Ice formations in the titlis glacier cave
A glacier cave is a गुफा formed भीतर the बर्फ of a glacier.
Glacier गुफाएं हैं प्रायः पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं, लकिन इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice.
In भौतिकी, गोलाकार गति is a गति of an ऑब्जेक्ट along the circumference of a circle or rotation along a circular path.
It can be uniform, with constant angular rate of रोटेशन ( और निरंतर गति ), or non-uniform साथ a बदलना rate of rotation.
The rotation around a फिक्स्ड अक्ष of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार motion of its parts.
The equations of motion describe the गति of the बीच of द्रव्यमान of a देह.
Examples of circular गति शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर ऊँचाई, a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is होने swung in वृत्त, a car turning through a वक्र in a रेस track, an इलेक्ट्रॉन moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a mechanism.
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly बदलना दिशा, the चलती ऑब्जेक्ट is undergoing त्वरण by a अभिकेन्द्रीय force in the direction of the center of rotation.
Without this acceleration, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a सीधा लकीर, according to न्यूटन 's कानून of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the undisputed हेवीवेट Champion of the World.
He was निभाई by कार्ल weathers.
पंथ था अनेक nicknames, सहित the निपुण of विपत्ति, the किंग of स्टिंग, the नाचना Destroyer, The Prince of Punch, The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto.
Urban लेजेंड राज्य कि अपोलो पंथ 's नाम is a wordplay on the रसूलों ' पंथ, a बयान of belief used in Christian churches.
All of Apollo 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित for the 15 round distance.
Championship झगड़े किया नहीं बदलें इससे 15 rounds to 12 rounds जबतक 1987.
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited साथ popularizing the रेड, श्वेत, और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ थी the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd और 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white, as seen in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature colors were black and gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in the नवीनतम फिल्म.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख ii of the संयुक्त States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter, अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a अदालत may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district judges of the United States district courts.
All of these judges described यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
In addition, judges of the Court of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the संघीय न्यायालयों, सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों, हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the President nor confirmed by the Senate, and their power derives from Article I instead.
देखिए आलेख i और आलेख III tribunals.
The beretta 21a बॉबकैट is a छोटी pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed by Beretta in Italy.
Production began in late 1984, solely in the beretta U.S.A. facility in Accokeek, Maryland.
it is a further विकास of the beretta मॉडल 20, whose production ended in 1985.
Variable सार्वभौमिक जीवन बीमे ( प्रायः shortened to vul ) is a प्रकार of जीवन बीमे कि builds a cash value.
In a VUL, the नकदी मान can be invested in a चौड़ी किस्में of पृथक खाते, समान to परस्पर funds, and the choice of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक खाते जिनकी मान vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' घटक in the नाम refers to the लचीलापन the मालिक रै in बनाना premium payments.
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums पारिभाषित by the आतंरिक आय कोड लिये जीवन insurance.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole जीवन बीमे कि रै फिक्स्ड प्रीमियम भुगतान कि typically can नहीं be छूटी बगैर lapsing the नीति ( हालांकि एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम ऋण विशेषता, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance, because the मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई समय as long as वहीँ is sufficient नकदी मान to अदा the लागत of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, नापसंद पूरे जीवन, वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the आयु at जिससे the नकदी मान बराबरी the मौत लाभ amount, which for whole life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another कुंजी लाभ of vul over Whole Life.
With a typical whole life नीति, the मौत लाभ is सीमित to the फेस राशि निर्दिष्ट in the policy, and at endowment age, the face amount is all that is paid out.
यूँ साथ either मौत or endowment, the बीमे कम्पनी keeps any cash value built up over the years.
However, some participating whole life policies offer riders which specify that any dividends paid on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to खरीदें `` सशुल्क up परिवर्धन '' to the नीति जिससे बढ़ाएँ दोनो the नकदी मान और the मौत लाभ over time.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the सामान्य खाता of the बीमे कम्पनी, a उच्चतर rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing मौत लाभ, और if a ऊँची rate-of-return is अर्जित in the पृथक खाते of a vul नीति, इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by लड़की स्काउट of the यूएसए ( gsusa ) as एक of इसके प्रमुख fundraisers लिये लोकल स्काउट units.
Members of the GSUSA have been selling कुकीज़ चूंकि 1917 to raise funds.
लड़कियों जो participate can earn पुरस्कार for their efforts.
There are भी ईकाई प्रोत्साहन if the ईकाई as a whole does well.
As of 2007, बिक्री यहूद अनुमानित at परिचय 200 million boxes per year.
विश्वविद्यालयों Hall
Purdue University, स्तिथ in वेस्ट lafayette, इंडियाना, is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General सभा, लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम, स्वीकृत a दान of जमीन और धन इससे lafayette बिजनेसमैन जॉन purdue to स्थापित a कॉलेज of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, and agriculture in his name.
The first classes were held on September 16, 1874, साथ छह instructors और 39 विद्यार्थी.
Today, Purdue is a member of the Big टेन सम्मेलन, और is a खूब ज्ञात world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in इंडियाना as खूब as the चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त States.
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 प्रमुख क्षेत्रों of पढ़ाई, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके प्रतिस्पर्धी अभियान्त्रिकी curricula.
The university has also been अत्यधिक influential in अमेरिका 's इतिहास of विमानन, having स्थापित the पहला कॉलेज क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान training, the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation, and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation technology कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the world.
In the mid-20th सदी, purdue 's विमानन कार्यक्रम विस्तारित to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
twenty-three purdue graduates have गए on to become astronauts, सहित गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts ), neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the first person to walk on the moon ), and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी ज्ञात as epidermal cysts ; l72.0 ) or पिलर cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
क्युकी an epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis और a पिलर गाँठ originates इससे बाल follicles, by परिभाषा, neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, श्वेत, semi-solid सामग्री in दोनो of ये गाँठ entities is नहीं sebum, लकिन keratin.
Furthermore, अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी neither एंटिटी contains वसामय glands.
In practice, however, the शर्तें हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are अपेक्षाकृत विरल और हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
आधुनिक pointe जूते.
The edge of the toe pad, जिससे is inserted between the पैर और टो बक्सा for cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe जूता is a प्रकार of जूता worn by बैले नर्तक जब performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless और sylph -like और have विकसित to enable नर्तक to नृत्य en pointe ( on the नुस्ख़े of उनके toes ) लिये विस्तारित अवधि of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though male नर्तक may पहनें उन्हें लिये अपरंपरागत भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला, नीचे in a midsummer रात्रि 's सपना, or मेन performing as महिलाओं in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
वे हैं manufactured in a किस्में of रंगों, most commonly in shades of light pink.
This tablespoon रै a क्षमता of परिचय 15 mL.
measuring spoons
In the US and parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest प्रकार of चमचा प्रयुक्त लिये खाने इससे a कटोरी.
In the uk, यूरोपीय और सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल देशों, a tablespoon is a प्रकार of large spoon usually used for serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon, the nearest समतुल्य to the us tablespoon is either the मिठाई चमचा or the सूप spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of one tablespoon, is commonly प्रयुक्त as a माप of आवाज़ in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is नहीं regulated by विधि और is विषय to considerable विभिन्नता.
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement ईकाई ) is लगभग 15 ml ; the क्षमता of an वास्तविक tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया एक tablespoon ( मापन unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a श्रेणी of सात काल्पनिक novels लिखा by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry Potter, और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark जादूगर रब voldemort, जिनकी aims हैं to become अमर, जीतें the wizarding संसार, subjugate non-magical people, and destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first अनोखा हैरी कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997, the किताबे have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide.
The series has also had some share of आलोचना, सहित चिंता लिये the increasingly अंधेरा टोन.
, the book series has sold about 450 million copies, making it the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in इतिहास, और रै महरूम अनूदित into 67 भाषाएं.
the पिछला चार किताबे consecutively नियत records as the fastest-selling books in history.
A series of many genres, सहित काल्पनिक और coming of आयु ( साथ तत्व of रहस्य, थ्रिलर, एडवेंचर, and romance ), it has many cultural meanings and references.
according to रोलिंग, the प्रमुख theme is death.
There are also many other विषयवस्तु in the श्रेणी, ऐसे as पूर्वाग्रह और भ्रष्टाचार.
The initial major publishers of the books were Bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम और scholastic दबायें in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The किताबे have चूंकि महरूम प्रकाशित by many publishers worldwide.
The books, with the सातवाँ किताब विभाजित into दो भाग, have महरूम बना into an eight-part फिल्मी श्रेणी by warner भाईs. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, बनाना the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रांड लायक in excess of $ 15 अरब.
भी due to the कामयाबी of the किताबे और films, हैरी कुम्हार रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये a थीम park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure.

viking 5c प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन
A rocket engine, or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '', is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket engines are reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance साथ न्यूटन 's तीसरा law.
Since they need no external सामग्री to रूप उनके जेट, प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन as खूब as स्थलीय उपयोग, such as missiles.
Most प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन हैं आतंरिक दहन इंजन, हालांकि non-combusting forms also exist.
Rocket engines as a group have the उच्चतम exhaust गतियाँ, हैं by दूर the lightest, लकिन हैं the तनिक propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार britney Spears.
It served as Spears 's debut सिंगल और शीर्षक track इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम,... baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
लिखा by अधिकतम मार्टिन और उत्पादित by मार्टिन और रामी, ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' थी released on September 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After recording and sending a डेमो टेप साथ an अप्रयुक्त सोंग इससे toni braxton, Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a टीन पॉप और dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a girl who regrets breaking up with her boyfriend.
The song received generally अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, जो praised its composition.
``... Baby One अधिक समय '' attained वैश्विक कामयाबी, reaching क्रमांक एक in every country it charted.
It also received numerous certifications around the world, and is एक of the best-selling singles of सब समय, साथ over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, निर्देशित by निगेल लंड, portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल, जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन और नाचना around the स्कूल, while watching her love interest from afar.
The music video was बाद संदर्भित in the म्यूज़िक वीडियो of `` if u तलाश एमी `` ( 2008 ), जहाँ स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is dressed with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One More Time '' was voted the third most influential वीडियो in the इतिहास of पॉप म्यूज़िक, in a पोल आयोजित by jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One More Time '' in a क्रमांक of सजीव दिखावे और in सब of उसके concert tours.
It was the encore of the... baby एक अधिक समय दौरे ( 1999 ) और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops !...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The m+m 's दौरे ( 2007 ), the सर्कस अभिनीत britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 ), और the femme fatale दौरे ( 2011 ).
``... Baby One More Time '' थी मनोनीत लिये a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन, और रै महरूम शामिल in सूचियाँ by Blender, Rolling Stone and VH1.
It has been विख्यात लिये redefining the ध्वनि of लेट 1990s music.
स्पीयर्स रै नामित ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' as एक of उसके पसंदीदा songs from her career.
It was also the फाइनल सोंग to be निभाई on the बीबीसी 's music programme Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an संक्रमण in the छोटी आंत caused by the bacterium vibrio cholerae.
The main symptoms हैं watery अतिसार और उल्टी.
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति, सहित एक साथ no apparent लक्षण.
The severity of the अतिसार और उल्टी can सीसे to रैपिड निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte imbalance, and death in some cases.
The primary उपचार is मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा, typically साथ मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान, to बदलें जल and electrolytes.
If this is not tolerated or करता नहीं provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are फायदेमंद in those साथ कठोर बीमारी to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 लाख लोगों और कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 मौतों a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published अनोखा by ऑस्कर वाइल्ड, appearing as the सीसे स्टोरी in lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 जून 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's editors feared the story was indecent as सुपुर्द, so वे censored roughly 500 शब्द, बगैर वाइल्ड 's ज्ञान, पहले publication.
But भी साथ कि, the स्टोरी थी स्टिल greeted साथ आक्रोश by अंग्रेजों reviewers, कुछ of जिसको सुझाया that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the स्टोरी लिये किताब प्रकाशन, बनाना substantial alterations, हटाना विवादास्पद passages, adding new chapters and including an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own right.
The amended संस्करण थी प्रकाशित by वार्ड, ताला and Company in April 1891.
Some scholars believe कि वाइल्ड होता आज have चाही us to पढ़ा the संस्करण he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man named डोरियन धूसर, the विषय of a पेंटिंग by कलाकार बेसिल Hallward.
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him, believing उसके सौंदर्य is जिम्मेदार लिये a नई विधि in उसके आर्ट.
डोरियन meets रब हेनरी wotton, a dost of बेसिल 's, और becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view.
espousing a नई hedonism, रब हेनरी suggests the तभी बाते लायक pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will फीका, डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट Basil has painted would age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a जीवन of विलासिता, the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a स्मरण of the प्रभाव प्रत्येक अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा, साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is considered a work of क्लासिक गोथिक fiction साथ a दमदार faustian थीम.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 फ़रवरी 1917 ), ज्ञात as ज़ा ज़ा गैबर ( ), is a हंगेरियाई -born American actress who acted in supporting roles in movies, on Broadway, and occasionally on television.
गैबर थी भी a socialite.
She began her stage career in Vienna at age 15, और थी पहनाया मिस हंगेरियाई in 1936.
She emigrated to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1941 और became a sought-after अभिनेत्री साथ `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर और style '', with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first movie role was as supporting अभिनेत्री in प्यारे to dekh at.
She later acted in we 're नहीं शादीशुदा !
and played एक of उसके few अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in moulin रूज ( 1952 ), निर्देशित by जॉन हस्टन, जो described her as a `` creditable '' actress.
Besides her film and television दिखावे, वो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये having नौ पतियों, सहित होटल महारथी कोनराड Hilton and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` Men have सदा liked me और i have सदा liked men.
But I like a mannish man, a man who knows कैसा to बात to और दावत a स्त्री – नहीं just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी martial कलाकार, कर्ता, martial कला प्रशिक्षक, पारस, और फिल्मकार.
The founder of Jeet Kune do, ली थी the बेटे of cantonese ओपेरा स्टार Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by टीकाकारों, आलोचकों, मीडिया और अन्य martial कलाकारों to be एक of the सबसे influential martial कलाकारों of सब समय, और a पॉप संस्कृति प्रतीक of the 20th century.
He is often credited साथ helping to बदलें the रास्ता एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in American films.
Lee was born in Chinatown, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग और थी उठाया in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
He was introduced to the फिल्मी उद्योग by उसके पिता और appeared in several films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to प्राप्त उसके उच्चतर शिक्षा, and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to a new level of लोकप्रियता और acclaim, sparking a surge of ब्याज in चाइनीज martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films changed and बहकावे martial कला और martial कला films in हांग काँग और the बाकी of the संसार.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The बिग boss ( 1971 ) और मुट्ठी of फ़्यूरी ( 1972 ) ; रास्ता of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ), निर्देशित और लिखा by ली ; warner भाइयो ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert Clouse.
Lee became an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout the संसार, विशेषकर among the चाइनीज, as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films.
He initially trained in wing chun, लकिन बाद अस्वीकृत well-defined martial आर्ट शैलियाँ, favouring बजाय the उपयोग of तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत, in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong काँग और the संयुक्त राज्य.
He died in कोलून टोंग on 20 जुलाई 1973 at आयु 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), भी ज्ञात as दीर्घकालिक obstructive फेफड़ों बीमारी ( ठंडा ), दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ), दीर्घकालिक airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( CORD ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
This limits airflow to and from the फेफड़े, causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea ).
in नैदानिक अभ्यास, copd is पारिभाषित by इसके characteristically कम airflow on lung function tests.
In contrast to asthma, इस limitation is poorly reversible और प्रायः gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious अणु or गैस, सबसे commonly इससे तम्बाकू धूम्रपान, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung.
The निदान of copd requires फेफड़ों फलन tests.
Important management रणनीति हैं धूम्रपान cessation, vaccinations, पुनर्वास, और ड्रग therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some patients go on to आवश्यकता long-term ऑक्सीजन चिकित्सा or फेफड़ों प्रत्यारोपण.
विश्वव्यापी, copd क्रमित as the छठे अग्रणी कारण of death in 1990.
It is projected to become the fourth leading कारण of मौत विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an बढ़ाएँ in धूम्रपान दरों और जनसांख्यिकी changes in many countries.
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S., and the economic बोझ of copd in the u.S. in 2007 थी $ 42.6 अरब in स्वास्थ्य परवाह लागत और खोया उत्पादकता.
annelies `` ऐनी '' मारी फ़्रैंक (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is एक of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust.
Her डायरी रै महरूम the आधार लिये several plays and films.
born in the नगर of फ्रैंकफर्ट am Main in Weimar Germany, she lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a जर्मनी नेशनल, फ़्रैंक खोया उसके नागरिकता in 1941.
She gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति मरणोपरांत बाद उसके डायरी was published.
It documents her experiences hiding during the जर्मनी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स in संसार युद्ध ii.
The फ़्रैंक परिवार स्थानांतरित इससे जर्मनी to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the year the Nazis gained control over Germany.
By the शुरूआत of 1940, वे यहूद फंस in एम्सटर्डम by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the परिवार गई into छुपाना in the छुपा कक्ष of ऐनी 's पिता, ओटो फ़्रैंक 's, office building.
After two years, the group was betrayed and transported to विशेषज्ञता camps.
ऐनी फ़्रैंक और उसके सिस्टर, margot, यहूद आखिरकार transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where they died of typhus in March 1945.
Otto Frank, the only survivor of the परिवार, लौटे to एम्सटर्डम बाद the युद्ध to ढूँढें कि ऐनी 's डायरी था महरूम saved, और उसके प्रयत्न led to इसके प्रकाशन in 1947.
It was translated from its original डच और पहला प्रकाशित in अंग्रेज़ी in 1952 as the डायरी of a यंग लड़की.
It has since been अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं.
the डायरी, जिससे थी दिए to ऐनी on उसके 13th जन्मदिवस, क्रॉनिकल्स her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – अप्रैल 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी, having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the कामयाबी of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x, और कोबेन hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
कोबेन, however, थी प्रायः असहज और कुंठित, believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम in Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, illness and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image, and the professional and lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी, संगीतकार कोर्टनी Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in सिएटल, the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The circumstances of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, साथ कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in the u.S., और over 50 लाख worldwide.

Radial engine of a बाईप्लेन
Master rod ( upright ), स्लेव और balances इससे a two-row, fourteen-cylinder pratt & व्हिटनी Twin Wasp
The radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine विन्यास in जिससे the सिलेंडर पाइंट outward इससे a सेंट्रल crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized स्टार जब viewed इससे the सामने, और is पुकारा a `` स्टार इंजन '' ( जर्मनी sternmotor ) in some languages.
The radial configuration was very commonly प्रयुक्त in वायुयान इंजन पहले टर्बाइन इंजन became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom, created by सुसान हैरिस, कि originally aired on एनबीसी इससे सितंबर 13, 1985, to may 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, बेट्टी श्वेत, rue mcclanahan और estelle getty, the दिखाएँ centers on चार पुरानी महिलाओं sharing a home in Miami, Florida.
It was produced by witt/thomas/harris प्रोडक्शन्स, in संघ साथ touchstone टेलीविज़न, और पॉल junger witt, टोनी थामस, और हैरिस served as the original executive producers.
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout सबसे of इसके चलाएं और जीती अनेक पुरस्कार, सहित the प्राइमटाइम Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe Awards लिये बेहतरीन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – musical or कॉमेडी.
All चार सितारों प्रत्येक प्राप्त an एमी पुरस्कार throughout the series ' run and had multiple nominations.
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated कार्यक्रम लिये छह आउट of इसके सात सीज़न.
Deepwater खुदाई is the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस खोजी and production in depths of more than 500 feet.
By this definition, वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater कुएं in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
It has been economically infeasible for many सालो, लकिन साथ उठती आयल कीमतें, अधिक कंपनियाँ हैं निवेश in इस area.
Major companies working in इस सेक्टर शामिल डायमंड offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of मोबाईल deepwater खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible खुदाई rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position संस्थापना ऐसे as a फ्लोटिंग spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
हाल उद्योग विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित कि the कुल व्यय in the वैश्विक deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all oil is accessible on जमीन or in shallow water.
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic उपकरण, आयल कंपनियाँ determine the खुदाई साइट सबसे संभावित to produce oil.
Then they use a मोबाईल offshore खुदाई ईकाई ( मोदू ) to खुदाई the initial well.
Some units are converted into उत्पादन rigs, अर्थ वे स्विच इससे खुदाई लिये oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the oil company will replace the MODU with a more permanent आयल उत्पादन रिग to कैप्चर oil.”... the मोदू 's जॉब is to ड्रिल bas into the समंदर 's मंजिल to ढूँढें आयल जमा.
The part of the drill that extends नीचे the डेक और through the जल is पुकारा the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to मूव between the मंजिल और the rig.
Engineers lower a drill string -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल जमा -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite दुर्घटनाओं in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred हत्या 11 मजदूर और spilling लाखो of गैलन of आयल into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the भूमध्यसागरीय और बंद the coast of ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी बाद a स्ट्रिंग of विशाल discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, विश्लेषक कह, is continuing ऊँची माँग लिये उर्जा worldwide.”
America needs the आयल so it is लगभग जरुरी to फेस the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater खुदाई in order for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf आयल उत्पादन होता विस्तार इससे इसके 2011 स्तर of 1.3 लाख barrels a दिन, स्टिल nearly a क्वार्टर of कुल घरेलू production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in both negative and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is स्टिल a hazardous संभावित निष्कर्ष.
Oil spills result in oil sinking to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering संयंत्र जीवन leaving मछली बगैर खाना और shelter to survive.
On the other hand deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the environment in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater oil खूब is नहीं in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और around the खूब बनाना a गुफा or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in.
deepwater खुदाई भी lets us देखिए the गहराइयों of the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the कुएं रिकार्ड फुटेज और लो फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास, giving वैज्ञानिक a dekh at पशु वे rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair और इसके परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
Francis Albert `` फ़्रैंक '' सिनात्रा,, ( दिसम्बर 12, 1915 – may 14, 1998 ) थी an American singer and film actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry जेम्स और टॉमी dorsey, सिनात्रा मिला unprecedented कामयाबी as a सोलो कलाकार इससे the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद being signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released उसके पहला एल्बम, the आवाज़ of फ़्रैंक Sinatra in 1946.
उसके पेशेवर करियर था stalled by the 1950s, लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद he जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded एल्बम ( ऐसे as in the मूत छोटी घंटों, गीतों लिये swingin ' प्रेमियों !, आइये मक्खी साथ me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert सिनात्रा & अंतोनियो कार्लोस jobim ), toured internationally, थी a founding सदस्य of the चूहा पैक और fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ और कूटनीतिज्ञों, सहित जॉन F. कैनेडी.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective सितंबर of my सालो, स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न खास फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा : a man और उसके म्यूज़िक, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in अनेक poorly प्राप्त films, सिनात्रा रिटायर्ड लिये the first time in 1971.
Two सालो बाद, however, he आए आउट of रिटायरमेंट और in 1973 अंकित अनेक एल्बम, स्कोरिंग a शीर्ष 40 hit साथ `` ( थीम From ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और internationally, जबतक a छोटी समय पहले his death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a अत्यधिक कामयाब करियर as a फिल्मी actor.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he भी garnered a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ the सुनहरी भुजा, और नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
He also starred in such musicals as ऊँची समाज, pal जॉय, यारों और डॉल और on the कस्बा.
Sinatra थी सम्मानित at the कैनेडी बीच honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता by रोनाल्ड Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the प्राप्तकर्ता of ग्यारह ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित the ग्रैमी trustees पुरस्कार, ग्रैमी Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling कलाकारों of सब समय, having बेची अधिक than 150 लाख copies worldwide.
ठेठ cornhole board
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, मकई टॉस, baggo or बैग, is a लॉन खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना मकई छेद बैग at a उठाया मंच साथ a hole in the far end.
A bag in the छेद स्कोर 3 अंक, जबकि एक on the मंच scores 1 point.
खेल continues जबतक a टोली or खिलाड़ी reaches the score of 21.
The अमरीकी सुनहरा त्रिभुज is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion सिक्का of the United States.
Authorized under the Gold bullion सिक्का अधिनियम of 1985, it थी पहला released by the संयुक्त States Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized शुरूआत in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स और consist of the वही श्रेणी of 26 postures और 2 श्वास exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, हास्य और rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret in Nickelodeon television series Zoey 101.
Massey has received many awards and नामांकन सहित a यंग कलाकार पुरस्कार और एमी पुरस्कार nominations.
He is also known for appearing in अनेक commercials in the early 2000s.
A conventional teaspoon बना of बेदाग स्टील.
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring यंत्र, as खूब as a ईकाई of मापन of आवाज़ in कुछ countries and customs.
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 प्रजाति of पौधे belonging to the वनस्पति समूह known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, they have xylem and फ्लोएम ( बनाना उन्हें vascular plants ).
They have stems, पत्ते, और जड़ें जैसे अन्य vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं और have neither बीज nor flowers.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, लकिन ferns as पारिभाषित यहाँ ( भी पुकारा monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte भी refers to ferns और a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण section below ).
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million सालो पहले in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the वर्तमान परिवारों और प्रजाति किया नहीं appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी cretaceous ( बाद flowering पौधे came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as शोभायमान पौधे, लिये remediating contaminated soils, और have महरूम the विषय of शोध लिये उनके क्षमता to हटाएँ कुछ रासायनिक प्रदूषक इससे the air.
कुछ हैं significant weeds.
They also play a role in mythology, आयुर्विज्ञान, और art.
Flat roofs in इसराईल
Flat छत in लॉस एंजिल्स
A चपटा छत is a प्रकार of covering for a building.
In contrast to the more sloped रूप of छत, a चपटा छत is आड़ा or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs which are nearly flat are ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs ( as the कोण of ढलान increases, so the pitch is said to increase ).
Any sheet of सामग्री प्रयुक्त to कवर a चपटा or low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक purpose of ये झिल्लियों is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the जल to चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on गार्डन sheds sometimes बहती freely बंद the किनारे of a छत, हालांकि gutter प्रणालियों हैं of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead जल सीधे onto the मैदान, or better, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs प्रायः सीसे जल into the rainwater नाले प्रणाली of any built up area.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, प्रायः लिये aesthetic उद्देश्य, or लिये rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs exist all over the संसार और प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल रै इसके अपना परंपरा or वरीयता लिये सामग्री used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is कम और जमने is असंभावित to occur, अनेक चपटा roofs हैं बस निर्मित of चिनाई or कंक्रीट और इस is शुभ at keeping आउट the ऊष्मा of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available.
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and leak, or where water soaked into the brickwork could फ्रीज to बर्फ और यूँ सीसे to 'blowing ' ( तोड़कर up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable.
traditionally सबसे चपटा roofs in the पश्चिमी संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक usually tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV किरणें और मौसम बंद it और helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering and degradation.
Roof अलंकार is प्रायः of प्लाईवुड, chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक, भी ज्ञात as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar केतली, or as चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और sealed साथ at joints by hot तारकोल - एकबार it रै cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing, यूँ exposing it to मौसम और सूर्य whereupon cracking और blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
Tarpaper is प्रायः a 'paper ' or fibre सामग्री soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands, tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित साथ ठीक बजरी लागू to the hot तारकोल दौरान the प्रक्रम of manufacture ऐसे कि a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
tarpapers vary in विशेषता as करता the कारीगरी और प्रशिक्षण of those applying it to produce more or less successful results.
In कुछ सूक्ष्म climates or छायांकित क्षेत्रों ये बल्कि 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can पिछला खूब in संबंध to the लागत of सामग्री purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over recent years to make them more and more affordable.
There are now अधिक firms supplying आधुनिक विकल्प और वहीँ is generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability.
If a leak does occur on a चपटा छत तब क्षति प्रायः goes unnoticed लिये long अवधि of समय दौरान जिससे जल penetrates and soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to महंगी क्षति इससे the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if बाएँ can weaken the roof structure.
There are also various स्वास्थ्य risks to लोगों और पशु श्वास the सांचे बीजाणुओं : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does घुस the अवरोध covering ( be it परंपरागत or a आधुनिक झिल्ली ) it can सफर a long रास्ता पहले causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen.
Thus it is not easy to see where it is टपकती in अनुक्रम to मरम्मत it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of जल in कि क्षेत्रफल और the प्रॉब्लम worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क which contains data.
The name is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``.
Computers can read cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं लिखें on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र, सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player, जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( ऐसे as आईएसओ 9660 स्वरूप pc CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the तकनीकी मानक कि defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
एक of a नियत of color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप, the पीला किताब, निर्मित by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the स्वरूप to थाम कोई रूप of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), कलम नाम J. K. रोलिंग, is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the लेखक of the हैरी कुम्हार fantasy series.
The कुम्हार किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान, जीती अनेक पुरस्कार, और sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in इतिहास, और महरूम the आधार लिये a श्रेणी of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the स्क्रिप्ट as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a शोधकर्ता और दुभाषिया सचिव लिये माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार लिये the हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother, divorce from her first husband and poverty जबतक रोलिंग समाप्त the पहला अनोखा in the श्रेणी, हैरी कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently प्रकाशित 6 sequels—the पिछला, हैरी कुम्हार और the deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her agency and resumed लिखने in the रूप of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at वयस्क readership, हकदार the Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults, the other for children younger than the हैरी कुम्हार दर्शक, और वो expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` जीवन स्टोरी, in जिससे वो progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire status within five years.
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling लेखक चूंकि रिकॉर्ड began, साथ बिक्री in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times समृद्ध सूची अनुमानित रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ), रैंकिंग उसके as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth सबसे शक्तिशाली हस्ती of 2007, और समय पत्रिका नामित उसके as a runner-up लिये इसके 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she has given her fans.
In October 2010, Rowling was नामित the `` सबसे influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी magazine editors.
वो रै become a notable लोकसेवक, supporting ऐसे धर्मार्थ as कॉमिक राहत, एक जनक परिवारों, Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level Group ).
Auburndale is a city in polk काउंटी, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 11,032 at the 2000 census.
According to the u.s जनसांख्यिकी estimates of 2005, the नगर था a जनसांख्यिकी of 12,381.
It is part of the lakeland – शीत हेवन महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
hurricane इसाबेल ( 2003 ) as देखी इससे कक्षा दौरान expedition 7 of the International Space Station.
The नजर, eyewall, और surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, are clearly visible in this view from space.
A तीव्र चक्रवात is a तूफ़ान प्रणाली characterized by a low-pressure बीच घिरी by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen जब जल काफूर इससे the समंदर is released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय, resulting in संघनन of water vapor contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a अलग ऊष्मा यांत्रिकी than अन्य cyclonic windstorms ऐसे as nor'easters, European windstorms, and polar lows.
The characteristic that separates तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि at कोई ऊँचाई in the माहौल, the बीच of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers दोनो to the भौगोलिक उत्पत्ति of ये प्रणालियों, जिससे प्रायः रूप in तीव्र regions of the ग्लोब, और to their formation in maritime tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति, साथ counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere.
The opposite direction of the हवा प्रवाह is a परिणाम of the कॉरिऑलिस force.
Depending on its location and strength, a तीव्र चक्रवात is referred to by names ऐसे as hurricane (, ), तूफ़ान ( ), तीव्र तूफ़ान, cyclonic तूफ़ान, तीव्र depression, and simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely शक्तिशाली हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात, वे हैं भी समर्थ to उपज ऊँची लहरें, damaging तूफ़ान surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over विशाल लाशें of गरम जल, और खोना उनके शक्ति if वे मूव over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source.
इस is क्यों तटीय regions can प्राप्त significant क्षति इससे a तीव्र चक्रवात, जबकि inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding अंतर्देशीय, और तूफ़ान surges can उपज extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to इससे the तटरेखा.
Although their effects on human populations can be विनाशकारी, तीव्र cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, जिससे makes उन्हें an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the वैश्विक atmospheric circulation mechanism.
As a result, tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल, और to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत stable और गरम तापमान worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop when the वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a कमजोर disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable.
The background पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological चक्र और पैटर्न ऐसे as the Madden-Julian oscillation, El Niño-Southern Oscillation, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
अन्य रूप जब अन्य प्रकार of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
Tropical systems are तब स्थानांतरित by परिचालन हवाएँ in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the शर्तें remain अनुकूल, the तीव्र disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the वर्णक्रम, if the शर्तें around the प्रणाली deteriorate or the तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall, the प्रणाली weakens and eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of ये प्रणालियों साथ वर्तमान प्रौद्योगिकी.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; दिसम्बर 9, 1916 ) is an अमरीकी स्टेज और फिल्मी कर्ता, फिल्मी निर्माता और author.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust for Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the o.k. corral ( 1957 ), the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ), स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ), निर्जन हैं the वीर ( 1962 ), सात दिनों in may ( 1964 ), The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is no.17 on the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the महानतम पुरूष अमरीकी स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब समय, making him the highest-ranked living person on the list.
in 1996, he प्राप्त the अकादमी मानद पुरस्कार `` लिये 50 सालो as a creative and moral force in the motion picture community. ''
He is one of the last surviving actors इससे हॉलीवुड 's `` सुनहरी आयु ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally कामयाब detroit-area कलाकार, he performed और अंकित as bob seger and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he था dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी to नीयत for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put together the चांदी गोली बैंड, a समूह of detroit-area संगीतकारों, साथ जिसको he became सबसे कामयाब on the नेशनल स्तर साथ the album Live Bullet, recorded live with the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he हासिल a नेशनल ब्रेकआउट साथ the स्टुडियो एल्बम Night Moves.
On his studio albums, he also worked extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय खण्ड, जिससे appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker साथ a क्लासिक raspy, चिल्लाना आवाज़, seger लिखा और अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम, महिलाओं, blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has recorded many hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the Page, '' `` we 've मिला tonight, '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा, '' और shakedown कि थी लिखा लिये बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop ii और `` जैसे a चट्टान, '' और भी co-wrote the ईगल्स ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
उसके iconic रिकॉर्डिंग of `` बूढ़ा समय चट्टान और फेंकें `` थी नामित one of the Songs of the Century in 2001.
With a career spanning पाँच दशकों, seger continues to perform और रिकार्ड आज.
seger थी inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( जनवरी 9, 1913 – अप्रैल 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba लिंडा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय सरकारी in 1942.
He subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान World War II.
Nixon थी निर्वाचित in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist, और elevated उसे to national prominence.
he थी the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served लिये आठ सालो as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960, narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र, और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ the सोवियत Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों, और स्थापित the पर्यावरणीय Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11, he scaled वापस manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of the प्रशासन.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग and removal from office.
बाद उसके इस्तीफा, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In रिटायरमेंट, निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक books and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, और died चार दिनों later at the age of 81.
{ { infobox सीनेटर
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट और Sen. Sumner.
ब्रैडी 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American साम्राज्यवाद in the caribbean और fearful कि annexation होता सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक गणतंत्र of हैती, became कायल कि भ्रष्टाचार lay पीछे the सन्धि, और कि मेन बंद to the अध्यक्ष shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, sen. sumner initially withheld उसके राय on the सन्धि on जनवरी 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from सहायक सचिव of राज्य, bancroft डेविस, कि u.s. नवल जहाजों were being used to protect President Báez.
sen. sumner 's कमेटी voted विरूद्ध annexation और at sen. sumner’s सुझाव और काफी संभवतः to सहेजें the पार्टी from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted और भेजा संदेश to कॉंग्रेस in एहसान of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out विरूद्ध the सन्धि ; warnng कि वहीँ होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों, noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह that took place on the island, and the risk that the independence of Haiti, recognized by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि और असंवैधानिक.
आखिरकार, on जून 30, 1870 the सन्धि थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
The following day, President Grant, feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s बंद dost J. lothrop motley, दूत to ब्रिटेन.
By autumn, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the सचिव of राज्य लिये failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two मेन, मित्रों जबतक तब, cooled into bitter enemies.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire सेंटो डोमिंगो somehow, sumner दिया a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President Grant, supported by his Secretary of State हैमिल्टन मछली, था initiated a अभियान to depose sumner इससे the अध्यक्षता of the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध कमेटी.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having रोका ग्रान्ट 's डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र सन्धि attempt, sumner था पराजित ग्रान्ट 's पूरा repeal of the कार्यकाल of दफ्तर अधिनियम, अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's नामांकन of सिकंदर स्टीवर्ट to u.S. सचिव of राजकोष, और महरूम a निरंतर harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go.
Grant resented sumner 's बड़प्पन of manner, as well.
Told once that Sumner किया नहीं मानना in the बाइबल, the अध्यक्ष is supposed to have कहा कि he थी नहीं surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, sumner’s स्वास्थ्य began to मनाही.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, सीनेटरों संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, ज्ञात as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to oust sen. sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a रूप of लागू आचार or पेशेवर आचार कि examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment.
It applies to all पहलुओं of कारोबार conduct और is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals और entire organizations.
Business ethics has दोनो normative और वर्णनात्मक आयाम.
As a कॉरपोरेट अभ्यास और a करियर specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to understand कारोबार बर्ताव employ वर्णनात्मक विधि.
The range and quantity of कारोबार नैतिक मुद्दे reflects the बातचीत of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in business आचार त्वरित dramatically दौरान the 1980s और 1990s, दोनो भीतर प्रमुख corporations and within academia.
For example, today most प्रमुख corporations प्रचार उनके प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings ऐसे as आचार कोड और सोशल responsibility charters.
Adam Smith said, `` People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment और diversion, लकिन the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the पब्लिक, or in कुछ contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to पाइंट कारोबार बर्ताव in what they perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and विवरण of बर्ताव कि झूठ परे सरकारी कंट्रोल.
The emergence of large corporations with limited संबंध और संवेदनशीलता to the समुदायों in जिससे वे operate त्वरित the विकास of औपचारिक आचार regimes.
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or स्किन caused by ऊष्मा, विद्युत, रसायन, घर्षण, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the सतही स्किन ( ज्ञात as सतही or पहला उपाधि ) or extend into the deeper स्किन लकिन do नहीं involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues, such as muscle or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे मामला the बर्न is either पूरा मोटाई ( तीसरा उपाधि ) or fourth degree.
The treatment जरूरी depends on the गंभीरता of the burn.
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि प्रमुख burns may आवश्यकता prolonged उपचार in specialized burn centers.
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if एक्सपोज़र is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह तापमान.
Partial thickness burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई साथ साबुन और जल followed by dressings.
फफोले चाहिए typically be बाएँ unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually require सर्जिकल उपचार ऐसे as स्किन कलम और extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता large amount of intravenous fluids.
The most common जटिलताओं of burns हैं सम्बन्धित to संक्रमण.
While large burns can be fatal, आधुनिक उपचार विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 million people तलाश चिकित्सा उपचार और 300,000 लोगों die from burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a बर्न बीच, लगभग 4 % die इससे their injuries.
The long term outcome is primarily सम्बन्धित to the आकार of बर्न और the आयु of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, नहीं सहित आर्कटिक और अंटार्कटिक regions
इस वीडियो थी लिया by the क्रू of Expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the Island of Newfoundland over the North अटलांटिक समंदर to सेंट्रल अफ़्रीकी, over दक्षिण Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन.
With a total क्षेत्रफल of परिचय, it कवर लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's सतह और परिचय 29 percent of its water surface area.
The first part of its नाम refers to एटलस of यूनानी mythology, बनाना the अटलांटिक the `` समुद्र of Atlas ''.
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The histories of हिरोडोटस around 450 bc ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : अटलांटिस थलैसा ( यूनानी : ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; अंग्रेज़ी : समुद्र of Atlas ).
The term Ethiopic Ocean, derived from Ethiopia, थी लागू to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as लेट as the mid-19th सदी.
Before Europeans discovered अन्य महासागर, the पद `` समंदर '' itself थी synonymous साथ the waters परे the जलसन्धि of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic.
The जल्दी यूनानियों believed इस समंदर to be a gigantic नदी encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, s-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally between यूरेशिया और अफ़्रीकी to the ईस्ट, and the Americas to the west.
As one component of the interconnected global ocean, it is connected in the north to the आर्कटिक समंदर ( जिससे is sometimes माना a समुद्र of the अटलांटिक ), to the प्रशांत समंदर in the दक्षिणपश्चिम, the भारतीय समंदर in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( अन्य परिभाषाएं describe the अटलांटिक as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर और दक्षिण अटलांटिक Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a unique पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to नीति ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
the following हैं सूचियाँ इससे जिससे these tropical and subtropical cyclone names are derived.
White light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is दृश्य to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण in इस दायरा of wavelengths is called visible light or simply light.
A ठेठ इंसान नजर होगा respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, इस corresponds to a बैंड in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted नजर generally रै इसके अधिकतम संवेदनशीलता at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ), in the ग्रीन प्रदेश of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ).
The spectrum does not, however, contain सब the रंगों कि the इंसान आँखें और दिमाग can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or जामुनी विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as magenta, हैं अनुपस्थित, लिये उदाहरण, क्युकी वे can be बना तभी by a mix of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing तभी एक wavelength हैं भी called pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` ऑप्टिकल खिड़की ``, the प्रदेश of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of this phenomenon is कि साफ एयर scatters ब्लू लाइट अधिक than रेड wavelengths, और so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is भी पुकारा the दृश्य खिड़की क्युकी it overlaps the human visible response spectrum.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just आउट of the इंसान दृष्टि, as खूब as the मीडियम wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की और the long wavelength or दूर इन्फ्रारेड ( lwir or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
अनेक प्रजाति can देखिए लाइट साथ बारंबारता बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम, '' जिससे is defined in terms of human vision.
मधुमक्खियों और अनेक अन्य कीट can detect पराबैंगनी लाइट, which helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant प्रजाति कि निर्भर on कीट परागण may owe reproductive कामयाबी to उनके रूप in पराबैंगनी लाइट, rather than how colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can देखिए into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range, however, can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट or कोई अन्य reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' दृश्य वर्णक्रम ends at परिचय 590nm, बस पहले the orange wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see कुछ रेड wavelengths, लकिन नहीं as अनेक as humans.
Zebras ( or ) are several प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा परिवार ) संयुक्त by उनके distinctive black and white stripes.
उनके धारियाँ आइये in अलग पैटर्न, unique to each individual.
They are generally सोशल पशु कि सजीव in छोटी harems to large herds.
Unlike उनके closest रिश्तेदारों, घोड़े और asses, zebras have never महरूम truly domesticated.
There are तीन प्रजाति of zebras : the मैदान zebra, the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra.
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus hippotigris, लकिन grévy 's जेब्रा is the एकमात्र प्रजाति of subgenus dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an गधा, to जिससे it is closely सम्बन्धित, जबकि the पूर्व two are more horse-like.
सब तीन belong to the genus equus, along with other living equids.
The unique stripes of zebras मेक उन्हें एक of the पशु सबसे परिचित to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, ऐसे as grasslands, savannas, वुडलैंड्स, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations, in particular शिकार लिये खालें और आवास विनाश.
Grévy 's zebra and the mountain जेब्रा हैं endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – हालांकि वहीँ is फिलहाल a योजना, पुकारा the quagga प्रोजेक्ट, कि aims to नस्ल zebras कि हैं phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back.
Barry White, born Barry यूजीन कार्टर ( – ), थी an अमरीकी composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for उसके distinctive बास आवाज़ और रोमांटिक चित्र, श्वेत 's महानतम कामयाबी आए in the 1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the प्रेम असीमित ऑर्केस्ट्रा, crafting अनेक enduring आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और डिस्को गीतों ऐसे as उसके दो biggest हिट्स, `` तुम 're the पहला, the पिछला, my Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with इसहाक़ हेज़, श्वेत is माना by allmusic.com as a पायोनियर of disco music in the early 1970s.
During the course of his career in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार, श्वेत हासिल 106 सुनहरा एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, 41 of जिससे भी attained platinum status.
White had 20 gold and 10 प्लेटिनम singles, साथ विश्वव्यापी बिक्री in excess of 100 लाख, according to आलोचकों Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James Cleveland, Ray चार्ल्स, एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन प्लस motown कलाकारों the supremes, the चार टॉप और मारविन Gaye.
Angelina जोली (, born एंजेलीना जोली वोइट ; जून 4, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, film director, and screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, two Screen Actors गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, और थी नामित हॉलीवुड 's highest-paid अभिनेत्री by फोर्ब्स in 2009 और 2011.
जोली promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी, और is विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य साथ शरणार्थियों as a खास envoy और पूर्व साख Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has often been cited as the world 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत '' स्त्री, a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो रै प्राप्त substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father jon वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी आउट ( 1982 ), लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक बाद साथ the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a major film थी in the cyber-thriller हैकर्स ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films जार्ज वालेस ( 1997 ) और gia ( 1998 ), और जीती an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl, Interrupted ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved चौड़ी कीर्ति बाद उसके portrayal of वीडियो खेल नायिका लारा क्रॉफ्ट in लारा क्रॉफ्ट : मकबरा रेडर ( 2001 ), और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in हॉलीवुड with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action star career with Mr. & mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं to date—and प्राप्त further नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas a mighty दिल ( 2007 ) और changeling ( 2008 ), जिससे earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress.
Jolie बना उसके directorial डेब्यू साथ the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton, जोली अभी जीवनदान साथ कर्ता ब्रैड pitt, in a संबंध notable लिये fervent मीडिया attention.
Jolie and Pitt have तीन biological children और तीन adopted children.
A प्राकृतिक मेहराब उत्पादित by the अपरदन of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the प्रक्रम by जिससे मृदा और चट्टान हैं removed इससे the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं such as wind or water flow, and then transported and deposited in other locations.
While erosion is a natural process, human activities have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे अपरदन is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion causes problems such as desertification, decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation, sedimentation of जलमार्गों, और ecological पतन due to घाटा of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the दो प्राथमिक कल्याणकारी of जमीन degradation ; संयुक्त, वे हैं जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl हैं amongst the सबसे significant इंसान क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to उनके प्रभाव on stimulating erosion.
However, there are many available alternative land use practices कि can काटना or सीमा अपरदन, ऐसे as छत -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on एमटीवी इससे दिसम्बर 3, 2009 to दिसम्बर 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of आठ housemates बिता उनके गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold पूर्वोत्तर शीत to मियामी बीच, साथ ऋतु 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
The चौथी ऋतु, फिल्माया in इटली, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The दिखाएँ लौटे लिये a पांचवां ऋतु, at Seaside Heights on January 5, 2012.
The पांचवां ऋतु finale aired on March 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, MTV पुष्टि कि the श्रेणी होता वापसी लिये their sixth season.
On अगस्त 30, 2012, एमटीवी घोषित कि the श्रेणी होगा समाप्त बाद the छठे season, which premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on दिसम्बर 20, 2012.
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / guidette, '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes, और scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों were not residents of the area.
The series garnered रिकार्ड दरजा लिये एमटीवी, बनाना it the संजाल 's सबसे viewed series telecast ever.
The series ' डाल have भी महरूम credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon and phrases into American popular culture.
The University of Chicago and the विश्वविद्यालयों of ओक्लाहोमा हैं among the शैक्षणिक संस्थानों कि have था वर्ग or सम्मेलनों परिचय the दिखाएँ.
In 2010, the cast of Jersey Shore was named on बारबरा walters ' 10 सबसे fascinating लोगों सूची, और the श्रेणी रै चूंकि महरूम exported to दर्जनों of देशों worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in अन्य देशों, साथ दो नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात geordie shore, नियत in न्यूकैसल upon Tyne, England.
The other is The Valleys, the वेल्श समतुल्य, जिससे is फिल्माया और नियत in Cardiff.
The only other official रीमेक of the दिखाएँ is gandía shore, नियत in gandía, स्पेन.
