United States territory is कोई extent of प्रदेश अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of the संघीय government of the United States, including all waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, और मैनेजिंग its territory.
This extent of territory is सब the क्षेत्रफल belonging to, और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे शामिल tracts lying at a अलहदा from the country ) for administrative and other purposes.
the संयुक्त राज्य कुल territory शामिल a उपसमुच्चय of राजनैतिक divisions.
The U.S. government is a सरकारी साथ प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां अंतर्गत the संयुक्त States Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the संयुक्त राज्य by the संविधान, nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य, हैं सुरक्षित to the राज्य respectively, or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 विज्ञान fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी निर्देशित by जोनाथन mostow और अभिनीत अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर, उपनाम stahl, क्लेयर danes और Kristanna Loken.
It is the दूसरी sequel to the टर्मिनेटर ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to kill सारा connor पहले उसके बेटे is born और to मार जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड, it भेजना वापस another टर्मिनेटर, the T-X, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible.
This includes John 's future wife, but नहीं जॉन खुद as उसके whereabouts हैं अनजान to स्काईनेट.
John 's जीवन is लगाई in खतरे जब the t-x accidentally finds him.
A cord of लकडी
the cord is a ईकाई of माप of शुष्क आवाज़ used in Canada and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of wood that, when `` ranked and खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं लकीर, समानांतर, छु और कॉम्पैक्ट ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, and deep ; or कोई अन्य व्यवस्था of रैखिक माप कि yields the वही volume.
The name cord probably आता इससे the उपयोग of a cord or स्ट्रिंग to measure it.
the, is an 8-bit हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल यंत्र developed and manufactured by Nintendo.
It was released in Japan on, in उत्तर अमेरिका in, और in यूरोपीय on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & विकास 1 —the वही स्टाफ जो था designed the खेल & देखें श्रेणी as खूब as अनेक लोकप्रिय खेल लिये the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली.
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 और 1998, in the रूप of खेल लड़के जेब, और खेल लड़के लाइट ( जापानी तभी ), respectively.
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the खेल & देखें श्रेणी introduced in, और it संयुक्त सुविधाएँ इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो entertainment System and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled साथ the पहेली खेल टेट्रिस.
As part of the चौथी पीढी of गेमिंग, the खेल लड़के competed साथ the sega खेल Gear, Atari Lynx, and the TurboExpress.
despite ये अन्य technologically श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the Game Boy was a tremendous success.
The Game Boy और इसके successor, the खेल लड़के रंग, have दोनो संयुक्त बेची 118.69 million units worldwide.
Upon its release in the United States, it बेची इसके संपूर्ण शिपमेंट of एक लाख इकाई within weeks.
The संसार व्यापार बीच is a जटिल of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क City, United States, replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site.
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin towers, जिससे खोली on अप्रैल 4, 1973 और यहूद नष्ट in the सितंबर 11 हमले of 2001, along with 7 World Trade Center.
The other इमारतें in the जटिल यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले, और their ruins were eventually demolished.
The site is being rebuilt with five नई skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल to those मारे in the हमले.
, only one skyscraper रै महरूम समाप्त ; the अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित to be समाप्त before 2020.
One World Trade Center होगा be the सीसे भवन लिये the नई जटिल, reaching अधिक than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in नई यॉर्क नगर on अप्रैल 30, 2012, और is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त by 2013.
A sixth tower is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 संसार व्यापार बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '', यहूद the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the मैरियट संसार व्यापार बीच ), 4 wtc, 5 wtc, 6 wtc, and 7 WTC.
All of ये इमारतें यहूद निर्मित between 1975 and 1985.
The cost for the निर्माण थी $ 400 लाख ( $ in dollars ).
The complex was located in the heart of New York City 's शहर वित्तीय ज़िला और contained 13.4 लाख वर्गाकार फीट ( 1.24 लाख m2 ) of office space.
The World Trade Center अनुभवी a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 और a डकैती on, 1998.
In 1998, the बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार decided to privatize the संसार व्यापार बीच, पट्टे the इमारतें to a निजी company to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767 jets into the जटिल, एक into प्रत्येक मीनार, in a coordinated terrorist attack.
After burning for 56 minutes, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour बाद by the उत्तर मीनार ( 1 ), साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार बीच resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling debris from the towers, combined with fires that the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब the अन्य इमारतें in the जटिल और caused अनर्थकारी damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area.
The प्रक्रम of क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at the संसार व्यापार बीच site took eight months.
Over the following सालो, योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt संसार व्यापार Center took form.
The first new building at the site was 7 संसार व्यापार बीच, जिससे खोली in.
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ), स्थापित in to oversee the पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम, व्यवस्थित प्रतियोगिताओं to चुनें a साईट plan and memorial design.
मेमोरी मूलाधार, designed by डेनियल libeskind, थी चयनित as the निपुण योजना, but this went through substantial changes in design.
The new संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल होगा शामिल एक संसार व्यापार बीच, three other high-rise office towers, and the National September 11 Memorial & Museum.
सैन जिबरील Mountains
San Bernardino kyu, साथ mt. सैन gorgonio in the अग्रभूमि और बिग भालू Lake in the background.
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain ranges of southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया, in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ physiographic प्रदेश in उत्तर अमेरिका.
The अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ शुरू at the दक्षिणी समाप्त of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego counties.
They derive the नाम अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ due to उनके east-west अभिविन्यास, बनाना उन्हें अनुप्रस्थ to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains.
Periodic table साथ इलेक्ट्रॉन shells
An electron shell may be thought of as an कक्षा followed by electrons around an अणु 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the केंद्रक is पुकारा the `` 1 शेल '' ( भी पुकारा `` k शेल '' ), followed by the `` 2 शेल '' ( or `` l शेल '' ), तब the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the nucleus.
The shell letters K, l, m,..., प्रयुक्त in the x-ray संकेतन, हैं alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of electrons : the 1st शेल can थाम up to दो electrons, the 2nd शेल can थाम up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an atom 's electrons होगा generally occupy बाहरी शेल तभी if the अधिक भीतरी शेल have already महरूम completely भर by अन्य electrons.
However, this is not a strict requirement : अणु may have दो or भी तीन अधूरी outer shells.
( See madelung नियम लिये अधिक विवरण. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in ये शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन विन्यास.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or शेल ) determine the रासायनिक गुण of the अणु ; it is called the valence shell.
Each shell consists of एक or अधिक subshells, और प्रत्येक subshell consists of एक or अधिक परमाणु orbitals.
vickie lynn मार्शल ( née होगन ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), ज्ञात by उसके moniker anna निकोल Smith, was an American model, actress, and television personality.
स्मिथ पहला gained लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय, बनने the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled लिये कपडे कंपनियाँ, सहित अंदाज़ा jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped आउट of ऊँची स्कूल और थी married in 1985.
Her अत्यधिक publicized दूसरी विवाह to आयल कारोबार mogul, J. हावर्ड मार्शल, 62 सालो उसके वरिष्ठ, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his money, which she denied.
following मार्शल 's मौत, स्मिथ began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his estate.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार, और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार ( अभी पुकारा Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a हॉलीवुड, फ्लोरिडा होटल रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of नुस्खा दवाएँ.
भीतर the फाइनल छह महीने of उसके जीवन, स्मिथ थी the फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of उसके बेटे, डेनियल, and the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of जापानी yen.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using जापानी वर्ण ज्ञात as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट ``, और यहूद भी minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much उच्चतर मान of the येन, वे यहूद minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing आउट of the जल, साथ `` पाँच येन '' लिखा in कांजी ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या, भी in कांजी, अलग by sprouts of a tree.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent कृषि और fisheries, the कुंजी तत्व of the जापानी first-sector economy.
Around a hole, वहीँ is a गियर कि represents उद्योग.
It is the only Japanese coin in परिसंचरण to कमी अरबी numerals on either face.
TLC is an American लड़की समूह जिनकी रंगमंडल spanned r & b, हिप हॉप, आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और new jack swing.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` t-boz '' वाटकिंस, rapper लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes और सिंगर rozonda `` chilli '' थामस, the समूह मिला unprecedented कामयाबी in the 1990s जबकि also enduring a series of spats with the law, each other, and the group 's record label.
Initially, tlc हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the रिलीज of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
On the tlc टिप, जिससे बेची 6 लाख copies worldwide.
however, it थी उनके दूसरी एल्बम, crazysexycool, कि catapulted the group to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified डायमंड by the riaa — a पहला लिये a मादा समूह, और आखिरकार बेची 23 million copies worldwide.
Five years later, the group released उनके तीसरा एल्बम fanmail, जिससे became the समूह 's पहला एल्बम to डेब्यू at क्रमांक एक और बेची more than 11 million copies worldwide.
The subsequent tour following fanmails रिलीज became the उच्चतम grossing tour of all time by a female band.
In 2002, लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes died in a car दुर्घटना in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's चौथी एल्बम 3d, जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी, it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine ranked tlc as एक of the महानतम musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the बैंड संचित टेन शीर्ष टेन singles, चार क्रमांक एक singles, चार multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC was ranked as the seventh सबसे कामयाब अधिनियम of the 1990s by बिलबोर्ड.
In 2008, the समूह थी inducted into the सब समय hot 100 कलाकार हॉल of Fame by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That year it थी भी सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 r & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold more than 65 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी और वे हैं क्रमित as the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling मादा समूह of सब समय, and the best selling female R & B group of all time.
In 2012, tlc क्रमित 12th on vh1 's 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, होने ranked the number one all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन और वितरित by Walt Disney Pictures.
The 37th film in the Walt डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक, it is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the apes by एडगर राइस बरोज, और is the तभी प्रमुख गति picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima साथ a पटकथा by tab मर्फी, bob tzudiker, और नोनी श्वेत, टार्ज़न सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें of टोनी goldwyn, minnie ड्राइवर, ग्लेन बंद, और रोजी o'donnell साथ ब्रायन धन्य, तलवार henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump of the जल्दी 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of its रिलीज, इसके उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 लाख बना it the सबसे महंगी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना, जबतक अव्वल by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was also the first Disney एनिमेटेड विशेषता to खोलें at # 1 चूंकि pocahontas.
This was the last major box दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
Oil मंच p-51 बंद the ब्राज़ीलियाई coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil मंच mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to drill wells, to निकालें और प्रक्रम आयल और प्राकृतिक गैस, और to temporarily स्टोर उत्पाद जबतक it can be brought to shore लिये शोधन और marketing.
In many मामले, the मंच contains सुविधाएं to हाउस the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the मंच may be फिक्स्ड to the समंदर मंजिल, may consist of an कृत्रिम island, or may float.
रिमोट subsea कुएं may भी be कनेक्ट to a मंच by flow lines and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of एक or अधिक subsea कुएं, or of एक or अधिक manifold केंद्रों लिये अनेक कुएं.
Slaughter is the killing of पशु, प्रायः कि of घरेलू पशुधन लिये food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle, water buffalo ( for beef and veal ), sheep, goats ( for lamb and मटन ), सूअर ( लिये पोर्क ), घोड़े ( लिये घोड़ा मांस ), और fowl, largely मुर्गियों, turkeys, और बतखों और increasingly मछली इससे the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).

Under the United States संविधान, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of राज्य and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the United States by influence and recognition.
The अध्यक्ष is भी the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष बहुमत of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice, और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The अध्यक्ष जरूर be at तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those व्यक्तियों जो यहूद sworn into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, देखिए अध्यक्ष of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into दफ्तर, और 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष, चार died in दफ्तर of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन, zachary टेलर, वारेन G. हार्डिंग, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी कॉलेज.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 दिनों in 1841, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into उसके चौथी पद in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two शर्तें, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन, थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners इससे मतदान यहूद repealed.
Warren हार्डिंग थी the पहला निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – जॉन q एडम्स, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote लकिन assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, बराक ओबामा, is the पहला अध्यक्ष of अफ़्रीकी descent.

AWM-F sniper rifle साथ संलग्न suppressor.
A suppressor, ध्वनि suppressor, or ध्वनि मॉडरेटर, is a यंत्र संलग्न to or भाग of the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव, और प्रायः the राशि of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be प्रयुक्त दोनो साथ a firearm और साथ संपीडित एयर gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य, विशेषकर एक चलती तेज़ than the गति of ध्वनि, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. वृहद than 300 मीटर ) can lessen, or retard, the रपट at the पल of प्रभाव, और बनाएँ the impression of silence near the target.
The noise heard near the muzzle as a प्रक्षेप्य पत्ते the बैरल, हालांकि subdued, is नहीं मूक at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder साथ आतंरिक mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant गैस and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors यहूद निर्मित around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by several inventors.
अमरीकी आविष्कारक hiram पर्सी कहावत ( नहीं to be उलझन साथ hiram स्टीवंस कहावत, hiram पर्सी 's पिता, और the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun ), is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave उसके यंत्र the trademarked name Maxim Silencer.
The muffler for internal दहन इंजन थी विकसित in समानांतर साथ the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th सदी, using अनेक of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use, although it has चूंकि गिरे आउट of एहसान साथ कुछ, विशेषकर among the firearms उद्योग, होने replaced साथ the अधिक वस्तुतः सटीक पद ध्वनि suppressor or बस suppressor, क्युकी a `` ध्वनि suppressor '' करता not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging.
आम उपयोग और u.S. विधान भाषा एहसान the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. law, the शर्तें `` firearm मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the संयुक्त राज्य दफ्तर of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, जो favored the newly designed ऊँची मानक hdm.22 long Rifle pistol during World War II.
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट at the श्वेत हाउस.
according to oss शोध मुख्य स्टेनली लोवेल, डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा और विश्वसनीय dost of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished his message, Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he था brought साथ उसे, घोषित कया he था किया और हात the धूम्रपान गन to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination पिस्टल साथ an अभिन्न suppressor थी भी प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी oss on clandestine परिचालन in नाजी occupied यूरोपीय दौरान the Second World War.
beatrice `` bea '' आर्थर ( may 13, 1922 – अप्रैल 25, 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी actress, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the अक्षर maude findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude, और as डोरोथी zbornak on the 1980s sitcom the सुनहरी Girls, winning Emmy Awards for both roles.
A stage actress both पहले और बाद उसके टेलीविज़न कामयाबी, वो जीती the टोनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शित अभिनेत्री in a musical लिये उसके प्रदर्शन as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken video game series, produced by Digital frontier और वितरित by asmik इक्का entertainment in संघ साथ बंदाई Entertainment.

For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary पड़ोस वकालत समूह, देखिए पड़ोस association.
In the United States, a homeowner संघ is a निगम formed by a रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन, मैनेजिंग, and selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision.
It grants the developer विशेषाधिकार मतदान अधिकारों in शासी the संघ, जबकि allowing the डेवलपर to निकास वित्तीय और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन, typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners संघ by a आवासीय खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and are subject to राज्य statutes कि govern non-profit corporations और homeowner एसोसिएशन.
State oversight of homeowner एसोसिएशन is minimal, और मुख्यतः takes the रूप of कानून जिससे हैं असंगत इससे state to state.
Some states, such as फ्लोरिडा और कैलिफ़ोर्निया, have a विशाल देह of homeowner संघ विधि, और कुछ राज्य, ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स, have वस्तुतः no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family घरों, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
Since 1964, homeowner एसोसिएशन have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute व्यापार संघ अनुमानित कि hoas governed 24.8 लाख अमरीकी घरों और 62 लाख निवासियों in 2010.

There are many breeds of गिनी सुअर जिससे have महरूम विकसित चूंकि its domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in रूप और purpose, ranging इससे दिखाएँ breeds साथ long, बहती बाल to those in उपयोग as मॉडल जीवों by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532, selective breeding by स्वदेशी दक्षिण अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में of घरेलू गिनी pigs, which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds यहूद primarily रखा as agricultural भण्डार लिये खाना, और प्रयत्न at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era.
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th century, the goal in प्रजनन shifted to फ़ोकस on the विकास of appealing pets.
To this end, various competitive प्रजनन संगठन यहूद संस्थापित by fanciers.
The American Cavy प्रजनक संघ, an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक संघ, is the शासी देह in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
The British cavy परिषद governs cavy क्लब in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल cavy परिषद ) और नई जीलैंड ( नई जीलैंड cavy Club ).
Each club publishes इसके अपना मानक of पूर्णता और determines जिससे breeds हैं eligible for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there are many breeds of Guinea pig, तभी a few breeds हैं commonly मिला on the दिखाएँ तालिका as pets.
Most Guinea pigs मिला as पालतु यहूद either मिला अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or यहूद करवाया to be सुखद पालतु regardless of कैसा खूब वे मिलें the नस्ल standard of perfection.
The short hair, Abyssinian, Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently देखी as पालतु, और the पूर्व तीन हैं the कोर breeds in the इतिहास of the प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रर्दशित of Guinea pigs.
In addition to their standard form, nearly सब breeds आइये in a साटन रूपांतर.
Satins, due to उनके खोखला बाल shafts, possess coats of a खास gloss and shine.
However, there is growing evidence that the genes जिम्मेदार लिये the साटन कोट भी can कारण कठोर अस्थि समस्याएं, सहित osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy प्रजनक ' एसोसिएशन क्युकी of एनिमल welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have कुछ साझा सामान्य मानकों : the सिर प्रोफ़ाइल चाहिए be rounded, with large eyes and large, smooth ears.
The body should be दमदार और of कॉम्पैक्ट निर्माण.
Coat रंग चाहिए in सब विसंगतियाँ be clearly पारिभाषित और thorough from root to tip.
These मानकों हैं बेहतरीन मिले by long स्थापित, commonly करवाया breeds, as उनके प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त समय और पशु to effectively breed for these qualities.
the कोट रंग आदर्श of शुभ परिभाषा और thoroughness is rarely मिले by अन्य than the चिकना coated breeds, जिससे have था खूब established, separate breeding lines for different colours.
State schools ( भी ज्ञात as पब्लिक स्कूलों or सरकारी स्कूलों ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or द्वितीयक स्कूलों mandated लिये or offered to सब children बगैर चार्ज सशुल्क लिये, in पूरे or in part, by taxation.
The term may also refer to institutions of post-secondary education वित्तपोषित, in पूरे or in भाग, और overseen by सरकारी.
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules जिनकी अनुक्रम is नियंत्रित by the अनुक्रम of मेसेंजर RNA molecules.
This is required by सब जीना कोशिकाएं और संबद्ध viruses.
the राइबोसोम ( इससे ribonucleic एसिड और the यूनानी सोम, अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a विशाल और जटिल आणविक यंत्र, मिला भीतर सब जीना कोशिकाएं, कि serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
ribosomes कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ in the अनुक्रम specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules.
ribosomes consist of दो प्रमुख subunits—the छोटी ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna, जबकि the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain.
Each subunit is composed of एक or अधिक ribosomal rna ( rrna ) अणुओं और a किस्में of proteins.
The sequence of DNA encoding लिये a प्रोटीन may be कॉपी अनेक टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) जंजीरों of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and use it as a template for determining the सही अनुक्रम of अमीनो acids in a particular प्रोटीन.
Amino acids are selected, collected and carried to the राइबोसोम by ट्रांसफ़र rna ( trna अणुओं ), जिससे डालें एक भाग of the राइबोसोम और bind to the messenger RNA chain.
The attached amino acids are then linked साथ by another भाग of the राइबोसोम.
Once the protein is उत्पादित, it can तब 'fold ' to उपज a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक three-dimensional structure.
A ribosome is बना इससे देवालय of rnas और प्रोटीन और is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein.
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit बांधता to the mrna पैटर्न, जबकि the larger subunit बांधता to the trna और the अमीनो acids.
When a ribosome finishes पढना an mrna अणु, ये दो subunits split apart.
Ribosomes are ribozymes, क्युकी the catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
Ribosomes from bacteria, archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of जीवन on धरती ) differ in उनके आकार, अनुक्रम, ढांचा, और the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes, जबकि leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA chain at एक समय, प्रत्येक `` पढना '' इसके अनुक्रम और producing a सम्बन्धित प्रोटीन अणु.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the संभावित विकासवादी origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, Christian de Duve, and George एमिल palade यहूद jointly awarded the नोबेल पुरस्कार in physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान, in 1974, लिये the डिस्कवरी of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 थी awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा of a हरितलवक
Overview of the Calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid झिल्लियों.
These reactions take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further रासायनिक प्रक्रियाओं on उन्हें.
There are तीन phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ, collectively पुकारा the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी when light is available.
Plants do नहीं carry आउट the calvin cycle by night.
वे, बजाय, रिलीज sucrose into the फ्लोएम from their starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the दयालु of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
In mathematics, a square number or पूर्ण वर्गाकार is an पूर्णांक कि is the वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक ; in अन्य शब्द, it is the उत्पाद of कुछ पूर्णांक साथ itself.
For example, 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक, चूंकि it can be लिखा as.
The usual notation for the formula for the वर्गाकार of a क्रमांक is नहीं the उत्पाद, लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक, प्रायः सुनाया as `` squared ''.
The name वर्गाकार क्रमांक आता इससे the नाम of the आकार ; see below.
Square संख्याएँ हैं non-negative.
another रास्ता of saying कि a ( non-negative ) number is a square number, is that its square roots are again integers.
For उदाहरण, = ±3, so 9 is a वर्गाकार number.
A positive पूर्णांक कि रै no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors except 1 is called square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th वर्गाकार क्रमांक is, साथ होने the zeroth square.
the अवधारणा of वर्गाकार can be विस्तारित to कुछ other number systems.
if तर्कसंगत संख्याएँ हैं शामिल, तब a वर्गाकार is the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers, और, conversely, the अनुपात of two square integers is a square ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting with 1, there are वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और सहित, जहाँ the अभिव्यक्ति represents the floor of the number.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the राजनैतिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected a भाव of नेशनल purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
the era देखी the पतन of the federalist पार्टी और an समाप्त to the कड़वा दलगत विवादों between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System.
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in बनाना उसके nominations, साथ the परम लक्ष्य of नेशनल unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely संबद्ध साथ मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) और उसके प्रशासनिक लक्ष्य कि his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in अमरीकी राजनीती साथ the समाप्त of the federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका began to develop बाद the युद्ध of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, इस era भी marks the पहला उदाहरण of आर्थिक परेशानियों in the growing संयुक्त States.
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the दूसरी बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य जटिल the टेंशन between the उत्तर और दक्षिण with the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with विडंबना क्युकी of the राजनैतिक turmoil, आर्थिक कारकों caused animosity between the उत्तर और दक्षिण.
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the इतिहास of the era थी एक in जिससे the राजनैतिक माहौल थी strained और divisive, विशेषकर among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, Columbian centinel, on जुलाई 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स as भाग of उसके शुभ होगा दौरे of America.
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी professional soccer player.
Hamm played many years as a forward लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल सॉकर टोली और थी a founding सदस्य of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than any अन्य खिलाड़ी, पुरूष or मादा, in the इतिहास of सॉकर और is the तीसरा सबसे capped female player in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the पहला दो टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ), और is सूचीबद्ध as एक of फीफा 's 125 बेहतरीन जीना खिलाड़ी ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports हॉल of कीर्ति और टेक्सास खेल हॉल of कीर्ति.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to जीतना in सॉकर और जीवन और appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र हिम्मत to सपना : the स्टोरी of the u.S. महिलाओं 's सॉकर टोली.
Washington Post columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा hamm, `` शायद the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण athlete of the last 15 years. ''
hamm takes a कोने kick.
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team आधारित in हैरिसन, नई जर्सी, representing the नई York metropolitan area.
The team competes in the पूर्वी सम्मेलन of प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten charter क्लब of mls, having competed in the लीग चूंकि its inception.
The team was a founding सदस्य of mls ( 1996 ), लकिन रै gone through several name changes.
The team was originally ज्ञात as the नई york/new जर्सी MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 ऋतु through the 2005 ऋतु, the टोली थी ज्ञात as the MetroStars.
On March 9, 2006, the team was बेची to रेड सांड gmbh, अग्रणी to the टोली 's वर्तमान name.
They are the only original MLS मताधिकार नहीं to have जीती कोई significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित नियमित ऋतु, playoffs, और knockout competition ) since inception.
the टोली 's बेहतरीन परिणाम in the mls थी the mls Cup final in 2008.
in the us खोलें कप, the metrostars पहुँचे तीन semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), पहले reaching उनके पहला फाइनल in 2003, losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the metros ' क्लिंट mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड by स्कोरिंग पाँच लक्ष्य in a game against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, alexi lalas, क्लिंट mathis, jozy altidore, माइकल ब्राडली, क्लाउडियो reyna, एडी पोप, रॉबर्टो donadoni, lothar matthäus, एडोल्फो वालेंसिया, youri djorkaeff, amado ग्वेरा, जुआन पाब्लो ángel, thierry Henry, Juninho Pernambucano, Jan Gunnar Solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also had well-known coaches, including Carlos Queiroz, Carlos Alberto Parreira, Bora milutinović, bob ब्राडली, mo johnston, Bruce Arena and Hans Backe.
Confucianism, Taoism, and Buddhism are one, a पेंटिंग in the litang स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a नदी स्ट्रीम, 12th सदी, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world, or in अनेक देशों, is मुश्किल due to definitional मुद्दे as खूब as व्यावहारिक problems of enumeration.
To begin साथ, the धार्मिक मान्यताओं, practices, और पहचान of ईस्ट एशियाइ ( जो comprise the बहुमत of the संसार 's बौद्धों by कोई माप ) प्रायः मिश्रण Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, Daoism, Shinto, and Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to संरचित congregations, or observe a definite अनुष्ठान of adherence ऐसे as लेने शरण, बनाना it मुश्किल to accurately अनुमान the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the hostility of अनेक नेशनल सरकारें ( प्रायः कम्युनिस्ट ones ऐसे as चीन or उत्तर कोरियाई ) to धर्म generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक योग कि may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the worldwide बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over एक अरब, लकिन क्लस्टर nearer to the first figure.
adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397 million.
By प्रमुख शाखाओं, the संख्याएँ are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, सहित ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism, साथ no कम than 185 लाख adherents, और संभवतः अनेक टाइम्स कि many ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in चीन, दक्षिण कोरियाई, जापानी, ताईवान, सिंगापुर, और Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism, साथ no कम than 125 लाख adherents.
This is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in Cambodia, Thailand, Laos, Sri Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, साथ लगभग 20 लाख adherents.
This form predominates in the वृहद तिब्बती और मंगोलियाई regions, as खूब as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan, and various territories within कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन, वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of रूस ( e.g. कालमिकिया, बुर्यातिया ), इण्डिया ( e.g. लद्दाख, सिक्किम ), और नेपाल ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, also known as Tibetan Buddhism, is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism, but this is imprecise, as shingon और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism भी अभ्यास तन्त्र.
At least 7 देशों ( श्री लंका, थाईलैंड, कंबोडिया, लाओस, बर्मा, भूटान, और मंगोल ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other East Asian adherents, इस फिगर might विस्तार to शामिल several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया और भूटान, और receives prominent जिक्र in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka.
In northern India and Nepal, the जमीन जहाँ buddhism थी born, the धर्म severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether this decline was due to the इस्लामी conquest of उत्तरी इण्डिया, or to अन्य कारकों, remains controversial.
See the article मनाही of buddhism in इण्डिया.
James बटलर hickok ( may 27, 1837 – अगस्त 2, 1876 ), बेहतर known as Wild Bill Hickok, was a folk hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter and scout, along with his reputation as a lawman, provided the आधार लिये उसके कीर्ति, हालांकि कुछ of उसके reported कारनामे हैं fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois, hickok गई वेस्ट at आयु 18 as a भगोड़े इससे इंसाफ, पहला working as a stagecoach ड्राइवर, पहले he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska.
He fought for the Union फौज दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध, और gained publicity बाद the युद्ध as a स्काउट, marksman, कर्ता, और पेशेवर gambler.
Between his law-enforcement duties and gambling, which easily overlapped, hickok थी शामिल in अनेक notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & मन 's सैलून in deadwood, डकोटा territory ( अभी दक्षिण Dakota ).
Artist 's conception of the जिज्ञासा रोवर vaporizing चट्टान on Mars.
The rover उतरा on मंगल in अगस्त 2012.
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself आरपार the सतह of the ग्रह मंगल बाद लैंडिंग.
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting सुविधाएँ, वे can प्लेस themselves in सनी स्थितियाँ to मौसम शीत महीने और वे can अग्रिम the ज्ञान of कैसा to perform बहुत रिमोट रोबोटिक गाडी control.
There have been four कामयाब robotically संचालित मंगल रोवर्स.
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory प्रबंधित the मंगल pathfinder मिशन और इसके अभी निष्क्रिय sojourner रोवर.
It currently manages the मंगल खोजी रोवर मिशन 's क्रियाशील अवसर रोवर और निष्क्रिय स्पिरिट, और, as भाग of the Mars Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity rover.
A financial audit, or more accurately, an ऑडिट of वित्तीय कथन, is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय कथन of a विधिक एंटिटी, with a view to express an audit opinion.
the ऑडिट राय is intended to provide उचित परख, लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख, कि the वित्तीय कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly, in सब सामग्री respects, and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements, which increases the value and credibility of the वित्तीय कथन उत्पादित by प्रबन्धन, यूँ बढ़ाएँ उपयोक्ता विश्वास in the वित्तीय बयान, reduce निवेशकों रिस्क और नतीजतन reduce the लागत of पूंजी of the preparer of the वित्तीय कथन.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग.
The financial audit is one of many assurance कृत्यों provided by हिसाब firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire आतंरिक auditors, जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः on the आतंरिक नियंत्रण of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited रिलायंस on the कार्य of आतंरिक auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures बना by an संगठन, इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce of ऐसे corporations to छिपाते unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auditing और परख मानकों फलक ( iaasb ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process.
लगभग सब jurisdictions आवश्यकता auditors to follow the ISA or a local variation of the ISA.
Dollar coins have been minted in the संयुक्त राज्य in सुनहरा, चांदी, और आधार मेटल संस्करण.
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United States साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर, हालांकि purists जिद कि a डालर is नहीं चांदी जबतक it contains कुछ of कि मेटल.
चांदी डॉलर, the पहला डालर coin issue, were minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored डॉलर have भी महरूम उत्पादित by the United States.
the sacagawea और अध्यक्षीय डॉलर हैं प्रायः referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
In modern times, dollar coins have नहीं महरूम बहुत लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Despite efforts by the सरकारी to प्रचार उनके उपयोग, सबसे अमेरिकी currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
in सीधा और स्तर उड़ान lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked turn of 60°, लिफ्ट बराबरी दोगुना the वज़न ( L=2W ).
The pilot experiences 2g और a doubled वज़न.
The steeper the बैंको, the वृहद the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate इससे शून्य to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the लंबवत g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( साथ g इससे गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a पद लिये accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is नहीं a फ़ोर्स, प्रति se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a force is आभास as a वज़न, कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' ( देखिए the synonym specific weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for प्रत्येक ईकाई of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's द्रव्यमान, और ( सहेजें लिये निश्चित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ोर्स प्रभाव ) is the कारण of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's त्वरण in संबंध to free-fall.
This acceleration अनुभवी by an ऑब्जेक्ट is due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed proper accelerations, और it is तभी ये कि हैं measured in g-force units.
They cause तनावों और strains on objects.
क्युकी of ये strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting अलोन करता नहीं उपज a g-force, भी हालांकि g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
Thus, the मानक गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती 's सतह produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward दिशा by the मैदान, keeping the object from going into free-fall.
The upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating सापेक्ष to the free-fall कंडीशन, जिससे is the पाथ कि the ऑब्जेक्ट होता follow जब गिरना freely toward the धरती 's center.
Objects अनुमत to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' शर्तें अंदर a freely गिरना लिफ्ट गिरना toward the धरती 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) शर्तें inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are examples of coordinate त्वरण ( a बदलें in गति ) बगैर a सनसनी of weight.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is उत्पादित, is synonymous साथ weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at सही कोण to उन्हें, उचित और निर्देशांक accelerations हैं the वही, और कोई निर्देशांक त्वरण जरूर be उत्पादित by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in free space, in which simple changes in velocity हैं उत्पादित by the इंजन, और उपज g-forces on the प्रक्षेपास्त्र और यात्री.
an augur पकड़कर a lituus, the curved wand प्रायः used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a पुजारी और आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय संसार, विशेषकर प्राचीन रोम और etruria.
His main role was to interpret the will of the gods by studying the उड़ान of पक्षियों : whether वे हैं उड़ती in समूह or अलोन, कया noises वे मेक as वे मक्खी, दिशा of flight and what kind of birds they are.
इस थी ज्ञात as `` taking the auspices. ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major undertaking in रोमन society—public or private—including matters of युद्ध, कॉमर्स, and religion.
The Roman historian Livy तनावों the महत्व of the augurs : `` जो करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices, कि सबकुछ in युद्ध and in peace, at home and abroad, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
farmington पहाड़ियाँ is an affluent जातियाँ in southeastern Michigan.
It is the दूसरी largest नगर in ओकलैंड काउंटी in the u.S. state of Michigan.
इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is part of the upscale northwestern उपनगरों of महानगर डेट्रॉयट और is भी पूर्वोत्तर of शहर Ann Arbor.
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ consistently बाँधने as एक of the safest शहरों in the United States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
in 2010, the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the 30th safest city in America.
Although the two cities have पृथक सेवाएं और पता, farmington और farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं often thought of as the same community.
Features of the community include a recently संवर शहर, boutiques, a विंटेज सिनेमा, numerous रेस्तरां, exotic car dealerships, art galleries, and public parks including Heritage Park.
वहीँ हैं अनेक ऐतिहासिक साइट सहित the longacre House and the Governor Warner Mansion.
Both शहरों हैं परोसा by Farmington Public Schools.
farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a प्रमुख कारोबार बीच for the greater Detroit area.
present-day छाप of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town मुहर ( मेट्रिक्स ) of náchod इससे 1570
A seal is a device for making an छाप in मोम, मिट्टी, पेपर, or कुछ अन्य मीडियम, सहित an embossment on पेपर, और is भी the छाप thus made.
The original purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper for one such as a आधुनिक लिफाफा, or the कवर of a संग्राहक or पैकेज पकड़कर valuables or अन्य वस्तुएँ.
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the final image represented on the device for making the छाप by a mirror-image डिज़ाइन, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप ( or, अधिक rarely, the sealing ).
If the छाप is बना purely as a राहत resulting इससे the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच, the मुहर is ज्ञात as a शुष्क मुहर ; in सब अन्य मामले a द्रव or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another color than the paper.
For विधिक उद्देश्य, the परिभाषा of a मुहर may be विस्तारित to include rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the संयुक्त राज्य, the शब्द `` मुहर '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ), which may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings, on flags, or on official letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the United States, among other uses, appears on the रिवर्स of the one-dollar विधेयक ; और अनेक of the seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on उनके संबंधित state flags.
In यूरोपीय, हालांकि coats of बाहें और heraldic बैज may खूब विशेषता in ऐसे contexts as खूब as on seals, the मुहर डिज़ाइन in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
the पढ़ाई of seals is ज्ञात as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this दिन, तब वसन्त होगा आइये जल्दी ; if it is सनी, the groundhog होगा माना देखिए इसके छाया और रिट्रीट वापस into इसके burrow, और the शीत मौसम will continue for six more weeks.
Modern customs of the अवकाश involve जश्न जहाँ जल्दी morning त्यौहार हैं आयोजित to देखें the groundhog उभरते इससे इसके burrow.
In southeastern पेन्सिलवेनिया, groundhog lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate the अवकाश साथ fersommlinge, सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा, speeches are made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the तभी भाषा बोला at the इवेंट, और those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड, प्रायः in the रूप of a निकल, dime, or quarter per word spoken, with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
The largest groundhog दिन जश्न is आयोजित in punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received widespread ध्यान as a परिणाम of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन, जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney, pa ( हालांकि filmed primarily in Woodstock, IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
ऊँची रेज़ोल्यूशन चित्र of Tampa Bay region
The tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रै a आर्द्र उपोष्ण जलवायु ( koppen cfa ), साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
The area अनुभवों a significant गर्मियाँ गीला ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the सालाना वर्षण जलप्रपात in the months of June through September.
The area is listed by the United States Department of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ नारियल हथेलियां और royal palms can be grown.
Highs प्रायः दायरा between 65 और 95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round.
Though known for hot summers, tampa 's आधिकारिक ऊँची रै never पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. पीटर्सबर्ग 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a प्रायद्वीप between tampa खाड़ी और the गल्फ of मैक्सिको, और much of the नगर of tampa झूठ on a छोटी प्रायद्वीप jutting out into Tampa Bay.
This निकटता to विशाल लाशें of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In general, the local communities farthest from the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ, दोनो दौरान a सिंगल दिन और throughout the सीज़न of the year.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा of बारंबारता और wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of सब संभावित बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a अलग अर्थ, और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित or अवशोषित by कि particular ऑब्जेक्ट.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर bas to a भिन्न of the आकार of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान लिये spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; जनवरी 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), भी ज्ञात by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932, as उसके घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद लिये the मध्य तीसरा of the 20th सदी.
With the bouncy लोकप्रिय सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम, fdr पराजित incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii, और restoring समृद्धि to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ), और सुधार ( through विनियमन of वॉल गली, बैंको and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a गहन मंदी.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग, जिससे स्टिल exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम, जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933, और सोशल सुरक्षा, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, साथ the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी, fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease सहायता to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी साथ ब्रिटेन.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड war effort.
As an active सैन्य नेता, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी नागरिकों.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers, और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt वर्चस्व the अमरीकी राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह years of his presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the पांचवां Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big city मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और ग्रामीण श्वेत southerners.
He also बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the संयुक्त Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ साथ अब्राहम Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी left of center. ''
A Joint कमेटी is a पद in राजनीती कि is प्रयुक्त to refer to a committee made up of members of both chambers of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a कमेटी साथ सदस्यों इससे अधिक than एक organization.
The regulation of prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य is नहीं among the enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most राज्य, वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It थी at एक समय माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the तभी राज्य to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 counties फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow brothel वेश्यावृति, लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी फिलहाल have no क्रियाशील brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' और जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three व्यापक श्रेणी : गली वेश्यावृति, वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, और अनुरक्षण वेश्यावृति.
The national flag of the United राज्य of अमेरिका, प्रायः बस referred to as the अमरीकी ध्वज, consists of तेरह बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of रेड ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और became the पहला राज्य in the Union.
Nicknames for the ध्वज शामिल the `` सितारों और धारियाँ '', `` बूढ़ा महिमा ``, और `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ territories.
The states and territories हैं further subdivided into जिले और so on.
Congressional जिले लिये the 113th संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional जिले, starting in 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
2000 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional जिले, इससे 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional जिले लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
The मात्रा ( apportionment ) और सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of जिले हैं संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी, हालांकि in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This सूची शामिल the 435 वर्तमान और over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, since the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, नेब्रास्का रै था तीन जिले, but it used to have as many as six.
In the first दशक of the twenty-first सदी, टेक्सास था 32 जिले, लकिन रै चूंकि added चार due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost जिले चूंकि the क्रमांक of congressional सीटे रै महरूम नियत at 435 by statute.
Also शामिल यहाँ हैं non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान and four obsolete.
The सीमाएँ of जिले प्रायः शिफ़्ट with each redistricting.
Over time, the region and जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला can बदलें substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the वही सीमाएँ जबकि बदलना उनके ज़िला numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia रिकॉर्ड कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार क्रमांक एक singles on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ), और मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ), कैरी थी established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate इससे उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और धीरे traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of तितली ( 1997 ), at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग इससे mottola.
Carey बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 लाख recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a शारीरिक और emotional विश्लेषण and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful काल, लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट साथ The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व, और ब्लैक रील और NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold more than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक Awards.
कैरी थी भी नामित the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
according to the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक one single in the United States, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, और 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा, शक्ति, melismatic स्टाइल और signature use of the whistle register.
stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a cloud is a दृश्य द्रव्यमान of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals बना of जल or विभिन्न रसायन निलंबित in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
ये निलंबित अणु are also known as aerosols.
बादल in धरती 's माहौल हैं पढ़ाई in the cloud physics branch of meteorology.
Two processes, possibly एक्टिंग साथ, can सीसे to एयर बनने संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the एयर or adding जल वाष्प to the air.
In general, precipitation will पतन to the सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, जिससे evaporates पहले reaching the सतह.
The international cloud classification system is आधारित on the फैक्ट बादल in उनके सबसे मौलिक फ़ॉर्म can दिखाएँ free-convective upward विकास जैसे कपासी, appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें ऐसे as स्ट्रेट्स, or लो the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express विसंगतियाँ or complexities in ये मौलिक फ़ॉर्म or to बताएँ मध्य or ऊँची ऊँचाई ranges.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to भारी वर्षण, alto- लिये मध्य बादल, और cirro- लिये ऊँची बादल ; the latter दो of जिससे may be of सरल or मध्यम complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, मध्य, or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर the मैदान its base forms.
Cloud प्रकार साथ significant लंबवत extent can रूप in the कम or मध्य ऊँचाई ranges depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of ल्यूक हावर्ड 's बादल categorization प्रणाली, जिससे began to स्प्रेड in लोकप्रियता during December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations उपयोग कोड संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड और रपट the प्रकार of tropospheric बादल दृश्य at प्रत्येक अनुसूचित अवलोकन समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई और शारीरिक appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल, वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere where बादल may be देखी हैं collectively ज्ञात as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere और exosphere, जिससे साथ मेक up the heterosphere कि marks the transition to outer space.
Clouds have महरूम observed on अन्य ग्रह और moons भीतर the सौर प्रणाली, लकिन, due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ, वे हैं रचित of अन्य substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
galveston काउंटी is a काउंटी स्तिथ in the u.S. राज्य of टेक्सास भीतर the houston–sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the जनसांख्यिकी was 291,309.
Its काउंटी सीट is galveston.
League नगर is the largest नगर in galveston काउंटी in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.
Galveston County was संस्थापित in 1838.

freeport, बहामा
This is a list of cities in the बहामा.
The following table lists the city or town name, the भौगोलिक निर्देशांक, the जनसांख्यिकी as of the 1990 जनसांख्यिकी, an अनुमान of the जनसांख्यिकी as of 2009, and the island name.
The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference, is the oldest प्रभाग i कॉलेज एथलेटिक सम्मेलन in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research विश्वविद्यालयों in उनके संबंधित राज्य, well-regarded academically, और साथ अपेक्षाकृत विशाल छात्र नामांकन ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the NCAA 's प्रभाग i ; इसके फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ), formerly ज्ञात as प्रभाग i-a, the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport.
Member schools of the बिग टेन ( or, in दो मामले, उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी हैं सदस्यों of the कमेटी on संस्थागत सहयोग, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 स्कूलों, following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the सम्मेलन होगा विस्तार to 14 सदस्यों साथ the परिवर्धन of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड, कॉलेज Park and Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
It is not to be उलझन साथ the बिग 12 सम्मेलन, जिससे रै तभी टेन स्कूलों और represents a different region of the country.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in स्कॉटलैंड using a घट स्टिल आसवन प्रक्रम at a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी, साथ malted जौ as the तभी grain ingredient.
As with any Scotch whisky, a single malt Scotch must be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in ओक casks in स्कॉटलैंड लिये at तनिक तीन सालो ( सबसे सिंगल malts हैं matured longer ).
`` malt '' indicates कि the व्हिस्की is distilled from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of दाने can be malted ( लिये उदाहरण, जौ, rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने which can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt Scotch, barley is always the only grain used.
`` सिंगल '' indicates कि सब the malts in the bottle come from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt whisky from अनेक distilleries हैं पुकारा `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of स्कॉच व्हिस्की ) on बोतलों of व्हिस्की कि contained a मिश्रण of दोनो जौ और non-barley अनाज व्हिस्की, लकिन इस is no longer the case.
Under the terminology स्थापित by the swr 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच व्हिस्की '' is a मिश्रण of single malt Scotch whiskies, not a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley whisky ; those are called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' प्रयुक्त अंतर्गत the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a बोतल of सिंगल malt स्कॉच is the क्रमांक of सालो the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As बहुत few whiskies हैं बोतलबंद इससे a सिंगल cask the आयु बयान reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, for उदाहरण, the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड..., in a बहुत दिलचस्प वितरण of pitches, produces a fused ध्वनि समर्थित by a निलंबित झांझ फेंकें `` ( एरिक्सन ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to अधिक परंपरागत musical बनावट, ध्वनि द्रव्यमान संयोजन `` minimizes the महत्व of व्यक्तिगत pitches in preference for texture, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist टोन क्लस्टर और स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be प्रयुक्त साथ ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स, आतुर tonguing, चौड़ी vibrato, चरम सीमाएँ, and glissandos.
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb, pauline oliveros ' ध्वनि पैटर्न लिये कोरस ( 1961 ), norma beecroft 's इससे सपनो of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy Van de Vate.
beecroft `` टुकड़ा व्यक्तिगत pitches in एहसान of a सामूहिक timbre through the उपयोग of गायन और इंस्ट्रूमेंटल क्लस्टर, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the opening of jean-féry विद्रोही 's बैले लेस elémens ( 1737–38 ), जहाँ अराजकता is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A later example is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's स्ट्रिंग quartet 1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently phill niblock 's अनेक ड्रोन आधारित music serves as an example.
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into one ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) और györgy ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works जैसे atmosphères ( 1961 ) और उसके requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using इस तकनीक शामिल henryk górecki, karel husa, witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass तकनीकों भी appear in the म्यूज़िक of जार्ज Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

A student is a learner, or किसी जो attends an शैक्षणिक संस्था.
In some nations, the अंग्रेज़ी पद ( or इसके cognate in another भाषा ) is सुरक्षित लिये those जो attend विश्वविद्यालयों, जबकि a schoolchild अंतर्गत the आयु of अठारह is पुकारा a pupil in अंग्रेज़ी ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student.
in इसके widest उपयोग, छात्र is प्रयुक्त for anyone who is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया, तस्मानिया, नई गिनी, seram, संभवतः timor, और neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes ज्ञात in तकनीकी contexts by the names sahul, australinea or meganesia, to फर्क it इससे the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the seven परंपरागत महाद्वीपों in the अंग्रेज़ी conception.
New Zealand is not part of the महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया, लकिन of the पृथक, submerged महाद्वीप of zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia हैं दोनो भाग of the wider regions ज्ञात as australasia और महासागरीय.
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas जिससे divide it into अनेक landmasses — the अराफुरा समुद्र और टोरेस जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई गिनी, और बास जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड Australia and Tasmania.
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice age, सहित the पिछला glacial अधिकतम परिचय 18,000 BC, they were connected by dry land.
During the past ten thousand years, rising sea स्तर overflowed the lowlands और अलग the महाद्वीप into आज 's low-lying arid to semi-arid मेनलैंड और the दो mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the edge of its continental शेल्फ, so the now-separate आइलैंड्स हैं माना भाग of the महाद्वीप.
Due to the स्प्रेड of पशु, fungi और पौधे आरपार the सिंगल pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as बिग as the संसार 's second-smallest देश, मोनाको.
historically इसके टंकी यहूद महत्वपूर्ण components of the city 's water supply.
पर्यावरणीय मुद्दे in नई यॉर्क नगर हैं प्रभावित by the नगर 's आकार, घनत्व, abundant पब्लिक परिवहन अवसंरचना, and location at the mouth of the Hudson River.
नई यॉर्क 's जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व रै environmental pros and cons.
It facilitates the उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the संयुक्त राज्य, but also concentrates pollution.
गैसोलीन खपत in the नगर is at the रेट the नेशनल औसत थी in the 1920s, और greenhouse gas emissions are a fraction of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons per person per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York City accounts for only 1 % of United States ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions जबकि आवास 2.7 % of इसके जनसांख्यिकी.
In September 2012, नई यॉर्क थी नामित the # 1 `` अमेरिका 's dirtiest नगर, '' by a travel+leisure readership सर्वेक्षण कि रेटेड the पर्यावरणीय विशेषता of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of and the most populous city in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया, साथ an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 लोगों और the नवीं largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta is the काउंटी सीट of fulton काउंटी, और a छोटी portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of दो रेलरोड लाइनों, और the नगर रोज़ इससे the राख of the सिविल युद्ध to become a नेशनल बीच of commerce.
In the decades following the Civil Rights गति, दौरान जिससे the नगर अर्जित a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too व्यस्त to नफ़रत '' लिये the प्रगतिशील दृश्य of इसके नागरिकों और नेताओ, अटलांटा attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary परिवहन हब of the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, via राजमार्ग, रेलरोड, और एयर, साथ hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र being the world 's busiest airport since 1998.
Atlanta is माना an `` अल्फा ( - ) संसार नगर, '' और, साथ a सकल घरेलू उत्पाद of us $ 270 अरब, atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s economy is माना विविध, प्रबल सेक्टर शामिल लोजिस्टिक्स, पेशेवर और कारोबार सेवाएं, मीडिया operations, government administration, and higher education.
topographically, अटलांटा is चिह्नित by रोलिंग पहाड़ियाँ और dense tree coverage.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 ओलंपिक, रै intensified in the 21st सदी, altering the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी, politics, and culture.

McCarthyism is the practice of making आरोपों of disloyalty, subversion, or देशद्रोह बगैर उचित लिहाज़ for evidence.
It also means `` the practice of making unfair दोषारोपण or using अन्यायपूर्ण investigative तकनीकों, विशेषकर in अनुक्रम to सीमित dissent or राजनैतिक criticism. ''
The term has its origins in the period in the United States ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare, स्थायी roughly इससे 1950 to 1956 और characterized by heightened fears of कम्युनिस्ट influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents.
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन u.s. सीनेटर जोसेफ मैकार्थी of विस्कॉन्सिन, `` mccarthyism '' जल्द took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless, unsubstantiated आरोपों, as खूब as demagogic हमले on the अक्षर or राष्ट्रभक्ति of राजनैतिक adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, thousands of Americans were अभियुक्त of होने साम्यवादियों or कम्युनिस्ट sympathizers और became the विषय of आक्रामक investigations और questioning पहले सरकारी or private-industry panels, committees and agencies.
The primary targets of ऐसे suspicions यहूद सरकारी कर्मचारी, those in the entertainment industry, educators and union activists.
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, और the स्तर of threat posed by a व्यक्ति 's रियल or supposed वामपंथी एसोसिएशन or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated.
Many people suffered loss of नियुक्ति and/or विनाश of उनके करियर ; some even suffered imprisonment.
Most of these punishments came about through विचारण verdicts बाद विकल, कानून कि होता be घोषित असंवैधानिक, dismissals लिये कारण बाद घोषित illegal or actionable, or extra-legal procedures that would come into general disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism शामिल the भाषणों, investigations, और hearings of सीनेटर मैकार्थी खुद ; the हॉलीवुड ब्लैकलिस्ट, संबद्ध साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( HUAC ) ; and the various anti-communist activities of the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism was a widespread social and cultural phenomenon कि प्रभावित सब स्तर of समाज और थी the सोर्स of a ग्रेट सौदे of बहस और विरोध in the United States.
Napoleon is a fictional अक्षर और the प्रमुख विपक्षी in जार्ज ऑरवेल 's एनिमल फार्म.
While he is at first a common farm pig, he gets rid of स्नोबॉल, another सुअर जिससे साझा the power.
He then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against their मास्टर्स to आखिरकार become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.
