A steam engine is a heat engine that performs mechanical कार्य using भाप as इसके working द्रव.
Using boiling water to उपज mechanical गति goes वापस परिचय 2,000 years, but early devices were not practical.
चूंकि the लेट 1700s भाप इंजन have become a प्रमुख सोर्स of mechanical power.
The first applications यहूद निकालना जल इससे खानों.
In 1781 James Watt patented a भाप इंजन कि उत्पादित निरन्तर rotative motion.
These 10 hp इंजन सक्रिय a चौड़ी दायरा of निर्माण मशीनरी to be powered.
The engines could be sited anywhere कि जल और कोयले or लकडी ईंधन could be प्राप्त.
By 1883, engines that could provide 10,000 hp था become feasible.
Steam engines could also be applied to वाहनों ऐसे as कर्षण इंजन और the रेल इंजनों जिससे हैं commonly बस पुकारा भाप इंजन outside America.
The stationary steam engine थी a कुंजी घटक of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, allowing कारखानों to locate where water power was unavailable.
Today steam turbines generate about 90 % of the इलेक्ट्रिक शक्ति in the संयुक्त राज्य using a किस्में of ऊष्मा स्त्रोत.
Steam engines are external combustion engines, जहाँ the working द्रव is पृथक इससे the दहन उत्पाद.
Non-combustion heat स्त्रोत ऐसे as सौर शक्ति, नाभिकीय शक्ति or geothermal उर्जा may be used.
The ideal thermodynamic cycle used to analyze इस प्रक्रम is पुकारा the rankine साईकिल.
In the cycle, जल is heated into भाप in a बॉयलर जबतक it पहुँच a high pressure.
When विस्तारित through पिस्टन्स or turbines, mechanical work is done.
the reduced-pressure भाप is तब सघन और pumped back into the boiler.
In general उपयोग, the पद भाप इंजन can refer to either the एकीकृत भाप पौधे ( सहित बायलरों इत्यादि. ) ऐसे as रेल steam locomotives and portable engines, or may refer to the piston or turbine machinery alone, as in the beam engine and stationary steam engine.
Specialized devices such as steam hammers और भाप pile ड्राइवर हैं निर्भर on भाप supplied इससे a पृथक बॉयलर.
A मिल इंजन इससे stott पार्क Bobbin Mill, Cumbria, England
A steam locomotive in जर्मनी.this क्लास of इंजन थी निर्मित in 1942 – 1950 और संचालित commercially until 1988.
`` Move Bitch '' ( edited संस्करण titled `` मूव b***h '' or बस `` मूव '' ) is the तीसरा आधिकारिक सिंगल इससे rapper Ludacris ' album Word of Mouf.
The सिंगल सुविधाएँ mystikal and I-20.
The single reached # 10 on the Billboard Hot 100 making it Ludacris 's first top ten hit on the chart, it भी पहुँचे # 3 on hot रैप ट्रैक्स और # 3 on hot r & b/hip-hop Singles & Tracks.
Puerto rican reggaeton duo maicol & मैनुएल sampled the सोंग on `` Hoy Me Levanté '' on their 2002 release Yakaleo.
The song is also प्रदर्शित in एपीसोड 2, श्रेणी एक of अंग्रेजों टीन comedy/drama Skins.
The song was also used by World Wrestling entertainment superstar montel vontavious पोर्टर दौरान उसके छोटी कार्यावधि in रिंग of सम्मान.
It was also used for April शिकारी in विभिन्न स्वतंत्र circuits.
It was प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म atl अभिनीत t.i., और ' hancock, ' हालांकि in the latter, the clean version was used.
A snippet of the सोंग is निभाई दौरान ट्रैफ़िक रिपोर्ट्स on अनेक रेडियो स्टेशन, प्रायः carrying an urban/hip-hop format.
Retired NBA star and now ईएसपीएन विश्लेषक jalen रोज़ is प्रदर्शित in the म्यूज़िक video.
The song has been covered by rock बैंड प्रारंभ ट्रबल, on उनके एल्बम प्रत्येक समाधान रै Its Problem.
It was featured on अंग्रेजों sitcom the inbetweeners जब the वर्ण jay और neil took होगा on a 'pussy patrol ' in Jay 's red Nissan Micra.
It was sampled by लड़की बात on the पहला track of उसके एल्बम All Day, `` Oh No ''.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of defender of the आस्था as भाग of उसके पूरा शीर्षक.
on उसके accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the grenadines, बेलीज़, अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा और संत किट्स and Nevis.
Her reign of years is फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in London और शिक्षित privately at home.
Her father acceded to the सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii, from which time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary territorial सेवा.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom वो रै चार children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, और एडवर्ड.
Her coronation सेवा took प्लेस in 1953 और थी the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal विज़िट to और इससे the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स, और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी, सुनहरी, और डायमंड jubilees in 1977, 2002, और 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the falklands युद्ध, युद्धों साथ इराकी और the युद्ध in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और the मौतों of उसके mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, लकिन support लिये the साम्राज्य और उसके निजी लोकप्रियता remain high.
Christianity is the largest धर्म सूचीबद्ध by australians in the national census.
In the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of australians यहूद सूचीबद्ध as Christian.
Australia has no official state धर्म और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई संविधान protects स्वतंत्रता of religion.
The presence of Christianity in Australia began साथ the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े of अंग्रेजों convicts in 1788.
the धर्म grew to खाता लिये 96.1 % of the national population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination जबतक 1986, जब it थी surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war बहुसंस्कृतिवाद और a मनाही in धार्मिक observance among कुछ भाग of the population have diversified the demographics of religion in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either Roman Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), साथ the तीसरा largest denomination होने the 5 % संबद्ध साथ the uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the यूनानी परंपरागत archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया और वहीँ हैं विशाल और growing पेंटेकोस्टल समूह, ऐसे as सिडनी 's hillsong गिरिजाघर.
The festivals of ईस्टर और क्रिसमस हैं पब्लिक छुट्टियाँ in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend गिरिजाघर स्कूलों और ईसाई संगठनों हैं अग्रणी non-government प्रदाताओं of स्वास्थ्य और welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों जैसे कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Anglicare, UnitingCare Australia, the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr जॉन dunmore लैंग, संत मरियम mackillop, कैथरीन हेलेन spence, पादरी दाउद unaipon, the रेवरेंड John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current सीईओ of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया, फ़्रैंक ब्रेनन, जेसुइट इंसान अधिकारों वकील, कार्डिनल जार्ज pell, कैथोलिक archbishop of सिडनी, फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान anglican primate और archbishop of ब्रिसबेन, केविन रड, पूर्व मजदूर प्रधान मंत्री, और टोनी एबॉट, नेता for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party.
Charter creating Collegiate स्कूल, जिससे became yale कॉलेज, अक्तूबर 9, 1701
Yale विश्वविद्यालयों is a निजी आइवी लीग शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in New Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the उपनिवेश of कनेक्टिकट, the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States.
Originally चार्टर्ड as the `` कॉलेजिएट स्कूल '', the संस्था traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen who sought to establish a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale कॉलेज '' to सम्मान a तोहफा इससे elihu yale, a राज्यपाल of the अंग्रेजों East India Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and sciences became the पहला u.S. संस्था to पुरस्कार the phd. yale became a founding सदस्य of the संघ of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the स्थापना of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी मौजूद और दो अधिक हैं नियोजित.
yale employs over 1,100 संकाय to सिखा और सलाह परिचय 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and professional students.
Almost all tenured professors teach undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम, अधिक than 2,000 of जिससे हैं offered annually.
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 अरब, the second-largest of कोई अकादमिक संस्था in the world.
Yale 's system of more than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 लाख आयतन.
49 Nobel Laureates have been संबद्ध साथ the विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी, संकाय, और staff.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, including five U.S. Presidents, 19 u.S. परम् अदालत justices, और अनेक foreign heads of state.
At the graduate स्तर, yale विधि स्कूल, yale स्कूल of आर्ट, और yale स्कूल of नाटक are consistently ranked the top programs in their field.
yale विधि स्कूल is the सबसे चयनात्मक law school in the United States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग I Ivy League.
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the संयुक्त राज्य is the yale-harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार झाड़ी इससे the परिवार asteraceae, जिससे grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a दायरा of ठंडा मरुस्थल, स्तान, और पहाड़ habitats in the Intermountain West of North America.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus artemisia, ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the प्रबल पौधे आरपार विशाल portions of the ग्रेट जलाशय, covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार मील in 11 पश्चिमी u.S. & कनाडाई राज्य.
It is the राज्य पुष्प of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of species, ऐसे as ऋषि grouse, pronghorn antelope, धूसर vireo, सानो खरगोश, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush थी प्रयुक्त as an हर्बल आयुर्विज्ञान by देशी अमेरिकी throughout the intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping आतंरिक bleeding, and treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, और tannins.
Several major threats exist to ऋषि ब्रश ecosystems, सहित इंसान settlements, परिवर्तन to agricultural जमीन, livestock grazing, invasive plant species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered by the अमरीकी ढूंढें इंजन कम्पनी Yahoo !
It was शुभारम्भ in 1997, और, according to comscore, याहू ! मेल is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
फिलहाल, याहू ! offers तीन संस्करण of Yahoo ! Mail.
The परंपरागत `` याहू ! मेल क्लासिक '' continues the उपलब्धता of the असली इंटरफ़ेस introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface, drag-and-drop features, improved ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता, कुंजीपटल शॉर्टकट, पता auto-complete, टैब्स, और अन्य अद्यतनीकृत सुविधाएँ.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta संस्करण of याहू ! मेल, जिससे शामिल सुधार to the डिज़ाइन, प्रदर्शन, ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta परीक्षण लिये the नई संस्करण रोका, और it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in response to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail मार्केट खण्ड.
On June 27, 2009, याहू ! मेसेंजर थी एकीकृत with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port नगर और the काउंटी सीट of पियर्स County, Washington, United States.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, southwest of Seattle, पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी, ओलंपिया, और उत्तरपश्चिम of Mount Rainier National Park.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
टकोमा is the second-largest नगर in the puget ध्वनि क्षेत्रफल और the तीसरा largest in the state.
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for the दक्षिण ध्वनि प्रदेश, जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around 1 million people.
Tacoma अपनाया इसके नाम बाद the आसपास माउंट Rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the पश्चिमी टर्मिनस of the उत्तरी प्रशांत रेलरोड in the लेट 19th सदी.
The decision of the railroad थी बहकावे by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, शुरुआत Bay.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` जब rails मिलें sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of Tacoma, a center of international व्यापार on the प्रशांत coast और वॉशिंगटन राज्य 's largest बंदरगाहों.
Like most central cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged मनाही in the mid-20th सदी as a परिणाम of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the शहर कोर शामिल the विश्वविद्यालयों of वॉशिंगटन टकोमा ; टकोमा कड़ी, the पहला आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल सेवा in the राज्य ; the राज्य 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar मजदूर राजनीती — इससे the रेलरोड मजदूर of the 19th सदी, to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी, to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about टकोमा, `` thrice सब अमरीकी '', by अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी neko मामला, describes it as `` a dusty बूढ़ा गहना in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce County has been named एक of the सबसे livable क्षेत्रों in the country.
Tacoma was also recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th सबसे walkable city in the country.
In contrast, the नगर is भी क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's पत्रिका स्वः नामित टकोमा the `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave टकोमा the शीर्षक of `` gayest नगर in अमेरिका '', in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित, और वॉशिंगटन State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is प्रसिद्ध लिये the 1940 पतन of the टकोमा narrows Bridge.
chula विस्टा ( ; ) is the दूसरी largest नगर in the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the सातवाँ largest नगर in दक्षिणी California, the fourteenth largest city in the State of California, and the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from downtown San Diego and from the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the नगर is at the बीच of एक of the richest आर्थिक और culturally diverse zones in the United States.
Chula विस्टा is so नामित क्युकी of इसके दर्शनीय स्थान between the सैन डिएगो खाड़ी और coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th century, तेज़ जनसांख्यिकी विकास रै recently महरूम observed in the city.
As the second largest city in San Diego County, chula विस्टा रै जल्दी become a गंतव्य लोकप्रिय to अनेक पर्यटकों.
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round संयुक्त राज्य ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक गंतव्यों शामिल क्रिकेट बेतार amphitheater, the Chula Vista marina, and the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a system or method of describing जमीन, रियल प्रॉपर्टी ( in कंट्रास्ट to निजी प्रॉपर्टी ) or real estate.
The system has been प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां, और is स्टिल प्रयुक्त वहीँ in the परिभाषा of general boundaries.
By custom, it was applied in the असली तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त राज्य, और in अनेक अन्य जमीन jurisdictions based on English common law.
Typically the system उपयोग शारीरिक सुविधाएँ of the लोकल भूगोल, साथ साथ दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ, to define and describe the boundaries of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are described in a running prose style, working around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम, इससे a पाइंट of शुरूआत, returning वापस to the वही पाइंट ; compare साथ the मौखिक अनुष्ठान of धड़कन the bounds.
it may शामिल सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी ), और it, in फेरे, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the ground with स्थाई स्मारक लगाई जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक स्मारक.
the पद `` metes '' refers to a boundary पारिभाषित by the मापन of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं, निर्दिष्ट by a distance between the terminal points, and an orientation or direction.
A direction may be a सरल कम्पास bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary description, such as along a निश्चित watercourse, a स्टोन वॉल, an adjoining पब्लिक सड़क रास्ता, or an मौजूदा building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of प्रॉपर्टी ( e.g. खेतो ), और राजनैतिक subdivisions ( e.g. कस्बा सीमाएँ ) जहाँ precise परिभाषा is नहीं जरूरी or होता be far too expensive, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 कूच 1727 ) थी an अंग्रेज़ी physicist और गणितज्ञ जो is widely regarded as एक of the सबसे influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution.
His book philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` गणितीय सिद्धान्त of प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ), first published in 1687, laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics.
न्यूटन भी बना seminal योगदान to प्रकाशिकी और साझा क्रेडिट साथ गॉटफ्राइड Leibniz for the invention of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia प्रतिपादित the कानून of गति और सार्वभौमिक gravitation कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the physical universe for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated that the गति of वस्तुएँ on the धरती और कि of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles.
By deriving कॅप्लर 's कानून of ग्रहीय गति इससे उसके गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता, न्यूटन removed the पिछला संदेह about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
Newton built the first practical reflecting दूरदर्शी और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of रंग आधारित on the अवलोकन कि a प्रिज़्म decomposes श्वेत लाइट into the many colours of the visible spectrum.
He also प्रतिपादित an अनुभवजन्य विधि of कूलिंग और पढ़ाई the speed of sound.
In addition to his work on the कलन, as a गणितज्ञ न्यूटन contributed to the पढ़ाई of शक्ति श्रेणी, generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer exponents, and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function.
Newton was a fellow of Trinity College and the second lucasian प्राध्यापक of गणित at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैम्ब्रिज.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and, unusually for a member of the कैम्ब्रिज संकाय, he refused to लो पावन आदेश in the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, शायद क्युकी he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences, Newton also dedicated much of his time to the पढ़ाई of alchemy और biblical कालक्रम, लकिन सबसे of उसके कार्य in those areas remained unpublished until long after his death.
In his बाद जीवन, न्यूटन became अध्यक्ष of the Royal Society.
He also served the British सरकारी as वार्डन और निपुण of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter Lewin explains न्यूटन 's विधि of gravitation in एमआईटी course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles सब obey न्यूटन 's विधि of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स कि is सीधे आंशिक to the उत्पाद of उनके masses और inversely आंशिक to the square of the distance between them.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically सममित masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if सब उनके द्रव्यमान were concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general physical law derived इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन called induction.
It is a part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the प्रिन्सिपिया '' ), पहला प्रकाशित on 5 जुलाई 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society, रॉबर्ट hooke बना a अर्जी कि न्यूटन था प्राप्त the विलोम वर्गाकार विधि इससे उसे – देखिए इतिहास section below. )
In आधुनिक भाषा, the विधि राज्य the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 और m2 in गामा ( kg ), r in मीटर ( m ), और the निरंतर g is लगभग equal to.
The मान of the निरंतर g थी पहला accurately संकल्पित इससे the परिणाम of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G.
This experiment थी भी the पहला परीक्षण of न्यूटन 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the publication of न्यूटन 's प्रिन्सिपिया और 71 सालो बाद न्यूटन 's मौत, so none of न्यूटन 's calculations could उपयोग the मान of g ; बजाय he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's विधि of gravitation resembles कूलम्ब 's विधि of विद्युत शक्तियां, जिससे is प्रयुक्त to गणना the परिमाण of electrical force between two charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square कानून, in जिससे फ़ोर्स is inversely आंशिक to the square of the distance between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law has the उत्पाद of दो आरोप in प्लेस of the उत्पाद of the masses, और the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law has since been superseded by आइंस्टीन 's सिद्धान्त of सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, लकिन it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity.
Relativity is required only when there is a need for extreme परिशुद्धता, or जब dealing साथ gravitation लिये अत्यधिक विशाल और dense objects.
White and red flags, representing इराकी और अमरीकी मौतों, बैठना in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of the घाटी पुस्तकालयों on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State University.
As part of the traveling इराकी देह गिनती प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती प्रोजेक्ट ), the ध्वज उद्देश्य to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( may 2008 )
Casualties of the विरोध in इराकी चूंकि 2003 ( शुरूआत साथ the 2003 आक्रमण of इराकी, और continuing साथ the ensuing occupation of इराकी, as खूब as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have आइये in अनेक forms, and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table नीचे summarizes विभिन्न estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
लिये सैनिकों in the u.s.-led बहुराष्ट्रीय गठबन्धन, the मौत टोल is carefully tracked और अद्यतनीकृत रोज़, और the names और छायाचित्र of those killed in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A total of 4,486 U.S. सैनिको यहूद मारे in इराकी between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, सूचना on दोनो सैन्य और civilian हताहत is दोनो कम precise और कम सतत.
Estimates of casualty levels are उपलब्धियाँ इससे पत्रकारों on the झाँकी, इससे officials of शामिल संगठन, और इससे समूह कि summarize सूचना on incidents reported in the न्यूज मीडिया.
The word `` हताहत `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य भाव शामिल the injured as well as the dead.
Accounts of the क्रमांक of गठबन्धन wounded vary widely, partly क्युकी it is नहीं स्पष्ट कया चाहिए be गिने : should only those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do बीमारियों or चोटों caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती, or चाहिए the फ़ोकस be प्रतिबंधित to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using अलग परिभाषाएं may arrive at बहुत अलग संख्याएँ, और sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of the कोच ), by फ्रांसिस्को de Goya
A highwayman थी a चोर और brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled और robbed by घोड़ा, as compared to a footpad जो travelled and robbed on foot.
Mounted robbers were widely considered to be socially श्रेष्ठ to footpads.
Such लुटेरों संचालित in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड इससे the elizabethan era until the early 19th century.
The word highwayman is first known to be प्रयुक्त in the साल 1617 ; अन्य euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों of the सड़क '' और `` gentlemen of the road. ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century North American highwaymen यहूद सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं जबकि in अन्य मामले the पद is rlallaala लिये mountain-based ruffians.
In the same time काल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, वे यहूद ज्ञात as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' जॉनसन, jr. ( born अगस्त 14, 1959 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी पेशेवर basketball player who played point guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ).
बाद जीतना championships in ऊँची स्कूल and college, Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA फाइनल सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी ऋतु, और जीती चार अधिक championships साथ the लेकर्स during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 बाद announcing कि he था contracted hiv, लकिन लौटे to play in the 1992 All-Star Game, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
After protests from his fellow players, he retired again लिये चार सालो, लकिन लौटे in 1996, at आयु 36, to खेल 32 खेल लिये the लेकर्स before retiring for the third and final time.
Johnson 's करियर उपलब्धियाँ शामिल तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार, नौ एनबीए फाइनल दिखावे, बारह all-star games, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists चार टाइम्स, और is the एनबीए 's all-time नेता in औसत assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream टोली ``, the u.S. बास्केट टोली कि जीती the ओलम्पिक सुनहरा पदक in 1992.
बाद leaving the एनबीए in 1992, जॉनसन formed the जादू जॉनसन all-stars, a barnstorming टोली that travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest खिलाड़ी in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996, और enshrined in the बास्केट Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was rated the महानतम एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of सब time by ESPN in 2007.
His दोस्ती और फंसने साथ बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स स्टार लैरी बर्ड, जिसको he faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS रोकथाम और सुरक्षित sex, as खूब as an उद्योगों, लोकसेवक, प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक स्पीकर.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for अनेक सालो, और थी भाग of a समूह कि खरीदा the लॉस एंजिल्स Dodgers in 2012.
Allium cells in अलग phases of the cell cycle
the कोशिकाएं of eukaryotes ( बाएँ ) and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic structural, कार्यात्मक और biological ईकाई of सब ज्ञात जीना जीवों.
It is the smallest unit of life कि is वर्गीकृत as a जीना बात ( मगर वायरस, जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन and lipids ), and is often called the building block of life.
It consists of a जीवद्रव्य enclosed भीतर a झिल्ली, जिससे contains अनेक biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
जीवों can be वर्गीकृत as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a सिंगल कोशिका ; सहित सबसे जीवाणु ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ).
While the number of cells in plants और पशु varies इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति, इंसानो contain परिचय 100 खरब ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant and animal कोशिकाएं हैं between 1 और 100 micrometres और इसलिए हैं दृश्य तभी अंतर्गत the microscope.
The cell was खोजा by रॉबर्ट hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob schleiden और theodor schwann, राज्य कि सब जीवों हैं रचित of एक or अधिक कोशिकाएं, कि सब कोशिकाएं आइये इससे preexisting कोशिकाएं, कि vital कृत्यों of an सजीव occur भीतर कोशिकाएं, और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
Cells emerged on planet Earth at तनिक 4.0–4.3 अरब सालो पहले.
The word cell आता इससे the लैटिन गर्भगृह, अर्थ `` small room ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by रॉबर्ट hooke in a किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 जब he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he देखी through उसके सूक्ष्मदर्शी to the small rooms monks lived in.
grecian सूत्र is a मेन 's बाल coloring उत्पाद in the United States.
कनाडा और यूरोपीय previously बैन the product because of its use of lead acetate.
A motor scooter 's front with an अव्यवहारिक क्रमांक और किस्में of headlamps, added लिये सजावटी purposes
A headlamp is a बल्ब संलग्न to the सामने of a गाडी to light the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the ग्रेट disparity between दिन और nighttime ट्रैफ़िक fatalities : the u.S. नेशनल राजमार्ग ट्रैफ़िक सुरक्षा प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly हाफ of सब traffic-related fatalities occur in the अंधेरा, despite only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness.
While it is आम लिये the पद हेडलाइट to be प्रयुक्त interchangeably in अनौपचारिक चर्चा, headlamp is the पद लिये the यंत्र itself, while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
अन्य वाहनों, ऐसे as रेल और वायुयान, हैं जरूरी to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त on साइकिल, और हैं जरूरी in कुछ jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a बैटरी or a छोटी विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
Additionally ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि दृष्टि प्रणालियों work to supplement headlamps.
Women 's rights are the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
In some स्थान ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि, लोकल कस्टम, और आचरण, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by महिलाओं and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's अधिकारों शामिल, हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine जॉनसन, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated ब्लैक स्त्री in the Deep South.
She received a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके पहला सुनहरी Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, वो निभाई oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( demi मूर ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, the खिलाड़ी, बना in अमेरिका, कैसा स्टेला मिला उसके नाली वापस, लड़की, बाधित और Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी, as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been मनोनीत लिये 13 एमी पुरस्कार लिये उसके कार्य in टेलीविज़न.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे 1998 to 2004.
She has been the मॉडरेटर of the दिन बात दिखाएँ the View since 2007.
गोल्डबर्ग रै a ग्रैमी, दो दिन emmys, दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of Fame.
She is one of the few entertainers जो have जीती an एमी, ग्रैमी, ऑस्कर, और टोनी पुरस्कार.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New यॉर्क नगर, the एनएचएल is widely माना to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports leagues in the United States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन, the नेशनल हॉकी संघ ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
it प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, although the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the संयुक्त राज्य.
बाद a श्रमिक विवाद कि led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु, the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार और फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी इससे about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल, over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( अनुक्रम diptera ) ; it is लागू in particular to the लार्वे of brachyceran उड़ता, ऐसे as houseflies, चीज उड़ता, और blowflies, बल्कि than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes and Crane flies.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as such ; in many मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं appear in the अनुक्रमणिका at सब.
In many non-technical texts the पद is प्रयुक्त लिये कीट लार्वे in general.
Other स्त्रोत have coined उनके अपना परिभाषाएं ; लिये उदाहरण : ``...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared... '' and ``... लागू to the footless लार्वे of dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of चौड़ी महत्व in पारिस्थितिकी और आयुर्विज्ञान ; among अन्य भूमिकाएँ, विभिन्न प्रजाति हैं prominent in recycling carrion and garbage, attacking crops and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
Herod (, hordos, यूनानी :, hērōdēs ), भी ज्ञात as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in जेरिको ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the ग्रेट '' is widely विवादित as he is वर्णित as `` a madman जो murdered his own family and a great many rabbis ``.
He is also known for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere, सहित उसके विस्तार of the दूसरी टेम्पल in जेरूसलम ( sometimes referred to as हेरोदेस 's टेम्पल ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his जीवनी हैं gleaned इससे the works of the 1st सदी ce roman–jewish इतिहासकार Josephus Flavius.
The Romans made Herod 's son, हेरोदेस archelaus, ethnarch of judea, samaria, और idumea ( biblical edom ) इससे 4 bce to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
archelaus थी judged incompetent by the रोमन सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria, judea उचित और idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
Herod 's अन्य बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त कोशिकाएं और igm antibodies present in the serum
the abo रक्त समूह प्रणाली is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण रक्त प्रकार प्रणाली ( or रक्त group system ) in human blood transfusion.
The associated anti-A and anti-B antibodies are usually IgM antibodies, which are usually उत्पादित in the पहला सालो of जीवन by sensitization to पर्यावरणीय substances ऐसे as खाना, जीवाणु, और viruses.
ABO blood types are also present in कुछ अन्य पशु, लिये उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
साल 1907 ( mcmvii ) थी a आम साल starting on मंगलवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar.
Northville is an affluent city located in और विभाजित by ओकलैंड और वेन काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of मिशिगन.
The area is a उपनगरीय of महानगर Detroit.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,970 at the 2010 census.
Most of the city is in ओकलैंड काउंटी, और is घिरी by the city of Novi.
The Wayne County portion is घिरी by northville Township.
northville is परोसा by northville Public Schools.
The city is located पूर्वोत्तर of ऐन arbor और उत्तरपश्चिम of डेट्रॉयट.
ऐलेन stritch ( born फ़रवरी 2, 1925 ) is an American actress and vocalist.
She has appeared in numerous stage plays और musicals, विशेषता films, और अनेक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम.
She is known for her performance of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim 's 1970 musical कम्पनी, उसके 2001 one-woman दिखाएँ, ऐलेन stritch at स्वतंत्रता, और recently for her role as Jack Donaghy 's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock.
She has been nominated लिये the टोनी पुरस्कार पाँच टाइम्स in विभिन्न श्रेणी.
Stritch is भी a three-time एमी पुरस्कार winner.
Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of young offenders sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ सेवा कार्यक्रम, जहाँ वे obtain अलौकिक शक्तियां बाद a अजीब विद्युत storm.
The series opened in 2009 और is फिलहाल ongoing.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan Rheon, लॉरेन socha, नाथन stewart-jarrett, और रॉबर्ट sheehan हैं introduced as अलीशा डैनियल्स, साइमन bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.
sheehan बाएँ बाद the दूसरी श्रेणी, replaced in the third by Joseph Gilgun as Rudy Wade.
After the fourth series was announced Rheon, Thomas and Socha had बाएँ उनके भूमिकाएँ और होता be replaced by नई वर्ण कार्ला crome, नाथन McMullen and Matt Stokoe, as Jess, Finn and Alex respectively.
Midway through the चौथी श्रेणी, stewart-jarrett बाएँ जबकि नताशा o'keeffe joined the cast as Abbey Smith.
On 19 March 2013, Channel 4 announced at a press event that वे have नवीनीकृत misfits लिये a पांचवां और फाइनल श्रेणी containing 8 एपीसोड.
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10, 1969 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the बहुमत of उसके करियर साथ the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL, having played क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ), ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ), नई यॉर्क jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw लिये over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre प्रारंभ at the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी मिसिसिपी लिये four years before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green खाड़ी on फ़रवरी 10, 1992, लिये the 19th चुनें in the 1992 NFL Draft.
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the चौथी खेल of the 1992 ऋतु, stepping in लिये घायल क्वार्टरबैक डॉन majkowski, और प्रारंभ प्रत्येक खेल through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the नई यॉर्क jets और प्रारंभ at क्वार्टरबैक लिये the 2008 ऋतु पहले हस्ताक्षर साथ the Vikings on August 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an NFL रिकार्ड 297 लगातार starts ( 321 सहित playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the AP Most Valuable Player तीन लगातार टाइम्स ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), और दो सुपर कटोरी दिखावे ( सुपर कटोरी xxxi, सुपर कटोरी xxxii ), जीतना one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, सबसे करियर pass कोशिशें, सबसे करियर interceptions thrown, सबसे लगातार starts by a player, most consecutive starts by a quarterback, most career victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by उसके उपनाम `` the gunslinger ''.

the संसार चौड़ी वेब ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain टेक्स्ट, बिंब, वीडियो, और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the cern, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at होगा '', और वे सरेआम introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) थी a राजनेता और attorney इससे ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त राज्य, ज्ञात लिये उसके proclivity लिये opposing उसके पार्टियों ' नेतृत्व, और specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin-madison और the विश्वविद्यालयों of मिनेसोटा विधि स्कूल, मोर्स स्थानांतरित to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law.
दौरान संसार युद्ध ii he थी निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an independent, he set a record for performing the दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और थी reelected twice जबकि a सदस्य of that party.
Morse made a ब्रैड चलाएं लिये the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी 's अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf of Tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे प्राधिकृत the अध्यक्ष to लो सैन्य कार्रवाई in वियतनाम बगैर a घोषणा of war.
He continued to speak out against the war in the ensuing सालो, और खोया उसके 1968 बोली लिये reelection to bob packwood, जो criticized उसके strong opposition to the war.
Morse made दो अधिक बोलियों लिये reelection to the सीनेट पहले his death in 1974.
In parliamentary कार्यविधि, a गति to तालिका रै दो अलग and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to तालिका प्रायः अर्थात् the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to मूव लिये postponement of विचार ; a प्रस्ताव to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
much कम प्रायः, it अर्थात् a गति to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom, to table means to move to प्लेस [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस on the तालिका ) : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the अमरीकी और the अंग्रेजों dialects have the भाव of `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the table.
The difference is the विचार of कया the तालिका is लिये, कि of a शेल्फ बंद to the पक्ष, or an active work bench.
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work bench, साथ the टॉपिक होने the बीच of ध्यान, माना और discussed by सब जबतक it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is that the table is जैसे कि of a शेल्फ, अभिलेख, or long-term भंडार यंत्र, जहाँ the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 American 3D computer एनिमेटेड comedy-drama थाना फिल्मी, और the तीसरा किश्त in the Toy Story series.
It was produced by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Pictures.
Directed by Lee Unkrich, the film थी released विश्वव्यापी इससे जून through अक्तूबर in डिज़्नी डिजिटल 3-d, reald, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 was also the first film to be released theatrically साथ dolby घेर 7.1 sound.
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt, while Unkrich wrote the story along साथ जॉन lasseter और एंड्रयू stanton, क्रमशः निदेशक और co-writer of the दो पहला films.
The प्लाट focuses on the खिलौने वुडी, बज़ lightyear, और उनके मित्रों dealing with an uncertain future as their owner, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle Harris, John ratzenberger, वालेस shawn, जेफ़ pidgeon, jodi बेंसन, R. ली ermey, जॉन मॉरिस, और लॉरी metcalf reprised उनके voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who played Slinky Dog in the first two films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed lenny और wheezy, दोनो died पहले उत्पादन began on खिलौना स्टोरी 3.
The role of Slinky Dog थी लिया over by ब्लेक क्लार्क ( a dost of varney ), जबकि ranft 's वर्ण और विभिन्न अन्य यहूद written out of the story.
New वर्ण शामिल प्रदर्शन by ned beatty, टिमोथी डाल्टन, क्रिस्टन schaal, Bonnie Hunt, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke shrek the तिहाई रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने दिन उत्तर अमरीकी सकल लिये an animated film unadjusted for inflation, and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड लिये a पिक्चर्स फिल्मी, as खूब as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, दोनो in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, और विश्वव्यापी.
in जल्दी अगस्त, it became पिक्चर्स 's highest-grossing फिल्मी at the उत्तर अमरीकी बक्सा दफ्तर ( surpassing ढूंढना nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month, Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is फिलहाल the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी मनोनीत लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार, सहित बेहतरीन चित्र, बेहतरीन adapted Screenplay, and Best Sound Editing.
It was the तीसरा एनिमेटेड फिल्मी ( बाद सौंदर्य और the जानवर और up ) to be मनोनीत for Academy Award for Best Picture.
It won the awards लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता और बेहतरीन Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी रिटायर्ड पेशेवर बास्केट शूटिंग guard.
Starks was सूचीबद्ध at 6'5 '' और 190 पाउंड दौरान his NBA playing career.
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 एनबीए ड्राफ्ट बाद उपस्थित चार कॉलेजों in उसके देशी ओक्लाहोमा, सहित ओक्लाहोमा State University, he gained fame while playing for the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
सुरक्षित डिजिटल or ( sd ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन, डिजिटल cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital मानक is कायम by the sd कार्ड संघ ( sda ).
SD technologies have महरूम implemented in अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद categories and more than 8,000 models.
The Secure डिजिटल स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन different form factors.
The four families are the original standard-capacity ( sdsc ), the high-capacity ( sdhc ), the extended-capacity ( sdxc ), और the sdio, जिससे combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors हैं the असली आकार, the `` मिनी '' आकार, और the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are अनेक combinations of रूप कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र निर्मित to hold a larger card.
Host डिवाइस कि comply साथ नए संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept older SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A नए कार्ड may प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र can नहीं navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output कृत्यों the कार्ड provides.
The organization of the कार्ड थी बदला starting साथ the sdhc परिवार.
Some vendors produced sdsc ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ और assure users of compatibility.
Hugh John Mungo Grant ( born 9 सितंबर 1960 ) is a अंग्रेजों कर्ता और फिल्मी निर्माता.
He has प्राप्त a सुनहरी ग्लोब, a bafta, और an Honorary César.
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 अरब इससे 25 नाट्य रिलीज worldwide.
Grant achieved अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्टारडम बाद appearing in रिचर्ड कर्टिस 's कामयाब चार Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a बारंबार cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s, delivering कॉमिक प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films जैसे Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st सदी, he था स्थापित खुद as a अग्रणी man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a कैड in ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ), परिचय a लड़के ( 2002 ), प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003 ), और अमरीकी dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later played against type साथ अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक नाटक फिल्मी बादल एटलस ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film स्टार जो approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ जैसे a अक्षर कर्ता, और कोशिशें to मेक उसके एक्टिंग appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant टच of विडंबना / sarcasm और पढ़ाई शारीरिक mannerisms as खूब as उसके precisely-timed संवाद delivery and facial expressions.
The entertainment media 's कवरेज of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद the बिग स्क्रीन रै प्रायः निष्प्रभ his work as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of एक्टिंग, और in उसके तिरस्कार towards the संस्कृति of हस्ती और दुश्मनी towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that acting is नहीं a सच्चा कॉलिंग लकिन बस a जॉब he गिरी into.
the हान राजवंश ( ; ) ( 206 bc – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the rebel leader लियू बंग, ज्ञात मरणोपरांत as सम्राट gaozu of हान.
It was briefly interrupted by the xin राजवंश ( 9–23 ad ) of the पूर्व रीजेंट वांग Mang.
This interregnum separates the हान into दो अवधि : the पश्चिमी हान ( 206 bc – 9 AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over चार सदियां, the काल of the हान राजवंश is माना a golden age in Chinese history.
To this day, China 's बहुमत जातीय समूह refers to itself as the `` हान लोगों '' और the चाइनीज script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into क्षेत्रों सीधे नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल सरकारी, ज्ञात as commanderies, और a क्रमांक of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms gradually lost all vestiges of उनके स्वतंत्रता, विशेषकर following the विद्रोह of the सात States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation which dominated the पूर्वी यूरेशियाई स्तान, पराजित the हान फौज in बैटल in 200 bc.
Following the शिकस्त, a राजनैतिक विवाह गठबंधन थी negotiated in जिससे the Han became the de facto inferior partner.
When, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu जारी to रेड हान सीमायें, सम्राट wu of हान ( r. 141–87 bc ) शुभारम्भ अनेक सैन्य अभियान विरूद्ध them.
The ultimate Han victory in ये युद्धों आखिरकार मजबूर the xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the tarim जलाशय of सेंट्रल एशिया और helped स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क, which reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the xiongnu into दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र, the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी xiongnu, और मजबूर the उत्तरी Xiongnu across the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories उत्तर of हान 's सीमायें यहूद जल्दी overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 AD, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the विभिन्न consort clans of the empresses और सम्राज्ञी dowagers, causing the हान 's परम downfall.
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by विशाल daoist धार्मिक समाजों जिससे instigated the पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
following the मौत of सम्राट ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by सैन्य अधिकारियों, allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire.
When Cao pi, किंग of वेई, usurped the सिंहासन इससे सम्राट Xian, the Han Dynasty ceased to exist.
the हान राजवंश थी an आयु of आर्थिक समृद्धि और देखी a significant विकास of the धन अर्थव्यवस्था पहला स्थापित during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage जारी by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 bc remained the मानक coinage of चीन जबतक the तंग Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay लिये इसके सैन्य अभियान और the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the सरकारी nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period, and the खोया आय थी recouped through heavily taxing निजी उद्यमियों.
The सम्राट थी at the शिखर of Han society.
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the धामों और नियुक्त मंत्रियों जो आए largely इससे the scholarly gentry class.
From the reign of सम्राट wu onward, the चाइनीज अदालत officially प्रायोजित confucianism in शिक्षा और अदालत politics, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu.
This policy endured जबतक the पतन of the चिंग Dynasty in 1911 AD.
Science और प्रौद्योगिकी दौरान the हान काल देखी significant अग्रिम, सहित papermaking, the nautical परिचालन अरित्र, the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in गणित, the raised-relief map, the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( also पुकारा tourette 's सिंड्रोम, tourette 's विकार, गाइल्स de la tourette सिंड्रोम, gts or, अधिक commonly, बस tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically मोम और wane, can be suppressed temporarily, और हैं preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is पारिभाषित as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of टिक विकार, जिससे शामिल transient and chronic tics.
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome, most often associated with the मुँह of obscene शब्द or socially अनुचित और अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), लकिन इस लक्षण is उपस्थित in तभी a छोटी अल्पसंख्यक of people with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, लकिन it is नहीं सदा correctly पहचाना क्युकी सबसे मामले हैं mild और the गंभीरता of tics decreases लिये most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is उच्चतर, साथ the अधिक आम tics of नजर blinking, खाँसी, गला clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and tourette 's करता नहीं adversely affect प्रज्ञा or जीवन प्रत्याशा.
जेनेटिक और पर्यावरणीय कारकों खेल a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
In सबसे मामले, दवा is unnecessary.
There is no effective उपचार लिये प्रत्येक मामला of tics, लकिन निश्चित medications और therapies can help when their use is warranted.
Education is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार योजना, और स्पष्टीकरण and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive विकार ( ओसीडी ) हैं उपस्थित in अनेक मरीजों देखी in tertiary specialty क्लिनिक.
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the व्यक्तिगत than the tics कि हैं the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly पहचानो comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of उसके निवासी, जॉर्जेस अल्बर्ट édouard ब्रूटस गाइल्स de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist, जो published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
सनबीम बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque पंजीकृत by जॉन marston co. ltd of wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
The company first made bicycles, then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until about 1936, and लागू the marque to सब तीन फ़ॉर्म of परिवहन.
The company also manufactured aero इंजन in the पहला संसार युद्ध और 647 वायुयान दौरान the दूसरी World War.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स रेस, और नियत a क्रमांक of जमीन गति रिकॉर्ड.
The company went into receivership in 1935 और थी खरीदा by the rootes समूह, जिससे जारी to use the Sunbeam marque.
Fox News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a cable news चैनल स्वामित्व by the फॉक्स entertainment समूह, a subsidiary of न्यूज निगम.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 million households in the United राज्य और to दर्शक internationally, प्रसारण primarily इससे इसके नई यॉर्क studios.
The channel was निर्मित by australian-american मीडिया mogul रुपर्ट मर्डोक, जो नियुक्त former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 7, 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers.
It grew दौरान the लेट 1990s और 2000s to become the प्रबल केबल news network in the United States.
Critics have stated that Fox News चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक स्थितियाँ और पक्षपातपूर्ण reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of प्रत्येक other, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular second premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial ( toward the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) मेहराब of the मुँह, और generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु ( अपर ) पहला molars और the ऊर्ध्वहनु 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The function of this molar is similar to that of all molars in लिहाज़ to पीस होने the प्रिंसिपल कार्रवाई दौरान mastication, commonly ज्ञात as चबाने.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : two on the buccal ( पक्ष निकटतम the गाल ), दो lingual ( पक्ष निकटतम the जीभ ), और एक distal.
There are great differences between the पतझड़ी ( baby ) mandibular molars और those of the स्थाई mandibular molars, भी हालांकि उनके फलन are similar.
The स्थाई mandibular molars हैं नहीं माना to have कोई दांत that precede it.
Despite being नामित molars, the पतझड़ी molars हैं followed by permanent premolars.
in the सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन, the पतझड़ी mandibular first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase.
The right deciduous mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` s '', और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` L ''.
The international संकेतन रै a अलग प्रणाली of संकेतन.
Thus, the सही पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '', and the left one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the स्थाई mandibular पहला molars हैं designated by a number.
The right permanent mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 '', और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer notation uses a क्रमांक in संयोजन साथ a प्रतीक designating in जिससे quadrant the tooth is found.
For this tooth, the left and सही पहला molars होता have the वही क्रमांक, `` 6 '', लकिन the सही एक होता have the प्रतीक, `` ┐ '', over it, जबकि the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a अलग क्रमांकन प्रणाली than the पिछला दो, और the सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is known as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular primary first molars प्रायः have चार गूदा horns.
The first molar is usually the first permanent दाँत to erupt और रै वयस्क undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and cheek ), mesiolingual ( ml, toward midline और जीभ ), distolingual ( dl, दूर इससे midline और towards जीभ ), distobuccal ( db, दूर इससे midline और toward गाल ), और distal ( d, दूर इससे midline ), सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम of decreasing size.
Listed in order of decreasing height they हैं : ml, dl, df, mf, और D. an आठवीं cusp थी मिला in a प्राथमिक दूसरी lower molar in an Argentinean child.
viewed इससे the शीर्ष of the दाँत ( occlusal दृश्य ), the mandibular पहला molar is pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual, with the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal सतह रै चार डोले.
The सेंट्रल नाली is नहीं सीधा लकिन रनों bas the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove रनों इससे the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
the lingual नाली रनों इससे the अधिक distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps.
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the buccal सतह between the mesiobuccal और distobuccal पुलिन ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central groove between the सेंट्रल गड्ढों is termed the लुईस ऑफसेट और is अनिवार्य to खाता लिये the स्थितियाँ of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal दृश्य ), दो roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, हालांकि दोनो प्रायः have a पतला distal curvature.
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal सम्पर्क the सटा दांत और हैं स्तिथ at the जंक्शन of the occlusal और middle thirds of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the two houses that act as the state विधानमंडल of the u.S. राज्य of फ्लोरिडा.
the फ्लोरिडा संविधान राज्य कि `` the विधान शक्ति of the राज्य shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida, '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives.
the विधानमंडल is seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee.
stained कांच चित्रण of डेनियल interceding with Arioch, the king 's guard.
Arioch had been चार्ज साथ हत्या सब the हिकमत मेन बाद they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second अध्याय of the किताब of डेनियल in the यहूदी बाइबल.
The chapter 's सोर्स टेक्स्ट is predominantly written in Aramaic.
according to the टेक्स्ट, nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of बाबुल who is troubled by his dreams.
He मांगे an निर्वचन लिये उसके सपनो or होगा have उसके mystic interpreters executed.
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the किंग 's सपनो और गुणगान God with a short psalm.
God gives डेनियल a दृष्टि in the रात्रि to खुलासा the king 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, Daniel is प्रचारित over the पूरे प्रांत of बाबुल.
One comcast बीच, the मुख्यालय of comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
The old comcast लोगो इससे 1969 to 1999, जब it थी replaced with the crescent logo.
the comcast निगम is an अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment, information and communications products and services.
It is the largest cable operator, one of the biggest mass media, home Internet service provider, and third largest home telephone service provider in the संयुक्त राज्य, providing केबल टेलीविज़न, ब्रॉडबैंड अंतरजाल, टेलीफोन सेवा और in कुछ क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar सचेतक, निगरानी कैमरे, आग सचेतक प्रणालियों और घर स्वचालन ) to दोनो आवासीय and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media संगुटिका nbcuniversal इससे ge in जनवरी 2011, और began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the बाकी 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It completed the खरीदें on कूच 19, 2013.
Comcast भी रै significant पकड़कर in अनेक cable networks ( including E !
Entertainment Television, स्टाइल संजाल, g4, the गोल्फ़ चैनल और एनबीसी खेल संजाल ), वितरण ( theplatform ), और related businesses.
Comcast has been the विषय of आलोचना लिये क्रियाएँ सहित इसके stance on जाल neutrality, as well as poor results on customer satisfaction surveys.
porcupines हैं rodents साथ a कोट of शार्प कांटे, or quills, कि defend and camouflage them from predators.
वे हैं स्वदेशी to the americas, दक्षिणी Asia, and Africa.
Porcupines हैं the तीसरा largest of the rodents, पीछे the capybara और the beaver.
सबसे porcupines हैं परिचय long, साथ an long tail.
Weighing, वे हैं rounded, विशाल and slow.
porcupines आइये in विभिन्न शेड्स of भूरा, धूसर, and the unusual white.
Porcupines ' spiny सुरक्षा resembles कि of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme echidnas.
The common साही is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, टहनियों और ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk गोभी और clover and in the winter it may eat bark.
The North American साही प्रायः climbs पेड़ to ढूँढें खाना.
The African porcupine is नहीं a climber और forages on the ground.
It is ज़्यादातर nocturnal, लकिन होगा sometimes forage for food in the day.
porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया और हैं eaten as a delicacy.
The नाम साही आता इससे मध्य फ्रेंच porc espin ( spined pig ).
a क्षेत्रीय अमरीकी नाम लिये the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. मैककॉय ( may 2, 1844 – अक्तूबर 10, 1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक and engineer, who was notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born फ़्री in कनाडा, he लौटे as a five-year-old चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1847, where he lived for the rest of his life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a hydrogen ईंधन कोशिका demonstration गाडी introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle कि उपयोग हाइड्रोजन as इसके onboard ईंधन लिये motive power.
हाइड्रोजन वाहनों शामिल हाइड्रोजन fueled स्पेस rockets, as खूब as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The power plants of such vehicles convert the chemical energy of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक दहन इंजन, or by reacting हाइड्रोजन साथ ऑक्सीजन in a fuel cell to run electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling परिवहन is a कुंजी तत्व of a प्रस्तावित हाइड्रोजन economy.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on धरती और यूँ is नहीं an उर्जा सोर्स ; बल्कि it is an उर्जा carrier.
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels, but it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा, सौर, or नाभिकीय ) कि हैं intermittent, too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen पौधे, using electrolysis of जल, हैं exploring technologies to उद्धार costs low enough, and quantities great enough, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित of हाइड्रोजन उर्जा लिये मोबाईल uses.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an उर्जा करेंसी is कि, if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using चट्टान ईंधन inputs, गाडी नोदन होता नहीं योगदान to carbon dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low उर्जा सामग्री प्रति ईकाई आवाज़, ऊँची tankage weights, बहुत ऊँची भंडार पोत pressures, the भंडार, परिवहन और भरना of गैसीय or द्रव हाइड्रोजन in वाहनों, the विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना that would be required to fuel vehicles, and the inefficiency of production processes.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento काउंटी.
It is स्तिथ at the संगम of the sacramento नदी और the अमरीकी नदी in the northern portion of California 's expansive Central Valley.
With an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an अनुमानित 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, as खूब as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by Time पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically और racially एकीकृत city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन Sutter, Jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the टेलीग्राफ, the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस, और the पहला transcontinental Railroad.
कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as Sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर, sacramento.

The Apple Store is a कड़ी of खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित by ठहराना Inc., dealing in computers and consumer electronics.
The स्टोर्स बेचें मैकिंटोश निजी कंप्यूटर, तन्त्र, ipods, ipads, आईफ़ोन, third-party accessories, and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV.
Some high profile stores feature a थिएटर लिये प्रस्तुतियों और वर्कशॉप और a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of खुदरा परिचालन, the ठहराना स्टोर्स have, according to an आलेख in the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स, महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये `` [ turning ] the उबाऊ कंप्यूटर बिक्री मंजिल into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 स्टोर्स विश्वव्यापी, साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of अरब in merchandise in 2011, और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य खुदरा market in terms of sales per unit area.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी उद्योगों और आविष्कारक, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the co-founder, अध्यक्ष, और सीईओ of ठहराना Inc.
Through Apple, he थी widely पहचाना as a charismatic पायोनियर of the निजी कंप्यूटर क्रान्ति और लिये उसके influential करियर in the कंप्यूटर और उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स फ़ील्ड, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief कार्यपालिका of पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios ; he became a सदस्य of the फलक of निर्देशकों of the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006, when Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the पहला to देखिए the वाणिज्यिक संभावित of xerox parc 's चूहा -ड्राइवn आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस, जिससे led to the creation of the Apple Lisa and, one year later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the laserwriter, एक of the पहला widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र printers, to the market.
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985, Jobs left ठहराना और संस्थापित अगला, a कंप्यूटर मंच विकास कम्पनी specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
In 1986, he acquired the कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of Lucasfilm, which was spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an कार्यपालिका producer.
He served as CEO and majority shareholder जबतक डिज़्नी 's खरीदें of पिक्चर्स in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, copland, gil amelio turned to अगला कंप्यूटर, और the nextstep मंच became the न्यास लिये the मैक OS X.
Jobs returned to ठहराना as an सलाहकार, और took कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought Apple from निकट दिवालियापन to profitability by 1998.
As the नई सीईओ of the कम्पनी, कार्य oversaw the विकास of the imac, itunes, ipod, iphone, और ipad, और on the services side, the company 's Apple Retail Stores, iTunes Store and the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable वित्तीय रिटर्न, और propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान सरेआम traded कम्पनी in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by अनेक टीकाकारों as एक of the महानतम turnarounds in business history.
In 2003, Jobs थी diagnosed साथ a अग्न्याशय neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a हार्मोन असंतुलन, underwent a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009, और appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical छोड़ लिये सबसे of 2011, कार्य resigned in अगस्त कि साल, and was elected Chairman of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest related to उसके metastatic ट्यूमर on अक्तूबर 5, 2011.
Jobs प्राप्त a क्रमांक of honors और पब्लिक मान्यता लिये उसके influence in the technology and music industries.
He has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', और रै महरूम वर्णित as the `` पिता of the डिजिटल क्रान्ति '', a `` निपुण of नवीनता '', और a `` डिज़ाइन perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the numeric system in ancient Rome, uses combinations of अक्षर इससे the लैटिन वर्णमाला to signify मान.
The संख्याएँ 1 to 10 can be expressed in रोमन numerals as follows:
और.
The रोमन numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals जारी बाद the मनाही of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by अधिक सुविधाजनक hindu-arabic numerals ; however इस process was gradual, and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day.
प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज Diagram
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net धनात्मक चार्ज अनुभवी by an इलेक्ट्रॉन in a multi-electron atom.
The पद `` प्रभावी '' is प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective नाभिकीय चार्ज अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल electron is also called the core charge.
It is possible to determine the strength of the नाभिकीय चार्ज by looking at the ऑक्सीकरण क्रमांक of the atom.
