The Dwight D. आइज़नहावर नेशनल प्रणाली of अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय फ्रीवे प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली, or बस the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States.
The system is named लिये अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, जो championed इसके गठन.
Construction was authorized by the Federal Aid राजमार्ग अधिनियम of 1956, और the असली portion was completed 35 years later.
The network has चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित, और, it था a कुल लंबाई of, बनाना it the संसार 's दूसरी longest बाद चीन 's., परिचय one-quarter of सब गाडी miles driven in the country use the Interstate system.
The लागत of निर्माण रै महरूम अनुमानित at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 डॉलर ), बनाना it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids ``.
The system has contributed in shaping the संयुक्त राज्य into a संसार आर्थिक महाशक्ति और a अत्यधिक industrialized nation.
.eu is the देश कोड top-level डोमेन ( cctld ) लिये the European Union ( EU ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the domain is उपलब्धियाँ लिये संगठनों in और निवासियों of eu सदस्य states.
The TLD is administered by eurid, a consortium originally consisting of the नेशनल cctld रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of बेल्जियम, स्वीडन, और इटली, joined बाद by the नेशनल registry operator of the Czech Republic.
ट्रेडमार्क स्वामी यहूद समर्थ to submit पंजीकरण through a सूर्योदय period, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
पूरा पंजीकरण प्रारंभ on 7 April 2006.
Meister means master in जर्मनी ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ).
The word is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is used for the current नेशनल, यूरोपीय or संसार चैंपियन ( deutscher Meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many modern day German पुलिस शक्तियां उपयोग the शीर्षक meister.
During the Second संसार युद्ध, meister थी the उच्चतम आयोजिक rank of the Ordnungspolizei.
Meister रै महरूम उधार into अंग्रेज़ी कठबोली, जहाँ it is used in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical ज्ञान और व्यावहारिक कौशल in उसके व्यवसायिक, कारोबार, or कुछ अन्य kind of work or activity.
लिये उदाहरण, a “puzzle-meister” होता be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a व्यंग्यात्मक intent ( लिये उदाहरण, “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a छोटी, neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ).
Mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों is an अमरीकी live-action children 's टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय teenagers साथ super-powers, based on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise, Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger.
Both the दिखाएँ और इसके सम्बन्धित merchandise देखी unbridled overnight success, becoming a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere months.
Under the original name, `` Mighty Morphin Power Rangers '' the series ran इससे 1993 to 1995 और शाखित the विशेषता फिल्मी mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों : The Movie.
The second and तीसरा सीज़न of the दिखाएँ खींचा on फुटेज और तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively, though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains.
Only the mecha and the Kiba रेंजर वेशभूषा ( worn by the श्वेत रेंजर ) यहूद retained इससे dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु, while only the mecha from Kakuranger were featured in the third season.
However the Kakuranger वेशभूषा यहूद बाद प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक वर्ण of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers.
The series was produced by MMPR Productions, वितरित by saban entertainment, और aired on फॉक्स बच्चे.
The show 's merchandise थी उत्पादित और वितरित by बंदाई entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the शक्ति रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद, और using वेशभूषा, प्रॉप्स, और फुटेज इससे subsequent Super Sentai series, as well as changing the cast and storyline.
While an overarching कथानक होता continue जबतक शक्ति रेंजरों खोया आकाशगंगा, subsequent श्रेणी after MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
In 2010, a re-version of mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों, साथ a नई लोगो, कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स, और अतिरिक्त वैकल्पिक खास effects, was broadcast on ABC Kids, and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series.
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19, 1809 – October 7, 1849 ) was an अमरीकी लेखक, कवि, एडिटर और साहित्यिक आलोचक, माना भाग of the American Romantic Movement.
Best ज्ञात लिये उसके किस्से of रहस्य और the घोर, पो थी एक of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the short story and is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre.
He is further credited साथ contributing to the उभरते विधा of विज्ञान fiction.
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a जीना through लिखने अलोन, resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन और करियर.
He was born as एडगर पो in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स ; he थी अनाथ यंग जब उसके माँ died shortly after his father abandoned the family.
Poe was taken in by John and frances allan, of रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, but they never formally adopted him.
he attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of वर्जिनिया लिये एक सेमेस्टर but left due to lack of money.
बाद enlisting in the फौज और बाद failing as an अधिकारी 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट, Poe parted ways with the Allans.
His publishing career began humbly, with an anonymous संग्रहण of कविताएं, tamerlane और अन्य कविताएं ( 1827 ), credited तभी to `` a Bostonian ''.
पो switched उसके फ़ोकस to गद्य और खर्च the अगला अनेक सालो working लिये साहित्यिक journals and periodicals, becoming known for his own style of literary criticism.
His कार्य मजबूर उसे to मूव among अनेक शहरों, सहित बाल्टीमोर, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
In जनवरी 1845 पो प्रकाशित उसके कविता, `` The Raven ``, to instant success.
His wife died of तपेदिक दो सालो बाद इसके प्रकाशन.
He began planning to produce his अपना जर्नल, the penn ( बाद renamed the स्टाइलस ), हालांकि he died पहले it could be produced.
On October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in Baltimore ; the कारण of उसके मौत is अनजान और रै महरूम variously attributed to दारू, दिमाग जमघट, हैजा, दवाएँ, दिल disease, rabies, suicide, tuberculosis, and other agents.
Poe and his works influenced literature in the United States and around the संसार, as खूब as in specialized फ़ील्ड, ऐसे as cosmology और क्रिप्टोग्राफी.
Poe and his कार्य appear throughout लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in साहित्य, music, films, and television.
A number of his घरों हैं समर्पित संग्रहालय today.
The Mystery Writers of America present an सालाना पुरस्कार ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार लिये विशिष्ट work in the mystery genre.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात गामा ( 15 पाउंड ) of मांस प्रति day.
A major घटक of उनके आहार is the flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों, like this African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव कि गर्भाशयी इसके उर्जा और nutrient आवश्यकताएँ इससे a आहार consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
Animals that depend solely on एनिमल flesh लिये उनके nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं माना carnivores जबकि those कि भी consume non-animal food are considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume दोनो एनिमल और non-animal खाना, और अलावा इससे the अधिक सामान्य परिभाषा, वहीँ is no clearly पारिभाषित ratio of plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore.
A carnivore कि sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain is an apex predator.
Plants that capture and digest कीट हैं पुकारा मांसाहारी plants.
Similarly, fungi that कैप्चर microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः पुकारा carnivorous fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football competition contested by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध.
The current champions are स्पेन, जो जीती the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
The current स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 संसार कप tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग national teams.
Brazil have जीती पाँच टाइम्स, और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have played in every tournament.
The अन्य संसार कप विजेता हैं इटली, साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी, साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता Uruguay, with two titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल मैच of the 2006 फीफा World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, रूस in 2018, और Qatar in 2022.
Heroes is an American विज्ञान fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by टिम क्रिंग कि appeared on एनबीसी लिये चार सीज़न इससे September 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The series tells the stories of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities, और कैसा ये abilities लो प्रभाव in the characters ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे, using multi-episode स्टोरी arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger, अधिक encompassing arc.
The series was produced by Tailwind Productions in संघ साथ सार्वभौमिक मीडिया studios.
it थी फिल्माया primarily in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
Four पूरा सीज़न aired, समाप्ति on फ़रवरी 8, 2010.
The critically acclaimed पहला ऋतु था a चलाएं of 23 एपीसोड और garnered an औसत of 14.3 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य, receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years.
the दूसरी ऋतु of नायक आकर्षित an औसत of 13.1 लाख दर्शक in the U.S., and marked NBC 's sole series among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season.
Heroes has earned a number of awards and nominations, सहित प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार, सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार and British Academy Television Awards.
An online extension of the series, Heroes 360 Experience, later rebranded as नायक evolutions, थी निर्मित to explore the नायक ब्रह्मांड और provides इनसाइट into the show 's mythology.
Other official Heroes media शामिल मैगज़ीन, कार्रवाई आंकड़े, tie-in और इंटरैक्टिव वेबसाइटों, a मोबाईल खेल, a novel, clothing and other merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, NBC Digital Entertainment released a series of online सामग्री लिये the गर्मियाँ, सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री, बेतार आईटीवी interactivity, ग्राफिक novels उपलब्धियाँ लिये mobile viewing and webisodes.
NBC announced नायक रद्दीकरण on may 14, 2010.
Afterward, the network considered making a टेलीविज़न खास इवेंट to conclude the श्रेणी ; however, on सितंबर 9, 2010, एनबीसी घोषित the निर्णय to रोकें कोई further विकास of the Heroes franchise.
Tim Kring then suggested that the broad premise of नायक storylines अनुमत लिये the मताधिकार to वापसी लिये प्रशंसक, लकिन he किया नहीं बताएँ जब or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, tv लकीर reported कि एमएसएन थी in बाते to revive the series with a new cast.
जॉन pierpont `` J. P. ''
Morgan ( April 17, 1837 – March 31, 1913 ) was an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर, बैंकर, लोकसेवक और आर्ट कलेक्टर जो वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट वित्त and industrial consolidation during his time.
In 1892 मॉर्गन arranged the विलय of एडिसन सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक और thomson-houston इलेक्ट्रिक कम्पनी to form General Electric.
After financing the creation of the Federal स्टील कम्पनी, he मिलाया in 1901 साथ the कार्नेगी स्टील कम्पनी और अनेक अन्य स्टील और आयरन व्यवसायों, सहित संचित स्टील और तार कम्पनी स्वामित्व by William Edenborn, to form the United States Steel Corporation.
Morgan died in Rome, Italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving उसके सौभाग्य और कारोबार to उसके बेटे, जॉन pierpont `` जोकर '' मॉर्गन, jr., और bequeathing उसके mansion और विशाल book collections to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York.
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s, he and उसके साझेदार था वित्तीय निवेश in अनेक विशाल corporations और यहूद अभियुक्त by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He directed the बैंकिंग गठबन्धन कि रोका the दहशत of 1907.
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era, and his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped रूपांतरण अमरीकी कारोबार.
This is a list of episodes of the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी.
The episodes were directed by शिगेरू ueda और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil कार्यपालिका Committee which included Xebec and Genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in टोकियो और घूमती around रिन asōgi, an अमर निजी अन्वेषक, as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
There are large time gaps in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला five episodes, ranging from one to thirty years.
The six episodes were broadcast monthly on AT-X चैनल in जापानी, between फ़रवरी 3 और जुलाई 6, 2008.
Each एपीसोड is 45 मिनट्स long.
Two pieces of theme म्यूज़िक हैं प्रयुक्त लिये the एपीसोड : the खोलने थीम `` alsatia '' और the समाप्ति थीम `` Cause Disarray ''.
Both were composed and performed by the जापानी मेटल बैंड Galneryus.
The श्रेणी थी उत्पादित to commemorate the दसवाँ वर्षगांठ of the at-x network it originally aired on.
Aerial photo of FLETC, where US digital forensics मानकों यहूद विकसित in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic विज्ञान encompassing the रिकवरी और छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in डिजिटल डिवाइस, प्रायः in relation to computer crime.
the पद डिजिटल forensics थी originally प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये कंप्यूटर forensics but has expanded to cover investigation of all devices capable of storing digital data.
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the लेट 1970s और जल्दी '80s, the अनुशासन विकसित in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s, और it थी नहीं जबतक the जल्दी 21st सदी कि national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a किस्में of अनुप्रयोग.
The most common is to support or खण्डन a परिकल्पना पहले दण्ड or सिविल ( as भाग of the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्कवरी process ) courts.
Forensics may also feature in the private sector ; such as during internal corporate investigations or intrusion छानबीन ( a विशेषज्ञ जांच into the प्रकृति और extent of an अनधिकृत संजाल intrusion ).
the तकनीकी पहलू of an छानबीन is विभाजित into अनेक sub-branches, relating to the प्रकार of डिजिटल devices involved ; computer forensics, network forensics, forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics.
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure, forensic इमेजिंग ( अधिग्रहण ) और विश्लेषण of डिजिटल media and the production of a report into collected evidence.
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime, digital forensics can be used to विशेषता प्रमाण to विशिष्ट संदिग्धों, confirm alibis or कथन, determine intent, पहचानो sources ( for example, in copyright cases ), or authenticate documents.
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of forensic विश्लेषण ( जहाँ the usual उद्देश्य is to provide जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler सवाल ) प्रायः involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
A तुलना of the chromaticities enclosed by some color spaces.
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of संख्याएँ, typically as तीन or चार मान or color components ( e.g. RGB and CMYK are color models ).
However, a color model with no associated mapping फलन to an निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेस is a अधिक or कम मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ no कनेक्शन to कोई globally समझा प्रणाली of रंग निर्वचन.
Adding a certain mapping function between the रंग मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ रंग स्पेस परिणाम in a definite `` पदचिह्न '' भीतर the सन्दर्भ color space.
This `` footprint '' is ज्ञात as a gamut, और, in संयोजन साथ the रंग model, defines a new color space.
For example, Adobe RGB and sRGB are दो अलग निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेसेस, दोनो आधारित on the RGB model.
In the most generic भाव of the परिभाषा ऊपर, रंग स्पेसेस can be पारिभाषित without the use of a color model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, are in प्रभाव a दिए नियत of names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं पारिभाषित by the अस्तित्व of a corresponding set of physical color swatches.
This article focuses on the गणितीय मॉडल अवधारणा.
Labor Day is an American federal अवकाश observed on the पहला सोमवार in सितंबर, कि मनाता the economic and social contributions of workers.
Life insurance is a अनुबंध between an insured ( बीमे नीति होल्डर ) और an insurer, जहाँ the insurer वादे to pay a designated beneficiary a sum of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, other events ऐसे as टर्मिनल बीमारी or नाजुक बीमारी may also trigger payment.
The policy होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम, either regularly or as a lump sum.
Other expenses ( such as funeral खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes included in the benefits.
Life policies are विधिक अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the limitations of the insured events.
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to सीमा the देयता of the insurer ; आम उदाहरण हैं दावा relating to suicide, fraud, war, riot and civil commotion.
Life-based अनुबंध tend to पतन into दो प्रमुख categories:
Protection नीतियों – designed to provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of specified event, typically a lump sum payment.
A आम रूप of इस डिज़ाइन is term insurance.
Investment policies – where the main उद्देश्य is to सुकर the विकास of पूंजी by नियमित or सिंगल प्रीमियम.
Common forms ( in the us ) हैं पूरे जीवन, सार्वभौमिक जीवन और परिवर्तनीय जीवन नीतियों.

9 – 12 फ़रवरी ( वियतनाम )
Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2, 1962 in yorba लिंडा, नारंगी काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, भी credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, most of जिससे यहूद नहीं विशाल वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं.
She went on to make a few television अतिथि दिखावे ( macgyver, 1st & टेन, और as a प्रतियोगी on the $ 100,000 पिरामिड ) पहले वो gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय एक्सपोज़र साथ her first major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the other हाफ of the दो `` sams '' लिये लगभग 5 सालो, cemented her popularity.
Paired with रोब estes जो निभाई सार्जेंट क्रिस lorenzo, kapture gained वैश्विक मान्यता साथ साथ उसके costar since the show was broadcast in several countries.
Sergeant Lance आखिरकार became लेफ्टिनेंट तलवार by the समय kapture बाएँ the श्रेणी in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her time with the series, Kapture briefly सत in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी, लिये दो एपीसोड.
She was interviewed for the रेशा stalkings ऋतु 1 dvd जिससे थी वितरित by लंगर खाड़ी entertainment और released in September 2004.
After a short hiatus from the screen following उसके निकास इससे रेशा stalkings, kapture लौटे in 1997 to the छोटी स्क्रीन और यूएसए संजाल.
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies, Perfect Crime ( आधारित on a सच्चा स्टोरी, भी पुकारा छुपा और तलाश : the जोआन जेन्सेन स्टोरी ), जिससे भी स्ट्रक्चर चमेली guy और उसके अंगरक्षक.
She later starred in a few other independent film projects and थिएटर प्रोडक्शन्स और था अनेक टेलीविज़न अतिथि appearances.
kapture भी था a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the बेचैन इससे 2002 through 2004, जहाँ वो थी credited as mitzi kapture donahue, और स्ट्रक्चर in the made-for-tv फिल्म रात्रि of आतंक जिससे premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
उसके नवीनतम is a supporting भूमिका in परमेश्वर 's कानों, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the xeroderma pigmentosum Society.
the एक्सबॉक्स 360 is the दूसरी वीडियो खेल कंसोल विकसित by और produced for Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 और निन्टेंडो 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
As of सितंबर 30, 2012, 70 लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have महरूम बेची worldwide.
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12, 2005, with detailed launch and खेल सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment एक्सपो ( e3 ).
The कंसोल बेची आउट completely upon रिलीज in सब regions except in Japan.
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service that allows players to compete online ; download arcade खेल, खेल demos, trailers, tv shows, म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ मीडिया बीच मल्टीमीडिया सामर्थ्य.
The Xbox Live also offers अभिगम to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications.
At their E3 प्रस्तुतीकरण on जून 14, 2010, microsoft घोषित a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 that would ship on the same day.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model और सुविधाएँ एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi, toslink s/pdif ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो आउटपुट, पाँच USB 2.0 ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port.
Older models of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 have चूंकि महरूम discontinued.
The first new console to be released features a 250 GB hard drive, while a बाद, कम महंगी sku सुविधाएँ 4 gb आतंरिक storage.
Backpack may also refer to a 2001 अनोखा by एमिली barr
A आधुनिक backpack
स्विस फौज backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत तुमको फ़्रेम.
A backpack ( also called rucksack, knapsack, packsack, pack ) is, in its simplest रूप, a cloth बोरी carried on एक 's वापस और secured साथ दो straps that go over the shoulders, but there can be exceptions.
Lightweight types of backpacks हैं sometimes worn on तभी एक कंधे strap.
Backpacks हैं प्रायः पसन्दीदा to हैंडबैग लिये carrying भारी loads or carrying कोई sort of उपकरण, because of the limited capacity to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ), प्रायः offload the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप बेल्ट, leaving the कंधे straps mainly for stabilising the load.
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads, as the hips are stronger than the shoulders, and also increases चपलता और संतुलन, चूंकि the लोड यात्राएँ nearer the wearer 's own center of mass.
In ancient times, the backpack थी प्रयुक्त as a अर्थात् to carry the शिकारी 's larger खेल और अन्य प्रकार of prey and as a way of easier transport for other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters होता dismember उनके शिकार और वितरित the टुकड़े of the एनिमल around, प्रत्येक एक पैकिंग the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they placed on to their backs.
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and स्किन ( depending on कया sorts of पशु यहूद in the क्षेत्रफल ) और sewn साथ by the आंतों of said animals, which were woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material.
मैक्सिको ( ; ; ), officially the संयुक्त मैक्सिकन राज्य ( ), is a federal constitutional republic in North America.
It is bordered on the उत्तर by the संयुक्त राज्य ; on the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर ; on the southeast by ग्वाटेमाला, Belize, and the Caribbean Sea ; and on the east by the Gulf of Mexico.
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ), Mexico is the पांचवां largest देश in the americas by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the 13th largest स्वतंत्र स्वदेश in the world.
With an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 लाख, it is the संसार 's eleventh सबसे populous देश और the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one states और a संघीय ज़िला, the पूंजी city.
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced civilizations ऐसे as the olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the zapotec, the माया और the एज़टेक पहले पहला सम्पर्क साथ europeans.
In 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory इससे इसके आधार in méxico-tenochtitlan, जिससे थी administered as the viceroyalty of New Spain.
This territory होता आखिरकार become मैक्सिको following मान्यता of the colony 's independence in 1821.
The post-independence period was characterized by economic अस्थिरता, the mexican-american युद्ध और territorial cession to the संयुक्त राज्य, a सिविल war, two empires and a domestic dictatorship.
the latter led to the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति in 1910, जिससे culminated साथ the promulgation of the 1917 संविधान and the emergence of the country 's current political system.
Elections held in July 2000 चिह्नित the पहला समय कि an विपक्ष पार्टी जीती the प्रेसिडेंसी इससे the संस्थागत Revolutionary Party.
चूंकि 2006 the देश रै महरूम in the midst of a ड्रग युद्ध which has caused 60,000 deaths.
Mexico has one of the संसार 's largest economies, और is माना both a regional power and middle power.
In addition, Mexico was the first Latin American member of the संगठन लिये आर्थिक co-operation और विकास oecd ( चूंकि 1994 ), और माना an upper-middle आय देश by the संसार Bank.
Mexico is माना a newly industrialized देश and an emerging power.
It has the fourteenth largest नाममात्र जीडीपी और the eleventh largest जीडीपी by purchasing power parity.
The economy is strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध ( nafta ) साझेदार, विशेषकर the United States of America.
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by क्रमांक of युनेस्को संसार विरासत साइट साथ 31, और in 2007 थी the दसवाँ सबसे visited देश in the संसार साथ 21.4 million international arrivals per year.
Babe Ruth holds the एमएलबी करियर slugging प्रतिशत record (.690 ).
In baseball statistics, slugging प्रतिशत ( abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of the power of a hitter.
It is calculated as कुल bases विभाजित by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a given player, और 1b, 2b, 3b, और hr हैं the क्रमांक of singles, युगल, तिगुना, और घर रनों, क्रमशः.
Walks are specifically excluded इससे इस गणना.
For example, in 1920, बेब रुथ निभाई उसके पहला ऋतु लिये the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़.
In 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 हिट्स, comprising 73 singles, 36 युगल, 9 तिगुना, और 54 घर रनों, जिससे brings the कुल आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, उसके slugging percentage for the season.
The अगला साल he slugged.846, और ये रिकॉर्ड गई अखंड जबतक 2001, जब बैरी bonds हासिल 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, unmatched since.
is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square ( now Square Enix ) लिये the सुपर निन्टेंडो entertainment System in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of Square 's Final Fantasy series ; Yuji Horii, a freelance पंक्तियां और निर्माता of एनिक्स 's लोकप्रिय ड्रैगन क्वेस्ट श्रेणी ; और अकिरा toriyama, a freelance manga कलाकार famed लिये उसके कार्य साथ ड्रैगन क्वेस्ट और ड्रैगन बॉल.
Kazuhiko Aoki उत्पादित the खेल, masato काटो लिखा सबसे of the प्लाट, जबकि composer yasunori mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story follows a group of adventurers जो सफर through समय to prevent a वैश्विक प्रलय.
Square re-released a ported version by tose in जापानी लिये सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन in 1999, बाद repackaged साथ a फाइनल काल्पनिक iv बंदरगाहों as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market.
A slightly enhanced Chrono ट्रिगर थी released लिये the निन्टेंडो ds on नवम्बर 25, 2008, in उत्तर अमेरिका और जापानी, और गई on बिक्री in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on February 3, 2009 and in Europe on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in pal territories पहले the निन्टेंडो DS version.
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon रिलीज और is माना आज to be एक of the महानतम वीडियो खेल of सब time.
Nintendo Power magazine वर्णित पहलुओं of chrono ट्रिगर as क्रांतिकारी, सहित इसके अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character development, unique battle system, and detailed graphics.
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995, and the game 's SNES और प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 लाख नक़ल as of कूच 2003.
The version for the निन्टेंडो ds बेची 790,000 नक़ल as of March 2009.
Chrono Trigger was also ported to मोबाईल फोन, आभासी कंसोल, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ), आईओएस डिवाइस, और एंड्रॉइड devices.
बकरी चीज
Goat चीज, or chèvre ( इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द लिये goat ), is cheese made out of the milk of goats.
Hyperthermia is elevated देह तापमान due to विफल thermoregulation कि occurs जब a देह produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates.
Extreme temperature elevation तब becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring तात्कालिक उपचार to prevent disability or death.
The most common causes शामिल ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक और प्रतिकूल प्रतिक्रियाएँ to drugs.
The former is an acute temperature उन्नयन caused by एक्सपोज़र to excessive ऊष्मा, or संयोजन of ऊष्मा और आर्द्रता, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of अनेक दवाएँ, विशेषकर those कि affect the सेंट्रल nervous system.
Malignant अतिताप is a विरल complication of कुछ प्रकार of general anesthesia.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be प्रयुक्त in the उपचार of कुछ kinds of कर्कट और अन्य शर्तें, सबसे commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
अतिताप differs इससे ज्वर in कि the देह 's तापमान set point remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, which occurs जब the तापमान बूंदें नीचे कि जरूरी to maintain सामान्य metabolism.
बेलीज़, is a देश स्तिथ on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the only country in the क्षेत्रफल जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is the आधिकारिक भाषा, हालांकि kriol and Spanish are more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the north by मैक्सिको, to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by ग्वाटेमाला और to the ईस्ट by the caribbean Sea.
Its मेनलैंड is परिचय long और wide.
With of land and a जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 निवासियों ( 2010 जनसांख्यिकी ), बेलीज़ possesses the lowest population density in Central America.
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश और एक of the उच्चतम in the western hemisphere.
Belize 's abundance of स्थलीय और समुद्री प्रजाति, और इसके विविधता of ecosystems दे it a कुंजी प्लेस भीतर the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor.
Belize has a विविध समाज, comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों और भाषाएं.
It is the only nation in the region साथ a अंग्रेजों औपनिवेशिक विरासत, लकिन as a भाग of the पश्चिमी caribbean मण्डल, it भी साझा a आम विरासत with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean countries.
In general, Belize is considered to be a Central American and Caribbean स्वदेश साथ दमदार ties to दोनो the caribbean और Latin America.
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ), the Community of लैटिन अमरीकी और caribbean राज्य ( celac ), और सेंट्रल अमरीकी संयोजन System ( SICA ).
Belize is known for its September जश्न, और is the जन्मस्थान of चबाने गम and Punta Rock.
The `` बेट्सी रॉस '' flag
A `` बेट्सी रॉस '' ध्वज उड़ती बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य, popularly attributed to बेट्सी रॉस, using the common motifs of alternating red-and-white striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
the ध्वज थी designed दौरान the अमरीकी क्रान्ति and features 13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive feature of the रॉस ध्वज is the व्यवस्था of the stars in a circle.
हालांकि the बेट्सी रॉस स्टोरी is स्वीकृत by सबसे अमेरिकी, कुछ ध्वज इतिहासकारों और revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American flag.
According to the traditional account, the original flag was बना in जून 1776, जब a छोटी committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और सापेक्ष जार्ज रॉस —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag.
Betsy accepted the job to manufacture the ध्वज, altering the कमेटी 's डिज़ाइन by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars.
While the बेट्सी रॉस लेजेंड is questionable, the ध्वज डिज़ाइन is ज्ञात to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; Alfred B. Street described it at the surrender of General Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags ज्ञात to मौजूद ; जबकि it is नहीं the oldest surviving ध्वज centuries in cloth रूप, इसके likeness appears on पुरानी शारीरिक relics, namely, the contemporary battlefield paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale.
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown from ship masts और अनेक अन्य स्थान, और यूँ provide the पहला ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक दस्तावेज़ीकरण of the ध्वज 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans अफेयर्स उपयोग the बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा to सब दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी क्रान्ति to the उपस्थित day.
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has been featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर ) और films, ऐसे as the 1960 संस्करण of Pollyanna.
The flag continues to be एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय प्रतीकों of the American Revolution.
A purr is a ध्वनि बना by सब प्रजाति of felids और is a भाग of बिल्ली संचार.
It varies between cats ( for example by loudness and tone ), and from प्रजाति to प्रजाति, लकिन can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
The term `` purring '' has been used liberally in साहित्य, और it रै महरूम claimed कि viverrids ( सीविट, नेवला, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other animals कि have महरूम कहा to purr हैं खरगोश, squirrels, guinea pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, elephants, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
However, using a सख्त परिभाषा of purring कि निरन्तर ध्वनि उत्पादन जरूर वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( और प्रायः go on लिये मिनट्स ), पीटर्स ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive review of the scientific literature, reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets, Genetta tigrina, and most likely also Genetta genetta, had been documented to purr.
the platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to eastern Australia, including Tasmania.
Together साथ the चार प्रजाति of एकिडना, it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति have महरूम found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, बतख -billed, बीवर -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it, साथ some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few विषैला स्तनधारियों, the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus मेक it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the एनिमल emblem of the राज्य of नई South Wales.
Until the early 20th century, it थी hunted लिये इसके फर, लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout its range.
Although captive breeding programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.
St. Elizabeth is a गाँव in मिलर काउंटी, मिसौरी, संयुक्त States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 336 at the 2010 census.
Wilton is a census-designated place ( cdp ) in sacramento काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States.
It is भाग of the sacramento – arden-arcade – roseville महानगर Statistical Area.
The population was 5,363 at the 2010 census, up from 4,551 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
In human-computer बातचीत, काटें और paste और नक़ल और paste हैं सम्बन्धित कमांड कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface बातचीत technique for transferring text, data, files or objects from a source to a destination.
Most ubiquitously, उपयोक्ता आवश्यकता the क्षमता to cut and paste sections of plain text.
The cut command removes the चयनित आंकड़ा इससे इसके असली स्थिति, जबकि the नक़ल कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the चयनित आंकड़ा is लगाई in a clipboard.
The data in the clipboard is बाद inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the paste command is issued.
The command names are an interface metaphor based on the शारीरिक कार्यविधि प्रयुक्त in पाण्डुलिपि संपादन to create a page layout.
This interaction तकनीक रै बंद एसोसिएशन साथ सम्बन्धित तकनीकों in आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस such as a computer mouse ( by drag and drop, for example ).
Economic order मात्रा is the अनुक्रम मात्रा कि minimizes कुल inventory पकड़कर costs and ordering costs.
it is एक of the oldest शास्त्रीय production scheduling models.
The framework used to determine इस अनुक्रम मात्रा is भी ज्ञात as barabas eoq Model or Barabas Formula.
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913, but R. H. Wilson, a consultant जो लागू it extensively, is दिए क्रेडिट लिये उसके in-depth analysis.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his आद्याक्षर srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और नेता of Double Trouble.
साथ साथ वादक क्रिस layton और bassist टॉमी शैनन, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and दोगुना ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम अक्सर went gold.
He was born and उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, और लिये a छोटी काल of समय जिया in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped आउट of ऊँची स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical करियर, joining समूह ऐसे as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly performed around ऑस्टिन.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य, जबकि browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to एपिक रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम, टेक्सास बाढ़ in जून of कि year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't Stand the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist रीज़ Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू आदत और लौटे to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released और अर्जित उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन ब्लूज़ Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including अल्बर्ट किंग, फ्रेडी किंग, ओटिस फटाफट, और muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition लिये उसके गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was मरणोपरांत inducted into the ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the state of Texas.

Coca-Cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought out by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th सदी.
The company produces concentrate, जिससे is तब बेची to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers include coca-cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख restaurants and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced अन्य कोला पेय under the Coke brand name.
The most आम of ये is आहार कोक, साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola, आहार कोक caffeine-free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान brand.
Barry Louis larkin ( born अप्रैल 28, 1964 ) is a रिटायर्ड प्रमुख लीग Baseball player.
Larkin played shortstop लिये the सिनसिनाटी लाल इससे 1986 to 2004 और was one of the pivotal players on the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team.
Larkin was निर्वाचित to the नेशनल बेसबॉल हॉल of कीर्ति in जनवरी 2012 and was inducted on July 22.
Larkin is considered one of the top players of his era, जीतना नौ चांदी slugger पुरस्कार और तीन सुनहरा Glove awards.
He was selected to the Major League All-Star Game बारह टाइम्स, और थी निर्वाचित the 1995 नेशनल लीग सबसे मूल्यवान Player.
brasília ( ) is the संघीय पूंजी of ब्राज़ील और the सीट of government of the Federal District.
Administratively, the city is located in the Federal ज़िला जिससे is in the central-west Region.
physically, it is स्तिथ in the Brazilian Highlands.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate, making it the fourth largest city in Brazil.
However, as a महानगर क्षेत्रफल, it बाँधने निम्नतर at छठे in population.
Brasília is the largest city in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
Brasília has the पांचवां largest जीडीपी among लैटिन अमरीकी शहरों और the third in Brazil.
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( बराबर to लगभग $ 30,900 us डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the नगर 's प्रति capita आय is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities.
As the national capital, brasília is the सीट of सब तीन शाखाओं of the संघीय सरकारी of Brazil.
The city भी होस्ट the मुख्यालय of अनेक ब्राज़ीलियाई companies.
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings around expansive urban areas, as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर, have sparked a बहस और प्रतिबिंब on जीवन in बिग शहरों in the 20th century.
The city 's design divides it into गिने ब्लॉक as खूब as सेक्टर लिये निर्दिष्ट क्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the होटल सेक्टर, the बैंकिंग Sector or the Embassy Sector.
brasília होस्ट 124 विदेशी embassies.
The city was planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal urban planner, Oscar niemeyer as the प्रिंसिपल वास्तु और रॉबर्टो burle मार्क्स as the लैंडस्केप पंक्तियां.
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's संसार hertitage सूची due to इसके वास्तुकला.
On April 22, 1960, it formally became ब्राज़ील 's नेशनल capital.
Viewed from above, the main portion of the नगर resembles an वायुयान or a तितली.
The city is commonly referred to as पूंजी संघीय, or simply BSB.
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those नहीं born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ).
In लोकल उपयोग, the शब्द `` brasília '' प्रायः refers तभी to the पहला प्रशासनिक प्रदेश ( ra i ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( Distrito Federal ), where the most important government buildings are located.
Brasília has a अद्वितीय औकात in ब्राज़ील, as it is an प्रशासनिक प्रभाग बल्कि than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil.
Nationally, the term is almost always used synonymously साथ the संघीय ज़िला, जिससे constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit, analogous to a state.
अनेक `` उपग्रह शहरों '' मौजूद जिससे हैं भी part of the Federal District.
Brasília अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília, connecting the पूंजी to सब प्रमुख ब्राज़ीलियाई शहरों and many international destinations.
It is the तीसरा सबसे महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in ब्राज़ील, in शर्तें of passengers and aircraft movements.
Personifications of Germany, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, and the संयुक्त किंगडम attempting to रखना the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist और राष्ट्रवादी तनाव in the balkans to prevent a सामान्य यूरोपीय war.
वे यहूद कामयाब in 1912 और 1913 लकिन किया नहीं सफल in in 1914.
The causes of World War I, which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and समाप्त in 1918, शामिल अनेक कारकों, ऐसे as the विरोध और दुश्मनी of the चार दशकों leading up to the war.
Militarism, alliances, साम्राज्यवाद, और राष्ट्रवाद निभाई प्रमुख भूमिकाएँ in the conflict as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions taken by statesmen and generals दौरान the संकट of 1914, casus belli लिये जिससे थी the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया हंगेरियाई ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip, an irredentist Serb.
The crisis आए बाद a long और मुश्किल श्रेणी of राजनयिक clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली, फ़्रांस, जर्मनी, the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, the Austria-Hungarian Empire and Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high.
In turn these राजनयिक clashes can be traced to परिवर्तन in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
The अधिक तात्कालिक कारण लिये the युद्ध थी तनाव over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed साथ सर्बिया और रूस लिये territory और influence in the प्रदेश और वे खींचा the बाकी of the ग्रेट शक्तियां into the विरोध through their various alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of events unleashed by the हत्या triggered the युद्ध, the युद्ध 's origins go deeper, involving नेशनल राजनीती, संस्कृतियों, अर्थशास्त्र, और a जटिल वेब of alliances और counterbalances कि had developed between the various European powers since 1870.
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of nationalism across Europe, unresolved territorial विवादों, an intricate प्रणाली of alliances, the आभास विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of शक्ति in यूरोपीय, convoluted और fragmented शासन, the बाहें दौड़ of the पिछला दशकों, पिछला सैन्य नियोजन, imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth, power and prestige, and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g., the Pig War between Austria and Serbia.
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the German belief that the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain न्यूट्रल ) और देरी और misunderstandings in राजनयिक संचार.
The various categories of explanation for World War I correspond to अलग इतिहासकारों ' overall methods.
Most इतिहासकारों और लोकप्रिय टीकाकारों शामिल कल्याणकारी इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी of explanation to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
The deepest भेद among ये खाते is between कहानियां कि देखिए it as the अपरिहार्य और predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित factors, and those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the war, historians and academics had to deal with an unprecedented बाढ़ of memoirs और आधिकारिक दस्तावेज़, released as प्रत्येक देश शामिल आजमाया to avoid दोष लिये starting the युद्ध.
Early releases of information by governments, विशेषकर those released लिये उपयोग by the `` आयोग on the जिम्मेदारी of the लेखक of the युद्ध '' यहूद दिखाया to be अधूरी और पक्षपातपूर्ण.
In addition कुछ दस्तावेज़, विशेषकर राजनयिक केबल between रूस और फ़्रांस, यहूद मिला to have been doctored.
Even in later decades however, जब much अधिक सूचना था महरूम released, इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति have महरूम shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
Johnson 's new चार्ट of नेशनल प्रतीक, प्रकाशित c. 1868.
The large flags shown in the किनारे हैं the 37-star ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal मानक of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the रूसी Imperial Standard, and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle.
Various अन्य ध्वज flown by जहाजों are shown.
The ध्वज of क्यूबा is labelled `` क्यूबन ( so पुकारा ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the Flag of China was drawn mistakenly as a पश्चिमी ड्रैगन.
A national flag is a ध्वज कि symbolizes a देश.
The flag is flown by the सरकारी, लकिन प्रायः can भी be flown by citizens of the country.
Both public and private buildings such as स्कूलों और courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल flag.
In some countries, the नेशनल ध्वज हैं तभी flown इससे non-military buildings on certain flag days.
There are तीन पृथक प्रकार of नेशनल ध्वज लिये उपयोग on जमीन, और तीन लिये उपयोग at समुद्र, हालांकि many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight remaining स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध.
The confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Norrie disease is a genetic विकार कि primarily affects the नजर और लगभग सदा leads to blindness.
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms, कुछ मरीजों suffer इससे a प्रगतिशील सुनना घाटा starting ज़्यादातर in उनके 2nd दशक of life, while another portion may be mentally challenged.
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear श्वेत जब लाइट is shone on उन्हें ), साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर, ऐसे as shrinking of the ग्लोब और the बर्बाद away of the iris.
Around 30–50 % of them will also have developmental delay/ mental retardation, psychotic-like सुविधाएँ, incoordination of आंदोलनों or behavioral abnormalities.
Most patients are born with normal hearing ; however, the onset of सुनना घाटा is बहुत आम in जल्दी किशोरावस्था.
परिचय 15 % of the मरीजों हैं अनुमानित to develop all the features of the disease.
The disease affects almost only male infants at birth or soon after जनम, क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited x-linked recessive.
Only in very rare cases, महिलाओं have महरूम diagnosed साथ norrie बीमारी as खूब.
The exact incidence number is अनजान ; तभी a few सौ मामले have महरूम reported so दूर.
It is a very rare विकार कि is नहीं संबद्ध साथ कोई विशिष्ट ethnic or racial groups.
a अनुबंध is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` प्रस्ताव '' और `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता who exchange `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be किया in लिखने, हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The पार्टियों may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic persons.
A अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that something will or will not occur.
The word promise can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the पूरा standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि, विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, और an अतिरिक्त 26 अधिनियमों at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on अनुबंध लिये the International Sale of Goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed लिये वेब विकास to उपज डायनेमिक Web pages.
It was developed by Microsoft to allow प्रोग्रामर्स to निर्माण डायनेमिक वेब साइट, वेब अनुप्रयोग और वेब सेवाएं.
it थी पहला released in जनवरी 2002 साथ संस्करण 1.0 of the.neT फ्रेमवर्क, और is the successor to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language Runtime ( CLR ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net कोड using कोई समर्थित.NET language.
The ASP.NET SOAP extension framework allows asp.net components to प्रक्रम साबुन संदेश.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or lsd-25, भी ज्ञात as lysergide ( इन ) और colloquially as एसिड, is a semisynthetic साइकेडेलिक ड्रग of the ergoline परिवार, खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच प्रक्रियाओं, closed and open eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences, as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture.
It is used mainly as an entheogen, recreational ड्रग, और as an एजेंट in साइकेडेलिक therapy.
LSD is non-addictive, is not known to cause दिमाग क्षति, और रै अत्यधिक कम toxicity relative to dose.
However, प्रतिकूल मनोरोग प्रतिक्रियाएँ ऐसे as चिंता, paranoia, and delusions are possible.
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 इससे ergotamine, a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर stoll इससे ergot, a अनाज कवक कि typically grows on rye.
The short form `` LSD '' comes from its early कोड नाम lsd-25, जिससे is an संक्षिप्त लिये the जर्मनी `` lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
LSD is sensitive to oxygen, पराबैंगनी लाइट, और क्लोराइड, विशेषकर in समाधान, हालांकि इसके potency may पिछला लिये सालो if it is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature.
In pure रूप it is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically delivered orally, प्रायः on a substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter पेपर, a शुगर घन, or gelatin.
In इसके द्रव रूप, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is very potent, with 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) होने the दहलीज खुराक.
नई प्रयोग साथ एलएसडी प्रारंभ in 2009 for the first time in 40 years.
introduced by sandoz laboratories, साथ trade-name delysid, as a ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947, एलएसडी जल्दी became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central प्रज्ञा एजेंसी ( सीआईए ) विचार the ड्रग might be लागू to दिमाग कंट्रोल और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's MKULTRA research program propagated the drug among young servicemen and students.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the Western world दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in इसके निषेध.
Currently, a number of organizations—including the beckley न्यास, मानचित्र, heffter शोध संस्थान और the अल्बर्ट hofmann foundation—exist to fund, encourage and coordinate research into the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics.
The United States Navy 's समुद्र, एयर, जमीन टीमों, commonly ज्ञात as the नेवी seals, हैं the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a भाग of the नवल खास Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command.
`` SEAL '' is सदा capitalized in सन्दर्भ to सदस्यों of the नवल खास Warfare community.
The acronym is derived from their capacity to operate at समुद्र, in the एयर, और on जमीन.
SEALs हैं पुरूष सदस्यों of the संयुक्त States Navy.
An exchange program with the Coast गार्ड, जिससे ग्रैजुएट तीन coast guardsmen as seals, थी suspended in 2011.
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) रंगरूटों operators from the SEAL Teams.
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go वापस to the famed macv-sog दौरान the वियतनाम युद्ध.
This cooperation still exists today and is seen in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, और in the ढूंढना और हत्या of ओसामा बिन लादेन in पाकिस्तानी.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, orange, green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in blue.
According to the highest अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना इंसानो on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The उच्चतम दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 million, while deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, और उर्जा resources.
Memphis is a city in the southwestern कोने of the u.S. राज्य of टेनेसी, और the काउंटी seat of Shelby County.
The city is स्तिथ on the 4th chickasaw bluff, दक्षिण of the संगम of the भेड़िया and Mississippi rivers.
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest नगर in the राज्य of टेनेसी, the largest नगर on the मिसिसिपी नदी, the तीसरा largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, और the 20th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The greater Memphis metropolitan area, सहित सटा काउंटी in मिसिसिपी और अरकंसास, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,316,100.
This makes Memphis the second largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी, surpassed तभी by महानगर नैशविले, which has overtaken Memphis in recent years.
Memphis is the youngest of टेनेसी 's प्रमुख शहरों.
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a memphian, और the मेम्फिस प्रदेश is ज्ञात, विशेषकर to मीडिया आउटलेट, as `` मेम्फिस & The Mid-South ``.

Chancellor एंजेला मार्केल 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30, 2011, कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022, in a नीति reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
Currently, 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 countries.
नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति, it थी reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति साल, हालांकि according to the संसार Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय शक्ति.
As of June 2011, countries ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ऑस्ट्रिया, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, लातवियाई, liechtenstein, ध्वज, मलेशिया, माल्टा, नई जीलैंड, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a table of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो पहलू, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल मांसपेशी or as several muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.

The Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida Wars, were three conflicts in Florida between the seminole — the सामूहिक नाम दिए to the amalgamation of विभिन्न समूह of देशी अमेरिकी और ब्लैक लोगों जो settled in फ्लोरिडा in the early 18th century — and the United States Army.
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ), the Second Seminole War from 1835 to 1842, और the तीसरा seminole युद्ध इससे 1855 to 1858.
The पहला विरोध साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू जैक्सन 's आक्रमण और विनाश of नीग्रो फोर्ट in Florida in 1816.
Jackson भी attacked the स्पेनी at pensacola.
Ultimately, the Spanish क्राउन ceded the उपनिवेश to संयुक्त राज्य rule.

Luxor Las Vegas is a होटल और कसीनो on the लास वेगास स्ट्रिप in Paradise, Nevada.
The 30-story hotel, owned and operated by MGM रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय, रै a कसीनो साथ over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it has a new, highly आधुनिकीकरण, और समकालीन डिज़ाइन और contains a कुल of 4,400 कक्ष, सहित 442 suites, अस्तर the आंतरिक दीवारें of a पिरामिड स्टाइल मीनार और भीतर twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were built as later additions.
The होटल is नामित बाद the नगर of लक्सर ( ancient Thebes ) in Egypt.
Luxor is the दूसरी largest होटल in लास वेगास ( the largest होने the mgm ग्रैंड ) और the eighth largest in the world.
As of 2010, the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating कार्यक्रम, जिससे evaluates `` चिरस्थायी '' hotel operations.
A pilot experiment, also called a pilot study, is a small scale preliminary study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, time, cost, adverse कार्यक्रम, और प्रभाव आकार ( सांख्यिकीय variability ) in an attempt to भविष्यवाणी an उचित नमूना आकार और improve upon the पढ़ाई डिज़ाइन prior to प्रदर्शन of a full-scale शोध project.
Pilot studies, therefore, may not be उचित लिये मामला अध्ययन.
The Los Angeles Fire Department ( LAFD ) is the agency कि provides आग सुरक्षा और आपात चिकित्सा सेवाएं लिये the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स.
It may be unofficially referred to as the Los Angeles City Fire Department to फर्क it इससे the लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी आग विभाग.
The acre is a ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल और u.S. प्रथागत systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी than an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010, the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम, हालांकि is स्टिल used in real estate descriptions ).
It is स्टिल प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The international प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre.
In the United राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा अलग us survey acre are in use.
The most आम उपयोग of the एकड़ is to माप tracts of जमीन.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the way human beings use words to communicate विचार और जज्बात, और कैसा ऐसे संचार हैं processed and understood.
Thus it is how the brain creates और understands भाषा.
Most हाल theories consider कि इस प्रक्रम is carried out entirely by and inside the brain.
इस is माना एक of the सबसे characteristic abilities of the human species - perhaps the most characteristic.
However very छोटी is ज्ञात परिचय it और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना for research on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who have suffered some type of significant head injury, whether बाह्य ( wounds, बुलेट ) or आतंरिक ( स्ट्रोक्स, tumors, अपक्षयी रोगों ).
Studies have shown that most of the language प्रसंस्करण कृत्यों हैं carried आउट in the दिमागी cortex.
The essential फलन of the cortical भाषा क्षेत्रों is symbolic representation.
Even though language exists in अलग फ़ॉर्म, सब of उन्हें हैं आधारित on symbolic representation.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car, designed और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह और manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in the world, with a top speed of.
The असली संस्करण रै a top speed of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम शीर्ष Gear.
The standard veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen, साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत the मार्गदर्शन of अभियान्त्रिकी मुख्य वुल्फगांग schreiber.
A number of special विसंगतियाँ have महरूम उत्पादित.

DVD is an ऑप्टिकल डिस्क भंडार स्वरूप, invented और विकसित by फिलिप्स, सोनी, तोशिबा, और Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs offer higher storage capacity than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि having the वही आयाम.
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding मशीने कि physically स्टैम्प आंकड़ा onto the dvd.
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM, क्युकी आंकड़ा can तभी be पढ़ा और नहीं लिखा nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and dvd+r ) can be अंकित एकबार using a dvd रिकॉर्डर और तब फलन as a dvd-rom. rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw, dvd+rw, और dvd-ram ) can be अंकित और erased अनेक times.
dvds हैं प्रयुक्त in dvd-video उपभोक्ता डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप और in dvd-audio उपभोक्ता digital audio format, as well as for authoring AVCHD discs.
DVDs containing other प्रकार of सूचना may be referred to as dvd आंकड़ा discs.
