Peter Gene hernandez ( born अक्तूबर 8, 1985 ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो Mars, is an American singer-songwriter and record producer.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of संगीतकारों, मंगल began बनाना म्यूज़िक at a यंग आयु और performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated from ऊँची स्कूल और तब स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, to pursue a musical career.
Mars produced songs for other कलाकारों, joining उत्पादन टोली the smeezingtons.
Mars had an unsuccessful stint साथ motown रिकॉर्ड, लकिन तब हस्ताक्षरित साथ अटलांटिक in 2009.
He became पहचाना as a सोलो कलाकार बाद lending उसके vocals और co-writing the hooks लिये the गीतों `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B, and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy.
He also co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही गोलाकार `` by flo rida featuring ke $ ha, and `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan.
In अक्तूबर 2010, he released his debut album, Doo-Wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the विश्वव्यापी number-one singles `` बस the रास्ता तुम Are `` and `` Grenade ``, the album peaked at number three on the Billboard 200.
मंगल थी मनोनीत लिये सात grammys at the 53rd ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, जीतना बेहतरीन पुरूष पॉप गायन Performance for `` Just the Way You Are ''.
His दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम, अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स, was released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a चौड़ी किस्में of शैलियाँ और प्रभाव, और contains तत्व of many musical genres.
He has worked with an assortment of कलाकारों इससे विभिन्न genres.
as a चाइल्ड, he थी अत्यधिक बहकावे by कलाकारों ऐसे as छोटी रिचर्ड, Elvis Presley and Michael Jackson and would often impersonate these artists from a young age.
Mars also incorporates रेगी - और motown -inspired ध्वनि into उसके कार्य.
विश्वव्यापी, मंगल became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He had three singles in the शीर्ष टेन, सहित पहला प्लेस साथ `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '', जिससे sold 12.5 million copies.
Mars won Best International Male सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट पुरस्कार.
Bruno Mars has sold 6 लाख एल्बम और 40 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी as a singer.
Althought as a song-writer, producer and singer उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड बिक्री surpass 100 लाख worldwide.
Bust of Zeus, otricoli ( sala रोटोंडा, museo pio-clementino, Vatican ).
Greek mythology is the body of myths and teachings that belong to the ancient यूनानियों, concerning उनके देवताओं और नायक, the प्रकृति of the संसार, और the origins और significance of उनके अपना cult और ritual practices.
It was a भाग of the धर्म in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is part of religion in modern Greece and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and political institutions of प्राचीन यूनानियों और इसके सभ्यता, और to लाभ समझना of the प्रकृति of myth-making itself.
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, और implicitly in यूनानी representational कला, ऐसे as vase-paintings और votive उपहार.
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the जीवनदान और adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में of देवताओं, देवियाँ, नायक, heroines, और पौराणिक जीव.
These accounts initially यहूद disseminated in an oral-poetic परंपरा ; आज the यूनानी मिथकों are known primarily from Greek literature.
The oldest known Greek साहित्यिक स्त्रोत, होमर 's एपिक कविताएं इलियड और ओडिसी, फ़ोकस on कार्यक्रम surrounding the Trojan War.
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod, the theogony और the works और दिनों, contain खाते of the उत्पत्ति of the संसार, the उत्तराधिकार of दैवी rulers, the succession of human ages, the origin of human woes, and the origin of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the homeric hymns, in fragments of एपिक कविताएं of the एपिक साईकिल, in lyric कविताएं, in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc, in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और poets of the Hellenistic Age, and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
Archaeological findings provide a प्रिंसिपल सोर्स of विवरण परिचय यूनानी mythology, साथ देवताओं और नायक प्रदर्शित prominently in the सजावट of many artifacts.
Geometric designs on pottery of the eighth century BC depict दृश्यों इससे the trojan साईकिल as खूब as the adventures of heracles.
In the succeeding archaic, शास्त्रीय, और hellenistic अवधि, homeric और विभिन्न अन्य पौराणिक दृश्यों appear, supplementing the existing literary evidence.
Greek mythology has था an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, कला, और साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains part of Western heritage and language.
Poets and artists from ancient times to the present have निकला प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी mythology और have खोजा समकालीन significance and relevance in the themes.
Mouth & macneal in 1971
Mouth & macneal थी a पॉप duo इससे the नीदरलैंड्स.
They हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उनके लाख selling recording of `` How Do You Do ``.
The Boise State Broncos football कार्यक्रम represents boise राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और compete in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ) of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference.
They are currently led by head कोच क्रिस petersen और खेल उनके घर खेल at bronco Stadium.
The फ़्रैंक ( चिह्न : fr. or sfr. ; जर्मनी : franken, फ्रेंच और romansh : फ़्रैंक, इतालवी : फ्रेंको ; कोड : chf ) is the currency and legal tender of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally legal tender in the German exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी is the यूरोपियन ), it is in चौड़ी रोज़ उपयोग वहीँ.
The स्विस नेशनल बैंको मुद्दे banknotes और the संघीय mint Swissmint issues coins.
The Swiss franc is the तभी संस्करण of the फ़्रैंक स्टिल जारी in यूरोपीय.
The smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a rappen ( rp. ) in जर्मनी, centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच, centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी, और रैप ( rp. ) in romansh.
The ISO code of the currency used by banks और वित्तीय संस्थानों is chf, हालांकि `` fr. '' is प्रयुक्त by सबसे व्यवसायों and advertisers ; some use SFr. ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica.
Given the different भाषाएं प्रयुक्त in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, लैटिन is प्रयुक्त लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin, ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a अंग्रेजों कॉमिक कर्ता और फिल्मकार जो रोज़ to fame in the silent era.
Chaplin became a विश्वव्यापी प्रतीक through उसके स्क्रीन persona `` the ट्रैम्प `` और is माना one of the most important figures of the film industry.
His career spanned अधिक than 75 सालो, इससे a चाइल्ड in the विक्टोरियन era to बंद to his death at the age of 88, and encompassed both adulation and controversy.
Raised in London, चैपलिन 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by गरीबी and hardship.
He was sent to a workhouse twice before the आयु of नौ ; उसके पिता थी अनुपस्थित, और उसके माँ थी वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी asylum.
चैपलिन began performing इससे a यंग आयु, touring म्यूज़िक halls and later working as a stage actor and comedian.
At 19 he was signed to the prestigious फ्रेड karno कम्पनी, जिससे took उसे to अमेरिका.
Chaplin was scouted by the film industry, and made उसके पहला दिखावे in 1914 साथ keystone studios.
He soon विकसित the ट्रैम्प persona और formed a विशाल fan base.
Chaplin directed his films इससे an जल्दी स्टेज, और जारी to hone उसके शिल्प as he स्थानांतरित to the Essanay, Mutual, and First National corporations.
By 1918, he थी एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध मेन in the world.
In 1919, Chaplin co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों, giving him complete control over his films.
His first feature-length picture was The Kid ( 1921 ), followed by A स्त्री of पेरिस ( 1923 ), the सुनहरा फटाफट ( 1925 ), and The Circus ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s, बजाय producing नगर लाइट्स ( 1931 ) और आधुनिक टाइम्स ( 1936 ) बगैर dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly राजनैतिक और उसके अगला फिल्मी, the ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ), satirised एडोल्फ Hitler.
the 1940s थी a दशक चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये Chaplin, and his popularity declined rapidly.
He was accused of communist sympathies, जबकि उसके भागीदारी in a paternity सूट और विवाह to much younger women were considered scandalous.
An FBI investigation was खोली on चैपलिन, और he थी आखिरकार मजबूर to छोड़ the संयुक्त राज्य और settle in स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
He abandoned the Tramp for his बाद films, जिससे शामिल monsieur verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), a किंग in नई यॉर्क ( 1957 ), और a Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
Chaplin wrote, directed, produced, संपादित, scored, और स्ट्रक्चर in सबसे of उसके films.
He was a perfectionist, और उसके वित्तीय स्वतंत्रता meant he प्रायः खर्च सालो on the development and production of a picture.
His films are characterised by slapstick संयुक्त साथ pathos, और प्रायः विशेषता the ट्रैम्प struggling against adversity.
Many contain social and political themes, as खूब as autobiographical तत्व.
In 1972, as भाग of a नवीनीकृत सराहना लिये उसके कार्य, चैपलिन प्राप्त an मानद अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये `` the incalculable प्रभाव he has had in making motion pictures the art form of this century ''.
He continues to be held in high regard, with the सुनहरा फटाफट, नगर लाइट्स, आधुनिक टाइम्स, और the ग्रेट तानाशाह प्रायः क्रमित among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( ppfa ), commonly shortened to नियोजित parenthood, is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit संगठन providing reproductive स्वास्थ्य और maternal and child health services.
The Planned parenthood कार्रवाई निधि, inc. ( ppaf ) is a सम्बन्धित संगठन जिससे lobbies लिये pro-choice विधान, व्यापक sex education, and access to affordable health care in the United States.
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. प्रदाता of reproductive स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं, सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग, hiv स्क्रीनिंग और counseling, निरोधक, and abortion.
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's कुल सेवाएं और abortions खाता लिये 3 % ; ppfa conducts roughly 300,000 abortions प्रत्येक साल, among 3 लाख लोगों परोसा.
The संगठन रै इसके जड़ें in ब्रुकलीन, नई यॉर्क, जहाँ मार्गरेट Sanger opened the country 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the American Birth कंट्रोल लीग in 1921, जिससे in 1942 became भाग of the नियोजित parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, Planned parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in the U.S., with a total budget of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an array of services to over three लाख लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य, और supports सेवाएं लिये over एक लाख क्लाइंट बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य.
पुरुषों rea is लैटिन लिये `` अपराधी mind ''.
In criminal law, it is viewed as one of the जरुरी तत्व of कुछ crimes.
The standard common law test of criminal liability is usually expressed in the Latin phrase, actus non facit reum nisi पुरुषों बैठना rea, जिससे अर्थात् `` the अधिनियम is नहीं culpable जबतक the दिमाग is अपराधी ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due process, there must be an actus reus, or `` guilty act, '' accompanied by कुछ स्तर of पुरुषों rea to constitute the अपराधों साथ जिससे the प्रतिवादी is चार्ज ( देखिए the तकनीकी आवश्यकता of concurrence ).
As a general rule, दण्ड देयता करता नहीं संलग्न to a व्यक्ति who acted with the absence of mental fault.
the एक्सेप्शन is सख्त liability crimes.
In civil law, it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित देयता लिये उल्लंघन of contract or tort, for example.
However, if a अपकृत्य is intentionally वचनबद्ध or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, ऐसे intent may बढ़ाएँ the पैमाना of देयता as well as the measure of damages payable to the plaintiff.
इसलिए, पुरुषों rea refers to the दिमागी element of the offence that accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the शर्तें पुरुषों rea और actus reus have महरूम replaced by alternative terminology.
In Australia, for example, the elements of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` दिमागी तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` बाह्य तत्व '' ( actus reus ).
This शब्दावली थी अपनाया to बदलें the अस्पष्टता of the लैटिन शर्तें साथ सरल and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) was the 18th President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following उसके अत्यधिक कामयाब भूमिका as a युद्ध सामान्य in the दूसरी half of the Civil War.
Under Grant, the Union Army defeated the Confederate सैन्य ; having effectively ended the युद्ध और secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's army at Appomattox.
As president he led the कट्टरपंथी republicans in उनके प्रयत्न to eliminate सब vestiges of Confederate nationalism and slavery.
परेशान over uncontrolled हिंसा in the दक्षिण और having desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी नागरिकता, President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871.
Grant was the first President to establish Civil Service reform having निर्मित a two-year federally वित्तपोषित सिविल सेवा आयोग in 1871.
in शर्तें of विदेशी नीति, ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित क्षमता for deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest.
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense of corrupt appointees, and by अमेरिका 's पहला औद्योगिक आयु आर्थिक अवसाद ( पुकारा the `` दहशत of 1873 `` ) कि वर्चस्व उसके second term.
Although his Republican Party split in 1872 साथ reformers denouncing उसे, ग्रान्ट was easily reelected.
By 1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control of every राज्य in the दक्षिण और as he बाएँ the श्वेत हाउस in कूच 1877 उसके नीतियों यहूद होने undone.
A करियर सिपाही, he ग्रैजुएट इससे the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य अकादमी at वेस्ट Point and served in the Mexican–American War.
When the Civil War began in 1861, Grant trained संघ स्वयंसेवी regiments in इलिनोइस.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of battles and थी प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य बाद forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate फौज और gaining control of Kentucky and most of Tennessee.
He then led संघ शक्तियां to विजय बाद आरंभिक setbacks in the बैटल of shiloh, earning a reputation as an aggressive commander.
In जुलाई 1863, बाद a long, जटिल अभियान, ग्रान्ट पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate armies ( capturing one of them ) and seized Vicksburg.
This famous victory gave the Union पूरा कंट्रोल of the मिसिसिपी नदी, विभाजित बंद the पश्चिमी confederacy, and opened the way for more Union triumphs.
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863, अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the संघ सेना.
As commanding सामान्य of the फौज, ग्रान्ट confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a श्रेणी of बहुत खूनी लड़ाइयों in 1864 ज्ञात as the Overland Campaign that ended with the bottling up of Lee at Petersburg, outside the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant समन्वित a श्रेणी of विनाशकारी अभियान शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन, फिलिप Sheridan, and George Thomas.
Finally breaking through ली 's trenches, the संघ फौज captured Richmond in April 1865.
ली surrendered उसके depleted शक्तियां to ग्रान्ट at appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate इतिहासकारों attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई जो जीती by brute फ़ोर्स, सबसे इतिहासकारों have hailed his military genius.
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President stabilized the nation बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण period that followed.
As president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing सिविल अधिकारों कानून और लड़ ku klux क्लान हिंसा.
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth amendment ; giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा लिये african-american voting rights.
He used the army to build the Republican Party in the दक्षिण, आधारित on ब्लैक मतदाता, उत्तरी newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) और देशी श्वेत supporters ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a result, African Americans यहूद represented in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस लिये the पहला समय in American history in 1870.
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having टूटा the deadlock on भारतीय appropriations in कॉंग्रेस, the सृष्टि of the फलक of भारतीय commissioners to मेक सुधार सुझाव, और उसके enlistment of quaker protestants who controlled mid western Indian agencies, that effectively curbed Congressional patronage.
Grant remained determined in keeping इंडियंस इससे होने exterminated इससे श्वेत settler अतिक्रमण or by the U.S. military.
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an all-time ऊँची लिये उसके पिछला वीटो of the महंगाई विधेयक, the ड्योढ़ी of the resumption of specie अधिनियम, and Secretary Bristow 's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by सचिव of राज्य हैमिल्टन मछली, implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय मध्यस्थता, settled the अलबामा दावा साथ ब्रिटेन और avoided युद्ध साथ स्पेन over the Virginius Affair.
A jukebox is a partially स्वचालित music-playing यंत्र, प्रायः a coin-operated यंत्र, कि होगा खेल a patron 's selection from self-contained media.
The classic jukebox has buttons with letters and numbers on them कि, जब डाला in संयोजन, हैं प्रयुक्त to खेल a विशिष्ट चयन.
A ड्रग परीक्षण is a तकनीकी विश्लेषण of a biological नमूना – लिये उदाहरण मूत्र, बाल, रक्त, स्वेद, or मौखिक द्रव / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing हैं to detect the उपस्थिति of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना steroids in खेल or लिये drugs prohibited by laws, such as cannabis, cocaine and heroin.
A `` 10-panel urine screen '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( सहित methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids ( thc )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, मॉरफीन, हेरोइन, oxycodone, Hydrocodone, etc. )
phencyclidine ( pcp )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket, प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी मानवयुक्त चंद्र landing missions
Space exploration is the डिस्कवरी और खोजी of बाहरी स्पेस by अर्थात् of space technology.
Physical खोजी of स्पेस is conducted दोनो by इंसान spaceflights and by robotic spacecraft.
जबकि the अवलोकन of वस्तुएँ in स्पेस, ज्ञात as खगोलशास्त्र, predates विश्वसनीय अंकित इतिहास, it थी the विकास of विशाल और अपेक्षाकृत कुशल rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality.
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing वैज्ञानिक शोध, uniting अलग राष्ट्र, ensuring the भविष्य अस्तित्व of मानवता and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries.
विभिन्न आलोचनाओं of स्पेस खोजी are sometimes made.
Space खोजी रै प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी प्रतियोगिता लिये geopolitical rivalries ऐसे as the Cold War.
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` Space Race `` between the Soviet Union and the संयुक्त राज्य, the लॉन्च of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the धरती, the ussr 's sputnik 1, on 4 अक्तूबर 1957, और the पहला चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the अमरीकी अपोलो 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period.
The Soviet space program achieved many of the पहला माइलस्टोन, सहित the पहला जीना होने in कक्षा in 1957, the पहला इंसान spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन सवार वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961, the पहला spacewalk ( by aleksei leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of exploration, focus shifted from one-off flights to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर, ऐसे as the स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम, और इससे प्रतियोगिता to सहयोग as with the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial पूर्णता of the iss following sts-133 in कूच 2011, योजनाएँ लिये स्पेस खोजी by the यूएसए remain in flux.
नक्षत्र, a बुश प्रशासन कार्यक्रम लिये a वापसी to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009.
The Obama Administration प्रस्तावित a संशोधन of नक्षत्र in 2010 to फ़ोकस on the विकास of the काबिलियत लिये crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020, transferring the विकास of लॉन्च वाहनों for human crews from NASA to the private sector, and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO, such as Earth/Moon L1, the Moon, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or Mars orbit.
As of March 2011, the US Senate and House of Representatives are स्टिल working towards a सुलह नासा funding विधेयक, जिससे होगा संभवतः terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन initiated a कामयाब मानवयुक्त spaceflight कार्यक्रम, जबकि the यूरोपीय संघ, जापानी, and India have also planned future manned space missions.
China, Russia, Japan, और इण्डिया have advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा दौरान the 21st सदी, जबकि the European Union has advocated manned missions to both the Moon and Mars during the 21st century.
From the 1990s onwards, निजी रूचि began promoting स्पेस पर्यटन और तब निजी स्पेस खोजी of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ).
John Calvin कूलिज, jr. ( जुलाई 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) थी the 30th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A Republican lawyer from Vermont, Coolidge worked his way up the ladder of मैसाचुसेट्स राज्य राजनीती, आखिरकार बनने राज्यपाल of कि state.
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust उसे into the नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट और दिया उसे a प्रतिष्ठा as a man of decisive action.
Soon after, he was elected as the 29th वाइस अध्यक्ष in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the अचानक मौत of Warren G. Harding in 1923.
Elected in his own right in 1924, he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government रूढ़िवादी, और भी as a man who said very little.
Coolidge restored पब्लिक विश्वास in the श्वेत हाउस बाद the घोटालों of उसके पूर्ववर्ती 's administration, and left office with considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` He embodied the स्पिरिट और उम्मीदें of the मध्य क्लास, could interpret उनके longings और एक्स्प्रेस their opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the औसत is the सबसे convincing प्रमाण of his strength. ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as भाग of a सामान्य आलोचना of laissez-faire government.
उसके प्रतिष्ठा underwent a पुनर्जागरण दौरान the रोनाल्ड reagan प्रशासन, लकिन the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is स्टिल divided between those who approve of his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy.
Espresso is a concentrated पेय brewed by forcing a छोटी राशि of nearly खौलते water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods, a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids, और crema ( अर्थ मलाई, लकिन होने a सन्दर्भ to the झाग साथ a मलाईदार बनावट कि फ़ॉर्म as a परिणाम of the दबाव ).
As a result of the pressurized brewing process the flavors और रसायन in a ठेठ कप of एस्प्रेसो हैं बहुत concentrated.
Espresso is the आधार लिये अन्य पेय, ऐसे as a latte, कापुचीनो, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
Espresso has more caffeine per unit आवाज़ than सबसे पेय, लकिन the usual सेवारत आकार is smaller—a ठेठ 60 ml ( 2 us द्रव ounce ) of एस्प्रेसो रै 80 to 150 mg of कैफीन, छोटी कम than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
Brian Keith Kelly ( born अक्तूबर 25, 1961 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और पूर्व player.
He is currently the head football coach for the notre dame लड़ आयरिश, a स्थिति he रै आयोजित चूंकि December 2009.
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand घाटी राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों ( 1991–2003 ), सेंट्रल मिशिगन विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ), और विश्वविद्यालयों of सिनसिनाटी ( 2006–2009 ).
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by two or अधिक पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of जिसको intends to बनाएँ एक or अधिक विधिक दायित्वों between उन्हें.
The elements of a अनुबंध हैं `` प्रस्ताव '' और `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be किया in लिखने, हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through an injunction.
दोनो of ये remedies पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों.
A अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking कि something will or will not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract, although care is required as a promise may नहीं have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध, as जब it is an अनुबंध बगैर विचार.
Contract law varies greatly इससे एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another, सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि, विशेषकर इससे England in common law countries, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there हैं 40 प्रासंगिक अधिनियमों जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) level, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ons ( born अगस्त 7, 1987 ) is a कनाडाई पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी खिलाड़ी जो is कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग penguins of the नेशनल Hockey League ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted first overall by the penguins आउट of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख जूनियर हॉकी लीग ( QMJHL ).
During his two-year प्रमुख जूनियर करियर साथ the rimouski océanic, he अर्जित back-to-back CHL Player of the Year awards and led his club to the 2005 Memorial Cup final.
Nicknamed `` The अगला एक ``, he थी एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास, अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट लॉटरी as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes ''.
In his पहला एनएचएल ऋतु, crosby समाप्त छठे in लीग स्कोरिंग साथ 102 अंक ( 39 लक्ष्य, 63 assists ) और थी a runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ).
By his second season, he led the एनएचएल साथ 120 अंक ( 36 लक्ष्य, 84 assists ) to कैप्चर the आर्ट रॉस ट्रॉफी, बनने the youngest खिलाड़ी and the only teenager to win a scoring title in any major North American sports league.
That same season, Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey Writers Association 's choice for most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the एनएचएल खिलाड़ी संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी, बनने the सातवाँ खिलाड़ी in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year.
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the टोली 's कप्तानी और subsequently led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली कप फाइनल, जहाँ वे यहूद पराजित by the Detroit Red Wings in six games.
The Penguins लौटे to the फाइनल विरूद्ध डेट्रॉयट the following साल और जीती in सात खेल ; Crosby became the youngest captain in NHL history to win the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 season, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying उसे साथ स्टीवन stamkos लिये the प्रक्षेपास्त्र रिचर्ड ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; साथ 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, crosby प्राप्त the चिह्नित मेसियर नेतृत्व पुरस्कार.
In 2010–11, crosby sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of हिट्स to the head in back-to-back games.
The injury left him sidelined लिये टेन और a हाफ महीने.
However, after playing आठ खेल in the 2011–12 ऋतु, crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011, और he किया not return until mid-March 2012.
Internationally, Crosby has represented Canada in numerous tournaments लिये the देश 's जूनियर और मेन 's टीमों.
After competing in the 2003 u-18 जूनियर संसार कप, he represented कनाडा in back-to-back iihf संसार u20 championships, जीतना silver in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 iihf संसार चैंपियनशिप, he led the टूर्नामेंट in स्कोरिंग, जबकि भी कमाई शीर्ष Forward and All-Star Team honours.
Four years later, Crosby was named to Team Canada लिये the 2010 शीत ओलंपिक in वैंकूवर.
Playing the संयुक्त राज्य in the सुनहरा पदक खेल, he scored the game-winning goal in overtime.
A United राज्य cent, भी ज्ञात as a penny.
`` my दो सेंट '' ( 2¢ ) और इसके longer संस्करण `` put my दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( us ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति, लिया इससे the असली English idiom expression : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
it is प्रयुक्त to preface the अंतरिम stating of one’s opinion.
By विरोधात्मक the राय to follow – suggesting इसके मान is तभी दो सेंट, a बहुत छोटी amount – the user of the phrase hopes to lessen the impact of a possibly statement, showing politeness and humility.
however, it is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ विडंबना when expressing a strongly felt opinion.
The phrase is also used आउट of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.

The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to the government of the गणतंत्र of चीन led by the kuomintang ( kmt ) और शक्तियां of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी of चीन ( CPC ).
The war began in April 1927, amidst the उत्तरी expedition, और essentially ended जब प्रमुख active battles ceased in 1950.
The conflict eventually resulted in दो de facto राज्य, the गणतंत्र of चीन ( आरओसी ) in ताईवान और the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन ( पीआरसी ) in मेनलैंड China, both claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
The war represented an ideological विभाजित ( बाएँ vs. सही ) between the कम्युनिस्ट cpc, and the KMT 's brand of Nationalism.
The civil war continued intermittently जबतक लेट 1937, जब the दो पार्टियों formed a दूसरी संयुक्त Front to counter a Japanese invasion.
China 's full-scale सिविल युद्ध resumed in 1946, a साल बाद the समाप्त of hostilities with Japan.
After four more years, 1950 saw the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड चीन ( सहित हाइनान ), और the गणतंत्र of चीन 's क्षेत्राधिकार होने प्रतिबंधित to Taiwan, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu and several outlying islands.
The kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to अनेक कारकों : भ्रष्टाचार - च्यांग लिखा in उसके डायरी on जून 1948 that the KMT had failed, not because of external enemies but because of rot from within.
Strong आरंभिक support इससे the u.S. diminished, और then, stopped.
( Partly because of kmt भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic शासन, और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित u.S. विदेशी नीति towards साम्यवादी between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords.
इस ensured pla लोकप्रिय support.
After the surrender of जापानी at the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii, सोवियत शक्तियां turned over उनके captured जापानी हथियार to the cpc और अनुमत the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria.
To this दिन, no armistice or सलाम सन्धि रै कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित, और it is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended.
Cross-Strait relations have महरूम hindered by सैन्य खतरे और राजनैतिक और आर्थिक दबाव, विशेषकर over Taiwan 's political status, with both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy. ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to threaten the आरओसी साथ a सैन्य आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to और gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
The ROC mutually claims mainland चीन, और वे दोनो continue the लड़ो over राजनयिक recognition.
Today, the war as such occurs on the political and economic fronts in the form of cross-Strait relations ; however, the दो पृथक de facto राज्य have बंद आर्थिक ties.
The One Hundred Twelfth United States कॉंग्रेस थी the बैठक of the विधान शाखा of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी, इससे जनवरी 3, 2011 जबतक January 3, 2013.
It convened in Washington, D.C. on January 3, 2011, और ended on जनवरी 3, 2013, 17 दिनों पहले the समाप्त of the अध्यक्षीय पद to जिससे बराक Obama was elected in 2008.
Senators elected to नियमित शर्तें in 2006 समाप्त those शर्तें in this Congress.
This Congress included the पिछला हाउस of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित इससे congressional जिले कि यहूद apportioned based on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 midterm elections, the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी जीती the बहुमत in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
While the डेमोक्रेट रखा उनके सीनेट बहुमत, it was reduced from the previous Congress.
This was the first कॉंग्रेस in जिससे the हाउस और सीनेट यहूद नियंत्रित by अलग पार्टियों चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ), and the first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
In this Congress, the House of प्रतिनिधि था the largest क्रमांक of रिपब्लिकन सदस्यों, 242, since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the कैनेडी परिवार परोसा, as खूब as the सबसे नीतियां polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण, with record low approval ratings.
माल in the संयुक्त राज्य is commonly measured in शर्तें of जाल लायक, which is the sum of all assets, including home equity, minus all liabilities.
The total net worth of US households और nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009, unadjusted लिये महंगाई or जनसांख्यिकी change.
For example, a household in कब्ज़ा of an $ 800,000 हाउस, $ 5,000 in परस्पर निधि, $ 30,000 in गाड़ियाँ, $ 20,000 लायक of भण्डार in their own company, and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming कि इस household होता have a $ 250,000 बंधक, $ 40,000 in car लोन, and $ 10,000 in credit card debt, its debts would total $ 300,000.
subtracting the debts इससे the लायक of इस household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), this household would have a net worth of $ 600,000.
जाल लायक can vary साथ fluctuations in value of the underlying assets.
The wealth —more specifically, the median net worth—of households in the United States is varied with संबंध to रेस, शिक्षा, भौगोलिक स्थान और लिंग.
As one would expect, households साथ वृहद आय विशेषता the उच्चतम जाल worths, हालांकि ऊँची आय can नहीं be taken as an always accurate indicator of net worth.
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the वृद्धि, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of उनके careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly वितरित, साथ the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the United States, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human capital such as skills, the United Nations अनुमानित the कुल माल of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy प्रक्रियाओं लिये पीड़ा राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं, जिससे have begun to लो the नाम `` rhizotomy '' in निश्चित उदाहरण, देखिए facet rhizotomy and similar.
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic तंत्रिका जड़ें in the स्पाइनल cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of spastic cerebral palsy.
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the प्रमुख उपयोग of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in इस सर्जरी, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed.
The sensory nerve roots, where spasticity is located, हैं पहला अलग इससे the मोटर ones, और the तंत्रिका मछली to be काटें हैं तब पहचाना via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity हैं तब selectively lesioned with tiny electrical pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely लक्ष्य और नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t प्राप्त गामा अमीनो butyric एसिड, which is the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy.
These over-firing, non-gaba-absorbing nerves generate असामान्य विद्युत कार्यकलाप दौरान the emg परीक्षण phase in sdr और हैं यूँ माना to be the सोर्स of the रोगी 's hypertonia ; वे हैं eliminated साथ the electrical pulses once identified, while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched.
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and that this is done without affecting nervous प्रणाली संवेदनशीलता or फलन in अन्य क्षेत्रों, क्युकी the तभी nerves नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार लिये the मांसपेशी tightness.
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly बनने interchangeable in the उपचार of दीर्घकालिक वापस pain from degenerative disc disease.
This is a कार्यविधि पुकारा a facet rhizotomy और is नहीं a सर्जिकल कार्यविधि लकिन is बजाय किया on an outpatient आधार using a सरल जांच to लागू radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body.
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to eight or more months of pain relief before the nerve regenerates and another गोलाकार of the कार्यविधि needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation, और इसके उपयोग of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम चाहिए not be confused with the SDR procedure.
Migrant मजदूर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 1935
The term migrant worker has different official meanings and connotations in अलग भाग of the संसार.
The United Nations ' definition is broad, सहित कोई लोगों working बाहर of उनके घर country.
The term can also be used to describe किसी जो migrates भीतर a देश, संभवतः उनके अपना, in अनुक्रम to pursue work such as seasonal work.

The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a symbolic टैटू कि is लगाई underneath the नजर.
It has no फिक्स्ड अर्थ लकिन लगभग सब meanings ( see below ) have some connection to prison.
U.S. Route 75 is a north–south u.S. राजमार्ग.
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson County, Minnesota, at the Canadian border, where it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य पक्ष of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in डलास, टेक्सास, जहाँ it is ज्ञात as उत्तर सेंट्रल Expressway.
u.S. 75 थी a border-to-border रूट, इससे कनाडा to the गल्फ of Mexico at Galveston, Texas.
However, the entire खण्ड दक्षिण of डलास, टेक्सास रै महरूम decommissioned in एहसान of अंतरराज्यीय 45, a कटऑफ section of town-to-town surface road having become State Highway 75.
Lower Ninth वार्ड is a पड़ोस of the नगर of New Orleans.
As the नाम implies, it is भाग of the Ninth Ward of New Orleans.
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the संपूर्ण क्षेत्रफल भीतर नई ऑरलियन्स downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however, the नगर नियोजन Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
The term `` Lower '' refers to its स्थान दूर towards the मुँह of the मिसिसिपी नदी, `` bas '' or `` नीचे '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology.
But the 9th वार्ड, जैसे सब wards in नई ऑरलियन्स, is a voting district.
the 9th वार्ड थी added as a मतदान ज़िला in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, और 7 जिससे मेक up the पावन क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल और वार्ड 9 जिले 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher voting district numbers in the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) हैं on the upriver पक्ष of the औद्योगिक Canal.
the क्षेत्रफल आए to नेशनल ध्यान लिये इसके devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005.
हबल दृश्य of कोपरनिकस crater ( इनसेट ), जिससे is परिचय 58 मील ( 93 km ) wide
Red and नारंगी tinted चंद्रमा, as देखी इससे धरती दौरान a चंद्र ग्रहण, जहाँ the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural satellite of the Earth, and the पांचवां largest उपग्रह in the सौर System.
It is the largest natural satellite of a ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली सापेक्ष to the आकार of इसके प्राथमिक, having 27 % the व्यास और 60 % the घनत्व of Earth, resulting in its mass.
The चंद्रमा is the दूसरी densest उपग्रह बाद io, a satellite of Jupiter.
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth, always showing the same face with its near पक्ष चिह्नित by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between the उज्जवल प्राचीन crustal हाइलैंड्स और the prominent प्रभाव craters.
It is the brightest object in the sky after the Sun, although its सतह is दरअसल बहुत अंधेरा, साथ a reflectance समान to कि of कोयले.
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have, चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on भाषा, पंचांग, आर्ट and mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the समंदर tides और the मिनट lengthening of the day.
The Moon 's current orbital अलहदा, परिचय तीस टाइम्स the व्यास of the धरती, कल्याणकारी it to appear लगभग the same size in the sky as the Sun, allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses.
This matching of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a coincidence.
The Moon 's linear distance from the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a रेट of 3.82±0.07cm प्रति साल, but this rate is not constant.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 अरब सालो पहले, नहीं long after the Earth.
Although there have been several hypotheses लिये इसके उत्पत्ति in the पास्ट, the वर्तमान सबसे widely स्वीकृत स्पष्टीकरण is कि the चंद्रमा formed from the debris left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body.
the चंद्रमा is the तभी celestial देह अन्य than धरती on which humans have set foot.
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA अपोलो कार्यक्रम हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि, शुरूआत साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968, और छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 and 1972, with the first being Apollo 11.
ये मिशन लौटे over 380 kg of चंद्र रॉक्स, जिससे have महरूम प्रयुक्त to develop a geological समझना of the चंद्रमा 's origins, the formation of its internal structure, and its subsequent history.
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the चंद्रमा रै महरूम visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the फाइनल Soviet Lunokhod rover.
चूंकि 2004, जापानी, चीन, इण्डिया, the संयुक्त राज्य, और the European Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar जल बर्फ in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और बंधी into the चंद्र regolith.
Future manned missions to the Moon have been planned, सहित सरकारी as खूब as privately वित्तपोषित प्रयत्न.
The Moon remains, under the Outer Space Treaty, free to all राष्ट्र to explore लिये शांतिपूर्ण उद्देश्य.
रोनाल्ड विल्सन reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the United States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he was the 33rd Governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975 ), और a रेडियो, फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न actor.
Born in Tampico, Illinois, and raised in डिक्सन, reagan थी शिक्षित at यूरेका कॉलेज, कमाई a स्नातक of Arts degree in economics and sociology.
After graduating, Reagan स्थानांतरित पहला to आयोवा to कार्य as a रेडियो प्रसारणकर्ता और तब, in 1937, to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a करियर as an actor, first in films and later television.
Some of his सबसे notable films शामिल knute rockne, सब अमरीकी ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), and Bedtime for Bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors गिल्ड और बाद as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती occurred दौरान उसके कार्य लिये GE.
originally a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी, उसके स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s, and he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing वाक in support of बैरी goldwater 's अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवारी in 1964, he थी persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship, जीतना दो years later and again in 1970.
He was defeated in his run for the रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1968 और in 1976, लकिन जीती दोनो the नामांकन और सामान्य चुनाव in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter.
As president, reagan implemented sweeping नई राजनैतिक and economic initiatives.
His supply-side economic policies, उतावले `` reaganomics ``, advocated reducing कर दरों to spur आर्थिक विकास, controlling the धन सप्लाई to reduce महंगाई, deregulation of the economy, and reducing government spending.
In his first term he survived an हत्या attempt, took a मुश्किल लकीर विरूद्ध मजदूर संघ, घोषित a नई युद्ध on दवाएँ, and ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He was re-elected in a भूस्खलन in 1984, proclaiming कि it was `` Morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily marked by foreign matters, ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the ठंडा युद्ध, the 1986 bombing of लीबिया, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he supported anti-communist movements विश्वव्यापी और खर्च उसके पहला पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a विशाल सैन्य buildup in an बाहें रेस साथ the ussr.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव, culminating in the inf सन्धि and the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed कि he था महरूम diagnosed साथ अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी earlier in the year ; he died ten years later at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he ranks highly in public opinion polls of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों और is credited लिये generating an वैचारिक पुनर्जागरण on the अमरीकी राजनैतिक सही.
Complete नियत of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a नाम प्रयुक्त in judaism लिये the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी, पुकारा the Oral Torah.
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a कावासाकी 600 cc क्लास खेल मोटरसाइकिल.
It थी introduced in 1995, और रै महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the सालो in response to new products from Honda, Suzuki, and Yamaha.
The ZX series is what was known as the निंजा लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल in the 1980s and still carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and plots on Presidents of the United States have been numerous : more than 20 कोशिशें to मार बैठे और पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों, as खूब as the presidents-elect, हैं known.
Four sitting राष्ट्रपतियों have महरूम मारे : अब्राहम lincoln ( the 16th अध्यक्ष ), जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ), William McKinley ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ).
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : पूर्व अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ), and President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ).
Although the historian J.W. Clarke रै सुझाया कि सबसे अमरीकी assassinations यहूद नीतियां प्रेरित क्रियाएँ, carried आउट by तर्कसंगत मेन, नहीं सब such attacks have been undertaken for political reasons.
कुछ हमलावर था questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally insane.
Since the Vice President of the संयुक्त राज्य रै लिये अधिक than a सदी महरूम निर्वाचित इससे the वही राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष, the हत्या of the President is unlikely to result in major policy changes.
इस may बताइये क्यों राजनैतिक समूह typically do not make such attacks.
