Oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa, cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
The state 's name is निकला इससे the choctaw शब्द okla और humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is ज्ञात informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of ओक्लाहोमा territory और भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', और इसके capital and largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and agriculture, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
It has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the स्वदेश, रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल domestic product growth.
ओक्लाहोमा नगर और तुलसा serve as ओक्लाहोमा 's प्राथमिक आर्थिक anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas.
With small पहाड़ सीमाएँ, प्रेयरी, mesas, और पूर्वी वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of अंग्रेज़ी, जर्मनी, स्कॉटिश, आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a संगम of तीन प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव, a गंतव्य for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Redwall, by ब्रायन ज़ाक, is a श्रेणी of children 's fantasy novels.
It is the title of the first book of the series, published in 1986, as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the किताब और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( redwall, mattimeo, and Martin the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
The books are primarily aimed at पुरानी children, लकिन have प्रशंसक of सब आयु.
There have been twenty-two novels और दो चित्र किताबे प्रकाशित.
The twenty-second, and फाइनल, अनोखा, the दुष्ट क्रू, थी मरणोपरांत released on May 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त राज्य and is stated in cubic feet.
A cubic foot of गैस is the राशि of गैस needed to भरण a आवाज़ of एक घन पैर अंतर्गत नियत शर्तें of दबाव और temperature.to माप larger amounts of प्राकृतिक गैस, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet.
To provide greater accuracy in comparing fuels, उर्जा सामग्री is measured in शर्तें of `` अंग्रेजों थर्मल Units ( BTU 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of heat जरूरी to उठाएँ एक पाउंड of जल ( लगभग a pint ), एक उपाधि Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density.
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- si ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा बराबर to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ).
It is लगभग the उर्जा समतुल्य of burning 100 घन फीट ( प्रायः referred to as 1 ccf ) of प्राकृतिक gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content, a therm factor is प्रयुक्त by ( प्राकृतिक ) गैस कंपनियाँ to बदलें the आवाज़ of गैस प्रयुक्त to इसके ऊष्मा समतुल्य, और यूँ गणना the वास्तविक उर्जा use.
the therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रायः in the units therms/CCF.
It will vary साथ the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons in the प्राकृतिक gas.
Natural gas with a उच्चतर than औसत विशेषज्ञता of इथेन, प्रोपेन or ब्यूटेन will have a higher therm factor.
impurities, ऐसे as कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड or nitrogen, lower the therm factor.
The volume of the गैस is गणना as if measured at मानक तापमान और दबाव ( STP ).
The heat content of natural gas is solely निर्भर on the संयोजन of the गैस, और is स्वतंत्र of तापमान और pressure.
One therm is बराबर to परिचय 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can भी be provided by परिचय of प्राकृतिक गैस.
The therm sometimes has been उलझन साथ the thermie ( देखिए नीचे ).
the names of दोनो इकाई come from the Greek word for heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a मीट्रिक ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा, भाग of the meter-tonne-second प्रणाली sometimes प्रयुक्त by यूरोपीय engineers.
The thermie is equal to the amount of उर्जा जरूरी to उठाएँ the तापमान of 1 टन of जल by 1 °C.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 BTU.
The American सिविल युद्ध ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The युद्ध था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार War I.
It remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी, प्रेरक स्पीकर, socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और बिजनेसमैन.
He won the सुनहरा पदक लिये decathlon in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics.
Following his Olympic win and the related मान्यता, he शादीशुदा क्रिस कार्दशियन, and his professional career evolved into being a television celebrity.
By 1981, he had starred in अनेक made-for-tv फिल्मों और थी erik एस्ट्राडा 's बदलना on the शीर्ष रेटेड tv series CHiPs.
He रै छह children : बर्ट, केसी, Brandon, Brody, Kendall and Kylie.
Since उसके 1991 विवाह to क्रिस जेनर, he is the stepfather to Kourtney, Kim, Khloe and Rob Kardashian.
चूंकि 2007, he रै appeared साथ उसके blended family on Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. कोलाई ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, but some serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो, और हैं occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination.
The harmless strains are part of the normal flora of the gut, और can लाभ उनके होस्ट by producing विटामिन k2, और by preventing the स्थापना of रोगजनक जीवाणु within the intestine.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute परिचय 0.1 % of आंत फ्लोरा, और fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the bacterium cause disease.
Cells are able to जीवित बाहर the देह लिये a सीमित राशि of समय, जिससे makes उन्हें आदर्श indicator जीवों to परीक्षण environmental samples for fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing देह of शोध कि रै examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for extended periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can also be grown easily और inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला सेटिंग, और रै महरूम intensively investigated for over 60 years.
E. coli is the सबसे widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव, और an महत्वपूर्ण प्रजाति in the फ़ील्ड of जैवप्रौद्योगिकी और सूक्ष्मजैविकी, where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North अमरीकी टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी और central Illinois.
the 217 क्षेत्रफल शामिल इलिनोइस ' पूंजी, springfield, प्लस Champaign, Urbana, Decatur, Danville, Quincy, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड, जिससे यहूद निर्मित in 1947.
The only significant change in 217 's boundaries was in 1957, जब इसके उत्तरी portion थी combined with part of area code 815 to form area code 309.
Image of the largest अंटार्कटिक ओज़ोन छेद कभी अंकित ( सितंबर 2006 ), over the Southern pole
Layers of the माहौल ( नहीं to scale )
Ozone depletion describes दो पृथक लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in the total volume of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ), and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ओज़ोन hole.
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, there हैं भी springtime ध्रुवीय tropospheric ओज़ोन depletion कार्यक्रम.
The details of polar ozone hole formation differ from that of mid-latitude thinning, लकिन the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens.
The main सोर्स of ये हैलोजन अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs, freons, halons ).
These compounds are transported into the stratosphere बाद होने उत्सर्जित at the surface.
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs and other contributory substances are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's माहौल, observed और प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ओज़ोन have उत्पन्न विश्वव्यापी चिंता अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल कि bans the उत्पादन of cfcs, halons, और अन्य ozone-depleting रसायन ऐसे as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected that a किस्में of biological consequences ऐसे as increases in स्किन कर्कट, cataracts, क्षति to पौधे, और कटौती of प्लवक populations in the समंदर 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम इससे the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief introductory statement of the संविधान 's आधारभूत उद्देश्य और guiding सिद्धान्त.
It states in सामान्य शर्तें, और न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of, the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the लोगों '' suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
Czechoslovakian शॉट putter plihan at the 1957 ईस्ट जर्मनी Indoor Athletics Championships
The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track और फ़ील्ड इवेंट involving `` फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing गति ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as far as possible.
The shot put competition for men has been a part of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक चूंकि उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896, महिलाओं 's प्रतियोगिता began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) member राज्य, साथ उनके territories ( सहित निर्भर territories ) पहचाना by the UN in blue
There are संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य, और प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a सदस्य of the United Nations General Assembly.
The मापदण्ड लिये प्रवेश of नई सदस्यों हैं नियत आउट in the संयुक्त Nations Charter, Chapter II, Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative votes from at least नौ of the परिषद 's पंद्रह सदस्यों, साथ none of the पाँच स्थाई सदस्यों मतदान विरूद्ध.
The Security Council 's recommendation must then be subsequently स्वीकृत in the सामान्य सभा by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign राज्य can become un सदस्यों, और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign राज्य ( हालांकि a few सदस्यों were not sovereign when they joined the UN ).
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a number of states that may be considered sovereign states according to the Montevideo सम्मेलन मापदण्ड हैं नहीं सदस्यों क्युकी the un करता नहीं consider उन्हें to possess प्रभुता, मुख्यतः due to the कमी of अंतरराष्ट्रीय मान्यता or विपक्ष from certain members.
In addition to the member states, the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ), intergovernmental organizations, and other अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन और entities जिनकी statehood or प्रभुता हैं नहीं precisely पारिभाषित, to become observers at the सामान्य सभा, allowing उन्हें to participate और बोलो, लकिन नहीं vote, in सामान्य सभा meetings.
The Eiffel Tower (, ) is an iron lattice tower located on the champ de मंगल in पेरिस, नामित बाद the इंजीनियर gustave एफिल, जिनकी कम्पनी designed and built the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it has become both a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और एक of the सबसे recognizable structures in the संसार.
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris और the most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख लोगों ascended it in 2011.
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to पब्लिक in the यूरोपीय संघ और the उच्चतम in यूरोपीय as long as the मंच of the ostankino मीनार, at, remains बंद as a परिणाम of the fire of August 2000.
The tower received its 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
The tower stands लम्बा, परिचय the वही ऊँचाई as an 81-storey building.
During its निर्माण, the एफिल मीनार surpassed the वॉशिंगटन स्मारक to assume the शीर्षक of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार, a title it held for 41 years, until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930.
Because of the addition, in 1957, of the एंटीना atop the एफिल मीनार, it is अभी taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not including broadcast antennas, it is the second-tallest ढांचा in फ़्रांस, बाद the Millau Viaduct.
The tower रै तीन स्तर लिये विज़िटर.
Tickets can be purchased to ascend, by सीढ़ियाँ or लिफ्ट ( लिफ्ट ), to the first and second levels.
the चलना इससे मैदान स्तर to the पहला स्तर is over 300 steps, as is the walk from the first to the second level.
The third and highest level is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do मौजूद लकिन हैं प्रायः बंद to the public.
The first and दूसरी स्तर have रेस्तरां.
The tower has become the सबसे prominent प्रतीक of दोनो पेरिस और फ़्रांस, प्रायः in the establishing shot of films set in the city.
केनेथ वेन `` केन '' जेनिंग्स iii ( born may 23, 1974 ) is an American game show contestant and author.
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the u.S. syndicated खेल show Jeopardy !
and as being the all-time leading धन विजेता on अमरीकी खेल shows.
In 2004, जेनिंग्स जीती 74 Jeopardy !
games before he थी पराजित by चैलेंजर नैंसी zerg on his 75th appearance.
उसके कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place पुरस्कार in उसके 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place पुरस्कार in the jeopardy !
परम टूर्नामेंट of champions, as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge.
During his पहला चलाएं of jeopardy !
दिखावे, जेनिंग्स अर्जित the रिकार्ड लिये the उच्चतम अमरीकी game show winnings.
His total was surpassed by ब्रैड rutter, जो पराजित जेनिंग्स in the finals of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( first aired on may 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to rutter 's मौजूदा Jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the रिकार्ड बाद appearing on अनेक अन्य खेल shows, culminating in an रूप on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( पहला aired on अक्तूबर 10, 2008 ), though Rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड.
After his success on Jeopardy !, Jennings wrote about his experience and छान अमरीकी ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब brainiac : adventures in the जिज्ञासु, प्रतिस्पर्धी, बाध्यता World of Trivia Buffs, published in 2006.
The कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in फ्रेंच ) is a professional sports league located in Canada.
The CFL is the highest level of प्रतियोगिता in कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल, a रूप of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely सम्बन्धित to American football.
Its eight current teams, which are located in आठ पृथक शहरों, हैं विभाजित into दो विभाजन of चार टीमों प्रत्येक — the ईस्ट प्रभाग and the West Division.
The league 's 19-week regular season runs from late June to early November ; प्रत्येक टोली plays 18 खेल साथ एक अलविदा सप्ताह.
Following the regular season, the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth place team in one division has a better record than the third place team in the अन्य प्रभाग, जब the टोली साथ the बेहतर रिकार्ड makes the playoffs और `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week डिवीजनल playoffs, जिससे culminate in the late-november धूसर Cup championship, the country 's largest annual sports and television event.
The CFL was officially founded on January 19, 1958, making it the दूसरी oldest gridiron फ़ुटबॉल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका स्टिल in आपरेशन, हालांकि सब इसके टीमों long predate the modern formation of the league.
It is the highest level of play in Canadian football, the most popular football लीग in कनाडा, और the second-most लोकप्रिय प्रमुख खेल लीग in कनाडा, बाद the नेशनल हॉकी League.
Although ice हॉकी is कनाडा 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल, the cfl रै increased the लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई football in Quebec and Western Canada.
कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल is भी निभाई at amateur स्तर ( i.e. युवावस्था, ऊँची स्कूल, cjfl, QJFL, CIS and senior leagues such as the Alberta Football League ).
The 2010s होगा be a significant दशक लिये the cfl in शर्तें of विकास, as टीमों have संवर, विस्तारित स्टेडियम, or plan to build entirely new stadiums.
The Montreal Alouettes संपन्नता इस पहला, adding 5,000 सीटे to पर्सिवल molson मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in time for the 2010 CFL season.
The Edmonton Eskimos and कैला स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके संबंधित स्टेडियम और सुविधाएं लिये the 2010 season.
In 2011, the BC शेर निभाई अंतर्गत a नई, retractable छत in bc प्लेस बाद बिता one and a half seasons at Empire Field.
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will खेल in an entirely नई स्टेडियम at the विश्वविद्यालयों of मनिटोबा, अनुसूचित to खोलें in time for the 2013 season.
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Saskatchewan roughriders और the नई ओटावा मताधिकार हैं भी looking at नई or extensively-renovated स्टेडियम in the following years.
वहीँ हैं भी उम्मीदें of expanding the लीग to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally basing a टोली in either the अधिक आबादी Halifax, or the more centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton.
According to sports इतिहासकार डगलस brei, the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग holds the भेद of होने the तभी पेशेवर खेल लीग in उत्तर America, major or minor league, in which each existing franchise has won at least one league title while in their current location.
Each antibody binds to a विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an बातचीत समान to a lock and key.
An एंटीबॉडी ( ab ), भी ज्ञात as an immunoglobulin ( ig ), is a विशाल y-shaped प्रोटीन उत्पादित by b-cells कि is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to पहचानो और neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses.
The antibody recognizes a unique part of the विदेशी निशाना, पुकारा an antigen.
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an एंटीबॉडी contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a ताला ) कि is विशिष्ट लिये एक particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an antigen, allowing these two structures to bind together with precision.
Using this binding mechanism, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other parts of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली, or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( लिये उदाहरण, by ब्लॉकिंग a भाग of a microbe कि is अनिवार्य लिये इसके आक्रमण और अस्तित्व ).
The उत्पादन of antibodies is the प्रमुख फलन of the humoral immune system.
antibodies हैं स्रावित by a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त cell called a plasma cell.
Antibodies can occur in दो शारीरिक फ़ॉर्म, a घुलनशील रूप कि is स्रावित इससे the कोशिका, और a झिल्ली -bound रूप कि is संलग्न to the सतह of a b कोशिका and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ).
The BCR is only found on the surface of b कोशिकाएं और facilitates the सक्रियण of ये कोशिकाएं और उनके subsequent differentiation into either एंटीबॉडी कारखानों पुकारा प्लाज्मा कोशिकाएं, or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि will survive in the body and remember that same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In most cases, interaction of the B cell with a T हेल्पर कोशिका is जरुरी to उपज पूरा सक्रियण of the b कोशिका और, इसलिए, एंटीबॉडी पीढी following antigen binding.
Soluble antibodies हैं released into the रक्त और ऊतक fluids, as खूब as अनेक secretions to continue to survey for invading microorganisms.
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the शर्तें एंटीबॉडी और immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically made of basic संरचनात्मक units—each साथ दो विशाल भारी जंजीरों और दो छोटी लाइट जंजीरों.
There are several different types of antibody heavy जंजीरों, और अनेक अलग kinds of antibodies, जिससे हैं grouped into अलग isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess.
Five different antibody isotypes are known in mammals, which perform different roles, and सहायता सीधा the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब लिये प्रत्येक अलग प्रकार of विदेशी ऑब्जेक्ट they encounter.
Though the general structure of all antibodies is very similar, a small region at the tip of the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय, allowing लाखो of antibodies साथ थोड़ा अलग टिप structures, or प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट, to exist.
इस प्रदेश is ज्ञात as the hypervariable region.
प्रत्येक of ये विसंगतियाँ can bind to a अलग antigen.
This विशाल विविधता of antibodies allows the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to recognize an equally wide variety of antigens.
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a set of gene segments that encode different antigen binding sites ( or paratopes ), followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in इस क्षेत्रफल of the एंटीबॉडी जीन, जिससे बनाएँ further diversity.
Antibody genes also re-organize in a process called class switching that changes the base of the heavy chain to another, बनाना a अलग isotype of the एंटीबॉडी कि retains the प्रतिजन विशिष्ट परिवर्तनीय प्रदेश.
इस allows a सिंगल एंटीबॉडी to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग भाग of the immune system.
The symbol used by the Zodiac कातिल to चिह्न उसके पत्राचार
The Zodiac Killer थी a सीरियल कातिल जो संचालित in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
The killer 's identity remains अनजान.
The Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia, vallejo, झील berryessa, और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between दिसम्बर 1968 और अक्तूबर 1969.
Four men और तीन महिलाओं between the आयु of 16 and 29 were targeted.
The killer originated the name `` Zodiac '' in a series of taunting अक्षर भेजा to the लोकल खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल दबायें.
These letters शामिल चार cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the four cryptograms भेजा, तभी एक रै महरूम definitively हल.
Suspects have been named by law enforcement और amateur जांचकर्ताओं, लकिन no conclusive प्रमाण रै surfaced.
In April 2004, the सैन फ्रांसिस्को पुलिस विभाग चिह्नित the मामला `` निष्क्रिय '', yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007.
the मामला भी remains खोलें in the नगर of vallejo, as खूब as in Napa County and Solano County.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया विभाग of इंसाफ रै कायम an खोलें मामला संचिका on the Zodiac murders since 1969.
Jennings is a small city in and the मोहल्ला सीट of जेफरसन डेविस मोहल्ला, louisiana, United States, near Lake Charles.
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a छोटी मनाही इससे the 2000 tabulation.
The नगर is 68 प्रतिशत white.
Jennings is the principal city of the जेनिंग्स micropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, जिससे शामिल all of Jefferson Davis Parish.
It is also भाग of the larger झील charles-jennings संयुक्त Statistical Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of पदार्थ on an परमाणु और आणविक स्केल.
The earliest, फैली वर्णन of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological लक्ष्य of precisely manipulating अणु और अणुओं for fabrication of macroscale products, also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently स्थापित by the नेशनल nanotechnology पहल, जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of matter with at least one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
This definition reflects the फैक्ट कि क्वांटम mechanical प्रभाव हैं महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm स्केल, और so the परिभाषा shifted इससे a particular technological लक्ष्य to a research category inclusive of all types of research and technologies that deal with the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold.
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies '' as खूब as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of शोध और अनुप्रयोग जिनकी आम trait is size.
Because of the variety of potential applications ( including industrial and सैन्य ), सरकारें have invested अरबों of डॉलर in nanotechnology शोध.
Through its National nanotechnology पहल, the यूएसए रै invested 3.7 अरब डॉलर.
The European Union रै invested 1.2 अरब और जापानी 750 लाख dollars.
nanotechnology as पारिभाषित by आकार is naturally बहुत व्यापक, सहित फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान as diverse as surface science, organic chemistry, molecular biology, semiconductor physics, microfabrication, etc.
The associated research and applications are equally diverse, ranging from extensions of conventional device physics to completely नई approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly, इससे विकासशील नई सामग्री साथ आयाम on the nanoscale to सीधा कंट्रोल of पदार्थ on the परमाणु स्केल.
Scientists फिलहाल बहस the भविष्य implications of nanotechnology.
Nanotechnology may be able to create many new materials and devices with a vast range of अनुप्रयोग, ऐसे as in आयुर्विज्ञान, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, biomaterials और energy production.
On the other hand, nanotechnology raises many of the वही मुद्दे as कोई नई प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित चिंताएं परिचय the toxicity और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials, और their potential effects on global economics, as well as speculation about various doomsday scenarios.
These concerns have led to a debate among वकालत समूह और सरकारें on whether खास विनियमन of nanotechnology is warranted.
Map of the पूर्वी bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the पूर्व कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of सेंट्रल और पूर्वी यूरोपीय, generally the सोवियत Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact.
The terms Communist Bloc and सोवियत bloc यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of राज्य लकीर साथ the सोवियत संघ, हालांकि these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe.
The New Jersey gubernatorial चुनाव of 2009 took प्लेस on नवम्बर 3, 2009.
लोकतांत्रिक राज्यपाल jon corzine थी कार्यशील लिये a दूसरी पद और थी होने challenged by रिपब्लिकन क्रिस क्रिस्टी, Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others, in addition to several write-in candidates.
क्रिस्टी जीती the चुनाव, साथ परिचय 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote, to 44.9 percent for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett.
Christie won the largest हाशिया लिये a पहला पद Republican since 1969.
Christie assumed दफ्तर on जनवरी 19, 2010.
This was the first चुनाव to भरण the newly निर्मित दफ्तर of Lieutenant Governor.
The उम्मीदवार लिये राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल यहूद joined साथ as a single choice, so that voters did not have the opportunity to split the ticket.
Kim guadagno, क्रिस्टी 's कार्यशील mate, became नई जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट governor following her inauguration.
Health care in the United States is provided by अनेक पृथक संगठन.
स्वास्थ्य परवाह सुविधाएं हैं largely स्वामित्व और operated by private sector businesses.
Health insurance for public सेक्टर कर्मचारी is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision and spending आता इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare, medicaid, tricare, the children 's स्वास्थ्य Insurance Program, and the Veterans Health Administration.
Most of the population अंतर्गत 65 is insured by उनके or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता, कुछ ख़रीदे स्वास्थ्य बीमे on their own, and the remainder are uninsured.
Of 17 high-income countries पढ़ाई by the नेशनल संस्थान of स्वास्थ्य in 2013, the संयुक्त राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु, दिल और फेफड़ों बीमारी, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, and rates of disability.
Together, such issues place the U.S. at the नीचे of the सूची लिये जीवन प्रत्याशा.
On average, a U.S. male can be expected to live लगभग चार कम सालो than those in the top-ranked country.
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ), the United राज्य खर्च अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रति capita ( $ 7,146 ), और अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह as प्रतिशत of its GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other nation in 2008.
The Commonwealth निधि क्रमित the संयुक्त राज्य पिछला in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह among similar countries, and notes U.S. care costs the most.
The U.S. Census Bureau reported कि 49.9 लाख निवासियों, 16.3 % of the जनसांख्यिकी, यहूद uninsured in 2010 ( up इससे 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) report said : `` The संयुक्त राज्य is among the few industrialized राष्ट्र in the संसार कि करता नहीं गारंटी अभिगम to health care for its population. ''
A 2004 oecd रपट कहा : `` साथ the एक्सेप्शन of मैक्सिको, तुर्कों, और the संयुक्त राज्य, सब oecd देशों था हासिल सार्वभौमिक or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक मौतों प्रत्येक साल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed ऊँची चिकित्सा खर्च.
a 2013 पढ़ाई मिला कि परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due to medical expenses, and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence.
On March 23, 2010, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care अधिनियम ( ppaca ) became विधि, providing लिये प्रमुख परिवर्तन in health insurance.
In physiology, body जल is the जल सामग्री of the human body.
A significant भिन्न of the इंसान body is water.
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states that `` the कुल राशि of जल in a man of औसत वज़न ( 70 गामा ) is लगभग 40 litres, averaging 57 percent of his total body weight.
In a newborn infant, this may be as high as 75 प्रतिशत of the देह वज़न, लकिन it progressively decreases इससे जनम to बूढ़ा आयु, सबसे of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life.
Also, obesity decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
These figures are statistical averages, so are illustrative, और जैसे सब biostatistics, होगा vary साथ बाते जैसे प्रकार of जनसांख्यिकी, आयु and number of people sampled, and methodology.
So there is not, and can not be, a figure कि is exactly the वही लिये सब लोगों, लिये इस or कोई अन्य physiological माप.
For example, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology लिये नर्स देता a फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to जल, जिससे approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased states where देह जल is प्रभावित, the कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments कि have बदला can दे clues to the प्रकृति of the प्रॉब्लम.
Body water is regulated by हार्मोन, सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( अध ), aldosterone और अलिंदी natriuretic peptide.
Per Netter 's Atlas of Human Physiology, देह जल is टूटा bas into the following compartments:
intracellular द्रव ( 2/3 of देह जल ).
Per Guyton, in a body containing 40 लीटर of द्रव, परिचय 25 लीटर is intracellular, which amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), close enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb.
Jackson 's texts states 70 % of body द्रव is intracellular.
extracellular द्रव ( 1/3 of देह जल ).
Per Guyton 's उदाहरण, लिये a 40 लीटर देह, परिचय 15 लीटर is extracellular, जिससे amounts to 37.5 % Again, this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here.
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular द्रव ).
Per Guyton 's उदाहरण, of the 15 लीटर of extracellular fluid, plasma volume averages 3 litres.
This amounts to 20 %, the वही as per Netter 's Atlas.
Interstitial द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a. `` तीसरा स्पेस, '' सामान्यतः उपेक्षित in calculations )
Contained inside organs, such as the gastrointestinal, प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु, उदरावरणीय, और ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a term used in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति 's overall emotional मूल्यांकन of उसके or उसके अपना worth.
It is a निर्णय of oneself as खूब as an रवैया toward the self.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example, `` I am competent, '' `` I am worthy '' ) and भाव ऐसे as triumph, despair, अभिमान और शर्म.
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is कया we सोचो परिचय the स्वः ; self-esteem, is the धनात्मक or ऋणात्मक evaluations of the self, as in how we feel about it. ''
Self-esteem is also ज्ञात as the evaluative आयाम of the स्वः कि शामिल जज्बात of worthiness, prides and discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely संबद्ध साथ self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition कि a व्यक्ति रै जिससे represents उनके judgements of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, मॉरिस rosenberg और social-learning पैरोकार पारिभाषित self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel branden in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने competent to cope साथ the मौलिक चुनौतियां of life and being worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता ) और self-respect ( a अहसास of निजी worth ).
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that every person has of their ability to face life 's challenges, to understand और solve समस्याएं, और उनके सही to achieve सुख, और be दिए आदर.
As a social psychological construct, self-esteem is attractive because शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of प्रासंगिक outcomes, ऐसे as अकादमिक उपलब्धि ( दलदल 1990 ) or कसरत behavior ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
In addition, self-esteem रै भी महरूम treated as an महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being ( Marsh 1989 ).
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular आयाम ( लिये उदाहरण, `` i मानना i am a शुभ लेखक और i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण, `` I believe I am a bad person, and feel bad about myself in general '' ).
Psychologists usually लिहाज़ self-esteem as an enduring व्यक्तित्व characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), हालांकि सामान्य, short-term विसंगतियाँ ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist.
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, and self-integrity.
A Masonic Lodge, often termed a निजी आवास or constituent आवास, is the मौलिक organisational unit of Freemasonry.
Every new Lodge must be warranted or चार्टर्ड by a ग्रैंड आवास, लकिन is विषय to इसके दिशा तभी in enforcing the प्रकाशित संविधान of the jurisdiction.
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand Lodge in London ( today called the संयुक्त ग्रैंड आवास of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e. बगैर ऐसे वारंट ; तभी एक अन्य आवास operates बगैर a वारंट - इस is the ग्रैंड stewards ' आवास in लंदन, हालांकि it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title.
A Freemason is generally entitled to visit any Lodge, in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e. अंतर्गत कोई ग्रैंड आवास ) in सौहार्द साथ उसके own.
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to निपुण masons ( कि is, freemasons जो have attained the अनुक्रम 's third degree ).
He is first usually required to जाँच, और certify, the नियमितता of the संबंध of the आवास - और be समर्थ to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership.
Freemasons gather साथ as a आवास to कार्य the तीन मौलिक डिग्री of डाला प्रशिक्षु, fellowcraft and Master Mason.
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass निर्माण कम्पनी headquartered in st हेलेन्स, संयुक्त किंगडम और a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the japan-based एनएसजी समूह.
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an independent company listed on the लंदन भण्डार एक्सचेंज और लिये a समय थी a constituent of the ftse 100 Index.
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as भाग of another एक, विशेषकर जब the कोटेड अभिव्यक्ति is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to इसके असली सोर्स, और it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks.
A quotation can also refer to the repeated उपयोग of इकाई of कोई अन्य रूप of अभिव्यक्ति, विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व of a पेंटिंग, scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition.
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year starting on Monday ( link होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on शनिवार of the 12-day धीमा Julian calendar.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके फल, जिससे is प्रायः सूखी and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when dried, is लगभग in व्यास, अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क, और, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived from them, may be described simply as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और सूखी unripe फल ), ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल ) और श्वेत pepper ( सूखी पके बीज ).
ब्लैक pepper is देशी to दक्षिण इण्डिया, और is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried मैदान pepper रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's सबसे traded मसाला.
It is one of the सबसे आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन and its descendants.
The spiciness of ब्लैक pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, नहीं to be उलझन with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the आधुनिक संसार, प्रायः युग्म with salt.
Fire hydrant in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a johnny pump in New York City ), is an active fire protection measure, and a source of जल provided in सबसे शहरी, suburban और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल सेवा to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the नगरपालिका जल सप्लाई to assist in extinguishing a fire.
Buildings निकट a hydrant may qualify लिये an बीमे छूट चूंकि अग्निशमन चाहिए be able to more rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property.
The अवधारणा of आग plugs तिथियाँ to at तनिक the 17th century.
This was a समय जब अग्निशमन responding to a कॉल होता खुदाई bas to the wooden water mains and hastily bore a hole to secure water to fight fires.
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well, and be transported इससे the खूब to the आग by बाल्टी brigades or, बाद, by hand-pumped fire engines.
The holes were then plugged with stoppers, normally redwood, जिससे over समय आए to be ज्ञात as आग plugs.
The स्थान of the प्लग होता प्रायः be अंकित or चिह्नित so कि it could be reused in future fires.
This is the सोर्स of the colloquial पद आग प्लग स्टिल प्रयुक्त for fire hydrants today.
After the Great Fire of London in 1666, the city installed water mains साथ छेद drilled at intervals, equipped साथ उठते, allowing an अभिगम पाइंट to the लकड़ी आग plugs इससे गली level.
The आविष्कार of a post- or pillar-type आग hydrant is generally credited to फ्रेडरिक graff sr., मुख्य Engineer of the Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801.
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet और थी of `` गीला बैरल '' डिज़ाइन साथ the वाल्व in the top.
It is said that Graff held the first patent for a आग hydrant, लकिन इस can नहीं be सत्यापित क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on आग in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process.
The President of the Republic of South Africa is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी अंतर्गत दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's संविधान.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of राज्य थी पुकारा the राज्य अध्यक्ष.
The President is elected by members of the National Assembly, the lower house of Parliament, and is usually the leader of the largest पार्टी, जिससे रै महरूम the अफ़्रीकी नेशनल कॉंग्रेस चूंकि the पहला non-racial चुनावों यहूद आयोजित on 27 April 1994.
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the अभी defunct भूमिका of प्रधान मंत्री, लकिन the दो भूमिकाएँ यहूद मिलाया in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office.
the 1993 और बाद constitutions हद the अध्यक्ष 's time in office to two five-year terms.
the पहला अध्यक्ष to be निर्वाचित अंतर्गत the नई संविधान थी Nelson Mandela, and the incumbent president is Jacob Zuma.
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ), वहीँ थी a सरकारी of नेशनल एकता, in जिससे an mp इससे the largest विपक्ष पार्टी थी हकदार to a स्थिति as Deputy President.
Along with Thabo Mbeki, the last State President, F.W. de klerk भी परोसा as डिप्टी अध्यक्ष, in उसके क्षमता as the नेता of the नेशनल पार्टी जिससे थी the second-largest party in the new Parliament.
But De Klerk later resigned और गई into विपक्ष साथ उसके party.
A voluntary coalition government continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the नई संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ), हालांकि there have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of deputy president.
Special education or special needs education is the शिक्षा of विद्यार्थी साथ खास needs in a रास्ता कि पता the विद्यार्थी ' व्यक्तिगत मतभेद और needs.
Ideally, this process involves the individually नियोजित और systematically monitored व्यवस्था of शिक्षण प्रक्रियाओं, adapted उपकरण और सामग्री, accessible जमावट, और अन्य interventions designed to सहायता learners साथ खास needs achieve a उच्चतर स्तर of निजी self-sufficiency and success in school and community than would be available if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education.
Common special needs include challenges साथ सीखना, संचार चुनौतियां, emotional और behavioral विकार, शारीरिक disabilities, and developmental disorders.
Students with these kinds of special needs हैं संभावित to लाभ इससे अतिरिक्त शैक्षणिक सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to शिक्षण, use of technology, a specifically adapted teaching area, or resource room.
बौद्धिक giftedness is a अंतर in सीखना और can भी लाभ इससे specialized शिक्षण तकनीकों or अलग शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम, लकिन the पद `` खास education '' is generally used to specifically indicate instruction of students whose special needs reduce their ability to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom, and gifted education is handled separately.
In सबसे विकसित देशों, शिक्षक हैं modifying शिक्षण विधि और environments so that the maximum number of students are served in general education environments.
Special education in विकसित देशों is प्रायः regarded कम as a `` प्लेस '' और अधिक as `` a दायरा of services, available in every school. ''
संयोजन can reduce सोशल stigmas और improve academic achievement for many students.
The विपरीत of खास शिक्षा is general education.
General शिक्षा is the मानक curriculum प्रस्तुत साथ मानक शिक्षण methods and without additional supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12, 1930, as schwartz györgy ) is a hungarian-american कारोबार महारथी, निवेशकों, and philanthropist.
He is the अध्यक्ष of सोरोस निधि प्रबन्धन.
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes.
He is known as `` the man जो broke the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of उसके in निवेश profits दौरान the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis.
Between 1979 and 2011, Soros gave दूर over $ 8 अरब to इंसान अधिकारों, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य, and education causes.
He played a significant role in the peaceful transition from communism to capitalism in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89 ) और provided एक of यूरोपीय 's largest उच्चतर शिक्षा endowments to Central European University in Budapest.
Soros is also the अध्यक्ष of the खोलें Society Institute.
An actor portraying सिकंदर ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an early model telephone.
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals, the इतिहास of जिससे involves a संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims.
The development of the modern electrical टेलीफोन शामिल an सरणी of lawsuits संस्थापित upon the पेटेंट दावा of अनेक individuals और numerous companies.
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898, from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission device, to failed attempts to use `` make-and-break '' current, to successful experiments with इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक telephones by सिकंदर ग्राहम घंटी और थामस वाटसन, और आखिरकार to commercially कामयाब telephones in the लेट 19th सदी.
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA, M.F.A. ) is a graduate degree typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई परे the स्नातक 's उपाधि ( bfa ), हालांकि the पद of पढ़ाई होगा vary by देश or by विश्वविद्यालयों.
The MFA is a creative उपाधि प्रायः awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला, रचनात्मक writing, filmmaking, dance, or theatre and other performing arts.
Coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature with the program प्रायः culminating in a प्रमुख कार्य or प्रदर्शन.
Master of Fine Arts programs have generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's उपाधि prior to प्रवेश, लकिन अनेक do नहीं आवश्यकता कि the undergraduate प्रमुख be the same as the MFA field of study.
The most important admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना पोर्टफोलियो or a performance audition.
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA, while an academic program, centers around practice in the particular फ़ील्ड, whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः बीच on the scholarly, अकादमिक, or नाजुक पढ़ाई of the field.
Additionally, in the United States, an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of विज़ुअल आर्ट, डिज़ाइन, नृत्य, थिएटर, film/video, नई मीडिया, और रचनात्मक लिखने - अर्थ कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in इसके फ़ील्ड, और is प्रयुक्त as a न्यूनतम योग्यता to be समर्थ to लागू to become a full-time प्राध्यापक शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों level in these disciplines.
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts, notably in the case of म्यूज़िक प्रदर्शन, जहाँ the mfa is नहीं देखी as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the more standardized DMA degree.
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between creative production and continued academic research, some विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based ph.d कार्यक्रम in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रचनात्मक लिखने, विज़ुअल कला, नई मीडिया, डिज़ाइन and theater.
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing, and to a lesser extent in डिज़ाइन और नई मीडिया, the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम रै नहीं appreciably बदला the standard for the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet.
This is an जारी contentious टॉपिक, और is the बारंबार विषय of अकादमिक panels, especially at the annual College Art Association conference.
The CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA strongly re-affirms that the phd is नहीं जरूरी as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the विज़ुअल arts.
The atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and नागासाकी in जापानी यहूद conducted by the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the फाइनल चरण of संसार युद्ध ii in 1945.
the दो कार्यक्रम हैं the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय weapons in war to date.
following a firebombing अभियान कि नष्ट अनेक जापानी शहरों, the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan.
The war in यूरोपीय ended जब नाजी जर्मनी हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of आत्मसमर्पण on 8 may, but the Pacific War continued.
साथ साथ the संयुक्त किंगडम और the गणतंत्र of चीन, the संयुक्त राज्य पुकारा लिये a आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी in the Potsdam Declaration on 26 July 1945, threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction ''.
The Japanese सरकारी उपेक्षित इस ultimatum, और the संयुक्त राज्य तैनात दो nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan Project.
अमरीकी airmen dropped छोटी लड़के on the नगर of हिरोशिमा on 6 August 1945, followed by Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August.
Within the first two to four months of the bombings, the अधि प्रभाव मारे 90,000–166,000 लोगों in हिरोशिमा और 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी, साथ roughly हाफ of the मौतों in each city occurring on the first day.
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that, of the people जो died on the दिन of the विस्फोट, 60 % died इससे फ्लैश or ज्वाला burns, 30 % इससे falling debris and 10 % from other causes.
During the following months, large numbers died from the प्रभाव of burns, विकिरण बीमारी, और अन्य चोटों, compounded by बीमारी.
In a US estimate of the total तात्कालिक और छोटी पद कारण of मौत, 15–20 % died इससे विकिरण बीमारी, 20–30 % इससे burns, और 50–60 % इससे अन्य injuries, compounded by illness.
In both शहरों, सबसे of the मुर्दे यहूद नागरिकों, हालांकि हिरोशिमा had a sizeable garrison.
On 15 August, six days बाद the bombing of नागासाकी, जापानी घोषित इसके आत्मसमर्पण to the allies, हस्ताक्षर the Instrument of Surrender on 2 September, officially ending World War II.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war Japan 's adopting Three non-nuclear सिद्धान्त, forbidding the स्वदेश इससे नाभिकीय armament.
The role of the bombings in जापानी 's आत्मसमर्पण और उनके नैतिक औचित्य are still debated.
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly ज्ञात as महात्मा गांधी, थी the preeminent नेता of भारतीय राष्ट्रवाद in british-ruled India.
Employing non-violent civil disobedience, गांधी led इण्डिया to स्वतंत्रता और प्रेरित आंदोलनों लिये non-violence, civil rights and freedom across the world.
The son of a senior government official, Gandhi was born and raised in a हिन्दू bania जातियाँ in तटीय गुजरात, और प्रशिक्षित in विधि in लंदन.
Gandhi became famous by fighting for the civil rights of Muslim and Hindu इंडियंस in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, using नई तकनीकों of non-violent सिविल disobedience that he developed.
returning to इण्डिया in 1915, he नियत about organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong opponent of `` communalism `` ( i.e. basing राजनीती on धर्म ) he पहुँचे आउट widely to सब धार्मिक समूह.
he became a नेता of मुसलमान protesting the declining status of the Caliphate.
Assuming leadership of the Indian नेशनल कॉंग्रेस in 1921, गांधी led देशभर अभियान लिये easing गरीबी, expanding महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, भवन धार्मिक और जातीय सौहार्द, समाप्ति अस्पृश्यता, increasing economic self-reliance, and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British domination.
गांधी led इंडियंस in protesting the नेशनल नमक कर साथ the dandi नमक कूच in 1930, और later in demanding the British to immediately Quit India in 1942, during World War II.
He was imprisoned for that और लिये numerous अन्य राजनैतिक offenses over the सालो.
Gandhi sought to अभ्यास non-violence और सच्चाई in सब परिस्थितियों, और advocated that others do the same.
He saw the villages as the कोर of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he किया नहीं support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the परंपरागत भारतीय धोती और चादर, woven साथ धागे he था हाथ spun on a charkha.
His chief राजनैतिक दुश्मन in ब्रिटेन थी विंस्टन चर्चिल, जो ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
He was a dedicated शाकाहारी, और undertook long fasts as अर्थात् of दोनो self-purification and political mobilization.
In his पिछला साल, अप्रसन्न at the विभाजन of इण्डिया, गांधी worked to रोकें the carnage between Muslims, Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the border area between India and Pakistan.
He was assassinated on 30 January 1948 by nathuram गोडसे जो विचार गांधी थी too सहानुभूतिपूर्ण to India 's Muslims.
30 जनवरी is observed as शहीदो ' Day in India.
The honorific महात्मा ( `` ग्रेट आत्मा '' ) was applied to him by 1914.
In India he was also पुकारा bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
He is known in India as the Father of the Nation ; his जन्मदिवस, 2 अक्तूबर, is commemorated वहीँ as गांधी jayanti, a नेशनल अवकाश, और world-wide as the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Day of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical but one of व्यावहारिकतावाद, कि is, practicing उसके सिद्धान्त in the moment.
Asked to give a संदेश to the लोगों, he होता respond, `` my जीवन is my message. ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23, ca. 1904 – May 10, 1977 ), born lucille fay lesueur, थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री in film, television and theatre.
Starting as a dancer in traveling नाट्य कंपनियाँ पहले debuting on ब्रॉडवे, क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925.
initially कुंठित by the आकार और विशेषता of उसके भाग, क्रॉफर्ड began a अभियान of self-publicity और became nationally known as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, Crawford 's fame rivaled, and later outlasted, mgm सहयोगियों norma शियर्र और greta garbo.
क्रॉफर्ड प्रायः निभाई मेहनती यंग महिलाओं who find romance and financial success.
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well received by अवसाद -era ऑडियंस और यहूद लोकप्रिय साथ महिलाओं.
Crawford became one of हॉलीवुड 's सबसे prominent फिल्म सितारों और एक of the उच्चतम सशुल्क महिलाओं in the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन उसके films began खोने धन और by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison ''.
After an absence of nearly two years from the स्क्रीन, क्रॉफर्ड मंचन a वापसी by अभिनीत in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स ( 1945 ), for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress.
In 1955, she became involved with the pepsi-cola कम्पनी through उसके विवाह to कम्पनी अध्यक्ष अल्फ्रेड स्टील.
After उसके मौत in 1959, क्रॉफर्ड थी निर्वाचित to भरण his vacancy on the board of directors but was forcibly retired in 1973.
She continued एक्टिंग in फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न regularly through the 1960s, जब उसके प्रदर्शन became कम ; बाद the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों हॉरर फिल्मी Trog in 1970, Crawford retired from the screen.
Following a public appearance in 1974, after which unflattering photographs were published, Crawford withdrew इससे पब्लिक जीवन और became increasingly reclusive जबतक उसके मौत in 1977.
क्रॉफर्ड शादीशुदा four times.
Her first three marriages ended in तलाक ; the पिछला ended साथ the मौत of husband अल्फ्रेड Steele.
She adopted पाँच children, एक of जिसको थी reclaimed by his birth mother.
Crawford 's संबंध साथ उसके दो पुरानी children, क्रिस्टीना and Christopher, were acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two और, बाद क्रॉफर्ड 's मौत, क्रिस्टीना लिखा a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, mommie dearest, in जिससे she alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated by Crawford.
She was voted the tenth greatest female star in the इतिहास of अमरीकी सिनेमा by the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान.
