Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a hard or soft cover प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री सीटे in a convertible or roadster, or the कार्गो bed in a pickup truck.
मुश्किल tonneau कवर खोलें by a hinging or फोल्डिंग यांत्रिकी while soft covers open by rolling up.
The tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते कार्गो.
When the cover is pulled out, it keeps items आउट of the सूर्य और provides अतिरिक्त सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight, as well as shielding the driver from view.
ट्विटर is an ऑनलाइन सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा और microblogging सेवा कि enables इसके उपयोक्ता to भेजें और पढ़ा text-based messages of up to 140 characters, known as `` tweets ''.
Twitter was निर्मित in कूच 2006 by जोकर dorsey और by जुलाई, the सोशल नेटवर्किंग site was launched.
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity, साथ over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012, generating over 340 लाख tweets रोज़ and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day.
Since its लॉन्च, ट्विटर रै become एक of the टेन सबसे visited वेबसाइटों on the Internet, and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet. ''
Unregistered users can read tweets, while पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can पोस्ट tweets through the जालस्थल इंटरफ़ेस, SMS, or a range of apps for mobile devices.
Twitter Inc. is based in सैन फ्रांसिस्को, साथ अतिरिक्त सर्वर और कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क City, Boston, and San Antonio.
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy फिल्मी, co-produced और निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore.
It is the first film of The Hangover franchise.The film stars Bradley कूपर, ed helms, zach galifianakis, हीथर ग्राहम, जस्टिन bartha, and Jeffrey Tambor.
The Hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck, Stu Price and Alan Garner, who travel to लास वेगास लिये a स्नातक पार्टी to celebrate उनके dost डग billings ' impending marriage.
However, Phil, Stu and Alan have no memory of the previous रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the wedding can take place.
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive producer Chris bender 's dost disappeared और था a विशाल विधेयक बाद होने भेजा to a स्ट्रिप क्लबों.
बाद लुकास और मूर बेची it to the स्टुडियो लिये $ 2 लाख, फिलिप्स और जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving a baby and a police cruiser, and also including boxer Mike Tyson.
Filming took place in नेवाडा लिये 15 दिनों, और दौरान फिल्मांकन, the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( Cooper, Helms and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship.
The Hangover was released on जून 5, 2009, बनने a नाजुक and commercial success.
It became the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009, साथ a विश्वव्यापी सकल of over US $ 467 million.
Critics praised the film 's comedic दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized it लिये इसके vulgarity.
The film won the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र – musical or कॉमेडी, और प्राप्त multiple other accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009 in the संसार, as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त राज्य, surpassing a रिकार्ड previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012.
Out of all R-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing ever in the U.S., पीछे तभी the जुनून of the मसीह और the मेट्रिक्स reloaded.
A sequel, the hangover भाग ii, थी released in 2011, और a तीसरा और फाइनल फिल्मी, the hangover Part III, is set for release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, प्रर्दशित chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell division जरुरी लिये यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
The cells उत्पादित by meiosis हैं गैमीट or spores.
In many organisms, सहित सब पशु और जमीन पौधे ( लकिन नहीं कुछ अन्य समूह ऐसे as fungi ), gametes are called sperm and egg cells.
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis, it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in each gamete, compared साथ the co-existence of प्रत्येक of the दो पृथक pairs of प्रत्येक chromosome ( एक प्राप्त इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) in प्रत्येक कोशिका जिससे परिणाम from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically अद्वितीय ) अगुणित कोशिकाएं, compared साथ the दो ( genetically एकसमान ) द्विगुणित cells produced from mitosis.
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of each chromosome —one इससे the सजीव 's माँ और एक इससे इसके पिता.
The cell divides twice, potentially producing up to चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं containing एक नक़ल of each chromosome.
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases, such as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, तभी एक of the संभावित चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं survives. )
In animals the अगुणित कोशिका resulting इससे meiosis is a पुरूष or female gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ और पैतृक डीएनए, resulting in औलाद कि हैं genetically distinct from either parent.
This gives rise to जेनेटिक विविधता in sexually reproducing populations.
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural गुण ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे प्राकृतिक चयन can अधिनियम, लकिन, as वर्णित नीचे in खण्ड 6, उत्पत्ति और फलन of meiosis, the जेनेटिक विविधता may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination कि is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis.
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis, specific genes are more अत्यधिक transcribed, और ये हैं पुकारा the meiome, the पद प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स लिये the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a key feature for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in जिससे समजात chromosome pairing, अन्तर्ग्रथन और recombination occur.
In जोड to दमदार meiotic stage-specific अभिव्यक्ति of mrna ( the meiome ), however, वहीँ हैं भी pervasive translational नियंत्रण ( e.g. selective usage of preformed mRNA ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome and translational नियंत्रण determine the व्यापक restructuring of meiotic कोशिकाएं needed to carry out meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a गोलाकार of डीएनए replication, बनाना इससे the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) two exact copies, sister chromatids, attached at the centromere region.
in the शुरूआत of meiosis the मातृ और पैतृक homologs pair to each other.
Then they typically exchange parts by समजात recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ and paternal versions of the chromosome.
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of homologs और arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
Then the fibers खींचो the recombined homologs to विपरीत poles of the cell.
As the chromosomes मूव दूर इससे the बीच the कोशिका divides into दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, प्रत्येक containing a haploid number of chromosomes composed of two chromatids.
After the recombined maternal and paternal homologs have अलग into the दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, a दूसरी गोलाकार of कोशिका प्रभाग occurs.
There meiosis ends as the two sister chromatids बनाना up प्रत्येक homolog हैं अलग और मूव into एक of the चार resulting gamete cells.
Upon fertilization, for example when a शुक्राणु enters an अंडा कोशिका, दो gamete कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by meiosis fuse.
The gamete from the mother and the gamete इससे the पिता प्रत्येक योगदान एक हाफ of the नियत of गुणसूत्रों कि make up the new offspring 's genome.
Meiosis uses many of the वही mechanisms as समसूत्रण, a प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे and animals to split one cell into two identical daughter cells.
In all plants and in many protists meiosis परिणाम in the गठन of बीजाणुओं : अगुणित कोशिकाएं कि can divide vegetatively बगैर undergoing fertilization.
मुक्केबाज़ी ( pugilism, पुरस्कार लड़, the मीठी विज्ञान or in यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे दो लोगों engage in a contest of strength, speed, reflexes, endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands.
Amateur boxing is an ओलम्पिक और राष्ट्रमंडल खेल और is a आम fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय games - it also has its own World Championships.
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to three-minute intervals पुकारा rounds.
The result is decided when an प्रतिद्वन्दी is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम, resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया, or is सुनाया the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest.
the जनम घंटा of मुक्केबाज़ी as a खेल may be इसके स्वीकृति by the ancient Greeks as an Olympic game as early as 688 BC.
Boxing evolved इससे 16th- और 18th-century prizefights, largely in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, to the forerunner of आधुनिक मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th century, again initially in Great Britain and later in the United States.
In 2004, ESPN क्रमित मुक्केबाज़ी as the सबसे मुश्किल खेल in the world.
अनुबंध or concord happens जब a शब्द परिवर्तन रूप depending on the other words to which it relates.
It is an instance of inflection, और प्रायः involves बनाना the मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or व्यक्ति ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence.
For example, in मानक अंग्रेज़ी, एक may कह i am or he is, लकिन not `` I is '' or `` he am ''.
This is because the व्याकरण of the भाषा requires कि the क्रिया और इसके विषय agree in person.
The pronouns i और he हैं पहला और तीसरा व्यक्ति क्रमशः, as हैं the verb forms am and is.
The verb रूप जरूर be चयनित so कि it रै the वही व्यक्ति as the subject.
The agreement based on overt व्याकरणिक श्रेणी as ऊपर is औपचारिक अनुबंध, in कंट्रास्ट to notional agreement, which is based on meaning.
For instance, the phrase The United States is treated as एकवचन लिये उद्देश्य of अनुबंध, भी हालांकि it is formally बहुवचन.
This is a list of places below औसत समुद्र स्तर कि हैं on जमीन.
Places in tunnels, mines, basements, dug holes ( also साथ खोलें आसमान ), अंतर्गत जल, अंतर्गत बर्फ, or मौजूदा temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing of sea tide etc. are not included.
सब आंकड़े हैं in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22, 1948 in yakima, वॉशिंगटन ) is a best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels and contemporary women 's fiction.
Over 140 million copies of her किताबे हैं in छपाई throughout the संसार, और चार have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber was the inaugural winner of the fan-voted Quill Award for romance in 2005 और रै महरूम awarded दोनो a रोमांस लेखक of अमेरिका रीता और a आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार by the रोमांस लेखक of America.
Catonsville is a census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in बाल्टीमोर County, Maryland, United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 41,567 at the 2010 census.
The community lies to the वेस्ट of बाल्टीमोर साथ the नगर 's border.
catonsville is the घर of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड, बाल्टीमोर काउंटी ( UMBC ), a public research university with over 12,000 students.
A lawyer, according to ब्लैक 's विधि शब्दकोष, is `` a व्यक्ति सीखे in the विधि ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law. ''
Law is the प्रणाली of नियम of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign सरकारी of a समाज to correct wrongs, maintain the stability of political and social authority, and deliver justice.
Working as a lawyer involves the व्यावहारिक अनुप्रयोग of अमूर्त विधिक theories और ज्ञान to solve विशिष्ट individualized समस्याएं, or to अग्रिम the रूचि of those जो retain ( i.e., hire ) lawyers to perform legal services.
The role of the वकील varies significantly आरपार विधिक jurisdictions, and so it can be treated here in only the most general terms.
Vector Marketing is the domestic sales arm of cutco निगम, an olean, नई यॉर्क आधारित cutlery निर्माता.
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय विधि requiring covered नियोक्ता to provide कर्मचारी job-protected और unpaid छोड़ लिये योग्य medical and family reasons.
Qualified medical and family reasons शामिल : निजी or परिवार बीमारी, परिवार सैन्य छोड़, गर्भावस्था, adoption, or the foster care placement of a child.
The FMLA is administered by the Wage and Hour Division of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of मजदूर.
The bill was a major part of अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन 's कार्यसूची in his first term.
President Clinton signed the bill into law on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c. सेक. 2601 ; 29 cfr 825 ) और it took प्रभाव on अगस्त 5, 1993, six months later.
The FMLA was intended `` to संतुलन the मांगे of the कार्यस्थल साथ the needs of परिवारों. ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid छोड़ दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी, जनक, जीवनसाथी or चाइल्ड, or लिये गर्भावस्था or परवाह of a नवजात चाइल्ड, or for adoption or foster care of a child.
In अनुक्रम to be योग्य लिये fmla छोड़, an कर्मचारी जरूर have महरूम at the कारोबार at तनिक 12 महीने, और worked at तनिक 1,250 घंटों over the पास्ट 12 महीने, and work at a location where the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles.
The fmla कवर दोनो public- और private-sector कर्मचारी, लकिन निश्चित श्रेणी of कर्मचारी हैं excluded, including elected officials and their personal staff members.
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era military conflict कि occurred in वियतनाम, लाओस, और कंबोडिया इससे 1 नवम्बर 1955 to the पतन of साइगॉन on 30 April 1975.
This युद्ध followed the पहला इंडोचायना युद्ध और थी लड़ा between उत्तर वियतनाम, समर्थित by इसके कम्युनिस्ट allies, और the सरकारी of South Vietnam, supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries.
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National मुक्ति सामने, or nlf ), a हलके हथियारबंद दक्षिण वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट आम सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर, largely लड़ा a छापामार war against anti-communist forces in the region.
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) सगाई in a अधिक conventional युद्ध, at टाइम्स committing large units into battle.
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air बड़प्पन और overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन, involving ground forces, artillery, and airstrikes.
The U.S. government viewed भागीदारी in the युद्ध as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण Vietnam as part of their wider strategy of containment.
The North Vietnamese government and Viet cong यहूद लड़ to reunify Vietnam under communist rule.
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war, fought initially against France, backed by the U.S., और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम, जिससे it regarded as a u.S. puppet state.
American military advisors arrived in कया थी तब फ्रेंच इंडोचायना beginning in 1950.
U.S. भागीदारी escalated in the जल्दी 1960s, साथ troop स्तर tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units यहूद तैनात शुरूआत in 1965.
Operations spanned अंतरराष्ट्रीय सीमायें, साथ लाओस और कंबोडिया heavily bombed.
अमरीकी भागीदारी in the युद्ध peaked in 1968, at the time of the Tet Offensive.
After this, U.S. ground forces were gradually withdrawn as भाग of a नीति ज्ञात as vietnamization.
Despite the पेरिस सलाम accords, हस्ताक्षरित by सब पार्टियों in January 1973, fighting continued.
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 अगस्त 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church amendment passed by the u.S. Congress.
The capture of Saigon by the वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the युद्ध, और उत्तर और दक्षिण वियतनाम were reunified the following year.
The war exacted a huge human cost in शर्तें of fatalities ( देखिए वियतनाम युद्ध हताहत ).
Estimates of the क्रमांक of वियतनामी सैनिको और नागरिकों मारे vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 cambodians, 20,000–200,000 laotians, और 58,220 U.S. service members also died in the conflict.
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of अलास्का photographed इससे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन, May 2006.
राख plumes पहुँचे a ऊँचाई of 19 km दौरान the climactic फटना at Mount Pinatubo, Philippines in 1991.
A volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a planet 's सतह or क्रस्ट, जिससे allows hot मैग्मा, volcanic राख और गैसों to एस्केप इससे the मैग्मा कक्ष below the surface.
Volcanoes are generally मिला जहाँ tectonic प्लेटों हैं diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic ridge, for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge, has examples of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic प्लेटों pulling अलावा ; the प्रशांत रिंग of आग रै उदाहरण of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic plates coming together.
By contrast, volcanoes are प्रायः नहीं निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic प्लेटों स्लाइड past one another.
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the इंटीरियर्स of प्लेटों, e.g., in the ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी दरार, the कुएं gray-clearwater volcanic फ़ील्ड और the रिओ ग्रांडे दरार in उत्तर अमेरिका.
This type of volcanism जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ of `` थाली परिकल्पना '' volcanism.
Volcanism away from plate सीमाएँ रै भी महरूम समझाया as mantle plumes.
These so-called `` hotspots ``, for उदाहरण हवाई, हैं postulated to उठता इससे upwelling diapirs साथ मैग्मा इससे the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km गहन in the Earth.
erupting ज्वालामुखी can पोज़ अनेक जोखिमों, नहीं तभी in the immediate vicinity of the eruption.
Volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft, in particular those with jet इंजन जहाँ राख अणु can be melted by the ऊँची ऑपरेटिंग temperature.
Large eruptions can affect तापमान as राख और droplets of sulfuric एसिड अस्पष्ट the सूर्य और कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however, वे भी अवशोषित ऊष्मा radiated up from the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
Historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic famines.
A deep pothole on नई यॉर्क नगर 's दूसरी Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and known in parts of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a प्रकार of disruption in the सतह of a roadway जहाँ a portion of the सड़क सामग्री has broken away, leaving a hole.
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC, also known as hypernephroma ) is a गुर्दा कर्कट कि originates in the अस्तर of the proximal convoluted tubule, the बहुत छोटी tubes in the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the सबसे आम प्रकार of गुर्दा कर्कट in adults, responsible for approximately 80 % of cases.
It is also known to be the सबसे lethal of सब the genitourinary tumors.
Initial treatment is सबसे commonly a कट्टरपंथी or आंशिक nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year अस्तित्व रेट is 60-70 %, लकिन इस is lowered considerably where metastases have spread.
It is relatively resistant to विकिरण चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी, हालांकि कुछ मामले respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, and sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC.
Estée Lauder Companies, Inc. is a निर्माता और marketer of प्रतिष्ठा skincare, मेकअप, महक and hair care products.
The company has its मुख्यालय in midtown मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane that forms the lining of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it कवर सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes और कुछ invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is composed of a layer of mesothelium समर्थित by a पतला परत of connective tissue.
The peritoneum both supports the abdominal अंगों और serves as a conduit लिये उनके रक्त और lymph vessels and nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal मांसपेशियां, diaphragm और श्रोणि मंजिल ) चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity, but wrapped in peritoneum ).
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal गुहा कि हैं स्तिथ पीछे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the गुर्दे ), और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).
Modern 2.5 '' SSD used in उपभोक्ता लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप computers.
DDR sdram आधारित SSD.
अधिकतम और.
PCI संलग्न io त्वरक SSD
PCI-E, DRAM, और नन्द आधारित ssd.
It uses an external शक्ति सप्लाई to मेक the dram non-volatile.
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a solid-state डिस्क or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्क, हालांकि it contains no वास्तविक `` डिस्क '' of कोई दयालु ) is a आंकड़ा भंडार यंत्र using एकीकृत circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently.
SSD technology uses इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अंतरफलक संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output ( i/o ) hard disk drives.
SSDs have no चलती mechanical components, जिससे फर्क उन्हें इससे परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय डिस्क ऐसे as मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क, which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads.
Compared with electromechanical डिस्क, ssds हैं typically कम susceptible to physical shock, much quieter, have lower access time, and less latency.
However, while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012, ssds हैं स्टिल परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक महंगी प्रति ईकाई of भंडार than HDDs.
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for hard disk ड्राइव, यूँ permitting सरल बदलना in आम अनुप्रयोग.
, most SSDs use nand-based फ्लैश मेमोरी, जिससे retains आंकड़ा without power.
For applications requiring तेज़ अभिगम, लकिन नहीं necessarily आंकड़ा हठ बाद power loss, SSDs may be constructed from random-access memory ( RAM ).
Such डिवाइस may employ पृथक शक्ति स्त्रोत, ऐसे as बैटरी, to maintain data after power loss.
Hybrid drives or solid state hybrid drives ( SSHD ) combine the features of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई, containing a विशाल मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव और an ssd संचय to improve प्रदर्शन of frequently accessed data.
These devices may offer near-ssd प्रदर्शन लिये अनेक अनुप्रयोग.
Salmon roe ( बाएँ ) और sturgeon caviar ( सही ) परोसा साथ माँ of pearl caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar.
ossetra caviar, सामन creme fraiche, आलू shallot croquette, basil oil, egg whites and yolks
Caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture संगठन, is a उत्पाद बना इससे salt-cured fish-eggs of the acipenseridae परिवार.
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, साथ pasteurization reducing इसके culinary and economic value.
Traditionally the term caviar refers तभी to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन और ब्लैक समंदर ( बेलुगा, ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of अन्य मछली ऐसे as सामन, steelhead, ट्राउट, lumpfish, whitefish, and other species of sturgeon.
Caviar is माना a लक्ज़री कोमलता और is खाया as a garnish or a spread.
In 2012, caviar बेची लिये $ 2,500 प्रति पाउंड, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 प्रति kilo.
The SEC Network is a television syndication network featuring सजीव प्रसारण of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और बास्केट कार्यक्रम इससे the Southeastern Conference.
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and is shown in अधिक than 50 प्रतिशत of households in the संयुक्त राज्य, ज़्यादातर southeastern संयुक्त राज्य markets.
The SEC संजाल typically airs in the नून पूर्वी स्लॉट कि थी पूर्व घर to the Raycom Sports SEC game of the week.
Games are shown locally on broadcast स्टेशन, क्षेत्रीय खेल संजाल, as खूब as on ईएसपीएन gameplan, ईएसपीएन Full Court, and ESPN3.com.
the सेक संजाल is भी उपलब्धियाँ in Canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen ग्राफिक्स फिलहाल प्रयुक्त by ईएसपीएन on एबीसी, a संस्करण of ईएसपीएन 's graphics package.
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because सबसे of इसके affiliates do नहीं letterbox उनके मानक परिभाषा फ़ीड्स, जबकि ईएसपीएन 's टेलीविज़न संजाल have अनुमत उनके ग्राफिक्स to लापरवाही the title safe, but letterbox for SD viewers.
starting साथ the सेक 2012 बास्केट ऋतु, सेक संजाल 's ग्राफिक्स have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format.
This is also being प्रयुक्त लिये the 2013 बास्केट ऋतु, लकिन था स्टिल adapted the पूर्व 4:3-safe ग्राफिक्स format for the 2012 SEC football season.
The 1990s, सुनाया और भी ज्ञात as `` the nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or `` the '90s '', was a decade that began on January 1, 1990, and ended on December 31, 1999.
it थी the 10th और पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी और the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold युद्ध at the शुरूआत of the दशक और the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल दौरान the second half of the decade.
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a काल of unprecedented सलाम और समृद्धि, हालांकि अनेक भाग of the so-called तीसरा संसार faced विभिन्न समस्याएं सहित genocide, AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars.
Culturally speaking the decade थी characterized by the वृद्धि of बहुसंस्कृतिवाद and alternative media.
Movements such as grunge, the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to young लोगों दौरान the दशक, aided by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as केबल टेलीविज़न and the Internet.
A combination of factors, including the mass mobilization of पूंजी बाज़ार through neoliberalism, the शुरूआत of the फैली अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the अंतरजाल, और the विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ led to a realignment और reconsolidation of economic and political power across the world, and within countries.
Income असमानता among देशों in the संसार रोज़ sharply between the 1980s और the mid-1990s, before levelling off and then falling after 2000.
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa, the balkans और the काकेशस, the पूर्व दो जिससे led to the rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide, respectively.
The United States began its current military occupation of the Middle East दौरान the गर्मियाँ of 1990 साथ मरुस्थल शील्ड बाद it काटें बंद a विशाल portion of the संसार 's पेट्रोलियम सप्लाई.
Signs of any resolution of तनाव between इसराईल और the अरब संसार remained elusive, हालांकि the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill in 1998 साथ the शुभ Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence.
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid देशी to the wilderness और रिमोट क्षेत्रों of उत्तर अमेरिका, Eurasia, and North Africa.
it is the largest सदस्य of इसके परिवार, साथ males averaging, and females.
It is similar in general appearance and proportions to a जर्मनी गड़रिये, or sled श्वान, लकिन रै a larger सिर, narrower छाती, longer legs, straighter tail and bigger paws.
Its winter fur is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled धूसर in रंग, हालांकि nearly pure श्वेत, red, or brown to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray wolf represents a अधिक specialised और प्रगतिशील रूप than इसके छोटी cousins ( the कायोटी और सुनहरी jackal ), as demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार, इसके अधिक gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior.
It is a social animal, travelling in nuclear families consisting of a पन्द्रहवें जोड़ी, accompanied by the जोड़ी 's वयस्क offspring.
The gray wolf is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा, साथ only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it.
It feeds primarily on विशाल ungulates, हालांकि it भी eats छोटी पशु, पशुधन, carrion, and garbage.
The gray wolf is one of the संसार 's सबसे खूब शोधकार्य पशु, साथ संभवतः अधिक किताबे लिखा परिचय it than any other wildlife species.
It has a long इतिहास of संघ साथ इंसानो, having महरूम despised और hunted in सबसे agricultural समुदायों due to its attacks on livestock, while conversely being respected by some Native American tribes.
It is the sole पूर्वज of the श्वान, जिससे थी पहला domesticated in the Middle East.
Although the fear of wolves is प्रचलित in अनेक इंसान समाजों, the बहुमत of अंकित हमले on लोगों have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and killed people, mainly children, but this is unusual, as भेड़ियों हैं अपेक्षाकृत few, सजीव दूर इससे लोगों, और have महरूम सिखाया to भय इंसानो by hunters and shepherds.
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to, though its still अपेक्षाकृत फैली दायरा और stable जनसांख्यिकी अर्थात् कि the प्रजाति is नहीं threatened at a वैश्विक स्तर, और is इसलिए वर्गीकृत by the IUCN as Least Concern.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman सभ्यता, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old रोमन गणतंत्र, जिससे preceded it, था महरूम destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the साम्राज्य यहूद a काल of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its अस्तित्व, लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors aurelian और diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th सदी, दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the पतन of सेंट्रल सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire.
क्युकी of the साम्राज्य 's विशाल extent और long सहनशीलता, the संस्थानों और संस्कृति of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा, धर्म, वास्तुकला, philosophy, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the संयुक्त राज्य is मुख्यतः provided by the पब्लिक सेक्टर, साथ कंट्रोल और funding coming इससे तीन levels : local, state, and federal, in that order.
Child education is compulsory, and there are also a विशाल क्रमांक और चौड़ी किस्में of उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों throughout the देश कि एक can चुनें to attend, both publicly and privately administered.
Public शिक्षा is universally उपलब्धियाँ.
स्कूल curricula, funding, शिक्षण, नियुक्ति, और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल फलक साथ क्षेत्राधिकार over school districts with many directives from state legislatures.
स्कूल जिले हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे अन्य लोकल jurisdictions, with independent officials and budgets.
Educational standards and मानकीकृत परीक्षण निर्णय हैं प्रायः बना by state governments.
The ages for अनिवार्य शिक्षा vary by state.
It begins इससे आयु पाँच to आठ और ends इससे ages fourteen to eighteen.
Compulsory education requirements can generally be संतुष्ट by educating children in पब्लिक स्कूलों, state-certified निजी स्कूलों, or an approved home school program.
In most public and private schools, education is divided into तीन स्तर : elementary स्कूल, मध्य स्कूल ( sometimes पुकारा जूनियर ऊँची स्कूल ), और ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ).
In almost all स्कूलों at ये स्तर, children हैं विभाजित by आयु समूह into ग्रेड, ranging इससे किंडरगार्टन ( followed by पहला ग्रेड ) लिये the youngest children in elementary school, up to twelfth grade, the final year of high school.
The exact age range of students in these grade levels varies थोड़ा इससे क्षेत्रफल to area.
post-secondary शिक्षा, बेहतर ज्ञात as `` कॉलेज `` in the संयुक्त राज्य, is generally governed separately इससे the elementary and high school system, and is described in a separate section below.
Government supported, free public schools for all प्रारंभ होने स्थापित बाद the क्रान्ति, और विस्तारित in the 19th सदी, as the परिणाम of प्रयत्न of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington.
By 1870, सब राज्य था फ़्री elementary schools, albeit only in urban centers.
As the 20th century drew nearer, राज्य प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य, और by 1910, 72 percent of children attended school.
Private स्कूलों जारी to स्प्रेड दौरान इस समय, as खूब as कॉलेजों and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges.
The year of 1910 भी देखी the पहला सच्चा ऊँची स्कूलों.
During the बाकी of the 20th सदी, शैक्षणिक प्रयत्न केन्द्रित on reducing the inequality of the schooling system.
The landmark Supreme अदालत मामला भूरा v. फलक of शिक्षा बना the desegregation of elementary और ऊँची स्कूलों a national priority, while the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college.
Special शिक्षा थी बना into संघीय विधि in 1975.
The Elementary and Secondary शिक्षा अधिनियम of 1965 बना मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता, और in 1983, a आयोग थी स्थापित to evaluate their results and propose a course of action.
The resulting No Child बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 थी विवादास्पद और इसके लक्ष्य proved to be unrealistic.
A commission established in 2006 evaluated उच्चतर शिक्षा, लकिन इसके सुझाव have yet to be fully implemented.
पॉल ब्रैग ( फ़रवरी 6, 1895 – दिसम्बर 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement.
Health spending प्रति capita, in $ us ppp-adjusted, साथ the us और कनाडा compared amongst other first world nations.
Comparison of the health care systems in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य हैं प्रायः बना by सरकारी, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य और पब्लिक नीति analysts.
The two countries had similar स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणालियों पहले कनाडा reformed इसके प्रणाली in the 1960s and 1970s.
The United States spends much अधिक धन on स्वास्थ्य परवाह than कनाडा, on दोनो a per-capita आधार and as a percentage of GDP.
In 2006, per-capita बिता लिये स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कनाडा was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कि साल ; Canada spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of स्वास्थ्य परवाह बिता in कनाडा थी financed by सरकारी, versus 46 % in the United States.
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending, and U.S. government व्यय on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी बस अंतर्गत 83 % of कुल कनाडाई बिता ( पब्लिक और निजी ) हालांकि ये आंकडे do n't लो into खाता जनसांख्यिकी मतभेद.
Studies have आइये to अलग conclusions परिचय the परिणाम of इस disparity in spending.
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal मिला कि `` स्वास्थ्य outcomes may be श्रेष्ठ in मरीजों cared लिये in कनाडा बनाम the United States, but differences are not consistent. ''
Life expectancy is longer in कनाडा, और इसके शिशु मृत्यु रेट is निम्नतर than कि of the u.S., लकिन there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences.
One commonly cited तुलना, the 2000 संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's दरजा of `` overall स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदर्शन '', जिससे प्रयुक्त a `` कम्पोजिट माप of उपलब्धि in the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य, the वितरण of health, the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '', ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations.
This पढ़ाई रेटेड the us `` responsiveness '', or विशेषता of सेवा लिये individuals receiving treatment, as 1st, compared with 7th for Canada.
While the average life expectancy लिये canadians थी 80.34 सालो compared साथ 78.6 सालो लिये निवासियों of the us, बस comparing the जीवन प्रत्याशा of two groups with different racial makeup and different obesity rates is likely not an effective way of determining which healthcare system is superior.
The जो 's पढ़ाई विधि यहूद criticized by some analyses.
Although there is a measure of consensus कि life-expectancy और शिशु मृत्यु चिह्नित the सबसे विश्वसनीय तरीके to compare nation-wide स्वास्थ्य परवाह, assuming the population makeup is similar, a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source has now broken through the ध्वनि गति अवरोध, और is traveling at 1.4 टाइम्स the गति of sound, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the सोर्स is चलती तेज़ ( साथ a गति ) than the ध्वनि लहरें it creates, it actually leads the advancing wavefront.
The sound source will pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a गति ) पहले the निरीक्षक actually hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an निरीक्षक in सामने of the सोर्स होगा detect
and an observer पीछे the सोर्स.
A sonic boom produced by an वायुयान चलती at m=2.92, गणना इससे the कोन कोण of 20 डिग्री.
An observer hears the boom when the शॉक वेव, on the किनारे of the कोन, crosses his or her location.
mach कोन angle
A sonic boom is the ध्वनि संबद्ध साथ the शॉक लहरें निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the air faster than the speed of sound.
Sonic booms generate विशाल amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा, sounding much like an explosion.
The crack of a supersonic गोली गुजर ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण of a सोनिक boom in miniature.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by jay लीनो कि initially aired इससे may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, और resumed उत्पादन on March 1, 2010.
The fourth अवतार of the tonight दिखाएँ मताधिकार बना इसके डेब्यू on may 25, 1992, तीन days following Johnny Carson 's retirement as host of the program.
The program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank, California, and is ब्रॉडकास्ट सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी और प्रशांत समय zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike Carson or his पूर्ववर्ती जोकर paar, लीनो तभी एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान, preferring to मेजबान the श्रेणी by खुद.
On April 26, 1999, the show began broadcasting in 1080i hdtv, बनने the पहला अमरीकी nightly बात दिखाएँ to be शॉट in high definition.
The दिखाएँ is शॉट in 16:9 aspect ratio.
The series, which followed the same मौलिक स्वरूप as कि of उसके पूर्ववर्तियों ( an खोलने monologue followed by कॉमेडी दिनचर्या, साक्षात्कार and performances ), ran until May 29, 2009, after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
NBC signed Leno to a new सौदे लिये a nightly बात दिखाएँ in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
The primetime series, titled The Jay लीनो दिखाएँ, debuted on सितंबर 14, 2009, following a समान स्वरूप to the Leno incarnation of Tonight.
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor the jay लीनो दिखाएँ उत्पन्न the दरजा कि NBC had expected.
The network decided to move a सघन 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's दिखाएँ to o'brien 's समय स्लॉट, और o'brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later.
This decision met साथ विपक्ष इससे o'brien, जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended जनवरी 22, 2010, after which he began his own talk show on TBS.
The Tonight Show with jay लीनो तब began इसके दूसरी और वर्तमान अवतार, the sixth of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
RFID chip अगला to a अनाज of राइस.
This chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in उपभोक्ता उत्पाद, और implanted in पालतु, लिये पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically भंडारित सूचना.
Some tags are संचालित और पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of मीटर.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर, और may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked object.
RFID tags are प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति through the सभा line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have टैग injected, allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be संलग्न to कपडे, possessions, or भी implanted भीतर लोगों, the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns.
id, अहंकार और super-ego हैं the तीन भाग of the मानसिक apparatus पारिभाषित in सिग्मुंड फ्रायड 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the तीन सैद्धांतिक constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described.
According to this model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और the अहंकार is the व्यवस्थित, यथार्थवादी भाग कि mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id और the super-ego.
The super-ego can stop you from doing certain बाते कि अपना id may want तुम to do.
Even though the model is संरचनात्मक और makes सन्दर्भ to an apparatus, the id, अहंकार और super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one with actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and `` topographical मॉडल '' ) थी पहला discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` परे the ख़ुशी principle `` और थी formalized और elaborated upon तीन सालो बाद in उसके `` The Ego and the Id ``.
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the पद `` बेहोश `` और इसके अनेक conflicting uses.
Air फ़ोर्स rotc emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training corps ( afrotc ) is एक of the तीन प्राथमिक commissioning स्त्रोत लिये अधिकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स, the अन्य दो होने the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स अकादमी ( usafa ) और एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी Training School ( OTS ).
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ), afrotc is लकीर अंतर्गत the jeanne M. holm बीच लिये अधिकारी accessions और नागरिक विकास at मैक्सवेल AFB, Alabama.
The Holm Center, formerly ज्ञात as the एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण Schools ( AFOATS ), retains direct responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS.
AFROTC is the largest और oldest सोर्स of commissioned अधिकारियों for the U.S. Air Force.
afrotc 's stated मिशन is to उपज विशेषता नेताओ लिये the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses with 984 additional institutions of higher सीखना participating in cross-town समझौतों कि allow उनके विद्यार्थी to attend afrotc वर्ग at a आसपास `` मेजबान '' कॉलेज or university.
according to afoats hq, in 2006, afrotc commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants, साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments, '' and are typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर लिये यूएसएएफ उद्देश्य और साथ the नाममात्र शीर्षक of प्राध्यापक of aerospace अध्ययन ( pas ) भीतर the संस्था 's academic community.
Most colleges and universities होगा designate the afrotc detachment as the विभाग of Aerospace Studies.
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant professors of aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ), सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारियों in the बाँधने of प्रमुख or कप्तान.
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide सैन्य प्रशासनिक support और हैं प्रायः augmented by एक to दो civilian स्टाफ support कर्मचारी of the अकादमिक संस्था.
Within AFROTC detachments, the विद्यार्थी ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into विंग्स, समूह, squadrons, और flights, mirroring the USAF functional wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC ) consisting of the पहला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण, और the पेशेवर अधिकारी कोर्स ( poc ) consisting of the पिछला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण.
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training functions : the Academic Classroom Program ( aerospace अध्ययन वर्ग ) और cadet क्रियाएँ ( i.e., नेतृत्व प्रयोगशाला, शारीरिक प्रशिक्षण, और अन्य प्रशिक्षण ).
Paper density ( also known as आधार वज़न और grammage ) is a पद प्रयुक्त in the गूदा और पेपर उद्योग और भी लिये कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
The term `` density '' is not used in its परंपरागत भाव of द्रव्यमान प्रति ईकाई आवाज़.
`` Paper घनत्व '', बल्कि, is a माप of the area density.
Paper products that let little or no लाइट pass through ( e.g. पोस्टर फलक ) हैं considered dense or heavy.
Paper उत्पाद कि allow कुछ लाइट to pass through ( e.g. tissue paper ) are considered lightweight.
In the pulp and paper industry, it is common to नियत a वाणिज्यिक पेपर यंत्र to उपज पेपर to a निशाना paper density.
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as the latter प्रायः रै a grammage वृहद than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing पेपर घनत्व are commonly used:
Expressed in grams per वर्गाकार मीटर ( g/m2 ), पेपर घनत्व is भी known as grammage.
This is the measure प्रयुक्त in सबसे भाग of the world.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक of चादरें, it is ज्ञात as आधार वज़न.
The convention used in the United States and a few other देशों using us पेपर आकार is पाउंड of a ream of 500 ( or in कुछ मामले 1000 ) चादरें of a given ( raw, still uncut ) basis size.
जापानी पेपर is expressed as the वज़न in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born अप्रैल 19, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the wnba 's Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger सिस्टर of एनबीए खिलाड़ी एंथोनी Parker.
She attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी और थी drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA टूर्नामेंट खेल और the पहला स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत दोनो माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She also became तभी the दूसरी खिलाड़ी to डंक in a wnba खेल on June 22, 2008.
A versatile player, she is मुख्यतः a आगे, लकिन थी सूचीबद्ध on टेनेसी 's रोस्टर as a forward, center, and guard.
She was a प्रारंभ on the महिला vols बास्केट टोली, winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships.
Parker won the 2009 निकलोडियन बच्चे ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the पसंदीदा मादा खिलाड़ी in the sports category.
And she was a अतिथि स्टार on फिगर it Out.
A food guide pyramid is a pyramid shaped guide of healthy foods divided into भाग to दिखाएँ the अनुशंसित सेवन लिये प्रत्येक खाना समूह.
The पहला खाना पिरामिड थी published in Sweden in 1974.
The सबसे widely ज्ञात खाना पिरामिड थी introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of Agriculture in the year 1992, was updated in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
Over 25 other देशों और संगठनों have भी प्रकाशित खाना pyramids.
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2, 1805august 4, 1875 ) थी a डैनिश लेखक और poet.
Although a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, and poems, andersen is बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके परी किस्से, a साहित्यिक विधा he so mastered कि he खुद रै become as mythical as the tales he wrote.
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; his stories—called, or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend आयु और राष्ट्रीयता.
During उसके आजीवन he थी acclaimed लिये having प्रसन्न children विश्वव्यापी and was feted by royalty.
Andersen 's fairy tales, which have been translated into more than 125 languages, have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक चेतना, readily accessible to children, लकिन पेश lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well.
They have प्रेरित गति तस्वीरें, plays, ballets, and animated films.

नजर सम्पर्क occurs जब `` दो लोगों dekh at प्रत्येक other 's eyes at the same time. ''
In human beings, eye contact is a form of nonverbal संचार और is विचार to have a विशाल influence on सोशल behavior.
Coined in the early to mid-1960s, the पद रै आइये in the वेस्ट to प्रायः define the अधिनियम as a सार्थक और महत्वपूर्ण चिह्न of विश्वास and social communication.
The customs and significance of नजर सम्पर्क vary widely between संस्कृतियों, साथ धार्मिक और सोशल मतभेद often altering its meaning greatly.
The study of नजर सम्पर्क is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
bed बग हैं parasitic कीट of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which cimex lectularius, the आम bed कीड़ा, is the बेहतरीन ज्ञात as it prefers to फीड on इंसान रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य पशु, e.g., चमगादड़ bugs, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( western US ), and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
The name of the `` bed कीड़ा '' is निकला इससे the पसन्दीदा आवास of cimex lectularius : गरम घरों और विशेषकर nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas.
Bed bugs are mainly active at रात्रि, लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively nocturnal.
They प्रायः फीड on उनके होस्ट बगैर being noticed.
A number of प्रतिकूल स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव may परिणाम इससे bed कीड़ा bites, including skin rashes, psychological effects, and allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both finding bed बग और the occurrence of संगत symptoms.
Bed bugs have been ज्ञात as इंसान परजीवी लिये हज़ारों of years.
At a point in the जल्दी 1940s, वे यहूद ज़्यादातर eradicated in the विकसित संसार, लकिन have increased in व्यापकता since 1995.
Because infestation of इंसान habitats रै महरूम on the increase, bed bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as well.
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल, preceding ezekiel, Jeremiah and the Book of the Twelve.
( The order of the subsequent किताबे differs somewhat in the ईसाई Old Testament ).
The पहला 39 अध्याय prophesy यातना लिये a गुनाहगार यहूदा और लिये सब the राष्ट्र of the संसार कि oppose परमेश्वर, जबकि the पिछला 27 prophesy the बहाली of the स्वदेश of इसराईल और a नई सृष्टि in परमेश्वर 's गौरवशाली भविष्य kingdom ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant, four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the किताब to यशायाह बेटे of amoz, लकिन अभी विद्वानों widely सहमत कि the किताब is the कार्य of तीन अलग लेखक - few scholars deny this view, and those that do, do so for theological reasons.
The first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second, Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century BCE author लिखने निकट the समाप्त of the babylonian captivity ; और the तीसरा, the काव्य trito-isaiah ( अध्याय 56–66 ), थी रचित in जेरूसलम shortly बाद the वापसी इससे निर्वासन, संभवतः by अनेक authors.
Oregon State विश्वविद्यालयों ( osu ) is a coeducational, पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in corvallis, Oregon, United States.
The university offers undergraduate, ग्रैजुएट और डॉक्टरेट डिग्री और a multitude of research opportunities.
There are more than 200 अकादमिक उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered through the university.
OSU 's programs in सूक्ष्मजैविकी, नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी, पारिस्थितिकी, वानिकी, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, खाना science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs.
The OSU 's liberal arts programs have also grown significantly and the department is माना a `` cornerstone '' of the संस्था.
More than 200,000 लोगों have attended osu चूंकि इसके founding.
The Carnegie Foundation classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as भाग of इसके शीर्ष टियर of शोध संस्थानों.
As of 2008, osu is एक of तभी seventy-three land-grant universities.
The school is भी पहचाना as a sea-grant, space-grant और sun-grant संस्था, बनाना it एक of तभी दो us संस्थानों to retain सब चार designations और the तभी पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ).
As one of the two फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the ऑरेगॉन विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली, osu receives अधिक funding लिये शोध, annually, than सब other public higher education institutions in Oregon combined.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the मादा urethra दौरान or पहले an orgasm.
It is also ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग phenomena in some research publications.
The exact source and nature of the द्रव continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर, which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of छोटी, air-breathing जमीन घोंघा, a स्थलीय pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae, the amber snails.
The common name of the amber snails is based on the शेल, जिससे is पारदर्शी और जब खाली प्रायः resembles एम्बर in color.
This species is endemic to the United States, specifically the state of एरिज़ोना और यूटा, जहाँ it थी पहला एकत्रित in the जल्दी 20th century.
It has been listed as endangered on the संयुक्त राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव सेवा सूची of endangered प्रजाति since 8 August 1991.
This snail lives in wetlands, springs, and seeps, and only two of its natural habitats are known to मौजूद : तीन झीलों, a मर्ग निकट kanab, यूटा, और vasey 's स्वर्ग, a वसन्त साथ the कोलोराडो नदी भीतर ग्रैंड Canyon National Park.
In its प्राकृतिक आवास it is बल्कि polyphagous, feeding मुख्यतः on bacteria, plants and fungi, and reproduces during the summer.
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the आईयूसीएन रेड सूची of threatened प्रजाति due to a श्रेणी of कारकों ( सहित influence ), the kanab ambersnail रै महरूम reintroduced to तीन स्रोतों ऊपर the ऐतिहासिक ऊँची जल स्तर along the Colorado River.
The Spanish language is the दूसरी सबसे प्रयुक्त भाषा in the संयुक्त States.
There हैं अधिक स्पेनी अध्यक्षों in the संयुक्त राज्य than वहीँ हैं अध्यक्षों of चाइनीज, French, German, Italian, Hawaiian, and the Native American languages combined.
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau, स्पेनी is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at घर by लगभग 37 लाख लोगों aged पाँच or पुरानी, a फिगर अधिक than double that of 1990.
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language, as well as six million Spanish language students, composing the largest नेशनल spanish-speaking जातियाँ बाहर of मैक्सिको और बनाना स्पेनी the रोमांस भाषा और the indo-european भाषा साथ largest क्रमांक of देशी अध्यक्षों in the world.
roughly हाफ of सब u.S. स्पेनी अध्यक्षों भी बोलो English `` very well, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, टेक्सास, कोलोराडो, नई मैक्सिको, एरिज़ोना, नेवाडा, यूटा, और कैलिफ़ोर्निया और of the स्पेनी explorers - who explored areas of 42 states-.
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( साल of the फ्रेंच रिकवरी of territory ), बाद the French and Indian War.
After of the incorporation of these states to the u.S. in पहला हाफ of 19th सदी, the स्पेनी भाषा थी बाद reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of प्यूर्टो रीको in 1898 और by बाद लहरें of the हिस्पैनिक करणों, मूलरूप इससे हिस्पैनिक अमेरिका, to the United States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today.

The Tokyo Mew Mew manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ a डाल of वर्ण designed by मिया Ikumi.
The series takes प्लेस in टोकियो, जापानी, जहाँ पाँच adolescent लड़कियों, पुकारा mew mews, हैं infused साथ the डीएनए of endangered प्रजाति to कॉम्बैट aliens attempting to take over the Earth.
The manga series is followed by a short sequel series, टोकियो mew mew a la विधि, जिससे introduces a नई mew mew और a new threat.
The Mew Mews are led by the main अक्षर, ichigo momomiya, जिनकी पहला कार्य is to एकत्रित the अन्य चार mew mews : मिंट aizawa, सलाद midorikawa, Pudding Fong, and Zakuro Fujiwara.
As the series progresses, Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya Aoyama to बनने उसके गर्लफ्रेंड जबकि trying to छुपा उसके secret double life from him.
The series antagonists शामिल तीन एलियंस, kish, पाई, और तीखा, and their leader, Deep Blue.
Originally from Earth, the aliens यहूद मजबूर to छोड़ long पहले due to घातक पर्यावरणीय परिवर्तन.
They have returned to kill the इंसानो, जो वे महसूस हैं destroying उनके ग्रह, और reclaim the planet.
In a la Mode, middle school student Berry shirayuki is introduced as the छठे mew mew और, in the अनुपस्थिति of ichigo, the अस्थाई नेता of the Mew Mews.
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists, the संत रोज़ crusaders, a समूह of इंसान teenagers साथ विभिन्न psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia.
Led by Duke, they make अनेक कोशिशें to मार बेरी, आखिरकार turning the लोकल populace against the Mew Mews.
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo ब्लैक बिल्ली लड़की कि प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling alien invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story of five female superheroes, the अक्षर डिजाइन यहूद redone to have a lighter, more colorful feel.
The main series characters were praised for being a पूर्ण अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी, as खूब as लिये उनके cute appearances.
The characters introduced in a la विधि यहूद भी praised लिये उनके विज़ुअल दिखावे, लकिन criticized as होने दोहराव of the original series.
the अक्षर ड्यूक थी भी criticized लिये having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the white supremacy group, the Ku Klux Klan.
Middle Triassic marginal marine sequence of siltstones ( नीचे ) और limestones ( ऊपर ), वर्जिन गठन, southwestern यूटा, USA
Sedimentary रॉक्स हैं प्रकार of चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition of सामग्री at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water.
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or सशुल्क अणु ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a solution.
Particles that form a sedimentary rock by accumulating हैं पुकारा sediment.
पहले होने deposited, sediment थी formed by weathering और अपरदन in a सोर्स क्षेत्रफल, और तब transported to the प्लेस of deposition by water, wind, ice, mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation.
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the धरती 's क्रस्ट is extensive, लकिन the कुल योगदान of sedimentary रॉक्स is अनुमानित to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust.
Sedimentary rocks are only a पतला veneer over a क्रस्ट consisting मुख्यतः of igneous और metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary rocks are deposited in परतों as strata, forming a structure called bedding.
The study of sedimentary रॉक्स और चट्टान strata provides सूचना परिचय the subsurface कि is उपयोगी लिये सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी, लिये उदाहरण in the निर्माण of सड़कें, houses, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary rocks are also important स्त्रोत of प्राकृतिक संसाधन जैसे कोयले, चट्टान fuels, पीने water or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source लिये वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान परिचय the धरती 's इतिहास, सहित palaeogeography, paleoclimatology और the history of life.
The scientific discipline कि अध्ययन the गुण और उत्पत्ति of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology.
Sedimentology is दोनो भाग of भूविज्ञान और शारीरिक भूगोल और overlaps partly साथ अन्य disciplines in the धरती sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or structural geology.

Humans are born with over 270 bones, some of which fuse together into a अनुदैर्ध्य अक्ष, the अक्षीय कंकाल, to जिससे the appendicular skeleton is attached.
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 कूच c. 460 or c. 492 ) थी a romano-british ईसाई missionary and bishop in Ireland.
Known as the `` Apostle of Ireland '', he is the प्राथमिक संरक्षक संत of the द्वीप साथ साथ संतो brigid और Columba.
Two प्रामाणिक अक्षर इससे उसे जीवित, इससे जिससे आइये the तभी generally accepted details of his life.
When he was about 16, he was captured from his home and taken as a slave to आयरलैंड, जहाँ he जिया लिये छह सालो पहले escaping और returning to उसके family.
After becoming a cleric, he returned to उत्तरी और पश्चिमी आयरलैंड as an ordained बिशप, लकिन छोटी is ज्ञात परिचय the places where he worked.
By the सातवाँ सदी, he था already आइये to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland.
Most available details of his life हैं इससे subsequent hagiographies, और ये हैं अभी नहीं स्वीकृत without detailed criticism.
the annals of ulster राज्य कि he arrived in आयरलैंड in 432, ministered in Ulster around 443, and died in 457 or 461.
The text, however, distinguishes between `` Old Patrick '' ( thought to mean palladius ) और `` पैट्रिक, archapostle of the स्कॉट्स, '' जो died in 492.
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but, on a फैली निर्वचन, he थी क्रियाशील as a मिशनरी in आयरलैंड दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the 5th century.
He is generally credited साथ होने the पहला बिशप of armagh, Primate of All Ireland.
Saint Patrick 's Day is observed on कूच 17, the तिथि of his death.
It is celebrated both inside and outside Ireland, as both a धार्मिक और, विशेषकर बाहर आयरलैंड, धर्मनिरपेक्ष holiday.
In the dioceses of आयरलैंड, it is दोनो a solemnity और a पावन दिन of दायित्व ; बाहर Ireland, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
Line खण्ड in the golden ratio
A golden rectangle with longer side a और shorter पक्ष b, जब लगाई सटा to a वर्गाकार साथ पहलू of length a, will produce a similar golden rectangle with longer side a + b and shorter side a.
इस illustrates the संबंध.
in गणित और the कला, दो quantities हैं in the सुनहरी अनुपात if the अनुपात of the योग of the quantities to the larger quantity is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one.
The figure on the सही illustrates the ज्यामितीय संबंध.

The golden ratio is also called the सुनहरी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio ओरिया ) or सुनहरी mean.
Other names include extreme and mean अनुपात, medial खण्ड, दैवी proportion, दैवी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio divina ), सुनहरी proportion, golden cut, and golden number.
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works to सन्निकट the सुनहरी ratio—especially in the रूप of the सुनहरी आयताकार, in जिससे the अनुपात of the longer पक्ष to the shorter is the सुनहरी ratio—believing this proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ).
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the golden ratio, सहित इसके रूप in the आयाम of a नियमित प्रस्तुतीकरण और in a सुनहरी आयताकार, जिससे can be काटें into a वर्गाकार और a छोटी आयताकार with the same aspect ratio.
The golden ratio रै भी महरूम प्रयुक्त to analyze the proportions of प्राकृतिक वस्तुएँ as खूब as man-made प्रणालियों such as financial markets, in some cases based on dubious fits to data.
North Myrtle Beach is a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in horry काउंटी, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, United States.
It was created in 1968 from four existing municipalities उत्तर of myrtle बीच, और serves as एक of the प्राथमिक पर्यटक कस्बों साथ the ग्रैंड Strand.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 13,752 at the 2010 census.
World War i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances यहूद दोनो reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध soon spread around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर that changed little until 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The युद्ध ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to fight a total war.
By the end of the युद्ध, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
the successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी states.
The League of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be factors contributing to World War II.
Camden is a city in camden काउंटी, नई जर्सी, संयुक्त राज्य.
It is the county सीट, स्तिथ आरपार the डेलावेयर नदी इससे Philadelphia.
As of the 2010 United States Census the नगर था a कुल जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344, representing a मनाही of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 निवासियों enumerated दौरान the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, जिससे था in फेरे अस्वीकृत by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) from the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census.
Camden क्रमित as the 12th-most populous नगरपालिका in the राज्य in 2010 बाद having been ranked 10th in 2000.
Camden was originally incorporated as a city on February 13, 1828, इससे portions of the now-defunct न्यूटन township, जबकि the क्षेत्रफल थी स्टिल भाग of gloucester County.
On March 13, 1844, Camden became भाग of the newly formed Camden County.
हालांकि एकबार a thriving बीच लिये निर्माण और उद्योग, camden is शायद best known for its struggles with urban dysfunction.
Three Camden mayors have been jailed for भ्रष्टाचार, the सबसे हाल होने मिल्टन मिलान in 2000.
Since 2005 the स्कूल प्रणाली और पुलिस विभाग have महरूम संचालित by the राज्य of New Jersey ; the takeover expired in 2012.
In 2008, Camden had the highest crime rate in the U.S. with 2,333 violent अपराधों प्रति 100,000 लोगों जबकि the नेशनल औसत थी 455 प्रति 100,000.
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 per student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil basis ) in the 2009–10 स्कूल साल और two-thirds of the विद्यार्थी ग्रैजुएट.
Two out of every five residents हैं नीचे the नेशनल poverty line.
Amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, elavil, tryptizol, laroxyl, saroten, sarotex, lentizol, endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
It is the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त tca और रै at तनिक बराबर efficacy against depression as the newer class of SSRIs according to a study from early 2001.
As खूब as reducing depressive लक्षण, ये प्रकार of tricyclics भी आसानी migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks and some schizophrenic symptoms.
It is also known to reduce आक्रामकता और हिंसक behavior.
A computer is a general purpose device that can be प्रोग्रामित to carry आउट a परिमित नियत of arithmetic or logical operations.
Since a अनुक्रम of परिचालन can be readily बदला, the computer can solve more than one kind of problem.
Conventionally, a computer consists of at तनिक एक प्रसंस्करण तत्व, typically a सेंट्रल processing unit ( CPU ) and some form of memory.
The प्रसंस्करण तत्व carries आउट गणित और लॉजिक परिचालन, and a sequencing and control unit that can change the order of operations based on stored information.
परिधीय डिवाइस allow सूचना to be पुनर्प्राप्त इससे an बाह्य सोर्स, और the परिणाम of operations saved and retrieved.
The पहला इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिजिटल कंप्यूटर यहूद विकसित between 1940 and 1945 in the United Kingdom and United States.
Originally they were the size of a large रूम, consuming as much शक्ति as अनेक सौ आधुनिक personal computers ( PCs ).
in इस era mechanical एनालॉग कंप्यूटर यहूद used for military applications.
Modern कंप्यूटर आधारित on एकीकृत circuits हैं लाखो to अरबों of टाइम्स अधिक सक्षम than the early machines, and occupy a fraction of the space.
Simple computers are small पर्याप्त to अनुरूप into मोबाईल डिवाइस, और मोबाईल कंप्यूटर can be संचालित by छोटी batteries.
Personal computers in उनके विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म हैं प्रतीक of the सूचना आयु और are what most people think of as “computers.”
However, the अंतःस्थापित कंप्यूटर मिला in अनेक डिवाइस इससे mp3 खिलाड़ी to सेनानी वायुयान and from toys to industrial robots are the most numerous.
`` Barefoot and pregnant '' is a phrase most commonly associated with the विवादास्पद विचार कि महिलाओं चाहिए नहीं कार्य बाहर the घर और चाहिए have अनेक children दौरान उनके reproductive years.
it रै अनेक अन्य meanings as well.
It is a फिगर of speech.
The phrase `` barefoot और गर्भवती '' थी संभवतः first used sometime before 1950.
An article from 1949 states, `` By early 1949, TWA was—in the शब्द of इसके नई अध्यक्ष, ralph S. damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Its उपयोग may तिथि as जल्दी as the 1910s.
An आलेख प्रकाशित in 1958 राज्य the phrase थी पहला used by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier.
`` Some forty years पहले, dr. hertzler उन्नत a परिकल्पना जिससे यंग महिलाओं of आज seem झुकी on proving correct. '
The तभी रास्ता to रखना a स्त्री प्रसन्न, ' he कहा, 'is to keep her barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
