विश्वविद्यालयों of फीनिक्स स्टेडियम, खोली अगस्त 1, 2006, is a बहुउद्देशीय फ़ुटबॉल stadium located in Glendale, Arizona.
It is the home of the एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl.
The stadium is located next door to the Jobing.com Arena and it features the first fully retractable प्राकृतिक ग्रास playing सतह निर्मित in the संयुक्त राज्य on शीर्ष of an एयरफील्ड प्रणालियों नाले प्रणाली.
An opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing field to मूव to the exterior of the भवन, allowing the संपूर्ण प्राकृतिक turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium has hosted Super कटोरी xlii, और the 2011 bcs नेशनल चैंपियनशिप खेल, a खेल कि it होस्ट प्रत्येक four years, which set the venue 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on January 11, 2011.
It will again मेजबान सुपर कटोरी xlix in 2015.
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming अधिकारों in सितंबर 2006, shortly बाद the स्टेडियम had opened under the name Cardinals Stadium.
The `` University of Phoenix `` name is लागू as a कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक, और नहीं as the घर स्टेडियम of the विश्वविद्यालयों ( जिससे रै no intercollegiate athletics program ).
The stadium रै भी hosted the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इवेंट रेसलमेनिया xxvi साथ 72,219 प्रशंसक in attendance.
the इवेंट थी आयोजित in the स्टेडियम on March 28th 2010.
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as Lawrence जोशुआ चेम्बरलेन, थी an अमरीकी कॉलेज प्राध्यापक इससे the राज्य of maine, जो volunteered दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to जुड़ें the Union Army.
Although having no earlier education in military strategies, he became a highly आदरणीय और सजा संघ अधिकारी, reaching the रैंक of ब्रिगेडियर सामान्य ( और brevet प्रमुख सामान्य ).
For उसके gallantry at gettysburg, he was awarded the Medal of Honor.
He was given the honor of commanding the संघ सैनिकों at the आत्मसमर्पण रस्म लिये the infantry of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज at appomattox, Virginia.
After the war, he डाला राजनीती as a रिपब्लिकन और परोसा चार one-year terms of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine.
He served on the संकाय, और as अध्यक्ष, of उसके अल्मा मेटर, bowdoin कॉलेज.
An inning, or innings, is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल in कोई of a किस्में of खेल – सबसे notably क्रिकेट और बेसबॉल दौरान जिससे एक टोली कोशिशें to स्कोर जबकि the अन्य टोली कोशिशें to prevent the first from scoring.
In क्रिकेट, the पद पारी is दोनो एकवचन और बहुवचन और is सदा spelled और सुनाया with the terminal `` s ''.
In बेसबॉल और सॉफ्टबॉल, the एकवचन रूप is inning and only the plural takes an `` s ''.
In many other sports, the length of the खेल is लिखवाई by a क्लॉक और टीमों स्वैप अप्रिय और रक्षात्मक भूमिकाएँ dynamically by taking possession of a ball or similar item.
In baseball and cricket, however, एक टोली, कहा to be `` बल्लेबाजी '', कोशिशें to स्कोर `` रनों '' —see चलाएं ( बेसबॉल ) और चलाएं ( क्रिकेट ) —while the अन्य टोली, कहा to be `` fielding '', attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get members of the batting team out.
The teams switch places after the fielding टोली रै succeeded in getting a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी आउट, बनाना a clock unnecessary.
In क्रिकेट, the पद पारी is भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the खेल of एक particular player ( Smith had a poor innings, scoring only 12 ).
By extension, this term can be used in British English for लगभग कोई कार्यकलाप जिससे takes a काल of समय ( the उदार सरकारी था a शुभ पारी, लकिन आखिरकार खोया दफ्तर in 1972, or तुम 've था a मेला पारी, अभी it 's my फेरे, अर्थ `` you have spoken for long enough, now let me speak '' ).
It is also used in सन्दर्भ to किसी जो रै died at a reasonably बूढ़ा age or lived a rich and rewarding life ( Ah, well.
John थी 89.
At least he था a शुभ पारी ).
The baseball-derived parallel to this in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी is the पद at चमगादड़.
According to the Oxford English Dictionary, the term पारी रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in सन्दर्भ to क्रिकेट चूंकि at तनिक 1735.
As cricket was a वयस्क, अत्यधिक व्यवस्थित खेल in the 1600s in इंग्लैण्ड, the term 's origin could well precede this first recorded usage.
The शब्द inning अर्थ 'a महफ़िल in ' is पहला recorded in 1522, and could be related.
Adenosine deaminase deficiency, भी पुकारा एडीए कमियां or ada-scid, is an autosomal recessive metabolic disorder that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in fewer than एक in 100,000 सजीव births विश्वव्यापी.
It accounts for about 15 % of all cases of कठोर संयुक्त immunodeficiency ( scid ).
It is very rare, you have a 3 % मौका of getting इस gene.
ADA deficiency may be present in infancy, बाल्यकाल, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset and severity is सम्बन्धित to कुछ 29 ज्ञात genotypes संबद्ध साथ the विकार.
An example of urban poverty in इस slum in जकार्ता, Indonesia
Poverty is the state of एक जो lacks a निश्चित राशि of सामग्री possessions or money.
Absolute poverty or destitution refers to the deprivation of मौलिक इंसान needs, जिससे commonly शामिल खाना, जल, स्वच्छता, कपडे, आश्रय, health care and education.
Relative poverty is defined contextually as आर्थिक असमानता in the स्थान or समाज in which people live.
For much of इतिहास, गरीबी थी माना largely अपरिहार्य as परंपरागत मोड्स of उत्पादन यहूद अपर्याप्त to दे an entire population a comfortable standard of living.
After the industrial क्रान्ति, द्रव्यमान उत्पादन in कारखानों बना माल increasingly more inexpensive and accessible.
of अधिक महत्व is the modernization of कृषि, ऐसे as fertilizers, in order to provide enough yield to feed the population.
The supply of basic needs can be प्रतिबंधित by constraints on सरकारी सेवाएं ऐसे as भ्रष्टाचार, कर avoidance, कर्ज़ और ऋण conditionalities and by the brain drain of health care and educational professionals.
Strategies of increasing आय to मेक मौलिक needs अधिक सस्ती typically शामिल welfare, economic freedoms, and providing financial services.
Poverty reduction is a major goal and issue for many अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ऐसे as the संयुक्त Nations and the World Bank.
The World Bank estimated 1.29 अरब लोगों यहूद जीना in निरपेक्ष गरीबी in 2008.
Of these, about 400 लाख लोगों in निरपेक्ष गरीबी जिया in इण्डिया and 173 million people in China.
In USA 1 in 5 children जीवनदान in गरीबी.
In terms of percentage of regional populations, sub-Saharan अफ़्रीकी at 47 % था the उच्चतम incidence रेट of निरपेक्ष poverty in 2008.
Between 1990 और 2010, परिचय 663 लाख लोगों स्थानांतरित above the absolute poverty level.
Still, चरम गरीबी is a वैश्विक चुनौती ; it is observed in सब भाग of the संसार, सहित the developed economies.
Mushroom poisoning ( also known as mycetism ) refers to नुकसानदेह प्रभाव इससे ingestion of विषाक्त substances उपस्थित in a mushroom.
These लक्षण can vary इससे पतला जठरांत्र तकलीफ to death.
the toxins उपस्थित हैं द्वितीयक metabolites उत्पादित in specific biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
Mushroom poisoning is प्रायः the परिणाम of ingestion of जंगली मशरूम बाद misidentification of a विषाक्त mushroom as an edible species.
The most common reason for this misidentification is बंद प्रतिरूप in शर्तें of रंग और सामान्य morphology of the toxic mushrooms species with edible species.
Even very experienced wild mushroom gatherers are upon rare अवसर poisoned by खाने विषाक्त प्रजाति, despite होने खूब aware of the risks, through carelessness.
To prevent mushroom poisoning, मशरूम gatherers need to be बहुत परिचित साथ the मशरूम वे intend to collect as well as with any similar-looking toxic species.
In addition, edibility of मशरूम may निर्भर on विधि of तैयारी for cooking.
collectors भी need to be खूब जागरूक कि edibility or toxicity of some species varies with geographic location.
Human height is the distance from the नीचे of the फीट to the शीर्ष of the सिर in a इंसान देह, खड़ा erect.
When populations share genetic पृष्ठभूमि और पर्यावरणीय कारकों, औसत ऊँचाई is अक्सर characteristic भीतर the group.
Exceptional ऊँचाई विभिन्नता ( around 20 % विचलन इससे औसत ) भीतर ऐसे a जनसांख्यिकी is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, which are medical conditions caused by specific genes or endocrine abnormalities.
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare, environmental कारकों जैसे दीर्घकालिक कुपोषण दौरान बाल्यकाल or किशोरावस्था may खाता लिये विलम्बित विकास and/or ( in कठोर मामले ) चिह्नित reductions in वयस्क stature even without the presence of any of these medical conditions.
Apollo 11 was the spaceflight कि उतरा the पहला इंसानो, अमेरिकी neil आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ एल्ड्रिन, on the चंद्रमा on जुलाई 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
Armstrong became the पहला to कदम onto the चंद्र सतह 6 घंटों later on July 21 at 02:56 UTC.
Armstrong spent about two and a हाफ घंटों बाहर the spacecraft, एल्ड्रिन थोड़ा कम ; और साथ वे एकत्रित of lunar material for return to Earth.
A third सदस्य of the मिशन, माइकल कॉलिन्स, piloted the कमांड spacecraft अलोन in चंद्र कक्षा जबतक आर्मस्ट्रांग and Aldrin returned to it just under a day later for the trip back to Earth.
Launched by a Saturn V rocket from कैनेडी स्पेस बीच in merritt द्वीप, फ्लोरिडा on जुलाई 16, अपोलो 11 थी the पांचवां मानवयुक्त मिशन of NASA 's Apollo program.
The Apollo spacecraft had three parts : a Command Module with a cabin for the three astronauts which was the only part which उतरा वापस on धरती ; a सेवा मोड्यूल जिससे समर्थित the कमांड मोड्यूल साथ नोदन, विद्युत शक्ति, ऑक्सीजन और जल ; और a Lunar Module for landing on the Moon.
After being sent to the Moon by the Saturn V 's अपर स्टेज, the astronauts अलग the spacecraft इससे it और travelled लिये तीन days until they entered into lunar orbit.
Armstrong and Aldrin then moved into the चंद्र मोड्यूल और उतरा in the समुद्र of Tranquility.
They stayed a कुल of परिचय 21 और a half hours on the lunar surface.
बाद उठाने बंद in the अपर भाग of the चंद्र मोड्यूल और rejoining Collins in the Command Module, they returned to Earth and landed in the Pacific Ocean on July 24.
Broadcast on live TV to a world-wide audience, Armstrong stepped onto the चंद्र सतह और वर्णित the इवेंट as `` एक छोटी कदम लिये [ a ] man, एक दानव छलांग लिये mankind. ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the स्पेस रेस और fulfilled a नेशनल लक्ष्य प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the लेट u.S. अध्यक्ष जॉन F. Kennedy in a speech before the United States Congress, `` before this decade is out, of landing a man on the Moon and returning him safely to the Earth. ''
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football competition लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी of the Second World War.
the वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन, जो won the 2010 tournament.
The वर्तमान स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग नेशनल teams.
ब्राज़ील have जीती पाँच टाइम्स, और वे हैं the only team to have played in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; Germany, with three शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, और स्पेन, साथ एक title each.
the संसार कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The अगला तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, रूस in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Genocide is a पद coined in 1944 by राफेल lemkin to describe the deliberate और व्यवस्थित विनाश, in पूरे or in part, of an ethnic, racial, religious, or national group.
It is defined in Article 2 of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following acts committed with intent to destroy, in whole or in part, a national, ethnical, racial or धार्मिक समूह, as ऐसे : हत्या सदस्यों of the समूह ; causing गंभीर bodily or दिमागी नुक़सान to सदस्यों of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the समूह शर्तें of जीवन, गणना to लाओ परिचय इसके शारीरिक विनाश in पूरे or in भाग ; imposing measures intended to prevent births within the group ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the group to another group. ''
Skulls of पीड़ितों of the rwandan नरसंहार
the प्रस्तावना to the cppcg नहीं तभी राज्य कि `` नरसंहार is a अपराधों अंतर्गत अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि, contrary to the स्पिरिट और aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और condemned by the civilized world '', but also that `` at all periods of history genocide has inflicted great losses on humanity ''.
Determining what historical कार्यक्रम constitute a नरसंहार और जिससे हैं merely दण्ड or अमानवीय behavior is not a clear-cut matter.
in nearly प्रत्येक मामला जहाँ आरोपों of नरसंहार have परिचालित, partisans of विभिन्न पहलू have fiercely disputed the interpretation and details of the event, often to the point of promoting wildly different versions of the facts.
an accusation of नरसंहार is कतई नहीं लिया lightly and will almost always be controversial.
The following list of genocides और कथित genocides चाहिए be समझा in इस कॉन्टेक्स्ट और can नहीं be regarded as the final word on these subjects.
A timing belt is a non-slipping mechanical ड्राइव बेल्ट और the term may refer to either:
Toothed belt, a लचीली बेल्ट साथ दांत moulded onto इसके inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ), a toothed बेल्ट प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव the camshaft ( s ) भीतर an आतंरिक combustion engine
The culture of the United States is primarily a पश्चिमी संस्कृति, लकिन is भी बहकावे by देशी अमरीकी, अफ़्रीकी, एशियाई, पोलिनेशियाई, और लैटिन अमरीकी cultures.
American culture started its formation over 10,000 years ago साथ the माइग्रेशन of paleo-indians इससे एशिया into the प्रदेश कि is आज the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य.
It has इसके अपना अद्वितीय सोशल और सांस्कृतिक विशेषताएँ ऐसे as dialect, music, arts, social habits, cuisine, and folklore.
The United States of America is an ethnically and racially diverse country as a परिणाम of large-scale आव्रजन इससे अनेक अलग देशों throughout इसके इतिहास.
Its chief early European प्रभाव आए इससे अंग्रेज़ी, स्कॉटिश, वेल्श और आयरिश settlers of colonial America during British rule.
British culture, due to colonial ties with Britain that स्प्रेड the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा, विधिक प्रणाली और अन्य सांस्कृतिक inheritances, था a formative influence.
Other important प्रभाव आए इससे अन्य भाग of पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, विशेषकर Germany, France, and Italy.
असली तत्व भी खेल a दमदार भूमिका, such as the invention of Jeffersonian democracy.
Thomas Jefferson 's Notes on the State of Virginia was perhaps the first influential domestic cultural critique by an अमरीकी और a प्रतिक्रियावादी टुकड़ा to the प्रचलित यूरोपीय सर्वसम्मति कि अमेरिका 's घरेलू मौलिकता थी विकृत.
Prevalent ideas and ideals that evolved domestically, such as national holidays, uniquely American sports, military tradition, and innovations in the arts and entertainment give a दमदार भाव of नेशनल अभिमान among the जनसांख्यिकी as a पूरे.
American culture includes both conservative and liberal elements, scientific and religious प्रतिस्पर्धात्मकता, राजनैतिक structures, रिस्क लेने और फ़्री अभिव्यक्ति, भौतिकवादी और moral तत्व.
Despite निश्चित सतत वैचारिक सिद्धान्त ( e.g. व्यक्तिगत, समतावाद, और आस्था in स्वतंत्रता और लोकतंत्र ), अमरीकी culture has a variety of expressions due to its geographical scale and demographic diversity.
The flexibility of U.S. culture and its highly symbolic nature lead some शोधकर्ताओं to categorize अमरीकी संस्कृति as a mythic पहचान ; अन्य see it as American exceptionalism.
It also शामिल तत्व कि विकसित इससे स्वदेशी अमेरिकी, और अन्य जातीय cultures—most prominently the culture of African Americans, cultures from Latin America, and Asian American cultures.
Many American cultural तत्व, विशेषकर इससे लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, have स्प्रेड आरपार the globe through modern mass media.
The United States रै प्रायः महरूम विचार of as a melting घट, लकिन शुरूआत in the लेट 1990s और जल्दी 2000s, it रुझान towards सांस्कृतिक diversity, pluralism and the image of a salad bowl instead.
Due to the extent of American culture, there are many integrated but अद्वितीय सोशल subcultures भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य.
The cultural affiliations an individual in the United States may have commonly depend on social class, राजनैतिक अभिविन्यास और a multitude of जनसांख्यिकी विशेषताएँ ऐसे as धार्मिक पृष्ठभूमि, occupation और जातीय समूह membership.
samoan ( gagana fa'a sāmoa or gagana sāmoa — आईपीए : ) is the भाषा of the samoan आइलैंड्स, comprising the स्वतंत्र country of Samoa and the United States territory of American Samoa.
It is an official language—alongside अंग्रेज़ी —in दोनो jurisdictions.
Samoan, a Polynesian language, is the पहला भाषा लिये सबसे of the समोआ आइलैंड्स ' जनसांख्यिकी of about 246,000.
With many samoan लोगों जीना in अन्य देशों, the कुल क्रमांक of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000.
The language is notable for the phonological मतभेद between औपचारिक और अनौपचारिक वाक as खूब as a ceremonial रूप used in Samoan oratory.
A glucose tolerance test is a चिकित्सा परीक्षण in जिससे ग्लूकोज is दिए और रक्त नमूने लिया afterward to determine कैसा जल्दी it is cleared from the blood.
The test is usually प्रयुक्त to परीक्षण लिये मधुमेह, इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध, और sometimes प्रतिक्रिया hypoglycemia और acromegaly, or rarer विकार of carbohydrate metabolism.
In the most commonly performed version of the परीक्षण, an मौखिक ग्लूकोज सहिष्णुता परीक्षण ( ogtt ), a मानक खुराक of ग्लूकोज is ingested by मुँह and blood levels are checked two hours later.
Many variations of the GTT have been devised over the सालो लिये विभिन्न उद्देश्य, साथ अलग मानक doses of ग्लूकोज, अलग रूट of प्रशासन, अलग intervals और durations of sampling, and various substances measured in addition to blood glucose.
`` What About Me '' is a सोंग लिखा by गैरी तुषार और frances swan, पहला अंकित by ऑस्ट्रेलियाई rock band Moving Pictures from their album Days of Innocence.
It was the band 's first number-one सिंगल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया बिता छह लगातार सप्ताह on the शीर्ष ; वहीँ, it थी the second-highest selling single of 1982.
The success of the song led उन्हें to अमेरिका जहाँ it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 chart.
The song stayed in the U.S. charts for such a long time that it प्रबंधित to मेक billboards शीर्ष 100 पॉप singles of 1983, at # 88, a विरल feat लिये a सिंगल साथ ऐसे a कम शिखर position.
The song made an असामान्य वापसी in 1989, peaking at # 46.
On the left a मुर्गा अंडा, the अंडा सबसे commonly खाया by humans, and on the right two quail eggs
Eggs are laid by females of many different species, including birds, सरीसृपों, amphibians, और मछली, और have महरूम खाया by mankind for thousands of years.
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a protective eggshell, albumen ( egg white ), और vitellus ( अंडा yolk ), contained भीतर विभिन्न पतला membranes.
Popular choices for egg consumption are chicken, बतख, बटेर, roe, और caviar, लकिन the अंडा सबसे प्रायः खपत by इंसानो is the मुर्गा अंडा, by a wide margin.
Egg yolks और पूरे अंडे स्टोर significant amounts of प्रोटीन and choline, and are widely used in cookery.
Due to their protein सामग्री, the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) categorizes अंडे as meats within the Food Guide Pyramid.
Despite the nutritional मान of अंडे, वहीँ हैं कुछ संभावित स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे arising इससे egg quality, storage, and individual allergies.
Chickens और अन्य egg-laying जीव हैं widely रखा throughout the संसार, and mass production of chicken eggs is a global industry.
In 2009, an estimated 62.1 लाख मीट्रिक टन of अंडे यहूद उत्पादित विश्वव्यापी इससे a कुल लेटा झुण्ड of approximately 6.4 billion hens.
There are issues of regional variation in demand and अपेक्षा, as खूब as वर्तमान debates concerning विधि of द्रव्यमान उत्पादन, साथ the यूरोपीय संघ 's ban on battery farming of chickens.
Major League Soccer ( MLS ) is a पेशेवर सॉकर लीग representing the sport 's highest level in the United States and Canada.
Sanctioned by the United States Soccer संघ ( u.S. सॉकर ), the लीग is रचित of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in Canada.
Seasons presently run from March to दिसम्बर, साथ प्रत्येक टोली playing 34 खेल in the नियमित ऋतु.
Ten teams compete in the postseason mls कप playoffs culminating in the चैंपियनशिप game, the MLS Cup.
Major लीग सॉकर थी संस्थापित in 1993 as भाग of the United States ' bid to host the 1994 FIFA World Cup.
The first season took प्लेस in 1996 शुरूआत साथ टेन टीमों.
Instead of ऑपरेटिंग as an संघ of independently स्वामित्व टीमों, mls is a सिंगल entity where each team is owned and controlled by the league 's investors.
The league 's closed सदस्यता makes it एक of the संसार 's few सॉकर लीग नहीं using प्रमोशन and relegation.
The legality of कैनबिस varies इससे देश to देश.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in सबसे देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, many countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, विशेषकर in उत्तर अमेरिका, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively विधिक in the नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तर कोरियाई और होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं for federal law, which governs persons in all states.
The औषधीय उपयोग of कैनबिस is विधिक in a क्रमांक of देशों, सहित Canada, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य स्तर और कुछ राज्य have स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime, also contrary to federal statute.
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others but, अलावा इससे the देशों कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to चिकित्सा मारिजुआना, सबसे देशों have विभिन्न दंड ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions हैं लिया अधिक seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, use, possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, बनाना it दंडनीय by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts उपयोग अनिवार्य उपचार कार्यक्रम लिये यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता, साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes.
There are also changes in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक दिशा as in कनाडा.
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in अनेक देशों और have resulted in कारावास वाक्य और लोगों खोने उनके कार्य.
However, simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries, particularly in parts of East एशिया और southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री of कैनबिस may सीसे to a वाक्य of जीवन in थाना or भी निष्पादन.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the आयतनी भिन्न of रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ प्रत्येक दिल ताल or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण.
इमेजिंग of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF.
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a विश्वव्यापी यूटिलिटी enabling पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद अनुमत by हृदय imaging.
As a mathematical term, ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of एडाल्फ Fick in cardiac output.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, चुम्बकीय अनुनाद इमेजिंग और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia, जन्मजात दिल Disease and Heart Failure.
State Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south राज्य राजमार्ग in the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, largely in the Mojave Desert.
The southern portion of the राजमार्ग is हस्ताक्षरित as the antelope घाटी Freeway.
The route connects अंतरराज्यीय 5, or सुनहरी राज्य फ्रीवे, निकट सांता clarita और साथ u.S. Route 395 near Inyokern.
Legislatively, the रूट extends दक्षिण of i-5 to राज्य रूट 1 in the प्रशांत palisades क्षेत्रफल of लॉस एंजिल्स, however the portion south of the junction with I-5 has not been constructed.
The southern part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway सेवारत और connecting the समुदायों of सांता clarita, palmdale और lancaster साथ the rest of the Greater Los Angeles area.
The उत्तरी portion, इससे विंसेंट ( दक्षिण of palmdale ) to रूट 395, is legislatively नामित the Aerospace Highway, as the highway serves Edwards Air Force Base, once one of the primary landing strips for NASA 's Space Shuttle.
This section is rural, following the line between the hot mojave मरुस्थल और the forming Sierra Nevada mountain range.
Most of Route 14 is loosely paralleled by a main line of the Southern Pacific Railroad, used लिये the antelope घाटी लकीर of the metrolink commuter रेल प्रणाली as खूब as a कनेक्शन between लॉस एंजिल्स और the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Central Valley via Tehachapi Pass.
Linked with US 395, इस सड़क connects लॉस एंजिल्स साथ ऐसे स्थान as मैमथ पहाड़, Mono Lake, Yosemite National Park and Reno, Nevada.
Route 14 थी भाग of u.S. रूट 6 prior to truncation in 1964, जब u.S. 6 थी a coast-to-coast route from Long Beach to Provincetown, Massachusetts.
The non-freeway segment of SR 14 from Silver Queen Road north of Rosamond to Mojave is ज्ञात as सिएरा राजमार्ग, as is the बूढ़ा रूटिंग between अंतरराज्यीय 5 और चांदी महारानी सड़क where SR 14 has been moved to a newer freeway alignment.
Portions of Route 14 remain signed with names associated साथ us 6, सहित मिडलैंड ट्रेल, थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट राजमार्ग और ग्रैंड फौज of the गणतंत्र राजमार्ग.
This route is part of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया फ्रीवे और एक्सप्रेसवे प्रणाली.
Blindness is the कंडीशन of lacking विज़ुअल बोध due to physiological or neurological factors.
Various scales have been developed to describe the extent of दृष्टि घाटा और define दृष्टिहीनता.
Total दृष्टिहीनता is the पूरा कमी of रूप और विज़ुअल लाइट बोध और is clinically recorded as NLP, an abbreviation for `` no light perception. ''
Blindness is frequently used to describe कठोर विज़ुअल पुतलियों with vision.
Those described as having only light बोध have no अधिक sight than the क्षमता to बताना लाइट इससे अंधेरा और the सामान्य दिशा of a light source.
To determine which people may need खास सहायता क्युकी of उनके विज़ुअल disabilities, विभिन्न सरकारी jurisdictions have प्रतिपादित अधिक जटिल परिभाषाएं referred to as legal blindness.
In North America and most of यूरोपीय, विधिक दृष्टिहीनता is पारिभाषित as विज़ुअल तीक्ष्णता ( दृष्टि ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better eye with best correction possible.
This means that a legally blind individual would have to stand इससे an ऑब्जेक्ट to देखिए it—with corrective lenses —with the वही उपाधि of स्पष्टता as a सामान्यतः sighted person could from.
In many areas, लोगों साथ औसत तीक्ष्णता जो nonetheless have a विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड of कम than 20 डिग्री ( the norm being 180 degrees ) are also classified as being legally blind.
Approximately ten percent of those deemed legally अँधा, by कोई माप, have no vision.
The बाकी have कुछ दृष्टि, इससे लाइट बोध alone to relatively good acuity.
कम दृष्टि is sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe विज़ुअल acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
By the 10th Revision of the WHO International Statistical Classification of Diseases, Injuries and Causes of Death, low vision is defined as visual acuity of less than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), लकिन बराबर to or बेहतर than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड घाटा to कम than 20 डिग्री, in the better eye with best possible correction.
Blindness is defined as visual acuity of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड घाटा to कम than 10 डिग्री, in the बेहतर नजर साथ बेहतरीन संभावित सुधार.
Blind people with undamaged eyes may still register लाइट non-visually लिये the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark cycle.
Light सिग्नल लिये इस purpose सफर through the retinohypothalamic ट्रैक्ट और हैं नहीं प्रभावित by optic nerve damage beyond where the retinohypothalamic tract exits.
Earl Simmons ( born December 18, 1970 ), better known by his stage names dmx और अंधेरा man x, is an अमरीकी rapper और actor.
In 1999, DMX released उसके best-selling एल्बम... और तब वहीँ थी x, जिससे featured the hit single `` Party Up ( Up in Here ) ``.
He has acted in films ऐसे as पेट, रोमियो जरूर die, निकास wounds, Cradle 2 The Grave, and Last Hour.
In 2006, he starred in the reality television series, which was primarily aired on the शर्त केबल टेलीविज़न संजाल.
In 2003, DMX published a book of उसके memoirs हकदार, e.a.r.l. : the आत्मकथा of DMX.
DMX released a mixtape the तौल in as a prelude/promotion towards उसके album Undisputed ( 2012 ).
DMX has sold over 30 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसे एक of the best-selling hip-hop कलाकारों of सब time.
Professional certification, trade certification, or पेशेवर नामांकन, प्रायः पुकारा बस प्रमाणन or योग्यता, is a नामांकन अर्जित by a व्यक्ति to assure योग्यता to perform a job or task.
Not all certifications that उपयोग post-nominal अक्षर हैं an स्वीकृति of शैक्षणिक उपलब्धि, or an एजेंसी नियुक्त to safeguard the public interest.
बग बनी is a मजेदार एनिमल कार्टून अक्षर, बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ in the looney धुनें और merrie melodies series of theatrical short films produced by Warner Bros. during the Golden age of American animation.
His popularity दौरान इस era led to उसके बनने a corporate mascot of Warner Bros. Entertainment.
Bugs is an anthropomorphic gray hare or rabbit who is famous for his flippant, व्यक्तित्व, a सुनाया नई यॉर्क एक्सेंट, उसके portrayal as a trickster, and his catch phrase `` Eh...
What 's up, दस्तावेज़ ? ''
( प्रायः कहा जबकि चबाने a carrot ).
Bugs has appeared in more films than any other cartoon अक्षर और is the नवीं सबसे portrayed फिल्मी व्यक्तित्व in the world.
According to his 1990 `` जीवनी '' बग बनी : 50 सालो और तभी एक धूसर हरे, बग थी born on July 27, 1940 in Brooklyn, New York in a warren under Ebbets Field, home of the Brooklyn Dodgers.
In वास्तविकता, he थी brought to जीवन by the animators और स्टाफ of लिओन schlesinger प्रोडक्शन्स ( बाद warner भाईs. cartoons ) : सहित टेक्स एवेरी, जो निर्देशित बग ' जल्दी निर्णायक छोटी A Wild Hare ( 1940 ) ; Robert McKimson, who created Bugs ' definitive character design ; and Mel Blanc, who originated the voice of Bugs.
The mucous membranes ( or mucosae or mucosas ; एकवचन mucosa ) हैं linings of ज़्यादातर endodermal उत्पत्ति, covered in epithelium, which are involved in absorption and secretion.
They line cavities that are exposed to the external पर्यावरण और आतंरिक अंगों.
They are at several places contiguous साथ स्किन : at the नथुनों, the होठ of the मुँह, the eyelids, the कानों, the genital area, and the anus.
The sticky, thick द्रव स्रावित by the श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों and glands is termed mucus.
The term mucous झिल्ली refers to जहाँ वे हैं मिला in the देह and not every mucous membrane secretes mucus.
The glans clitoridis, glans penis ( head of the शिश्न ), साथ साथ the अंदर of the अग्रत्वचा और the clitoral हुड, are mucous membranes.
The urethra is भी a श्लेष्मक झिल्ली.
the स्रावित mucus फंदा the pathogens in the देह, preventing any further activities of diseases.
A master sergeant is the सैन्य रैंक लिये a वरिष्ठ non-commissioned अधिकारी in कुछ हथियारबंद forces.
Cake is a रूप of ब्रैड or bread-like खाना.
In its आधुनिक फ़ॉर्म, it is typically a मीठी baked मिठाई.
In its oldest फ़ॉर्म, cakes यहूद सामान्यतः fried breads or cheesecakes, और सामान्यतः had a disk shape.
Determining whether a दिए खाना चाहिए be वर्गीकृत as ब्रैड, केक, or पेस्ट्री can be difficult.
Modern cake, विशेषकर परत cakes, सामान्यतः contain a संयोजन of आटा, शुगर, अंडे, और मक्खन or आयल, साथ कुछ किस्में भी requiring liquid ( typically milk or water ) and leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking powder ).
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées, nuts, dried or candied fruit, or extracts हैं प्रायः added, और numerous substitutions लिये the primary ingredients are possible.
Cakes are often filled with fruit preserves or मिठाई sauces ( जैसे पेस्ट्री मलाई ), आइस्ड साथ buttercream or अन्य icings, और सजा साथ marzipan, piped borders or candied fruit.
केक is प्रायः the मिठाई of चुनाव लिये meals at ceremonial अवसरों, विशेषकर weddings, anniversaries, and birthdays.
There are countless cake recipes ; कुछ हैं bread-like, कुछ समृद्ध और विस्तृत, और अनेक हैं सदियां old.
Cake making is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at one time considerable labor गई into केक बनाना ( विशेषकर the whisking of अंडा foams ), बेकिंग उपकरण और दिशानिर्देश have महरूम सरलीकृत so कि भी the सबसे amateur cook may bake a cake.
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker Messner ( March 7, 1942 – July 20, 2007 ) थी an अमरीकी ईसाई सिंगर, इंजीलवादी, उद्योगों, लेखक, बात दिखाएँ मेजबान, और टेलीविज़न personality.
She was शादीशुदा इससे 1961 to 1992 to televangelist, और बाद convicted felon, Jim Bakker.
She co-hosted साथ उसे on the PTL Club ( 1976–1987 ).
She was a participant in the 2004 ऋतु of the वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the surreal Life.
Cambria is a village in Columbia काउंटी, विस्कॉन्सिन, संयुक्त राज्य.
The population was 767 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is भाग of the मैडिसन महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
Public policy is the principled guide to कार्रवाई लिया by the प्रशासनिक कार्यपालिका शाखाओं of the राज्य साथ लिहाज़ to a क्लास of मुद्दे in a manner consistent with law and institutional customs.
In general, the foundation is the pertinent national और substantial संवैधानिक विधि और implementing विधान ऐसे as the US Federal code.
Further substrates शामिल दोनो न्यायिक interpretations और regulations जिससे हैं generally authorized by legislation.
Other scholars define it as a system of `` courses of action, नियामक उपायों, कानून, और funding प्राथमिकताएं concerning a दिए टॉपिक promulgated by a governmental entity or its representatives. ''
Public policy is commonly समाविष्ट `` in constitutions, विधान acts, and judicial decisions. ''
in the संयुक्त राज्य, इस अवधारणा refers नहीं तभी to the परिणाम of नीतियों, लकिन अधिक broadly to the decision-making and analysis of governmental decisions.
As an academic discipline, पब्लिक नीति is पढ़ाई by professors और विद्यार्थी at पब्लिक नीति स्कूलों of major universities throughout the country.
The U.S. professional association of public policy practitioners, शोधकर्ताओं, विद्वानों, और विद्यार्थी is the संघ लिये पब्लिक नीति विश्लेषण and Management.
Digestion is the mechanical और रासायनिक विश्लेषण of खाना into छोटी components कि हैं अधिक easily अवशोषित into a blood stream, for instance.
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a विश्लेषण of विशाल खाना अणुओं to छोटी ones.
When food enters the मुँह, पाचन of the खाना starts by the कार्रवाई of mastication, a रूप of mechanical digestion, and the wetting contact of saliva.
लार, a द्रव स्रावित by the salivary ग्रंथियों, contains salivary amylase, an enzyme which starts the digestion of starch in the food.
After undergoing mastication और मंड पाचन, the खाना होगा be in the form of a small, round slurry mass called a bolus.
It will then travel bas the ग्रासनाल और into the पेट by the कार्रवाई of peristalsis.
Gastric juice in the पेट starts प्रोटीन पाचन.
Gastric juice मुख्यतः contains हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड और pepsin.
As these two chemicals may damage the stomach wall, mucus is स्रावित by the पेट, providing a slimy परत कि अधिनियमों as a शील्ड विरूद्ध the damaging प्रभाव of the रसायन.
At the same time protein digestion is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, जिससे हैं लहरें of muscular contractions कि मूव साथ the पेट wall.
This allows the द्रव्यमान of खाना to further mix with the digestive enzymes.
After some time ( typically an hour or two in इंसानो, 4–6 घंटों in कुत्तो, somewhat shorter अवधि in हाउस बिल्लियों ), the resulting मोटा द्रव is called chyme.
When the pyloric sphincter valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum जहाँ it mixes साथ digestive एंजाइमों इससे the pancreas, and then passes through the small intestine, in which digestion continues.
When the chyme is fully पचता, it is अवशोषित into the blood.
95 % of अवशोषण of nutrients occurs in the छोटी intestine.
Water and minerals are reabsorbed वापस into the रक्त in the कोलन ( विशाल आंत ) जहाँ the ph is थोड़ा अम्लीय परिचय 5.6 ~ 6.9.
Some vitamins, such as biotin और विटामिन k ( k2mk7 ) उत्पादित by जीवाणु in the colon are also absorbed into the blood in the colon.
Waste material is eliminated इससे the मलाशय during defecation.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग of इंग्लैण्ड इससे 21 अप्रैल 1509 जबतक उसके मौत.
He was lord, and later king, of Ireland, as well as continuing the नाममात्र अर्जी by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the किंगडम of फ़्रांस.
हेनरी थी the दूसरी monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding his father, Henry VII.
Besides his six marriages, Henry VIII is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक Church.
हेनरी 's struggles साथ रोम led to the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a आस्तिक in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं, भी बाद उसके excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor, Maximillian i, और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल, well-equipped फौज, लकिन हासिल छोटी at a considerable वित्तीय cost.
Maximillian, for his part, प्रयुक्त the अंग्रेज़ी आक्रमण to उसके अपना ends, और इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's ability to defeat the French.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession लिये हेनरी, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the महत्वपूर्ण नगर of boulogne, लकिन again the पावन रोमन सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, समर्थित हेनरी only as long as he needed to and England, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive, educated and संपन्नता किंग, और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` एक of the सबसे charismatic शासकों to बैठना on the अंग्रेज़ी सिंहासन ''.
Besides ruling with निरपेक्ष शक्ति, he भी सगाई खुद as an लेखक and composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a बेटी होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led to the दो बाते लिये जिससे हेनरी is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
He is अक्सर characterised in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) हैं an afro-cuban percussion instrument.
The drums are of अलग आकार : the larger ढोल is पुकारा in स्पेनी the hembra ( मादा ) and the smaller the macho ( male ).
They are membranophones, or यंत्र कि बनाएँ ध्वनि by a vibration of a stretched membrane.
Different religious groups include different किताबे in उनके biblical canons, in varying आदेश, और sometimes divide or combine किताबे, or चरितार्थ अतिरिक्त material into canonical books.
Christian Bibles range from the sixty-six किताबे of the प्रोटोस्टेंट canon to the eighty-one किताबे of the ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church canon.
The Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four किताबे विभाजित into तीन भाग ; the पाँच किताबे of the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' or `` law '' ), the Nevi'im ( `` prophets '' ), and the Ketuvim ( `` writings '' ).
The first part of Christian Bibles is the Old वसीयत, जिससे contains, at न्यूनतम, the twenty-four किताबे of the यहूदी बाइबल विभाजित into thirty-nine किताबे और ordered differently from the Hebrew Bible.
The Catholic Church and Eastern Christian churches भी थाम निश्चित deuterocanonical किताबे और passages to be भाग of the बूढ़ा वसीयत canon.
The second part is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books ; the चार canonical gospels, अधिनियमों of the रसूलों, twenty-one epistles or अक्षर और the किताब of Revelation.
The Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox और पूर्वी कैथोलिक चर्च may have नाबालिग differences in their lists of accepted books.
The सूची दिए यहाँ लिये ये चर्च is the सबसे समावेशी : if at तनिक एक पूर्वी church accepts the book it is included here.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of रेड ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing पचास छोटी, श्वेत, five-pointed सितारों arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of छह सितारों ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ पंक्ति of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका और the 13 धारियाँ represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames for the flag शामिल the `` सितारों और धारियाँ '', `` बूढ़ा महिमा ``, and `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
Dred Scott v. sandford,, भी ज्ञात as the dred स्कॉट निर्णय, थी a लैंडमार्क decision by the U.S. Supreme Court.
It made दो प्रमुख rulings.
The first ruling was कि african-americans यहूद नहीं नागरिकों, और इसलिए था no खड़ा to sue in federal court.
The second ruling was that the संघीय सरकारी था no शक्ति to विनियमित गुलामी in कोई territory acquired subsequent to the creation of the United States.
Given the first ruling, most scholars and अनेक समकालीन राजनैतिक आंकड़े ( सहित the नेतृत्व of the then-new रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ) माना कि the दूसरी सत्ताधारी was not binding precedent, but mere dictum.
The rationale of the Supreme Court regarding the jurisdictional सत्ताधारी implied कि लोगों of अफ़्रीकी descent ( दोनो स्लेव और फ़्री ) यहूद नहीं सुरक्षित by the संविधान और यहूद not U.S. citizens.
Since ड्योढ़ी of the 14th amendment to the u.S. संविधान, दोनो rulings हैं superseded and no longer valid precedent.
Nonetheless, the case retains ऐतिहासिक significance as it is widely regarded as the worst निर्णय ever made by the Supreme Court.
The opinion of the अदालत, लिखा by मुख्य इंसाफ रोजर B. taney, stirred debate.
The decision was 7–2, and every इंसाफ besides taney लिखा a पृथक concurrence or dissent.
For the first time चूंकि marbury v. मैडिसन, the अदालत आयोजित an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस to be unconstitutional.
Dred स्कॉट, an african-american स्लेव, था पूछा a संयुक्त राज्य सर्किट अदालत to पुरस्कार उसे उसके स्वतंत्रता क्युकी he और उसके निपुण था resided in a राज्य ( इलिनोइस ) and a territory ( Wisconsin Territory ) where slavery had been banned.
Chief Justice Roger Taney, writing for the court, आयोजित कि स्कॉट, as a व्यक्ति of अफ़्रीकी ancestry, थी नहीं a नागरिक of the संयुक्त राज्य और इसलिए था no right to sue in federal court.
This holding was contrary to the अभ्यास of numerous राज्य at the समय, विशेषकर फ़्री राज्य, जहाँ फ़्री अश्वेतों did in fact enjoy the rights of citizens, such as the right to vote and hold public office.
In what is sometimes considered mere obiter dictum, the Court went on to hold that Congress had no authority to prohibit गुलामी in संघीय territories क्युकी स्लेव हैं निजी प्रॉपर्टी और the पांचवां amendment to the संविधान protects प्रॉपर्टी स्वामी विरूद्ध पिछडे of उनके property without due process of law.
in reaching इस निर्णय, taney था hoped to settle the growing controversy surrounding slavery in the United States, but it had the opposite effect.
The decision was fiercely debated आरपार the देश, as शायद best exemplified by the Lincoln–Douglas debates of 1858.
Abraham Lincoln, the second-ever रिपब्लिकन nominee लिये अध्यक्ष, थी समर्थ to जीत the अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of slavery was a key Republican party plank.
the निर्णय निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the समय of राज्य secession और the सिविल युद्ध, हालांकि it is चरम to say the decision `` caused '' the war.
The decision is acknowledged for the influential भूमिका it निभाई in altering the नेशनल राजनैतिक लैंडस्केप : it is credited साथ शुभारंभ अब्राहम lincoln’s नेशनल political career and ultimately allowing for his election.
Although the Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case, the Court stated in the slaughter-house मामले कि at तनिक एक भाग of it था already महरूम overruled by the fourteenth amendment in 1868, जिससे begins by stating, `` सब व्यक्तियों born or देशीयकृत in the संयुक्त राज्य, और विषय to the क्षेत्राधिकार thereof, are citizens of the United States and of the State wherein they reside. ''
To जिससे the अदालत noted:
The first observation we have to make on this clause is, कि it puts at बाकी दोनो the सवाल जिससे we stated to have been the subject of differences of opinion.
It declares that persons may be नागरिकों of the संयुक्त राज्य बगैर लिहाज़ to उनके नागरिकता of a particular राज्य, और it overturns the dred स्कॉट निर्णय by making all persons born within the United States and subject to its jurisdiction citizens of the United States.
वहीँ हैं दर्जनों of पड़ोस in Columbus, Ohio.
Some हैं मुश्किल to define, as वे encompass विशाल क्षेत्रों विकसित at अलग times—often with sub-neighborhoods within them.
Borders can also change based on लोकप्रिय समझना of the क्षेत्रफल, as खूब as the whims of the निवासियों.
This आलेख उपयोग आंकड़ा इससे the datasourcecolumbus वेब साईट, spotcrime.com, HelloColumbus.com, as well as the various Columbus Area Commissions to define the various areas.
Excerpts and border information are drawn directly इससे the प्रमुख आलेख.
A biologist is a scientist जो अध्ययन जीना जीवों और उनके relationship to their environment.
Biologists शामिल in मौलिक शोध attempt to discover underlying mechanisms कि govern how organisms work.
Biologists involved in applied research attempt to develop or improve चिकित्सा, औद्योगिक or agricultural प्रक्रियाओं.
Martinus विलेम beijerinck, a वनस्पतिशास्त्री और microbiologist
Base कूद इससे a चट्टान in a wingsuit.
BASE jumping, also sometimes written as B.A.S.E. jumping, is an activity where भागीदार जम्प इससे फिक्स्ड वस्तुएँ और उपयोग a पैराशूट to ब्रेक उनके पतन.
`` BASE '' is an acronym that stands for four श्रेणी of फिक्स्ड वस्तुएँ इससे जिससे एक can जम्प : इमारतें, एन्टेना, spans ( पुलों ), and earth ( cliffs ).
The अंग्रेजों shorthair is a domesticated बिल्ली जिनकी सुविधाएँ make it a popular breed in cat shows.
It has been the most popular breed of cat registered by the UK 's शासी परिषद of the बिल्ली फैंसी ( gccf ) चूंकि 2001, जब it overtook the Persian breed.
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National Team, commonly ज्ञात as the संयुक्त राज्य मेन 's नेशनल बास्केट टोली, represents the संयुक्त राज्य of America in international men 's basketball.
The USA is the most successful टोली in अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिता, जीतना medals in सब सत्रह ओलम्पिक tournaments it has entered, coming away with fourteen golds.
Two of its gold medal-winning squads were inducted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame as टीमों in अगस्त 2010—the 1960 टोली, जिससे प्रदर्शित छह हॉल of famers ( 4 खिलाड़ी, 2 कोच ), और the 1992 `` सपना टोली '', featuring 14 हॉल of famers ( 11 खिलाड़ी, 3 coaches ).
the संयुक्त राज्य is फिलहाल क्रमित पहला in the FIBA World Rankings.
Traditionally composed of amateur खिलाड़ी, a 1989 नियम बदलें by fiba अनुमत यूएसए बास्केट to फ़ील्ड टीमों with professional players.
The पहला ऐसे टोली, ज्ञात as the `` सपना टोली '', जीती the gold medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain, playing in the final against Croatia.
With the परिचय of पेशेवर, the टोली थी समर्थ to चिंगारी a दूसरी run of dominance after capturing only a bronze medal in 1988.
A team of professional खिलाड़ी competed at the 1994 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप, finishing पहला.
In 1996, 2000, 2008, और 2012 the यूएसए again captured सुनहरा medals.
Facing increased competition, the USA विफल to जीत a पदक at the 2002 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप, finishing sixth.
The 2004 Summer Olympic team lost three games on its way to a bronze medal, a record that represented more नुकसान in a सिंगल साल than the देश 's ओलम्पिक टीमों था suffered in सब पिछला olympiads संयुक्त.
Determined to put an समाप्त to ये असफलताओं, यूएसए बास्केट initiated a long-term प्रोजेक्ट aimed at creating better, more cohesive teams.
The USA won its first seven खेल at the 2006 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप in जापानी पहले खोने विरूद्ध यूनानियों in the semi-finals, समाप्ति the प्रतियोगिता with the bronze medal.
The USA won gold two years बाद, हालांकि, at the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक साथ a प्रबल प्रदर्शन.
This success was followed up at the 2010 FIBA संसार चैंपियनशिप, जहाँ despite क्षेत्ररक्षण a रोस्टर featuring no खिलाड़ी इससे the 2008 ओलम्पिक टोली, the यूएसए किया not lose a single game en route to defeating host Turkey for the gold medal.
The USA continued this streak of dominance by going अपराजित और capturing सुनहरा एकबार अधिक at the 2012 गर्मियाँ Olympics.

Joe Theismann 's सुपर कटोरी रिंग ( सही )
The Super Bowl ring is an पुरस्कार in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग दिए to the विजेता of the लीग 's सालाना World Championship game, the Super Bowl.
Since only one Vince Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the team ( ownership ) itself, the सुपर कटोरी रिंग offers a collectible memento लिये the वास्तविक खिलाड़ी और टोली सदस्यों to रखना लिये themselves to symbolize the विजय.
