to दृश्य लेबल्स.
The Witch 's उंगली in the carlsbad caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` छोड़ने, trickling '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem कि उदय इससे the मंजिल of a चूना गुफा due to the टपकता of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate.
This stalagmite formation occurs तभी अंतर्गत निश्चित ph शर्तें भीतर the भूमिगत cavern.
The corresponding formation on the छत of a गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalactite.
If ये formations grow साथ, the result is known as a column.
The हॉल of दिग्गज in the carlsbad Caverns
stalagmites चाहिए सामान्यतः नहीं be छुआ, चूंकि the चट्टान buildup is formed by खनिज precipitating आउट of the जल समाधान onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the surface where the mineral water will cling, thus affecting the growth of the formation.
Oils and dirt from human सम्पर्क can भी दाग the गठन और बदलें इसके रंग permanently.
Similar structures can also form in लावा tubes, संबद्ध साथ कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles, हालांकि the यांत्रिकी of गठन is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can भी रूप on कंक्रीट ceilings और floors, हालांकि वे रूप much अधिक rapidly there than in the natural cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the संसार is ऊँची और is स्तिथ in the गुफा of cueva मार्टिन Infierno, Cuba.
In the Zagros Mountains of south Iran, approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur, in the shapur गुफा on the चौथी of पाँच बरामदा स्टैंड the 3rd सदी ce प्रतिमा of Shapur I, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved from एक stalagmite, is nearly ऊँची.
How I मिले अपना माँ is an अमरीकी sitcom कि premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
The show was निर्मित by क्रेग थामस और कार्टर Bays.
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030, जब टेड mosby ( voiced by bob saget ) gathers उसके बेटी ( lyndsy fonseca ) और son ( David Henrie ) to tell them the story of how he met their mother.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends from wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों, मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन सेगल ), a विधि छात्र, और लिली एल्ड्रिन ( alyson हनिंगन ), a किंडरगार्टन टीचर, जो have महरूम डेटिंग for almost nine years when Marshall proposes.
Their engagement causes Ted to सोचो परिचय ढूंढना उसके अपना आत्मा mate, much to the disgust of उसके dost बार्नी stinson ( neil पैट्रिक हैरिस ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
And thus, Ted begins his ढूंढें लिये उसके पूर्ण mate, और meets रोबिन scherbatsky ( कोबी स्मल्डर्स ), whom he also befriends.
The 100th episode of कैसा i मिले अपना माँ aired on जनवरी 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the श्रेणी was renewed for a ninth season.
On January 30, 2013, it थी घोषित कि ऋतु 9 होगा be इसके फाइनल ऋतु.
Gringo (,, ) is a slang Spanish और पुर्तगाली शब्द प्रयुक्त in ibero-america, to denote विदेशियों, प्रायः इससे the United States.
The term can be लागू to किसी जो is दरअसल a foreigner, or it can denote a strong association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture.
In Spanish it does नहीं have a ऋणात्मक connotation.
Roger axtell, a सफर तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ, टीप कि `` [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word.
It is कठबोली लकिन is अपमानजनक तभी in its use and context. ''
The word was प्रयुक्त in स्पेन long पहले it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote विदेशी, non-native speakers of Spanish.
The great white shark, Carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great white, श्वेत सूचक, श्वेत शार्क, or श्वेत मौत, is a प्रजाति of विशाल lamniform शार्क जिससे can be मिला in the तटीय सतह waters of सब the major oceans.
The great white shark is मुख्यतः ज्ञात लिये इसके आकार, साथ the largest individuals ज्ञात to have approached or exceeded in length, and in weight.
This shark पहुँच इसके परिपक्वता around 15 सालो of आयु और can have a life span of over 30 years.
The great white शार्क is arguably the संसार 's largest ज्ञात extant macropredatory मछली, और is एक of the primary predators of marine mammals.
It is also ज्ञात to शिकार upon a किस्में of अन्य समुद्री पशु, including fish and seabirds.
It is the only known surviving प्रजाति of इसके genus carcharodon, और is क्रमित पहला in having the most attacks on humans.
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species, जबकि it is शामिल in परिशिष्ट ii of cites.
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर फिल्मी by स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग चित्रित the ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
In वास्तविकता, इंसानो हैं नहीं the पसन्दीदा शिकार of the great white shark.
The संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the सैन्य शक्तियां of the United States of America.
They consist of the फौज, नेवी, समुद्री corps, एयर फ़ोर्स, और Coast Guard.
The U.S. has a strong परंपरा of civilian कंट्रोल of the military.
The President is the military 's overall head, and helps form military policy साथ the u.S. विभाग of रक्षा ( dod ), a संघीय कार्यपालिका विभाग, एक्टिंग as the प्रिंसिपल अंग by which military policy is carried out.
The DoD is headed by the सचिव of रक्षा, जो is a civilian और Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is second in the सैन्य 's कड़ी of कमांड, बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष, और serves as the प्रिंसिपल सहायक to the President in all DoD-related matters.
To coordinate military action with diplomacy, the अध्यक्ष रै an सलाहकार नेशनल सुरक्षा परिषद headed by a National Security Advisor.
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint Chiefs of स्टाफ, जिससे शामिल the सिर of प्रत्येक of the रक्षा विभाग 's सेवा शाखाओं as खूब as the मुख्य of the National Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त chiefs of Staff and the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
The कमांडेंट of the coast गार्ड is नहीं a सदस्य of the संयुक्त Chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions, under the एकीकृत combatant कमांड, अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the सचिव of रक्षा साथ the exception of the Coast Guard.
The coast गार्ड जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the प्रशासन of the विभाग of मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives its operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the विभाग of the नेवी by the अध्यक्ष or कॉंग्रेस दौरान a समय of war.
All five armed सेवाएं हैं among the सात uniformed सेवाएं of the संयुक्त राज्य ; the अन्य हैं the u.S. पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य सेवा commissioned corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps.
From the time of its inception, the military निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका in the इतिहास of the United States.
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as a परिणाम of विजय in the पहला barbary युद्ध और the दूसरी barbary War.
Even so, the Founders were suspicious of a permanent military force and not until the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया a विशाल खड़ा फौज become officially स्थापित.
The National Security Act of 1947, adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset, created the आधुनिक u.S. सैन्य फ्रेमवर्क ; the अधिनियम मिलाया previously cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the विभाग of the नेवी into the नेशनल सैन्य स्थापना ( renamed the विभाग of रक्षा in 1949 ), headed by the सचिव of रक्षा ; और निर्मित the विभाग of the Air Force and National Security Council.
The U.S. military is one of the largest militaries in शर्तें of क्रमांक of कर्मियों.
It draws its manpower from a large pool of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक ; हालांकि conscription रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in the पास्ट in विभिन्न times of both war and peace, it has not been used since 1972.
As of 2013, the u.S. खर्च परिचय $ 554.2 अरब annually to निधि इसके सैन्य शक्तियां, और appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations.
Put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 प्रतिशत of the संसार 's सैन्य expenditures.
The U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced and शक्तिशाली उपकरण, साथ साथ फैली अवस्थिति of शक्तियां around the संसार, giving उन्हें significant सामर्थ्य in both defense and power projection.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's राय और विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to प्राप्त उन्हें.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं, as साथ मानहानि, बदनामी, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( सहित, लिये उदाहरण inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of अभिव्यक्ति is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश, प्राप्त और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in लिखने or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` खास कर्तव्य और जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is मिला to कारण धार्मिक ठोकर, ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों जातिगत और धार्मिक Hatred Act 2006.
The बिग बंग सिद्धान्त लोगो.
The Big Bang Theory is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और Bill Prady.
Like the name of the श्रेणी itself, साथ the एक्सेप्शन of the पहला episode— '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ साथ `` the '' और resemble the नाम of a वैज्ञानिक principle, सिद्धान्त or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 एपीसोड have aired.
The Big Bang Theory has been नवीनीकृत लिये a सातवाँ ऋतु.
Dwight David `` Ike '' आइज़नहावर ( सुनाया, ; अक्तूबर 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the United States from 1953 until 1961.
He had previously been a five-star general in the United राज्य फौज दौरान संसार युद्ध ii और परोसा as परम् कमांडर of the अलाइड शक्तियां in यूरोपीय ; he था जिम्मेदारी लिये नियोजन और supervising the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन मशाल in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front.
In 1951, he became the first परम् कमांडर of नाटो.
आइज़नहावर थी of पेन्सिलवेनिया डच ancestry और थी reared in a विशाल परिवार in कान्सास by अभिभावक साथ a robust work ethic and religious background.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल जिससे instilled self-reliance.
He attended और ग्रैजुएट इससे वेस्ट पाइंट और बाद शादीशुदा and had two sons.
After World War II, आइज़नहावर परोसा as फौज मुख्य of स्टाफ अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन, तब assumed the पोस्ट of अध्यक्ष at Columbia University.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 अध्यक्षीय रेस as a रिपब्लिकन to काउंटर the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` Communism, Korea and corruption ''.
He won by a भूस्खलन, defeating डेमोक्रेट adlai stevenson और समाप्ति दो decades of the New Deal Coalition.
In the first year of his presidency, Eisenhower अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953 ईरानी तख्तापलट d'état और प्रयुक्त नाभिकीय threats to conclude the Korean War with China.
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the funding for conventional military शक्तियां ; the लक्ष्य थी to रखना दबाव on the सोवियत संघ और reduce संघीय deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino सिद्धान्त in उसके वर्णन of the threat प्रस्तुत by the spread of communism.
The Congress agreed to his निवेदन in 1955 लिये the formosa रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे सक्रिय उसे to prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध चाइनीज राष्ट्रवादियों और स्थापित the u.S. policy of defending Taiwan.
When the Soviets शुभारम्भ sputnik in 1957, he था to खेल catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced Israel, the uk, और फ़्रांस to समाप्त उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान the स्वेज संकट of 1956.
In 1958, he भेजा 15,000 us सैनिकों to लेबनान to prevent the pro-western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
Near the end of his term, his efforts to set up a समिट बैठक साथ the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the u-2 घटना.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of mccarthyism by खुलकर invoking the आधुनिक विस्तारित संस्करण of कार्यपालिका privilege.
he वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक कार्यकलाप to his Vice President, Richard Nixon.
He was a moderate रूढ़िवादी जो जारी नई सौदे एजेंसियों and expanded Social Security.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among many invaluable आउटपुट ; the नेशनल aeronautics और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ), ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण डिस्कवरी in स्पेस ; the स्थापना of दमदार विज्ञान शिक्षा via the नेशनल रक्षा शिक्षा अधिनियम ; और प्रोत्साहित शांतिपूर्ण उपयोग of नाभिकीय शक्ति via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act.
In social policy, he भेजा संघीय सैनिकों to छोटी चट्टान, अरकंसास, लिये the पहला समय चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण to enforce संघीय अदालत orders to desegregate public schools.
He also signed civil rights legislation in 1957 और 1960 to protect the सही to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां in दो सालो और made five appointments to the Supreme Court.
He was the first term-limited अध्यक्ष in accordance साथ the 22nd amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones for the most part and देखी considerable आर्थिक समृद्धि मगर लिये a शार्प मंदी in 1958–59.
Eisenhower is प्रायः क्रमित अत्यधिक among the u.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the official air traffic control call चिह्न of a संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान carrying the अध्यक्ष of the United States.
In common parlance the पद refers to those एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान specifically designed, निर्मित, और प्रयुक्त लिये the purpose of transporting the president.
The अध्यक्षीय वायुयान is a prominent प्रतीक of the अमरीकी presidency and its power.
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President arose in 1943, जब officials of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां – the पूर्ववर्ती to the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स – became चिंतित साथ relying on वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइंस to transport the President.
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured लिये उपयोग as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however, it थी अस्वीकृत by the रहस्य सेवा amid चिंताएं over the aircraft 's safety record.
a c-54 skymaster थी तब परिवर्तित लिये अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; इस वायुयान, उतावले the पवित्र गाय, transported अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to the Yalta Conference in February 1945, and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
the `` एयर फ़ोर्स एक '' कॉल चिह्न थी निर्मित बाद a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign.
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet, सहित दो बोइंग 707s introduced in the 1960s और 1970s, क्रमशः ; चूंकि 1990, the अध्यक्षीय बेड़े रै consisted of दो बोइंग vc-25as – specifically विन्यस्त, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the दो vc-25 वायुयान साथ तीन बदलना वायुयान beginning in 2017.
A wedding anniversary is the वर्षगांठ of the तिथि a विवाह took प्लेस.
Traditional names मौजूद लिये सबसे of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण, 50 सालो of विवाह is पुकारा a `` सुनहरी wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary ''.
a स्कैनर साथ duplexing स्वचालित Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one मुद्रक, फैक्स मशीने, photocopiers और scanners, an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or adf is a विशेषता जिससे takes अनेक पृष्ठों और फ़ीड्स the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, and thereby copy, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page.
सबसे copiers allow स्कैनिंग on the फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a document feeder.
The vast majority of fax मशीने have an adf, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, some fax यंत्र स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र as a स्कैनर, faxing multi-page documents to themselves.
Document feeders are described by गति, in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट or ppm, और क्षमता, प्रायः in a दायरा from 10 sheets to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or radf scans एक पक्ष of a पेज, तब flips it और scans the अन्य पक्ष.
A duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or dadf scans दोनो पहलू in one pass.
The advantage of the dadf is तेज़ गति लिये two-sided originals.
radfs और dadfs हैं रेटेड in बिंब प्रति मिनट ( ipm ), the क्रमांक of पहलू they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational और शैक्षणिक जटिल located in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
The complex is पंजीकृत as a डलास लैंडमार्क, नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क और is घर to नौ संग्रहालय, छह प्रदर्शन सुविधाएं, a लैगून, और the largest Ferris wheel in North America.
Many of the buildings on the complex were constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial exposition in 1936 जिससे खींचा over six million visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still जीवित और it is पहचाना as a significant उदाहरण of Art Deco architecture.
Fair पार्क रै महरूम designated a ग्रेट प्लेस in अमेरिका by the American Planning Association.
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is an स्वतंत्र, not-for-profit शैक्षणिक संगठन that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
the ग्रेट स्थान in अमरीकी कार्यक्रम helps to celebrate क्षेत्रों with “exemplary character, quality, and planning.”
होने designated as a ग्रेट प्लेस in अमेरिका, Fair Park was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011.
सैन जोस ( ; स्पेनी : st. जोसेफ ) is the third-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the tenth-largest in the u.S., और the काउंटी सीट of सांता क्लारा काउंटी which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay.
San Jose is the largest नगर भीतर सिलिकॉन घाटी, जिससे is a प्रमुख घटक of the वृहद सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, a प्रदेश of 8.4 million people and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States.
It is the largest नगर in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
San Jose was founded on November 29, 1777, as el pueblo de सैन जोस de guadalupe, the पहला civilian कस्बा in the स्पेनी उपनिवेश of नुएवा California, which later became Alta California.
The city served as a farming community to support स्पेनी सैन्य संस्थापना at सैन फ्रांसिस्को and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, सैन जोस परोसा as इसके पहला capital.
After more than 150 years as a small farming city, San Jose and the surrounding सांता क्लारा घाटी became the पिछला ( और largest ) संलग्न क्षेत्रफल of अविकसित जमीन surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose experienced increased माँग लिये आवास इससे सैनिको और दिग्गजों returning from World War II.
San जोस तब जारी इसके आक्रामक विस्तार दौरान the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area.
The rapid growth of the high-technology और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स उद्योग further त्वरित the परिवर्तन इससे an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San Jose 's location within the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग अर्जित the नगर इसके उपनाम, पूंजी of सिलिकॉन Valley.
San Jose now maintains वैश्विक नगर औकात और is the largest नगर in the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी, जमीन क्षेत्रफल, और औद्योगिक development.
The U.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of April 2013, the अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of San Jose was 984,000.
San Jose, along with the Santa क्लारा घाटी, अनुभवी परिचय हाफ a सदी of spectacular suburban sprawl, साथ विशेषताएँ of तीव्र शहरी similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite कदम to avoid बनने `` l.A. उत्तर ''.
However, the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by उपायों ऐसे as जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व और पब्लिक पारगमन सुरक्षा, निवेश, and ridership.
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer अब्राहम ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent चूंकि it थी पहला आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स to उपस्थित, साथ the पहला होमो sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय came during the paleolithic era.
the आगमन of कृषि around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age.
Neolithic Europe lasted लिये 4000 सालो, अतिव्यापी साथ metal-using संस्कृतियों कि धीरे स्प्रेड throughout the continent.
technological अग्रिम दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक आयु tended to arrive इससे the Middle East, spreading gradually to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय यहूद मिनोआई और माइसीनियाई, जिससे flourished दौरान the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता began साथ the वृद्धि of the city-states of Ancient Greece.
Greek influence reached इसके zenith अंतर्गत the expansive साम्राज्य of सिकंदर the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western यूरोपीय यहूद वर्चस्व by the la tène संस्कृति, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC, would grow to become the रोमन गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता सफल यूनानी संस्कृति as the प्रबल भूमध्यसागरीय civilization.
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the गणतंत्र into the रोमन साम्राज्य.
The empire थी बाद विभाजित by the सम्राट diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires.
During the later years of the Roman Empire, the Germanic peoples of उत्तरी यूरोपीय grew in शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in ad 476, a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks the समाप्त of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages.
During the मध्य आयु, the पूर्वी रोमन साम्राज्य बच, हालांकि आधुनिक इतिहासकारों refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in the remnants of the पूर्व पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य और स्थापित kingdoms और empires of उनके own.
Of all of the germanic peoples, the franks होता वृद्धि to a स्थिति of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, the frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; West francia होता evolve into the किंगडम of फ़्रांस, जबकि ईस्ट francia होता evolve into the पावन रोमन Empire, a precursor to modern Germany.
The British Isles were the साईट of अनेक large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन, और जब the romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों isles दौरान the 400s, लहरें of germanic anglo-saxons migrated to दक्षिणी ब्रिटेन और स्थापित a श्रेणी of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927.
During this काल, the किंगडम of कैंडल और किंगडम of हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद व्यवस्थित as well.
The viking आयु, a काल of migrations of scandinavian peoples, वर्चस्व the period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states was the साम्राज्य of cnut the ग्रेट, a डैनिश नेता जो होता become किंग of इंग्लैण्ड, डेनमार्क, and Norway.
The Normans, a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of normandy, होता have a significant प्रभाव on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय, इससे the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, would go on to मिला kievan rus ', an जल्दी राज्य जिससे थी a precursor लिये the आधुनिक देश of Russia.
As the viking आयु खींचा to a बंद, the काल ज्ञात as the क्रूसेड, a श्रेणी of religiously-motivated सैन्य expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several Crusader राज्य यहूद संस्थापित in the पूर्वी भूमध्यसागरीय.
These were सब short-lived.
The Crusaders होता have a profound प्रभाव on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय.
उनके बोरी of कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire.
Extinct dog breeds is a compilation of श्वान breeds कि have become विलुप्त.
Wii Speak is a microphone accessory लिये निन्टेंडो 's वी वीडियो खेल console.
Connected to the console via USB, the device can be placed निकट the वीडियो प्रदर्शक, allowing आवाज़ गपशप to be conducted साथ the संपूर्ण room.
The device सुविधाएँ an led to indicate जब the microphone is active.
Wii Speak was घोषित at निन्टेंडो 's 2008 e3 मीडिया drug.
It was released separately and bundled with Animal Crossing : City लोक on नवम्बर 16, 2008, in उत्तर अमेरिका, और थी released on दिसम्बर 5, 2008, in Europe.
the वी बोलो accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.
निसान बुद्धिमान Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and प्राधिकरण प्रणाली जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ as an विकल्प or standard in several cars.
It was first developed by siemens in the mid-1990s और introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` keyless go '' in 1998 on the w220 s-class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17, 1997.
Univisión ( ) is a spanish-language टेलीविज़न संजाल in the United States.
The network is primarily dedicated for Latin अमरीकी परिवारों जो reside in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It has the largest audience of spanish-language टेलीविज़न दर्शक in the संसार according to nielsen दरजा.
Randy Falco, ( CEO as of June 29, 2011 ) COO, रै महरूम in चार्ज of the कम्पनी चूंकि the प्रस्थान of univision संचार अध्यक्ष और सीईओ Joe Uva in April 2010.
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language टेलीविज़न संजाल, और is प्रायः a दमदार पांचवां, outranking the cw, साथ कुछ fourth-place साप्ताहिक placings, और as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in नई यॉर्क, और रै इसके प्रमुख studios, उत्पादन सुविधाएं, और परिचालन in doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो थी घोषित, Univision Studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is available on cable and satellite in सबसे of the देश, साथ लोकल स्टेशन in over 50 बाज़ार साथ विशाल हिस्पैनिक और लातीनी populations और a नेशनल केबल संजाल feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station.
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows, and in प्रमुख बाज़ार ऐसे as लॉस एंजिल्स, नई यॉर्क, और मियामी the लोकल newscasts carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( o & o ) स्टेशन are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ), tpg पूंजी, l.P., विधाता इक्विटी साझेदार, मैडिसन dearborn साझेदार, और थामस H. ली साझेदार लिये $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 प्रति share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt.
The buyout left the company with a debt स्तर of बारह टाइम्स इसके सालाना नकदी प्रवाह, जिससे थी twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years.
Artist 's धारणा of a आदिग्रह disk
The formation and of the Solar System is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 अरब सालो पहले साथ the गुरुत्वाकर्षक पतन of a छोटी part of a giant molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a आदिग्रह डिस्क आउट of जिससे the ग्रह, moons, क्षुद्रग्रह, और अन्य छोटी सौर प्रणाली लाशें formed.
This widely स्वीकृत मॉडल, ज्ञात as the nebular परिकल्पना, थी पहला विकसित in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel Kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent development has interwoven a किस्में of वैज्ञानिक disciplines सहित खगोलशास्त्र, भौतिकी, भूविज्ञान, और planetary science.
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s, the मॉडल रै महरूम दोनो challenged और परिष्कृत to account for new observations.
The सौर प्रणाली रै विकसित considerably चूंकि its initial formation.
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas और धूल around उनके जनक ग्रह, जबकि अन्य moons हैं विचार to have formed independently and later been captured by their planets.
Still others, as the Earth 's Moon, may be the परिणाम of दानव टक्करों.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन और have महरूम सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of the Solar System.
The स्थितियाँ of the ग्रह प्रायः shifted, और ग्रह have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये much of the सौर प्रणाली 's जल्दी evolution.
In roughly 5 billion years, the सूर्य होगा कूल और विस्तार outward अनेक टाइम्स इसके वर्तमान व्यास ( बनने a रेड दानव ), पहले ढलाई बंद इसके बाहरी परतों as a ग्रहीय nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf.
In the far distant future, the गम्भीरता of गुजर सितारों होगा धीरे reduce the सूर्य 's retinue of ग्रह.
कुछ ग्रह होगा be नष्ट, अन्य ejected into interstellar space.
ultimately, over the कोर्स of tens of अरबों of सालो, it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( काफ्का 's असली जर्मनी शीर्षक :, बाद as, और ) is a अनोखा लिखा by फ्रांज काफ्का in 1914 और 1915 लकिन नहीं published until 1925.
One of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the स्टोरी of a man गिरफ्तार और prosecuted by a रिमोट, अभिगम्य प्राधिकार, साथ the प्रकृति of his crime revealed to neither him nor the reader.
Like Kafka 's other novels, The Trial was never completed, हालांकि it करता शामिल a अध्याय जिससे brings the स्टोरी to an end.
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel, ऐसे as असमानताओं in समय in जोड to अन्य discontinuities in narration.
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his dost और साहित्यिक executor अधिकतम brod संपादित the टेक्स्ट लिये प्रकाशन by verlag Die Schmiede.
The original manuscript is held at the संग्रहालय of आधुनिक साहित्य, marbach am neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the book was listed in Le Mondes 100 Books of the Century and as No. 2 of the बेहतरीन जर्मनी novels of the बीसवीं सदी.
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और अभिनेत्री.
She launched her career in 1994 साथ the सोंग, `` रहो ( i छूटी तुम ) ``, जिससे थी शामिल in the film Reality Bites.
She was the first artist to have a number एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य जबकि नहीं हस्ताक्षरित to a रिकॉर्डिंग contract.
Her five studio CDs शामिल उसके प्रमुख लेबल डेब्यू, the gold-selling tails और इसके follow-up, the grammy-nominated, gold-selling Firecracker.
Loeb has also worked in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, voice-over कार्य और children’s recordings.
Loeb रै appeared in दो टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, dweezil & लिसा, a साप्ताहिक culinary एडवेंचर लिये the खाना संजाल और Number 1 Single, a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 केन्द्रित on उसके क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम, कामयाबी, करियर, and family.
Her children 's music शामिल the एल्बम कैच the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ), और शिविर लिसा ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's book and एल्बम लिसा लोएब 's पगली sing-along : the निराशाजनक पैनकेक and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011.
In 2010 she संस्थापित the लिसा लोएब चश्मा संग्रहण, जिससे is आधारित on उसके own designs.
The Coat of arms of the राज्य of New Jersey includes:
A shield with three plows emblazoned, प्रतिनिधि of नई जर्सी 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing नाईट 's helmet.
A horse 's head as the crest of the हेल्मेट.
The female figures Liberty और ceres, प्रतिनिधि of the राज्य 's motto ( देखिए next item ).
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a `` स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ; ceres is पकड़कर an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the पैर of the emblem contains the राज्य motto of New Jersey, `` Liberty and Prosperity '', and the year of statehood, 1776.
It was originally designed by पियरे यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 और थी परिवर्धित slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central मोटिफ in the ध्वज of नई जर्सी और the ग्रेट मुहर of the राज्य of नई Jersey.
The Coat of arms contains a घोड़ा 's सिर.
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a shield referring to the राज्य 's कृषि परंपरा, giving it the उपनाम `` Garden State ''.
The two Goddesses represent the State motto, `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि ''.
स्वतंत्रता is on the बाएँ.
She is holding a staff with a liberty cap on it, और the शब्द स्वतंत्रता underneath उसके.
The goddess on the सही is ceres, देवी of कृषि.
She is holding a cornucopia साथ समृद्धि लिखा नीचे her.
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11, 1896, the तिथि in जिससे the सभा officially स्वीकृत the ध्वज as the राज्य emblem, the buff रंग is due indirectly to जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, जो था ordered on अक्तूबर 2, 1779, कि the वर्दी coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been सुरक्षित तभी लिये उसके अपना वर्दी और those of अन्य महाद्वीपीय सेनापतियों और their aides.
Then, on February 28, 1780, the महाद्वीपीय युद्ध अधिकारियों in फिलाडेल्फिया निर्देशित कि the वर्दी कोट facings of सब regiments यहूद to be the same as the background color of the regiments ' state flag.
The seal is वर्णित in नई जर्सी statute Title 52, §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out '' is a सोंग by the बीटल्स, लिखा by पॉल mccartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` double a-sided `` सिंगल साथ `` दिन tripper ``, the पहला समय दोनो पहलू of a single were so designated in an initial release.
Both songs were recorded दौरान the रबर आत्मा सत्र.
The song is an example of lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a गहराई कि happened तभी rarely बाद वे लिखा the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, You 're a Rich Man `` and `` i 've मिला a अहसास ``, हैं among the notable exceptions.
as a चिकित्सा निदान, pedophilia or paedophilia is a मनोरोग विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or विशेष यौन ब्याज toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or पुरानी जरूर be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the आकर्षण can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a range of परिभाषाएं, as मिला in psychiatry, मनोविज्ञान, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` विकार of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता लिये children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent sexual प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children कि वे have either acted on or जिससे कारण उन्हें तकलीफ or interpersonal परेशानी.
In popular usage, pedophilia means any यौन ब्याज in children or the अधिनियम of चाइल्ड यौन गाली, प्रायः termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states, `` pedophilia is the अधिनियम or काल्पनिक on the भाग of an वयस्क of engaging in यौन कार्यकलाप साथ a चाइल्ड or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the यौन ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क साथ रोमिल or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided क्युकी हालांकि लोगों जो कमिट चाइल्ड यौन गाली commonly प्रदर्शनी the विकार, कुछ अपराधियों do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, नहीं सब pedophiles दरअसल कमिट such abuse.
Pedophilia was first formally पहचाना और नामित in the लेट 19th century.
A significant amount of शोध in the क्षेत्रफल रै लिया प्लेस चूंकि the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, there are also women who प्रदर्शनी the विकार, और शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ estimates underrepresent the सच्चा क्रमांक of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia रै महरूम विकसित, लकिन वहीँ हैं therapies कि can reduce the incidence of a person committing child sexual abuse.
In the United राज्य, following कान्सास v. hendricks, sex अपराधियों जो हैं diagnosed साथ निश्चित दिमागी विकार, विशेषकर pedophilia, can be विषय to indefinite civil commitment, under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the सटीक कल्याणकारी of pedophilia have नहीं महरूम conclusively established.
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated साथ अनेक अलग neurological abnormalities, और प्रायः co-exists साथ अन्य व्यक्तित्व disorders and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement, a variety of typologies have been सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to बर्ताव और motivations.
Julio César Chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a रिटायर्ड मैक्सिकन पेशेवर boxer.
Chávez is माना by अनेक लोगों लिये उनके खेल आंकडे the महानतम fighter ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time world चैंपियन in तीन वज़न विभाजन, और लिये अनेक सालो he थी माना एक of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : wbc सुपर featherweight in 1984, wba lightweight in 1987, wbc lightweight in 1988, wbc लाइट welterweight in 1989, ibf लाइट welterweight in 1990, और wbc Light Welterweight in 1994.
He holds records for सबसे कामयाब लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ), सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez also has the longest अपराजित streak in मुक्केबाज़ी इतिहास, 13 सालो.
His record was 89-0-1 going into उसके पहला घाटा to फ्रेंकी रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो win streak until his `` draw '' with Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching power, विनाशकारी देह आक्रमण, remarkably दमदार chin और the अथक stalking of his opponents.
He बाँधने # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम मुक्केबाज Of All Time.
On दिसम्बर 7, 2010, he थी inducted in the prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय मुक्केबाज़ी हॉल of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the father of prospect Omar chávez और पूर्व wbc middleweight चैंपियन जूलियो César Chávez, Jr.

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( यहूदी :, hashoah, `` प्रलय '' ; यहूदी :, churben or hurban, इससे the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ), थी the द्रव्यमान हत्या or नरसंहार of लगभग छह लाख यहूदियों दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, a कार्यक्रम of व्यवस्थित state-sponsored हत्या by नाजी जर्मनी, led by एडोल्फ हिटलर और the नाजी पार्टी, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in यूरोपीय पहले the holocaust, लगभग two-thirds यहूद मारे.
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust, as यहूद लगभग दो लाख यहूदी महिलाओं और तीन लाख यहूदी मेन.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory यहूद प्रयुक्त to concentrate, थाम, और मार यहूदियों और अन्य पीड़ितों.
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition, and कुछ उपयोग the आम संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं, सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध, पॉलिश और सोवियत civilians, and homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet Union indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह लाख नागरिकों और बंदियों of युद्ध यहूद intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and नरसंहार यहूद carried आउट in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society, सबसे prominently the nuremberg कानून, यहूद enacted in जर्मनी सालो पहले the outbreak of World War II.
विशेषज्ञता शिविरों यहूद स्थापित in जिससे inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव मजदूर जबतक वे died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered यहूदियों and political opponents in mass shootings.
the occupiers जरूरी यहूदियों और romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by freight train to extermination camps where, if they survived the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that led to the genocides, turning the तीसरा reich into कया one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the United States is a युवावस्था संगठन administered by the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना और कृषि of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ), साथ the मिशन of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
The name represents चार निजी विकास क्षेत्रों of फ़ोकस लिये the संगठन : head, heart, hands, and health.
The organization has over 6.5 million सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य, इससे आयु पाँच to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, responsibility and life skills of युवावस्था through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम और a धनात्मक युवावस्था development approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused संगठन as a परिणाम of इसके इतिहास, 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता, स्वस्थ जीना, विज्ञान, engineering, and technology programs.
Today, 4-H and related programs exist in over अस्सी देशों around the संसार ; the संगठन और प्रशासन varies इससे country to country.
प्रत्येक of ये कार्यक्रम operates independently, लकिन cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, global education programs, and communications.
The 4-h motto is `` to मेक the बेहतरीन बेहतर '', जबकि इसके स्लोगन is `` सीख by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
The नेशनल ध्वज of चिली, consists of दो गैरबराबरी आड़ा bands of श्वेत और रेड और a ब्लू वर्गाकार the same height as the white band in the canton, which bears a white five-pointed star in the center.
It थी अपनाया on 18 अक्तूबर 1817.
The Chilean flag is भी ज्ञात in स्पेनी as la estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत समंदर, श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered andes, और रेड स्टैंड लिये the रक्त spilled to achieve स्वतंत्रता.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the colors यहूद निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown by the mapuche दौरान the Arauco War.
`` ध्वज दिन '' is आयोजित प्रत्येक साल on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 सैनिको who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the अंतर्दृष्टियों पीढी, is the जनसांख्यिकी दल following Generation X.
There are no precise dates for जब पीढी y starts और ends.
Commentators use beginning birth तिथियाँ इससे the latter 1970s, or इससे the जल्दी 1980s to the जल्दी 2000s.

Virginia ( ), officially the राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया, is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the South Atlantic region of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों born वहीँ.
The भूगोल और जलवायु of the राष्ट्रमंडल हैं तराशा by the ब्लू लकीरें kyu और the Chesapeake Bay, which provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the राष्ट्रमंडल is रिचमंड ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the most populous city.
Fairfax काउंटी is the सबसे populous राजनैतिक subdivision.
the wealthiest is Loudoun County.
The Commonwealth 's जनसांख्यिकी is over आठ लाख.
The area 's history begins साथ अनेक स्वदेशी समूह, सहित the Powhatan.
In 1607 the London Company स्थापित the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया as the first permanent New World English colony.
Slave labor और the जमीन acquired इससे विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों प्रत्येक निभाई a significant भूमिका in the उपनिवेश 's जल्दी politics and plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the confederacy in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध, दौरान जिससे रिचमंड थी बना the confederate पूंजी और वर्जिनिया 's northwestern काउंटी seceded to रूप the state of West Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a सदी following पुनर्निर्माण, दोनो प्रमुख नेशनल पार्टियों हैं प्रतिस्पर्धी in आधुनिक वर्जिनिया.
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest विधानमंडल in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध.
The state government has been repeatedly क्रमित सबसे प्रभावी by the pew बीच on the States.
It is unique in how it treats शहरों और काउंटी बराबर, manages लोकल सड़कें, और prohibits its governors from serving consecutive terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, सहित the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in Hampton Roads, the site of the region 's main seaport.
वर्जिनिया 's पब्लिक स्कूलों और अनेक कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a परिणाम, कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become the राज्य 's अग्रणी export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie मेकर, codenamed sundance ) is a फ्रीवेयर वीडियो संपादन software by Microsoft.
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the ability to create and संपादन वीडियो as खूब as to प्रकाशित उन्हें on skydrive, फेसबुक, youtube, और फ्लिकर.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single by तुपाक shakur, और दसवाँ track इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, 2Pacalypse Now.
The सोंग, जिससे सुविधाएँ r & b सिंगर डेव hollister, is परिचय a बारह year-old लड़की named Brenda who lives in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The सोंग explores the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके प्रभाव on the यंग mothers and their families.
Like many of shakur 's गीतों, `` ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' draws from the plight of the impoverished.
using ब्रेंडा to represent यंग माताओं in सामान्य, shakur criticises the कम स्तर of support from the baby 's father, the government, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the सोंग जब he पढ़ा a समाचारपत्र आलेख परिचय a twelve-year-old लड़की जो मिला गर्भवती इससे उसके cousin और, because she did not want her parents to know about the baby, threw it in a trash can.
The official logo of पोकीमॉन लिये इसके अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the असली जापानी title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a मीडिया मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी वीडियो खेल कम्पनी Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a जोड़ी of interlinkable खेल लड़के role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित by खेल freak, पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most कामयाब and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
Pokémon गुण have चूंकि महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी, manga, व्यापार cards, toys, books, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, and, cumulative sales of the वीडियो खेल ( सहित घर कंसोल संस्करण, ऐसे as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have पहुँचे अधिक than 200 लाख नक़ल.
In November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन, घोषित कि it था सहमत नहीं to नवीनीकृत the पोकीमॉन representation agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( अभी the पोकीमॉन कम्पनी अंतरराष्ट्रीय ), a subsidiary of जापानी 's पोकीमॉन Co., now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia.
The name Pokémon is the romanized संकुचन of the Japanese brand.
The term Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the release of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 और श्वेत 2 ; साथ the आगामी रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x और y, 6 नई पोकीमॉन have महरूम प्रदर्शित in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the एकवचन और बहुवचन, as is प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति नाम ; it is grammatically सही to कह `` एक पोकीमॉन '' और `` अनेक Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.
Cover of the first संस्करण of the प्रकाशन दादा by ट्रिस्टन tzara ; Zurich, 1917
Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an आर्ट गति of the यूरोपीय avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter लकिन the ऊँचाई of नई यॉर्क दादा थी the साल पहले in 1915.
To quote Dona Budd 's The Language of Art ज्ञान, दादा थी born आउट of ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया to the horrors of संसार युद्ध I.
This अंतरराष्ट्रीय गति थी begun by a समूह of कलाकार and poets associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada अस्वीकृत कारण और लॉजिक, prizing बकवास, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the नाम दादा is unclear ; कुछ मानना कि it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain कि it originates इससे the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन tzara और मार्सल Janco 's frequent use of the words da, da, meaning yes, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a बैठक of the समूह जब a पेपर चाकू stuck into a french-german शब्दकोष happened to पाइंट to 'डैडa ', a फ्रेंच शब्द लिये 'hobbyhorse '.
The गति primarily शामिल विज़ुअल कला, साहित्य, काव्य, आर्ट manifestoes, आर्ट सिद्धान्त, थिएटर, और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन, और concentrated इसके anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In जोड to होने anti-war, दादा थी भी anti- बुर्जुआ और था राजनैतिक affinities with the radical left.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, और प्रकाशन of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate कवरेज of आर्ट, राजनीती, और संस्कृति यहूद विषय प्रायः discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, hans arp, raoul hausmann, हन्ना höch, योहानेस baader, ट्रिस्टन tzara, फ्रांसिस picabia, रिचर्ड huelsenbeck, georg grosz, जॉन heartfield, मार्सल duchamp, beatrice लकडी, कर्ट schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
the गति बहकावे बाद शैलियाँ जैसे the avant-garde और शहर म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों, और समूह सहित surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound काव्य, a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on पॉप आर्ट, a जश्न of antiart to be बाद embraced लिये anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
First trophic स्तर.
The पौधे in इस चित्र, और the शैवाल और phytoplankton in the झील, हैं प्राथमिक producers.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, और manufacture उनके अपना खाना by photosynthesis, using उर्जा इससे the sun.
The trophic level of an सजीव is the स्थिति it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic गर्भाशयी इससे the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food chain represents a succession of जीवों कि खा another सजीव और हैं, in फेरे, खाया themselves.
The number of steps an सजीव is इससे the प्रारंभ of the कड़ी is a माप of इसके trophic level.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as पौधे, मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2, परभक्षी at स्तर 3 और typically समाप्त साथ carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the कड़ी can रूप either a one-way प्रवाह, or a food `` web. ''
Ecological communities with उच्चतर biodiversity रूप अधिक जटिल trophic paths.

Top to bottom : Bombyx mori, Hyalophora cecropia, antheraea pernyi, samia सिंथिया.

A silk-producing raspy क्रिकेट.
Silk is a natural protein fibre, कुछ फ़ॉर्म of जिससे can be woven into वस्त्र.
The protein fibre of silk is रचित मुख्यतः of fibroin और उत्पादित by certain insect larvae to form cocoons.
The best-known type of silk is प्राप्त इससे the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering रूप of रेशा is due to the triangular प्रिज़्म -like ढांचा of the रेशा fibre, which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at different angles, thus producing different colors.
Silks are produced by several other कीट, लकिन generally तभी the रेशा of शलभ caterpillars रै महरूम used for textile manufacturing.
There has महरूम कुछ शोध into अन्य silks, जिससे differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly produced by the लार्वे of कीट undergoing पूरा metamorphosis, लकिन कुछ वयस्क कीट ऐसे as webspinners उपज रेशा, और कुछ insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives.
Silk उत्पादन भी occurs in कलापक्ष ( मधुमक्खियों, wasps, और चींटियों ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
Other types of arthropod produce silk, most notably विभिन्न arachnids ऐसे as मकड़ियों ( देखिए मकड़ी silk ).
Late Show साथ दाउद लेटरमैन is an अमरीकी late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by David Letterman on CBS.
The show debuted on August 30, 1993, और is उत्पादित by लेटरमैन 's उत्पादन कम्पनी, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The दिखाएँ 's म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the हाउस बैंड, the सीबीएस ऑर्केस्ट्रा, is पॉल Shaffer.
the सिर लेखक is मैट रॉबर्ट्स और the announcer is Alan Kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, Late Show बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी औसत दर्शक over समय और तीसरा in number of episodes over time.
The दिखाएँ लीड अन्य लेट रात्रि shows in ad आय with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the दिखाएँ airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, लकिन is अंकित सोमवार through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., और गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second गुरुवार एपीसोड प्रायः airs on शुक्रवार of that week.
In 2002, Late Show with दाउद लेटरमैन थी क्रमित no. 7 on tv मार्गदर्शिका 's 50 महानतम tv shows of सब समय.
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by तब, लेटरमैन होगा surpass जॉनी कार्सन as the longest tenured late-night बात दिखाएँ मेजबान.
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality वृत्तचित्र टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम on ब्रावो, नियत in नारंगी County, California.
It was the first The रियल housewives कार्यक्रम in the series.
The series is a voyeuristic look into the धनवान जीवनदान of ये housewives, as वे दूकान, मिलेंगी प्लास्टिक सर्जरी, gossip, fight and live lavishly.
The financial crisis, the beginning of which coincided almost exactly साथ the पहला ऋतु 's ब्रॉडकास्ट, रै चूंकि trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles साथ जॉब नुकसान, evictions, बंधक मूलभूत, foreclosures, और वैवाहिक stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the use of the अंतरजाल or अन्य इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an व्यक्तिगत, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may include the making of false accusations or कथन of फैक्ट ( as in मानहानि ), निगरानी, बनाना खतरे, पहचान चोरी, क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण, the solicitation of नाबालिग लिये sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable व्यक्ति, in कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना, होता लिहाज़ it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it occurs through the उपयोग of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक संचार प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as the अंतरजाल.
However, it sometimes लीड to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both हैं दण्ड offenses.
Cyberstalking shares महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ साथ offline stalking.
Many stalkers – ऑनलाइन or बंद – हैं प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश to control their victims.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन अजनबी or a व्यक्ति whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit भागीदारी of अन्य लोगों ऑनलाइन जो do नहीं भी जान the निशाना.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play अंतर्गत राज्य anti-stalking कानून, बदनामी कानून, और उत्पीड़न कानून.
A cyberstalking conviction can परिणाम in a restraining अनुक्रम, परिवीक्षा, or भी दण्ड दंड against the assailant, including jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another, or for पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन और उनके ग्राहक, क्लाइंट और अन्य external parties.
The overall style of letter will depend on the संबंध between the पार्टियों चिंतित.
There are many कारण to लिखें a कारोबार अक्षर.
It could be to निवेदन सीधा सूचना or कार्रवाई इससे another पार्टी, to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ इससे a प्रदायक, to पहचानो a गलती कि थी वचनबद्ध, to जवाब directly to a request, to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is still very useful because it produces a स्थाई रिकार्ड, is गोपनीय, औपचारिक और delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid मछली इससे the tilapiine cichlid जनजाति.
tilapia हैं मुख्यतः freshwater मछली, inhabiting उथले स्ट्रीम, तालाबों, rivers and lakes, and less commonly found living in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of major importance in कारीगर फ़िशिंग in अफ़्रीकी और the levant, और हैं of increasing महत्व in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become समस्यापूर्ण हृदयरोग प्रजाति in नई warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy नाटक अपराधों फिल्मी अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और beasley the श्वान as the eponymous वर्ण, Turner and Hooch respectively.
The film also stars घोड़ी winningham, क्रेग T. नेल्सन, और रेगिनाल्ड VelJohnson.
It was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film थी originally slated to be निर्देशित by हेनरी winkler, लकिन he थी terminated due to `` रचनात्मक differences ''.
It was co-written by माइकल blodgett इससे परे the Valley of the Dolls fame.
Although K-9 ( with James belushi ) थी released prior to इस फिल्मी ( exactly तीन महीने पहले ), टर्नर & hooch became अधिक लोकप्रिय और seemingly निष्प्रभ इसके वृहद कामयाबी, भी हालांकि K-9 had a very similar plot.
A pilot for a Turner & hooch tv श्रेणी थी बना और भागा as a भाग of the जादुई World of Disney.

Adolf हिटलर ( ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) थी an आस्ट्रिया -born जर्मनी राजनेता और the नेता of the नाजी पार्टी ( ( nsdap ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of नाजी जर्मनी ( as führer und reichskanzler ) इससे 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the केन्द्र of नाजी जर्मनी, संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a decorated दिग्गज of संसार युद्ध I.
He joined the जर्मनी मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the nsdap ) in 1919, and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921.
in 1923, he attempted a तख्तापलट d'état in म्यूनिख, known as the Beer Hall Putsch.
The failed coup resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment, during जिससे समय he लिखा उसके संस्मरण, mein कैम्फ ( my संघर्ष ).
After his रिलीज in 1924, हिटलर gained लोकप्रिय support by attacking the सन्धि of versailles और promoting pan-germanism, antisemitism, and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After his नियुक्ति as चांसलर in 1933, he रूपांतरित the वाइमर गणतंत्र into the तीसरा reich, a single-party तानाशाही आधारित on the अधिनायकवादी और autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a नई अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष नाजी जर्मनी आधिपत्य in continental Europe.
To this end, his foreign and domestic policies had the उद्देश्य of seizing lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस '' ) for the Germanic people.
He directed the rearmament of जर्मनी और the आक्रमण of कैंडल by the wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 German forces and their यूरोपीय allies occupied सबसे of यूरोपीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी.
in 1943, जर्मनी था महरूम मजबूर onto the रक्षात्मक और suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the फाइनल दिनों of the युद्ध, दौरान the बैटल of बर्लिन in 1945, हिटलर शादीशुदा his long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two दिनों बाद, the दो वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड फौज, and their corpses were burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered the main cause of the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय.
His antisemitic नीतियों और racially प्रेरित विचारधारा resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 लाख Jews, and millions of other people deemed racially inferior.
अंगूठा
a डोमेन नाम is an पहचान स्ट्रिंग कि defines a फ्रेम of प्रशासनिक स्वायत्तता, authority, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the नियम और प्रक्रियाओं of the डोमेन नाम System ( DNS ).
Technically, कोई नाम पंजीकृत in the डीएनएस is a डोमेन name.
Domain names are used in various networking contexts and application-specific नामकरण और संबोधित उद्देश्य.
In general, a domain name represents an अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( ip ) संसाधन, ऐसे as a निजी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the अंतरजाल, a सर्वर computer hosting a web site, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the डीएनएस रूट डोमेन, जिससे is nameless.
The first-level set of डोमेन names हैं the top-level डोमेन ( tlds ), सहित the जेनेरिक top-level डोमेन ( gtlds ), ऐसे as the prominent डोमेन com, सूचना, जाल and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users जो काश to कनेक्ट लोकल क्षेत्रफल संजाल to the अंतरजाल, बनाएँ अन्य सरेआम accessible अंतरजाल संसाधन or run web sites.
The registration of ये डोमेन names is प्रायः administered by डोमेन नाम registrars जो बेचें their services to the public.
A fully योग्य डोमेन नाम ( fqdn ) is a डोमेन नाम कि is completely specified in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are usually written in lowercase, हालांकि लेबल्स in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली हैं case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic आयन साथ the आणविक सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2.
These nitrate esters are a specialized क्लास of विस्फोटक.
A wheat कटाई in Idaho
This photo from a 1921 ज्ञानकोष shows a ट्रैक्टर ploughing a क्रॉप field.
Agriculture is a major उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य और the देश is a net exporter of food.
As of the last census of कृषि in 2007, वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख खेतो, covering an क्षेत्रफल of, an औसत of प्रति farm.
Although agricultural कार्यकलाप occurs in सबसे राज्य, it is विशेषकर concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा, arable जमीन ज्ञात as the Great Plains, which encompasses the central region of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, नामित बाद tanzanian छात्र erasto mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer जल can freeze faster than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support for the प्रभाव, वहीँ is no अनुबंध on exactly कया the प्रभाव is and under what circumstances it occurs.
There have been reports of similar phenomena चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि साथ अपर्याप्त विवरण लिये the claims to be replicated.
The घटना seems contrary to ऊष्मागतिकी, लकिन a number of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations होगा need to decide on a precise परिभाषा of `` जमने '' और कंट्रोल a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in order to confirm or explain the effect.
The Siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly पहचाना breeds of Oriental cat.
The नस्ल originated in थाईलैंड ( formerly ज्ञात as सियाम ), जहाँ वे हैं एक of अनेक देशी breeds and are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय breeds in यूरोपीय और उत्तर अमेरिका.
Quality Food centers ( qfc ) is a सुपरमार्केट कड़ी आधारित in bellevue, वॉशिंगटन, साथ 64 स्टोर्स in the puget ध्वनि प्रदेश of Washington state and in the Portland, Oregon metropolitan area.
in अर्थशास्त्र, the धन सप्लाई or धन भण्डार, is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time.
There are अनेक तरीके to define `` धन, '' लकिन मानक उपायों प्रायः शामिल करेंसी in परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ).
Money supply data हैं अंकित और प्रकाशित, प्रायः by the सरकारी or the central bank of the country.
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored परिवर्तन in धन सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर, महंगाई, the exchange rate and the business cycle.
That relation between धन और कीमतें is historically संबद्ध साथ the quantity theory of money.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct संबंध between money-supply विकास और long-term दाम महंगाई, at तनिक लिये रैपिड increases in the राशि of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in इसके धन सप्लाई भी देखी रैपिड increases in कीमतें ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason for the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of इस causal कड़ी is the विषय of contention.
कुछ शास्त अर्थशास्त्रियों argue कि the धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In addition, those economists seeing the central bank 's कंट्रोल over the धन सप्लाई as feeble कह कि वहीँ हैं दो कमजोर कड़ी between the विकास of the धन supply and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when many resources are underutilized, an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई can कारण a sustained बढ़ाएँ in रियल उत्पादन बजाय of महंगाई.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the अनुपात between नाममात्र जीडीपी और धन सप्लाई, परिवर्तन, an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव, an exaggerated effect, or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion चित्र फिल्मी स्वरूप और a नियत of सिनेमा प्रक्षेप मानकों निर्मित by the कनाडाई कम्पनी IMAX Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record और प्रदर्शक बिंब of दूर वृहद आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional film systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have been परिवर्तित ( or upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप लिये प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर और कुछ have भी महरूम partially शॉट in IMAX.
IMAX is the most widely प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये special-venue फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों.
, वहीँ हैं 697 imax थिएटर in 52 countries.
Today 's Special is a कनाडाई children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ उत्पादित by क्लाइव vanderburgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987.
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and मान channel/odyssey ( अभी the hallmark चैनल ) as खूब as many PBS stations throughout the United States.
It was set in a विभाग स्टोर, आधारित on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the now defunct Simpson 's in Toronto.
Many sequences for it were शॉट at the महारानी गली वेस्ट और yonge गली स्टोर बाद घंटों.
Constitutionalism, in its most general meaning, is `` a जटिल of विचार, attitudes, और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of government derives from and is limited by a body of fundamental law ''.
A political organization is constitutional to the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the रूचि और लिबर्टीज of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.
As described by राजनैतिक वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान दाउद Fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as brain freeze, cold-stimulus सिरदर्द, or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ), is a रूप of ब्रैड cranial पीड़ा or सिरदर्द commonly संबद्ध with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having कुछ ठंडा टच the छत of the मुँह ( तालु ), और is believed to परिणाम इससे a तंत्रिका जवाब causing रैपिड constriction and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head.
The रेट of सेवन लिये ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम पढ़ाई as a contributing factor.
There हैं लोगों जो can नहीं अनुभव `` दिमाग फ्रीज '' or similar symptoms.
The term ice-cream सिरदर्द रै महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि at तनिक 31 जनवरी 1937, contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The first published use of the term brain freeze, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, थी on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत लोक song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in अनेक देशों, विशेषकर in the english-speaking संसार ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the नई साल at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is भी सुंग at अंत्येष्टि, graduations और as a विदाई or ending to other occasions.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय लड़के स्काउट युवावस्था गति, in अनेक देशों, uses it as a close to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English literally as `` old long since '', or अधिक idiomatically, `` long long पहले '', `` दिनों गए by '' or `` old times ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the first line of the कोरस, might be loosely अनूदित as `` लिये ( the खातिर of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also प्रयुक्त in समान कविताएं by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), और जेम्स वाटसन ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the दिनों of auld लैंग syne '' as the समतुल्य of `` एकबार upon a समय...
`` in his retelling of परी किस्से in the स्कॉट्स भाषा.
Ben schulz, खिलाड़ी of leeroy Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins और प्रायः elongated साथ numerous अतिरिक्त अक्षर, is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित लिये a खिलाड़ी अक्षर निर्मित by बेन schulz in blizzard entertainment 's MMORPG, World of Warcraft.
The character became लोकप्रिय due to a वीडियो of the खेल that circulated around the Internet.
The phenomenon has चूंकि स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into अन्य online and mainstream media.
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in ओकलैंड, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, in the जल्दी morning घंटों of नई साल 's Day 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit ट्रैन returning इससे सैन फ्रांसिस्को, बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारियों detained ऑस्कर ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the मंच at the Fruitvale BART Station.
अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle और another अधिकारी यहूद restraining Grant, who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer Mehserle stood और, according to गवाह, कहा : `` मिलेंगी वापस, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in the वापस ; mehserle appeared दंग, put उसके हैंड्स to उसके सिर and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During his court testimony, Mehserle said कि ग्रान्ट तब exclaimed, `` तुम शॉट me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he थी सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning at highland हॉस्पिटल in Oakland.
The events were captured on अनेक डिजिटल वीडियो और कोशिका फोन कैमरे.
The footage was disseminated to मीडिया आउटलेट और to विभिन्न वेबसाइटों, जहाँ it was watched millions of times.
the following दिनों देखी दोनो शांतिपूर्ण और हिंसक protests.
the शूटिंग रै महरूम variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, alameda काउंटी prosecutors चार्ज mehserle साथ हत्या लिये the shooting.
He resigned his स्थिति और pleaded नहीं अपराधी.
The trial began on जून 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued that Mehserle mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल, intending to उपयोग उसके तासीर जब he देखी ग्रान्ट reaching for his waistband.
pretrial filings argue कि उसके क्लाएंट किया नहीं कमिट first-degree हत्या और पूछा a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil अधिकारों attorney जॉन burris दायर a $ 25 लाख wrongful मौत अर्जी विरूद्ध BART on behalf of Grant 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the जूरी लौटे इसके verdict : mehserle थी मिला अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial विरोध विरूद्ध the सत्ताधारी यहूद शांतिपूर्वक व्यवस्थित ; लूटने, आगजनी, विनाश of प्रॉपर्टी, and small riots broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 लोगों यहूद आखिरकार गिरफ्तार.
On Friday, July 9, 2010, the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights case विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही अधिनियम अंतर्गत the पृथक अधिपति एक्सेप्शन to double jeopardy.
The विभाग of इंसाफ होगा be working साथ the u.S. attorney 's office in San Francisco and the FBI.
On November 5, 2010, mehserle थी sentenced to दो सालो, ऋण time served.
He served his time in the लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी कारावास, occupying a निजी cell away from other prisoners.
He was released on June 13, 2011 और is अभी on पैरोल.
Major representatives of the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण.
The Harlem पुनर्जागरण थी a सांस्कृतिक गति कि spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` नई नीग्रो गति '', नामित बाद the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of नई यॉर्क नगर, अनेक french-speaking ब्लैक लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी और caribbean colonies जो जिया in पेरिस यहूद भी बहकावे by the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण.
The Harlem Renaissance is unofficially पहचाना to have spanned इससे परिचय 1919 जबतक the जल्दी or mid-1930s.
अनेक of इसके विचार जिया on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '', as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति ) और 1929 ( the साल of the भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश और the शुरूआत of the ग्रेट Depression ).
