अफ़्रीकी नाईट of baguirmi in पूरा padded armour suit.
The history of Africa begins with the प्रागितिहास of अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the उपस्थित as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states.
Some जल्दी प्रमाण of कृषि in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ इससे 16,000 bce, and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of early सभ्यता arose in मिश्र, और बाद in नुबिया, the मग़रिब और the Horn of Africa.
During the मध्य आयु, islam स्प्रेड through the regions.
क्रासिंग the मग़रिब और the सहेल, a major center of Muslim culture was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture, Mali Empire, Ashanti Empire, किंगडम of mapungubwe, किंगडम of ज्या, किंगडम of saloum, किंगडम of baol, किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे, किंगडम of kongo, प्राचीन कार्थेज, numidia, mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th century, Europeans and arabs took स्लेव इससे वेस्ट, सेंट्रल और southeast अफ़्रीकी विदेशी in the African slave trade.
European colonization of अफ़्रीकी विकसित rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the लेट 19th and early 20th centuries.
Following struggles लिये स्वतंत्रता in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as खूब as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been challenging लिये शोधकर्ताओं in the फ़ील्ड of अफ़्रीकी अध्ययन क्युकी of the किल्लत of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly techniques ऐसे as the रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास, ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान, पुरातत्व and genetics have been crucial.
Curry Foley was the first खिलाड़ी in प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल इतिहास to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting लिये the साईकिल is the accomplishment of एक बैटर hitting a single, a double, a triple, and a home run in the same game.
Collecting the हिट्स in कि अनुक्रम is ज्ञात as a `` natural cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 टाइम्स चूंकि the पहला by curry फोली in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been पुकारा `` एक of the rarest '' और `` सबसे मुश्किल feats '' in बेसबॉल.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an average MLB player hitting for a cycle against an average टोली in a खेल is लगभग 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds to परिचय 2.5 चक्र in a 162-game ऋतु साथ 30 teams.
In other baseball leagues, the साईकिल is हासिल कम अक्सर.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( npb ), the top-level बेसबॉल संगठन in जापानी, have hit लिये the साईकिल, the सबसे हाल होने michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit लिये the साईकिल on the वही दिन एकबार in npb इतिहास ; this has occurred twice in MLB history.
एक npb खिलाड़ी रै भी hit लिये the साईकिल in an NPB All-Star game.
No player has ever hit लिये the साईकिल in the एमएलबी all-star खेल or the postseason.
The main स्लेव रूट in मध्यकालीन Africa.
This आलेख discusses प्रणालियों, इतिहास, और प्रभाव of slavery within Africa.
See अरब स्लेव व्यापार, अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार, maafa, and Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions.
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in अफ़्रीकी ''.
Europeans usually किया नहीं डालें the आंतरिक regions.
Slavery in अफ़्रीकी रै existed throughout the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक सदियां, and continues in the current day.
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as वे यहूद in much of the ancient world.
In most African समाजों जहाँ गुलामी थी प्रचलित, the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave व्यापार began, अनेक of the लोकल स्लेव प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव markets outside of Africa.
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in अनेक अलग फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of ये do नहीं clearly अनुरूप the परिभाषाएं of गुलामी elsewhere in the world.
Debt slavery, enslavement of युद्ध captives, सैन्य गुलामी, और दण्ड गुलामी were all practiced in various parts of Africa.
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions, गुलामी थी a छोटी भाग of the आर्थिक जीवन of अनेक समाजों in अफ़्रीकी जबतक the परिचय of transcontinental स्लेव ट्रेड ( Arab and Atlantic ).
Slave practices were again transformed with यूरोपीय colonization of अफ़्रीकी और the औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the early 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task मैनेजर can भी be प्रयुक्त to नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं, प्रोसेसर अपनापन, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर थी introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग, which had far fewer features.
The task list was capable of listing currently running प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें, or बनाना a नई प्रक्रम.
In Windows XP तभी, a shutdown मेनू is भी उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to standby, hibernate, फेरे बंद, restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the programs currently running.
This file was executed by कार्यशील the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the c : \खिड़कीs directory.
The Troop is an american-canadian live-action, सिंगल कैमरा कॉमेडी -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी of teenagers who fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood.
निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by अधिकतम burnett, ग्रेग कूलिज और क्रिस मॉर्गन, the श्रेणी premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18, 2009.
The second season premiered on जून 25, 2011 और निकलोडियन रद्द the श्रेणी मिडवे through it 's second season.
The remaining episodes of season 2 यहूद aired on nicktoons मगर the last 3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its area, the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( DRC ) is घर to a विशाल संभावित of प्राकृतिक संसाधन और खनिज माल, इसके untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 खरब, yet the अर्थव्यवस्था of the drc रै अस्वीकृत drastically since the mid-1980s.
At the time of its independence in 1960, DRC was the second most industrialized देश in अफ़्रीकी बाद दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; it boasted a thriving खनन सेक्टर और इसके कृषि सेक्टर was relatively productive.
If the दर्शक stares at इस चित्र लिये 20–60 सेकेंड और stares at a श्वेत ऑब्जेक्ट, a negative afterimage will appear ( in this case, it will be cyan on magenta ).
This can भी be हासिल by the दर्शक closing his/her आँखें और tilting their head up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an ऑप्टिकल भ्रम कि refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in एक 's दृष्टि बाद the एक्सपोज़र to the असली चित्र रै ceased.
One of the most आम afterimages is the उज्जवल glow कि seems to फ्लैश पहले एक 's आँखें बाद looking into a light source for a few seconds.
Closing the eye can सहायता achieve a बेहतर भाव of the color in its own aspect.
Afterimages come in two forms, ऋणात्मक ( उलट ) और धनात्मक ( retaining असली color ).
The process behind positive afterimages is अनजान, हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित to neural adaptation.
On the other hand, negative afterimages are a retinal घटना और हैं खूब समझा.
Lost is an American serial drama television series that premiered on सितंबर 22, 2004 on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ).
The series was निर्मित by J. J. abrams और डैमन lindelof, आधारित upon an असली पायलट script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber.
Six seasons of the show aired, in addition to numerous काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन पिछला episodes.
ABC announced that खोया होता समाप्त बाद छह सीज़न, having उत्पादित a कुल of 121 एपीसोड.
The series follows the past, present, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on a यात्री जेट, oceanic उड़ान 815, उड़ती इससे सिडनी to लॉस एंजिल्स बाद it क्रैश on a tropical island in the South Pacific.
The series also शामिल कहानियां of the जीवनदान of लोगों already जीना on the द्वीप — वे शामिल the `` अन्य ``, जो initially antagonize the survivors, as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the द्वीप as खूब as a द्वितीयक कथानक इससे another point in a character 's life.
Season 6 सुविधाएँ a detailing of the जीवनदान of the survivors in a different reality, as if the flight had never crashed.
In the following सूची, the पद `` प्रदर्शित अक्षर ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or वर्ण जो हैं प्रदर्शित in the secondary storyline of each episode.
`` no.
in series '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in the overall श्रेणी, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in प्रत्येक particular ऋतु.
`` U.S. viewers ( लाख ) '' refers to the क्रमांक of अमेरिकी in millions who watched the episode live.
A total of 121 episodes of Lost यहूद उत्पादित, the पिछला of जिससे aired on May 23, 2010.
All seasons are उपलब्धियाँ on dvd in regions 1–4 और on blu-ray in regions A and B.
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a औपचारिक सन्दर्भ to a चिकित्सा कंडीशन in जिससे the मेहराब of the पैर collapses, साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground.
In some individuals ( an अनुमानित 20–30 % of the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of बाद increased चोट, or पैर समस्याएं, due to चपटा फीट, in a जनसांख्यिकी of लोगों जो पहुँचें सैन्य सेवा आयु बगैर prior foot problems.
however, ये अध्ययन can नहीं be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित भविष्य damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages.
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat फीट हैं संबद्ध साथ पैर लक्षण, or निश्चित लक्षण in अन्य भाग of the देह ( such as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to gen x, is the पीढी born बाद the पश्चिमी post-world War II baby boom.
Demographers, historians and commentators use beginning birth तिथियाँ इससे the जल्दी 1960s to the early 1980s.
The term was popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 अनोखा पीढी x : किस्से लिये an त्वरित संस्कृति.
Before that, it had महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
Pressure ulcers, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, हैं स्थानीयकृत चोटों to the स्किन and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a बोनी prominence, as a परिणाम of दबाव, or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction.
सबसे commonly इस होगा be the sacrum, coccyx, एड़ियों or the कूल्हों, लकिन अन्य साइट ऐसे as the elbows, knees, ankles or the back of the cranium can be affected.
The कारण of दबाव छाले is दबाव लागू to नरम ऊतक so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the नरम ऊतक is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a cause ; shear खींचता on रक्त बरतन कि फीड the skin.
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in व्यक्तियों जो हैं नहीं चलती परिचय or हैं confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed कि अन्य कारकों can influence the सहिष्णुता of स्किन लिये दबाव and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development.
These factors are protein-calorie कुपोषण, microclimate ( स्किन wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), रोगों कि reduce रक्त प्रवाह to the स्किन, ऐसे as arteriosclerosis or रोगों कि reduce the feeling in the skin, such as paralysis or neuropathy.
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the age of the person, चिकित्सा शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis, मधुमेह or संक्रमण ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented and treatable if found early, pressure छाले can be बहुत मुश्किल to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों, frail बड़ो, व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर जहाँ स्पाइनल चोट is शामिल ) and terminally ill patients.
प्राथमिक रोकथाम is to redistribute दबाव by turning the patient regularly.
the लाभ of turning to avoid further sores is खूब प्रलेखित since at least the 19th century.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair, खाने a संतुलित आहार साथ पर्याप्त प्रोटीन और keeping the स्किन फ़्री इससे एक्सपोज़र to मूत्र और स्टूल is very important.
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in हॉस्पिटल जमावट is ऊँची, लकिन सुधार हैं होने बना.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure अल्सर व्यापकता सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in कनाडा, वहीँ थी a significant घटी in the overall facility-acquired व्यापकता of दबाव ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however, एड़ी छाले यहूद the सबसे आम facility-acquired location in the survey.
overboard is a 1987 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी starring Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell.
It was निर्देशित by गैरी मार्शल, उत्पादित by roddy mcdowell, और loosely प्रेरित by the 1974 Italian film Swept Away.
In turn, overboard थी adapted into the 2006 दक्षिण कोरियाई टेलीविज़न series, Couple or Trouble.
Green Bay is a नगर in और the काउंटी सीट of भूरा काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन, स्तिथ at the सिर of ग्रीन खाड़ी, a sub-basin of Lake Michigan, at the mouth of the Fox River.
It has an elevation of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर और is स्तिथ उत्तर of मिल्वौकी.
The population was 104,057 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is the third-largest city in the state of विस्कॉन्सिन, बाद मिल्वौकी और Madison.
It is also the third-largest नगर on the वेस्ट shore of झील मिशिगन, after Chicago and Milwaukee.
Green Bay is home to the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, बनाना it by दूर the smallest महानगर area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise.
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area, which covers Brown, kewaunee, और oconto काउंटी और था a संयुक्त जनसांख्यिकी of 282,599 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
Green Bay is an industrial city with अनेक meatpacking और पेपर पौधे, और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी, an भुजा of झील मिशिगन that locals call the Bay of Green Bay, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville पब्लिक संग्रहालय, साथ प्रदर्शनियों of आर्ट, इतिहास, और विज्ञान ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay.
Luteinizing hormone ( LH, also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the अग्रवर्ती pituitary ग्रंथि.
In females, an acute वृद्धि of lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation और विकास of the corpus luteum.
In males, where LH था भी महरूम पुकारा अंतरालीय cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ), it stimulates leydig कोशिका production of testosterone.
It acts synergistically साथ fsh.
Selena quintanilla-pérez ( अप्रैल 16, 1971 – कूच 31, 1995 ), ज्ञात बस as सेलिना, was an American singer-songwriter.
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling लैटिन कलाकार of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके चौदह top-ten singles in the शीर्ष लैटिन गीतों चार्ट, सहित सात number-one hits.
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 और 1995, `` amor prohibido `` और `` no me queda más ``.
वो थी पुकारा `` the महारानी of tejano म्यूज़िक `` और the मैक्सिकन equivalent of Madonna.
Selena released उसके पहला एल्बम, सेलिना y लॉस Dinos, at the age of twelve.
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music Awards और उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ emi a few सालो बाद.
Her fame grew throughout the जल्दी 1990s, विशेषकर in spanish-speaking देशों, and she had begun recording in English as well.
Selena was murdered at the आयु of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by yolanda Saldívar, the former president of her fan club.
On April 12, 1995, two सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत, जार्ज W. बुश, राज्यपाल of टेक्सास at the time, declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas.
Warner भाईs. उत्पादित सेलिना, a फिल्मी आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत Jennifer Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's जीवन थी भी the आधार of the musical सेलिना forever अभिनीत Veronica Vazquez as Selena.
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated साथ a life-sized कांस्य प्रतिमा ( mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस christi, टेक्सास ) और a सेलिना museum opened there.
She has sold over 60 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling artists of all time.
वो is भी the तभी मादा कलाकार to have five albums in U.S. Billboard 200 at the same time.
German stahlhelm इससे संसार युद्ध II
Insignia of the Bolivian फौज colorados रेजीमेंट, प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( बहुवचन, stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी लिये `` steel helmet ''.
The इम्पीरियल जर्मनी फौज began to बदलें the परंपरागत boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers दोनो to a जेनेरिक स्टील हेल्मेट, और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design.
The Stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape, was an instantly recognizable प्रतीक लिये सैन्य imagery और became a आम तत्व of सैन्य प्रचार on दोनो पहलू, just like the Pickelhaube before it.
Its name थी भी प्रयुक्त by the stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक राष्ट्रवादी संगठन स्थापित at the end of 1918.
glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
जीवदीप्ति, the उत्पादन और उत्सर्जन of light by a living organism
Chemiluminescence, is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट ( संदीप्ति ) बगैर emission of heat
Phosphorescence, a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence, production of संदीप्ति in a सामग्री by the बमबारी of आयनकारी radiation
Glow in the Dark दौरे, a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट दौरे by Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub city लिये लुफ़्थान्सा और receives फ़्लाइट इससे स्टार गठबंधन वाहक.
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large, मीडियम, छोटी, और non-hubs as एक of the faa विमानक्षेत्र श्रेणी जिससे हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on क्रमांक of वाणिज्यिक passengers.
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an airport कि an एयरलाइन उपयोग as a ट्रांसफ़र पाइंट to मिलेंगी यात्री to उनके intended destination.
It is part of a हब और spoke मॉडल, जहाँ travelers चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं परोसा by सीधा फ़्लाइट change planes en route to their destinations.
This is as opposed to the पाइंट to पाइंट मॉडल.
Many hubs of the एयरलाइंस हैं भी situated at एयरपोर्ट in the cities of the respective head offices.
Some airlines may use only a single hub, जबकि अन्य एयरलाइंस उपयोग अनेक hubs.
Hubs are used लिये दोनो यात्री फ़्लाइट as खूब as कार्गो flights.
Many एयरलाइंस भी उपयोग फ़ोकस शहरों, जिससे फलन much the same as hubs.
Airlines may also use द्वितीयक hubs, a non-technical पद लिये विशाल फ़ोकस cities.
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either समाप्त as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
खोखला lacedaemon.
Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city कि stood on the हिल of therapne on the बाएँ बैंको of the eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta.
Across the घाटी the successive ridges of माउंट taygetus are in evidence.
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ), or Lacedaemon, was a prominent city-state in ancient यूनानियों, situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी in laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th सदी bc, जब the आक्रमणकारी dorians subjugated the लोकल, non-dorian population.
Around 650 BC, it rose to become the प्रबल सैन्य land-power in प्राचीन Greece.
Given its सैन्य pre-eminence, स्पार्टा थी पहचाना as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars.
Between 431 and 404 BC, Sparta थी the प्रिंसिपल दुश्मन of एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian युद्ध, इससे जिससे it उभरा विजयी, though at great cost.
Sparta 's defeat by thebes in the बैटल of leuctra in 371 bc ended स्पार्टा 's prominent role in Greece.
However, it maintained इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता जबतक the रोमन conquest of यूनानियों in 146 BC.
It then underwent a long period of decline, विशेषकर in the मध्य आयु, जब अनेक spartans स्थानांतरित to सजीव in mystras.
Modern स्पार्टा is the पूंजी of the यूनानी क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और a बीच लिये the प्रसंस्करण of goods such as citrus and olives.
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its सोशल प्रणाली और संविधान, जिससे completely केन्द्रित on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण और excellence.
Its inhabitants were classified as spartiates ( spartan नागरिकों, जो enjoyed पूरा अधिकारों ), mothakes ( non-spartan फ़्री मेन उठाया as spartans ), perioikoi ( freedmen ), and Helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local population ).
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training and शिक्षा regimen, और spartan phalanges यहूद widely माना to be among the best in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably अधिक अधिकारों और समता to मेन than elsewhere in the शास्त्रीय world.
Sparta was the subject of fascination in इसके अपना दिन, as खूब as in the वेस्ट following the पुनरुद्धार of शास्त्रीय learning.
This प्रेम or admiration of स्पार्टा is known as Laconism or Laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an interactive competition in which उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य as सामान्य managers of virtual teams.
The players that an individual is able to मैनेज हैं पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग.
The अलग क्रियाएँ लोगों हैं समर्थ to मेक हैं drafting, व्यापार, adding or dropping players, and changing rosters.
Due to the growth of the अंतरजाल, काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल रै vastly increased in लोकप्रियता, विशेषकर क्युकी काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल प्रदाताओं ऐसे as ईएसपीएन, याहू, सीबीएस, और the एनएफएल itself हैं समर्थ to keep track of statistics entirely online, eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players.
सबसे लीग have a सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप in Week 16 of the NFL season.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना इंसानो on Earth.
As of आज, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि, it पहुँचे इस milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल, और हैं अपेक्षित to बढ़ाएँ to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 और 10.5 अरब by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, और उर्जा संसाधन.
skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान, और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल मांसपेशी or as several muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
A gold बार is a मात्रा of परिष्कृत धात्विक सुनहरा of कोई आकार कि is बना by a बार निर्माता बैठक मानक शर्तें of manufacture, labeling, and record keeping.
Larger gold bars that are उत्पादित by pouring the molten मेटल into molds हैं पुकारा ingots.
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping इससे appropriately लिपटे सुनहरा sheets.
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central बैंको और traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 औंस ) Good Delivery gold bar.
The kilobar, जिससे is to कह 1000 गामा in द्रव्यमान, is the बार कि is अधिक manageable और is used extensively for trading and investment.
The premium on these bars जब traded is बहुत कम over the स्पॉट मान of the सुनहरा बनाना it आदर्श लिये छोटी हस्तांतरण between banks and traders.
Most kilobars are flat, although some investors, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, prefer the ईंटों आकार.
Elisha आर्चिबाल्ड `` आर्ची '' मैनिंग iii ( born may 19, 1949 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक in the National Football League, playing for the New Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982, then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings.
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning, वर्तमान नई यॉर्क दिग्गज starting क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग, और पूर्व Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning.
Advocacy is a political process by an व्यक्तिगत or समूह जिससे aims to influence public-policy और संसाधन आवंटन निर्णय भीतर राजनैतिक, economic, and social systems and institutions.
Advocacy can include many क्रियाएँ कि a व्यक्ति or संगठन undertakes सहित मीडिया अभियान, पब्लिक बोलना, commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or polls or the filing of an amicus brief.
Lobbying ( often by लॉबी समूह ) is a रूप of वकालत जहाँ a सीधा दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक on an issue which plays a significant role in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy समूह in the u.S. और कनाडा हैं using सोशल मीडिया to सुकर नागरिक सगाई and collective action.
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a लंबवत तिरंगा of ग्रीन, श्वेत, और रेड साथ the नेशनल कोट of बाहें चार्ज in the center of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors यहूद अपनाया by मैक्सिको following स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन दौरान the देश 's युद्ध of Independence, and subsequent First Mexican Empire.
The current flag was adopted in 1968, but the overall डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821, जब the पहला नेशनल ध्वज थी निर्मित.
The current law of national symbols, विधि on the नेशनल बाहें, ध्वज, और गान, कि governs the उपयोग of the नेशनल ध्वज रै been in place since 1984.
रेड, श्वेत, और ग्रीन हैं the रंगों of the national liberation army in Mexico.
The central emblem is the एज़टेक pictogram लिये tenochtitlan ( अभी मैक्सिको नगर ), the center of their empire.
It recalls the लेजेंड कि प्रेरित the aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island.
The रूप of the कोट of बाहें थी सबसे recently संशोधित in 1968.
A रिबन in the नेशनल रंगों is at the नीचे of the coat of arms.
throughout इतिहास, the ध्वज रै बदला चार टाइम्स, as the डिज़ाइन of the कोट of बाहें और the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified.
However, the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle, holding a serpent in its talon, is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the कैक्टस is situated on a rock that rises above a lake.
The coat of arms is निकला इससे an एज़टेक लेजेंड कि उनके देवताओं बताई उन्हें to निर्माण a नगर जहाँ वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal eating a serpent, which is now Mexico City.
The current national flag, the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज, is भी प्रयुक्त as the मैक्सिकन नवल ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor ब्यूरो promotes a कस्बा, नगर, प्रदेश, or देश in अनुक्रम to बढ़ाएँ the number of visitors.
It promotes the development and विपणन of a गंतव्य, focusing on सम्मेलन बिक्री, पर्यटन विपणन, और services.
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing विज़िट इससे पर्यटकों और कारोबार travelers, जिससे generates overnight आवास लिये a गंतव्य, विज़िट to रेस्तरां, and shopping revenues.
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism विपणन संगठन in उनके संबंधित पर्यटक गंतव्यों, as वे हैं सीधे जिम्मेदार लिये विपणन the गंतव्य ब्रांड through सफर और पर्यटन `` product awareness '' to visitors.
dmos उपज अरबों of डॉलर in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर लिये उनके गंतव्यों ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise.
Destination marketing organizations are often पुकारा सफर, सम्मेलन, विज़िटर, or पर्यटन bureaux, welcome centers, information centers and more.
Regardless of the नाम, ये संगठन प्रस्ताव अनेक services to the traveling public.
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the संसार, और एक of the largest जमीन स्तनधारियों in उत्तर अमेरिका और पूर्वी एशिया.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European red हिरण ( cervus elaphus ), लकिन प्रमाण इससे a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial डीएनए indicates कि the two are distinct species.
This animal should not be confused with the larger मूस ( alces alces ), to जिससे the नाम `` नीलगाय '' applies in Eurasia.
अलावा इससे the मूस, the तभी अन्य सदस्य of the हिरण परिवार to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the नीलगाय in आकार is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ).
नीलगाय दायरा in वन और forest-edge आवास, feeding on grasses, पौधे, पत्ते, and bark.
Although native to North America and eastern Asia, वे have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have महरूम introduced, सहित अर्जेंटीना, Australia, and New Zealand.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic प्रजाति और ecosystems into जिससे they have been introduced.
Male elk have large antlers जिससे हैं शेड प्रत्येक साल.
males भी engage in ritualized समागम व्यवहार दौरान the rut, सहित posturing, antler कुश्ती ( sparring ), और bugling, a लाउड श्रेणी of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females.
Elk are susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक रोगों, कुछ of जिससे can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations, largely through टीकाकरण, have had mixed success.
Some संस्कृतियों आदर the नीलगाय as a spiritual force.
In parts of Asia, antlers and उनके मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त in traditional medicines.
Elk are hunted as a खेल प्रजाति ; the मांस is leaner और उच्चतर in प्रोटीन than beef or chicken.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or George वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, और phds आरपार अनेक dozen disciplines.
The विश्वविद्यालयों थी चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as the Columbian College in the District of Columbia.
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the four big बिल्लियों in the genus पेंथेरा और a सदस्य of the परिवार फ़ेलिडाए.
With some males exceeding in वज़न, it is the second-largest जीना cat after the tiger.
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी resides in गिर वन नेशनल पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर have disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia in historic times.
Until the late pleistocene, परिचय 10,000 सालो पहले, the शेर थी the सबसे फैली विशाल जमीन mammal after humans.
They were found in most of Africa, across यूरेशिया इससे पश्चिमी यूरोपीय to इण्डिया, और in the americas इससे the yukon to Peru.
The lion is a vulnerable species, having seen a प्रमुख जनसांख्यिकी मनाही of 30–50 % over the पास्ट दो दशकों in इसके African range.
शेर populations हैं untenable outside designated reserves and national parks.
Although the cause of the मनाही is नहीं fully समझा, आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ इंसानो हैं फिलहाल the महानतम causes of concern.
Within अफ़्रीकी, the वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is विशेषकर endangered.
Lions live लिये 10–14 सालो in the जंगली, जबकि in captivity they can live longer than 20 years.
In the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 years, as चोटों sustained इससे continual लड़ साथ प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce उनके आयु.
They typically inhabit सवाना और घासभूमि, हालांकि they may take to bush and forest.
Lions are unusually सोशल compared to other cats.
A pride of lions consists of सम्बन्धित महिलाओं और औलाद and a small number of adult males.
समूह of मादा शेर typically हंट साथ, preying mostly on large ungulates.
Lions are apex and keystone परभक्षी, हालांकि वे scavenge as अवसर allows.
While शेर do नहीं typically हंट इंसानो, कुछ have महरूम ज्ञात to do so.
Sleeping mainly दौरान the दिन, शेर हैं primarily nocturnal, हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the male lion is easily recognised by इसके माने, और इसके फेस is एक of the सबसे widely recognised एनिमल प्रतीकों in इंसान culture.
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period, साथ उत्कीर्णन और paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं, through वस्तुतः सब प्राचीन और मध्यकालीन संस्कृतियों where they once occurred.
It has been extensively चित्रित in sculptures, in paintings, on नेशनल flags, and in contemporary films and literature.
Lions have been kept in menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य, और have महरूम a कुंजी प्रजाति sought लिये exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century.
Zoos are cooperating विश्वव्यापी in प्रजनन कार्यक्रम लिये the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the history of video games, the सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the पिछला पीढी, और शामिल consoles released चूंकि लेट by Nintendo, Microsoft, and Sony.
For घर consoles, the सातवाँ पीढी began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 and continued with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006, and Wii on 19 November 2006.
प्रत्येक नई कंसोल introduced a new type of breakthrough in technology.
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at hd रिज़ॉल्यूशन, the प्लेस्टेशन 3 offered, in जोड to fhd गेमिंग, hd फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी, and the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining निन्टेंडो in the गति मार्केट, सोनी released the PlayStation Move in September 2010.
The PlayStation Move सुविधाएँ गति संवेदन गेमिंग, समान to that of the Wii.
Microsoft भी joined सोनी और निन्टेंडो, with its Kinect.
Unlike the अन्य दो प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन 3 और वी ), kinect करता नहीं उपयोग कोई परिरक्षक of कोई sort and makes the users the `` controller. ''
having बेची 8 लाख इकाई in इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट, kinect रै claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers तार परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद, सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 परिरक्षक can be प्रयुक्त in wired and wireless configurations.
starting साथ हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the सातवाँ पीढी began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी परिचय of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '', alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles.
The निन्टेंडो ds ( nds ) सुविधाएँ a टच स्क्रीन और built-in माइक्रोफोन, और supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the संशोधित संस्करण of the nds, the dsi, सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे, the ability to download games from the DSi store, and a web browser.
The PlayStation Portable, or PSP, released बाद the वही साल on 12 दिसम्बर 2004, followed a अलग pattern.
It became the first handheld video game console to use an optical डिस्क स्वरूप, सार्वभौमिक मीडिया डिस्क ( umd ), as इसके प्राथमिक storage media.
Sony also gave the psp मजबूत multi-media काबिलियत, कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 और other PSPs, and Internet connectivity.
The Nintendo DS likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन and Nintendo DS Browser, as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles.
Despite high sales संख्याएँ लिये दोनो consoles, प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल बिक्री have consistently पिछड़ापन पीछे those of the निन्टेंडो ds ; nevertheless, the PlayStation Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system.
Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely दिल क्लबों बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt. pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो album by English rock band the Beatles.
Released in June 1967, the album included गीतों ऐसे as `` साथ a छोटी सहायता इससे my मित्रों ``, `` लुसी in the आसमान with Diamonds ``, and `` A Day in the Life ``.
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ), sgt. pepper further रजि इससे the conventional पॉप चट्टान मुहावरा of the समय और incorporated balladry, साइकेडेलिक, म्यूज़िक हॉल, and symphonic influences.
During the Sgt. Pepper सत्र, the समूह improved upon the विशेषता of उनके म्यूज़िक 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques.
निर्माता जार्ज मार्टिन 's अभिनव approach included the use of an orchestra.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by English pop artists Peter Blake and jann haworth, थी प्रेरित by a स्केच by पॉल mccartney कि चित्रित the बैंड पोज़ in सामने of a कोलाज of कुछ of उनके पसंदीदा हस्तियाँ.
Sgt. Pepper was a विश्वव्यापी नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the uk एल्बम चार्ट और 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200.
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock स्टाइल, the एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और जीती चार Grammy Awards in 1968.
With an अनुमानित 32 लाख नक़ल बेची, it is एक of the संसार 's best selling albums.
sgt. pepper is माना by अनेक to be the सबसे influential और प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी, और रै been named the greatest album of all time by both All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal पालि is a प्रदेश of the दिमागी cortex कि is located beneath the lateral fissure on both cerebral hemispheres of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of विज़ुअल यादें, प्रसंस्करण संवेदी इनपुट, comprehending भाषा, storing नई यादें, जज्बात, and deriving meaning.
The human lungs हैं the अंगों of श्वसन in इंसानो.
इंसानो have दो फेफड़े, a सही फेफड़ों और a left lung.
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly छोटी consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय पायदान '' allowing स्पेस लिये the दिल within the chest ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of airways और 300 to 500 लाख alveoli, having a कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the वही क्षेत्रफल as एक पक्ष of a टेनिस court.
Furthermore, if all of the capillaries that surround the alveoli यहूद unwound और रखी समाप्त to समाप्त, वे होता extend लिये about.
Each फेफड़ों weighs, इसलिए बनाना the संपूर्ण organ about.
इंसान फेफड़े
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( one लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the स्तर of t4.
इस जंक्शन is भी ज्ञात as the carina.
the conducting मण्डल contains the श्वासनली, the bronchi, the bronchioles, और the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar ducts, and the alveoli.
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) हैं बना up of एयरवेज़.
The conducting मण्डल रै no गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the रक्त, और is reinforced साथ उपास्थि in order to hold open the airways.
The conducting मण्डल warms the एयर to and humidifies the air.
It also cleanses the एयर by निकालना अणु via cilia स्तिथ on the दीवारें of सब the passageways.
The lungs are घिरी by the पसली पिंजरा.
the respiratory मण्डल is the साईट of गैस एक्सचेंज with blood.
The sympathetic बेचैन प्रणाली via noradrenaline acting on the beta receptors causes bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, जिससे अधिनियमों on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle.
This action is सम्बन्धित, हालांकि माना पृथक इससे bronchoconstriction.
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, सहित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और ऑक्सीजन, हैं भी शामिल in the विनियमन process.
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura, lining the भीतरी वॉल of the thoracic पिंजरा, और the visceral pleura अस्तर the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar ऊतक साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar नलिकाएं और टर्मिनल bronchioles.
However, it often शामिल कोई रूप of फेफड़ों ऊतक, भी सहित bronchioles, bronchi, रक्त vessels and lung interstitium.
The margarita is a मैक्सिकन कॉकटेल consisting of टकीला मिश्रित साथ cointreau or समान नारंगी -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or lemon juice, often served with salt on the glass rim.
it is the सबसे आम tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the rocks ), blended with ice ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or बगैर बर्फ ( सीधा up ).

Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the बरगंडी वाइन of the वही नाम, जिससे in फेरे is नामित बाद the Burgundy region of France.
The color बरगंडी is समान to अन्य शेड्स of अंधेरा red such as maroon.
जब referring to the रंग, `` बरगंडी '' is usually not capitalized.
The first recorded उपयोग of `` बरगंडी '' as a रंग name in English was in 1881.

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the औकात of लापता to हथियारबंद सेवाएं कर्मियों जो हैं reported लापता during active service.
They may have been मारे, wounded, become a कैदी of युद्ध, or deserted.
If deceased, neither उनके remains nor संगीन can be positively identified.
Becoming MIA has महरूम an occupational रिस्क लिये सेवा कर्मियों लिये as long as there has been warfare.

This building is the असली कारावास, निर्मित साथ with the Historic Courthouse.

The रिओ थिएटर in बीच
पहला बैपटिस्ट गिरिजाघर at 117 कोरा गली in बीच is located next to the downtown section.
First ईसाई गिरिजाघर at 124 कोरा गली in बीच is एक of the oldest congregations in the community.
बीच is a नगर in शेल्बी काउंटी, टेक्सास, United States.
The population थी 5,193 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is the काउंटी सीट of Shelby County.
It is named for its location near the center of शेल्बी काउंटी, नहीं लिये इसके स्थान in Texas as it is located near the Louisiana border.
Intense red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें साथ dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in छायाचित्र is the आम रूप of रेड pupils in color photographs of eyes.
It occurs when using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फ्लैश बहुत बंद to the कैमरा लेंस ( as साथ सबसे compact cameras ), in ambient low light.
The प्रभाव appears in the आँखें of इंसानो और पशु कि have tapetum lucidum.
Theatrical followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally with a बहुत उज्जवल लाइट और somewhat दूर इससे the अभिनेताओं, occasionally गवाह red-eye in actors on stage.
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण between the followspot ऑपरेटर and the light.
The University of California, Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is a पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और एक of the टेन सामान्य campuses of the विश्वविद्यालयों of California system.
The main campus is located on a site in goleta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, इससे सांता बारबरा और उत्तरपश्चिम of Los Angeles.
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an स्वतंत्र शिक्षक ' कॉलेज, ucsb joined the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली in 1944 और is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system.
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy विश्वविद्यालयों, जिससे recognizes शीर्ष पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in the United States.
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and is organized into पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों offering 87 undergraduate डिग्री and 55 graduate degrees.
The कैम्पस is the 6th-largest in the uc प्रणाली by नामांकन with 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students.
In 2012, UCSB was ranked 41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों '' और 10th among पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों by u.S. न्यूज & संसार रपट.
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher शिक्षा संसार विश्वविद्यालयों rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very ऊँची कार्यकलाप '' शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year, 97th-largest in the United States.
UCSB houses बारह नेशनल शोध centers, सहित the प्रसिद्ध kavli संस्थान for Theoretical Physics.
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates, one Fields medalist, 29 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of sciences, 27 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of अभियान्त्रिकी, और 31 सदस्यों of the अमरीकी Academy of Arts and Sciences.
UCSB was the No. 3 host on the arpanet और थी निर्वाचित to the संघ of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1995.
The UC Santa बारबरा gauchos compete in the ncaa प्रभाग i बिग वेस्ट Conference.
The Gauchos have won ncaa नेशनल championships in मेन 's सॉकर और मेन 's water polo.
संत जोसेफ साथ the शिशु Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day, March 19, the Feast of St. Joseph is in Western christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast दिन of संत जोसेफ, जीवनसाथी of the धन्य वर्जिन Mary.
He is भी the step-father of यीशु of Nazareth /Jesus Christ.
It has the rank of a solemnity in the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a पहला क्लास feast.
Previous to 1962 it थी मनाये as a feast of the rank of double of the first class.
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the Anglican नियाज़, और a feast or पर्व in the लूथरन गिरिजाघर.
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as for Canada, persons नामित जोसेफ, josephine, etc., लिये धार्मिक संस्थान, स्कूलों और parishes bearing उसके नाम, और लिये carpenters.
It is भी पिता 's दिन in कुछ कैथोलिक देशों, mainly Spain, Portugal, and Italy.
March 19 थी समर्पित to संत जोसेफ in अनेक पश्चिमी पंचांग by the tenth century, and this custom was established in Rome by 1479.
Pope St. Pius V extended इसके उपयोग to the संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by उसके अपोस्टोलिक संविधान quo primum ( जुलाई 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal सम्मेलनों may, if वे काश, ट्रांसफ़र it to a date outside Lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in सम्मान of st. जोसेफ as जीवनसाथी of the धन्य वर्जिन मरियम और संरक्षक of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर, the latter शीर्षक having been given to him by Pope Pius IX.
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after ईस्टर साथ an अष्टक, बाद divino afflatu of st. पायस x ( देखिए सुधार of the रोमन Breviary by Pope Pius X ), it was moved to the preceding Wednesday.
The feast थी भी retitled the solemnity of Saint Joseph.
इस जश्न और इसके accompanying अष्टक थी abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955.
It is still maintained by catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 or पहले missals.
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss. फिलिप और जेम्स, may 1, था धुंधली इससे the मेमोरी of सबसे catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी, कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries.
The feast of ss. फिलिप और जेम्स, जिससे था महरूम मनाये on कि तिथि चूंकि the छठे सदी, was moved from its traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, which at one time occupied the उच्चतम संभावित रैंक in the गिरिजाघर पंचांग, थी घटाया to an वैकल्पिक मेमोरियल, the lowest rank for a saint 's day.
The Eastern परंपरागत गिरिजाघर मनाता संत जोसेफ on the संडे after Christmas.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, और philanthropist.
Under the guidance of कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ), और मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) बना म्यूज़िक इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate इससे उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ), at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग from Mottola.
कैरी बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
पहले the रिलीज of उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought out of her रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a मनाही in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful काल, लौटे to the शीर्ष of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second सिंगल `` we belong साथ `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling music artists of all time.
in 1998, वो थी सम्मानित as the संसार 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
कैरी थी भी नामित the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of America, वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा कलाकार in the संयुक्त राज्य, साथ 63.5 लाख certified albums.
With the release of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
Aside इससे उसके वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 संसार Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा, शक्ति, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is any सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी genus bombus, in the family Apidae.
वहीँ हैं over 250 ज्ञात प्रजाति, मौजूदा primarily in the Northern Hemisphere although they also occur in South America.
They have been introduced to नई जीलैंड और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य of तस्मानिया.
Bumblebees are social कीट कि हैं characterised by ब्लैक और पीला देह बालों, प्रायः in bands.
However, some species have नारंगी or रेड on उनके लाशें, or may be entirely black.
Another स्पष्ट ( लकिन नहीं अद्वितीय ) characteristic is the नरम प्रकृति of the बाल ( long, branched setae ), पुकारा pile, कि covers their entire body, making them appear and feel fuzzy.
They are best distinguished from similarly large, fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg, which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that is bare, but घिरी by a फ्रिंज of बालों प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण पराग ( in समान मधुमक्खियों, the हिन्द लेग is completely बालदार, और पराग दाने हैं wedged into the hairs for transport ).
जैसे उनके रिश्तेदारों the मधु मधुमक्खियों, bumblebees feed on nectar and gather pollen to feed their young.
A man खुलकर carrying a handgun in a बर्गर King in Eagle, Colorado.
In the United States, open carry is आशुलिपि शब्दावली लिये `` खुलकर carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '', as विशिष्ट इससे concealed carry, where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun owners openly carry firearms while they go about their daily business, रै देखी an बढ़ाएँ in the u.S. in हाल सालो.
This has been marked by a number of organized कार्यक्रम intended to बढ़ाएँ the दृश्यता of खोलें carry और पब्लिक जागरूकता परिचय the practice.
proponents of खोलें carry पाइंट to इतिहास और आंकडे, noting that criminals usually conceal their weapons.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, georgiacarry.org और कुछ भागीदार of the फ़्री राज्य प्रोजेक्ट, खोलें carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in हाल years, but it is not yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend.
The gun अधिकारों जातियाँ रै महरूम मिश्रित in its response.
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, जबकि special-interest समूह ऐसे as the aforementioned opencarry.org और georgiacarry.org, और निश्चित नेशनल समूह ऐसे as the गन स्वामी of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by गन कंट्रोल समूह ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान and the Coalition to Stop Gun Violence.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in फ़्रांस.
France produces around three quarters of इसके विद्युत by नाभिकीय शक्ति.
the grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय Power Plant in Germany.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022, in a नीति reversal following जापानी 's फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in तीस देशों.
In 2010, before the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति, it थी reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति साल, हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 और 2009, तभी five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, Germany and स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय शक्ति.
As of June 2011, countries such as Australia, ऑस्ट्रिया, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, लातवियाई, liechtenstein, ध्वज, मलेशिया, माल्टा, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a गति चित्र कैमरा, और to समाप्त गति चित्र फिल्मी, तैयार लिये उपयोग in a प्रोजेक्टर, जिससे bears बिंब in color.
The पहला रंग cinematography थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग प्रणालियों ऐसे as the एक patented in इंग्लैण्ड by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A सरलीकृत योगात्मक प्रणाली थी विकसित by जार्ज अल्बर्ट स्मिथ and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These early प्रणालियों प्रयुक्त black-and-white फिल्मी to फोटोग्राफ और प्रोजेक्ट दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through different color filters.
Still इससे फुटेज अंकित by एडवर्ड Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology, there are two distinct processes : Eastman रंग ऋणात्मक 2 रसायन ( कैमरा ऋणात्मक स्टॉक्स, duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) और eastman रंग धनात्मक 2 रसायन ( धनात्मक prints for direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2.
फुजी 's उत्पाद हैं compatible with ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born अक्तूबर 13, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, record producer, and actress.
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album, which प्रदर्शित the hit सोंग `` foolish ``, और बेची over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके पहला सप्ताह of रिलीज throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The album set a Soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह बिक्री लिये a नई मादा कलाकार, outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill.
In the same week, she became the पहला मादा यजमान to simultaneously थाम the शीर्ष दो स्थान on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '', and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( साथ मोटे Joe ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs, `` Foolish, '' `` What 's luv ? '' और `` सदा on समय ``, on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the वही सप्ताह, होने the पहला स्त्री to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles.
In 2003, the self-titled debut album won Ashanti her first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन r & b album.
As of April 1st 2013, ashanti रै बेची over 27.7 लाख records worldwide.
ashanti ended the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the तीसरा top new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé.
She भी ended the दशक at क्रमांक 38 on the शीर्ष कलाकार of the Decade list.
She is currently on the list of The बीस बेहतरीन selling म्यूज़िक singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल foolish लिये selling 7.2 लाख copies to-date.
Ashanti has an अनुमानित जाल लायक of $ 40 लाख डॉलर [ usd ].
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) ``, which reached number एक on बिलबोर्ड hot 100, जिससे थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट at the वही समय as `` foolish '', `` सदा on समय '' ( साथ ja नियम ), और `` कया 's luv '' ( साथ Fat Joe ).
Later that year, she was acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके लेबल और capped बंद उसके कामयाब डेब्यू by जीतना आठ बिलबोर्ड awards and two American Music Awards.
Within seven years of ashanti 's करियर, वो रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स on the Hot 100.
Ashanti has endorsed numerous उत्पाद सहित गैप, हर्बल essences और mudd जीन्स.
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston, Janet जैक्सन, प्रिंस, मैडोना, तुपाक shakur, मरियम J. blige, एला fitzgerald, नशीले रॉबिन्सन, डोना गर्मियाँ, and Blue Magic as her musical influences.
Praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers और आलोचकों alike, ashanti रै written/co-written the bulk of all her music.
She is फिलहाल working on उसके अपना प्रकाशन कम्पनी हकदार लिखा Entertainment.
She released her fourth studio album हकदार the घोषणा on जून 3, 2008 और is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो working on her fifth.
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand up `` alongside 15 अन्य मादा गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड up to कर्कट '' सजीव टेलीविज़न खास जिससे helped उठाएँ $ 100 लाख डॉलर for cancer research.
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the सैन्य विमानन भुजा of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका दौरान और तत्काल बाद संसार युद्ध ii, and the direct predecessor of the United States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the United States Army, which in 1942 थी विभाजित functionally by कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम into तीन autonomous शक्तियां : the फौज मैदान शक्तियां, the सेवाएं of सप्लाई ( जिससे in 1943 became the फौज सेवा शक्तियां ), और the AAF.
Each of these forces had a commanding सामान्य जो reported सीधे to the मुख्य of स्टाफ of the संयुक्त States Army.
The AAF administered all parts of military विमानन formerly वितरित among the फौज एयर corps, सामान्य मुख्यालय एयर फ़ोर्स, और मैदान शक्तियां corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों, और यूँ became the पहला एयर organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel.
In practice, the aaf थी वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर the फौज.
The peak आकार of the aaf थी over 2.4 लाख मेन और महिलाओं in सेवा और nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
By VE दिन it था 1.25 लाख मेन stationed विदेशी और संचालित इससे अधिक than 1,600 airfields worldwide.
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a वृहद स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार अधिक efficiently, और to provide a ढांचा लिये the अतिरिक्त कमांड echelons जरूरी by a vastly increased force.
Although other nations already था पृथक एयर शक्तियां स्वतंत्र of the फौज or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों royal एयर फ़ोर्स और the जर्मनी luftwaffe ), the aaf remained a भाग of the United States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947.
However, in its विस्तार और conduct of the युद्ध, the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा of the वृहद organization.
By the end of World War ii the aaf था become वस्तुतः an स्वतंत्र service.
By regulation and executive order, the AAF was a subordinate agency of the War Department tasked only with आयोजन, प्रशिक्षण, और equipping कॉम्बैट इकाई, सीमित in जिम्मेदारी to the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य, as यहूद the फौज मैदान शक्तियां और the फौज सेवा शक्तियां.
In reality, Headquarters aaf नियंत्रित the conduct of सब पहलुओं of the एयर युद्ध in प्रत्येक भाग of the संसार, determining एयर नीति और issuing आदेश बगैर transmitting them through the Chief of Staff.
This `` contrast between सिद्धान्त और फैक्ट is... आधारभूत to an समझना of the AAF. ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal स्वतंत्रता of सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना और दस्तावेज़ controlled by the United States government.
The Act defines agency रिकॉर्ड विषय to प्रकटीकरण, outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं and grants nine exemptions to the statute.
It was originally signed into विधि by अध्यक्ष lyndon B. जॉनसन, despite उसके misgivings, on जुलाई 4, 1966 as and went into effect the following year.
the संघीय सरकारी 's स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियम चाहिए नहीं be उलझन with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the individual states.
अनेक of those राज्य अधिनियमों may be समान but not identical to the federal act.
The European Union ( EU ) is an आर्थिक और राजनैतिक संघ of 27 सदस्य राज्य कि हैं स्तिथ primarily in Europe.
The eu operates through a प्रणाली of supranational स्वतंत्र institutions and intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the member states.
Institutions of the EU include the European आयोग, the परिषद of the यूरोपीय संघ, the यूरोपीय परिषद, the अदालत of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय संघ, the European Central Bank, the Court of Auditors, and the European Parliament.
The European पार्लियामेंट is निर्वाचित प्रत्येक पाँच सालो by EU citizens.
The EU 's de facto पूंजी is ब्रसेल्स.
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel जातियाँ ( ecsc ) और the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ ( eec ), formed by the भीतरी छह देशों in 1951 and 1958 respectively.
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of नई सदस्य राज्य और in शक्ति by the जोड of नीति areas to its remit.
The Maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the यूरोपीय संघ अंतर्गत इसके current name in 1993.
The नवीनतम प्रमुख amendment to the संवैधानिक आधार of the eu, the सन्धि of Lisbon, came into force in 2009.
The EU has विकसित a सिंगल मार्केट through a standardised प्रणाली of laws that apply in all member states.
भीतर the शेंगेन क्षेत्रफल ( जिससे शामिल 22 eu और 4 non-eu राज्य ) passport controls have been abolished.
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people, goods, सेवाएं, और पूंजी, enact विधान in इंसाफ और घर अफेयर्स, और maintain आम नीतियों on व्यापार, कृषि, fisheries and regional development.
A monetary union, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 और is रचित of 17 सदस्य states.
Through the Common Foreign and Security Policy the EU रै विकसित a भूमिका in बाह्य संबंध और रक्षा.
Permanent diplomatic मिशन have महरूम स्थापित around the world.
The EU is represented at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the WTO, the G8 and the G-20.
With a combined population of over 500 million inhabitants, or 7.3 % of the world population, the EU, in 2012, generated a nominal gross domestic product ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर, representing लगभग 20 % of the वैश्विक जीडीपी जब measured in शर्तें of खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी, और represents the largest नाममात्र जीडीपी और जीडीपी ppp in the world.
The EU was the recipient of the 2012 नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार.
The Wales national rugby लीग टोली represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी लीग फ़ुटबॉल matches.
फिलहाल the टोली is सातवाँ in the rlif World Rankings.
The team were run under the auspices of the रग्बी फ़ुटबॉल लीग, लकिन an स्वतंत्र देह, वेल्स रग्बी लीग, अभी रनों the team from Cardiff.
A total of three वेल्श खिलाड़ी have महरूम डाला into the रग्बी लीग Hall Of Fame.
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting teams, Wales स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily रेड लिये अनेक सालो, सहित now.
However in their last World Cup campaign in 2000 वे किया पहनें a कमीज़ featuring the वेल्श ध्वज, adding a टच of ग्रीन and white.
The team is known as `` The Dragons '' और so the टीमों लोगो on the कमीज़ is a रेड ड्रैगन.
The टोली तिथि वापस to 1907, बनाना उन्हें the तीसरा oldest national side after England and New Zealand.
And it थी a touring नई जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई against in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड, चूंकि 1935 फ़्रांस, as खूब as सत्कार the touring ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड टीमों, although they rarely toured themselves, not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975.
For twenty-six सालो वेल्स competed विरूद्ध उनके दो biggest विरोधियों, इंग्लैण्ड and France, in the European Nations Cup, winning the trophy four times.
Wales have also competed in the World कप on तीन अवसरों, the पहला समय होने in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful tournaments to date, surprisingly making the semi-finals on दोनो अवसरों पहले होने पिटे by इंग्लैण्ड और Australia respectively.
Wales failed to qualify लिये the 2008 संसार कप, होने the दूसरी उच्चतम क्रमित पक्ष नहीं to do so, having lost to Scotland on points difference over two matches.
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head कोच और नियुक्त ली briers as कप्तान, having निभाई लिये वेल्स since 1998.
In recent seasons Wales have taken विशाल strides अंतर्गत पूर्व खिलाड़ी iestyn हैरिस जो रै coached वेल्स to वापस to वापस यूरोपीय कप सफलताओं, जिससे culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the फलन of the myocardium ( the दिल मांसपेशी ) लिये कोई कारण, प्रायः अग्रणी to दिल विफलता ; आम लक्षण हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) और परिधीय एडिमा ( सूजन of the legs ).
People with cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at रिस्क of खतरनाक फ़ॉर्म of irregular दिल beat and sudden cardiac death.
The most common रूप of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
Fuck in its शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the अधिनियम of यौन intercourse.
It is an अंग्रेज़ी शब्द कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The उत्पत्ति of the शब्द is अस्पष्ट.
it is प्रायः माना to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as कमीने और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a क्रिया, an क्रियाशील or an क्रियाविशेषण.
There are many common phrases which मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : this article adopts the U.S. Department of परिवहन 's परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी, to औसत a car or ट्रक, प्रयुक्त लिये यात्री, excluding बसें और रेल.
The United States is home to the largest यात्री गाडी मार्केट of कोई देश in the संसार.
Overall, there were an अनुमानित 254.4 लाख पंजीकृत यात्री वाहनों in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 DOT study.
This number, along with the औसत आयु of वाहनों, रै increased steadily चूंकि 1960, indicating a growing number of vehicles per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to soon exceed the United राज्य ; by the समाप्त of 2012, वहीँ यहूद over 240 लाख गाड़ियाँ on the road in China.
The United States is also home to three विशाल गाडी निर्माताओं : सामान्य मोटर्स, घाट मोटर कम्पनी और क्रिसलर, जिससे have historically महरूम referred to as the `` Big Three. ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the शीर्ष तीन ; लकिन is number five, behind Toyota and Honda.
The motor car has clearly become an अभिन्न भाग of अमरीकी जीवन, साथ वाहनों outnumbering licensed drivers.
नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला in a हॉस्पिटल सेटिंग showing several automated analysers.
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory जहाँ परीक्षण हैं किया on नैदानिक नमूनों in अनुक्रम to मिलेंगी सूचना परिचय the स्वास्थ्य of a रोगी as pertaining to the निदान, उपचार, और prevention of disease.
In पोकर, खिलाड़ी construct हैंड्स of पाँच ताश according to predetermined rules, which vary according to which variant of poker is being played.
These hands are compared using a hand ranking प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार सब विसंगतियाँ of पोकर, the खिलाड़ी साथ the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker.
In कुछ विसंगतियाँ, the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie.
ये हाथ rankings हैं भी प्रयुक्त in कुछ अन्य card games, and in poker dice.
The ranking of a particular हाथ is increased by सहित अनेक ताश of the वही कार्ड रैंक, by सब पाँच cards being from the same suit, or by all five cards being of consecutive rank.
The relative ranking of the विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी is आधारित on the probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
Bruce रान्डेल hornsby ( born नवम्बर 23, 1954 ) is an अमरीकी virtuoso ; a सिंगर, pianist, सिंथेसाइज़र, accordion, and dulcimer player, and songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity और रचनात्मकता of उसके सजीव प्रदर्शन, hornsby draws अक्सर इससे शास्त्रीय, जैज़, ब्लूग्रास, लोक, motown, इन्जील, rock, blues, and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a क्रमांक of अवसरों साथ उद्योग पुरस्कार, सहित the बेहतरीन नई कलाकार ग्रैमी in 1987 साथ ब्रूस hornsby and the Range, the Best Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990, and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993.
Hornsby has also हासिल मान्यता लिये उसके सोलो एल्बम और प्रदर्शन, उसके touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers, उसके ब्लूग्रास प्रोजेक्ट with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician.
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a सदस्य of the बैंड इससे सितंबर 1990 to कूच 1992, playing at over one hundred shows during that period.
Sugarcane वृक्षारोपण in ग्रामीण Cuba
Agriculture in क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भाग in the अर्थव्यवस्था for several hundred years.
Agriculture contributes less than 10 percent to the gross domestic product ( जीडीपी ), लकिन it employs roughly 20 प्रतिशत of the working जनसांख्यिकी.
About 30 प्रतिशत of the देश 's जमीन is प्रयुक्त लिये क्रॉप cultivation.
The inefficient agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा रै led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
Cuba now imports परिचय 80 % of the खाना it rations to the पब्लिक.
The rationing कार्यक्रम खाते लिये परिचय a तीसरा of the खाना उर्जा the average Cuban consumes.
Overall, however, क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports लिये तभी 16 % of its food.

Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game Mega Millions as the successor of the बिग खेल ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional $ 1 लॉटरी game.
The first ( The Big खेल ) आचमन लाखो आरेखण थी in 2002 ( see below ).
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 equal वार्षिक किश्तों ( जबतक the नकदी विकल्प is चुनी ) ; प्रायः, the जैकपॉट increases जब वहीँ is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no jackpot winner लिये the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18, 2012 आरेखण, the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 लिये the आरेखण to be held on December 21.
( See below लिये सूचना on कैसा the खेल 's जैकपॉट is funded. )
Reflecting common practice among American lotteries, the जैकपॉट is advertised as a नाममात्र मान of सालाना किश्तों.
a नकदी मान विकल्प ( the usual चुनाव ), जब चुनी by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ), pays the approximate present value of the installments.
Mega लाखो फिलहाल उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46 ( the Mega Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers.
Each खेल लागत $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the exception ), वहीँ is an विकल्प, पुकारा megaplier ( ऐसे खेल हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot पुरस्कार are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier थी बना उपलब्धियाँ to सब आचमन लाखो jurisdictions in जनवरी 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option.
आचमन लाखो is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी time Tuesdays and Fridays, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of इसके 12 असली lotteries और the drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta, Georgia.
पर्यवेक्षित by the जॉर्जिया लॉटरी.
The largest जैकपॉट in आचमन लाखो, as खूब as in अमरीकी लॉटरी इतिहास, थी $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( साथ a नकदी विकल्प of $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the कूच 30, 2012 drawing in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois, Kansas, and Maryland.
All three टिकटें था महरूम claimed as of अप्रैल 18, साथ प्रत्येक नियत of विजेता चुनना the cash option.
is a जापानी manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक tsugumi ohba और manga कलाकार Takeshi Obata.
The main character is Light Yagami, a high school student who discovers a अलौकिक कोपी, the `` मौत नोट '', dropped on धरती by a shinigami ( a परमेश्वर of मौत ) named Ryuk.
The Death Note grants its user the ability to मार anyone जिनकी नाम और फेस वे जान, by लिखने the नाम in the कोपी जबकि picturing उनके face.
The series centers around लाइट 's attempt to बनाएँ और नियम a संसार `` cleansed of दुष्ट '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी, and the efforts of a detective known as L to stop him.
Death Note was first serialized in 108 chapters by shueisha in the जापानी manga पत्रिका साप्ताहिक shōnen जम्प इससे दिसम्बर 2003 to may 2006.
The series was also published in tankōbon स्वरूप in जापानी starting in may 2004 और समाप्ति in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes.
The anime series aired in Japan इससे अक्तूबर 3, 2006, to जून 26, 2007.
Composed of 37 episodes, the दुश्मनी थी विकसित by madhouse और निर्देशित by Tetsuro Araki.
A लाइट अनोखा आधारित on the श्रेणी, लिखा by nisio isin, was released in Japan.
Additionally, various video games have महरूम प्रकाशित by कोनामी लिये निन्टेंडो DS.
The series was adapted into live-action films released in जापानी on जून 17, 2006, नवम्बर 3, 2006, और फ़रवरी 2, 2008.
Viz मीडिया licensed the मौत नोट manga in उत्तर अमेरिका और रै प्रकाशित सब the बारह आयतन इससे the श्रेणी, a 13th आवाज़ जिससे serves as a `` reader 's guide '', as well as the light novels.
The episodes from the दुश्मनी पहला appeared in उत्तर अमेरिका as downloadable by IGN.
viz बाद licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it aired on bionix in कनाडा and on Cartoon Network in the United States.
The live-action films briefly निभाई in निश्चित उत्तर अमरीकी theaters since 2008.
however, none of the वीडियो खेल have thus far been published in North America or Europe.
मौत नोट is एक of साप्ताहिक shōnen jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of सब time, with sales over 26.5 million copies.
हैलोवीन or hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many विद्वानों, सब hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार, और त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other विद्वानों maintain कि it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween क्रियाएँ शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा पार्टियों, नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
New York नगर taxicabs दौरान midtown फटाफट घंटा in Manhattan
The taxicabs of नई यॉर्क नगर, साथ उनके distinctive पीला paint, are a widely recognized icon of the city.
taxicabs हैं संचालित by निजी कंपनियाँ और licensed by the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC ).
It also oversees over 40,000 अन्य for-hire वाहनों, सहित `` ब्लैक गाड़ियाँ '', commuter वैन और ambulettes.
`` medallion टैक्सी, '' the परिचित पीला कैब, हैं the तभी वाहनों in the नगर permitted to pick up passengers in response to a street hail.
