Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is निकला इससे the यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to हस्तांतरण जल, लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients through the plant.
U.S. महिलाओं suffragists demonstrating लिये the सही to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage also known as woman suffrage is the सही of महिलाओं to vote और to चलाएं लिये दफ्तर.
Limited voting rights were gained by women in स्वीडन, फिनलैंड और कुछ पश्चिमी u.S. राज्य in the late 19th century.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन यहूद formed to निर्देशांक प्रयत्न, विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of Women ( 1888 ) and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
In 1893, New जीलैंड, तब a self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश, granted वयस्क महिलाओं the सही to vote और the self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश of South Australia did the same in 1895, but also permitted women to run for office.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया federated in 1901, और महिलाओं acquired the सही to vote और स्टैंड in संघीय चुनावों इससे 1902, though uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962.
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the ग्रैंड duchy of फिनलैंड, तब भाग of the रूसी साम्राज्य, जिससे भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों of पार्लियामेंट in the 1907 संसदीय चुनावों.
नार्वे followed, granting पूरा महिलाओं 's suffrage in 1913.
In most पश्चिमी देशों, महिलाओं 's suffrage आए बाद संसार i युद्ध i i, साथ कुछ महत्वपूर्ण लेट adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971.
Women 's suffrage has generally been पहचाना बाद राजनैतिक अभियान to obtain it यहूद waged.
In many देशों it थी granted पहले universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a सही अंतर्गत the सम्मेलन on the विलोपन of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women, adopted by the United Nations in 1979.
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by डायने setterfield is a गोथिक सस्पेंस अनोखा, the लेखक 's पहला प्रकाशित book.
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian मान्यताओं पृथक इससे मुख्यधारा christianity.सोर्सs लिये descriptors : • millenarian : • restorationist : • ईसाई : • denomination : the संगठन रिपोर्ट्स विश्वव्यापी सदस्यता of over 7.78 लाख adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद, सम्मेलन attendance of over 12 million, and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million.
They are directed by the शासी देह of यहोवा 's गवाह, a समूह of बड़ो in ब्रुकलीन, नई York, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's गवाह ' मान्यताओं हैं आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और वे prefer to use their own translation, the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures.
They believe that the destruction of the उपस्थित संसार प्रणाली at armageddon is निकट, और कि the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's किंगडम on धरती is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind.
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the लेट 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the गठन of zion 's देखें मीनार ट्रैक्ट समाज —with significant organizational और doctrinal परिवर्तन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name Jehovah 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, थी अपनाया in 1931 to फर्क themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल छात्र समूह और symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the विरासत of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known लिये उनके door-to-door उपदेश, distributing साहित्य ऐसे as the बुर्ज and Awake !
, and refusing सैन्य सेवा और रक्त transfusions.
They consider उपयोग of the नाम यहोवा vital for proper worship.
They reject Trinitarianism, inherent immortality of the आत्मा, और hellfire, जिससे वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, Easter, birthdays, or other holidays and customs वे consider to have pagan origins असंगत साथ christianity.
Adherents commonly refer to their body of beliefs as `` the सच्चाई '' और consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider धर्मनिरपेक्ष समाज to be morally भ्रष्ट और अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी, और most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses.
Congregational disciplinary क्रियाएँ शामिल disfellowshipping, उनके पद लिये औपचारिक expulsion and shunning.
Baptized individuals जो formally छोड़ हैं माना disassociated and are also shunned.
disfellowshipped और disassociated individuals may आखिरकार be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The religion 's position regarding conscientious objection to सैन्य सेवा और refusal to सलाम नेशनल ध्वज रै brought it into विरोध साथ some governments.
Consequently, Jehovah 's Witnesses have महरूम persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ हैं बैन or प्रतिबंधित in कुछ countries.
Persistent legal challenges by यहोवा 's गवाह have बहकावे विधान सम्बन्धित to सिविल अधिकारों in several countries.
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 franco-italian रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल अमरीकी widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
It सितारों मार्लोन ब्रैंडो, मरिया श्नाइडर, और jean-pierre Léaud.
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual हिंसा और emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद और drew various levels of government censorship.
the mpaa दिया the फिल्मी an x दरजा upon रिलीज in the United States.
After revisions were made to the mpaa दरजा कोड, it थी वर्गीकृत as an NC-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored r-rated काटें in 1981.
The film has its nc-17 दरजा लिये `` कुछ सुस्पष्ट यौन content. ''
Windows XP is an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft लिये उपयोग on निजी कंप्यूटर, सहित घर and business desktops, laptops and media centers.
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24, 2001, it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, आधारित on संस्थापित उपयोक्ता base.
The name `` XP '' is short लिये `` अनुभव '', highlighting the उन्नत user experience.
Windows XP, the successor to Windows 2000 and Windows ME, was the first consumer-oriented ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft to be निर्मित on the खिड़कियाँ NT kernel.
Windows XP was released विश्वव्यापी लिये खुदरा बिक्री on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, और over 400 लाख नक़ल were in use in January 2006.
It was succeeded by खिड़कियाँ विस्टा in January 2007.
Direct OEM and retail बिक्री of खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on जून 30, 2008.
Microsoft जारी to बेचें खिड़कियाँ xp through उनके प्रणाली बिल्डर ( छोटी oems जो बेचें समवेत कंप्यूटर ) program until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and दफ्तर 2003 होता समाप्त on अप्रैल 8, 2014 और सुझाया कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी to migrate to a नए OS.
The NT -based संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, जिससे हैं प्रोग्रामित in c, C++, और सभा, हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके improved स्थिरता and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस, a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` dll नरक `` कि plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, improved side-by-side सभा प्रौद्योगिकी in खिड़कियाँ xp allows side-by-side संस्थापना, registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation.
It is also the first version of Windows to use उत्पाद सक्रियण to कॉम्बैट illegal copying.
During Windows XP 's development, the प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '', बाद whistler, अंग्रेजों कोलंबिया, as अनेक microsoft कर्मचारी skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics data उत्पन्न by जाल अनुप्रयोग, खिड़कियाँ xp थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली until August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost प्रत्येक माह चूंकि at तनिक नवम्बर 2007, the पहला माह लिये जिससे आंकडे हैं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ from Net Applications.
`` पोर ऊना cabeza '' is an अर्जेंटाइन टैंगो साथ म्यूज़िक और गीत लिखा in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively.
The name is a स्पेनी horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head.
The गीत बोलो of a बाध्यता horse-track जुआरी जो compares उसके व्यसन for horses with his attraction to women.
Alfredo Le Pera was a ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são पाउलो, a much italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in ब्राज़ील, और भी the जन्मस्थान of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá.
Le Pera and gardel died in an वायुयान क्रैश in medellín, ( Colombia ), on June 24, 1935.
Por ऊना cabeza
The tango has चूंकि महरूम performed by numerous टैंगो orchestras.
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), Schindler 's List ( 1993 ), True Lies ( 1994 ), Titanic ( 1996 ), Bad Santa ( uncut संस्करण, 2003 ), सब the किंग 's मेन ( 2006 ), ग्रह 51 ( 2009 ), एपीसोड 37 of nip/tuck ( 2003–2010 ), एपीसोड 9 of दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक श्रेणी मीठी जासूस ( 2005–08 ), the शुरूआत और समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry, I Love You ( 2004 ), and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ).
In the movie Frida ( Salma हायेक, 2002 ), gardel is सुना गायन it on a radio.
It is also कोटेड in दाउद डेल tredici 's `` Good News !
nilda is वापस '' ( इससे the सोंग साईकिल Miz Inez Sez ).
In Scent of a स्त्री ( 1992 ), the टैंगो is performed by the `` the टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '', जो दरअसल appear in the dancing scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ).
John Williams arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the एल्बम `` सिनेमा serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have भी performed the टुकड़ा साथ in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट.
In 2012 a dance version was released by the समूह `` da करेरा '' featuring the असली गायन recording by Carlos Gardel.
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is एक of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms लिये maintaining blood pressure.
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease इसलिए causing रक्त दबाव to घटी ; likewise, decreased रक्त दबाव activates the baroreflex, causing दिल रेट to बढ़ाएँ यूँ causing an बढ़ाएँ in blood pressure.
The system relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, ज्ञात as baroreceptors, in the aortic मेहराब, carotid साइनस, और elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem.
Subsequent changes in रक्त दबाव हैं mediated by the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली.
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative प्रतिक्रिया लूप in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin system.
The Loma Prieta earthquake, also known as the Quake of '89 और the संसार श्रेणी भूकंप, थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave परिमाण 7.1 ) और on the open-ended Richter Scale.
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया, घायल 3,757 और बाएँ कुछ 3,000–12,000 लोगों homeless.
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 संसार श्रेणी, featuring दोनो of the खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल 's प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टीमों, the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related sports coverage, this was the first major earthquake in the संयुक्त राज्य to have इसके आरंभिक धक्का ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव on टेलीविज़न.
Pawn in the मानक staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most हालातों the weakest टुकड़ा in the खेल of शतरंज, historically representing infantry or, more particularly, armed peasants or pikemen.
In chess, each player begins the game with eight pawns, one on each square of the rank तत्काल in सामने of the अन्य टुकड़े.
( in बीजीय संकेतन, the श्वेत प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, जबकि black pawns start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
व्यक्तिगत प्यादे हैं referred to by the संचिका on which they stand.
लिये उदाहरण, एक बोलती of `` श्वेत 's f-pawn '' or `` ब्लैक 's b-pawn '', or कम commonly ( using descriptive notation ), `` White 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn ''.
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn, meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file, a नाईट साहूकार ( on the b- or g-file ), a बिशप साहूकार ( on the c- or f-file ), a महारानी साहूकार ( on the d-file ), a किंग साहूकार ( on the e-file ), और a सेंट्रल साहूकार ( on either the d- or e-file ).
The सैन्य शक्तियां of the संसार have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals.
The हथियारबंद शक्तियां of सबसे विकसित देशों have अभी removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ).
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the सैन्य शामिल the 4 of the 5 सदस्यों of the un सुरक्षा परिषद ( संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस, और रूस ), the गणतंत्र of चीन ( ताईवान ), ऑस्ट्रेलिया, इसराईल, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, Argentina, and all NATO members excluding Turkey.
Hydrogen उत्पादन is the परिवार of औद्योगिक विधि लिये generating hydrogen.
Currently the dominant technology for सीधा उत्पादन is भाप reforming इससे hydrocarbons.
अनेक अन्य विधि हैं ज्ञात सहित electrolysis and thermolysis.
In 2006, the संयुक्त राज्य थी अनुमानित to have a उत्पादन capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen.
5 million टन of हाइड्रोजन यहूद खपत on-site in आयल शोधन, और in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया ( haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 million tonnes were an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali प्रक्रम.
Hydrogen उत्पादन is an अनुमानित $ 100 billion industry.
A basis point ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips '', भी ज्ञात as a `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई बराबर to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत पाइंट, or एक भाग प्रति टेन thousand, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ', and in that context is written with which looks like a प्रतिशत चिह्न ( % ) साथ दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the समाप्त ( जैसे a stylized रूप of the चार zeros in the denominator, हालांकि it originates as a प्राकृतिक एक्सटेंशन of the प्रतिशत ( % ) और permille ( ‰ ) लक्षण ).
A basis पाइंट is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis पाइंट = 1 permyriad = एक one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद of कम than 1 % हैं discussed.
The most common उदाहरण is ब्याज दरों, जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of कम than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is समतुल्य to a बदलें of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g. a 4.67 % रेट increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ).
Like percentage points, आधार अंक avoid the ambiguity between सापेक्ष और निरपेक्ष चर्चाएँ परिचय ब्याज rates by dealing only with the absolute change in numeric value of a rate.
For example, if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % ब्याज रेट, इस could refer to an बढ़ाएँ either इससे 10 % to 10.1 % ( सापेक्ष, 1 % of 10 % ), or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( निरपेक्ष, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the रपट says वहीँ रै महरूम a `` 10 आधार पाइंट बढ़ाएँ '' इससे a 10 % ब्याज रेट, तब we जान कि the ब्याज rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial industry to उपयोग आधार अंक to denote a रेट बदलें in a वित्तीय यंत्र, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between दो ब्याज दरों, सहित the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain loans और bonds may commonly be कोटेड in संबंध to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा, वे होगा प्रायः be quoted as a spread over ( or under ) the index.
For example, a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % प्रति annum ऊपर the लंदन interbank offered रेट ( libor ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over LIBOR, which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''.
The term `` basis point '' has its origins in व्यापार the `` आधार '' or the स्प्रेड between दो ब्याज rates.
Since the basis is प्रायः छोटी, ये हैं कोटेड multiplied up by 10000, और hence a `` full point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point.
कंट्रास्ट साथ pips in fx forward markets.
The relationship between प्रतिशत परिवर्तन और आधार अंक can be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट बदलें = 100 basis points, and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point.
So, a bond whose yield increases इससे 5 % to 5.5 % is कहा to बढ़ाएँ by 50 आधार अंक ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen 1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 basis points.
The अंग्रेजों royal परिवार is the समूह of बंद रिश्तेदारों of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people जो हैं the संबंध of the monarch in उसके or उसके भूमिका as sovereign of कोई of the अन्य राष्ट्रमंडल realms, यूँ sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by जनम or विवाह, the हाउस of विंडसर, चूंकि 1917, जब जार्ज v बदला the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at युद्ध साथ जर्मनी और दिए the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार 's दमदार जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक image could be improved by choosing a more British house name.
The new name chosen, Windsor, had absolutely no कनेक्शन अन्य than as the नाम of the किला जिससे थी और continues to be a royal residence.
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal परिवार, और अलग सूचियाँ होगा शामिल अलग लोगों, those carrying the स्टाइल उसके or उसके majesty ( hm ), or उसके or उसके royal highness ( hrh ) हैं सदा माना सदस्यों, जिससे प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs, the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons.
On 30 November 1917, King George V issued अक्षर पेटेंट धमक जो हैं सदस्यों of the royal परिवार ; the टेक्स्ट of the सूचना इससे the लंदन गजट is as follows:
In 1996, Her Majesty The Queen परिवर्धित ये अक्षर पेटेंट, as थी evidenced by इस सूचना इससे the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by सदस्यों of the royal परिवार to अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों to be born, evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and relatives of the British Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, sometimes लिये विस्तारित अवधि as viceroys, or लिये विशिष्ट ceremonies or कार्यक्रम.
Today, they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम और विदेश on निमित्त of the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Aside from the monarch, their only constitutional role in the अफेयर्स of सरकारी is to serve, if योग्य और जब नियुक्त by अक्षर पेटेंट, as a काउंसलर of राज्य, दो or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch.
In the अन्य realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do नहीं serve as Counsellors of State.
However in each such realm the monarch 's परिवार सदस्यों may अधिनियम on निमित्त of, हैं वित्तपोषित by, and represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the United Kingdom.
The Queen, her consort, her children and grandchildren, as well as सब पूर्व अधिपति ' children और grandchildren थाम स्थान in the पहला भाग of the आधिकारिक आदेश of पूर्वता in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स, स्कॉटलैंड, and Northern Ireland.
पत्नियां of the कहा आनंद उनके पतियों ' पूर्वता, और पतियों of राजकुमारियों हैं unofficially but habitually placed with their wives as well.
however, the महारानी बदला the निजी अनुक्रम of पूर्वता in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra, who henceforth take private precedence over the Duchess of Cornwall, who is otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself.
She did not alter the सापेक्ष पूर्वता of अन्य born-princesses, ऐसे as the daughters of her younger sons.
हैती ( ; haitian क्रियोल ayiti ), officially the गणतंत्र of Haiti ( ; ), is a Caribbean country.
It occupies the western, smaller portion of the island of Hispaniola, in the वृहद antillean द्वीपसमूह, जिससे it साझा साथ the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र.
Ayiti ( land of ऊँची kyu ) थी the स्वदेशी taíno or amerindian name for the island.
The देश 's उच्चतम पाइंट is Pic la Selle, at.
The total area of Haiti is और इसके पूंजी is port-au-prince.
Haitian Creole और फ्रेंच हैं the आधिकारिक भाषाएं.
Haiti 's regional, ऐतिहासिक, और ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय लिये अनेक reasons.
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean, the first black -led गणतंत्र in the संसार, और the दूसरी गणतंत्र in the americas जब it gained स्वतंत्रता in 1804 as भाग of a कामयाब स्लेव क्रान्ति स्थायी nearly a दशक.
In 2012, Haiti announced its intention to seek संबद्ध सदस्यता औकात in the अफ़्रीकी Union.
Haiti is the सबसे populous of the predominantly francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the Americas.
It is one of only two independent nations in the americas ( साथ साथ कनाडा ) to designate फ्रेंच as an आधिकारिक भाषा ; the अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं सब विदेशी départements, or collectivités, of France.
Haiti is the most populous पूरा member-state of the caribbean जातियाँ ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest देश in the americas as measured by the इंसान विकास Index.
राजनैतिक हिंसा रै occurred regularly throughout इसके history, leading to government instability.
Most recently, in February 2004, a तख्तापलट d'état originating in the उत्तर of the देश मजबूर the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन of अध्यक्ष Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A provisional government took control with सुरक्षा provided by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in हैती ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel Martelly, the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, थी निर्वाचित in the Haitian general election, 2011.
The island रै था a इतिहास of destructive earthquakes.
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck हैती on 12 जनवरी 2010 और तबाह port-au-prince.
The highest विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती थी अनुमानित at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates यहूद उच्चतर.
The Presidential palace, पार्लियामेंट और अनेक अन्य महत्वपूर्ण structures यहूद नष्ट, साथ साथ अनगिनत homes and businesses, leaving hundreds of thousands of people homeless.
The country has yet to रिकवर इससे the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake.
United राज्य सहायता संगठन have दान $ 2 billion.
Combined with other international दान, ये निधि हैं intended to योगदान to the rebuilding of the country.
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo, the इतालवी इलेक्ट्रो हाउस और dance-punk music producer, DJ and photographer.
The Bloody beetroots is well-known लिये the ब्लैक venom मुखौटा he wears दौरान performances.
In fact, the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार उसके छाती, जिससे is दोनो the साल कि the निर्माता and punk-rock was born.
`` The Bloody Beetroots DJ नियत '' contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo और टॉमी चाय.
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric pager used in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s, संचालित by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless telecommunications device that receives और प्रदर्शक न्यूमेरिक or टेक्स्ट संदेश, or receives और announces आवाज़ messages.
One-way pagers can तभी प्राप्त संदेश, जबकि जवाब pagers और two-way pagers can भी acknowledge, जवाब to, और originate संदेश using an internal transmitter.
Pagers operate as part of a paging प्रणाली जिससे शामिल एक or अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the मामला of जवाब pagers और two-way pagers, एक or अधिक आधार स्टेशन ), as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users.
These systems can range from a restaurant system साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर, to a देशभर प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों of high-power आधार स्टेशन.
One of the first practical paging सेवाएं थी शुभारम्भ in 1950 लिये physicians in the New York City area.
Physicians paid US $ 12 per माह लिये the सेवा और carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर कि होता प्राप्त फोन संदेश within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The system was manufactured by the reevesound कम्पनी और संचालित by Telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis Mitchell संयुक्त तत्व of मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और ऑटोमोबाइल रेडियो technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर, और इससे इस पाइंट, paging प्रौद्योगिकी जारी to advance, and pager adoption continued to expand, until the early 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as cellular technologies became सस्ता और अधिक widely उपलब्धियाँ, उन्नत सेवाएं began to displace paging as a वाणिज्यिक उत्पाद.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche उत्पाद, ढूंढना preferential उपयोग in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as अस्पताल, पब्लिक सुरक्षा, और खुदरा स्थितियाँ जहाँ उनके सादगी, high reliability, and low cost represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a town in dorchester काउंटी, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, संयुक्त राज्य.
The population was 196 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management और बजट, और प्रयुक्त by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो लिये सांख्यिकीय उद्देश्य तभी, reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – जुलाई 13, 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार, born in coyoacán, जो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began and ended in मैक्सिको नगर, in उसके घर ज्ञात as the ब्लू हाउस.
She gave her birth date as जुलाई 7, 1910, लकिन उसके जनम certificate shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her जनम to coincide साथ the साल of the शुरूआत of the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति so कि उसके जीवन होता शुरू with the birth of modern Mexico.
Her work has been celebrated in मैक्सिको as emblematic of नेशनल और स्वदेशी परंपरा, और by नारीवादी लिये इसके uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form.
Mexican culture और amerindian सांस्कृतिक परंपरा हैं महत्वपूर्ण in उसके कार्य, जिससे रै महरूम sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art.
उसके कार्य रै भी महरूम वर्णित as `` surrealist '', और in 1938 आंद्रे ब्रेटन, प्रिंसिपल initiator of the surrealist movement, described Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb ''.
Kahlo had a volatile विवाह साथ the प्रसिद्ध मैक्सिकन कलाकार डिएगो रिवेरा.
She suffered lifelong स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं.
Many of her स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं यहूद the परिणाम of a ट्रैफ़िक accident she survived as a teenager.
Recovering from her injuries isolated उसके इससे अन्य लोगों और इस अलगाव बहकावे उसके works, अनेक of जिससे हैं self-portraits of one sort or another.
Kahlo suggested, `` i पेंट खुद क्युकी i am so प्रायः अलोन और क्युकी i am the subject I know best. ''
वो भी stated, `` I was born a bitch.
I was born a चित्रकार. ''

theresienwiese on the दिन पहले Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in म्यूनिख, बायर्न, जर्मनी, कार्यशील इससे लेट सितंबर to the first weekend in October.
It is one of the most famous कार्यक्रम in जर्मनी और is the संसार 's largest मेला, साथ अधिक than 6 लाख people from around the world attending the event every year.
To the locals, it is not called oktoberfest, लकिन `` die wiesn '', बाद the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
The Oktoberfest is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of bar संस्कृति, having महरूम आयोजित since 1810.
Other शहरों आरपार the संसार भी थाम oktoberfest जश्न, modeled after the original Munich event.
The Munich oktoberfest originally took प्लेस दौरान the सोलह दिनों up to, और सहित, the first Sunday in October.
In 1994, the schedule was modified in response to German reunification so कि if the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर जलप्रपात on the 1st or 2nd, तब the festival would go on until October 3 ( German Unity Day ).
Thus, the festival is now 17 दिनों जब the पहला संडे is अक्तूबर 2 और 18 दिनों जब it is October 1.
In 2010, the पर्व lasted जबतक the पहला सोमवार in अक्तूबर, to mark the anniversary of the event.
The festival is held in an area named the theresienwiese ( फ़ील्ड, or मर्ग, of therese ), प्रायः पुकारा wiesn लिये छोटी, located near Munich 's center.
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are खपत, साथ लगभग 7 लाख liters परोसा दौरान the 16 दिन पर्व in 2007.
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ), Schweinebraten ( roast pork ), Schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड हैम ओल ), steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड मछली on a स्टिक ), würstl ( sausages ) साथ साथ brezeln ( pretzel ), knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ), käsespätzle ( चीज नूडल्स ), reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ), Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ).
A platter साथ चीज और garnishes
पहियों of Gouda
Cheese is a generic term for a विविध समूह of milk-based खाना products.
चीज is उत्पादित in wide-ranging जायका, textures, and forms.
Cheese consists of प्रोटीन और मोटे इससे मिल्क, प्रायः the मिल्क of गायों, भैंस, goats, or sheep.
It is उत्पादित by जामन of the मिल्क protein casein.
typically, the मिल्क is acidified और जोड of the एंजाइम rennet causes coagulation.
The solids are अलग और दबाया into फाइनल form.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at कुकिंग तापमान.
Hundreds of types of चीज इससे विभिन्न देशों हैं उत्पादित.
Their styles, textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's आहार ), whether वे have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat सामग्री, the जीवाणु और mold, the processing, and aging.
Herbs, spices, or wood धुँआ may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red color of many cheeses, such as रेड लीसेस्टर, is सामान्यतः formed इससे adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids ऐसे as vinegar or lemon juice.
Most cheeses हैं acidified to a lesser उपाधि by जीवाणु, जिससे फेरे मिल्क sugars into lactic acid, then the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are available ; most are produced by fermentation of the कवक mucor miehei, लकिन अन्य have महरूम निकाली इससे विभिन्न प्रजाति of the cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued for its portability, long जीवन, और ऊँची सामग्री of मोटे, प्रोटीन, कैल्सियम, और फॉस्फोरस.
Cheese is अधिक कॉम्पैक्ट और रै a longer शेल्फ जीवन than मिल्क, हालांकि कैसा long a चीज होगा रखना may निर्भर on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening.
Generally speaking, hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses, ऐसे as brie or बकरी 's मिल्क चीज.
Cheesemakers near a dairy प्रदेश may लाभ इससे fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, और निम्नतर शिपिंग लागत.
The long storage life of some चीज, विशेषकर if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind, allows selling जब बाज़ार हैं favorable.
Additional ingredients may be added to कुछ cheeses, ऐसे as ब्लैक मिर्च, लहसुन, chives or cranberries.
A विशेषज्ञ विक्रेता of चीज is sometimes known as a cheesemonger.
To become an expert in इस फ़ील्ड, जैसे वाइन or कुकिंग, requires कुछ औपचारिक education and years of tasting and hands-on experience.
This position is typically responsible for all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the चीज मेनू, खरीदना, receiving, भंडार, और ripening.
Legal citation signals are a set of brief abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance of a विधिक citation as it relates to a proposition.
Signals help a reader quickly discern meaning or उपयोगिता of a particular सन्दर्भ जब the सन्दर्भ itself करता नहीं provide पर्याप्त information.
Most citation सिग्नल हैं लगाई in सामने of the citation to which they apply.
लिये उदाहरण, in the अनुच्छेद जब लिखने a विधिक तर्क, it is important to refer to primary sources.
To assist readers in locating these स्त्रोत, it is वांछनीय to उपयोग a मानकीकृत citation format.
See generally हार्वर्ड विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ, the bluebook : a वर्दी प्रणाली of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some न्यायालयों may आवश्यकता कोई विधिक papers कि हैं सुपुर्द to उन्हें to conform to a different citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` see generally, '' जिससे indicates कि the citation `` the bluebook : a वर्दी प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic.
Neil Alden Armstrong ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – अगस्त 25, 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी astronaut और the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा.
He was also an aerospace इंजीनियर, नवल एविएटर, परीक्षण pilot, and university professor.
पहले बनने an astronaut, आर्मस्ट्रांग थी an अधिकारी in the U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War.
After the war, he earned his bachelor 's उपाधि at purdue विश्वविद्यालयों और परोसा as a परीक्षण पायलट at the नेशनल सलाहकार कमेटी लिये aeronautics high-speed Flight Station, now known as the Dryden Flight Research Center, where he logged over 900 flights.
He later समाप्त ग्रैजुएट अध्ययन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी California.
A participant in the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स 's man in स्पेस soonest और x-20 dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight कार्यक्रम, आर्मस्ट्रांग joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962.
He made his first स्पेस उड़ान, as कमांड पायलट of मिथुन 8, in 1966, बनने नासा 's पहला civilian astronaut to fly in space.
On this mission, he performed the पहला डॉकिंग of दो spacecraft, with pilot David Scott.
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's दूसरी और पिछला spaceflight थी as मिशन commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
On this mission, Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface और खर्च दो और a हाफ घंटों exploring, जबकि माइकल कॉलिन्स remained in चंद्र कक्षा in the Command Module.
Along with Collins and Aldrin, Armstrong was awarded the Presidential पदक of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978, अध्यक्ष jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he और उसके पूर्व crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the आयु of 82, बाद जटिलताओं from coronary artery bypass surgery.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
He is considered to be एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds of सब time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th सदी, the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय थी sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He थी foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन काउंटी, Virginia.
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए the वही उपनाम, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny chenery, he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered रंगों और उसके दूल्हे थी एडी Sweat.
Secretariat stood लगभग लम्बा, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
Madrid (, ) is the पूंजी और largest city of Spain.
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire population of the मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5 million.
It is the third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय संघ, बाद लंदन और बर्लिन, और इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris.
The city spans a कुल of.
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the देश और the जातियाँ of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the city of Madrid, its conurbation and extended suburbs and villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha.
As the capital city of Spain, seat of सरकारी, और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch, मैड्रिड is भी the राजनैतिक, आर्थिक और सांस्कृतिक centre of Spain.
the वर्तमान महापौर is ana botella इससे the लोगों 's Party ( PP ).
The Madrid urban agglomeration रै the third-largest जीडीपी in the यूरोपीय संघ और इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती, शिक्षा, entertainment, पर्यावरण, मीडिया, फ़ैशन, science, culture, and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities.
Due to its आर्थिक आउटपुट, ऊँची मानक of जीना, और मार्केट आकार, मैड्रिड is माना the प्रमुख वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय और the इबेरिया प्रायद्वीप ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies, such as Telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain, the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप, और the सातवाँ सबसे visited नगर in the संसार according to फोर्ब्स.
Is the 10th सबसे livable नगर in the संसार according to monocle पत्रिका, in its 2010 index.
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest European cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > मैड्रिड is फिलहाल a प्रत्याशी नगर लिये the 2020 गर्मियाँ Olympics.
Madrid houses the headquarters of the संसार पर्यटन संगठन ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ), the SEGIB, the Organization of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It also hosts major अंतरराष्ट्रीय संस्थानों regulators of स्पेनी : the खड़ा कमेटी of the संघ of स्पेनी भाषा अकादमियों, मुख्यालय of the royal स्पेनी अकादमी ( rae ), the cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes मेलों as fitur, आरको, simo tci और the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week.
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure, it रै preserved the dekh और महसूस of अनेक of इसके ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods and streets.
Its landmarks include the royal राजमहल of मैड्रिड ; the teatro रियल ( royal थिएटर ) साथ इसके लौटी 1850 ओपेरा हाउस ; the buen retiro पार्क, संस्थापित in 1631 ; the 19th-century नेशनल पुस्तकालयों भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय, and the Golden Triangle of Art, located along the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum, the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía, a museum of modern art, and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums.
Cibeles Palace and फव्वारा have become the स्मारक प्रतीक of the city.
The path of the via appia और of the via appia Traiana.
Remains of the appian रास्ता in रोम, निकट Quarto Miglio
निकट रोम.
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : via appia ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक सबसे महत्वपूर्ण रोमन सड़कें of the ancient republic.
It connected Rome to brindisi, apulia, in southeast Italy.
Its महत्व is indicated by इसके आम name, recorded by Statius :
appia teritur रेजिना longarum viarum
`` the appian रास्ता is the महारानी of the long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor जो began और समाप्त the पहला खण्ड as a सैन्य सड़क to the दक्षिण in 312 bc दौरान the samnite युद्धों.
The Draupner wave, a single दानव वेव measured on नई साल 's दिन 1995, आखिरकार पुष्टि the अस्तित्व of freak waves, which had previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves, monster waves, killer waves, चरम लहरें, और असामान्य लहरें ) हैं अपेक्षाकृत विशाल और spontaneous समंदर सतह लहरें कि occur दूर आउट at समुद्र, और हैं a threat even to large ships and ocean liners.
In oceanography, they are more precisely पारिभाषित as लहरें जिनकी ऊँचाई is अधिक than twice the significant वेव ऊँचाई ( swh ), जिससे is itself पारिभाषित as the औसत of the largest तीसरा of लहरें in a wave record.
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest लहरें मिला at समुद्र ; वे हैं, बल्कि, surprisingly विशाल लहरें for a given sea state.
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause, but occur where शारीरिक कारकों ऐसे as ऊँची हवाएँ और दमदार currents कारण लहरें to विलय to बनाएँ a सिंगल exceptional large wave.
Electress sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people योग्य to सफल to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त किंगडम और the अन्य 15 राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
The Act of उपनिवेश 1701 bestowed उत्तराधिकार on the electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों while excluding Roman Catholics.
The British government does not publish an official list of all those in line to सफल, लकिन the कार्य of genealogical लेखक और amateur शोधकर्ताओं suggests कि वहीँ हैं अनेक thousand people potentially in line.
At a समिट in पर्थ, पश्चिमी ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 2011, the heads of सरकारी of सब 16 राष्ट्रमंडल realms सहमत to लो कदम to adopt absolute primogeniture, end the exclusion of people married to Roman Catholics, and make other changes in the succession rules.
The line of succession is also used to select the counsellors of राज्य ( और a रीजेंट if the need arises ) अंतर्गत the provisions of the Regency Act 1937.
For earlier versions of the line of succession, देखिए इतिहास of the अंग्रेजों लकीर of उत्तराधिकार.
Edward मोंटगोमरी क्लिफ्ट ( अक्तूबर 17, 1920july 23, 1966 ) थी an अमरीकी फिल्मी और स्टेज कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody, sensitive young men ''.
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; उदाहरण शामिल the सोशल climber in जार्ज स्टीवंस 's a प्लेस in the सूर्य, the anguished कैथोलिक पुजारी in हिचकॉक 's i कबूल, the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत, and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions.
Later, after a disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956, और दारू और नुस्खा ड्रग गाली, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important roles were still his, including `` the reckless, alcoholic, mother-fixated रोडियो यजमान '' in जॉन हस्टन 's the misfits, the शीर्षक भूमिका in हस्टन 's, और the विशेषज्ञता शिविर शिकार in स्टेनली Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his करियर, तीन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और एक लिये बेहतरीन supporting कर्ता.
The War on Terror ( also known as the वैश्विक युद्ध on आतंक ) is a पद commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States.
This resulted in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान to eliminate al-qaeda and other militant organizations.
The United Kingdom and many अन्य नाटो और non-nato राष्ट्र participate in the conflict.
The phrase 'War on Terror ' was first used by US अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश on 20 सितंबर 2001.
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term to signify a वैश्विक सैन्य, राजनैतिक, lawful, और conceptual struggle—targeting दोनो organizations designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them.
It was typically प्रयुक्त साथ a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी Islamists, al-Qaeda, and other jihadi groups.
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the पद विदेशी आकस्मिकता आपरेशन ), it is स्टिल commonly प्रयुक्त by राजनेता, in the मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially, ऐसे as the संयुक्त States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal.
German battleship schleswig-holstein, westerplatte, September 1, 1939
Destroyer USS शॉ exploding बाद उसके आगे पत्रिका थी detonated दौरान the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic issues, अनसुलझे मुद्दे, और resentments resulting इससे संसार युद्ध i और the interwar काल in यूरोपीय, in जोड to the प्रभाव of the ग्रेट अवसाद in the 1930s.
The culmination of events कि led to the outbreak of युद्ध हैं generally समझा to be the 1939 आक्रमण of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan.
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी और by the नेतृत्व of the kwantung फौज in Japan.
World War II started बाद ये आक्रामक क्रियाएँ यहूद मिले साथ an आधिकारिक घोषणा of युद्ध and/or armed resistance.

the सूची करता नहीं शामिल जीव ; लिये these, see List of Greek mythological creatures.
The मित्सुबिशी galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969 and 2012.
The name was derived इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द galant, अर्थ `` chivalrous ''.
There have been nine distinct पीढियां, और संचयी बिक्री अभी exceed पाँच लाख.
It began as a compact सेडान, लकिन over the कोर्स of इसके जीवन रै विकसित into a larger mid-size car.
आरंभिक उत्पादन थी तभी आधारित in जापानी, लकिन चूंकि 1994 the अमरीकी मार्केट रै महरूम परोसा by वाहनों समवेत at the पूर्व diamond-star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त दबाव, is the दबाव exerted by circulating blood upon the walls of blood vessels, and is one of the principal vital signs.
When used without further specification, `` blood दबाव '' प्रायः refers to the arterial दबाव of the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण.
During each heartbeat, blood दबाव varies between a अधिकतम ( systolic ) और a न्यूनतम ( diastolic ) pressure.
The रक्त दबाव in the परिसंचरण is प्रधानतया due to the pumping action of the heart.
Differences in mean blood pressure are जिम्मेदार लिये रक्त प्रवाह इससे एक स्थान to another in the circulation.
The rate of औसत रक्त प्रवाह depends on the प्रतिरोध to प्रवाह प्रस्तुत by the blood vessels.
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating रक्त चालें दूर इससे the दिल through धमनियों और capillaries due to viscous losses of energy.
Mean blood pressure drops over the पूरे परिसंचरण, हालांकि सबसे of the पतन occurs साथ the छोटी arteries and arterioles.
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic शक्तियां ( e.g., दौरान खड़ा ) और valves in रगों, श्वास, और pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal मांसपेशियां भी influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification प्रायः refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव measured at a व्यक्ति 's अपर भुजा और is a माप of the pressure in the brachial artery, the major artery in the upper arm.
a person’s रक्त दबाव is प्रायः expressed in शर्तें of the systolic दबाव over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ), for example 120/80.
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an अधिकारी of the राज्य, लिये उदाहरण ) to unilaterally रोकें an आधिकारिक action, especially the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the United Nations Security Council, whose permanent सदस्यों ( चीन, फ़्रांस, रूस, संयुक्त किंगडम, संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ) can ब्लाक any resolution.
or it can be सीमित, as in the विधान प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation.
A veto only gives power to रोकें परिवर्तन, नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें ( except for the rare `` amendatory veto '' ).
Thus a veto allows इसके होल्डर to protect the status quo.
the अवधारणा of a वीटो देह originated साथ the रोमन consuls and tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate.
Sulfur डाइऑक्साइड ( भी गंधक डाइऑक्साइड ) is the रासायनिक compound with the formula.
it is a विषाक्त गैस साथ a pungent, तकलीफदेह महकते, कि is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
Since coal and पेट्रोलियम प्रायः contain गंधक यौगिकों, उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the sulfur compounds are removed before burning the fuel.
Further ऑक्सीकरण of so2, प्रायः in the उपस्थिति of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2, फ़ॉर्म H2SO4, and thus acid rain.
Sulfur dioxide emissions हैं भी a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere.
Both of ये impacts हैं कारण लिये चिंता over the environmental impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '', `` कमज़ोरी '', और `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated mg ) is an असंक्राम्य neuromuscular बीमारी अग्रणी to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability.
It is an autoimmune disorder, in जिससे कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular जंक्शन, inhibiting the excitatory प्रभाव of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
myasthenia is treated medically साथ acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, and, in selected cases, thymectomy.
The disease incidence is 3–30 मामले प्रति लाख प्रति साल और उठती as a result of increased awareness.
MG must be distinguished इससे जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes कि can उपस्थित समान लक्षण लकिन प्रस्ताव no जवाब to immunosuppressive treatments.
Reflective twisted nematic द्रव क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक.
Polarizing filter film with a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize light as it enters.
Glass substrate साथ ito electrodes.
The shapes of these electrodes होगा determine the आकार कि होगा appear when the LCD is turned ON.
लंबवत ridges etched on the सतह are smooth.
मुड़ nematic liquid crystal.
Glass substrate with common electrode film ( ito ) साथ आड़ा ridges to लकीर up साथ the आड़ा filter.
Polarizing फिल्टर फिल्मी साथ a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to भेजें लाइट वापस to दर्शक.
( In a backlit एलसीडी, इस परत is replaced साथ a light source. )
A liquid-crystal प्रदर्शक ( एलसीडी ) is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल प्रदर्शक, or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals.
द्रव crystals do नहीं emit light directly.
LCDs are available to display arbitrary बिंब ( as in a general-purpose कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शक ) or फिक्स्ड बिंब जिससे can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा, ऐसे as preset शब्द, अंक, and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock.
They use the वही मौलिक प्रौद्योगिकी, मगर कि मनमानी बिंब हैं बना up of a विशाल क्रमांक of small pixels, while other displays have larger elements.
LCDs are used in a चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, टेलीविज़न, यंत्र panels, वायुयान कॉकपिट displays, and signage.
They are common in consumer devices such as वीडियो खिलाड़ी, गेमिंग डिवाइस, घड़ियाँ, घड़ियाँ, calculators, और telephones, और have replaced कैथोड ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications.
They are उपलब्धियाँ in a wider दायरा of स्क्रीन आकार than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक, और चूंकि वे do not use phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
LCDs are, however, susceptible to चित्र हठ.
The LCD screen is more उर्जा कुशल और can be disposed of more safely than a CRT.
Its low electrical power खपत enables it to be प्रयुक्त in बैटरी -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक equipment.
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of खण्ड भर साथ द्रव crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome.
द्रव crystals यहूद पहला खोजा in 1888.
By 2008, worldwide sales of टेलीविज़न साथ एलसीडी screens exceeded सालाना बिक्री of crt इकाई ; the crt became obsolete for most purposes.
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a लक्ज़री होटल, कसीनो, और स्पा in अटलांटिक नगर, नई जर्सी, संयुक्त राज्य.
It is owned by Marina District Development, a संयुक्त venture between boyd गेमिंग और a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by mgm रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
The $ 1.1 अरब कसीनो होटल सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष और is the largest होटल in New Jersey.
The borgata खोली in जुलाई 2003 as a लास vegas-style megaresort and is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic City.

A विटामिन ( or ) is an सशुल्क यौगिक जरूरी by an सजीव as a vital nutrient in limited amounts.
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of यौगिकों ) is पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और जरूर be प्राप्त इससे the diet.
Thus, the term is conditional दोनो on the हालातों और on the particular सजीव.
For example, ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for इंसानो, लकिन नहीं लिये सबसे अन्य पशु, और biotin और विटामिन D are required in the human diet only in certain circumstances.
by सम्मेलन, the पद विटामिन शामिल neither अन्य अनिवार्य nutrients, ऐसे as dietary खनिज, अनिवार्य वसीय acids, or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often.
Thirteen vitamins हैं universally पहचाना at उपस्थित.
Vitamins are वर्गीकृत by उनके biological और रासायनिक कार्यकलाप, not their structure.
Thus, each `` vitamin '' refers to a क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब दिखाएँ the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध साथ a particular vitamin.
Such a set of chemicals is grouped अंतर्गत an alphabetized विटामिन `` जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' शीर्षक, ऐसे as `` विटामिन a ``, जिससे includes the compounds retinal, retinol, and four known carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the विटामिन in the देह, और हैं sometimes inter-convertible to एक another, as well.
Vitamins have विविध biochemical functions.
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of खनिज चयापचय ( ऐसे as विटामिन d ), or regulators of कोशिका और ऊतक विकास और differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ).
Others function as antioxidants ( e.g., विटामिन e और sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B complex विटामिन ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors, कि सहायता एंजाइमों in their work as catalysts in metabolism.
In इस भूमिका, विटामिन may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic समूह : For example, biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable अणुओं कि फलन to carry रासायनिक समूह or electrons between अणुओं.
For उदाहरण, फोलिक एसिड may carry मिथाइल, formyl, and methylene groups in the cell.
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ हैं विटामिन ' best-known फलन, the अन्य विटामिन कृत्यों हैं बराबर महत्वपूर्ण.
Until the mid-1930s, जब the पहला वाणिज्यिक yeast-extract विटामिन b जटिल और semi-synthetic विटामिन c संपूरक टैबलेट यहूद बेची, विटामिन यहूद प्राप्त solely through खाना सेवन, और परिवर्तन in आहार ( जिससे, लिये उदाहरण, could occur दौरान a particular growing season ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
However, vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic और synthetic-source multivitamin dietary और खाना पूरक और एडिटिव, चूंकि the middle of the 20th century.
World Muslim जनसांख्यिकी by प्रतिशत ( pew शोध बीच, 2009 )
संसार मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी in millions
Islam is the संसार 's दूसरी largest धर्म बाद Christianity.
According to a 2010 पढ़ाई, islam रै 1.62 अरब adherents, बनाना up over 23 % of the संसार population.
islam is the predominant धर्म in the मध्य ईस्ट, in सहेल, in the Horn of Africa and northern Africa, and in some parts of Asia.
Large communities of मुसलमान हैं भी मिला in चीन, the balkans, और रूस.
Other parts of the world host large मुस्लिम अप्रवासी समुदायों ; in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, लिये उदाहरण, islam is the दूसरी largest धर्म after Christianity, where it represents 6 % of the total population.
according to the pew शोध बीच in 2010 वहीँ यहूद 49 muslim-majority countries.
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims live in दक्षिण और southeast एशिया, साथ over 1 अरब adherents.
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान, followed by पाकिस्तानी ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of मुसलमान सजीव in Arab countries.
In the मध्य ईस्ट, the non-arab देशों of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी, Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities.
A पढ़ाई conducted by the pew शोध बीच in 2010 और released January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world.
The study found more Muslims in the United किंगडम than in लेबनान और अधिक in चीन than in सीरियाई.
Rhode Island ( or ), officially the राज्य of rhode द्वीप और विधाता बागानों, is a state in the New England region of the United States.
Rhode Island is the smallest in क्षेत्रफल, the आठवीं तनिक populous, लकिन the दूसरी सबसे densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey.
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and मैसाचुसेट्स to the उत्तर और ईस्ट, और it साझा a जल boundary साथ नई यॉर्क 's long द्वीप to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Rhode Island थी the पहला of the 13 असली colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे अंग्रेजों नियम, declaring itself स्वतंत्र on May 4, 1776, two months before any other colony.
The State was also the पिछला of the तेरह असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` the समंदर राज्य '', a सन्दर्भ to the राज्य 's भूगोल, चूंकि rhode द्वीप रै अनेक विशाल bays और inlets कि राशि to about 14 % of its total area.
Its land area is, but its total क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the United Arab Emirates, स्तिथ भीतर the अमीर of the वही नाम.
the अमीर of दुबई is स्तिथ on the southeast coast of the पारसी गल्फ on the arabian प्रायद्वीप and is one of the seven emirates that make up the country.
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest जमीन territory by क्षेत्रफल ( 4,114 km2 ) बाद abu धाबी.
Dubai and Abu Dhabi, the national capital, are the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of नेशनल महत्व in the देश 's legislature.
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman metropolitan area.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a देश or city-state और, in कुछ मामले, the uae as a पूरे रै महरूम described as 'Dubai '.
the earliest जिक्र of दुबई is in 1095 ad, और the earliest recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799.
The Sheikhdom of Dubai थी formally स्थापित in 1833 by शेख़ maktoum बिन butti al-maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति of the bani yas, जीना in कया थी तब the दूसरी सऊदी राज्य और now part of Saudi Arabia, to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas.
It remained under the tribe 's control when the United Kingdom assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the country 's second emirate.
Its strategic geographic location made the कस्बा an महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार हब और by the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी, दुबई थी already an important regional port.
Today, Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that has grown steadily to become a global city and a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और the पारसी Gulf region.
Although Dubai 's अर्थव्यवस्था थी historically निर्मित on the आयल उद्योग, the अमीर 's western-style मॉडल of business drives its economy with the main revenues now coming from tourism, real estate, and financial services.
Dubai has recently attracted world ध्यान through अनेक अभिनव विशाल निर्माण प्रोजेक्ट और खेल कार्यक्रम.
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings, such as the world 's tallest burj खलीफा, in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी विकास प्रोजेक्ट सहित man-made आइलैंड्स, होटल, और कुछ of the largest खरीदारी मॉल in the प्रदेश और the world.
This increased attention has also highlighted मजदूर और इंसान अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning the नगर 's largely South Asian paid workforce.
Dubai 's property market experienced a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम of the विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक downturn following the वित्तीय संकट of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai has made a steady and क्रमिक रिकवरी साथ सहायता coming इससे neighboring emirates.
The handful of new projects that are in the pipeline have been able to सहायता दुबई रियल एस्टेट मेक a वापसी.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in the world, and the most महंगी नगर in the मध्य ईस्ट, surpassing इसराईल 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai has also been rated as one of the best places to live in the Middle East, सहित by us अमरीकी वैश्विक परामर्श कड़ मर्सर जो रेटेड the नगर as the बेहतरीन प्लेस to live in the Middle East in 2011.
