Waves on an समंदर coast.
This animation uses Earth science data from a variety of sensors on NASA Earth observing satellites to माप शारीरिक oceanography पैरामीटर्स ऐसे as समंदर currents, समंदर हवाएँ, समुद्र सतह height and sea surface temperature.
An ocean ( ; the संसार समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता ) is a देह of saline जल कि composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere.
In the context of Earth, it refers to one or all of the major विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार समंदर – वे हैं, in descending अनुक्रम of क्षेत्रफल, the प्रशांत, अटलांटिक, भारतीय, दक्षिणी ( अंटार्कटिक ), और आर्कटिक Oceans.
The word `` sea `` is प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably साथ `` समंदर '', लकिन सख्ती बोलना a समुद्र is a देह of saline जल ( संभवतः a प्रभाग of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
Earth is the तभी ग्रह ज्ञात to have an समंदर ( or कोई विशाल amounts of open liquid water ).
लगभग 72 % of the ग्रह 's सतह ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline जल कि is customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल महासागर और छोटी समंदर, with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In terms of the hydrosphere of the Earth, the समंदर contains 97 % of the धरती 's जल.
Oceanographers have stated कि आउट of 97 %, तभी 5 % of the समंदर as a पूरे on Earth has been explored.
Because it is the principal घटक of धरती 's जलमंडल, the संसार समंदर is अभिन्न to सब known life, forms part of the carbon cycle, and influences climate and weather patterns.
the कुल आवाज़ is लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species, although much of the समंदर 's गहराइयों remain unexplored और it is अनुमानित कि over दो लाख समुद्री प्रजाति exist.
The उत्पत्ति of धरती 's महासागर is स्टिल अनजान, लकिन महासागर हैं believed to have formed in the hadean काल और may have been the impetus for the emergence of life.
Extraterrestrial oceans may be रचित of a चौड़ी दायरा of तत्व और यौगिकों.
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of टाइटन, हालांकि वहीँ is प्रमाण लिये the अस्तित्व of महासागर elsewhere in the सौर प्रणाली.
Early in their भूगर्भिक histories, मंगल और शुक्र हैं theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the surface of Mars was एकबार covered by जल, हालांकि the जल on मंगल is no longer oceanic, और a runaway ग्रीनहाउस प्रभाव may have boiled दूर the वैश्विक ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in जल निम्नतर इसके जमने पाइंट, so कि जल might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
अपुष्ट महासागर हैं speculated beneath the सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह and natural satellites ; notably, the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth.
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are also believed to possess द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों of yet to be पुष्टि compositions.
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons, including सतह महासागर of द्रव जल भीतर a परितारकीय ठहरने zone.
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of ग्रह साथ a सतह completely covered with liquid.
Elvis Aaron प्रेस्ली ( जनवरी 8, 1935 – अगस्त 16, 1977 ) was an American singer and actor.
A सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक, he is commonly known by the single name Elvis.
One of the सबसे लोकप्रिय संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley moved to Memphis, टेनेसी, साथ उसके परिवार at the आयु of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working साथ सूर्य रिकॉर्ड मालिक sam phillips, जो चाही to लाओ the ध्वनि of african-american म्यूज़िक to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist विधेयक ब्लैक, प्रेस्ली थी the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -ड्राइवn fusion of country and rhythm and blues.
RCA Victor acquired उसके अनुबंध in a सौदे arranged by कर्नल tom पार्कर, जो गई on to मैनेज the singer for over two decades.
Presley 's first आरसीए सिंगल, `` heartbreak होटल ``, released in जनवरी 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and फेंकें साथ a श्रेणी of संजाल टेलीविज़न दिखावे और chart-topping records.
His energized interpretations of songs, many from african-american स्त्रोत, और उसके uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना him enormously popular—and controversial.
In November 1956, he बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in प्रेम me टेंडर.
Drafted into military service in 1958, प्रेस्ली relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर दो सालो बाद साथ कुछ of उसके सबसे commercially कामयाब work.
He staged few concerts however, and guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to बनाना हॉलीवुड फिल्मों और साउंडट्रैक एल्बम, सबसे of them critically derided.
In 1968, after seven years away from the stage, he returned to live performance in a celebrated comeback television खास कि led to an विस्तारित लास वेगास कॉन्सर्ट रेसिडेंसी and a string of profitable tours.
In 1973 Presley मंचन the पहला कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via satellite, Aloha from Hawaii.
नुस्खा ड्रग गाली severely deteriorated उसके स्वास्थ्य, और he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42.
Presley is regarded as एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of 20th-century लोकप्रिय culture.
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide कामयाबी encompassing अनेक जाति, सहित देश, पॉप ballads, इन्जील, और blues.
he is the best-selling सोलो कलाकार in the इतिहास of popular music.
Nominated for 14 competitive Grammys, he जीती तीन, और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार at age 36.
He has महरूम inducted into अनेक music halls of fame.
A glass of रूट बियर साथ झाग
रूट बियर is a कार्बोनेटेड, sweetened पेय, originally बना using the रूट of a sassafras plant ( or the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor.
Root बियर, popularized in उत्तर अमेरिका, आता in दो forms : alcoholic and soft drink.
The historical root beer was analogous to छोटी बियर in कि the प्रक्रम provided a पेय साथ a बहुत कम दारू सामग्री.
Although roots are used as the source of many नरम पेय throughout the संसार, प्रायः अलग names are used.
Fluorescent minerals emit दृश्य लाइट जब उजागर to पराबैंगनी light
प्रतिदीप्ति is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित लाइट or other electromagnetic radiation.
It is a रूप of संदीप्ति.
In सबसे मामले, the उत्सर्जित लाइट रै a longer wavelength, और इसलिए निम्नतर energy, than the absorbed radiation.
However, when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense, it is संभावित लिये एक इलेक्ट्रॉन to अवशोषित दो photons ; इस two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted विकिरण may भी be of the वही wavelength as the अवशोषित विकिरण, termed `` अनुनाद fluorescence ''.
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the absorbed radiation is in the ultraviolet region of the वर्णक्रम, और यूँ अदृश्य to the इंसान नजर, और the उत्सर्जित लाइट is in the visible region.
Fluorescence has many practical applications, including mineralogy, gemology, chemical sensors ( प्रतिदीप्ति स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ), fluorescent लेबलिंग, dyes, biological डिटेक्टरों, और, सबसे commonly, fluorescent दीये.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the सिद्धान्त of लॉजिक और लॉजिकल विचार बाहर of a formal setting.
However, perhaps because of the informal in the शीर्षक, the precise परिभाषा of अनौपचारिक लॉजिक is a पदार्थ of कुछ विवाद.
Ralph H. जॉनसन और J. एंथोनी ब्लेयर define अनौपचारिक लॉजिक as `` a शाखा of लॉजिक जिनकी कार्य is to develop non-formal मानकों, मापदण्ड, प्रक्रियाओं for the analysis, interpretation, evaluation, criticism and construction of argumentation. ''
This परिभाषा reflects कया था महरूम अव्यक्त in उनके अभ्यास और कया अन्य यहूद doing in their informal logic texts.
Informal logic is संबद्ध साथ ( अनौपचारिक ) fallacies, नाजुक सोच, the सोच कौशल गति और the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` informal logic '' covers a `` collection of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of तर्क in ordinary भाषा कि remain करीब to the अभ्यास of argumentation than औपचारिक logic. ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the ग्रेट अवसाद began in अगस्त of 1929, जब the संयुक्त States economy first went into an economic recession.
Although the country spent दो महीने साथ घटती जीडीपी, it थी नहीं जबतक the वॉल गली क्रैश of अक्तूबर, 1929 कि the प्रभाव of a declining economy were felt, and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued.
The market क्रैश चिह्नित the शुरूआत of a दशक of ऊँची बेरोजगारी, गरीबी, कम profits, अपस्फीति, plunging farm incomes, and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement.
Although its कल्याणकारी हैं स्टिल अनिश्चित और विवादास्पद, the जाल प्रभाव थी a अचानक और सामान्य घाटा of confidence in the economic future.
The usual explanations include numerous कारकों, विशेषकर ऊँची उपभोक्ता कर्ज़, ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by बैंको और निवेशकों, और the कमी of high-growth नई उद्योग, सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक सर्पिल of reduced spending, falling confidence, and lowered production.
उद्योग कि suffered the सबसे शामिल निर्माण, कृषि as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted in the agricultural heartland, शिपिंग, खनन, and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed.
the अर्थव्यवस्था पहुँचे नीचे in the शीत of 1932–33 ; तब आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास until 1937, when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment.
The Depression caused प्रमुख राजनैतिक परिवर्तन in America.
Three years into the depression, Herbert Hoover खोया the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's आर्थिक रिकवरी योजना, the नई सौदे, instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम लिये राहत, रिकवरी and reform, and brought about a major realignment of American politics.
The Depression also resulted in an बढ़ाएँ of करणों of लोगों to अन्य देशों लिये the first time in American history.
For example, some आप्रवासियों गई वापस to उनके देशी देशों, और कुछ देशी us नागरिकों went to Canada, Australia, and South Africa.
It also resulted in the mass migration of people from badly hit areas in the Great मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the उत्तर, क्रमशः ( देखिए okies और the ग्रेट माइग्रेशन of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी ).
जातिगत तनाव भी increased during this time.
By the 1940s immigration had लौटे वापस to सामान्य, और करणों declined.
A well-known example of an emigrant थी फ़्रैंक mccourt, जो गई to आयरलैंड, as recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes.
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns, ऐसे as the use of stimulus packages, Keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It also shaped modern American साहित्य, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन steinbeck 's `` the अंगूर of प्रकोप `` और `` Of Mice and Men ``.
The Great अवसाद of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार market crash of October 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the गणतंत्र of तुर्कों, is a transcontinental देश, स्तिथ ज़्यादातर on Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : बुल्गारिया to the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया to the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया, इरान और the अज़रबैजानी exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the ईजियन समुद्र is to the वेस्ट ; और the ब्लैक समुद्र is to the उत्तर.
The Sea of Marmara, the bosphorus और the dardanelles ( जिससे साथ रूप the तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate Europe and Asia.
तुर्कों 's स्थान at the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes it a देश of significant geostrategic importance.
The country 's आधिकारिक भाषा is तुर्की, a turkic भाषा, जिससे is बोला by लगभग 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks, जो constitute between 70 % और 75 % of the जनसांख्यिकी according to the संसार Factbook.
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and, according to the same source, क्रमांक around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी जबकि अन्य जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों हैं अनुमानित to be at 7–12 %.
The विशाल बहुमत of the population is Muslim.
The area now called Turkey has been inhabited चूंकि the paleolithic, सहित विभिन्न प्राचीन आनातोलियाई सभ्यताओं और thracian peoples.
After सिकंदर the ग्रेट 's conquest, the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized, जिससे continued with the Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire.
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the क्षेत्रफल in the 11th सदी, starting the प्रक्रम of turkification, जिससे थी greatly त्वरित by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk सल्तनत of rûm शासित आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th century, the Ottoman beylik united आनातोलिया और निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of southeastern यूरोपीय, पश्चिमी एशिया और उत्तर Africa.
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following इसके शिकस्त in संसार युद्ध i, भाग of it यहूद occupied by the विजयी allies.
A cadre of young military officers, led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his सहयोगियों, व्यवस्थित a कामयाब प्रतिरोध to the allies ; in 1923 वे स्थापित the आधुनिक गणतंत्र of तुर्कों, साथ अतातुर्क as इसके पहला अध्यक्ष.
Turkey is a लोकतांत्रिक, धर्मनिरपेक्ष, एकात्मक, संवैधानिक republic with a diverse cultural heritage.
Turkey has become increasingly एकीकृत साथ the वेस्ट through सदस्यता in organisations such as the Council of Europe, NATO, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 major economies.
तुर्कों began पूरा सदस्यता negotiations साथ the यूरोपीय संघ in 2005, having महरूम an संबद्ध सदस्य of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered close cultural, राजनैतिक और आर्थिक संबंध साथ the मध्य ईस्ट, काकेशस, the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल एशिया और the अफ़्रीकी देशों through सदस्यता in organisations such as the Turkic Council, Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture, Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing economy and diplomatic पहलों have led to इसके मान्यता as a क्षेत्रीय power.
Turkey is the संसार 's 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था by नाममात्र जीडीपी और the 16th largest by purchasing power parity.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated ब्लैक स्त्री in the गहन दक्षिण.
वो प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This प्रदर्शन जीती उसके a दूसरी सुनहरी ग्लोब और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable बाद films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2, the खिलाड़ी, बना in अमेरिका, कैसा स्टेला Got Her Groove Back, Girl, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी, as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश, और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये 13 एमी पुरस्कार for her work in television.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड वर्गों from 1998 to 2004.
She has महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the दिन talk show The View since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two दिन emmys, दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार, चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, और रै महरूम honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is एक of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Award.
augusta is a संचित नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया, located at the fall line of the Savannah River, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the augusta– रिचमंड काउंटी जनसांख्यिकी थी 195,844 नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated cities of Hephzibah and Blythe.
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area, which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877, making it both the second-largest नगर और the second-largest मैट्रो क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य बाद अटलांटा.
It is the 116th-largest नगर in the संयुक्त States.
Internationally, augusta is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये होस्टिंग the मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट in golf each spring.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains data.
The name is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only memory ``.
कंप्यूटर can पढ़ा cd-roms, but can not write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र, सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी, जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The पीला किताब is the तकनीकी मानक that defines the format of CD-ROMs.
One of a set of color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप, the पीला किताब, निर्मित by सोनी और फिलिप्स, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the स्वरूप to थाम कोई form of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as ब्लैक चीलों पहले 1986, और ज्ञात colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a पेशेवर ice hockey team based in Chicago, Illinois.
वे हैं सदस्यों of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the पश्चिमी Conference of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
They have जीती चार स्टेनली कप championships चूंकि उनके founding in 1926, most recently in 2009–10.
The Blackhawks are one of the असली छह एनएचएल टीमों, साथ साथ the डेट्रॉयट रेड विंग्स, मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens, टोरंटो मेपल leafs, Boston Bruins and New York Rangers.
Since the ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई उनके घर खेल at the संयुक्त बीच बाद having खर्च 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium.
Lent याजकों carrying आउट a गली बारात during Holy Week.
The बैंगनी रंग is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ penance and detachment.
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in अन्य कैथोलिक देशों, sometimes संबद्ध साथ mortification of the flesh.
granada, निकारागुआ.
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical साल of अनेक ईसाई denominations, स्थायी लिये a काल of लगभग छह सप्ताह leading up to Easter Sunday.
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is taken to run from Ash बुधवार to maundy गुरुवार ( पावन गुरुवार ) morning or to ईस्टर Eve.
In the Catholic Church, Lent lasts जबतक पावन गुरुवार, जबकि अन्य denominations run until Easter Eve.
The परंपरागत purpose of lent is the तैयारी of the आस्तिक through दुआ, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of पावन सप्ताह, अंकन the मौत, दफ़न और क़यामत of यीशु, जिससे recalls the कार्यक्रम of the बाइबल जब यीशु is crucified on शुभ शुक्रवार, जिससे तब culminates in the जश्न on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ.
During Lent, many of the वफादार कमिट to उपवास or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries as a form of penitence.
The Stations of the क्रॉस, a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's carrying the क्रॉस और of उसके execution, are often observed.
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers from their altars, जबकि crucifixes, धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ, और अन्य विस्तृत धार्मिक प्रतीकों हैं प्रायः रहमत in बैंगनी fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain pious Catholic countries, some adherents चिह्नित the ऋतु साथ the परंपरागत abstention इससे the consumption of meat.
In some देशों, ग्रैंड धार्मिक जुलूसों और सांस्कृतिक कस्टम हैं observed, और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally described as स्थायी लिये चालीस दिनों, in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे, according to the gospels of मैथ्यू, चिह्नित और ल्यूक, यीशु खर्च उपवास in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry, where he endured temptation by the Devil.
However, अलग ईसाई denominations गणना the forty days of Lent differently.
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; यूँ the काल इससे राख बुधवार जबतक ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों जब the sundays हैं excluded.
however in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि than ईस्टर Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, along with its pious customs हैं observed by catholics, lutherans, methodists, Presbyterians, and Anglicans.
Location of chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति plant
The abandoned city of pripyat साथ chernobyl संयंत्र in the अलहदा
abandoned आवास ब्लॉक in pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The chernobyl विपत्ति is widely माना to have महरूम the worst नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र दुर्घटना in इतिहास, और is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The आधिकारिक सोवियत casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित, और long-term प्रभाव such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.
In व्याकरण, a विषय पूरक is a predicative अभिव्यक्ति कि फ़ॉलो a linking क्रिया ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
In the former case, a renaming noun phrase such as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम is पुकारा a predicative नाममात्र.
An क्रियाशील following the copula और describing the subject is called a predicative adjective.
in either मामला the predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject.
Subject complements are used with a small class of क्रियाएँ पुकारा linking क्रियाएँ or copula, of जिससे be is the सबसे आम.
Since copula हैं stative क्रियाएँ, विषय complements हैं नहीं प्रभावित by any action of the verb.
Subject complements हैं typically नहीं clause वितर्क, nor हैं वे clause adjuncts.
Throughout the fifty-five year इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम set.
This page only शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न artists.
This does not include the various special awards कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
The page however does include other non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have महरूम प्रस्तुत to the artist ( s ).
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm ) और by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार, is an अमरीकी rapper, record producer, songwriter and actor.
Eminem, along with his सोलो करियर, is a सदस्य of उसके समूह d12, और भी एक हाफ of the हिप हॉप duo ख़राब meets Evil, with Royce da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is one of the best-selling artists in the संसार और is the best-selling कलाकार of the 2000s.
He has been listed and ranked as one of the greatest artists of all time by many मैगज़ीन, सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका जिससे क्रमित उसे 82nd on इसके सूची of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
The same magazine घोषित उसे the किंग of हिप हॉप.
Including his work with D12 and ख़राब meets दुष्ट, एमिनेम रै हासिल टेन number-one एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
He has बेची अधिक than 100 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, सहित 42 लाख ट्रैक्स और 49.1 लाख एल्बम in the United States.
As an भूमिगत rapper एमिनेम released उसके डेब्यू solo album, Infinite in 1996.
The album was a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक विफलता.
He gained मुख्यधारा लोकप्रियता in 1999 बाद the रिलीज of his major-label debut album The Slim Shady LP.
The LP also earned Eminem उसके पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Rap Album.
His next two records The Marshall mathers lp, और the एमिनेम दिखाएँ, भी जीती बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, बनाना एमिनेम the पहला कलाकार to जीत बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम for three consecutive LPs.
This was followed by another स्टुडियो रिलीज in 2004 titled Encore.
Eminem then went on अंतराल बाद touring in 2005.
He released उसके पहला एल्बम in पाँच सालो titled पतन, on May 15, 2009.
In 2010, एमिनेम released उसके सातवाँ studio album Recovery.
Recovery was an international कामयाबी और थी नामित the बेहतरीन selling एल्बम of 2010 विश्वव्यापी, joining the एमिनेम Show, which was the best seller of 2002.
एमिनेम जीती ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये दोनो पतन और रिकवरी, giving him a total of 13 Grammys in his career.
Eminem has opened other ventures, सहित उसके अपना रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार रिकॉर्ड साथ उसके मैनेजर Paul Rosenberg.
He भी रै उसके अपना रेडियो चैनल, Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio.
Eminem began an acting career in 2002, जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the हिप हॉप नाटक फिल्मी 8 Mile.
he जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन असली सोंग, बनने the first rap artist ever to win the award.
He has also made कैमियो दिखावे in the धो ( 2001 ), मजेदार लोगों ( 2009 ) और the टेलीविज़न series Entourage.
The acre is a ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल and U.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी than an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल field.
The acre is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, बर्मा और the संयुक्त Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in कनाडा.
The international प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre.
In the संयुक्त राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा अलग US survey acre are in use.
the सबसे आम उपयोग of the एकड़ is to measure tracts of land.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square metres.
दौरान the मध्य आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक नई निष्कर्षों in the 19th सदी.
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions and जॉन डाल्टन 's परमाणु सिद्धान्त branched इससे the discoveries of एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये.
Lavoisier 's quantitative प्रयोग नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल ऑक्सीजन बल्कि than कया थी previously विचार to be phlogiston.
The law of conservation of mass, or principle of mass conservation, states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy ( both of जिससे have द्रव्यमान ), the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली जरूर remain निरंतर over समय, as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is नहीं added or removed.
Hence, the मात्रा of द्रव्यमान is `` conserved '' over time.
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed, although it may be rearranged in स्पेस, or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in रूप, as लिये उदाहरण जब लाइट or शारीरिक कार्य is रूपांतरित into अणु कि योगदान the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed.
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical प्रतिक्रिया, नाभिकीय प्रतिक्रिया, or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली, the द्रव्यमान of the reactants or starting सामग्री जरूर बराबर the mass of the products.
The concept of mass conservation is widely प्रयुक्त in अनेक फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रसायन, यांत्रिकी, और fluid dynamics.
Historically, mass संरक्षण थी खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये in the लेट 18th सदी, और थी of निर्णायक importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high सन्निकटन कि it विफल तभी लिये the ऊँची energies treated by the बाद refinements of आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, लकिन वरना remains उपयोगी और fear सटीक लिये सबसे रासायनिक calculations, even in modern practice.
In special relativity, needed लिये सटीकता जब विशाल उर्जा हस्तांतरण between प्रणालियों is शामिल, the अंतर between thermodynamically बंद और पृथक प्रणालियों becomes महत्वपूर्ण, चूंकि संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक systems, i.e. those completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment.
In this circumstance, the mass-energy equivalence प्रमेय राज्य कि द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा संरक्षण, जिससे is the पहला विधि of thermodynamics.
By contrast, for a thermodynamically closed प्रणाली ( i.e., एक जिससे is बंद to exchanges of पदार्थ, लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा, ऐसे as ऊष्मा और कार्य, साथ the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory, although the change is usually small, चूंकि अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by तुलना साथ ordinary अनुभव ) carry तभी a छोटी राशि of द्रव्यमान ( again by ordinary मानकों of measurement ).
In special relativity, mass is not converted to energy, since energy in all of इसके फ़ॉर्म सदा retains इसके समतुल्य राशि of द्रव्यमान throughout कोई परिवर्तन or translocation into, or out of, a system.
However, certain types of matter ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may be परिवर्तित to उर्जा, so long as the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली is अपरिवर्तित in the process.
However, if such energy is removed इससे प्रणालियों, वे जरूर खोना the द्रव्यमान कि is संबद्ध with it.
In general relativity, द्रव्यमान ( और उर्जा ) संरक्षण in expanding आयतन of स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा, विषय to अलग परिभाषाएं, and neither mass nor energy is as strictly and simply conserved as is the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space.
For a discussion, see mass in सामान्य आपेक्षिकता.
A pig is any of the पशु in the genus सस, भीतर the suidae परिवार of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the घरेलू सुअर, इसके पूर्वज the जंगली boar, और अनेक अन्य जंगली रिश्तेदारों.
Young और छोटी सूअर हैं ज्ञात as piglets.
सूअर हैं omnivores और are highly social and intelligent animals.
8-inch, -inch, और -inch फ्लॉपी डिस्क
8-inch, -inch ( पूरा ऊँचाई ), और -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` floppy '' चुम्बकीय सामग्री, removed इससे इसके आवास
A floppy disk, or diskette, is a डिस्क भंडार मीडियम रचित of a डिस्क of पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम, sealed in a rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles.
They are read and लिखा by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क ड्राइव ( FDD ).
Floppy disks, initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes, were a सर्वव्यापी रूप of आंकड़ा भंडार और एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the पहला दशक of the 21st सदी.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an बाह्य usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, और non-standard drives could only be handled by old equipment.
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses, especially with legacy industrial computer equipment, they have been superseded by आंकड़ा भंडार विधि साथ much वृहद क्षमता, ऐसे as usb फ्लैश ड्राइव, पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, ऑप्टिकल discs, memory cards, and computer networks.
An एनिमेटेड आरेख of a cutter
In baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball जिससे ब्रेक थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने पक्ष as it पहुँच घर plate.
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball, as it is प्रायः thrown तेज़ than a स्लाइडर लकिन साथ अधिक गति than a typical fastball.
Some pitchers उपयोग a कटर as a रास्ता to prevent hitters इससे expecting their regular fastballs.
a आम तकनीक प्रयुक्त to throw a कटर is to उपयोग a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand.
When a batter is able to hit a कटर पिच, it प्रायः परिणाम in नरम सम्पर्क और an आसान आउट, due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot.
The cutter is typically 2–5 किमी धीमा than a पिचर 's four-seam fastball.
In 2010, the औसत पिच वर्गीकृत as a कटर by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed पिचर थी 88.6 किमी ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph.
`` What It takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by अमरीकी hard rock band Aerosmith.
It was written by स्टीवन टायलर, जो पेरी, और डेसमंड चाइल्ड.
It was released in 1990 as the तीसरा सिंगल इससे एरोस्मिथ 's critically और commercially successful 1989 album Pump.
In the वीडियो the बनाना of पंप, a & r man जॉन Kalodner described the song as `` a masterpiece ''.
During live performances, Tyler sings the first verse a cappella and belts out एक of उसके हस्ताक्षर चिल्लाती सही पहले the कोरस.
The album version of the सोंग is followed by an बेनाम छुपा track.
सिर of odysseus इससे a यूनानी 2nd सदी bc संगमरमर समूह representing Odysseus blinding Polyphemus, found at the villa of Tiberius at Sperlonga
Detail of an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक of ulysses in ट्यूनीशिया
Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), also known by the Roman नाम ulysses ( ; ), थी a legendary यूनानी किंग of ithaca और a नायिका of होमर 's एपिक कविता the ओडिसी.
Odysseus also plays a कुंजी भूमिका in होमर 's इलियड और अन्य works in that same Epic Cycle.
Husband of Penelope, father of Telemachus, and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance, छल, और versatility ( polytropos ), और is hence ज्ञात by the epithet odysseus the cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning प्रज्ञा `` ).
He is most famous for the ten eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद the decade-long trojan युद्ध और उसके प्रसिद्ध Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy.
Erie is a statutory कस्बा in बोल्डर और वेल्ड काउंटी in the U.S. state of Colorado.
The जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 और थी अंकित as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25 लिये आसान अभिगम to i-70, डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोराडो 's संपूर्ण Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles, extending from the north side of राज्य राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to राज्य राजमार्ग 7, और between us 287 on the वेस्ट and Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, 25 मिनट्स to डेनवर और 20 मिनट्स इससे Boulder.
the फलक of trustees serves as the विधान और शासी देह of the कस्बा of erie और is जिम्मेदार for establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the authority to adopt laws, ordinances and रिज़ॉल्यूशन as needed to conduct the कारोबार of the कस्बा, और by अध्यादेश may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish, प्राप्त सेवाएं or to provide लिये सहकारी सेवा डिलीवरी.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees, the Town Administrator is the chief operating and प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर नेतृत्व in the प्रशासन और निष्पादन of नीतियों और उद्देश्य formulated by the Board.
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate और कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a सुरक्षित पर्यावरण, prevent अपराधों और enforce the विधि, while protecting the rights of all.
Erie Municipal Airport ( eik ) is स्वामित्व और संचालित by the कस्बा of erie और is रणनीतिक स्तिथ in the denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on Colorado Highway 7, a little over three miles west of Interstate 25.
The main रनवे is कंक्रीट प्रशस्त और 4,700 feet long.
The is a home video game console उत्पादित by सोनी कंप्यूटर entertainment.
It is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन 2, as भाग of the PlayStation series.
The PlayStation 3 competes साथ microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो 's वी as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
It was first released on नवम्बर 11, 2006, in जापानी, साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय बाज़ार following shortly thereafter.
The console was पहला officially घोषित at E3 2005.
Originally set for a spring 2006 रिलीज तिथि, it थी विलम्बित अनेक टाइम्स जबतक आखिरकार hitting स्टोर्स at the end of the year.
It was the पहला और फिलहाल तभी console to use Blu-ray Disc as its primary storage medium.
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service, the PlayStation संजाल, और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन वीटा, in सितंबर 2009 the अद्यतनीकृत प्लेस्टेशन 3 Slim, was released.
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the असली संस्करण, हालांकि it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on बाद असली मॉडल ), लकिन notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design.
As of November 4, 2012, 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s have महरूम sold worldwide.
Its successor, प्लेस्टेशन 4, is नियत लिये a q4 2013 release.
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto dalí i domènech, 1st marqués de dalí de pubol ( may 11, 1904january 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर dalí ( ), was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres, Spain.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the striking और विचित्र images in his surrealist work.
His painterly skills हैं प्रायः attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters.
His best-known work, The हठ of मेमोरी, थी समाप्त in 1931.
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film, मूर्तिकला, और छायाचित्र, in सहयोग साथ a दायरा of कलाकारों in a variety of media.
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive, my passion for luxury and my प्रेम of प्राच्य कपडे '' to a self-styled `` अरब lineage '', claiming कि उसके पूर्वजो were descended from the Moors.
Dalí was highly imaginative, और भी enjoyed indulging in असामान्य और वैभवशाली बर्ताव.
His eccentric manner और attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes खींचा अधिक ध्यान than उसके कलाकृति, to the dismay of those जो आयोजित उसके कार्य in high esteem, and to the irritation of his critics.

The humanities are academic disciplines that पढ़ाई इंसान संस्कृति, using विधि कि हैं primarily विश्लेषणात्मक, नाजुक, or सट्टे, और having a significant ऐतिहासिक element, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences.
The humanities शामिल प्राचीन और आधुनिक भाषाएं, साहित्य, दर्शनशास्त्र, धर्म, and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre.
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences शामिल इतिहास, मानवशास्त्र, क्षेत्रफल अध्ययन, संचार अध्ययन, सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन, विधि, अर्थशास्त्र and linguistics.
विद्वानों working in the मानवता हैं sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
However, that term also describes the philosophical position of मानवतावाद, जिससे कुछ `` antihumanist `` विद्वानों in the humanities reject.
Some secondary schools offer मानवता वर्ग, प्रायः consisting of अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य, वैश्विक studies, and art.
Human disciplines like history, cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject matters to which the प्रायोगिक विधि करता नहीं लागू, और वे have अभिगम बजाय to the तुलनात्मक विधि और तुलनात्मक शोध.
the 2005 ब्लू रूम Christmas Tree
The White House Christmas Tree, also known as the Blue रूम क्रिसमस पेड़, is the आधिकारिक अंदर क्रिसमस पेड़ at the निवास of the अध्यक्ष of the United States, the White House.
The first indoor Christmas tree थी संस्थापित in the श्वेत हाउस sometime in the 19th सदी ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक साल ) और चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग motif at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of government of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the निष्पादन of संघीय विधि, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, और न्यायिक अधिकारियों, और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी शक्तियां, साथ the सलाह और सहमति of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, और to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत असाधारण हालातों.
Since the founding of the संयुक्त राज्य, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष और the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली व्यक्ति in the world.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year पद, और is एक of तभी दो nationally elected federal officers, the other being the Vice President of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th और current president.
On November 6, 2012, he थी re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
Senses हैं physiological capacities of जीवों that provide data for perception.
The senses and their operation, classification, और सिद्धान्त हैं अतिव्यापी विषय पढ़ाई by a किस्में of फ़ील्ड, सबसे notably neuroscience, संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक विज्ञान ), और philosophy of perception.
The nervous प्रणाली रै a विशिष्ट संवेदी प्रणाली or organ, dedicated to each sense.
इंसानो have a multitude of senses.
sight ( ophthalmoception ), सुनना ( audioception ), स्वाद ( gustaoception ), महकते ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists, including temperature ( thermoception ), kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ), पीड़ा ( nociception ), संतुलन ( equilibrioception ), त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ), और विभिन्न आतंरिक stimuli ( e.g. the अलग chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक और carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ), only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves.
What constitutes a sense is a matter of some बहस, अग्रणी to कठिनाइयों in धमक कया exactly a sense is.
Animals also have receptors to भाव the संसार around उन्हें, साथ डिग्री of काबिलियत varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively कमजोर भाव of महकते, जबकि कुछ पशु may कमी एक or more of the traditional five senses.
Some animals may also intake और interpret संवेदी stimuli in बहुत अलग तरीके.
Some species of पशु हैं समर्थ to भाव the संसार in a रास्ता कि इंसानो can नहीं, साथ कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to भाव विद्युत और चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड, and detect water pressure and currents.
Spiders ( order araneae ) हैं air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest अनुक्रम of arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among all other groups of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक, और have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक आवास साथ the एक्सेप्शन of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति, और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
anatomically, मकड़ियों differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह segments are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, मकड़ियों do नहीं have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs और बजाय extend उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक दबाव.
Their abdomens भालू appendages कि have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen.
मकड़ी webs vary widely in आकार, आकार और the amount of sticky thread used.
It अभी appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म, और spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय, लकिन ये पशु जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम surviving order, the Mesothelae.
the प्रमुख समूह of आधुनिक मकड़ियों, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी, ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों, हालांकि a few विशाल प्रजाति भी लो birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing कंपन, लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि, और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts हैं too सीमित to लो solids, और वे liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male मकड़ियों पहचानो themselves by a किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid being eaten by the females.
Males of most species जीवित a few matings, सीमित मुख्यतः by their short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, each of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों of eggs.
महिलाओं of अनेक प्रजाति परवाह लिये उनके यंग, लिये उदाहरण by carrying them around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of species are social, building communal webs that may हाउस anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration, as in the विधवा मकड़ियों, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
Although most spiders सजीव लिये at सबसे दो सालो, tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can live up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans, scientists are now researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार, मकड़ियों have become आम प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.
Grey 's Anatomy is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न चिकित्सा नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी प्रसारण कम्पनी ( एबीसी ), as a mid-season बदलना on March 27, 2005.
The श्रेणी रै aired नौ सीज़न, और focuses on the fictional जीवनदान of सर्जिकल interns और निवासियों as वे gradually evolve into seasoned doctors, while trying to maintain personal lives.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda rhimes, जो serves as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता, साथ साथ बेट्सी beers, Mark Gordon, Krista Vernoff, Rob Corn, Mark Wilding, and Allan Heinberg.
The श्रेणी थी निर्मित to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind casting technique.
It is primarily फिल्माया in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
The श्रेणी ' समर्थक is dr. मेरेडिथ धूसर ( एलेन pompeo ), जो originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.
Meredith is आबंटित to कार्य अंतर्गत dr. मिरांडा बेली ( चन्द्रा विल्सन ), साथ साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ), dr. George O'Malley ( T. R. Knight ), Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ), and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death और स्टीवंस ' प्रस्थान, the हॉस्पिटल 's विलय साथ रहमत वेस्ट brings in dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( जेसी विलियम्स ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ), in the sixth season.
The surgical wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard Webber ( James pickens, jr. ), जो is आखिरकार replaced by dr. डेरेक गड़रिये ( पैट्रिक डेम्पसे ), और later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ).
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season, and is replaced by dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक स्मिथ ), जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान the पांचवां ऋतु, और बाद dr. टेडी altman ( किम raver ), जो प्रस्थान at the end of the eighth season.
Introduced in the second season is Dr. Addison Montgomery ( Kate Walsh ), who पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the तीसरा ऋतु, in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च उसके अपना spin-off medical drama Private Practice.
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the show in the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर of the नवीं season.
Meredith 's half-sister, dr. lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ), appears इससे ऋतु तीन और मरता at the end of season eight.
Dr. Arizona रॉबिन्स ( जेसिका capshaw ) is दिए श्रेणी नियमित औकात at the beginning of the sixth season.
Grey 's Anatomy is the highest-rated नाटक in the कुंजी 18–49 जनसांख्यिकी.
Previously among the overall top-ten रेटेड shows in the संयुक्त राज्य, धूसर 's anatomy रै महरूम खूब प्राप्त by critics.
Considered an impact on संस्कृति, the श्रेणी रै प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार, और रै also been included in various critics ' top ten lists.
The show has produced several specials, as खूब as वितरित सब सीज़न to dvd, और released a संग्रहण of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy was named the fifth-highest आय कमाई दिखाएँ, in शर्तें of विज्ञापन per half-hour.
On May 11, 2012, the series was नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं ऋतु, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a दिमागी विकार characterized by a विश्लेषण of विचार प्रक्रियाओं और by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
Common symptoms शामिल auditory मति, paranoid or विचित्र delusions, or disorganized वाक और thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in यंग adulthood, साथ a वैश्विक आजीवन व्यापकता of परिचय 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is आधारित on observed बर्ताव और the रोगी 's reported अनुभवों.
Genetics, early environment, neurobiology, and psychological and social प्रक्रियाओं appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; कुछ recreational और नुस्खा दवाएँ appear to कारण or worsen symptoms.
वर्तमान शोध is केन्द्रित on the भूमिका of neurobiology, हालांकि no single isolated organic cause has been found.
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the निदान represents a सिंगल विकार or a क्रमांक of अलहदा syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek जड़ें skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) और phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ), schizophrenia करता नहीं imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व '', or `` multiple personality disorder '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in public perception.
Rather, the term means a `` splitting of दिमागी कृत्यों '', क्युकी of the symptomatic प्रस्तुतीकरण of the illness.
The mainstay of उपचार is antipsychotic दवा, जिससे primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
Psychotherapy and vocational and social पुनर्वास हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण in treatment.
In more गंभीर cases—where वहीँ is रिस्क to स्वः और others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, हालांकि हॉस्पिटल stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were.
The disorder is thought mainly to affect संज्ञान, लकिन it भी प्रायः contributes to दीर्घकालिक problems with behavior and emotion.
People with schizophrenia हैं संभावित to have अतिरिक्त ( comorbid ) शर्तें, सहित प्रमुख अवसाद और चिंता विकार ; the आजीवन occurrence of substance use disorder is almost 50 %.
Social problems, such as long-term बेरोजगारी, गरीबी, और homelessness हैं आम.
The औसत जीवन प्रत्याशा of लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 सालो कम than those बगैर, the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ).

The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian लिये gilgamesh ), किंग of Uruk.
Four of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` बूढ़ा babylonian '' संस्करण, तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit, shūtur एली sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
fragments of लगभग दो तिहाई of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the best copies were discovered in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century bc assyrian किंग ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a दोस्ती between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba, इसके monstrous guardian.
Later they मार the सांड of स्वर्ग, जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a punishment for these क्रियाएँ, the देवताओं वाक्य enkidu to death.
The दूसरी हाफ of the एपिक focuses on gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to सीख the रहस्य of अनन्त जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
he learns कि `` the जीवन कि तुम are seeking you will never find.
When the देवताओं निर्मित man वे आवंटित to उसे मौत, लकिन जीवन they retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian संस्करण of the एपिक, और तब attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's कीर्ति जिया on बाद उसके मौत, क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट, और उसके खाता of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been अनूदित into अनेक अलग भाषाएं, और gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A सुकेन्द्रिक ( or ) is an सजीव जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain complex structures enclosed within membranes.
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the टैक्सोन eukarya or Eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic कोशिकाएं अलावा इससे prokaryotic कोशिकाएं is the केंद्रक, or नाभिकीय लिफाफा, भीतर जिससे the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried.
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name, which आता इससे the यूनानी ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) और ( karyon, `` नट '' or `` कर्नेल '' ).
Most eukaryotic कोशिकाएं भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All large जटिल जीवों हैं eukaryotes, सहित animals, plants and fungi.
the समूह भी शामिल अनेक unicellular organisms.
Cell division in eukaryotes is अलग इससे कि in जीवों बगैर a केंद्रक ( prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated गुणसूत्रों, through आंदोलनों निर्देशित by microtubules.
There हैं दो प्रकार of प्रभाग processes.
In mitosis, one कोशिका divides to उपज दो genetically एकसमान cells.
In meiosis, which is जरूरी in यौन जनन, एक द्विगुणित कोशिका ( having दो उदाहरण of प्रत्येक chromosome, एक इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of each pair of parental chromosomes, and then two stages of cell division, resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ).
Each gamete has just one complement of गुणसूत्रों, प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय मिक्सर of the सम्बन्धित जोड़ी of parental chromosomes.
Eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, और so makes up एक of the तीन डोमेन of life.
The two other domains, Bacteria और आर्किया, हैं prokaryotes और have none of the above features.
eukaryotes represent a छोटा अल्पसंख्यक of सब जीना बाते ; भी in a इंसान देह there are 10 times more microbes than human cells.
however, due to उनके much larger आकार उनके सामूहिक worldwide biomass is estimated at about equal to that of prokaryotes.
They are माना to have पहला विकसित लगभग 1.6–2.1 अरब years ago.
The use of Internet services or software with Internet access to defraud victims or to otherwise take लाभ of उन्हें, लिये उदाहरण by चोरी निजी सूचना, जिससे can भी सीसे to identity theft.
A very आम रूप of अंतरजाल धोखाधड़ी is the वितरण of rogue security software.
Internet services can be used to उपस्थित बेईमान solicitations to prospective पीड़ितों, to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन, or to संचारण the proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to वित्तीय संस्थानों or to others connected with the scheme.
Internet धोखाधड़ी can occur in गपशप कक्ष, ईमेल, संदेश boards, or on websites.
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a नाटो -led सुरक्षा मिशन in अफगानिस्तान कि थी स्थापित by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद in December 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement.
Its main purpose is to train the Afghan National सुरक्षा शक्तियां ( ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण कुंजी सरकारी संस्थानों लकिन is भी engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups.
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul और surrounding क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान, al qaeda और factional warlords, so as to allow लिये the स्थापना of the अफगान transitional प्रशासन headed by Hamid Karzai.
In October 2003, the UN Security Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF मिशन throughout अफगानिस्तान, और isaf subsequently विस्तारित the मिशन in चार प्रमुख चरण over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF had been involved in increasingly अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन in दक्षिणी और पूर्वी Afghanistan.
Troop योगदानकर्ता शामिल इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, नाटो member states and a number of other countries.
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly, with the United States, संयुक्त किंगडम, और कनाडा sustaining the बहुमत of हताहत in intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन, साथ अन्य योगदानकर्ता sustaining significantly कम.
As of early 2010, there यहूद at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases अंदर अफगानिस्तान लकिन अधिक यहूद अपेक्षित to be निर्मित in the coming सालो.
परिचय 400 of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by american‐led नाटो forces and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane एल्कलॉएड कि is प्राप्त इससे the पत्ते of the कोका plant.
The name comes from `` कोका '' और the एल्कलॉएड प्रत्यय -ine, forming कोका.
It is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, और a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, भी known as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ).
It is addictive because of its effect on the mesolimbic बदला pathway.
Unlike most molecules, cocaine has pockets with दोनो ऊँची hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता, violating the नियम of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
This causes it to क्रॉस the blood–brain अवरोध दूर बेहतर than अन्य psychoactive रसायन and may even induce blood-brain barrier breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, उपज, or वितरित cocaine for non-medicinal and non-government-sanctioned purposes in almost every country.

The tri-tip is a cut of बीफ इससे the नीचे sirloin primal काटें.
It is a small triangular muscle, प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड. ( 675 to 1,150g ) प्रति पक्ष of बीफ.
The scientific name of this muscle is प्रदिश fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the संयोजी ऊतक covering the quadriceps femoris, also called quadriceps extensor, a group of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella, or knee cap of the animal.
Willmar is a city in, and the county seat of, kandiyohi काउंटी, मिनेसोटा, संयुक्त States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 19,610 at the 2010 census.

The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives ( or स्पीकर of the हाउस ) is the पीठासीन अधिकारी of the कक्ष.
The office was established in 1789 by Article I, Section 2 of the United States Constitution, जिससे राज्य in भाग, `` the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि shall chuse उनके स्पीकर... ''
The वर्तमान स्पीकर is जॉन boehner, a रिपब्लिकन who represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district.
The संविधान करता नहीं आवश्यकता कि the स्पीकर be a सदस्य of कॉंग्रेस, but no non-member has ever been elected to the office.
The Speaker is दूसरी in the संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, बाद the वाइस अध्यक्ष और ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments, in which the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the संयुक्त राज्य the स्पीकर of the हाउस is a नेतृत्व स्थिति और the office-holder actively works to नियत the majority party 's legislative agenda.
The Speaker usually does not personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the ड्यूटी to members of the House from the majority party.
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party, the स्पीकर भी performs प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों, और represents his or her Congressional district.
A bicycle frame is the प्रमुख घटक of a सायकिल, on to जिससे पहियों और अन्य components are fitted.
The modern and most common frame design for an upright bicycle is आधारित on the सुरक्षा सायकिल, और consists of दो त्रिकोण, a प्रमुख triangle and a paired rear triangle.
This is known as the डायमंड फ़्रेम.
फ्रेम्स हैं जरूरी to be दमदार, stiff और लाइट, जिससे वे do by combining अलग सामग्री and shapes.
`` सरल गम्भीरता लोलक '' मॉडल assumes no friction or air resistance.
An exemplar animation of a लोलक प्रर्दशित the गति और त्वरण vectors
A pendulum is a weight निलंबित इससे a so कि it can झूले freely.
जब a लोलक is विस्थापित बगलों इससे इसके resting संतुलन स्थिति, it is विषय to a restoring force due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring फ़ोर्स संयुक्त साथ the लोलक 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate about the equilibrium position, swinging back and forth.
the समय लिये एक पूरा साईकिल, a बाएँ झूले और a right swing, is called the period.
A pendulum swings साथ a विशिष्ट काल जिससे depends ( mainly ) on its length.
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the नियमित गति of pendulums थी प्रयुक्त लिये timekeeping, और थी the संसार 's सबसे सटीक timekeeping technology until the 1930s.
pendulums हैं प्रयुक्त to विनियमित लोलक घड़ियाँ, और हैं प्रयुक्त in scientific instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they were प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to माप the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical सर्वेक्षण, and even as a standard of length.
The शब्द 'pendulum ' is नई लैटिन, इससे the लैटिन pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple gravity pendulum is an idealized गणितीय मॉडल of a लोलक.
This is a वज़न ( or bob ) on the समाप्त of a massless cord निलंबित from a, without friction.
जब दिए an आरंभिक धक्का, it होगा झूले वापस and forth at a constant amplitude.
Real pendulums are subject to friction and air drag, so the आयाम of उनके swings गिरावट.
The First Battle of Bull Run, also known as First Manassas ( the नाम प्रयुक्त by confederate शक्तियां ), थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21, 1861, in प्रिंस विलियम काउंटी, वर्जिनिया, निकट the city of Manassas.
It was the पहला प्रमुख जमीन बैटल of the अमरीकी सिविल War.
Just months after the प्रारंभ of the युद्ध at फोर्ट sumter, the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a कूच विरूद्ध the confederate capital of Richmond, Virginia, which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin McDowell led his unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन confederate फौज of ब्रिगेडियर. gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction.
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a आश्चर्य पार्श्व आक्रमण on the confederate बाएँ थी poorly चलाया by उसके अधिकारियों और मेन ; nevertheless, the confederates, जो था महरूम नियोजन to आक्रमण the संघ left flank, found themselves at an initial disadvantage.
Confederate reinforcements under ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जोसेफ E. johnston arrived इससे the shenandoah घाटी by रेलरोड और the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of virginians अंतर्गत a अपेक्षाकृत अनजान कर्नल इससे the वर्जिनिया सैन्य संस्थान, थामस J. जैक्सन, stood their ground and Jackson received his famous nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack, and as the संघ सैनिकों began withdrawing अंतर्गत आग, अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as mcdowell 's मेन frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many casualties, and realized the युद्ध थी going to be much longer और bloodier than either था anticipated.
अंधड़ निकट garajau, Madeira
Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree कि it is hot or ठंडा, गीला or शुष्क, शांत or stormy, clear or cloudy.
Most weather phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल, बस नीचे the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and वर्षण कार्यकलाप, whereas जलवायु is the पद लिये the औसत वायुमंडलीय शर्तें over longer periods of time.
When used बगैर योग्यता, `` मौसम '' is समझा to be the weather of Earth.
Weather is driven by air pressure ( temperature और नमी ) मतभेद between एक place and another.
These pressure और तापमान मतभेद can occur due to the सूर्य कोण at कोई particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
the दमदार तापमान कंट्रास्ट between ध्रुवीय और तीव्र air gives rise to the jet stream.
मौसम प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes, ऐसे as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the jet stream flow.
क्युकी the धरती 's अक्ष is tilted सापेक्ष to इसके कक्षीय प्लेन, धूप is घटना at different angles at different times of the year.
On Earth 's सतह, temperatures प्रायः दायरा ±40 °c ( −40 °f to 100 °F ) annually.
Over thousands of years, changes in Earth 's orbit affect the amount and distribution of solar energy प्राप्त by the धरती और influence long-term जलवायु और वैश्विक जलवायु बदलें.
सतह तापमान मतभेद in फेरे cause pressure differences.
उच्चतर altitudes हैं कूलर than निम्नतर altitudes due to differences in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the application of विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी to भविष्यवाणी the राज्य of the माहौल लिये a भविष्य समय and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small परिवर्तन to एक भाग of the प्रणाली can grow to have विशाल प्रभाव on the प्रणाली as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history, and वहीँ is प्रमाण कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as कृषि और उद्योग has inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying how the मौसम works on अन्य ग्रह रै महरूम सहायक in समझना कैसा मौसम works on Earth.
A famous लैंडमार्क in the सौर प्रणाली, बृहस्पति 's ग्रेट रेड स्पॉट, is an anticyclonic तूफ़ान ज्ञात to have existed for at least 300 years.
However, weather is नहीं सीमित to ग्रहीय bodies.
A स्टार 's किरीट is constantly होने खोया to स्पेस, बनाना कया is essentially a बहुत पतला atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
The गति of द्रव्यमान ejected इससे the सूर्य is ज्ञात as the solar wind.

वो हस्ताक्षरित साथ Capitol Records.
Perry has released three studio albums, including उसके डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न कैटी हडसन, एक of the लड़कों, और teenage Dream.
पेरी 's मुख्यधारा करियर थी kicked बंद साथ the विशाल चार्ट कामयाबी of her debut single `` I Kissed a Girl ``.
दौरान उसके करियर, पेरी रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये numerous प्रमुख म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, primarily for Teenage Dream and One of the Boys.
The following is a list of sovereign राज्य और territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक भाषा or भाषा of government.
In 2012, there were 88 states in कुल ( 60 sovereign राज्य और 28 non-sovereign राज्य ).
In many देशों अंग्रेज़ी is the प्रबल भाषा, लकिन करता नहीं have official status.
In Australia, English is spoken by the vast बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी और is the तभी भाषा प्रयुक्त in सरकारी संस्थानों, लकिन Australia does not have an official language.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States, हालांकि अनेक राज्य और regions भीतर the u.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an official language.
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official भाषा of कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ), इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य भाषाएं ), आयरलैंड ( साथ साथ आयरिश ), और the फिलीपीन ( along with Tagalog ).
English is the एकमात्र आधिकारिक भाषा of the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र and the Commonwealth Games.
English is one of the आधिकारिक भाषाएं of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the यूरोपीय संघ और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Olympic Committee.
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see भी अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य ), or of the संयुक्त राज्य, itself a former colony of the UK.
Notable exceptions शामिल रवांडा, जिससे थी a पूर्व belgian उपनिवेश और इरित्रिया, जिससे थी an इतालवी उपनिवेश जहाँ the British Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's linguistic चित्र is जटिल.
According to the Constitution of India, `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official language of the संघ ; और अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary आधिकारिक भाषा ' ; however, अंग्रेज़ी is mandated लिये the authoritative ग्रन्थ of सब संघीय कानून और परम् अदालत निर्णय और ( साथ साथ हिंदी ) is एक of the two languages of the Indian Parliament.
English is प्रयुक्त लगभग exclusively लिये उच्चतर education, business and science.
Courses in बहुमत of the स्कूलों हैं taught exclusively in English.
English is extensively प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक purposes in India.
India is the second-largest English-speaking country in the संसार by क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों, after the United States.
As such, many consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto आधिकारिक language of India.
देखिए आधिकारिक भाषाएं of India.
The linguistic makeup of पाकिस्तानी is similarly जटिल.
While the नेशनल भाषा is उर्दू, अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक भाषा और प्रयुक्त in business, government and law.
अंग्रेज़ी is a अनिवार्य भाषा in schools.
All स्कूल पाठ्यक्रम हैं सिखाया in English.
पाकिस्तानी is the 9th largest english-speaking देश in the world by population.
दक्षिणी कोन (, ) is a भौगोलिक प्रदेश रचित of the southernmost areas of South America, south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of Brazil, in terms of राजनैतिक भूगोल the दक्षिणी कोन रै traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना, चिली, पैराग्वे, और उरुग्वे.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, Chile and उरुग्वे, bounded on the उत्तर by the राज्य of ब्राज़ील, पैराग्वे, बोलीविया और पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर, और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the उच्चतम इंसान विकास अनुक्रमणिका of लैटिन अमेरिका, ऊँची मानक of जीना, significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक बाज़ार और the emerging economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings हैं sometimes आयोजित around सम्मेलन tables.
In a meeting, two or more people come together to discuss एक or अधिक विषय, प्रायः in a औपचारिक सेटिंग.
An official game in baseball, also sometimes पुकारा a विनियमन खेल, is a खेल कि रै progressed परे the पाइंट at जिससे it can be considered complete if necessary.
This is लगभग the halfway पाइंट of the game.
In the case of inclement weather, any game which has reached इस पाइंट may be रोका और shortened as needed, साथ the परिणाम होने फाइनल, और सब रिकॉर्ड और आंकडे गिने.
A game which has not reached this point before being stopped is either माना a निलंबित खेल ( to be जारी at a बाद तिथि इससे the पाइंट of stoppage ), or is simply canceled and replayed from the start.
( This depends on the नियम of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत league. )
In either case, no आंकडे हैं गिने जबतक the खेल becomes आधिकारिक.
Since most पेशेवर बेसबॉल खेल हैं नौ पारी long, the fifth inning is used as the threshold for an official game.
If the visiting team is अग्रणी, or the खेल is tied, the समाप्त of the पांचवां inning marks इस point.
If the home team ( जिससे bats पिछला ) is already ahead in the स्कोर, और theoretically होता नहीं need इसके हाफ of the पांचवां inning, then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game.
The game is also considered official if the घर टोली स्कोर to लो the सीसे in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning, चूंकि the खेल होता समाप्त तत्काल if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' औकात is प्रयुक्त to determine whether a बरसात जाँच will be honored for fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but करता नहीं पहुँचें the पाइंट of बनने आधिकारिक, प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई टिकट लिये the make-up खेल or ( in सबसे मामले ) any other available game of their choice.
If a game is halted after it becomes official, the खेल is बस shortened और no बरसात जाँच is given.
The `` official game '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 ऋतु, जब कैलोरी ripken, jr. थी approaching the रिकार्ड लिये लगातार खेल निभाई, previously held by Lou Gehrig.
Large संख्याएँ यहूद लटका on the पक्ष of the b & o गोदाम at Oriole Park at Camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a नई क्रमांक थी unfurled दौरान the पांचवां inning बाद प्रत्येक खेल था become आधिकारिक ( चूंकि the statistic होता not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ).
A similar practice has been used to गिनती bas toward the demolition of अनेक स्टेडियम ( सहित दिग्गजों स्टेडियम in फिलाडेल्फिया in 2003, बुच मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in St. Louis in 2005, and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became official, the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium.
A telephone number or phone number is a अनुक्रम of अंक प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे एक टेलीफोन लकीर to another in a पब्लिक switched टेलीफोन network.
When telephone numbers यहूद invented, वे यहूद छोटी — as few as एक, two or three digits — and were given orally to a switchboard operator.
As phone प्रणालियों have grown और interconnected to encompass the संसार, टेलीफोन numbers have become longer.
In addition to telephones, वे अभी अभिगम अन्य डिवाइस, ऐसे as कंप्यूटर and fax machines.
The number contains the information necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint लिये the टेलीफोन कॉल.
Each such endpoint जरूर have a अद्वितीय क्रमांक भीतर the पब्लिक switched telephone network.
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( for normal लाइनों at तनिक ) और इसलिए the क्रमांक of endpoints determines the जरुरी length of the telephone number.
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a नियत of shorter संख्याएँ लिये the endpoints सबसे प्रायः used.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers हैं automatically अनूदित to अद्वितीय टेलीफोन संख्याएँ पहले the call can be connected.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ; Australia ; the संयुक्त किंगडम, आयरलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, कैंडल, सऊदी अरब, the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात, मोरक्को, मकाओ, बहरीन, क़तर, बांग्लादेश, बोत्सवाना, घाना, कीनिया, हांग काँग, मलेशिया, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many systems also allow calls within a local area to be बना बगैर डायलिंग the लोकल क्षेत्रफल code.
For example, a phone number in North America will प्रारंभ साथ तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ), जिससे is the क्षेत्रफल कोड, followed by सात अंक विभाजित into भाग of तीन and four ( such as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
Some areas now have अनिवार्य ten-digit डायलिंग in प्लेस, भी लिये लोकल calls.
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and secure फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन संजाल, जहाँ the स्वरूप of टेलीफोन संख्याएँ is मानकीकृत by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies that the संपूर्ण क्रमांक चाहिए be 15 अंक or shorter, और begin with a country prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or नगर कोड और the सदस्य क्रमांक, जिससे might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन क्रमांक in लिखने or छपाई, starting साथ a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country code.
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone, the + जरूर be replaced साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कॉल उपसर्ग चुनी by the देश the कॉल is होने बना इससे.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be डाला सीधे.
The format and आवंटन of लोकल फोन संख्याएँ हैं नियंत्रित by प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's respective government, either directly or by sponsored organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ).
Before a टेलीफोन कॉल is कनेक्ट, the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर be dialed by the calling party or Caller.
The पुकारा पार्टी might have उपकरण कि presents कॉलर ID before the call is answered.
A collection agency is a business that pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most collection agencies operate as एजेंटों of लेनदारों और collect debts लिये a शुल्क or प्रतिशत of the कुल amount owed.
There are many types of संग्रहण एजेंसियों.
First-party एजेंसियों हैं oftentimes subsidiaries of the असली company the debt is owed to.
third-party एजेंसियों हैं पृथक कंपनियाँ contracted by a company to collect debts on their behalf for a fee.
Debt buyers purchase the कर्ज़ at a प्रतिशत of इसके मान, तब attempt to collect it.
Each country has its own नियम और regulations regarding them.
Cannabis पुष्प साथ दृश्य trichomes
Cannabis, also ज्ञात as मारिजुआना ( इससे the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ), और by अन्य names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the principal psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the संयंत्र, सहित at तनिक 84 अन्य cannabinoids, ऐसे as cannabidiol ( सीबीडी ), cannabinol ( cbn ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( cbg ).
This is a सूची of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ लिये the वॉशिंगटन redskins, as खूब as इसके पूर्ववर्तियों the बोस्टन braves ( 1932 ) और बोस्टन redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football League ( NFL ).
The Washington Redskins franchise was originally संस्थापित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स as the बोस्टन braves, नामित बाद the लोकल बेसबॉल franchise.
The नाम थी बदला the following साल to the Redskins.
In 1937, the मताधिकार स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
Of the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks, दो have महरूम inducted into the प्रो Football Hall of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen.
