1st खास शक्तियां operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ), popularly ज्ञात as डेल्टा फ़ोर्स, is एक of the संयुक्त राज्य ' चार secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units.
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by the विभाग of रक्षा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively समर्थित by usasoc, it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command.
Delta Force and its Navy बंटवारा, the नवल खास warfare विकास समूह, हैं the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य 's primary counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism, direct action, और नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन, हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक बहुमुखी समूह सक्षम of conducting अनेक प्रकार of गुप्त मिशन, सहित, लकिन नहीं सीमित to, hostage rescues and raids.
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly गुपचुप खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) प्रायः works साथ – और रंगरूटों – ऑपरेटर from Delta Force.
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in which an atomic nucleus emits an alpha कण, और thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु साथ a द्रव्यमान क्रमांक 4 कम और परमाणु क्रमांक 2 less.
अनेक अन्य प्रकार of decays are possible.
Radioactive decay, also known as nuclear decay or radioactivity, is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a केंद्रक of an अस्थिर अणु loses उर्जा by emitting अणु of आयनकारी विकिरण.
A material that spontaneously emits इस दयालु of विकिरण — जिससे शामिल the उत्सर्जन of ऊर्जावान अल्फा अणु, बीटा अणु, और गामा किरणें — is माना radioactive.
There are many different प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए तालिका नीचे ).
A decay, or loss of energy, results when an atom with one type of nucleus, called the parent radionuclide, परिणत to an अणु साथ a केंद्रक in a अलग राज्य, or to a अलग केंद्रक containing अलग numbers of protons and neutrons.
Either of ये उत्पाद is नामित the daughter nuclide.
In some decays the parent and daughter are different रासायनिक तत्व, और यूँ the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation ( सृष्टि of an अणु of a new element ).
The first decay प्रक्रियाओं to be खोजा यहूद अल्फा decay, beta decay, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs when the nucleus ejects an अल्फा कण ( हीलियम केंद्रक ).
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons, लकिन in rarer प्रकार of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or विशिष्ट nuclei of अन्य तत्व ( in the प्रक्रम called cluster decay ).
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus emits an electron or positron and a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो, in a प्रक्रम कि परिवर्तन a प्रोटॉन to a neutron or the other way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting इलेक्ट्रॉन, converting a प्रोटॉन into a न्यूट्रॉन ( electron capture ).
All of these processes परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation.
By contrast, there मौजूद रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय प्रक्रियाओं कि do नहीं परिणाम in transmutation.
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma ray in गामा क्षय, or प्रयुक्त to eject an कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by बातचीत साथ the उत्साहित nucleus in a process called internal conversion.
radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, और इस परिणाम in a बदलें in an element from one isotope to another.
One type of radioactive decay results in उत्पाद जिससे हैं नहीं पारिभाषित, लकिन appear in a दायरा of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus.
This decay is called spontaneous परिवर्द्धन.
This decay happens जब a विशाल अस्थिर केंद्रक अनायास splits into दो ( और occasionally तीन ) छोटी बेटी nuclei, और प्रायः emits gamma rays, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the level of सिंगल अणु, in कि, according to क्वांटम सिद्धान्त, it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी जब a particular अणु will decay.
However, the मौका कि a दिए अणु होगा decay is constant over time.
For a विशाल क्रमांक of अणु, the क्षय रेट लिये the संग्रहण is computable इससे the measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent बाल हटाना जिससे removes the बाल इससे the root.
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed क्षेत्रफल लिये दो to आठ सप्ताह, हालांकि कुछ लोगों होगा प्रारंभ to see regrowth in only a week.
Almost any area of the body can be waxed, सहित eyebrows, फेस, बिकिनी क्षेत्रफल, टाँगे, बाहें, वापस, उदर और feet.
There are many प्रकार of वैक्सिंग उपयुक्त लिये निकालना अनावश्यक hair.
Strip वैक्सिंग is संपन्नता by spreading a मोम thinly over the skin.
A cloth or पेपर स्ट्रिप is तब दबाया on the शीर्ष और ripped बंद the direction of hair growth.
This removes the मोम साथ with the hair.
Strip wax can also be made at home using नीबू रस, जल, शुगर और मधु.
Hot waxing utilizes hot मोम ( as opposed to strip wax ).
In this case, the मोम is लागू somewhat thickly और with no cloth or paper strips.
The wax then hardens when it cools, thus allowing the आसान हटाना by a चिकित्सक बगैर the सहायता of cloths.
This waxing method is very फायदेमंद to लोगों जो have संवेदनशील स्किन.
Wall painting ( 1st century AD ) from pompeii depicting a multigenerational भोज
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the सभ्यता of Ancient Rome.
The term refers to the संस्कृति of the रोमन गणतंत्र, बाद the रोमन साम्राज्य, जिससे, at इसके शिखर, covered an क्षेत्रफल from Lowland Scotland and Morocco to the Euphrates.
Life in ancient रोम revolved around the नगर of रोम, इसके famed सात पहाड़ियाँ, और इसके स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ), the Forum of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The नगर भी था अनेक थिएटर, gymnasiums, और many taverns, baths, and brothels.
Throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control, residential architecture ranged from very modest houses to country villas, and in the पूंजी नगर of रोम, वहीँ यहूद इम्पीरियल निवास on the सुरुचिपूर्ण palatine हिल, इससे जिससे the word palace is derived.
The vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी जिया in the नगर बीच, packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ).
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time, with a जनसांख्यिकी कि may खूब have exceeded एक लाख लोगों, साथ a ऊँची समाप्त अनुमान of 3.6 लाख और a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the नगर 's क्षेत्राधिकार जिया in innumerable शहरी centers, साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और अनेक सैन्य settlements, a बहुत ऊँची rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
the सबसे urbanized भाग of the साम्राज्य थी इटली, जिससे था an अनुमानित rate of urbanization of 32 %, the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800.
Most Roman towns and cities had a forum, temples और the वही प्रकार of इमारतें, on a छोटी स्केल, as मिला in रोम.
The large urban population required an अंतहीन सप्लाई of खाना जिससे थी a जटिल logistical कार्य, सहित acquiring, transporting, storing और वितरण of food for Rome and other urban centers.
Italian farms supplied सब्जियां और फल, लकिन मछली और मांस यहूद luxuries.
aqueducts यहूद निर्मित to लाओ जल to शहरी centers and wine and oil were imported from Hispania, Gaul and Africa.
वहीँ थी a बहुत विशाल राशि of कॉमर्स between the प्रांतों of the रोमन साम्राज्य, चूंकि इसके परिवहन technology was very efficient.
The average लागत of हस्तांतरण और the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable साथ 18th-century Europe.
The later city of Rome किया नहीं भरण the स्पेस भीतर इसके प्राचीन aurelian दीवारें जबतक बाद 1870.
Eighty percent of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन रोम lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in शहरों और उनके estates यहूद left in the care of farm managers.
The plight of rural slaves was generally बदतर than उनके counterparts working in शहरी वैभवशाली households.
To stimulate a higher labor productivity most जमींदार freed a विशाल क्रमांक of स्लेव और अनेक प्राप्त wages.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 लोगों जिया in एक छोटी फार्म हट in मिश्र, जबकि छह परिवारों owned a single olive tree. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce माइग्रेशन of जनसांख्यिकी to शहरी centers जबतक the जल्दी 2nd सदी, जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी रोका growing और started to decline.
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC, private Greek culture was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades विरूद्ध the `` softening '' प्रभाव of hellenized संस्कृति इससे the रूढ़िवादी moralists.
By the time of Augustus, संस्कारी यूनानी household स्लेव सिखाया the रोमन यंग ( sometimes even the girls ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
Greek sculptures adorned hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in the विला, or यहूद imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery किताबे ascribed to apicius is essentially Greek.
Roman writers disdained लैटिन लिये a संस्कारी यूनानी स्टाइल.
Only in law और शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's accretive culture supreme.
Against this इंसान पृष्ठभूमि, दोनो the शहरी और ग्रामीण सेटिंग, एक of इतिहास 's सबसे influential सभ्यताओं took shape, leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today.
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf, Jr. ( born अगस्त 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर golfer.
Glass बोतलों ( लिये खीरा स्लाइस ) on shipping pallets
A सोवियत मेयोनेज़ jar
A modern `` फ्रेंच kilner '' jar
Glass उत्पादन involves दो प्रमुख विधि – the फ्लैश कांच प्रक्रम, जिससे produces चादर कांच, और glassblowing which produces bottles and other containers.
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम, पारिस्थितिकी, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष relative to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and जुलाई, the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर to अधिक direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun.
The same is सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in November, December and January.
It is the tilt of the Earth that कल्याणकारी the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ months which increases the solar flux.
however, due to मौसमी lag, जून, जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर, January and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न साथ साथ the परंपरागत चार.
Hot regions have दो or तीन सीज़न ; the बरसात ( or गीला, or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.

The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter, निकट चार्ल्सटन, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, कि प्रारंभ the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध.
Following declarations of secession by seven Southern states, South Carolina मांगे कि the u.S. फौज लापरवाही इसके सुविधाएं in चार्ल्सटन Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously स्थानांतरित उसके छोटी कमांड इससे the indefensible फोर्ट moultrie on सुलीवान 's द्वीप to फोर्ट sumter, a substantial किला controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor.
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant जलयान स्टार of the वेस्ट, विफल जब it थी fired upon by shore बैटरी on January 9, 1861.
South कैरोलिना अधिकारियों तब जब्त सब संघीय प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन area, except for Fort Sumter.
During the जल्दी महीने of 1861, the हालात around फोर्ट sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In March, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly formed confederate राज्य of अमेरिका, थी लगाई in command of Confederate forces in Charleston.
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of बैटरी around चार्ल्सटन हार्बर aimed at Fort Sumter.
Conditions in the फोर्ट grew dire as the संघ सैनिको rushed to पूरा the installation of additional guns.
Anderson was short of मेन, खाना, और आपूर्तियाँ.
The resupply of Fort Sumter became the पहला संकट of the प्रशासन of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln.
He notified the Governor of South Carolina, Francis W. Pickens, कि he थी sending सप्लाई जहाजों, जिससे resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
प्रमुख एंडरसन refused to surrender.
शुरूआत at 4:30 a.m. on अप्रैल 12, the confederates bombarded the फोर्ट इससे artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the संघ गैरीसन लौटे आग, वे यहूद significantly outgunned और, बाद 34 घंटों, प्रमुख Anderson agreed to evacuate.
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of इस सगाई, हालांकि a गन विस्फोट दौरान the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies on अप्रैल 14 caused दो संघ मौतों.
Following the battle, there was फैली support इससे दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण लिये further सैन्य action.
Lincoln 's तात्कालिक कॉल लिये 75,000 स्वयंसेवक to दबाने the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी slave states also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
The सिविल युद्ध था begun.
3G, short for third Generation, is the तीसरा पीढी of मोबाईल दूरसंचार प्रौद्योगिकी.
3G telecommunication networks support services कि provide an सूचना ट्रांसफ़र रेट of at तनिक 200 kbit/s.
However, many सेवाएं advertised as 3g provide उच्चतर गति than the न्यूनतम technical requirements for a 3G service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5G and 3.75G, also provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन और मोबाईल modems in लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर.
3G finds application in बेतार आवाज़ telephony, मोबाईल अंतरजाल अभिगम, फिक्स्ड बेतार Internet access, video calls and mobile TV.
`` Mazel Tov ! '' लिखा on a wine glass tag
traditionally, बाद the दूल्हे ब्रेक the कांच, the अतिथि चिल्लाओ `` Mazel Tov ! ``.
A birthday cake, iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is प्रायः किया in Israel.
Here the phrase is लिखा in यहूदी कर्सिव.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '', यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; यहूदी : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used to एक्स्प्रेस बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न और significant अवसर or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious बीमारी affecting primarily the जिगर, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver और ultimately to cirrhosis, जिससे is generally apparent बाद अनेक सालो.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis होगा go on to develop जिगर विफलता, जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal और gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध साथ intravenous ड्रग उपयोग, poorly sterilized चिकित्सा उपकरण and transfusions.
An estimated 130–200 लाख लोगों विश्वव्यापी हैं संक्रमित with.
The existence of ( originally `` non- A non- B hepatitis '' ) थी postulated in the 1970s और सिद्ध in 1989.
तभी infects इंसानो and chimpanzees.
The virus persists in the जिगर in परिचय 85 % of those infected.
This persistent संक्रमण can be treated साथ दवा : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon और ribavirin, साथ either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated are cured.
Those who develop cirrhosis or जिगर कर्कट may require a liver transplant.
is the अग्रणी कारण of जिगर प्रत्यारोपण, हालांकि the वायरस प्रायः बारंबार after transplantation.
No vaccine विरूद्ध is उपलब्धियाँ.
A flexible spending account ( FSA ), also known as a flexible spending व्यवस्था, is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना of an नियोक्ता in the United States.
An FSA allows an employee to नियत aside a portion of आय to अदा लिये योग्य खर्च as स्थापित in the कैफेटेरिया योजना, सबसे commonly लिये चिकित्सा खर्च but often for dependent care or other expenses.
Money deducted from an employee 's अदा into an fsa is नहीं विषय to payroll कर, resulting in substantial payroll tax savings.
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is कि निधि नहीं प्रयुक्त by the समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी, ज्ञात as the `` उपयोग it or lose it '' rule.
The most common type of लचीली बिता खाता, the चिकित्सा व्यय fsa ( भी चिकित्सा fsa or स्वास्थ्य fsa ), is समान to a health savings account ( HSA ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while HSAs and HRAs are almost exclusively used as components of a consumer driven health care योजना, चिकित्सा fsas हैं commonly offered साथ अधिक परंपरागत स्वास्थ्य योजनाएँ as well.
In addition, funds in a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता हैं नहीं खोया when the plan year is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper फ़ॉर्म or an fsa डेबिट कार्ड, भी ज्ञात as a flexcard, may be used to access the account funds.
टेनेसी ( ) ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern United States.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive और the 17th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
टेनेसी is bordered by केंटकी और वर्जिनिया to the उत्तर, उत्तर कैरोलिना to the ईस्ट, जॉर्जिया, अलबामा, और मिसिसिपी to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern part of the state, और the मिसिसिपी नदी फ़ॉर्म the राज्य 's western border.
Tennessee 's capital and second largest नगर is नैशविले, जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 609,644.
Memphis is the state 's largest नगर, साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 652,050.
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga संघ, a 1772 frontier अनुबंध generally regarded as the पहला संवैधानिक government west of the Appalachians.
What is अभी टेनेसी थी initially भाग of उत्तर कैरोलिना, और बाद भाग of the Southwest Territory.
Tennessee थी admitted to the संघ as the 16th राज्य on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the पिछला राज्य to छोड़ the संघ और जुड़ें the confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861, और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted to the Union at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers लिये the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य, और अधिक सैनिको लिये the संघ फौज than any other Southern state.
In the 20th century, Tennessee transitioned from an agrarian अर्थव्यवस्था to a अधिक diversified अर्थव्यवस्था, aided at टाइम्स by संघीय entities ऐसे as the टेनेसी घाटी प्राधिकार.
In the early 1940s, the city of Oak Ridge थी स्थापित to हाउस the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं, helping to निर्माण the संसार 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a नाजुक भूमिका in the विकास of अनेक फ़ॉर्म of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक, including rock and roll, blues, country, and rockabilly.
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the जन्मस्थान of the ब्लूज़, साथ संगीतकारों ऐसे as w.c. सुलभ performing in इसके क्लब as जल्दी as 1909.
Memphis was also home to Sun Records, where musicians such as Elvis Presley, Isaac Hayes, जॉनी नकदी, कार्ल perkins, जेरी ली लुईस, रॉय orbison, और चार्ली समृद्ध began उनके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर, and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording सत्र in ब्रिस्टल generally चिह्नित the शुरूआत of the देश म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड ओले opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country music recording industry.
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय in नैशविले, और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय rock-a-billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly Hall of Fame, an online साईट recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in जिससे टेनेसी निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका, is आधारित in नैशविले.
टेनेसी 's प्रमुख उद्योग शामिल agriculture, manufacturing, and tourism.
Poultry, soybeans, and cattle are the state 's primary agricultural products, and major निर्माण निर्यात शामिल रसायन, परिवहन उपकरण, और विद्युत उपकरण.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the स्वदेश 's सबसे visited नेशनल पार्क, is headquartered in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य, और a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border.
Other major tourist आकर्षण शामिल the टेनेसी एक्वेरियम in चट्टानूगा, the sunsphere in knoxville, dollywood in कबूतर forge, the पार्थेनन, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय, और ryman ऑडिटोरियम in नैशविले, and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
One डिज़ाइन रूपांतर of a मुर्गा ring.
A cock रिंग is a रिंग कि can be लगाई around a man 's शिश्न, प्रायः at the आधार, primarily to slow the प्रवाह of blood from the erect penile tissue, thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around बस the शिश्न or दोनो the शिश्न और scrotum, or बस the scrotum अलोन, हालांकि इस is प्रायः पुकारा a testicle cuff.
Rings can be made of a किस्में of अलग सामग्री, सबसे commonly चमड़े, रबर, or silicone, हालांकि नायलॉन और मेटल हैं also used either as the main component or part of the closure.
the पद मुर्गा रिंग is sometimes प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये a प्रिंस अल्बर्ट piercing, a piercing of the शिश्न कि is usually, though not always, a metal ring.
जब प्रयुक्त in मामले of erectile dysfunction वे हैं ज्ञात by विभिन्न names such as `` erection ring '' and `` tension ring ''.
The मुख्यालय of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल at 245 पार्क एवेन्यू, Midtown Manhattan, New York City, USA.
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a पेशेवर बेसबॉल लीग, consisting of टीमों कि खेल in the नेशनल लीग and the American League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the कमिश्नर of बेसबॉल, बाद 100 years as separate legal entities.
MLB constitutes one of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग of the संयुक्त States and Canada.
It is composed of 30 टीमों — 29 in the संयुक्त राज्य और one in Canada.
Teams in MLB play 162 games प्रत्येक ऋतु over छह महीने ( अप्रैल through September ).
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason टूर्नामेंट कि culminates in the संसार श्रेणी, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions which dates to 1903.
The organization oversees अनेक minor-league बेसबॉल लीग जिससे operate परिचय 240 टीमों संबद्ध साथ the major-league clubs.
With the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बेसबॉल संघ, the लीग भी manages the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संसार बेसबॉल Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest season उपस्थिति of कोई खेल लीग in the संसार साथ nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक coast in the mid-atlantic प्रदेश of the United States.
It is bordered to the south और वेस्ट by मेरीलैंड, to the पूर्वोत्तर by नई जर्सी, और to the उत्तर by Pennsylvania.
the राज्य takes इसके नाम इससे थामस वेस्ट, 3rd सामन्त de la warr, an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला औपनिवेशिक राज्यपाल, बाद जिसको कया is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the दूसरी smallest, the छठे तनिक populous, लकिन the छठे सबसे densely आबादी of the fifty United States.
डेलावेयर is विभाजित into तीन counties.
इससे उत्तर to दक्षिण, ये तीन काउंटी are New Castle, Kent, and Sussex.
While the southern two counties have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural, नई किला काउंटी रै महरूम more industrialized.
Before its coastline was explored by Europeans in the 16th सदी, डेलावेयर थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी, सहित the lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by डच व्यापारियों at zwaanendael, located near the present town of Lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution and on दिसम्बर 7, 1787, became the पहला राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य, thereby बनने ज्ञात as the First State.
Energy परिवर्तन in उर्जा प्रणालियों भाषा
उर्जा परिवर्तन or उर्जा परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम of बदलना one form of energy to another.
In physics, the term energy describes the capacity to उपज निश्चित परिवर्तन भीतर a प्रणाली, बगैर लिहाज़ to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy.
Changes in total energy of systems can तभी be संपन्नता by adding or subtracting उर्जा इससे उन्हें, as उर्जा is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved, according to the first law of thermodynamics.
According to special relativity, परिवर्तन in the उर्जा of प्रणालियों होगा भी coincide साथ परिवर्तन in the प्रणाली 's द्रव्यमान, और the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of its energy.
उर्जा in a प्रणाली may be रूपांतरित so कि it resides in a अलग राज्य, or a different type of energy.
उर्जा in अनेक राज्य may be प्रयुक्त to do many varieties of physical work.
Energy may be used in प्राकृतिक प्रक्रियाओं or मशीने, or else to provide कुछ सेवा to समाज ( ऐसे as heat, light, or motion ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the potential रासायनिक उर्जा in गैसोलीन और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा, जिससे is तब रूपांतरित into the propulsive उर्जा ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ).
A solar cell converts solar radiation into विद्युत उर्जा कि can तब be प्रयुक्त to लाइट a बल्ब or शक्ति a कंप्यूटर.
The generic name for a यंत्र जिससे converts उर्जा इससे एक रूप to another, is a transducer.
In सामान्य, सबसे प्रकार of उर्जा, सहेजें लिये थर्मल उर्जा, may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, ऐसे as जब संभावित उर्जा is परिवर्तित to गतिज उर्जा as an ऑब्जेक्ट जलप्रपात in vacuum, or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in space.
Conversion of other types of energies to ऊष्मा may भी occurs साथ nearly पूर्ण दक्षता ( many types of friction do this ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when उर्जा रै already महरूम partly वितरित among अनेक उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु, जिससे हैं freely अनुमत to explore कोई राज्य of आवेग and position ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy वितरण in ऐसे राज्य, dictates कि भविष्य राज्य of the प्रणाली जरूर be of at तनिक बराबर evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a whole, to collect उर्जा into कम राज्य, एकबार it रै स्प्रेड to उन्हें ).
A consequence of इस आवश्यकता is कि वहीँ हैं सीमाएं to the दक्षता साथ जिससे थर्मल उर्जा can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा, चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन at a दिए तापमान already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
ऐसे उर्जा is sometimes माना `` degraded उर्जा, '' because it is not entirely usable.
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this reason, thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of उर्जा साथ efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or विकार ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य अर्थात्, to compensate लिये the घटी in एन्ट्रॉपी संबद्ध with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus, useful work ), since the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal टंकी at a निम्नतर तापमान, in ऐसे a रास्ता कि the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस प्रक्रम अधिक than compensates लिये the एन्ट्रॉपी घटी संबद्ध साथ परिवर्तन of the rest of the heat into other types of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ in कनाडा and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त राज्य और Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the end of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन, the नेशनल हॉकी संघ ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the नाम of the लीग originally referred थी कनाडा, हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 ऋतु, the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a salary cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
the एनएचएल draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी विस्तार इससे छह to तीस क्लब चूंकि 1967, और the increased उपलब्धता of अत्यधिक skilled यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी.
This is the complete list of the ratified और unratified amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the स्वीकृति of the United States Congress.
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the Constitution, the first टेन of जिससे हैं ज्ञात collectively as the विधेयक of Rights.
The procedure for amending the United राज्य संविधान is governed by आलेख v of the असली टेक्स्ट.
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस, लकिन नहीं submitted to the states.
Before an amendment can लो प्रभाव, it जरूर be प्रस्तावित to the राज्य by a two-thirds vote of दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v सम्मेलन ) पुकारा by two-thirds of the राज्य, और ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To date, no convention for proposing amendments रै महरूम पुकारा by the राज्य, और तभी once—in 1933 लिये the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the सम्मेलन विधि of ratification been employed.
FMR LLC ( वफ़ादारी प्रबन्धन और शोध ) or वफ़ादारी निवेश is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय financial services corporation.
It is एक of the largest परस्पर निधि और वित्तीय services groups in the world.
It was founded in 1946 और serves उत्तर अमरीकी निवेशकों.
वफ़ादारी ventures is इसके venture capital arm.
Fidelity International सीमित ( फील ), थी an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969, सेवारत most countries in the rest of the world.
In सितंबर 2011, फील थी rebranded as 'fidelity विश्वव्यापी Investment '.
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual निधि, provides निधि वितरण और निवेश सलाह सेवाएं, as खूब as providing छूट brokerage सेवाएं, रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं, माल प्रबन्धन, प्रतिभूति execution and clearance, life insurance and a number of other services.

Sociology is the scientific study of इंसान समाज और इसके origins, विकास, संगठन, और संस्थानों.
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical छानबीन और नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a देह of ज्ञान परिचय इंसान social activity, structures, and functions.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct शोध जिससे may be लागू सीधे to सोशल नीति और welfare, जबकि अन्य फ़ोकस primarily on शोधन the theoretical understanding of social processes.
Subject matter ranges इससे the सूक्ष्म स्तर of व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी और बातचीत to the मैक्रो level of systems and the social structure.
the परंपरागत focuses of समाजशास्त्र शामिल सोशल स्तरीकरण, सोशल क्लास, संस्कृति, race and ethnicity, gender and sexuality, social mobility, religion, secularization, law, and deviance.
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency, sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further विषय, ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य, चिकित्सा, सैन्य और penal संस्थानों, the अंतरजाल, पर्यावरणीय समाजशास्त्र, राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था और the भूमिका of सोशल कार्यकलाप in the विकास of वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान.
The range of सोशल वैज्ञानिक विधि रै भी expanded.
Social researchers draw upon a किस्में of गुणात्मक और quantitative तकनीकों.
The भाषाई और सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
conversely, हाल दशकों have देखी the वृद्धि of नई analytically, mathematically और computationally rigorous techniques, such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis.
Sociology should not be confused साथ विभिन्न सामान्य सोशल अध्ययन पाठ्यक्रम जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध to समाजशास्त्रीय theory or social science research methodology.
Thunder is the ध्वनि caused by बिजली.
Depending on the nature of the lightning और अलहदा of the श्रोता, थंडर can दायरा इससे a शार्प, लाउड क्रैक to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in दबाव और तापमान इससे बिजली produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding and within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, this expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a sonic बूम, जिससे produces the ध्वनि of थंडर, प्रायः referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
The distance of the lightning can be calculated by the listener based on the time interval इससे जब the बिजली is देखी to जब the ध्वनि is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the island of majorca ( mallorca ) और पूंजी नगर of the autonomous जातियाँ of the balearic आइलैंड्स in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) and ciutat ( नगर ) यहूद प्रयुक्त पहले the युद्ध of the स्पेनी उत्तराधिकार और हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त by लोगों in Majorca.
However, the आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca, the वही as the द्वीप.
It is situated on the दक्षिण coast of the द्वीप on the Bay of Palma.
As of the 2009 census, the population of the city of Palma उचित थी 401,270, और the जनसांख्यिकी of the संपूर्ण शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285, रैंकिंग as the बारहवीं largest urban area of Spain.
लगभग हाफ of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of majorca live in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, हालांकि widely अलग इससे पालमा उचित, is administratively माना part of the municipality.
Its airport, Son Sant जोन, serves over 22 लाख यात्री प्रत्येक साल.
The Marivent Palace was offered by the city to the तब प्रिंस जुआन कार्लोस i of स्पेन.
The royals have चूंकि खर्च उनके गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ in Palma.

लिये अन्य उपयोग, देखिए लूथर ( disambiguation ).
Alexander Joseph `` लेक्स '' luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in कॉमिक किताबे प्रकाशित by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also come into विरोध साथ बैटमैन और अन्य superheroes in the dc ब्रह्मांड.
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, the अक्षर पहला appeared in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 23 ( अप्रैल 1940 ).
Luthor is described as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट वैज्ञानिक '' of ऊँची प्रज्ञा और अविश्वसनीय technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman, the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal लक्ष्य.
Despite periodically wearing a powered बहि, luthor रै traditionally lacked superpowers or a डुअल पहचान.
The character थी originally चित्रित as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो, in the रग of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In his earliest दिखावे, luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा सिर of red hair.
despite इस, the अक्षर बाद became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake.
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel विस्तारित upon luthor 's उत्पत्ति और motivations, revealing उसे to be a बाल्यकाल dost of सुपरमैन 's who lost his hair when a fire destroyed his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths, the character was re-imagined as a machiavellian उद्योगपति और white-collar दण्ड, भी briefly सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the United States.
in हाल सालो, विभिन्न लेखक have revived luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th Greatest विलेन by जादूगर on इसके 100 महानतम खलनायक of All Time list.
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic किताब खलनायक of सब समय क्रमित luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब आलोचक पीटर sanderson, एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक जिनकी adventures लो प्लेस `` in a संसार in जिससे the ordinary कानून of प्रकृति हैं थोड़ा suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit this description.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अवकाश अंकन the जन्मदिवस of रेव. dr. मार्टिन लूथर King, Jr.
It is observed on the तीसरा सोमवार of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल, जिससे is around the समय of किंग 's जन्मदिवस, January 15.
The floating अवकाश is समान to छुट्टियाँ नियत अंतर्गत the वर्दी सोमवार अवकाश अधिनियम, हालांकि the act predated the establishment of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day by 15 years.
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent सक्रियता in the सिविल अधिकारों गति, जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested जातिगत पक्षपात in federal and state law.
The campaign for a federal अवकाश in किंग 's सम्मान began जल्द बाद उसके हत्या in 1968.
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, और it थी पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At पहला, कुछ राज्य resisted observing the अवकाश as ऐसे, giving it वैकल्पिक names or combining it with other holidays.
It was officially observed in सब 50 राज्य लिये the पहला समय in 2000.
The camera फोन समाधान allows तत्काल sharing of pictures.
As it 's automatic and तत्काल, the उपयोक्ता करता नहीं have to उपयोग a केबल or removable media to connect to a personal computer.
A camera phone is a mobile phone which is able to कैप्चर स्टिल छायाचित्र ( और प्रायः वीडियो ).
Since early in the 21st century the बहुमत of मोबाईल फोन in उपयोग are camera phones.
Most camera फोन हैं simpler than पृथक डिजिटल cameras.
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller sensors limit their प्रदर्शन in ग़रीब lighting.
Lacking a physical shutter, most have a long शटर lag.
फ्लैश, जहाँ उपस्थित, is usually weak.
ऑप्टिकल जूम और तिपाई screws are rare.
Some भी कमी a usb कनेक्शन, removable मेमोरी कार्ड, or अन्य रास्ता of transferring उनके तस्वीरें अधिक जल्दी than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the more expensive कैमरा फोन have तभी a few of ये तकनीकी disadvantages, जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें और in कोई मामला have not inhibited their widespread use.
Most मॉडल लाइनों improve in ये प्रणाम every year or two.
Some, ऐसे as the droid अविश्वसनीय तभी have a मेनू चुनाव to start an application program to activate the camera.
Others, such as the ब्लैकबेरी तूफ़ान 2, droid x, मोटोरोला v980 और नोकिया 5800 भी have a पृथक कैमरा बटन लिये quickness and convenience.
खिड़कियाँ फोन can be विन्यस्त to operate as a camera even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones are designed to resemble पृथक low-end डिजिटल कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे in रूप and to some extent in features and picture quality, and are branded as both mobile phones and cameras, including certain Sony phones.
The principal advantages of कैमरा फोन हैं लागत और compactness ; बेशक लिये a उपयोक्ता जो carries a मोबाईल फोन वैसे, the अतिरिक्त आकार और cost are negligible.
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile अनुप्रयोग to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र stitching.
A few high end phones can use their टच स्क्रीन to सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य, giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि of फ़ोकस कंट्रोल exceeded तभी by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` whatever happened to the man of कल ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the dc Comics character of Superman.
Written by एलन मूर साथ सहायता इससे long-time, और जल्द to be retiring, सुपरमैन एडिटर, जूलियस schwartz, the स्टोरी थी प्रकाशित in दो भाग, beginning in Superman # 423 and ending in Action Comics # 583, both published in September 1986.
the स्टोरी थी drawn by long-time कलाकार रूखा swan, in उसके फाइनल प्रमुख योगदान to the सुपरमैन शीर्षक, और was inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
the स्टोरी थी an काल्पनिक टेल जिससे बताई the फाइनल स्टोरी of the चांदी आयु सुपरमैन और उसके long इतिहास, जिससे थी होने rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths, before his modern introduction in the John Byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted उसके प्लाट to सम्मान the long इतिहास of the अक्षर और to serve as a पूरा conclusion to his mythology.
The story is a frame story set ten years after सुपरमैन थी पिछला देखी, जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the टेल of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's करियर to a रिपोर्टर इससे the Daily Planet.
उसके स्टोरी शामिल numerous हिंसक हमले विरूद्ध सुपरमैन by उसके दुश्मनों, the पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य identity of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him.
The story has been cited as one of the best कहानियां of the अक्षर of सुपरमैन, और आलोचकों और ऑडियंस अक्सर choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published.
It is used as an example of how to close the long-time निरंतरता of a कॉमिक किताब अक्षर.
The story 's legacy has endured साथ समान कहानियां लिखा as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of सुपरमैन as the man of कल, और थी प्रयुक्त in the शीर्षक of another सुपरमैन.
The bugatti veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car, designed और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह और manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, साथ a शीर्ष गति of.
The असली संस्करण रै a शीर्ष speed of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न programme Top Gear.
The मानक veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन car चलित सब साल award in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse, reaching on औसत a शीर्ष गति of.
The Veyron 's मुख्य पंक्तियां थी hartmut warkuss, और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen, साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special विसंगतियाँ have महरूम उत्पादित.
In December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the ability to customize exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the veyron 16.4 configurator अनुप्रयोग on the marque 's official website.
The संस्था of the eucharist रै महरूम a कुंजी थीम in the depictions of the पिछला भोजन in ईसाई आर्ट, as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes painting.
`` At the Last Supper, on the night he was गद्दारी, हमारी रक्षक instituted the eucharistic बलिदान of उसके देह and Blood. ''
( catechism of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर 1323 )
eucharist in the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर refers to दोनो the जश्न of the द्रव्यमान, कि is, the eucharist liturgy, और the ब्रैड और वाइन जिससे बाद the प्रतिष्ठापना are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ, Lord and God, a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional पद प्रयुक्त in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर to refer to the eucharistic प्रजाति ( the देह और रक्त of Christ ).

A short story is a brief work of साहित्य, प्रायः लिखा in कथा गद्य.
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century, the short स्टोरी रै grown to encompass a देह of कार्य so विविध as to defy आसान characterization.
At its most prototypical the short story features a small cast of named characters, and focuses on a self-contained घटना साथ the intent of evoking a `` सिंगल प्रभाव '' or मनोदशा.
In so doing, short stories make use of plot, resonance, and other dynamic components to a दूर वृहद उपाधि than is ठेठ of an किस्सा, yet to a दूर lesser degree than a novel.
While the short story is largely distinct from the अनोखा, लेखक of दोनो generally चित्रण इससे a आम पूल of साहित्यिक techniques.
Short stories have no नियत लंबाई.
In शर्तें of शब्द गिनती वहीँ is no आधिकारिक demarcation between an anecdote, a short story, and a novel.
बल्कि, the रूप 's पैरामीटर्स हैं दिए by the rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित और माना, so कि कया constitutes a short story may differ between genres, countries, eras, and commentators.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for publication, and the evolution of the रूप seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the सबमिशन दिशानिर्देश of इसके constituent houses.
The short story has been माना दोनो an शिक्षुता रूप preceding अधिक lengthy works, और a crafted रूप in इसके अपना सही, एकत्रित together in books of similar length, price, and distribution as novels.
छोटी स्टोरी लेखक may define उनके works as भाग of the कलाकारी and personal expression of the form.
वे may भी attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form.
Area codes in मिशिगन
Area code 810 is the टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड सेवारत eastern Michigan.
The raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, also known as the common raccoon, उत्तर अमरीकी raccoon, उत्तरी raccoon और colloquially as कून, is a medium-sized स्तनधारी native to North America.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid परिवार, having a देह length of and a body weight of.
Its grayish कोट ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates against cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive सुविधाएँ हैं इसके अत्यधिक dexterous सामने पंजे और इसके फेशियल मुखौटा, जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of several Native American tribes.
Raccoons are विख्यात लिये उनके प्रज्ञा, साथ अध्ययन प्रर्दशित कि वे हैं समर्थ to याद the समाधान to tasks for up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, जिससे is प्रायः nocturnal, consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates, 33 % plant foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed वनों, लकिन due to उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित उनके दायरा to mountainous क्षेत्रों, तटीय marshes, और शहरी क्षेत्रों, where some homeowners consider them to be pests.
As a परिणाम of escapes और deliberate introductions in the mid-20th सदी, raccoons हैं अभी भी वितरित आरपार the यूरोपीय mainland, the Caucasus region and Japan.
हालांकि previously विचार to be एकान्त, वहीँ is अभी प्रमाण कि raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior.
Related females often share a common area, while unrelated males live together in groups of up to चार पशु to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी males दौरान the समागम ऋतु, और अन्य potential invaders.
Home दायरा आकार vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 एकड़ ) लिये महिलाओं in शहरों to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
After a gestation काल of परिचय 65 दिनों, दो to पाँच यंग, known as `` kits '', are born in spring.
The kits are subsequently raised by उनके माँ जबतक dispersion in लेट पतन.
Although captive raccoons have been known to सजीव over 20 सालो, उनके औसत जीवन प्रत्याशा in the जंगली is only 1.8 to 3.1 years.
In many areas, hunting और vehicular चोट हैं the दो सबसे आम कल्याणकारी of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake, साथ an उपरिकेंद्र निकट the कस्बा of léogâne ( ouest विभाग ), लगभग वेस्ट of port-au-prince, हैती 's पूंजी.
The earthquake occurred at 16:53 लोकल समय ( 21:53 utc ) on मंगलवार, 12 January 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or वृहद था महरूम अंकित.
An estimated three लाख लोगों यहूद प्रभावित by the भूकंप.
The उच्चतम विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती was estimated at 220,000.
haitian सरकारी estimates were higher.
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000 निवास और 30,000 वाणिज्यिक इमारतें था collapsed or were severely damaged.
the भूकंप caused प्रमुख क्षति in port-au-prince, jacmel and other settlements in the region.
Many notable landmark buildings यहूद significantly क्षतिग्रस्त or नष्ट, सहित the अध्यक्षीय राजमहल, the नेशनल सभा भवन, the port-au-prince Cathedral, and the main jail.
among those मारे यहूद archbishop of port-au-prince जोसेफ Serge Miot, and opposition leader Micha Gaillard.
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ), स्तिथ in the पूंजी, collapsed, हत्या अनेक, सहित the मिशन 's मुख्य, Hédi Annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals लिये humanitarian सहायता, pledging निधि और dispatching बचाव और चिकित्सा टीमों, इंजीनियर्स and support personnel.
Communication systems, air, जमीन, और समुद्र हस्तांतरण सुविधाएं, अस्पताल, और विद्युत संजाल था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप, जिससे hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न ; भ्रम over जो थी in चार्ज, एयर ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, और समस्याएं साथ prioritisation of फ़्लाइट further complicated early relief work.
port-au-prince 's morgues यहूद अभिभूत साथ tens of thousands of bodies.
ये था to be दफ्न in mass graves.
As rescues tailed बंद, आपूर्तियाँ, चिकित्सा परवाह और स्वच्छता became priorities.
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals इससे सहायता मजदूर और survivors, और लूटने और विरल हिंसा were observed.
On 22 January the United Nations noted that the आपात phase of the राहत आपरेशन थी आरेखण to a बंद, और on the following दिन the haitian सरकारी officially पुकारा बंद the search for survivors.
मिस्टर ed is a fictional talking घोड़ा, originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स, और बाद in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात कॉमेडी उत्पादित by filmways that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2, 1961, and then on CBS from October 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were Mister Ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', played by gelding Bamboo Harvester और voiced by पूर्व पश्चिमी स्टार allan लेन ( जो गई uncredited लिये the संपूर्ण लंबाई of the श्रेणी ), और उसके मालिक, an eccentric और enormously klutzy, yet दोस्ताना, वास्तु नामित Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ).
Much of the program 's humor stemmed इससे the फैक्ट मिस्टर ed होता बोलो तभी to wilbur, as खूब as ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other कार्यशील चुटकुले केन्द्रित on wilbur 's अक्षर होने a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or others.
According to the show 's निर्माता, आर्थर lubin, यंग थी चुनी as the सीसे अक्षर क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the sort of guy a horse would talk to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae West, scored a तख्तापलट by persuading the स्क्रीन प्रतीक to अतिथि star in one episode.
In the United States, reruns aired on उपनाम at नाइट इससे कूच 3, 1986, to फ़रवरी 1, 1993.
Sister station TV Land भी reran the दिखाएँ इससे 1996–98 और again इससे 2003-06.
the श्रेणी is फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv, साथ साथ Highway Patrol, and The Patty Duke Show.
It is भी फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on Hallmark Movie Channel.
As of January 1, 2011, the पहला दो सीज़न of the दिखाएँ हैं उपलब्धियाँ on hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology जिससे refers to the `` होने caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` मुर्दे in मसीह '' और `` we जो हैं जिंदा और remain '' होगा be `` caught up in the बादल '' to मिलें `` the रब in the एयर ''.
The term `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक दो होश.
In the pre-tribulation दृश्य, a समूह of लोगों होगा be बाएँ पीछे on धरती after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the most common use of the पद, विशेषकर among fundamentalist ईसाइयों और in the संयुक्त States.
The other, older use of the पद `` rapture '' is बस as a पर्याय लिये the फाइनल क़यामत generally, बगैर a विश्वास कि a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on धरती लिये an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
This distinction is महत्वपूर्ण as कुछ प्रकार of christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in धार्मिक शिक्षा, but might use the older and more general sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the final resurrection.
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it होगा occur in एक इवेंट or दो ), और विभिन्न दृश्य regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial महफ़िल वर्णित in 1 thessalonians 4.
Denominations such as Roman Catholics, Orthodox Christians, Lutheran Christians, and Reformed ईसाइयों मानना in a rapture तभी in the भाव of a सामान्य फाइनल क़यामत, जब मसीह रिटर्न a सिंगल समय.
They do not believe that a group of people is left पीछे on धरती लिये an विस्तारित tribulation काल बाद the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth brethren, और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the चौड़ी परिसंचरण of the scofield Reference Bible.
Kris नाथन humphries ( born फ़रवरी 6, 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर basketball player with the Brooklyn Nets.
The Philistine शहरों of गाजा, ashdod, ashkelon, ekron, और gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, Plištim ), Pleshet or peleset, यहूद a लोगों जो as भाग of the समुद्र peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय क्षेत्रफल of canaan at the शुरूआत of the आयरन आयु ( circa 1175 bc ), सबसे probably from the Aegean region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, ekron और gath, इससे wadi गाजा in the दक्षिण to the yarqon नदी in the उत्तर, लकिन साथ no फिक्स्ड किनारा to the east.
The Bible paints उन्हें as the किंगडम of इसराईल 's most dangerous enemy.
Originating somewhere in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC, rising to a शिखर of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc, of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी नहीं अधिक than हाफ the कुल, और शायद much कम.
Nothing is known for certain about the original भाषा or भाषाएं of the philistines, however वे यहूद नहीं भाग of the Semitic Canaanite population.
There is some limited evidence in favour of the assumption कि the philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either इससे यूनानियों and/or luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor.
philistine-related शब्द मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती, और can in कुछ मामले, साथ रिज़र्वेशन, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st मिलेनियम bce वे था अपनाया the सामान्य canaanite language of the region.
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple चुनाव परीक्षण, administered by the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य प्रवेश प्रसंस्करण कमांड, प्रयुक्त to determine योग्यता लिये enlistment in the United States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when वे हैं in the 10th, 11th और 12th ग्रेड, हालांकि anyone योग्य लिये enlistment may take it.
Although the परीक्षण is administered by the सैन्य, it is नहीं ( और never रै महरूम ) a आवश्यकता that a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the armed forces.
In financial accounting, a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole बंदोबस्त, a कारोबार साझेदारी, a निगम or अन्य कारोबार संगठन, ऐसे as an llc or an LLP.
Assets, liabilities and ownership इक्विटी हैं सूचीबद्ध as of a विशिष्ट तिथि, ऐसे as the समाप्त of इसके वित्तीय year.
A balance sheet is often वर्णित as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी 's वित्तीय condition ''.
Of the four basic वित्तीय कथन, the संतुलन चादर is the तभी बयान जिससे applies to a सिंगल पाइंट in समय of a कारोबार ' calendar year.
A standard company balance sheet रै तीन भाग : एसेट, देनदारी और ownership equity.
The main categories of एसेट हैं प्रायः सूचीबद्ध पहला, और typically in order of liquidity.
Assets हैं followed by the देनदारी.
The difference between the assets and the देनदारी is ज्ञात as इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट or the जाल लायक or पूंजी of the कम्पनी और according to the हिसाब समीकरण, जाल लायक जरूर बराबर एसेट ऋण liabilities.
Another way to look at the same समीकरण is कि एसेट बराबरी देनदारी प्लस owner 's equity.
Looking at the equation in this way shows कैसा एसेट यहूद financed : either by उधार धन ( देयता ) or by using the मालिक 's money ( owner 's equity ).
Balance sheets are usually presented साथ एसेट in एक खण्ड और देनदारी और जाल लायक in the अन्य खण्ड साथ the दो भाग `` balancing. ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन at the समाप्त of the काल, प्लस any cash in hand.
However, many businesses are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods और वे acquire इमारतें और उपकरण.
In other words : व्यवसायों have एसेट और so वे can नहीं, भी if वे want to, तत्काल turn these into cash at the end of each period.
Often, ये व्यवसायों owe धन to आपूर्तिकर्ता और to कर अधिकारियों, और the proprietors do नहीं withdraw all their original capital and profits at the end of each period.
In other शब्द व्यवसायों भी have देनदारी.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly ज्ञात as the.17 hmr, is a rimfire राइफल कार्ट्रिज विकसित by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002.
It descended from the.22 Magnum by necking bas the.22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a.17 कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, और it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 caliber rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded with a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) गोली, it can उद्धार muzzle गतियाँ in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional baseball टोली आधारित in schaumburg, इलिनोइस, in the संयुक्त States.
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North अमरीकी लीग, जिससे is नहीं संबद्ध साथ प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल, however, the टोली folded in कूच 2011, पहले वे began खेल in the NAL.
इससे the 1999 ऋतु to the 2010 ऋतु, the flyers निभाई उनके home games at Alexian Field, near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway.
The team formerly played in थंडर खाड़ी, ओंटारियो, जहाँ वे यहूद ज्ञात as the थंडर Bay Whiskey Jacks.
the टोली थी originally a सदस्य of the उत्तरी League from 1993 to 2010.
On July 27, 2009, the Flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II, जिससे pitted the flyers विरूद्ध the नेशनल प्रो fastpitch सॉफ्टबॉल champions, the शिकागो डाकुओं.
निभाई by आधिकारिक सॉफ्टबॉल नियम, the खेल थी देखी by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, and was won by the Bandits 4-2.
In 1999, the flyers नियुक्त उनके पहला मैनेजर, Ron Kittle.
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White Sox, and former Chicago Cubs and श्वेत sox खिलाड़ी ग्रेग hibbard थी the pitching कोच.
During the early years of the franchise, kittle किया a श्रेणी of tv commercials to प्रचार the टोली, using the gimmick `` ma Kittle. '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma. ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial interest in the टोली as the flyers hoped to चोरी दूर प्रशंसक इससे the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly successful converse विज्ञापन जहाँ लैरी जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as दोनो खुद और `` gramama. ''
At the end of the 2001 season, however, kittle resigned इससे उसके managerial स्थिति, और जिम Boynewicz was hired to replace him.
In 2004, the Flyers made it to the उत्तरी लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी विरूद्ध the st. पॉल संतो.
Despite leading the five-game श्रेणी 2-1, schaumburg आखिरकार lost the series.
In Game 5, Flyers relief pitcher Lyle prempas अनुमत a खेल जीतना ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder मार्क mirizzi in the ninth inning.
The Flyers appeared in the Northern लीग playoffs चार टाइम्स ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never won the championship.
Some famous खिलाड़ी जो निभाई लिये the flyers यहूद पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder ozzie canseco and former Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
रेचल हन्ना वाइज़ ( / वाइस / ; born 7 कूच 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी फिल्मी और थिएटर actress and former fashion model.
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall, कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s, तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न, appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स, the अंग्रेजों mini-series स्कारलेट और ब्लैक, and the television film Advocates II.
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ), but her breakthrough role came in the film कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as एवलिन carnahan-o'connell in the films the मम्मी ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates, About a Boy, Constantine, The Fountain and The Constant माली, लिये जिससे वो प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं ' गिल्ड पुरस्कार लिये उसके supporting भूमिका as टेसा Quayle.
She has been labelled an `` अंग्रेज़ी रोज़ '' चूंकि उसके नाबालिग भूमिका in चोरी Beauty ( 1996 ).
वाइज़ भी works in थिएटर.
Her stage भेदन थी the 1994 पुनरुद्धार of noël कायर 's खेल डिज़ाइन लिये जीना, which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse production of Tennessee विलियम्स ' एकाएक, पिछला गर्मियाँ, और उनके 2009 पुनरुद्धार of a स्ट्रीटकार Named Desire.
Her portrayal of blanche dubois in the latter खेल अर्जित उसके the आलोचकों ' वृत्त Theatre Award for Best Actress.
She has recently निभाई evanora in oz the ग्रेट and Powerful.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
आठ बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये war.
The Confederates assumed that European देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि crippled the southern economy.
The पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध i.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a form of ब्रैड in जिससे आलू replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour.
It is पकाया in a किस्में of विधि, सहित by baking it on a hot griddle or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, और may have a किस्में of अन्य ingredients baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी, साथ कुछ व्यंजनों having a बहुमत of आलू, और अन्य having a majority of wheat flour.
Some व्यंजनों कॉल लिये mashed आलू, साथ अन्य calling for dehydrated potato flakes.
it is उपलब्धियाँ as a वाणिज्यिक उत्पाद in many countries, with similar variations in ingredients, cooking method, and other variables.
The प्रशांत समय मण्डल observes मानक समय by subtracting आठ hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
The clock time in this मण्डल is आधारित on the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the ग्रीनविच वेधशाला.
During daylight छायांकन समय, इसके समय ऑफसेट is.
in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, इस समय मण्डल is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ).
Specifically, it is प्रशांत मानक समय ( pst ) जब observing मानक समय ( शीत ), और प्रशांत daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ).
Most of कनाडा उपयोग daylight छायांकन समय.
In Mexico the utc−8 समय मण्डल is ज्ञात as the उत्तरपश्चिम मण्डल, जिससे is synchronized साथ the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest नगर in the प्रशांत समय मण्डल is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे यूएसए ; the नगर 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone.
The मण्डल is एक घंटा ahead of the अलास्का समय मण्डल, एक घंटा पीछे the Mountain Time Zone and three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone.
Stereo 8, commonly known as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track टेप, or बस eight-track, is a चुम्बकीय tape sound recording technology.
It was popular in the United राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s, लकिन थी अपेक्षाकृत unknown in many European countries.
It was, however, बहुत लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त किंगडम दौरान this period.
स्टीरियो 8 थी निर्मित in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of lear जेट निगम, साथ with Ampex, Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Motorola, and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ).
It was a further development of the similar stereo-pak four-track कार्ट्रिज निर्मित by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz.
A later quadraphonic संस्करण of the स्वरूप थी घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और पहला known as Quad-8, then later changed to just Q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or अगस्त 1213 bc ; मिश्र :, alternatively transcribed as rameses और ramses or ), referred to as रामेसेस the Great, was the third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty.
He is प्रायः regarded as the महानतम, सबसे मनाये, and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire.
His successors and later उन्होंने पुकारा उसे the `` ग्रेट पूर्वज. ''
Ramesses II led several military रिझाने into the levant, re-asserting मिश्र कंट्रोल over canaan.
He also led रिझाने to the दक्षिण, into नुबिया, commemorated in inscriptions at beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein.
At age fourteen, Ramesses थी नियुक्त प्रिंस रीजेंट by उसके पिता सेती I.
He is believed to have लिया the सिंहासन in उसके लेट किशोर और is ज्ञात to have शासित मिश्र इससे 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो and 2 months, according to both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary historical records.
He was once said to have जिया to be 99 सालो बूढ़ा, लकिन it is अधिक संभावित कि he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became pharaoh in 1279 bc as सबसे egyptologists आज मानना, he होता have assumed the सिंहासन on may 31, 1279 bc, आधारित on उसके ज्ञात accession date of III Shemu day 27.
Ramesses II मनाये an unprecedented 14 sed त्यौहार ( the पहला आयोजित बाद तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और तब प्रत्येक three years ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh.
On his death, he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the किंग्स ; उसके देह थी बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881, and is now on display in the Cairo Museum.
The early part of his reign was केन्द्रित on भवन शहरों, मंदिरों और स्मारक.
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses in the nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी और प्रमुख आधार लिये his campaigns in Syria.
This city was built on the remains of the नगर of avaris, the पूंजी of the हिक्सोस जब वे took over, और थी the स्थान of the main Temple of Set.
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources, from a transliteration into यूनानी of a भाग of रामेसेस 's सिंहासन नाम,, `` ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
the टेक्सास रेंजरों हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल team located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The Rangers franchise is फिलहाल a सदस्य of the पश्चिमी प्रभाग of Major League Baseball 's American League.
चूंकि, the रेंजरों have निभाई in रेंजरों Ballpark in Arlington in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's name is borrowed from the प्रसिद्ध विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी of the वही नाम.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the नाम of the वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों, an विस्तार टोली awarded to वॉशिंगटन, d.C., बाद the नगर 's पहला ballclub, the असली वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों, moved to Minnesota and became the Twins.
After the season, the new Senators स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास, और debuted as the रेंजरों the following spring.
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason, सब following प्रभाग championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers advanced पास्ट the प्रभाग श्रेणी लिये the पहला समय, defeating the tampa Bay Rays.
Texas then brought home their first अमरीकी लीग pennant बाद धड़कन the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ in छह games.
In the 2010 World Series, the मताधिकार 's पहला, the रेंजरों गिरी to the सैन फ्रांसिस्को Giants in five games.
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to जीत a संसार श्रेणी खेल, the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having महरूम swept in उनके 2005 World Series appearance.
They repeated as American League champions the following साल, तब खोया the 2011 संसार श्रेणी to the st. लुई कार्डिनल्स in seven games.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 BC – 15 कूच 44 bc ) थी a रोमन सामान्य, statesman, कौंसुल और notable लेखक of Latin prose.
He played a नाजुक भूमिका in the कार्यक्रम कि led to the निधन of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire.
In 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus and Pompey formed a राजनैतिक गठबंधन कि थी to dominate रोमन राजनीती लिये अनेक सालो.
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट, among उन्हें केटो the younger साथ the बारंबार support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of gaul, समाप्त by 51 bc, विस्तारित रोम 's territory to the English Channel and the Rhine.
Caesar became the पहला रोमन सामान्य to क्रॉस दोनो जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार the राइन और conducted the first invasion of Britain.
These achievements granted him unmatched military शक्ति और threatened to ग्रहण the खड़ा of pompey, जो था realigned खुद साथ the सीनेट बाद the death of Crassus in 53 BC.
With the Gallic Wars concluded, the Senate ordered सीज़र to lay bas उसके सैन्य कमांड और वापसी to Rome.
Caesar refused, and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon with a लीजन, leaving उसके प्रांत और illegally प्रवेश रोमन territory under arms.
Civil war resulted, इससे जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled leader of Rome.
After assuming कंट्रोल of सरकारी, सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल and governmental reforms, including the creation of the Julian calendar.
He केंद्रीकृत the अफसरशाही of the गणतंत्र और थी आखिरकार proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved, and on the ides of कूच ( 15 कूच ) 44 bc, सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by मार्कस junius ब्रूटस.
A new series of civil wars broke out, and the संवैधानिक सरकारी of the गणतंत्र थी never restored.
Caesar 's adopted heir octavian, बाद ज्ञात as augustus, रोज़ to एकमात्र शक्ति, and the era of the Roman Empire began.
Much of Caesar 's जीवन is ज्ञात इससे उसके अपना खाते of उसके सैन्य अभियान, और इससे अन्य समकालीन स्त्रोत, मुख्यतः the अक्षर और भाषणों of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by suetonius और प्लूटार्क हैं भी प्रमुख स्त्रोत.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of इतिहास.

Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, बाहर the विश्वविद्यालयों of Lagos
वहीँ हैं सैंकड़ों of भाषाएं spoken in Nigeria.
the प्रमुख भाषाएं हैं योरूबा, हौसा, Igbo, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official language of सीरियल, अंग्रेज़ी, the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा, थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, और Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान language families.
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot, ( UK ) bird 's nest, bishop 's lace, and महारानी ऐनी 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering संयंत्र in the परिवार apiaceae, देशी to शीतोष्ण regions of Europe, southwest Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia.
domesticated गाजर are cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख ii of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of कॉंग्रेस to alter, अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग regions of the संयुक्त States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत, सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals, और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त States district courts.
All of these judges वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
In addition, judges of the Court of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, और their power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I और आलेख iii अधिकरणों.
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born दिसम्बर 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर, songwriter and actress.
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and अधिक 20 लाख singles, bringing उसके कुल बिक्री to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around the world.
Furtado first gained कीर्ति साथ उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, वाह, Nelly !
, which spawned दो कामयाब singles, `` i 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` Turn Off the Light ``. ``
I 'm जैसे a बर्ड '' जीती a 2001 juno पुरस्कार लिये सिंगल of the साल और a 2002 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance.
In 2003, Furtado released Folklore, which produced three अंतरराष्ट्रीय singles— `` powerless ( कह कया तुम want ) ``, `` कोशिश `` और `` força ``.
Three years later she released ढीला, a विश्वव्यापी वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी.
The album spawned four number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous ``, `` maneater ``, `` कह it Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) ``.
बाद a three-year ब्रेक, वो released उसके पहला full-length स्पेनी एल्बम, mi योजना, and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album.
In 2012, फ़र्टाडो 's चौथी english-language स्टुडियो album, The Spirit Indestructible was released.
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous awards and accolades, सहित 2 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 10 juno पुरस्कार, 3 muchmusic वीडियो पुरस्कार और a स्टार on कनाडा 's Walk of Fame.
जीव of the रात्रि is the tenth studio album by Kiss.
It is the band 's पिछला एल्बम लिये कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड, the तभी लेबल the समूह था कभी अंकित for at that point.
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder और जल्दी चुंबन समर्थक neil bogart, जो था died of कर्कट during the recording sessions.
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho सर्कस ), और इसके पहला एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट होता बाद be credited, लकिन नहीं प्रदर्शित pictorially on the कवर, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
टच is a निर्णायक means of receiving information.
This फ़ोटो shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ for visually impaired people.
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing केंद्रों to उपज the संवेदी modalities ऐसे as टच, तापमान, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The sensory receptors cover the स्किन और epithelia, skeletal मांसपेशियां, हड्डियों और joints, आतंरिक organs, and the cardiovascular system.
While touch is considered one of the पाँच परंपरागत होश, the छाप of टच is formed from several modalities.
In medicine, the colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर reflect the variety of mechanisms involved.
दैहिक होश हैं sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश, साथ the समझना कि somesthesis includes touch, proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception.
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors और chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the स्पाइनल cord और into the brain.
Processing primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex.
The cortical homunculus थी devised by Wilder Penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when activity in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as heat ; this signal आखिरकार गुजरता to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to कि क्षेत्रफल on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be लगा at the सही स्थान.
The point-to-point मानचित्रण of the देह सतहों in the दिमाग is पुकारा a homunculus और is अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि of a body image.
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) मैप is नहीं अपरिवर्तनीय, however.
Dramatic शिफ्ट can occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक or injury.
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति in the subfamily magnolioideae of the परिवार magnoliaceae.
It is named बाद फ्रेंच वनस्पतिशास्त्री पियरे magnol.
magnolia is an प्राचीन genus.
Appearing before bees किया, the पुष्प विकसित to प्रोत्साहित pollination by beetles.
To avoid क्षति इससे pollinating भृंग, the carpels of Magnolia flowers are extremely tough.
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have महरूम मिला डेटिंग to 20 लाख सालो पहले, और of पौधे identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago.
Another aspect of magnolias कि is माना to represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic साथ अनेक अन्य flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ).
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution, with a main centre in ईस्ट और southeast एशिया और a द्वितीयक केन्द्र in पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका, सेंट्रल अमेरिका, the वेस्ट इंडीज, और some species in South America.
