`` White Christmas '' is an Irving बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned Christmas setting.
According to the Guinness Book of संसार रिकॉर्ड, the संस्करण सुंग by bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब time, with estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide.
खाते vary as to जब और where Berlin wrote the song.
One story is कि he लिखा it in 1940, in गरम la quinta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जबकि रहकर at the la quinta होटल, a बारंबार हॉलीवुड रिट्रीट भी favored by writer-producer Frank Capra, although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there.
He often stayed up all रात्रि लिखने — he बताई उसके सचिव, `` पकड़ें अपना कलम and take down this song.
I just wrote the बेहतरीन सोंग i 've कभी लिखा — हेक, i बस लिखा the बेहतरीन सोंग कि anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring in which भागीदार propel themselves आरपार snow-covered मैदान using skis and poles.
The activity is popular in अनेक स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields, primarily उत्तरी Europe, Canada, and Alaska.
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing खेल परिवार, जिससे शामिल स्की कूद, nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country स्कीइंग और स्की कूद ), biathlon ( स्कीइंग and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ).
Cross-country skiing is the आधुनिक स्टाइल of स्कीइंग कि सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक स्कीइंग, विशेषकर जब किया in the backcountry.
It is also सम्बन्धित to telemark स्कीइंग.
A use tax in संयुक्त राज्य is पूरक to बिक्री कर जिससे अर्थात्, if you buy a Taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax to vendor, you owe use tax.
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद यहूद खपत or सेवाएं यहूद rendered.
Use tax typically is a tax on खपत लकिन if तुम ख़रीदे an मद ( बगैर paying बिक्री कर ) और स्टोर it in your warehouse initially, use tax applies to that location where goods were stored.
Later on when the final consumption takes place at कुछ अन्य स्थान, तुम हैं जरूरी to अदा the अवकल of कर रेट to the क्षेत्राधिकार of परम place of consumption.
This really means that you do n't have to अदा दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as उपयोग Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the अन्य कि तुम हैं जरूरी to अदा on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it is the दायित्व of the खरीदार to स्वः assess उपयोग कर और अदा it to the उचित jurisdication.
Use Tax is generally charged at the same कर रेट of बिक्री कर लकिन in कुछ राज्य the कर रेट is अलग.
Use tax is भी termed as `` खपत कर '' or `` उपभोक्ता उपयोग Tax ''.
a उपयोग कर is a प्रकार of excise कर levied in the United States by numerous state governments.
it is assessed upon ठोस निजी प्रॉपर्टी खरीदा by a निवासी of the assessing राज्य लिये use, storage, or consumption in that state ( not for resale ), regardless of where the purchase took place.
If a निवासी of a राज्य makes a खरीदें भीतर उसके घर राज्य, पूरा बिक्री कर is सशुल्क at the time of the transaction.
The use tax applies जब a निवासी of the assessing राज्य purchases an मद कि is नहीं विषय to his home state 's sales tax.
Usually, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering वस्तुएं through the मेल, by फोन, or over the अंतरजाल from other states.
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as the बिक्री कर कि होता have महरूम owed ( if कोई ) था the वही goods महरूम खरीदा in the state of residence.
For example, a resident of Massachusetts, साथ a 6.25 % `` बिक्री और उपयोग कर '' on निश्चित goods और सेवाएं, purchases non-exempt goods or सेवाएं in नई हैम्पशायर for use, storage or other consumption in Massachusetts.
अंतर्गत नई हैम्पशायर विधि, the नई हैम्पशायर विक्रेता collects no बिक्री कर on the goods, लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax.
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of खरीदें, whatever कर यहूद सशुल्क by the क्रेता to कि राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग, भंडार or consumption in Massachusetts.
With few exceptions, no state 's vendors will charge the native state 's sales कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य, अर्थ सब goods ordered इससे out-of-state हैं essentially free of sales tax.
The purchaser is इसलिए जरूरी to घोषित और अदा the उपयोग कर to his home state on these ordered goods.
The assessing jurisdiction may मेक the उपयोग कर देय annually, लकिन कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता a मासिक भुगतान.
For example, where a वर्मांट निवासी रै नहीं सशुल्क at तनिक 6 % बिक्री कर on प्रॉपर्टी brought in लिये उपयोग in the राज्य, वर्मांट विधि requires दाखिल a कर वापसी ( रूप su-452 और भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee, a 5 % penalty per month, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties.
Typical exemptions शामिल purchases by charitable non-profit संगठन or सरकारी एजेंसियों, purchases लिये पुनर्विक्रय in कॉमर्स, और purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business.
Also note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the u.S. और अनेक have ever-changing सूचियाँ of विशिष्ट प्रकार of goods और सेवाएं कि हैं नहीं taxable.
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires भुगतान of कर on `` pre-written '' ( नहीं कस्टम ) तन्त्र खरीदा और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और उपयोग in मैसाचुसेट्स, regardless of where it originates.
However, the actual use of the वही तन्त्र डाउनलोड by a मैसाचुसेट्स निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In contrast, Arkansas generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित over the अंतरजाल ( ऐसे as डाउनलोड तन्त्र or म्यूज़िक ), मगर voip which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered ऑनलाइन, मगर `` कस्टम तन्त्र लिये a particular ग्राहक '' जिससे is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most cases, this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax laws of इसके अपना स्थान, रिमोट विक्रेता have to सौदे साथ the उपयोग कर कानून of अनेक jurisdictions—up to प्रत्येक us राज्य और मोहल्ले कि प्रकृती उन्हें, if the कम्पनी रै a उपस्थिति or `` नेक्सस '' in प्रत्येक राज्य ( as विशाल `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ).
In medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood दबाव in the pulmonary धमनी, pulmonary रग, or pulmonary capillaries, साथ ज्ञात as the फेफड़ों vasculature, अग्रणी to shortness of साँस, dizziness, fainting, और अन्य symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a कठोर बीमारी साथ a markedly decreased कसरत सहिष्णुता और दिल विफलता.
It was पहला पहचाना by dr. अर्नस्ट वोन romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent classification, it can be एक of पाँच अलग प्रकार : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or विविध.

Sanuk, a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation, is a जूते ब्रांड आधारित in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Sanuk, the Thai word for fun, was founded by Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी जेफ़ kelley जब he प्रारंभ बनाना चप्पल आउट of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The first product created was green carpeted और हकदार the `` फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान मालिक asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through बुटीक स्टोर्स और नहीं the intended लहरे shops.
The novelty अधिनियम थी followed up by a चन्दन लपेटा in तार जाल, a तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण, and styles made out of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men, women and youth and is distributed आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य और in over 50 देशों throughout यूरोपीय, एशिया, दक्षिण अमेरिका और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Sanuk centers itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली वकालत the slogan, `` Smile, Pass it on ! ``.
In computer science, array programming languages ( also known as vector or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन on scalars to लागू transparently to vectors, matrices, and higher dimensional arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार परिचय आंकड़ा हेरफेर.
The level of conciseness can be नाटकीय in निश्चित मामले : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code.
apl, designed by केन iverson, थी the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग language to provide array programming capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays प्रति se. iverson 's योगदान to rigor और स्पष्टता थी संभवतः अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the simple extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party, usually an व्यक्तिगत, pays a जीवन बीमे कम्पनी a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि होगा बाद be वितरित वापस to the insured party over time.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a गारंटी वितरण of आय over समय, ऐसे as via फिक्स्ड भुगतान, जबतक the death of the person or persons named in the contract or until a final date, whichever comes first.
However, the majority of modern annuity ग्राहक उपयोग annuities तभी to accumulate निधि फ़्री of आय और पूंजी gains कर और to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
अध्यक्ष बराक Obama.
Barack Obama with his first परम् अदालत nominee, सोनिया Sotomayor.
Following is a list of all संयुक्त राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama नामांकित to आलेख iii judgeships have महरूम पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट, namely दो justices to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त States, 35 judges to the United States courts of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations हैं फिलहाल प्रतीक्षारत Senate action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों और 22 अतिरिक्त संघीय न्यायपालिका vacancies कि हैं anticipated to occur पहले the समाप्त of ओबामा 's second term.
Obama has not made any recess नियुक्ति to the संघीय न्यायालयों.
Obama has made two nominations to the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, an आलेख iii tribunal.
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United राज्य अदालत of संघीय दावा, an आलेख i अदालत, to be मुख्य Judge of that court.
इस is a सूची of एयरपोर्ट in Mexico, sorted by location.
मैक्सिको रै परिचय 1,834 एयरपोर्ट, रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of एयरपोर्ट in North America, and 3rd in the world.
Only major नेशनल और अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट are shown.
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a सुरक्षा, प्रायः a बंध, जारी by a u.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not गारंटी by the us सरकारी चूंकि the एजेंसियों हैं private entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan विपणन संघ ( sallie mae ), संघीय नेशनल बंधक संघ ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर ऋण बंधक निगम ( फ्रेडी Mac ).
Agency प्रतिभूति हैं प्रायः exempt इससे state and local taxes, but not federal tax.
Agency debt is भी पुकारा an एजेंसी security.
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, a खौलते जल रिएक्टर.
The reactors are located inside the आयताकार containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the कूलिंग मीनारें.
Three nuclear-powered American warships, ( शीर्ष to नीचे ) नाभिकीय cruisers uss bainbridge और uss long बीच साथ uss एंटरप्राइज़ the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964.
Crew members हैं स्पेलिंग आउट आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence formula E = mc2 on the flight deck.
The Russian nuclear-powered हिमभंजक ns yamal on a 1994 संयुक्त expedition with the NSF.
Nuclear power is the use of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate ऊष्मा और विद्युत.
Nuclear power पौधे provided परिचय 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा और 13 % of the world 's electricity, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report कि वहीँ हैं 437 operational नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों ( हालांकि नहीं all are producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
In जोड, वहीँ हैं लगभग 140 नवल बरतन using नाभिकीय propulsion in operation, powered by some 180 reactors.
There is an जारी बहस परिचय the उपयोग of nuclear energy.
proponents, ऐसे as the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि नाभिकीय शक्ति is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, such as Greenpeace अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs, मानना कि नाभिकीय शक्ति मुद्राएँ अनेक खतरे to people and the environment.
नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र दुर्घटनाओं शामिल the chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ), and the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
वहीँ have भी महरूम कुछ nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
Research into safety improvements is continuing and नाभिकीय संलयन, believed to be safer, may be used in the future.
As of 2012, according to the iaea, विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय शक्ति reactors under construction in 15 countries.
In the US the licenses of almost हाफ इसके रिएक्टरों have महरूम विस्तारित to 60 सालो, और योजनाएँ to निर्माण another दर्जन हैं अंतर्गत serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार of नाभिकीय उर्जा नीति in अनेक देशों.
Germany decided to close all its reactors by 2022, और इटली रै बैन नाभिकीय शक्ति.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy Agency halved its अनुमान of अतिरिक्त नाभिकीय generating क्षमता to be निर्मित by 2035.
Photograph of the बर्लिन वॉल लिया इससे the West side.
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट germans इससे fleeing इससे Communism.
It was an iconic symbol of the Cold युद्ध और इसके पतन in 1989 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the War.
The Cold War, often dated from 1947 to 1991, was a sustained state of political and military tension between शक्तियां in the पश्चिमी bloc, वर्चस्व by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ नाटो among इसके allies, और शक्तियां in the पूर्वी bloc, वर्चस्व by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi जर्मनी, leaving the ussr और the us as दो superpowers साथ profound आर्थिक और राजनैतिक मतभेद.
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned गति संस्थापित by मिश्र, इण्डिया, और यूगोस्लाविया ; इस गुट अस्वीकृत संघ साथ either the US-led West or the Soviet-led East.
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each possessing नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby threatened साथ परस्पर assured विनाश —never met in direct military combat.
बजाय, in उनके संघर्ष लिये वैश्विक influence वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और in नियमित indirect confrontations through proxy wars.
Cycles of relative calm would be followed by ऊँची टेंशन, जिससे could have led to संसार war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ), the स्वेज संकट ( 1956 ), the बर्लिन संकट of 1961, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ), the Soviet war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through सैन्य coalitions, रणनीतिक conventional फ़ोर्स deployments, extensive सहायता to क्लाएंट राज्य, espionage, विशाल प्रचार अभियान, conventional और नाभिकीय बाहें दौड़, appeals to न्यूट्रल राष्ट्र, फंसने at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ), and technological competitions such as the Space Race.
The US and USSR became involved in political and military विरोध in the तीसरा संसार देशों of लैटिन अमेरिका, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य ईस्ट, और southeast एशिया.
to alleviate the रिस्क of a संभावित नाभिकीय युद्ध, दोनो पहलू sought relief of political tensions through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the संयुक्त राज्य increased राजनयिक, सैन्य, और आर्थिक pressures on the सोवियत संघ, at a time when the communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the new Soviet President Mikhail गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, especially Poland.
They reached a breaking point when गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग सोवियत सैनिकों to support the faltering सरकारी of East Germany in late 1989.
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from मास्को in a शांतिपूर्ण वेव of revolutions ( वहीँ थी कुछ हिंसा in रोमानिया ).
The pressures escalated inside the सोवियत संघ, जहाँ साम्यवादी गिरी और the ussr was formally dissolved in late 1991.
The United राज्य remained as the संसार 's तभी महाशक्ति.
The Cold War and its events have left a significant विरासत, और it is प्रायः referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, विशेषकर in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park of आयोवा, यूएसए, featuring a bluff निहार the अपर मिसिसिपी नदी विपरीत the संगम of the Wisconsin River.
The park is संचालित by the आयोवा विभाग of प्राकृतिक संसाधन.
it is nearly a हजार एकड़ ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
The निकटतम नगर is मैकग्रेगर, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 लगभग defines इसके उत्तरी boundary.
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of pikes शिखर, a विशेषकर ऊँची पाइंट निहार the gorge of the अपर मिसिसिपी, और जैसे pikes शिखर in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
There are चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds और RV facilities.
पहाड़ बाइक हैं permitted in निश्चित portions of the park.
Aside from recreational विकास, the जमीन in the पार्क थी never साफ और to a विशाल extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement.
It is part of a larger complex of parks, reserves and refuges which include Effigy Mounds National Monument, the various components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन, the विशाल अपर मिसिसिपी नदी नेशनल वन्यजीव और मछली शरण और much छोटी, much कम खूब ज्ञात driftless क्षेत्रफल नेशनल वन्यजीव शरण.
The Northeast Iowa Legacy ट्रेल प्रणाली is undergoing विकास, और होगा कनेक्ट तत्व of these sites.
Zac Brown Band is an अमरीकी country/folk बैंड आधारित in अटलांटा, Georgia.
The लाइनअप consists of zac भूरा ( सीसे vocals, गिटार ), jimmy de मार्टिनी ( चलाऊ, vocals ), जॉन driskell हॉपकिंस ( बास गिटार, vocals ), coy bowles ( गिटार, keyboards ), क्रिस fryar ( ड्रम ), Clay Cook ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
The band has toured throughout the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित a स्लॉट on the 2009 और 2010 bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have also recorded five studio albums, और charted नौ क्रमांक एक singles on the बिलबोर्ड देश चार्ट : `` मुर्गा fried ``, `` toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` as वो 's चलना दूर ``, `` colder मौसम ``, `` घुटना गहन ``, `` रखना me in दिमाग ``, and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in addition to the singles `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at number 2 on the same chart.
Talk रेडियो is a रेडियो स्वरूप containing चर्चा about topical issues.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual, और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार साथ a क्रमांक of अलग अतिथि.
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation, usually by broadcasting live बातचीत between the मेजबान और श्रोता जो `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via टेलीफोन ) to the show.
Listener contributions are usually screened by a दिखाएँ 's निर्माता ( s ) in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम दर्शक ब्याज और, in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक बात radio, attract advertisers.
Generally, the shows are organized into segments, each separated by a pause for विज्ञापन ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial रेडियो, म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in प्लेस of commercials to पृथक the program segments.
विसंगतियाँ of बात रेडियो शामिल रूढ़िवादी बात, hot बात, उदार talk and sports talk.
While talk radio has historically been associated with am/fm, starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio shows became लागत प्रभावी in the form of podcasts.
Now, it is possible for an individual to use a variety of services to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ बगैर carriage by a परंपरागत रेडियो station.
In addition TV programming from talk and news आउटलेट ऐसे as बीबीसी, सीएनएन, ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः उपलब्धियाँ expanding the world of talk radio further.
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios, but a wide variety of अन्य डिवाइस और सेवाएं सहित pcs using itunes, स्टेशन निर्देशिका ऐसे as tunein, दिखाएँ निर्देशिका स्मार्टफ़ोन साथ apps such as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the परिवार hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla fabricius, 1787
hippa admirabilis ( thallwitz, 1892 )
Hippa alcimede ( de man, 1902 )
Hippa australis hale, 1927
hippa carcineutes holthuis & मैनिंग, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de Man, 1896 )
hippa granulatus ( borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( दाना, 1852 )
hippa इंडिका haig, मुरुगन & बालकृष्णन Nair, 1986
Hippa marmorata ( hombron & jacquinot, 1846 )
Hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus emerita, और प्रजाति have प्रायः महरूम transferred between the two genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially ज्ञात as the खास पूंजी प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ), is the capital and largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the उत्तरपश्चिम coast of जावा, जकार्ता is the देश 's आर्थिक, सांस्कृतिक और राजनैतिक केन्द्र, और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011, it is the सबसे populous नगर in इंडोनेशिया और in southeast एशिया, और is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official metropolitan area, known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता, bogor, depok, tangerang और bekasi ), is the दूसरी largest in the संसार, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण और संसार शहरों पढ़ाई Group and Network ( GaWC ) research.
और रै an area of.
This area has population of well over 28 लाख, बनाना it एक of the संसार 's largest conurbations in शर्तें of क्रमांक of निवासियों.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों, a जम्प इससे its 2007 ranking of 171.
Jakarta has grown अधिक rapidly than kuala lumpur, बीजिंग and Bangkok.
Established in the चौथी सदी, the नगर became an महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार बंदरगाहों लिये the किंगडम of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( जब it थी ज्ञात as batavia ) और रै जारी as the पूंजी of इंडोनेशिया चूंकि the देश 's स्वतंत्रता was declared in 1945.
The city is the सीट of the आसियान सचिवालय.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International विमानक्षेत्र, और tanjung priok harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by अनेक intercity और commuter रेल, और परोसा by अनेक बस लाइनों कार्यशील on reserved busways.
A typical घर एयर कंडीशनिंग खिड़की unit.
Air conditioning is the process of altering the गुण of एयर ( primarily तापमान और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable conditions.
More generally, एयर कंडीशनिंग can refer to कोई रूप of technological कूलिंग, heating, ventilation, or disinfection that modifies the condition of air.
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con, AC or A/C, और नहीं to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त लिये प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a प्रमुख or घर appliance, प्रणाली, or यांत्रिकी designed to बदलें the एयर तापमान and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The कूलिंग is typically किया using a सरल प्रशीतन साईकिल, लकिन sometimes वाष्पीकरण is प्रयुक्त, commonly लिये comfort cooling in buildings and motor vehicles.
In construction, a complete प्रणाली of हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन और एयर कंडीशनिंग is referred to as `` HVAC ``.
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( भी styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a सोंग by अमरीकी rapper लील Wayne featuring label mate, Cory Gunz.
It is taken इससे उसके नवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम, Tha Carter IV ( 2011 ).
It was officially released on itunes on दिसम्बर 16, 2010.
It was उत्पादित by `` a milli `` निर्माता Bangladesh.

DC Talk ( styled as dc बात ), is a ग्रैमी -winning ईसाई रैप trio.
The group was formed in Lynchburg, वर्जिनिया in 1987 by टोबी mckeehan, माइकल tait, और केविन अधिकतम स्मिथ.
They have released पाँच प्रमुख स्टुडियो एल्बम साथ : dc बात ( 1989 ), nu थांग ( 1990 ), फ़्री at पिछला ( 1992 ), यीशु Freak ( 1995 ), and Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary ईसाई म्यूज़िक पुकारा dc बात `` the सबसे लोकप्रिय overtly ईसाई अधिनियम of all time. ''
In 2000, the group released an EP titled Solo which contained दो सोलो गीतों इससे प्रत्येक सदस्य.
Since that समय, dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite अंतराल, और the तीन band members have each led solo careers.
They have performed and recorded व्यक्तिगत गीतों साथ अनेक टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s, although the group never officially reunited or disbanded.
The समूह 's musical स्टाइल विकसित significantly throughout their career.
Their first two releases, DC Talk and nu थांग, यहूद of the हिप hop genre.
DC Talk 's तीसरा एल्बम, फ़्री at पिछला, भी मुख्यतः took influence इससे the हिप हॉप स्टाइल, हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक began taking on a rock sound.
The trio 's last two albums, यीशु freak और अलौकिक, यहूद predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a संकलन of अनेक shorter किताबे लिखा at अलग टाइम्स और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of these किताबे have महरूम विभाजित into अध्याय, generally a पेज or so in length, since the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th century, each chapter रै महरूम further विभाजित into `` आयतें '' of a few short lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the मामला of, और sometimes वहीँ is अधिक than एक वाक्य in a सिंगल श्लोक, as in the case of.
As the chapter and verse divisions यहूद नहीं भाग of the असली ग्रन्थ, वे रूप भाग of the paratext of the Bible.
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew टेक्स्ट differ at विभिन्न अंक इससे those प्रयुक्त by ईसाइयों.
For instance, in Jewish परंपरा, the ascriptions to अनेक ज़बूर हैं regarded as स्वतंत्र आयतें, बनाना 116 अधिक आयतें, whereas the स्थापित ईसाई practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places, e.g. in यहूदी bibles is गिने as in ईसाई अनुवाद.
An index ( बहुवचन : indexes ) is a सूची of शब्द or वाक्यांश ( 'headings ' ) और संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to जहाँ उपयोगी सामग्री relating to that heading can be found in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will शामिल names of लोगों, स्थान और कार्यक्रम, और अवधारणाओं चयनित by a व्यक्ति as होने प्रासंगिक और of ब्याज to a संभावित रीडर of the book.
The pointers are typically page numbers, अनुच्छेद संख्याएँ or खण्ड numbers.
In a पुस्तकालयों कैटलॉग the शब्द हैं लेखक, शीर्षक, विषय headings, etc., and the pointers are call numbers.
Internet search engines, such as Google, and full text searching help provide access to information लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक as an अनुक्रमणिका, as वे provide non-relevant कड़ी, और may मिस प्रासंगिक सूचना if it is नहीं phrased in exactly the रास्ता वे expect.
In United States financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a रपट बना by a वित्तीय संस्था to the वित्तीय अपराधों प्रवर्तन संजाल ( fincen ), an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.
फेसबुक on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in फ़रवरी 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी लीग, and Stanford University.
It धीरे added support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों before opening to high school students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the site.
Users must register before using the site, बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, और एक्सचेंज संदेश, सहित स्वचालित notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or अन्य विशेषताएँ, और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे कार्य '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, फेसबुक रै over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10, violating the साईट 's शर्तें of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक, और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा by विश्वव्यापी मासिक active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों, ऐसे as फेसबुक detox, राज्य कि फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक खाता.
nevertheless, फेसबुक 's मार्केट विकास प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions, with the site losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in मेनलो पार्क, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
फेसबुक inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
सल्फोनेमाइड कार्यात्मक group
Hydrochlorothiazide is a सल्फोनेमाइड और a thiazide.
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड, but not a thiazide.
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa दवाएँ or sulpha दवाएँ ) हैं सिंथेटिक रोगाणुरोधी एजेंटों कि contain the sulfonamide group.
Some sulfonamides are also विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are नए ड्रग समूह आधारित on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies are आम, hence medications containing sulfonamides हैं prescribed carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing drugs and additives, such as sulfates और sulfites, जिससे हैं chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड समूह, और do नहीं कारण the वही hypersensitivity प्रतिक्रियाएँ देखी in the sulfonamides.
This is a list of वर्ण इससे जार्ज लोपेज़.
Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) हैं domesticated धूसर geese ( either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as poultry for their meat, eggs, and down feathers since ancient times.
30 Seconds to Mars is an अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड इससे लॉस एंजिल्स, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, लय गिटार, songwriter ), शैनन leto ( ड्रम, percussion ) और tomo miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
following the प्रस्थान of मैट wachter ( अभी of फ़रिश्ते & airwaves ) in 2007, टिम kelleher became the bassist लिये the समूह, performing सजीव only with both Jared and Miličević recording bass for studio recordings, while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
previously, the समूह भी प्रदर्शित guitarists solon bixler ( now of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ).
To date, 30 Seconds to Mars have released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम – 30 सेकेंड to मंगल ( 2002 ), a Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ), This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive मेटल और post-grunge, लकिन वे have भी शामिल भावनाएं, screamo, स्पेस चट्टान और synthrock into their music.
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on their work ) and Tool because of their use of philosophical और आध्यात्मिक गीत, अवधारणा albums and their use of experimental music.
A Christmas Story is a 1983 अमरीकी क्रिसमस कॉमेडी फिल्मी आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये, आधारित on his book In God We Trust, All Others Pay Cash, with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories.
It was निर्देशित by bob क्लार्क.
The film has since become a अवकाश क्लासिक और is दिखाया numerous टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the क्रिसमस season on the network TBS, often in a 24-hour marathon.
In 2012, the film was selected for preservation in the National Film रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस लिये होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
A Joe 's Crab Shack शाखा in सैन डिएगो, ca.
The building was initially a rowing क्लबों और थी बाद परिवर्तित into the restaurant.
Joe 's Crab Shack is an अमरीकी कड़ी of beach-themed seafood कैज़ुअल डाइनिंग रेस्तरां स्वामित्व by ignite रेस्तरां Group.
संस्थापित in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास, the रेस्तरां अभी operates locations all across the United States of America.
It serves seafood और अमरीकी भोजन.
The रेस्तरां भी have a तोहफा दूकान कि बिकता facetious t-shirts featuring phrases advertising Joe 's seafood choices.
It is आधारित in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास.
नई यॉर्क नगर क्रूज लाइनर टर्मिनल in नरक 's Kitchen at 52nd Street.
The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the लक्ज़री लाइनर पंक्ति or मैनहटन क्रूज टर्मिनल or नई यॉर्क क्रूज टर्मिनल ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of उत्तर नदी पियर 88, 90, 92 और 94 on the हडसन नदी between West 46th and West 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be संकल्पित by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित cross-street. )
Ships अभी डॉक at पियर 88, 90 and 92.
बांध 94 on the उत्तर पक्ष is अभी used for exhibition space.
Pier 86, once used by संयुक्त राज्य लाइनों, is अभी घर to the USS Intrepid.
In 2003, the टर्मिनल संभाला 900,000 passengers.
The नगर is forecasting कि 1.5 लाख होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल by 2017.
the पियर हैं long and apart.
They were first समाप्त in 1935 to बदलें the चेल्सी पियर as the नगर 's लक्ज़री लाइनर terminal.
The new टर्मिनल थी निर्मित to हैंडल बडे जहाजों कि had outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The संवर योजनाएँ कॉल लिये it to हैंडल तीन विशाल ships at a time.
In doing renovations, the नगर is भी considering decommissioning Pier 92.

decades the टर्मिनल थी the तभी ocean-going यात्री terminal in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large जहाजों at a समय, दो नई terminals have खोली in the हार्बर — the केप स्वतंत्रता क्रूज बंदरगाहों खोली in 2004 in bayonne, नई जर्सी ( प्रयुक्त by royal caribbean क्रूज लकीर, हस्ती क्रूज़ और azamara क्रूज़ ), और the ब्रुकलीन क्रूज टर्मिनल ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the टर्मिनल थी निर्मित जमीन था to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers.
The US Army Corps of Engineers, जो कंट्रोल the waterfront आयाम, होता नहीं extend the pierhead लकीर दूर into the नदी, so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land.
The city पहले किया इस लिये the चेल्सी पियर ; however in चेल्सी तभी landfill was taken away.
At the Passenger Terminal वास्तविक मैनहटन schist थी taken away.
From डाउनस्ट्रीम in the नदी
Many major passenger ships have docked there, including the RMS Queen Mary 2 and Freedom of the समंदर, पहले the ब्रुकलीन और bayonne terminals opened.

Christian right is a term प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य to describe right-wing ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized by उनके दमदार support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of christianity to राजनीती और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to उपयोग those शिक्षाओं to influence law and public policy.
In the U.S., the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी catholics, यहूदियों, mormons, और occasionally secularists '' who share their goals.
The movement has its roots in अमरीकी राजनीती going वापस as दूर the 1940s और रै महरूम विशेषकर influential since the 1970s.
उनके influence draws, in भाग, इससे grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially रूढ़िवादी स्थितियाँ on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ, स्टेम कोशिका शोध, समलैंगिकता, निरोधक, गर्भपात, and pornography.
Although the Christian right is usually associated साथ the u.S., the गति रै महरूम a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर in the राजनीती of कनाडा, the नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तरी आयरलैंड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया, among अन्य.
Far East गति ( stylized as far★east गति or abbreviated fm ) is an अमरीकी hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The समूह formed in 2003 और consists of kev nish ( केविन nishimura ), prohgress ( James Roh ), J-Splif ( Jae Choung ), and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their song `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '' प्रदर्शित in the हॉलीवुड फिल्म, the तेज़ और the क्रोधित : टोकियो बहाव, और इसके subsequent soundtrack, video game and DVD.
Since `` Round Round '', the समूह रै महरूम प्रदर्शित on विभिन्न संजाल shows सहित,, अनुगामी, गपशप लड़की, और finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित फिल्मी at sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट और on itunes as खूब in लेट October 2010.
दूर ईस्ट गति भी रै the भेद of होने the पहला asian-american group to earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States.
LR44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका, commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी led flashlights, डिजिटल thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
lr44 क्षारीय cell
the बैटरी नामकरण is पारिभाषित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी आयोग ( आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( Primary batteries, part 3 Watch batteries ).
The letter L indicates the electrochemical प्रणाली प्रयुक्त ; a जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड, मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer और धनात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a गोलाकार कोशिका 11.4±0.2 mm व्यास और 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their अपना भाग संख्याएँ लिये आईईसी प्रकार lr44 बैटरी including:
lr44, lr44g, lr44gd, LR44H
LR1154, L1154, l1154c, l1154f, l1154g, L1154H
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn )
1166a
AG13, a613, ag14, ag-14, G13A, G13-A
157, 303, 357
A76, GDA76, gp76a, gpa7, gpa75, gpa76, GPS76A,
1128mp, 208-904, a-76, ca18, ca19, cr44, d76a, ka, ka76, MS76H, PX76A, PX675A, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, V13GA
4.5-volt, D, c, aa, aaa, aaaa, a23, 9-volt, cr2032 and LR44 batteries
Other प्रकार of बैटरी हैं or यहूद बना in the R44 size.
Formerly, mercury batteries were made as बटन कोशिकाएं ( प्रकार mr44 और nr44 ).
zinc-air बैटरी प्रकार pr44 आवश्यकता air to work.
Silver-oxide batteries type SR44 may provide extra capacity compared to lr44 प्रकार लकिन have थोड़ा अलग वोल्टेज characteristics.
प्रदर्शन of a यंत्र meant to उपयोग a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types.

Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most destructive अटलांटिक hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक hurricane ऋतु.
It was the costliest natural disaster, as खूब as एक of the पाँच deadliest hurricanes, in the इतिहास of the United States.
Among recorded अटलांटिक hurricanes, it थी the छठे strongest overall.
At least 1,833 लोगों died in the hurricane और subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane चूंकि the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; कुल प्रॉपर्टी क्षति थी अनुमानित at $ 81 अरब ( 2005 usd ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on अगस्त 23, 2005 और crossed दक्षिणी फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane, causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a श्रेणी 5 hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल, लकिन weakened पहले बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a श्रेणी 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused severe विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे सेंट्रल फ्लोरिडा to टेक्सास, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध प्रणाली catastrophically failed, in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, और the floodwaters lingered लिये सप्ताह.
However, the worst property क्षति occurred in तटीय क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों, जिससे यहूद flooded over 90 % in घंटों, as नौकाएँ और कसीनो barges rammed इमारतें, pushing गाड़ियाँ और घरों inland, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
The hurricane surge सुरक्षा असफलताओं in नई ऑरलियन्स हैं माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. फौज corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
Responsibility for the असफलताओं और बाढ़ थी रखी squarely on the फौज corps in जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood डुवल, u.S. ज़िला अदालत, लकिन the संघीय एजेंसी could नहीं be आयोजित financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the प्रतिक्रियाएँ इससे संघीय, राज्य और लोकल सरकारें, resulting in the इस्तीफा of संघीय आपात प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक माइकल D. Brown, and of New Orleans Police Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass.
Several agencies सहित the संयुक्त राज्य coast गार्ड ( uscg ), नेशनल hurricane बीच ( nhc ), and National Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions.
They provided सटीक hurricane मौसम ट्रैकिंग forecasts with sufficient lead time.
Even the most insistent appeals from national, राज्य और लोकल पब्लिक officials to निवासियों to evacuate पहले the तूफ़ान किया नहीं warn कि the levees could breach and fail.
U.S. debt इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the पब्लिक '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or gross public debt.
The अंतर is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़, '' जिससे शामिल दायित्वों to government programs such as Social Security.
Stated as a formula, नेशनल कर्ज़ = कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक + intragovernmental Debt.
The second panel shows the दो कर्ज़ आंकड़े as a प्रतिशत of u.S. जीडीपी ( डालर मान of u.S. आर्थिक production for that year ).
The top panel is deflated so प्रत्येक साल is in 2010 dollars.
The United States public debt is the money उधार by the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य through the issuing of प्रतिभूति by the राजकोष और other federal government agencies.
US पब्लिक कर्ज़ consists of two components:
Debt आयोजित by the पब्लिक शामिल राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित by निवेशकों बाहर the संघीय सरकारी, सहित that held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve System and foreign, state and local governments.
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury प्रतिभूति आयोजित in खाते administered by the संघीय सरकारी कि हैं owed to कार्यक्रम beneficiaries, ऐसे as the सोशल सुरक्षा Trust Fund.
Debt held by government accounts represents the संचयी surpluses, सहित ब्याज आय, of ये खाते कि have महरूम invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना एकीकृत बजट deficit or surplus.
The संघीय सरकारी बजट deficit or surplus is the अंतर between सरकारी रसीदें and spending, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, some बिता कि is excluded इससे the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the US public debt as a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान युद्धों और recessions, और subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the public as a share of जीडीपी peaked बस बाद संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ), लकिन तब गिरी over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large budget deficits and the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of the संघीय government 's fiscal policies.
On 2 April 2013, कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
Intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 खरब, giving a संयुक्त कुल public debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or लगभग 47 % of the कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी स्वामित्व by विदेशी निवेशकों, the largest of जिससे यहूद the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन और जापानी at बस over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In basketball, an assist is attributed to a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a रास्ता कि लीड to a स्कोर by फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य, अर्थ कि he or वो थी `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer चाहिए be credited साथ an assist.
An assist can be scored लिये the passer भी if the खिलाड़ी जो receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball.
however, the असली परिभाषा of an assist किया नहीं शामिल ऐसे परिस्थितियों, so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass सीधे पहले the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist, so no अधिक than एक assist can be अंकित per field goal ( unlike in other sports, such as ice hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does not count as an assist in the एनबीए, लकिन करता in fiba खेल ( तभी एक assist is awarded प्रति नियत of फ़्री throws in जिससे at तनिक एक फ़्री throw is बना ).
Point गार्ड tend to मिलेंगी the सबसे assists प्रति खेल ( apg ), as उनके भूमिका is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to get fewer assists, but centers साथ शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति और अदालत दृष्टि can dominate a टोली by assisting.
Being inside the key, the बीच प्रायः रै the बेहतरीन कोण और the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये `` dishes '' and other short passes in the scoring area.
Center Wilt चेम्बरलेन led the एनबीए in assists in 1968.
A strong बीच साथ inside-scoring prowess, ऐसे as पूर्व एनबीए बीच hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters.
The एनबीए single-game assist रिकार्ड is 30, आयोजित by स्कॉट skiles of the ऑरलैंडो जादू विरूद्ध the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most करियर assists is आयोजित by जॉन Stockton with 15,806.
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the uk, जब discussing प्रॉपर्टी कर in the संयुक्त राज्य, or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used sometimes in accounting.
In the United States, it is a notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर ( a दसवाँ of a cent ).
in the संयुक्त किंगडम it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the दशकों of चर्चा on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling.
अनेक अन्य मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the मिल, ऐसे as the Maltese lira.
The term comes इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum '', अर्थ `` thousandth part ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( भी प्रायः पुकारा the पारसी युद्धों ) यहूद a श्रेणी of विरोध between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of फारस और city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC.
The टक्कर between the fractious राजनैतिक संसार of the यूनानियों और the विशाल साम्राज्य of the फारसियों began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC.
struggling to नियम the independent-minded शहरों of ionia, the फारसियों appointed tyrants to rule each of them.
This would prove to be the source of much ट्रबल लिये the यूनानियों और फारसियों alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to जीतें the द्वीप of naxos, साथ पारसी support ; however, the expedition थी a क़हर और, pre-empting उसके dismissal, aristagoras incited सब of हैलेनिक एशिया नाबालिग into rebellion against the Persians.
This was the शुरूआत of the आयोनियन विद्रोह, जिससे होता पिछला जबतक 493 bc, progressively आरेखण अधिक regions of Asia Minor into the conflict.
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and eretria, और in 498 bc ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर और बर्न the पारसी क्षेत्रीय पूंजी of Sardis.
The पारसी किंग दारा the ग्रेट vowed to have बदला on Athens and Eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, with the two पहलू effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
in 494 bc, the फारसियों regrouped, और attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus.
at the बैटल of lade, the ionians suffered a निर्णायक शिकस्त, और the विद्रोह collapsed, साथ the फाइनल सदस्यों होने stamped out the following year.
Seeking to सुरक्षित उसके साम्राज्य इससे further revolts और इससे the हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड यूनानियों, दारा embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian आक्रमण of यूनानियों began in 492 bc, साथ the पारसी सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace और Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 BC a second force was sent to Greece, इस समय आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र, अंतर्गत the कमांड of datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades, before besieging, capturing और razing eretria.
however, जबकि en रूट to आक्रमण एथेंस, the पारसी फ़ोर्स थी decisively पराजित by the athenians at the Battle of Marathon, ending Persian efforts for the time being.
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of यूनानियों, लकिन died in 486 bc और जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to उसके बेटे xerxes I.
In 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the second पारसी आक्रमण of यूनानियों साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन सेना कभी समवेत.
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by स्पार्टा और एथेंस ) at the बैटल of thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece.
however, जबकि seeking to नष्ट the संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े, the फारसियों suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
The following year, the confederated Greeks went on the offensive, defeating the Persian फौज at the बैटल of plataea, और समाप्ति the आक्रमण of यूनानियों.
The allied यूनानियों followed up उनके कामयाबी by destroying the बाकी of the पारसी बेड़े at the बैटल of mycale, पहले expelling पारसी garrisons इससे sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the general pausanias at the घेरा of byzantium alienated अनेक of the यूनानी राज्य इससे the spartans, और the anti-persian गठबंधन थी इसलिए reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next तीन दशकों, शुरूआत साथ the expulsion of the बाकी पारसी garrisons इससे Europe.
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the लीग जीती a दोगुना विजय कि आखिरकार secured स्वतंत्रता for the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 bc ) resulted in a विनाशकारी शिकस्त, और further campaigning थी निलंबित.
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC, but हासिल छोटी, और जब it withdrew the greco-persian युद्धों खींचा to a quiet end.
Some historical sources suggest the समाप्त of hostilities थी चिह्नित by a सलाम सन्धि between एथेंस और फारस, the so-called सलाम of Callias.
Hooverville निकट पोर्टलैंड, ऑरेगॉन
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular name for shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर लोगों दौरान the ग्रेट अवसाद.
They were named after Herbert Hoover, who was अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the onset of the अवसाद और widely blamed for it.
The term थी coined by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन, publicity मुख्य of the Democratic National Committee.
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born सितंबर 25, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ).
he थी drafted in the छठे गोलाकार of the 1998 NFL Draft by the Green Bay Packers.
बाद a ऋतु on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड and two seasons backing up Brett Favre, he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led Seattle to six playoff दिखावे और a सुपर कटोरी रूप ; he थी चयनित to तीन प्रो प्याले और an All-Pro selection.
Following ten seasons with the सीहॉक्स, hasselbeck joined the टेनेसी टाइटन्स in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract साथ the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस in 2013 कम than 24 घंटों बाद होने released by the Tennessee Titans.
आईसीटी is inevitably सम्बन्धित to the computer network.
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( IT ), but is a more विशिष्ट पद कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन of दूरसंचार ( टेलीफोन लाइनों और बेतार सिग्नल ), कंप्यूटर as खूब as जरुरी एंटरप्राइज़ तन्त्र, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable users to access, store, transmit, and manipulate information.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, लकिन it became लोकप्रिय बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum for England, Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term आईसीटी is अभी भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल through a single cabling or link system.
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, भवन प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल प्रणाली using a सिंगल एकीकृत प्रणाली of cabling, signal distribution and management.
The term Infocommunications is प्रयुक्त in कुछ मामले as a shorter रूप of सूचना और communication ( s ) technology.
In फैक्ट infocommunications is the विस्तार of दूरसंचार साथ सूचना प्रसंस्करण and content handling functions on a common digital technology base.
For a comparison of ये और अन्य शर्तें, देखिए.
For आईसीटी विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.
This is a सूची of वर्ण इससे जार्ज Lopez.
a schematic प्रस्तुतीकरण of the प्लम खीर मॉडल of the अणु ; in thomson 's गणितीय मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic ढांचा involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum खीर मॉडल of the अणु by J. J. thomson, जो खोजा the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897, थी प्रस्तावित in 1904 पहले the डिस्कवरी of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this model, the अणु is रचित of electrons ( जिससे thomson स्टिल पुकारा `` corpuscles '', हालांकि G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) घिरी by a सूप of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges, like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
the electrons ( as we जान उन्हें आज ) यहूद विचार to be positioned throughout the अणु, लकिन साथ अनेक structures संभावित लिये positioning multiple electrons, particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ).
Instead of a soup, the atom was also sometimes कहा to have था a `` बादल '' of धनात्मक चार्ज.
साथ इस मॉडल, thomson abandoned उसके पहले `` nebular अणु '' hypothesis in which the atom was composed of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least part of the अणु थी to be रचित of thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles, हालांकि the बाकी of the positively charged part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson मॉडल थी disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil प्रयोग of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden.
This was interpreted by अर्नेस्ट रदरफोर्ड in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the मामला of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to संतुलन परिचय 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
Although gold has an atomic number of 79, immediately after रदरफोर्ड 's पेपर appeared in 1911 antonius वैन डेन broek बना the सहज सुझाव कि atomic number is nuclear charge.
The पदार्थ जरूरी प्रयोग to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) कि the प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज थी बहुत बंद to the परमाणु क्रमांक ( moseley मिला तभी एक ईकाई अंतर ), और moseley संदर्भित तभी the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( लकिन quantum-limited ) bohr मॉडल of the अणु in the वही साल, in जिससे a केंद्रक containing an परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक charge is surrounded by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells.
bohr था भी प्रेरित moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model was compared ( हालांकि नहीं by thomson ) to a अंग्रेजों मिठाई पुकारा प्लम खीर, hence the name.
Thomson 's paper थी प्रकाशित in the कूच 1904 संस्करण of the philosophical पत्रिका, the अग्रणी British science journal of the day.
In Thomson 's view :... the atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of वर्दी धनात्मक विद्युतीकरण,...
In इस मॉडल, the electrons यहूद फ़्री to घूर्णन भीतर the blob or cloud of positive substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the फैक्ट कि जब an इलेक्ट्रॉन स्थानांतरित दूर इससे the बीच of the धनात्मक बादल, it लगा a larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स, क्युकी वहीँ थी अधिक सामग्री of विपरीत charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
in thomson 's मॉडल, electrons यहूद फ़्री to घूर्णन in बजती जिससे यहूद further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits.
Thomson attempted to make उसके मॉडल खाता लिये कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों ज्ञात लिये some elements, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, Thomson 's model ( along साथ a समान saturnian रिंग मॉडल लिये परमाणु electrons, भी put आगे in 1904 by nagaoka बाद जेम्स क्लर्क मैक्सवेल 's मॉडल of शनि 's बजती ), यहूद पहले harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
ठेठ स्ट्रिप of बेकन.
बेकन is a cured मांस prepared from a pig.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the परिणाम is भैस bacon ( also known as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or महीने in ठंडा एयर, or it may be boiled or स्मोक्ड.
Fresh and सूखी बेकन is typically पकाया before eating.
boiled बेकन is तैयार to खा, as is कुछ स्मोक्ड bacon, but may be cooked further before eating.
Bacon is prepared इससे अनेक अलग कटौती of meat.
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork, except in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ it is लगभग सदा prepared इससे पोर्क पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` वसीय '', or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ).
the पक्ष काटें रै अधिक meat and less fat than the belly.
बेकन may be prepared इससे either of दो पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback, जिससे is almost pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
bacon-cured पोर्क loin is ज्ञात as back bacon.
uncooked पोर्क पेट बेकन स्ट्रिप्स.
Bacon may be eaten स्मोक्ड, boiled, fried, baked, or ग्रील्ड, or प्रयुक्त as a नाबालिग संघटक to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used लिये barding और larding roasts, विशेषकर game, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is derived from the बूढ़ा ऊँची जर्मनी bacho, अर्थ `` buttock '', `` हैम '' or `` पक्ष of बेकन '', and cognate with the Old French bacon.
In continental Europe, this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग संघटक, valued दोनो as a सोर्स of मोटे और लिये इसके flavor.
In Italy, इस is पुकारा pancetta और is प्रायः पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा uncooked और thinly sliced as part of an antipasto.
Meat from other animals, such as beef, lamb, chicken, goat, or turkey, may भी be काटें, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble बेकन, और may भी be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such उपयोग is आम in क्षेत्रों साथ significant Jewish and Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; अन्य कटौती और विशेषताएँ जरूर be separately योग्य ( e.g., `` स्मोक्ड pork loin bacon '' ).
For safety, bacon must be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be नष्ट by हीटिंग, जमने, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is विशिष्ट इससे नमक पोर्क और हैम by differences in the brine ( or dry packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing संघटक, सबसे notably सोडियम नाइट्राइट, और occasionally सोडियम नाइट्रेट or पोटैशियम नाइट्रेट ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
Flavorings such as भूरा शुगर or मेपल हैं प्रयुक्त लिये some products.
If used, sodium polyphosphates हैं added to improve sliceability और reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried.
Today, a brine for ham, but नहीं बेकन, शामिल a विशाल राशि of sugar.
Historically, `` हैम '' और `` बेकन '' referred to अलग कटौती of मांस कि यहूद brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
the कर्मचारी रिटायरमेंट आय सुरक्षा अधिनियम of 1974 ( erisa ) (, संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a संघीय विधि जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन योजनाएँ in निजी उद्योग और provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
ERISA थी enacted to protect the रूचि of कर्मचारी लाभ योजना भागीदार and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and other सूचना concerning the योजना to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
Providing for उचित remedies और अभिगम to the संघीय courts.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full देह of कानून regulating कर्मचारी लाभ योजनाएँ, जिससे हैं मिला मुख्यतः in the आतंरिक Revenue Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of Labor, the Department of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the आतंरिक आय सेवा ), और the पेंशन लाभ guaranty निगम.
Illegal immigration to the संयुक्त राज्य is the अधिनियम of विदेशी नागरिकों प्रवेश the संयुक्त राज्य, बगैर सरकारी अनुमति और in उल्लंघन of संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रीयता विधि, or रहकर परे the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A warning sign at the international boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा in पाइंट रॉबर्ट्स, वॉशिंगटन.
A much different approach at the u.s.-mexico किनारा निकट el पासो, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the बीच लिये आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख लोगों, bas इससे 12.5 लाख people in 2007.
अन्य estimates दायरा इससे 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report, 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % यहूद इससे अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % यहूद इससे एशिया ; 6 % यहूद इससे यूरोपीय और कनाडा ; और 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent स्कूल ज़िला is a स्कूल ज़िला आधारित in Alvin, Texas ( USA ).
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school district south of Houston in the समुदायों of एल्विन, manvel, pearland, hillcrest, rosharon, आयोवा उपनिवेश, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the नई विशाल master-planned समुदायों of छाया क्रीक ranch, दक्षिण कांटा, and Southern Trails.
Alvin isd कवर of जमीन.
In human anatomy, the ulnar तंत्रिका is a तंत्रिका जिससे रनों निकट the ulna bone.
the ulnar collateral स्नायु of कोहनी joint is in relation with the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected तंत्रिका in the इंसान देह ( अर्थ unprotected by मांसपेशी or bone ), so injury is common.
This nerve is directly connected to the छोटी उंगली, और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग उंगली, supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ, सहित दोनो सामने और वापस of the नुस्ख़े, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One विधि of injuring the तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is फंस between the अस्थि और the overlying skin at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping एक 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is thought to be a pun, based on the ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम of the अस्थि of the अपर भुजा, the `` humerus `` और the word `` humorous ``.
Alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar सनसनी अनुभवी जब it is struck ''.
हॉग्वार्ट्स स्कूल of चुड़ैल और wizardry, shortened हॉग्वार्ट्स, is a fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल of जादू लिये विद्यार्थी aged ग्यारह to अठारह, and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested that वो may have inadvertently लिया the नाम इससे the hogwort संयंत्र ( croton capitatus ), जिससे वो था देखी at kew gardens कुछ समय पहले लिखने the श्रेणी, हालांकि the names `` the हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th बेहतरीन स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 online ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School.
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network Rankings, it was added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग `` लिये मजा '' और थी तब voted on.
The U.S. subprime बंधक संकट थी a नियत of कार्यक्रम और शर्तें कि led to a वित्तीय संकट और subsequent recession that began in 2008.
It was characterized by a rise in subprime बंधक delinquencies और foreclosures, और the resulting मनाही of प्रतिभूति backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in सितंबर 2008, साथ significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों और consumers and the onset of a severe global recession.
There were many causes of the crisis, with commentators assigning different स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों, regulators, क्रेडिट एजेंसियों, सरकारी आवास नीतियों, और उपभोक्ता, among others.
A proximate कारण थी the वृद्धि in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated दौरान a दिए साल रोज़ इससे the ऐतिहासिक 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to लगभग 20 % from 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S.
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 लिये उदाहरण, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two परिवर्तन यहूद भाग of a broader ट्रेंड of lowered lending मानकों और higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households था become increasingly ऋणी, साथ the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी आय उठती इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home कीमतें अस्वीकृत steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त their loans became more difficult.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज दरों ( causing उच्चतर मासिक भुगतान ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, सहित subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms globally, खोया most of their value.
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt and other securities as भाग of a मनाही in the क्षमता और willingness of the निजी वित्तीय प्रणाली to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. credit and financial markets led to tightening क्रेडिट around the संसार और slowing आर्थिक विकास in the U.S. and Europe.
the संकट था कठोर, long-lasting consequences for the U.S. and European economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, साथ nearly 9 लाख कार्य खोया दौरान 2008 और 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. housing कीमतें गिरी nearly 30 % on औसत और the u.S. भण्डार मार्केट गिरी लगभग 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. भण्डार मार्केट था बरामद to इसके pre-crisis शिखर लकिन आवास कीमतें remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट and unemployment remained elevated.
Economic growth remained नीचे pre-crisis स्तर.
Europe also जारी to संघर्ष साथ इसके अपना आर्थिक crisis.
कार्ल जंग in 1910.
Myers and Briggs extrapolated उनके mbti सिद्धान्त इससे जंग 's कृतियाँ in उसके किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक Types.
the myers-briggs प्रकार indicator ( mbti ) मूल्यांकन is a psychometric प्रश्नावली designed to माप मनोवैज्ञानिक preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by कार्ल गुस्ताव जंग और पहला प्रकाशित in उसके 1921 किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार ( अंग्रेज़ी संस्करण, 1923 ).
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological functions by जिससे we अनुभव the संसार : सनसनी, अंतर्ज्ञान, अहसास, और सोच.
One of ये चार कृत्यों is प्रबल सबसे of the time.
The original developers of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी, इसाबेल briggs मायर्स ; ये दो, having पढ़ाई extensively the कार्य of जंग, turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use.
They began creating the indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, believing कि a ज्ञान of व्यक्तित्व वरीयताओं होता सहायता महिलाओं जो यहूद प्रवेश the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective ''.
The initial questionnaire grew into the Myers-Briggs प्रकार indicator, जिससे थी पहला प्रकाशित in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on सामान्य populations और emphasizes the मान of naturally occurring differences.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the रास्ता we construe हमारी अनुभवों, और ये वरीयताओं underlie हमारी रूचि, needs, मान, और प्रेरणा '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording कलाकार महिला गागा, इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on April 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of इसके अनुसूचित release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in प्रेम साथ a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of उसके जीवन कि वो ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the song was also परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to लाओ oneself into the लाइट.
the कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on अनेक धार्मिक समूह, the सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, जो likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous redone-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` lovegame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन पृथक hooks और a हाउस -influenced break down.
Gaga समझाया कि the लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन, regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be.
`` यहूदा '' initially था a दमदार बिक्री खोलने, लकिन थी less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the top ten of the चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार, और भी पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the charts in South Korea.
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring Norman Reedus.
it रै a biblical कथानक जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The वीडियो portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक day missionaries going to Jerusalem.

Before its रिलीज, the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery and her role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं ढूंढना any offensive content.
The video was मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी Video Music Awards.

Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born मारविन pentz gay, jr., थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell, बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of motown '' और `` प्रिंस of आत्मा ''.
During the 1970s, gaye अंकित the अवधारणा एल्बम कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान और neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe अंतर्गत a कर निर्वासन in the जल्दी 1980s, gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the अकादमी of गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the तभी category in which every member is eligible to nominate for.
बेहतरीन चित्र is माना the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण of the अकादमी पुरस्कार, as it represents सब the directing, acting, music composing, writing, editing and other efforts put forth into a film.
Consequently, बेहतरीन चित्र is the फाइनल पुरस्कार और the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना Academy Awards ceremony.
The ग्रैंड staircase कालम at the dolby थिएटर in लॉस एंजिल्स, जहाँ the अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremonies have महरूम आयोजित चूंकि 2002, showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago.
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure वीडियो खेल निर्मित by फ्रेंच डेवलपर quantic सपना exclusively लिये the प्लेस्टेशन 3.
The game is written and निर्देशित by quantic सपना 's संस्थापक and CEO David Cage.
Heavy Rains story is a नाटकीय थ्रिलर modelled बाद फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the origami कातिल, a सीरियल killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next शिकार, जबकि investigative पत्रकार मैडिसन paige, एफबीआई profiler नॉर्मन jayden, और निजी detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
The player interacts साथ the खेल by performing क्रियाएँ highlighted on स्क्रीन सम्बन्धित to motions on the controller, and in some cases, performing a series of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences.
The player 's निर्णय और क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल will affect the narrative.
The main characters can be मारे, और निश्चित क्रियाएँ may सीसे to अलग दृश्यों और endings.
A playable demo थी released on 11 फ़रवरी 2010.
The demo was released prior to this तिथि लिये लोगों जो took भाग in a चार दिन चुनौती on 5 February 2010.
A patch to allow use of the प्लेस्टेशन मूव नियंत्रक to खेल the खेल थी released in September 2010.
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed और रै बेची over दो लाख नक़ल.
It won 2010 's Game of the साल इससे सीएनएन और गेमिंग संघ, और बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN.
A modified version of the game was released titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée exclusively in फ़्रांस, aimed towards a younger audience.
in 2010, the खेल थी शामिल in the किताब 1001 वीडियो Games You Must Play Before You Die.
Total superannuation उद्योग देनदारी : सदस्यों निधि and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988.
सालाना कुल superannuation उद्योग एसेट growth 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों मेक in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ for them in retirement.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया, superannuation इंतजाम हैं government-supported and encouraged, and minimum provisions are compulsory for employees.
For example, employers are required to pay a proportion of an कर्मचारी 's salaries और मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि, लकिन लोगों are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation.
The minimum obligation जरूरी by नियोक्ता is नियत to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the शर्तें of रिलीज contained in अनुसूची 1 of the superannuation उद्योग ( पर्यवेक्षण ) regulations 1994.
