Electoral College map showing the results of the 2012 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया ( denoted in ब्लू ) to कैप्चर 332 चुनावी votes.
Former Governor Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in रेड ) to कैप्चर 206 चुनावी मत.
Cartogram प्रतिनिधित्व of the चुनावी कॉलेज vote लिये the 2012 चुनाव, साथ प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing one electoral vote.
The United States Electoral College is the संस्था कि officially elects the अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States every four years.
The President और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं नहीं निर्वाचित सीधे by the voters.
बजाय, वे हैं निर्वाचित by `` निर्वाचक '' जो हैं chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors हैं apportioned to प्रत्येक राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of electors in प्रत्येक राज्य is बराबर to the क्रमांक of सदस्यों of कॉंग्रेस to जिससे the राज्य is हकदार.
The Twenty-third amendment रै सदा resulted in the ज़िला of Columbia having three electors.
There are 538 निर्वाचक, आधारित on वहीँ होने 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 senators, plus the three electors from the District of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय और वाइस अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, हालांकि unpledged electors are possible.
In all states, except Maine और नेब्रास्का, निर्वाचक हैं निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' आधार.
That is, सब निर्वाचक pledged to the अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी जो विन्स the सबसे मत in a state become electors for that state.
maine और नेब्रास्का उपयोग the `` congressional ज़िला विधि '', selecting एक elector भीतर प्रत्येक congressional district by popular vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote.
Although no elector is जरूरी by संघीय विधि to सम्मान a प्रतिज्ञा, वहीँ have तभी been very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित और requires प्रत्येक elector to डाल एक vote लिये अध्यक्ष और another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the चुनावी कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing the अध्यक्ष and Vice President.
The Electoral कॉलेज देता a न्यूमेरिक लाभ in the चुनाव of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी राज्य, as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्वाचक लिये the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all विधि of मतदान favors the larger states.
A number of constitutional amendments have been प्रस्तावित seeking to alter the चुनावी कॉलेज or बदलें it साथ a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th and वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to थाम the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों और हार्वर्ड विधि स्कूल, जहाँ he थी अध्यक्ष of the Harvard Law Review.
He was a जातियाँ आयोजक in शिकागो पहले कमाई उसके विधि उपाधि.
He worked as a civil rights attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक विधि at the विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He served three terms representing the 13th ज़िला in the इलिनोइस सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004, कार्यशील unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received national ध्यान दौरान उसके अभियान to represent इलिनोइस in the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट साथ उसके विजय in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक, उसके keynote पता at the Democratic National Convention in July, and his election to the Senate in November.
He began his presidential campaign in 2007, and in 2008, बाद a बंद प्राथमिक अभियान विरूद्ध हिलेरी rodham क्लिंटन, he जीती sufficient delegates in the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी primaries to प्राप्त the presidential nomination.
He then पराजित रिपब्लिकन nominee जॉन मैक्केन in the सामान्य चुनाव, और थी inaugurated as president on January 20, 2009.
Nine महीने बाद, ओबामा थी नामित the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating Republican nominee Mitt romney, और थी sworn in लिये a दूसरी पद on जनवरी 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great मंदी in the रूप of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 और the कर राहत, बेरोजगारी बीमे reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency शामिल the रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम, प्रायः referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank वॉल गली सुधार और उपभोक्ता Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
In may 2012, he became the पहला बैठे u.S. अध्यक्ष to सरेआम support same-sex विवाह और in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर briefs जिससे urged the परम् अदालत to नियम in एहसान of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop स्तर in अफगानिस्तान, हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस, ordered u.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in लीबिया, और ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन कि resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.
The Honda CBR1100XX Super Blackbird was a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल बना इससे 1996 to 2007.
The bike was developed to चुनौती the कावासाकी निंजा zx-11 as the संसार 's तीव्रतम उत्पादन motorcycle, and Honda succeeded with a top speed of.
Two years later the title passed to the suzuki hayabusa, जिससे पहुँचे.

Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड आधारित on images
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य information about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital स्वरूप कि is theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य परवाह settings.
In some मामले इस sharing can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization औकात, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology बिंब, vital लक्षण, निजी आंकड़े जैसे आयु और वज़न, और बिलिंग सूचना.
The मेरिनर up on the mast in a storm.
One of the wood-engraved illustrations by Gustave Doré.
The Rime of the प्राचीन मेरिनर ( originally the rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज, लिखा in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern संस्करण उपयोग a बाद संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 that featured a gloss.
Along with other poems in गीतात्मक ballads, it थी a सिग्नल शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत of अंग्रेजों रोमांटिक literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers और अन्य उपयोक्ता एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the उचित proxy server ( access method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट फलन “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This function returns a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or अधिक अभिगम विधि विशेषताएँ.
These विशेषताएँ कारण the उपयोक्ता एजेंट to उपयोग a particular proxy server or to connect directly.
Multiple विशेषताएँ provide a fall-back जब a proxy fails to respond.
The ब्राउजर fetches इस pac संचिका before requesting other URLs.
The URL of the PAC file is either configured manually or संकल्पित automatically by the वेब प्रॉक्सी autodiscovery प्रोटोकॉल.
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as zendaya, is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, सिंगर and dancer.
she stars on the Disney Channel sitcom शेक it Up as Rocky Blue.
She has starred in दो films और निभाई एक of the सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced फर्न in the pixie खोखला Games.
She appeared in Good Luck Charlie as रॉकी ब्लू और in a शुभ लक चार्ली और शेक it up क्रॉसओवर शीर्षक चार्ली शेक It Up.
She appeared on prankstars as herself in the एपीसोड `` चलना the शरारत '' और on a.n.t. फार्म as sequoia जोन्स in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT. ''
zendaya is भी a musician.
She signed a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8, 2012 और प्रारंभ रिकॉर्डिंग गीतों लिये उसके डेब्यू album on August 12, 2012.
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out `` and another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा `` देखें me, '' जिससे is प्रदर्शित on the ब्रेक it bas album.
On March 20, 2012, Zendaya and Bella thorne released an एल्बम साथ पुकारा शेक it up : सजीव 2 नृत्य, प्रत्येक have उनके अपना सोंग on it, साथ साथ a mash-up of both songs together as one.
On August 21, 2012, Zendaya and बेला thorne released an ep पुकारा शेक it up : बना In Japan.
zendaya रै a क्रिसमस सोंग पुकारा `` शेक सांता शेक, '' जिससे is on the डिज़्नी चैनल अवकाश Playlist CD, which was released on October 2, 2012.
On March 5, 2013 the third Shake It Up soundtrack was released, entitled i < 3 नृत्य ; on it, zendaya रै दो गीतों साथ बेला - `` संक्रामक प्रेम '' और `` इस is my नृत्य मंजिल '' - as खूब as एक सोलो सोंग, `` ताल of my Drum. ''
This is a list of airports in पेन्सिलवेनिया ( a u.S. राज्य ), grouped by प्रकार और sorted by location.
It contains सब public-use और सैन्य airports in the state.
Some private-use and former airports may be शामिल जहाँ notable, ऐसे as एयरपोर्ट कि यहूद previously public-use, those साथ वाणिज्यिक enplanements recorded by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA airport code.
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and वितरित by ठहराना inc. originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस such as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone और google 's एंड्रॉइड, ठहराना करता नहीं अनुज्ञा आईओएस लिये संस्थापना on non-apple hardware.
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS अनुप्रयोग, जिससे have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड अधिक than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इकाई shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012, behind only Google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted लिये 65 % of मोबाईल वेब आंकड़ा खपत ( सहित उपयोग on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ).
At the हाफ of 2012, वहीँ यहूद 410 लाख devices activated.
According to the special media event held by Apple on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 लाख डिवाइस have महरूम बेची through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the अवधारणा of सीधा हेरफेर, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface control तत्व consist of sliders, switches, और बटन.
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe, tap, pinch, and reverse पिंच, सब of जिससे have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली और इसके multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers हैं प्रयुक्त by कुछ अनुप्रयोग to respond to shaking the यंत्र ( एक आम परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode ).
iOS is निकला इससे os x, साथ जिससे it साझा the डार्विन foundation.
आईओएस is ठहराना 's मोबाईल संस्करण of the os x ऑपरेटिंग system used on Apple computers.
In iOS, there are four abstraction layers : the कोर os परत, the कोर सेवाएं परत, the मीडिया परत, and the Cocoa Touch layer.
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the यंत्र 's फ्लैश मेमोरी लिये the प्रणाली partition, using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself.
iOS currently रनों on iphone, ipad, iPod touch and Apple TV.

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic device whose intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air गति आरपार a देह of a गाडी in गति, प्रायः वर्णित as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams, because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the राशि of एयर बहती underneath the गाडी जिससे generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
Spoilers are प्रायः fitted to रेस और high-performance खेल गाड़ियाँ, हालांकि वे have become common on passenger vehicles as well.
Some spoilers are added to गाड़ियाँ primarily लिये स्टाइलिंग उद्देश्य और have either छोटी aerodynamic लाभ or भी make the aerodynamics worse.
Spoilers लिये गाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः incorrectly उलझन साथ, or the term used interchangeably with, wings.
Automotive wings are डिवाइस जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as एयर गुजरता around उन्हें, नहीं बस disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as निन्टेंडो 's शुभंकर, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by खेल designer Shigeru Miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of video games where the अक्षर मारियो plays a भाग, either as the समर्थक, विपक्षी, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble डाल, as a कैमियो, or in a game within a game.
It does not include सरल सन्दर्भ to the अक्षर, ऐसे as the portraits of मारियो मिला in The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past.
The year indicated is the year the game was first released, सबसे commonly in जापानी ; खेल यहूद sometimes released सालो later in other regions of the world.
The list includes पोर्ट, remakes और compilations.
It does n't शामिल कोई आभासी कंसोल re-releases.
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` i am a man of निरंतर विषाद '' ) is a परंपरागत अमरीकी लोक सोंग पहला अंकित by लंड burnett, a partially अँधा fiddler from Kentucky.
The song was originally recorded by burnett as `` विदाई सोंग '' मुद्रित in a रिचर्ड burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An जल्दी संस्करण थी अंकित by emry आर्थर in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public interest in the सोंग थी नवीनीकृत बाद the रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी o bhai, Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a सेंट्रल भूमिका in the फिल्मी 's plot.
The song was also शामिल in the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक कामयाब, multiple-platinum selling साउंडट्रैक.
Josephson जंक्शन सरणी चिप विकसित by the नेशनल Bureau of Standards as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI निकला ईकाई लिये इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित ( वोल्टेज ), इलेक्ट्रिक potential difference, and electromotive force.
The volt is नामित in सम्मान of the इतालवी physicist alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ), who invented the voltaic pile, possibly the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987, पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक बदला इससे cyrillic to लैटिन script )
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या ( चित्र लिया in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of hohenberg, यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by gavrilo princip, एक of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई serb हत्यारे समन्वित by डेनियल Ilić.
The political objective of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the गति कि बाद became ज्ञात as यंग Bosnia.
Serbian सैन्य अधिकारियों stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of ये सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins साथ बम और pistols और प्रशिक्षित उन्हें.
The assassins were given access to the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of हथियार और operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार, आजमाया, convicted and punished.
Those जो यहूद गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914.
The अन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों यहूद गिरफ्तार और आजमाया पहले a सर्बियाई कंगारू अदालत on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations आता इससे these two trials and related records.
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing और हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
मिशन सैन जुआन capistrano थी a स्पेनी मिशन in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, स्तिथ in present-day San Juan Capistrano.
it थी संस्थापित on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th century theologian और `` योद्धा पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of इटली, सैन जुआन capistrano रै the भेद of होने घर to the oldest भवन in कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्टिल in उपयोग, a चैपल built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` सेरा 's चैपल '' और `` पिता सेरा 's गिरिजाघर, '' it is the तभी extant ढांचा जहाँ it रै महरूम documented that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass.
One of the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one of the few missions to have दरअसल महरूम संस्थापित twice—others होने मिशन सैन जिबरील arcángel और मिशन la purísima concepción ).
The साईट थी originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by पिता fermín Lasuén, but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The success of the settlement is evident in इसके ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड.
Prior to the आगमन of the प्रचारकों, कुछ 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout the local area.
By 1790, the क्रमांक of परिवर्तित ईसाइयों था grown to 700, और बस छह सालो बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( हाल converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted कि साल अलोन, आउट of the कुल 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 पूर्व निवासियों ( ज़्यादातर juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked क़ब्रों in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
The remains of पिता ( बाद monsignor ) st. जॉन o'sullivan, जो पहचाना the प्रॉपर्टी 's ऐतिहासिक मान और working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property, and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt.
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the मिशन : fathers जोस barona, विसेंट fustér, और विसेंट पास्कुआल oliva हैं सब entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
The Criolla or `` मिशन अंगूर, '' थी पहला planted at सैन जुआन capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery.
The Mission डाला a long काल of क्रमिक मनाही बाद secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts यहूद बना over the सालो to restore the मिशन to इसके पूर्व glory, but none met with great success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, and `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये धार्मिक सेवाएं.
About half-a-million विज़िटर, सहित 80,000 स्कूल children, आइये to the Mission each year.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a renowned architectural wonder, the Mission is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the सालाना `` वापसी of the दात '' जिससे is traditionally observed प्रत्येक कूच 19 ( संत जोसेफ 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite subject लिये अनेक notable कलाकारों, और रै महरूम immortalized in साहित्य और on फिल्मी numerous टाइम्स, शायद अधिक than any other mission.
In 1984, a modern church complex was constructed बस उत्तर और वेस्ट of the मिशन यौगिक और is अभी ज्ञात as मिशन basilica सैन Juan Capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a संग्रहालय, साथ the सेरा चैपल भीतर the यौगिक सेवारत as a chapel for the mission parish.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत जॉन Cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland.
It tells the story of ऊँची स्कूल छात्र लेन myer जो is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome and commonly The Superdome ) is a खेल और प्रदर्शनी स्टेडियम, स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल कारोबार ज़िला of नई ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the नई ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its steel फ़्रेम कवर a expanse.
Its dome is बना of a lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम और रै a व्यास of, बनाना it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन यूएसए ), the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक, the r+l वाहक नई ऑरलियन्स कटोरी, the allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size and location in one of the major tourist destinations in the United States, the superdome routinely makes the `` छोटी सूची '' of उम्मीदवार होने माना लिये प्रमुख sporting कार्यक्रम, ऐसे as the Super Bowl and the Final Four.
In 2005, the Superdome gained international ध्यान of a अलग प्रकार जब it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking आश्रय इससे hurricane कैटरीना.
The भवन suffered extensive क्षति as a परिणाम of the तूफ़ान, और was closed for many months afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it थी घोषित कि जर्मनी automaker mercedes-benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The new नाम took प्रभाव on अक्तूबर 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and first in the United राज्य ), बाद the mercedes-benz एरिना, the स्टेडियम of bundesliga क्लबों vfb stuttgart, in stuttgart, जर्मनी और the mercedes-benz एरिना in शंघाई, China.

Disney 's Animal किंगडम आवास is an african-themed डीलक्स resort at the Walt Disney World Resort.
It खोली on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
The resort is स्वामित्व और संचालित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Parks and Resorts.
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal किंगडम रिज़ॉर्ट क्षेत्रफल, सटा to डिज़्नी 's एनिमल किंगडम.
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public क्षेत्रों in the रिज़ॉर्ट भीतर निकटता of the पशु, conveying the अहसास of होने in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` populists '', थी a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त राज्य स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( United States, 19th Century ).
It was most important in 1892-96, और तब rapidly धुंधली away.
Based among poor, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North कैरोलिना, अलबामा, और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed गेहूं किसानो in the मैदान राज्य ( विशेषकर कान्सास और नेब्रास्का ), it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading रूप of agrarianism और hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions, and in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके अध्यक्षीय nominee, विलियम Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' और `` populism `` हैं commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to established interests and mainstream parties.
Linguistic map of सीरियल, कैमरून, and Benin.
चिह्न in अंग्रेज़ी, बाहर the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of भाषाएं बोला in सीरियल.
The major languages are Yoruba, हौसा, इग्बो, ईदो, fulfulde, कनूरी, और ibb.
The आधिकारिक भाषा of सीरियल, अंग्रेज़ी, the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा, थी चुनी to facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, और niger–congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान भाषा families.
A श्रेणी of कार्यक्रम led to the आक्रमण on Pearl Harbor.
War between Japan and the संयुक्त राज्य था महरूम a सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s, though real tension did not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan.
Over the next decade, Japan विस्तारित धीरे into चीन, अग्रणी to सब out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into चीन, सहित युद्ध आपूर्तियाँ purchased from the U.S.
This move prompted the United States to embargo सब आयल निर्यात, अग्रणी the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी to अनुमान कि it था कम than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource क्षेत्रफल '' to add it to the वृहद ईस्ट एशिया co-prosperity गोला कि जापानी envisioned in the प्रशांत.
The Philippine आइलैंड्स, at कि समय an अमरीकी territory, यहूद भी a Japanese target.
The Japanese military concluded that an आक्रमण of the फिलीपीन होता provoke an अमरीकी military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait लिये the अपरिहार्य us counterattack, जापानी 's सैन्य नेताओ बजाय decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण, जिससे वे assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति और reconquest of the islands.
Planning for the attack had begun in बहुत जल्दी 1941, by admiral isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally won assent from the Naval High कमांड by, among अन्य बाते, threatening to इस्तीफा.
The आक्रमण थी स्वीकृत in the गर्मियाँ at an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन और again at a दूसरी सम्मेलन in the fall.
Simultaneously over the year, पायलटों यहूद प्रशिक्षित, और जहाजों prepared लिये इसके निष्पादन.
प्राधिकार लिये the आक्रमण थी granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम संतोषजनक to Japan was not reached.
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the अनुक्रम to आक्रमण थी जारी at the शुरूआत of दिसम्बर.
A आम दफ्तर stapler
A common स्कूल stapler
A stapler is a mechanical यंत्र कि joins चादरें of पेपर or समान सामग्री by ड्राइविंग a पतला मेटल staple through the sheets and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely used in government, कारोबार, कार्यालयों, घरों और स्कूलों.
The word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In addition to joining पेपर चादरें साथ, staplers can भी be प्रयुक्त in a सर्जिकल सेटिंग to जुड़ें ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, सबसे staplers हैं प्रयुक्त to join multiple sheets of paper.
Paper staplers come in two पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और इलेक्ट्रिक.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, हालांकि मॉडल कि हैं प्रयुक्त जबकि नियत on a डेस्क or अन्य सतह are not uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a variety of अलग डिजाइन और मॉडल.
उनके प्राथमिक ऑपरेटिंग फलन is to जुड़ें विशाल संख्याएँ of paper sheets together in rapid succession.
Some इलेक्ट्रिक staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 sheets at a time.
swallowing, ज्ञात scientifically as deglutition, is the प्रक्रम in the human or animal body that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails and the object goes through the श्वासनली, तब choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – अगस्त 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, थी a नेता of the कट्टरपंथी रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और a fierce प्रतिद्वन्दी of slavery.
He was one of the most influential सदस्यों in the इतिहास of Congress.
As chairman of the शक्तिशाली हाउस तरीके और अर्थात् कमेटी, स्टीवंस, a witty, व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर and flamboyant party leader, dominated the House from 1861 until his death.
He लिखा much of the वित्तीय विधान कि paid for the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the प्रधान नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी republicans दौरान the युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply चूंकि उसके मौत as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have बदला.
Historians of the dunning स्कूल ( 1890s–1940s ) आयोजित स्टीवंस जिम्मेदार लिये demanding हर्ष उपचार of the श्वेत दक्षिण और violating अमरीकी traditions of republicanism, depicting Stevens as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This highly ऋणात्मक characterization आयोजित sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican नेता in the struggles विरूद्ध गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य और intrepid mainstay of the attempt to सुरक्षित जातिगत इंसाफ लिये the freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण, the तभी सदस्य of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि कभी to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
अवलोकन of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA और the संश्लेषण of प्रोटीन by a राइबोसोम
In molecular biology and आनुवंशिकी, अनुवाद is the प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of जीन अभिव्यक्ति.
In translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide, कि होगा बाद मोड़ें into an active protein.
In bacteria, अनुवाद occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य, जहाँ the विशाल और छोटी subunits of the ribosome are located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, translation occurs आरपार the झिल्ली of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis.
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of tRNAs with पूरक anticodon sequences to कि of the mrna.
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the mrna गुजरता through और is `` पढ़ा '' by the राइबोसोम in a फ़ैशन reminiscent to कि of a stock ticker and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide अंदर लिये बाद vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, ऐसे as ट्रांसफ़र rna, ribosomal rna, और छोटी नाभिकीय rna, do not undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation, elongation, translocation and termination ( सब describing the विकास of the अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide कि is the उत्पाद of अनुवाद ).
अमीनो acids हैं brought to ribosomes और समवेत into proteins.
In सक्रियण, the सही अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ to the सही transfer RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino एसिड is joined by इसके carboxyl समूह to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
जब the trna रै an अमीनो acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the small subunit of the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' समाप्त of mrna साथ the सहायता of दीक्षा factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens when the A साईट of the राइबोसोम चेहरों a रोकें codon ( uaa, uag, or UGA ).
No tRNA can recognize or bind to इस codon.
Instead, the stop codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a रिलीज फ़ैक्टर प्रोटीन कि prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, और puromycin, among others.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure इससे कि of eukaryotic ribosomes, और यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल infections बगैर कोई detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
a मल्टीमीडिया संदेश on a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging सेवा ( mms ) is a मानक रास्ता to भेजें संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to और इससे mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( छोटी संदेश सेवा ) काबिलियत कि अनुमत एक्सचेंज of टेक्स्ट संदेश तभी up to 160 characters in length.
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, हालांकि it is भी लोकप्रिय as a method of delivering news and entertainment content including videos, pictures, text pages and ringtones.
The standard is विकसित by the खोलें मोबाईल गठबंधन ( ओमो ), हालांकि दौरान विकास it थी भाग of the 3GPP and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious disease unique to इंसानो, caused by either of दो वायरस विसंगतियाँ, variola प्रमुख and Variola minor.
the बीमारी is भी ज्ञात by the लैटिन names variola or variola वीरा, निकला इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally ज्ञात in अंग्रेज़ी as the `` चेचक '' or `` रेड प्लेग '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox स्थानीयकृत in छोटी रक्त बरतन of the स्किन और in the mouth and throat.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular खाज और, बाद, उठाया fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a more गंभीर बीमारी और रै an overall मृत्यु rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of बीमारी ( भी ज्ञात as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims.
Long-term complications of V. major infection include characteristic scars, commonly on the फेस, जिससे occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to गठिया और osteomyelitis हैं कम common complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
smallpox is believed to have उभरा in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the pustular खाज on the mummified देह of pharaoh ramses v of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th सदी ( सहित पाँच reigning monarchs ), और थी जिम्मेदार for a third of all blindness.
Of all those संक्रमित, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the disease.
Smallpox was जिम्मेदार लिये an अनुमानित 300–500 लाख मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ) अनुमानित कि 15 लाख लोगों contracted the बीमारी and that two million died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the जो certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated, the अन्य होने rinderpest, जिससे थी घोषित eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to थाम अपना हाथ '' is a सोंग by the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the Beatles.
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney, and recorded in अक्तूबर 1963, it थी the पहला बीटल्स रिकार्ड to be बना using four-track उपकरण.
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would साधारणतया have गए सीधा to the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों रिकार्ड चार्ट on इसके दिन of रिलीज ( 29 नवम्बर 1963 ) था it नहीं महरूम अवरोधित by the समूह 's पहला लाख विक्रेता `` वो loves तुम ``, the बीटल्स ' पिछला uk सिंगल, जिससे थी having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group.
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the uk शीर्ष पचास लिये twenty-one सप्ताह in total.
It was also the group 's first American number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at क्रमांक forty-five और starting the अंग्रेजों आक्रमण of the अमरीकी म्यूज़िक उद्योग.
By 1 फ़रवरी it आयोजित the क्रमांक एक स्पॉट — लिये सात सप्ताह — पहले होने replaced by `` वो loves तुम '', a रिवर्स परिदृश्य of कया had occurred in Britain, and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to थाम अपना हाथ '' became the बीटल्स ' best-selling single worldwide.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त राज्य in the लेट 1950s और जारी जबतक the early 1970s.
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide बेहतर वज़न वितरण on त्वरण ( बीम axles हैं भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी ), हालांकि a उठाया भण्डार सामने बर्खास्तगी is आम as खूब.
आम वज़न कटौती तकनीकों शामिल fiberglass देह panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
Because they were primarily built for racing, these cars typically था the इंजन swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली एक, the मौजूदा भण्डार इंजन modified ( often heavily ) or both.
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical fuel इंजेक्शन, ऐसे as एक इससे algon, hilborn, or Crower.
With form being लिखवाई by फलन, उनके रूप is प्रायः बहुत शीर्ष भारी और ungainly, largely due to सामने ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust पाइप निकास through the सामने फेंडर खूब is a आम characteristic of gassers, as is having लाशें चित्रित in flamboyant metalflakes, मोती, और कैंडी finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag रेसिंग क्लास, बल्कि than एक using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the पूर्ववर्ती of the आधुनिक Funny Car.
Twelve-lead ईकेजी of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( आरपार the वक्ष or छाती ) निर्वचन of the विद्युत कार्यकलाप of the दिल over a काल of समय, as detected by electrodes संलग्न to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The recording produced by this noninvasive कार्यविधि is termed an electrocardiogram ( भी ईसीजी or ईकेजी ).
An ECG is प्रयुक्त to माप the रेट और नियमितता of heartbeats, as खूब as the आकार और स्थिति of the कक्षों, the उपस्थिति of कोई क्षति to the दिल, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed for निदान or शोध उद्देश्य on इंसान दिल, लकिन may भी be performed on पशु, प्रायः लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities or research.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी कारोबार महारथी, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और लेखक.
He is the chairman and president of The ट्रम्प संगठन और the संस्थापक of ट्रम्प entertainment रिसॉर्ट.
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality show The Apprentice have बना उसे a well-known हस्ती जो थी no. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the बेटे of फ्रेड ट्रम्प, a धनवान New York City real-estate developer.
He worked for his father 's firm, Elizabeth Trump & Son, while attending the Wharton स्कूल of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया, और in 1968 officially joined the कम्पनी.
He was given control of the कम्पनी in 1971 और renamed it the ट्रम्प संगठन.
In 2010, ट्रम्प expressed an ब्याज in बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in the 2012 चुनाव, हालांकि in may 2011, he announced he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, Trump was suggested as a संभावित वाइस अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल bachmann, if वो यहूद to जीत the रिपब्लिकन नामांकन.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam cooke, लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 और released अंतर्गत the आरसीए विक्टर लेबल shortly बाद his death in late 1964.
Though only a modest hit लिये cooke in तुलना with his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
The song has gained in लोकप्रियता और नाजुक acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि इसके release, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
भाप उठती इससे the nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति Station in Iceland.
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न and stored in the Earth.
थर्मल उर्जा is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The geothermal उर्जा of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal अनुपात, जिससे is the अंतर in तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, और θερμος ( thermos ), अर्थ hot.
At the core of the धरती, थर्मल उर्जा is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
The ऊँची तापमान और दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats rock और जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
इससे hot स्रोतों, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस heating since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, स्पेस हीटिंग, स्पा, औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं, desalination और agricultural applications.
geothermal शक्ति is लागत प्रभावी, विश्वसनीय, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
हाल technological अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग such as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the धरती, लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal शक्ति रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The धरती 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to supply humanity 's energy needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is बहुत expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा कीमतें, subsidies, और ब्याज rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग अनुभव, the लागत of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal उर्जा लागत between दो और टेन सेंट per kwh.
Ownership of property may be private, सामूहिक, or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी may be वस्तुएँ, land/real एस्टेट, or बौद्धिक property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining जो रै निश्चित अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the property.
These rights and duties, sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of अधिकारों ', can be अलग और आयोजित by different parties.
The question of ownership पहुँच वापस to the प्राचीन दार्शनिकों, प्लेटो और अरस्तू, जो आयोजित अलग राय on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property created divisive inequalities, जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 bc ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों to प्राप्त the पूरा लाभ of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is अभी referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the कॉमन्स ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ लोगों tend to रुसवा आम प्रॉपर्टी more than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for उदाहरण, a निजी मालिक of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी, depending on उसके worldview, might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle जायज the अस्तित्व of निजी स्वामित्व, he बाएँ खोलें सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between what is private and common and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
Over the millennia, and आरपार संस्कृतियों कया can be प्रॉपर्टी और कैसा it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the आधार लिये अनेक अन्य अवधारणाओं कि रूप the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों such as money, trade, debt, bankruptcy, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public property.
Ownership is the key building block in the विकास of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic प्रणाली.
Adam स्मिथ stated कि एक of the पवित्र कानून of इंसाफ was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process and mechanics of ownership are fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ, ट्रांसफ़र और खोना स्वामित्व of प्रॉपर्टी in a क्रमांक of ways.
To acquire property one can purchase it with धन, व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, प्राप्त it as a तोहफा, चोरी it, ढूँढें it, मेक, it or होमस्टीड it.
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it for other प्रॉपर्टी, giving it as a तोहफा, होने robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in कि the मालिक of कोई प्रॉपर्टी होगा भी अपना the आर्थिक लाभ of that property.
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a सोंग अंकित by barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार रिहाना, लिये उसके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम लाउड ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the सोंग थी released as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे लाउड on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The R & B song was produced by the नॉर्वेजियाई उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट, और थी लिखा by the duo साथ साथ ester डीन, Traci Hale, and Drake.
lyrically, it incorporates विषयवस्तु of यौन intercourse and romance.
Music critics दिया the सोंग धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ, citing it कुछ of रिहाना 's बेहतरीन गायन कार्य to तिथि ; there was a praise regarding its romantic nature, as well as its sexual tones.
`` What 's My Name ? '' थी a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी और अव्वल the us बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट, giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
the सोंग भी अव्वल the चार्ट in हंगेरियाई और the संयुक्त किंगडम और reached the top five in Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway and Slovakia.
The song received a नामांकन at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन rap/sung सहयोग.
An accompanying music video, directed by Philip andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a किराना स्टोर साथ साथ रोमांटिक दृश्यों between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the अटलांटिक, सहित शनिवार रात्रि सजीव in अमेरिका और the श्रेणी सात finale of the x फ़ैक्टर in the United Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's मीडिया नियामक, ofcom, लिये the raunchy प्रकृति of रिहाना 's outfit.
A mathematical constant is a खास क्रमांक, प्रायः a रियल क्रमांक, कि is `` significantly interesting in some way ''.
Constants arise in many अलग क्षेत्रों of गणित, साथ स्थिरांक ऐसे as e ( गणितीय निरंतर ) | और pi| occurring in ऐसे विविध contexts as geometry, number theory and calculus.
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '', and what makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a matter of स्वाद, और कुछ गणितीय स्थिरांक हैं notable अधिक लिये ऐतिहासिक कारण than लिये उनके मूलभूत गणितीय interest.
The more popular constants have been पढ़ाई throughout the आयु और computed to many decimal places.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually हैं भी computable संख्याएँ ( chaitin 's निरंतर होने a significant exception ).
Elections to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special election on जनवरी 19, 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स थी आयोजित पहले in the year. )
Thirty-four of the सीटे यहूद लिये six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` क्लास three '', and three were special elections for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of जिसको रिटायर्ड or यहूद पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) और 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
बाद the पिछला चुनावों ( in 2008 ), the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट थी रचित of 58 डेमोक्रेट, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
Republicans won four सीटे आयोजित by retiring डेमोक्रेट और republicans पराजित दो लाज़िम Democrats.
This was the largest number of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 चुनावों और भी the पहला time since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` क्लास 3 '' सीनेटरों जहाँ डेमोक्रेट have विफल to लाभ सीटे और the तीसरा लगातार mid-term चुनाव held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate with 51 सीटे प्लस 2 independents जो caucus साथ उन्हें, compared to the 47 republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice प्रत्येक साल as the सूर्य पहुँच इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial गोला.
As a result, on the day of the संक्रांति, the सूर्य appears to have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर the क्षितिज at लोकल सौर noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( सूर्य ) और sistere ( to स्टैंड स्टिल ), क्युकी at the solstices, the सूर्य स्टैंड स्टिल in उतार ; कि is, the मौसमी गति of the Sun 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, साथ साथ the equinoxes, हैं कनेक्ट साथ the seasons.
In many cultures the solstices चिह्नित either the शुरूआत or the midpoint of शीत and summer.
The term solstice can also be प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव, as the तिथि ( दिन ) जब इस occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest दिन of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें और देश म्यूज़िक singer-songwriter and pianist.
He is known by the उपनाम `` the कातिल '' और is प्रायः viewed as “rock & roll 's first great wild man”.
An जल्दी पायोनियर of चट्टान और फेंकें म्यूज़िक, in 1956 लुईस बना उसके पहला recordings at Sun Records.
`` क्रेजी बाहें `` बेची 300,000 नक़ल in the दक्षिण, लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed this in कि वही साल जब he अंकित गीतों ऐसे as `` ग्रेट गेंदें of आग ``, `` breathless `` and `` High School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold अधिक रिकॉर्ड than एल्विस प्रेस्ली at this time.
However, Lewis ' चट्टान 'n ' फेंकें करियर faltered in the वेक of उसके विवाह to his young cousin.
He had छोटी कामयाबी in the चार्ट following the कांड and his popularity quickly faded.
उसके सजीव प्रदर्शन शुल्क plummeted इससे $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
in the meantime he थी संकल्पित to लाभ वापस some of his popularity.
During the जल्दी 60’s he किया n't have much चार्ट कामयाबी साथ few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
His live performances at this time were increasingly जंगली और ऊर्जावान.
His album Live at the Star क्लबों, हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक म्यूज़िक पत्रकारों और प्रशंसक as एक of the wildest और greatest rock and roll concert albums ever.
After रिकॉर्डिंग गीतों ऐसे as `` i 'm on आग '' लिये अनेक सालो साथ छोटी कामयाबी, in 1968 लुईस made a transition into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited उसके करियर और throughout the लेट '60s और '70s he regularly अव्वल the country-western charts.
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make प्रेम मीठी लिये तुम ``, `` वहीँ जरूर be अधिक to प्रेम than इस ``, `` होता तुम लो another मौका on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of the बिग bopper 's `` chantilly फीता `` और `` rockin ' my जीवन दूर ``.
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to ऑडियंस around the संसार और स्टिल रिलीज नई एल्बम.
One such album, titled Last man खड़ा, is उसके बेहतरीन selling to तिथि at over a लाख नक़ल sold worldwide.
This was followed by Mean Old Man which रै प्राप्त कुछ of the बेहतरीन बिक्री of lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both चट्टान और देश, जीती अनेक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित a आजीवन उपलब्धि Award.
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1986, and उसके pioneering योगदान to the विधा रै महरूम पहचाना by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the फिल्म ग्रेट गेंदें of आग, अभिनीत डेनिस Quaid.
In 2003, रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका सूचीबद्ध उसके बक्सा नियत सब कातिल, no फिलर : the anthology क्रमांक 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time ``.
in 2004, वे क्रमित उसे क्रमांक 24 on उनके सूची of the 100 महानतम कलाकारों of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun रिकॉर्ड ' लाख डालर quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम, जिससे भी शामिल जॉनी नकदी, कार्ल perkins, रॉय orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry Louis Stephens, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a समाचारपत्र साथ शीर्षक `` अध्यक्षीय Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The emancipation उदघोषणा थी an अनुक्रम जारी to सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
It was based on the president 's संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as कमांडर in मुख्य of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free, और ordered the फौज ( और सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as फ़्री सब those enslaved in टेन राज्य कि यहूद स्टिल in विद्रोह, यूँ applying to 3.1 लाख of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion, but as the army took control of confederate regions, the स्लेव in those regions यहूद emancipated बल्कि than लौटे to उनके मास्टर्स.
From 20,000 to 50,000 पूर्व स्लेव in regions जहाँ विद्रोह था already महरूम subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated, और over 3 लाख अधिक यहूद emancipated as the Union army advanced.
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave राज्य कि यहूद नहीं in विद्रोह, nor to सबसे regions already नियंत्रित by the संघ फौज ; emancipation वहीँ होता आइये बाद पृथक राज्य क्रियाएँ and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the स्वामी, किया नहीं itself गैरकानूनी गुलामी, और किया नहीं make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of slavery an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य, in जोड to the लक्ष्य of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, lincoln था जारी a प्रारंभिक उदघोषणा कि he होता अनुक्रम the emancipation of सब स्लेव in कोई राज्य of the confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by January 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed और जारी जनवरी 1, 1863, took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ where the Union had already mostly regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners जो envisioned a रेस युद्ध, angered कुछ उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट, सक्रिय anti-slavery forces, and weakened forces in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of African Americans both in the Southern and Northern States, and led to many स्लेव escaping उनके मास्टर्स और कार्यशील पीछे संघ लाइनों in अनुक्रम to have उनके emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by उसे और स्टीव शिबुया.
It is Snyder 's पहला फिल्मी आधारित on an original script.
The फिल्मी सितारों एमिली ब्राउनिंग, abbie cornish, जेना malone, वैनेसा Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था, as वो makes a योजना to एस्केप the हॉस्पिटल पहले कष्ट a मस्तिष्कखंडछेदन.
The film was released in both conventional और imax थिएटर in the संयुक्त राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on कूच 25, 2011.
It received generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, लकिन थी a मॉडरेट बक्सा दफ्तर success.
Front और वापस of canon powershot a95, a ठेठ pocket-size digital camera
haselblad 503cw साथ ixpress v96c डिजिटल वापस, an उदाहरण of a professional digital camera system
A डिजिटल कैमरा ( or digicam ) is a कैमरा कि takes video or still photographs by recording images on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are डिजिटल, और डिजिटल कैमरे हैं incorporated into अनेक डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an optical system, typically using a लेंस साथ a परिवर्तनीय diaphragm to फ़ोकस लाइट onto an image pickup device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager, बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the चित्र पिकअप यंत्र is इलेक्ट्रॉनिक बल्कि than chemical.
However, unlike film कैमरे, डिजिटल कैमरे can प्रदर्शक बिंब on a स्क्रीन तत्काल बाद होने recorded, and store and delete images from memory.
Many digital cameras can भी रिकार्ड चलती वीडियो साथ ध्वनि.
Some डिजिटल कैमरे can क्रॉप और सिलाई तस्वीरें और perform other elementary image editing.
The inside and front of a Dell PowerEdge web server, a कंप्यूटर designed लिये रैक mounting
Multiple web servers may be used for a high ट्रैफ़िक जालस्थल, यहाँ चार सूर्य आग x4200 सर्वर हैं संस्थापित साथ
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the तन्त्र ( the कंप्यूटर अनुप्रयोग ) कि helps to उद्धार वेब सामग्री कि can be पहुँचा through the अंतरजाल.
The most common use of web servers is to host websites, but there हैं अन्य उपयोग ऐसे as गेमिंग, आंकड़ा भंडार or कार्यशील एंटरप्राइज़ अनुप्रयोग.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American National Red Cross, is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता, विपत्ति राहत और शिक्षा अंदर the संयुक्त States.
It is the designated u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the अमरीकी रेड क्रॉस offers सेवाएं in पाँच अन्य क्षेत्रों : जातियाँ सेवाएं कि सहायता the मोहताज ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण, प्रसंस्करण और वितरण of रक्त and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, health, and safety ; and international relief and development programs.
Issued a कॉरपोरेट चार्टर by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत शीर्षक 36 of the संयुक्त राज्य कोड, खण्ड 3001, the American National Red Cross is governed by volunteers and supported by community donations, income from health and safety training and products, and income from blood products.
The अमरीकी रेड क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The अध्यक्ष of the फलक of राज्यपालों, सेवारत उसके दूसरी three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The current President and Chief Executive अधिकारी is गेल J. mcgovern.
