A rooster ( also called a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a पुरूष gallinaceous बर्ड.
It प्रायः refers to a पुरूष मुर्गा ( gallus gallus ).
Immature male chickens less than एक साल बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the संयुक्त राज्य, और the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout North America, as well as Australia and New Zealand.
In the United किंगडम और आयरलैंड the पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is more commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general उपयोग as the नाम लिये a पुरूष of अन्य species of bird, for example `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the कार्रवाई of perching aloft to नींद at रात्रि, और is किया by both sexes.
The मुर्गा is polygamous, लकिन can नहीं गार्ड अनेक nests of eggs at once.
He guards the general area where his hens are nesting, और होगा आक्रमण अन्य roosters कि डालें उसके territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a ऊँची पर्च, प्रायः 3–5 फीट बंद the मैदान to serve as a lookout लिये उसके झुण्ड.
He will sound a distinctive सचेतक कॉल if परभक्षी are nearby.
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video खेल श्रेणी, पहला प्रकाशित in अक्तूबर 1996 by मीडिया फैक्टरी in जापानी.
In the US, it थी initially प्रकाशित by wizards of the coast, the कम्पनी that produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over प्रकाशन in June 2003.
It is एक of निन्टेंडो 's पिछला बाकी दमदार links to its heritage as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a British car निर्माता साथ इसके मुख्यालय in gaydon, warwickshire, संयुक्त किंगडम जिससे specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is भाग of the जैगुआर जमीन रोवर समूह, a subsidiary of Tata Motors of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the संसार ( after Jeep ).
the जमीन रोवर नाम थी originally प्रयुक्त by the रोवर कम्पनी लिये एक विशिष्ट गाडी model, named simply the Land Rover, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following years it विकसित into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, सहित the defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
Land Rovers are फिलहाल समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull पौधे, साथ शोध और विकास लेने place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009.
Although the brand originates इससे the असली 1948 मॉडल, जमीन रोवर as a कम्पनी has only existed since 1978.
Prior to this, it was a product line of the Rover Company जिससे थी subsequently अवशोषित into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर निगम ( bl ) following leyland मोटर निगम ’s कब्ज़ा of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना of a पृथक जमीन रोवर कम्पनी लकिन स्टिल अंतर्गत the bl छतरियाँ, बाकी भाग of the subsequent रोवर समूह in 1988, अंतर्गत the स्वामित्व of अंग्रेजों aerospace बाद the remains of अंग्रेजों leyland यहूद टूटा up and privatised.
In 1994 रोवर समूह पीएलसी थी acquired by BMW.
in 2000, रोवर समूह थी broken-up by bmw और जमीन रोवर थी sold to Ford Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover brand इससे bmw लिये around £6 लाख.
इस reunited the रोवर और जमीन रोवर ब्रांड्स लिये the first time since 2000 when the Rover group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, घाट बेची दोनो जमीन रोवर और जैगुआर Cars to Tata Motors.
This बिक्री भी शामिल the dormant Rover brand
The cover of the पहला dvd संकलन released by aniplex of the नई कप्तान shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth ऋतु of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी श्रेणी is named.
The series is आधारित on tite kubo 's manga with same name.
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki abe और उत्पादित by tv टोकियो, Dentsu, and Studio Pierrot.
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper captain, Shūsuke Amagai, and the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र, एक of the परिवारों कि constitute the धामों of आत्मा समाज.
The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on tv टोकियो और ended on अक्तूबर 7, 2008.
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media, और इस चाप began airing on अगस्त 28, 2010 on कार्टून संजाल 's वयस्क Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the ऋतु, have महरूम released by aniplex ; the पहला dvd संकलन थी released on नवम्बर 26, 2008 and the fifth on March 25, 2009.
A DVD box will be प्रकाशित by viz Media on December 13, 2011.
The एपीसोड उपयोग तीन टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक खोलने theme and two closing themes.
The खोलने थीम is `` chu-bura `` by Kelun.
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B, used for एपीसोड 168 to 179, और the दूसरी closing थीम is `` gallop '' by pe'zmoku, प्रयुक्त लिये the शेष of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at एक समय माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा संशोधित Statutes.
Only 8 counties फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All फ़ॉर्म of वेश्यावृति हैं illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( जिससे contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि, as elsewhere in the देश.
As with other countries, prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : गली वेश्यावृति, वेश्यालय prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard and commonly shortened to ईस्ट coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the संयुक्त राज्य साथ the अटलांटिक Ocean.
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are, from north to south, the U.S. states of Maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, rhode द्वीप, कनेक्टिकट, नई यॉर्क, नई जर्सी, डेलावेयर, मेरीलैंड, वर्जिनिया, उत्तर कैरोलिना, दक्षिण Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961.
Nixon थी born in yorba लिंडा, California.
he ग्रैजुएट इससे whittier कॉलेज in 1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of Law in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय government in 1942.
He subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान World War II.
Nixon was elected in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, और elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
He थी the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served for eight सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential अभियान in 1960, narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी, और खोया a रेस लिये Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र, और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
domestically, उसके प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ, imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of कुछ Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
he थी re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's दूसरी पद देखी an अरब आयल embargo, the इस्तीफा of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, और a continuing श्रेणी of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of उसके राजनैतिक support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग and removal from office.
After उसके इस्तीफा, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, lustral ) is an antidepressant of the चयनात्मक serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
It was introduced to the मार्केट by फाइजर in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive, दहशत, और सोशल चिंता विकार in दोनो adults and children.
in 2011, it थी the second-most विहित antidepressant on the u.S. खुदरा मार्केट, साथ 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to कि of पुरानी tricyclic antidepressants, लकिन इसके पक्ष प्रभाव हैं much कम सुनाया.
Differences with नए antidepressants हैं subtler और भी ज़्यादातर confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac ) लिये some subtypes of depression.
उपचार of दहशत विकार साथ sertraline परिणाम in a significant घटी of the क्रमांक of panic attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive विकार, sertraline is नहीं as प्रभावी as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम achieved by combining these two treatments.
हालांकि स्वीकृत लिये सोशल phobia और posttraumatic तनाव विकार, sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric विकार और can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of अन्य ssris, साथ ऊँची दरों of मतली, अतिसार, अनिद्रा, और यौन पक्ष प्रभाव ; however, it करता नहीं कारण weight gain, and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the ड्रग थी उपस्थित in significant एकाग्रता in fetal रक्त, और थी भी संबद्ध with a higher rate of various birth defects.
similarly to अन्य antidepressants, the उपयोग of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five heartbeats is a 1991 musical नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड, जो co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
वितरित by 20th सदी फॉक्स, the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख डाल शामिल टाउनसेंड, माइकल राइट, Leon Robinson, Harry J. Lennix, Tico Wells, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the जीवनदान of अनेक कलाकारों : the dells, the temptations, चार टॉप, विल्सन पिकेट, जेम्स भूरा, फ्रेंकी lymon, sam cooke और others ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the आँखें of the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख समर्थक, डोनाल्ड `` बतख '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ), जो serves as a narrator throughout the फिल्मी.
However, a बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a लगातार समय लकीर as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The film includes a significant राशि of असली म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न कलाकारों लिये the फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक, सहित singles ऐसे as `` a दिल is a हाउस लिये प्रेम ``, `` we have n't समाप्त Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film was released to most North American ऑडियंस कूच 29, 1991 however it थी नहीं बना उपलब्धियाँ to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary.
the फिल्म प्राप्त मिश्रित reviews from critics.
Secretariat ( कूच 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), और the belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — रिकॉर्ड कि स्टिल stand today.
He is माना to be एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds of सब time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th सदी, the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची url_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He was foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन काउंटी, Virginia.
Like his प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला दो दौड़ ), और दिग्गज एडी मेपल ( पिछला रेस ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered रंगों and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
A ठेठ 12 v, 40 ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable बैटरी कि आपूर्तियाँ इलेक्ट्रिक उर्जा to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर, the लाइट्स, और the प्रज्वलन प्रणाली of a vehicle’s engine.
ऑटोमोटिव sli बैटरी हैं प्रायः lead-acid प्रकार, और हैं बना of छह गैल्वानी cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
Each कोशिका provides 2.1 volts लिये a कुल of 12.6 volt at full charge.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped साथ डीज़ल इंजन, may have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have समानांतर स्ट्रिंग्स of batteries.
lead-acid बैटरी हैं बना up of प्लेटों of सीसे और पृथक प्लेटों of सीसे डाइऑक्साइड, जिससे are submerged into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water.
This कल्याणकारी a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया कि रिलीज electrons, allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the एसिड of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of the प्लेटों, changing their surface to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड and lead.
With the प्लेटों लौटी to उनके असली कंडीशन, the process may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive बैटरी reduces the need लिये संसाधन जरूरी लिये manufacture of नई बैटरी, diverts विषाक्त सीसे from landfills, and prevents risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is employment in which a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of घंटों पारिभाषित as ऐसे by his/her employer.
Full-time employment often comes with लाभ कि हैं नहीं typically offered to part-time, अस्थाई, or लचीली मजदूर, ऐसे as सालाना छोड़, sickleave, and health insurance.
Full-time कार्य हैं प्रायः माना करियर.
They generally अदा अधिक than part-time कार्य, और प्रायः carry more hours per week.
The Fair Labor मानकों अधिनियम ( flsa ) करता नहीं define full-time employment or part-time employment.
इस is a पदार्थ generally to be संकल्पित by the employer ( US Department of Labor ).
The परिभाषा by नियोक्ता can vary और is generally प्रकाशित in a company 's Employee Handbook.
Companies commonly आवश्यकता इससे 30–35 or 40 घंटों प्रति सप्ताह to be defined as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits.
full-time औकात varies between कम्पनी और is प्रायः आधारित on the शिफ़्ट the employee must work during each work week.
The `` standard '' कार्य सप्ताह consists of पाँच eight-hour दिनों, commonly परोसा between 9:00am to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour दिनों ; it may भी consist of as छोटी as नौ घंटों लिये a कुल of a 36 घंटा कार्य सप्ताह.
Twelve-hour shifts are often तीन दिनों प्रति सप्ताह, जबतक the कम्पनी रै the इरादे of paying आउट the कर्मचारी overtime.
Overtime is legally सशुल्क आउट anytime an कर्मचारी works अधिक than 40 घंटों per week.
The विधिक न्यूनतम लिये ओवरटाइम starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased भुगतान is माना to compensate थोड़ा लिये the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in खुदरा, लकिन हैं स्टिल full-time if the जरूरी क्रमांक of घंटों is पहुँचे.
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time कार्य is dropped to part-time, जिससे is sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying बेरोजगारी benefits to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the title दिए to 54 प्रजाति of समुद्री मछली in the genus Hippocampus.
`` हिप्पोकैम्पस '' आता इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ `` घोड़ा '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the संघीय u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the विभिन्न schedules, हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित पद ), फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त राज्य, और अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties.
माया numerals
Maya numerals हैं a vigesimal ( आधार - बीस ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals are made up of three symbols ; zero ( shell आकार ), एक ( a बिन्दु ) और पाँच ( a बार ).
For example, thirteen is written as तीन dots in a आड़ा पंक्ति ऊपर दो आड़ा लाइनों stacked above each other.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as lbj, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : Representative, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a संयुक्त राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, जॉनसन थी पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960 अध्यक्षीय election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही, जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld सिविल अधिकारों, पब्लिक प्रसारण, medicare, medicaid, पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा, सहायता to शिक्षा, और उसके `` युद्ध on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The भागीदारी stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer दंगे broke आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965, और अपराधों दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended उसके बोली लिये reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to सफल उसे.
Historians argue कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is क्रमित favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic policies.
प्रोजेस्टेरोन भी ज्ञात as p4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the मादा menstrual cycle, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a क्लास of हार्मोन पुकारा progestogens, और is the प्रमुख naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ तिल Street.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow बर्ड.
He can roller skate, बर्फ स्केट, नृत्य, गाओ, लिखें काव्य, चित्रण और भी सवारी a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on एक अवसर भी गायन the वर्णमाला as एक बिग long शब्द ( इससे the सोंग पुकारा `` abc-def-ghi, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He lives in a large nest पीछे the 123 तिल गली brownstone और रै a टेडी भालू नामित Radar.
Webtrends is a निजी कम्पनी headquartered in पोर्टलैंड, ऑरेगॉन, United States.
It provides वेब, सोशल, और मोबाईल analytics और अन्य software solutions related to marketing intelligence.
The company was founded in 1993 और अभी serves अधिक than 10,000 विशाल और छोटी कड़s. < संदर्भ name='intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
the दूसरी crusade ( 1145–1149 ) थी the second major crusade launched from Europe.
The Second Crusade was प्रारंभ in जवाब to the पतन of the काउंटी of edessa the पिछला साल to the forces of Zengi.
The काउंटी था महरूम संस्थापित दौरान the पहला crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
While it was the first जेहादी राज्य to be संस्थापित, it थी भी the first to fall.
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III, and was the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by यूरोपीय किंग्स, namely लुई सात of फ़्रांस और कोनराड iii of जर्मनी, साथ सहायता इससे a क्रमांक of other European nobles.
the सेना of the दो किंग्स marched separately across Europe.
बाद क्रासिंग बीज़ान्टिन territory into आनातोलिया, दोनो सेना यहूद separately defeated by the Seljuq Turks.
The main Western Christian source, Odo of Deuil, and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' प्रगति, विशेषकर in आनातोलिया जहाँ he is कथित to have deliberately ordered turks to आक्रमण उन्हें.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of their armies reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised आक्रमण on दमिश्क.
The crusade in the ईस्ट थी a विफलता लिये the crusaders और a ग्रेट विजय लिये the Muslims.
It होता ultimately have a कुंजी influence on the पतन of जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only success of the दूसरी crusade आए to a संयुक्त फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, frisian, Norman, English, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from England, by ship, to the Holy Land, the army stopped and helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली फौज in the कैप्चर of लिस्बन, expelling इसके मूरिश occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा निगम कि रनों जंजीरों of विशाल छूट विभाग स्टोर्स और गोदाम स्टोर्स.
The company is the world 's third largest पब्लिक निगम, according to the सौभाग्य वैश्विक 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest निजी नियोक्ता in the संसार साथ over दो लाख कर्मचारी, और is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned business, as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार, जो अपना a 48 प्रतिशत हिस्सेदारी in Walmart.
It is भी एक of the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान companies.
The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित by sam वाल्टन in 1962, incorporated on अक्तूबर 31, 1969, and publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in bentonville, अरकंसास.
Walmart is भी the largest किराना रिटेलर in the United States.
In 2009, it उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत of इसके us $ 258 अरब बिक्री in the u.S. इससे grocery business.
It also owns and operates the sam 's क्लबों खुदरा warehouses in उत्तर अमेरिका.
By 1988, wal-mart थी the सबसे लाभप्रद रिटेलर in the us, और by November 1990, it outsold K-mart.
By 1991 it outsold Sears in खुदरा, बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest रिटेलर, a भेद it still holds.
Walmart रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों, अंतर्गत 55 different names.
The company operates अंतर्गत the walmart नाम in the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in Mexico as walmex, in the संयुक्त किंगडम as asda, in जापानी as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It रै wholly स्वामित्व परिचालन in अर्जेंटीना, Brazil, and Canada.
Walmart 's investments बाहर उत्तर अमेरिका have था मिश्रित परिणाम : इसके परिचालन in the संयुक्त किंगडम, दक्षिण अमेरिका, और चीन हैं अत्यधिक कामयाब, whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea were unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary मूर ( 4 अप्रैल 1952 – 6 फ़रवरी 2011 ), थी a उत्तरी आयरिश संगीतकार, सबसे widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career dating back to the 1960s, Moore निभाई साथ कलाकारों सहित फिल lynott और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके किशोर, अग्रणी उसे to सदस्यताएँ साथ the आयरिश bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as b.b. किंग, अल्बर्ट किंग, कोलोसियम ii, जार्ज हैरिसन और ग्रेग झील, as खूब as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high प्रोफ़ाइल संगीतकारों, सहित a कैमियो रूप playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby `` इससे traveling wilburys आवाज़. 3.
an उदाहरण of रैक आरोहित servers
A web hosting service is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन to मेक their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a आंकड़ा बीच.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as आवास in लैटिन अमेरिका or फ़्रांस.
The scope of web होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग, जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are प्रायः वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal processing.
Many Internet service providers ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा फ़्री to सदस्य.
Individuals and संगठन may भी obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक service providers.
Personal web साईट होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the आकार और प्रकार of the जालस्थल.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. पीएचपी, जावा, माणिक्य on rails, coldfusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री प्रबन्धन.
भी, सुरक्षित sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or कंट्रोल फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource संजाल infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( from the लैटिन obstare, `` to स्टैंड by '' ) is the चिकित्सा specialty dealing साथ the परवाह of सब महिलाओं 's reproductive tracts और उनके children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians हैं भी स्त्रीरोग, अर्थ वे perform in both specialties.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ये physicians हैं commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), यहूद दो अमरीकी भाइयो, आविष्कारक, और विमानन pioneers जो यहूद credited साथ inventing और भवन the संसार 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना the पहला नियंत्रित, संचालित और sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the brothers developed उनके उड़ती यंत्र into the पहला व्यावहारिक fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the first to निर्माण और मक्खी प्रायोगिक वायुयान, the राइट भाइयो यहूद the पहला to इफ़तेरा aircraft controls that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their आविष्कार of three-axis कंट्रोल, जिससे सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the वायुयान effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
इस विधि became मानक और remains मानक on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical work, the राइट भाइयो केन्द्रित on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of पायलट कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the समय जो put अधिक जोर on विकासशील शक्तिशाली इंजन.
Using a छोटी homebuilt हवा टनल, the wrights भी एकत्रित अधिक सटीक आंकड़ा than कोई पहले, enabling उन्हें to डिज़ाइन and build wings and propellers that were more efficient than any before.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a उड़ती यंत्र, लकिन बल्कि, the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical skills essential for their success by working लिये सालो in उनके दूकान साथ मुद्रण दबाता, साइकिल, मोटर्स, and other machinery.
उनके कार्य साथ साइकिल in particular बहकावे उनके विश्वास कि an अस्थिर गाडी जैसे a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice.
इससे 1900 जबतक उनके पहला संचालित फ़्लाइट in लेट 1903, वे conducted extensive glider tests that also developed their skills as pilots.
Their bicycle shop कर्मचारी चार्ली टेलर became an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the टोली, भवन उनके पहला वायुयान engine in close collaboration with the brothers.
The राइट भाइयो ' औकात as आविष्कारक of the वायुयान रै महरूम विषय to counter-claims by various parties.
Much controversy persists over the अनेक स्पर्धा दावा of early aviators.
America 's Next Top Model, Cycle 12 is the twelfth cycle of अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल और the छठे ऋतु to एयर on The CW network.
It premiered on कूच 4, 2009.
The cycle 's catch phrase is `` मिलेंगी in the मोड़ें. ''
the साईकिल 's promotional सोंग is महिला गागा 's `` The Fame ''.
the पुरस्कार लिये this cycle are:

A fashion spread and कवर in सत्रह.
A 100,000 अनुबंध साथ covergirl cosmetics.
the पहला हाफ of the साईकिल took प्लेस in नई यॉर्क नगर, चलती the दिखाएँ वापस from Los Angeles last season.
The international गंतव्य लिये इस साईकिल is são पाउलो, ब्राज़ील, the श्रेणी पहला visit to South America.
the क्रमांक of लड़कियों थी घटाया to 13, the पहला समय चूंकि साईकिल 9, बाद होने कायम at 14 in the last two cycles.

the विजेता थी 20-year-old teyona एंडरसन from Woodstown, New Jersey.
