Exxon mobil निगम, or exxonmobil, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस निगम headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
It is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's मानक आयल कम्पनी, और थी formed on नवम्बर 30, 1999, by the विलय of Exxon and Mobil.
It is affiliated with इम्पीरियल आयल जिससे operates in कनाडा.
ExxonMobil is the संसार 's largest कम्पनी by आय और in 2013, became the largest publicly traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The company is ranked # 5 globally in फोर्ब्स वैश्विक 2000 सूची in 2013.
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 और, at तब ( 2007 ) दरों of उत्पादन, are expected to last over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 देशों constituting a संयुक्त रोज़ शोधन क्षमता of, exxon mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870.
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors साथ रोज़ उत्पादन of 3.921 लाख boe ( barrels of आयल equivalent ).
In 2008, इस थी लगभग 3 % of संसार उत्पादन, जिससे is कम than several of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
जब क्रमित by आयल और गैस reserves it is 14th in the संसार साथ कम than 1 % of the total.
A 2012 article in the रोज़ टेलीग्राफ says कि exxonmobil रै `` grown into एक of the planet’s most hated corporations, able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire nations ''.
In terms of its environmental record, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to उन्हें by dictatorships, ऐसे as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief executive until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical परिचय जलवायु बदलें और disliked सरकारी interference at any level ''.
The company was widely criticized लिये इसके slow जवाब to सफ़ाई इसके 1989 valdez oil spill in Alaska.
इस आलेख is परिचय the ग्लोब थिएटर of Shakespeare.
For the modern reconstruction in लंदन, देखिए शेक्सपियर 's Globe.
For अन्य उपयोग, देखिए ग्लोब थिएटर ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The Globe Theatre was a थिएटर in लंदन संबद्ध साथ विलियम Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing कम्पनी, the रब चेम्बरलेन 's मेन, on जमीन स्वामित्व by थामस brend और inherited by उसके बेटे, निकोलस brend और पोता सर Matthew Brend, and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A दूसरी ग्लोब थिएटर थी निर्मित on the वही साईट by June 1614 and closed in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the Globe, named `` Shakespeare 's ग्लोब ``, खोली in 1997 लगभग इससे the साईट of the असली theatre.
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by Frank capra, आधारित on the छोटी स्टोरी `` the महानतम तोहफा ``, जिससे फिलिप वैन doren stern लिखा in 1939 और privately published in 1945.
The film is माना एक of the सबसे loved films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और रै become परंपरागत देखने दौरान the क्रिसमस season, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol.
The film stars जेम्स स्टीवर्ट as जार्ज बेली, a man जो रै दिए up उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings about the intervention of his guardian angel, Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ).
Clarence shows George all the जीवनदान he रै छुआ और कैसा अलग जीवन in उसके जातियाँ of bedford जलप्रपात would be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high उत्पादन लागत और stiff प्रतियोगिता at the समय of इसके रिलीज, the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded as a क्लासिक और is a स्टेपल of Christmas television around the world.
theatrically, the फिल्मी 's break-even पाइंट थी दरअसल $ 6.3 लाख, लगभग twice the उत्पादन cost, a figure it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes... it was initially a major disappointment और पुष्टि, at तनिक to the studios, कि capra थी no longer सक्षम of turning आउट the populist सुविधाएँ कि बना उसके films the must-see, money-making events they once were. ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made, रखकर क्रमांक 11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998 महानतम फिल्म सूची, और होता भी प्लेस क्रमांक एक on इसके सूची of the सबसे प्रेरणादायक अमरीकी films of all time.
Data गोदाम अवलोकन
In computing, a आंकड़ा गोदाम or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( dw, dwh, or edw ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis.
It is a central repository of data which is created by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक or अधिक disparate स्त्रोत.
Data warehouses store वर्तमान as खूब as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना trending reports for senior management reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse हैं अपलोड इससे the operational प्रणालियों ( ऐसे as विपणन, बिक्री etc., दिखाया in the फिगर to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational आंकड़ा स्टोर लिये अतिरिक्त परिचालन पहले वे हैं प्रयुक्त in the dw लिये रिपोर्टिंग.
The typical ETL -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग, आंकड़ा संयोजन, और अभिगम परतों to हाउस its key functions.
the स्टेजिंग परत or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस स्टोर्स raw data extracted from each of the disparate source data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate आंकड़ा सेट by transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग परत प्रायः storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data are then स्थानांतरित to yet another डेटाबेस, प्रायः पुकारा the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस, जहाँ the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts.
the संयोजन of तथ्य और आयाम is sometimes called a star schema.
The access layer helps उपयोक्ता retrieve आंकड़ा.
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source प्रणालियों करता नहीं आवश्यकता etl, स्टेजिंग databases, or operational आंकड़ा स्टोर databases.
The integrated data source प्रणालियों may be माना to be a भाग of a वितरित operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data आभासीकरण विधि may be प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the वितरित एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate और कुल आंकड़ा सीधे into the data warehouse database tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated source data systems and the data warehouse are सब एकीकृत चूंकि वहीँ is no परिवर्तन of आयामी or सन्दर्भ आंकड़ा.
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down इससे the कुल आंकड़ा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा of the एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा systems.
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into data marts.
Data marts store subsets of आंकड़ा इससे a warehouse.
This परिभाषा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम focuses on data storage.
The main source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made available for use by managers and other business professionals for data mining, online विश्लेषणात्मक प्रसंस्करण, मार्केट शोध और निर्णय support ( marakas & o'brien 2009 ).
However, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, और to मैनेज the आंकड़ा शब्दकोष हैं भी माना अनिवार्य components of a आंकड़ा warehousing system.
Many references to आंकड़ा warehousing उपयोग इस broader कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence टूल्स, टूल्स to निकालें, रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा into the repository, और टूल्स to मैनेज और retrieve मेटाडेटा.
पोर्टलैंड स्टोन पाषाण on the आइल of Portland, England
An abandoned निर्माण कुल पाषाण near Adelaide, South Australia
A पाषाण is a प्रकार of open-pit मेरा from which rock or minerals are extracted.
Quarries are generally used for extracting भवन सामग्री, ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन, निर्माण कुल, riprap, बालू, और gravel.
They are often collocated साथ कंक्रीट और डामर पौधे due to the आवश्यकता लिये विशाल amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals हैं typically referred to as खोलें pit mines.
the शब्द पाषाण can शामिल भूमिगत quarrying लिये स्टोन, such as Bath stone.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism, the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter दिन संत गति of restorationist christianity, जिससे began साथ the visions of जोसेफ स्मिथ in upstate New York during the 1820s.
बाद स्मिथ 's मौत in 1844 the mormons followed Brigham Young to what would become the Utah Territory.
Today Mormons are समझा to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
Some Mormons हैं भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah, and उत्तर अमेरिका रै अधिक mormons than कोई अन्य महाद्वीप, हालांकि the बहुमत of mormons सजीव बाहर the संयुक्त States.
Mormons have विकसित a दमदार भाव of communality कि तना इससे उनके doctrine and history.
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic स्थान, और between 1852 और 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of mormons खुलकर practiced बहुवचन विवाह, a रूप of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources to सेवारत in उनके गिरिजाघर, और अनेक यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a health code कि eschews alcoholic पेय, तम्बाकू, कॉफी, चाय, और अन्य addictive substances.
They tend to be बहुत family-oriented, और have दमदार कनेक्शन्स आरपार पीढियां और साथ विस्तारित परिवार, परावर्तक of उनके belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity.
Mormons also have a strict law of शुद्धता, requiring abstention इससे यौन संबंध बाहर of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as ईसाई, हालांकि कुछ of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as well as other books of scripture, ऐसे as the किताब of mormon.
They have a अद्वितीय दृश्य of cosmology, और मानना कि all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to परमेश्वर requires following the उदाहरण of यीशु मसीह, और accepting his atonement through ordinances such as baptism.
They believe that Christ 's church was restored through जोसेफ स्मिथ, और is हिदायत by living prophets and apostles.
Central to Mormon faith is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर बोलती to उसके children और जवाब their prayers.
In वित्तीय हिसाब, एसेट are economic resources.
Anything tangible or intangible that is सक्षम of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to उपज मान और कि is आयोजित to have positive economic value is considered an asset.
Simply stated, एसेट represent मान of स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित into cash ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ).
The संतुलन चादर of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड the monetaryj.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. shim, `` the बनियान जेब cpa '', wiley, 2005.there हैं अलग विधि of assessing the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet.
In some cases, the Historical Cost is used ; such that the मान of the एसेट जब it थी खरीदा in the पास्ट is प्रयुक्त as the मौद्रिक value.
In other instances, the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट मान of the एसेट is प्रयुक्त to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the एसेट स्वामित्व by the firm.
It is धन और अन्य valuables belonging to an individual or business.
Two major asset वर्ग हैं ठोस एसेट और intangible एसेट.
Tangible assets contain विभिन्न subclasses, सहित current assets and fixed assets.J.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश शर्तें '', सामन्त 's वित्तीय मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 वर्तमान एसेट शामिल inventory, जबकि फिक्स्ड एसेट शामिल ऐसे वस्तुएं as इमारतें और उपकरण.J. downes, j.e. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
intangible एसेट हैं nonphysical संसाधन और अधिकारों कि have a value to the firm because they give the firm some kind of advantage in the market place.
Examples of intangible एसेट हैं साख, copyrights, trademarks, patents और कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम, और वित्तीय assets, including such items as accounts receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also ज्ञात as a neurone or तंत्रिका कोशिका ) is an electrically excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
A रासायनिक सिग्नल occurs via a अन्तर्ग्रथन, a specialized connection with other cells.
Neurons connect to each अन्य to रूप neural संजाल.
Neurons are the core components of the nervous प्रणाली, जिससे शामिल the दिमाग, स्पाइनल cord, और परिधीय ganglia.
A number of specialized types of न्यूरॉन्स मौजूद : संवेदी न्यूरॉन्स respond to टच, ध्वनि, लाइट और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting cells of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain.
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain and spinal cord, कारण मांसपेशी contractions, और affect glands.
Interneurons connect neurons to other न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the वही प्रदेश of the दिमाग or spinal cord.
A typical neuron possesses a कोशिका देह ( प्रायः पुकारा the सोम ), dendrites, and an axon.
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body, प्रायः extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching अनेक टाइम्स, giving वृद्धि to a जटिल `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a special सेल्यूलर एक्सटेंशन कि arises इससे the कोशिका देह at a साईट पुकारा the axon उभरकर और ट्रेवल्स लिये a अलहदा, as दूर as 1 मीटर in humans or even more in other species.
The cell body of a न्यूरॉन अक्सर देता वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites, लकिन never to अधिक than एक axon, although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates.
at the बहुमत of synapses, सिग्नल are sent from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many अपवाद to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स कि कमी dendrites, न्यूरॉन्स कि have no axon, synapses कि कनेक्ट an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons are electrically excitable, maintaining वोल्टेज अनुपात आरपार उनके झिल्लियों by अर्थात् of metabolically चलित आयन पंपों, जिससे combine साथ आयन चैनल्स अंतःस्थापित in the झिल्ली to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, and calcium.
Changes in the cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न, जिससे ट्रेवल्स rapidly साथ the कोशिका 's axon, और activates सिनेप्टिक कनेक्शन्स with other cells when it arrives.
Neurons do नहीं undergo कोशिका प्रभाग.
In most cases, neurons हैं उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of स्टेम कोशिकाएं.
Astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have भी महरूम observed to फेरे into न्यूरॉन्स by पुण्य of the स्टेम कोशिका characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases दौरान adulthood—but in दो दिमाग क्षेत्रों, the हिप्पोकैम्पस और घ्राण बल्ब, there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons.
Super Bowl XLIII was an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियन एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
The Steelers defeated the कार्डिनल्स by the स्कोर of 27–23.
The game थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 1, 2009, at रेमंड जेम्स Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
With this win, the स्टीलर्स became the पहला टोली to जीत छह सुपर Bowls.
Pittsburgh, जो समाप्त the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 12–4 रिकार्ड, भी जीती उनके दूसरी सुपर कटोरी in चार सालो बाद जीतना सुपर Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season.
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL शीर्षक चूंकि 1947, the longest चैंपियनशिप सूखा in the league.
The club became an अनपेक्षित विजेता दौरान the नियमित ऋतु, compiling a 9–7 रिकार्ड, और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच केन whisenhunt, जो थी the स्टीलर्स ' अप्रिय समन्वयक in सुपर कटोरी xl, and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner, who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team, St. Louis Rams.
Pittsburgh कूद to a 17–7 मध्यांतर सीसे, aided by linebacker जेम्स हैरिसन 's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
trailing 20–7 at the प्रारंभ of the चौथी क्वार्टर, एरिज़ोना scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक, सहित wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on चौड़ी receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, सहित चार receptions लिये 73 गज on कि फाइनल game-winning ड्राइव, थी नामित सुपर Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the पुरस्कार, और भी थी the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver to जीत the पुरस्कार, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of आनुषंगिक festivities कि हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल, the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न संजाल ब्रॉडकास्ट आकर्षित an औसत u.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख viewers, making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point.
A diagram of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा of बारंबारता and wavelengths
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of सब संभावित बारंबारता of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a अलग अर्थ, और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित or अवशोषित by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the ब्रह्मांड itself, जबकि it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान लिये spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, विकिरण इससे विभिन्न भाग of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( जमीन पौधे ) कि do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और हैं इसलिए पुकारा ' non-vascular पौधे '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized ऊतकों लिये the हस्तांतरण of जल ; however चूंकि ये do not contain lignin, they are not considered to be true vascular tissue.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic समूह ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक और remains in उपयोग as a सामूहिक पद लिये mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ), लकिन वे उपज neither पुष्प nor बीज, reproducing via बीजाणुओं.
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a financial संस्था और a वित्तीय intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those जमा into lending क्रियाएँ, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A bank is the connection between customers that have पूंजी deficits और ग्राहक साथ capital surpluses.
Due to their influence भीतर a वित्तीय प्रणाली और an अर्थव्यवस्था, बैंको हैं generally highly regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve बैंकिंग जहाँ वे थाम तभी a छोटी आरक्षित of the निधि deposited और lend आउट the बाकी लिये profit.
They are generally विषय to न्यूनतम पूंजी आवश्यकताएँ जिससे हैं आधारित on an अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियत of capital standards, known as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena, headquartered in सियेना, इटली, जिससे रै महरूम ऑपरेटिंग लगातार चूंकि 1472.
It is followed by berenberg बैंको of हैम्बर्ग ( 1590 ) और Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
बैंकिंग in इसके आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of पुनर्जागरण Italy, such as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
In the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties —among उन्हें notably medici, fugger, welser, berenberg, baring और रोथ्सचाइल्ड —have निभाई a सेंट्रल भूमिका over many centuries.
The एक्सबॉक्स is a वीडियो खेल कंसोल manufactured by Microsoft.
It was released on November 15, 2001 in North America, फ़रवरी 22, 2002 in जापानी, और कूच 14, 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's पहला foray into the गेमिंग कंसोल मार्केट.
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2, sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका अमरीकी बिक्री before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
The Xbox थी the पहला कंसोल offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी बाद the atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live सेवा शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर 2002 अनुमत खिलाड़ी to खेल games online with a broadband connection.
It first competed साथ dreamcast 's ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन बाद primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's online service.
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely adopted yet, एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी a कामयाबी due to बेहतर सर्वर, सुविधाएँ ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची, और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, जिससे is the best-selling एक्सबॉक्स वीडियो खेल और was by far the most popular online game for years.
एक्सबॉक्स 's successor, the एक्सबॉक्स 360, was launched in November 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in लेट 2005 in जापानी जहाँ बिक्री यहूद poor.
It was discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और जल्दी 2007 in North America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in नवम्बर 2006, और the पिछला खेल in उत्तर अमेरिका थी मैडेन एनएफएल 09 released in August 2008.
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating कि कोई in-warranty मरम्मत अभी needed होगा नहीं be undertaken.
Xbox access to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी रोका on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in नई वसीयत स्कॉलरशिप as the चौथी इन्जील, is an खाता of the पब्लिक मंत्रालय of Jesus.
It begins साथ the गवाह और प्रतिज्ञान by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत, दफ़न, resurrection, and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus.
This account is चौथी of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, Mark and Luke.
states that the book गर्भाशयी इससे the गवाही of the ' शिष्य जिसको Jesus loved. '
Along with Peter, the unnamed disciple is विशेषकर बंद to यीशु, और early-church परंपरा पहचाना उसे as John the Apostle, one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such कि टीकाकारों दावत the चार किताबे साथ, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, जॉन थी नहीं the author of any of these books.
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more और अधिक रै लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century Jewish context.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the development of the परंपरा इससे जिससे the इन्जील arose.
The discourses seem to be चिंतित साथ the वास्तविक मुद्दे of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written.
It is notable कि, in the इन्जील, the जातियाँ स्टिल appears to define itself primarily विरूद्ध judaism, बल्कि than as part of a wider Christian church.
Though Christianity started as a गति भीतर judaism, धीरे ईसाइयों and Jews became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, अर्थ कि it describes यीशु as the अवतार of the दैवी लोगो through जिसको सब बाते यहूद बना, as the ऑब्जेक्ट of veneration, और अधिक explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John does Jesus बात at लंबाई परिचय खुद और उसके दैवी भूमिका, प्रायः साझा साथ the शिष्यों only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on अलग चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting lazarus ), दिए as signs meant to engender faith.
Synoptic elements such as parables और exorcisms हैं नहीं मिला in John.
It presents a एहसास eschatology in जिससे मोक्ष is already उपस्थित for the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were टेन calamities कि, according to the biblical किताब of exodus, इसराईल 's परमेश्वर, yahweh, inflicted upon मिश्र to राजी pharaoh to रिलीज the ill-treated Israelites from slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated बाद the दसवाँ प्लेग, triggering the exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to कंट्रास्ट the शक्ति of yahweh साथ the नपुंसकता of Egypt 's various gods.
Some commentators have associated several of the plagues with judgment on specific देवताओं संबद्ध साथ the nile, प्रजनन और प्राकृतिक phenomena.
the plagues of मिश्र हैं भी mentioned in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the Book of Exodus, God proclaims that all the gods of मिश्र होगा be judged through the दसवाँ और फाइनल plague:
John Martin 's painting of the प्लेग of hail और आग ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which खिलाड़ी assume the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण in a fictional सेटिंग.
Players take responsibility for acting out these roles within a narrative, either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a प्रक्रम of संरचित decision-making or character development.
Actions taken within many games सफल or असफल according to a औपचारिक प्रणाली of नियम और दिशानिर्देश.
There हैं अनेक फ़ॉर्म of RPG.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through चर्चा, whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing खेल ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
In both of these forms, an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on the नियम और सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी, जबकि प्रत्येक of the अन्य खिलाड़ी plays the भूमिका of a सिंगल character.
Several varieties of RPG also exist in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मीडिया, ऐसे as multi-player text-based muds और उनके graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player ऑफ़लाइन role-playing वीडियो खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी कंट्रोल a अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests, और may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics.
These games often share जमावट और नियम साथ tabletop rpgs, लकिन emphasize अक्षर उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
Despite this variety of फ़ॉर्म, कुछ खेल फ़ॉर्म ऐसे as व्यापार कार्ड खेल और wargames कि are related to role-playing games may not be included.
Role-playing activity may sometimes be उपस्थित in ऐसे खेल, लकिन it is not the primary focus.
The term is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe लिए सिमुलेशन खेल और exercises used in teaching, training, and academic research.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four सालो of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई Confederate States of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War थी एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
The definition of the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट by the एयरपोर्ट Council International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines और उपायों the following तीन प्रकार of airport traffic:
यात्री ट्रैफ़िक : कुल यात्री emplaned और deplaned, passengers in transit counted once
कार्गो ट्रैफ़िक : loaded और मोड भाड़ा and mail in metric tonnes
ट्रैफ़िक आंदोलनों : अवतरण and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants यहूद मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
अधिक तत्काल, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी until 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In नवम्बर the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
the युद्ध ended in विजय for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the former two lost a ग्रेट राशि of territory, जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely.
The मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
the यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, and the Macondo blowout ) थी an आयल spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo prospect, माना the largest आकस्मिक समुद्री आयल spill in the इतिहास of the पेट्रोलियम उद्योग, अनुमानित to be between 8 % और 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion and sinking of the deepwater क्षितिज आयल रिग, जिससे claimed 11 जीवनदान, a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated for 87 days, until it was capped on 15 July 2010.
The कुल निर्वहन is अनुमानित at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, वेटलैंड्स और मुहानों इससे the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों, फ्लोटिंग booms, controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several failed प्रयत्न to contain the प्रवाह, the खूब थी घोषित sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some reports indicate the well साईट continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, along with adverse प्रभाव इससे the जवाब और क्लीनअप क्रियाएँ, extensive क्षति to समुद्री और वन्यजीव habitats, फ़िशिंग और पर्यटन उद्योग, और इंसान स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं have जारी through 2013.three years after the spill, tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations छान the कल्याणकारी of the विस्फोट और record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. government 's September 2011 रपट pointed to defective सीमेंट on the खूब, faulting ज़्यादातर bp, लकिन भी खूब ऑपरेटर transocean और contractor Halliburton.
पहले in 2011, a श्वेत हाउस आयोग likewise blamed bp और इसके साझेदार लिये a श्रेणी of cost-cutting निर्णय और an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली, लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted from `` systemic '' root causes and `` absent significant reform in both industry practices and government policies, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, BP and the United States Department of इंसाफ settled संघीय दण्ड आरोप साथ bp pleading अपराधी to 11 रिश्तो of manslaughter, दो misdemeanors, और a felony count of lying to Congress.
BP also agreed to four years of government monitoring of its सुरक्षा practices और आचार, और the पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी घोषित that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government.
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and other payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude जबतक 2014 हैं जारी to determine payouts और जुर्माना अंतर्गत the साफ जल अधिनियम और the प्राकृतिक संसाधन क्षति मूल्यांकन.
As of फ़रवरी 2013, दण्ड और सिविल settlements और भुगतान to a विश्वास निधि था लागत the कम्पनी $ 42.2 billion.
`` Where the Streets Have No नाम '' is a सोंग by चट्टान बैंड u2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 album the जोशुआ पेड़ और थी released as the एल्बम 's तीसरा सिंगल in अगस्त 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating गिटार arpeggio using a विलंब प्रभाव, निभाई दौरान the सोंग 's introduction and again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the ख़्याल कि it is संभावित to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय आधारित on the गली on जिससे वे जिया, विशेषकर in Belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the song, producer Brian Eno considered erasing the सोंग 's टेपों to have उन्हें प्रारंभ इससे खरोंच.
`` जहाँ the गलियों have no नाम '' थी praised by आलोचकों और became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the US, number fourteen in Canada, number ten in the Netherlands, and number four in the United Kingdom.
The song has become one of the band 's सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके सजीव अधिनियम चूंकि the सोंग debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a Los एंजिल्स छत लिये the फिल्मांकन of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो, जिससे जीती a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक वीडियो.recently the सोंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
थामस जेफरी `` tom '' हैंक्स ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director.
Hanks is known for उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13, बिग, कि Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie Wilson 's War, Catch Me If तुम can, फॉरेस्ट गंप, डाल दूर, a लीग of उनके अपना, the da विंची कोड, फ़रिश्ते & राक्षसों, as खूब as एनिमेटेड films जैसे the खिलौना Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous पुरस्कार दौरान उसके करियर, सहित जीतना a सुनहरी ग्लोब लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फिलाडेल्फिया और a सुनहरी Globe, an Academy Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump, and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.
Hanks is also known लिये उसके सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग on छायांकन निजी रयान और the mini-series बैंड of Brothers, which launched Hanks also as a successful director, producer and writer.
As of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर अलोन, और over $ 8.5 अरब विश्वव्यापी making him the highest all-time box office star.
The Cape is an अमरीकी सुपरहीरो नाटक series.
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season बदलना शुरूआत साथ a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे, January 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time.
An encore played on Monday, January 10, साथ follow-up एपीसोड continuing on सोमवार evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17.
NBC subsequently cut the total number of episodes to be aired इससे 13 to 10 as a परिणाम of low ratings.
On कूच 2, 2011, एनबीसी घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale होता तभी be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती, और यूँ the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि at तनिक 240 bce.
Clear records of the धूमकेतु 's दिखावे यहूद बना by चाइनीज, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
हैली 's धूमकेतु पिछला appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक और the यांत्रिकी of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred Whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल, जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अमोनिया – और धूल.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the सबसे populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त States of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, including city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि शामिल the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated स्थान.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties कि हैं नहीं a part of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined हद, जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a कोर समूह of separatists, to New England.
उनके स्टोरी is एक of travail और अस्तित्व in a harsh New World environment.
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a शॉट on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध कैमरून in the 2011 फीफा u-20 संसार Cup.
Forwards, also known as strikers, हैं the खिलाड़ी on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य, and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals.
This very advanced position and its limited defensive जिम्मेदारियों औसत आगे सामान्यतः स्कोर अधिक लक्ष्य than अन्य players.
This position requires प्रज्ञा, गति, और शक्ति, दोनो of निष्पादन और of thought, to perform the role well.
Modern team formations प्रायः शामिल एक to तीन forwards ; two is the most common.
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced स्थिति ( the केन्द्र आगे ), और another attacking आगे जो plays somewhat deeper और assists in बनाना लक्ष्य as खूब as स्कोरिंग ( the दूसरी स्ट्राइकर ).
It should be noted that inside आगे develop इससे attacking midfield स्थितियाँ and hence are naturally midfielders.
बार्सिलोना fc स्टार लियोनेल मेस्सी is a ठेठ attacking मिडफील्डर seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy.
A California घरेलू साझेदारी is a विधिक संबंध उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल, और to निश्चित opposite-sex युगल in which at least one party is at least 18 years of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, and benefits, and... the same जिम्मेदारियों, दायित्वों, और कर्तव्य अंतर्गत विधि... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership registry थी the पहला of इसके दयालु in the संयुक्त राज्य निर्मित by a विधानमंडल बगैर court intervention.
Initially, घरेलू partnerships enjoyed बहुत few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation अधिकारों और the सही to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner.
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California domestic partnerships to शामिल सब of the अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों आम to विवाह.
As such, कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships हैं functionally समतुल्य to civil unions offered in several other states.
Although the कार्यक्रम enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, it रै महरूम the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex परिवारों have challenged the विस्तार of घरेलू partnerships in court.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex विवाह contend कि anything कम than पूरा विवाह अधिकारों विस्तारित to same-sex साझेदार is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era.
Mark A. जैक्सन ( born अप्रैल 1, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट कोच, और पूर्व खिलाड़ी जो is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA.
A point guard from St. John 's University, he played for the New York Knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los एंजिल्स क्लिपर्स, डेनवर टेंडर्स, टोरंटो रैपटर्स, यूटा जैज़ और ह्यूस्टन rockets in the एनबीए in a करियर spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a commentator लिये ईएसपीएन और एबीसी alongside उसके पूर्व कोच जेफ़ वैन gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen.
He was previously an NBA विश्लेषक लिये the यस संजाल 's नई जर्सी Nets games.
South Africa has eleven official भाषाएं : अफ्रीकी, अंग्रेज़ी, ndebele, उत्तरी sotho, sotho, swazi, tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two percent of दक्षिण africans बोलो a पहला भाषा other than an official one.
सबसे दक्षिण africans can बोलो अधिक than one language.
Dutch and अंग्रेज़ी यहूद the पहला आधिकारिक भाषाएं of South Africa from 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans was added as a भाग of डच in 1925.
Dutch was replaced by अफ्रीकी जब दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी became a गणतंत्र in 1961, और डच थी dropped in 1983, so between 1983 और 1994, दक्षिण Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those भाषाएं : isizulu, isixhosa, अफ्रीकी, sepedi ( referring to उत्तरी sotho ), setswana, अंग्रेज़ी, sesotho ( referring to दक्षिणी sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, tshivenda और isindebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ).
In South Africa, दक्षिणी ndebele is ज्ञात बस as ndebele, as सबसे अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to उत्तरी sotho as sesotho sa leboa, लकिन the 1996 संस्करण referred to the भाषा as Sepedi.
Different government departments और आधिकारिक लाशें उपयोग अलग terms to denote Northern Sotho.
The main भाषा of सरकारी is अंग्रेज़ी भी if दक्षिण africans प्रायः take pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans also features prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the भाषाएं साथ the उच्चतम number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In terms of भाषाई वर्गीकरण, the आधिकारिक भाषाएं शामिल दो west-germanic भाषाएं ( English and Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu, Xhosa, Swati and ndebele ) और तीन हैं sotho–tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी sotho, दक्षिणी sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a tswa–ronga भाषा.
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely उभरा नेशनल मानक भाषा जिससे भी subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric acid, existing सामान्यतः as a crystalline हाइड्रेट, सबसे commonly as एल्युमिनियम नाइट्रेट nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The New York jets हैं a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered in Florham Park, New Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The team is a member of the Eastern Division of the American Football सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
In a unique व्यवस्था लिये the लीग, the jets share metlife स्टेडियम in ईस्ट रदरफोर्ड, New Jersey with the New York Giants.
The franchise is legally and corporately पंजीकृत as नई यॉर्क jets, LLC.
The team was founded in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of नई यॉर्क, an असली सदस्य of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ; बाद, the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger.
The team began to खेल in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new ownership, the current name was adopted in 1963 and the मताधिकार थी relocated to shea स्टेडियम in 1964 और तब to the meadowlands खेल जटिल in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in सुपर कटोरी iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस, बनने the पहला afl टोली to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game.
Since 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs तेरह टाइम्स, और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार टाइम्स, सबसे recently खोने to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers in 2010.
However, the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, making उन्हें एक of तीन एनएफएल टीमों to जीत उनके लोन सुपर कटोरी रूप, साथ साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो and Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
The team 's training facility, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य jets प्रशिक्षण बीच, जिससे खोली in 2008, is स्तिथ in florham Park.
The team currently holds उनके सालाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर सत्र on the कैम्पस of the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई यॉर्क at cortland in cortland, New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex.
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also ज्ञात as साइकेडेलिक मशरूम, हैं fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin मशरूम, the सबसे आम होने shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin मशरूम शामिल agrocybe, conocybe, copelandia, galerina, gerronema, gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, Mycena, Panaeolus, Pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin मशरूम और सबसे of उन्हें पतन in the genus psilocybe.
psilocybin मशरूम have संभावित महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्रागैतिहासिक times and may have been depicted in rock art.
Many संस्कृतियों have प्रयुक्त ये मशरूम in धार्मिक rites.
In modern Western society they are प्रयुक्त recreationally लिये उनके साइकेडेलिक effects.
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns हॉपकिंस स्कूल of आयुर्विज्ञान conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin अधिनियमों as an anti-depressant as सुझाया by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर, और the प्रशांत समंदर to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 संयुक्त States.
Approximately half of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर the anchorage महानगर area.
Alaska 's economy is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग दो सेंट प्रति एकड़ ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes before बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, और the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it was used only for the peninsula and is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or, अधिक वस्तुतः, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also ज्ञात as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an aleut शब्द derived from the same root.
The 101 French departments are divided into 342 arrondissements, जिससे may be अनूदित into English as districts.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is पुकारा a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the विभाग, कि प्रीफ़ेक्चर is the पूंजी of the arrondissement, एक्टिंग दोनो as a प्रीफ़ेक्चर and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further divided into cantons और communes.
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, वस्तुतः `` म्यान '' or `` म्यान `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट जिससे is a sex अंग और has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth.
In humans, इस ड्योढ़ी लीड इससे the खोलने of the भग to the गर्भाशय ( womb ), but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
नापसंद मेन, जो have तभी एक genital orifice, महिलाओं have दो, the urethra and the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral खोलने, और दोनो उद्घाटन are protected by the labia.
The inner mould of the योनि रै a foldy बनावट जिससे can बनाएँ friction for the penis during intercourse.
During arousal, the योनि gets नम to सुकर the प्रवेश of the शिश्न.
the latinate बहुवचन `` vaginae '' is rarely used in English.
Colloquially, the word vagina is often प्रयुक्त to refer to the भग or to the female genitals in general.
However, by its शब्दकोष और anatomical परिभाषाएं, योनि refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The सिनसिनाटी लाल हैं a प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल team based in Cincinnati, Ohio.
They हैं सदस्यों of the नेशनल लीग Central Division.
Established in 1881 as an स्वतंत्र क्लबों, the टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882, and joined the National League in 1890.
The club traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's पहला खुलकर professional team in 1869.
The Reds have won five World Series titles, one अमरीकी संघ pennant, नौ नेशनल लीग pennants और टेन division titles.
The लाल निभाई in the नेशनल लीग वेस्ट between 1969 और 1993 और have महरूम in the National League Central since 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have played at ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क, निर्मित अगला to उनके घर इससे 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
Bob castellini रै स्वामित्व the सिनसिनाटी Reds since 2006.
a शरारत बदबू bomb.
A stink bomb is a यंत्र designed to बनाएँ an अप्रिय महकते.
They range in प्रभावकारिता इससे सरल pranks to सैन्य ग्रेड malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The गिनीज किताब of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of आठ रसायन साथ a stench resembling इंसान मल, तभी much stronger, designed to परीक्षण the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
Another one, `` Who me ? ``, is a मिश्रण of पाँच sulfur-containing रसायन और खुश्बू जैसे rotting खाना और carcasses.
The adage `` A picture is worth a हजार शब्द '' refers to the ख़्याल कि a जटिल विचार can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It also aptly characterizes one of the main goals of कल्पना, namely बनाना it संभावित to अवशोषित विशाल amounts of आंकड़ा जल्दी.
The अभिव्यक्ति `` उपयोग a चित्र.
It 's worth a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 समाचारपत्र आलेख quoting समाचारपत्र एडिटर आर्थर ब्रिसबेन discussing पत्रकारिता and publicity.
1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई हाउस of piqua, Ohio.
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper advertisement for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the स्वदेश 's महानतम सम्पादक says : एक चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट 's सचित्र पत्रिका of the युद्ध exemplifies the सच्चाई of the ऊपर बयान -- judging इससे the गरम रिसेप्शन it रै प्राप्त at the हैंड्स of the Sunday Light readers.
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल मुद्रक ' स्याही, promoting the उपयोग of बिंब in विज्ञापन कि appeared on the पहलू of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad हकदार, `` एक dekh is लायक a हजार Words. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द, '' जहाँ it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The Home Book of Proverbs, maxims, और परिचित वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he पुकारा it `` a Chinese proverb, so that people would take it seriously. ''
Soon after, the कहावत होता become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The discussion of `` एक चित्र लायक हजार शब्द '' बनाम `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 किताबे is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A चित्र is लायक a हजार words
Despite this modern origin of the popular phrase, the भावना रै महरूम expressed by पहले लेखक.
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev लिखा ( in fathers और बेटे in 1862 ), `` a चित्र shows me at a glance कया it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an opposite बयान regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month : `` दिखाएँ me अपना flowcharts और छिपाते अपना टेबल, और i shall continue to be mystified.
Show me अपना टेबल, और i won’t प्रायः need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John मैकार्थी, the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक, to मेक the विपरीत पाइंट : `` as the चाइनीज कह, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम, पारिस्थितिकी, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may कारण पशु to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern गोलार्ध is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी the hemisphere faces the sun.
The वही is सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in November, December and January.
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the सौर flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर, जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based seasons ( with उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु, और in कुछ तीव्र क्षेत्रों, a कूल or mild season.
In some भाग of the संसार, खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons, चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक from Tunisia
डच निर्यात in 2006
At the समय of लिखने the नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( देखिए : सूची of देशों by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP प्रति capita is roughly $ 42,000 जिससे puts it in the शीर्ष 10 of richest राष्ट्र in the संसार ( see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ).
Between 1996 और 2000 सालाना आर्थिक विकास ( जीडीपी ) averaged over 4 %, well above the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक आर्थिक slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however दिखाया आर्थिक growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the जारी वैश्विक वित्तीय crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis.
Several बैंको गई दिवालिया, और a क्रमांक of अन्य था to receive governmental aid.
In 2009 the economy declined साथ 3.5 %, followed by दो सालो of mild growth.
The डच अर्थव्यवस्था is फिलहाल in a मंदी again, with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012.
महंगाई is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment has been अपेक्षाकृत कम compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र लिये दशकों लकिन बाद mid-2012 it रै देखी a तेज़ बढ़ाएँ और in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.
The Netherlands प्रबंधित to maintain इसके aaa दरजा at तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the तीन प्रमुख credit rating agencies.
Historically, the Dutch introduced and invented the भण्डार मार्केट by the merchandise व्यापार through डच वेस्ट India Company.
the नीदरलैंड्स is a founding सदस्य of the यूरोपीय संघ, the OECD and the World Trade Organization.
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio एल्बम और छठे स्टुडियो एल्बम by तुपाक shakur.
It contains remixes of previously unreleased म्यूज़िक अंकित by shakur पहले उसके मौत in 1996.
Released in the United States on December 14, 2004 ( दिसम्बर 12 in the संयुक्त किंगडम ), वफ़ादार to the Game was produced by Eminem.
The original panel of The View ; Meredith Vieira, Star जोन्स, डिब्बी matenopoulos और बारबरा walters in 1997.
The View is an अमरीकी बात दिखाएँ ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997 as भाग of the network 's daytime programming block.
निर्मित by बारबरा walters और विधेयक geddie, जो दोनो भी serve as the दिखाएँ 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता, the program features a panel of women as co-hosts.
Along with Walters, the current फलक शामिल whoopi गोल्डबर्ग, जो serves as the मॉडरेटर, आनन्द behar, एलिज़ाबेथ hasselbeck, और Sherri Shepherd.
International versions of the कार्यक्रम हैं aired in अनेक देशों.
As of the 2012–13 season, its 16th, The View is the fourth-longest कार्यशील नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास, पीछे the फिल donahue दिखाएँ ( 29 ), the variously-named Live !
कार्यक्रम ( 25 ), और the ओपरा विनफ्रे Show ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly पुकारा bitter-berry, chokecherry, वर्जिनिया बर्ड चेरी और पश्चिमी chokecherry ( भी ब्लैक chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a प्रजाति of बर्ड चेरी ( prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent, except for the far north and far south.
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary airport serving the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, the second-most आबादी महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It is most often referred to by इसके iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड lax, साथ the अक्षर सुनाया individually.
LAX is located in southwestern लॉस एंजिल्स साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester, इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र of लॉस एंजिल्स World Airports ( LAWA ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the संसार बाद hartsfield-jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, बीजिंग पूंजी अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र, शिकागो o'hare अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, और Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the अर्जी लिये `` the संसार 's व्यस्ततम उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is also the तभी विमानक्षेत्र to रैंक among the शीर्ष पाँच u.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये दोनो passenger and cargo traffic.
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area, but other एयरपोर्ट सहित bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र, जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र, long बीच विमानक्षेत्र, la/ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, और ताड़ Springs International Airport also serve the region.
LAX is also the busiest airport in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन, यात्री ट्रैफ़िक और एयर कार्गो कार्यकलाप, leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an American football quarterback for the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
He played for the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस लिये 14 सीज़न इससे 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL क्वार्टरबैक आर्ची मैनिंग और an elder bhai of नई यॉर्क दिग्गज quarterback Eli Manning.
Manning played college football for the University of टेनेसी, अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप in उसके वरिष्ठ season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the No. 2 Nebraska cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी कटोरी giving नेब्रास्का और tom ओसबोर्न उनके 3rd नेशनल चैंपियनशिप in 4 years.
He was चुनी by the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस साथ the पहला overall चुनें in the 1998 NFL Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC East ) division championships, दो afc championships, और to a सुपर कटोरी चैंपियनशिप ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He has won a record four league most valuable player awards, was the most valuable player of Super Bowl xli, रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले, रै बारह 4,000-yard गुजर सीज़न, और is the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस ' all-time नेता in गुजर गज ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was named the best खिलाड़ी in the एनएफएल और फॉक्स खेल साथ साथ खेल illustrated नामित उसे the एनएफएल player of the decade of the 2000s.
In May 2011, he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt साथ दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year, $ 90 million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011.
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season, but in सितंबर 2011, he underwent a much अधिक गंभीर दूसरी सर्जरी : a स्तर एक सर्वाइकल fusion procedure.
Manning had never छूटी an एनएफएल खेल in उसके करियर, लकिन थी मजबूर to miss the entire 2011 season.
He was released by the कोल्टस on कूच 7, 2012, और बाद an लगभग two-week काल जहाँ he visited साथ और worked out for several NFL teams, he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20, 2012.
मैनिंग 's pre-snap दिनचर्या रै अर्जित उसे the उपनाम, `` the शेरिफ '' और is एक of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों और मौखिक कमांड to कॉल the खेल at the लकीर of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.
The America मीनार of the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is एक of the संसार 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 देशों, providing the आयल और गैस उद्योग साथ उत्पाद और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई, गठन मूल्यांकन, पूर्णता, production and reservoir consulting.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच in neartown, ह्यूस्टन.
Baker ह्यूजेस incorporated थी formed जब बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय और ह्यूजेस Tool Company merged in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates विश्वव्यापी साथ प्रमुख कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल, संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस सुविधा in celle, जर्मनी ; lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, Texas ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The company is administered broadly in दो बांटती : the पूर्वी गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य ईस्ट, एशिया प्रशांत और russia/caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada, US Land, US Gulf, and Latin America ).
Each of ये regions is subdivided into markets.
the संयुक्त राज्य one- cent सिक्का, commonly ज्ञात as a penny, is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
The cent 's प्रतीक is ¢.
Its obverse has featured the profile of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln चूंकि 1909, the centennial of उसके जनम.
इससे 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of lincoln 's जनम ) to 2008, the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 सम्मानित lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस और a नई, स्थाई रिवर्स – the संघ शील्ड – थी introduced in 2010.
The coin is 0.75 इंच ( 19.05 mm ) in व्यास और 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's official name लिये a पैनी is `` '' और the u.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक नाम is `` एक cent टुकड़ा ''.
The colloquial term penny derives इससे the अंग्रेजों सिक्का of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal संस्करण of जिससे था a similar value.
In American English, pennies is the बहुवचन रूप, अन्य बहुवचन फ़ॉर्म पेंस और पेशाब ( मानक उपयोग in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) हैं not used.
As of 2012, it लागत the u.S. मिंट 2.00 सेंट to मेक a cent क्युकी of the cost of materials and production.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components लिये वितरण और fabrication, अनुमानित at $ 13 लाख in fy 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead आबंटित to the पैनी, जिससे थी $ 17.7 लाख for 2011.
Fixed costs and ओवरहेड होता have to be अवशोषित by अन्य circulating coins without the penny.
The loss in profitability due to producing the एक cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
This was a slight घटी इससे 2011, the साल पहले, जिससे था a उत्पादन loss of $ 60,200,000.
or अधिक specifically, हैं शोभायमान किस्में of domesticated आम कार्प ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are kept for decorative purposes in outdoor koi ponds or water gardens.
Koi किस्में हैं विशिष्ट by coloration, patterning, and scalation.
कुछ of the प्रमुख रंगों हैं श्वेत, black, red, yellow, blue, and cream.
The most popular category of koi is the Gosanke, जिससे is बना up of the kohaku, taisho sanshoku, और showa sanshoku किस्में.
The American Federation of Government Employees ( afge ) is an अमरीकी मजदूर संघ representing over 650,000 कर्मचारी of the संघीय सरकारी, परिचय 5,000 कर्मचारी of the ज़िला of Columbia, and a few hundred private sector employees, mostly in and around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- postal federal employees and the largest union लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी जो रपट सीधे to the महापौर ( i.e., बाहर of D.C. public schools ).
It is संबद्ध साथ the afl-cio.

ग्रीन : a spore tetrad.
Blue : a spore bearing a trilete mark – the -shaped scar.

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing स्तर of जटिलता, इससे the earliest algal मैट्स, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the जटिल gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे वे विकसित, लिये a समय प्रत्येक नई ग्रेड of संगठन became अधिक `` कामयाब '' than इसके पूर्ववर्तियों.
In the Ordovician period, around, the पहला जमीन पौधे appeared.
These began to diversify in the लेट सिल्यूरियन काल, around, और the परिणाम of उनके diversification हैं प्रदर्शित in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved early पौधे in सेल्यूलर विवरण, petrified in volcanic springs.
By the middle of the Devonian Period, most of the features recognised in पौधे आज हैं उपस्थित, सहित जड़ें, पत्ते और द्वितीयक लकडी ; और, by लेट devonian times, seeds had evolved.
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a उपाधि of परिष्कार कि अनुमत उन्हें to रूप वनों of tall trees.
Evolutionary innovation जारी into the carboniferous काल और is स्टिल जारी today.
Most संयंत्र समूह यहूद अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities changed.
This may have नियत the झाँकी लिये the रूप of the flowering पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ), और their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major group of plants to evolve were the grasses, which became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-paleogene, from around.
The grasses, as well as many other groups, evolved new mechanisms of चयापचय to जीवित the कम और गरम, शुष्क शर्तें of the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध over the पिछला.
The winning Super Bowl टोली receives the विंस लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी.
The Super कटोरी is an सालाना अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल कि determines the champion of the National Football League ( NFL ).
The contest is held in an American नगर कि is चुनी तीन to चार सालो beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed sites.
Since 1971, the winner of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( afl ) और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ), the दो लीग मिले in चार ऐसे प्रतियोगिताओं.
The first two were ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप Game. ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first ऐसे खेल कि carried the `` सुपर कटोरी '' moniker, the names `` सुपर कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first two games.
The NFC /NFL लीड in सुपर कटोरी विन्स साथ 25, जबकि the afc /afL रै won 22.
अठारह अलग franchises, सहित टीमों कि relocated to another city, have won the Super Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with छह championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ), जबकि दोनो the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have पाँच विन्स प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and पिट्सबर्ग have the सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ आठ, जबकि the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार दिखावे साथ चार losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The New England Patriots, Denver broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have भी खोया a रिकार्ड four Super Bowls.
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4, Denver is 2–4 और नई इंग्लैण्ड is 3–4.
The record for consecutive wins is two and is साझा by सात franchises : the 1966-67 ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स, the 1972-73 मियामी डॉल्फिन, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat twice ), the 1988-89 सैन Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 Denver Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the बाल्टीमोर ravens, जो in जीतना सुपर कटोरी xlvii unseated और replaced the 49ers in that position.
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी, सहित मताधिकार relocations और renaming : the क्लीवलैंड भूरा, डेट्रॉयट शेर, jacksonville jaguars, और ह्यूस्टन texans, though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl.
मार्टिन काउंटी is a काउंटी स्तिथ in the u.S. state of Texas.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके जनसांख्यिकी was 4,799.
Its सीट is stanton.
the काउंटी is नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन, an early settler.
Martin काउंटी is एक of 30 निषेध, or entirely dry, counties in the state of Texas.
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट समूह इससे अनेक प्रकार of अणुओं, सहित nucleotides, प्रोटीन, and alkaloids.
The प्रक्रम of निकालना the फास्फेट group is called dephosphorylation.
As the name suggests, क्षारीय phosphatases हैं सबसे प्रभावी in an क्षारीय environment.
It is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as basic phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a संकर of गेहूं ( triticum ) और rye ( secale ) पहला करवाया in laboratories दौरान the late 19th century.
The grain was originally करवाया in स्कॉटलैंड और स्वीडन.
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second generation संकर, i.e., a क्रॉस between दो kinds of प्राथमिक ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the उपज संभावित और अनाज विशेषता of गेहूं साथ the बीमारी और पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता ( including soil conditions ) of rye.
Only recently has it महरूम विकसित into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can more or less resemble either of इसके अभिभावक.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, although कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be खरीदा at स्वास्थ्य खाना स्टोर्स or हैं to be मिला in some breakfast cereals.
When crossing wheat and rye, wheat is used as the मादा जनक और rye as the पुरूष जनक ( pollen donor ).
The resulting hybrid is बंध्य, और जरूर be treated साथ colchicine to induce polyploidy और यूँ the ability to reproduce itself.
The primary producers of triticale हैं कैंडल, जर्मनी, फ़्रांस, बेलारूस और Australia.
In 2009, according to the खाना और कृषि संगठन ( fao ), 15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in 29 countries across the world.
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid, जिससे अर्थात् the संयंत्र is द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes derived from different species.
In other शब्द, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, most work was done on octoploid triticale.
अलग ploidy स्तर have महरूम निर्मित and evaluated over time.
The tetraploids दिखाया छोटी वादा, लकिन hexaploid triticale was successful enough to find commercial application.
The CIMMYT triticale improvement program चाही to improve खाना उत्पादन और पोषण in विकासशील देशों.
Triticale has potential in the production of ब्रैड और अन्य खाना उत्पाद, ऐसे as कुकीज़, पास्ता, पिज़्ज़ा आटा और नाश्ता cereals.
The protein content is उच्चतर than कि of गेहूं, हालांकि the glutenin भिन्न is less.
The grain has also been stated to have उच्चतर स्तर of lysine than wheat.
Assuming increased acceptance, the मिलिंग उद्योग होगा have to adapt to triticale, as the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed लिये गेहूं हैं मुलम्मा to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a फीड अनाज, और बाद शोध मिला इसके मंड थी विशेषकर readily digested.
As a feed grain, triticale is already खूब स्थापित और of ऊँची economic importance.
It has received attention as a potential उर्जा क्रॉप, और शोध is फिलहाल होने conducted on the उपयोग of the क्रॉप 's बायोमास in bioethanol production.
`` कश, the जादू ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton और पीटर yarrow, और बना लोकप्रिय by yarrow 's समूह पीटर, Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording.
The song हासिल ग्रेट लोकप्रियता.
A college football national championship in the उच्चतम स्तर of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य, फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( ncaa ) प्रभाग i फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ), is a नामांकन awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ).
Division I FBS ( formerly प्रभाग i-a ) फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी ncaa खेल in जिससे a वार्षिक चैंपियन is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
Because the championship team is not determined by a NCAA चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical नेशनल चैंपियनशिप ``.
Since the ncaa, the खेल 's शासी देह, करता नहीं determine or घोषित a नेशनल champion in this field, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
A चैंपियनशिप टोली is independently घोषित by विभिन्न individuals and organizations, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
ये चुनाव हैं sometimes at odds with each other.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual championship team, it has documented the चुनाव of अनेक चयनकर्ताओं in the आधिकारिक ncaa फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision रिकॉर्ड.
In addition, various third party विश्लेषकों have independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of कया वे have संकल्पित to be the most legitimate selections for each season.
These are also often at odds with each other as well as व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships, जिससे, लिये कोई particular ऋतु, may or may नहीं correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely recognized national champions चयनकर्ताओं हैं the संबद्ध दबायें, जिससे conducts a पोल of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, और the यूएसए आज कोच ' पोल, a पोल of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion.

The team 's home ballpark is नागरिकों पार्क, स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल गली in southeast d.C., निकट the Anacostia River.
the पार्क खोली in 2008, replacing rfk स्टेडियम, the team 's home from 2005 to 2007.
The Nationals ' name गर्भाशयी इससे the पूर्व वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल टोली कि था the वही नाम ( used interchangeably with Senators ).
Their nickname is `` the nats '' —a shortened संस्करण कि थी भी प्रयुक्त by the बूढ़ा d.C. टीमों.

They were based in Montreal, Quebec, और निभाई उनके घर खेल at jarry पार्क स्टेडियम और बाद in ओलम्पिक स्टेडियम.

The Expos had their highest winning प्रतिशत in the strike-shortened ऋतु of, जब the टोली था the best record in baseball.
The team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan interest to drop off.
