The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises, और the तभी एक in the नेशनल लीग, कि रै never निभाई in a संसार श्रेणी ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is देय तभी if वहीँ is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's सेवाएं तभी if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled out of court....
Contingent fees are प्रायः गणना as a प्रतिशत of the client 's net recovery. ''
In the English legal system, it is generally referred to as no जीत no fee.
A conditional fee अनुबंध between a विधि कड़ और a client.
The usual form of this अनुबंध is कि the solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on the समझना कि if lost, no payment is made.
However, if the मामला is जीती, the वकील होगा be हकदार to the सामान्य शुल्क आधारित on hourly billing, plus a success fee.
The कामयाबी शुल्क in इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no वृहद than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the US, which gives the कामयाब attorney a प्रतिशत of the क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in एहसान of उसके क्लाएंट.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue उनके सिविल अधिकारों चूंकि वरना, to मुकदमा किसी लिये a अपकृत्य, एक जरूर पहला be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue ऐसे वाद in the first place.
However, because of the ऊँची रिस्क, few attorneys होगा लो मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक वे feel the case has good merit.
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer, contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्राज़ील, कनाडा, the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र, फ़्रांस, Greece, Ireland, Japan, New Zealand, the United Kingdom and the United States.
They are भी अनुमत in निजी चोट क्रियाएँ in Lithuania.
Recently, they have महरूम अनुमत in बेल्जियम as well.
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling साथ ', translating the यूनानी ecclesia ) is a समूह of लोगों formally assembled for a special purpose.
Sons of अराजकता is a टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by कर्ट sutter परिचय the जीवनदान of a close-knit गैरकानूनी motorcycle club operating in Charming, a fictional town in California 's Central Valley.

The Grímsvötn sub-glacial झीलों ( ; vötn = `` waters '', एकवचन : ) और the ज्वालामुखी of the same name are in South-East Iceland.
They are in the हाइलैंड्स of आइसलैंड at the northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The lakes are at, at an उन्नयन of.
beneath the झीलों is the मैग्मा कक्ष of the Grímsvötn volcano.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic ज्वालामुखी जिससे रै the उच्चतम फटना आवृत्ति of सब the ज्वालामुखी in Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure फटना of 1783–1784 थी a भाग of the वही फिशर प्रणाली.
Grímsvötn was erupting at the वही समय as laki दौरान 1783, but continued to erupt until 1785.
क्युकी सबसे of the ज्वालामुखी झूठ underneath vatnajökull, सबसे of इसके eruptions have महरूम subglacial और the बातचीत of magma and meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC, an eruption began, with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes, resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in आइसलैंड, और in the संयुक्त किंगडम, ग्रीनलैंड, जर्मनी, Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May.
Until 25 may the फटना स्केल था महरूम larger than कि of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull.
the फटना रोका at 02:40 utc on 25 may 2011, हालांकि वहीँ थी कुछ विस्फोटक कार्यकलाप इससे the tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater.
Vetting is the process of performing a पृष्ठभूमि जाँच on किसी पहले offering उन्हें नियुक्ति, डाक्टरेट an award, etc.
A prospective person or प्रोजेक्ट may be vetted पहले बनाना a भर्ती decision.
In addition, in प्रज्ञा महफ़िल, एसेट हैं vetted to determine their usefulness.

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly harrah 's entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी पब्लिक गेमिंग निगम कि owns और operates over 50 कसीनो, होटल, और सात गोल्फ़ courses under several brands.
The company, based in Paradise, नेवाडा, is the largest गेमिंग कम्पनी in the संसार, साथ सालाना revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).
Caesars is a public company, with a joint venture of अपोलो वैश्विक प्रबन्धन और टेक्सास प्रशांत समूह ownig a large portion of the stack and Blackstone Group also holding a significant stake.
The name change from `` Harrah 's entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars entertainment निगम '' थी बना official on November 23, 2010.
Harrah 's remains a कुंजी ब्रांड in the company.
On November 5, 2010, harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 साझा लकिन retracted इस offering on November 19.
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a Canadian citizen लकिन जो रै महरूम granted अनुमति to सजीव और कार्य in कनाडा बगैर कोई समय सीमा on his or her stay.
A permanent निवासी जरूर सजीव in कनाडा लिये दो सालो आउट of प्रत्येक पाँच or रिस्क losing that status.
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and responsibilities as a Canadian citizen, among others the right to work for any एंटरप्राइज़ as खूब as लिये the संघीय or प्रांतीय सरकारी ( अंतर्गत प्रतिबंध of अभिगम अधिकारों to निश्चित regulated professions ).
The main मतभेद हैं कि निवासियों can नहीं :
vote in चुनावों in कनाडा ;
run for निर्वाचित दफ्तर ;
थाम कनाडाई passports ;
In addition, वे may be अनुमत to जुड़ें कनाडा 's हथियारबंद शक्तियां if the नेशनल ब्याज होता not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents also रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों वचनबद्ध जबकि resident in Canada.
Permanent निवासियों may लागू लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता बाद तीन सालो in कनाडा ; however this is not mandatory.

The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci from her debut on जनवरी 16, 1970 जबतक the पिछला ब्रॉडकास्ट टेलीविज़न एपीसोड aired on सितंबर 23, 2011.

In the u.S., एरिका is माना to be the सबसे लोकप्रिय character in soap opera history.
regarding the north-american मार्केट, tv मार्गदर्शिका काल्स उसके `` unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध साबुन ओपेरा character in the history of daytime TV '', and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time.
A graph of the US CPI इससे 1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ), और इसके प्रतिशत annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in the दाम स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods और सेवाएं खरीदा by households.
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a measure of the average change over समय in the कीमतें सशुल्क by शहरी उपभोक्ता लिये a मार्केट बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods and services. ''
The CPI is a statistical अनुमान constructed using the कीमतें of a नमूना of प्रतिनिधि वस्तुएं whose prices are collected periodically.
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods and services, being combined to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting उनके साझा in the कुल of the उपभोक्ता expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of several price indices गणना by सबसे नेशनल सांख्यिकीय agencies.
The annual प्रतिशत बदलें in a cpi is प्रयुक्त as a measure of inflation.
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e., adjust लिये the प्रभाव of महंगाई ) the रियल मान of मजदूरी, salaries, pensions, लिये regulating कीमतें और लिये deflating monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values.
In most countries, the CPI is, along with the population census and the USA नेशनल आय और उत्पाद खाते, एक of the सबसे closely देखी नेशनल economic statistics.
Knocking on wood, or to touch wood, refers to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally touching/knocking on wood, or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही, in अनुक्रम to avoid `` tempting भाग्य `` बाद बनाना a favourable अवलोकन, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own death.
रॉकर भुजा
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive, marine, motorcycle and प्रत्यागमनी विमानन इंजन, the रॉकर भुजा is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys रेडियल गति इससे the कैम पालि into रैखिक movement at the poppet valve to open it.
One end is raised and lowered by a घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft ( either सीधे or via a tappet ( lifter ) और pushrod ) जबकि the other end acts on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the बाहर of the भुजा, the अंदर दबाता bas on the वाल्व stem, opening the valve.
When the outside of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts रोटेशन, the inside rises, allowing the valve spring to close the valve.
The drive cam is चलित by the camshaft.
इस pushes the रॉकर भुजा up और bas परिचय the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
Friction may be reduced at the point of contact साथ the वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता.
A similar arrangement transfers the motion via another रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता to a second rocker arm.
This rotates about the रॉकर शाफ्ट, और हस्तांतरण the गति via a tappet to the poppet valve.
In this मामला इस opens the सेवन valve to the cylinder head.
The effective leverage of the भुजा ( और यूँ the फ़ोर्स it can exert on the वाल्व स्टेम ) is determined by the rocker arm ratio, the ratio of the distance from the rocker arm 's center of rotation to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current automotive डिज़ाइन favors रॉकर भुजा ratios of परिचय 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the past छोटी धनात्मक ratios ( the वाल्व लिफ्ट is वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used.
Many pre-WW2 इंजन उपयोग 1:1 ( न्यूट्रल ) ratios.
For car engines the rocker arms are generally स्टील stampings, providing a उचित संतुलन of शक्ति, weight and economical cost.
Because the रॉकर बाहें हैं, in भाग, प्रत्यागमनी वज़न, excessive द्रव्यमान विशेषकर at the lever ends limits the engine 's ability to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the लाइट्स गई आउट in जॉर्जिया '' is a दक्षिणी गोथिक सोंग लिखा by songwriter bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence.
Reba mcentire बाद covered it in 1991.
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western studios on सूर्यास्त in हॉलीवुड और released कम than दो सप्ताह बाद in नवम्बर 1972, the सोंग centers around the पुरानी bhai of the narrator, falsely convicted of and executed for a murder, which the narrator herself has committed.
In postal mail, a return address is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the पता of the व्यक्ति sending the संदेश.
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine कैसा to respond to the प्रेषक of the संदेश if needed.
The return address need नहीं शामिल a प्रेषक 's नाम, लकिन चाहिए शामिल पता or p.o. बक्सा विवरण in the same way as the delivery address should.
In some countries, the return address is conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर बाएँ हाथ कोने of the लिफाफा, कार्ड, or लेबल.
In the United किंगडम, the वापसी पता is प्रायः लगाई on the रिवर्स of the envelope, near the top.
व्यवसायों प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे preprinted with a return address.
Many individuals have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted साथ उनके घर address to affix to their correspondence.
Charities sometimes include ऐसे चादरें in mailshots.
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized लेबल्स to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता to छिलके और स्टिक वापसी पता लेबल्स to उनके लिफाफे.
The return पता is नहीं जरूरी on डाक मेल.
However, lack of a वापसी पता रोकता the डाक सेवा इससे होने समर्थ to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; such as from damage, postage due, or invalid destination.
Such मेल may यूँ become dead letter mail.
Should the return address be of a different state or देश, the मेल may be routed through कि स्थान लिये आसानी of वापसी.
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial तंत्रिका graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an कृत्रिम अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to सुकर तंत्रिका regeneration और is एक of अनेक नैदानिक treatments for nerve injuries.
When direct suturing of the two आउट of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता बगैर टेंशन, the मानक नैदानिक उपचार for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting.
Due to the limited उपलब्धता of दाता ऊतक और कार्यात्मक रिकवरी in autologous तंत्रिका कलम, neural ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी शोध रै केन्द्रित on the विकास of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, especially for large defects.
Similar तकनीकों हैं भी होने छान लिये तंत्रिका मरम्मत in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन system poses a greater challenge because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment.
The creation of artificial conduits is भी ज्ञात as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends और intervening गैप हैं enclosed भीतर a ट्यूब composed of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, सिंथेटिक ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit, it चाहिए सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal और distal ends of the तंत्रिका gap, block external inhibitory factors, and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most मौलिक उद्देश्य of a तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduit is to combine शारीरिक, रासायनिक, and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation.
Materials that have been used to मेक biologic tubes शामिल रक्त बरतन और skeletal मांसपेशियां, जबकि nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively.
tissue-engineered तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduits हैं a संयोजन of अनेक तत्व : scaffold ढांचा, scaffold material, cellular therapies, neurotrophic factors and biomimetic materials.
The choice of which physical, chemical and biological cues to उपयोग is आधारित on the गुण of the तंत्रिका पर्यावरण, which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration.
The factors that control material selection include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability दौरान तंत्रिका विकास, implantation और नसबंदी.
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series produced by RDF USA ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for truTV about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry और ऋण, a family-owned साहूकार दूकान स्तिथ at 20450 greenfield सड़क, between 8 मील सड़क और the जॉन C. आवास फ्रीवे in डेट्रॉयट, Michigan.
The series premiered on August 16, 2010, delivering दो लाख दर्शक, सेटिंग a रिकार्ड as trutv 's most-watched series premiere ever.
amoxicillin bp
amoxicillin ( इन ), formerly amoxycillin ( बैन ), और abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is usually the drug of choice within the क्लास क्युकी it is बेहतर अवशोषित, following मौखिक प्रशासन, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
amoxicillin is एक of the सबसे आम एंटीबायोटिक विहित for children.
The drug became उपलब्धियाँ in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु, जिससे हैं resistant to a व्यापक वर्णक्रम of β-lactam antibiotics, such as penicillin.
लिये इस कारण, it is प्रायः संयुक्त साथ clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases प्रभावकारिता by reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके सेवा as the 37th वाइस President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is एक of तभी चार लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a डेमोक्रेट इससे टेक्सास, परोसा as a संयुक्त राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, जॉनसन थी पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही, जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over बैरी Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों, पब्लिक प्रसारण, medicare, medicaid, पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा, सहायता to शिक्षा, और उसके `` युद्ध on गरीबी. ''
जॉनसन थी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared और the सलाम प्रक्रम bogged bas.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, और अपराधों दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे लिये `` विधि और अनुक्रम '' policies.
The लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी विभाजित in अनेक feuding गिरोहों, और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended his bid for reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to succeed him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त राज्य after the New Deal era.
जॉनसन is क्रमित favorably by some historians because of his domestic policies.
The Big Bang Theory cast at कॉमिक कॉन 2009, इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर, साइमन helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The अमरीकी sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; पैनी, a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been प्रचारित to अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग टाइम्स, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी, और former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका in a छोटी समूह of एपीसोड.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स for secession.
confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the संघ जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Human evolution refers to the विकासवादी प्रक्रम अग्रणी up to the रूप of modern humans.
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life, the topic usually covers only the evolutionary history of primates, in particular the genus होमो, और the emergence of होमो sapiens as a पृथक प्रजाति of hominids ( or `` ग्रेट apes '' ).
The study of human evolution involves many scientific disciplines, including physical मानवशास्त्र, primatology, पुरातत्व, भाषाविज्ञान, विकासवादी मनोविज्ञान, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged इससे अन्य स्तनधारियों परिचय in the लेट cretaceous काल, and the earliest fossils appear in the Paleocene, around.
The परिवार मानवनुमा diverged इससे the hylobatidae ( गिबन ) परिवार 15-20 लाख सालो ago, and around, the Ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged from the Hominidae family.
Bipedalism is the मौलिक adaption of the hominin लकीर, और the earliest bipedal hominin is माना to be either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin, with Ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged around the वही समय, परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले, और either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them.
The early bipedals आखिरकार विकसित into the australopithecines और बाद the genus Homo.
The earliest documented members of the genus Homo हैं होमो habilis जिससे विकसित around ; the earliest प्रजाति लिये जिससे वहीँ is धनात्मक प्रमाण of उपयोग of stone tools.
The brains of these early hominins यहूद परिचय the वही आकार as कि of a चिंपैंजी.
During the next million years a process of encephalization began, और साथ the आगमन of होमो इरेक्टस in the चट्टान रिकार्ड, cranial क्षमता had doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and होमो ergaster यहूद the पहला of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी, और ये प्रजाति स्प्रेड through अफ़्रीकी, Asia, and Europe between.
It is believed कि ये प्रजाति यहूद the पहला to उपयोग fire and complex tools.
According to the Recent अफ़्रीकी ancestry सिद्धान्त, आधुनिक इंसानो विकसित in अफ़्रीकी संभवतः इससे होमो heidelbergensis, होमो rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor और migrated आउट of the महाद्वीप कुछ 50,000 to 100,000 सालो पहले, replacing लोकल populations of Homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis.
Archaic Homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो, विकसित between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago.
Recent DNA प्रमाण suggests कि अनेक haplotypes of neanderthal उत्पत्ति हैं उपस्थित among सब non-african populations, और neanderthals और अन्य hominids, ऐसे as Denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of their genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic, about 200,000 years ago.
the परिवर्तन to behavioral आधुनिकता साथ the विकास of सांकेतिक संस्कृति, भाषा, और specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 years ago according to many anthropologists although some suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span.
Lisa Cuddy, m.d., is a fictional अक्षर on the फॉक्स संजाल medical drama House.
She is portrayed by लिसा edelstein.
Cuddy was the Dean of आयुर्विज्ञान और हॉस्पिटल व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro शिक्षण हॉस्पिटल in New Jersey.
She also becomes House 's love interest through the सालो to प्रारंभ a संबंध साथ उसे in season seven.
Cuddy quit her job after the events of ऋतु सात 's finale `` चलती on ``.
Track and field is a खेल comprising विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं based on running, jumping, and throwing.
The name of the खेल गर्भाशयी इससे the प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a स्टेडियम साथ an ओवल कार्यशील track around a grass field.
The throwing and jumping कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस in the सेंट्रल enclosed area.
Track and field falls under the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स, जिससे भी शामिल सड़क कार्यशील, क्रॉस देश running, and race walking.
The two most prestigious international track and फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं हैं आयोजित अंतर्गत the ध्वज of एथलेटिक्स : the एथलेटिक्स प्रतियोगिता at the ओलम्पिक खेल और the आइएएएफ World Championships in Athletics.
The International Association of एथलेटिक्स federations is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय शासी देह लिये track and field.
Track and फ़ील्ड कार्यक्रम हैं generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ एथलीट चुनौतीपूर्ण each other to decide a single victor.
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest time, while the कूद और फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the खिलाड़ी जो रै हासिल the greatest distance or height in the contest.
The running events are categorised as sprints, मध्य और long-distance कार्यक्रम, relays, and hurdling.
नियमित कूद कार्यक्रम शामिल long जम्प, ट्रिपल जम्प, ऊँची जम्प और ध्रुव वॉल्ट, जबकि the most common throwing events are shot put, javelin, discus and hammer.
There are also `` combined events '', ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon, in जिससे एथलीट compete in a क्रमांक of the ऊपर events.
रिकॉर्ड हैं रखा of the बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in विशिष्ट कार्यक्रम, at world and national levels, right down to a personal level.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the event 's rules or regulations, वे हैं disqualified इससे the प्रतियोगिता और उनके marks हैं erased.
In North America, the term track और फ़ील्ड may be प्रयुक्त to refer to एथलेटिक्स in सामान्य, बल्कि than specifically track and field events.
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स इससे 34 राष्ट्र led by the संयुक्त राज्य, विरूद्ध इराकी in जवाब to इराकी 's आक्रमण और annexation of Kuwait.
the युद्ध is भी ज्ञात अंतर्गत अन्य names, ऐसे as the पारसी गल्फ युद्ध, पहला गल्फ युद्ध, गल्फ युद्ध i, or the पहला इराकी युद्ध, पहले the पद `` इराकी युद्ध '' became पहचाना instead with the 2003 Iraq War ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ).
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 अगस्त 1990 थी मिले साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय condemnation, और brought तात्कालिक आर्थिक sanctions against Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President George H. W. Bush तैनात u.S. शक्तियां into सऊदी अरब, और urged अन्य देशों to भेजें उनके अपना शक्तियां to the scene.
An array of राष्ट्र joined the गठबन्धन.
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were from the U.S., with Saudi अरब, the संयुक्त किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता, in कि order.
Saudi Arabia सशुल्क around us $ 36 अरब of the us $ 60 billion cost.
The war was marked by the beginning of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने लाइनों of the लड़ो, साथ the primacy of the u.S. संजाल CNN.
The war has also earned the उपनाम वीडियो खेल युद्ध बाद the रोज़ ब्रॉडकास्ट बिंब on फलक the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm.
The initial conflict to expel इराकी सैनिकों इससे कुवैत began साथ an aerial बमबारी on 17 जनवरी 1991.
This was followed by a मैदान उत्पीड़न on 24 February.
This थी a निर्णायक विजय लिये the गठबन्धन शक्तियां, जो liberated कुवैत and advanced into Iraqi territory.
The Coalition ceased उनके अग्रिम, और घोषित a cease-fire 100 hours after the ground campaign started.
aerial और मैदान कॉम्बैट थी confined to इराकी, कुवैत, and areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
Iraq launched scud मिसाइलें विरूद्ध गठबन्धन सैन्य लक्ष्य in सऊदी Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in American usage, is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य Mint.
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % निकल, the टुकड़ा रै महरूम struck since 1866.
the चांदी हाफ dime, बराबर to पाँच सेंट, था महरूम issued since the 1790s.
The American Civil War caused economic hardship, driving gold and चांदी इससे परिसंचरण ; in जवाब, in प्लेस of low-value सिक्के, the government at first issued paper currency.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद स्पेंसर M. क्लार्क, सिर of the करेंसी ब्यूरो ( आज the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण ), लगाई his own portrait on the denomination.
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces, without अनमोल मेटल, कॉंग्रेस भी प्राधिकृत a five-cent टुकड़ा consisting of आधार मेटल ; the मिंट began striking इस संस्करण in 1866.
The initial design of the शील्ड निकल थी struck जबतक 1883, तब replaced by the Liberty Head nickel.
The भैंस निकल थी introduced in 1913 as भाग of a ड्राइव to बढ़ाएँ the beauty of American coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 और 2005, खास डिजाइन in सम्मान of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using जेफरसन निकल पंक्तियां फेलिक्स schlag 's असली रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ), although a new obverse, by Jamie Franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it लागत अधिक than ग्यारह सेंट to उपज a निकल ; the मिंट is exploring the सम्भावना of reducing cost by using less expensive metals.
A poster with flowers or clusters of flowers उत्पादित by बारह प्रजाति of flowering पौधे इससे अलग families
A flower, sometimes ज्ञात as a खिलते or खिलना, is the reproductive ढांचा मिला in flowering पौधे ( पौधे of the division Magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms ).
The biological फलन of a पुष्प is to प्रभाव जनन, प्रायः by providing a यांत्रिकी लिये the union of sperm with eggs.
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a जनसांख्यिकी ) or allow selfing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडा इससे the वही flower ).
Some पुष्प उपज diaspores बगैर fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the साईट जहाँ gametophytes develop.
Flowers दे वृद्धि to फल और seeds.
Many flowers have evolved to be आकर्षक to पशु, so as to कारण उन्हें to be vectors for the transfer of pollen.
In addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering पौधे, पुष्प have long महरूम admired और प्रयुक्त by इंसानो to beautify उनके पर्यावरण, और भी as वस्तुएँ of रोमांस, अनुष्ठान, धर्म, medicine and as a source of food.
The McDonnell डगलस ( अभी बोइंग ) f-15 त्रिभुज is a twin-engine, all-weather रणनीतिक सेनानी designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat.
It is considered among the most कामयाब आधुनिक सेनानी, साथ over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट victories with no losses in dogfights.
Following reviews of proposals, the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स चयनित mcdonnell डगलस ' डिज़ाइन in 1967 to मिलें the सेवा 's need लिये a समर्पित air superiority fighter.
The Eagle पहला उड़ाया in जुलाई 1972, और डाला service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the त्रिभुज रै महरूम exported to इसराईल, जापानी, सऊदी Arabia, and other nations.
The f-15 थी originally envisioned as a pure एयर बड़प्पन aircraft.
Its design included a secondary ground-attack काबिलियत कि थी largely unused.
The design proved flexible पर्याप्त कि an all-weather स्ट्राइक डेरिवेटिव, the f-15e स्ट्राइक Eagle, was later developed, and entered service in 1989.
the f-15 त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in service with the U.S. Air Force past 2025.
Mimio is a brand name of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद aimed at the education market.
The primary products are focused around कंप्यूटर whiteboard इंटरैक्टिव शिक्षण डिवाइस.
MimioCapture devices also allow उपयोक्ता to कैप्चर सब of the स्याही स्ट्रोक्स कि हैं लिखा on the whiteboard.
When used in conjunction with a video प्रोजेक्टर it turns the ordinary whiteboard सतह into a fully इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard.
The product लकीर थी originally designed by आभासी Ink.
On October 4, 2006 Newell rubbermaid acquired the mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb ) उत्पाद line.
Rahab of जेरिको
Rahab, ( ; ; ) थी, according to the किताब of जोशुआ, a स्त्री जो जिया in जेरिको in the promised जमीन और assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly all अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of जोशुआ describe उसके as a harlot or prostitute.
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización de los estados americanos, पुर्तगाली : organização डॉस estados americanos, फ्रेंच : संगठन des États américains ), or the OAS, is a regional international organization.
The OAS थी संस्थापित on 30 अप्रैल 1948, और रै इसके मुख्यालय in Washington, D.C., United States.
Its members हैं the 35 स्वतंत्र राज्य of the Americas.
Since 26 May 2005, the Secretary सामान्य of oas रै महरूम जोस मिगुएल insulza.
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : cristóbal colón ; पुर्तगाली : cristóvão कोलोन ; पहले 31 अक्तूबर 145120 may 1506 ) थी an इतालवी एक्सप्लोरर, नाविक, और colonizer, born in the गणतंत्र of Genoa, in what is today northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the Catholic monarchs of स्पेन, he समाप्त चार voyages आरपार the अटलांटिक समंदर कि led to सामान्य यूरोपीय awareness of the American continents.
those voyages, और उसके प्रयत्न to स्थापित स्थाई settlements on the island of Hispaniola, initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World.
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking माल through the स्थापना of व्यापार रूट और colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे प्रस्ताव, to पहुँचें the ईस्ट इंडीज by sailing westward, आखिरकार प्राप्त the support of the स्पेनी क्राउन, जिससे देखी in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia.
During his पहला voyage in 1492, बजाय of reaching जापानी as he था intended, कोलंबस landed in the Bahamas archipelago, at a locale he named San Salvador.
Over the course of three more voyages, Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser Antilles, as well as the caribbean coast of वेनेजुएला और सेंट्रल अमेरिका, claiming उन्हें लिये the स्पेनी Empire.
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer to reach the Americas ( having been preceded by the Norse expedition led by leif ericson in the 11th सदी ), कोलंबस 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय सम्पर्क साथ the americas, inaugurating a काल of यूरोपीय खोजी, conquest, and colonization that lasted for several centuries.
They had, therefore, an enormous impact in the ऐतिहासिक विकास of the आधुनिक पश्चिमी संसार.
कोलंबस खुद देखी उसके accomplishments primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the Christian religion.
Never admitting that he had reached a continent previously अनजान to europeans, बल्कि than the ईस्ट इंडीज he था नियत आउट लिये, कोलंबस पुकारा the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial प्रशासकों in अमेरिका led to उसके गिरफ़्तार और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला in 1500, और बाद to protracted वाद over the लाभ जिससे कोलंबस और his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the Boxer is a नस्ल of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; रंगों हैं fawn or brindled, साथ or बगैर श्वेत markings, which may cover the entire body.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad, short skulls ), and have a square muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), बहुत दमदार जबड़े, और a शक्तिशाली काटना आदर्श लिये फांसी on to विशाल prey.
The boxer थी करवाया इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल और the अभी विलुप्त bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser group.
Boxers were first exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895, the first Boxer club being founded the next year.
आधारित on 2012 अमरीकी kennel क्लबों आंकडे, मुक्केबाज held steady as the seventh most popular breed of dog in the United States for the third consecutive year.
सीरियल ata ( sata ) is a कंप्यूटर बस इंटरफ़ेस कि connects host bus adapters to mass storage devices such as hard disk drives and optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the पुरानी at अनुलग्नक मानक ( ata ; बाद referred to as समानांतर ata or pata ), offering अनेक लाभ over the पुरानी इंटरफ़ेस : घटाया केबल आकार और लागत ( सात conductors बजाय of 40 ), देशी hot swapping, तेज़ आंकड़ा transfer through higher signalling rates, and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed सीरियल केबल over दो pairs of conductors.
In contrast, parallel ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ATA specifications ) used a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और कंट्रोल सिग्नल, सब ऑपरेटिंग at much निम्नतर आवृत्ति.
to ensure पिछड़ा संगतता साथ विरासत ata तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग, SATA uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
sata रै replaced समानांतर ata in उपभोक्ता डेस्कटॉप और लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर, और रै largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications.
SATA 's मार्केट share in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट थी 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded अनुप्रयोग कि उपयोग compactflash भंडार, भी हालांकि the नई cfast मानक is based on SATA.
Serial ATA उद्योग संगतता विशेषताएँ originate इससे the सीरियल ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय Organization ( aka.
SATA-IO, serialata.org ).
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, और publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ, the परीक्षण मामले, and plug-fests.
As with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA content ownership is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें : primarily the incits t13 उपसमिति ata, the incits t10 उपसमिति ( scsi ) ; a subgroup of t10 जिम्मेदार लिये सीरियल संलग्न scsi ( SAS ).
the पूरा specification from SATA-IO.
The remainder of this article होगा कोशिश to उपयोग the शब्दावली और विशेषताएँ of sata-io.
The इतिहास of the अंतरजाल began साथ the विकास of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the दूसरी piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched संजाल ऐसे as arpanet, चिह्नित i at npl in the uk, cyclades, मेरिट संजाल, tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The ARPANET in particular led to the विकास of प्रोटोकॉल लिये internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, and consequently, the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected tcp/ip संजाल, पुकारा the अंतरजाल, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf ) विकसित the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on संस्कृति और कॉमर्स, सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल, तत्काल messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन calls '', two-way interactive video calls, and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vbns ), internet2, और National LambdaRail.
increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, चलित by कभी वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना, कॉमर्स, entertainment, and social networking.
the तोहफा is the दूसरी एल्बम by स्कॉटिश सिंगर सुसान बॉयल, which was released on 8 November 2010.
Boyle hinted that the album has a 1960s feel `` क्युकी कि थी [ उसके ] era ''.

`` This Is Just To Say '' ( 1934 ) is a प्रसिद्ध imagist कविता by विलियम कार्लोस Williams.
Professor Albus Percival Wulfric ब्रायन डम्बल्डोर is a प्रमुख अक्षर और समर्थक of J. K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
For most of the series, he is the हेडमास्टर of the wizarding स्कूल हॉग्वार्ट्स.
As भाग of उसके backstory, it is नाज़िल कि he is the संस्थापक और नेता of the अनुक्रम of the फीनिक्स, an संगठन समर्पित to लड़ the प्रमुख विपक्षी of the श्रेणी, Lord Voldemort.
Dumbledore is portrayed by रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of हैरी कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
After हैरिस ' मौत, माइकल gambon portrayed Dumbledore for all of the remaining films.
Rowling stated she chose the name डम्बल्डोर, जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लिये `` bumblebee ``, क्युकी of डम्बल्डोर 's प्रेम of म्यूज़िक : वो imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot ''.
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone that is उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( भी ज्ञात as c-cells ) of the थायराइड, और in अनेक other animals in the ultimobranchial body.
it अधिनियमों to reduce रक्त कैल्सियम ( ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ).
Calcitonin रै महरूम मिला in मछली, सरीसृपों, birds, and mammals.
Its importance in humans has not महरूम as खूब स्थापित as इसके महत्व in अन्य पशु, as इसके फलन is प्रायः नहीं significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis.
It belongs to calcitonin-like प्रोटीन परिवार.
A mousepad साथ a padded कलाई बाकी.
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( uk ) is a सतह लिये रखकर और चलती a कंप्यूटर mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the चूहा compared to using a चूहा सीधे on a तालिका by providing a सतह to allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप गति accurately and without jitter.
Some mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded कलाई rest.
The स्टेडियम देखी इससे ऊपर in 1980
दिसम्बर 29, 2002 implosion
the riverfront स्टेडियम साईट in जून, 2006.
इस फ़ोटो थी लिया इससे the पश्चिमी concourse of Great American Ball Park.
A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by the लाल ' हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय और प्रमुख गली, जिससे थी विस्तारित जब the new park was built.
The Cincinnati Bengals ' पॉल भूरा स्टेडियम is in the distance.
Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ), थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी लाल नेशनल लीग बेसबॉल टोली और the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team.
Located on the Ohio River in downtown सिनसिनाटी, the स्टेडियम थी बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the घर of `` the बिग रेड यंत्र ``, as the लाल यहूद प्रायः पुकारा in the 1970s.
निर्माण began on फ़रवरी 1, 1968, और थी समाप्त at a cost of less than $ 50 million.
On June 30, 1970, the लाल hosted the अटलांटा braves in उनके ग्रैंड खोलने, with Hank Aaron hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront.
Two weeks बाद on जुलाई 14, 1970, riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख League Baseball All-Star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed टक्कर at घर थाली between लाल स्टार पीट रोज़ और catcher रे fosse of the क्लीवलैंड Indians.
In September 1996, Riverfront Stadium was renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a प्रायोजन सौदे साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's उर्जा कम्पनी, cinergy निगम.
In 2001, to make room for Great American बॉल पार्क, the seating क्षमता at cinergy फ़ील्ड थी घटाया to 39,000.
There was a huge wall in Center Field दृश्य बाद the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
The स्टेडियम थी demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer, headquartered in Yangsan, South gyeongsang प्रांत, और सियोल, दोनो in दक्षिण Korea.
इसके प्रमुख घरेलू प्रतिस्पर्धी हैं hankook Tire and Kumho Tires.
The company 's name is reflected in the कम्पनी स्लोगन, `` Next Century Tire. ''
The silent बहुमत is an अनिर्दिष्ट विशाल बहुमत of लोगों in a देश or समूह जो do not express their opinions publicly.
The term was popularized ( though not first used ) by U.S. President रिचर्ड निक्सन in a नवम्बर 3, 1969, वाक in जिससे he कहा, `` और so tonight—to तुम, the ग्रेट मूक बहुमत of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join in the large demonstrations against the वियतनाम युद्ध at the समय, जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the counterculture, और जो किया नहीं participate in पब्लिक प्रवचन.
Nixon along with many others saw this group of मध्य अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया by the अधिक गायन अल्पसंख्यक.
The phrase थी प्रयुक्त in the 19th सदी as a प्रेयोक्ति referring to सब the लोगों जो have died, और अन्य have used it before and after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world.
sam, a rhesus मंकी, उड़ाया to an altitude of 88 km in 1959.

Before humans went into space, several animals were launched into space, सहित numerous बंदरों, so कि वैज्ञानिकों could investigate the biological प्रभाव of space travel.
The United राज्य शुभारम्भ फ़्लाइट containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985.
France शुभारम्भ दो monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट in 1967.
The सोवियत संघ और रूस शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 and 1996.
Most monkeys यहूद anesthetized पहले lift-off.
Overall thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया in the स्पेस कार्यक्रम ; none flew more than once.
Numerous back-up बंदरों भी गई through the कार्यक्रम लकिन never flew.
Monkeys from several species were used, सहित rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus बंदरों, गिलहरी बंदरों, and pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes बल्कि than बंदरों ) यहूद भी प्रयुक्त.
RAID ( अनावश्यक सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क, originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive डिस्क ) is a storage technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed across the drives in one of अनेक तरीके पुकारा `` रेड स्तर '', depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक और प्रदर्शन जरूरी.
The term `` RAID '' was first defined by David पैटरसन, garth A. गिब्सन, और रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Berkeley in 1987.
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers later attempted to reinvent the पद to describe a अनावश्यक सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क as a अर्थात् of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology.
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage योजनाएं कि can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक शारीरिक ड्राइव : रेड is an उदाहरण of भंडार आभासीकरण और the सरणी can be पहुँचा by the operating system as one single drive.
The different schemes or architectures हैं नामित by the शब्द रेड followed by a क्रमांक ( e.g. RAID 0, RAID 1 ).
Each scheme provides a अलग संतुलन between the कुंजी लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता और उपलब्धता, performance and capacity.
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide सुरक्षा विरूद्ध unrecoverable ( सेक्टर ) पढ़ा त्रुटियाँ, as खूब as whole disk failure.
A lymphocyte is a type of white रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा system.
Under the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं और b कोशिकाएं.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 अंधेरा कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by जोएल और Ethan Coen.
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff Lebowski, an बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स slacker और avid बॉलर, nicknamed `` The Dude. ''
बाद a मामला of mistaken पहचान, the यार is introduced to a करोड़पति also named Jeffrey Lebowski.
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he आयोग the यार to उद्धार the फिरौती to सुरक्षित उसके रिलीज.
The plan goes awry when The Dude 's friend वाल्टर sobchak ( जॉन गुडमैन ) योजनाएं to रखना the पूरा ransom.
स्टीव buscemi, फिलिप seymour हॉफमन, दाउद huddleston, julianne मूर, tara reid, और जॉन turturro भी स्टार in the फिल्मी, जिससे is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '', played by Sam Elliott.
The film is loosely inspired by the कार्य of रेमंड चांडलर.
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler kind of story – how it moves episodically, and deals with the characters trying to सुलझाना a रहस्य, as खूब as having a hopelessly जटिल प्लाट कि 's ultimately महत्वहीन. ''
The original स्कोर थी रचित by कार्टर burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
The Big lebowski थी a निराशा at the u.S. बक्सा दफ्तर और प्राप्त mixed reviews at the time of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time, and the फिल्मी रै become a cult पसंदीदा, विख्यात लिये इसके idiosyncratic वर्ण, सपना sequences, unconventional संवाद, and eclectic soundtrack.
Severus Snape is a fictional अक्षर in the हैरी कुम्हार किताब series written by J.K. Rowling.
In the first novel of the series, he is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up to be the प्राथमिक विपक्षी until the final chapters.
As the series progresses, snape 's अक्षर becomes अधिक परतदार और जटिल.
Rowling करता नहीं fully खुलासा the विवरण of उसके सच्चा loyalties जबतक the end of the final book, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
Over the course of the series, Snape 's portrayal evolves इससे कि of a दुर्भावनापूर्ण और दलगत टीचर to कि of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches potions at हॉग्वार्ट्स, हालांकि in the छठे अनोखा he सिखाती रक्षा विरूद्ध the अंधेरा कला, a स्थिति which he was known to have desired throughout the series.
He ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर of हॉग्वार्ट्स in the फाइनल अनोखा.
रोलिंग रै वर्णित उसे as `` a तोहफा of a character ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn खाना of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is आम in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य और मुख्यतः खाया at breakfast.
Modern grits हैं commonly बना of alkali-treated मकई known as hominy.
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges इससे around the संसार ऐसे as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have महरूम processed to speed cooking.
The word `` grits '' derives from the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी शब्द `` grytt, '' अर्थ coarse meal.
This word originally referred to गेहूं और अन्य porridges अभी ज्ञात as groats in भाग of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in Europe in the मध्य आयु, is a खाना निकला इससे मकई ( a नई संसार संयंत्र ) और `` मकई '' had been used to describe wheat products in many European regions.
`` Grits '' may be either एकवचन or बहुवचन ; historically, in the अमरीकी दक्षिण the शब्द थी invariably एकवचन notwithstanding इसके बहुवचन रूप ( cf. ऐसे खाना names as `` स्पघेटी '' or `` linguine '', likewise plural in form, but singular in use ).
Sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( from a देशी अमरीकी muskogee शब्द ).
In molecular जीवविज्ञान, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a हार्मोन produced by the fertilized egg after conception.
Later दौरान गर्भावस्था it is बना by the विकासशील placenta, और बाद by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors उपज इस हार्मोन ; इसलिए, elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not ज्ञात whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य चूंकि कूच 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is तब बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers शामिल coca-cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company रै, on अवसर, introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the कोक ब्रांड name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola, आहार कोक caffeine-free, coca-cola चेरी, coca-cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान brand.
An ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता, जो is चार्ज साथ representing the रूचि of the पब्लिक by investigating और संबोधित शिकायत of maladministration or violation of rights.
In some countries an Inspector General, Citizen एडवोकेट or अन्य आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य समान to those of a नेशनल ombudsman, और may also be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or municipal government, and unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by, or भी कार्य लिये, a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a समाचारपत्र, लिये an ngo, or लिये a पेशेवर regulatory body.
Whether appointed by the विधानमंडल, the कार्यपालिका, or an संगठन ( or, कम अक्सर, निर्वाचित by the constituency कि he or वो serves ), the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman हैं to investigate शिकायत और attempt to निराकरण them, usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation.
Ombudsmen sometimes also aim to पहचानो प्रणालीगत मुद्दे अग्रणी to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches of people 's rights.
At the national level, most ombudsmen have a चौड़ी जनादेश to सौदे साथ the संपूर्ण पब्लिक सेक्टर, और sometimes भी तत्व of the निजी सेक्टर ( लिये उदाहरण, contracted service providers ).
In some मामले, वहीँ is a अधिक प्रतिबंधित जनादेश, लिये उदाहरण साथ particular sectors of society.
अधिक हाल developments have शामिल the सृष्टि of specialised Children 's Ombudsman and Information Commissioner agencies.
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national government is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g. the संयुक्त किंगडम संसदीय कमिश्नर लिये प्रशासन, और the पश्चिमी ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य ombudsman ).
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing साथ कथित maladministration to promoting और protecting इंसान अधिकारों, the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution.
The post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century been instituted by सबसे सरकारें और by कुछ intergovernmental संगठन ऐसे as the European Union.
बनाना a शिकायत to an ombudsman is usually free of charge.

New England is a region in the northeastern कोने of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of the छह राज्य of maine, नई हैम्पशायर, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and Connecticut.
New इंग्लैण्ड is bordered by नई यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम, और नई Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in North अमेरिका, तीर्थयात्रियों इससे इंग्लैण्ड पहला settled in नई इंग्लैण्ड in 1620, to रूप plymouth उपनिवेश.
Ten years later, the puritans settled उत्तर of plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन, यूँ forming मैसाचुसेट्स Bay Colony.
Over the next 130 years, New England fought in four French और भारतीय युद्धों, जबतक the अंग्रेजों पराजित the फ्रेंच और उनके देशी allies in उत्तर America.
In the late 18th century, the New England colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's प्रयत्न to थोपने नई कर without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party was a विरोध to जिससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन responded साथ a श्रेणी of दंडात्मक कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government, which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड in वसन्त 1776, और the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in July 1776.
Some of the पहला आंदोलनों of अमरीकी साहित्य, दर्शनशास्त्र, और शिक्षा originated in New England.
The region played a prominent role in the गति to abolish गुलामी, और थी the पहला प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य to be रूपांतरित by the Industrial Revolution.
Today, New England is a major world center of शिक्षा, ऊँची प्रौद्योगिकी, बीमे, और आयुर्विज्ञान.
Boston is its cultural, financial, शैक्षणिक, चिकित्सा और परिवहन center.
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों, जिससे हैं प्रायः governed by town meeting.
the तभी unincorporated territory in New England exists in the sparse, northern regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, and Maine.
Since 1970, voters have more often supported liberal उम्मीदवार at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर than those of कोई अन्य प्रदेश in the संयुक्त राज्य.
New England is the only one of the United States Census Bureau 's nine regional विभाजन जिनकी नाम करता नहीं derive इससे इसके भूगोल, और it is the तभी multi-state प्रदेश साथ साफ, सतत boundaries.
It maintains a strong sense of cultural identity नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश, हालांकि the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः लडे, combining puritanism साथ उदारतावाद, कृषिक जीवन साथ उद्योग, and isolation with immigration.

is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि combines the चिकित्सा drama and action-adventure genres.
It was produced by Mark VII Limited और वितरित by सार्वभौमिक studios.
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on एनबीसी, replacing the दो short-lived श्रेणी the साझेदार और the शुभ जीवन, और भागा जबतक September 3, 1977, with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years.

was created and produced by Jack webb और रॉबर्ट A. cinader, दोनो of जिसको यहूद भी जिम्मेदार for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet.
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य, भाग of कनाडा और three countries in South America.
Places that use Eastern Standard समय ( est ) जब observing मानक समय ( autumn/winter ) हैं 5 घंटों पीछे समन्वित Universal Time ( ).
Eastern Daylight Time ( edt ), जब observing daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों पीछे Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
In the northern parts of the time zone, during the दूसरी संडे in कूच, at 2:00 a.m. est, घड़ियाँ हैं उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
During the first Sunday in November, at 2:00 a.m. EDT, clocks are moved वापस to 1:00 a.m. est, यूँ `` duplicating '' one hour.
दक्षिणी भाग of the मण्डल ( पनामा और the caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving.
Standard रूप of the आवधिक table.
The colors represent अलग श्रेणी of तत्व explained below.
The आवधिक तालिका is a table प्रदर्शक of the रासायनिक तत्व, व्यवस्थित on the आधार of उनके atomic numbers, electron configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
Elements हैं प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व, positioned ऊपर a छोटी double row of elements.
The table can भी be deconstructed into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of ये having names ऐसे as the हैलोजन्स or the प्रतिष्ठित गैसों.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, कोई ऐसे तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the गुण of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, और such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors मौजूद, dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed उसके तालिका to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some गुण of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be expected to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since महरूम विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम खोजा or synthesized.
The elements इससे 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally, हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
The तत्व बाद 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is होने धड़ा, साथ the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन होने a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally निर्मित by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus `` पायदान '' Persson and later developed and published by Mojang.
It थी सरेआम released लिये the pc on may 17, 2009, as a developmental अल्फा संस्करण और, बाद क्रमिक updates, was published as a full release version on November 18, 2011.
A version for Android was released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर 7, और an आईओएस संस्करण थी released on नवम्बर 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the खेल थी released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game, co-developed by 4J Studios.
All versions of minecraft प्राप्त आवधिक updates.
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow खिलाड़ी to निर्माण constructions आउट of textured घन in a 3d procedurally उत्पन्न संसार.
अन्य क्रियाएँ in the खेल शामिल खोजी, gathering resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal modes : survival, which requires खिलाड़ी to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; और रचनात्मक, जहाँ खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of संसाधन, the ability to fly, and no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named हार्डकोर is the वही as अस्तित्व, differing तभी in परेशानी ; it is नियत to hardest setting and respawning is disabled, forcing players to delete their worlds upon death.
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the नवीनता पुरस्कार, बेहतरीन downloadable खेल पुरस्कार, और the बेहतरीन डेब्यू खेल पुरस्कार इससे the खेल डेवलपर चुनाव पुरस्कार ; और the दर्शक पुरस्कार, as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, Minecraft was awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक पुरस्कार in the श्रेणी बेहतरीन Downloadable Game.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on pc और as of जनवरी 22, 2013, over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार सब प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film निर्देशित, उत्पादित, और co-written by क्रिस्टोफर नोलन.
Based on the DC Comics अक्षर बैटमैन, the फिल्मी is the दूसरी भाग of नोलन 's बैटमैन फिल्मी श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman, with a returning डाल of माइकल caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth, गेरी oldman as जेम्स गॉर्डन और मॉर्गन फ्रीमैन as लुसियस फॉक्स.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and the consort of Bruce वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ), जो joins बैटमैन और the पुलिस in combating the नई उठती threat of a दण्ड मास्टरमाइंड कॉलिंग खुद `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's comic book debut in 1940, the 1988 ग्राफिक अनोखा, और the 1996 श्रेणी, जिससे retold two-face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to बैटमैन in बैटमैन no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी लिखा by विधेयक उंगली.
The अंधेरा नाईट थी फिल्माया primarily in शिकागो, as खूब as in अनेक other locations in the United States, the United Kingdom, and Hong Kong.
Nolan used an imax कैमरा to फिल्मी कुछ sequences, सहित the Joker 's first appearance in the film.
On January 22, 2008, some months after he had completed filming on The Dark Knight and six महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's रिलीज, झाड़ लेजर died इससे a विषाक्त संयोजन of नुस्खा दवाएँ, अग्रणी to intense attention from the press and movie-going public.
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The Dark Knight, developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen गोलियाँ of लेजर as the जोकर, लकिन बाद लेजर 's मौत, the स्टुडियो refocused इसके promotional अभियान.
The Dark Knight was released on July 16, 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, on जुलाई 18, 2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका, और on जुलाई 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever made, the फिल्मी प्राप्त अत्यधिक धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत numerous रिकॉर्ड दौरान इसके theatrical run.
With over $ 1 अरब in आय विश्वव्यापी, it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time, unadjusted for inflation.
The film received आठ अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations ; it जीती the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन और लेजर थी मरणोपरांत awarded Best Supporting Actor.
The Dark Knight Rises, the final part of the त्रयी, थी released on जुलाई 20, 2012.
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio, the प्रौद्योगिकी और कार्यक्रम कि उत्पादित यंत्र कि उपयोग रेडियो लहरें और क्रियाएँ कि लोगों undertook.
Later, the history is वर्चस्व by प्रोग्रामिंग और सामग्री, जिससे is करीब to सामान्य history.
The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing कला केन्द्र in नई दक्षिण वेल्स, ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
It was conceived और largely निर्मित by डैनिश वास्तु jørn utzon, खोलने in 1973 बाद a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957.
Joseph काहिल 's नई दक्षिण वेल्स सरकारी दिया the go-ahead लिये work to begin in 1958.
The सरकारी 's बिंदास निर्णय to चुनें utzon 's डिज़ाइन is प्रायः निष्प्रभ by the scandal that followed.
it is on bennelong पाइंट in सिडनी Harbour, close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central कारोबार ज़िला ( the सीबीडी ), घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour ( Sydney Cove and Farm Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to इसके नाम, it घरों अनेक performance venues.
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the संसार, होस्टिंग over 1,500 प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by some 1.2 million people.
It provides a venue for many performing-arts कंपनियाँ, सहित the चार कुंजी निवासी कंपनियाँ ओपेरा ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बैले, the सिडनी थिएटर कम्पनी और the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a wide range of productions on its own account.
It is also one of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia, with more than सात लाख लोगों visiting प्रत्येक साल, 300,000 of जिसको लो a guided tour.
It is administered by the Sydney ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास, अंतर्गत the नई दक्षिण वेल्स मंत्रालय of the Arts.
On 28 June 2007, it थी बना a युनेस्को संसार विरासत Site.
It is one of the 20th century 's सबसे distinctive इमारतें और एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध performing arts centres in the world.
A graph of body mass index as a फलन of देह द्रव्यमान और देह ऊँचाई is दिखाया above.
the dashed लाइनों represent subdivisions भीतर a major class.
For instance the `` Underweight '' classification is further विभाजित into `` कठोर '', `` मॉडरेट '', और `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass index ( BMI ), or quetelet अनुक्रमणिका, is a माप लिये इंसान देह आकार आधारित on an individual 's weight and height.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of विकासशील `` सोशल भौतिकी ''.
Body mass index is defined as the individual 's देह द्रव्यमान विभाजित by the वर्गाकार of उनके ऊँचाई.
The formulae universally प्रयुक्त in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a ईकाई of measure of kg/m2.
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart, which displays BMI as a function of weight ( horizontal अक्ष ) और ऊँचाई ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using रुपरेखा लाइनों लिये अलग मान of बीएमआई or रंगों लिये अलग बीएमआई श्रेणी.
† The factor लिये uk/us इकाई is अधिक precisely 703.06957964, लकिन कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता is not meaningful for this calculation.
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the स्टोन by 14 तब add the पाउंड to दे the पूरे द्रव्यमान in पाउंड ; to कार्य इससे फीट और इंच पहला गुणा the फीट by 12 then add the inches to give the whole height in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS फ़रवरी 9, 1737 ) – जून 8, 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक activist, लेखक, political theorist and revolutionary.
As the लेखक of दो अत्यधिक influential pamphlets at the प्रारंभ of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, he प्रेरित the Patriots in 1776 to declare independence from Britain.
His ideas reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational इंसान rights.
he रै महरूम पुकारा `` a corsetmaker by व्यापार, a पत्रकार by व्यवसायिक, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, इंग्लैण्ड, in the काउंटी of नॉर्फ़ोक, paine emigrated to the अंग्रेजों अमरीकी colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution.
His principal contributions were the शक्तिशाली, widely पढ़ा pamphlet आम भाव ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling अमरीकी किताब कि advocated औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका 's स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of Great Britain, and The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said, `` Without the कलम of the लेखक of आम भाव, the तलवार of वॉशिंगटन होता have महरूम उठाया in vain.”
Paine lived in France for सबसे of the 1790s, बनने deeply शामिल in the French Revolution.
He लिखा the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in भाग a रक्षा of the French Revolution against its critics.
His attacks on British लेखक एडमंड बुर्के led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the अपराधों of seditious libel.
In 1792, despite not होने समर्थ to बोलो फ्रेंच, he थी निर्वाचित to the फ्रेंच National Convention.
The girondists regarded उसे as an ally.
Consequently, the montagnards, विशेषकर robespierre, regarded him as an enemy.
In December 1793, he was arrested and imprisoned in पेरिस, तब released in 1794.
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ), his किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद, promotes कारण और freethinking, और argues विरूद्ध institutionalized धर्म in सामान्य और ईसाई doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet कृषिक इंसाफ ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of प्रॉपर्टी, और introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income.
in 1802, he लौटे to America where he died on June 8, 1809.
Only six people attended his funeral as he था महरूम ostracized लिये उसके उपहास of christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically, सूचना परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g., दवाएँ, नैदानिक, devices, therapy protocols ).
They are conducted तभी बाद संतोषजनक सूचना रै महरूम gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक सुरक्षा, और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics कमेटी स्वीकृति is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought.
Previously, many उभरते देशों किया नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल ट्रायल लिये product approvals.
Now, though उभरते देशों स्टिल accept आंकड़ा इससे u.s./europe, they also require some local trials.
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development, investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot studies, and subsequently conduct larger स्केल अध्ययन in मरीजों कि प्रायः compare the नई उत्पाद साथ अन्य already स्वीकृत लिये the affliction of ब्याज.
as धनात्मक सुरक्षा और efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered, the number of patients is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in size, और can involve a सिंगल शोध एंटिटी in एक देश or many such entities in multiple countries.
A full series of ट्रायल may incur sizable लागत, और the बोझ of paying लिये सब the जरुरी लोगों और सेवाएं is प्रायः borne by the प्रायोजक, जिससे may be a सरकारी संगठन or a फार्मास्युटिकल, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor, a नैदानिक विचारण is प्रबंधित by an outsourced संगी, ऐसे as a अनुबंध शोध संगठन or a नैदानिक ट्रायल ईकाई in the academic sector.
The Green Bay Packers are an American football टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी, विस्कॉन्सिन.
They are members of the North Division of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the एनएफएल, having महरूम व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919.
The Packers are the तभी non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर खेल team in the United States.
The पैकर्स हैं the पिछला vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on जिससे the टोली plays ) और जार्ज व्हिटनी calhoun, the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 और 1920 the पैकर्स competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base and मीडिया extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी निभाई चयनित घर खेल वहीँ between 1933 और 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than कोई अन्य टोली in the एनएफएल ), सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( सुपर Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the शिकागो bears, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the डेट्रॉयट Lions.
the bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास, dating back to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl दारू ), the वही प्रकार of दारू मिला in alcoholic beverages.
It is most प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मोटर ईंधन, मुख्यतः as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World ethanol production for हस्तांतरण ईंधन tripled between 2000 और 2007 इससे 17 अरब to अधिक than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of इथेनॉल in वैश्विक गैसोलीन प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), साथ the संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of वैश्विक उत्पादन, followed by ब्राज़ील साथ 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of इथेनॉल उपज the उर्जा of एक gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in ब्राज़ील और in the संयुक्त राज्य, और साथ दोनो देशों यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 87.1 % of the संसार 's ethanol fuel production in 2011.
सबसे गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क आज in the u.S. can चलाएं on मिश्रणों of up to 10 % इथेनॉल, और इथेनॉल represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011.
चूंकि 1976 the ब्राज़ीलियाई सरकारी रै बना it अनिवार्य to मिश्रण इथेनॉल साथ गैसोलीन, and since 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 लाख flex-fuel ऑटोमोबाइल और लाइट ट्रक और 1.5 लाख flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a रूप of बेदर्दी उर्जा कि can be produced from agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made from very common फसलों ऐसे as शुगर cane, आलू, manioc और corn.
There रै महरूम considerable बहस परिचय कैसा उपयोगी bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline.
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large राशि of arable जमीन जरूरी लिये फसलों, as खूब as the उर्जा और प्रदूषण संतुलन of the पूरे साईकिल of इथेनॉल उत्पादन, विशेषकर इससे मकई.
हाल developments साथ cellulosic इथेनॉल उत्पादन और व्यावसायीकरण may allay some of these concerns.
Cellulosic ethanol offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख और सार्वभौमिक घटक in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं दीवारें, can be used to produce ethanol.
According to the International Energy Agency, cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे भूमिका in the भविष्य than previously thought.
