A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987, पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन, और उसके बीवी, सोफी, duchess of hohenberg, यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by gavrilo Princip, one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were सतत साथ the गति कि बाद became known as Young Bosnia.
सर्बियाई सैन्य अधिकारियों stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of ये सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
प्रमुख tankosić हथियारबंद the हत्यारे with bombs and pistols and trained them.
The assassins were given अभिगम to the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The हत्यारे, the कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine टनल, और the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर 1914.
The अन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों यहूद गिरफ्तार और आजमाया पहले a सर्बियाई कंगारू अदालत on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल और सम्बन्धित रिकॉर्ड.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i one month later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी actress and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her भूमिका in the फिल्मी जेरी मैग्वायर ( 1996 ), और subsequently प्राप्त दो nominations लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as Bridget Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the drama Cold Mountain ( 2003 ).
She has won an Academy Award, three Golden Globe Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and a BAFTA Award ; was नामित hasty खीर 's स्त्री of the साल in 2009 ; और स्थापित herself as एक of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest bones in the इंसान देह, the malleus, the incus और the stapes.
They are contained within the middle ear स्पेस और serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the एयर to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles होता constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, हालांकि the पद may refer to कोई छोटी अस्थि throughout the body.
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन originally निकला इससे a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
It is often thought of as an eschatological Messianic आयु or संसार to आइये और is सम्बन्धित to the biblical अवधारणा of the किंगडम of परमेश्वर.
generally, ईसाइयों मानना कि the नई वचन थी instituted at the पिछला Supper as part of the Eucharist, which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New वचन, as an उदाहरण an उदघाटन eschatology defines और describes the नई वचन as an जारी संबंध between ईसाई ईमानवालों और परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत बाद the दूसरी coming of मसीह ; कि is, it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the future external world as well.
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the नई वचन is देखी in सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of the नई वसीयत साथ the saying : `` इस कप कि is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood ''.
Christians believe that Jesus is the मध्यस्थ of the नई वचन, और कि the रक्त of मसीह शेड at उसके crucifixion is the जरूरी रक्त of the covenant.
As with all covenants between God and man वर्णित in the बाइबल, the नई वचन is माना `` a बंध in रक्त sovereignly administered by God. ''
It has been theorized that the New Covenant is the विधि of मसीह as बोला दौरान उसके उपदेश on the Mount.
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य दस्तावेज़ the सबसे prominent मामले of each presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, clause 1 ), राष्ट्रपतियों have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक or अधिक of the following तरीके : the ability to grant a full pardon, to commute a sentence, or to rescind a fine.
U.S. Presidents have no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया लिये अपराधों prosecuted under state law.
as to the अंतर between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of किसी फिलहाल सेवारत a वाक्य लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons और clemencies यहूद जारी by u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in the 20th century alone.
The records of अधिनियमों of दया यहूद पब्लिक जबतक 1934.
In 1981 the दफ्तर of the pardon attorney थी निर्मित और रिकॉर्ड इससे President H. W. Bush forward are now listed.
This सूची शामिल pardons और commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a नगर in the u.S. राज्य of फ्लोरिडा.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा, on tampa खाड़ी निकट the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
The population of tampa in 2011 थी 346,037.
The current location of Tampa was once inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the सुरक्षा हार्बर संस्कृति, सबसे notably the tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century, but there यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर आज 's नगर हद until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the United States Army established a frontier outpost called Fort ब्रुक at the मुँह of the hillsborough नदी, निकट the साईट of आज 's tampa सम्मेलन बीच.
The first civilian निवासियों यहूद pioneers जो settled निकट the फोर्ट लिये सुरक्षा from the nearby Seminole population.
the कस्बा grew धीरे जबतक the 1880s, जब रेलरोड कड़ी, the डिस्कवरी of फास्फेट, और the आगमन of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started tampa 's विकास and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a भाग of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly referred to as the tampa Bay Area.
For U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is भाग of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater, फ्लोरिडा महानगर Statistical Area.
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents, making it the दूसरी largest महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) in the राज्य, और the चौथी largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, पीछे मियामी, वॉशिंगटन, d.C., और अटलांटा.
The Greater Tampa Bay area has just over 4 million residents और generally शामिल the tampa और sarasota मैट्रो क्षेत्रों.
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed an औसत सालाना विकास of 2.47 प्रतिशत, or a लाभ of लगभग 97,000 निवासियों per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the Greater Tampa Bay Market experienced a combined growth rate of 14.8 प्रतिशत, growing इससे 3.4 लाख to 3.9 लाख और hitting the 4 लाख people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 अनुमान shows the tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल जनसांख्यिकी to have 4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 people.
Tampa has a number of sports teams, such as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, the tampa खाड़ी बिजली of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग, और the tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर खेल in neighboring st. पीटर्सबर्ग, Florida.
In 2008, Tampa was क्रमित as the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी नगर by फोर्ब्स.
A 2004 सर्वेक्षण by the nyu समाचारपत्र वॉशिंगटन वर्गाकार न्यूज क्रमित tampa as a शीर्ष नगर for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` गामा '' संसार नगर by loughborough विश्वविद्यालयों.
According to loughborough, tampa बाँधने alongside अन्य संसार शहरों such as Phoenix, Santo Domingo, and Osaka.
In recent years Tampa has देखी a notable upsurge in high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता, signaling अधिक माल concentrated in the area.
tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन National Convention.
The शेवरलेट cavalier थी a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the कम्पनी 's j मंच, the cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984.
AT & T Mobility LLC branded और referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ), is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of at & t inc. कि provides wireless services to 107 million subscribers in the United States, including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
AT & T गतिशीलता is the दूसरी largest बेतार दूरसंचार प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको, पीछे Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012.
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the lenox पार्क क्षेत्रफल of dekalb co. जॉर्जिया, just outside Atlanta.
originally cingular बेतार llc इससे 2000 to 2007, a संयुक्त venture between sbc संचार और bellsouth, the कम्पनी acquired the बूढ़ा at & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
cingular became wholly स्वामित्व by at & t in दिसम्बर 2006 as a result of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth.
In January 2007, Cingular confirmed it होता re-brand itself अंतर्गत the at & t नाम.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, लिये दोनो नियामक और brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान a transition period.
The transition concluded in लेट जून, बस prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, at & t गतिशीलता घोषित इसके इरादे to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had received government and regulatory स्वीकृति, at & t होता have था अधिक than 130 million subscribers.
However, the u.S. विभाग of इंसाफ, the संघीय संचार आयोग, और at & t गतिशीलता 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as स्प्रिंट nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market.
In December 2011, in the फेस of दोनो सरकारी और फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष, at & t withdrew उनके offer to complete the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( जनवरी 15, 1929 – अप्रैल 4, 1968 ) थी an अमरीकी clergyman, activist, and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
He is best known for his role in the उन्नति of सिविल अधिकारों using nonviolent सिविल disobedience.
King has become a नेशनल प्रतीक in the इतिहास of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद.
A Baptist minister, King became a सिविल अधिकारों activist जल्दी in his career.
He led the 1955 मोंटगोमरी बस बहिष्कार और helped मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957, serving as its first president.
With the SCLC, King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany, Georgia, in 1962, और व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम, अलबामा, कि आकर्षित नेशनल ध्यान following टेलीविज़न न्यूज कवरेज of the brutal police response.
King also helped to organize the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन, जहाँ he delivered his `` I Have a Dream `` speech.
There, he established his reputation as एक of the महानतम orators in अमरीकी इतिहास.
He also established his reputation as a radical, and became an object of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन 's cointelpro लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन.
FBI agents investigated उसे लिये संभावित कम्युनिस्ट ties, अंकित उसके extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to सरकारी officials, और on एक अवसर, mailed किंग a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide.
On October 14, 1964, किंग प्राप्त the नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार लिये combating जातिगत असमानता through nonviolence.
In 1965, he और the sclc helped to व्यवस्थित the selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following year, he took the movement north to Chicago.
In the final years of his life, किंग विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी और the वियतनाम युद्ध, alienating अनेक of उसके liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King was planning a नेशनल occupation of वॉशिंगटन, d.C., पुकारा the Poor People 's Campaign.
किंग थी assassinated on अप्रैल 4, 1968, in Memphis, Tennessee.
His मौत थी followed by दंगे in many U.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of killing King, had been framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों बाद the शूटिंग, और the जूरी of a 1999 सिविल विचारण मिला loyd jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King.
King was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and the congressional सुनहरा पदक मरणोपरांत.
Martin Luther किंग, jr. दिन थी स्थापित as a u.S. संघीय holiday in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the u.S. have महरूम renamed in उसके सम्मान.
A memorial प्रतिमा on the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली to the public in 2011.
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति, reaching a कुल देह लंबाई of up to and weighing up to.
It is the तीसरा largest जमीन carnivore ( पीछे only the polar bear and the brown bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of अंधेरा लंबवत धारियाँ on reddish-orange फर साथ a lighter underside.
It has exceptionally stout teeth, and the canines हैं the longest among जीना felids साथ a क्राउन ऊँचाई of as much as or even.
In zoos, tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years, which भी seems to be उनके आयु in the wild.
They are territorial and generally एकान्त लकिन सोशल पशु, प्रायः requiring विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास कि support their prey requirements.
This, coupled with the fact that they are स्वदेशी to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी स्थान on धरती, रै caused significant conflicts with humans.
Tigers once ranged widely across एशिया, इससे तुर्कों in the west to the eastern coast of Russia.
Over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic range, and have महरूम extirpated इससे दक्षिणपश्चिम और सेंट्रल एशिया, इससे the आइलैंड्स of जावा और bali, और इससे large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, वे दायरा इससे the siberian ताइगा to खोलें grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The remaining six tiger subspecies have महरूम वर्गीकृत as endangered by IUCN.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, down from around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th सदी, साथ सबसे बाकी populations occurring in छोटी pockets पृथक इससे प्रत्येक अन्य.
Major कारण लिये जनसांख्यिकी मनाही शामिल आवास विनाश, आवास fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by tigers is अनुमानित at कम than, a 41 % मनाही from the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
Tigers are among the most recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the संसार 's charismatic megafauna.
They have प्रदर्शित prominently in प्राचीन mythology और लोकगीत, और continue to be depicted in modern films and literature.
टाइगर्स appear on अनेक ध्वज, coats of arms, and as mascots for sporting teams.
The Bengal tiger is the नेशनल एनिमल of दोनो इण्डिया और बांग्लादेश.
The सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा of a हरितलवक
अवलोकन of the calvin साईकिल and carbon fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि बदलें कार्बन dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ लो the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation, कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ, और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its नाम, इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी जब लाइट is available.
Plants do नहीं carry आउट the calvin साईकिल by night.
They, instead, रिलीज sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves.
This process happens when light is उपलब्धियाँ स्वतंत्र of the दयालु of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
A linen रूमाल साथ खींचा लड़ी कढ़ाई around the किनारे
Linen cloth बरामद इससे qumran गुफा 1 निकट the मुर्दे समुद्र.
Linen ( ) is a textile made इससे the मछली of the flax संयंत्र, linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, लकिन जब it is बना into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather.
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin और cognates साथ the लैटिन नाम लिये the flax संयंत्र linum, और the पहले यूनानी λινόν ( linon ).
इस शब्द इतिहास रै दिए वृद्धि to a क्रमांक of अन्य शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी, the सबसे notable of जिससे is the English word line, derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
वस्त्र in a लिनेन बुनते बनावट, भी जब बना of कपास, गांजा और अन्य non-flax मछली are also loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
Such fabrics generally have their own specific names अन्य than लिनेन ; लिये उदाहरण, ठीक कपास धागे in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam.
The collective term `` linens `` is स्टिल प्रायः प्रयुक्त generically to describe a क्लास of woven और भी knitted bed, bath, table and kitchen textiles.
The name linens is retained क्युकी traditionally, लिनेन थी प्रयुक्त लिये many of these items.
In the पास्ट, the शब्द `` linens '' थी भी प्रयुक्त to औसत lightweight undergarments ऐसे as शर्ट, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a शब्द also cognate with linen ), and detachable shirt collars and cuffs, which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen.
The inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as लिये उदाहरण jackets ) थी traditionally बना of लिनेन, और इस is the origin of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the world : उनके इतिहास goes वापस अनेक हज़ारों of सालो.
Fragments of straw, बीज, मछली, yarns, और विभिन्न प्रकार of fabrics जिससे तिथि वापस to परिचय 8000 bc have महरूम मिला in स्विस झील dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven linen fabrics इससे जंगली flax may तिथि वापस भी पहले to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in प्राचीन Egypt.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in लिनेन क्युकी it थी देखी as a प्रतीक of लाइट और पवित्रता, और as a display of wealth.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, यहूद बहुत ठीक लिये उनके दिन, लकिन हैं coarse compared to आधुनिक लिनेन.
Today, linen is प्रायः an महंगी वस्त्र, और is उत्पादित in relatively small quantities.
it रै a long `` स्टेपल '' ( व्यक्तिगत रेशा लंबाई ) सापेक्ष to कपास और other natural fibers.
Many products are made of लिनेन : aprons, बैग, तौलिये ( swimmers, नहाना, बीच, देह और धो तौलिये ), napkins, bed linens, लिनेन चौके, धावक, chair covers, and men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The चैंपियनशिप रै महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन, जो won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार कप Finals.
A qualification phase, जिससे फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
the 19 संसार कप tournaments have महरूम won by eight different national teams.
Brazil have जीती पाँच टाइम्स, और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have played in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी, साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
the अगला तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
The is an expansion यंत्र लिये the वी रिमोट वीडियो खेल नियंत्रक लिये the वी कि allows it to अधिक accurately capture complex motion.
According to Nintendo, the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer और सेंसर बार सामर्थ्य of the वी रिमोट to enable क्रियाएँ to be rendered identically on the screen in real time.
The Wii 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the वी motionplus और इसके peripherals in खेल जहाँ उपयोग of इसके touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( onward सिंगापुर ) is the नेशनल anthem of Singapore.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a थीम सोंग लिये आधिकारिक कृत्यों of the नगर परिषद of सिंगापुर, the सोंग थी selected in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon full स्वतंत्रता in 1965, majulah singapura थी formally अपनाया as सिंगापुर 's national anthem.
By law the anthem may only be sung with इसके असली मलय गीत, हालांकि वहीँ मौजूद प्राधिकृत अनुवाद of the गीत of the गान in सिंगापुर 's three other official languages : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally composed in the key of G प्रमुख, in 2001 the नेशनल गान थी officially relaunched in the निम्नतर कुंजी of f प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow लिये a `` grander और more inspiring arrangement ''.
The नेशनल गान is regularly performed or सुंग in स्कूलों और हथियारबंद शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies आयोजित at the शुरूआत and/or the समाप्त of प्रत्येक दिन, during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken.
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on अवसरों of नेशनल जश्न or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the नेशनल दिन परेड, at नेशनल दिन observance ceremonies conducted by शैक्षणिक संस्थानों और सरकारी विभाग, and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights भवन a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों और फ्लोटिंग vessels.
It normally takes प्लेस in a specialized facility known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, भी पुकारा shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces इसके जड़ें to before recorded history.
Shipbuilding and ship repairs, दोनो वाणिज्यिक और सैन्य, हैं referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The निर्माण of नौकाएँ is a समान activity called boat building.
The dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा जलयान तोड़कर.
Wakonda is a town in मिट्टी काउंटी, दक्षिण डकोटा, संयुक्त States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 321 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित नगर, कस्बा, गाँव, बरो, और नगरपालिका.
A few exceptional Census designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government कि शामिल the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of a काउंटी, or काउंटी समतुल्य.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties कि हैं नहीं a part of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद, जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different रैंकिंग is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( चूंकि the Nintendo DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed developers, however, can use a ब्लू बुद्धिमान प्रणालियों नाइट्रो emulator बक्सा to फ्लैश cards.
These devices are भी ज्ञात as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two main classes of flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस जिससे अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the खेल लड़के अग्रिम खेल पाक स्लॉट ) और नए डिवाइस कि अनुरूप in slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically सस्ता due to economies of स्केल ( inherited इससे उनके उपयोग साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ), लकिन आवश्यकता a booting औजार in slot-1 in अनुक्रम to use the touch screen and other DS features.
Second-generation devices ( those which only use slot-1 ) do नहीं कार्य साथ gba homebrew, लकिन became कम महंगी और easier to उपयोग, rivaling अनेक Slot-2 devices in price.
First-generation डिवाइस शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस, gbamp cf, supercard, and M3.
Second-generation devices शामिल r4 क्रान्ति, cyclods, g6 रियल और ds-x.
The भंडार यंत्र either contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a स्लॉट लिये a memory card to store homebrew.
Storage डिवाइस साथ a memory-card स्लॉट प्रायः have अधिक भंडार क्षमता than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card क्षमता is प्रायः measured in मेगाबाइट ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and खेल लड़के अग्रिम roms ; खास सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as क्षमता to खेल मीडिया फाइलें ) ; physical size and cost.
Strictly बोलना, a भंडार यंत्र is नहीं जरुरी लिये ds साथ flashme installed because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB.
However, this is not an easily-portable विधि क्युकी the ds needs to be भीतर दायरा of a उपयुक्त Wi-Fi card.
are American लोगों of जापानी विरासत.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian American communities, but in recent decades, it has become the छठे largest समूह at roughly 1,304,286, सहित those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest Japanese American communities were found in कैलिफ़ोर्निया साथ 272,528, हवाई साथ 185,502, नई यॉर्क साथ 37,780, वॉशिंगटन साथ 35,008, और Illinois with 17,542.
Southern California has the largest japanese-american जनसांख्यिकी in उत्तर अमेरिका.

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन आधारित upon बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका 's singles चार्ट, सबसे notably the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100.
इस सूची spans इससे the समस्या दिनाँक January 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began साथ the समस्या दिनाँक अगस्त 4, 1958, और is फिलहाल the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in the United States.
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100, बिलबोर्ड प्रकाशित चार singles चार्ट : `` बेहतरीन विक्रेता in स्टोर्स '', `` सबसे निभाई by jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These charts, जिससे ranged इससे 20 to 100 slots, were phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart इतिहास, उनके आंकड़ा is शामिल लिये कम्प्यूटेशनल उद्देश्य, और to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
All items listed below are from the Hot 100 era, unless otherwise विख्यात ( pre-hot 100 चार्ट ).
V is an American science fiction टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि भागा लिये दो सीज़न on एबीसी, from November 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the new series chronicles the arrival on Earth of a technologically उन्नत एलियन प्रजाति जिससे ostensibly आता in सलाम, लकिन दरअसल रै sinister motives.
V stars Morena baccarin, lourdes benedicto, मॉरिस शाहबलूत, जोएल gretsch, लोगन huffman, चार्ल्स mesure, एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल, लौरा vandervoort and Scott Wolf, and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum, Yves Simoneau, Scott Peters, and Jace Hall.
The series was produced by The Scott पीटर्स कम्पनी, hdfilms और warner भाईs. टेलीविज़न.
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity, in which the participants use a Global positioning प्रणाली ( gps ) receiver or मोबाईल यंत्र और अन्य navigational तकनीकों to छुपा और तलाश containers, पुकारा `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A typical cache is a small waterproof संग्राहक containing a logbook जहाँ the geocacher enters the तिथि they found it and signs it with their established code name.
After हस्ताक्षर into the log, the संचय जरूर be लगाई वापस exactly where the person found it.
Larger containers such as plastic भंडार containers ( tupperware or समान ) or ammunition बाक्स can भी contain वस्तुएं for trading, usually toys or trinkets of little value.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop group that was originally रचित of krs-one, d-nice, और dj स्कॉट La Rock.
DJ स्कॉट la चट्टान थी murdered on अगस्त 27, 1987, महीने बाद the release of BDP 's debut album, Criminal Minded.
The name of the group, बोगी bas, गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण Bronx section of The Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall रेगी और हिप हॉप म्यूज़िक और उनके डेब्यू lp दण्ड minded contained फ़्रैंक descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap.
A नगरपालिका बंध is a बंध जारी by a लोकल government, or their agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states, शहरों, काउंटी, redevelopment एजेंसियों, special-purpose जिले, स्कूल जिले, पब्लिक यूटिलिटी जिले, सरेआम स्वामित्व एयरपोर्ट और seaports, और any other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level.
Municipal bonds may be general दायित्वों of the जारीकर्ता or secured by निर्दिष्ट revenues.
In the United States, interest income received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the आय कर of the राज्य in जिससे वे हैं जारी, हालांकि नगरपालिका bonds जारी लिये निश्चित उद्देश्य may not be tax exempt.
Unlike new समस्या स्टॉक्स कि हैं brought to मार्केट साथ दाम प्रतिबंध जबतक the सौदे is बेची, नगरपालिका bonds are free to trade at any time once they are purchased by the investor.
Professional traders regularly trade and retrade the वही bonds अनेक times a week.
`` Gim me कुछ lovin ' '' is a सोंग लिखा by स्टीव winwood, स्पेंसर डेविस और muff Winwood, and originally performed by The Spencer Davis Group.
The basic riff of the सोंग थी उधार इससे the होमर बैंको सोंग `` ( ai n't That ) A Lot of Love '', written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker.
`` Gim me Some lovin ' '' थी a uk # 2 in the पतझड़ of 1966 and a US # 7.
The song is ranked # 247 on the रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's सूची of the 500 महानतम गीतों of All Time.
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is अलग इससे कि जारी in the us on the संयुक्त कलाकारों लेबल, होने धीमा, and lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single.
( the us संस्करण रै अधिक प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त on reissue cds, even those coming from Europe. )

The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an ऑनलाइन डेटाबेस of सूचना सम्बन्धित to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, and video games.
This includes actors, production क्रू कर्मियों, और fictional वर्ण प्रदर्शित in ये तीन विज़ुअल entertainment मीडिया.
It is one of the most popular online entertainment गंतव्यों, साथ over 100 लाख अद्वितीय उपयोक्ता प्रत्येक माह और a ठोस और rapidly growing mobile presence.
IMDb was शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 17, 1990, और in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com.
As of April 27, 2013, आईएमडीबी था 2,503,783 शीर्षक ( शामिल एपीसोड ) और 5,192,493 personalities in इसके डेटाबेस, as खूब as 43 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता.

Fibre Channel Host बस एडाप्टर ( 64-bit pci-x card )
scsi मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware, a host controller, मेजबान एडाप्टर, or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices.
The terms are primarily used to refer to डिवाइस लिये connecting scsi, fibre चैनल और esata devices.
However, devices for connecting to IDE, ईथरनेट, firewire, usb और अन्य प्रणालियों may भी be पुकारा host adapters.
recently, the आगमन of iscsi और fibre चैनल over ईथरनेट रै brought परिचय ईथरनेट HBAs, which are different from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support दोनो ईथरनेट और fibre चैनल पुकारा converged संजाल Adapters ( CNAs ).
cashmere स्कार्फ
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters लिये बिक्री.
cashmere ऊन, प्रायः बस ज्ञात as cashmere, is a रेशा प्राप्त from Cashmere goats and other types of goat.
The word cashmere गर्भाशयी इससे an बूढ़ा स्पेलिंग of काश्मीर.
Cashmere is fine in बनावट, दमदार, लाइट, and soft.
Garments made from it provide बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन.
In the United States, under the u.s. ऊन उत्पाद labeling अधिनियम of 1939, as amended, ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), राज्य कि a ऊन or textile product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool उत्पाद is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat मछली produced by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the रेशा of ऐसे ऊन उत्पाद करता नहीं exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 प्रतिशत ( by वज़न ) of cashmere मछली साथ औसत diameters that exceed 30 microns.
the औसत रेशा व्यास may be विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores in the संयुक्त राज्य, साथ स्टोर्स स्तिथ throughout the पूर्वी seaboard, in the मिडवेस्ट, on the वेस्ट coast और in the Southwest.
The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1975 और is आधारित in Woodbury, New York.

Egg roll is a पद प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक अलग भोजन around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland China, many chinese-speaking regions of एशिया, और चाइनीज अप्रवासी समुदायों around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in चीन.
In Guangdong and Hong काँग, अंडा फेंकें प्रायः refers to बिस्किट roll.
इस is a प्रकार of biscuit.
The संघटक शामिल अंडा, आटा और शुगर.
Egg roll also is a dish in Canton and Hong काँग, इस is प्रायः बना साथ vegetable.
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast और हैं नहीं as commonly खपत in the उत्तर और पश्चिमी parts of China.
In American Chinese भोजन, an अंडा फेंकें is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, पोर्क or झींगा, गोभी, गाजर, टमाटर, सेम sprouts और अन्य सब्जियां, और तब गहन fried.
This variety of the egg roll is very आम और लोकप्रिय, आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय किस्में of अमरीकी चाइनीज खाना, और is प्रायः शामिल as भाग of a `` combination platter ''.
In Montreal, Canada, open-ended eggrolls हैं a jewish-chinese fusion dish.
They can be either कोषेर certified or merely कोषेर स्टाइल.
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical और emotional तनाव caused इससे an चोट ( देखिए भी पीड़ा और कष्ट ).
Some damages that might be under this category would be : aches, अस्थाई और स्थाई सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप, संभावित shortening of जीवन, अवसाद or scarring.
When दाखिल a मुकदमा as a परिणाम of an चोट, it is आम लिये किसी to seek money both in compensation for actual money that is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's अर्जी, or, alternatively, it is an तत्व of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish and/or शारीरिक पीड़ा endured by the claimant as a परिणाम of चोट लिये जिससे the अभियोक्ता seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or गैर litigated दावा ) as खूब as in दिनचर्या बीमे settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by lawyers प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers to settle लिये धन.
These demand for bodily injury compensation monies often set out क्षतिपूर्ति कि हैं similarly प्रयुक्त in the अदालत litigated pleadings.
Demands are usually लिखा summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा परवाह और the तथ्य जिससे resulted in the injury.
Sample of a Medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी stampIn
the United राज्य और कनाडा, a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी is a खास हस्ताक्षर guarantee for the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring वित्तीय संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक और the वित्तीय संस्था स्वीकृत देयता for any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect शेयरधारकों by preventing अनधिकृत हस्तांतरण और संभावित investor losses.
They also limit the देयता of the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट जो स्वीकृत the certificates.
Different institutions have different policies as to what type of identification they require to provide the गारंटी और whether वे चार्ज a शुल्क लिये ऐसे service ( usually nominal if any ).
Most संस्थानों होगा नहीं गारंटी a हस्ताक्षर of किसी who has not already been their customer.
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary पब्लिक, in the भाव कि a `` हस्ताक्षर गारंटी '' is a प्रमाणन by the संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर is authentic, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily.
Some banks may no longer provide this service, however, अनेक स्टिल do as खूब as अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों ऐसे as a बचत और लोन and Credit Unions.
At उनके एकमात्र discretion, ये संस्थानों may स्टिल decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees.
When US citizens are abroad, कुछ वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals, in प्लेस of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल द्वीप, लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, March 1956
The General Motors स्ट्रीटकार षड्यंत्र ( भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers to दोषारोपण और convictions in संबंध to a program by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, and the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर, न्यूर्क, लॉस एंजिल्स, नई यॉर्क नगर, ओकलैंड और सैन डिएगो और परिवर्तित उन्हें into बस आपरेशन.
Several of the कंपनियाँ शामिल यहूद convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize अंतरराज्यीय commerce but were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies.
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, who first drew attention to the कार्यक्रम in 1946, और तब ब्रैडफोर्ड C. snell, an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट जिनकी विवादास्पद 1974 गवाही to a सीनेट पूछताछ brought the समस्या to नेशनल जागरूकता.
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate विनाश of streetcars थी भाग of a larger रणनीति to धक्का the संयुक्त राज्य into automobile dependency.
अन्य कह कि स्वतंत्र आर्थिक कारकों brought परिचय परिवर्तन in the पारगमन प्रणाली, सहित the ग्रेट अवसाद, the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, मजदूर अशांति, मार्केट शक्तियां, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has suggested that snell और अन्य गिरी into simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त सोच, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, GM waged a war on electric traction.
It was बेशक an सब आउट उत्पीड़न, लकिन by no अर्थात् the सिंगल कारण लिये the विफलता of rapid transit.
Also, it is बस as साफ कि क्रियाएँ और inactions by सरकारी contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving प्रभावी rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित न्यूर्क, फिलाडेल्फिया, सैन फ्रांसिस्को, पिट्सबर्ग, and Boston ; others are re-introducing them.
The story has been explored several times in print, film and अन्य मीडिया, notably in जो framed रोजर खरगोश, लिया लिये a सवारी और the समाप्त of suburbia.
corwin हाउस, सलेम, मैसाचुसेट्स, built ca. 1660, First Period English
American colonial वास्तुकला शामिल अनेक भवन डिज़ाइन शैलियाँ संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक काल of the संयुक्त States, including First Period English ( late-medieval ), French Colonial, Spanish Colonial, Dutch Colonial and Georgian.
These styles are संबद्ध साथ the घरों, चर्च और सरकारी इमारतें of the काल from about 1600 through the 19th century.
`` In the Mood '' is a बिग बैंड era # 1 hit अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader ग्लेन Miller.
It अव्वल the चार्ट in 1940 in the u.S. और एक साल बाद थी प्रदर्शित in the movie Sun Valley Serenade.
In 1999, National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn Miller recording on RCA bluebird on the npr 100, the सूची of `` the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण अमरीकी musical works of the 20th सदी ''.
वरुण logo
The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed लोगों to `` लहरे '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे labs and universities around the world.
Along with its sister प्रोजेक्ट, शुक्र, वरुण offers a अद्वितीय दृष्टिकोण to ocean science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent जलयान क्रूज़ or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध, जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely संचालित क्रॉलर.
A gramophone record, commonly known as a फोनोग्राफ रिकार्ड ( in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ), विनाइल रिकार्ड ( in सन्दर्भ to विनाइल, the सामग्री सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a रिकार्ड '', is an एनालॉग ध्वनि storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
The groove usually starts near the periphery और ends निकट the बीच of the disc.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational speed at जिससे वे हैं निभाई ( `` 33 आरपीएम ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', इत्यादि. ), उनके समय क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive accuracy, or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', etc. ), and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th सदी, replacing the फोनोग्राफ बेलन, साथ जिससे it था co-existed, by the 1920s.
by the लेट 1980s, डिजिटल मीडिया था gained a larger मार्केट share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured and sold in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 लाख इकाई shipped, the सबसे in कोई साल चूंकि 1998 और the स्वरूप रै जारी to slowly regain popularity.
They हैं विशेषकर प्रयुक्त by djs और audiophiles लिये many types of music.
As of 2013, विनाइल रिकॉर्ड continue to be used for distribution.
Grassland in the सांता रोजा पठार, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
घासभूमि in the antelope घाटी, California
the konza tallgrass प्रेयरी in the चकमक पहाड़ियाँ of northeastern Kansas.
a घासभूमि in the Philippines.
an भीतरी मंगोलियाई घासभूमि in the People 's Republic of China
Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses ( पोएसी ), however sedge ( cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( juncaceae ) परिवारों can भी be मिला.
Grasslands occur naturally on सब महाद्वीपों मगर Antarctica.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in North America, देशी grasslands हैं वर्चस्व by बारहमासी गुच्छा ग्रास प्रजाति, whereas in warmer climates सालाना species form a greater component of the vegetation.
grasslands हैं मिला in सबसे ecoregions of the Earth.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands, savannas, और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem ' ), जिससे is एक of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( lawsonia inermis, भी पुकारा हिना पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering संयंत्र, the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
The English नाम `` हिना '' आता इससे the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also used for dye preparations derived from the संयंत्र, और लिये the आर्ट of अस्थाई गोदना आधारित on those dyes.
Henna रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता to डाई स्किन, बाल, और fingernails, as well as fabrics including Silk, wool and leather.
additionally, the नाम is misused लिये अन्य स्किन और बाल dyes, ऐसे as ब्लैक henna or neutral henna, which are not derived from the plant.
A thin film is a layer of material ranging from भिन्नों of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to अनेक micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor डिवाइस और ऑप्टिकल coatings हैं the प्रमुख अनुप्रयोग लाभकारी इससे thin-film construction.
A familiar application of पतला films is the household दर्पण, जिससे typically रै a पतला मेटल कोटिंग on the वापस of a चादर of glass to form a reflective interface.
The process of silvering थी एकबार commonly प्रयुक्त to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film कोटिंग ( कम than a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to produce two-way mirrors.
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक परतों having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic structure of alternating thin films of अलग सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice जिससे कारनामे the घटना of क्वांटम confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being done with ferromagnetic और ferroelectric पतला films लिये उपयोग as computer memory.
It is also होने लागू to दवाएँ, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to उपज thin-film बैटरी.
पतला films हैं भी प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized solar cells.
Ceramic thin films हैं in चौड़ी उपयोग.
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of पतला कोटिंग of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा of substrate सामग्री विरूद्ध संक्षारण, ऑक्सीकरण और पहनें.
In particular, the use of such coatings on कटिंग टूल्स can extend the जीवन of ये वस्तुएं by several orders of magnitude.
Research is being किया on a नई क्लास of thin-film अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड, जिससे could be प्रयुक्त to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित by एपिक खेल और प्रकाशित by microsoft Game Studios.
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North America, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और सबसे of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' साथ added सामग्री और an आर्ट किताब titled नष्ट Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with लोगों can मक्खी और released a साल बाद, featuring नई सामग्री सहित अतिरिक्त अभियान स्तर, a नई एकाधिक खेल विधि, और खेल लिये खिड़कियाँ सजीव कार्यक्षमता.
The game focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा स्क्वाड as वे wield a हताश, last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the बाकी इंसान निवासियों of the fictional ग्रह Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde.
The player assumes the role of मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ), a पूर्व कैदी और war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the उपयोग of कवर और रणनीतिक आग लिये the खिलाड़ी to अग्रिम through the scenarios ; a दूसरी player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The game also features several ऑनलाइन एकाधिक खेल मोड्स लिये up to आठ खिलाड़ी.
Gears of War sold over three million नक़ल in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as well as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during.
It currently stands as the 5th बेहतरीन selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 खेल of सब समय.
The game has since बेची over पाँच लाख नक़ल by सितंबर 2008.
The game was well received by आलोचकों, जो praised इसके gameplay और विस्तृत visuals, और it जीती अनेक `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006.
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War franchise, including the 2008 sequel Gears of युद्ध 2 और इसके follow-up, गियर्स of युद्ध 3, जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20, 2011, बाद having initially महरूम नियत to have महरूम released on अप्रैल 5, 2011, the तिथि upon जिससे एपिक खेल ' चट्टान bleszinski थी a अतिथि on लेट रात्रि साथ Jimmy Fallon.
Adaptations to books, comics, as खूब as a विशेषता फिल्मी हैं to be expected.
A Tree Grows in ब्रुकलीन is a 1943 अनोखा लिखा by Betty Smith.
the स्टोरी focuses on an irish-american family in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City.
The अनोखा is नियत in the पहला और दूसरी दशकों of the 20th century.
The book थी an immense कामयाबी.
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy Tree of स्वर्ग, देशी to चीन और ताईवान, अभी माना हृदयरोग, और आम in the vacant लोट of New York City.
World map with the intertropical मण्डल highlighted in रेड.
Tropical climate zones of the Earth जहाँ सब बारह महीने have औसत temperatures ऊपर 18 °C ( 64 °F ).
The tropics is a region of the धरती surrounding the equator.
it is सीमित in अक्षांश by the tropic of कर्कट in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध at लगभग n और the tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
The tropics are also referred to as the तीव्र मण्डल और the torrid मण्डल ( देखिए भौगोलिक मण्डल ).
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth जहाँ the सूर्य पहुँच a पाइंट सीधे ओवरहेड at तनिक एकबार दौरान the solar year.
The tropics are distinguished from the अन्य climatic और biomatic regions of धरती, the मध्य latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either side of the equatorial zone.

`` What तुम need '' is an एपीसोड of the अमरीकी टेलीविज़न anthology series The Twilight Zone.
It is आधारित on the छोटी स्टोरी of the वही name by Lewis Padgett ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ).
PlayhouseSquare, in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland, Ohio, is the second-largest थिएटर जटिल in the संयुक्त राज्य, दूसरी तभी to नई यॉर्क नगर 's Lincoln Center ).
Constructed in a स्पैन of 19 महीने in the जल्दी 1920s, the थिएटर यहूद subsequently closed down, but were revived through a grassroots effort.
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a नई era of शहर पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड, और थी पुकारा `` एक of the शीर्ष टेन सफलताओं in Cleveland history. ''
The driver and यात्री सामने airbags, बाद having महरूम तैनात, in a British Peugeot 306 car.
an एयरबैग is a गाडी सुरक्षा device.
It is an occupant संयम प्रणाली consisting of a लचीली कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants दौरान a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा to उनके लाशें जब वे स्ट्राइक आंतरिक वस्तुएँ ऐसे as the steering wheel or a window.
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions, and sensors may तैनात एक or अधिक airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित on the प्रकार, कोण और गंभीरता of प्रभाव ; the एयरबैग is designed to तभी inflate in मॉडरेट to कठोर frontal क्रैश.
airbags हैं सामान्यतः designed साथ the इरादे of supplementing the सुरक्षा of an occupant who is correctly restrained with a seatbelt.
Most डिजाइन हैं inflated through pyrotechnic means and can only be operated once.
Newer side-impact एयरबैग मौड्यूल consist of संपीडित एयर सिलेंडर कि हैं triggered in the इवेंट of a side impact vehicle impact.
The first commercial designs यहूद introduced in यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल during the 1970s with limited success.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and जल्दी 1990s साथ a ड्राइवर एयरबैग, और a सामने यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on कुछ गाड़ियाँ ; और अनेक आधुनिक वाहनों अभी include four or more units.
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to रपट वित्तीय सूचना to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs ) of the United States.
They are used to report income, calculate कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, और ज़ाहिर अन्य सूचना as जरूरी by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ).
There हैं over 800 विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म और schedules.
The best-known of these is रूप 1040 प्रयुक्त by individuals.
In the United States, driver 's licenses are issued by each व्यक्तिगत राज्य ( सहित वॉशिंगटन, d.C. और territories ), बल्कि than the संघीय सरकारी क्युकी of the राजनैतिक concept of federalism.
ड्राइवर हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a अनुज्ञा इससे उनके राज्य of निवास और सब राज्य recognize प्रत्येक अन्य 's पंक्तियां लिये अस्थाई visitors subject to normal age requirements.
a राज्य may भी बर्खास्तगी an व्यक्तिगत 's ड्राइविंग विशेषाधिकार within its borders for traffic violations.
Many states share a common system of अनुज्ञा वर्ग, साथ कुछ अपवाद, और वाणिज्यिक अनुज्ञा वर्ग हैं मानकीकृत by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383.
China has been the source of अनेक आविष्कारों, सहित the चार ग्रेट आविष्कारों : papermaking, the कम्पास, बारूद, और मुद्रण ( दोनो woodblock and movable type ).
The list below contains ये और अन्य आविष्कारों.
The Chinese invented technologies involving यांत्रिकी, hydraulics, और गणित लागू to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, कृषि, engineering, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 bc ), वे था उन्नत metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित the धमाका भट्टी और cupola भट्टी, while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
A sophisticated आर्थिक प्रणाली in चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों such as paper money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions such as the fire lance, land mine, naval मेरा, हाथ तोपों, exploding गोलों, multistage प्रक्षेपास्त्र, और प्रक्षेपास्त्र बम with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century कम्पास और क्षमता to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern चाइनीज था प्रयुक्त the escapement यांत्रिकी चूंकि the 8th सदी and the endless power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th century.
They also बना विशाल mechanical कठपुतली थिएटर चलित by waterwheels और carriage पहियों और wine-serving automatons driven by paddle wheel boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest पाषाणकालीन संस्कृतियों of चीन और यहूद formed around 7000 bc.
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives, stone hoes and spades, the cultivation of बाजरा, राइस और the सोयाबीन, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील, the सृष्टि of pottery साथ cord-mat-basket designs, the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca Bray argues कि the domestication of the ox और भैंस दौरान the longshan संस्कृति ( c. 3000–c. 2000 bc ) काल, the अनुपस्थिति of longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield फसलों, पूरा प्रमाण of longshan cultivation of dry-land खाद्यान्न फसलों जिससे दिया ऊँची yields `` तभी जब the मृदा थी carefully cultivated, '' suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With later आविष्कारों ऐसे as the multiple-tube बीज ड्रिल और भारी moldboard आयरन हल, चीन 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger population.
For the purposes of this list, inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China, और as ऐसे करता नहीं शामिल विदेशी technologies जिससे the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क, ऐसे as the पवनचक्की इससे the मध्य ईस्ट or the telescope from Early modern Europe.
It also does not include technologies विकसित elsewhere और बाद invented separately by the चाइनीज, ऐसे as the ओडोमीटर and chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or natural discoveries, परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और कलाकारी नवप्रवर्तनों can नहीं be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list.
Gross घरेलू उत्पाद in 2011 us डॉलर प्रति capita, समायोजित लिये महंगाई और खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( log स्केल ) इससे 1860 to 2011, with population ( disk area ) for the US ( yellow ), UK ( orange ), Japan ( red ), China ( red ), and India ( blue ).
Globalization ( or globalisation—see spelling differences ) is the प्रक्रम of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising इससे the इंटरचेंज of संसार दृश्य, products, ideas, and other aspects of culture.
Put in simple terms, globalization refers to प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार world-wide exchanges of नेशनल और cultural resources.
Advances in transportation and telecommunications अवसंरचना, सहित the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल, हैं प्रमुख कारकों in वैश्वीकरण, generating further interdependence of आर्थिक and cultural activities.
Though several scholars place the origins of वैश्वीकरण in आधुनिक टाइम्स, अन्य ट्रेस इसके इतिहास long पहले the यूरोपीय age of discovery and voyages to the New World.
Some even ट्रेस the origins to the तीसरा मिलेनियम BCE.
Since the beginning of the 20th century, the pace of globalization has intensified at a रैपिड रेट, विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा युद्ध era.
The term वैश्वीकरण रै महरूम in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) पहचाना चार मौलिक पहलुओं of वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार और ट्रांजेक्शन, पूंजी और निवेश आंदोलनों, माइग्रेशन और गति of लोगों और the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental challenges such as climate change, cross-boundary जल और एयर प्रदूषण, और over-fishing of the समंदर हैं linked साथ वैश्वीकरण.
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by business and कार्य संगठन, अर्थशास्त्र, socio-cultural संसाधन, और the natural environment.
The Replacements is a 2000 American खेल कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित by हावर्ड deutch.
It stars Keanu Reeves, Gene hackman, और ब्रुक langton.
An अमरीकी एयरलाइंस वायुयान takes बंद इससे dallas/fort Worth International Airport.
This विमानक्षेत्र is the एयरलाइन 's largest hub.
American Airlines flies to 79 घरेलू गंतव्यों और 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों in 48 countries.
( as of दिसम्बर 2012 )
The list includes the city, country, the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport कोड ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सिविल विमानन संगठन ( icao विमानक्षेत्र कोड ), और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम, साथ the एयरलाइन 's hubs, फ़ोकस शहरों और seasonal destinations marked.
The सूची भी contains गंतव्यों no longer परोसा by the एयरलाइन, which are marked as terminated destinations.
It does not include destinations परोसा लिये अमरीकी एयरलाइंस by इसके क्षेत्रीय affiliates अमरीकी त्रिभुज Airlines, Executive Airlines, and AmericanConnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known संस्करण of जिससे थी सुंग by हैरी belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण interspersed साथ another jamaican folksong, Hill and Gully Rider, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento influences, `` Day-O ( The banana नाव सोंग ) '' is widely ज्ञात as an उदाहरण of कैलिप्सो म्यूज़िक.
It is a work song, from the point of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working the रात्रि शिफ़्ट लदान केले onto ships.
Daylight has आइये, the शिफ़्ट is over और वे want उनके कार्य to be गिने up so that they can go home.
World युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
The युद्ध ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to World War II.
नर्स जैकी is an अमरीकी श्रेणी कि premiered on जून 8, 2009, on Showtime, Movie Central and The Movie Network.
The series stars Edie Falco as the title अक्षर जैकी peyton, an आपात विभाग नर्स at सब संतो ' हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क नगर.
For Jackie, `` Every दिन is a ऊँची तार अधिनियम of juggling मरीजों, डॉक्टर, fellow nurses and her own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on अक्तूबर 14, 2007, on E !.
It follows the lives of the kardashian/jenner परिवार, सहित बहनों कोर्टनी, Kim, and Khloé Kardashian.
The series ' success रै led to the spin-offs कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क, khloé & लैमर, कोर्टनी और Khloé Take Miami, and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the इस्लामी गणतंत्र of अफगानिस्तान, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming part of South Asia, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of around 30 लाख inhabiting an क्षेत्रफल of लगभग, बनाना it the 42nd सबसे populous और 41st largest स्वदेश in the world.
It is bordered by पाकिस्तानी in the दक्षिण और the ईस्ट, इरान in the वेस्ट, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, उज़्बेकिस्तान और ताजिकिस्तान in the उत्तर, and China in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has been an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा सड़क और इंसान माइग्रेशन.
Archaeologists have found evidence of इंसान habitation इससे as दूर वापस as the मध्य paleolithic.
Urban सभ्यता may have begun in the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप, the जमीन रै महरूम घर to विभिन्न peoples through the आयु और witnessed अनेक military campaigns, notably by Alexander the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western forces.
The land also served as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians, kushans, hephthalites, saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, timurids, मुगलों, durranis, और अन्य have risen to form major empires.
The political history of the modern state of अफगानिस्तान begins in 1709, जब the hotaki राजवंश थी स्थापित in कांधार followed by अहमद शाह दुर्रानी 's rise to power in 1747.
In the लेट 19th सदी, अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र राज्य in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires.
following the 1919 anglo-afghan युद्ध, किंग अमानुल्ला began a यूरोपीय स्टाइल modernization of the country but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring इण्डिया in 1947, the संयुक्त राज्य और the सोवियत संघ began spreading प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान, जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां and the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This was followed by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध, the वृद्धि और पतन of the extremist तालिबान सरकारी और the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the United Nations Security Council authorized the सृष्टि of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) to सहायता maintain सुरक्षा in अफगानिस्तान और assist the Karzai administration.
Three decades of war made Afghanistan one of the world 's सबसे खतरनाक देशों, सहित the largest निर्माता of शरणार्थियों और asylum जरुरतमंदों.
While the अंतरराष्ट्रीय जातियाँ is पुनर्निर्माण war-torn अफगानिस्तान, आतंकवादी समूह ऐसे as the हक्कानी संजाल और hezbi islami हैं actively शामिल in a nationwide Taliban -led insurgency, which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the insurgents यहूद जिम्मेदार for 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
आठ बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
in 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
लागत of goods बेची ( cogs ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a business has sold during a particular period.
Costs are संबद्ध साथ particular goods using एक of अनेक formulas, including specific identification, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
Costs include all लागत of खरीदें, लागत of परिवर्तन और अन्य लागत incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location and condition.
Costs of goods बना by the कारोबार शामिल सामग्री, मजदूर, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as costs of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or लिखा bas in मान.
Freak Lunchbox कैंडी स्टोर in halifax, Nova Scotia
A confectionery store ( अधिक commonly referred to as a मीठी दूकान in the संयुक्त किंगडम, a कैंडी स्टोर in the उत्तर अमेरिका, or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery and is usually targeted to children.
Most confectionery स्टोर्स हैं भर साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a grocer or convenience store could accommodate.
They often प्रस्ताव a चयन of बूढ़ा fashioned ट्रीट, and sweets from different countries.
Very often अपरिवर्तित in लेआउट चूंकि उनके inception, confectioneries are known for their warming and nostalgic feel.
The गाँव of pateley सेतु दावा to have the oldest confectionery store in England.
The oldest मीठी दूकान in इंग्लैण्ड, in the गाँव of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in वेस्ट South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive और the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
The state 's name is derived from the choctaw शब्द okla और humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is ज्ञात informally by इसके उपनाम, the sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma territory और भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', और इसके पूंजी और largest नगर is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and कृषि, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, ranking among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल घरेलू product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, साथ nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर statistical areas.
With small mountain ranges, प्रेयरी, mesas, और पूर्वी वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s. आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, जर्मनी, स्कॉटिश, आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in ओक्लाहोमा, दूसरी only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of तीन प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव, a destination for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Stacked और खड़ा car टायर
A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a व्हील 's रिम to protect it और enable better vehicle performance.
Most tires, such as those लिये ऑटोमोबाइल और साइकिल, provide कर्षण between the गाडी और the सड़क जबकि providing a लचीली cushion that absorbs shock.
The materials of modern pneumatic tires हैं सिंथेटिक रबर, प्राकृतिक रबर, कपड़ा और तार, साथ साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और अन्य रासायनिक compounds.
They consist of a tread और a body.
The tread provides traction जबकि the देह provides containment लिये a मात्रा of संपीडित air.
Before rubber was developed, the पहला संस्करण of टायर यहूद बस bands of मेटल कि fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to prevent पहनें और आंसू.
जल्दी रबर टायर यहूद ठोस ( not pneumatic ).
Today, the बहुमत of टायर हैं न्यूमेटिक inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped देह of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of वाहनों, सहित गाड़ियाँ, साइकिल, मोटरसाइकिल, ट्रक, earthmovers, और वायुयान.
Metal tires are still used on इंजनों और railcars, और ठोस रबर ( or अन्य पॉलिमर ) टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न non-automotive applications, such as some casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( जून 11, 1741 – जून 17, 1775 ) थी an अमरीकी डॉक्टर जो निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in अमरीकी patriot संगठन in बोस्टन in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress.
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18, 1775, to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in बोस्टन थी सेटिंग आउट to रेड the कस्बा of concord और गिरफ़्तार विद्रोही नेताओ John Hancock and Samuel Adams.
Warren participated in the अगला दिन 's लड़ाइयों of lexington और concord, जिससे हैं commonly माना to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
Warren had been commissioned a प्रमुख सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly पहले the जून 17, 1775 बैटल of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his rank, Warren served in the battle as a निजी सिपाही, और थी मारे in कॉम्बैट जब अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop नस्ल 's हिल.
His death, immortalized in जॉन trumbull 's पेंटिंग, the मौत of सामान्य वारेन at the बैटल of बंकर 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, जस्ती the विद्रोही शक्तियां, और he रै been memorialized in many place names in the United States.
stm चित्र of self-assembled supramolecular जंजीरों of the सशुल्क semiconductor Quinacridone on Graphite.
An सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क सामग्री साथ सेमीकंडक्टर properties, that is, with an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals.
Single अणुओं, छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) और सशुल्क polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic खुशबूदार यौगिकों pentacene, anthracene, और rubrene.
polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene ), बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There are two प्रमुख अतिव्यापी वर्ग of सशुल्क semiconductors.
These are सशुल्क charge-transfer देवालय और विभिन्न linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene.
Linear backbone organic semiconductors शामिल polyacetylene itself और इसके डेरिवेटिव polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer देवालय प्रायः प्रदर्शनी समान conduction mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors.
ऐसे mechanisms उठता इससे the उपस्थिति of छेद और इलेक्ट्रॉन conduction layers separated by a band gap.
While such classic mechanisms are important locally, as with अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, स्थानीयकृत राज्य, गतिशीलता गैप, और phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction, particularly in polyacetylenes.
Like अकार्बनिक semiconductors, सशुल्क semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals.
ठेठ वर्तमान वाहक in सशुल्क semiconductors are holes and electrons in π-bonds.
लगभग सब सशुल्क solids हैं insulators.
But when their constituent अणुओं have π-conjugate प्रणालियों, electrons can मूव via π-electron बादल overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling and related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals हैं उदाहरण of इस प्रकार of सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर.
Mainly due to low mobility, भी unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can फलन as current carriers.
This type of semiconductor is also obtained by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता अणु साथ an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor अणु.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the मादा urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are माना to be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications.
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर, जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी देह.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
Japan won the 2011 टूर्नामेंट in a दंड गोलीबारी.
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय तीन सप्ताह ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in women 's फ़ुटबॉल और is निभाई amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the सदस्य राज्य of फीफा, the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी देह.
the पहला महिलाओं 's संसार कप टूर्नामेंट, नामित the महिलाओं 's संसार Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one years after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930.
