the अगला संसार कप होगा be hosted by Canada in 2015.

'Son of man ' is the translation of various Hebrew और यूनानी वाक्यांश प्रयुक्त in दोनो the यहूदी बाइबल और the नई वसीयत.
It has diverse meanings, ranging from a सामान्य इंसान होने to a prophesied अनन्त, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears एक सौ और सात टाइम्स in the Hebrew Bible.
This is the most common यहूदी निर्माण लिये the एकवचन लकिन is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in इंटरमीडिएट बहुवचन रूप `` बेटे of मेन '', i.e. इंसान beings.
As generally interpreted by यहूदियों, it denotes humankind generally.
In the koine यूनानी of the नई वसीयत, `` the बेटे of man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
the उपयोग of the definite आलेख in `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा, और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ, no records of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
Geza Vermes has stated that `` the Son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is unrelated to यहूदी बाइबल usages.
In Christian usage, unlike the Son of God title, जिससे रै महरूम an अनिवार्य तत्व of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the अपोस्टोलिक आयु, the उदघोषणा of `` यीशु as the बेटे of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity.
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the नई वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 सालो of बहस no सर्वसम्मति on the समस्या रै उभरा among scholars.
Master of foxhounds leads the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला in देवों, इंग्लैण्ड, साथ the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the ट्रैकिंग, पीछा, और sometimes हत्या of a फॉक्स, traditionally a रेड फॉक्स, by प्रशिक्षित foxhounds or अन्य सैंट hounds, और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a निपुण of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox hunting originated in the रूप practised जबतक recently in the संयुक्त किंगडम in the 16th सदी, लकिन is practised सब over the संसार, सहित in Australia, Canada, France, Ireland, Italy and the United States.
In Australia, the पद भी refers to the शिकार of foxes साथ firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting with bow and तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, `` शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शिकार साथ हाउंडs- beagling, स्टैग शिकार, मिंक शिकार, खीचें hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here.
The sport is controversial, particularly in the UK, where it was banned in Scotland in 2002, and in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स in नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि enforced इससे फ़रवरी 2005 ), हालांकि शूटिंग foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of ग्रामीण संस्कृति और उपयोगी लिये कारण of संरक्षण और pest कंट्रोल, जबकि प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि it is cruel and unnecessary.
Tobacco advertising is the advertising of tobacco उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the तम्बाकू उद्योग through a किस्में of मीडिया including sponsorship, particularly of sporting events.
it is अभी एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regulated forms of marketing.
Some or all forms of tobacco advertising हैं बैन in अनेक देशों.

The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट Technology.
It eventually changed its name to गठबंधन गेमिंग और acquired, in 1996, बल्ली गेमिंग अंतरराष्ट्रीय, a पूर्व प्रभाग of बल्ली निर्माण.

Gustave Doré 's engravings illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 ) ; यहाँ, दांते is खोया in canto 1 of the inferno.
inferno ( इतालवी लिये `` नरक `` ) is the पहला भाग of Dante Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy.
It is followed by purgatorio और paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the यात्रा of दांते through नरक, हिदायत by the Roman poet Virgil.
In the कविता, नरक is चित्रित as नौ वृत्त of suffering located within the Earth.
Allegorically, the Divine Comedy represents the journey of the आत्मा towards परमेश्वर, साथ the inferno describing the मान्यता और rejection of sin.
Smirnoff is a brand of वोदका स्वामित्व और उत्पादित by the अंग्रेजों कम्पनी diageo.
The स्मरनॉफ ब्रांड began साथ a वोदका डिस्टिलरी संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).
It is now वितरित in 130 countries.
It is produced in several देशों सहित इण्डिया, Ireland, Italy, the United Kingdom and the United States.
स्मरनॉफ उत्पाद शामिल वोदका, flavoured vodka, and malt beverages.
In March 2006, Diageo North अमेरिका claimed कि स्मरनॉफ वोदका थी the best-selling आसुत स्पिरिट brand in the world.
Big Brown ( foaled अप्रैल 10, 2005 in केंटकी ) is a रिटायर्ड champion American Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes.
करवाया by dr. गेरी B. नैप 's monticule खेतो in lexington, Kentucky, he won his first five race starts.
He was sired by ग्रेड iii विजेता boundary, a बेटे of उत्तर अमरीकी Champion sire Danzig, a son of Northern Dancer.
Big Brown 's dam was Mien, भी a पोती of उत्तरी नर्तकी through her sire, Nureyev.
The Serenity Prayer is the common name for an originally untitled दुआ by the अमरीकी theologian reinhold niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It has been अपनाया by alcoholics बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step programs.
The best-known form is : God, ग्रान्ट me the serenity to accept the बाते i can नहीं change,
The courage to बदलें the बाते i can,
And wisdom to जान the अंतर.
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial अधिकारों, or the घोषणा of अधिकारों ), थी a बयान अपनाया by the पहला महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in जवाब to the असहनीय अधिनियमों passed by the British Parliament.
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the असहनीय अधिनियमों, सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक विधेयक of अधिकारों, और provided a विस्तृत सूची of grievances.
It was similar to the घोषणा of अधिकारों और grievances, passed by the स्टैम्प अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a decade earlier.
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to enter into a boycott of British trade ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances यहूद redressed, to प्रकाशित पता to the लोगों of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और British America, and to send a petition to the King.
Pulse pressure is the दबाव कि is लगा जब अहसास the पल्स.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the pressure difference between the systolic और diastolic pressures is the दबाव बदलें to बनाएँ the पल्स, जिससे is the pulse pressure.
If resting रक्त दबाव is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), pulse pressure is 40.
The Hills is a reality टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे originally aired on एमटीवी इससे may 31, 2006 until July 13, 2010.
The show uses a reality television format, following the personal lives of several young वयस्कों जीना in लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लकिन tends towards a कथा स्वरूप अधिक commonly मिला in scripted जाति ऐसे as soap operas.
The series originally followed the निजी जीवन of पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार लॉरेन कोनराड और उसके मित्रों ' नई जीवनदान in Los Angeles.

The series concluded at the समाप्त of the sixth season.
Entertainment Weekly ranked The Hills 82nd on उनके सूची of `` the 100 बेहतरीन shows of the पिछला 25 सालो, '' stating कि the श्रेणी थी a `` नई क्लासिक. ''

In poker, bad beat is a subjective term for a हाथ in जिससे a खिलाड़ी साथ कया appear to be दमदार ताश nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs जहाँ एक खिलाड़ी bets the clearly stronger हाथ और their opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` hits '' and wins.
वहीँ is no सर्वसम्मति among पोकर खिलाड़ी as to कया exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will disagree about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the परिवार cyprinidae of अनुक्रम cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest मछली to be domesticated, और is एक of the सबसे commonly रखा एक्वेरियम fish.
A relatively small member of the कार्प परिवार ( जिससे भी शामिल the कोई कार्प और the crucian कार्प ), the goldfish is a domesticated संस्करण of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia.
It was first domesticated in China more than a हजार सालो पहले, और अनेक पृथक breeds have since been developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in आकार, देह आकार, जोडे विन्यास और coloration ( विभिन्न combinations of श्वेत, पीला, नारंगी, red, brown, and black are known ).
uncooked rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a जर्मनी मांस roulade प्रायः consisting of बेकन, प्याज, सरसों और अचार लपेटा in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked.
in कुछ देशों, the roulade is also known as `` beef olive ''.
Beef or veal is used as मांस हालांकि कुछ खाना विद्वानों tend to मानना कि the असली संस्करण थी संभवतः venison or pork, and pork is still popular in some areas.
the बीफ rouladen as we जान उन्हें आज have become लोकप्रिय over the last century.
The cut is प्रायः topside बीफ or silverside चूंकि इस is the सस्ता cut.
The more महंगी संस्करण होता be the गोलाकार steak, also known as rump steak.
the मांस is काटें into विशाल, thin slices.
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork पेट, कटा प्याज और कटा अचार ( gurken ) जिससे is at टाइम्स varied by adding minced मांस, sausage meat, pine nuts and mustard.
The mixture varies इससे प्रदेश to region.
Rouladen are traditionally परोसा लिये डिनर.
रेड वाइन is प्रायः परोसा with this dish.
Typical eukaryotic कोशिका.
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the कोशिकाएं of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा इससे nutrients into एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( एटीपी ), और then release waste products.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ, जिससे ब्रेक विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones, releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
Respiration is one of the कुंजी तरीके a कोशिका gains उपयोगी उर्जा to ईंधन सेल्यूलर activity.
Cellular respiration is माना an ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रिया.
The overall reaction is broken into अनेक छोटी ones जब it occurs in the देह, सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves.
Although technically, सेल्यूलर श्वसन is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, it clearly does not resemble one when it occurs in a living cell.
इस अंतर is because it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, no सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises it is a दहन reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly प्रयुक्त by एनिमल और संयंत्र कोशिकाएं in श्वसन शामिल शुगर, अमीनो acids और वसीय acids, और a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly बंधुआ to the बाकी of the अणु और is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger bonds to रूप, thereby transferring उर्जा लिये उपयोग by the कोशिका ) can तब be used to drive processes requiring energy, including biosynthesis, locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes.
Countries by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the सीआईए संसार factbook.
This article includes a list of countries in the संसार sorted by उनके सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ), the मार्केट मान of सब फाइनल goods and services from a nation in a given year.
The GDP dollar estimates प्रस्तुत यहाँ हैं गणना at मार्केट or सरकारी आधिकारिक एक्सचेंज rates.
Several economies जिससे हैं नहीं माना to be देशों ( संसार, the eu, और कुछ निर्भर territories ) हैं शामिल in the lists because they appear in the sources.
ये economies हैं नहीं क्रमित in the चार्ट यहाँ, लकिन हैं listed where applicable.
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different देशों, और the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another आधारित on fluctuations in the एक्सचेंज rates of the country 's currency.
Such fluctuations may बदलें a देश 's रैंकिंग इससे एक साल to the अगला, भी हालांकि वे प्रायः मेक छोटी or no difference to the standard of living of its population.
इसलिए ये आंकड़े चाहिए be used with caution.
Some countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे हैं on औसत धनवान.
ये countries/regions could appear in इस सूची as having a small GDP.
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population, और इसलिए छोटी कुल अर्थव्यवस्था ; the जीडीपी is गणना as the जनसांख्यिकी टाइम्स the माल per capita.
comparisons of नेशनल माल हैं भी अक्सर बना on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( ppp ), to समायोजन लिये मतभेद in the cost of living in different countries.
( See List of देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but रै इसके अपना कमियां ; it करता नहीं प्रतिबिंबित the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, और it भी requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
on the पूरे, ppp प्रति capita आंकड़े हैं अधिक narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita figures.
The first list includes data compiled by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र आंकडे प्रभाग लिये 2011.
The second सूची largely शामिल आंकड़ा ( अनुमान ) compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Monetary Fund for 2012.
The third list shows the संसार बैंको 's ज़्यादातर 2011 estimates, और the चौथी सूची शामिल mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook.
lapping is a machining प्रक्रम, in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला together with an abrasive between them, by hand movement or by way of a machine.
This can लो दो फ़ॉर्म.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally पुकारा पीस ), typically involves रगड़ a भंगुर सामग्री ऐसे as कांच विरूद्ध a सतह ऐसे as आयरन or कांच itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड, जौहरियों 's रूज, optician 's रूज, emery, silicon carbide, diamond, etc., in between them.
इस produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the two surfaces and removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer सामग्री ऐसे as पिच or a सिरेमिक लिये the गोद, जिससे is `` चार्ज '' साथ the अक्खड़.
The lap is then प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer सामग्री जिससे holds it और permits it to स्कोर आरपार और काटें the harder material.
Taken to a finer limit, this will produce a polished सतह ऐसे as साथ a पॉलिशिंग cloth on an ऑटोमोबाइल, or a polishing cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel.
Taken to the ultimate limit, with the aid of accurate interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग, lensmakers can उपज सतहों कि हैं flat to better than 30 nanometers.
इस is एक बीसवीं of the wavelength of लाइट इससे the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source.
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly बंधुआ ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ under the right conditions.
( This is not the same as the wringing effect of जोहानसन ब्लॉक, हालांकि it is समान ).
The term `` America 's Team '' is a popular nickname in the संयुक्त राज्य कि refers to the डलास cowboys in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, जहाँ the narrator opens साथ the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः प्रयुक्त by मीडिया आउटलेट, सहित ईएसपीएन, Yahoo !, HBO Sports, and Sports Illustrated.
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 कनाडाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, आधारित on the television film of the same name.
In Canada, the series premiered in फ्रेंच on télétoon on फ़रवरी 28, 2011, in अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on कूच 14, 2011, and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27, 2011.
The show was created by Fresh TV, creators of 6teen और कुल नाटक.
The show फ़ॉलो ethan मॉर्गन ( मैथ्यू नाईट ), जो, in the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी, learns that his babysitter Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire.
In the film, he learns he is able to have visions और उसके बेहतरीन dost बेनी Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.
The series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures, with occasional सहायता इससे fellow vampires रोरी ( cameron कैनेडी ) और एरिका ( केट टॉड ), जबकि dealing साथ the परेशानियों of नियमित high school life.
A second ऋतु थी पुष्टि to प्रारंभ उत्पादन in सितंबर 2011 और it पहला premiered on Disney Channel on June 29, 2012, it premiered on Teletoon September 6, 2012.
Télétoon started featuring season 2 sneak-peak एपीसोड on अक्तूबर 28, 2012 और premiered it on जनवरी 10, 2013

A pickup ट्रक or pick-up, प्रायः बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the पद पिकअप is प्रयुक्त लिये लाइट ट्रक साथ a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः based on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have उनके अपना शर्तें समान to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe, जहाँ वैन और लाइट lorries हैं commonly प्रयुक्त लिये समान roles.
The President of the United States of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the संयुक्त States.
The president leads the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे साथ the निष्पादन of संघीय विधि, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, और न्यायिक officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, and to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत असाधारण हालातों.
Since the founding of the United States, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष और the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely जिम्मेदार लिये dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is frequently वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली व्यक्ति in the world.
the अध्यक्ष is indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year पद, और is एक of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों, the other being the Vice President of the United States.
The twenty-second amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने elected to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or acting president, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
on जनवरी 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he थी re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve until January 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद खनिज water
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., खूब जल, आसुत जल, खनिज जल, or वसन्त जल ) packaged in प्लास्टिक or glass water bottles.
Bottled जल may be कार्बोनेटेड or not.
Sizes range इससे छोटी सिंगल सेवारत बोतलों to विशाल carboys for water coolers.
Map of the major rivers, झीलों, और टंकी in इण्डिया
Map showing नदियाँ और बाढ़ prone क्षेत्रों in इण्डिया
Rivers of India play an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the जीवनदान of the Indian people.
the नदी प्रणालियों provide सिंचाई, potable जल, सस्ती परिवहन, विद्युत, और the livelihoods लिये a विशाल number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains क्यों nearly सब the प्रमुख शहरों of इण्डिया are located by the banks of rivers.
The नदियाँ भी have an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in हिन्दू mythology और are considered holy by all Hindus in the country.
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries मेक up the नदी प्रणाली of इण्डिया.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, some of the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the देश और towards the ईस्ट of the राज्य of himachal pradesh खाली into the arabian समुद्र.
Parts of Ladakh, northern parts of the aravlli दायरा और the arid भाग of the थार मरुस्थल have inland drainage.
Dr.Francis बुकानन surveyed the पाठ्यक्रम of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया साथ साथ उनके tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it.
the shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the सदियां is very remarkable.
अनेक of the चैनल्स उल्लेखित in कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become dead, dried or even extinct.
All प्रमुख नदियाँ of इण्डिया originate इससे one of the three main watersheds :
the हिमालय और the Karakoram ranges
विंध्य और satpura सीमाएँ और chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or पश्चिमी ghats in पश्चिमी इण्डिया
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for commercial and वित्तीय संबंध among the संसार 's प्रमुख औद्योगिक राज्य in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक अनुक्रम intended to govern मौद्रिक संबंध among स्वतंत्र nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II थी स्टिल raging, 730 delegates इससे सब 44 अलाइड राष्ट्र gathered at the माउंट वॉशिंगटन होटल in bretton वुड्स, नई हैम्पशायर, United States, for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944, और हस्ताक्षरित the अनुबंध on इसके final day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and प्रक्रियाओं to विनियमित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at bretton वुड्स स्थापित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Bank for Reconstruction and Development ( IBRD ), which today is part of the World Bank Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 बाद a sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the agreement.
The chief features of the Bretton Woods प्रणाली यहूद an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the एक्सचेंज रेट by tying इसके करेंसी to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold.
This brought the Bretton Woods प्रणाली to an समाप्त और देखी the डालर become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the Nixon shock, निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य डालर became a reserve currency used by many states.
At the same time, अनेक फिक्स्ड मुद्राएँ ( ऐसे as gbp, लिये उदाहरण ), भी became free floating.
Ducati Motor पकड़कर s.p.A. is an इतालवी कम्पनी कि डिजाइन और manufactures मोटरसाइकिल.
Headquartered in Bologna, Italy, Ducati is owned by audi through इसके इतालवी subsidiary लेम्बोर्गिनी.
A credit score is a numerical अभिव्यक्ति आधारित on a सांख्यिकीय विश्लेषण of a व्यक्ति 's क्रेडिट फाइलें, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily आधारित on क्रेडिट रपट सूचना typically sourced इससे क्रेडिट bureaus.
Lenders, such as banks and credit card कंपनियाँ, उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता और to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders use credit scores to determine who qualifies लिये a ऋण, at कया ब्याज रेट, और कया क्रेडिट limits.
lenders भी उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जिससे ग्राहक हैं संभावित to bring in the most revenue.
The use of credit or identity scoring prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting क्रेडिट is an क्रियान्वयन of a विश्वसनीय system.
Credit scoring is नहीं सीमित to बैंको.
Other संगठन, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन कंपनियाँ, बीमे कंपनियाँ, जमींदार, और सरकारी विभाग employ the same techniques.
Credit scoring also has a लॉट of ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन, जिससे उपयोग अनेक similar techniques.
These techniques combine हज़ारों of कारकों लकिन वे हैं अधिक or कम समान or the वही.
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of उनके परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण, to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट, the परिभाषा of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The International System of इकाई ( si ) defines सात इकाई of माप as a मौलिक नियत इससे जिससे सब other SI units are derived.
These si आधार इकाई और उनके शारीरिक quantities are:
मीटर लिये लंबाई ( us अंग्रेज़ी : meter )
kilogram लिये द्रव्यमान ( नोट : नहीं the gram )
दूसरी लिये time
ampere लिये इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान
kelvin लिये तापमान
candela for चमकदार तीव्रता
mole लिये the राशि of पदार्थ.
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually स्वतंत्र आयाम as जरूरी by आयामी विश्लेषण commonly employed in विज्ञान and technology.
however, in a दिए realization of ये इकाई वे may खूब be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each other.
The names of SI units हैं लिखा in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets इस नियम, as 'degree ' is the unit, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g. metre has the symbol m ), मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित बाद व्यक्तियों हैं लिखा साथ an आरंभिक capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ).
Many other units, such as the लीटर ( us अंग्रेज़ी : लीनियर ), हैं formally नहीं भाग of the si, लकिन are accepted for use with SI.
स्मारक canyon
Colorado नेशनल स्मारक ( locally referred to as the स्मारक ) is a भाग of the National Park Service near the city of Grand Junction, Colorado.
Spectacular canyons काटें गहन into sandstone और भी granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some areas.
This is an क्षेत्रफल of मरुस्थल जमीन ऊँची on the कोलोराडो पठार, साथ पिनियन and juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a wide range of वन्यजीव, सहित red-tailed चीलों और सुनहरी ईगल्स, ravens, jays, मरुस्थल bighorn शीप, और coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback riding, road bicycling, and दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a आगंतुक बीच on the वेस्ट पक्ष contains a प्राकृतिक इतिहास संग्रहालय और gift shop.
There are magnificent views from trails और the रिम चट्टान ड्राइव, जिससे हवाएँ साथ the plateau.
आसपास हैं the किताब cliffs, और the largest flat-topped mountain in the world, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which runs the width of the park, and शामिल चट्टान formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता स्मारक, the चुंबन युगल, और कोक Ovens.
The monument शामिल 20,500 एकड़ ( 32 वर्गाकार मील ), much of जिससे रै महरूम recommended to Congress for designation as wilderness.
left to right : Utility Uniform, Blue Dress वर्दी, सेवा वर्दी, और संध्या पोशाक uniforms
The वर्दी of the संयुक्त राज्य समुद्री corps serve to फर्क marines इससे सदस्यों of other services.
Among current वर्दी in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां, the marines ' वर्दी have been in service the longest.
The Marine Dress Blue uniform रै, साथ few परिवर्तन, महरूम worn in essentially इसके वर्तमान form since the 19th century.
North American telephone क्षेत्रफल कोड 419 और 567 serve the उत्तरपश्चिम quadrant of the u.S. state of Ohio.
The largest नगर परोसा by ये क्षेत्रफल कोड is टोलेडो ( और इसके उपनगरों of Holland, Maumee, Northwood, Oregon, Ottawa Hills, Perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, Swanton, Waterville, and Whitehouse ).
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling Green, Bryan, Bucyrus, Celina, क्लाइड, crestline, defiance, delphos, एडिसन, erastus, findlay, fostoria, fremont, galion, kenton, लीमा, मैन्सफील्ड, माउंट gilead, नेपोलियन, नॉरवॉक, ओक हार्बर, बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
Other areas served include the Lake erie आइलैंड्स उत्तर of बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन और वेस्ट of Sandusky.
The main area code, 419, was created as one of the original area codes in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड 567 थी निर्मित on January 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest नगर, 419 थी the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल कोड to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid.
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an अमरीकी देश म्यूज़िक सिंगर और संगीतकार.
Although he started out singing straight-up country and western material in the 1970s, he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s, bringing उसे further कामयाबी on नहीं बस the देश charts, but the pop charts as well.
Among his biggest hits are `` रूम पूरा of गुलाब, '' `` do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी prettier at closing समय, '' और the रीमेक of the आत्मा hit `` Stand by Me ``.
He is भी the cousin of जेरी ली लुईस, कार्ल mcvoy, Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation Administration, Gilley is a licensed पायलट, जो holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges लिये multi-engine airplanes, as खूब as निजी पायलट privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य in नई यॉर्क नगर और the वॉशिंगटन, D.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners यहूद hijacked by 19 al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into इमारतें in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ान 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175, यहूद क्रैश into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें, क्रमशः, of the संसार व्यापार Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल, as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति to टेन अन्य विशाल surrounding structures.
A third plane, American एयरलाइंस उड़ान 77, थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य Department of Defense ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, बाद इसके यात्री tried to overcome the hijackers.
In total, almost 3,000 लोगों died in the हमले, सहित the 227 नागरिकों और 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
suspicion जल्दी गिरी on al-qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, Osama bin लादेन, initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel, the presence of u.S. सैनिकों in सऊदी अरब, और प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the युद्ध on आतंक और आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान to depose the तालिबान, जिससे था harbored al-Qaeda.
Many देशों strengthened उनके anti-terrorism विधान और expanded law enforcement powers.
Having evaded कैप्चर लिये सालो, बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the जुड़वा मीनारें और अन्य गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन and had a significant effect on global markets.
Cleanup of the संसार व्यापार बीच साईट थी समाप्त in may 2002, और the Pentagon was repaired within a year.

Finding Nemo is a 2003 अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama एडवेंचर फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by एंड्रयू stanton, released by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें, और the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, साथ साथ a राजसी तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ), खोज लिये उसके abducted बेटे nemo ( सिकंदर gould ) सब the रास्ता to सिडनी harbour.
Along the way, Marlin learns to लो risks और let nemo लो परवाह of खुद.
It is Pixar 's first film to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी hemisphere summer.
The film was re-released for the first time in 3D on September 14, 2012, और it थी released on blu-ray on दिसम्बर 4, 2012.
A sequel, ढूंढना dory, is फिलहाल in विकास, नियत to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated विशेषता, और थी मनोनीत in तीन अधिक श्रेणी including Best Original Screenplay.
It was the second highest-grossing film of 2003, कमाई a कुल of $ 921 लाख विश्वव्यापी.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling dvd of सब समय, साथ over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006, और थी the highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले पिक्चर्स 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय, as खूब as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film.
In 2008, the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित it the दसवाँ महानतम animated film ever made during their Top 10.

In the संयुक्त राज्य, सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the old-age, survivors, और विकलांगता Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program.
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) and the वर्तमान संस्करण of the अधिनियम, as amended, encompass अनेक सोशल welfare और सोशल insurance programs.
Social सुरक्षा is primarily वित्तपोषित through समर्पित payroll कर पुकारा संघीय Insurance Contributions Act tax ( FICA ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal विकलांगता बीमे विश्वास निधि, the संघीय हॉस्पिटल बीमे विश्वास निधि, or the संघीय अनुपूरक चिकित्सा बीमे विश्वास Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund.
upward redistribution of आय is जिम्मेदार लिये परिचय 43 % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75 years.
According to economist Martin feldstein, the संयुक्त बिता लिये सब सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम in 2003 constituted 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product.
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 प्रतिशत of सब अमेरिकी आयु 65 or पुरानी आउट of गरीबी.
The Social सुरक्षा प्रशासन is headquartered in woodlawn, मेरीलैंड, just west of Baltimore.
The alcohol by volume दिखाया on a बोतल of absinthe.
Alcohol by आवाज़ ( abbreviated as abv, abv, or alc/vol ) is a मानक माप of कैसा much दारू ( इथेनॉल ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
the abv मानक is प्रयुक्त worldwide.
In some देशों, दारू by आवाज़ is referred to as डिग्री gay-lussac ( बाद the फ्रेंच chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ).

चार्ल्स जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic.
He created some of the world 's most यादगार fictional वर्ण और is generally regarded as the महानतम उपन्यासकार of the विक्टोरियन period.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented fame, and by the बीसवीं सदी उसके साहित्यिक प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged by आलोचकों and scholars.
उसके novels और छोटी कहानियां continue to be widely popular.
Born in Portsmouth, इंग्लैण्ड, डिकेंस बाएँ स्कूल to कार्य in a फैक्टरी बाद his father was thrown into debtors ' prison.
Although he had little formal शिक्षा, उसके जल्दी impoverishment drove उसे to सफल.
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 सालो, लिखा 15 novels, 5 novellas और सैंकड़ों of छोटी कहानियां और non-fiction आलेख, lectured और performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights, education, and other social reforms.
Dickens sprang to कीर्ति साथ the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन of the pickwick Papers.
Within a few सालो he था become an अंतरराष्ट्रीय साहित्यिक हस्ती, प्रसिद्ध लिये his humour, satire, and keen observation of character and society.
His novels, most published in monthly or weekly किश्तों, pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of कथा fiction, जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन mode for novel publication.
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate उसके दर्शक 's प्रतिक्रिया, और he प्रायः परिवर्धित उसके प्लाट और अक्षर विकास based on such feedback.
For example, when his बीवी 's chiropodist expressed तकलीफ at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to reflect her disabilities, Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments.
Fagin in Oliver Twist जाहिर mirrors the प्रसिद्ध बाड़ ikey सुलेमान ; उसके कैरीकेचर of leigh हंट in the फिगर of mr skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read episodes.
In the same novel, both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne इससे वाल्टर जंगली landor और मूनी इससे 'looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
His plots यहूद carefully constructed, और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व इससे topical कार्यक्रम into his narratives.
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have प्रत्येक नई मासिक एपीसोड पढ़ा to उन्हें, खोलने up और प्रेरणादायी a new class of readers.
Dickens was regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus of उसके आयु.
His 1843 novella, A क्रिसमस कैरोल, is एक of the सबसे influential works कभी लिखा, और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre.
उसके रचनात्मक प्रतिभाशाली रै महरूम praised by fellow writers—from leo टालस्टाय to G. K. चेस्टरटन और जार्ज ऑरवेल —for its realism, comedy, prose style, unique characterisations, and social criticism.
On the other hand Oscar Wilde, हेनरी जेम्स और वर्जिनिया woolf complained of a कमी of मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई, ढीला writing, and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.
मार्टिन लूथर किंग और अन्य सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ in सामने of the statue of Abraham Lincoln, August 28, 1963
The civil अधिकारों गति थी a श्रेणी of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता पहले the law that peaked in the 1960s.
In many situations it took the form of अभियान of सिविल प्रतिरोध aimed at achieving बदलें by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In some परिस्थितियों it थी accompanied, or followed, by सिविल अशांति and armed rebellion.
The process was long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these आंदोलनों किया नहीं fully achieve उनके लक्ष्य हालांकि, the प्रयत्न of ये आंदोलनों किया सीसे to सुधार in the विधिक अधिकारों of previously दलित groups of people.
The main aim of the civil rights movement included, and include, ensuring that the अधिकारों of सब लोगों हैं बराबर सुरक्षित by the विधि, सहित the अधिकारों of अल्पसंख्यकों.
Civil rights movements ranging इससे the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to the वैश्विक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup, the संसार चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन 's नेशनल संघ फ़ुटबॉल टीमों.
It took प्लेस in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे 11 June to 11 July 2010.
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004, the international football संघ, फीफा, चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over मिश्र और मोरक्को to become the पहला अफ़्रीकी nation to host the finals.
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country, with the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's largest नगर, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a विश्वव्यापी योग्यता टूर्नामेंट कि began in अगस्त 2007.
In the first round of the tournament फाइनल, the टीमों competed in round-robin समूह of चार टीमों लिये अंक, with the top two teams in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage, जहाँ तीन rounds of खेल decided जिससे टीमों होता participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, पराजित third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय, साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th मिनट giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक, बनने the आठवीं nation to win the tournament, and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent.
Host nation South अफ़्रीकी, 2006 संसार champions इटली और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
It was the पहला समय कि the होस्ट यहूद eliminated in the पहला round.
New Zealand with their तीन draws यहूद the तभी अपराजित टोली in the टूर्नामेंट, but were also eliminated in the first round.
The McMuffin is a family of नाश्ता सैंडविच in विभिन्न आकार और configurations, sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's.
The Egg mcmuffin is the हस्ताक्षर नाश्ता सैंडविच ; it थी invented by the लेट मैकडोनाल्ड 's वाल हर्ब पीटरसन in the लेट 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972.
John Lennon थी an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार जो gained विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स, लिये उसके subsequent सोलो करियर, and for his political activism and pacifism.
He थी शॉट by चिह्नित दाउद chapman at the प्रवेश of the building where he lived, The Dakota, in New York City on 8 December 1980.
Lennon had just लौटे इससे रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो साथ उसके बीवी, योको Ono.
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, जहाँ it थी stated कि nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे चोटों.
shortly बाद लोकल न्यूज स्टेशन reported लेनन 's मौत, crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota.
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff Cemetery in hartsdale, नई यॉर्क ; the राख यहूद दिए to ओनो, जो chose नहीं to थाम a अंत्येष्टि for him.
The first report of Lennon 's मौत to a u.S. नेशनल दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड Cosell, on ABC 's Monday Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर और महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the state of Louisiana.
The जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
the नई ऑरलियन्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( नई orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
The city is named बाद orléans, a नगर स्तिथ on the loire नदी in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for इसके भोजन, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके सालाना जश्न and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in America.
New Orleans is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The नगर और ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. tammany to the उत्तर, st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट, plaquemines to the दक्षिण and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of which is included in the city हद, झूठ to the उत्तर और झील borgne झूठ to the ईस्ट.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जीती the चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee, लाज़िम Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a अभियान कि promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, फटा by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था वर्चस्व presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after डेमोक्रेट lyndon B. जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन, the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी, फैली विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध आरपार university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा राज्यपाल जार्ज Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the चुनावी कॉलेज ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य since then.
This is the latest election where a अध्यक्षीय टिकट जीती बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर state.
Karak ( ; भी ज्ञात as garak, garrak, और gorg ) is a गाँव in gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला, in the सेंट्रल ज़िला of Nahavand County, Hamadan Province, Iran.
At the 2006 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी 294, in 65 families.
Kurt 's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – अप्रैल 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी, having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड, the बैंड मिला भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, साथ उसके निजी मुद्दे प्रायः विषय to मीडिया ध्यान.
He challenged Nirvana 's दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम in Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी, संगीतकार कोर्टनी Love.
On April 8, 1994, कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल, the शिकार of कया थी officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The circumstances of his मौत at आयु 27 have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination और बहस.
Since उनके डेब्यू, निर्वाण, साथ कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman सगाई साथ the निर्माण और मेंटेनेंस of machinery.
More generally in the English speaking world, early millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ बढ़ई जो erected मशीने प्रयुक्त in कृषि, खाना प्रसंस्करण और processing lumber and paper.
In the early part of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, उनके कौशल यहूद दबाया into सेवा भवन the earliest powered textile mills.
Modern millwrights work with steel और अन्य सामग्री in जोड to लकडी और जरूर प्रायः combine the कौशल of अनेक skilled ट्रेड in अनुक्रम to सफलतापूर्वक fabricate औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts.
the आधुनिक millwright जरूर भी be समर्थ to पढ़ा blueprints और अन्य schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the us, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights प्रायः नियत themselves up as independent contractors.
The समायोजन ब्यूरो is a 2011 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कार्रवाई थ्रिलर फिल्मी loosely आधारित on the फिलिप K. Dick short story, `` Adjustment Team ``.

The score was composed by Thomas Newman, with two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने अनुक्रम ; `` हैं तुम तैयार ? '' लिये the closing credits ).
Sodium azide is the अकार्बनिक यौगिक साथ the formula NaN3.
This colorless नमक is the gas-forming घटक in अनेक car airbag systems.
it is प्रयुक्त लिये the तैयारी of अन्य azide compounds.
It is an ionic substance, is अत्यधिक घुलनशील in जल, और is बहुत acutely विषाक्त.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक arc.
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the नीचे marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो वृत्त ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती 's माहौल, resulting in a वर्णक्रम of लाइट appearing in the आसमान.
It takes the रूप of a multicoloured arc.
Rainbows caused by धूप सदा appear in the खण्ड of आसमान directly opposite the sun.
In a `` primary rainbow '', the arc shows रेड on the बाहरी भाग और बैंगनी on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by लाइट होने refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of जल, तब reflected अंदर on the वापस of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen outside the primary arc, और रै the अनुक्रम of इसके रंग reversed, रेड facing toward the अन्य एक, in दोनो rainbows.
This second rainbow is caused by लाइट reflecting twice अंदर water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी और colloquially referred to as the tory पार्टी or the tories, is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism.
it is the largest political पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम, होने the largest सिंगल पार्टी in the हाउस of कॉमन्स साथ 303 mps, the largest पार्टी in लोकल सरकारी साथ 9,391 पार्षदों, और the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
It governs in गठबन्धन साथ the उदार डेमोक्रेट, साथ पार्टी नेता दाउद Cameron as Prime Minister.
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834, and was one of दो प्रबल पार्टियों in the 19th सदी, साथ साथ the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी in 1912 बाद विलय साथ the उदार यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी, हालांकि कि नाम is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the उदार vote greatly diminished और the श्रमिक पार्टी became the conservatives ' main rivals.
रूढ़िवादी प्रधान मंत्रियों led सरकारें लिये 57 सालो of the 20th century, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging आर्थिक उदारीकरण और देखी the conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The पार्टी थी लौटे to सरकारी in गठबन्धन, having विफल to जीत a बहुमत, in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह, जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन of यूरोपीय conservatives और Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट और second-largest in the Welsh Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as भाग of the ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था, साथ the uup फिलहाल participating in the five-party उत्तरी आयरलैंड Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final, और शायद सबसे recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस नॉलेस, केली rowland और मिशेल विलियम्स.
Formed in 1990 in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास, नियति 's चाइल्ड सदस्यों began उनके musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After years of limited कामयाबी, वे यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड as नियति 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the release of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम, the लिखने 's on the वॉल, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, the समूह थी plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil, as roberson और luckett attempted to विभाजित इससे the समूह 's मैनेजर mathew नॉलेस, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were जल्द replaced साथ विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however, in 2000, फ्रैंकलिन थी बर्खास्त, leaving them as a trio.
Their third album, Survivor, which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the समूह 's अनुभव, contains the विश्वव्यापी हिट्स `` स्वतंत्र महिलाओं ``, `` उत्तरजीवी `` और `` bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they announced a अंतराल और re-united दो सालो बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी to तिथि.
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the महानतम musical trios of सब समय, the नवीं सबसे कामयाब artist/band of the 2000s, और लगाई the समूह 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The Centers for Disease कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय एजेंसी अंतर्गत the विभाग of स्वास्थ्य और इंसान सेवाएं headquartered in druid पहाड़ियाँ, unincorporated dekalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect public health and safety by providing information to enhance health निर्णय, और it promotes स्वास्थ्य through partnerships साथ राज्य स्वास्थ्य विभाग और other organizations.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ), पर्यावरणीय स्वास्थ्य, occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य, स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन, injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
The CDC is the United States ' national पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the International Association of National Public Health Institutes.
भूकंप भविष्यवाणी `` is प्रायः पारिभाषित as the specification of the समय, स्थान, और परिमाण of a भविष्य भूकंप भीतर stated हद '', और विशेषकर of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region. ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting, जिससे is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of सामान्य भूकंप जोखिम, सहित the आवृत्ति और परिमाण of damaging भूकंप, in a given area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों, जिससे, upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर भूकंप, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake prediction must be precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased एहतियात, सहित disruption of ordinary activities and commerce, and timely enough that preparation can be made.
Predictions must also be reliable, as false alarms and cancelled सचेतक हैं नहीं तभी economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine विश्वास in, और thereby the प्रभावकारिता of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 भूकंप around the संसार प्रत्येक साल साथ a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद, नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily प्राप्त using sufficiently broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such trivial `` कामयाब पूर्वानुमान '' are not useful.
Major भूकंप हैं प्रायः followed by रिपोर्ट्स कि वे यहूद पूर्वानुमानित, or at तनिक anticipated, लकिन no अर्जी of a कामयाब prediction of a major earthquake has survived close inquiry.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst वैज्ञानिकों कि कुछ विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला, लकिन by the 1990s continuing विफलता led many scientists to question whether it was even possible.
While many scientists still hold that, दिए पर्याप्त संसाधन, भविष्यवाणी might be संभावित, अनेक अन्य maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13, 1993 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, सिंगर, संगीतकार, songwriter और रिकार्ड निर्माता.
Ryan is best known for अभिनीत as बेली पिकेट in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली Series The Suite Life on Deck.
In 2008, The सुइट जीवन on डेक क्रमित as tv 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 और the No. 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14.
Ryan started एक्टिंग in पेशेवर थिएटर at the आयु of सात ; in 2007 वो appeared in the बार्नी & मित्रों straight-to-dvd फिल्मी बार्नी : let 's go to the फायरहाउस and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney.
She is भी ज्ञात लिये appearing in the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी the longshots as Edith.
in 2009, वो अतिथि स्ट्रक्चर in an एपीसोड of wizards of waverly प्लेस in wizards on डेक साथ हन्ना मोंटाना as बेली Pickett along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck.
Then, in 2010, she starred in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां, जिससे थी the सबसे देखी केबल कार्यक्रम on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 ).
Soon after that, Ryan स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र नाट्य फिल्मी, कया If..., which premiered on August 20, 2010.
Ryan also starred in the नई डिज़्नी चैनल असली फिल्म, रेडियो विद्रोही, जहाँ वो portrays the भूमिका of tara एडम्स, a शर्मीले 17-year-old girl who adopts the radio personality, Radio Rebel.
released फ़रवरी 17, 2012.

Stührling tourbillon गति ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an जोड to the यांत्रिकी of a देखें escapement.
विकसित around 1795 by the french-swiss घड़ीसाज़ abraham-louis breguet इससे an पहले विचार by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer मेकर जॉन अर्नाल्ड, a tourbillon aims to काउंटर the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve सटीकता, tourbillons हैं स्टिल शामिल in कुछ महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is usually उजागर on the देखें 's फेस to दिखाएँ it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft installer ) is a तन्त्र घटक प्रयुक्त लिये the संस्थापना, मेंटेनेंस, and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, and often the files themselves, are packaged in installation packages, loosely relational databases संरचित as com संरचित storages और commonly ज्ञात as `` msi फाइलें '', इससे उनके default file extension.
खिड़कियाँ installer contains significant परिवर्तन इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, Setup API.
New features include a GUI framework और स्वचालित पीढी of the uninstallation अनुक्रम.
Windows Installer is positioned as an वैकल्पिक to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी संस्करण of installshield और nsis.
Microsoft encourages third parties to use खिड़कियाँ installer as the आधार लिये संस्थापना frameworks, so कि वे synchronize correctly साथ अन्य installers और रखना the आतंरिक डेटाबेस of संस्थापित products consistent.
Important सुविधाएँ ऐसे as rollback और versioning निर्भर on a सतत आतंरिक database for reliable operation.
furthermore, खिड़कियाँ installer facilitates the principle of तनिक विशेषाधिकार by performing तन्त्र installations by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as उर्जा पेय, बेची by phusion प्रोजेक्ट of शिकागो, Illinois.
Phusion operates as पेय चार brewing कम्पनी.
Four Loko, the company 's most लोकप्रिय पेय, debuted in the United States market in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 राज्य, और in कनाडा, the बहामा, Bolivia, Honduras, and Europe.
The name `` चार '' is निकला इससे the असली उर्जा पेय 's चार प्रमुख ingredients : alcohol, caffeine, taurine, and guarana.
Four branded products have been the object of legal, ethical, and health चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly विपणन उन्हें to the underaged और the purported खतरे of combining दारू and caffeine.
After the beverage was banned in several states, a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed कैफीन, taurine, और guarana as संघटक, और the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
The गर्दन of a गिटार प्रर्दशित the नट ( in the पृष्ठभूमि, coloured white ) and first four metal frets.
A fret is a raised तत्व on the गर्दन of a stringed यंत्र.
Frets usually extend आरपार the पूरा चौडाई of the गर्दन.
On सबसे आधुनिक पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On some historical instruments and non-European यंत्र, frets हैं बना of टुकड़े of स्ट्रिंग tied around the neck.
Frets divide the neck into fixed खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित to a musical फ्रेमवर्क.
On instruments such as guitars, each fret represents एक semitone in the मानक पश्चिमी प्रणाली जहाँ एक अष्टक is विभाजित into twelve semitones.
Fret is often प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया, अर्थ बस `` to दबायें bas the स्ट्रिंग behind a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their system of placement.
There was खपत of दारू दोनो दौरान and after prohibition.
the 18th amendment निषिद्ध the उत्पादन, वितरण और बिक्री of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त राज्य and was widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920.
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that दारू थी the प्रमुख कारण of सबसे निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध थी देखी as the समाधान to the nation 's poverty, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon अनुसमर्थन of the amendment, the प्रसिद्ध इंजीलवादी Billy Sunday said that `` The slums will soon be only a memory.
We will turn हमारी जेलों into कारखानों और हमारी jails into storehouses और corncribs. ''
( Compare christianity और दारू. )
Since alcohol was to be banned and since it was देखी as the कारण of सबसे, if नहीं सब, अपराधों, कुछ समुदायों बेची उनके jails.
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States कॉंग्रेस confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a हमिंगबर्ड to मक्खी to the ग्रह मंगल साथ the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ), is the आधारभूत ईकाई of लंबाई in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the उत्तर ध्रुव ( at समुद्र स्तर ), इसके परिभाषा रै महरूम periodically परिष्कृत to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it has been defined as `` the length of the path travelled by लाइट in वैक्यूम दौरान a समय अंतराल of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''

Geologists explaining the importance of volcanic राख परतों to विद्यार्थी on फ़ील्ड in आइसलैंड
A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid पदार्थ कि constitutes the धरती as खूब as the प्रक्रियाओं और इतिहास कि रै तराशा it.
geologists प्रायः engage in अध्ययन geology.
Geologists, studying more of an लागू विज्ञान than a सैद्धांतिक एक, जरूर दृष्टिकोण भूविज्ञान using भौतिकी, रसायन और जीवविज्ञान as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to वैज्ञानिकों सगाई in अन्य फ़ील्ड, हैं generally अधिक उजागर to the बाहरी than रहकर in laboratories ; हालांकि some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab.
Geologists are engaged in खोजी लिये खनन कंपनियाँ in ढूंढें of धातुओं, oils, और अन्य धरती संसाधन.
They हैं भी in the forefront of प्राकृतिक जोखिमों और आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन, अध्ययन भूकंप, volcanic activity, tsunamis, weather storms, and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events.
फिलहाल, geologists हैं भी सगाई in the चर्चा of जलवायु change, as they study the history and evidence for this Earth process.

Modern वैक्यूम tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature style
In electronics, a वैक्यूम ट्यूब, इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ), तापायनिक वाल्व, ट्यूब, or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The संग्राहक is प्रायः पतला पारदर्शी कांच in a roughly cylindrical shape.
The simplest वैक्यूम ट्यूब, the डायोड, is essentially an incandescent लाइट bulb with an added electrode inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons हैं `` boiled '' बंद इसके सतह और into the वैक्यूम अंदर the bulb.
If the एलेक्ट्रोड -- पुकारा a `` थाली '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is बना अधिक धनात्मक than the hot फिलामेंट, a सीधा वर्तमान बहती through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it संभावित to बदलें an प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान लागू to the फिलामेंट to direct current.
The introduction of a third electrode, a grid between the फिलामेंट और the थाली, yields another फलन.
A voltage लागू to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण the वर्तमान बहती इससे the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the यंत्र to be प्रयुक्त as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक.
Vacuum tubes हैं यूँ प्रयुक्त लिये rectification, प्रवर्धन, switching, or समान प्रसंस्करण or creation of electrical signals.
The विशाल बहुमत of आधुनिक दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the खण्ड परिचय gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology, which drove the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of रेडियो प्रसारण, टेलीविज़न, रडार, ध्वनि reinforcement, ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग और जनन, विशाल टेलीफोन संजाल, analog and digital computers, and industrial process control.
Although some applications had counterparts using पहले technologies ऐसे as the चिंगारी गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर, it थी the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical.
In most applications, solid-state डिवाइस ऐसे as transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस have replaced tubes.
Solid-state devices पिछला longer और हैं छोटी, अधिक कुशल, अधिक विश्वसनीय, and cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant unwanted heat, and can take many seconds—many मिनट्स in नाजुक applications—after powering on to गरम to a तापमान where they perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been developed, are impractical, or जहाँ a ट्यूब रै श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन, as साथ कुछ डिवाइस in पेशेवर ऑडियो और high-power रेडियो ट्रांसमीटरों.
tubes हैं स्टिल उत्पादित लिये such applications.
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by नाभिकीय विस्फोट और geomagnetic तूफ़ान उत्पादित by दानव सौर flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured मिठाई, फिलहाल उत्पादित और marketed by the Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a division of Mars, Inc.
They have hard शुगर शेल जिससे carry the अक्षर s.
The inside is mainly sugar, corn syrup, and hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल आयल साथ साथ फल रस, साइट्रिक एसिड, और प्राकृतिक और artificial flavours.
The confectionery रै महरूम बेची in a किस्में of फ्लेवर संग्रहण, such as Tropical and Wild Berry.
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता जो थी the प्रधान मंत्री of the संयुक्त किंगडम इससे 1940 to 1945 और again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as एक of the महानतम wartime नेताओ of the 20th सदी, चर्चिल थी भी an officer in the British Army, a historian, a writer, and an artist.
He is the only British Prime Minister in इतिहास to have प्राप्त the नोबेल पुरस्कार in साहित्य, और थी भी the पहला व्यक्ति to be बना an Honorary Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an वैभवशाली परिवार as the पोता of the 7th ड्यूक of marlborough.
His father, Lord randolph चर्चिल, थी a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा as चांसलर of the Exchequer ; his mother, Jennie Jerome, was an American socialite.
As a young army अधिकारी, he देखी कार्रवाई in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया, the सूडान, और the Second Boer War.
he gained कीर्ति as a युद्ध correspondent और लिखा books about his campaigns.
At the forefront of राजनीती लिये पचास सालो, he आयोजित अनेक political and cabinet positions.
Before the First World War, he served as President of the Board of Trade, Home सचिव, और पहला रब of the admiralty as भाग of the asquith उदार सरकारी.
During the war, he continued as First Lord of the admiralty जबतक the विनाशकारी gallipoli अभियान caused उसके प्रस्थान इससे सरकारी.
He then briefly resumed क्रियाशील फौज सेवा on the पश्चिमी सामने as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
He returned to government as Minister of munitions, सचिव of राज्य लिये युद्ध, और सचिव of राज्य लिये एयर.
After the युद्ध, चर्चिल परोसा as चांसलर of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29, controversially returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity, a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy.
Also controversial was his विपक्ष to increased घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII.
Out of office and नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' दौरान the 1930s, चर्चिल took the सीसे in चेतावनी about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, he was again appointed First Lord of the Admiralty.
Following the resignation of Neville चेम्बरलेन on 10 may 1940, चर्चिल became प्रधान Minister.
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire अंग्रेजों प्रतिरोध, विशेषकर दौरान the मुश्किल जल्दी दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood अलोन among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler.
Churchill was particularly noted for his speeches and रेडियो प्रसारण, जिससे helped inspire the British people.
He led ब्रिटेन as प्रधान मंत्री जबतक विजय over Nazi Germany had been secured.
After the रूढ़िवादी पार्टी खोया the 1945 चुनाव, he became नेता of the विपक्ष to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
After जीतना the 1951 चुनाव, he again became प्रधान Minister, before retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, Elizabeth II granted him the इज्ज़त of a राज्य अंत्येष्टि, जिससे देखी एक of the largest सभाओं of संसार कूटनीतिज्ञों in history.
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as होने among the सबसे influential लोगों in अंग्रेजों history.

The Ford Focus is a compact car ( C-segment in Europe ) manufactured by the घाट मोटर कम्पनी चूंकि 1998.
Ford began sales of the फ़ोकस to यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 और in उत्तर अमेरिका दौरान 1999 for the 2000 model year.
In Europe, South America, North अमेरिका और दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, the फ़ोकस replaced the विभिन्न संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण sold in those markets.
in एशिया और australasia, it replaced the Ford Laser.
As of the first half of 2012, the Focus surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become the संसार 's बेहतरीन selling ऑटोमोबाइल nameplate.

An agar थाली -- an उदाहरण of a बैक्टीरियल growth medium.
Specifically, it is a streak थाली ; the नारंगी लाइनों और dots हैं formed by bacterial colonies.
A growth medium or culture medium is a द्रव or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms or cells, or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are अलग प्रकार of मीडिया लिये growing अलग types of cells.
There are two major types of growth media : those used for cell culture, which use विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला इससे पौधे or पशु, और microbiological संस्कृति, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये growing microorganisms, ऐसे as bacteria or yeast.
The सबसे आम विकास मीडिया लिये microorganisms हैं nutrient broths और आगर प्लेटों ; specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth.
Some जीवों, termed सुकुमार जीवों, आवश्यकता specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, for example, are obligate intracellular parasites and आवश्यकता a विकास मीडियम containing जीना कोशिकाएं.
A talent agent, or booking agent, is a person who finds jobs for actors, authors, film directors, संगीतकारों, मॉडल, निर्माता, पेशेवर एथलीट, लेखक और अन्य लोगों in विभिन्न entertainment businesses.
An agent भी defends, supports और promotes the interest of his/her clients.
Agents can not produce उनके अपना shows due to conflict of interest.
a हुनर एजेंट जरूर be familiar with their clients.
An agent has to know कया दयालु of कार्य the क्लाएंट can और can नहीं do in अनुक्रम to match them with various jobs.
Having an agent is not जरूरी, लकिन करता सहायता the कलाकार in getting jobs.
In many cases casting directors, or अन्य व्यवसायों, go to हुनर एजेंसियों to ढूँढें कलाकारों वे हैं looking लिये.
The agent is paid a percentage of the स्टार 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations कि govern अलग प्रकार of एजेंटों कि हैं स्थापित by कलाकार 's संघ और the विधिक jurisdiction in which the agent operates.
वहीँ हैं भी पेशेवर संगठन that license talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in कैसा studios होता उपज films और यूँ reducing the लागत of विशेष और महंगी actors.
Actors and actresses were working for the studios लकिन यहूद नहीं स्वामित्व by एक प्रमुख स्टुडियो एंटिटी और so यहूद समर्थ to कार्य on within their time and with other studios.
क्युकी of इस, एजेंटों यहूद अभी देखी as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became third पार्टियों कि negotiated between studios और क्लाइंट, इस बनाना उनके सेवाएं imperative between each party.
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts, all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया मजदूर कोड, जिससे काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or निगम जो engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, promising, or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists. ''
Mars has two known moons, Phobos and deimos, जिससे हैं विचार to be captured क्षुद्रग्रह.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the वर्ण phobos ( panic/fear ) और deimos ( terror/dread ) जो, in यूनानी mythology, accompanied their father Ares, god of war, into battle.
एरीस थी ज्ञात as मंगल to the Romans.
It is possible कि मंगल may have moons छोटी than 50 - 100 मीटर और a धूल रिंग between phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered.
In law enforcement parlance, the term हत्या किताब refers to the मामला संचिका of a हत्या छानबीन.
Typically, murder books include crime झाँकी छायाचित्र और sketches, पोस्टमार्टम और forensic रिपोर्ट्स, transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं ' टीप and witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the पूरा पेपर ट्रेल of a हत्या छानबीन, इससे the समय the हत्या is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully, और it is असामान्य लिये नागरिकों to be दिए आज़ाद अभिगम to ये kinds of records, especially for unsolved cases.

Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
They are generally प्रयुक्त in फल सलाद.
A KSA, or Knowledge, कौशल, और abilities, is a श्रेणी of कथा कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying to United States Federal government job openings.
KSAs are used to determine, along with resumes, जो the बेहतरीन आवेदकों हैं जब अनेक उम्मीदवार qualify लिये a job.
The ज्ञान, कौशल और abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब performance of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of निजी प्रबन्धन पूछा संघीय एजेंसियों to रोकें requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays about one 's career and शैक्षणिक पृष्ठभूमि कि presumably qualify एक to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, skills, and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's हुनर और विशेषज्ञता और सम्बन्धित अनुभवों ( कार्य, शिक्षा, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A series of KSA कथन हैं प्रायः जरूरी जब applying लिये सबसे संघीय सरकारी और कुछ राज्य और नगर सरकारी कार्य.
KSAs are used as a गज to assess the सामर्थ्य of a prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of संभावित क्षमता to perform the duties of the job.
Most government hiring officials look for a short, कुरकुरे और साफ ksa कि emphasizes परिणाम or accomplishments प्राप्त in previous work.
ksa कथन हैं भी ज्ञात as मूल्यांकन Factors.
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '', `` Quality रैंकिंग कारकों '', `` ज्ञान, abilities, कौशल और अन्य विशेषताएँ '', or `` जॉब तत्व ''.
The नाम can be बस a नाम लकिन प्रायः it प्रभाव content and length of the essay.
Every agency has its own regulations लकिन सबसे of the समय the प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
The below definitions are defined by the u.S. दफ्तर of कर्मियों Management :
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - the गुण जरूरी to perform a जॉब और हैं generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of सूचना लागू सीधे to the प्रदर्शन of a फलन.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a सीखे psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable बर्ताव or a बर्ताव कि परिणाम in an observable product.
The स्कोरिंग of ksa essays is आधारित on a scale of from one to 100.
Job applicants must स्कोर ऊपर 70 to be माना लिये the स्थिति.
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible, providing उदाहरण इससे पिछला नियुक्ति or प्रशिक्षण कि clearly demonstrate तुम मिलें the योग्यता.
When applying to federal government positions, a Federal पुनरारंभ is प्रायः जरूरी in जोड to ksa कथन.
