Love Always is the डेब्यू एल्बम of अमरीकी r & b duo k-ci & JoJo, released on June 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
It was recorded at various studios in नई यॉर्क और the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल in 1996 और 1997.
It was produced by जोजो और अनेक अन्य, सहित devante झूले, James Mtume, and Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a भाग of jodeci पहले इस album.
The album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200 और भी appeared on अंतरराष्ट्रीय चार्ट.
The single `` All My Life `` charted क्रमांक एक in अनेक देशों, और सब चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked ऊपर the top 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love सदा थी प्राप्त favorably by आलोचकों, जो praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production.
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और सुनहरा by Music Canada and IFPI Sweden.
As of June 1999 it था बेची 2.9 लाख नक़ल in the United States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on the note periodically समायोजित आधारित on an अनुक्रमणिका जिससे reflects the लागत to the lender of उधार on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's मानक परिवर्तनीय rate/ base rate.
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, but जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट can be बदला at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States, whilst in the United States, `` adjustable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम, और implies a बंधक regulated by the संघीय सरकारी, साथ कैप्स on charges.
In अनेक देशों, समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm, and in such places, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
among the सबसे आम indices हैं the दरों on 1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ), and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders उपयोग उनके अपना लागत of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका, rather than using other indices.
This is done to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया लिये the lender, जिनकी अपना लागत of funding होगा प्रायः be related to the index.
Consequently, payments made by the borrower may बदलें over समय साथ the बदलना ब्याज रेट ( alternatively, the पद of the loan may change ).
This is distinct from the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक, जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान amounts but a fixed interest rate.
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only बंधक, the फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक, the ऋणात्मक amortization बंधक, और the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates transfer part of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क इससे the lender to the borrower.
They can be used where मनमौजी ब्याज दरों मेक फिक्स्ड रेट loans difficult to obtain.
The borrower लाभ if the ब्याज रेट जलप्रपात लकिन loses if the ब्याज rate increases.
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying लागत of उधार compared to फिक्स्ड or capped रेट mortgages.
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy, a United States Senator and brother of assassinated President John fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी, took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून 5, 1968, in लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, दौरान the अभियान ऋतु लिये the संयुक्त States Presidential election, 1968.
After winning the California and दक्षिण डकोटा प्राथमिक चुनावों लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, कैनेडी थी शॉट as he walked through the रसोईघर of the दूत Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan sirhan, a 24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी, थी convicted of Kennedy 's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime.
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming प्रमाण कि he थी framed.
The shooting was अंकित on ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर, और the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's देह lay in repose at st. पैट्रिक 's गिरजाघर in नई यॉर्क लिये दो दिनों पहले a funeral mass was held on June 8.
His body थी interred निकट उसके bhai जॉन at आर्लिंगटन नेशनल Cemetery.
His मौत prompted the सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय candidates by the United States Secret Service.
Hubert humphrey गई on to जीत the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon.
As with his brother Jack 's death, Bobby 's हत्या और the हालातों surrounding it have शाखित a किस्में of षड्यंत्र theories.
As of 2013 कैनेडी remains एक of तभी दो बैठे संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ).
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an अनौपचारिक नाम लिये the काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे generally माना to last from the mid-1980s until present day.
In this period, comic book characters generally became गहरा और अधिक psychologically जटिल, creators became better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the उद्योग, independent comics flourished, and larger publishing houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for this period is the अंधेरा आयु of कॉमिक किताबे, due to the लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim titles, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry Met Sally... is a 1989 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by नोरा ephron और directed by Rob Reiner.
It stars Billy क्रिस्टल as हैरी और मेग रयान as Sally.
The स्टोरी फ़ॉलो the शीर्षक वर्ण इससे the समय वे मिलें बस पहले sharing a cross-country ड्राइव, through twelve years or so of chance encounters in New York City.
The film raises the question `` Can men and women कभी बस be मित्रों ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक विचार परिचय संबंध कि became household अवधारणाओं, ऐसे as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the फिल्मी आए इससे reiner 's वापसी to single life after a divorce.
An इंटरव्यू ephron conducted साथ Reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally was based on ephron और कुछ of उसके मित्रों.
क्रिस्टल आए on फलक और बना उसके अपना योगदान to the पटकथा, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the dialogue based on the real-life दोस्ती between reiner और क्रिस्टल.
The साउंडट्रैक consists of मानकों performed by हैरी connick, jr., साथ a big band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick won his first Grammy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन जैज़ पुरूष गायन प्रदर्शन.
Columbia Pictures released the फिल्मी using the `` मंच '' तकनीक, जिससे शामिल खोलने it in a few चुनें शहरों, letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate interest, and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks.
When Harry मिले सैली... grossed a कुल of US $ 92.8 million in North America.
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award, an ऑस्कर नामांकन, और a लेखक गिल्ड of अमेरिका पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये उसके पटकथा.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Laughs list of the शीर्ष कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on ब्रावो 's `` 100 Funniest Movies ''.
In जल्दी 2004, the फिल्मी थी adapted for the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger Helper is a लकीर of packaged खाना उत्पाद primarily consisting of boxed पास्ता bundled साथ a पैकेट or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of each box are संयुक्त साथ browned मैदान बीफ, जल और मिल्क to बनाएँ a complete dish.
the उत्पाद लकीर भी सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ अन्य starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta.
It is बना by सामान्य मिलों.
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper उत्पाद तभी सप्लाई the मंड मद और the सॉस पैकेट्स, कुछ किस्में of the उत्पाद शामिल ground beef.
These include a frozen food line, which features some of the ब्रांड 's क्लासिक किस्में in a पूरा भोजन kit रूप, साथ frozen मैदान बीफ और frozen सॉस packaged separately इससे the नूडल्स in the same bag.
There is also an `` instant '' version of हैमबर्गर हेल्पर containing निर्जलित मांस, नूडल्स और seasonings in a छोटी थैली, requiring only water to be added.
The हैमबर्गर हेल्पर शुभंकर is the `` helping हाथ '', an anthropomorphic एनिमेटेड, चार fingered left-hand glove, which appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages.

It is the only dwarf ग्रह in the क्षुद्रग्रह बेल्ट.

A बौना ग्रह is a planetary-mass ऑब्जेक्ट कि is neither a planet nor a satellite.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is विशाल पर्याप्त लिये इसके आकार to be नियंत्रित by gravitation, लकिन कि नापसंद a ग्रह रै नहीं साफ इसके कक्षीय प्रदेश of अन्य वस्तुएँ.
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of लाशें orbiting the सूर्य, brought परिचय by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ कि rivaled प्लूटो in आकार, और आखिरकार precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object, Eris.
This classification राज्य कि लाशें विशाल पर्याप्त to have साफ the neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं पारिभाषित as ग्रह, जबकि those कि हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as small Solar System bodies.
बौना ग्रह आइये in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the रोस्टर of ग्रह by the iau रै महरूम दोनो praised और criticized ; it थी कहा to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by माइक भूरा, जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह, but has been rejected by Alan Stern, who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU currently recognizes पाँच बौना ग्रह in the सौर System :, Pluto,,, and.
However, only two of these bodies, ceres और प्लूटो, have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to demonstrate कि वे अनुरूप the definition.
Eris has been accepted as a बौना ग्रह क्युकी it is अधिक विशाल than Pluto.
the iau subsequently decided कि बेनाम trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ साथ an निरपेक्ष परिमाण उज्जवल than +1 ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a geometric albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets.
The only two such objects ज्ञात at the समय, माकेमाके और हउमेया, गई through this naming procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets.
It is suspected कि another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the Solar System are dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 बौना ग्रह may be मिला जब the संपूर्ण प्रदेश ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान, और कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered.
Individual astronomers recognize several of these, and in अगस्त 2011 माइक भूरा प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 प्रत्याशी वस्तुएँ, ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets. '
Brown identifies नौ ज्ञात वस्तुएँ – the पाँच स्वीकृत by the iau प्लस,,, और – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '', साथ another two dozen highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems साथ the विशेषताएँ of बौना ग्रह रै नहीं महरूम addressed.
A debit card ( भी ज्ञात as a बैंको कार्ड or जाँच कार्ड ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान कार्ड कि provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम to उसके or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution.
Some cards have a भंडारित मान साथ जिससे a भुगतान is बना, जबकि सबसे रिले a संदेश to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account.
The card, जहाँ स्वीकृत, can be प्रयुक्त बजाय of नकदी जब making purchases.
In कुछ मामले, the प्राथमिक खाता क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively लिये उपयोग on the Internet and there is no physical card.
in अनेक देशों, the उपयोग of डेबिट ताश रै become so फैली कि उनके आवाज़ रै overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and, in some instances, cash transactions.
The development of debit cards, unlike credit cards and चार्ज ताश, रै generally महरूम देश विशिष्ट resulting in a क्रमांक of अलग systems around the world, which were often incompatible.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be used in other देशों और अनुमत उनके उपयोग लिये अंतरजाल और फोन purchases.
Unlike credit and charge cards, payments using a debit card are immediately transferred इससे the cardholder 's designated बैंको खाता, बजाय of उन्हें paying the धन वापस at a later date.
डेबिट ताश प्रायः भी allow लिये तत्काल वापसी of नकदी, acting as the ATM card for withdrawing cash.
Merchants may also offer cashback सुविधाएं to ग्राहक, जहाँ a ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी साथ with their purchase.
Francois Henri `` Jack '' lalanne ( सितंबर 26, 1914 - जनवरी 23, 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी फ़िटनेस, कसरत, और nutritional विशेषज्ञ और प्रेरक स्पीकर who is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero. ''
He वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' और a `` जंक food junkie '' until he was 15.
He also had behavioral problems, but `` turned his जीवन around '' बाद सुनना to a पब्लिक लेक्चर by पॉल ब्रैग, a well-known पोषण स्पीकर.
During his career, he came to believe that the देश 's overall स्वास्थ्य depended on the स्वास्थ्य of इसके जनसांख्यिकी, लिखने कि `` शारीरिक संस्कृति और पोषण — is the salvation of America. ''
Decades before health और फ़िटनेस began होने प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स, lalanne थी already widely पहचाना लिये सरेआम उपदेश the स्वास्थ्य benefits of regular exercise and a good diet.
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a फ़िटनेस टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ between 1953 and 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the स्वदेश 's पहला फ़िटनेस gyms in ओकलैंड, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जिससे became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s टेलीविज़न कसरत कार्यक्रम थी aimed toward महिलाओं, जिसको he भी encouraged to join his health clubs.
He invented a number of कसरत मशीने, सहित leg-extension और चरखी डिवाइस.
Besides producing उसके अपना श्रेणी of वीडियो, he coached the बुजुर्ग और निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo कसरत, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as खूब as लिये उसके prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated, `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an एनिमल !, '' बाद lalanne, at 54, ताल a 21-year-old श्वार्ज़नेगर `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death, Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों सब over the संसार to सजीव healthier जीवनदान, '' और, as राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, था पहले लगाई उसे on उसके राज्यपाल 's परिषद on Physical Fitness.
Steve Reeves credited lalanne as उसके प्रेरणा to निर्माण उसके muscular physique जबकि keeping a पतला waist.
He was inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति और रै a स्टार on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Air forces of most of the देशों उपयोग प्रणाली समान to Armies.
however, the raf और the एयर शक्तियां of अनेक राष्ट्रमंडल देशों, or those formerly अंतर्गत a अंग्रेजों influence, उपयोग a अलग नियत of बाँधने loosely आधारित on नवल समतुल्यता ; लेफ्टिनेंट, Commander, Captain and Commodore are prefixed for air force use with Flight, Wing, Group and Air, respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to command ).
Penélope Cruz sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, she made her acting debut at 16 on टेलीविज़न और उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following साल in jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to नाजुक acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ), The Hi-Lo देश ( 1999 ), the लड़की of अपना सपनो ( 2000 ) और स्त्री on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved मान्यता लिये उसके सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow.
She has चूंकि निर्मित a कामयाब करियर, appearing in films इससे a चौड़ी दायरा of जाति, सहित the comedy Waking Up in Reno ( 2002 ), the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ), the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ), and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ).
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations लिये प्रत्येक.
She won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona.
She was the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री in इतिहास to प्राप्त an अकादमी Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
क्रूज़ रै modeled लिये companies such as Mango, Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal.
Penélope and her younger सिस्टर mónica क्रूज़ have designed वस्तुएं लिये Mango.
She has donated both उसके समय और धन to charities.
Cruz has volunteered in युगांडा और इण्डिया, जहाँ वो खर्च एक सप्ताह working लिये माँ टेरेसा ; वो दान उसके सैलरी इससे ' to help fund the late nun 's mission.
A मोम मूर्तिकला of क्रूज़ होगा be placed in a premier spot in the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris.
File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a file manager application and also a नेविगेशन औजार कि is शामिल साथ रिलीज of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
It provides a आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस लिये accessing the file systems.
It is also the component of the operating प्रणाली कि presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar और डेस्कटॉप.
Controlling the कंप्यूटर is संभावित बगैर खिड़कियाँ एक्सप्लोरर कार्यशील ( लिये उदाहरण, the संचिका | चलाएं कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ will function without it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ shell, explorer.exe, or simply “Explorer”.
The Care Bears are characters created by अमरीकी बधाई in 1981 लिये उपयोग on ग्रीटिंग ताश.
The original artwork for the cards was चित्रित by कलाकार एलेना Kucharik.
In 1983, kenner turned the परवाह Bears into plush teddy bears.
The Care Bears appeared in their अपना tv specials पुकारा the परवाह bears in the जमीन बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) और the परवाह bears बैटल the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ).
They also had their own television series from 1985 to 1988, in addition to तीन विशेषता films : the परवाह bears फिल्म ( 1985 ), परवाह bears फिल्म ii : a नई पीढी ( 1986 ), and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ).
Each Care Bear comes in a different color and has a specialized तमगा on इसके पेट कि represents इसके ड्यूटी और व्यक्तित्व.
This insignia was known as उनके `` tummy प्रतीक. ''
However, the movie परवाह bears : oopsy करता it ! renamed उन्हें `` पेट badges ''.
Adding to the Care Bear family हैं the `` परवाह भालू cousins '', जिससे विशेषता a शेर, खरगोश, पेंगुइन, raccoon, और अन्य ऐसे पशु निर्मित in the same style as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears यहूद reintroduced साथ नई खिलौने.
बना by play-along खिलौने, the नई खिलौने offered सुविधाएँ ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, and glow-in-the-dark bears.
As part of this comeback, the bears have appeared in दो computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the मताधिकार मनाये इसके 25th वर्षगांठ ; another relaunch took प्लेस, as खूब as the रिलीज of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It !.
In mid-2011, ag घोषित a पुनरुद्धार tv एनिमेटेड श्रेणी titled `` परवाह bears : स्वागत to Care-a-Lot ``.
The प्रीमियर of the श्रेणी utilizes `` 30 सालो of देखभाल ''.
It premiered on the हब on June 2, 2012.
As of 2013, Care bears merchandise is स्टिल होने marketed.

Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United States that runs इससे अंतरराज्यीय 15 निकट कोव फोर्ट, यूटा, to a पार्क और सवारी निकट बाल्टीमोर, मेरीलैंड.
It was the first Interstate राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य.
I-70 लगभग traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और भी the बूढ़ा नेशनल सड़क ) ईस्ट of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the rockies, the रूट of i-70 थी निकला from multiple sources.
I-70 is the fifth longest अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग, बाद i-90, i-80, I-40, and I-10.
The construction of I-70 in Colorado और यूटा is माना an अभियान्त्रिकी आश्चर्य as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर Tunnel, Glenwood Canyon, and the San Rafael Swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest point along the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली साथ an उन्नयन of.
The sections of the interstate in Missouri and कान्सास have रखी अर्जी to be the पहला अंतरराज्यीय in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Though विवादित, the संघीय राजमार्ग प्रशासन रै claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through glenwood canyon, समाप्त in 1992, थी the last piece of the Interstate Highway system, as originally planned, to open to traffic.
फ़ोटो of 1999 कुल eclipse
As seen from the Earth, a solar eclipse occurs जब the चंद्रमा गुजरता between the सूर्य और धरती, और the चंद्रमा fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen only at नई चंद्रमा, जब the सूर्य और the चंद्रमा हैं in संयोजन as देखी इससे धरती in an alignment referred to as syzygy.
In a कुल ग्रहण, the डिस्क of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial and annular eclipses तभी भाग of the सूर्य is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly गोलाकार कक्षा, a छोटी करीब to the धरती, और in the वही कक्षीय plane, there would be total solar eclipses every single month.
However, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's कक्षा around the सूर्य ( देखिए ecliptic ) so इसके छाया at नई moon usually misses Earth.
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the Moon 's orbit must क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये an ग्रहण ( दोनो सौर as खूब as चंद्र ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical, प्रायः लेने it दूर पर्याप्त दूर इससे धरती कि इसके apparent आकार is नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to ब्लाक the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each year at a line of nodes resulting in at तनिक दो, और up to पाँच, सौर eclipses occurring प्रत्येक साल ; no अधिक than दो of which can be total eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at any particular स्थान क्युकी totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on धरती 's सतह traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra.
An ग्रहण is a प्राकृतिक phenomenon.
Nevertheless, in कुछ प्राचीन और आधुनिक संस्कृतियों, सौर eclipses have महरूम attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its खगोलीय स्पष्टीकरण, as the सूर्य seems to गायब दौरान the दिन और the आसमान darkens in a पदार्थ of मिनट्स.
Because it is खतरनाक to dekh सीधे at the सूर्य, observers चाहिए उपयोग खास नजर सुरक्षा or indirect viewing techniques when viewing a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a total eclipse.
It is safe to view the total phase of a कुल सौर ग्रहण साथ the unaided नजर and without protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles होगा सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe or गवाह पूर्वानुमानित सेंट्रल सौर eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` भाग '', `` portion '' ) is a राजनैतिक संगठन कि typically seeks to influence, or entirely कंट्रोल, सरकारी नीति, प्रायः by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office.
Parties participate in electoral अभियान और शैक्षणिक मंगवाने or विरोध actions.
Parties प्रायः espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि, expressed in a पार्टी कार्यक्रम, bolstered by a लिखा मंच with specific goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone फल belonging to the genus mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae.
The mango is native to South Asia, इससे जहाँ it रै महरूम वितरित विश्वव्यापी to become एक of the सबसे cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) are also grown on a more स्थानीयकृत आधार, mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn आम ' – is the तभी आम पेड़ commonly cultivated in अनेक तीव्र and subtropical regions.
It is the national fruit of इण्डिया, पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन.
In several cultures, इसके फल और पत्ते हैं ritually प्रयुक्त as पुष्पक सजावट at weddings, public celebrations and religious ceremonies.
Gill arnette byrd, < संदर्भ नाम > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football player.
He was a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the सैन डिएगो chargers बाद graduating इससे सैन जोस राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों.
Byrd was inducted into the chargers हॉल of Fame in 1998.
He was an All-City running back and defensive back at Lowell High School ( San फ्रांसिस्को ), helping to सीसे the कार्डिनल्स to the नगर चैंपियनशिप in his senior season of 1978.
World मैप प्रर्दशित the tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the Northern tropic, is the circle of latitude on the धरती कि marks the सबसे northerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे ओवरहेड at its zenith.
This event occurs एकबार प्रति साल, at the समय of the जून संक्रांति, जब the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
It फिलहाल ( साल 2013 ) झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the Equator.
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart, marking the सबसे southerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे overhead, is the Tropic of Capricorn.
ये ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं दो of the पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि उपायों or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश that mark maps of the Earth, besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator.
The positions of these circles of अक्षांश ( अन्य than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष of रोटेशन सापेक्ष to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया, उत्तर अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, और Australia.
Discs using the dvd-video specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a dvd player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, और the बिट रेट is प्रायः adaptive.
It was first available लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम लिये a शुल्क of $ 5,000.
The specification is नहीं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ, क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd किताब is मालिकाना और गोपनीय.
In computing and specifically अंतरजाल, a जोंक is एक जो लाभ, प्रायः deliberately, इससे अन्य ' सूचना or प्रयत्न लकिन करता not offer anything in return, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech.
In economics, this type of बर्ताव is पुकारा `` फ़्री सवारी '' और is संबद्ध with the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching करता नहीं necessarily refer to illegal उपयोग of कंप्यूटर संसाधन, लकिन प्रायः बजाय to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit, using too much of कया is freely दिए बगैर contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it.
The name गर्भाशयी इससे the जोंक, an एनिमल कि झंझट रक्त और तब कोशिशें to leave unnoticed.
Other शर्तें हैं प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as `` freeloader '', लकिन जोंक is the most common.
the पूरा त्रिभुज लोगो, प्रयुक्त in various versions from 1970 to 1993.
The United States Postal Service ( USPS ), also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail, is an independent agency of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जिम्मेदार लिये providing डाक सेवा in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It is one of the few government एजेंसियों explicitly प्राधिकृत by the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, जहाँ बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन थी नियुक्त the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 इससे फ्रैंकलिन 's आपरेशन और रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान रूप in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 मजदूर and operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the ऑपरेटर of the largest गाडी बेड़े in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve सब अमेरिकी, regardless of geography, at uniform price and quality.
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` u.S. मेल '' और निजी letterboxes in the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन स्टिल competes विरूद्ध निजी पैकेज डिलीवरी services, such as UPS and FedEx.
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the जल्दी 1980s साथ the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies लिये लागत संबद्ध साथ the disabled and overseas voters.
Since the 2006 all-time शिखर मेल आवाज़, बाद जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed the डाक जवाबदेही और enhancement अधिनियम ``, ( जिससे mandated $ 5.5 अरब प्रति साल to be सशुल्क into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, D.C. has been the पूंजी of the संयुक्त राज्य since 1800.
Eight other cities have served as the meeting प्लेस लिये कॉंग्रेस और हैं इसलिए माना to have एकबार been the capital of the United States.
In addition, each of the 50 U.S. states and the five प्रिंसिपल territories of the संयुक्त राज्य maintains its own capital.
राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड नियत in a ring
The राजकुमारी काटें is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय काटें आकार लिये ईंट, अगला to a round brilliant.
The face-up आकार of the राजकुमारी काटें is वर्गाकार or आयताकार और the प्रोफ़ाइल or side-on आकार is similar to that of an inverted pyramid with four beveled sides.
The princess cut is a relatively new डायमंड काटें, having महरूम निर्मित in the 1960s.
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें, in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड, पुकारा the क्राउन, is काटें साथ a गोलाकार face-up आकार और the नीचे, पुकारा the मण्डप, is shaped similar to a cone.
A princess cut with the same width as the व्यास of a गोलाकार शानदार होगा तौल अधिक as it रै चार किनारे जिससे would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant.
The princess cut is sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार परिवर्धित शानदार.
However, while displaying the same high degree of brilliance, इसके faceting स्टाइल is अद्वितीय और completely अलग इससे कि of a round brilliant.
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` क्रॉस '' काटें क्राउन और a श्रेणी of अद्वितीय, chevron-shaped facets in the मण्डप जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब जब the स्टोन is viewed सीधे through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the high degree of light वापसी of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ a distinctive वर्गाकार or आयताकार shape.
the वर्गाकार राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड is प्रायः थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the वही carat weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain अधिक क्रिस्टल वज़न makes इस आकार लोकप्रिय amongst diamond cutters.
accredited gem appraisers ( आगा ) और अमरीकी gem समाज प्रयोगशाला ( agsl ) और यूरोपीय gem laboratories-usa ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut.
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an आदर्श राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड और अनेक डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट आदर्श ईंट साथ differing facet पैटर्न और कोण as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough उद्योग सर्वसम्मति or अनुभवजन्य आंकड़ा to बताएँ काटें ग्रेडिंग मानकों लिये राजकुमारी काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे by ईंट accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades.
The name `` Princess Cut '' was originally used in connection साथ another डायमंड काटें, वरना ज्ञात as the `` प्रोफ़ाइल '' काटें, designed by arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The वही नाम थी बाद प्रयुक्त और बना लोकप्रिय by ygal पर्लमैन, Betzalel Ambar, and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
A similar cut with only 49 facets, as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the राजकुमारी काटें, थी बाद ब्रांडेड the `` quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles.
तीन सालो of ऑप्टिकल शोध yielded a वर्गाकार स्टोन साथ faceting समान to that of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक of a राजकुमारी काटें diamond.
This can प्रायः be संकल्पित by the तार आरेख कि is plotted in diamond grading reports.
By adding more chevrons on the मण्डप पक्ष of the डायमंड, the व्यक्तिगत facets of the diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets.
As a result, it can दे a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड a `` कुचल ice '' look.
Vice versa, जब a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड रै lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets.
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the धूसर भेड़िया ( canis lupus ), a सदस्य of the कैनिडाए परिवार of the mammalian order Carnivora.
the पद `` घरेलू श्वान '' is generally used for both domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog has been the first animal to be domesticated और रै महरूम the सबसे widely रखा working, शिकार, और पालतु एनिमल in human history.
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine प्रजाति, as opposed to the शब्द `` कुतिया '' लिये the मादा of the species.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 सालो पहले लकिन,, the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी बनने सर्वव्यापी across world cultures.
Dogs perform many roles for people, such as hunting, herding, pulling loads, सुरक्षा, assisting पुलिस और सैन्य, companionship, and, more recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
This impact on human society has given them the nickname `` man 's बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी संसार.
In some संस्कृतियों, कुत्तो हैं भी a सोर्स of meat.
In 2001, there were estimated to be 400 लाख कुत्तो in the संसार.
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few hundred years old, having been artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies और व्यवहार by लोगों लिये विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक roles.
through इस चयनात्मक प्रजनन, the श्वान रै विकसित into सैंकड़ों of varied breeds, और shows अधिक behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal.
For example, height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white through grays ( usually called `` blue '' ) to black, and browns इससे लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in a चौड़ी विभिन्नता of पैटर्न ; coats can be छोटी or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is आम लिये सबसे breeds to शेड this coat.
आरेख of a हस्तांतरण electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी, musée देस कला et métiers, Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a प्रकार of सूक्ष्मदर्शी कि उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image.
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the ढांचा of छोटी वस्तुएँ क्युकी electrons have wavelengths परिचय 100,000 टाइम्स shorter than दृश्य light photons.
They can achieve बेहतर than 50 pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to परिचय 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal लाइट microscopes are limited by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी उपयोग electrostatic और इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to control the electron beam and focus it to form an image.
These electron ऑप्टिकल lenses हैं analogous to the कांच lenses of a लाइट optical microscope.
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of biological and अकार्बनिक नमूनों सहित microorganisms, कोशिकाएं, विशाल अणुओं, biopsy नमूने, धातुओं, और crystals.
Industrially, the electron microscope is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल और विफलता विश्लेषण.
Modern electron microscopes produce electron micrographs, using specialized डिजिटल कैमरे or फ़्रेम grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried मुर्गा तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in नई ऑरलियन्स, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as popeyes मुर्गा & बिस्कुट or popeyes मुर्गा & seafood, it थी acquired by sandy स्रोतों, Georgia -based AFC Enterprises, originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a company press release dated June 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group, measured by number of units '', with more than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 states and the District of Columbia, and over 22 countries worldwide including Turkey, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, चीन, हांग काँग, इराकी, इंडोनेशिया, जॉर्डन, कुवैत, संयुक्त अरब अमीरात, जापानी, मलेशिया, सऊदी अरब, दक्षिण कोरियाई, सिंगापुर, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, Vietnam, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
परिचय तीस स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a weight प्रशिक्षण कसरत in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a वज़न or प्रतिरोध away from them using their legs.
The term leg press also refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform इस कसरत.
The leg press can be प्रयुक्त to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall निम्नतर देह शक्ति ( इससे घुटना joint to hip ).
Using the तिर्यक sled-type लेग press machine.
There are दो प्रमुख प्रकार of leg press:
The तिर्यक or लंबवत 'sled ' प्रकार लेग press.
वज़न डिस्क ( प्लेटों ) हैं संलग्न सीधे to the sled, which is mounted on rails.
The user sits नीचे the sled और pushes it upward with their feet.
These मशीने सामान्यतः शामिल समायोज्य सुरक्षा कोष्ठक कि prevent the उपयोक्ता from being trapped under the weight.
the 'cable ' प्रकार लेग दबायें, or 'seated लेग दबायें ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits upright and pushes आगे साथ उनके फीट onto a थाली कि is संलग्न to the वज़न stack by means of a long steel cable.
Wendy विलियम्स शिकारी ( born वेन्डी जोन विलियम्स ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress and author.
वो होस्ट a syndicated टेलीविज़न बात show, The Wendy Williams Show.

Williams रै gained सुर्खी लिये उसके on-air spats with celebrities.
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called The वेन्डी विलियम्स अनुभव जिससे ब्रॉडकास्ट कार्यक्रम surrounding उसके रेडियो show.
She has written an autobiography and अनेक अन्य किताबे, और रै निर्मित a उत्पाद लकीर पुकारा Adorn by Wendy Williams.
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' speech पहले the हाउस of burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by Peter F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or give me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक हेनरी इससे a वाक he made to the Virginia Convention.
On that day, at st. जॉन 's गिरिजाघर in रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, और is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
among the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य us राष्ट्रपतियों Thomas Jefferson and George Washington.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the देश 's अटलांटिक प्रदेश, it incorporates the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और mainland Labrador to the northwest, with a combined area of.
In 2011, the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी was 514,536.
Approximately 92 प्रतिशत of the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी जीवनदान on the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( सहित its associated smaller islands ), of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड अंग्रेज़ी ) as उनके माँ जीभ in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was भी घर to अद्वितीय किस्में of फ्रेंच, और आयरिश, as खूब as the now-extinct Beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun और inuktitut हैं भी spoken.
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city, St. John 's, is कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी महानगर क्षेत्रफल, और is घर to लगभग 40 percent of the province 's population.
St. John 's is the seat of government, home to the House of सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador became the दसवाँ प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई कनफेडरेशन on कूच 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
On December 6, 2001, an amendment was made to the संविधान of कनाडा to बदलें the प्रांत 's आधिकारिक नाम to न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, Canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और to the प्रदेश on the कनाडाई mainland as Labrador.
थियोडोर `` t.r. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; अक्तूबर 27, 1858—january 6, 1919 ) थी the 26th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted for his समृद्ध व्यक्तित्व, दायरा of रूचि और उपलब्धियाँ, और उसके नेतृत्व of the प्रगतिशील Movement, as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity.
He was a नेता of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और संस्थापक of the पहला अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` सांड Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before बनने अध्यक्ष, he आयोजित कार्यालयों at the city, state, and federal levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, एक्सप्लोरर, शिकारी, लेखक, और सिपाही हैं as much a part of his fame as any office he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United States in 1901, making him the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he ताल आउट the youngest निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, जॉन F. कैनेडी, by तभी एक साल.
Roosevelt थी भी the पहला of तभी तीन बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों to have won the Nobel Peace Prize.
The टेडी भालू is नामित बाद उसे, despite उसके अवमानना लिये होने called `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy family in New York City, रूज़वेल्ट थी a sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और ठहरे at घर studying natural history.
To overcome उसके शारीरिक कमज़ोरी, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager छात्र of प्रकृति.
He attended Harvard University, where he studied जीवविज्ञान, boxed और विकसित an ब्याज in naval affairs.
In 1881, one year out of Harvard, he was elected to the New York State सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of उसके रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( the `` GOP '' ).
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) स्थापित उसके पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार, the बाहरी, and current political issues, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, his first wife और उसके माँ died on the वही day.
He temporarily बाएँ राजनीती और गई to the frontier, बनने a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran लिये महापौर in 1886, finishing तीसरा साथ 60,000 votes.
he बाद gained कीर्ति by लेने vigorous charge of the city police.
at the नेशनल स्तर, he थी a leader in civil service reform.
The spanish–american युद्ध broke आउट in 1898 जबकि रूज़वेल्ट थी, effectively, कार्यशील the Department of the Navy.
He promptly resigned and formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स – a स्वयंसेवी प्यादे रेजीमेंट that fought in Cuba.
The war hero was elected राज्यपाल in 1898 और in 1900 थी मनोनीत for vice president.
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley on a मंच of ऊँची tariffs, the सुनहरा मानक, साम्राज्यवाद, समृद्धि at home and victory abroad.
In 1901, अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley थी assassinated and Roosevelt became President.
He attempted to मूव the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद, सहित विश्वास busting and increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 बाद having ascended to the प्रेसिडेंसी ( इससे the vice-presidency ) upon the मौत of उसके पूर्ववर्ती, जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote चूंकि the uncontested चुनाव of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` वर्गाकार सौदे `` to describe his domestic agenda, emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies.
As an outdoorsman और naturalist, he प्रचारित the conservation movement.
On the world stage, रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों यहूद characterized by उसके स्लोगन, `` बोलो softly and carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common पूर्वज ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक, child/descendant, सहोदर, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or sibling of a parent/ancestor ).
However in common parlance, `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically अर्थात् `` पहला cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the english-speaking संसार to describe the सटीक संबंध between दो cousins ( in the व्यापक भाव ) और the पूर्वज they have in common.
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट, हालांकि आम उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the डिग्री और removals और refers to लोगों साथ आम ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.

The series थी निर्मित by stu चांदी.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy जो, बाद खोने उसके अभिभावक, is अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by एलेक्स karras, और उसके नई socialite बीवी, निभाई by सुसान Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively शादीशुदा युगल था to समायोजन to उनके नई जीवनदान और अचानक parenthood, लकिन it थी the अनुकूल वेबस्टर himself who drove much of the plot.
The series was उत्पादित by जॉर्जियाई खाड़ी ltd., emmanuel लुईस entertainment Enterprises, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television.

तीन प्रकार of कोशिका division
Cell division is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a जनक कोशिका divides into two or more daughter cells.
कोशिका प्रभाग प्रायः occurs as भाग of a larger cell cycle.
In eukaryotes, there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative प्रभाग, whereby प्रत्येक बेटी कोशिका is genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ), और a reductive कोशिका प्रभाग, whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in उनके जीवन साईकिल, और दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative कोशिका प्रभाग known as binary fission, where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of सजीव, हैं preceded by a सिंगल गोलाकार of DNA replication.
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba, one cell division is समतुल्य to जनन – an संपूर्ण नई सजीव is निर्मित.
On a larger स्केल, mitotic कोशिका प्रभाग can बनाएँ progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय जीवों, such as plants that grow from cuttings.
कोशिका प्रभाग भी enables sexually reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
And after growth, cell division allows लिये continual निर्माण और मरम्मत of the सजीव.
A human being 's body experiences परिचय 10,000 खरब कोशिका विभाजन in a lifetime.
Cell division रै महरूम modeled by परिमित subdivision rules.
The प्राथमिक चिंता of कोशिका प्रभाग is the मेंटेनेंस of the original cell 's genome.
Before division can occur, the genomic सूचना कि is भंडारित in गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated, और the duplicated genome जरूर be अलग cleanly between cells.
A great deal of cellular अवसंरचना is शामिल in keeping genomic सूचना सतत between `` generations ''.
Mountain सीमाएँ of मैसाचुसेट्स, संयुक्त States.
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones, 23 फ़रवरी 1955, southampton, हैम्पशायर, इंग्लैण्ड ) is a अंग्रेजों संगीतकार, singer and songwriter.
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit singles & एल्बम, `` जोन्स is an संपन्नता singer-songwriter जो थी a नियमित chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop.
Jones, who was equally popular in the u.S., appeared at सजीव सहायता ``.
Allmusic पत्रकार, स्टीफन थामस erlewine adds, `` जोन्स थी एक of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music मिलाया the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive ध्वनि of नई वेव with the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s, पहले he retreated into होने a cult फिगर in the 1990s ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय आइल of man tt ( पर्यटक ट्रॉफी ) रेस is a मोटरसाइकिल रेसिंग इवेंट आयोजित on the Isle of Man and was for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world.
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 before being transferred to the संयुक्त किंगडम बाद सुरक्षा चिंताएं और चलाएं by the fim as the अंग्रेजों ग्रैंड प्रिक्स लिये the 1977 season.
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the TT Formula 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's रेसिंग औकात.
From 1989 the racing has been विकसित by the आइल of man विभाग of पर्यटन as the आइल of Man TT Festival.
The race is चलाएं in a time-trial स्वरूप on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the प्रावधानों of an अधिनियम of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ).
The first race was held on Tuesday 28 May 1907 और थी पुकारा the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auto-cycle पर्यटक ट्रॉफी.
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 गोद of the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज लिये road-legal touring मोटरसाइकिल साथ exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
The winner of the single-cylinder class, और overall विजेता of the पहला इवेंट in 1907, थी चार्ली collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल in a time of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph.
The winner of the twin-cylinder class was rem fowler सवारी a peugeot एंजिन नॉर्टन in a समय of 4 घंटों 21 मिनट्स और 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph.
The trophy प्रस्तुत to चार्ली collier as the विजेता of the 1907 आइल of Man TT Race, was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars.
It featured a stylised संस्करण of ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर hermes by giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel.
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat सुनहरा montague ट्रॉफी प्रस्तुत to जॉन नेपियर ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural विजेता of the आइल of man पर्यटक Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy.
The Marquis de mouzilly st. मंगल ट्रॉफी is अभी प्रस्तुत annually to the विजेता of the आइल of man वरिष्ठ TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between 26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of man tt रेस आयोजित on the गाँव green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 classic मोटरसाइकिल लिये the centenary re-enactment on the असली st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स थी flagged दूर by पूर्व संसार motor-cycle Champion Geoff Duke.
the पहला of the भागीदार to be flagged दूर थी the recently लौटी twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first Isle of Man TT Race in 1907.
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy Martin सवारी a 1938 triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य पूर्व tt प्रतिस्पर्धी सहित एलन cathcart, सैमी मिलर, Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap.

Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs जब लोगों हैं बगैर कार्य और actively seeking work.
the बेरोजगारी रेट is a माप of the व्यापकता of बेरोजगारी और it is गणना as a प्रतिशत by dividing the क्रमांक of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force.
During periods of recession, an अर्थव्यवस्था प्रायः अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची unemployment rate.
According to International श्रमिक संगठन रपट, अधिक than 197 लाख लोगों globally हैं आउट of कार्य or 6 % of the संसार 's workforce were without a job in 2012.
There remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the कल्याणकारी, consequences and solutions for unemployment.
Classical economics, New classical economics, and the आस्ट्रिया स्कूल of अर्थशास्त्र argue कि मार्केट mechanisms हैं विश्वसनीय अर्थात् of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue विरूद्ध interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the बाहर, ऐसे as unionization, minimum wage laws, taxes, and other regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers.
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी और अनुशंसा government interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions.
This सिद्धान्त focuses on तूल झटके कि एकाएक reduce कुल demand for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers.
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to बढ़ाएँ माँग लिये मजदूर ; ये can शामिल वित्तीय stimuli, सरेआम वित्तपोषित जॉब सृष्टि, और expansionist monetary policies.
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment, there are a few categorizations of unemployment that हैं प्रयुक्त to अधिक precisely मॉडल the प्रभाव of बेरोजगारी within the economic system.
The main types of unemployment शामिल संरचनात्मक बेरोजगारी जिससे focuses on संरचनात्मक समस्याएं in the अर्थव्यवस्था और inefficiencies अंतर्निहित in श्रमिक बाज़ार, including a mismatch between the supply and demand of laborers with necessary skill sets.
Structural arguments emphasize causes and solutions related to विघटनकारी technologies और वैश्वीकरण.
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their अपना कार्य और कैसा कि compares to वर्तमान मजदूरी दरों प्लस the समय और प्रयत्न जरूरी to ढूँढें a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता जॉब प्रविष्टि दहलीज और wage rates.
Behavioral economists हाइलाइट व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय बनाना, और प्रायः involve समस्याएं और समाधान concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages.
Collectivism is any philosophic, political, धार्मिक, आर्थिक, or सोशल आउटलुक कि emphasizes the interdependence of प्रत्येक इंसान being in a society or civilization.
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of व्यक्तिगत in इंसान प्रकृति ( in the वही रास्ता ऊँची कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति exists as the रिवर्स of कम कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति ).
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion भीतर सोशल समूह ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '', in कया विशिष्ट कॉन्टेक्स्ट it is पारिभाषित ) और in कुछ मामले, the प्रधानता of group goals over individual goals.
Collectivists often फ़ोकस on जातियाँ, समाज, स्वदेश or country.
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of सरकारी और राजनैतिक, आर्थिक और शैक्षणिक तत्त्वज्ञान throughout इतिहास और सबसे इंसान समाजों in अभ्यास contain तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत और collectivism.
Some examples of collectivist संस्कृतियों शामिल इण्डिया और जापानी.
collectivism can be विभाजित into आड़ा collectivism and vertical collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals, और is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on decentralization और समतावाद.
Vertical collectivism is आधारित on hierarchical structures of शक्ति और on moral और cultural conformity, and is therefore based on centralization and hierarchy.
A cooperative enterprise would be an उदाहरण of आड़ा collectivism, whereas a सैन्य पदानुक्रम होता be an उदाहरण of लंबवत collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an immune mediated disease of the brain.
It प्रायः occurs following a वाइरल संक्रमण लकिन may appear following टीकाकरण, बैक्टीरियल or parasitic infection, or even appear spontaneously.
As it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to अनेक काठिन्य, और is माना भाग of the अनेक sclerosis borderline diseases.
The incidence रेट is परिचय 8 प्रति 1,000,000 लोगों per year.
Although it occurs in सब आयु, सबसे reported मामले हैं in children और adolescents, साथ the औसत age around 5 to 8 years old.
The mortality rate may be as ऊँची as 5 %, पूरा रिकवरी is देखी in 50 to 75 % of मामले, जबकि up to 70 to 90 % recover with some minor residual disability.
the औसत समय to रिकवर is one to six months.
ADEM produces अनेक जलन lesions in the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord, particularly in the white matter.
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white matter and cortical gray-white जंक्शन of दोनो दिमागी बांटती, cerebellum, brainstem, और स्पाइनल cord, लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और gray matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved.
When the patient suffers more than एक demyelinating एपीसोड, it is पुकारा तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the digestion प्रणाली जिससे कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ पशु, सहित vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
it is शामिल in the दूसरी phase of digestion, following mastication ( chewing ).
The पेट is स्तिथ between the ग्रासनाल और the छोटी intestine.
It secretes protein-digesting एंजाइमों पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in खाना पाचन, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines.
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is निकला इससे the यूनानी शब्द stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately इससे stoma ( ), `` मुँह ''.
The शब्द gastro- और gastric ( अर्थ सम्बन्धित to the पेट ) हैं both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ).
1940 pontiac खास श्रेणी 25 Woodie
A woodie is a car देह स्टाइल, विशेषकर a स्टेशन वैगन, जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed of लकडी फ्रेमवर्क with infill panels of wood or painted metal.
After the निधन of वास्तविक लकडी निर्माण, निर्माताओं प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional, अनुकरण framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was जगाई abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स साथ a श्रेणी of पक्ष और पश्च आड़ा डोले.
A pearl is a hard ऑब्जेक्ट उत्पादित भीतर the नरम ऊतक ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
Just जैसे the शेल of a clam, a पर्ल is बना up of कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट in minute crystalline form, which has been deposited in concentric layers.
The ideal pearl is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना, लकिन अनेक अन्य आकार of मोती ( baroque pearls ) occur.
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां, and because of this, the word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare, fine, admirable, and valuable.
The most valuable pearls occur अनायास in the जंगली, लकिन वे हैं अत्यधिक rare.
These जंगली मोती हैं referred to as natural pearls.
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत of those कि हैं currently sold.
Imitation pearls are also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry, but the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत ग़रीब, और प्रायः, कृत्रिम मोती हैं easily distinguished from genuine pearls.
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily for उपयोग in आभूषण, लकिन in the पास्ट वे यहूद भी सिले onto lavish clothing.
Pearls have also महरूम कुचल और प्रयुक्त in कॉस्मेटिक्स, दवाइयाँ, और in पेंट formulations.
Whether wild or cultured, gem quality मोती हैं लगभग सदा nacreous और, as is the आंतरिक of the शेल कि produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs हैं सक्षम of producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by कुछ स्त्रोत ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological लैब्स और भी अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम, और हैं formed in the वही रास्ता, सबसे of them have no value, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as Live Search, Windows Live Search, और एमएसएन ढूंढें ) is a वेब ढूंढें इंजन ( advertised as a `` निर्णय engine `` ) from Microsoft.
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO स्टीव बाल्मर on may 28, 2009 at the सब बाते डिजिटल conference in San Diego for release on June 1.
Notable changes include the listing of search suggestions while प्रश्नों हैं डाला और a सूची of सम्बन्धित खोज ( पुकारा `` explore फलक '' ) आधारित on semantic प्रौद्योगिकी इससे powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
On July 29, 2009, microsoft और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे bing होता शक्ति Yahoo ! Search.
All Yahoo ! ढूंढें वैश्विक ग्राहक और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित to have बना the transition by early 2012.
In October 2011, Bing घोषित it थी working on नई back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना, साथ the लक्ष्य of delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users.
Known as `` बाघ '', the नई index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that includes `` Sidebar '', a social विशेषता कि खोज उपयोक्ता ' सोशल संजाल लिये सूचना प्रासंगिक to the search query.

In American football, each टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड at one time.
the विशिष्ट भूमिका कि a खिलाड़ी takes on the field is called their position.
Under the आधुनिक नियम of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, that is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी, the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the बॉल, जो is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग, और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ), और the खास टीमों ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's main job is.
The Irish people ( or na héireannaigh ; ulster-scots : airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय समूह जो originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000 सालो ( according to पुरातत्व अध्ययन, देखिए प्रागैतिहासिक Ireland ).
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they are claimed to be descended इससे समूह ऐसे as the nemedians, fomorians, fir bolg, tuatha dé danann और the milesians.
lebor gabála érenn, a किताब of आयरिश mythology tells that Milesians were Scythian descendants.
The main groups कि interacted साथ the आयरिश in the मध्य आयु शामिल the Picts, Scots, and the Vikings.
Due to this सम्पर्क, icelanders हैं विख्यात लिये having some Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman आक्रमण of the ऊँची मध्य आयु, the अंग्रेज़ी बागानों और the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the देश introduced the Normans and Flemish into Ireland.
Welsh, Picts, Bretons, and small parties of Gauls and भी anglo-saxons हैं ज्ञात in आयरलैंड इससे much पहले टाइम्स.
वहीँ have महरूम अनेक notable Irish people throughout history.
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary columbanus is regarded as एक of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by kilian of würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg.
The scientist Robert Boyle is माना the `` पिता of रसायन ``.
Famous Irish explorers शामिल ब्रेंडन the नाविक, रॉबर्ट mcclure, अर्नेस्ट shackleton और tom Crean.
By some accounts, the first European child born in North अमेरिका था आयरिश descent on दोनो पहलू ; और an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to नियत पैर on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are descendants of Irish people living in many western देशों, विशेषकर in english-speaking देशों.
Historically, emigration रै महरूम caused by राजनीती, अकाल और आर्थिक issues.
An estimated 50 to 80 million people हैं वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों, primarily in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा और आइसलैंड ; there are also smaller numbers in Argentina, Chile, Mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South Africa, New Zealand, France, Germany and Brazil.
the largest क्रमांक of वंशजों of आयरिश people live in the United States.
The number of people living in Australia who are of Irish descent is उच्चतर, as a प्रतिशत of कुल जनसांख्यिकी, than कि of कोई other country.
Approximately forty percent of the उपनिवेश जनसांख्यिकी of आइसलैंड आए इससे आयरलैंड or स्कॉटलैंड.
the बहुत पहला निवासियों of Iceland were Irish.
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried into कक्षा by a स्पेस शटल in 1990 और remains in आपरेशन.
A aperture telescope in low Earth orbit, Hubble 's चार प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी, दृश्य, and near infrared.
The दूरदर्शी is नामित बाद the astronomer एडविन Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows it to लो अत्यधिक शार्प बिंब साथ लगभग no पृष्ठभूमि light.
Hubble 's Deep Field have been some of the most detailed visible-light बिंब कभी, allowing a गहन दृश्य into space and time.
Many Hubble observations have led to सफलताएँ in astrophysics, ऐसे as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe.
हालांकि नहीं the पहला स्पेस दूरदर्शी, हबल is एक of the largest और सबसे बहुमुखी, और is खूब ज्ञात as दोनो a vital research tool and a public relations boon for astronomy.
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA, with योगदान इससे the यूरोपीय स्पेस एजेंसी, और is संचालित by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी विज्ञान Institute.
The HST is one of NASA 's ग्रेट observatories, साथ साथ the कॉम्पटन गामा रे वेधशाला, the चन्द्रा X-ray Observatory, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
Space telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as जल्दी as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, साथ a प्रस्तावित लॉन्च in 1983, लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by तकनीकी देरी, बजट समस्याएं, and the Challenger disaster.
When finally launched in 1990, वैज्ञानिकों मिला कि the प्रमुख दर्पण था महरूम मैदान incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's capabilities.
The दूरदर्शी थी लौटी to इसके intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993.
Hubble is the तभी दूरदर्शी designed to be सर्विस in स्पेस by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, and replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द on सुरक्षा grounds following the कोलंबिया disaster.
However, after spirited public discussion, NASA administrator Mike Griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल सर्विसिंग मिशन, समाप्त in 2009 by स्पेस शटल Atlantis.
The telescope is now अपेक्षित to फलन जबतक at तनिक 2013.
Its वैज्ञानिक successor, the जेम्स webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी ( jwst ), is to be शुभारम्भ in 2018 or possibly later.
anti-inflammatory refers to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or उपचार that reduces inflammation.
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half of analgesics, remedying पीड़ा by reducing सूजन as opposed to opioids, which affect the central nervous system.
The Tonight Show is a us late-night बात दिखाएँ कि रै aired on NBC since 1954.
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment कार्यक्रम in the us और the तीसरा longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the Press and Today.
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ), Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ), jay लीनो ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), और Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts also appeared, विशेषकर दौरान the paar और Carson eras.
The longest-serving host to date थी जॉनी कार्सन, जो hosted the tonight दिखाएँ अभिनीत जॉनी कार्सन for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The current host of the दिखाएँ is jay लीनो, जो था previously hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, एनबीसी घोषित jimmy fallon होता become the नई मेजबान of The Tonight Show.
The Tonight Show with jimmy fallon होगा प्रीमियर फ़रवरी 24, 2014, the दिन बाद the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
SS एंड्रिया डोरिया.
Pronounced was an ocean लाइनर लिये the इतालवी लकीर ( società di navigazione इटालिया ) घर ported in जेनोआ, इटली, सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके डूब in 1956, जब 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ).
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral एंड्रिया डोरिया, the जलयान था a सकल पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a country attempting to rebuild its economy and reputation after संसार युद्ध ii, एंड्रिया डोरिया थी an प्रतीक of इतालवी national pride.
Of all Italy 's जहाजों at the समय, एंड्रिया डोरिया थी the largest, तीव्रतम and supposedly safest.
Launched on 16 June 1951, the जलयान undertook इसके maiden voyage on 14 जनवरी 1953.
On 25 जुलाई 1956, जबकि the एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क नगर, the eastbound of the स्वीडिश अमरीकी लकीर collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately started to list severely to स्टारबोर्ड, जिससे बाएँ हाफ of इसके lifeboats अनुपयोगी.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of जीवन, लकिन the दक्षता of the जलयान 's तकनीकी डिज़ाइन अनुमत it to रहो afloat लिये over 11 घंटों बाद the ramming.
The good behavior of the crew, improvements in संचार और the रैपिड जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a विपत्ति समान in स्केल to that of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and बच, जबकि 46 लोगों died as a consequence of the collision.
The evacuated luxury liner capsized और sank the following morning.
This दुर्घटना remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur in संयुक्त राज्य waters since the sinking of the in 1915.
The घटना और इसके aftermath were heavily covered by the news media.
While the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable, the cause of the collision with the स्टॉकहोम और the घाटा of एंड्रिया डोरिया उत्पन्न much ब्याज in the मीडिया और अनेक lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the two शिपिंग कंपनियाँ दौरान hearings तत्काल बाद the विपत्ति, no determination of the कारण ( s ) थी कभी formally published.
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian लाइनर, अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated कि a misreading of रडार on the स्वीडिश जलयान may have initiated the टक्कर कोर्स, अग्रणी to त्रुटियाँ on both ships.
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic यात्री पोत to डूबना पहले वायुयान became the पसन्दीदा method of travel.
डायलिसिस tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of सेमi- or partially permeable झिल्ली tubing बना इससे regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used for diffusion साथ solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त with water only.
Osmosis is when water गुजरता through a semi-permeable परत to पहुँचें संतुलन.
Diffusion, on the other hand, allows the गति of अणुओं इससे ऊँची विशेषज्ञता to कम विशेषज्ञता.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त to अनुरूप through the झिल्ली or a झिल्ली 's pore.
This प्रायः परिणाम साथ the प्रभाव of diffusion through a झिल्ली तभी वाकई affects छोटी molecules, and almost never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical हालातों to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of अणुओं, preventing the प्रवाह of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out of a समाधान जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, प्रायः जल, जिससे surrounds it और in जिससे वे can be flushed away.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable झिल्लियों, a समाधान containing अनेक प्रकार of अणुओं, प्रायः ग्लूकोज और मंड, is लगाई into a semi-permeable dialysis bag, such as a cellulose membrane with pores, and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band.
The sealed डायलिसिस थैला is लगाई in a संग्राहक of a अलग solution, or water.
Molecules छोटी पर्याप्त to pass through the tubing ( जल, लवण, monosaccharides, और other small molecules ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the direction of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger अणुओं ( ऐसे as प्रोटीन, or polysaccharides ) कि have आयाम significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag.
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) will cross a semi-permeable झिल्ली, जैसे डायलिसिस tubing, into a hypertonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium, where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium.
पारा प्रयोगशाला थर्मामीटर
A thermometer ( from the Greek, thermos, meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον, metron, `` माप '' ) is a यंत्र कि उपायों तापमान or तापमान अनुपात using a variety of different principles.
a थर्मामीटर रै दो महत्वपूर्ण तत्व : the तापमान सेंसर ( e.g. the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ तापमान, plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
There are many types and many uses लिये thermometers, as विस्तृत नीचे in भाग of इस आलेख.
Snow White और the सात dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी और released by rko रेडियो तस्वीरें.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, it is the पहला full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी and the earliest in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series.
The story was adapted by storyboard artists डोरोथी ऐन रिक्त, रिचर्ड creedon, मेरिल de मारिस, ओटो englander, अर्ल hurd, लंड rickard, टेड Sears and Webb Smith.
David Hand was the supervising director, while विलियम cottrell, विल्फ्रेड जैक्सन, लैरी morey, perce pearce, और बेन sharpsteen निर्देशित the फिल्मी 's व्यक्तिगत sequences.
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a देशभर रिलीज on फ़रवरी 4, 1938, और साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय आय of $ 8 लाख दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज briefly assumed the रिकार्ड of उच्चतम grossing sound film at the time.
the लोकप्रियता of the फिल्मी रै led to it होने re-released theatrically अनेक टाइम्स, जबतक its home video release in the 1990s.
Adjusted for महंगाई, it is एक of the शीर्ष टेन performers at the उत्तर अमरीकी box office.
At the 11th Academy Awards, Walt डिज़्नी थी awarded an मानद ऑस्कर, और the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत for Best Musical Score.
It was added to the United States National Film रजिस्ट्री in 1989 और is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the 100 महानतम अमरीकी films, जो भी नामित the फिल्मी as the महानतम अमरीकी animated film of all time in 2008.
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big सांस्कृतिक प्रभाव, resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम पार्क attraction, a video game, and a Broadway musical.
Childbirth, labour, delivery, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल साथ the expulsion of एक or अधिक नवजात infants from a woman 's uterus.
The process of सामान्य प्रसव is categorized in तीन चरण of श्रमिक : the shortening और dilation of the cervix, descent and birth of the infant, and birth of the placenta.
In many cases and with increasing frequency, प्रसव is हासिल through प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean खण्ड, जिससे is the हटाना of the neonate through a surgical incision in the abdomen, rather than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the u.S. इससे 1996 to 2006, और comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
With respect to induced मजदूर, अधिक than 22 % of महिलाओं undergo induction of labour in the United States.
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be harmful to the fetus and neonate as well as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ, और have स्थापित सख्त दिशानिर्देश लिये non-medically indicated induced births और elective cesarean पहले 39 weeks.

flushed दूर is a 2006 british/american कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड action / adventure comedy film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell.
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks Animation, and is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated विशेषता as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The film stars the आवाज़ talents of ह्यूज जैकमैन, केट विंसलेट, एंडी serkis, विधेयक nighy, इयान McKellen, Shane Richie and Jean Reno.
The story was by Sam Fell, Peter Lord, Dick Clement, and Ian La Frenais, and the पटकथा थी लिखा by लंड सहनशील, इयान la frenais, Christopher Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William Davies.
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006, and in UK on December 1 2006, and was distributed by Paramount Pictures, मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड, स्पेन, और the नीदरलैंड्स, जिससे यहूद संभाला by सार्वभौमिक Pictures.
The Atlanta Braves are a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in अटलांटा.
The Braves are a सदस्य of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's National League.
The Braves have निभाई in टर्नर फ़ील्ड since 1997.
The `` Braves '' name, which was first प्रयुक्त in 1912, originates इससे a पद लिये a देशी American warrior.
They are nicknamed `` the Bravos '', and often referred to as `` America 's Team `` in सन्दर्भ to the टोली 's खेल होने ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ tbs इससे the 1970s जबतक 2007, gaining a चौड़ी fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball, winning division titles an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in कि काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in जिससे वहीँ यहूद no आधिकारिक प्रभाग champions ).
The Braves won the nl वेस्ट 1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005, और लौटे to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010.
The Braves advanced to the संसार श्रेणी पाँच टाइम्स in the 1990s, जीतना the शीर्षक in 1995.
Since their debut in the National League in 1876, the franchise has won 16 divisional शीर्षक, 17 नेशनल लीग pennants, as खूब as तीन संसार श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in Atlanta.
The Braves are the only एमएलबी मताधिकार to have जीती the संसार श्रेणी in तीन अलग घर शहरों.
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the अन्य होने the शिकागो शावक ) और थी संस्थापित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड stockings ( not to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ).
They are considered `` the oldest लगातार playing टोली in प्रमुख North American sports. ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because although the Cubs are a पूरा ऋतु `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the शिकागो श्वेत stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire, thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons.
बाद विभिन्न नाम परिवर्तन ( ऐसे as the बोस्टन beaneaters ), the टोली संचालित as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century.
In 1953, the team moved to मिल्वौकी, विस्कॉन्सिन और became the मिल्वौकी braves, followed by the move to Atlanta in 1966.
The team 's कार्यकाल in अटलांटा is प्रसिद्ध लिये हांक आरोन तोड़कर बेब रुथ 's करियर घर run record in 1974, though the majority of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee.
His record stood जबतक 2007, जब सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक Barry Bonds broke the record.
the पत्ते of a Beech tree
3D rendering of a μct स्कैन of a पत्ता टुकड़ा, रेज़ोल्यूशन circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A leaf is an organ of a vascular संयंत्र, as पारिभाषित in वनस्पति शर्तें, और in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a mass संज्ञा कि refers to पत्ते as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a thin, flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis, but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those शर्तें : कुछ हैं नहीं चपटा ( लिये उदाहरण अनेक रसीले पत्ते और conifers ), कुछ हैं नहीं ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ), और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic फलन ( consider लिये उदाहरण cataphylls, कांटे, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular plants, or भी of कुछ lichens, जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे at सब ( in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the किंगडम plantae ), do look and function much like leaves.
Furthermore, several structures found in vascular पौधे dekh जैसे पत्ते लकिन हैं नहीं दरअसल पत्ते ; वे differ इससे पत्ते in उनके structures and origins.
Examples include phyllodes, cladodes, और phylloclades.
