Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of अमरीकी कॉमेडी छोटी films परिचय a समूह of ग़रीब पड़ोस children और उनके adventures.
Created by कॉमेडी निर्माता एचएएल रोच, the श्रेणी is विख्यात लिये प्रर्दशित children behaving in a अपेक्षाकृत प्राकृतिक रास्ता, as रोच और असली निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to film the unaffected, raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles.
In addition, Our Gang notably put boys, girls, whites and blacks together in a group as equals, कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान, '' according to फिल्मी इतिहासकार लियोनार्ड Maltin.
Such a thing had never been done पहले in सिनेमा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम दोहराया बाद the कामयाबी of Our Gang.
The first production at the रोच स्टुडियो in 1922 थी a श्रेणी of मूक short subjects.
When Roach changed वितरकों इससे pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927, और परिवर्तित the series to sound in 1929, the series took off even further.
Production continued at the Roach studio until 1938, जब the श्रेणी थी बेची to mgm, जो तब जारी producing the comedies until 1944.
The Our Gang series includes a कुल of 220 शॉर्ट्स और एक विशेषता फिल्मी, सामान्य spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the अधिकारों to the हमारी गिरोह ट्रेडमार्क following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों, the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated लिये टेलीविज़न अंतर्गत the शीर्षक the छोटी दुष्टों beginning in 1955.
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package ( now owned by warner भाईs. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग, साथ आवधिक नई प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the सालो, सहित a 1994 छोटी दुष्टों विशेषता फिल्मी released by Universal Pictures.
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias Jansen or Sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) थी a डच spectacle-maker इससे middelburg संबद्ध साथ the आविष्कार of the पहला ऑप्टिकल दूरदर्शी.
Janssen is sometimes भी credited लिये inventing the first truly compound microscope.
However, the origin of the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, बस जैसे the उत्पत्ति of the दूरदर्शी, is a पदार्थ of debate.
Lake tahoe ( ; washo : dáʔaw ) is a विशाल freshwater झील in the Sierra Nevada of the United States.
At a surface elevation of, it is स्तिथ साथ the किनारा between कैलिफ़ोर्निया और नेवाडा, west of Carson City.
Lake tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन झील in North America.
Its depth is, making it the संयुक्त राज्य 's second-deepest ( the deepest is crater झील in Oregon, being deeper, at ).
Additionally, Lake Tahoe is listed as the 26th largest झील by आवाज़ in the world at.
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a भाग of the झील tahoe जलाशय साथ the आधुनिक झील होने तराशा दौरान the बर्फ ages.
It is known for the clarity of इसके जल और the परिदृश्य of surrounding mountains on all sides.
the क्षेत्रफल surrounding the झील is भी referred to as Lake Tahoe, or simply Tahoe.
Lake Tahoe is a प्रमुख पर्यटक आकर्षण in दोनो Nevada and California.
It is घर to a क्रमांक of स्की रिसॉर्ट, गर्मियाँ बाहरी recreation, and tourist attractions.
Snow and skiing are a significant भाग of the क्षेत्रफल 's अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा.
पहाड़ और झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण throughout the year.
The Nevada पक्ष भी शामिल विशाल कसीनो.
Highways provide year-round अभिगम इससे रेनो, कार्सन नगर, और sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों of the कॉंग्रेस इससे लेने प्रभाव जबतक the प्रारंभ of the अगला set of terms of office for Representatives.
It is the most recent amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
It was सुपुर्द to the राज्य लिये अनुसमर्थन in 1789 and was adopted in 1992.
“First they came... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to पादरी मार्टिन niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the सुस्ती of जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent purging of उनके चुनी लक्ष्य, समूह after group.
There is some disagreement over the सटीक wording of the quotation और जब it थी निर्मित ; the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम प्रस्तुत differently by niemöller on अलग occasions.

Four तिहाई लोगो
The Four Thirds system is a standard created by Olympus and Kodak for digital single-lens reflex कैमरा ( dslr ) डिज़ाइन और development. < संदर्भ name='dpreview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that, with digital कैमरे और lenses उपलब्धियाँ इससे अनेक निर्माताओं, allows लिये the इंटरचेंज of lenses और लाशें इससे अलग निर्माताओं.
seems to cover the मानक.
Proponents describe it as an open standard, लकिन कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it अंतर्गत a non-disclosure agreement.
Unlike older SLR systems, Four Thirds रै महरूम designed इससे the मैदान up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses हैं extensively computerized, to the पाइंट कि Olympus offers firmware updates for many of them.
Lens design has been tailored to the आवश्यकताएँ of डिजिटल सेंसर, सबसे notably through telecentric designs.
The size of the sensor is significantly छोटी than लिये सबसे dslrs और इस implies कि lenses, विशेषकर telephoto lenses, can be smaller.
For example, a चार तिहाई लेंस साथ a 300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण of दृश्य as a 600 mm फोकल length lens for the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly more compact.
Thus, the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2, और जबकि इस enables longer फोकल लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन, it करता n't सहायता the manufacture of चौड़ी कोण lenses.
The image sensor format, generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger slrs और छोटी कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे, generally देता स्तर of लागत, प्रदर्शन और convenience intermediate between those two classes.
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts संस्थापित throughout a भवन to सप्लाई conditioned एयर to a रूम through आउटलेट vents, पुकारा diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles.
hvac ( हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन, और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental comfort.
HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मागतिकी, द्रव यांत्रिकी, और ऊष्मा transfer.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as hvac & r or hvacr, or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( ऐसे as the नामांकन of hacr-rated सर्किट ब्रेकर्स ).
HVAC is important in the design of मीडियम to विशाल औद्योगिक और दफ्तर इमारतें ऐसे as skyscrapers और in समुद्री environments ऐसे as एक्वैरियम, जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated with respect to temperature and humidity, using fresh air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught प्रणाली, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and air conditioning is based on inventions and discoveries बना by निकोलय lvov, माइकल फैराडे, विलिस वाहक, reuben trane, जेम्स जूल, विलियम Rankine, Sadi Carnot, and many others.
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial क्रान्ति, और नई विधि of modernization, उच्चतर दक्षता, और system control are constantly introduced by companies and inventors worldwide.
The three central functions of heating, ventilating, और air-conditioning हैं interrelated, विशेषकर साथ the need to provide थर्मल सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर एयर विशेषता भीतर reasonable installation, operation, and maintenance costs.
HVAC systems can provide वेंटिलेशन, reduce एयर घुसपैठ, and maintain pressure relationships between spaces.
The means of air डिलीवरी और हटाना इससे स्पेसेस is ज्ञात as room air distribution.
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for कूलिंग और हीटिंग depends on the exterior जलवायु और आंतरिक निर्दिष्ट शर्तें.
However before taking up the heat load गणना, it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस एयर आवश्यकताएँ लिये प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल in विवरण, as pressurization is an महत्वपूर्ण consideration.
In आधुनिक इमारतें the डिज़ाइन, संस्थापना, और कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of ये functions are integrated into one or more HVAC systems.
For very small buildings, ठेकेदारों सामान्यतः क्षमता इंजीनियर और चुनें HVAC systems and equipment.
For larger buildings, building services designers and engineers, such as mechanical, architectural, or भवन सेवाएं इंजीनियर्स analyze, डिज़ाइन, और बताएँ the hvac प्रणालियों, और specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the संस्थापना हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी लिये सब आकार of इमारतें.
The hvac उद्योग is a विश्वव्यापी एंटरप्राइज़, साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन और मेंटेनेंस, प्रणाली डिज़ाइन और निर्माण, equipment manufacturing and sales, and in education and research.
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the निर्माताओं of hvac उपकरण, लकिन regulating और मानकों संगठन ऐसे as hardi, ashrae, smacna, एसीसीए, वर्दी mechanical कोड, अंतरराष्ट्रीय mechanical कोड, और AMCA have been established to support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement.
Royal Navy Commander James Bond, cmg, rnvr, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by अंग्रेजों पत्रकार and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the समर्थक of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of novels, films, comics and video games.
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two छोटी स्टोरी संग्रहण पहले उसके मौत, हालांकि the पिछला दो books— the man साथ the सुनहरी गन और octopussy और the जीना daylights —were published posthumously.
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent, कोड क्रमांक 007, residing in लंदन लकिन क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew during his service in the Naval Intelligence Division during World War II, to whom फ्लेमिंग added उसके अपना स्टाइल और a क्रमांक of उसके अपना tastes ; बंध 's नाम थी appropriated इससे अमरीकी ornithologist James Bond.
Bond has a number of character traits जिससे चलाएं throughout the किताबे, सहित an enjoyment of cars, a love of food and drink, and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
Since Fleming 's death in 1964, वहीँ have महरूम अन्य authorised लेखक of बंध सामग्री, सहित जॉन गार्डनर, जो लिखा चौदह novels and two novelizations and Raymond Benson, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and three short stories.
There have also been three authors who लिखा एक किताब प्रत्येक, किंग्सले एमिस ( लिखने as रॉबर्ट markham ), सेबेस्टियन faulks और jeffery Deaver.
Additionally a series of novels आधारित on बंध 's youth— यंग बंध —was लिखा by चार्ली higson.
As spin-offs इससे the साहित्यिक works, वहीँ थी a टेलीविज़न अनुकूलन of the first novel, Casino Royale, in which Bond was played as an American agent.
A comic स्ट्रिप श्रेणी भी भागा in the रोज़ Express newspaper.
There have भी महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; सात अभिनेताओं have played Bond in these films.
`` प्रकृति लड़के '' is a सोंग by ईडन ahbez, published in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy... who wandered very दूर '' तभी to सीख कि `` the महानतम बात... थी बस to प्रेम और be loved in वापसी ''.
Nat King Cole 's 1948 रिकॉर्डिंग of the सोंग थी a प्रमुख hit और `` प्रकृति लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप और जैज़ मानक, साथ dozens of major artists interpreting the song.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
louisiana is the 31st सबसे extensive और the 25th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Its capital is Baton रूज और largest नगर is नई ऑरलियन्स.
Louisiana is the only state in the U.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes, जिससे हैं लोकल सरकारी 's equivalent to counties.
The largest मोहल्ला by जनसांख्यिकी is ईस्ट baton रूज मोहल्ला, और the largest by land area is Cameron Parish.
Much of the state 's lands were formed from sediment धोया bas the मिसिसिपी नदी, leaving विशाल deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp.
These contain a समृद्ध दक्षिणी biota ; ठेठ उदाहरण शामिल birds such as ibis and egrets.
There are also many species of पेड़ मेंढक, और मछली ऐसे as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, आग is a प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम in the लैंडस्केप, और रै उत्पादित extensive क्षेत्रों of longleaf पाइन forest and wet savannas.
These support an exceptional विशाल क्रमांक of संयंत्र प्रजाति, सहित अनेक प्रजाति of orchids and carnivorous plants.
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, multilingual heritage, होने so strongly बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच, स्पेनी, देशी अमरीकी ( भारतीय ) और African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
Before the अमरीकी खरीदें of the territory, the वर्तमान louisiana राज्य था महरूम both a Spanish and French colony.
In addition, the pattern of development included importing numerous अफ़्रीकी स्लेव in the 18th सदी, साथ अनेक इससे the वही प्रदेश of वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी, यूँ concentrating their culture.
In the post-Civil War environment, Anglo-Americans increased the pressure for Anglicization, और in 1915, अंग्रेज़ी थी बना the तभी आधिकारिक भाषा of the state.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
In some स्थान ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि, लोकल कस्टम, और आचरण, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by महिलाओं और लड़कियों in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with धारणाएं of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल, हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
the कानून of विज्ञान or वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं कथन कि describe, भविष्यवाणी, और शायद बताइये why, a range of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate, accurate, broad or सीमित theories, in सब प्राकृतिक वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी, रसायन, जीवविज्ञान, भूविज्ञान, खगोलशास्त्र etc. ).
An analogous पद लिये a वैज्ञानिक law is a principle.
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a large collection of facts संकल्पित by प्रयोग into a सिंगल statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be used to predict the निष्कर्ष of an प्रयोग, दिए the आरंभिक, boundary, और अन्य शारीरिक शर्तें of the प्रक्रियाओं जिससे लो place,
हैं strongly समर्थित by अनुभवजन्य प्रमाण - वे हैं वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान कि प्रयोग have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ).
Their सटीकता करता नहीं बदलें जब नई theories हैं worked आउट, लकिन बल्कि the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग, चूंकि the equation ( if any ) representing the law does not change.
As with other scientific knowledge, वे do नहीं have निरपेक्ष certainty जैसे गणितीय theorems or पहचान, और it is always possible for a law to be overturned by future observations.
are often quoted as a आधारभूत controlling influence बल्कि than a वर्णन of observed facts.
I.e. `` the कानून of गति आवश्यकता that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates, जिससे हैं प्रस्तावित दौरान the वैज्ञानिक प्रक्रम पहले और दौरान validation by experiment and observation.
These are not laws since they have नहीं महरूम सत्यापित to the वही उपाधि और may नहीं be fear सामान्य, हालांकि वे may सीसे to the formulation of laws.
A law is a अधिक solidified और औपचारिक बयान, आसुत इससे दोहराया experiment.
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy, and presents the depth to which गणित can describe प्रकृति, वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For उदाहरण, whether a विधि `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical issue, rather than scientific.
Fundamentally, all scientific laws follow इससे भौतिकी, कानून जिससे occur in अन्य sciences ultimately follow इससे शारीरिक laws.
Often, from mathematically आधारभूत viewpoints, सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge इससे वैज्ञानिक laws.
The लॉन्च of the प्लेस्टेशन 3 into the जापानी मार्केट on 10 नवम्बर 2006 चिह्नित the दूसरी प्रमुख सातवाँ generation entertainment system to be released.
the प्रणाली थी released सात दिनों बाद on 17 नवम्बर in the United States.
Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in the Blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी ; the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और अन्य संसार बाज़ार in the पहला half of 2007.
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the सीबीएस साबुन operas the यंग और the बेचैन and The Bold and the Beautiful, portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman.
वो बना उसके डेब्यू दौरान the एपीसोड airing on January 21, 1983.
In 1992, Bregman began making sporadic दिखावे on the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत, बाद resulting in the अक्षर migrating वहीँ fully in 1995.
following a अतिथि रूप in 2000, bregman लौटे to the यंग और the बेचैन on August 24, 2001, remaining on recurring status.
In 2013, it was announced that bregman था महरूम लगाई on अनुबंध.
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her romances with Paul Williams, स्कॉट grainger, sr., और माइकल baldwin among अनेक अन्य causing a fierce फंसने साथ traci Abbott Connolly.
Lauren is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके long, हिंसक फंसने साथ शीला Carter.
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप series for the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff थी लडे between the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स, champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और defending एनबीए champions, and the Boston Celtics, champions of the Eastern Conference.
The Lakers पराजित the सेल्टिक्स, चार खेल to तीन, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th संस्करण of the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी थी निभाई between जून 3 और जून 17, was broadcast on ABC, and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people.
The सेल्टिक्स अर्जित उनके berth into the playoffs by जीतना the Atlantic Division.
The लेकर्स जीती the प्रशांत प्रभाग to earn their berth.
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the मियामी ऊष्मा in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the क्लीवलैंड cavaliers in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन semifinals, and defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the यूटा जैज़ in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन semifinals, और the फीनिक्स Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals.
The NBA Finals were अनुसूचित in the प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल संसार श्रेणी 2–3–2 सात खेल स्वरूप, साथ the लेकर्स possessing home-court advantage as a reward for finishing with better regular season record than the Celtics.
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant, Pau Gasol, और रॉन artest brought the लेकर्स बंद to विजय in खेल 1.
A record breaking प्रदर्शन इससे रे एलन 's आठ three-point baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph.
Derek Fisher ’s 11 अंक in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the लेकर्स win Game 3.
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent प्रदर्शन in baskets by the team’s reserves, जबकि पॉल पियर्स led the टोली to a खेल 5 जीत साथ 27 अंक on 57 % शूटिंग इससे the floor.
The Lakers avoided विलोपन by जीतना a निर्णायक खेल 6 साथ 24 अंक contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter, the Lakers rallied and जीती उनके दूसरी लगातार चैंपियनशिप by लेने over an रोमांचक खेल 7 aided by लेट योगदान on ठोकर by pau gasol and Artest and rebounding.
Bryant was named Most Valuable खिलाड़ी of the फाइनल लिये उसके दूसरी लगातार trophy.
This was the first एनबीए फाइनल to go the पूरा सात खेल चूंकि और तभी the चौथी चूंकि the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in.
The laker मताधिकार रै 16 एनबीए championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस, 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 मिनियापोलिस लेकर्स पराजित the वॉशिंगटन capitols 4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the नई York Knicks 4 games to 1 ; in 1954 Minneapolis defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
The NBA would return to the 2–2–1–1–1 National हॉकी लीग सात खेल श्रेणी स्वरूप जबतक 1985.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके फल, जिससे is प्रायः सूखी और प्रयुक्त as a मसाला and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when dried, is approximately in diameter, dark red जब fully वयस्क, और, जैसे सब drupes, contains a सिंगल बीज.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived from them, may be वर्णित बस as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और सूखी unripe फल ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in तीव्र regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest निर्माता और निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried मैदान pepper रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो its flavour and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the संसार 's सबसे traded मसाला.
It is one of the most common मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन और इसके वंशजों.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be confused with the capsaicin कि देता मांसल मिर्च theirs.
It is in the आधुनिक संसार, प्रायः युग्म with salt.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the आयतनी भिन्न of रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the प्रणालीगत circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट कि allows सार्थक गणितीय expression defining EF.
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide यूटिलिटी enabling पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly और inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a गणितीय उत्पाद अनुमत by हृदय इमेजिंग.
As a mathematical term, ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of एडाल्फ Fick in cardiac output.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia, जन्मजात दिल बीमारी और दिल विफलता.
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the prosecution in देशों साथ either the आम विधि adversarial प्रणाली, or the civil law inquisitorial system.
The prosecution is the विधिक पार्टी जिम्मेदार लिये पेश the मामला in a दण्ड विचारण against an individual accused of breaking the law.
स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake सबसे commonly अर्थात् a मिठाई in the shortcake परिवार of cakes.
स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake may also refer to:
Strawberry shortcake, a अक्षर और मताधिकार निर्मित by अमरीकी Greetings
The shortened शीर्षक of स्ट्रॉबेरी on the shortcake, a Japanese romance movie.
Abū al-Qāsim muḥammad इब्न ʿabd allāh इब्न ʿabd al-muṭṭalib इब्न hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), was a religious, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर and prophet of God.
Muhammad is लगभग universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims regard मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक of islam.
मुसलमान consider उसे to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of उसके ताऊ Abu Talib.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a shepherd, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ, he बाद reported कि it थी वहीँ, at आयु 40, कि he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this event मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक ``, कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, और कि he खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद treated harshly.
To escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग, जिससे is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In मदीना, मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes, his अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely शांतिपूर्ण Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few महीने बाद returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to islam, और he था संयुक्त अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम धार्मिक polity.
The खुलासे ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of परमेश्वर ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, मुहम्मद 's जीवन ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss मुहम्मद और अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
जबकि conceptions of मुहम्मद in मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far less so.
The Great किताबे ( दूसरी संस्करण )
ग्रेट किताबे of the पश्चिमी संसार is a श्रेणी of किताबे originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त States in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes.
The series is now in इसके दूसरी संस्करण और contains 60 volumes.
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be relevant to समकालीन मुद्दे, और नहीं तभी महत्वपूर्ण in इसके ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर बदला rereading ; और it जरूर be a भाग of `` the ग्रेट वार्तालाप परिचय the great ideas, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors.
Books यहूद नहीं चुनी on the आधार of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness, ऐतिहासिक influence, or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded by jj cale in 1976, लकिन भी ज्ञात as a कवर संस्करण अंकित by eric क्लैप्टन.
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly लोकप्रिय हिट्स '' और टीप कि `` भी लिये an कलाकार जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked with The Who, Led Zeppelin और the रोलिंग पत्थरों, उत्पादित the क्लैप्टन रिकॉर्डिंग, जिससे थी released on क्लैप्टन 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The सजीव संस्करण of `` कोका '', इससे the बस एक रात्रि एल्बम अंकित in टोकियो, charted on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 as the B-side of `` Tulsa Time ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
कोका '' थी एक of अनेक of cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन, सहित `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' Light ''.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी विरूद्ध the संयुक्त राज्य नवल आधार at पर्ल हार्बर, हवाई, on the morning of दिसम्बर 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese सेनानी, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें, launched from six aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. नेवी battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त, साथ चार होने sunk.
Two of these were later raised, and with the बाकी चार repaired, छह battleships लौटे to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. aircraft were नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी यहूद मारे और 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा खण्ड ) यहूद नहीं attacked.
जापानी नुकसान यहूद लाइट : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines खोया, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One जापानी नाविक थी captured.
The attack came as a profound shock to the American लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the Pacific and European theaters.
The following दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the संयुक्त राज्य घोषित युद्ध on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे था महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( लिये उदाहरण the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
subsequent परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य action by Japan.
however, the कमी of कोई औपचारिक चेतावनी, विशेषकर जबकि negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी, led अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of ब्रावो 's कामयाब प्रोजेक्ट रनवे, a वास्तविकता प्रतियोगिता लिये फ़ैशन designers.
ऋतु 2 began airing on December 7, 2005.
Following a देशभर ढूंढें पहले in the साल, सोलह designers यहूद चुनी as semi-finalists and brought to New York City in June, 2005.
After the पहला चुनौती, पुकारा `` सड़क to the रनवे '', fourteen went on to compete as finalists.
The winning designer, Chloe Dao, received $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch her own लकीर, a 2007 शनि आसमान roadster, a स्प्रेड in elle पत्रिका, और a mentorship साथ the Banana Republic Design Team.
Winning alongside dao थी उसके मॉडल, अनुग्रह kelsey, जो received the ELLE Magazine spread.
Michael Kors and Nina Garcia लौटे as न्यायाधीशों लिये the दूसरी ऋतु.

Andrae Gonzalo, in the same year, competed in the दूसरी ऋतु of the सब सितारों संस्करण रखकर 10th आउट of 13.
An उदाहरण of a heraclius mule
In numismatics, a mule is a coin or medal minted with obverse और रिवर्स डिजाइन नहीं सामान्यतः देखी on the वही टुकड़ा.
These can be जानबूझकर or उत्पादित by error.
This type of error is अत्यधिक sought बाद, और उदाहरण can लाने steep prices from collectors.
The earliest mules हैं मिला among प्राचीन यूनानी and Roman coins.
Opinion is divided between those who think that वे हैं आकस्मिक, the परिणाम of an गलत संयोजन of a नई die साथ एक कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग, or the कार्य of coiners working साथ मरता चुराया इससे an आधिकारिक मिंट, perhaps at a time when one of them should have been destroyed.
The name derives from the mule, the संकर औलाद of a घोड़ा और a गधा, due to ऐसे a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग सिक्के, much as a mule has parents of two different species.
इस पेज दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes and tornado outbreaks of 2010.
the बहुमत of tornadoes रूप in the u.S., लकिन वे can occur almost anywhere under the right conditions.
A lesser number occur outside the U.S., most notably in parts of neighboring southern Canada दौरान the उत्तरी गोलार्ध 's गर्मियाँ ऋतु, लकिन हैं भी known in South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2010 ( of जिससे at तनिक 1,266 यहूद पुष्टि ), with 45 confirmed fatalities.
Elsewhere in the world, 11 people were मारे in tornadoes, छह in अर्जेंटीना, तीन in the बहामा, एक in Bangladesh, and one in Germany.
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an अत्यधिक शांत जल्दी वसन्त काल, however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल और a व्यस्त लेट spring and summer period.
The autumn महीने यहूद थोड़ा above average.
A lymphocyte is a type of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं और B cells.
Windows PowerShell is microsoft 's कार्य स्वचालन फ्रेमवर्क, consisting of a command-line शेल और संबद्ध scripting language built on.NET Framework.
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI, enabling प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो local and remote Windows systems.
In PowerShell, administrative tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ), जिससे हैं specialized.neT वर्ग implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in स्क्रिप्ट, executables ( जिससे हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ), or by instantiating regular.NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ).
These work by accessing आंकड़ा in अलग आंकड़ा स्टोर्स, जैसे the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री, जिससे हैं made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers.
Windows powershell भी provides a होस्टिंग api साथ जिससे the Windows PowerShell runtime can be embedded inside other applications.
These applications can then उपयोग खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित परिचालन, सहित those उजागर via the आलेखीय interface.
This capability has been used by microsoft एक्सचेंज सर्वर 2007 to expose इसके प्रबन्धन कार्यक्षमता as powershell cmdlets और प्रदाताओं और implement the आलेखीय प्रबन्धन tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets.
Other Microsoft applications including microsoft एसक्यूएल सर्वर 2008 भी expose उनके प्रबन्धन इंटरफ़ेस via PowerShell cmdlets.
With PowerShell, आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन अनुप्रयोग on खिड़कियाँ हैं परतदार on top of Windows PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting इंटरफ़ेस लिये खिड़कियाँ उत्पाद is mandated by the Common Engineering Criteria.
Windows PowerShell includes इसके अपना extensive, console-based सहायता, समान to man पृष्ठों in यूनिक्स शेल, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring जूली एंड्रयूज, लंड वैन dyke, दाउद tomlinson, और glynis जॉन्स, उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी, और आधारित on the मरियम poppins किताबे series by P. L. Travers.
The film was directed by रॉबर्ट stevenson और लिखा by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन dagradi, with songs by the Sherman Brothers.
it थी शॉट at वॉल्ट डिज़्नी studios in burbank, California.
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film संपादन, असली म्यूज़िक स्कोर, बेहतरीन सोंग लिये `` chim chim cher-ee '' और बेहतरीन विज़ुअल प्रभाव, और प्राप्त a कुल of 13 nominations.
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling मीडिया ऐसे as टेलीविज़न, कॉमिक किताबे, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप्स, boardgames, video games, and in some cases, films.
On a television program, for example, the स्टोरी होता unfold over अनेक एपीसोड.
In टेलीविज़न, the उपयोग of the स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक आम in dramas than in comedies, especially in soap operas.
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than समाचारपत्र कॉमिक्स, as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer to the स्ट्रिप can पढ़ा in अनुक्रम to समझे कया is going on.
Although story arcs have existed for decades, the term `` story arc '' was coined in 1988 in संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wiseguy, और थी जल्दी adapted लिये अन्य उपयोग.
Many American comic book श्रेणी हैं अभी लिखा in चार or six-issue arcs, भीतर a continuing series.
छोटी स्टोरी arcs हैं easier to पैकेज as व्यापार paperbacks लिये पुनर्विक्रय, और अधिक accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending continuity that once characterised comics.
Black Friday is the day following थैंक्सगिविंग दिन in the संयुक्त राज्य, प्रायः regarded as the शुरूआत of the Christmas shopping season.
In recent years, most major रिटेलर have खोली अत्यधिक जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश खरीदारी ऋतु, समान to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations.
Black Friday is not an official public अवकाश as ऐसे, लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन बाद बंद, followed by a वीकेंड, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year चूंकि 2005, हालांकि न्यूज रिपोर्ट्स, जिससे at कि समय यहूद inaccurate, have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी दिन of the year for a much longer period of time.
The दिन 's नाम originated in फिलाडेल्फिया, जहाँ it originally थी प्रयुक्त to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving.
Use of the term started before 1961 and began to देखिए broader उपयोग बाहर फिलाडेल्फिया around 1975.
बाद an वैकल्पिक स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit, or are `` ''.
For अनेक सालो, it थी आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m., but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This was लिया to a नई चरम in 2011, जब अनेक रिटेलर ( सहित निशाना, kohl 's, macy 's, Best Buy, and Bealls ) opened at midnight for the first time.
In 2012, Walmart and several other retailers announced that they होता खोलें सबसे of उनके स्टोर्स at 8:00 p.m. on थैंक्सगिविंग दिन ( मगर in राज्य जहाँ खोलने on थैंक्सगिविंग is निषिद्ध due to ब्लू कानून, ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ वे स्टिल खोली around midnight ), prompting calls for a walkout among some workers.
Black शुक्रवार खरीदारी is ज्ञात लिये attracting आक्रामक crowds, साथ सालाना रिपोर्ट्स of assaults, shootings, and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out.
The Family That Preys is a 2008 अमरीकी फिल्म नाटक लिखा, उत्पादित, and directed by Tyler Perry.
The screenplay focuses on two families, one धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास, जिनकी जीवनदान हैं intertwined in दोनो प्रेम and business.
The movie is the second of चार in जिससे पेरी 's हस्ताक्षर अक्षर, madea, does not make an appearance.
It is also the second Perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's छोटी लड़कियों ) कि is नहीं आधारित on कोई of the filmmaker 's stage plays.
Net 10, Net 15, Net 30 and Net 60 ( भी जाल 10 दिनों, et al ) हैं फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the जाल राशि ( the कुल बकाया on the चालान ) is अपेक्षित to be सशुल्क in full and received by the seller within 10, 15, 30 or 60 days after the goods are dispatched or service is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 terms are often coupled साथ a क्रेडिट लिये जल्दी भुगतान.
The word net in this sense अर्थात् `` कुल बाद सब discounts. ''
It originally derives इससे the लैटिन nitere ( to चमक ) और nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), और more recently from the French net ( sharp, neat, clean ).
roadtown, tortola
the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज यहूद the आइलैंड्स in और around the caribbean कि were part of the British Empire.
In 1912, the British West Indies were divided into आठ colonies : the बहामा, बारबाडोस, अंग्रेजों guiana, अंग्रेजों होंडुरास, जमैका ( साथ इसके dependencies the Turks and Caicos Islands and the Cayman Islands ), Trinidad and Tobago, the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands.
Between 1958 and 1962, all of the island territories मगर the अंग्रेजों वर्जिन आइलैंड्स, the बहामा, अंग्रेजों होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों Guiana were organised into the West Indies Federation.
It was hoped that the Federation would become independent as a single nation, but it था सीमित शक्तियां, अनेक व्यावहारिक समस्याएं, और a कमी of लोकप्रिय support.
Consequently, the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ was dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now independent as separate countries, with membership to अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय forums ऐसे as the संगठन of अमरीकी राज्य, the संघ of caribbean राज्य, the संसार व्यापार संगठन, the United Nations, the Caribbean Community, the Commonwealth of Nations and the Caribbean Development Bank among others.
The शेष हैं अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories.
All the former nations of the British West इंडीज, मगर the राष्ट्रमंडल of डोमिनिकन, गुयाना और त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, हैं राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
The term is still प्रयुक्त लिये अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories in the caribbean, such as the Cayman Islands.
The बाकी अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज
`` What a अद्भुत संसार '' is a सोंग लिखा by bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was first recorded by लुई आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a सिंगल in 1967.
Thiele and Weiss यहूद दोनो prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता और वेइस as a composer/performer ).
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's रिकॉर्डिंग थी inducted in the ग्रैमी Hall of Fame in 1999.
The publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music समूह, कार्लिन म्यूज़िक corp., और कीड़ा म्यूज़िक, inc.
उद्घाटन दिन 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम of the U.S. Capitol.
President George W. Bush and First Lady लौरा बुश सीसे the inaugural परेड bas पेन्सिलवेनिया Avenue to the White House, 2005
The inauguration of the president of the संयुक्त राज्य is a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the शुरुआत of a नई four-year term of a president of the United States.
The day a presidential inauguration occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन '' और occurs on जनवरी 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment, the date was March 4, the day of the year on जिससे the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the पिछला उद्घाटन to लो प्लेस on the पुरानी तिथि थी फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4, 1933. )
The most recent public अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन रस्म, the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to begin his second four-year term in office, took place on Monday, January 21, 2013.
The only उद्घाटन तत्व mandated by the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is कि the अध्यक्ष मेक an शपथ or प्रतिज्ञान पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the Execution '' of the office of the presidency.
However, over the years, various परंपराओं have arisen कि have विस्तारित the उद्घाटन इससे a सरल oath-taking ceremony to a day-long event, including parades, speeches, and balls.
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through कि of jimmy कार्टर, the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन दिन रस्म took प्लेस on the Capitol 's East Portico.
Since the 1981 inauguration of रोनाल्ड reagan, the रस्म रै महरूम आयोजित at the Capitol 's West Front.
The inaugurations of William हावर्ड taft in 1909 और reagan in 1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to cold weather.
The War of 1812 and World War II caused दो inaugurations to be आयोजित at अन्य स्थितियाँ in Washington, D.C.
जब जार्ज वॉशिंगटन थी उदघाटन, the शपथ थी administered by रॉबर्ट livingston, चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य, in 1789, and by William Cushing, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John एडम्स, no मुख्य इंसाफ रै छूटी an उद्घाटन दिन.
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a संडे, the मुख्य इंसाफ रै administered the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष on the संडे privately और तब again the अगला day publicly.
When a नई अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the मौत or इस्तीफा of a अध्यक्ष, the शपथ of दफ्तर is administered but formal, public inauguration events have not been held.
stefani जोआन एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28, 1986 ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम महिला गागा, is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, नर्तकी, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
Born and raised in New York City, she primarily studied at the कान्वेंट of the पवित्र दिल और briefly attended नई यॉर्क विश्वविद्यालयों 's tisch स्कूल of the कला पहले withdrawing to फ़ोकस on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the चट्टान म्यूज़िक झाँकी of Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
By the end of 2007, record executive and producer Vincent Herbert signed her to his label Streamline रिकॉर्ड, an imprint of interscope रिकॉर्ड.
Initially working as a songwriter at interscope रिकॉर्ड, उसके गायन abilities captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार एकॉन, जो also signed her to Kon Live Distribution, his own label under Interscope.
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, the कीर्ति ( 2008 ), जिससे थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी कि अव्वल चार्ट around the संसार और शामिल the अंतरराष्ट्रीय number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face ``.
After embarking on the The कीर्ति बॉल दौरे, वो followed the एल्बम साथ the कीर्ति दानव ( 2009 ), जिससे शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` Bad Romance ``, `` Telephone ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
The Fame Monsters success अनुमत उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long दानव बॉल दौरे, जिससे बाद became एक of the highest-grossing कॉन्सर्ट tours of all time.
Her most recent album, Born This Way ( 2011 ), अव्वल the चार्ट of सबसे प्रमुख बाज़ार और उत्पन्न अधिक अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping singles, including `` Born This Way ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
बहकावे by britney स्पीयर्स, दाउद बोवी, माइकल जैक्सन, मैडोना, और महारानी, महिला गागा is पहचाना लिये उसके flamboyant, विविध और outré योगदान to the music industry through her fashion, performances and music videos.
As of October 2011, she has sold an estimated 23 million एल्बम और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी और उसके singles हैं कुछ of the best-selling worldwide.
Her उपलब्धियाँ शामिल पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार and 13 MTV Video Music Awards.
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in vh1 's सूची of 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, is the छठे बेहतरीन selling डिजिटल singles कलाकार in us according to riaa, is regularly लगाई on सूचियाँ रचित by फोर्ब्स पत्रिका और थी नामित एक of the सबसे influential लोगों in the world by Time magazine.
Besides her musical करियर, वो involves herself साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी and LGBT activism.
McKethan स्टेडियम घर of घड़ियाल बेसबॉल
A picture of the 1924 बेसबॉल team
The Florida gators बेसबॉल टोली represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of फ्लोरिडा in the sport of baseball.
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National Collegiate Athletics Association ( ncaa ), और the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the southeastern सम्मेलन ( सेक ).
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium on the विश्वविद्यालयों 's gainesville, फ्लोरिडा कैम्पस, और हैं फिलहाल led by सिर coach Kevin O'Sullivan.
In the ninety-eight season history of the gators बेसबॉल कार्यक्रम, the टोली रै जीती बारह सेक championships और रै appeared in आठ कॉलेज संसार Series tournaments.

The reverse side of the बटन shows a पोर्ट्रेट of उसके कार्यशील mate Hannibal Hamlin.
A political अभियान is an व्यवस्थित प्रयत्न जिससे seeks to influence the निर्णय making process within a specific group.
In democracies, political campaigns often refer to चुनावी अभियान, wherein प्रतिनिधि हैं चुनी or referendums are decided.
In modern राजनीती, the सबसे ऊँची प्रोफ़ाइल राजनैतिक अभियान हैं केन्द्रित on उम्मीदवार लिये सिर of राज्य or head of government, often a President or Prime Minister.
एलिज़ाबेथ cady stanton and her daughter, Harriot
एलिज़ाबेथ cady stanton ( नवम्बर 12, 1815 – अक्तूबर 26, 1902 ) थी an अमरीकी सोशल activist, abolitionist, और अग्रणी figure of the early women 's rights movement.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the पहला महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन आयोजित in 1848 in seneca जलप्रपात, नई यॉर्क, is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों and women 's suffrage movements in the United States.
Before Stanton narrowed उसके राजनैतिक फ़ोकस लगभग exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, वो थी an क्रियाशील abolitionist together with her husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit Smith.
Unlike many of those involved in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति, stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to महिलाओं परे voting rights.
उसके चिंताएं शामिल महिलाओं 's parental और कस्टडी अधिकारों, प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों, नियुक्ति और आय अधिकारों, divorce, the economic health of the family, and birth control.
She थी भी an outspoken समर्थक of the 19th-century temperance movement.
After the American Civil War, Stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति जब वो, साथ साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी, अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और पंद्रहवीं Amendments to the United States Constitution.
She opposed giving added legal सुरक्षा और मतदान अधिकारों to अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मेन while women, black and white, were denied those same rights.
Her position on this issue, together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond मतदान अधिकारों, led to the गठन of दो पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined, साथ stanton as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त संगठन, लगभग बीस सालो बाद उसके ब्रेक इससे the original women 's suffrage movement.
stanton died in 1902 having authored दोनो the स्त्री 's बाइबल और उसके आत्मकथा, साथ साथ अनेक आलेख और pamphlets concerning मादा suffrage and women 's rights.
My Fair Lady is a musical आधारित upon जार्ज बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब और गीत by एलन jay lerner and music by Frederick Loewe.

The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit, सेटिंग कया थी तब the रिकार्ड लिये the longest चलाएं of कोई प्रमुख musical theatre production in history.

`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a short story by विज्ञान fiction लेखक रे bradbury जिससे थी पहला प्रकाशित in the may 6, 1950 समस्या of collier 's.

Ethnicity or ethnic group is a socially पारिभाषित श्रेणी आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता.
Ethnicity can, but does not have to, include common ancestry, रूप, भोजन, ड्रेसिंग स्टाइल, विरासत, इतिहास, भाषा or dialect, धर्म, symbols, traditions, or other cultural factor.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ जिससे नियत the समूह अलावा इससे अन्य समूह.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और वितरित solar energy.
Active solar तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
passive सौर तकनीकों शामिल orienting a भवन to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the additional लागत of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे जरूर be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
The शास्त्रीय लैटिन वर्णमाला or रोमन वर्णमाला विकसित इससे a पश्चिमी किस्में of the यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the cumaean वर्णमाला, which was adopted and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome.
The Etruscan alphabet was in फेरे अपनाया और further परिवर्धित by the प्राचीन romans to write the Latin language.
During the Middle Ages, the Latin alphabet was adapted to Romance languages, direct descendants of लैटिन, as खूब as to सेल्टिक, germanic, बाल्टिक, और कुछ स्लावी भाषाएं.
With the age of colonialism and Christian इंजीलवाद, the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट थी स्प्रेड विदेशी, और लागू to स्वदेशी अमरीकी, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, Austronesian, Austroasiatic, and African languages.
More recently, linguists have भी tended to prefer the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट or the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ध्वन्यात्मक वर्णमाला ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट ) जब transcribing or creating written standards for non-European languages, such as the African reference alphabet.
The term Latin वर्णमाला may refer to either the वर्णमाला प्रयुक्त to लिखें लैटिन ( as वर्णित in इस आलेख ), or अन्य alphabets आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट, जिससे is the मौलिक नियत of अक्षर common to the various alphabets descended from the classical Latin one, such as the English alphabet.
ये latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें अक्षर, जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला, or add new letters, like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet.
Letter shapes have बदला over the सदियां, सहित the सृष्टि लिये मध्यकालीन लैटिन of निम्नतर मामला फ़ॉर्म which did not exist in the Classical period.
The assassination of United States अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln took प्लेस on शुभ शुक्रवार, अप्रैल 14, 1865, as the अमरीकी Civil War was drawing to a close.
The हत्या occurred पाँच दिनों बाद the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of Northern Virginia, General Robert E. Lee, surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first अमरीकी अध्यक्ष to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम बना on एंड्रयू जैक्सन 30 सालो पहले in 1835.
The assassination was planned and carried out by the well-known स्टेज कर्ता जॉन wilkes बूथ, as भाग of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David Herold, who were आबंटित to मार सचिव of राज्य विलियम H. seward, और जार्ज atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson.
By simultaneously eliminating the शीर्ष तीन लोगों in the प्रशासन, बूथ और उसके co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government.
Lincoln was shot while watching the खेल हमारी अमरीकी cousin साथ उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in वॉशिंगटन, D.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
He died जल्दी the अगला morning.
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only प्रबंधित to घाव seward, जबकि atzerodt, जॉनसन 's would-be हत्यारे, खोया उसके तंत्रिका and fled Washington.

plug-in ( कम्प्यूटिंग ), a टुकड़ा of तन्त्र जिससे enhances another तन्त्र application and usually can not be run independently
Browser extension, जिससे modifies the इंटरफ़ेस and/or बर्ताव of web browsers

Club level seating is a special खण्ड of seating in आधुनिक खेल स्टेडियम.
The Club Level is usually located towards the मध्य of the स्टेज of seating भाग, ऊपर the निम्नतर डेक लकिन नीचे the upper deck.
They are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes, either सही ऊपर, सही नीचे, or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes.
Club Level seating is माना as उच्चतर क्लास than बैठे anywhere else in the एरिना, but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes.
नापसंद the लक्ज़री बाक्स, सबसे क्लबों स्तर do not wrap entirely around the arena.
Some club levels stop at a certain point, giving way to an विस्तार of the मेज़ानाइन, जबकि अन्य दे रास्ता to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable exception to इस is अमीरात स्टेडियम in लंदन, जिससे रै a पूरा टियर of क्लबों seating.
Club Levels allow प्रशंसक अनेक स्तर of entertainment.
Club Level seating is खोलें to the तत्व, as opposed to the entirely enclosed लक्ज़री बाक्स, जिससे देता more of an outdoors impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas.
Club Level seating is सामान्यतः खरीदा on a अनुबंध आधार to allow लिये अधिकतम लाभ on the part of the stadium.
The क्लबों स्तर provides प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर भाग of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets.
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to खास रेस्तरां, merchandise स्टैंड, और लाउंज क्षेत्रों of the स्टेडियम कि हैं not otherwise available.
Concession stands and vendors on the Club स्तर भी प्रायः प्रस्ताव अलग मेनू than in अन्य stands to give more of a special feel to the Club.
These areas are बंद बंद to the बाकी of the स्टेडियम, और वे प्रायः can तभी be पहुँचा through the exclusive, private club entrances.
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia villani scicolone ; 20 सितंबर 1934 ) is an Italian actress.
Loren is widely recognized as इटली 's सबसे प्रसिद्ध और सम्मानित अभिनेत्री.
She was the first actress of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन, लिये उसके portrayal of cesira in vittorio de सिका 's दो महिलाओं.
Her अन्य पुरस्कार शामिल a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, पाँच special Golden Globes, a BAFTA Award and a Laurel Award.
In 1995 she received the Cecil B. DeMille पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ, एक of अनेक ऐसे पुरस्कार.
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ), El Cid ( 1961 ), कल, आज और कल ( 1963 ), विवाह italian-style ( 1964 ), और a खास दिन ( 1977 ).
In later years she has appeared in अमरीकी blockbusters ऐसे as grumpier बूढ़ा मेन ( 1995 ), and Nine ( 2009 ).
In 1994 वो स्ट्रक्चर in रॉबर्ट altman 's prêt-à-porter, जिससे अर्जित उसके a सुनहरी Globe nomination the same year.

it रै परिचय 13 लाख wireless users.

Hospital Emergency Codes हैं प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to चेतावनी स्टाफ to various emergencies.
The use of codes is intended to convey essential सूचना जल्दी और साथ minimal गलतफहमी to स्टाफ, जबकि preventing तनाव और दहशत among visitors to the hospital.
These कोड may be posted on placards throughout the हॉस्पिटल, or printed on employee identification badges for ready reference.
Back of a हॉस्पिटल id बैज प्रर्दशित विपत्ति कोड.
हॉस्पिटल आपात कोड may denote अलग कार्यक्रम at different hospitals, including nearby ones.
Because many physicians work at more than one facility, this may lead to भ्रम in emergencies, so वर्दी प्रणालियों have महरूम प्रस्तावित.
The रूट of the eifel जलसेतु, साथ इसके average slope.
The Eifel जलसेतु थी एक of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire.
The aqueduct, constructed in AD 80, carried water कुछ इससे the hilly eifel प्रदेश of कया is अभी जर्मनी to the प्राचीन नगर of colonia claudia आरा agrippinensium ( present-day कोलोन ).
if the auxiliary स्पर्स to अतिरिक्त स्रोतों are included, the length was.
The construction was almost entirely below ground, and the flow of the water was उत्पादित entirely by गम्भीरता.
A few bridges, including एक up to in लंबाई, यहूद needed to pass over valleys.
Unlike कुछ of the अन्य प्रसिद्ध रोमन aqueducts, the eifel जलसेतु थी specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing.
In chemistry, a disulfide bond ( Br.E. disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध, प्रायः निकला by the coupling of दो thiol groups.
The linkage is भी पुकारा an SS-bond or disulfide bridge.
The overall कनेक्टिविटी is इसलिए R-S-S-R.
The शब्दावली is widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry.
In औपचारिक शर्तें, the कनेक्शन is a persulfide, in सादृश्य to इसके congener, परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ), लकिन इस शब्दावली is obscure and is no longer used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ).
Formal चित्रण of disulfide बंध गठन as an oxidation.

Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it, रै महरूम वर्चस्व, लिये over 1,400 सालो, by विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of christianity.
According to some surveys, a majority of citizens still identify with Christianity, although regular गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the मध्य of the 20th सदी, और आव्रजन और जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed to the विकास of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of UK citizens are अंकित by नियमित सर्वेक्षण, the चार प्रमुख ones होने the uk जनसांख्यिकी, the श्रमिक फ़ोर्स सर्वेक्षण, the अंग्रेजों सोशल attitudes सर्वेक्षण और the European Social Survey.
According to the 2001 UK जनसांख्यिकी, christianity is the प्रमुख धर्म, followed by islam, हिंदुत्व, sikhism, judaism और buddhism in शर्तें of number of adherents.
This, and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no धार्मिक संबद्धों रै led टीकाकारों to variously describe the संयुक्त किंगडम as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-christian society.
The United Kingdom was formed by the संघ of previously स्वतंत्र देशों इससे 1707, and consequently most of the largest religious groups do not have UK-wide organisational structures.
While some groups have separate structures लिये the व्यक्तिगत देशों of the संयुक्त किंगडम, अन्य may have a सिंगल ढांचा covering इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the अपेक्षाकृत हाल सृष्टि of उत्तरी आयरलैंड in 1921, सबसे प्रमुख धार्मिक समूह in उत्तरी Ireland are organised on an all-Ireland basis.
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance कि occurred in the नगर of न्यूर्क, New Jersey between July 12 and July 17, 1967.
The six days of rioting, looting, और विनाश बाएँ 26 मुर्दे और सैंकड़ों injured.
In United States college athletics, redshirt is a विलंब or बर्खास्तगी of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी in अनुक्रम to lengthen उसके or her period of eligibility.
Typically, a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons, a number निकला इससे the चार सालो of अकादमिक वर्ग कि हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a स्नातक 's उपाधि at an अमरीकी college or university.
However, a student खिलाड़ी may be offered the अवसर to redshirt लिये up to दो सालो, जिससे allows the खिलाड़ी to स्प्रेड those four years of eligibility over five, or sometimes six years.
In a redshirt year, a student खिलाड़ी may attend वर्ग at the कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों, अभ्यास साथ an एथलेटिक टोली, और dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game.
Using this mechanism, a student athlete has up to five अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग the चार सालो of पात्रता, यूँ बनने a fifth-year वरिष्ठ.
The term is used as a क्रिया, संज्ञा, और क्रियाशील.
लिये उदाहरण, a कोच may चुनें to redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The opposite of this is a `` सच्चा freshman. ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र शामिल.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय.
More तत्काल, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
The युद्ध ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
the successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी states.
The लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार War II.
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to कह, `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' - between 1979 and 1983.
इस काल चिह्नित the महानतम territorial extent of Communist states.
A communist state is a state where the means of उत्पादन हैं collectively स्वामित्व by the समाज.
It has a रूप of सरकारी characterized by single-party नियम or dominant-party नियम of a कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
Technically, `` communist राज्य '' is a contradictio in terminis as a कम्युनिस्ट समाज as पारिभाषित by दोनो माक्र्सवादी and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this perspective, the term marxist-leninist राज्य is more appropriate.
Historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working class ; today, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी, लिये उदाहरण, refer to समकालीन चीन और वियतनाम, जहाँ a कम्युनिस्ट party-run राज्य exists alongside a mixed economy.
According to Marxist–Leninists, the state is a tool in the हैंड्स of the सत्ताधारी क्लास, जिससे in a समाजवादी समाज is the working क्लास, so a समाजवादी state is, according to Leninists, a state of the working class.
In practice, कम्युनिस्ट राज्य do नहीं दरअसल refer to themselves as such.
They do this not to disguise the fact that the ruling पार्टी is कम्युनिस्ट, लकिन बल्कि क्युकी वे do नहीं consider themselves to be a communist society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally पहचानो themselves as समाजवादी राज्य or मजदूर ' राज्य.
The primary goal of ये राज्य, जिससे भी explains उनके आधिकारिक नाम, is to मार्गदर्शिका उनके संबंधित देशों in the process of building socialism, ultimately leading to communism.
Communist states may have several legal political parties, लकिन the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी is प्रायः granted a खास or प्रबल भूमिका in सरकारी, प्रायः by statute or अंतर्गत the संविधान.
Consequently, the संस्थानों of the राज्य और of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी become intimately entwined, ऐसे as in the विकास of parallel institutions.
In the 20th सदी, सबसे कम्युनिस्ट states adopted planned economies.
However, there were exceptions : the सोवियत संघ दौरान the 1920s और लेट 1980s और यूगोस्लाविया बाद संसार युद्ध ii अनुमत सीमित बाज़ार और a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management, while China, Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
In the 21st सदी, चीन और वियतनाम have अनुमत a मिश्रित economy to develop.
The fundamental अवधारणाओं of कम्युनिस्ट राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे the असली socio-economic ideologies from which they develop.
As a result, many adherents of these विचारधाराओं प्रायः oppose the राजनैतिक प्रणालियों commonly संबद्ध साथ these states.
For example, dissenting साम्यवादियों ऐसे as trotskyists यहूद प्रायः opposed to the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of the 20th सदी, claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` रियल '' साम्यवादी or कि the विचारधारा of ऐसे राज्य had reached a point of irrevocable corruption.
Michael फ्रेड फेल्प्स ii ( born जून 30, 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी तैराक और the सबसे सजा Olympian of all time, with a total of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18, double the second highest record holders ), ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम ( 11 ), और ओलम्पिक medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ).
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, Phelps took the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे first-place finishes at कोई सिंगल ओलम्पिक खेल.
Five of those victories यहूद in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम, tying the single Games record.
In the 2012 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in लंदन, फेल्प्स जीती चार golds और दो चांदी medals, बनाना उसे the सबसे successful athlete of the Games for the third Olympics in a row.
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as खूब as the पूर्व long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the 200-meter फ्रीस्टाइल और 200-meter व्यक्तिगत medley.
He has जीती a कुल of 71 medals in प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय long-course प्रतियोगिता, 57 सुनहरा, 11 चांदी, and three bronze spanning the Olympics, the World, and the Pan Pacific Championships.
Phelps 's अंतरराष्ट्रीय शीर्षक और record-breaking प्रदर्शन have अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार सात टाइम्स और अमरीकी तैराक of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
His unprecedented Olympic success in 2008 अर्जित फेल्प्स खेल illustrated पत्रिका 's Sportsman of the Year award.
After the 2008 Summer Olympics, Phelps started the Michael फेल्प्स न्यास, जिससे focuses on growing the खेल of तैराकी और promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further work with his foundation after the 2012 Olympics, जिससे he रै कहा होगा be उसके पिछला.
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a Chinese multinational computer hardware and इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कम्पनी साथ इसके मुख्यालय in बीजिंग, चीन और morrisville, उत्तर कैरोलिना और इसके पंजीकृत दफ्तर in Hong Kong, China.
Its products include personal computers, टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, सर्वर, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक भंडार devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest pc विक्रेता by 2012 ईकाई sales.
It बाज़ार the थिंकपैड लकीर of कोपी कंप्यूटर and the ThinkCentre line of desktops.
Lenovo has परिचालन in अधिक than 60 देशों और sells its products in around 160 countries.
लेनोवो थी संस्थापित in बीजिंग in 1984 और incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 under its previous name, Legend.
Lenovo is listed on the हांग काँग भण्डार एक्सचेंज और is a constituent of the हैंग सेंग china-affiliated Corporations Index.
Slug is a common name लिये an जाहिर shell-less स्थलीय gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the common name of any gastropod mollusc कि रै no शेल, रै a बहुत घटाया शेल, or रै तभी a small internal shell.
( This is in contrast to the आम नाम `` घोंघा ``, जिससे is लागू to gastropods कि have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल enough that the soft parts of the animal can retract fully into it. )
slugs मौजूद on जमीन और in the समुद्र, और वहीँ is भी one genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to जमीन slugs, whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater हैं usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the परिवार urocyclidae ), are known as semislugs.
The विभिन्न taxonomic परिवारों of slugs रूप भाग of अनेक काफी अलग विकासवादी lineages which also include snails.
Thus, for example, the various families of land slugs are not very closely सम्बन्धित to एक another, despite a सतही समानता in the overall body form.
The shell-less कंडीशन रै arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently दौरान the विकासवादी पास्ट, और यूँ the श्रेणी `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, like all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° टेढ़ी of the internal organs ) during development.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the प्रभाव of इस रोटेशन, लकिन externally the लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be more or less symmetrical, except for the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the right hand side.
The soft, slimy लाशें of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs हैं confined to नम environments and must retreat to damp hiding places when the weather is dry.
The subsequent सूचना in इस आलेख applies to land slugs.
is a लैटिन शब्द कि अर्थात् `` यूँ '' or, in लिखने, `` it was thus in the source material ''.

Sic ( noise artist ), styled as [ sic ], स्टेज नाम of जेनिफर मॉरिस, a कनाडाई noise artist

`` ( sic ) '', a सोंग by अमरीकी बैंड slipknot on the album Slipknot
sic, the आरंभिक of Marco Simoncelli.

Schwarz सूचना मानदंड in the फ़ील्ड of statistics

Segmented पूर्णांक काउंटर विधि, a विधि of आपरेशन in क्रिप्टोग्राफी
Sepang International Circuit, a high-end racetrack कि होस्ट the मलेशियाई round of Formula 1
Shanghai अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट, a मोटर रेसिंग स्थान in Shanghai, China
Simplified instructional कंप्यूटर, a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त in प्रणालियों programming
sic ( बेटे idées couleurs ), an जल्दी twentieth-century आर्ट पत्रिका produced by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College, a two year Junior कॉलेज in harrisburg, इलिनोइस, संयुक्त राज्य
Specific inductive capacity, abbreviated to sic, जिससे is अधिक commonly ज्ञात as the सापेक्ष विद्युतशीलता or the dielectric constant
st ignatius ' कॉलेज, riverview, a जेसुइट school in Sydney, Australia
इम्पीरियल मानक of Napoleon I
Napoleon Bonaparte (, ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political नेता जो रोज़ to prominence दौरान the latter चरण of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति और इसके associated wars in Europe.
As Napoleon I, he थी सम्राट of the फ्रेंच इससे 1804 to 1815.
His legal reform, the Napoleonic Code, has been a major influence on अनेक सिविल विधि jurisdictions विश्वव्यापी, लकिन he is बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध फ़्रांस by a श्रेणी of coalitions, the so-called napoleonic युद्धों.
He established hegemony over most of continental यूरोपीय और sought to स्प्रेड the आदर्शों of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, जबकि consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
Due to उसके कामयाबी in ये युद्धों, प्रायः विरूद्ध numerically श्रेष्ठ दुश्मनों, he is generally regarded as एक of the महानतम military commanders of all time, and his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide.
नेपोलियन थी born at ajaccio in corsica in a परिवार of प्रतिष्ठित Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He प्रशिक्षित as an तोपखाने अधिकारी in mainland France.
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic and led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the पहला और दूसरी coalitions arrayed against France.
He led a कामयाब आक्रमण of the इतालवी प्रायद्वीप.
In 1799, he staged a coup d'état and संस्थापित खुद as पहला कौंसुल ; पाँच सालो बाद the फ्रेंच सीनेट proclaimed him emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the first decade of the 19th सदी, the फ्रेंच साम्राज्य अंतर्गत नेपोलियन सगाई in a श्रेणी of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved every major European power.
After a streak of victories, France secured a प्रबल स्थिति in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय, और नेपोलियन कायम the फ्रेंच गोला of influence through the गठन of extensive alliances और the नियुक्ति of मित्रों and family members to rule other European countries as French client states.
The Peninsular War और 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of रूस चिह्नित turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes.
His Grande Armée थी badly क्षतिग्रस्त in the अभियान और never fully recovered.
In 1813, the Sixth Coalition पराजित उसके शक्तियां at लिपजिग ; the following साल the गठबन्धन invaded France, forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba.
Less than a year later, he escaped Elba and लौटे to शक्ति, लकिन थी पराजित at the बैटल of वाटरलू in जून 1815.
नेपोलियन खर्च the पिछला छह सालो of उसके जीवन in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer, but वहीँ रै महरूम कुछ बहस परिचय the कारण of उसके मौत, as कुछ विद्वानों have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning.
This is a कालानुक्रमिक लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों from Pennsylvania.
संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों हैं popularly निर्वाचित, लिये a six-year term, beginning January 3.
चुनावों हैं आयोजित the पहला मंगलवार after November 1.
