The South Africa नेशनल रग्बी संघ टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी in rugby union.
They compete in the सालाना रग्बी चैंपियनशिप, साथ साथ southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and New Zealand.
They have जीती इस चैंपियनशिप on तीन अवसरों in sixteen years.
They are currently ranked second in the world by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी फलक, और यहूद नामित 2008 संसार टोली of the साल at the Laureus World Sports Awards.
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition, the springboks किया नहीं compete in the पहला दो संसार cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa.
The team made its World Cup debut in 1995, when the newly लोकतांत्रिक दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी hosted the टूर्नामेंट.
The Springboks तब पराजित the सब अश्वेतों 15–12 in the फाइनल, जिससे is अभी remembered as एक of the महानतम पल in दक्षिण Africa 's sporting history, and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process.
South अफ़्रीकी regained उनके शीर्षक as champions 12 सालो बाद, जब they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final.
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the springboks यहूद प्रचारित to पहला प्लेस in the आईआरबी संसार rankings, a स्थिति वे आयोजित जबतक जुलाई the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot.
The Springboks play in green and gold jerseys, and उनके प्रतीक हैं the springbok और the protea.
the पक्ष रै महरूम playing अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी चूंकि 1891, जब a अंग्रेजों isles पक्ष toured the nation, playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July.
South Africa was coached by जेक श्वेत, जो led the boks to the 2007 संसार कप शीर्षक, announcing उसके इस्तीफा effectively from the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार कप quarter-final, जो तब stated he होता नहीं be हस्ताक्षर a new deal.
the पिछला कप्तान थी जॉन smit, जो पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 निभाई वेश्या लिये most of his career, although he has also been a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to Smit being unavailable for the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी, ताला विक्टर matfield took smit 's प्लेस as captain for that tour.
The current captain is जां de villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), was fought July 1–3, 1863, in और around the कस्बा of gettysburg, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
It was the battle with the largest number of casualties in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और is प्रायः वर्णित as the युद्ध 's turning पाइंट.
Union maj. gen. जार्ज गॉर्डन meade 's फौज of the potomac पराजित हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's Army of Northern Virginia, ending Lee 's invasion of the North.
After his success at chancellorsville in वर्जिनिया in may 1863, ली led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to शुरू उसके दूसरी आक्रमण of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign.
With his army in high spirits, Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their अभियोजन of the युद्ध by penetrating as दूर as harrisburg, पेन्सिलवेनिया, or भी फिलाडेल्फिया.
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln, Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker स्थानांतरित उसके फौज in pursuit, लकिन थी सुकून बस तीन दिनों पहले the बैटल and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the two armies initially collided at gettysburg on जुलाई 1, 1863, as ली तत्काल concentrated उसके शक्तियां वहीँ, his objective being to engage the Union army and destroy it.
Low ridges to the northwest of कस्बा यहूद defended initially by a संघ प्यादे प्रभाग अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जॉन buford, and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry.
However, two large Confederate corps फहरा उन्हें इससे the उत्तरपश्चिम और उत्तर, collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ लाइनों, sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south.
On the second day of बैटल, सबसे of दोनो सेना था समवेत.
The Union line was laid out in a रक्षात्मक गठन resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of July 2, ली शुभारम्भ a भारी उत्पीड़न on the संघ बाएँ पार्श्व, और fierce लड़ raged at छोटी Round Top, the Wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the Peach Orchard.
On the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's हिल और कब्रिस्तान Hill.
सब आरपार the रणभूमि, despite significant losses, the Union defenders held their lines.
On the third दिन of बैटल, जुलाई 3, लड़ resumed on culp 's हिल, और प्यादे लड़ाइयों raged to the ईस्ट और दक्षिण, लकिन the प्रमुख इवेंट थी a नाटकीय infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge, known as Pickett 's Charge.
The charge was repulsed by Union rifle and तोपखाने आग, at ग्रेट नुकसान to the confederate फौज.
ली led उसके फौज on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers इससे दोनो सेना यहूद हताहत in the three-day battle.
That November, President Lincoln used the dedication रस्म लिये the gettysburg नेशनल कब्रिस्तान to सम्मान the गिरे संघ सैनिको और redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address.
An अकादमिक अनुशासन, or फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई, is a शाखा of ज्ञान कि is taught and researched at the college or university level.
Disciplines are defined ( in part ), and recognized by the academic journals in जिससे शोध is प्रकाशित, और the सीखे समाजों और अकादमिक विभाग or faculties to जिससे उनके practitioners belong.
However, there exists no formal criteria for when शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly जर्नल्स रूप an अकादमिक अनुशासन.
A huge difference exists between, on the one hand, well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world, have a long history, and have a well established set of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों, और, on the अन्य हाथ, सुझाव लिये नई फ़ील्ड समर्थित तभी by few विश्वविद्यालयों और publications.
Fields of study usually have several sub-disciplines or शाखाओं, और the distinguishing लाइनों between these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous.
PHP is a server-side एनक्रिप्शन भाषा designed लिये वेब विकास लकिन भी प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose programming language.
पीएचपी is अभी संस्थापित on अधिक than 244 लाख websites and 2.1 million web servers.
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the सन्दर्भ क्रियान्वयन of पीएचपी is अभी उत्पादित by the PHP Group.
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page, it अभी स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट preprocessor, a recursive एक्रोनिम.
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a पीएचपी प्रोसेसर मोड्यूल जिससे generates the resulting वेब पेज : पीएचपी कमांड can be अंतःस्थापित सीधे into an एचटीएमएल सोर्स दस्तावेज़ rather than calling an external file to process data.
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface काबिलियत और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन आलेखीय अनुप्रयोग.
PHP is free software released अंतर्गत the पीएचपी अनुज्ञा, जिससे is असंगत साथ the ग्नू सामान्य पब्लिक अनुज्ञा ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP.
PHP can be तैनात on सबसे वेब सर्वर और भी as a स्टैंडअलोन शेल on लगभग प्रत्येक operating system and platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1961 जबतक उसके मौत in 1963.
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. सीनेट इससे 1953 जबतक 1960.
Kennedy defeated वाइस अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट, the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल, the स्पेस रेस, the african-american Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, और helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by the दक्षिण Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी और दक्षिणी कम्युनिस्ट insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
ली घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों, लकिन he थी शॉट and killed by Jack Ruby two days later, before a trial could take place.
The एफबीआई और the वारेन आयोग officially concluded कि Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their छानबीन, the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s सूचना concerning कैनेडी 's निजी जीवन रै आइये to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in जिससे he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात, विशेषकर चूंकि the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the general public, reports of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much दबायें.
Kennedy ranks highly in पब्लिक राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.
`` Stand by Me '' is a सोंग originally performed by बेन E. किंग और लिखा by किंग, जेरी leiber, और Mike Stoller, inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me, '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
There have महरूम over 400 अंकित संस्करण of the song.
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D. ehrhart, shows a फार्म स्त्री labeled `` लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी '' sheltering इससे a tornado of political change.
A metaphor is a फिगर of वाक कि describes a विषय by asserting कि it is, on some point of comparison, the same as another otherwise unrelated object.
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to अन्य rhetorical आंकड़े of वाक कि achieve उनके प्रभाव via संघ, तुलना or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
In simpler terms, a रूपक compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते बगैर using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent examples of a रूपक in अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य is the सब the संसार 's a स्टेज monologue इससे As You Like It :
सब the संसार 's a stage,
And all the मेन और महिलाओं merely खिलाड़ी ;
They have their exits और उनके entrances ; — विलियम शेक्सपियर, as तुम Like It, 2/7
This quote is a रूपक क्युकी the संसार is नहीं literally a stage.
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage, शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार और a स्टेज to convey an समझना about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it.

Printmaking is the process of making artworks by मुद्रण, सामान्यतः on पेपर.
Printmaking सामान्यतः कवर तभी the प्रक्रम of बनाना prints साथ an तत्व of originality, rather than just being a photographic reproduction of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the process is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही टुकड़ा, जिससे is called a print.
Each print उत्पादित is नहीं माना a `` नक़ल '' लकिन बल्कि is माना an `` original ''.
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking प्रक्रम, और भी क्युकी the imagery of a छपाई is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another कार्य लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय image designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique.
A छपाई may be ज्ञात as an impression.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen तभी लिये इसके क्षमता to उपज अनेक impressions, लकिन बल्कि लिये the अद्वितीय qualities कि प्रत्येक of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
Prints are created by transferring स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared स्क्रीन to a चादर of पेपर or अन्य material.
Common प्रकार of matrices शामिल : मेटल प्लेटों, प्रायः तांबे or जस्ता, or पॉलिमर प्लेटों लिये नक्काशी or etching ; स्टोन, aluminum, or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of silk or सिंथेटिक fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त लिये the screenprinting process.
Other types of matrix substrates और सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं हैं discussed नीचे.
Multiple impressions मुद्रित इससे the वही matrix form an edition.
Since the late 19th century, कलाकारों have generally हस्ताक्षरित व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः क्रमांक the impressions to form a limited edition.
Prints may भी be मुद्रित in किताब रूप, ऐसे as illustrated books or artist 's books.
Il Divo is an अंग्रेज़ी बहुराष्ट्रीय operatic पॉप गायन समूह निर्मित by म्यूज़िक मैनेजर, कार्यपालिका, and reality TV star Simon Cowell.
Formed in the संयुक्त किंगडम, वे हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित to Cowell 's record label, Syco Music.
Il Divo is a group of चार पुरूष गायकों : फ्रेंच पॉप सिंगर सेबेस्तियन izambard, स्पेनी baritone कार्लोस marín, American tenor David Miller, and Swiss tenor Urs Bühler.
To date, वे have बेची अधिक than 26 लाख एल्बम worldwide.
Su-15, one of the principal Soviet एयर रक्षा interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent मिशन of दुश्मन वायुयान, विशेषकर बमवर्षक और reconnaissance वायुयान, और नष्ट उन्हें, relying usually on great speed and powerful armament.
Being used since the First World War, after the late 1960s, interceptors became कम महत्वपूर्ण due to shifting इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक मिसाइलें ( icbms ) लिये नाभिकीय warfare.
A Vietnamese अमरीकी ( ) is an अमरीकी of वियतनामी descent.
They make up परिचय हाफ of सब विदेशी वियतनामी ( người việt hải ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group.
Mass Vietnamese आव्रजन to the संयुक्त राज्य प्रारंभ बाद 1975, बाद the समाप्त of the Vietnam War.
Early immigrants were शरणार्थी नाव लोगों fleeing persecution or गरीबी.
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust into ग़रीब शहरी पड़ोस, ये newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to स्थापित strong communities in a short amount of time.
More than sixty प्रतिशत of वियतनामी अमेरिकी reside in the राज्य of California, Texas, Washington, Florida, and Virginia.
Front page of the u.S. हथियारबंद शक्तियां समाचारपत्र, सितारों और Stripes, 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in उसके führerbunker in Berlin.
His wife Eva ( née Braun ) वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या साथ उसे by ingesting cyanide.
That afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior निर्देश, उनके remains यहूद carried up the सीढ़ियाँ through the बंकर 's आपात निकास, doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker.
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains were बरामद और interred in successive स्थितियाँ जबतक 1970 जब वे यहूद again exhumed, cremated और the राख बिखरे.
Accounts differ as to the cause of मौत ; एक कि he died by ज़हर तभी और another कि he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, while biting down on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary इतिहासकारों have अस्वीकृत ये खाते as होने either सोवियत प्रचार or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded that the body showed signs of having been शॉट through the मुँह, लकिन इस रै महरूम सिद्ध असंभावित.
There is also controversy regarding the authenticity of कपाल और जबड़ों fragments जिससे यहूद बरामद.
In 2009, DNA tests were performed on a कपाल सोवियत officials था long believed to be हिटलर 's.
The tests revealed कि the कपाल थी दरअसल कि of a स्त्री less than 40 years old.
स्थान of मिसौरी
The दारू कानून of मिसौरी हैं among the तनिक प्रतिबंधक and most lax and permissive in the United States.
मिसौरी is ज्ञात throughout the मिडवेस्ट लिये इसके largely laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू regulation, in sharp contrast to the very strict alcohol laws of some of its neighbors, like Kansas and Oklahoma.
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a विरल संक्रमण of the deeper परतों of स्किन और subcutaneous ऊतकों, easily spreading आरपार the fascial प्लेन भीतर the subcutaneous tissue.
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें जैसे diabetes, cancer, etc.
It is a severe disease of अचानक onset और is प्रायः treated तत्काल साथ ऊँची doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type I describes a polymicrobial संक्रमण, whereas प्रकार ii describes a monomicrobial infection.
Many प्रकार of जीवाणु can कारण necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., समूह a streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
ऐसे infections हैं अधिक संभावित to occur in लोगों साथ compromised immune systems.
Historically, Group A streptococcus बना up सबसे मामले of प्रकार ii infections.
However, since as early as 2001, another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै महरूम observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति, caused by methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ).
Some published case reports have implied a संभावित कड़ी between उपयोग of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf, हालांकि the प्रमाण of the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी of a छोटी क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों और it थी unclear whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se.
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ), also ज्ञात as the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, थी a वैश्विक युद्ध कि lasted from 1939 to 1945.
It involved the vast बहुमत of the संसार 's राष्ट्र —including सब of the ग्रेट powers —eventually forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis.
it थी the सबसे फैली युद्ध in इतिहास, साथ अधिक than 100 लाख लोगों सेवारत in military units from over 30 different countries.
In a state of `` total war ``, the major भागीदार लगाई उनके संपूर्ण आर्थिक, औद्योगिक, और वैज्ञानिक सामर्थ्य at the सेवा of the युद्ध effort, erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources.
चिह्नित by द्रव्यमान मौतों of नागरिकों, सहित the holocaust और the तभी उपयोग of nuclear weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These deaths make World War ii by दूर the deadliest विरोध in इंसान इतिहास.
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937, but the world war is generally said to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ the आक्रमण of कैंडल by जर्मनी और subsequent घोषणाओं of युद्ध on जर्मनी by France and Britain.
From late 1939 to जल्दी 1941, in a श्रेणी of अभियान और treaties, जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन साथ Italy, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
following the molotov–ribbentrop अनुबंध, जर्मनी और the सोवियत संघ partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, including Poland.
The United Kingdom and the अन्य सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल यहूद the तभी प्रमुख अलाइड शक्तियां continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष, साथ लड़ाइयों लेने प्लेस in उत्तर Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In June 1941, the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union, giving a start to the largest जमीन थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास, जिससे tied bas the प्रमुख भाग of the अक्ष ' सैन्य शक्तियां लिये the बाकी of the युद्ध.
In December 1941, Japan joined the Axis, attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the प्रशांत समंदर, और quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, after Japan lost a series of naval battles and European Axis सैनिकों यहूद पराजित in उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और, decisively, at stalingrad.
In 1943, with a series of German defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, the अलाइड आक्रमण of इटली, और अमरीकी victories in the प्रशांत, the अक्ष खोया the पहल और undertook रणनीतिक रिट्रीट on all fronts.
In 1944, the Western Allies invaded France, while the Soviet Union regained सब of इसके territorial नुकसान और invaded जर्मनी और its allies.
दौरान 1944 और 1945 the संयुक्त राज्य पराजित the जापानी Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands.
The war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by सोवियत और पॉलिश सैनिकों और the subsequent जर्मनी unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945, the संयुक्त राज्य dropped परमाणु बम on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August, and Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese द्वीपसमूह निकट, और the सोवियत संघ having घोषित युद्ध on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया, जापानी surrendered on 15 अगस्त 1945, समाप्ति the युद्ध in एशिया और cementing the कुल victory of the Allies over the Axis.
World War II altered the राजनैतिक संरेखण और सोशल structure of the world.
The United Nations ( UN ) was established to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय सहयोग और prevent भविष्य conflicts.
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States, the सोवियत संघ, चीन, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद.
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as rival superpowers, सेटिंग the स्टेज लिये the ठंडा युद्ध, जिससे lasted लिये the अगला 46 सालो.
Meanwhile, the influence of European great powers started to मनाही, जबकि the decolonisation of एशिया और अफ़्रीकी began.
Most देशों जिनकी उद्योग था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards economic recovery.
Political integration, especially in Europe, उभरा as an प्रयत्न to stabilise postwar संबंध और लड़ो अधिक effectively in the Cold War.
A limited liability कम्पनी ( llc ) is a लचीली रूप of एंटरप्राइज़ कि मिश्रणों तत्व of साझेदारी and corporate structures.
Note than an llc is नहीं a निगम, और कॉलिंग an llc a निगम is technically incorrect.
An LLC is a विधिक रूप of कम्पनी कि provides सीमित देयता to इसके स्वामी in the विशाल majority of United States jurisdictions.
LLCs do नहीं need to be व्यवस्थित for profit.
पाँच k-cups
the अंदर of a प्रयुक्त k-cup, साथ the top foil and the used coffee grounds removed.
इस shows the फिल्टर inside the K-Cup.
K-Cup portion packs are used साथ keurig or अन्य सिंगल कप brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी, tea, or hot chocolate.
Each K-Cup is a प्लास्टिक संग्राहक साथ a कॉफी फिल्टर inside.
Ground कॉफी सेम हैं packed in the k-cup और sealed air-tight with a combination plastic and foil lid.
When the k-cup is लगाई in a keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup and forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug.
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to कॉफी roasters और चाय makers ऐसे as ग्रीन पहाड़ कॉफी roasters, diedrich/ ग्लोरिया जीन्स, टिमोथी 's संसार कॉफी, वैन houtte, हिरण कॉफी, celestial seasonings, bigelow चाय कम्पनी, twinings, Tully 's, Coffee People and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the original k-cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in सितंबर 2012.
Keurig holds at least one additional, still-active US patent and another patent अनुप्रयोग, detailing सुधार कि have subsequently महरूम incorporated in उनके k-cup डिज़ाइन.
Electa Pocket Chronograph ( ca. 1890s ) manufactured by the gallet देखें कम्पनी in la chaux-de-fonds, स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
Gallet multichron astronomic ( ca. 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph साथ 12 घंटा recoding सामर्थ्य, स्वचालित day, date, month, and moon phase display
a आधुनिक seiko क्वार्ट्ज wristwatch using the chronograph function ( movement 7T92 ).
नागरिक atessa eco-drive atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph with 4 area Radio Controlled reception ( North America, Europe, China, Japan ).
A chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें कि is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch combined with a display watch.
A basic chronograph रै an स्वतंत्र स्वीप दूसरी हाथ ; it can be प्रारंभ, रोका, और लौटे to zero by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of कोई particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित पता in the प्रोसेसर 's पता space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an विस्तार कार्ड कि fits into a slot.
The पीसीआई लोकल बस थी पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles, जहाँ it विस्थापित the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर प्रकार.
PCI और pci-x हैं होने replaced by पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस, लकिन, सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ), विद्युत विशेषताएँ, बस timing, and protocols.
The specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network ताश, ध्वनि ताश, modems, अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल, tv ट्यूनर ताश और डिस्क controllers.
पीसीआई वीडियो ताश replaced isa और vesa ताश, जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI वीडियो ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or PCI Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस versions.
माइकल whitaker स्मिथ ( born अक्तूबर 7, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी समकालीन Christian musician, who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts.
His biggest कामयाबी in मुख्यधारा म्यूज़िक थी in 1991 जब `` प्लेस in इस संसार '' hit no. 6 on the Billboard Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार विजेता, और रै अर्जित 40 Dove Awards.
Over the course of his career, he sold more than 13 million albums और अंकित 29 no. 1 hit गीतों, चौदह सुनहरा एल्बम, and five platinum albums.
Smith is an American Music पुरस्कार प्राप्तकर्ता ; he थी भी नामित एक of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` Most Beautiful People ''.
An American poster from the World War II -era that was प्रयुक्त to inform लोगों परिचय कया वे चाहिए do if वे suspect तोड़फोड़.
Sabotage is a deliberate कार्रवाई aimed at weakening another एंटिटी through subversion, रुकावट, disruption, or destruction.
In a workplace setting, sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of दक्षता generally निर्देशित at causing कुछ बदलें in कार्यस्थल conditions.
One who engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs try to छिपाते उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences of उनके क्रियाएँ.
For example, whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to be पहचाना साथ an अधिनियम of तोड़फोड़, it होता नहीं want the व्यक्तिगत पहचान of the perpetrators ज्ञात.
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private, independent college with an Evangelical ईसाई आधार कि focuses on शिक्षण शास्त्रीय उदार कला और सरकारी, स्तिथ in Purcellville, Virginia, United States.
पैट्रिक हेनरी is ज्ञात लिये इसके रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण Christian focus.
As of April 17, 2007, the college was accredited by the Transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों और स्कूलों, a नेशनल faith-related accrediting संगठन पहचाना by the विभाग of शिक्षा and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation.
The school was founded with the help of the Home स्कूल विधिक रक्षा संघ, और अभी serves as the मुख्यालय लिये the संगठन, with which it is still closely connected.
The history of television comprises the कार्य of numerous इंजीनियर्स और आविष्कारक in अनेक देशों over many decades.
The earliest proposal was in 1908, in a paper by A. A. campbell-swinton और postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड rays.
The first व्यावहारिक demonstrations of टेलीविज़न, however, यहूद विकसित using electromechanical methods to scan, transmit, and reproduce an image.
As electronic camera and display tubes यहूद perfected, electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic systems in nearly all applications.
L'Idéal Cinéma - Jacques Tati at aniche खोली नवम्बर 23rd 1905 ; the oldest still-active फिल्म theater in the world
A cinema in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A typical multiplex ( AMC Promenade 16 in वुडलैंड पहाड़ियाँ, लॉस एंजिल्स, U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a cinema, movie house, film house, फिल्मी थिएटर or चित्र हाउस ) is a स्थान, प्रायः a भवन, लिये देखने films.
Most लकिन नहीं सब फिल्म थिएटर हैं वाणिज्यिक परिचालन केटरिंग to the general public, who attend by purchasing a ticket.
The फिल्म is प्रक्षिप्त साथ a फिल्म प्रोजेक्टर onto a large projection screen at the front of the auditorium.
Most movie theaters are अभी equipped लिये डिजिटल सिनेमा प्रक्षेप, निकालना the need to बनाएँ और transport a physical film print.
Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया नॉर्टन मालिक 's क्लबों on कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य रूट 41, near Creston.
A motorcycle club is a समूह of individuals जिनकी प्राथमिक ब्याज और क्रियाएँ involve motorcycles.
Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an infectious बीमारी caused by at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging to the genus borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the प्रमुख कारण of lyme बीमारी in उत्तर अमेरिका, whereas borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European cases.
The disease is नामित बाद the कस्बों of lyme और बूढ़ा lyme, कनेक्टिकट, यूएसए, जहाँ a क्रमांक of मामले यहूद identified in 1975.
Although Allen Steere realized that lyme बीमारी थी a tick-borne बीमारी in 1978, the कारण of the बीमारी remained a रहस्य जबतक 1981, जब B. burgdorferi थी पहचाना by Willy Burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most आम tick-borne बीमारी in the Northern Hemisphere.
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few प्रजाति of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early symptoms may include fever, headache, थकान, अवसाद, और a characteristic गोलाकार स्किन खाज पुकारा erythema migrans ( EM ).
बाएँ अनुपचारित, बाद लक्षण may involve the joints, दिल, and central nervous system.
In most cases, the infection and its symptoms हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक, विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated early.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more गंभीर लक्षण, जिससे can be disabling और मुश्किल to treat.
Penises of minke whales on display at the आइसलैंडिक phallological संग्रहालय
Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a सामान्य पद लिये the अंगों साथ जिससे पुरूष और उभयलिंगी पशु introduce शुक्राणु into receptive females during copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do not bear a penis in every animal प्रजाति, और in those प्रजाति in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न, the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous.
For example, the शिश्न of a स्तनधारी is at सबसे analogous to the शिश्न of a male insect or barnacle.
the पद शिश्न applies to अनेक reproductive intromittent अंगों, लकिन नहीं to सब ; लिये उदाहरण the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, and male spiders use their pedipalps.
In most species of पशु in जिससे वहीँ is an अंग कि might reasonably be वर्णित as a शिश्न, it रै no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the शुक्राणु to the मादा, लकिन in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal part of the urethra, which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires.
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or music publishing कम्पनी कि is जिम्मेदार लिये हुनर बालचर और overseeing the कलाकारी विकास of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों and/or songwriters.
It also अधिनियमों as a liaison between कलाकारों और the रिकार्ड लेबल or प्रकाशन कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the point of album release is generally considered under the purview of, and responsibility of, A & R.
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial इकाई और u.S. प्रथागत इकाई बराबर to one-eighth of a मील, समतुल्य to 220 गज, 660 फीट, 40 छड़, or 10 जंजीरों.
The exact मान of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking countries.
Five furlongs are approximately 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a करीब सन्निकटन ).
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the परिधि of the धरती ( साथ the ग्रेट वृत्त coincident साथ the मध्याह्न of देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ), the परिधि of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.
CR2032 लिथियम बटन कोशिका battery
Lithium 9 volt, aa, & aaa आकार
Lithium batteries हैं डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक ) बैटरी कि have लिथियम मेटल or लिथियम compounds as an anode.
They stand apart इससे अन्य बैटरी in उनके ऊँची चार्ज घनत्व ( long जीवन ) and high cost per unit.
Depending on the design and रासायनिक यौगिकों प्रयुक्त, लिथियम कोशिकाएं can उपज voltages इससे 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices.
Raymond `` Ray '' Charles Jack lamontagne ( ; born जून 18, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter.
LaMontagne has released four studio एल्बम, ट्रबल, तक the सूर्य turns ब्लैक, गपशप in the अनाज and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise.
He was born in New हैम्पशायर और थी प्रेरित to बनाएँ म्यूज़िक बाद सुनना an album by Stephen Stills.
Critics have compared lamontagne 's म्यूज़िक to कि of the बैंड, Van Morrison, Nick Drake, and Tim Buckley.
He lives in मैसाचुसेट्स साथ उसके बीवी और दो children.

It is the precursor to the झील हाउस और प्रेरित the Maximum Ride series.

Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an ऑनलाइन सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's सदस्यता थी initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the साईट.
Users must register before using the site, after which वे may बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, और एक्सचेंज संदेश, सहित स्वचालित notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, school or college, or other विशेषताएँ, और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे कार्य '' or `` बंद मित्रों ''.
As of September 2012, फेसबुक रै over एक billion active users.
According to a May 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण, वहीँ हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in फेसबुक, और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of उसके अपना धन to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा by विश्वव्यापी monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों, और खेल a rousing खेल of scrabulous पहले Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, राज्य कि फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in अप्रैल 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions, साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, और थी headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on may 18, 2012.
अर्विन योहानेस eugen ख़बरों ( 15 नवम्बर 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly known as The Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs, ), was a German Field Marshal of World War II.
He earned the आदर of दोनो उसके अपना सैनिकों और the enemies he fought.
Rommel was a highly decorated officer in World युद्ध i और थी awarded the डालना le mérite लिये उसके कारनामे on the Italian front.
In संसार युद्ध ii, he further विशिष्ट खुद as the कमांडर of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 invasion of France.
His leadership of जर्मनी और इतालवी शक्तियां in the उत्तर अफ़्रीकी अभियान स्थापित उसे as एक of the सबसे समर्थ कमांडरों of the war, and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox.
He is regarded as एक of the सबसे skilled कमांडरों of मरुस्थल warfare in the conflict.
He later commanded the जर्मनी शक्तियां opposing the अलाइड cross-channel invasion in Normandy.
His कार्यभार never took उसे to the पूर्वी Front.
Rommel is regarded as having महरूम a दयालु और पेशेवर अधिकारी.
उसके afrika कोर्प्स थी never अभियुक्त of युद्ध अपराधों, और सैनिको captured during his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers, नागरिकों और captured कमांडो यहूद उपेक्षित.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the षड्यंत्र to assassinate एडोल्फ हिटलर.
Since ख़बरों थी a नेशनल नायिका, हिटलर desired to eliminate him quietly.
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in वापसी लिये आश्वासनों कि ख़बरों 's परिवार होता नहीं be persecuted following उसके death.
Stained glass प्रतिनिधित्व of the पावन स्पिरिट as a dove, c. 1660.
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors, बाद elaborated by पाँच बौद्धिक virtues और चार अन्य समूह of नैतिक विशेषताएँ.
They are : wisdom, understanding, wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, ज्ञान, fortitude, और परहेज़गारी ( reverence ).
the धरती दिन ध्वज, the नवीनतम प्रस्ताव of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event, मनाये on अप्रैल 22, on जिससे कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support लिये पर्यावरणीय protection.
It was first celebrated in 1970, और is अभी समन्वित globally by the धरती दिन संजाल, और मनाये in more than 192 countries each year.
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in San फ्रांसिस्को, the तिथि प्रस्तावित थी कूच 21, 1970, the पहला दिन of वसन्त in the उत्तरी hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise थी बाद मंजूर in a उदघोषणा हस्ताक्षरित by सचिव सामान्य u thant at the United Nations.
A माह बाद a पृथक धरती दिन थी संस्थापित by संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर gaylord नेल्सन as an environmental teach-in first held on April 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता पुरस्कार in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 धरती दिन थी केन्द्रित on the संयुक्त राज्य, an संगठन शुभारम्भ by डेनिस हेज़, जो थी the असली नेशनल समन्वयक in 1970, took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous communities celebrate धरती सप्ताह, an संपूर्ण सप्ताह of क्रियाएँ focused on environmental issues.
Iodine is a chemical element with symbol i और परमाणु क्रमांक 53.
The name is इससे यूनानी ioeidēs, अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी, due to the रंग of elemental iodine vapor.
आयोडीन और इसके यौगिकों हैं primarily प्रयुक्त in पोषण, और industrially in the उत्पादन of एसिटिक एसिड and certain polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number, low toxicity, and ease of अनुलग्नक to सशुल्क यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray कंट्रास्ट सामग्री in आधुनिक आयुर्विज्ञान.
आयोडीन रै तभी एक stable isotope.
A क्रमांक of आयोडीन radioisotopes हैं भी used in medical applications.
Iodine is मिला on धरती मुख्यतः as the अत्यधिक water-soluble आयोडाइड आयन, I−, which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
Like the other हैलोजन्स, फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic अणु i2, और तब only momentarily after being oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the ब्रह्मांड और on धरती, आयोडीन 's ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a अपेक्षाकृत rare element.
However, इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर जल रै दिए it a role in biology.
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological कृत्यों ( तभी टंगस्टन, employed in एंजाइमों by a few प्रजाति of जीवाणु, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in अनेक soils, due to आरंभिक कम प्रचुरता as a crust-element, और भी leaching of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater, has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations.
Iodine कमियां affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable cause of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by higher animals, which use it to synthesize थायराइड हार्मोन, जिससे contain the तत्व.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in the थायराइड ग्रंथि along with nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a ऊँची परिवर्द्धन उत्पाद उपज, concentrates in the थायराइड, लकिन is easily remedied साथ पोटैशियम iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence decisions बना by officials in the सरकारी, सबसे प्रायः विधायक or सदस्यों of नियामक agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of people and organized समूह, सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर, corporations, fellow विधायक or सरकारी officials, or वकालत समूह ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, अर्थ a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता भीतर उसके or उसके चुनावी ज़िला, or नहीं ; वे may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists हैं लोगों जिनकी कारोबार is trying to influence विधान on निमित्त of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can भी लॉबी as an अधिनियम of स्वयंसेवा or as a छोटी भाग of उनके सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण, a सीईओ बैठक साथ a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
Governments often define and regulate व्यवस्थित समूह lobbying कि रै become influential.
The आचार और नैतिकता of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, जब the implication is कि लोगों साथ अत्यधिक socioeconomic शक्ति हैं corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it दूर इससे निष्पक्षता ) in अनुक्रम to serve उनके own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' रूचि हैं विधिवत defended विरूद्ध अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार, or भी बस बनाना यकीनन कि अल्पसंख्यक रूचि हैं fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance कंपनियाँ, may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in अनुक्रम to counteract the influence of तम्बाकू कंपनियाँ, in जिससे मामला the lobbying होता be viewed by सबसे लोगों as जायज ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists हैं `` शुभ lobbyists '' और जिससे ones हैं `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence विधान is a शक्ति संघर्ष.
As in other forms of power struggle, such as युद्ध or विधि प्रवर्तन, motives दायरा इससे to self-defense to fighting for justice, and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of अपना प्रेम गिटार रिफ
Cream were a 1960s अंग्रेजों चट्टान supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist जोकर ब्रूस, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues चट्टान, मुश्किल चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed गीत, eric क्लैप्टन 's ब्लूज़ गिटार playing और vocals, जोकर ब्रूस 's आवाज़ और prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The group 's third album, पहियों of आग, थी the संसार 's पहला platinum-selling दोगुना album.
मलाई हैं widely regarded as होने the world 's first successful supergroup.
in उनके करियर, वे बेची over 15 million albums worldwide.
Cream 's म्यूज़िक शामिल गीतों आधारित on परंपरागत ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` क्रॉसरोड्स `` और `` spoonful ``, और आधुनिक ब्लूज़ such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम `` ( us, क्रमांक 5 ), `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us, क्रमांक 6 ), `` क्रॉसरोड्स '' ( us, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक of the समय, और, साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स, और टेरी कठ of शिकागो, popularised the उपयोग of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a भारी yet technically निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed और बहकावे the emergence of अंग्रेजों bands ऐसे as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
The बैंड 's सजीव प्रदर्शन बहकावे प्रगतिशील rock acts such as Rush.
मलाई यहूद inducted into the चट्टान और Roll Hall of Fame in 1993.
वे यहूद शामिल in दोनो रोलिंग स्टोन और vh1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 Greatest Artists of All Time ''.
They were also क्रमित क्रमांक 16 on vh1 's `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters, and starring ricki झील, सन्नी बोनो, डिब्बी हैरी, माइकल st. जेरार्ड, shawn थॉम्पसन, colleen fitzpatrick, जेरी stiller, and in his last film role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from Waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended दर्शक.
In fact, Hairsprays PG is the mildest दरजा a waters फिल्मी रै प्राप्त ; सबसे of उसके पिछला films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम as a नर्तकी on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation.
hairspray थी तभी a मॉडरेट कामयाबी upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it managed to attract a larger दर्शक on घर वीडियो in the जल्दी 1990s और became a cult classic.
Most critics praised the फिल्मी, हालांकि कुछ यहूद displeased साथ the overall campiness.
In 2002, the film थी adapted into a ब्रॉडवे musical of the वही नाम, जिससे जीती आठ Tony Awards, including Best Musical in 2003.
A second फिल्मी संस्करण of hairspray, an अनुकूलन of the स्टेज musical, थी भी released by नई लकीर सिनेमा in 2007, which included many changes of scripted items from the original.
The film also ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 सूची of the 500 greatest movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम, ढांचा, और doctrine भीतर christianity.
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर considers itself the एक सच्चा गिरिजाघर और the अपोस्टोलिक देखिए, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being पुकारा a denomination और do नहीं have कोई औपचारिक denominational ढांचा, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping परे the लोकल सभा ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups are विशाल ( e.g. catholics, lutherans, anglicans or baptists ), जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च, और in सबसे मामले the सापेक्ष size is not evident in this list.
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes क्रॉस denominational लाइनों, or in कुछ मामले बनाएँ नई denominations आउट of दो or अधिक continuing समूह, ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties और complexities हैं नहीं clearly depicted here.
Major विभाजन भीतर christianity.
Note : This is नहीं a पूरा सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the विविधता among denominations of Christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, many of which can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations साथ विकिपीडिया आलेख होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस सूची हैं notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly पुकारा ईसाई, मतभिन्नता arising primarily इससे doctrinal मतभेद between समूह.
For the purpose of सादगी, इस सूची is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination.
Explanations of different opinions concerning उनके औकात as ईसाई denominations can be मिला at उनके संबंधित आलेख.
There is no official recognition in सबसे भाग of the संसार लिये धार्मिक लाशें, और वहीँ is no आधिकारिक clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other churches चाहिए be labeled साथ pejorative शर्तें ऐसे as `` cult '', or परिचय whether इस or कि समूह enjoys कुछ माप of respectability.
Such considerations प्रायः vary इससे प्लेस to प्लेस, जहाँ एक धार्मिक समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात in एक प्रदेश, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world.
Inclusion on this list करता नहीं indicate कोई निर्णय परिचय the आकार, महत्व, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` louisiana ``, edged on the west by the Rocky Mountains.
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` बिक्री of louisiana '' ) थी the अधिग्रहण by the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस रद्दीकरण of debts लायक 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), लिये a कुल योग of 15 लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 सेंट per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed सब or भाग of 15 उपस्थित u.S. राज्य and two Canadian provinces.
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the मिसिसिपी नदी ; सबसे of उत्तर डकोटा ; सबसे of दक्षिण डकोटा ; northeastern नई मैक्सिको ; उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of मोंटाना, व्योमिंग, और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी, सहित the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स ; और छोटी portions of जमीन कि होता आखिरकार become भाग of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France नियंत्रित इस विशाल क्षेत्रफल इससे 1699 जबतक 1762, the साल it दिया the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under Napoleon Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an साम्राज्य in उत्तर America.
A स्लेव विद्रोह in हैती और an impending युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, however, led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही ये योजनाएँ और बेचें the संपूर्ण territory to the United States, who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The खरीदें of the territory of louisiana took प्लेस during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson.
At the time, the purchase faced घरेलू विपक्ष क्युकी it थी विचार to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory, Jefferson decided to go ahead with the खरीदें वैसे in अनुक्रम to हटाएँ फ़्रांस 's उपस्थिति in the प्रदेश और to protect दोनो u.S. व्यापार अभिगम to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at प्लेस d'armes, नई ऑरलियन्स अंकन ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana to the United States, 10 March 1804, as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` कूल झटका '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball and originally performed by The Capitols.
Released in 1966, it पहुँचे no. 2 on the अमरीकी r & b चार्ट और No. 7 on the pop chart.
The backing track for this song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the motown हाउस बैंड the दुर्गंध Brothers.
Per one of the Funk Brothers, the सोंग थी originally to be पुकारा `` pimp झटका. ''
This was taken from watching पड़ोस pimps, जो होता नृत्य in the क्लब, लकिन यहूद too `` कूल '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
Their version थी subsequently नामित `` the pimp झटका. ''
The producer was भयभीत कि a सोंग साथ the शब्द pimp in the शीर्षक होता be बैन or नहीं प्राप्त much धनात्मक attention, and had the title changed to its current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big Trouble, Human यौन जवाब, the la de da 's, the सृष्टि, और The Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren किया उसके संस्करण in an विषम समय हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky feel to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the सोंग लिये उनके 1982 एल्बम अवकाश और बाद re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature फिल्मी घर अलोन 2 : खोया in नई यॉर्क, ताऊ फ़्रैंक ( gerry bamman ) गाती `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower.
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the कूल चाबुक '' ) is प्रयुक्त in कूल चाबुक commercials.
A रिकॉर्डिंग of `` कूल झटका '' by रिकार्डो रे is प्रदर्शित in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film खड़ा in the साए of motown, performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ सीसे vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The song is सुना briefly in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता, Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.
Despite this कारण, it is सूचीबद्ध in कुछ विसंगतियाँ of the फिल्मी 's soundtrack.
A league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, क्षेत्रफल ).
It was long common in यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका, लकिन it is no longer an आधिकारिक ईकाई in any nation.
The league originally referred to the अलहदा a व्यक्ति could चलना in an घंटा.
Since the Middle आयु, अनेक मान have महरूम निर्दिष्ट in अनेक countries.
In the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of nautical दूरियाँ, the 3 मील ( 4.8 km ) अलहदा corresponds to कैसा दूर an निरीक्षक of औसत ऊँचाई ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level.
Thus, a जलयान traveling एक `` लीग '' रै पहुँचे कया थी previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon.
The lack of a historical and global standard लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted लिये by the परिवर्तनीय उन्नयन of the निरीक्षक ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a dominion of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 काउंटी.
Since 1949 it has existed as the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड.
From its foundation, the Irish Free State was embroiled in a सिविल युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the सन्धि और प्रतिद्वंद्वियों जो समर्थित a republic.
The pro-Treaty side, संगठित as cumann na ngaedheal उभरा विजयी इससे the विरोध और won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, जब वे शांतिपूर्वक हात over शक्ति to the anti-treaty गुट in fianna fáil, जो defeated them in an election.
The Irish state, despite its हिंसक beginnings, रै remained a उदार लोकतंत्र throughout इसके अस्तित्व.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the कड़ी साथ ब्रिटेन स्थापित अंतर्गत the सन्धि और आयरलैंड 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the British राष्ट्रमंडल और अपनाया the शीर्षक of `` गणतंत्र ''.
In the economic गोला, the आयरिश राज्य रै था a मिश्रित प्रदर्शन.
On independence, it was एक of the wealthier देशों in यूरोपीय प्रति सिर of जनसांख्यिकी.
However it also inherited इससे अंग्रेजों नियम the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी, emigration, uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial base.
For much of its history, the राज्य struggled to rectify ये समस्याएं.
Particular peaks of करणों यहूद अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, when the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna fáil सरकारें attempted to बनाएँ आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies यहूद dropped in पक्ष of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों और प्रोत्साहित of विदेशी निवेश with low taxes.
This थी विस्तारित जब आयरलैंड डाला the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, Ireland experienced an economic boom known as the सेल्टिक बाघ, in जिससे the देश 's जीडीपी surpassed अनेक of इसके European neighbours.
आव्रजन भी surpassed करणों, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 million.
However, since 2008, आयरलैंड रै अनुभवी a कठोर संकट in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign debt.
the resultant आर्थिक slump रै deepened the प्रभाव of the world recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश संविधान शामिल a अर्जी on उत्तरी आयरलैंड as a part of the national territory.
however, the राज्य भी opposed और प्रयुक्त इसके सुरक्षा शक्तियां विरूद्ध those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army, who tried to unite Ireland by force.
इस occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s और 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to दलाली an अनुबंध to the विरोध ज्ञात as the परेशानियों भीतर उत्तरी आयरलैंड from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the right of the Irish सरकारी to be a पार्टी to the उत्तरी negotiations in the anglo-irish अनुबंध of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the आयरिश संविधान थी altered by referendum to हटाएँ the territorial अर्जी to उत्तरी आयरलैंड और बजाय extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to all the people of the island should they wish to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) थी the छठे अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American राजनयिक, सीनेटर, और congressional प्रतिनिधि.
He was a सदस्य of the federalist, democratic-republican, नेशनल Republican, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams was the son of पूर्व अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स और अबीगैल Adams.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties, सबसे notably the सन्धि of ghent, which ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's उत्तरी किनारा साथ कनाडा, negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा, और authored the मुनरो Doctrine.
Historians सहमत he थी एक of the महानतम राजनयिकों और secretaries of state in American history.
As president, he sought to modernize the अमरीकी अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रचारित education.
एडम्स enacted a भाग of उसके कार्यसूची और paid off much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a कॉंग्रेस नियंत्रित by उसके दुश्मनों, और उसके कमी of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him.
He खोया उसके 1828 बोली लिये re-election to Andrew Jackson.
In doing so, he became the first अध्यक्ष चूंकि उसके पिता to serve a सिंगल term.
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently राष्ट्रवादी प्रतिबद्धता to अमेरिका 's रिपब्लिकन values.
More recently होवे ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar और moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' lifetime, technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of धार्मिक पुनरुद्धार, सोशल reform, and party politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled अधिक rapidly और efficiently than ever before.
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts बाद leaving दफ्तर, सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ दूर वृहद acclamation than he था हासिल as अध्यक्ष.
He is, so far, the only president later निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
एनिमेटेड by उसके growing revulsion विरूद्ध गुलामी, एडम्स became a leading opponent of the Slave Power.
He predicted that if a civil युद्ध यहूद to ब्रेक आउट, the अध्यक्ष could abolish slavery by using his war powers.
एडम्स भी पूर्वानुमानित the संघ 's विच्छेद over the गुलामी समस्या, लकिन कहा कि if the दक्षिण became independent there would be a series of bloody slave revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a संस्करण of the अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर वेब ब्राउजर इससे microsoft.
It was released to the पब्लिक on कूच 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a प्रमुख out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the रिलीज अनुसूची of कोई particular संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, unlike previous versions.
It is the first version since अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 2 to नहीं be bundled साथ a खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, हालांकि कुछ oems have संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system requirements for Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 हैं खिड़कियाँ 7, खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 r2, खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or खिड़कियाँ Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
Windows XP and पहले हैं नहीं समर्थित.
Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 is the पिछला संस्करण of अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on Windows Vista.
दोनो ia-32 और x64 builds are available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports अनेक सीएसएस 3 गुण, अंतःस्थापित आईसीसी v2 or v4 रंग प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली, और रै improved JavaScript performance.
It is the पिछला of the पाँच प्रमुख वेब browsers to implement support लिये Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated ग्राफिक्स रेंडरिंग using direct2d, hardware-accelerated टेक्स्ट रेंडरिंग using directwrite, hardware-accelerated वीडियो रेंडरिंग using मीडिया न्यास, imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the html5 वीडियो और ऑडियो टैग और the वेब खोलें फ़ॉन्ट स्वरूप.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid और पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by मौरिस treener, सिर केमिस्ट at Miles, in Elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, सूजन, ज्वर, सिरदर्द, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, अपच, और hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess stomach acid.
It थी शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of alka-seltzer बना to relieve जुकाम और फ्लू, alka-seltzer प्लस, थी later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin रूपांतर, alka-mints, थी introduced in 1994 and discontinued in 1997.
alka-seltzer is फिलहाल स्वामित्व by बायर Schering Pharma AG, Germany.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications बेची over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving टैबलेट that form a carbonated solution in water.
Cherry अलका seltzer प्लस टैब्लेट dissolving in water
चित्र प्रर्दशित the छह सबसे आम speleothems with labels.
enlarge to दृश्य लेबल्स.
A stalactite (, ; from the Greek stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to ड्रिप '', और अर्थ `` कि जिससे drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( द्वितीयक खनिज ) कि hangs इससे the छत of चूना caves.
it is a प्रकार of dripstone.
The सम्बन्धित गठन on the मंजिल of the गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an अकादमिक उपाधि बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा, ऐसे as in सन्दर्भ books like Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many डिग्री have अधिक than एक abbreviation.
In the UK, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations लिये डिग्री साथ पूरा stops ( e.g. `` बीएससी '' बल्कि than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and पृथक populations or समूह by anatomical, सांस्कृतिक, जातीय, जेनेटिक, भौगोलिक, ऐतिहासिक, भाषाई, धार्मिक, or social affiliation.
First used to denote नेशनल संबद्धों, the पद began to be प्रयुक्त to सुनाना to शारीरिक traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the term was प्रायः प्रयुक्त, in a taxonomic भाव, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ सुझाएँ कि the विचार of रेस प्रायः is प्रयुक्त in a भोली or simplistic रास्ता, i.e. कि among इंसानो, रेस रै no taxonomic significance : सब जीना इंसानो belong to the वही प्रजाति, होमो sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of दौड़ vary over समय, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals आधारित on आभास traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage जातिगत स्पष्टीकरण लिये सामूहिक differentiation in दोनो physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies and theories that grew आउट of the कार्य of 19th-century विज्ञानियों और physiologists रै led to the उपयोग of the शब्द रेस itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in सामान्य contexts, it is अभी प्रायः replaced by अन्य शब्द जिससे हैं कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज, ऐसे as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
लुसी स्टोन ( अगस्त 13, 1818 – अक्तूबर 19, 1893 ) थी a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist, and a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women.
In 1847, Stone became the first woman इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a कॉलेज उपाधि.
She spoke out for women 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध गुलामी at a समय जब महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित और prevented from public speaking.
स्टोन थी the पहला अंकित अमरीकी स्त्री to retain her own last name after marriage.
Stone 's organizational activities लिये the कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the मुश्किल political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's Rights सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually साथ with a number of other local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of विधान लाशें to promote laws giving more rights to women.
She assisted in establishing the स्त्री 's नेशनल वफ़ादार लीग to सहायता pass the तेरहवीं amendment और thereby abolish गुलामी, बाद जिससे वो helped रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers, the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association, which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights, publishing and distributing speeches by herself और अन्य, और सम्मेलन कार्यवाही.
In the long-running and influential स्त्री 's जर्नल, a साप्ताहिक periodical कि वो स्थापित और प्रचारित, स्टोन aired दोनो her own and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning स्टार of the स्त्री 's अधिकारों गति '', स्टोन वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the first person by whom the heart of the अमरीकी पब्लिक थी deeply stirred on the स्त्री सवाल. ''
Together, Anthony, stanton, और स्टोन have महरूम पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a bond is an instrument of indebtedness of the बंध जारीकर्ता to the धारकों.
It is a debt security, under जिससे the जारीकर्ता owes the धारकों a कर्ज़ और, depending on the शर्तें of the बंध, is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज ( the कूपन ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually देय at फिक्स्ड intervals ( semiannual, सालाना, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the bond is negotiable, i.e. the स्वामित्व of the यंत्र can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the होल्डर of the बंध is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower साथ बाह्य निधि to वित्त long-term निवेश, or, in the मामला of सरकारी bonds, to वित्त वर्तमान व्यय.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term वाणिज्यिक पेपर हैं माना to be धन मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is in the लंबाई of the term of the instrument.
Bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the दो is कि ( पूंजी ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे हैं स्वामी ), whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे are lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds प्रायः have a पारिभाषित पद, or परिपक्वता, बाद जिससे the बंध is redeemed, whereas स्टॉक्स may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable बंध, ऐसे as consols, जिससे is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.
