A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object that is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट, जिससे seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the स्केल फ़ैक्टर ) of the शारीरिक size of the original object.
Very often the स्केल मॉडल is प्रयुक्त as a मार्गदर्शिका to बनाना the object in full size.
Scale models are निर्मित or एकत्रित लिये अनेक कारण.
The Zune hd थी a पोर्टेबल मीडिया खिलाड़ी in the zune उत्पाद परिवार released on September 15, 2009 by Microsoft.
It was a direct प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ the ठहराना ipod और iPhone series of mobile devices.
It was initially released in 16 और 32 gb capacities.
A 64 GB version थी released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and शामिल wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन, अभिगम to the zune मार्केटप्लेस और वेब browsing.
The Zune HD utilized the nvidia tegra apx 2600 चिप, allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, content होता be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल on the खिलाड़ी 's OLED touchscreen.
Old Sparky, the electric कुर्सी प्रयुक्त at गाओ गाओ थाना
निष्पादन by electrocution, प्रायः performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी, is an निष्पादन विधि originating in the United States in which the condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution method was निर्मित by कर्मचारी of थामस एडिसन दौरान the युद्ध of currents, और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the संयुक्त राज्य और, लिये a काल of अनेक दशकों, in the फिलीपीन ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned व्यक्ति थी संलग्न to the कुर्सी, विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान होता be passed through the व्यक्तिगत 's देह, in अनुक्रम to कारण fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The first jolt of electric current was designed to cause immediate unconsciousness और दिमाग मौत ; the दूसरी एक थी designed to कारण fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the संयुक्त राज्य the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the मौत दंड, इसके उपयोग is in मनाही due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन, which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution.
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of निष्पादन, आज it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक विधि कि may be चुनी over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन in अलबामा, फ्लोरिडा, South Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the कैदी to चुनें lethal इंजेक्शन as an alternative method.
In the states of केंटकी और टेनेसी, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै महरूम रिटायर्ड मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates जो do नहीं चुनें electrocution or inmates जो वचनबद्ध उनके अपराधों बाद the designated date are killed by lethal injection.
The electric chair is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in Arkansas and ओक्लाहोमा if अन्य फ़ॉर्म of निष्पादन हैं मिला असंवैधानिक in the state at the time of execution.
It is the एकमात्र विधि of निष्पादन in वर्मांट, where treason is the only capital crime.
On फ़रवरी 8, 2008, the नेब्रास्का परम् अदालत संकल्पित कि निष्पादन by इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी थी a `` बेदर्द and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution.
This brought executions of this type to an समाप्त in नेब्रास्का, the तभी बाकी state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder.
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the सामान्य सभा, the राज्य विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड, और is रचित of 141 delegates elected from 47 districts.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the मेरीलैंड राज्य हाउस ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on राज्य वृत्त in annapolis, जिससे is the राज्य पूंजी.
The State House also houses the मेरीलैंड राज्य सीनेट कक्ष और the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल of the State of Maryland.
Each प्रतिनिधि रै कार्यालयों in annapolis, in the आसपास कैस्पर R. Taylor, Jr. House Office Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the बैटल लिये पेरिस ) took प्लेस दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the occupying जर्मनी गैरीसन on 25 August.
The मुक्ति of पेरिस प्रारंभ साथ an uprising by the फ्रेंच प्रतिरोध against the German garrison.
on 24 अगस्त, the फ्रेंच शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur, ffi ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण इससे the फ़्री फ्रेंच फौज of मुक्ति and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton.
The capital प्रदेश of फ़्रांस था महरूम governed by नाजी जर्मनी चूंकि the हस्ताक्षर of the दूसरी compiègne armistice in जून 1940, जब the जर्मनी फौज occupied northern and westernmost France, and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the exile of the vichy सरकारी to sigmaringen in जर्मनी.
However, there was still much heavy लड़ to be किया पहले फ़्रांस थी liberated, सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the Vosges Mountains ), along the German-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों लिये the शेष of 1944 और into 1945.
`` Feelin ' alright ? '' भी ज्ञात as `` अहसास alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The सोंग थी भी a hit सिंगल लिये अनेक performers : जो cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, us # 33 ), Mongo Santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has also been अंकित by तीन श्वान रात्रि ( 1969 ), the 5th आयाम ( 1970 ), लू राल्स, फ्रेडी किंग, पॉल weller, lulu, chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), विरल धरती, the इलेक्ट्रिक अवधारणा ऑर्केस्ट्रा, माँ 's Finest ( 1973 ), The Ohio Players ( 1971 ), Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes.
A Steel Drum version by त्रिनिदाद आयल कम्पनी थी reissued on the dancefloor जैज़ संकलन Blue Juice 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 फिल्मी duets, सुंग by Huey Lewis.
Both the असली और the जो cocker कवर यहूद प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म Flight, starring Denzel Washington.
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor, voice actor, singer, songwriter और संगीतकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom ned 's declassified स्कूल अस्तित्व मार्गदर्शिका और लिये उसके भूमिका in the 2007 tv फिल्म shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.
Werkheiser also निभाई पीटर parkes in the चौथी और फाइनल ऋतु of the ABC Family show Greek.
Sample view of an electronic स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड आधारित on बिंब
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय व्यक्तिगत मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization औकात, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology बिंब, vital लक्षण, निजी आंकड़े like age and weight, and billing information.
ऋण origination is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a borrower applies लिये a नई ऋण, and a lender processes that application.
origination generally शामिल सब the कदम इससे लेने a ऋण अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ).
Loan servicing covers सबकुछ बाद disbursing the निधि जबतक the loan is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized संस्करण of नई खाता खोलने लिये वित्तीय services organizations.
Certain people and संगठन specialize in ऋण origination.
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage originator कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent उदाहरण.
वहीँ हैं अनेक अलग प्रकार of loans.
For more सूचना on ऋण प्रकार, देखिए the ऋण और उपभोक्ता lending articles.
Steps involved in originating a ऋण vary by ऋण प्रकार, विभिन्न kinds of ऋण रिस्क, नियामक, lender policy, and other factors.
Top left : The टेनेसी घाटी प्राधिकार, भाग of the नई Deal, being signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो थी जिम्मेदार लिये पहलों और कार्यक्रम collectively ज्ञात as the New Deal.
Bottom : a पब्लिक भित्ति इससे एक of the artists employed by the New Deal.
The New Deal थी a श्रेणी of आर्थिक कार्यक्रम enacted in the संयुक्त राज्य between 1933 and 1936.
They involved अध्यक्षीय कार्यपालिका आदेश or कानून passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the पहला term of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
the कार्यक्रम यहूद in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद, और केन्द्रित on कया इतिहासकारों call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to सामान्य स्तर ; और सुधार of the वित्तीय प्रणाली to prevent a repeat अवसाद.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine अध्यक्षीय शर्तें इससे 1933 to 1969 ), साथ इसके आधार in उदार विचार, the श्वेत दक्षिण, परंपरागत डेमोक्रेट, बिग नगर मशीने, और the newly सशक्त मजदूर संघ और जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों.
The Republicans were split, with conservatives opposing the संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास, और उदारवादियों accepting कुछ of it और होनहार to make it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal गठबन्धन कि वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s, जबकि the विपक्ष रूढ़िवादी गठबन्धन largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for समर्थक of the नई सौदे, और `` रूढ़िवादी `` लिये इसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in उसके endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn इससे two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, and Left party districts ).
As noted by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by विरल, non-southern डेमोक्रेट majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट सीनेटरों — spelled दूसरी नई सौदे reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First नई सौदे '' ( 1933–34 ) और a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ), साथ the दूसरी एक अधिक उदार और more controversial.
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups, from banking और railroads to उद्योग और खेती, सब of जिससे मांगे सहायता लिये आर्थिक survival.
The संघीय आपात राहत प्रशासन, लिये उदाहरण, provided $ 500 लाख लिये राहत operations by states and cities, while the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 शामिल the वेगनर अधिनियम to प्रचार मजदूर संघ, the works प्रगति प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( जिससे बना the संघीय सरकारी by दूर the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States आवास प्राधिकार और फार्म सुरक्षा प्रशासन, दोनो in 1937, और the मेला मजदूर मानकों अधिनियम of 1938, जिससे नियत अधिकतम घंटों और न्यूनतम wages for most categories of workers.
The आर्थिक downturn of 1937–38, और the कड़वा विभाजित between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in कॉंग्रेस joined in the अनौपचारिक रूढ़िवादी Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief कार्यक्रम ऐसे as the wpa और ccc और अवरोधित प्रमुख उदार प्रस्ताव.
रूज़वेल्ट खुद turned उसके ध्यान to the war effort, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the National रिकवरी प्रशासन ( nra ) और the पहला संस्करण of the agricultural समायोजन अधिनियम ( aaa ) असंवैधानिक, however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) बाएँ the नई सौदे largely intact, even expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the नई सौदे as प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम, जिससे रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड M. निक्सन generally retained.
After 1974, however, the call for deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था gained bipartisan support.
The New Deal विनियमन of बैंकिंग ( glass–steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain क्रियाशील, साथ कुछ स्टिल ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the असली names, सहित the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम ( fdic ), the संघीय क्रॉप बीमे निगम ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest programs still in अस्तित्व आज हैं the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली और the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( SEC ).
a स्त्री ( ), pl : महिलाओं ( ) is a female human.
The term woman is usually reserved for an adult, साथ the पद लड़की होने the usual पद लिये a female child or adolescent.
However, the term woman is also sometimes प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a मादा इंसान, regardless of आयु, as in वाक्यांश such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically capable of giving जनम, हालांकि पुरानी महिलाओं जो have गए through menopause and some intersex women can not.
`` i do n't want to मिस a बात '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane वारेन, the सोंग debuted at क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 years together ).
The song stayed at number one for चार सप्ताह इससे सितंबर 5 to सितंबर 26, 1998.
The song also ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 लिये अनेक सप्ताह in अनेक अन्य देशों.
In the UK, the song peaked at क्रमांक चार, बनने एरोस्मिथ 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk, जहाँ it थी the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has sold over a million copies.
हालांकि नहीं प्रयुक्त by the बहुमत of the संसार 's देशों, daylight saving time is common in the Western world.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the अभ्यास of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the हल्का महीने so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks are adjusted आगे एक घंटा निकट the प्रारंभ of वसन्त और हैं समायोजित backward in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी पहला implemented दौरान the पहला संसार War.
Many देशों have प्रयुक्त it at विभिन्न times since then.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy संकट और रै महरूम widely प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका और यूरोपीय चूंकि तब.
The practice has been दोनो praised और criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, and other activities that exploit sunlight बाद working घंटों, लकिन can कारण समस्याएं लिये संध्या entertainment और अन्य occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग उपयोग पैटर्न differ greatly, और शोध परिचय how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST clock शिफ्ट उपस्थित अन्य चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, और can disrupt बैठक, सफर, बिलिंग, रिकार्ड keeping, चिकित्सा devices, heavy equipment, and sleep patterns.
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically, but इस can be सीमित और error-prone, विशेषकर जब dst तिथियाँ हैं बदला.
floorplan of the château de Montargis
Montargis is a कम्यून in the loiret विभाग in north-central France on the Loing river.
The town is स्तिथ परिचय दक्षिण of पेरिस और ईस्ट of orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the दूसरी largest नगर in the loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a large forest, और contains लाइट उद्योग और खेती, including saffron.
Due to its numerous canals और पुलों, montargis sometimes बिल्स itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though काफी आधुनिक, it retains a मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in its downtown area.
In computer storage, a logical unit number, or LUN, is a क्रमांक प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a लॉजिकल ईकाई, जिससे is a यंत्र addressed by the scsi प्रोटोकॉल or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be प्रयुक्त साथ कोई यंत्र जिससे supports read/write परिचालन, ऐसे as a टेप ड्राइव, लकिन is सबसे प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
Though not technically सही, the पद `` lun '' is प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata markon ), commonly shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित or बस Mark, is the second book of the New Testament.
This canonical खाता of the जीवन of यीशु of नासरत is एक of the three synoptic gospels.
It was विचार to be an निचोड़, जिससे खाते लिये इसके प्लेस as the दूसरी gospel in the Bible.
However, most contemporary scholars अभी लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels इन्जील of मैथ्यू और इन्जील of ल्यूक is widely आयोजित by अनेक, हालांकि नहीं सब, नई वसीयत विद्वानों.
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus from उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to उसके मौत और क़यामत.
it focuses विशेषकर on the पिछला सप्ताह of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift कथा portrays यीशु as a वीर man of कार्रवाई, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
an महत्वपूर्ण थीम of Mark is the Messianic Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, कोशिशें unsuccessfully to रखना उसके मुक्तिदाता पहचान रहस्य, और conceals उसके संदेश साथ parables.
meanwhile, the शिष्यों असफल to समझे दोनो the implication of the चमत्कार of यीशु और the अर्थ of the बाते he predicts about his arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 साथ the डिस्कवरी of यीशु ' खाली मकबरा और कि the following खाता of उसके क़यामत दिखावे is a later addition.
According to tradition and some early church writers, the author is चिह्नित the इंजीलवादी, the साथी of the apostle पीटर.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in रूप और in धर्मशास्त्र, जिससे tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा कि the इन्जील थी आधारित on पीटर 's उपदेश.
The text is a compilation which may शामिल eye-witness खाते as खूब as ज्ञात अपोस्टोलिक preachings, और pre-existing लिखा रिकॉर्ड कि do नहीं मौजूद today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the stories in the इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted orally before being written down.
Various elements within the gospel सुझाएँ कि the लेखक लिखा in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन लिये a non-jewish ईसाई community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high काल्पनिक अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री और विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑक्सफोर्ड professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा the होब्बिट, लकिन आखिरकार विकसित into a much larger work.
It was written in चरण between 1937 और 1949, much of it दौरान World War II.
It is the second best-selling अनोखा कभी लिखा, साथ over 150 लाख नक़ल sold.
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, who had in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the अन्य बजती of शक्ति as the परम हथियार in उसके अभियान to जीतें और नियम सब of middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits frodo baggins, samwise `` sam '' gamgee, meriadoc `` मैरी '' brandybuck और peregrin `` pippin '' took, लकिन भी the hobbits ' मुख्य allies और यात्राएं companions : aragorn, a इंसान रेंजर ; boromir, a man इससे gondor ; gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by tolkien to be एक आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत, साथ the अन्य being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the बजती as तीन आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, यूँ बनाना the अभी परिचित रब of the Rings trilogy.
The three आयतन यहूद हकदार the फेलोशिप of the रिंग, the Two Towers, and The Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, दो प्रति आवाज़, साथ अनेक appendices of पृष्ठभूमि सामग्री शामिल at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the बजती रै चूंकि महरूम reprinted numerous टाइम्स और translated into many languages.
Tolkien 's work has been the विषय of extensive विश्लेषण of इसके themes and origins.
Although a प्रमुख कार्य in itself, the स्टोरी थी तभी the पिछला गति of a larger एपिक tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier work, and on the story of The Lord of the Rings, include philology, mythology, धर्म और the लेखक 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization, as खूब as पहले काल्पनिक works और tolkien 's अनुभवों in संसार War I.
The रब of the बजती in इसके फेरे is माना to have था a ग्रेट प्रभाव on आधुनिक काल्पनिक ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the बजती रै led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, the founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works, और the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has प्रेरित, और continues to inspire, कलाकृति, म्यूज़िक, films and television, video games, and subsequent literature.
Award-winning adaptations of The रब of the बजती have महरूम बना लिये रेडियो, थिएटर, and film.
The following is an एपीसोड सूची लिये the निकलोडियन sitcom Drake & Josh.
The series debuted on जनवरी 11, 2004.
A TV film Merry Christmas, Drake & Josh was made अलावा इससे the नियमित श्रेणी on दिसम्बर 5, 2008.
There are a कुल of 60 एपीसोड यहूद उत्पादित spanning four seasons.
ड्रेक घंटी, जोश पेक, और मिरांडा cosgrove यहूद the तभी अभिनेताओं to appear in all 60 episodes.
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता क्लारा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in अगस्त 2010.
The offense is wearing रेड jerseys साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक एलेक्स स्मिथ, जो is in a ब्लैक jersey ; the defense in white.
In the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, प्रशिक्षण शिविर refers to the समय पहले the season commences.
During this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an outside स्थान, प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर लिये at तनिक the first few weeks.
This is similar to बेसबॉल 's वसन्त प्रशिक्षण.
Training camp is प्रयुक्त in अनेक अलग तरीके.
New players and कोच उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of मूल्यांकन ; लिये दिग्गजों, it is समय to गोलाकार back into form.
Training camp is विभाजित into अनेक अलग components.
the पहला is scrimmages.
These हैं pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly full games ' worth of plays.
Sometimes, दो अभ्यास सत्र हैं आयोजित on the same day.
इस अवधारणा is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training camp include drills, बैठक साथ कोच और अन्य खिलाड़ी at एक 's स्थिति, वज़न प्रशिक्षण, और pre-season games.
The latter half of training camp leads सीधे into the प्रदर्शनी ऋतु.
With NFL training शिविरों starting in late-july, the biggest चिंता रै महरूम निर्जलीकरण.
In 2001, Minnesota Vikings खिलाड़ी korey stringer died of a चिकित्सा कंडीशन आधारित इससे निर्जलीकरण and heatstroke.
the मौत of stringer prompted the NFL to change their training policies.
at प्रत्येक अभ्यास, प्रत्येक टोली जरूर have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally, an ambulance must be present during practices.
With NFL training camps शुरूआत in लेट जुलाई, कठोर मौसम can affect अभ्यास and exhibition games.
In 2002, a क्लीवलैंड भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम, and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an जल्दी dekh at the खिलाड़ी ; प्रवेश to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल टिकट, बनाना प्रशिक्षण camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at शिविर साइट साथ साथ offering क्रियाएँ और कार्यक्रम to मेक प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a संचिका प्रणाली ( or filesystem ) is a प्रकार of आंकड़ा स्टोर जिससे can be प्रयुक्त to स्टोर, retrieve और अद्यतन a set of files.
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files, or to the वास्तविक तन्त्र or फर्मवेयर components कि implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are used on local data storage डिवाइस ; अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम via a संजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( e.g. nfs, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some file systems are `` virtual '', in that the `` फाइलें '' supplied हैं computed on निवेदन ( e.g. procfs ) or हैं merely a मानचित्रण into a अलग संचिका प्रणाली प्रयुक्त as a backing store.
The file system manages access to दोनो the सामग्री of फाइलें और the मेटाडेटा परिचय those फाइलें.
It is जिम्मेदार लिये arranging भंडार स्पेस ; विश्वसनीयता, दक्षता, और ट्यूनिंग with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – March 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) और बाद the दसवाँ मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the तभी व्यक्ति to have परोसा in both of these offices.
Before becoming President, taft, a रिपब्लिकन, थी चयनित to serve on the श्रेष्ठ अदालत of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United States and in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of appeals लिये the छठे सर्किट.
In 1900, अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley नियुक्त taft governor-general of the Philippines.
In 1904, President Theodore Roosevelt नियुक्त taft सचिव of युद्ध in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे taft, तब उसके बंद राजनैतिक ally, into उसके handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State, while घटती दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the परम् Court.
Riding a wave of लोकप्रिय support लिये fellow रिपब्लिकन रूज़वेल्ट, taft जीती an आसान विजय in his 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, सिविल सेवा सुधार, strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स आयोग, improving the प्रदर्शन of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in लैटिन अमेरिका और एशिया through `` डालर कूटनीति ``, और दिखाया decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके निर्णय, प्रायः alienated उसके अपना कुंजी constituencies, और थी overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912.
In surveys of presidential scholars, taft is प्रायः क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of all American Presidents.
After leaving office, Taft spent his time in academia, मध्यस्थता, और the ढूंढें लिये संसार सलाम through उसके self-founded लीग to enforce Peace.
In 1921, after the First संसार युद्ध, अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त taft मुख्य Justice of the United States.
Taft served in this capacity until shortly पहले उसके मौत in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical स्टोरी of the exodus, in जिससे the hebrew-born मूसा, an अपनाया मिश्र प्रिंस, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as उसके adoptive bhai, pharaoh rameses ii, ऐनी बैक्सटर as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan, yvonne de कार्लो as sephora, डेबरा पेजेट as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
the supporting डाल शामिल सर सेड्रिक hardwicke as pharaoh सेती i, नीना foch as bithiah, मार्था Scott as Yoshebel, Judith Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John Carradine as Aaron.
The फिल्मी थी released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें in vistavision on October 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, जिससे demille narrated, थी the पिछला फिल्मी कि he directed.
He was set to सीधा the 1958 रीमेक of उसके 1938 फिल्मी the buccaneer, लकिन उसके फाइनल बीमारी मजबूर उसे to बाज़ the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also नियोजित to फिल्मी the जीवन of रब baden पावेल, the संस्थापक of the Scout movement, with David Niven ; this project was never realized.
the टेन आयतें is a आंशिक रीमेक of demille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast और क्रू of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the असली.
It has चूंकि महरूम remade as a टेलीविज़न miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the सबसे financially कामयाब films कभी बना, grossing over $ 65 लाख at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for inflation, इस makes it the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically, साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box दफ्तर जालस्थल `` the संख्याएँ '' सूचियाँ the घरेलू gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten आयतें थी चयनित लिये संरक्षण in the संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the American Film Institute revealed इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative community.
The Ten आयतें थी सूचीबद्ध as the दसवाँ बेहतरीन फिल्मी in the epic genre.
The film received seven अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations सहित बेहतरीन चित्र, और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best Visual Effects.
Charlton Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र कर्ता in the नाटक category.
Yul Brynner won the National फलक of पुनर्विलोकन पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका as rameses, साथ साथ उसके अन्य भूमिकाएँ in the King and I and Anastasia.
Louisville (, or ) is a प्रमुख नगर और the largest नगर in the u.S. राज्य of केंटकी और the काउंटी सीट of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the नगर 's सीमायें have महरूम साथ those of the काउंटी क्युकी of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's संतुलन कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों और is the जनसांख्यिकी सूचीबद्ध in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the louisville महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes louisville-jefferson काउंटी और 12 surrounding काउंटी, आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( देखिए Geography below ).
The Louisville Combined सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, having a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,451,564, शामिल the एमएसए, hardin काउंटी and Larue County in Kentucky, and Scott County, Indiana.
An important internal शिपिंग बंदरगाहों in the 19th सदी, louisville आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी, the पहला of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
A typical प्रायोगिक सेटअप लिये an aldol reaction.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the तापमान of जिससे is होने monitored by a तापयुग्म ( the तार on the left ).
A cooling bath, in प्रयोगशाला रसायन ( प्रायः लकिन नहीं सदा सशुल्क रसायन ) अभ्यास, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures हैं प्रयुक्त to collect liquids बाद आसवन, to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a रोटरी evaporator, or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया नीचे रूम तापमान ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen, water, or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'कैरीr ' ( ऐसे as द्रव जल, एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल, एसीटोन, इत्यादि. ), जिससे हस्तांतरण ऊष्मा between the नहाना और the पोत ; ; और ( c ) an योगात्मक to गुमसुम the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A familiar example of this is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज ice cream.
The phase-change of ice into द्रव जल requires उर्जा, 'pulling ' heat from the system.
Adding salt lowers the अस्थायी at जिससे इस happens, अर्थ अधिक उर्जा रै to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' अधिक ऊष्मा इससे इसके पर्यावरण to become liquid. )
Eating disorders are शर्तें पारिभाषित by असामान्य खाने आदतें कि may involve either अपर्याप्त or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia नर्वोज़ा और एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा हैं the सबसे आम विशिष्ट forms in the United Kingdom.
Other types of eating विकार शामिल binge खाने विकार और खाने विकार नहीं otherwise specified.
Bulimia नर्वोज़ा is a विकार characterized by binge eating and purging.
purging can शामिल self-induce उल्टी, over-exercising, and the usage of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the पाइंट of self-starvation और excessive weight loss.
Though primarily thought of as affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख होने प्रभावित in the u.K. ), खाने विकार affect males as well.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with eating disorders are males ( गोर्गान, 1999 ).
( an अनुमानित 1 लाख u.K. males होने प्रभावित ).
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among दोनो मेन और महिलाओं, वहीँ is प्रमाण to सुझाएँ कि it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी संसार who are at the highest risk of developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of सब अमेरिकी personally जान किसी साथ an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा, और the कौशल to observe the कृत्यों of the दिमाग as खूब.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in खाने आचरण, जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in खाने disorders.
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely समझा, लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण कि it may be linked to अन्य चिकित्सा शर्तें and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness और youthfulness have contributed to खाने विकार affecting diverse populations.
One study दिखाया कि लड़कियों साथ adhd have a वृहद मौका of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested that women साथ ptsd, विशेषकर due to sexually सम्बन्धित आघात, हैं अधिक संभावित to develop एनोरेक्सिया nervosa.
One पढ़ाई दिखाया कि फोस्टर लड़कियों हैं अधिक संभावित to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think कि पीर दबाव और idealized body-types देखी in the मीडिया are also a significant factor.
Some research दिखाएँ कि लिये निश्चित लोगों वहीँ हैं जेनेटिक कारण क्यों वे may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a सहसंबंध between मरीजों साथ bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In जोड, चिंता विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार हैं आम आवृत्ति साथ क्लाइंट of eating disorders.
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of eating disorders, the consequences of खाने विकार can be कठोर, सहित मौत ( whether इससे सीधा चिकित्सा प्रभाव of अशांत खाने आदतें or इससे comorbid शर्तें ऐसे as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the United States existed from the जल्दी सालो of the औपनिवेशिक काल ; it थी firmly स्थापित by the समय the संयुक्त राज्य sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line had either abolished गुलामी outright or passed कानून लिये the क्रमिक abolition of slavery.
In 1787 कॉंग्रेस निषिद्ध गुलामी in the उत्तरपश्चिम territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry बाद 1800, और विस्तारित into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into स्लेव और फ़्री राज्य साथ the mason-dixon लकीर, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808, but the घरेलू व्यापार, साथ बिक्री to the गहन दक्षिण, विस्तारित dramatically, और अनेक captives यहूद shipped by the coastwise स्लेव व्यापार.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके विस्तार into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, और numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it as हानिकारक to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham lincoln 's चुनाव, in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य broke दूर to रूप the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका, अग्रणी to the American Civil War.
The federal government in 1862 बना abolition of गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
in जनवरी 1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed स्लेव in the confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished गुलामी throughout the संपूर्ण संयुक्त राज्य, सहित the किनारा राज्य और the भारतीय territories.
From the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an अनुमानित 12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See गुलामी in the americas.
The great बहुमत गई to the शुगर बागानों of the वेस्ट Indies or Brazil, where mortality was high.
About 645,000 यहूद brought to कया is अभी the United States.
By the 1860 United States Census, the slave जनसांख्यिकी in the अमरीकी दक्षिण था grown to four million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 स्लेव राज्य, nearly 400,000 आयोजित स्लेव ( roughly one in four ), amounting to 8 % of all American families.
While some स्लेव worked as हाउस बन्दों और शहरी शिल्पकार, the ग्रेट बहुमत worked on बागानों or विशाल खेतो, cultivating lucrative नकदी फसलों, ऐसे as राइस, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 सबसे स्लेव यहूद आयोजित in the गहन दक्षिण, जहाँ वे परोसा in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
in छोटी परिचालन, वे worked with their owners.
In विशाल बागानों वे यहूद निर्देशित by white paid overseers.
अंतर्गत the प्रणाली कि became chattel गुलामी ( स्वामित्व of a इंसान होने, और of his/her descendants ), a racial element was fundamental : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, वर्जिनिया, followed by अन्य दक्षिणी colonies, enacted विधि कि children of स्लेव mothers were born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ), or by manumission by स्वामी, जिससे थी regulated by राज्य, और became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized कार्य by a प्रणाली of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted for several सालो लिये दोनो ग़रीब europeans और africans alike, to अदा off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements क्युकी of ग़रीब economies in उनके home countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as fewer europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to आयात अधिक Africans as slaves.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the House of Burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a नई स्लेव कोड in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान और added नई प्रावधानों enforcing white supremacy in the law.
Schematic cross section of part of पत्ता, जाइलम दिखाया as रेड वृत्त at फिगर 8.
Xylem is one of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
The word xylem is derived इससे the यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is लकडी, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic फलन is to हस्तांतरण जल, लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients through the plant.
This clock प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of the प्रमुख इकाई of geological समय and definitive events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil रिकार्ड of जीवन on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 ga ( billion years ago ).
Other subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and proterozoic हैं दोनो eons, the palaeozoic, mesozoic और cenozoic हैं eras of the phanerozoic eon.
The दो लाख साल quaternary काल, the समय of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at this scale.
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological मापन कि relates स्तरिकी to समय, और is प्रयुक्त by geologists, paleontologists, और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय और संबंध between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The तालिका of भूगर्भिक समय spans प्रस्तुत यहाँ agrees साथ the तिथियाँ और नामकरण नियत forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy.
Evidence from radiometric डेटिंग indicates कि the धरती is about 4.54 billion years old.
The geology or deep समय of धरती 's पास्ट रै महरूम व्यवस्थित into विभिन्न units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are प्रायः सीमांकित by परिवर्तन in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें, indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological events, such as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the cretaceous काल और the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction event, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life.
Older time spans which predate the विश्वसनीय चट्टान रिकार्ड ( पहले the proterozoic इओन ) are defined by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing परिपथ बना by टेक्सास यंत्र.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more उपयोक्ता दोस्ताना संस्करण of the ti-85, और as a बदलना लिये the ti-81.
It was the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of the TI-83.
it साझा साथ the ti-85 a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the ti-82 सुविधाएँ a 96x64 पिक्सेल प्रदर्शक, और the कोर विशेषता नियत of the ti-81 with many new features.

The King of Fighters fighting game series, produced by SNK Playmore, शामिल a चौड़ी डाल of वर्ण, कुछ of जिससे हैं लिया इससे अन्य snk games.
The story takes place in a fictional universe in जिससे an सालाना श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 लड़ tournaments are held.
The first game in the series introduces the initial प्रमुख अक्षर of the श्रेणी, kyo kusanagi, a यंग जापानी सेनानी जो is the वारिस to a शक्तिशाली group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi गोत्र 's दुश्मनों, उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori yagami, और the परमेश्वर orochi और इसके इंसान अनुसरणकर्ता, among others.
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a नई स्टोरी चाप, घूमती around k ', a यंग man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests संगठन क्युकी वे kidnapped उसे at an जल्दी age and stripped him of his past memories, so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control.
In The King of Fighters 2003, a new character named Ash Crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to चोरी the शक्तियां of the clans जो sealed the orochi in the पास्ट लिये an unknown reason.
A new group of antagonists, known as those इससे the पास्ट, भी appears in the श्रेणी ; वे want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति लिये the purpose of giving it to उनके unknown master.
The plot and the वर्ण आए इससे the Yamata no Orochi legend.
वहीँ हैं भी अनेक वर्ण in the खेल कि हैं parodies or homages to several popular anime, manga, and films.
merchandise आधारित on the वर्ण रै भी महरूम released, सहित action figures and keychains.
The characters have garnered तारीफ़ इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications लिये the विशेषता of उनके डिजाइन and movesets.

Whale Wars is a साप्ताहिक अमरीकी documentary-style वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet cable channel.
The कार्यक्रम फ़ॉलो पॉल वाटसन, संस्थापक of the समुद्र गड़रिये संरक्षण समाज, as he और the क्रू aboard their various vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, Animal ग्रह नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी लिये a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical प्रजाति of त्रिभुज.
It is sometimes known as the American harpy त्रिभुज to फर्क it इससे the पापुआई त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई गिनी harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest और सबसे शक्तिशाली रैप्टर मिला in the americas, और among the largest extant प्रजाति of eagles in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy layer.
विनाश of इसके प्राकृतिक आवास रै देखी it vanish इससे अनेक भाग of its former range, and it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
Biological classification, or scientific classification in जीवविज्ञान, is a विधि of वैज्ञानिक taxonomy प्रयुक्त to समूह और categorize जीवों into समूह ऐसे as genus or species.
These समूह हैं ज्ञात as taxa ( एकवचन : taxon ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of carolus लीनियस, जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा शारीरिक विशेषताएँ.
These groupings have since महरूम संशोधित to improve संगति साथ the darwinian principle of common descent.
With the परिचय of the cladistic विधि in the लेट 20th सदी, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped आधारित purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, which uses DNA sequences as आंकड़ा, रै भी चलित अनेक हाल revisions और is संभावित to continue doing so.
biological वर्गीकरण belongs to the विज्ञान of biological systematics.
Lennon 's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston लेनन ; 9 अक्तूबर 1940 – 8 दिसम्बर 1980 ) थी an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, सिंगर और songwriter जो रोज़ to विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as a संस्थापक सदस्य of the बीटल्स, एक of the सबसे commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music.
With Paul McCartney, he formed एक of the सबसे मनाये songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; उसके पहला बैंड, the quarrymen, विकसित into the बीटल्स in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the समाप्त of the दशक, लेनन embarked on a सोलो करियर कि उत्पादित the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine ``.
After his marriage to योको ओनो in 1969, he बदला उसके name to John Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote समय to उठाने उसके शिशु बेटे शॉन, लकिन re-emerged साथ ओनो in 1980 साथ the नई एल्बम दोगुना Fantasy.
he थी murdered तीन weeks after its release.
Lennon नाज़िल a rebellious प्रकृति और acerbic wit in उसके म्यूज़िक, लिखने, drawings, on film and in interviews.
Controversial through his political and peace activism, he moved to New York City in 1971, where उसके आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to निर्वासन उसे, जबकि कुछ of उसके गीतों were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units, and as लेखक, co-writer or यजमान, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest britons voted उसे आठवीं, और in 2008, रोलिंग स्टोन क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest singer of all time.
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 1994.
प्रतिमा of rip वैन winkle in irvington, नई यॉर्क, नहीं दूर इससे `` sunnyside ``, the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a छोटी स्टोरी by अमरीकी लेखक वॉशिंगटन इरविंग प्रकाशित in 1819, as खूब as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving थी जीना in बर्मिंघम, इंग्लैण्ड, it थी भाग of a संग्रहण हकदार the Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill kyu, इरविंग बाद admitted, `` जब i लिखा the स्टोरी, i था never महरूम on the Catskills. ''
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम नियत.
This page only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न artists.
This does not शामिल the विभिन्न खास पुरस्कार कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
The page however करता शामिल अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a कॉमिक fictional अक्षर निर्मित and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens.
He is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके दो टेलीविज़न श्रेणी और film series during the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a स्टेज अधिनियम कि जल्दी led to an एचबीओ खास in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, reubens took the अक्षर to गति चित्र साथ pee-wee 's बिग एडवेंचर in 1985, toning bas the वयस्क innuendo for the appeal of children.
This प्रशस्त the रास्ता लिये pee-wee 's playhouse, an एमी Award winning children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another film, बिग शीर्ष pee-wee, थी released in 1988.
Due to negative media attention following a कांड in 1991, reubens decided to shelve उसके alter अहंकार दौरान the 1990s, और तब धीरे resurrected it during the following decade.
It was at that time that reubens addressed योजनाएँ to लिखें a नई pee-wee फिल्मी, pee-wee 's playhouse : the फिल्म.
In June 2007, reubens appeared as pee-wee herman लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's यारों ' चुनाव Awards.
That '70s Show is an American television काल sitcom कि centers on the जीवनदान of a समूह of teenage मित्रों living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place, Wisconsin, from May 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox television network, first airing on अगस्त 23, 1998, कार्यशील लिये आठ लगातार सीज़न, and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18, 2006.
The main teenage डाल सदस्यों यहूद topher अनुग्रह, mila kunis, एश्टन कूचर, डैनी masterson, लौरा prepon, and Wilmer Valderrama.
The main adult cast members यहूद डेबरा jo rupp, kurtwood स्मिथ, डॉन स्टार्क और, दौरान the first three seasons, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य.
It is named after the कान्सास नदी जिससे बहती through it, जिससे in फेरे थी नामित बाद the Kansa Native American tribe, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is प्रायः कहा to औसत `` लोगों of the हवा '' or `` लोगों of the दक्षिण हवा, '' हालांकि इस थी probably not the term 's original meaning.
निवासियों of कान्सास हैं called `` Kansans. ''
For हज़ारों of सालो कया is अभी कान्सास थी घर to numerous और विविध Native American tribes.
Tribes in the Eastern part of the राज्य generally जिया in गांवों साथ the नदी valleys.
Tribes in the Western भाग of the राज्य यहूद सेमi- nomadic और hunted विशाल herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, लकिन the pace of उपनिवेश त्वरित in the 1850s, in the midst of राजनैतिक युद्धों over the slavery issue.
When officially opened to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854, abolitionist free-staters इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड और pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
Thus, the क्षेत्रफल थी a hotbed of हिंसा और अराजकता in इसके जल्दी दिनों as ये शक्तियां collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on जनवरी 29, 1861, कान्सास डाला the संघ as a फ़्री state.
After the सिविल युद्ध, the जनसांख्यिकी of कान्सास grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural राज्य, producing ऊँची yields of गेहूं, ज्वार और sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th सबसे extensive और the 33rd सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Psychology is an अकादमिक और लागू अनुशासन कि involves the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of mental functions and behaviors.
मनोविज्ञान रै the तात्कालिक लक्ष्य of समझना individuals और समूह by दोनो establishing सामान्य principles and researching specific cases, and by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
In this field, a पेशेवर or शोधकर्ता is पुकारा a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and social behavior, जबकि भी exploring the physiological और neurobiological प्रक्रियाओं कि underlie निश्चित संज्ञानात्मक कृत्यों and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, attention, जज्बात, phenomenology, प्रेरणा, दिमाग कामकाज, व्यक्तित्व, बर्ताव, और interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the बेहोश दिमाग.
Psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य विधि to infer causal और correlational संबंध between psychosocial variables.
In जोड, or in विपक्ष, to employing अनुभवजन्य और निगमनात्मक विधि, some—especially नैदानिक और counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques.
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '', with psychological findings linking to research and perspectives from the सोशल sciences, प्राकृतिक sciences, आयुर्विज्ञान, और the मानवता, ऐसे as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is प्रायः लागू to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity.
The majority of psychologists हैं शामिल in कुछ दयालु of therapeutic भूमिका, practicing in नैदानिक, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental प्रक्रियाओं और बर्ताव, और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in अन्य अकादमिक जमावट ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in औद्योगिक और organizational जमावट, or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as human development and aging, sports, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( अप्रैल 13, 1743 ( अप्रैल 2, 1743 o.S. ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी an अमरीकी founding पिता, the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he परोसा in the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just after the युद्ध ended, इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the संयुक्त राज्य Minister to France.
Jefferson was the first United राज्य सचिव of राज्य ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष George Washington.
With his close dost जेम्स मैडिसन he व्यवस्थित the democratic-republican पार्टी, और subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet.
Elected Vice अध्यक्ष in 1796, जब he आए in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the federalists, जेफरसन opposed एडम्स और साथ मैडिसन secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson called the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the खरीदें of the विशाल louisiana territory इससे फ़्रांस ( 1803 ), और भेजा the लुईस और क्लार्क expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His दूसरी पद थी घिरा साथ परेशानियों at घर, ऐसे as the विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of his former Vice President Aaron Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea, he आजमाया आर्थिक warfare साथ उसके embargo कानून जिससे तभी क्षतिग्रस्त अमरीकी व्यापार.
In 1803, President Jefferson initiated a प्रक्रम of भारतीय जनजातीय हटाना और relocation to the louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी, in अनुक्रम to खोलें lands लिये eventual American settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, Jefferson was a बहुश्रुत जो spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान, आविष्कार, वास्तुकला, धर्म और दर्शनशास्त्र, interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, जिससे he नामित monticello.
While not a notable orator, जेफरसन थी a skilled लेखक और corresponded साथ अनेक influential people in America and Europe throughout his adult life.
Though जेफरसन स्वामित्व अनेक स्लेव, he opposed the संस्था सब उसके जीवन और नतीजतन treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers.
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether जेफरसन थी the पिता of एक or अधिक children belonging to सैली hemings, a स्लेव at monticello. ''
Historians are also in disagreement with how much जेफरसन थी वचनबद्ध to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson हस्ताक्षरित into विधि a विधेयक कि बैन the importation of स्लेव into the United States.
बाद मार्था जेफरसन, उसके बीवी of ग्यारह सालो, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower for the rest of his life ; their marriage produced six children, of whom two survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson रै महरूम criticized by अनेक आधुनिक दिन विद्वानों over the समस्या of गुलामी, he remains रेटेड as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by स्टीवन वैन zandt, उत्पादित by वैन zandt और आर्थर बेकर और अंकित by कलाकारों United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the कलाकारों शामिल होता इंकार कोई और सब offers to perform at सूर्य नगर, a रिज़ॉर्ट जिससे थी स्तिथ in bantustan of bophuthatswana, एक of a क्रमांक of internationally अपरिचित supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population.

Bill रसेल जीती 11 championships साथ the Boston Celtics.
This is a list of NBA players साथ सबसे championships जीती as a खिलाड़ी.
The National बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर basketball league in North America.
It was founded in 1946 as the बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका ( BAA ).
The league adopted its current name at the प्रारंभ of the जब it मिलाया साथ the नेशनल बास्केट League ( NBL ).
The NBA Finals is the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the एनबीए और the निष्कर्ष of the खेल 's postseason.
The winning team of the श्रेणी receives the लैरी o'brien चैंपियनशिप Trophy.
Players from the जीतना टोली प्रायः प्राप्त चैंपियनशिप बजती इससे the टोली honoring उनके योगदान.
However, in some rare occasion, the टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative वस्तुएं, ऐसे as कलाई घड़ियाँ, instead of rings.
The number of championships जीती by एनबीए सुपरस्टार is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मापन of their greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे एनबीए championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing career.
He जीती उसके पहला चैंपियनशिप साथ the बोस्टन Celtics in his rookie year.
Afterwards, he went on to जीत 10 championships in the अगला 12 सालो, सहित आठ consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
He जीती the पिछला दो championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, Sam Jones, won 10 championships इससे 1959 to 1969, the दूसरी सबसे in एनबीए इतिहास.
Four Celtics players, Tom Heinsohn, K. C. जोन्स, satch सैंडर्स और जॉन havlicek, जीती आठ championships each.
Two other Celtics, Jim Loscutoff and फ़्रैंक रैमसे, जीती सात championships प्रत्येक.
Four players, Bob Cousy, Kareem abdul-jabbar, माइकल जॉर्डन और scottie pippen, जीती छह championships each.
Jordan and pippen हैं सदस्यों of the शिकागो bulls टोली जो जीती तीन लगातार championships twice in the 1990s.
Robert Horry and John salley हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी to have जीती the championships साथ तीन अलग teams.
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio Spurs, while Salley won चार championships साथ the डेट्रॉयट पिस्टन्स, the bulls और the लेकर्स.
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only players to win two championships साथ दो अलग टीमों in लगातार seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, जबकि केर जीती लगातार championships साथ the bulls और the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the true मान, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the मापन
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a मापन प्रणाली is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( सच्चा ) value.
The precision of a मापन प्रणाली, भी पुकारा reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to जिससे दोहराया माप under unchanged conditions show the same results.
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial उपयोग, वे हैं deliberately contrasted in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the scientific method.
A मापन प्रणाली can be सटीक लकिन नहीं precise, precise लकिन नहीं सटीक, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a systematic error, then increasing the नमूना आकार generally increases परिशुद्धता लकिन करता नहीं improve सटीकता.
The result would be a सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम इससे the flawed experiment.
Eliminating the व्यवस्थित गलती improves सटीकता लकिन करता नहीं बदलें परिशुद्धता.
A मापन प्रणाली is designated मान्य if it is दोनो सटीक और precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed effects caused by a factor or factors unrelated to the स्वतंत्र परिवर्तनीय ) और गलती ( यादृच्छिक variability ).
the शब्दावली is भी लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is, मान प्राप्त by a computational procedure from observed data.
In addition to accuracy and precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest बदलें in the underlying शारीरिक मात्रा कि produces a जवाब in the measurement.
In the case of पूरा reproducibility, ऐसे as जब rounding a क्रमांक to a representable फ्लोटिंग point number, the word precision has a meaning not related to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a माप लिये the सापेक्ष सटीकता साथ जिससे an मनमानी क्रमांक can be represented.
Fuck in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the अधिनियम of sexual intercourse.
It is an English word that is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
The उत्पत्ति of the शब्द is obscure.
it is प्रायः माना to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a क्रिया, an क्रियाशील or an adverb.
वहीँ हैं अनेक आम वाक्यांश जिससे मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded मैप प्रर्दशित the विभिन्न महाद्वीपों and regions.
Depending on the convention और मॉडल, कुछ महाद्वीपों may be संचित or subdivided : लिये उदाहरण, यूरेशिया is सबसे प्रायः subdivided into यूरोपीय और एशिया ( रेड शेड्स ), जबकि उत्तर और दक्षिण अमेरिका are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A महाद्वीप is एक of अनेक बहुत विशाल landmasses on Earth.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict मापदण्ड, साथ up to सात regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest in आकार to smallest ) : एशिया, अफ़्रीकी, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, continents हैं वर्णित by अर्थात् of tectonic प्लेटों.
Plate tectonics is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई of the गति, टक्कर और प्रभाग of महाद्वीपों, earlier known as continental drift.
बाइकर बॉयज is a 2003 फिल्मी परिचय a समूह of भूमिगत motorcycle drag racers.

Community property is a marital प्रॉपर्टी शासन कि originated in सिविल विधि jurisdictions और is अभी also found in some common law jurisdictions.
The states of the United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it थी inherited इससे मैक्सिको 's ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली, जिससे itself थी inherited इससे स्पेनी विधि ( a रोमन -derived सिविल विधि प्रणाली ) और ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community system of acquests और gains, जिससे replaced the परंपरागत फ्रेंच जातियाँ of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the United States साथ जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी राज्य highlighted in रेड.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into a जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी व्यवस्था.
In a community property क्षेत्राधिकार, सबसे प्रॉपर्टी acquired दौरान the विवाह ( मगर लिये उपहार or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific evidence that होता पाइंट to a contrary निष्कर्ष लिये a particular टुकड़ा of प्रॉपर्टी.
प्रभाग of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी may लो प्लेस by item, by splitting all items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of community प्रॉपर्टी is सख्ती mandated by statute, अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस तब शिफ्ट to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री an `` निष्पक्ष वितरण `` of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी, जिससे may परिणाम in an गैरबराबरी प्रभाग of ऐसे.
In non-community प्रॉपर्टी राज्य प्रॉपर्टी may be विभाजित by निष्पक्ष distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each partner brings into the विवाह or receives by तोहफा, bequest or मक्कारी दौरान विवाह is called separate property ( i.e., not community property ).
See प्रभाग of प्रॉपर्टी.
प्रभाग of जातियाँ debts may नहीं be the same as division of community property.
For example, in California, community प्रॉपर्टी is जरूरी to be विभाजित `` बराबर '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is जरूरी to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage is the पृथक प्रॉपर्टी of कि जीवनसाथी, जबतक the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी.
The rules for this vary इससे क्षेत्राधिकार to क्षेत्राधिकार.

After the ceremony, the युगल बना the परंपरागत appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the समाप्त of an भुजा or forelimb of primates and humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few other vertebrates ऐसे as the कोआला ( जिससे रै दो opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` हाथ '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably similar to human fingerprints ) are often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
Hands are the main structures लिये physically manipulating the पर्यावरण, प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर skills ( such as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ).
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of तंत्रिका endings on the देह, हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया, और have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands.
Like अन्य युग्म अंगों ( आँखें, फीट, टाँगे ), प्रत्येक हाथ is dominantly नियंत्रित by the opposing दिमाग गोलार्ध, so कि handedness, or the पसन्दीदा hand choice for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil, reflects individual brain functioning.
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example, in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the तीन अंक of the बर्ड हाथ शामिल the वही समजात घाटा of दो अंक as in the डायनासोर हाथ.
The human hand has 27 हड्डियों, नहीं सहित the sesamoid हड्डियों which number varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, इंटरमीडिएट और distal ) of the उंगलियाँ.
the metacarpals हैं the हड्डियों कि connects the fingers and the wrist.
Each इंसान हाथ रै 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones.

Basic digital सचेतक क्लॉक बगैर a रेडियो.
The चिह्नित in the top-left of the प्रदर्शक indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 radio alarm clock ( Sony digimatic 8fc-59w ) साथ an जल्दी mechanical-digital प्रदर्शक.
A digital क्लॉक is a प्रकार of क्लॉक कि प्रदर्शक the समय डिजिटली, i.e. in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों, as opposed to an एनालॉग clock, where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital घड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः संबद्ध साथ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ड्राइव, लकिन the `` डिजिटल '' वर्णन refers only to the display, not to the drive mechanism.
( दोनो एनालॉग और डिजिटल घड़ियाँ can be चलित either mechanically or electronically, लकिन `` clockwork '' mechanisms with digital displays are rare. )
The biggest डिजिटल क्लॉक is the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर '' ) on the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf, Germany.
Family Guy creator Seth macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ actors, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी chabert बाद the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include पैट्रिक warburton, आदम वेस्ट, जॉन G. ब्रेनन, निकोल सुलीवान and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें लिये multiple characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities on the दिखाएँ, चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ और पॉप संस्कृति.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one कर्ता, बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the श्रेणी or था conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` और macfarlane रै भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, हालांकि no अन्य डाल सदस्य रै जीती an पुरस्कार लिये उनके कार्य on the series.
The five sets of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार चित्रित यहाँ दिखाएँ the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति और डिजाइन in the United States from 1935–2005.
The history of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced वापस to the जल्दी 20th सदी.
the earliest ज्ञात डिज़ाइन थी by the अमरीकी, एलिज़ाबेथ magie, patented in 1904 but existing as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a फलक खेल to illustrate an आर्थिक principle, namely the georgist अवधारणा of a सिंगल जमीन value tax.
A श्रेणी of फलक खेल यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through the 1930s कि involved the buying and selling of land and the development of that land.
By 1934, a फलक खेल था महरूम निर्मित much जैसे the संस्करण of एकाधिकार बेची by पार्कर भाइयो और its related companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several people, mostly in the Midwestern संयुक्त राज्य और निकट the ईस्ट coast, contributed to the खेल 's डिज़ाइन और एवोल्यूशन.
By the 1970s, the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become लोकप्रिय लोकगीत ; it थी मुद्रित in the खेल 's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो, in a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly, and was cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a guide to family games published for रीडर 's डाइजेस्ट in 2003 तभी दिया क्रेडिट to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली खेल थी निर्मित in the 1800s, और नहीं acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers.
भी in the 1970s, प्राध्यापक ralph anspach, जो था खुद प्रकाशित a फलक खेल intended to illustrate the सिद्धान्त of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting, fought Parker Brothers and its then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
through the शोध of anspach और अन्य, much of the early history of the game was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady, author of the 1974 किताब the एकाधिकार किताब : रणनीति और tactics of the संसार 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल over the वास्तविक इतिहास of the खेल on बैरी farber 's नई यॉर्क नगर बात दिखाएँ in 1975.
क्युकी of the lengthy अदालत प्रक्रम, सहित appeals, the विधिक औकात of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the खेल was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of पार्कर भाइयो, as do इसके विशिष्ट design elements.
At the conclusion of the court case, the game 's logo and graphic design elements became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार ब्रांड, licensed by पार्कर भाइयो ' जनक कंपनियाँ onto a किस्में of वस्तुएं through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s and 1980s, and several books and journal आलेख on the विषय, हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो ' वर्तमान जनक कम्पनी ) किया नहीं acknowledge कोई of the खेल 's इतिहास पहले चार्ल्स darrow on इसके आधिकारिक एकाधिकार जालस्थल as recently as June 2012.
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in सामग्री प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by उन्हें, at तनिक as recently as 2006.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय tournaments, पहला आयोजित in the early 1970s, continue to the present, with the next world championship likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a नई पीढी of spin-off फलक खेल और कार्ड खेल appeared on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean.
In 1989, the first of अनेक वीडियो खेल और कंप्यूटर खेल संस्करण थी published.
Since 1994, many official variants of the game, based on locations other than Atlantic City, New Jersey ( the official U.S. सेटिंग ) or लंदन ( the आधिकारिक राष्ट्रमंडल सेटिंग, excepting कनाडा ), have महरूम प्रकाशित by हास्ब्रो or its licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the मानक u.s. संस्करण of the खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण, हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the Atlantic City property names.
Hasbro also modified the आधिकारिक लोगो to दे the `` mr. एकाधिकार '' अक्षर a 3-d computer-generated look, which has since been adopted by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves and Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed die, introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार : the आचमन संस्करण by जीतना चालें खेल, in संस्करण उत्पादित directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ).
In baseball, a बलिदान मक्खी is a batted बॉल कि satisfies चार criteria:
There are fewer than दो outs जब the बॉल is hit.
The ball is hit to the आउटफील्ड ( मेला or बेईमानी ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have महरूम आउट if नहीं लिये an गलती or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another runner is put out ).
A runner who is already on आधार स्कोर on the खेल.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to कारण a teammate to स्कोर a चलाएं, जबकि sacrificing उसके own ability to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त States.
Minnesota थी carved आउट of the पूर्वी हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory और admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
ज्ञात as the `` जमीन of 10,000 झीलों '', the राज्य 's नाम comes from a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
Those waters, together with forests, parks, and wilderness areas, offer निवासियों और पर्यटकों a किस्में of बाहरी recreational अवसर.
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive और the 21st सबसे populous of the U.S. states.
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( ज्ञात as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ), the बीच of परिवहन, कारोबार, उद्योग, शिक्षा, सरकारी और घर to an internationally known arts community.
The remainder of the राज्य consists of पश्चिमी prairies अभी दिए over to intensive कृषि ; पतझड़ी वनों in the southeast, अभी साफ, farmed और settled ; and the less populated North Woods, used for mining, forestry, and recreation.
Minnesota is known for its relatively मिश्रित सोशल और राजनैतिक orientations, और रै a ऊँची रेट of नागरिक भागीदारी और वोटर turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest राज्य, और रै a अत्यधिक साक्षर population.
The विशाल बहुमत of निवासियों हैं of scandinavian and German descent.
The state is known as a बीच of scandinavian American culture.
जातीय विविधता रै increased in recent decades.
Substantial influxes of Asian, अफ़्रीकी, और लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों have joined the वंशजों of यूरोपीय settlers और the original Native American inhabitants.
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers ), often a government department, corporation, foundation or विश्वास, to a, प्रायः ( लकिन नहीं सदा ) a nonprofit एंटिटी, शैक्षणिक संस्था, कारोबार or an व्यक्तिगत.
In order to प्राप्त a ग्रान्ट, कुछ रूप of `` ग्रान्ट लिखने '' प्रायः referred to as either a proposal or an application is usually required.
Most grants are बना to निधि a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट और आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of अनुपालन and reporting.
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a potential funder, either on the आवेदक 's अपना पहल or in जवाब to a निवेदन लिये Proposal from the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, ऐसे as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals who seek to open a small business.
Sometimes grant makers require grant जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ रूप of tax-exempt औकात, be a पंजीकृत nonprofit संगठन or a local government.
For example, tiered funding लिये a फ्रीवे हैं बहुत विशाल अनुदान negotiated at सरकारी policy level.
however छोटी अनुदान may be provided by a सरकारी agency ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving सरकारें, कारोबार, समुदायों, और individuals is प्रायः arranged by अनुप्रयोग either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized साथ the सबसे stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56co साथ a half-life of 77.27 दिनों, और 58co साथ a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives कि हैं कम than 18 घंटों और the बहुमत of ये have half-lives that are less than 1 second.
This element also has 11 meta राज्य, सब of जिससे have half-lives less than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of cobalt range in परमाणु वज़न इससे 47co to 75co.
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most abundant stable समस्थानिक, 59co, is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay.
The primary decay products पहले 59co हैं आयरन isotopes and the primary products after are nickel isotopes.
