Who स्थानांतरित my चीज ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the स्टाइल of a मिसाल or कारोबार fable.
It describes change in one 's work and life, and four typical reactions to said change by दो चूहे और दो `` littlepeople '', दौरान उनके हंट लिये चीज.
A New York Times business बेस्टसेलर चूंकि रिलीज, जो स्थानांतरित my चीज ?
remained on the list for almost five years और खर्च over 200 सप्ताह on प्रकाशक साप्ताहिक 's सजिल्द nonfiction list.
It रै बेची अधिक than 26 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी in 37 भाषाएं और remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
Nikita sergeyevich khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War.
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the सोवियत संघ इससे 1953 to 1964, और as अध्यक्ष of the परिषद of मंत्रियों, or प्रीमियर, इससे 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-stalinization of the सोवियत संघ, लिये बैकिंग the प्रगति of the जल्दी सोवियत स्पेस कार्यक्रम, और लिये अनेक relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy.
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964, replacing उसे साथ लियोनिद brezhnev as पहला सचिव और एलेक्सी kosygin as Premier.
Khrushchev was born in the रूसी गाँव of kalinovka in 1894, बंद to the present-day किनारा between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in his youth, और दौरान the रूसी सिविल युद्ध थी a राजनैतिक commissar.
With the सहायता of lazar kaganovich, he worked उसके way up the Soviet hierarchy.
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges, और स्वीकृत हज़ारों of रखवाले.
In 1939, स्टालिन भेजा उसे to govern युक्त, और he जारी the purges there.
During कया थी ज्ञात in the सोवियत संघ as the ग्रेट patriotic युद्ध ( पूर्वी सामने of संसार युद्ध ii ), Khrushchev was again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
khrushchev थी उपस्थित at the खूनी रक्षा of stalingrad, a fact he took great pride in throughout his life.
After the war, he returned to युक्त पहले होने recalled to मास्को as एक of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the power struggle triggered by स्टालिन 's मौत in 1953, khrushchev, बाद अनेक सालो, उभरा विजयी.
On फ़रवरी 25, 1956, at the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस, he वितरित the `` रहस्य वाक, '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic नीतियों, aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary नागरिकों, यहूद प्रायः अप्रभावी, विशेषकर in the area of agriculture.
Hoping eventually to rely on मिसाइलें लिये नेशनल रक्षा, khrushchev ordered प्रमुख कटौती in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, khrushchev 's नियम देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, विशेषकर by उसके उभरते विरोधियों, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ उसे in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of Soviet शक्ति struggles, लकिन थी pensioned बंद साथ an अपार्टमेंट in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs यहूद smuggled to the वेस्ट और published in part in 1970.
khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
Upper जठरांत्र ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract.
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz, जिससे connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds are माना चिकित्सा emergencies, और आवश्यकता प्रवेश to हॉस्पिटल for urgent diagnosis and management.
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy, अपर gi hemorrhage is अभी प्रायः treated बगैर surgery.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the highest estimate, the world जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान, it may decline to 6 billion.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is estimated to number billion by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ).
The USCB estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations जनसांख्यिकी निधि, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world population has अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The उच्चतम दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल, और हैं expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, और उर्जा संसाधन.
Philips Lumileds lighting कम्पनी is the निर्माता of a चौड़ी दायरा of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ).
It is a now a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग of फिलिप्स lighting.
knuckle mnemonic लिये the क्रमांक of दिनों in each month of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
A mnemonic (, साथ a मूक `` m '' ), or mnemonic यंत्र, is any learning technique that aids information retention.
mnemonics उद्देश्य to अनुवाद सूचना into a रूप कि the human brain can retain better than its original form.
Even the process of applying this conversion might already सहायता the ट्रांसफ़र of सूचना to long-term memory.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for सूचियाँ और in auditory रूप, ऐसे as छोटी कविताएं, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, लकिन mnemonics can भी be लिये अन्य types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily remembers spatial, personal, surprising, physical, यौन, humorous, or वरना 'relatable ' सूचना, बल्कि than अधिक अमूर्त or impersonal फ़ॉर्म of सूचना.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of memory '' और is सम्बन्धित to mnemosyne ( `` स्मरण '' ), the नाम of the देवी of मेमोरी in Greek mythology.
Both of these words are निकला इससे μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` स्मरण, memory ''.
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of कया is आज ज्ञात as the Art of memory.
Ancient Greeks and Romans विशिष्ट between दो प्रकार of मेमोरी : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory.
The former is inborn, and is the एक कि everyone उपयोग automatically और बगैर सोच.
The artificial memory in contrast has to be trained and developed through the सीखना और practicing of a किस्में of mnemonic तकनीकों.
mnemonic प्रणालियों हैं खास तकनीकों or रणनीति consciously used to improve memory, it helps employ information already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task.
अध्यक्ष बुश हस्ताक्षर the no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे Act at Hamilton H.S. in Hamilton, Ohio.
The No Child Left पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a संयुक्त राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary और द्वितीयक Education Act, which included Title I, the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students.
NCLB supports standards-based शिक्षा सुधार आधारित on the आधार कि सेटिंग high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The अधिनियम requires राज्य to develop आकलन in basic skills.
States must give ये आकलन to सब विद्यार्थी at चुनें ग्रेड स्तर in अनुक्रम to प्राप्त संघीय स्कूल funding.
The अधिनियम करता नहीं assert a नेशनल उपलब्धि मानक ; मानकों are set by each individual state.
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education through annual परीक्षण, सालाना अकादमिक प्रगति, रपट ताश, टीचर योग्यता, and funding changes.
The bill passed in the U.S. कॉंग्रेस साथ bipartisan support.

A pickup ट्रक or pick-up, प्रायः बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट motor vehicle with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis, लकिन भी प्रायः on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some देशों have उनके अपना शर्तें समान to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in Australia and New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup ट्रक हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ वैन और light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne और पोप एड्रियन i shows a well-bred मध्यकालीन घोड़ा साथ मेहराबदार गर्दन, परिष्कृत head and elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, build और नस्ल इससे the आधुनिक घोड़ा, और यहूद, on औसत, smaller.
They were also more सेंट्रल to समाज than उनके आधुनिक counterparts, होने अनिवार्य for war, agriculture, and transport.
Consequently, specific types of horse developed, अनेक of जिससे have no आधुनिक समतुल्य.
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन घोड़ा, शोधकर्ताओं भी need to consider वृत्तचित्र ( दोनो लिखा और सचित्र ) और पुरातत्व प्रमाण.
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by नस्ल, लकिन बल्कि by use.
This led them to be described, लिये उदाहरण, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध घोड़े ), `` palfreys `` ( सवारी घोड़े ), cart horses or packhorses.
सन्दर्भ is भी दिए to उनके प्लेस of उत्पत्ति, ऐसे as `` स्पेनी घोड़े, '' but whether this referred to one breed or several is unknown.
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval दस्तावेज़ or साहित्य is the लचीलापन of the मध्यकालीन भाषाएं, जहाँ अनेक शब्द can be प्रयुक्त लिये एक बात ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by one word ).
Words such as ' courser ' और 'चार्जr ' हैं प्रयुक्त interchangeably ( भी भीतर एक दस्तावेज़ ), और जहाँ एक एपिक may बोलो disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in घुड़सवार उपकरण, प्रायः introduced इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों, अनुमत for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
In particular, improved डिजाइन लिये the solid-treed काठी as खूब as the arrival of the stirrup, horseshoe and horse collar were significant advances in medieval society.
Consequently, the assumptions and theories developed by इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक, और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे, ऐसे as the प्रजनन or आकार of the घोड़ा, और a क्रमांक of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject.
The म्यूज़िक man is a musical साथ किताब, म्यूज़िक, और गीत by मेरेडिथ willson, आधारित on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold हिल, जो मुद्राएँ as a लड़कों ' बैंड आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड यंत्र और वर्दी to भोली townsfolk before skipping town with the cash.
In River City, Iowa, prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him, लकिन जब हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके भय of सोशल interactions due to उसके लिस्प, marian begins to पतन in प्रेम साथ हेरोल्ड.
Harold, in turn falling लिये marian, risks होने caught to win her.
In 1957, the दिखाएँ became a hit on ब्रॉडवे, जीतना पाँच टोनी पुरस्कार, सहित बेहतरीन Musical, and running for 1,375 performances.
The cast album won the first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन असली डाल एल्बम '' और थी क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड चार्ट for 245 weeks.
The show 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 फिल्मी अनुकूलन और a 2003 टेलीविज़न रीमेक.
It अक्सर is उत्पादित by दोनो पेशेवर और amateur theater companies.
निरीक्षक 's व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle व्हील, measuring व्हील, or perambulator is a यंत्र लिये measuring distance.

A desert is a landscape or region of land that is very dry because of low rainfall amounts ( वर्षण ), प्रायः रै छोटी कवरेज by पौधे, और in जिससे स्ट्रीम शुष्क up जबतक वे हैं supplied by जल इससे बाहर areas.
Deserts can also be वर्णित as क्षेत्रों जहाँ अधिक जल is खोया by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert plants must have खास adaptations to जीवित साथ इस छोटी water.
Deserts generally receive less than 25 cm of बरसात ( वर्षण ) प्रत्येक साल.
semideserts or steppes हैं regions जिससे receive between and.
In the köppen जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान हैं classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the thornthwaite जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान होता be वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal climates.
संसार युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार युद्ध i thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants यहूद मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला little until 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a total war.
By the end of the war, four major इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
the successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी states.
The League of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध ii.
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 song originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट जोखिम और बना प्रसिद्ध by सिंगर cyndi Lauper.
It was the first प्रमुख सिंगल released by lauper as a सोलो कलाकार और the lead-off सिंगल from her debut album She 's So Unusual.
Lauper’s version gained मान्यता as a feminist गान और प्रचारित by an award-winning वीडियो.
It has महरूम covered on either an एल्बम or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 other artists.
The single was Lauper 's breakthrough hit, reaching # 2 on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 और बनने a विश्वव्यापी hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains एक of lauper 's हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी a widely लोकप्रिय song during the era of its release, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 महानतम पॉप गीतों ' : 1-50 '', `` रोलिंग स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम वीडियो '' lists ranked the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, respectively.
The song received a Grammy पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन.
दृश्य of defibrillator electrode position and placement.
Defibrillation is a आम उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, और pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र पुकारा a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the देह 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the निदान of treatable लय, अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक साथ छोटी, or in some cases no training at all.
The Cato Institute is an अमरीकी libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray rothbard, ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स koch, अध्यक्ष of the फलक और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of the संगुटिका Koch Industries, Inc..
In July 1976, the name was बदला to the केटो संस्थान.
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index, Cato is the 6th most influential US आधारित सोचो टैंक, रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति और 2nd in Social Policy.
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to बढ़ाएँ the समझना of पब्लिक नीतियों आधारित on the सिद्धान्त of सीमित सरकारी, फ़्री बाज़ार, individual liberty, and peace.
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate, advocate, promote, and disseminate लागू नीति प्रस्ताव कि बनाएँ फ़्री, खोलें, और सिविल समाजों in the संयुक्त राज्य और throughout the world. ''
Cato scholars were critical of जार्ज W. बुश 's रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे, सहित the इराकी युद्ध, सिविल लिबर्टीज, शिक्षा, कृषि, उर्जा policy, and excessive government spending.
On other issues, they supported Bush administration initiatives, most notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह, सोशल सुरक्षा, वैश्विक वार्मिंग, कर नीति, और आव्रजन.
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election, केटो विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party उम्मीदवार, जॉन मैक्केन और बराक Obama.
Cato has criticized अध्यक्ष ओबामा 's stances on नीति मुद्दे चूंकि उसके उद्घाटन, ऐसे as फिस्कल stimulus, healthcare सुधार, विदेशी नीति, और the युद्ध on दवाएँ, जबकि supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy.
ड्रैकुला is an 1897 गोथिक हॉरर अनोखा by Irish author Bram Stoker.
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula, the novel tells the स्टोरी of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate इससे transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड, और the बैटल between ड्रैकुला और a छोटी समूह of मेन और महिलाओं led by प्राध्यापक Abraham Van Helsing.
Dracula has been assigned to many literary genres including पिशाच साहित्य, हॉरर fiction, the गोथिक अनोखा और आक्रमण literature.
The novel touches on themes such as the role of women in विक्टोरियन संस्कृति, यौन प्रथाओं, आव्रजन, उपनिवेशवाद, और post-colonialism.
Although Stoker did not इफ़तेरा the पिशाच, he पारिभाषित इसके आधुनिक रूप, और the अनोखा रै शाखित numerous theatrical, film and television interpretations.
Quidditch is a प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in the wizarding संसार of the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रह्मांड, और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels and movies.
It is an अत्यधिक अशिष्ट लकिन बहुत लोकप्रिय semi-contact sport, played by wizards and witches.
Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks, using चार गेंदें और छह elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य, तीन on प्रत्येक side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
In the Harry Potter universe, Quidditch holds a fervent following similar to the स्थिति कि संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds as a globally popular sport.
The sport is monumental throughout the wizarding संसार.
हैरी plays an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति लिये उसके हाउस टोली at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker and becomes the captain in his sixth year there.
Regional and अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं हैं उल्लेखित throughout the series.
In Goblet of आग, quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स is रद्द लिये the Tri-Wizard Tournament, but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup.
In addition, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट ), to कैप्चर a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन, और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's diadem, और दौरान the फाइनल लड़ो साथ voldemort — the `` unerring कौशल of the seeker '' is उपयोगी to उसे in snatching the elder wand out of the air.
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks, the nimbus 2000 और the firebolt, दोनो of जिससे हैं नष्ट by the series ' end.
The game has been अपनाया in the रियल संसार in the रूप of मगलू quidditch.
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United States consisting of two घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस ज्ञात as the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और the अपर हाउस ज्ञात as the सीनेट.
कॉंग्रेस meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
Both प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों हैं चुनी through direct election.
Congress has a total of 535 voting सदस्यों : 435 सदस्यों in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और 100 सदस्यों in the Senate.
Members of the House of Representatives serve two-year शर्तें representing the लोगों of a ज़िला.
Congressional districts are apportioned to states by जनसांख्यिकी using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी परिणाम, प्रत्येक राज्य in the संघ having at तनिक one representative in the House of Representatives.
Regardless of population, प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve a six-year term.
The terms are staggered so प्रत्येक दो सालो लगभग one-third of the Senate is up for election.
Each लड़खड़ाते समूह of one-third of the सीनेटरों हैं पुकारा 'classes '.
No state of the United राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों इससे the वही क्लास.
Most incumbents तलाश re-election, और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent.
In August 2012, a Gallup poll reported कि congress’s स्वीकृति दरजा amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 %, मिलान a 38-year low reached in November 2011.
`` A Little अधिक देश than कि '' is the शीर्षक of a सोंग लिखा by जॉय + रोरी 's रोरी ली feek, Wynn Varble, and Don Poythress, and recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin.
It was released in August 2009 as Corbin 's डेब्यू सिंगल और is शामिल on उसके self-titled debut album.
In April 2010, the song पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक चार्ट, बनाना कोर्बिन the पहला पुरूष सोलो कलाकार in सात years to send a debut single to Number One.
It रै महरूम certified सुनहरा by the RIAA.
The BlackBerry is a line of बेतार हैंडहेल्ड डिवाइस और सेवाएं designed और marketed by शोध In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry.
The first ब्लैकबेरी यंत्र, an ईमेल पेजर, थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस, the z10 और q10, were announced on January 30, 2013.
The user इंटरफ़ेस varies by मॉडल ; सबसे विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल, जबकि नए पीढियां have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard.
A ब्लैकबेरी can shoot वीडियो, लो फ़ोटो, खेल म्यूज़िक, और perform ऑनलाइन कृत्यों such as web-browsing and emailing.
They can also भेजें और प्राप्त धक्का ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची स्तर of सुरक्षा through on-device message encryption, and are designed to function as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry devices support a विशाल किस्में of तत्काल messaging सुविधाएँ, साथ the सबसे लोकप्रिय being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service.
The BlackBerry PlayBook is a टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर offered by the company.
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in जून क्वार्टर of 2010 और the 200 millionth स्मार्टफोन थी shipped in सितंबर quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011, बनाना इसके निर्माता the छठे सबसे लोकप्रिय यंत्र मेकर ( 25 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री हैं smartphones ).
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500 मोबाईल सेवा ऑपरेटर using various mobile technologies.
As of सितंबर 2012, वहीँ were eighty million subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the उच्चतम penetrations of ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी, with up to about 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
BlackBerry, iPhone, Android, and Windows फोन हैं माना the चार प्रमुख स्मार्टफोन ब्रांड्स.
ब्लैकबेरी is widely referred to as `` crackberry '' in the संयुक्त राज्य, जिससे alludes to its excessive use by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine.
Use of the term CrackBerry became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's नई संसार कॉलेज शब्दकोष named `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year. ''
An उदाहरण of a माँग curve shifting.
The shift इससे d1 to d2 अर्थात् an बढ़ाएँ in माँग with consequences for the other variables
In economics, the demand curve is the graph depicting the संबंध between the दाम of a निश्चित कमोडिटी और the राशि of it कि उपभोक्ता हैं willing और समर्थ to purchase at that given price.
It is a graphic प्रतिनिधित्व of a माँग अनुसूची.
The demand curve for all consumers together फ़ॉलो इससे the माँग वक्र of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता : the व्यक्तिगत मांगे at प्रत्येक दाम are added together.
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets, and are often combined with supply curves to estimate the equilibrium दाम ( the दाम at जिससे विक्रेता साथ हैं willing to बेचें the वही राशि as खरीदार साथ हैं willing to ख़रीदे, भी ज्ञात as मार्केट clearing दाम ) और the संतुलन मात्रा ( the राशि of कि शुभ or सेवा कि होगा be उत्पादित और खरीदा बगैर surplus/excess सप्लाई or shortage/excess demand ) of that market.
In a monopolistic market, the माँग वक्र facing the monopolist is बस the मार्केट माँग वक्र.
historia
by nikolaos gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by छानबीन '' ) is an छतरियाँ पद कि relates to पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the डिस्कवरी, संग्रहण, organization, and presentation of information about these events.
The term शामिल लौकिक, भूगर्भिक, और सशुल्क इतिहास, लकिन is प्रायः generically implied to mean human history.
Scholars who लिखें परिचय इतिहास हैं पुकारा historians.
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a कथा to जाँचें और analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम, और objectively determine the पैटर्न of कारण and effect that determine them.
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness by discussing the study of the discipline as an समाप्त in itself और as a रास्ता of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present.
Stories common to a particular culture, but नहीं समर्थित by बाह्य स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the किस्से surrounding किंग आर्थर ) हैं प्रायः वर्गीकृत as सांस्कृतिक विरासत or महापुरूष, क्युकी वे do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of history.
Events occurring prior to लिखा record are considered prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. Greek इतिहासकार is माना भीतर the पश्चिमी परंपरा to be the `` पिता of इतिहास '', और, साथ साथ उसके समकालीन thucydides, helped form the foundations for the modern study of human history.
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the culture-focused हिरोडोटस और the military-focused thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention or दृष्टिकोण in modern historical writing.
In the Eastern tradition, a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn Annals was known to be compiled इससे as जल्दी as 722 bce हालांकि तभी 2nd सदी BCE texts survived.
प्राचीन प्रभाव have helped spawn रूपांतर interpretations of the प्रकृति of इतिहास जिससे have evolved over the centuries and continue to change today.
The modern study of history is wide-ranging, और शामिल the पढ़ाई of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical elements of historical investigation.
Often इतिहास is सिखाया as भाग of प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक शिक्षा, और the academic study of history is a major discipline in University studies.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man जो indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध black Americans.
detractors अभियुक्त उसे of उपदेश जातिवाद, black supremacy, and violence.
He has been called one of the महानतम और सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in इतिहास.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by श्वेत supremacists, it थी rumored—when he थी यंग, और at least one of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, उसके माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, और he थी लगाई in a श्रेणी of foster homes.
in 1946, at आयु 20, he गई to थाना for breaking and entering.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after उसके पैरोल in 1952, he जल्दी रोज़ to become एक of इसके नेताओ.
For a dozen years, Malcolm x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East, he returned to the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे, inc. और the संगठन of afro-american Unity.
In February 1965, less than a साल बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam, he थी assassinated by three members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over time.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट to the सिविल अधिकारों गति 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` i किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a प्रेत तब... pointed in a निश्चित दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य with civil rights leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी बैंकर जो परोसा as the 74th संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of the राजकोष.
He had served as the अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of गोल्डमैन sachs, और is अभी अध्यक्ष of the paulson संस्थान, जिससे he संस्थापित in 2011 to प्रचार चिरस्थायी आर्थिक विकास and a cleaner environment around the world, with an initial focus on the United States and China.
A virtual यंत्र ( vm ) is a तन्त्र implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर, जिससे is presented to the application layer of the system.
Virtual machines may be based on विशेषताएँ of a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला and functions of a real world computer.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest अनुक्रम of arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among all other groups of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on every महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक, और have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications कि have महरूम प्रस्तावित since 1900.
anatomically, मकड़ियों differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, मकड़ियों do नहीं have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs और बजाय extend उन्हें by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा glands within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, आकार और the राशि of sticky thread used.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, and spiders that उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और विविध than orb-web मकड़ियों.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय, लकिन ये पशु जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम surviving अनुक्रम, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of आधुनिक मकड़ियों, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the Triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी, ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों, हालांकि a few विशाल प्रजाति भी take birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the शिकार to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have acute vision, and hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके चुनाव of tactics और क्षमता to develop नई ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and वे liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने खाया by the महिलाओं.
Males of most species survive a few matings, limited मुख्यतः by उनके छोटी जीवन spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, प्रत्येक of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों of eggs.
Females of many species care for their यंग, लिये उदाहरण by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना with them.
A minority of species are सोशल, भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration, as in the विधवा मकड़ियों, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two सालो, tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans, वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of व्यवहार, मकड़ियों have become आम प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13, 1960 ) is a fictional अक्षर और एक of the दो मादा लीड in the फॉक्स sitcom कि '70s दिखाएँ, appearing in सब आठ सीज़न.
portrayed by लौरा prepon, डोना is the love interest to Eric Forman.
US काउंटी household मध्य आय 2009.
Median US household आय, 2001-2011
Household income is a माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त States government and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the आयु of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability भुगतान, चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त, नियमित rental रसीदें, as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार, निवेश, or अन्य kinds of income received routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing लगभग every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
u.S. मध्य household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government लाभ, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, सहित 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a समान आर्थिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is नहीं commonly लिया into खाता in ऐसे उपायों may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
A registered agent, also known as a resident agent or statutory agent, in United States business law, is a business or व्यक्तिगत designated to प्राप्त सेवा of प्रक्रम ( sop ) जब a कारोबार एंटिटी is a पार्टी in a विधिक कार्रवाई ऐसे as a मुकदमा or समन.
The registered agent 's address may also be where the राज्य होगा भेजें the कागजी लिये the वार्षिक नवीकरण of the कारोबार एंटिटी 's charter.
The registered agent for a business entity may be an individual member of the company, or ( अधिक प्रायः ) a तीसरा पार्टी, ऐसे as the संगठन 's वकील or a सेवा कम्पनी.
Failure to properly maintain a पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect a कम्पनी negatively.
दफ्तर लिये आपात Management.
Office of युद्ध सूचना युद्ध poster 1941 - 1945
`` जीवन, स्वतंत्रता, और the pursuit of सुख '' is a well-known phrase in the United States Declaration of Independence.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable अधिकारों '' साथ जिससे सब इंसान beings are endowed by their creator for their protection of which they institute governments.
Fencing, is typically divided into ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी, शास्त्रीय तलवारबाजी and historical fencing,.
The sport of fencing ( commonly called olympic fencing or competitive तलवारबाजी ) is विभाजित into तीन हथियार श्रेणी : foil, sabre and épée.
Classical fencing uses the वही तीन हथियार, लकिन approaches तलवारबाजी as a martial art.
प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी is एक of पाँच खेल जिससे रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the आधुनिक Olympic Games, the other four being Athletics, Cycling, Swimming, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ), also called simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a विशाल मांसपेशी समूह कि शामिल the चार प्रचलित मांसपेशियां on the front of the thigh.
It is the great extensor muscle of the घुटना, forming a विशाल मांसल द्रव्यमान जिससे कवर the सामने और sides of the femur.
The proper Latin plural रूप of the क्रियाशील quadriceps होता be quadricipites.
In आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग, quadriceps is used in both singular and plural.
The singular रूप quadricep, उत्पादित by hypercorrection, is frequently used.
rms टाइटैनिक थी a अंग्रेजों यात्री लाइनर कि sank in the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर on 15 अप्रैल 1912 बाद colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New York City, US.
The sinking of Titanic caused the मौतों of 1,502 लोगों in एक of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history.
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the समय of उसके maiden voyage.
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर, और वो थी निर्मित by the harland और wolff डॉकयार्ड in belfast साथ थामस Andrews, who perished with the ship, as her naval architect.
On her maiden voyage, वो carried 2,224 यात्री and crew.
Under the command of Edward Smith, her passengers शामिल कुछ of the wealthiest लोगों in the संसार, as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, scandinavia और elsewhere throughout यूरोपीय seeking a new life in North America.
The ship was designed to be the last word in comfort and लक्ज़री, साथ an on-board gymnasium, तैराकी पूल, पुस्तकालयों, high-class रेस्तरां and opulent cabins.
She also had a शक्तिशाली बेतार टेलीग्राफ provided लिये the convenience of यात्री as well as for operational use.
Though वो था उन्नत सुरक्षा सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight compartments और remotely activated watertight doors, she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard.
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried only enough lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than हाफ of the क्रमांक यात्राएं on the maiden voyage, और one-third उसके कुल यात्री and crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912, Titanic called at Cherbourg in फ़्रांस और queenstown ( अभी cobh ) in आयरलैंड पहले heading westwards towards New York.
On 14 April 1912, four days into the crossing और परिचय 375 मील ( 600 km ) दक्षिण of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड, वो hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm ship 's time.
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull प्लेटों to बकल inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और खोली पाँच of उसके सोलह watertight compartments to the समुद्र ; the जलयान धीरे filled with water.
Meanwhile, passengers और कुछ क्रू सदस्यों यहूद evacuated in lifeboats, अनेक of जिससे यहूद शुभारम्भ तभी partly loaded.
A disproportionate क्रमांक of मेन यहूद बाएँ सवार क्युकी of a `` महिलाओं और children पहला `` protocol followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, वो broke अलावा और foundered, साथ खूब over एक हजार people still aboard.
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered, the Cunard लाइनर rms carpathia arrived on the झाँकी of the डूब, जहाँ वो brought सवार an अनुमानित 705 survivors.
The disaster was greeted with worldwide शॉक और आक्रोश at the विशाल घाटा of जीवन और the नियामक और operational failures that had led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the संयुक्त राज्य led to प्रमुख सुधार in मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा.
One of their most important legacies was the स्थापना in 1914 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलन लिये the सुरक्षा of जीवन at समुद्र ( solas ), which still governs maritime safety today.
Additionally, several new wireless regulations यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps in बेतार संचार -- -which could have saved many more passengers.
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions और यहूद बाएँ अक्षम ; अनेक परिवारों, विशेषकर those of क्रू सदस्यों इससे southampton, खोया उनके प्राथमिक bread-winners.
They यहूद helped by an outpouring of पब्लिक सहानुभूति और charitable donations.
Some of the पुरूष survivors यहूद अभियुक्त of कायरता लिये leaving the जलयान जबकि लोगों यहूद स्टिल on फलक ; the श्वेत Star Line 's chairman, J. Bruce Ismay, faced social ostracism for the rest of his life.
The wreck of the Titanic remains on the समुद्रतल, विभाजित in दो और धीरे disintegrating at a depth of.
Since its discovery in 1985, हज़ारों of artefacts have महरूम बरामद और put on display at museums around the world.
टाइटैनिक रै become एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध जहाजों in इतिहास, उसके मेमोरी रखा जिंदा by numerous books, folk songs, films, exhibits, and memorials.
The human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the human body, including the foot, thigh और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ; however, the precise परिभाषा in इंसान anatomy refers तभी to the खण्ड of the निम्नतर limb extending from the knee to the ankle.
टाँगे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये खड़ा, चलना, कूद, कार्यशील, kicking, and similar activities, and constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass.
This article is about the demographic features of the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों, सहित जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व, नस्ल, शिक्षा स्तर, स्वास्थ्य of the populace, आर्थिक औकात, धार्मिक संबद्धों और other aspects of the population.
As of 2010, the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों is अनुमानित to be 73.7 लाख साथ a विकास rate of 1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ).
The जनसांख्यिकी is अपेक्षाकृत यंग साथ 26.6 % गिरना in the 0-14 age bracket.
according to the oecd/world बैंको जनसांख्यिकी आंकडे in तुर्कों the population growth from 1990 to 2008 was 16 million or 29 %.

Joel Grey ( born April 11, 1932 ) is an American stage and screen actor, सिंगर, और नर्तकी, ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका as the निपुण of ceremonies in दोनो the स्टेज और फिल्मी adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret.

James Madison, Jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( O.S. March 5 ) – June 28, 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman और राजनैतिक theorist, the चौथी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “father of the constitution” लिये होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the United States Constitution and as the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights.
He served as a राजनेता much of उसके वयस्क life.
After the constitution had been drafted, मैडिसन became एक of the leaders in the movement to ratify it.
His collaboration with सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और जॉन jay उत्पादित the federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the time, they would later be माना among the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण polemics in support of the संविधान.
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional ratifying सम्मेलन, और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन प्रयत्न in वर्जिनिया.
Like most of his contemporaries, मैडिसन बदला उसके राजनैतिक views during his life.
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution, he favored a strong national government, though later he grew to एहसान stronger राज्य सरकारें, पहले settling between the दो extremes late in his life.
In 1789, मैडिसन became a नेता in the नई हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, drafting many basic laws.
He is notable for drafting the पहला टेन amendments to the संविधान, और यूँ is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights ``.
Madison worked closely साथ अध्यक्ष जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to व्यवस्थित the नई federal government.
Breaking with Hamilton and what became the Federalist Party in 1791, Madison and Thomas जेफरसन व्यवस्थित कया वे पुकारा the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( बाद पुकारा by इतिहासकारों the democratic-republican Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), मैडिसन पर्यवेक्षित the louisiana खरीदें, जिससे doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the प्रेसिडेंसी, he presided over नवीनीकृत समृद्धि लिये several years.
As अध्यक्ष ( 1809–17 ), बाद the विफलता of राजनयिक विरोध और a व्यापार embargo against Great Britain, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition, he wanted to end the influence of the अंग्रेजों among उनके भारतीय allies, जिनकी प्रतिरोध अवरोधित संयुक्त राज्य उपनिवेश in the Midwest around the Great Lakes.
Madison found the war to be an administrative nightmare, as the United States had neither a strong army nor financial system ; as a result, he afterward समर्थित a stronger नेशनल सरकारी और a दमदार सैन्य, as खूब as the नेशनल बैंको, which he had long opposed.
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave society, he was a slaveholder जो inherited उसके वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात as montpelier, और स्वामित्व सैंकड़ों of स्लेव दौरान उसके lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops.
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise that अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी of स्लेव to be गिने लिये प्रतिनिधित्व.
`` रोमन 's बदला '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper Nicki Minaj from her debut studio album Pink Friday.
it थी लिखा by minaj और rapper एमिनेम, जो is also featured in the song, and was produced by Swizz Beatz.
It was released exclusively on अक्तूबर 30, 2010 through the us itunes स्टोर, as a promotional release preceding the album 's release.
The song initiated a feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj, where many people felt the song थी निर्देशित at लील ' किम और regarded around उसके जज्बात towards Minaj 's rise to fame.
the सोंग सन्दर्भ minaj 's alter-ego, रोमन zolanski, और Eminem 's alter-ego, Slim Shady.
The सोंग garnered बहुत धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, most of which praised the song as a stand-out track on the album.
An official remix featuring minaj 's mentor, लील वेन, थी released to the US iTunes Store on January 19, 2011.

हाइड्रोलिक द्रव होने poured.
Hydraulic fluids, also called हाइड्रोलिक liquids, हैं the मीडियम by जिससे शक्ति is transferred in hydraulic machinery.
आम हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं आधारित on mineral oil or water.
Examples of equipment that might use हाइड्रोलिक fluids शामिल excavators और backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, शक्ति परिचालन प्रणालियों, ट्रांसमिशन, कचरा ट्रक, वायुयान उड़ान कंट्रोल systems, lifts, and industrial machinery.
Hydraulic systems like the ones mentioned above will कार्य सबसे efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक द्रव प्रयुक्त रै no compressibility
Mahindra ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra tractors, the फार्म उपकरण प्रभाग of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा, builds और sources tractors that are sold worldwide across six continents.
Mahindra is also among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर निर्माताओं in the world.
महिंद्रा रै a विशाल उपभोक्ता आधार in इण्डिया, चीन and America and a growing base in Australia.
The company builds more tractors in India than any other निर्माता, और रै the क्षमता to निर्माण 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, m & m formed a संयुक्त venture साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate for the Indian market.
Armed with engineering, tooling और निर्माण know-how gained इससे इस संबंध, m & m विकसित इसके पहला ट्रैक्टर, the B-275.
Mahindra Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is एक of the largest ट्रैक्टर कंपनियाँ in the संसार, and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world.
To expand into the growing ट्रैक्टर मार्केट in चीन, महिंद्रा acquired बहुमत हिस्सेदारी in Jiangling.
To raise awareness परिचय महिंद्रा in the us, महिंद्रा यूएसए घोषित इसके नई प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट, which is participating with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet.
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson, Jr. Mahindra USA, Inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध प्रायोजन लिये the 2009 nascar Nationwide Series.
With this sponsorship, Mahindra थी the पहला भारतीय कम्पनी to प्रायोजक a car in NASCAR.
In 2008, Mahindra was a sponsor of the मैकडोनाल्ड मोटरस्पोर्ट टोली जिससे भागा the # 81 car in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी.
The POWER6 is a माइक्रोप्रोसेसर विकसित by ibm कि implemented the Power ISA v.2.03.
When it became available in systems in 2007, it succeeded the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's फ्लैगशिप शक्ति माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.
It is भाग of the eclipz प्रोजेक्ट, कहा to have a लक्ष्य of converging ibm 's सर्वर हार्डवेयर जहाँ practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries, pSeries, and zSeries ).
The American middle class is a सोशल क्लास in the संयुक्त राज्य.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use, समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक, अधिक or कम congruent, theories on the अमरीकी मध्य class.
Depending on class model used, the मध्य क्लास may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the first major studies of the middle class in America थी श्वेत कॉलर : the अमरीकी मध्य वर्ग, प्रकाशित in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists ऐसे as डेनिस गिल्बर्ट of हैमिल्टन कॉलेज commonly divide the middle class into two sub-groups.
constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the अपर or पेशेवर middle class consisting of highly educated, salaried professionals and managers.
Constituting roughly one तीसरा of households is the निम्नतर मध्य क्लास consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals, skilled craftsmen and lower-level management.
middle-class व्यक्तियों commonly have a आरामदायक मानक of जीना, significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा, considerable कार्य स्वायत्तता और rely on their expertise to sustain themselves.
Members of the मध्य क्लास belong to विविध समूह जिससे ओवरलैप with each other.
Overall, middle-class persons, विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals, हैं characterized by conceptualizing, creating and consulting.
यूँ, कॉलेज शिक्षा is एक of the main indicators of middle-class status.
Largely attributed to the प्रकृति of middle-class occupations, मध्य क्लास मान tend to emphasize स्वतंत्रता, adherence to मूलभूत standards, valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity.
Politically more क्रियाशील than अन्य जनसांख्यिकी, कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य क्लास पेशेवर हैं विभाजित between the two major parties.
Income varies considerably इससे निकट the नेशनल मध्य to खूब in excess of $ 100,000.
Household आय आंकड़े, however, do नहीं सदा प्रतिबिंबित क्लास औकात और मानक of जीना, as वे हैं largely बहकावे by the क्रमांक of income earners and fail to recognize household size.
It is therefore possible for a large, dual-earner, निम्नतर मध्य क्लास household to out-earn a छोटी, one-earner, अपर मध्य class household.
The middle classes are very influential, as वे encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता, लेखक, teachers, journalists, and editors.
Most societal trends in the US originate भीतर the मध्य वर्ग.
