The cast members of Saturday Night Live were originally referred to as the `` नहीं तैयार लिये प्रधान समय खिलाड़ी ''.
The असली डाल ( l to r ) : laraine न्युमैन, जॉन belushi, जेन कर्टिन, gilda Radner, Dan Aykroyd, Garrett Morris, and Chevy Chase
Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco भूकंप, remembered as एक of the worst natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in an इवेंट of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or विनाश, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A विपत्ति can be ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic इवेंट stemming इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as भूकंप, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a phenomenon कि can कारण क्षति to जीवन और प्रॉपर्टी और नष्ट the आर्थिक, social and cultural life of people.
in समकालीन academia, आपदाओं हैं देखी as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
These risks are the उत्पाद of a संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability.
Hazards कि स्ट्राइक in क्षेत्रों साथ कम vulnerability होगा never become आपदाओं, as is the मामला in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 प्रतिशत of सब मौतों caused by आपदाओं occur in विकासशील देशों, और नुकसान due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत of जीडीपी ) in विकासशील देशों than in industrialized countries.
In computing, booting ( also ज्ञात as booting up ) is the आरंभिक नियत of परिचालन कि a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs जब electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first समय or is re-energized बाद होने turned बंद, और ends जब the कंप्यूटर is तैयार to perform इसके सामान्य परिचालन.
On modern सामान्य purpose कंप्यूटर, इस can लो tens of सेकेंड और typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating और initializing परिधीय devices, and then finding, loading and starting an operating system.
Many कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों भी allow ये परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र command without cycling power, in what is known as a soft reboot, though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot.
A boot loader is a कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम कि loads the प्रमुख ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण for the computer after completion of the self-tests.
the कंप्यूटर पद बूट is छोटी लिये बूटस्ट्रैप or बूटस्ट्रैप लोड और गर्भाशयी from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
The usage calls attention to the requirement that, if सबसे तन्त्र is loaded onto a कंप्यूटर by अन्य तन्त्र already कार्यशील on the कंप्यूटर, कुछ mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer.
जल्दी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त a किस्में of ad-hoc विधि to मिलेंगी a छोटी कार्यक्रम into memory to solve this problem.
The invention of integrated circuit read-only memory ( ROM ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped साथ a प्रारंभ up program that could not be erased.
Growth in the क्षमता of rom रै अनुमत कभी अधिक विस्तृत प्रारंभ up प्रक्रियाओं to be implemented.
On general purpose computers, the boot process begins with the निष्पादन of an आरंभिक कार्यक्रम भंडारित in बूट roms or पढ़ा in another fashion.
In some older कंप्यूटर, the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग to चलाएं, if no ऑपरेटिंग system was used, or the operating system.
In other computers, the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम is a बूट लोडर कि may तब लोड into random-access मेमोरी ( राम ), इससे nonvolatile द्वितीयक storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or, in some older computers, from a medium such as punched cards, punched tape, or magnetic tape in older computers, the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it.
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities, it may, instead, load a larger और अधिक सक्षम द्वितीयक बूट लोडर, जिससे होता तब लोड the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण.
Some embedded systems do नहीं आवश्यकता a noticeable बूट अनुक्रम to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may बस चलाएं operational programs that are stored in ROM.
Firebird is an open सोर्स एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस प्रबन्धन प्रणाली कि रनों on लिनक्स, Windows, and a variety of Unix.
The database forked from Borland 's open सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000, लकिन चूंकि firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten.
आउटसोर्सिंग is the contracting आउट of an आतंरिक कारोबार process to a third-party organization.
The practice of contracting a business प्रक्रम आउट to a तीसरा पार्टी बल्कि than स्टॉफ it internally is आम in the आधुनिक अर्थव्यवस्था.
The term `` outsourcing '' became लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य निकट the फेरे of the 21st century.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और एसेट इससे एक कड़ to another, लकिन नहीं सदा.
The definition of आउटसोर्सिंग शामिल दोनो विदेशी और घरेलू contracting, और sometimes शामिल offshoring, which means relocating a business function to another country.
Financial savings from lower अंतरराष्ट्रीय मजदूर दरों is a बिग प्रेरणा लिये outsourcing/offshoring.
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing, जिससे entails bringing प्रक्रियाओं संभाला by third-party firms in-house, और is sometimes संपन्नता via vertical integration.
However, a business can provide a अनुबंध सेवा to another कारोबार बगैर necessarily insourcing कि कारोबार process.
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( धीरे replicating retrovirus ) कि कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency सिंड्रोम ( एड्स ), a कंडीशन in इंसानो in जिससे progressive failure of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of रक्त, वीर्य, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or स्तन मिल्क.
Within these bodily fluids, hiv is उपस्थित as दोनो फ़्री वायरस अणु and virus within infected immune cells.
HIV infects vital कोशिकाएं in the इंसान प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली ऐसे as हेल्पर t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + T cells ), macrophages, and dendritic cells.
hiv संक्रमण लीड to कम स्तर of cd4+ t कोशिकाएं through a क्रमांक of mechanisms सहित : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells, direct viral killing of infected cells, and killing of infected CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells.
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a नाजुक स्तर, cell-mediated प्रतिरक्षण is खोया, और the देह becomes progressively अधिक susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a आग स्टेशन in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in आग स्टेशन, allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the मैदान मंजिल तेज़ than by using a standard staircase.
the यंत्र थी invented in the 1870s by दाउद kenyon, in शिकागो, इलिनोइस, हालांकि it is प्रायः incorrectly credited to the Boston Fire Department.
मरियम poppins is the शीर्षक अक्षर of a series of children 's books written by P. L. Travers.
throughout the मरियम poppins श्रेणी, जिससे lasted इससे 1934 to 1988, मरियम shepard was the illustrator and acted as a second author.
The books centre on a जादुई अंग्रेज़ी नैनी, मरियम poppins.
She is blown by the East हवा to क्रमांक सत्रह चेरी पेड़ लेन, लंदन, और into the बैंको ' household to परवाह for their children.
Encounters with chimney sweeps, shopkeepers and विभिन्न adventures follow जबतक मरियम poppins abruptly पत्ते, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures लो प्लेस over a कुल of आठ किताबे.
However, only the first तीन किताबे विशेषता मरियम poppins arriving और leaving.
The later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures इससे उसके असली तीन विज़िट.
As P. L. Travers explains in उसके परिचय to मरियम poppins in the पार्क, `` She can not forever arrive and depart. ''
The books यहूद adapted in 1964 into a musical डिज़्नी फिल्मी अभिनीत Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, Disney Theatrical उत्पादित a स्टेज musical अनुकूलन in the वेस्ट End theatre.
The stage musical was transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 जहाँ it भागा जबतक इसके closing on कूच 3, 2013.
It has been अत्यधिक कामयाब, as थी the 1964 film.
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of age teen romantic drama film developed alongside निकोलस स्पार्क्स ' अनोखा by the वही नाम.
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in उसके विशेषता फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू और co-written by स्पार्क्स और Jeff Van Wie.
The Last Song stars miley सायरस, लियाम hemsworth, और ग्रेग kinnear और फ़ॉलो a troubled किशोरावस्था as वो reconnects साथ उसके estranged पिता और जलप्रपात in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town.
The फिल्मी is वितरित by touchstone Pictures.
स्पार्क्स थी approached to लिखें दोनो the फिल्मी 's पटकथा and the novel.
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा, बनाना the पिछला सोंग उसके पहला स्क्रिप्ट to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in North कैरोलिना जैसे the अनोखा, स्थानांतरित to जॉर्जिया बाद the राज्य था campaigned for months to host production.
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island, जॉर्जिया और आसपास savannah, the पिछला सोंग became the पहला फिल्म to be दोनो शॉट और नियत in Tybee Island.
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18, 2009 साथ much of it occurring on the द्वीप 's बीच और pier.
The Last Song was originally scheduled लिये चौड़ी रिलीज on जनवरी 8, 2010, लकिन थी स्थगित to कूच 31, 2010.
लिखा simlish
Simlish is a fictional भाषा प्रदर्शित in ea खेल ' sim श्रेणी of खेल.
It debuted in SimCopter, and has been विशेषकर prominent in the सीम, the सीम 2 और the Sims 3.
The Sims development team created the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा by experimenting साथ fractured यूक्रेनी, फ्रेंच, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, Cebuano, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in simcity 4, simcity समाजों और simcity 2013, लकिन दूर कम अक्सर.
Civilized Creatures in spore can भी be सिखाया to बोलो Simlish.
it is भी प्रदर्शित to an extent in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf.
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue in the game, but विचार कि using a रियल भाषा होता मेक it ध्वनि too दोहराए और होता भी be too costly to hire अनुवादक लिये world languages.
Initially, inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II, Sims creator होगा राइट और भाषा विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel सुझाया experimenting साथ the navajo भाषा to बनाएँ simlish.
However, they ultimately decided कि simlish worked बेहतरीन as a `` भाषा '' बना up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be अनूदित, so कि इसके अर्थ होता be left open to the imagination of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` बकवास भाषा '' turned आउट to be the सही विकास चुनाव, as लोगों यहूद सक्षम of imagining it अधिक realistically than a computer could simulate a real one.
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by आवाज़ अभिनेताओं स्टीफन kearin और gerri Lawlor.
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on ब्लेड जड़ें of a v2500 iae वायुयान इंजन.
Step 1 : the ut जांच is लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the help of a special borescope tool ( video probe ).
Step 2 : यंत्र जमावट are input.
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the ब्लेड root.
In this case, an indication ( शिखर in the आंकड़ा ) through the रेड लकीर ( or फाटक ) indicates a शुभ ब्लेड ; an indication to the बाएँ of that range indicates a crack.
principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण.
LEFT : A probe भेजना a ध्वनि वेव into a परीक्षण सामग्री.
There are two indications, एक इससे the आरंभिक पल्स of the जांच, और the दूसरी due to the back wall echo.
RIGHT : A defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the आयाम of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is संकल्पित by the अनुपात d/e
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ), very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 mhz और occasionally up to 50 mhz हैं शुभारम्भ into सामग्री to detect आतंरिक खामियां or to characterize सामग्री.
A common example is अल्ट्रासोनिक मोटाई मापन, जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई of the परीक्षण ऑब्जेक्ट, लिये उदाहरण, to monitor pipework corrosion.
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and अन्य धातुओं और alloys, हालांकि it can भी be प्रयुक्त on कंक्रीट, लकडी और composites, albeit with less resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग सहित aerospace, ऑटोमोटिव और अन्य परिवहन sectors.
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), also called ductus deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ), is भाग of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes साथ characteristic cyanosis.
In medicine, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; इससे यूनानी भाषा ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- रूट denoting a प्रतिबंध or thinning or to मेक or grow thin/lean, haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in रक्त सप्लाई to ऊतकों, causing a shortage of ऑक्सीजन और glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ).
ischemia is generally caused by समस्याएं साथ रक्त बरतन, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
It also means local anemia in a given part of a देह sometimes resulting इससे जमघट ( ऐसे as vasoconstriction, घनास्रता or वाहिकारोध ).
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome, also ज्ञात as trisomy 21, is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति of all or part of a third copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the सबसे आम chromosome तबदीली in इंसानो.
It is typically संबद्ध साथ a विलंब in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation, or mr ) और शारीरिक growth, and a particular set of facial characteristics.
The average IQ of young वयस्कों साथ bas सिंड्रोम is around 50, whereas यंग वयस्कों बगैर the condition typically have an IQ of 100.
( MR has historically महरूम पारिभाषित as an IQ below 70. )
A large proportion of individuals with bas सिंड्रोम have a कठोर उपाधि of बौद्धिक disability.
Down सिंड्रोम is नामित बाद जॉन langdon bas, the अंग्रेजों physician who described the syndrome in 1866.
The condition was clinically described earlier by Jean etienne dominique esquirol in 1838 और edouard seguin in 1844.
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959.
Down syndrome can be पहचाना in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal screening.
pregnancies साथ इस निदान हैं often terminated.
The CDC estimates that about one of every 691 babies born in the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक साल is born साथ bas सिंड्रोम.
अनेक children साथ bas सिंड्रोम हैं शिक्षित in नियमित स्कूल वर्ग जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता specialised educational facilities.
Some children graduate from high school, and, in the US, वहीँ हैं increasing अवसर लिये participating in post-secondary education.
Education और उचित परवाह रै महरूम दिखाया to improve विशेषता of life significantly.
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to work at सशुल्क नियुक्ति in the जातियाँ, जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता a अधिक sheltered कार्य पर्यावरण.
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes, or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a symptom जिससे may have अनेक अन्य कल्याणकारी, लकिन जिससे is प्रायः caused by the बदलना हार्मोन स्तर कि हैं characteristic of menopause.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( p.l. 78-346, 58 स्टेट. 284m ), ज्ञात informally as the g.i. विधेयक, थी a विधि कि provided a दायरा of लाभ for returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
लाभ शामिल low-cost mortgages, low-interest लोन to प्रारंभ a कारोबार or फार्म, नकदी भुगतान of ट्यूशन और जीना खर्च to attend college, high school or vocational education, as well as one year of unemployment compensation.
It was available to every दिग्गज जो था महरूम on क्रियाशील ड्यूटी दौरान the युद्ध सालो लिये at तनिक नब्बे दिनों और था not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required.
By the समाप्त of the कार्यक्रम in 1956, roughly 2.2 लाख दिग्गजों था प्रयुक्त the g.i. विधेयक शिक्षा लाभ in अनुक्रम to attend colleges or universities, and an additional 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program.
Since the असली 1944 विधि, the पद रै आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज लाभ कार्यक्रम निर्मित to assist दिग्गजों of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service.
Historians and economists consider the G.I. Bill a major राजनैतिक success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the उपचार of संसार युद्ध i veterans—and a प्रमुख योगदान to अमेरिका 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth.
The वाटरगेट कांड थी a राजनैतिक कांड कि occurred in the संयुक्त राज्य in the 1970s as a परिणाम of the जून 17, 1972 break-in at the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी मुख्यालय at the Watergate office complex in Washington, D.C., and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The scandal आखिरकार led to the इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड निक्सन, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, on अगस्त 9, 1974 — the तभी resignation of a U.S. President.
The scandal also resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three व्यक्तियों, दर्जनों of जिसको यहूद निक्सन 's top administration officials.
The affair began with the arrest of पाँच मेन लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश into the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी ( dnc ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17, 1972.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the burglars to a slush निधि प्रयुक्त by the कमेटी लिये the re-election of the अध्यक्ष, the आधिकारिक संगठन of निक्सन 's अभियान.
In July 1973, as evidence mounted against the president 's staff, including testimony provided by former staff members in an छानबीन conducted by the सीनेट वाटरगेट कमेटी, it थी नाज़िल कि अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording प्रणाली in उसके offices and he had recorded many conversations.
Recordings from ये टेपों implicated the अध्यक्ष, revealing he था attempted to कवर up the questionable ( और illegal ) goings-on कि had taken place during his administration, both before and after the break-in.
After a protracted series of bitter court लड़ाइयों, the u.S. परम् अदालत unanimously शासित कि the अध्यक्ष था to हाथ over the टेपों to सरकारी जांचकर्ताओं ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of प्रतिनिधि और a दमदार सम्भावना of a conviction in the सीनेट, निक्सन resigned the प्रेसिडेंसी on अगस्त 9, 1974.
His successor, जेराल्ड घाट, तब जारी a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly lansing और स्पेंसर ) is a fictional अक्षर on the ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital.
Elizabeth is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John beradino ), एक of the originating कोर वर्ण of the श्रेणी.
Rebecca Herbst originated the अक्षर on अगस्त 1, 1997 और रै महरूम the तभी contract actress to play the role.
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings, भाग्यशाली स्पेंसर और एलिज़ाबेथ webber और जेसन Morgan and Elizabeth Webber.
The United States presidency of रोनाल्ड reagan, भी ज्ञात as the reagan प्रशासन, थी a रिपब्लिकन administration headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing government programs and introduced the largest across-the-board कर कटौती in अमरीकी history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` reaganomics ``, यहूद an उदाहरण of supply-side अर्थशास्त्र.
Reagan aimed to encourage उद्यमिता और सीमा the विकास of सोशल बिता, as खूब as the reduction of regulation and inflation.
Economic growth saw a strong रिकवरी in the 1980s, helping reagan to जीत a भूस्खलन re-election.
The national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign policy, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the सोवियत संघ an `` दुष्ट साम्राज्य `` और समाप्ति 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the सैन्य प्रारंभ by उसके पूर्ववर्ती, सहित an आक्रमण of हरा, the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी action by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam War.
The `` Reagan doctrine `` controversially granted सहायता to अर्धसैनिक शक्तियां seeking to फेकने communist governments, particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan.
Reagan also promoted new technologies such as missile defense प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the soviets और उनके allies.
In diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret थैचर, और he मिले साथ सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव चार टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' नाभिकीय arsenals.
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` reagan क्रान्ति '', or the आयु of reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment दोनो भीतर और परे the u.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets.
The Reagan प्रशासन worked toward the पतन of सोवियत साम्यवादी, और it किया पतन बस as he बाएँ office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar संसार साथ the u.S. as the world 's sole superpower.
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term, Reagan himself left दफ्तर साथ a 63 प्रतिशत स्वीकृति दरजा, एक of the उच्चतर स्वीकृति दरजा of दूँ राष्ट्रपतियों.
After years of unstinting praise from the right, and unrelenting आलोचना इससे the बाएँ, इतिहासकार दाउद हेनरी पाता कि by 2009 a सर्वसम्मति था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the स्वदेश to the सही by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the प्रेसिडेंसी और अमरीकी self-confidence, और contributed critically to समाप्ति the ठंडा युद्ध.
Crude मौत रेट by देश ( 2006 ).
मृत्यु रेट is a माप of the क्रमांक of मौतों ( in सामान्य, or due to a specific cause ) in a population.
Scaled to the आकार of कि जनसांख्यिकी, प्रति unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति 1000 individuals प्रति साल ; यूँ, a मृत्यु रेट of 9.5 ( आउट of 1000 ) in a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population, or 0.95 % out of the total.
It is distinct from morbidity rate, which refers to the number of individuals in poor health during a दिए समय काल ( the व्यापकता रेट ) or the क्रमांक of newly appearing मामले of the बीमारी प्रति ईकाई of समय ( incidence rate ).
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately प्रयुक्त to refer to the क्रमांक of मौतों among a नियत of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल मामले लिये a बीमारी or चोट, बल्कि than लिये the सामान्य population of a country or ethnic group.
This disease mortality statistic is more precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
एक distinguishes:
The crude मौत रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति year per 1000 people.
the crude मौत रेट लिये the पूरे संसार is परिचय 8.37 प्रति 1000 प्रति साल according to the current CIA World Factbook.
The perinatal मृत्यु रेट, the योग of neonatal मौतों और fetal मौतों ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
The maternal mortality ratio, the क्रमांक of मातृ मौतों प्रति 100,000 सजीव births in same time period.
The maternal mortality rate, the क्रमांक of मातृ मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally defined as 15–44 years of age ).
The infant mortality rate, the number of deaths of children कम than 1 साल बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव births.
The child mortality rate, the number of मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव births.
the standardised मृत्यु अनुपात ( smr ) - इस represents a आंशिक तुलना to the संख्याएँ of मौतों कि होता have महरूम अपेक्षित if the जनसांख्यिकी था महरूम of a मानक composition in terms of age, gender, etc.
The age-specific मृत्यु रेट ( asmr ) - इस refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल प्रति 1000 people of a given age ( e.g. age 62 last birthday ).
In regard to the or failure of medical treatment or प्रक्रियाओं, एक होता भी distinguish:
The early mortality रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the जल्दी चरण of an जारी उपचार, or in the period immediately following an treatment.
The late mortality rate, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the लेट चरण of an जारी उपचार, or a significant length of time after an acute treatment.
Note that the crude मौत रेट as पारिभाषित ऊपर और लागू to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक impression.
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and लिंग ) विशिष्ट मृत्यु दरों और the आयु ( और लिंग ) वितरण of the जनसांख्यिकी.
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for विकसित राष्ट्र than in less-developed देशों, despite जीवन प्रत्याशा होने उच्चतर in विकसित देशों due to standards of health being better.
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely अलग जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण, साथ a much उच्चतर proportion of पुरानी लोगों, due to दोनो निम्नतर हाल जनम दरों और निम्नतर मृत्यु rates.
A more complete picture of mortality is दिए by a जीवन तालिका जिससे shows the मृत्यु रेट separately for each age.
A life table is जरुरी to दे a शुभ अनुमान of life expectancy.
An otoacoustic उत्सर्जन ( oae ) is a ध्वनि जिससे is उत्पन्न from within the inner ear.
having महरूम पूर्वानुमानित by थामस सुनहरा in 1948, इसके अस्तित्व थी पहला demonstrated experimentally by दाउद kemp in 1978 और otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise by a number of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been क्षतिग्रस्त, so oaes हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला और the क्लिनिक as a माप of inner ear health.
Broadly speaking, there are two types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ), which can occur बगैर बाह्य उत्तेजनाओं, और जगाई otoacoustic emissions ( eoaes ), जिससे आवश्यकता an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane टॉमस थी the उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और बारहवीं hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
Tomas developed इससे a तीव्र वेव ईस्ट of the windward Islands on October 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it स्थानांतरित through the windward आइलैंड्स और passed very near Saint Lucia.
After reaching श्रेणी 2 औकात on the saffir-simpson स्केल, टॉमस जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र storm in the central Caribbean Sea, due to strong wind shear and dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized near the Windward passage.
Throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 people are known to have महरूम मारे, 14 of जिसको यहूद in संत Lucia.
मौद्रिक नुकसान throughout the windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at US $ 588 million, mainly in Saint Lucia.
In the wake of the storm in हैती, बाढ़ intensified an जारी हैजा outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in December 2010, 55 लोगों यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola, हालांकि the वितरण of ये fatalities are unknown.
Overall क्षति इससे the तूफ़ान थी at तनिक $ 741 लाख.
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य, अभिनेत्री, satirist, सिंगर और अंतरजाल ब्लॉगर बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a डाल सदस्य of the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
वो रै प्राप्त ध्यान as a गायन आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक Obama, and is an active participant in the Tea Party movement.
Postmodern साहित्य is साहित्य characterized by भारी रिलायंस on तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation, विरोधाभास, और questionable narrators, और is प्रायः ( हालांकि नहीं exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era.
postmodern works हैं देखी as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध आत्मज्ञान सोच और modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern literature, जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे, tends to resist परिभाषा or वर्गीकरण as a `` movement ''.
Indeed, the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory, particularly reader-response और deconstructionist approaches, और the subversions of the अव्यक्त अनुबंध between लेखक, टेक्स्ट और रीडर by जिससे इसके works हैं प्रायः characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions ऐसे as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, and importance of postmodern साहित्य, as is प्रायः the मामला साथ कलाकारी आंदोलनों, postmodern साहित्य is commonly पारिभाषित in संबंध to a precursor.
For example, a postmodern literary work tends not to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is प्रायः मिला in modernist साहित्य, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate chance over craft, और further employ metafiction to undermine the लेखक 's प्राधिकार.
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions between high and low culture through the उपयोग of pastiche, the संयोजन of विषय और जाति नहीं previously deemed अनुरूप लिये literature.
Enigma is an electronic musical प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu, दाउद Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990.
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany, but आधारित उसके रिकॉर्डिंग स्टुडियो a.r.t. studios in ibiza, स्पेन, इससे the जल्दी 1990s जबतक may 2009, जहाँ he रै अंकित सब of पहेली 's स्टुडियो रिलीज to date.
Cretu is both the composer और the निर्माता of the project.
His पूर्व बीवी, पॉप सिंगर सैंड्रा, प्रायः provided vocals on Enigma tracks.
Jens gad co-arranged और निभाई guitar on three of the Enigma albums.
Peter कॉर्नेलियस भी contributed to पहेली during the 1990s.
Seven studio albums have been produced अंतर्गत the नाम of the प्रोजेक्ट.
Scooby-Doo is an American animated cartoon franchise, comprising several animated टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित इससे 1969 to the present day.
The original series, scooby-doo, जहाँ हैं तुम !
, was created for hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by लेखक जो माणिक्य और केन स्पीयर्स in 1969.
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones, daphne ब्लेक, velma dinkley, और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स — और उनके talking भूरा ग्रेट डेन श्वान नामित scooby-doo, who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps.
Following the success of the असली श्रेणी, hanna-barbera और इसके successor warner ब्रदर्स. एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी और अनेक सम्बन्धित works, सहित टेलीविज़न specials and telefilms, a line of direct-to-video films, and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films.
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different variations on the show 's supernatural theme, and include characters such as Scooby 's cousin scooby-dum और भतीजे scrappy-doo in जोड to or बजाय of कुछ of the असली वर्ण.
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on CBS from 1969 to 1976, जब it स्थानांतरित to ABC.
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986, और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the वर्ण as children, a pup नामित scooby-doo, इससे 1988 until 1991.
Two new Scooby-Doo श्रेणी, कया 's नई, scooby-doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ], aired as भाग of बच्चे wb on the wb संजाल और इसके successor, the cw संजाल, from 2002 until 2008.
The most recent scooby-doo श्रेणी, scooby-doo !
रहस्य incorporated, aired on कार्टून संजाल from 2010 to 2013.
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are broadcast frequently on Cartoon Network and boomerang in the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य देशों.
Call of Duty is a first-person और third-person शूटर computer/ वीडियो game franchise.
the श्रेणी began on the pc, और बाद विस्तारित to consoles and handhelds.
Several spin-off खेल have भी महरूम released.
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, this includes : Call of Duty, Call of Duty 2, और कॉल of ड्यूटी 3.
Beginning साथ आधुनिक warfare, जिससे is नियत in आधुनिक times, the series has shifted focus away from World War II.
Call of Duty 4 : आधुनिक warfare ( released नवम्बर 2007 ) थी followed by कॉल of ड्यूटी : संसार at युद्ध और Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the ठंडा युद्ध, जबकि आधुनिक warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes प्लेस in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it for Apple OS X.
जबकि the स्टुडियो अनंत वार्ड primarily स्टिल develops उन्हें, treyarch has also developed several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other.
Some games have been विकसित by धूसर पदार्थ इंटरैक्टिव, चिंगारी असीमित, विस्मित entertainment, n-space, विद्रोह developments, ideaworks Game Studio, Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games.
The games use a variety of engines, सहित the id तकनीक 3, the treyarch ngl, और the iw 5.0.
Other products in the franchise include a line of action figures designed by Plan-B Toys, a card खेल निर्मित by अपर डेक, और a कॉमिक किताब mini-series प्रकाशित by wildstorm.
As of November 11, 2011, the कॉल of ड्यूटी श्रेणी have बेची over 100 million copies.
as of कूच 31, 2012 वहीँ हैं 40 लाख मासिक क्रियाशील खिलाड़ी आरपार सब of the Call of Duty titles, with 10 million Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members.
Over 1.6 billion hours of ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged आधुनिक warfare 3 चूंकि its 2011 release.
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such property is transferred via a होगा, according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the मालिक, ऐसे as a ट्रांसफ़र of प्रॉपर्टी इससे an intestate एस्टेट or trust, or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries.
The एस्टेट कर is एक भाग of the एकीकृत तोहफा और एस्टेट कर प्रणाली in the United States.
The अन्य भाग of the प्रणाली, the तोहफा कर, imposes a कर on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate.
In जोड to the संघीय सरकारी, अनेक राज्य भी थोपने an एस्टेट कर, with the state version called either an estate tax or an inheritance tax.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट कर कॉल it the `` death tax ''.
If an asset is बाएँ to a जीवनसाथी or a federally पहचाना दान, the कर usually does not apply.
In addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत, पहले and/or upon उनके मौत, without incurring federal gift or estate taxes.
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 अक्तूबर 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता और संगीतकार, ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर और लय guitarist of the rock band Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, which lasted लिये आठ सालो, he थी the सीसे सिंगर और guitarist लिये Institute, and later began a solo career.
When performing solo, Gavin plays गीतों इससे उसके extensive musical libraries.
Rossdale रै महरूम क्रमित in the शीर्ष 100 भारी मेटल vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ).
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), बेहतर ज्ञात बस as राफेल, थी an इतालवी चित्रकार और वास्तु of the High Renaissance.
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of संयोजन और लिये इसके विज़ुअल उपलब्धि of the neoplatonic आदर्श of इंसान grandeur.
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da विंची, he फ़ॉर्म the परंपरागत ट्रिनिटी of ग्रेट मास्टर्स of कि काल.
Raphael was enormously उत्पादक, कार्यशील an unusually विशाल कार्यशाला, और despite his death at 37, a large body of his work remains.
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace, जहाँ the frescoed राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल, और the largest, कार्य of उसके करियर.
The best known work is the स्कूल of एथेंस in the वेटिकन Stanza della Segnatura.
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed, लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the कार्यशाला इससे उसके drawings, with considerable loss of quality.
He was extremely influential in उसके आजीवन, हालांकि बाहर रोम उसके कार्य थी ज़्यादातर ज्ञात from his collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of उसके ग्रेट प्रतिद्वंद्वी michelangelo थी अधिक फैली जबतक the 18th और 19th सदियां, जब राफेल 's अधिक serene and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models.
His career falls naturally into तीन phases और तीन शैलियाँ, पहला वर्णित by giorgio vasari : उसके जल्दी सालो in umbria, तब a काल of परिचय चार सालो ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं of फ्लोरेंस, followed by उसके पिछला hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working for two Popes and their close associates.
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
She became a हॉलीवुड स्टार बाद headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), which grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations लिये स्टील magnolias ( 1989 ) और pretty स्त्री, वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting Hill ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ), Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie Wilson 's युद्ध ( 2007 ), वेलेंटाइन 's दिन ( 2010 ), खा दुवा प्रेम ( 2010 ), और दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought बक्सा दफ्तर रसीदें of over $ 2.6 अरब, बनाना her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts.
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार, टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों सालाना `` शक्ति सूची '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
Her fee for 1990 's pretty स्त्री थी $ 300,000 ; in 2003, वो थी सशुल्क an unprecedented $ 25 लाख for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, रॉबर्ट्स 's जाल लायक थी अनुमानित to be $ 140 million.
Roberts has been named one of People पत्रिका 's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों in the संसार '' ग्यारह टाइम्स, tied साथ हैल Berry.
In 2011, she थी नामित एक of the `` 100 hottest महिलाओं of All-Time '' by Men 's Health.
In 2001, महिलाओं घर जर्नल क्रमित उसके as the 11th सबसे शक्तिशाली woman in the United States.
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born may 14, 1984 ) is an अमरीकी कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और Internet entrepreneur.
He is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as एक of पाँच co-founders of the सोशल नेटवर्किंग website Facebook.
As of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक, Inc. and in 2013 his personal wealth was estimated to be US $ 13.3 billion.
Together with his college roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, डस्टिन moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस, zuckerberg शुभारम्भ फेसबुक from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group तब introduced फेसबुक onto अन्य campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to पालो आल्टो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of फेसबुक और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक उपयोक्ता विश्वव्यापी पहुँचे a कुल of एक अरब in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in विभिन्न विधिक विवादों कि यहूद initiated by अन्य in the समूह, जो claimed a share of the कम्पनी based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, zuckerberg रै महरूम नामित among the 100 wealthiest और सबसे influential people in the world by Time magazine as a part of its Person of the Year accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by कर्ता जेसी eisenberg in the 2010 हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the सोशल Network in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed.
The Mayflower was the जलयान कि in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a कोर group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार environment.

Committee of Ways and Means is the मुख्य कर -writing कमेटी of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other हाउस समितियों जबतक वे लागू लिये a waiver इससे उनके पार्टी 's congressional leadership.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising उपायों, as खूब as a क्रमांक of other programs including:
Social सुरक्षा
बेरोजगारी लाभ
medicare
प्रवर्तन of चाइल्ड support laws
Temporary Assistance for मोहताज परिवारों, a संघीय welfare program
फोस्टर परवाह और अपनाना programs
The U.S. Constitution requires कि सब बिल्स regarding कराधान जरूर originate in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation जरूर go through इस कमेटी, the कमेटी is बहुत influential, as is इसके सीनेट बंटवारा, the u.S. Senate Committee on Finance.
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by चार्ली rangel, जो था लिया a छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष जबतक हाउस आचार उल्लंघनों यहूद resolved.
However, his leave of अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष थी शासित to be a इस्तीफा.
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman, so sander levin आयोजित कि स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ of the 112th कॉंग्रेस.
Dave शिविर became the कमेटी कुर्सी लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस, बाद the republicans जीती control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री स्तनधारी belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ).
At in लंबाई और or अधिक in वज़न, it is the largest known animal to have ever existed.
Long and slender, the blue whale 's देह can be विभिन्न शेड्स of bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat हल्का underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( भी ज्ञात as the सानो ब्लू व्हेल ) मिला in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. इंडिका, मिला in the भारतीय समंदर, may be another subspecies.
As साथ अन्य baleen whales, इसके diet consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly सब the महासागर on धरती जबतक the शुरूआत of the twentieth century.
For over a century, they were hunted लगभग to extinction by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय जातियाँ in 1966.
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 ब्लू whales विश्वव्यापी, स्तिथ in at तनिक पाँच समूह.
अधिक हाल शोध into the सानो subspecies suggests इस may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest जनसांख्यिकी थी in the अंटार्कटिक, क्रमांकन लगभग 239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर प्रशांत, अंटार्कटिक, और भारतीय समंदर groups.
वहीँ हैं दो अधिक समूह in the उत्तर अटलांटिक, and at least two in the Southern Hemisphere.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is कलियों कि रूप भीतर the पुष्प heads पहले the flowers come into bloom.
the कलियों go दूर or बदलें to a coarse, मुश्किल edible form when the flower blooms.
The uncultivated or जंगली किस्में of the species is called a cardoon.
It is a perennial संयंत्र देशी to the Mediterranean region.
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी.
U.S. statesman, inventor, and diplomat बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the bill.
On the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of Independence Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed चूंकि जुलाई 13, 1969, जब the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, और $ 10,000 यहूद रिटायर्ड.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) पहले it is replaced due to wear and tear.
The bills हैं भी commonly referred to as `` benjamins '', in सन्दर्भ to the उपयोग of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन 's portrait on the denomination, or `` C-Notes '', based on the Roman numeral for 100.
the विधेयक is एक of दो denominations मुद्रित आज कि करता नहीं विशेषता a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the रिवर्स, according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण, shows लगभग 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21, 2010, and was to be issued to the public on February 11, 2011, लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010 क्युकी as अनेक as 30 % यहूद अनुपयोगी due to a निर्माण flaw.
A vertical क्रीज in the पेपर reveals a रिक्त स्पेस on the विधेयक when pulled out.
In their replacement, and continuing the ऊँची माँग of इस denomination, the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
On अप्रैल 24, 2013, the संघीय आरक्षित घोषित the नई $ 100 विधेयक would enter circulation on October 8, 2013.
किंग दाउद in robes of a बीज़ान्टिन emperor.
Miniature इससे the पेरिस psalter.
David ( ; आईएसओ 259-3 dawid ; ' ; दमदार 's : daveed ) according to the यहूदी बाइबल, थी the दूसरी किंग of the संयुक्त किंगडम of इसराईल, और according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
His life is conventionally दिनाँक to c. 1040–970 bce, उसके शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002 bce, और his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
The Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on David, although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', which most विद्वानों लो as पुष्टि of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th सदी bce of a judean royal राजवंश पुकारा the हाउस of David.
He is depicted as a righteous किंग, हालांकि नहीं बगैर त्रुटियां, as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा, संगीतकार, और कवि, traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
David is सेंट्रल to यहूदी, ईसाई, और इस्लामी doctrine and culture.
biblical परंपरा maintains कि a सीधा वंशज of David will be the Messiah.
In Islam he is माना to be a नबी और the किंग of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the पूंजी और largest शहरी agglomerate of Nepal.
The agglomerate consists of काठमांडू महानगर नगर at इसके कोर, और इसके सिस्टर शहरों Patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It also includes the recently पहचाना शहरी क्षेत्रों of shankhapur, karyabinayak, और champapur.
Banepa, dhulikhel, और panauti हैं उपग्रह शहरी क्षेत्रों of काठमांडू located just outside the Kathmandu valley.
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the agglomerate रै a जनसांख्यिकी of अधिक than 2.5 लाख निवासियों.
The metropolitan नगर क्षेत्रफल is और रै a जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of 19,250 per km2.
The city stands at an उन्नयन of लगभग in the bowl-shaped काठमांडू Valley of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by four प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri, phulchoki, nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
Kathmandu Valley is part of three जिले ( काठमांडू, ललितपुर, और भक्तपुर ), रै the उच्चतम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in the country, and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
दौरान rana और शाह eras, the नाम `` नेपाल '' referred तभी to the काठमांडू घाटी ; it थी कया people who lived outside the valley called it.
During this काल, अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों पुकारा the घाटी itself `` Nepal Proper ''.
Today, Kathmandu is नहीं तभी the पूंजी of the संघीय लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of नेपाल, लकिन भी the मुख्यालय of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
The Central Region comprises three zones : bagmati, narayani, और जनकपुर.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the Bagmati Zone.
काठमांडू is the गेटवे to पर्यटन in Nepal.
It is भी the तंत्रिका बीच of the देश 's economy.
It has the most advanced infrastructure of कोई शहरी क्षेत्रफल in नेपाल, और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on tourism, which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu अस्वीकृत thereafter दौरान a काल of राजनैतिक अशांति, लकिन चूंकि तब रै improved. )
The city has a rich इतिहास, spanning nearly 2000 सालो, as inferred इससे inscriptions मिला in the valley.
Religious and सांस्कृतिक festivities रूप a प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of people residing in Kathmandu.
Most of Kathmandu 's लोगों follow हिंदुत्व और अनेक अन्य follow buddhism.
There are people of other religious beliefs as खूब, giving काठमांडू a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन संस्कृति.
Nepali is the most commonly बोला भाषा in the नगर.
Nepal Bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा बोला by the Newar people.
Hindi is widely understood and अंग्रेज़ी is समझा by काठमांडू 's शिक्षित निवासियों.
The city 's साक्षरता रेट is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are अभिन्न to काठमांडू 's सांस्कृतिक विरासत, पर्यटन उद्योग, और अर्थव्यवस्था ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ सब तीन शहरों ' स्मारक और आकर्षण साथ अंतर्गत one heading, `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site ``.
Field hockey, usually referred to simply as hockey, is a team sport of the hockey family जिससे is निभाई between दो टीमों of ग्यारह खिलाड़ी साथ हॉकी sticks और a मुश्किल, ठोस प्लास्टिक ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, with particular popularity throughout यूरोपीय, एशिया, महासागरीय, और दक्षिण अमेरिका – in जोड to होने the नेशनल खेल of पाकिस्तानी और India.
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada, the United States, और अन्य regions of the संसार जहाँ the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी is अधिक लोकप्रिय.
During play, goal keepers are the तभी खिलाड़ी जो हैं अनुमत to टच the बॉल साथ कोई भाग of उनके देह ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a खिलाड़ी 's हाथ माना 'part of the स्टिक ' ), साथ इस तभी applying भीतर the शूटिंग वृत्त ( भी ज्ञात as the d, or शूटिंग arc, or just the circle ), while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick.
the टोली कि स्कोर the सबसे लक्ष्य by the end of the match wins.
If the score is tied at the end of the game, either a draw is घोषित or the खेल goes into अतिरिक्त समय and/or a दंड गोलीबारी, depending on the प्रतियोगिता 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय हॉकी संघ ( fih ), साथ मेन और महिलाओं होने represented internationally in प्रतियोगिताओं सहित the ओलम्पिक खेल, राष्ट्रमंडल खेल, हॉकी संसार कप, champions ट्रॉफी and Junior Hockey World Cup, with many countries running extensive junior, senior, and masters ' club competitions.
The FIH is also responsible for organising the हॉकी नियम फलक और विकासशील the नियम for the sport.
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a क्रमांक of respects जबकि मूर्त the प्राथमिक सिद्धान्त of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side रूपांतर, साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules remaining the वही, सहित रुकावट और फीट, वहीँ हैं अनेक कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - खिलाड़ी may नहीं उठाएँ the बॉल जबतक शूटिंग on लक्ष्य, खिलाड़ी may नहीं hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off.
Ethan `` Cane '' ashby ( né एटकिन्सन ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी सीबीएस साबुन ओपेरा The Young and the Restless.
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard, who originally auditioned लिये ब्रैड स्नाइडर on as the संसार turns लकिन थी अनुशंसित लिये a भूमिका on the यंग and the Restless instead.
the भूमिका थी to be portrayed as an अमरीकी, लकिन गोडार्ड 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent influenced the character 's background.
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the एपीसोड airing on जनवरी 12, 2007 as an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of उसके परिवार, a डेब्यू कि प्राप्त a मिश्रित response.
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the character 's पृष्ठभूमि थी rewritten by मरिया एरिना घंटी in 2009, reestablishing उसे as the बेटे of कोलिन और genevieve एटकिन्सन ( ट्रिस्टन रोजर्स और Genie Francis ).
Though characterized as `` रहस्यमय '', cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the पहला सदस्य of the एटकिन्सन परिवार to appear on the series, followed by his parents and identical twin brother.
Soon after his debut, he became a अग्रणी अक्षर, a निर्णय praised by दर्शक और critics.
The character has been involved with एम्बर मूर ( adrienne frantz ), क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) और सबसे notably लिली सर्दियों ( christel Khalil ), a romance that garnered significant fan attention.
In 2009, cane और लिली यहूद शादीशुदा ; वैश्विक bc होता बाद कॉल लिली the love of Cane 's life.
The pair था दो children, चार्ली और mattie ashby.
In 2011, the actor थी fired, और cane थी शॉट to मौत onscreen.
However, Goddard was rehired soon बाद दर्शक campaigned लिये उसके वापसी, revealing कि cane 's एकसमान twin brother was in fact the man who died.
This कुर्बान उसके विवाह to लिली, लकिन the युगल यहूद remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012.
Goddard has been widely acclaimed लिये उसके portrayal ; canyon न्यूज कहा कि he portrays the अक्षर honestly, और is `` सदा dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, फिल्मी निर्माता, और संगीतकार.
He has won the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार for Best Actor.
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न श्रेणी 21 जम्प गली, बनने a teen idol.
Dissatisfied with that status, Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office कामयाबी in films ऐसे as sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), चार्ली और the चॉकलेट फैक्टरी ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ), rango ( 2011 ) और the pirates of the caribbean फिल्मी श्रेणी ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with निदेशक और dost टिम बर्टन in आठ films ; the सबसे हाल होने Dark Shadows ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in donnie brasco, शिकारी S. थॉम्पसन in भय और loathing in लास वेगास, जार्ज जंग in उड़ा, और the बैंको डाकू जॉन dillinger in माइकल Mann 's Public Enemies.
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर और over $ 7.6 अरब worldwide.
He has been nominated for top awards many times, winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy ग्लोब्स –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी टॉड : the राक्षस नाई of बेड़े गली और इससे the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड लिये pirates of the caribbean : the Curse of the Black Pearl.
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American cinema, being twice नामित as the `` sexiest man जिंदा `` by लोगों पत्रिका in 2003 और 2009.
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness किताब of संसार रिकॉर्ड as the उच्चतम सशुल्क कर्ता, with $ 75 million.
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view web pages कि may contain टेक्स्ट, बिंब, वीडियो, और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the cern, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 लिये कया होता eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at होगा '', और वे सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in दिसम्बर of the वही year.
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born नवम्बर 11, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the नई यॉर्क jets of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the पहला गोलाकार of the 2009 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट as the पांचवां overall चयन by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall.
He निभाई कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी California ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined और एथलेटिक परिवार.
In the eighth ग्रेड, he began to खेल फ़ुटबॉल और सीख the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति, training with his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, सांचेज़ वचनबद्ध to दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following उसके कामयाब high school career in which he led his team to a championship title during his final season.
At USC, Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first तीन सालो हालांकि he रोज़ to prominence due to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे on the फ़ील्ड in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty.
सांचेज़ भी became लोकप्रिय भीतर the जातियाँ due to his Mexican-American heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and won the रोज़ कटोरी विरूद्ध penn राज्य लिये जिससे सांचेज़ थी awarded the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार लिये उसके प्रदर्शन on offense.
Although many considered him too अनुभवहीन, सांचेज़ घोषित उसके इरादे to डालें the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड भूरा, और थी नामित the starting क्वार्टरबैक prior to the प्रारंभ of the season.
Despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the jets to the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल, a खोने प्रयत्न to the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस, बनने the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs और the टोली 's दूसरी लगातार afc चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers, 24–19.
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior, सांचेज़ tied चार अन्य quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories by a quarterback in NFL history.
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships, Sanchez joined quarterback Ben roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in एनएफएल इतिहास to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप in उनके पहला दो सीज़न in the league.
The अगला दो सीज़न होता be a स्लोप लिये दोनो the टोली और Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs.
Fans और मीडिया आलोचकों पुकारा लिये a struggling Sanchez to be benched.
He आखिरकार थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy.
Paul एवेरी ( अप्रैल 2, 1934december 10, 2000 ) थी an अमरीकी पुलिस रिपोर्टर, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां on the infamous सीरियल कातिल known as the Zodiac, and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible AC sump pump साथ a गार्डन नली कनेक्टर
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water कि रै संचित in a जल collecting sump जलाशय, commonly मिला in the तहखाने of homes.
the जल may डालें via the घेरा नालों of a तहखाने waterproofing प्रणाली, funneling into the basin or because of rain or natural ground water, if the basement is below the water table level.
Sump पंपों हैं प्रयुक्त जहाँ तहखाने बाढ़ happens regularly और to उपाय dampness जहाँ the water table is above the foundation of a home.
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण, ऐसे as a नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली or a शुष्क खूब.
Pumps may निर्वहन to the sanitary सीवर in पुरानी संस्थापना.
एकबार माना स्वीकार्य, इस अभ्यास may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or नगरपालिका bylaws, क्युकी it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect और reroute sump पंप निर्वहन away from sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed लिये noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited उनके sump पंप configurations और do नहीं एहसास that the pump discharges to the sewer.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने, it 's संभावित going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical प्रणाली, sump पंपों may have a बैटरी बैकअप.
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps, eliminating the need लिये विद्युत at the व्यय of using potable जल, potentially बनाना उन्हें अधिक महंगी to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem.
Since a sump जलाशय may अतिप्रवाह if नहीं constantly उत्तेजित, a बैकअप प्रणाली is महत्वपूर्ण लिये मामले जब the प्रमुख शक्ति is out for prolonged periods of time, as during a severe storm.
There are generally दो प्रकार of sump पंपों — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal pump 's motor is mounted above the sump, जहाँ it is अधिक easily सर्विस, लकिन is भी more conspicuous.
The pump impeller is चलित by a long, लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a स्क्रॉल housing in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely आरोहित अंदर the sump, और is विशेषकर sealed to prevent विद्युत short circuits.
Sump pump systems are also utilized in औद्योगिक और वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल तालिका -सुनानाd समस्याएं in सतह मृदा.
An artesian aquifer or आवधिक ऊँची जल तालिका हालात can कारण the मैदान to become unstable due to water saturation.
as long as the पंप कृत्यों, the सतह मृदा will remain stable.
ये sumps हैं typically टेन फीट in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated मेटल पाइप कि contains perforations or drain holes throughout.
वे may शामिल इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंट्रोल प्रणालियों साथ विज़ुअल और audible सचेतक और हैं प्रायः covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody Kansas or the किनारा युद्ध, थी a श्रेणी of हिंसक राजनैतिक confrontations involving anti-slavery free-staters और pro-slavery `` किनारा ruffian `` तत्व, कि took प्लेस in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether कान्सास होता डालें the संघ as a फ़्री state or slave state.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and southerners over the समस्या of गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by होरेस greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून ; the कार्यक्रम it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War.
कॉंग्रेस था long struggled to संतुलन the रूचि of pro-slavery शक्तियां और anti-slavery forces.
The events later known as bleeding कान्सास यहूद नियत into गति by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it होता be a फ़्री or स्लेव राज्य ; however, इस resulted in आव्रजन en masse to कान्सास by कार्यकर्ताओं इससे दोनो sides.
At one point, Kansas had two separate governments, प्रत्येक साथ इसके अपना संविधान, हालांकि तभी एक थी federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, कान्सास थी admitted to the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य, कम than तीन महीने before the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War.
Benzene is an organic रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the आणविक सूत्र c6 h|hydrogen|h6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon अणु joined in a रिंग, साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन अणु संलग्न to प्रत्येक कार्बन atom.
क्युकी इसके अणुओं contain तभी कार्बन और हाइड्रोजन अणु, बेंजीन is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude आयल, और is एक of the सबसे basic petrochemicals.
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a चक्रीय हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ a निरन्तर pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated ph –h. बेंजीन is a colorless और अत्यधिक ज्वलनशील liquid with a sweet smell.
It is मुख्यतः प्रयुक्त as a precursor to भारी रसायन, ऐसे as ethylbenzene और cumene, which are produced on a billion kilogram scale.
Because it has a high octane क्रमांक, it is an महत्वपूर्ण घटक of गैसोलीन, composing a few percent of its mass.
Most non-industrial अनुप्रयोग have महरूम सीमित by बेंजीन 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14 कूच 1835 – 4 जुलाई 1910 ) थी an इतालवी astronomer और विज्ञान इतिहासकार.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's वी खेल कंसोल to run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo.
It achieves this by defeating the Wii 's नक़ल सुरक्षा और कोड हस्ताक्षर उपायों.
In more general terms, Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the वी 's हार्डवेयर, accessories और तन्त्र लिये उद्देश्य बाहर those intended by the manufacturer.
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a pointing device on other ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, or कार्यशील web-based खेल in the built-in वेब ब्राउजर.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, ऐसे as the `` गोधूलि हैक ``, `` bannerbomb '' और इसके बाद अवतार `` letterbomb '', `` तोड़ स्टेक '', `` इंडियाना Pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the Jodi '', made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible.
हैडली ( सही ) discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice.
स्टीफन जॉन हैडली ( born फ़रवरी 13, 1947 ) थी the 21st u.S. सहायक to the अध्यक्ष लिये National Security Affairs ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ), serving under President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing पौधे और दे उर्वरक to हाफ of them.
If there are differences between the fertilized संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह, ये मतभेद may be due to the उर्वरक.
A scientific control is an experiment or observation designed to minimize the प्रभाव of परिवर्तनीय अन्य than the single independent variable.
This increases the reliability of the परिणाम, प्रायः through a तुलना between कंट्रोल माप and the other measurements.
Scientific controls are a भाग of the वैज्ञानिक विधि.
For example, during drug testing, वैज्ञानिकों होगा कोशिश to कंट्रोल दो समूह to रखना उन्हें as एकसमान as संभावित, तब allow एक समूह to कोशिश the ड्रग.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the पौधे in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल समूह, क्युकी वे स्थापित the बेसलाइन स्तर of विकास कि the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a कंट्रोल समूह, the प्रयोग can नहीं determine whether the fertilizer-treated पौधे grow अधिक than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all परिवर्तनीय in an प्रयोग होगा be नियंत्रित ( accounted लिये by the कंट्रोल measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled.
In such an experiment, if all the controls work as अपेक्षित, it is संभावित to conclude कि the प्रयोग is working as intended और कि the परिणाम of the प्रयोग are due to the effect of the variable being tested.
That is, वैज्ञानिक नियंत्रण allow an अन्वेषक to मेक a अर्जी जैसे `` दो परिस्थितियों were identical until factor X occurred.
Since factor X is the only difference between the दो परिस्थितियों, the नई निष्कर्ष थी caused by फ़ैक्टर x. ''

John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, राजनयिक, और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे Great Britain.
Well शिक्षित, he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
A lawyer and public फिगर in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he निभाई a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the कॉंग्रेस.
बाद, as a राजनयिक in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, और थी जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी, बहकावे American political thought.
One of his greatest roles थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, और 25 सालो later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' क्रांतिकारी श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the विवादास्पद एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों, और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams was defeated for re-election by थामस जेफरसन और रिटायर्ड to मैसाचुसेट्स.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन.
He and his wife, Abigail Adams, founded an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता, राजनयिकों, और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the Adams political family.
एडम्स थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी Adams, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have received greater मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स, हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as मनाये as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became known as the White House.
A Watt भाप इंजन.
The steam engine, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और the world.
The औद्योगिक क्रान्ति थी the परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from hand production methods to machines, नई रासायनिक निर्माण और आयरन उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं, improved दक्षता of जल शक्ति, the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools.
The परिवर्तन भी शामिल the बदलें इससे लकडी and other bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial revolution began in ब्रिटेन और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त States.
The Industrial Revolution marks a प्रमुख turning पाइंट in इतिहास ; लगभग प्रत्येक पहलू of रोज़ जीवन थी बहकावे in कुछ way.
Most notably, average income और जनसांख्यिकी began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
In the शब्द of नोबेल पुरस्कार विजेता रॉबर्ट E. लुकास, jr., `` लिये the पहला समय in इतिहास, the जीना मानकों of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained growth... Nothing remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned by the classical economists, even as a theoretical possibility. ''
विलियम घंटी स्कॉट आयरन and Coal, 1855-60
The period of time covered by the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति varies साथ अलग इतिहासकारों.
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully लगा जबतक the 1830s or 1840s, जबकि T. S. एश्टन आयोजित कि it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued कि the प्रक्रम of आर्थिक और सोशल बदलें took प्लेस धीरे और the पद क्रान्ति is a misnomer.
This is still a विषय of बहस among इतिहासकारों.
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति और the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
The Industrial क्रान्ति began an era of per-capita आर्थिक विकास in पूंजीवादी economies.
Economic historians are in agreement that the onset of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट in the इतिहास of मानवता चूंकि the domestication of पशु और पौधे.
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870, when technological and economic progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of steam-powered नौकाएँ, जहाजों और रेल, the विशाल स्केल manufacture of यंत्र टूल्स और the increasing उपयोग of भाप संचालित factories.
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born September 27, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न न्यूज रिपोर्टर, फिलहाल appearing on फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल.
This list ranks U.S. cities by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( नहीं सहित लाशें of water ).
Total areas ( सहित जल ) हैं भी दिए, लकिन नोट कि, जब क्रमित by कुल क्षेत्रफल, a क्रमांक of तटीय शहरों appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San फ्रांसिस्को is an चरम उदाहरण ; जल makes up nearly 80 % of इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल of 232 वर्गाकार miles ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in अनेक मामले a नगर may be geographically विशाल primarily क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका सरकारी has merged with the government of the surrounding county.
In some cases the county no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the व्यवस्था रै formed a संचित city–county ( or city- बरो in अलास्का, or city- parish in Louisiana ).

The large आंत ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the पिछला भाग of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
इसके फलन is to अवशोषित जल इससे the बाकी indigestible food matter, and then to pass useless waste material from the body.
This article is primarily परिचय the इंसान आंत, हालांकि the सूचना परिचय इसके processes are directly applicable to most mammals.
The large intestine consists of the cecum, मलाशय और गुदा canal.
It starts in the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis, बस at or नीचे the सही कमर, जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे समाप्त of the small intestine.
इससे यहाँ it continues up the उदर, तब आरपार the चौडाई of the abdominal गुहा, and then it turns down, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
The large intestine is about long, जिससे is परिचय one-fifth of the पूरे लंबाई of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the विशाल आंत शामिल the cecum, कोलन, मलाशय, और गुदा canal.
however, कुछ स्त्रोत exclude the anal canal.
The Green Bay Packers हैं an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी, विस्कॉन्सिन.
They are members of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल, having महरूम व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned major लीग पेशेवर खेल टोली in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The Packers हैं the पिछला vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and जार्ज व्हिटनी calhoun, the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in ग्रीन खाड़ी डेटिंग back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन और the मिडवेस्ट.
They joined the American Professional Football संघ ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base और मीडिया extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी निभाई चयनित घर खेल वहीँ between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the एनएफएल ), सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( सुपर कटोरी xxxi ) और 2011 ( सुपर कटोरी XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, कड़वा rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the शिकागो bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized घाटी स्तिथ in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, पारिभाषित by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it.
Home to 1.76 लाख लोगों, it झूठ उत्तर of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin.
Nearly two thirds of the घाटी 's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is भाग of the नगर of लॉस Angeles.
The other incorporated शहरों in the घाटी हैं ग्लेनडेल, burbank, सैन फर्नांडो, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

The World of coca-cola, is a स्थाई प्रदर्शनी featuring the इतिहास of The Coca-Cola Company.
Its well-known विज्ञापन as खूब as a मेजबान of entertainment क्षेत्रों और आकर्षण, और is स्तिथ in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया ( जहाँ the कम्पनी 's मुख्यालय are located ) at Pemberton Place ( named in honor of John Pemberton, the inventor of Coca-Cola ).
as भाग of जॉर्जिया 's museums.
