It opened to the public on May 24, 2007, relocating इससे और replacing the असली प्रदर्शनी.
Pretties is a 2005 विज्ञान fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी किताब of the Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld.
It is set in a future dystopian संसार in जिससे everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by extreme cosmetic surgery upon reaching age 16.
It tells the story of किशोरावस्था टैली youngblood जो विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध society 's enforced conformity.
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री sentenced to जीवन in थाना लिये murdering उसके children.
Born in Union, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, और a पूर्व छात्र of the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिण कैरोलिना संघ, वो थी convicted on जुलाई 22, 1995 लिये murdering उसके दो बेटे, 3-year-old माइकल Daniel Smith, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith, born August 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it विकसित, due to उसके claiming कि a ब्लैक man चुराया उसके car और kidnapped उसके बेटे.
She later claimed कि वो suffered इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य issues that impaired her judgment.
According to the South Carolina Department of corrections, स्मिथ होगा be योग्य लिये पैरोल on नवम्बर 4, 2024, बाद सेवारत a न्यूनतम of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at दक्षिण कैरोलिना 's leath correctional संस्था, निकट Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit koyukon athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the उच्चतम पहाड़ शिखर in the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका साथ a समिट elevation of above sea level.
At कुछ, the आधार to शिखर वृद्धि is माना the largest of any mountain situated entirely above sea level.
Measured by स्थलाकृतिक prominence, it is the तीसरा सबसे prominent शिखर बाद माउंट एवरेस्ट and Aconcagua.
Located in the अलास्का दायरा in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का, it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
The first European to दस्तावेज़ sighting the पहाड़ थी जार्ज वैंकूवर in 1794.
In 1903, जेम्स wickersham अंकित the पहला attempt at चढ़ाई mckinley जिससे was unsuccessful.
In 1906, Frederick कुक claimed the पहला ascent जिससे थी बाद proven to be false.
The first verifiable ascent to mckinley 's समिट थी हासिल on जून 7, 1913 by चढना Hudson Stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert Tatum.
In 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress रूट माना to be the safest और easiest रूट और इसलिए the सबसे लोकप्रिय फिलहाल in use.
the होंडा s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
It was शुभारम्भ in कूच 1964.
उपलब्धियाँ as a roadster – bearing दमदार प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in कूच 1965 – the s600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels.
During its production run up to 1966, the model styling होता remain pretty much the वही, साथ the सबसे notable परिवर्तन coming to the सामने grille, बम्पर, और headlights.
Powered by a DOHC, water-cooled, four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ चार carburetors, the इंजन क्षमता थी increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और था a शीर्ष speed of.
With the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त चादर मेटल of the कूप only added to the overall weight.
Suspension was independent साथ sealed रोलर कड़ी ड्राइव to प्रत्येक पश्च wheel.
The s600 थी the पहला द्रव्यमान marketed Honda car.
पहला offered तभी in right-hand ड्राइव, it जल्द became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets.
There were a few pre-production S500s manufactured in बाएँ हाथ ड्राइव, दो or तीन भी होने दिखाया in कुछ जल्दी बिक्री विवरणिका.
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special, upgraded package called the SM600 which included, among other items, special paint colors, विशेष badging, a मानक रेडियो और स्पीकर, a खास एंटीना in the यात्री पक्ष सूर्य छज्जा, मानक reversing लाइट्स, a मानक सिगरेट हल्का, a मानक हीटर, बेहतर cushioned सीटे, और a detachable सीट track लिये जल्दी हटाना of the यात्री seat.
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964, साथ उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the s800 ) साथ तभी 111 roadsters और 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom कि depicts the teenage अनुभवों of हास्य क्रिस चट्टान ( जो is भी the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant पड़ोस of ब्रुकलीन, New York.
The show is set between 1983 और 1987 ; however, Rock himself was a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny montero, जिसको he रै प्रायः referred to as the प्रेरणा लिये a lot of the episodes.
In many interviews, Rock has described Kenny as the कारण he मिला into कॉमेडी in the पहला प्लेस.
The show 's शीर्षक parodies the सीबीएस sitcom everybody Loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` everybody loves रेमंड लकिन Everybody Hates Chris ! ``.
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James विलियम्स, टेरी क्रू, tichina अर्नाल्ड, tequan रिचमंड, imani हकीम, और विंसेंट Martella.
In पतन 2008, the the cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates Chris and The Game to the Friday night death slot.
The fourth season of the श्रेणी premiered शुक्रवार, अक्तूबर 3, 2008, at 8:00pm eastern/7:00pm Central.
On May 21, 2009, The CW घोषित कि it था रद्द everybody hates क्रिस.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his own past—dropping आउट of ऊँची स्कूल to become a comedian—and कि it थी समय to समाप्त the show.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the दो pleural परतों, the fluid-filled स्पेस that surrounds the lungs.
excessive amounts of ऐसे द्रव can impair श्वास by limiting the expansion of the lungs during ventilation.
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old अंग्रेज़ी वीर एपिक कविता consisting of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों, नियत in scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a single पाण्डुलिपि ज्ञात as the nowell codex.
Its संयोजन by an बेनाम anglo-saxon कवि is dated between the 8th and the early 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly damaged by a आग कि swept through a भवन आवास a संग्रहण of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton.
The poem fell into obscurity for दशकों, और इसके अस्तित्व किया नहीं become widely ज्ञात again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, आता to the सहायता of hroðgar, the किंग of the danes, जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) रै महरूम अंतर्गत आक्रमण by a दानव ज्ञात as Grendel.
After बियोवुल्फ़ जानबूझ उसे, grendel 's माँ हमले the हॉल और is तब भी defeated.
Victorious, Beowulf goes home to geatland in स्वीडन और बाद becomes किंग of the Geats.
बाद a काल of पचास सालो रै passed, बियोवुल्फ़ defeats a dragon, but is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his death, his attendants bury him in a tumulus, a दफ़न mound, in geatland.
Shem Ham and japheth by जेम्स tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; Sēm ; अरबी : sām ; ge'ez : ሴም, sēm ; `` renown ; समृद्धि ; नाम '' ) थी one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature.
He is सबसे popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ बेटे, हालांकि some traditions regard him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष आयु of shem और उसके bhai japheth, लकिन साथ sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the पिता of सब the children of eber, the bhai of japheth the elder, भी to him were children born. ``.
however, the नई अमरीकी मानक बाइबल देता, `` भी to shem, the पिता of सब the children of eber, and the older brother of Japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology note, ) two years after the flood, making him barely 99 at the समय the बाढ़ began ; और कि he जिया लिये another 500 सालो बाद इस, बनाना उसके आयु at मौत 600 सालो.
the children of shem यहूद ईलम, asshur, arphaxad, lud, और Aram, in addition to daughters.
Abraham, the patriarch of the hebrews और arabs, थी एक of the वंशजों of Arphaxad.
इस्लामी साहित्य describes shem as एक of the believing sons of Noah.
Some sources even पहचानो shem as a नबी in उसके अपना सही और कि he थी the next prophet after his father.
In एक मुस्लिम लेजेंड, shem थी एक of the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु उठाएगा as a sign to the Children of Israel.
The 1st century historian Flavius josephus, among अनेक अन्य, recounted the परंपरा कि ये पाँच बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the nations of Elam, Assyria, Chaldea, Lydia, and Syria, respectively.
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages, as a उपसमुच्चय of the afro-asiatic भाषाएं, denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी, Aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; leviticus rabbah 25:6 ; संख्याएँ rabbah 4:8. ), shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek, किंग of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is अंकित to have मिले बाद the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the अनेक extra-biblical स्त्रोत कि describe उसे, shem is also credited with killing Nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; भी in 1 क्रॉनिकल्स 1:4.
Geographic identifications of flavius josephus, c. 100 ad ; japheth 's बेटे दिखाया in रेड, हैम 's बेटे in blue, Shem 's sons in green.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group inc. is a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily an अंतरजाल डोमेन रजिस्ट्रार और web hosting company.
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006, लकिन बाद रद्द it, due to `` मार्केट uncertainties ''.
In addition to domain registration and होस्टिंग go पापा भी बिकता e-business सम्बन्धित तन्त्र और सेवाएं.
On June 24, 2011, the वॉल गली जर्नल reported कि private-equity firms केकेआर और चांदी झील साझेदार, साथ साथ a third investor, were nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR, Silver Lake साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर ventures था बंद the deal.
Although the खरीदें दाम थी नहीं officially घोषित it थी reported to be $ 2.25 अरब, लिये 65 % of the company.
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go पापा to वारेन adelman, जो था महरूम साथ the कम्पनी लिये परिचय 10 years.
The andorran कोट of बाहें at the Andorran parliament.
Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), also called the Principality of the Valleys of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय, स्तिथ in the पूर्वी pyrenees kyu और bordered by स्पेन और France.
It is the sixth smallest स्वदेश in यूरोपीय, having an क्षेत्रफल of और an अनुमानित population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, Andorra la वेला, is the उच्चतम पूंजी नगर in यूरोपीय, at an उन्नयन of above sea level.
the आधिकारिक भाषा is कैटलन, हालांकि Spanish, Portuguese, and French are also commonly spoken.
Created under a चार्टर in 988, the उपस्थित principality was formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the बिशप of Urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous देश मुख्यतः क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग, जिससे सेवाएं an अनुमानित 10.2 million visitors annually, and also because of its status as a tax haven.
It is नहीं a सदस्य of the यूरोपीय संघ, लकिन the euro is the de facto currency.
The people of Andorra have the 4th उच्चतम इंसान जीवन प्रत्याशा in the संसार — 82 सालो at birth.
The George Washington विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw, gwu, or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक private, coeducational research university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards प्रमाणपत्र, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, और phds across several dozen disciplines.
The university was चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as the columbian College in the District of Columbia.
Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born October 21, 1980 ) is an American socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और occasional अभिनेत्री.
In 2007, she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a अदालत awarding उसके $ 5 लाख ; बाद in कि same year, she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up साथ the kardashians, और इसके subsequent spin-offs, सहित कोर्टनी और किम Take New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
In 2010, Kardashian थी the highest-earning वास्तविकता स्टार, साथ अनुमानित earnings of $ 6 million.
With sisters Kourtney and khloé, कार्दशियन co-owns the फ़ैशन बुटीक chain D-A-S-H.
She has been involved in the उत्पादन of अनेक लाइनों of कपडे और सुगंध.
In August 2011, कार्दशियन शादीशुदा बास्केट खिलाड़ी क्रिस humphries in a widely publicized ceremony.
That October, कार्दशियन दायर लिये तलाक following 72 दिनों of विवाह.
The move garnered significant backlash इससे the मीडिया, जो labeled it a `` publicity stunt ''.
बाद 536 दिनों, कार्दशियन और humphries पहुँचे an अघोषित उपनिवेश at the लॉस एंजिल्स Superior Court, finalizing the divorce in April 2013.

Oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '', is the तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स और the सबसे populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii.
The state पूंजी, होनोलूलू, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast, it रै a कुल जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, बनाना it the 20th largest द्वीप in the संयुक्त राज्य.
In the महानतम आयाम, इस volcanic द्वीप is long and across.
The लंबाई of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two separate शील्ड ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau, साथ a व्यापक `` घाटी '' or काठी ( the सेंट्रल oahu मैदान ) between them.
The highest पाइंट is mt. ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, उठती to above sea level.
The base currency of the संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S. डालर, और is मुद्रित on बिल्स in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At one time, however, u.S. करेंसी शामिल पाँच larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 यहूद मुद्रित लिये सामान्य उपयोग, और a $ 100,000 नोट थी मुद्रित लिये निश्चित आतंरिक ट्रांजेक्शन.
British होंडुरास थी a अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश in Central America.
In 1981, the colony gained पूरा स्वतंत्रता, और is अभी the स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of Belize.
पहला colonised by spaniards in the 17th सदी, the territory on the east coast of Central America, south of Mexico, became a British crown colony in 1862.
in 1964, it became a self-governing colony.
Belize became fully स्वतंत्र इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1981.
Belize was the पिछला महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the संयुक्त किंगडम in the Americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel गेहूं, or hulled गेहूं, is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं इससे the fifth millennium BC.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze आयु to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और उत्तरी स्पेन और रै मिला a नई मार्केट as a स्वास्थ्य खाना.
Spelt is sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum ), in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid गेहूं, जिससे अर्थात् it रै छह sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional जासूस निर्मित by लेखक और चिकित्सक सर Arthur Conan Doyle.
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic, holmes is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके कुटिल लॉजिकल तर्क, उसके क्षमता to अपनाना लगभग कोई भेस, और उसके उपयोग of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases.
Holmes, who first appeared in publication in 1887, थी प्रदर्शित in चार novels और 56 छोटी stories.
The first novel, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और the दूसरी, the चिह्न of the चार, in lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in लोकप्रियता साथ the पहला श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां in the strand पत्रिका, शुरूआत साथ a कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां और दो novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927.
The stories cover a काल इससे around 1880 up to 1914.
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer, dr. जॉन H. वाटसन ; दो हैं narrated by holmes खुद ( `` the blanched सिपाही `` और `` the शेर 's माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा in the third person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and `` His Last Bow `` ).
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria स्कॉट `` ), holmes tells वाटसन the प्रमुख स्टोरी इससे उसके यादें, जबकि वाटसन becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The first and fourth novels, A Study in स्कारलेट और the घाटी of भय, प्रत्येक शामिल a long अंतराल of सर्वज्ञ narration recounting कार्यक्रम unknown to either Holmes or Watson.
The United States House of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
the अन्य हाउस is the Senate.
The composition and powers of the House हैं स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट re-pass the विधान साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the चुनावी कॉलेज.
Each U.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is entitled to at least one representative.
The सबसे populous राज्य, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, फिलहाल रै 53 representatives.
The total number of मतदान प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the कक्ष, is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United States Capitol.
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक of जिलेटिन desserts, सहित फल gels, puddings और no-bake मलाई pies.
The brand 's popularity has led to it होने प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक पद लिये जिलेटिन मिठाई आरपार the U.S. and Canada.
Kennywood is an मनोरंजन पार्क स्तिथ in वेस्ट mifflin, पेन्सिलवेनिया, a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग.
The park पहला खोली in 1898 as a `` ट्राली पार्क '' आकर्षण at the end of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew mcswigan और यूँ began the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार for over 100 years.
This परंपरागत मनोरंजन पार्क स्टिल रै structures और यात्राएँ डेटिंग वापस to इसके खोलने and the early 1900s.
Along with Rye playland पार्क, it is एक of तभी दो मनोरंजन पार्क listed in the National Register of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood entertainment कम्पनी, जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood Entertainment is now संचालित by california-based राजमहल entertainment, a subsidiary of parques reunidos, an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मनोरंजन park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of candover निवेश, an निवेश fund based in the UK.
A सोशल सुरक्षा कार्ड जारी by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a now deceased person.
In the United States, a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number issued to U.S. citizens, permanent निवासियों, और अस्थाई ( working ) निवासियों अंतर्गत खण्ड 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the सोशल सुरक्षा अधिनियम, संहिताबद्ध as.
the क्रमांक is जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन, an independent agency of the United States government.
इसके प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social Security क्रमांक may be प्राप्त by applying on रूप ss-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये A Social Security Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes आंदोलनों in विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of आर्ट और डिज़ाइन, विशेषकर विज़ुअल आर्ट और म्यूज़िक, जहाँ the कार्य is नियत आउट to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating all non-essential forms, features or concepts.
Minimalism is any डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल in जिससे the सरलतम और fewest तत्व हैं used to create the maximum effect.
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट, सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी विज़ुअल कला in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated with this movement include Donald Judd, John mccracken, agnes मार्टिन, डान flavin, रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, ऐनी truitt, और फ़्रैंक Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive पहलुओं of modernism, और is प्रायः interpreted as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद and a bridge to Postminimal art practices.
The terms have expanded to encompass a गति in म्यूज़िक जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition और iteration, as in the रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग, टेरी रिले, स्टीव reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम रचनाएं हैं sometimes ज्ञात as प्रणालियों music.
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to इसके अनिवार्य.
It has also been used to describe the plays और novels of सैमुएल beckett, the films of रॉबर्ट bresson, the कहानियां of रेमंड carver, और even the automobile designs of Colin Chapman.
The word was first used in अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी 20th सदी to describe the mensheviks.
In रसायन और भौतिकी, डाल्टन 's विधि ( भी पुकारा डाल्टन 's विधि of आंशिक pressures ) राज्य that the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
इस अनुभवजन्य विधि थी observed by जॉन डाल्टन in 1801 and is related to the ideal gas laws.
mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of गैसों can be पारिभाषित as the संकलन
or
where represent the आंशिक दबाव of प्रत्येक घटक.
It is assumed कि the गैसों do नहीं प्रतिक्रिया with each other
where is the mole fraction of the i-th घटक in the कुल मिश्रण of n components.
The relationship below provides a way to determine the volume आधारित विशेषज्ञता of कोई व्यक्तिगत गैसीय घटक
where is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th component expressed in ppm.
डाल्टन 's विधि is नहीं exactly followed by real gases.
Those deviations हैं considerably विशाल at high pressures.
In such conditions, the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between अणुओं उठाता the तीव्रता of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस अणुओं पर्याप्त to substantially change the pressure exerted by them.
Neither of those प्रभाव हैं माना by the ideal gas model.
This is a list of the largest संयुक्त राज्य कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों by नामांकन for colleges and universities in the United States.
What this सूची शामिलs:
Colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य
University systems if the प्रणाली is चलाएं अंतर्गत a सिंगल administration
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट students
Enrollment is गिने by the एकीकृत post-secondary शिक्षा प्रणाली within the U.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the क्रमांक of अद्वितीय विद्यार्थी जो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों during the year.
What इस सूची करता नहीं include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled विद्यार्थी हैं पूरा or भाग समय ( e.g., कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों may have a ऊँची नामांकन, लकिन have सबसे विद्यार्थी नामांकित in only a single class )

`` सही गोलाकार '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida, released as the lead single from his second studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
The song सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals इससे Kesha.
It was released to रेडियो on 27 जनवरी 2009 और थी डिजिटली released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो लड़के entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically बोलती of flo rida 's जाल बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm, जबकि adapting the कोरस of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the सोंग 's लेखक, the कोरस refers to मौखिक sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the संयुक्त राज्य, दौरान the चलाएं atop the चार्ट, kesha थी uncredited.
The song received mostly negative समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, जो claimed it थी kitsch and misogynistic.
However, it was a commercial success, reaching the शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in उन्नीस देशों विश्वव्यापी.
In the United States, it became Flo Rida 's दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री जब it थी released to डिजिटल रिटेलर.
The single 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो थी निर्देशित by मैल्कम जोन्स और मनोनीत लिये an MTV Video Music Award.
The song has been used in several movies, such as The hangover, the भद्दा सच्चाई और the तेलुगु फिल्म pilla zamindar.
In the movie Pitch पूर्ण, the सोंग is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers.
The मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the judicial branch of the federal government of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate justices of the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य.
From 1789 until 1866, the office was ज्ञात as the मुख्य इंसाफ of the परम् Court.
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country, and acts as a chief administrative अधिकारी लिये the संघीय न्यायालयों और as सिर of the न्यायिक सम्मेलन of the संयुक्त राज्य appoints the निदेशक of the प्रशासनिक दफ्तर of the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों.
The Chief इंसाफ भी serves as a प्रवक्ता for the judicial branch.
The मुख्य इंसाफ लीड the कारोबार of the परम् Court.
he presides over मौखिक वितर्क before the court.
जब the अदालत renders an राय, the मुख्य justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion.
the मुख्य इंसाफ भी रै significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings.
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United States, which has occurred twice, the मुख्य इंसाफ presides over the विचारण in the सीनेट.
In modern tradition, the मुख्य इंसाफ रै the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the शपथ of दफ्तर of the अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The first Chief इंसाफ थी जॉन jay.
The 17th और वर्तमान मुख्य इंसाफ is जॉन G. Roberts, Jr.
Caribou near prudhoe खाड़ी, 1973
prudhoe खाड़ी आयल फ़ील्ड is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on Alaska 's North Slope.
It is the largest आयल फ़ील्ड in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The राशि of recoverable आयल in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than दोगुना कि of the next largest field in the United States, the East Texas oil field.
The field is संचालित by bp ; साझेदार हैं exxonmobil और ConocoPhillips Alaska.
Labor unions are legally पहचाना as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in अनेक उद्योग in the संयुक्त States.
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, and working शर्तें लिये उनके सदस्यता, और on representing उनके सदस्यों in विवादों साथ प्रबन्धन over उल्लंघनों of contract provisions.
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ और electioneering at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger छतरियाँ संगठन : the afl-cio निर्मित in 1955, और the बदलें to जीत संघ जिससे विभाजित इससे the afl-cio in 2005.
दोनो एडवोकेट नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the United States and Canada, and take an active role in politics.
The AFL-CIO is especially चिंतित साथ वैश्विक व्यापार मुद्दे.
In 2010, the प्रतिशत of मजदूर belonging to a संघ in the संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल मजदूर संघ `` घनत्व '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in Finland.
Union membership in the निजी सेक्टर रै गिरे अंतर्गत 7 % — levels not seen since 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited विपक्ष रै contributed to इस मनाही in membership.
The most prominent unions are among पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी ऐसे as शिक्षक और पुलिस.
सदस्यों of संघ हैं disproportionately पुरानी, पुरूष और निवासियों of the पूर्वोत्तर, the Midwest, and California.
Union workers average 10-30 % higher अदा than non-union in अमेरिका बाद controlling लिये व्यक्तिगत, job, and labor market characteristics.
Although much smaller compared to उनके शिखर सदस्यता in the 1950s, अमरीकी संघ remain a prominent राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर, दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना सदस्यताएँ और through coalitions साथ like-minded activist संगठन around मुद्दे ऐसे as immigrant rights, trade policy, health care, and living wage campaigns.
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs, unions are फिलहाल वकालत नई `` कार्ड जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि होता आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to सौदेबाजी साथ a संघ if अधिक than 50 % of मजदूर हस्ताक्षरित forms, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The current procedure involves प्रतीक्षारत 45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally पर्यवेक्षित secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce असमानता, whereas weaker संघ have बना it easier लिये ceos, sometimes working साथ मार्केट शक्तियां कि वे have helped shape, to increase it. ''
The decline in unionization चूंकि wwii in the संयुक्त राज्य रै महरूम संबद्ध with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality.
A ईसाई lacroix फ़ैशन बुटीक
A बुटीक is a छोटी खरीदारी आउटलेट, विशेषकर एक कि specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and jewelry.
The शब्द is फ्रेंच लिये `` दूकान '', via लैटिन from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into रोज अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the लेट 1960s जब, लिये a ब्रैड काल, लंदन थी the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street और the किंग्स सड़क यहूद the फ़ोकस of much मीडिया ध्यान as घर to the सबसे fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as मीनार सेतु सड़क.
It can also refer to a specialised कड़ ऐसे as a बुटीक निवेश बैंको or boutique law firm.
The word is often used to describe a property in the independent section of the hotel मार्केट ( ऐसे as the rockwell in लंदन ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves इससे larger जंजीरों ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In such cases the establishments उद्देश्य to convey the विचार कि the आपरेशन is elite और highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques होता be one-of-a-kind लकिन अधिक generally बोलना, कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if वे specialize in particular शैलियाँ.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market वस्तुएं कि हैं either niche or उत्पादित in intentionally छोटी संख्याएँ at बहुत ऊँची कीमतें.
This may be referred to as बुटीक निर्माण.
For example, before the release of the Wii, a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` बुटीक video-game कम्पनी '', producing खेल लिये niche ऑडियंस, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International is माना as the precursor in निर्माण और बिक्री of bespoke watches.
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique निर्माण साईट, जिससे allows producing छोटी श्रेणी or भी अद्वितीय timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made वस्तुएं और अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं, अन्य बस उपज t-shirts, स्टिकर, and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices.
In the जल्दी 1990s सेलिना प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके own line of women 's clothing.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` सेलिना इत्यादि. बुटीक & सैलून '' एक स्तिथ in कॉर्पस christi और one located in San Antonio, Texas.
One was due to open in Monterrey, मैक्सिको, in 1995 लकिन due to उसके मौत it थी नहीं opened.
Around 1999 the San Antonio स्थान बंद और the कॉर्पस christi स्थान थी closed in 2009.
In late 1990s some European retail traders developed the विचार of tailoring a दूकान towards a जीवनशैली थीम, in the रूप of `` अवधारणा स्टोर्स '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the first अवधारणा स्टोर्स थी 10 कोरसो como in मिलान, इटली followed by Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, and The Gap, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कड़ी billabong और, हालांकि कम आम, रब & टेलर adapted to the अवधारणा स्टोर ट्रेंड after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in वियना, वर्जिनिया, चार्टर्ड और regulated अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the नेशनल क्रेडिट संघ प्रशासन ( ncua ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest प्राकृतिक सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार, दोनो in एसेट आकार और in सदस्यता.
As of September 2012, Navy Federal था over $ 50 अरब usd in एसेट, और over 4 million members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ), known by उसके स्टेज नाम स्टीवी अचरज, is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, a चाइल्ड prodigy जो विकसित into एक of the सबसे रचनात्मक musical आंकड़े of the late 20th century.
Blind चूंकि shortly बाद जनम, अचरज हस्ताक्षरित साथ motown 's tamla लेबल at the आयु of ग्यारह, और continues to perform and record for Motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` अंधविश्वास ``, `` सर ड्यूक ``, `` तुम हैं the सनशाइन of my जीवन `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also शामिल talking किताब, innervisions और गीतों in the कुंजी of Life.
He has recorded more than thirty u.S. शीर्ष टेन हिट्स और प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, the most ever awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is also noted for उसके कार्य as an activist लिये राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी, सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to मेक मार्टिन Luther King, Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States.
In 2009, अचरज थी नामित a संयुक्त राष्ट्र मेसेंजर of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ, with Wonder at number five.
By popular vote, Stevie was inducted into The SoulMusic हॉल of कीर्ति at soulmusic.com in दिसम्बर 2012.
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', for mind/soul, and -ωσις `` -osis '', for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, और is a जेनेरिक मनोरोग पद लिये a दिमागी राज्य प्रायः वर्णित as involving a `` घाटा of contact with reality ``.
People suffering from मनस्ताप हैं वर्णित as psychotic.
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder, दौरान जिससे मति और delusions, सकल उत्तेजना or बेहोशी और impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad और can औसत anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the जटिल और catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder.
moreover a चौड़ी किस्में of सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली रोगों, इससे दोनो बाह्य substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of psychosis.
This led many professionals to कह कि मनस्ताप is नहीं विशिष्ट enough as a diagnostic term.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal बर्ताव ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध प्रकार of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas एक exhibiting बहुत हल्का लक्षण could be वर्गीकृत in the श्रेणी of an `` attenuated psychotic रिस्क सिंड्रोम ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the धनात्मक लक्षण of मनस्ताप, especially those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of these drugs, however, दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between ड्रग और placebo, or a बहुत छोटी प्रभाव आकार, suggesting कि the pathophysiology of मनस्ताप is much अधिक complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing मनस्ताप may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व परिवर्तन और विचार disorder.
Depending on its severity, इस may be accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र बर्ताव, as खूब as परेशानी with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities.
General grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the Star Wars universe.
A पुनरावर्ती विपक्षी, he is the परम् कमांडर of the confederacy of स्वतंत्र प्रणालियों, a राजनैतिक गुट of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber कॉम्बैट by गिनती dooku, he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली योद्धा devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars.
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi देह गिनती होता संकेत the आकाशगंगा to दे उसे the उपनाम the knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the आकाशगंगा दौरान the क्लोन युद्धों जो था मारे the सबसे जेडी in सिंगल कॉम्बैट, he किया नहीं संकोच to flee from battles he knew he would lose.
Statistics play an important role in summarizing बेसबॉल प्रदर्शन और evaluating खिलाड़ी in the खेल.
Since the प्रवाह of a बेसबॉल खेल रै प्राकृतिक ब्रेक to it, और सामान्यतः खिलाड़ी अधिनियम individually rather than performing in clusters, the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball चूंकि the सृष्टि of the नेशनल लीग और अमरीकी League, now part of Major League Baseball.
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball, from लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ of पेशेवर आधार बॉल खिलाड़ी और the नीग्रो लीग.
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts destitute pea pickers in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, centering on फ्लोरेंस ओवेन्स थॉम्पसन, आयु 32, a माँ of सात children, in nipomo, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, March 1936.
USA सालाना रियल जीडीपी इससे 1910–60, साथ the सालो of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the बेरोजगारी रेट in the us 1910–1960, साथ the सालो of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic depression in the दशक preceding संसार युद्ध II.
The timing of the Great Depression varied across nations, but in most countries it started in 1930 और lasted जबतक the लेट 1930s or मध्य 1940s.
It was the longest, सबसे फैली, और deepest अवसाद of the 20th century.
in the 21st सदी, the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly used as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline.
The अवसाद originated in the u.S., बाद the पतन in भण्डार कीमतें कि began around सितंबर 4, 1929, and became worldwide news with the stock market crash of October 29, 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ).
The Great अवसाद था विनाशकारी प्रभाव in countries rich and poor.
Personal income, tax revenue, profits और कीमतें dropped, जबकि अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार plunged by अधिक than 50 %.
बेरोजगारी in the u.S. रोज़ to 25 %, और in कुछ countries rose as high as 33 %.
Cities सब around the संसार यहूद hit मुश्किल, विशेषकर those निर्भर on heavy industry.
निर्माण थी वस्तुतः halted in many countries.
Farming and rural areas suffered as क्रॉप कीमतें गिरी by लगभग 60 %.
Facing plummeting माँग साथ few वैकल्पिक स्त्रोत of कार्य, क्षेत्रों निर्भर on प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग such as cash cropping, mining and logging suffered the most.
Some economies प्रारंभ to रिकवर by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the negative effects of the Great अवसाद lasted जबतक the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also known as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ), ventricular असामयिक ताल ( vpb ), or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ), is a अपेक्षाकृत आम इवेंट जहाँ the धड़कन is initiated by purkinje मछली in the ventricles बल्कि than by the sinoatrial नोड, the सामान्य धड़कन initiator.
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily विशिष्ट इससे a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped ताल `` or लगा as palpitations in the छाती.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles contract after the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can पंप a maximized राशि of रक्त दोनो to the फेफड़े और to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles अनुबंध पहला और पहले the atria have optimally भर the ventricles with blood, which means that circulation is inefficient.
However, single beat PVC arrhythmias do नहीं प्रायः पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William गेरी busey ( born जून 29, 1944 ), बेहतर ज्ञात as गेरी busey, is an American film and stage actor, and artist.
He has appeared in a variety of films, including Lethal Weapon, Point Break, and अंतर्गत घेरा, as खूब as अतिथि दिखावे on gunsmoke, वाकर, टेक्सास रेंजर, विधि & अनुक्रम, और अनुगामी.
He was मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story.
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( acta ), is a बहुराष्ट्रीय सन्धि लिये the purpose of establishing अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों लिये बौद्धिक property rights enforcement.
The agreement aims to establish an अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधिक फ्रेमवर्क लिये लक्ष्यीकरण नकली goods, जेनेरिक दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the अंतरजाल, और होता बनाएँ a नई शासी देह बाहर मौजूदा forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World Intellectual Property Organization, or the United Nations.
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by Australia, Canada, जापानी, मोरक्को, नई जीलैंड, सिंगापुर, दक्षिण कोरियाई, और the संयुक्त राज्य.
In 2012, मैक्सिको, the यूरोपीय संघ और 22 देशों जिससे हैं member states of the European Union signed as well.
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally स्वीकृत ) the अनुबंध, जिससे होता आइये into फ़ोर्स in देशों कि ratified it बाद ratification by six countries.
Supporters have described the agreement as a response to `` the बढ़ाएँ in वैश्विक व्यापार of नकली goods और pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based organizations ऐसे as the गति चित्र संघ of अमेरिका और फार्मास्युटिकल शोध और निर्माताओं of अमेरिका यहूद क्रियाशील in the सन्धि 's विकास.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों कह the सम्मेलन adversely affects आधारभूत rights including freedom of expression and privacy.
ACTA has also been criticised by डॉक्टर बगैर सीमायें लिये endangering अभिगम to दवाइयाँ in developing countries.
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups, developing देशों और the सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it रै महरूम वर्णित as नीति laundering by आलोचकों सहित the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the European पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त मुख्य अन्वेषक, rapporteur कादर आरिफ, as खूब as फैली विरोध आरपार Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, अंग्रेजों mep दाउद मार्टिन, अनुशंसित विरूद्ध the सन्धि, stating : `` the intended benefits of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary सत्र, साथ 478 मतदान विरूद्ध the सन्धि, 39 in पक्ष और 165 MEPs abstaining.
faw semi-trailer truck in China
Tractor with पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A ट्रैक्टर साथ an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer ट्रक साथ स्लीपर पीछे the टैक्सी.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated गाडी कि consists of a towing इंजन, ज्ञात as a ट्रैक्टर in the संयुक्त राज्य और ट्रक in many other places, attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck और ट्रेलर, ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक, 18-wheeler, mack ट्रक, बिग रिग in the संयुक्त राज्य, or artic, छोटी लिये articulated lorry, in Britain and Ireland.
A semi-trailer does not ट्रेल completely पीछे the towing गाडी, लकिन is संलग्न at a पाइंट कि is बस forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
This is done so that a fraction of the वज़न of the ट्रेलर is carried by the prime mover.
This arrangement means that both tractor and semi-trailer will have a distinctly अलग डिज़ाइन than a rigid ट्रक और trailer.
The पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स हैं a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Founded in, the स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest मताधिकार in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl शीर्षक ( छह ), जीती अधिक afc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( आठ ) और निभाई in ( पंद्रह ) और hosted more ( eleven ) conference championship games than any other AFC or NFC team.
The स्टीलर्स share the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे with the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers won उनके सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप, सुपर कटोरी xliii, on फ़रवरी 1, 2009.
The Steelers were founded as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates on जुलाई 8, 1933, by आर्ट रूनी, लेने इसके असली नाम इससे the बेसबॉल टोली of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The ownership of the स्टीलर्स रै remained भीतर the रूनी परिवार since its founding.
The current owner is Art 's बेटे, डान रूनी, जो रै दिए much कंट्रोल of the मताधिकार to उसके son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's फ्लैगशिप टीमों, the स्टीलर्स आनंद a विशाल, फैली fanbase nicknamed steeler स्वदेश.
The Steelers currently play their home games at हाइन्ज़ फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस, जिससे भी होस्ट the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pittsburgh Panthers.
निर्मित in 2001, the स्टेडियम replaced तीन नदियाँ स्टेडियम जिससे hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
Prior to Three Rivers, the स्टीलर्स था निभाई उनके खेल in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three अलग kinds of गेहूं and rye flour
Flour is a चूर्ण जिससे is बना by पीस खाद्यान्न grains, or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ).
It is the main ingredient of bread, which is a staple food for many संस्कृतियों, बनाना the उपलब्धता of पर्याप्त आपूर्तियाँ of आटा a प्रमुख आर्थिक और राजनैतिक समस्या at विभिन्न टाइम्स throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in यूरोपीय, उत्तर अमरीकी, मध्य पूर्वी, भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों, और is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries.
जबकि गेहूं is the सबसे आम आधार लिये आटा, मकई आटा रै महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन times, and remains a staple throughout the Americas.
Rye flour is an important constituent of ब्रैड in much of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय, और राइस can भी be used in flour, though this is relatively uncommon.
Heart rate is the क्रमांक of heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय, typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ).
दिल रेट can vary as the देह 's need to अवशोषित ऑक्सीजन और excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड changes, such as during physical exercise, sleep, illness, or as a result of ingesting drugs :
सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर अजीब ones साथ बराबर अजीब प्रभाव, ऐसे as केटामाइन जिससे can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ).
There are many ways in जिससे the दिल रेट speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the दिमाग, अनेक of जिससे हैं those कि हैं 'forced'/'enticed ' आउट by the ingestion and processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a निरंतर रक्त आवाज़, एक of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार more oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting दिल दरों दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is पारिभाषित as a resting दिल रेट नीचे 60 bpm.
However, heart rates from 50 to 60 bpm हैं आम among स्वस्थ लोगों और do नहीं necessarily require special attention.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting दिल रेट ऊपर 100 bpm, हालांकि persistent बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm, मुख्यतः if वे हैं उपस्थित दौरान नींद, may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ).

A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और सेडान कुर्सियां हैं excluded, चूंकि वे हैं wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी यात्री उपयोग और लिये comfort or elegance, though some are also used to transport goods.
it may be लाइट, smart और तेज़ or भारी, large and comfortable.
Carriages normally have बर्खास्तगी using पत्ता स्रोतों, अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th सदी ) or चमड़े दीर्घकाय.
A public passenger vehicle would नहीं प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the इतिहास of the carriage, as is the तेज़ ( two-wheeled ) रथ.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust भूकंप कि occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे, 26 दिसम्बर 2004, साथ an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is known by the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman earthquake.
The resulting सुनामी थी दिए विभिन्न names, सहित the 2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी, दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी, इंडोनेशियाई tsunami, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर, हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in चौदह देशों, और inundating तटीय समुदायों साथ लहरें up to high.
It was one of the deadliest प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in अंकित history.
इंडोनेशिया थी the hardest-hit देश, followed by श्री Lanka, India, and Thailand.
With a magnitude of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the third largest भूकंप कभी अंकित on a seismograph.
the भूकंप था the longest अवधि of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 and 10 minutes.
It caused the संपूर्ण ग्रह to हिलना as much as और triggered अन्य भूकंप as far away as Alaska.
Its epicentre थी between simeulue और mainland Indonesia.
The plight of the प्रभावित लोगों और देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide community दान अधिक than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam उठती इससे the nesjavellir geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न and stored in the Earth.
थर्मल उर्जा is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके सतह, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The क्रियाशील geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ), अर्थ earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is created by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000 °f ).
Heat conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
the ऊँची तापमान और दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt, बनाना मैग्मा संवहन upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats rock and जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been used for bathing since paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग चूंकि प्राचीन रोमन टाइम्स, लकिन it is अभी बेहतर ज्ञात लिये विद्युत पीढी.
विश्वव्यापी, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, स्पेस हीटिंग, स्पा, औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost प्रभावी, विश्वसनीय, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically महरूम limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग, खोलने a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal कुएं रिलीज ग्रीनहाउस गैसों फंस गहन भीतर the धरती, लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर per energy unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal शक्ति रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
the धरती 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
खुदाई और खोजी लिये गहन resources is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा कीमतें, subsidies, और interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी उर्जा सोर्स जैसे geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग अनुभव, the लागत of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between दो और टेन सेंट प्रति kwh.
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and us प्रथागत ( non- मीट्रिक ) ईकाई of volume, used in the United States and the United Kingdom.
It is defined as the volume of a घन साथ पहलू of एक पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in लंबाई.
To गणना घन फीट गुणा लंबाई X width X height.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc, थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट क्रांतिकारी नेता जो थी प्रधान मंत्री ( 1945–1955 ) और अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
He was a key फिगर in the न्यास of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945, as खूब as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम ( pavn ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the việt मिन्ह स्वतंत्रता गति इससे 1941 onward, establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down इससे शक्ति in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead और प्रेरणा for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united, communist Vietnam—until his death.
After the war, साइगॉन, पूंजी of the गणतंत्र of वियतनाम, was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
सब सड़कें सीसे घर is a विशेषता फिल्मी released on September 26, 2008.
Directed by Dennis Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason London, Vivien Cardone, वैनेसा शाखा, पीटर कायोटी, स्टीफन मिल्टन, और allan Kayser.
The movie was फिल्माया in और around कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी.
The movie बना इसके संसार प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the सांता बारबरा अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film Festival.
The फिल्मी रै भी recently महरूम in अनेक फिल्मी त्यौहार, and has received bad reviews.
पीटर बॉयल died पहले the movie 's release.
It was the पिछला फिल्म he appeared in.
बिक्री कर in the संयुक्त राज्य हैं कर लगाई on the बिक्री or lease of goods and services in the United States.
While no national general sales tax exists, the federal सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the बिक्री or lease of particular goods and services.
Furthermore, forty-five states, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं, and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services.
States may also delegate to लोकल सरकारें the प्राधिकार to थोपने अतिरिक्त सामान्य or चयनात्मक बिक्री taxes.
Sales tax is गणना by multiplying the खरीदें दाम by the applicable tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा इससे कम than 1 % to over 10 %.
बिक्री कर is एकत्रित by the seller at the time of sale.
Use tax is self assessed by a खरीदार जो रै नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री tax on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the value added कर, a बिक्री कर is imposed तभी एकबार, at the खुदरा level.
However, in cases where वस्तुएं हैं बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, ऐसे as प्रयुक्त गाड़ियाँ, the बिक्री कर can be चार्ज on the same item indefinitely.
The definition of retail sales and कया goods और सेवाएं हैं taxable vary among the राज्य.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories of goods and सेवाएं कि हैं exempt इससे बिक्री कर, or taxed at घटाया दरों.
the खरीदें of goods लिये further manufacture or लिये पुनर्विक्रय is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt खाना बेची in किराना स्टोर्स, नुस्खा medications, and many agricultural supplies.
Sales taxes, including those imposed by लोकल सरकारें, हैं generally administered at the राज्य level.
States imposing sales tax require retail विक्रेता to collect कर इससे ग्राहक, संचिका रिटर्न, और remit the कर to the state.
प्रक्रियात्मक नियम vary widely.
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers जबतक the क्रेता provides an exemption certificate.
Most states allow or आवश्यकता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
A central processing ईकाई ( cpu ), भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर ईकाई, is the हार्डवेयर भीतर a कंप्यूटर कि carries आउट the निर्देश of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetical, logical, and input/output operations of the system.
The term has been in use in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at तनिक चूंकि the early 1960s.
The form, design, and implementation of CPUs have बदला over the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास, लकिन उनके आधारभूत operation remains much the same.
A computer can have more than one cpu ; इस is पुकारा multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain अनेक cpu on a सिंगल चिप ; those ics हैं पुकारा multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic and logical परिचालन, और the कंट्रोल ईकाई ( cu ), जिससे extracts निर्देश इससे मेमोरी और decodes और चलाता उन्हें, कॉलिंग on the alu जब necessary.
Not सब कम्प्यूटेशनल प्रणालियों rely on a central processing unit.
An array प्रोसेसर or वेक्टर प्रोसेसर रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग elements, with no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the distributed कम्प्यूटिंग मॉडल, समस्याएं हैं हल by a वितरित interconnected set of processors.
rfid चिप अगला to a अनाज of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान क्रमांक जब queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in उपभोक्ता उत्पाद, और implanted in पालतु, लिये पहचान उद्देश्य.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically भंडारित information.
Some tags are powered और पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a local power source such as a बैटरी, or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of मीटर.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर, और may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked ऑब्जेक्ट.
RFID tags हैं प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके progress through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have टैग injected, allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the एनिमल.
Since rfid टैग can be संलग्न to कपडे, possessions, or भी implanted भीतर लोगों, the सम्भावना of reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns.
Overtime is the राशि of समय किसी works परे normal working hours.
Normal घंटों may be संकल्पित in अनेक ways:
by custom ( what is माना स्वस्थ or उचित by society ),
by practices of a दिए व्यापार or profession,
by legislation,
by अनुबंध between नियोक्ता और मजदूर or उनके representatives.
Most nations have ओवरटाइम मजदूर कानून designed to dissuade or prevent नियोक्ता इससे forcing उनके कर्मचारी to कार्य excessively long hours.
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian, ऐसे as preserving the स्वास्थ्य of मजदूर so कि वे may continue to be उत्पादक, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common approach to regulating overtime is to आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to अदा मजदूर at a उच्चतर hourly रेट लिये ओवरटाइम कार्य.
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if नहीं obliged to do so by विधि, विशेषकर if वे मानना कि वे फेस a पिछड़ा झुकने supply curve of labour.
Overtime pay दरों can कारण मजदूर to कार्य longer घंटों than they would at a flat hourly rate.
Overtime कानून, attitudes toward ओवरटाइम और घंटों of कार्य vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors.
Visualization of कड़ी between पृष्ठों on a विक using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed graph आरेखण algorithms हैं a क्लास of algorithms लिये आरेखण रेखाचित्र in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few क्रासिंग किनारे as संभावित, by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of नोड, आधारित on उनके सापेक्ष स्थितियाँ, और तब using ये शक्तियां either to सिमुलेट the गति of the किनारे और नोड or to minimize their energy.
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, होने शारीरिक simulations, प्रायः आवश्यकता no खास ज्ञान परिचय आलेख सिद्धान्त ऐसे as planarity.
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively पुकारा समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) is the राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be purchased with a unit of currency.
For example, if you had taken one dollar to a स्टोर in the 1950s, तुम होता have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of वस्तुएं than तुम होता आज, indicating कि तुम होता have था a वृहद खरीदना शक्ति in the 1950s.
करेंसी can be either a कमोडिटी धन, like gold or silver, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars.
as आदम स्मिथ विख्यात, having धन देता एक the क्षमता to `` कमांड '' अन्य ' मजदूर, so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is power over other people, to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency.
If one 's monetary आय stays the वही, लकिन the दाम स्तर increases, the purchasing power of that income falls.
Inflation does not सदा imply गिरना खरीदना शक्ति of एक 's धन आय since it may rise faster than the price level.
A higher real income अर्थात् a उच्चतर खरीदना शक्ति चूंकि रियल आय refers to the income adjusted for inflation.
For a price index, its value in the आधार साल is प्रायः सामान्यीकृत to a मान of 100.
The purchasing power of a unit of करेंसी, कह a डालर, in a दिए साल, expressed in डॉलर of the आधार साल, is 100/p, जहाँ p is the दाम अनुक्रमणिका in that year.
So, by definition the purchasing शक्ति of a डालर decreases as the दाम स्तर उदय.
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount c of धन, t सालो into the भविष्य, can be computed साथ the सूत्र for the present value :
where in इस मामला i is an assumed भविष्य annual inflation rate.
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for कामयाबी और प्रतियोगिता is नतीजतन बहुत heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the education of children from किंडरगार्टन to the तीसरा और फाइनल साल of ऊँची स्कूल.
Mathematics, science, कोरियाई, अंग्रेज़ी, और सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally माना to be the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण subjects.
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised, by the generally अकादमिक elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace, as शिक्षा और इसलिए अनेक स्कूलों कमी high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
South Korea was the first country in the world to provide high-speed अंतरजाल अभिगम to सब प्राथमिक, जूनियर, और ऊँची स्कूलों.
Although South Korean students often rank highly on international comparative assessments when compared to विद्यार्थी of सबसे पश्चिमी शिक्षा प्रणालियों, the दक्षिण कोरियाई शिक्षा प्रणाली is criticised लिये emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The दक्षिण कोरियाई शिक्षा प्रणाली is बल्कि notably सख्त और overly संरचित as compared to its counterparts in most Western societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit निजी संस्थान ऐसे as अकादमियों or cram-schools ( hagwon [ 학원 ] ), जिससे too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students are criticised as a major social problem.
The My Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on कूच 16, 1968, by संयुक्त राज्य फौज सैनिको of `` चार्ली '' कम्पनी of 1st बटालियन, 20th infantry रेजीमेंट, 11th Brigade of the Americal Division.
Victims शामिल महिलाओं, मेन, children, और infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly raped prior to the killings.
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially charged with criminal offenses for their क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai, तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट विलियम calley, a प्लाटून नेता in चार्ली कम्पनी, थी convicted.
मिला अपराधी of हत्या 22 ग्रामीणों, he थी originally given a life sentence, but only served three and a half years under house arrest.
The massacre took place in the hamlets of my lai और my khe of बेटे my गाँव.
The इवेंट is भी ज्ञात as the बेटे my नरसंहार, विशेषकर in the Vietnamese state media.
The U.S. सैन्य codeword लिये the `` viet cong stronghold '' थी `` Pinkville ''.
The घटना prompted वैश्विक आक्रोश जब it became पब्लिक knowledge in 1969.
The massacre also increased घरेलू विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी in the Vietnam War.
Three U.S. servicemen जो था आजमाया to halt the नरसंहार और protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced by several U.S. Congressmen as traitors.
They प्राप्त नफ़रत मेल और मौत खतरे और मिला mutilated animals on their doorsteps.
The तीन यहूद बाद widely praised और सजा by the Army for their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the सितंबर 11 हमले यहूद 19 मेन संबद्ध साथ al-qaeda, और 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia.
Others were from मिश्र, लेबनान, और the UAE.
The hijackers यहूद व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों, प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker साथ चार `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' जो यहूद प्रशिक्षित to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the संयुक्त राज्य यहूद खालिद al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi, who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000.
They were followed by तीन hijacker-pilots, मोहम्मद atta, marwan al-shehhi, और ziad jarrah जल्दी in the गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake उड़ान प्रशिक्षण in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in सैन डिएगो in दिसम्बर 2000.
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the वसन्त और जल्दी गर्मियाँ of 2001, बस महीने पहले the सितंबर 11 attacks.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, राजनैतिक, और सैन्य नेता इससे मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by Muslims और bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और नबी of God.
Muhammad is almost universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by परमेश्वर for mankind.
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic आस्था of आदम, नूह, अब्राहम, मूसा, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was orphaned at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of उसके ताऊ abu तालिब.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, और थी पहला शादीशुदा by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported कि it थी वहीँ, at आयु 40, कि he प्राप्त उसके पहला रहस्योद्घाटन इससे परमेश्वर.
तीन सालो बाद इस इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and that he himself थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर, in the वही रग as अन्य इस्लामी नबियों.
Muhammad gained few followers जल्दी on, और थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और his followers were treated harshly.
To escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान of मदीना.
After eight years of fighting with the meccan जनजातियों, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों in पूर्वी अरब.
In 632, a few महीने बाद returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the समय of उसके मौत, सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to Islam, and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity.
The खुलासे ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around जिससे the धर्म is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's जीवन ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of मुहम्मद in मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far less so.
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal रैंक, ऐसे as oldest व्यक्ति or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research, ऐसे as the जराविद्या शोध समूह ( grg ) or गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड.
The longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met विंसेंट वैन gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13.
This led to news media ध्यान in 1985, बाद calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age, beyond any reasonable सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके देशी नगर, arles, फ़्रांस.
अधिक प्रमाण of calment 's जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed जीवनकाल लिये पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon किमुरा, जो currently lives in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the संसार जिनकी आयु can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल 2011.
Since the death of 115-year बूढ़ा koto okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest जीना woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
This is a timeline of the african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति.
The Civil अधिकारों गति थी a स्वतंत्रता संघर्ष by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the गति यहूद स्वतंत्रता इससे पक्षपात, बराबर अवसर in नियुक्ति, शिक्षा और आवास, the सही to vote और equal access to public facilities.
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the संयुक्त किंगडम and in the United States.
With roots in blues rock and साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, the bands कि निर्मित भारी मेटल विकसित a मोटा, विशाल ध्वनि, characterized by highly amplified distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and प्रदर्शन शैलियाँ हैं generally संबद्ध साथ मर्दानगी and machismo.
the पहला भारी मेटल bands ऐसे as led zeppelin, गहन जामुनी और ब्लैक sabbath आकर्षित विशाल ऑडियंस, हालांकि वे यहूद often derided by critics, a status common throughout the history of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence ; motörhead introduced a पंक चट्टान sensibility और an increasing जोर on speed.
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy मेटल ऐसे as आयरन maiden followed in a समान vein.
Before the समाप्त of the दशक, भारी मेटल प्रशंसक became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक फ़ोर्स साथ समूह जैसे Mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme, aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the मुख्यधारा साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका, मेगाडेथ, slayer, और एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि अन्य शैलियाँ of the सबसे चरम subgenres of मेटल जैसे death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles ऐसे as nu मेटल, जिससे प्रायः incorporates तत्व of grunge और हिप हॉप ; और metalcore, जिससे मिश्रणों चरम मेटल साथ हार्डकोर पंक, have further expanded the definition of the genre.
The far-right ( also known as the चरम सही ) refers to the उच्चतम उपाधि of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society, and supports supremacy of certain individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or अस्तबलों जो हैं to be अधिक valued than those deemed to be innately अवर or अवांछनीय.
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक विशेषताएँ of लोगों कि can नहीं be बदला.
This stands as a point of अंतर साथ the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours, ऐसे as आलस्य or decadence, as the primary sources of social inequalities.
the केन्द्र right—unlike the दूर right—claims कि लोगों can समाप्त उनके behavioural inferiority through changing their habits and choices.
The original far right, which emerged in France after the French Revolution, refused to accept the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र और समर्थित a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy.
The far right is commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह जो थाम चरम राष्ट्रवादी, xenophobic, जातिवाद, religious fundamentalist or reactionary views.
The most extreme-right movements have धड़ा दमन और नरसंहार विरूद्ध समूह of लोगों on the आधार of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 दिसम्बर 1679 ), in कुछ पुरानी ग्रन्थ थामस हाब्स of malmsbury, थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस, बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज for his work on political philosophy.
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for सबसे of पश्चिमी राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of सोशल contract theory.
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between सिविल समाज और the राज्य ) ; the दृश्य कि सब legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों ; और a उदार निर्वचन of विधि जिससे पत्ते लोगों फ़्री to do whatever the विधि करता नहीं explicitly forbid.
He was one of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र.
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion, obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion, remains influential ; and his account of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested सहयोग, और of राजनैतिक समुदायों as होने आधारित upon a `` सोशल अनुबंध `` remains एक of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political philosophy, Hobbes also contributed to a विविध सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड, सहित इतिहास, भूगोल, the भौतिकी of गैसों, धर्मशास्त्र, आचार, और general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify, assess, और कंट्रोल the भाव of oneself, of others, and of groups.
It can be divided into क्षमता ei और trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using अधिकतम प्रदर्शन परीक्षण और रै stronger संबंध साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा, whereas trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether ei is a रियल प्रज्ञा और whether it रै वृद्धिशील वैध over IQ and the Big Five personality traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to औलाद इससे इसके अभिभावक or पूर्वज.
This is the process by which an औलाद कोशिका or सजीव acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of its parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate और कारण कुछ प्रजाति to evolve.
The study of आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी, जिससे शामिल the field of epigenetics.
For United States individual आय कर, समायोजित सकल आय ( agi ) is कुल सकल आय minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is समायोजित सकल आय ऋण भत्तों लिये निजी छूटों and itemized deductions.
For most individual tax purposes, agi is अधिक प्रासंगिक than सकल income.
Gross income is sales price of goods or प्रॉपर्टी, ऋण लागत of the प्रॉपर्टी बेची, प्लस other income.
It includes wages, ब्याज, dividends, कारोबार आय, rental आय, और सब other types of income.
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a कारोबार or rental कार्यकलाप और 21 अन्य विशिष्ट वस्तुएं.
Several deductions ( e.g. चिकित्सा खर्च और विविध itemized deductions ) हैं सीमित आधारित on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, including those of lower कर दरों और itemized deductions, हैं आधारित on स्तर of agi.
Many states base state income tax on agi साथ निश्चित deductions.
`` Lazy Eye '' is the तीसरा सिंगल इससे silversun pickups ' डेब्यू एल्बम Carnavas.
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David लेटरमैन, the tonight दिखाएँ साथ jay लीनो, बाद साथ jools Holland, and Last Call with Carson Daly.
the सोंग is a playable track on चट्टान Band 2 and Guitar Hero : World Tour.
An alternate version of the सोंग, साथ a लंबाई of 7:27, थी निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter संस्करण थी played on FM and other XM channels.
