A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone क्रमांक ; in the उत्तर अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश कोड 1 ), it is the पहला तीन अंक of a seven-digit phone number.
In other देशों दोनो the उपसर्ग और the क्रमांक may have different lengths.
It shows जिससे एक्सचेंज the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to.
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( जरूरी लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय काल्स तभी ), क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी लिये काल्स between टेलीफोन क्षेत्रों ), उपसर्ग, and subscriber number.
Some places सीमित निश्चित prefixes to फैक्स संख्याएँ or कोशिका फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान such dedicated prefixes are not used.
As टेलीफोन प्रौद्योगिकी उन्नत, the precise significance of the उपसर्ग became धुंधला in अनेक स्थान ; 485 in लंदन, uk, थी एकबार the gulliver एक्सचेंज, but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many number blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, सुनाया, ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 मधुमेह, in particular, in overweight और मोटे लोगों और those with normal kidney function.
इसके उपयोग in गर्भकालीन मधुमेह has been limited by safety concerns.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary सिंड्रोम, और रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज उत्पादन by the liver.
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that has महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce ldl कोलेस्ट्रॉल और triglyceride स्तर, और is नहीं associated with weight gain.
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन मॉडल सूची of अनिवार्य दवाइयाँ ( the other being glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin causes few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र परेशान ) और is संबद्ध साथ a कम रिस्क of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious चिंता in overdose और जब it is विहित to लोगों साथ contraindications, लकिन वरना, there is no significant risk.
First synthesized and found to reduce blood शुगर in the 1920s, metformin थी forgotten लिये the अगला दो दशकों as शोध shifted to इंसुलिन और अन्य antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several रिपोर्ट्स कि it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों, और in 1957, फ्रेंच चिकित्सक जां sterne प्रकाशित the पहला नैदानिक विचारण of metformin as a treatment for diabetes.
it थी introduced to the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1958, Canada in 1972, and the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the सबसे widely विहित antidiabetic ड्रग in the संसार ; in the संयुक्त राज्य अलोन, अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of माउंट rushmore निकट keystone, दक्षिण डकोटा, in the संयुक्त राज्य.
sculpted by danish-american gutzon borglum और उसके बेटे, lincoln borglum, माउंट rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln.
the संपूर्ण मेमोरियल कवर और is ऊपर sea level.
The tallest पहाड़ in the प्रदेश is Harney Peak ( ).
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is credited with conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of प्रसिद्ध लोगों into the ब्लैक पहाड़ियाँ प्रदेश of दक्षिण डकोटा in अनुक्रम to प्रचार पर्यटन in the region.
Robinson 's initial विचार थी to sculpt the needles ; however, gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the needles site because of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location, which also has the लाभ of facing southeast लिये अधिकतम सूर्य एक्सपोज़र.
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red बादल और भैंस विधेयक कोड़ी लकिन borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस, और chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों जिनकी likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, निर्माण on the मेमोरियल began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
Upon Gutzon borglum 's मौत in कूच 1941, उसके बेटे lincoln borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for each president to be चित्रित इससे सिर to कमर, कमी of funding मजबूर निर्माण to end in late October 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took कंट्रोल of the मेमोरियल in 1933, जबकि it थी स्टिल अंतर्गत निर्माण, और has managed the memorial to the present day.
It attracts nearly तीन लाख लोगों annually.
Charvet dress shirt इससे the 1930s, norsk folkemuseum, Oslo.
A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर, a full-length खोलने at the सामने इससे the कॉलर to the हेम, and sleeves with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly प्रयुक्त by मेन, चूंकि women usually wear blouses.
The सामने खोलने is fastened using बटन or studs, और the cuffs close with buttons or cuff links.
शर्ट हैं सामान्यतः बना इससे woven cloth, और हैं प्रायः accompanied by a जैकेट और टाई, लिये example with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are also worn more casually.
In British English, पोशाक कमीज़ अर्थात् specifically the अधिक औपचारिक संध्या परिधान worn साथ black- or white- टाई, भी discussed below.
Some of these formal शर्ट have stiff fronts और detachable छल्लों attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened bas by बटन ) is sometimes प्रयुक्त in गलती to लागू to सब शर्ट ( साथ or बगैर buttoned bas छल्लों ), होने प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, प्रशासनिक assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In उत्तर अमेरिका, it is मनाये on the बुधवार of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the classical फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल, हालांकि he खर्च सबसे of उसके working जीवन in Rome.
His work is characterized by स्पष्टता, लॉजिक, और अनुक्रम, and favors line over color.
Until the 20th century he remained a प्रमुख प्रेरणा लिये ऐसे classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as jacques-louis दाउद, Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere, मगर लिये a छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered उसे वापस to फ़्रांस to serve as First Painter to the King.
सबसे of उसके works हैं इतिहास paintings of धार्मिक or mythological subjects that very often have a large landscape element.

Whitley 's ब्रैड करियर in मुख्यधारा देश म्यूज़िक lasted इससे 1984 जबतक उसके मौत in 1989, but he continues to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters.

A statute is a औपचारिक लिखा enactment of a विधान प्राधिकार कि governs a state, city, or county.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit कुछ, or घोषित policy.
The word is often प्रयुक्त to फर्क विधि बना by विधान लाशें इससे मामला विधि, decided by courts, and regulations issued by government agencies.
statutes हैं sometimes referred to as विधान or `` black letter law. ''
As a सोर्स of विधि, statutes हैं माना प्राथमिक प्राधिकार ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes जरूर be in सामंजस्य साथ the आधारभूत law of the land ( constitutional ).
इस शब्द is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the common law.
Statutes acquire their फ़ोर्स इससे the समय of उनके ड्योढ़ी, however जबतक otherwise provided.
statutes हैं of अनेक kinds ; namely, Public or private.
declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is एक जिससे is सीमित in इसके duration at the time of its enactment.
It continues in फ़ोर्स जबतक the समय of इसके limitation रै समाप्त, जबतक sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is एक लिये the फिराकर of जिससे वहीँ is no सीमित समय, हालांकि it may not be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई तभी, the former will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be सहमत upon by the उच्चतम कार्यपालिका in the सरकारी, और आखिरकार प्रकाशित as part of a code.
In many countries, statutes are organized in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications पुकारा कोड, ऐसे as the United States Code.
In many राष्ट्र statutory विधि is विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ to constitutional law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries जिससे bifurcate बंद the आम iliac धमनियों अग्रवर्ती to the sacroiliac संयुक्त of the pelvis.
वे proceed अग्रवर्ती और अवर साथ the medial border of the psoas major muscles.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior और अवर to the वंक्षण स्नायु परिचय एक तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट पाइंट of the वंक्षण ligament on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the धमनी प्रयुक्त to संलग्न the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a digital distribution, digital rights प्रबन्धन, एकाधिक और संचार मंच विकसित by वाल्व निगम.
It is used to distribute games and सम्बन्धित मीडिया ऑनलाइन, इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र डेवलपर to larger तन्त्र घरों ; in अक्तूबर 2012, वाल्व विस्तारित the सेवा to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर, जातियाँ सुविधाएँ ऐसे as मित्रों सूचियाँ और समूह, बादल छायांकन, और in-game आवाज़ और गपशप functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming interface, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software products, सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा, नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking, in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions, और support लिये user-created सामग्री through भाप कार्यशाला.
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft खिड़कियाँ, the क्लाएंट रै विस्तारित to शामिल os x और लिनक्स संस्करण, और क्लाइंट साथ सीमित कार्यक्षमता on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices.
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software, वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of भाप साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be प्रयुक्त in स्कूलों for educational software, including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games available through भाप, और 54 लाख क्रियाशील user accounts.
As of January 2013, भाप रै देखी over 6.6 लाख संयुक्त players.
Steam has an अनुमानित 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट for video games.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी इससे the walschaerts वाल्व गियर of a भाप locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य, कर्ता, singer, film producer, screenwriter and film director.
He is known for his slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, स्टेज और radio.
He was originally युग्म up साथ डीन मार्टिन in 1946, forming the famed कॉमेडी टोली of Martin and Lewis.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work, वे स्ट्रक्चर in a कामयाब श्रेणी of कॉमेडी films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and स्थिति as नेशनल अध्यक्ष लिये the muscular dystrophy संघ ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार, लॉस एंजिल्स फिल्मी आलोचकों संघ, और वेनिस फिल्मी पर्व, and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he received the राज्यपालों पुरस्कार of the अकादमी of टेलीविज़न कला & sciences फलक of Governors, which is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On February 22, 2009, the अकादमी of गति चित्र कला और sciences awarded लुईस the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी in यूरोपीय, at परिचय, साथ an औसत निर्वहन of अधिक than.
The राइन और the डेन्यूब formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन साम्राज्य और, चूंकि those दिनों, the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a रक्षात्मक विशेषता और रै महरूम the आधार लिये क्षेत्रीय और international borders.
The many castles and प्रागैतिहासिक fortifications साथ the राइन गवाही to its importance as a waterway.
River traffic could be रोका at ये स्थितियाँ, प्रायः लिये the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state that controlled that portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), भी transliterated as sree or shri or श्री is a शब्द of संस्कृत उत्पत्ति, प्रयुक्त in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र रूप of पता equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language, or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ).
Design of complex structures like the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना of संरचनात्मक विश्लेषण.
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the शारीरिक और naturally निर्मित पर्यावरण, सहित works जैसे सड़कें, पुलों, नहरों, dams, और buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी, और it थी पारिभाषित to फर्क non-military अभियान्त्रिकी इससे सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental अभियान्त्रिकी, भूतकनीकी अभियान्त्रिकी, भूभौतिकी, भूगणित, कंट्रोल अभियान्त्रिकी, संरचनात्मक अभियान्त्रिकी, biomechanics, nanotechnology, परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती विज्ञान, वायुमंडलीय sciences, forensic अभियान्त्रिकी, नगरपालिका or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी, जल resources engineering, materials engineering, coastal engineering, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the पब्लिक सेक्टर इससे नगरपालिका through to नेशनल सरकारें, और in the निजी सेक्टर इससे व्यक्तिगत homeowners through to international companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) थी an अमरीकी नर्तकी, कोरियोग्राफर, लेखक, educator, and social activist.
Dunham had one of the most successful dance careers in American and European थिएटर of the 20th सदी, और निर्देशित उसके अपना नृत्य company for many years.
वो रै महरूम पुकारा the `` matriarch और महारानी माँ of black dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, Dunham was प्रसिद्ध throughout यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका और थी widely लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ the वॉशिंगटन Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great ''.
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham नृत्य कम्पनी, the तभी self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at कि समय, and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
Dunham थी an innovator in african-american आधुनिक नृत्य as खूब as a नेता in the field of dance anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly पुकारा peat मॉस due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can स्टोर जल, चूंकि दोनो जीना और मुर्दे पौधे can थाम विशाल quantities of जल अंदर उनके कोशिकाएं ; plants may hold from 16-26 times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species.
The empty cells help retain जल in drier शर्तें.
Hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier शर्तें, forming larger peatlands, both raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations then provide आवास लिये a चौड़ी सरणी of peatland पौधे, सहित sedges and ericaceous shrubs, as well as orchids and carnivorous plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed इससे it do नहीं क्षय readily क्युकी of the phenolic यौगिकों अंतःस्थापित in the moss 's cell walls.
In addition, bogs, like all वेटलैंड्स, develop अवायवीय मृदा शर्तें, जिससे produces धीमा अवायवीय क्षय बल्कि than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can also acidify its परिवेश by लेने up cations, ऐसे as कैल्सियम और मैग्नीशियम, और releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the सही शर्तें, peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters.
अलग प्रजाति of sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता हद for flooding and pH, so any one peatland may have a number of different Sphagnum species.
Individual peat moss plants consist of a प्रमुख स्टेम, साथ tightly arranged क्लस्टर of शाखा fascicles प्रायः consisting of दो or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches.
The top of the plant, or capitulum, रै कॉम्पैक्ट क्लस्टर of young branches.
साथ the स्टेम हैं बिखरे पत्ते of विभिन्न आकार, नामित स्टेम पत्ते ; the shape varies according to species.
The पत्ते consist of दो kinds of कोशिकाएं ; छोटी, ग्रीन, जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose cells ), and large, clear, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
the latter have the large water-holding capacity.
The earliest version of the संजाल कार्ड, जारी हस्तचालित बल्कि than through an APTIS machine.
the पहला aptis संस्करण of the Network Card.
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 जबतक खूब into the 1990s, as स्टॉक्स था to be प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare condition in 2002 resulted in a नाबालिग बदलें : the रेड `` r '' shows कि इस is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is स्टिल in उपयोग as of 2007.
The Network Railcard is a discount कार्ड introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल, upon the सृष्टि of उनके संजाल southeast area around London, England.
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by rail by offering discounts लिये वयस्कों और accompanying children on a चौड़ी दायरा of off-peak किराए.
The range of discounts available, and the price of the कार्ड, have varied चूंकि कि समय, लकिन the कार्ड रै सदा महरूम मान्य लिये a साल 's असीमित use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or रेल नियुक्त सफर एजेंट, by completing an अनुप्रयोग रूप - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or अन्य दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to buy or use the card.
It is one of a number of concessionary किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों railway system.
The United Nations ( UN ; French : संगठन देस राष्ट्र unies, onu ) is the संसार 's largest, foremost, और most prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating सहयोग in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि, अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा, आर्थिक विकास, सोशल प्रगति, इंसान अधिकारों, सिविल अधिकारों, सिविल लिबर्टीज, राजनैतिक freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War ii to बदलें the लीग of राष्ट्र, to रोकें युद्धों between देशों, और to provide a मंच for dialogue.
it contains अनेक subsidiary संगठन to carry out its missions.
At its founding, the un था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011, there are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and its specialized एजेंसियों decide on सत्य और प्रशासनिक मुद्दे in नियमित बैठक आयोजित throughout the year.
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the सुरक्षा परिषद ( लिये deciding निश्चित रिज़ॉल्यूशन लिये सलाम और सुरक्षा ) ; the आर्थिक और सोशल परिषद ( लिये assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और सोशल सहयोग और विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( लिये providing अध्ययन, सूचना, और सुविधाएं needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent un प्रणाली एजेंसियों शामिल the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ), the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of secretary-general जिससे रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon of दक्षिण Korea since 2007.
The संयुक्त राष्ट्र मुख्यालय resides in अंतरराष्ट्रीय territory in नई यॉर्क नगर, साथ further main offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
The organization is financed from assessed और voluntary योगदान इससे इसके सदस्य राज्य, और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the city of Miami बीच, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य, स्तिथ due ईस्ट of मियामी नगर उचित between biscayne खाड़ी और the अटलांटिक Ocean.
The क्षेत्रफल encompasses सब of the अवरोध आइलैंड्स of Miami Beach south of Indian Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, धन्यवाद to the विकास प्रयत्न of कार्ल G. फिशर, the lummus भाइयो, और जॉन S. कॉलिन्स, the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the कॉलिन्स सेतु provided the पहला vital जमीन link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has gone through numerous artificial and प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन over the सालो, सहित a booming क्षेत्रीय अर्थव्यवस्था, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
As of 2010, परिचय 39,186 निवासियों सजीव in South Beach.
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी मनोनीत John F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, was not eligible for re-election बाद सेवारत the अधिकतम दो शर्तें अनुमत by the twenty-second amendment.
Kennedy was निर्वाचित साथ a सीसे of 112,827 मत, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving उसे a विजय of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first चुनाव in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान संयुक्त राज्य participated.
a क्रमांक of कारकों बताइये क्यों the election was so close.
Kennedy gained since वहीँ थी an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन, और he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained among protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's जोर on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न, और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy प्रयुक्त उसके विशाल, well-funded अभियान संगठन to जीत the नामांकन, सुरक्षित समर्थन, और, साथ the सहायता of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on कार्यशील mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और used television effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. इतिहास कि दो बैठे u.s. सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और जॉनसन ) यहूद निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष और vice-president, a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया once, by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
A poster for a c. 1884 अमरीकी उत्पादन of मैकबेथ, अभिनीत थामस W. keene.
Depicted, counter clockwise इससे top-left, हैं : मैकबेथ और banquo मिलें the witches ; बस बाद the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a play लिखा by विलियम शेक्सपियर.
It is considered एक of उसके darkest और सबसे शक्तिशाली tragedies.
नियत in स्कॉटलैंड, the खेल dramatizes the corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित जब its protagonist, the Scottish lord Macbeth, chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power.
He commits regicide to become king and then furthers his moral descent with a reign of murderous आतंक to रहो in शक्ति, आखिरकार plunging the देश into सिविल युद्ध.
In the समाप्त, he loses सबकुछ कि देता अर्थ और purpose to उसके life before losing his life itself.
The play is believed to have been लिखा between 1603 और 1607, और is सबसे commonly दिनाँक 1606.
The earliest account of a प्रदर्शन of कया थी संभवतः शेक्सपियर 's खेल is अप्रैल 1611, जब साइमन forman अंकित seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
It was first published in the folio of 1623, संभवतः from a prompt book.
It was most likely written during the reign of James i, जो था महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he succeeded to the अंग्रेज़ी सिंहासन in 1603.
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company, and of all the plays Shakespeare लिखा दौरान james’s शासनकाल, मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s संबंध साथ the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, और tells the स्टोरी of a वीर स्कॉटिश सामान्य नामित मैकबेथ जो receives a prophecy इससे a तिकड़ी of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland.
Consumed by महत्वाकांक्षा और spurred to कार्रवाई by उसके बीवी, मैकबेथ हत्याएं किंग डंकन और takes the throne for himself.
His शासनकाल is racked साथ guilt और paranoia, और he जल्द becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, दीवानगी, और death.
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the खाता of किंग मैकबेथ of स्कॉटलैंड, macduff, और डंकन in holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ), a इतिहास of इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries, although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of थिएटर, कुछ मानना कि the खेल is शापित, और होगा नहीं जिक्र इसके शीर्षक aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many centuries, the खेल रै आकर्षित कुछ of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं to the roles of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth.
It has been adapted to film, टेलीविज़न, ओपेरा, novels, कॉमिक किताबे, and other media.
The Milton Hershey School is a private परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12 ) बोर्डिंग स्कूल in hershey, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial स्कूल, the संस्था थी संस्थापित और वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey और उसके बीवी, कैथरीन Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally established for impoverished, स्वस्थ, caucasian, पुरूष अनाथ, जबकि आज it serves विद्यार्थी of विभिन्न पृष्ठभूमि.
The मिल्टन hershey स्कूल विश्वास, जिससे निधि the स्कूल, owns controlling ब्याज in the hershey कम्पनी और owns the hershey entertainment and Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees many of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six billion dollars in assets, the Milton hershey स्कूल is एक of the wealthiest स्कूलों in the संसार.
The school is overseen by a फलक of Managers.
The school फिलहाल serves 1,818 विद्यार्थी, और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 विद्यार्थी by 2013.
A member of CORE : Coalition for आवासीय शिक्षा, it is the largest आवासीय शिक्षा program in the US.

EPUB, a फ़्री और खोलें e-book मानक
Electronic आलेख, आलेख in scholarly जर्नल्स or मैगज़ीन कि can be पहुँचा via इलेक्ट्रॉनिक transmission
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The Act also परोसा as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be शामिल in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Second-language acquisition or second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों सीख a second language.
Second-language acquisition ( often abbreviated to sla ) भी refers to the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन devoted to studying that process.
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a व्यक्ति 's पहला भाषा ; हालांकि the अवधारणा is नामित second-language अधिग्रहण, it can भी चरितार्थ the learning of third, fourth, or subsequent languages.
second-language अधिग्रहण refers to कया learners do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic discipline of second-language अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics.
It is broad-based and relatively new.
As well as the various branches of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language अधिग्रहण is भी closely सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान, cognitive psychology, and education.
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself, the terms second-language अधिग्रहण शोध, second-language अध्ययन, और second-language अधिग्रहण अध्ययन are also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field, और क्युकी of इस it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting date.
However, it करता appear to have विकसित a ग्रेट सौदे चूंकि the mid-1960s.
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the सीखना प्रक्रम, लकिन in हाल सालो सीखना और acquisition have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate विरासत भाषा सीखना, लकिन it करता नहीं usually incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as होने the समाप्त परिणाम of सीखना a भाषा, नहीं the प्रक्रम itself, और देखिए the पद as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in fields such as शिक्षा और मनोविज्ञान, however, प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism.
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign language ; rather, the learning of second भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the वही आधारभूत प्रक्रियाओं in अलग हालातs..
There has been much बहस परिचय exactly कैसा भाषा is सीखे, और अनेक issues are still unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, but none हैं स्वीकृत as a पूरा स्पष्टीकरण by सब sla शोधकर्ताओं.
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the field of second-language अधिग्रहण, इस is नहीं अपेक्षित to happen in the foreseeable future.
फोर्ब्स सूची of अरबपतियों is an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's wealthiest लोगों, compiled और प्रकाशित by Forbes, an American national business magazine.
the कुल जाल लायक of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत on the सूची is estimated, in United States dollars, based on their assets and accounting for debt.
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a सिंगल दिन, due to रोज़ fluctuations among एक्सचेंज दरों और भण्डार valuations.
The संयुक्त राज्य रहस्य सेवा is a u.S. संघीय विधि प्रवर्तन agency that is part of the United States Department of Homeland Security.
the sworn सदस्यों हैं विभाजित among the खास एजेंटों and the Uniformed Division.
Until March 1, 2003, the सेवा थी भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the Treasury.
The U.S. रहस्य सेवा रै दो पृथक areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering missions such as prevention and छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी और u.S. राजकोष प्रतिभूति, and investigation of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders और उनके परिवारों, ऐसे as the अध्यक्ष, पास्ट राष्ट्रपतियों, वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों, अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of राज्य, और विदेशी embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
The रहस्य सेवा 's आरंभिक जिम्मेदारी थी to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी, which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
The agency तब विकसित into the संयुक्त राज्य ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा और counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ), ब्यूरो of दारू, तम्बाकू, firearms और विस्फोटक ( atf ), आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन ( बर्फ ), और आतंरिक Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a सोंग लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और फ्रेड फोस्टर, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after उसके मौत, बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी posthumous number-one सिंगल in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास बाद `` ( sittin ' on ) the डॉक of the खाड़ी `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; जनवरी 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), भी ज्ञात by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित to अधिक than दो शर्तें, he निर्मित a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932, as उसके घरेलू policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम, fdr पराजित incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the नेशनल spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii, और restoring समृद्धि to the स्वदेश 's economy.
In his first hundred days in दफ्तर, जिससे began कूच 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan रूढ़िवादी गठबन्धन कि formed in 1937 prevented उसके पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended परिचय 1975–85, मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग, which still exists.
साथ साथ अनेक छोटी कार्यक्रम, प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese आक्रमण of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी, fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal थी to मेक अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, रूज़वेल्ट, साथ congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease सहायता to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड युद्ध प्रयत्न.
As an active military leader, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the world 's first atom bomb.
in 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers, और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन भी लिये दशकों afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the पांचवां Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor संघ, बिग नगर मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और rural white Southerners.
He also बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ साथ अब्राहम lincoln और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी left of center. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, मारा, और ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह कि originated in लॉस एंजिल्स और रै स्प्रेड to अन्य parts of the United States, Canada, Mexico, and Central America.
The majority of the gang is ethnically रचित of सेंट्रल अमेरिकी और क्रियाशील in शहरी और suburban areas.
In the U.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी, वर्जिनिया, मोंटगोमरी काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, और प्रिंस जार्ज 's काउंटी, मेरीलैंड ; long द्वीप, नई यॉर्क ; the बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स क्षेत्रफल ; शेर्लोट, उत्तर कैरोलिना ; और ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास.
There is also a presence of ms-13 in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो, कनाडा.
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the देह और भी प्रायः the फेस, as खूब as the उपयोग of उनके अपना चिह्न भाषा.
They are notorious for उनके उपयोग of हिंसा और a subcultural moral कोड कि predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions.
This क्रूरता of the विशिष्ट सदस्यों of the `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें a पाथ to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border.
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन, जो have initiated wide-scale छापे विरूद्ध ज्ञात और suspected गिरोह सदस्यों – netting सैंकड़ों of रखवाले आरपार the देश.
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the United States on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic मानवशास्त्र और forensic पुरातत्व, साथ प्रत्येक एपीसोड focusing on an एफबीआई मामला संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains brought by एफबीआई खास एजेंट seeley बूथ ( दाउद boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The rest of the main cast शामिल michaela conlin, T. J. thyne, eric millegan, tamara टेलर, Jonathan Adams, and John Francis Daley.
Created by Hart Hanson, the श्रेणी is बहुत loosely आधारित on the जीवन और कृतियाँ of उपन्यासकार और forensic anthropologist कैथी reichs, जो भी produces the show.
Its शीर्षक अक्षर, temperance ब्रेनन, is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series.
Conversely, Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों ब्रह्मांड ) forensic anthropologist नामित कैथी reichs.
Bones is a joint production by Josephson entertainment, दूर फ़ील्ड प्रोडक्शन्स और 20th सदी फॉक्स टेलीविज़न.
The series has completed airing its आठवीं ऋतु और रै महरूम नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं ऋतु.
Super Bowl XXV was an American football खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन भैंस बिल्स और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियन New York Giants to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season.
The Giants defeated the Bills by the score of 20–19, जीतना उनके दूसरी कभी Super Bowl.
It is the तभी सुपर कटोरी decided by one point.
The game was held at tampa स्टेडियम in tampa, फ्लोरिडा, on जनवरी 27, 1991, during the height of the Gulf War.
it थी यूँ निभाई अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The star-spangled ध्वज `` by व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन दौरान the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making उनके पहला सुपर कटोरी रूप बाद finishing the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 13-3 रिकार्ड, और अग्रणी the लीग in total points scored with 428.
In advancing to उनके दूसरी सुपर कटोरी, the दिग्गज भी posted a 13-3 नियमित ऋतु record, but with a ball-control offense and a defense that allowed a league low 211 points.
The game is best remembered for Bills placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य attempt जिससे गई चौड़ी सही of the uprights, अग्रणी to a दिग्गज विजय, and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
The Giants set a Super Bowl रिकार्ड पकड़कर कब्ज़ा of the बॉल for 40 minutes and 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि खपत a सुपर कटोरी record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants कार्यशील वापस ottis एंडरसन, जो carried the बॉल 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 गज and one touchdown, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He was the first awardee to receive the newly named `` Pete Rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( नामित लिये the पूर्व कमिश्नर ).
Anderson भी अंकित एक रिसेप्शन लिये सात yards.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of अश्वेतों, a man जो indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक Americans.
Detractors अभियुक्त उसे of उपदेश जातिवाद, ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता, and violence.
He has been called one of the महानतम और सबसे influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it थी rumored—when he थी यंग, और at तनिक एक of उसके uncles थी lynched.
When he was 13, his माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, और he थी लगाई in a श्रेणी of foster homes.
in 1946, at आयु 20, he गई to prison for breaking and entering.
In prison, मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952, he जल्दी rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, मैल्कम x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in अफ़्रीकी और the मध्य ईस्ट, he लौटे to the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of islam, he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over समय.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans —in कंट्रास्ट to the सिविल अधिकारों गति 's जोर on संयोजन.
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` i किया अनेक बाते as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ, he जारी to emphasize pan-africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
The third season of 90210, an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, premiered on सोमवार सितंबर 13, 2010.
The CW officially नवीनीकृत the दिखाएँ लिये a तीसरा ऋतु on फ़रवरी 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the networks fall 2010 schedule, they घोषित उनके निर्णय to मूव 90210 to सोमवार नाइट्स at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to गपशप Girl.
It premiered on September 13, 2010 और थी मिले साथ generally धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ from critics.
The season picks up at the समाप्त of गर्मियाँ और focuses on the students senior year of high school.
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame, a new relationship between चांदी और navid और a उलझन टेडी जो decides to खुलासा to उसके परिवार और friends he is gay.
It भी सौदे साथ the aftermath of Naomi Clark 's assault.
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes, ट्रिस्टन wilds, annalynne mccord, रयान eggold, जेसिका stroup, माइकल steger, जेसिका lowndes, Matt Lanter, Gillian Zinser, Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin.
Rebecca sinclair जारी उसके भूमिका as कार्यपालिका निर्माता for the season.
The season premiered to 1.96 लाख दर्शक और a 0.9 दरजा in the adults 18–49 demographic.
christmas-themed एपीसोड `` अवकाश दीवानगी '', hit ऋतु highs in सब कुंजी demos साथ 2.1 in the cw 's निशाना डेमो of महिलाओं 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It was also the most देखी एपीसोड in over a साल साथ 2.2 लाख viewers tuning in.
The ऋतु finale aired on May 16, 2011.
The season averaged 1.75 million live दर्शक और a 0.9 वयस्कों 18–49 दरजा.
It was released on DVD in the United राज्य on अगस्त 30, 2011.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, और सिर of the 54-member राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र.
She is परम् राज्यपाल of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms became republics.
at उपस्थित, in जोड to the पहला चार aforementioned देशों, एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned longer at over 63 years.
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन and educated privately at home.
Her पिता acceded to the सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड VIII, from which time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake पब्लिक कर्तव्य दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married प्रिंस फिलिप, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग, साथ जिसको वो रै चार children : चार्ल्स, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her राजतिलक सेवा took प्लेस in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's अनेक ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional परिवर्तन in उसके realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ, रब माउंटबेटन, the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and रिपब्लिकन sentiments, लकिन support लिये the साम्राज्य और उसके निजी popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took place on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as खूब as सब चुनावों to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections.
Republican Marco Rubio, former Speaker of the Florida House of प्रतिनिधि, पराजित स्वतंत्र चार्ली crist और डेमोक्रेट kendrick नम्र in a three-way race.
एक पद सीनेटर mel मार्टिनेज थी निर्वाचित in a बहुत बंद race against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
Martinez announced on December 2, 2008 कि he होता नहीं तलाश re-election to the सीनेट, and would resign prior to the end of his term.
In August 2009, Governor Charlie Crist announced that he would नियुक्त उसके पूर्व मुख्य of स्टाफ, जार्ज lemieux, a रिपब्लिकन, to the सीनेट सीट being vacated by Martinez.
Governor Crist सरेआम घोषित he थी कार्यशील लिये the seat in mid-2009.
At the time he received many Republican endorsements, such as the National रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी, मार्टिनेज, और the 2008 रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय nominee जॉन McCain.
His support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 ठेस उसके लोकप्रियता among conservatives, and candidate Marco Rubio surged.
In April 2010 Crist announced he would drop out of the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक और चलाएं as an स्वतंत्र.
The National Republican senatorial कमेटी withdrew इसके समर्थन of crist और मांगे a refund of its campaign funds that it provided for the Crist campaign.
कांग्रेसी kendrick नम्र थी the पहला डेमोक्रेट to declare his intention to run.
Alexander snitker थी the पहला सदस्य of the libertarian पार्टी on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history.
उपग्रह दृश्य of दोहा
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the राज्य of क़तर.
स्तिथ on the coast of the पारसी Gulf,
it had a जनसांख्यिकी of 998,651 in 2008, और is भी एक of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is Qatar 's largest नगर, साथ over 60 % of the स्वदेश 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding suburbs, and is also the economic centre of the country.
Doha also serves as the seat of सरकारी of क़तर, जिससे is शासित by शेख़ हमद बिन खलीफा al Thani.
Doha is home to the शिक्षा नगर, an क्षेत्रफल devoted to शोध और education.
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level बैठक of the दोहा विकास Round of World Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian खेल, जिससे थी the largest एशियाई खेल कभी आयोजित.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan अरब खेल और सबसे of the खेल at the 2011 afc एशियाई Cup.
Doha hosted the UNFCCC जलवायु negotiations ( cop 18 ) दिसम्बर 2012 और होगा मेजबान a विशाल क्रमांक of the venues लिये the 2022 फीफा World Cup.
the संसार पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the 20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011.
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( ऊर्ध्वहनु साइनस ), ऊपर the आँखें ( frontal साइनस ), between the आँखें ( ethmoid साइनस ), और पीछे the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The साइनस हैं नामित लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे they are located.
Lean manufacturing, lean enterprise, or lean production, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for कोई लक्ष्य अन्य than the सृष्टि of मान लिये the समाप्त ग्राहक to be अपव्यय, and thus a target for elimination.
Working from the perspective of the customer जो consumes a उत्पाद or सेवा, `` मान '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a ग्राहक होता be willing to pay for.
Essentially, lean is centered on preserving मान साथ कम कार्य.
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota Production System ( tps ) ( hence the पद toyotism is भी प्रचलित ) और पहचाना as `` झुकना '' तभी in the 1990s.
TPS is renowned for its focus on कटौती of the असली टोयोटा सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक value, but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved.
The steady growth of टोयोटा, इससे a छोटी कम्पनी to the संसार 's largest automaker, रै केन्द्रित ध्यान on कैसा it रै हासिल इस success.
icarly लोगो
iCarly is an American sitcom that airs on निकलोडियन, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far ऐसे as `` ido '', `` ihire an idiot '', `` ipity the nevel '', `` idate sam & फ्रेडी '', इत्यादि. as specials, despite उनके होने regular episodes.
प्रत्येक एपीसोड शीर्षक begins साथ a निम्नतर मामला i which represents the internet, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show was nominated for an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया children 's कार्यक्रम in 2009.
The series starring मिरांडा cosgrove as कार्ली शे, a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star.
the श्रेणी ended on नवम्बर 23, 2012 with the one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye ''.
A total of 7 seasons और 109 एपीसोड यहूद ब्रॉडकास्ट.
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 लाख दर्शक, साथ the खास एपीसोड `` isaved अपना जीवन '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) और उसके sassy बेहतरीन dost sam ( jennette mccurdy ) अधिनियम मजेदार at a स्कूल हुनर दिखाएँ ऑडिशन, tech-savvy Freddie ( Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling them.
After देखकर the लड़कियों ' दमदार रसायन और banter, the online audience clamors for more and the iCarly webcast is born.
While grappling साथ ठेठ मुद्दे of किशोरावस्था, कार्ली, sam, और फ्रेडी ढूँढें आउट कि वे have भी become ऑनलाइन celebrities as their show – which features talent contests, recipes, problem-solving, and random dancing – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, Washington with her 26-year-old bhai और संरक्षक स्पेंसर ( जेरी trainor ) और produces the दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment.
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned, लकिन उनके पिता, स्टीवन शे ( दाउद chisum ), is a u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी temporarily stationed on a पनडुब्बी, और is प्रायः उल्लेखित लकिन is तभी देखी in व्यक्ति during the series finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife were an Irish boy band जिससे formed in 1998 और disbanded in 2012.
originally हस्ताक्षरित by साइमन cowell और प्रबंधित by लुई वाल्श, the समूह 's फाइनल line-up consisted of nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian McFadden was a member इससे 1998 जबतक उसके प्रस्थान in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 million records विश्वव्यापी, a कुल कि शामिल स्टुडियो एल्बम, singles, वीडियो रिलीज, और compilation albums.
the समूह संचित 14 number-one singles in the संयुक्त किंगडम ( the third-highest in UK history ), tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley.
They हासिल a कुल of 26 शीर्ष टेन singles over उनके 14-year career.
By 2010, Westlife was listed in the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड, as the uk 's top-selling एल्बम समूह of the 21st century.
They also won The रिकार्ड of the साल ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the uk ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स और in 2012, the Official Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history.
Despite their European and Asian success, Westlife never प्रबंधित to ब्रेक into the u.S. मार्केट, achieving तभी एक hit सिंगल in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
In October 2011, westlife घोषित उनके इरादे to विभाजित in 2012, following उनके महानतम Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album.
The boyband 's final concerts were आयोजित on 22 और 23 जून 2012 at croke पार्क स्टेडियम in डबलिन.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 टिकटें, बेची आउट in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, which include retinol, retinal, retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin a carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण.
विटामिन a रै अनेक कृत्यों, it is महत्वपूर्ण लिये विकास और विकास, for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision.
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, जिससे combines साथ प्रोटीन opsin to रूप rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु, कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision.
विटामिन a भी कृत्यों in a बहुत अलग भूमिका as an irreversibly oxidized रूप of रेटिनॉल ज्ञात as retinoic एसिड, जिससे is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells.
In foods of animal origin, the major form of vitamin A is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, जिससे is परिवर्तित to रेटिनॉल ( chemically an दारू ) in the छोटी आंत.
The retinol form कृत्यों as a भंडार रूप of the विटामिन, और can be परिवर्तित to and from its visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic एसिड ), a metabolite कि can be irreversibly synthesized इससे विटामिन a, रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन A activity, and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle.
retinoic एसिड is प्रयुक्त लिये विकास और cellular differentiation.
All forms of विटामिन a have a beta-ionone रिंग to जिससे an isoprenoid कड़ी is attached, called a retinyl group.
Both structural features are अनिवार्य लिये विटामिन कार्यकलाप.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as दो कनेक्ट retinyl समूह, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त in the देह to योगदान to vitamin A levels.
alpha-carotene और gamma-carotene भी have a सिंगल retinyl group, which give them some vitamin activity.
none of the अन्य carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone समूह और रै विटामिन कार्यकलाप in इंसानो.
Vitamin A can be मिला in दो प्रिंसिपल फ़ॉर्म in foods :
Retinol, the form of vitamin A absorbed when खाने एनिमल खाना स्त्रोत, is a पीला, fat-soluble पदार्थ.
चूंकि the pure दारू रूप is अस्थिर, the vitamin is found in tissues in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially उत्पादित और administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ), लकिन no अन्य carotenoids, फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी पशु, जिससे possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa और converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores ऐसे as बिल्लियों और ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase और can नहीं बदलें कोई carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ).
Selena मारी गोमेज़ ( born जुलाई 22, 1992 ) is an American singer and actress.
She made her debut as a child अभिनेत्री in बार्नी & मित्रों.
In 2007, गोमेज़ आए to prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the television series Wizards of Waverly Place.
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year, and became the संस्थापक और सीसे सिंगर of the पॉप बैंड सेलिना Gomez & the Scene.
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ), and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally ``, `` जो says ``, और `` प्रेम तुम जैसे a प्रेम सोंग ``.
After the release of television films and their accompanying soundtracks, गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी डेब्यू in ramona और beezus in 2010 और starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly प्लेस और the अंतराल of सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012, वो केन्द्रित on उसके फिल्मी करियर, सेवारत as a आवाज़ अभिनेत्री in होटल transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year.
Her debut solo एल्बम is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013, और is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment उद्योग, गोमेज़ is शामिल in परोपकारी क्रियाएँ through दान कार्य और विभिन्न social and environmental causes.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter, अभिनेत्री, और model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the अमरीकी नदी in the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest नगर in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an अनुमानित 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, और the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by Time पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically और racially एकीकृत नगर in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., और James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State विश्वविद्यालयों, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or सैक State, is the largest local university.
It is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य University system.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ in the ओक पार्क neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, Davis is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस, वेस्ट of the पूंजी.
The UC Davis Medical बीच, a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल, is located in the city of Sacramento.
Memorial Day is a United States federal holiday जिससे occurs प्रत्येक साल on the फाइनल सोमवार of May.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत in the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
Formerly known as Decoration Day, it originated after the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate the संघ और confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th सदी मेमोरियल दिन था महरूम विस्तारित to सम्मान सब Americans who have died in all wars.
It typically marks the start of the गर्मियाँ अवकाश ऋतु, जबकि मजदूर दिन marks its end.
Many people visit cemeteries and memorials, विशेषकर to सम्मान those जो have died in सैन्य सेवा.
अनेक स्वयंसेवक प्लेस an अमरीकी ध्वज on each grave in national cemeteries.
By the early 20th सदी, मेमोरियल दिन थी an अवसर लिये अधिक सामान्य expressions of मेमोरी, as लोगों visited the क़ब्रों of उनके मृतक रिश्तेदारों in church cemeteries, whether they had served in the military or not.
It भी became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to खरीदारी, परिवार महफिलों, आतिशबाजी, यात्राएँ to the बीच, and national media events.
सालाना सजावट दिनों लिये particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ rural areas of the American South, notably in the mountains.
In cases involving a family graveyard जहाँ रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न, इस may लो on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles.
People gather on the designated दिन और put पुष्प on क़ब्रों और नवीनीकृत सम्पर्क with kinfolk and others.
There often is a धार्मिक सेवा और a `` डिनर on the मैदान, '' the परंपरागत पद लिये a potluck भोजन in जिससे लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began पहले the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और यूँ may प्रतिबिंबित the रियल उत्पत्ति of the `` मेमोरियल day '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused साथ दिग्गजों दिन ; मेमोरियल दिन is a दिन of remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत, जबकि दिग्गजों दिन celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans, living or dead.
Mt. Zion Church state इतिहास मार्कर निकट फिलाडेल्फिया, Mississippi.
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) थी a अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक African American voters as possible in Mississippi, which had historically excluded most blacks from voting.
The प्रोजेक्ट भी नियत up दर्जनों of स्वतंत्रता स्कूलों, स्वतंत्रता घरों, और जातियाँ centers in छोटी towns throughout Mississippi to aid the local black population.
The प्रोजेक्ट थी व्यवस्थित by the परिषद of federated संगठन ( cofo ), a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC, CORE, NAACP and SCLC ).
सबसे of the impetus, नेतृत्व, और financing लिये the गर्मियाँ Project came from the SNCC.
Robert Parris मूसा, sncc फ़ील्ड सचिव और co-director of cofo, directed the summer project.
Blues is the name given to both a musical रूप और a म्यूज़िक विधा कि originated in समुदायों of primarily the `` गहन दक्षिण `` of the संयुक्त राज्य around the समाप्त of the 19th सदी इससे spirituals, work songs, field hollers, shouts and chants, and rhymed simple narrative ballads.
The blues form, ubiquitous in jazz, rhythm and ब्लूज़, और चट्टान और फेंकें is characterized by विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions, of जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ कॉर्ड progression is the सबसे common.
The blue notes that, for expressive purposes are sung or निभाई flattened or धीरे झुकी ( नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the प्रमुख स्केल, हैं भी an important part of the sound.
The blues genre is based on the blues form but possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as विशिष्ट lyrics, bass lines, and instruments.
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from देश to शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद अधिक or कम लोकप्रिय दौरान अलग अवधि of the 20th century.
Best known are the डेल्टा, piedmont, जम्प, और शिकागो ब्लूज़ styles.
संसार युद्ध ii चिह्नित the परिवर्तन इससे ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ और the प्रगतिशील खोलने of ब्लूज़ म्यूज़िक to a wider दर्शक, especially white listeners.
In the 1960s and 1970s, a संकर रूप पुकारा blues-rock evolved.
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` ब्लू शैतानों '', अर्थ वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग of the पद in इस भाव is मिला in जार्ज colman 's one-act तमाशा Blue Devils ( 1798 ).
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be पुरानी, it रै महरूम attested to चूंकि 1912, जब हार्ट wand 's `` डलास ब्लूज़ `` became the पहला स्वत्वाधिकार ब्लूज़ composition.
In गीत the phrase is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to describe a depressed mood.
A quarter dollar, commonly shortened to क्वार्टर, is a सिक्का लायक 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर or 25 cents.
The क्वार्टर रै महरूम उत्पादित since 1796.
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ which is more common in other भाग of the संसार, originated साथ the अभ्यास of dividing स्पेनी milled डॉलर into आठ कील तराशा खण्ड ( cf. `` टुकड़े of eight `` ).
At one time `` two bits ``, i.e. two wedges, प्रत्येक कील an आठवीं, यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी real, was a common nickname for a quarter.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a मैक्सिकन अवकाश मनाये throughout मैक्सिको और around the world in other cultures.
the अवकाश focuses on महफिलों of परिवार और मित्रों to दुवा लिये और remember friends and family members who have died.
It is particularly celebrated in मैक्सिको, जहाँ it is a नेशनल अवकाश, और all banks are closed.
The जश्न takes प्लेस on नवम्बर 1 और 2, in कनेक्शन साथ the कैथोलिक छुट्टियाँ of सब संतो ' Day and All Souls ' Day.
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls, marigolds, और the पसंदीदा भोजन और पेय of the रजि और visiting graves with these as gifts.
They also छोड़ possessions of the मृतक.
Scholars trace the origins of the आधुनिक मैक्सिकन अवकाश to स्वदेशी observances डेटिंग वापस सैंकड़ों of सालो और to an एज़टेक पर्व dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
the अवकाश रै स्प्रेड throughout the संसार : in ब्राज़ील, dia de finados is a पब्लिक अवकाश that many Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches.
In Spain, there are festivals and parades, and, at the end of the दिन, लोगों एकत्रित at कब्रिस्तान और दुवा लिये उनके मुर्दे loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly themed जश्न appear in अनेक एशियाई और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों.

The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were शुभारम्भ simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all- इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed और निर्मित by the घंटी पंच co.
in Britain, and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer division, वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके लॉजिक circuits और nixie tubes for their numerical displays.
They were the पहला of a श्रेणी of डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी थी to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s.
George Washington ( –, 1799 ) was the first President of the United राज्य ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी युद्ध, और एक of the founding fathers of the United States.
He presided over the सम्मेलन कि drafted the संविधान, जिससे replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और स्थापित the position of President.
Washington was elected President as the सर्वसम्मत चुनाव of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, और he परोसा दो शर्तें in office.
He oversaw the सृष्टि of a दमदार, well-financed नेशनल सरकारी कि कायम neutrality in the wars raging in Europe, suppressed rebellion, and won acceptance among Americans of all types.
His leadership style established many forms and संस्कार of सरकारी कि have महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि, ऐसे as using a कैबिनेट system and delivering an inaugural address.
Further, the शांतिपूर्ण परिवर्तन इससे उसके प्रेसिडेंसी to the प्रेसिडेंसी of जॉन एडम्स स्थापित a परंपरा that continues into the 21st century.
Washington was hailed as `` पिता of उसके देश `` भी दौरान उसके आजीवन.
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial वर्जिनिया ; उसके धनवान planter परिवार स्वामित्व तम्बाकू बागानों and slaves.
After both his father and older brother died when he थी यंग, वॉशिंगटन became personally और professionally संलग्न to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स, who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier.
वॉशिंगटन जल्दी became a वरिष्ठ अधिकारी in the colonial forces during the first stages of the French and Indian War.
Chosen by the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776, but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City.
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter, he पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों, retook नई Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause.
Because of his strategy, Revolutionary forces captured two प्रमुख अंग्रेजों सेना at साराटोगा in 1777 और yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington लिये उसके चयन और पर्यवेक्षण of उसके सेनापतियों, प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल और क्षमता to थाम साथ the फौज, समन्वय साथ the राज्य राज्यपालों and state militia units, relations with Congress and attention to supplies, logistics, and training.
In battle, however, Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by अंग्रेजों सेनापतियों साथ larger सेना.
After victory had been finalized in 1783, Washington resigned as Commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति, proving उसके विपक्ष to तानाशाही और उसके प्रतिबद्धता to अमरीकी republicanism.
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the Articles of Confederation, in 1787 वॉशिंगटन presided over the संवैधानिक सम्मेलन कि drafted the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
Elected unanimously as the first अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789, he attempted to लाओ प्रतिद्वंद्वी गिरोहों साथ to unify the nation.
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off all state and national कर्ज़, to implement an प्रभावी कर प्रणाली और to बनाएँ a नेशनल बैंको ( despite विपक्ष इससे थामस Jefferson ).
Washington proclaimed the United राज्य न्यूट्रल in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय बाद 1793.
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the jay सन्धि in 1795, despite तीव्र विपक्ष इससे the jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the federalist पार्टी, he समर्थित इसके कार्यक्रम.
वॉशिंगटन 's विदाई पता थी an influential प्राइमर on रिपब्लिकन पुण्य और a चेतावनी विरूद्ध partisanship, sectionalism, and involvement in foreign wars.
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his घर, माउंट vernon, और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he प्रबंधित a variety of enterprises.
He freed सब उसके स्लेव by his final will.
Washington had a vision of a great and शक्तिशाली स्वदेश कि होता be निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन लाइनों using federal power.
He sought to use the national government to बचाना स्वतंत्रता, improve अवसंरचना, खोलें the पश्चिमी lands, प्रचार कॉमर्स, मिला a permanent capital, reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism.
At his death, Washington was eulogized as `` first in war, first in सलाम, और पहला in the दिल of उसके देशवासियों '' by हेनरी Lee.
The federalists बना उसे the प्रतीक of उनके पार्टी लकिन लिये अनेक सालो, the jeffersonians जारी to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument.
As the leader of the first successful revolution against a औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य in संसार इतिहास, वॉशिंगटन became an अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक लिये मुक्ति और राष्ट्रवाद, विशेषकर in फ़्रांस and Latin America.
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S. Federal बिता – नकदी or बजट आधार.
Fiscal साल 2012 u.S. संघीय रसीदें.
the बजट of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी प्रायः begins as the अध्यक्ष 's proposal to the U.S. Congress which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, Congress is the body required by विधि to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed by दोनो घरों to the President for signature.
Congressional निर्णय हैं governed by नियम और विधान regarding the federal budget process.
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and Senate committees and for Appropriations subcommittees, which then स्वीकृति व्यक्तिगत appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding to विभिन्न संघीय कार्यक्रम.
If कॉंग्रेस fails to pass an सालाना बजट ( as रै महरूम the मामला चूंकि 2009 ), a श्रेणी of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures.
After Congress approves an appropriations bill, it is sent to the अध्यक्ष, जो may चिह्न it into विधि, or may वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट जब passed by the Congress ).
A vetoed विधेयक is भेजा वापस to कॉंग्रेस, जिससे can pass it into law with a two-thirds majority in each chamber.
Congress may also combine all or कुछ appropriations बिल्स into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
In addition, the president may request and the Congress may pass supplemental appropriations बिल्स or आपात supplemental appropriations बिल्स.
Several सरकारी एजेंसियों provide बजट आंकड़ा और analysis.
These शामिल the सरकारी जवाबदेही दफ्तर ( gao ), congressional बजट दफ्तर, the Office of Management and Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department.
These agencies have reported कि the संघीय सरकारी is facing a series of important financing challenges.
In the short-run, tax revenues have अस्वीकृत significantly due to a कठोर मंदी और कर नीति choices, while expenditures have expanded for wars, unemployment insurance and other safety net spending.
In the long-run, expenditures सम्बन्धित to healthcare कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare और medicaid हैं प्रक्षिप्त to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures.
New Guinea ( also, Tok Pisin : Niugini, डच : nieuw गिनी, और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार 's दूसरी largest द्वीप, बाद ग्रीनलैंड, covering a land area of 786,000 km2.
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, it lies geographically to the ईस्ट of the मलय द्वीपसमूह, साथ जिससे it is sometimes शामिल as भाग of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago.
geologically it is a भाग of the वही tectonic थाली as Australia.
When world sea levels were low, the two shared shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 मीटर नीचे समुद्र स्तर ), combining साथ lands अभी inundated into the tectonic महाद्वीप of Sahul, also known as Greater Australia.
The two landmasses became separated when the क्षेत्रफल अभी ज्ञात as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of the last glacial period.
anthropologically, नई गिनी is माना part of Melanesia.
Politically, the पश्चिमी हाफ of the द्वीप comprises दो इंडोनेशियाई provinces : Papua and West Papua.
The eastern half forms the मेनलैंड of the देश of पापुआ नई गिनी.
The island has a population of about 7.5 million, साथ a बहुत कम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of तभी 8 inh/km2.
New गिनी is differentiated इससे इसके drier, खुशामद, और कम fertile दक्षिणी बंटवारा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, by इसके much उच्चतर वर्षा और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic geology, with its highest point, Puncak Jaya, reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal fauna, with marsupials, सहित wallabies और possums, और the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
Other than bats और कुछ दो दर्जन स्वदेशी कृंतक genera, वहीँ हैं no pre-human स्वदेशी placental mammals.
Pigs, several अतिरिक्त प्रजाति of चूहे, और the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी गायन श्वान यहूद introduced with human colonization.
The human presence on the द्वीप तिथियाँ वापस at तनिक 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of Africa.
Research indicates that the highlands were an जल्दी और स्वतंत्र बीच of कृषि, साथ प्रमाण of सिंचाई going back at least 10,000 years.
Because of the समय गहराई of इसके inhabitation और इसके अत्यधिक fractured लैंडस्केप, an unusually ऊँची क्रमांक of भाषाएं हैं बोला on the द्वीप, साथ कुछ 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects.
Most are classified as पापुआई भाषाएं, a generally स्वीकृत भौगोलिक पद जिससे a minority of authors hold to be a genetic one.
A क्रमांक of ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं बोला on the coast and on offshore islands.
In the 16th century स्पेनी explorers खोजा the द्वीप और पुकारा it Nueva Guinea.
in हाल इतिहास पश्चिमी नई गिनी थी included in the Dutch East Indies colony.
The Germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the island as German New गिनी in उनके pre–world युद्ध i प्रयत्न to स्थापित themselves as a औपनिवेशिक शक्ति, whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the Treaty of Versailles, the German portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, नामित the territory of पापुआ ) as a League of Nations mandate.
The eastern half of the द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता इससे ऑस्ट्रेलिया as Papua New Guinea in 1975.
the पश्चिमी हाफ gained स्वतंत्रता इससे the डच in 1961, but became part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial circumstances.
`` The वैन buren लड़कों '' is the 148th एपीसोड of the sitcom seinfeld, and name of a fictional New York street gang.
Their sign is crossing the हैंड्स, साथ एक हाथ साथ सब the उंगलियाँ 'up ' and spread out.
The other hand has all but the अंगूठा और सूचक उंगली up, लिये a कुल of आठ ( 8 ).
The gang is named for the 8th President of the संयुक्त राज्य, मार्टिन वैन buren ( जो थी the पहला अध्यक्ष इससे नई York ).
This was the 14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th season.
