bevo चिह्न
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or निकट बियर, brewed in the संयुक्त राज्य by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of prohibition, when beer, वाइन और आसुत liquors, यहूद बना illegal लिये तेरह सालो.
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing bevo जब alcoholic पेय यहूद निषिद्ध in 1916 by the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद forces.
उत्पादन रोज़ greatly साथ नेशनल निषेध in 1919, और bevo थी by दूर the सबसे लोकप्रिय of the many `` cereal beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time.
At the peak of its लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, अधिक than पाँच लाख मामले of Bevo were sold annually.
Renard with a mug of bevo, चित्रित in टेरा cotta on the आंतरिक दीवारें of the bevo भवन, St. Louis
Labels on the bottles billed it as `` bevo the पेय ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` पेय '' और the स्लावी भाषा शब्द लिये बियर `` pivo '', और थी सुनाया `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` renard the फॉक्स `` ( आधारित on the समर्थक of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ), और promotional मग साथ this character were manufactured.
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its St. Louis shops पुकारा the `` bevo नौकाएँ '' जिससे यहूद प्रयुक्त लिये प्रमोशन.
Seven are believed to have been built on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि एक surviving उदाहरण थी आधारित upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8.
बिलबोर्ड विज्ञापन bevo in Trenton, New Jersey, 1917
A contemporary विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग और invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the मामला इससे अपना पंसारी, druggist, or dealer. ''
The पेपर लेबल on the वापस of the बोतल पढ़ा `` the all-year-round Soft Drink.
appetizing - healthful - पौष्टिक - Refreshing.
Milk or जल may contain bacteria.
BEVO never करता. ''
Bevo became part of the popular culture of the समय, और is उल्लेखित in विभिन्न लोकप्रिय गीतों और Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to द्वितीयक कठबोली उपयोग of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण, in अमरीकी सैन्य कठबोली a यंग और अनुभवहीन officer was called a `` Bevo ''.
The University of Texas named its mascot `` bevo '', a नाम जिससे रै stuck to इस दिन.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink, `` तुम ca n't रहो up on bevo '', in उसके 1917 फौज revue, यिप यिप Yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled बूटलेग बियर और liquor as खूब as `` homebrew ``, काटें into bevo 's marketshare.
With बिक्री flattening to 100,000 मामले by 1929, Anheuser-Busch stopped production.
the bevo मिल, st. लुई, in 2008
The Bevo building, with the Renard character prominently displayed at the किनारे, स्टिल operates as a bottling सुविधा at उनके प्रमुख ब्रेवरी in st. लुई, मिसौरी.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by अगस्त anheuser बुच, sr. in 1917.
It was closed in 2009, but it reopened in अक्तूबर 2009 अंतर्गत new owners.
Bevo is also mentioned in the छोटी स्टोरी `` the हत्यारे `` by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे ; as खूब as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis.

a कांच of pasteurized गाय milk
Milk is a white liquid उत्पादित by the mammary ग्रंथियों of mammals.
It is the प्राथमिक सोर्स of पोषण for young mammals before they are able to digest other types of food.
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum, which carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby और can reduce the रिस्क of अनेक रोगों in the baby.
It भी contains अनेक अन्य nutrients.
As an agricultural product, milk is निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों और प्रयुक्त as खाना लिये humans.
Worldwide, दुग्ध खेतो उत्पादित परिचय 730 लाख टन of milk in 2011.
India is the world 's largest निर्माता और उपभोक्ता of मिल्क, yet neither निर्यात nor imports milk.
New जीलैंड, the यूरोपीय संघ 's 27 सदस्य राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और the संयुक्त States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products.
China और रूस हैं the संसार 's largest importers of milk and milk products.
Throughout the संसार, वहीँ हैं अधिक than 6 अरब consumers of milk and milk products.
over 750 लाख लोगों सजीव भीतर dairy farming households.
Milk is a कुंजी योगदानकर्ता to improving पोषण और खाना सुरक्षा particularly in developing countries.
Improvements in livestock and dairy प्रौद्योगिकी प्रस्ताव significant वादा in reducing गरीबी और कुपोषण in the world.
Motorcycle स्पीडवे, प्रायः referred to as स्पीडवे, is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल involving चार और sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway मोटरसाइकिल उपयोग तभी एक गियर और have no brakes और रेसिंग takes प्लेस on a flat oval track usually consisting of dirt or loosely packed shale.
Competitors use this surface to slide their मशीने बगलों, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight भाग of the track the मोटरसाइकिल reach speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a type of speedway racing being practised in the USA पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the लेट 1910s और जल्दी 1920s.
There are now both domestic and अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक of देशों सहित the स्पीडवे संसार कप whilst the उच्चतम overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion.
स्पीडवे is लोकप्रिय in सेंट्रल और उत्तरी यूरोपीय और to a lesser extent in Australia and North America.
A variant of track रेसिंग, स्पीडवे is administered internationally by the fédération internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic स्पीडवे कार्यक्रम हैं regulated by fim संबद्ध national motor sport federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate.
In humans, the most important related यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं विटामिन d2 और विटामिन d3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although विटामिन d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is नहीं दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और जरूर be प्राप्त इससे उनके diet.
However, as with other compounds commonly called vitamins, विटामिन d थी खोजा in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी, namely, rickets, the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds called vitamins, in the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is added to स्टेपल भोजन, ऐसे as मिल्क, to avoid बीमारी due to कमियां.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार, और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D इससे सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप कि रोकता toxicity लकिन, क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप, no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, यूएसए, लिये the राशि of सूर्य exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference intakes लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is इससे उनके आहार, हालांकि कि होगा rarely occur in practice.
In the जिगर विटामिन d is परिवर्तित to calcidiol, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as calcifediol ( इन ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol, the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes, such as the अप्रसार, differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best प्रमाण of लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in mortality in elderly women.
the duramax is a सामान्य मोटर्स डीज़ल इंजन परिवार लिये light- और medium duty trucks, designed by Isuzu.
The 6.6-liter duramax is उत्पादित by dmax, a संयुक्त venture between GM and Isuzu in Moraine, Ohio.
This engine was initially संस्थापित in 2001 मॉडल साल चेवी और जीएमसी ट्रक और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups, वैन, and medium-duty trucks.
In 2006, production at Moraine was reportedly सीमित to लगभग 200,000 इंजन per year.
On may 9, 2007, dmax घोषित the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th Duramax V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility.

is also a परंपरागत लिखा संक्षिप्त लिये बाल्टीमोर, Maryland.
Statue of Balto in सेंट्रल पार्क ( नई यॉर्क City )
Balto ( 1919 – March 14, 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome, in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported इससे anchorage, अलास्का, to nenana, अलास्का, by ट्रैन और तब to nome by श्वान sled to कॉम्बैट an outbreak of the disease.
The run is commemorated by the सालाना iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race.
balto थी नामित बाद the सामी एक्सप्लोरर सैमुएल Balto.
balto died at the आयु of 14.

The निसान उच्चिष्ट is a mid-size / entry-level लक्ज़री car manufactured by Nissan, marketed as the `` four-door sports car ''.
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder संस्करण of the bluebird, और थी spun into इसके अपना लकीर in 1981, having been made continuously since then.
The `` Maxima '' नाम थी लागू धीरे, शुरूआत in 1981.
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama, जापानी, जबतक the वर्तमान उत्तर अमरीकी maximas प्रारंभ होने assembled in Smyrna, Tennessee.
The `` Maxima '' has also been applied to cefiros और चलेगा in विभिन्न बाज़ार.
propolis as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous मिश्रण कि मधु मधुमक्खियों collect इससे पेड़ कलियों, sap बहती, or अन्य botanical sources.
it is प्रयुक्त as a sealant लिये unwanted open spaces in the hive.
Propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी गैप ( लगभग or कम ), while larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax.
Its रंग varies depending on इसके वनस्पति सोर्स, the most common being dark brown.
propolis is स्टिकी at और ऊपर रूम तापमान,.
At lower temperatures, it becomes मुश्किल और बहुत भंगुर.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26, 1948 ) is an American singer, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the बोस्टन -आधारd चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ, in जिससे he भी plays the हार्मोनिका, and occasional piano and percussion.
he is ज्ञात as the `` राक्षस of screamin ' '' due to his high screams and his wide vocal range.
he is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy प्रदर्शन, he प्रायः पोशाक in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits साथ उसके ट्रेडमार्क scarves hanging from his microphone stand.
In the 1970s, Tyler रोज़ to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ, जिससे released ऐसे पड़ाव मुश्किल चट्टान एल्बम as Toys in the Attic and Rocks.
In the late 1970s और जल्दी 1980s, टायलर था a भारी ड्रग और दारू व्यसन, और the बैंड 's popularity waned.
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently कायम गम्भीरता लिये over 20 सालो, लकिन था a पतन साथ नुस्खा painkillers in the late 2000s, for which he successfully received treatment in 2009.
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and जल्दी 1990s साथ the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश, पंप, और मिलेंगी a पकड़, टायलर became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon.
As a result, he has since embarked on अनेक सोलो endeavors सहित अतिथि दिखावे on अन्य कलाकारों ' म्यूज़िक, फिल्मी and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling book, and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ).
However, he has जारी to रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform साथ एरोस्मिथ, बाद अधिक than 43 years in the band.
The band 's नवीनतम एल्बम, म्यूज़िक इससे Another Dimension !
, was released on नवम्बर 6, 2012.
Tyler is शामिल among रोलिंग पत्थरों 100 Greatest Singers.
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल vocalists of सब समय.
In 2001 he was inducted into the Rock और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति साथ एरोस्मिथ, और he थी the प्रस्तुतकर्ता when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler and उसके songwriting संगी जो पेरी होगा be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ascap संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और होगा भी be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame.
the जिगर produces यूरिया in the यूरिया साईकिल as a बर्बाद उत्पाद of the digestion of protein.
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया नाइट्रोजन प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.
Individual laboratories may have अलग सन्दर्भ सीमाएँ, और इस is क्युकी the procedure may vary.
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2, 1940 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और कॉलेज और पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी जो थी the सिर कोच of the एनएफएल 's डेट्रॉयट Lions from 1988 to 1996.
His 67 विन्स और 71 नुकसान हैं प्रत्येक the सबसे लिये a सिर coach in team history.
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ), also known as the Jewish people, are a nation और an ethnoreligious समूह, originating in the israelites or hebrews of the प्राचीन निकट East.
The Jewish ethnicity, nationality, and religion are strongly interrelated, as judaism is the परंपरागत आस्था of the Jewish nation.
Converts to judaism, जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों भीतर the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर to those born into it, have महरूम absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia.
In यहूदी परंपरा, यहूदी ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs अब्राहम, Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE.
the आधुनिक राज्य of इसराईल थी स्थापित as a Jewish nation-state, and defines itself as such in its Basic Laws.
Its Law of Return grants the सही of नागरिकता to कोई jew जो निवेदन it.
Israel is the only country where Jews हैं a बहुमत of the population.
Jews also enjoyed political स्वायत्तता twice पहले in प्राचीन इतिहास.
The first of these periods lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce, और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों, the संयुक्त साम्राज्य, और the विभाजित साम्राज्य of the kingdoms of इसराईल और यहूदा, समाप्ति साथ the विनाश of the First Temple.
The second was the period of the hasmonean किंगडम spanning इससे 140 to 37 BCE.
Since the विनाश of the पहला टेम्पल, most Jews have lived in diaspora.
A minority in every country in which they live ( except इसराईल ), वे have अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a जनसांख्यिकी कि रै fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries.
The world Jewish जनसांख्यिकी पहुँचे a शिखर of 15 लाख prior to the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, लकिन छह लाख Jews were killed in the Holocaust.
Since then the population has risen again और, थी अनुमानित at 13.4 लाख by the उत्तर अमरीकी यहूदी आंकड़ा बैंको, or कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
according to इस रपट, परिचय 42.5 % of सब यहूदियों reside in इसराईल ( 5.7 लाख ), और 39.3 % in the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 million ), with most of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include all those who consider themselves यहूदियों, whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध साथ a यहूदी संगठन.
The total संसार यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी, however, is difficult to measure.
In addition to issues with census methodology, there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a jew और धर्मनिरपेक्ष, राजनैतिक, और ancestral पहचान factors that may affect the figure considerably.
कॉर्पस christi procession.

Corpus Domini redirects यहाँ.
For अन्य उपयोग देखिए कॉर्पस domini ( disambiguation )
The feast of कॉर्पस christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह ), भी ज्ञात as कॉर्पस domini, is a लैटिन रीति liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the संस्था of the eucharist, जिससे थी observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber माहौल of the nearness of Good Friday.
In the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the सबसे पावन Body and Blood of Christ.
It is also celebrated in कुछ anglican, लूथरन, और बूढ़ा कैथोलिक चर्च कि थाम similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity संडे or, `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त of मसीह is नहीं a पावन दिन of दायित्व, it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day ''.
At the end of Holy Mass, there is often a बारात of the धन्य sacrament, generally प्रदर्शित in a monstrance.
the बारात is followed by सुनाकर of the Blessed Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each साल in रोम, जहाँ it begins at the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran और makes इसके रास्ता to the basilica of Saint Mary Major, where it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood, the स्तर of जिससे वृद्धि in जवाब to सूजन ( i.e. c-reactive प्रोटीन is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the सतह of मुर्दे or मरना कोशिकाएं ( और कुछ प्रकार of जीवाणु ) in अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक प्रणाली via the c1q complex.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in जवाब to कारकों released by macrophages और मोटे कोशिकाएं ( adipocytes ).
It is a सदस्य of the pentraxin परिवार of proteins.
It is not related to c-peptide or प्रोटीन c.
C-reactive प्रोटीन थी the पहला पैटर्न मान्यता receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic European colonization of the americas is typically दिनाँक to 1492, जब a स्पेनी expedition headed by क्रिस्टोफर कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया to खोलें व्यापार but inadvertently discovered the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale खोजी और colonization soon followed.
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many आतंरिक युद्धों और थी धीरे recovering इससे the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic प्लेग caused, the रैपिड विस्तार at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
The first expeditions occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला, प्यूर्टो रीको और क्यूबा, और बाद 1500 विस्तारित into the इंटीरियर्स of दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण America.
In 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of England, John Cabot landed on the उत्तर अमरीकी coast, और a साल बाद, कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage पहुँचे the दक्षिण अमरीकी coast.
France संस्थापित colonies in much of पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका, on a क्रमांक of Caribbean islands, and in South America.
पुर्तगाल colonized Brazil.
Eventually, the entire Western Hemisphere came under the कंट्रोल of यूरोपीय सरकारें, अग्रणी to profound परिवर्तन to इसके लैंडस्केप, जनसांख्यिकी, and plant and animal life.
In the 19th सदी अलोन over 50 लाख लोगों left Europe for the Americas.
The post-1492 era is ज्ञात as the काल of the columbian एक्सचेंज.
कैथ रिचर्ड्स ( born 18 दिसम्बर 1943 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer-songwriter and founder member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones.
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had created `` rock 's महानतम सिंगल देह of riffs '', रैंकिंग उसे 4th on इसके सूची of 100 बेहतरीन guitarists.
Fourteen गीतों रिचर्ड्स लिखा साथ the रोलिंग पत्थरों ' सीसे vocalist मिक जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time ``.
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the लेट 1960s और 1970s और उसके candour regarding उसके व्यसन to और eventual abstinence from heroin.
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from the androgen समूह और is मिला in स्तनधारियों, सरीसृपों, पक्षियों, और अन्य vertebrates.
in स्तनधारियों, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is primarily स्रावित in the अंडकोष of males and the ovaries of females, although small amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the प्रिंसिपल पुरूष sex हार्मोन और an anabolic steroid.
In मेन, टेस्टोस्टेरोन plays a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of पुरूष reproductive ऊतकों ऐसे as the testis और प्रोस्टेट as well as promoting secondary sexual characteristics such as increased muscle, bone mass, and the growth of body hair.
in जोड, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य और well-being as खूब as the prevention of osteoporosis.
On average, in वयस्क इंसान males, the प्लाज्मा विशेषज्ञता of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is परिचय 7–8 टाइम्स as ग्रेट as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क इंसान महिलाओं ' प्लाज्मा, but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater, the daily production is about 20 times greater in men.
Females also are more संवेदनशील to the हार्मोन.
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is observed in most vertebrates.
Fish मेक a थोड़ा अलग रूप पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone.
इसके बंटवारा in कीट is ecdysone.
ये सर्वव्यापी steroids सुझाएँ कि sex hormones have an ancient evolutionary history.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` प्राकृतिक '' लकिन अपेक्षाकृत समरूप groupings हैं evident in a सांख्यिकीय population.
It is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in विपणन research.
In this technique, the कुल जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित into ये समूह ( or क्लस्टर ) और a सरल यादृच्छिक sample of the groups is selected.
Then the जरूरी सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of the तत्व within each selected group.
This may be done लिये प्रत्येक तत्व in ये समूह or a subsample of तत्व may be चयनित within each of these groups.
A common motivation for cluster sampling is to reduce the total क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और लागत दिए the desired सटीकता.
Assuming a फिक्स्ड नमूना आकार, the तकनीक देता अधिक सटीक परिणाम जब सबसे of the विभिन्नता in the population is within the groups, not between them.
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County, North कैरोलिना, संयुक्त राज्य, और is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास शहरों of greensboro और ऊँची Point.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,382 at the 2010 census.
नताली पोर्टमैन ( born नताली hershlag ; ; जून 9, 1981 ) is an अभिनेत्री और मॉडल with dual American and Israeli citizenship.
Her first role was as an orphan taken in by a hitman in the 1994 action film, but mainstream कामयाबी आए जब वो थी डाल as padmé amidala in the स्टार युद्धों प्रीक्वेल त्रयी ( released in 1999, 2002 and 2005 ).
In 1999, वो नामांकित at हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों to पढ़ाई मनोविज्ञान while still working as an actress.
She completed her स्नातक 's उपाधि in 2003.
In 2001, Portman opened in नई यॉर्क नगर 's पब्लिक थिएटर उत्पादन of एंटोन Chekhov 's The Seagull.
In 2005, Portman received a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री और जीती the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer.
She won a Constellation Award for Best Female Performance and a Saturn Award for Best अभिनेत्री लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका in v लिये वेंडेट्टा ( 2006 ).
She played leading roles in the historical dramas गोया 's भूत ( 2006 ) और the अन्य बोलिन लड़की ( 2008 ).
In May 2008, she परोसा as the youngest सदस्य of the 61st सालाना कैन फिल्मी Festival jury.
Portman 's directorial debut, Eve, opened the 65th Venice अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता in 2008.
पोर्टमैन निर्देशित a खण्ड of the collective film New York, I Love You.
In 2011, Portman won the Academy Award, the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार, the bafta पुरस्कार, the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और the स्वतंत्र स्पिरिट पुरस्कार लिये उसके सीसे performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan.
Copper is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक cu ( from ) and atomic number 29.
It is a ductile metal with very ऊँची थर्मल और विद्युत चालकता.
Pure copper is नरम और malleable ; a freshly उजागर सतह has a reddish-orange color.
It is used as a कंडक्टर of ऊष्मा और विद्युत, a भवन सामग्री, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The metal and its alloys have महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये हज़ारों of सालो.
In the Roman era, तांबे थी प्रधानतया mined on साइप्रस, hence the उत्पत्ति of the name of the metal as сyprium ( metal of Cyprus ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts, which प्रायः impart ब्लू or ग्रीन रंगों to खनिज ऐसे as azurite और फ़िरोज़ा and have been widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built with तांबे corrode to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently सुविधाएँ तांबे, दोनो by itself and as part of pigments.
Copper is essential to all living organisms as a ट्रेस dietary खनिज क्युकी it is a कुंजी constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea तांबे is a constituent of the रक्त रंजक hemocyanin, जिससे is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates.
The main areas where copper is मिला in vertebrates हैं जिगर, मांसपेशी और अस्थि.
In sufficient concentration, copper compounds are जहरीला to उच्चतर जीवों और हैं प्रयुक्त as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional sports leagues, or simply major leagues, in the United राज्य और कनाडा हैं the उच्चतम पेशेवर प्रतियोगिताओं of टोली खेल in the दो देशों.
हालांकि व्यक्तिगत खेल ऐसे as गोल्फ़, tennis, and auto racing are also very popular, the term is usually limited to team sports.
The term `` major league '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the top level of professional American baseball.
Today, the major northern North America professional team sports leagues are Major लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ), the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ), and the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Other notable लीग शामिल प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( mls ), the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( cfl ), the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल League, Major League Lacrosse, the National Lacrosse League and the Women 's National Basketball Association.
The NFL, MLB, NBA, और एनएचएल हैं commonly referred to as the Big Four.
Each of ये is the richest पेशेवर क्लबों प्रतियोगिता in its sport worldwide.
the बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी can become सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक in दोनो देशों और elsewhere in the संसार, क्युकी the लीग enjoy a significant place in popular culture in the US and Canada.
The एनएफएल रै 32 टीमों, और the others have 30 each.
The vast majority of प्रमुख लीग टीमों हैं concentrated in the सबसे populous महानगर areas of the United States.
Baseball, football, hockey, and soccer have had professional leagues for over 100 years ; जल्दी लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ, ओहियो लीग, और नेशनल हॉकी संघ formed the आधार of the आधुनिक एमएलबी, एनएफएल और एनएचएल क्रमशः.
Soccer was first professionalized in 1894, लकिन लीग suffered greatly इससे कमी of स्थिरता और seldom lasted अधिक than a दशक.
Soccer 's महानतम सफलताओं यहूद in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the असली उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1968-1984 ), the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and, currently, Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the नेशनल बास्केट लीग और इसके splinter समूह the बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका, लेने on इसके current form in 1949.
Every major league averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति प्रति खेल or उच्चतर as of 2011.
Meridian Altitude is an खगोलीय नेविगेशन method of calculating an observer 's latitude.
Earned value management ( EVM ), or Earned value project/performance प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन तकनीक लिये measuring प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन और प्रगति in an उद्देश्य manner.
क्युकी evm रै the क्षमता to combine measurements of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
और cost,
in a single integrated system, अर्जित मान प्रबन्धन is समर्थ to provide सटीक forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट performance problems, which is an important contribution for project management.
Early EVM research showed that the areas of नियोजन और कंट्रोल हैं significantly impacted by इसके उपयोग ; और similarly, using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना परिभाषा as खूब as the analysis of overall project performance.
More recent शोध अध्ययन have दिखाया कि the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं धनात्मक predictors of project success.
Popularity of EVM रै grown significantly in हाल सालो परे सरकारी contracting, in जिससे सेक्टर इसके महत्व continues to वृद्धि ( e.g., हाल new DFAR rules ), in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes.
Colorful वसन्त गार्डन पुष्प
Spring is एक of the चार conventional शीतोष्ण सीज़न, following winter and preceding summer.
वहीँ हैं विभिन्न तकनीकी परिभाषाएं of वसन्त, लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the term varies according to local climate, cultures and customs.
When it is spring in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, it होगा be पतझड़ in the दक्षिणी hemisphere.
At the spring equinox, days are close to 12 घंटों long साथ दिन लंबाई increasing as the ऋतु progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and also to विचार of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, क़यामत, और regrowth, साथ त्यौहार such as Carnival, Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown was a settlement in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया, the पहला स्थाई अंग्रेज़ी settlement in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on may 14, 1607 ( o.s., may 24, 1607 n.s. ), it followed अनेक पहले विफल कोशिशें, सहित the खोया उपनिवेश of roanoke.
Jamestown परोसा as the पूंजी of the उपनिवेश लिये 83 सालो, from 1616 until 1699.
The settlement was located within the territory of a political एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah, the राज्य of the powhatan confederacy, साथ around 14,000 देशी inhabitants, and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing, feasting and tobacco ceremonies, and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists, जो यहूद नहीं agriculturally inclined, हालांकि संबंध साथ the newcomers भी soured fairly जल्दी on, अग्रणी to the कुल annihilation of the paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the वर्जिनिया कम्पनी brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to सहायता improve the settlement.
In 1619, the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown, हालांकि the आधुनिक धारणा of गुलामी in the भविष्य संयुक्त राज्य किया नहीं begin in Virginia until 1660.
When the colony was subdivided into the original आठ shires of वर्जिनिया in 1634, the कस्बा became स्तिथ in the eponymous जेम्स City Shire.
The London Company 's second settlement, Bermuda, claims to be the site of the oldest कस्बा in the अंग्रेज़ी नई संसार, as st. जार्ज 's, बरमूडा was officially established ( as New London ) in 1612, whereas James Fort, in Virginia, was not to be converted into James towne until 1619, and further did not survive into the present day.
In 1699, the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today williamsburg, बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a settlement, existing today only as an archaeological site.
आज, jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया, साथ with Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the archaeological site on Jamestown Island, is a cooperative effort by jamestown नेशनल ऐतिहासिक साईट ( भाग of औपनिवेशिक नेशनल ऐतिहासिक पार्क ), और संरक्षण Virginia.
The Jamestown उपनिवेश, a जीना इतिहास interpretive साईट, is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown न्यास in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.
James Christopher Frey ( born सितंबर 12, 1969 ) is an American writer.
उसके किताबे a लाख छोटी टुकड़े ( 2003 ) और my dost लियोनार्ड ( 2005 ), as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ), were bestsellers.
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered कि थाना समय और the extent of निश्चित चोटों यहूद अतिरंजित in a लाख छोटी टुकड़े, a अधिकारीगण autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction.
Deere & कम्पनी, सबसे commonly ज्ञात by इसके नाम जॉन deere, is an अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline, इलिनोइस, और एक of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world.
In 2012, it was listed as 97th in the Fortune 500 अमेरिका 's रैंकिंग और 190th in the सौभाग्य 500 Global ranking.
Deere and Company agricultural products, बेची अंतर्गत the जॉन deere नाम, शामिल tractors, combine हार्वेस्टर, कपास हार्वेस्टर, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, and UTVs.
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment, as खूब as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल इंजन और drivetrains ( axles, ट्रांसमिशन, gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment.
Additionally, John Deere manufactures उपकरण प्रयुक्त in लॉन, grounds, और turf परवाह, ऐसे as walk-behind लॉन mowers, zero-turn लॉन mowers, lawn tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the core व्यवसायों, जॉन deere भी provides वित्तीय सेवाएं और अन्य related activities.
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' और रै a चित्र of a leaping हिरण as a लोगो, a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing रनों जैसे a deer ''.
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` nothing रनों जैसे a deere '' लिये a विपणन अभियान to sell snowmobiles.

The United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स.
( Hamilton is एक of दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल जारी u.S. bills.
the अन्य is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर. )
सब $ 10 बिल्स जारी आज are Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने before it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 यहूद $ 10 बिल्स.
Ten dollar bills are delivered by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in पीला straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट collection of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).
Andy सैमुएल ग्रिफ़िथ ( जून 1, 1926 – जुलाई 3, 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी कर्ता, टेलीविज़न producer, Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer, and writer.
He was a Tony Award nominee लिये दो भूमिकाएँ, और gained prominence in the अभिनीत भूमिका in निदेशक एलिया कज़न 's फिल्मी a फेस in the भीड ( 1957 ) पहले he became बेहतर known for his television roles, playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock.
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin, ( née Raines ; born जुलाई 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd, अमरीकी -born naturalist, author, the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, Queensland, Australia.
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter, their unconventional television nature वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी साथ साथ इसके spin-off श्रेणी, क्रोक फाइलें और the मगरमच्छ शिकारी डायरीज़.
She has lived in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992, जब वो शादीशुदा स्टीव Irwin.
Andreas Cellarius 's उदाहरण of the copernican प्रणाली, इससे the harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the खगोलीय मॉडल in जिससे the धरती और ग्रह revolve around a relatively stationary Sun at the center of the Solar System.
The word आता इससे the यूनानी ( helios `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, जिससे लगाई the धरती at the center.
The notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as early as the 3rd century BC by Aristarchus of Samos, but aristarchus 's heliocentrism आकर्षित छोटी ध्यान जबतक कोपरनिकस revived और elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that इस is a भ्रामक छाप resulting इससे the घाटा of वैज्ञानिक works of the hellenistic Era.
Using indirect evidence he argues कि a heliocentric दृश्य थी expounded in हिप्पारकस 's work on gravity.
It was not until the 16th सदी कि a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली थी प्रस्तुत, by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ, astronomer, and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland, leading to the Copernican Revolution.
In the following century, योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित इस मॉडल to शामिल अंडाकार orbits, and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of विलियम हर्शेल, फ्रेडरिक bessel, और अन्य, खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास कि the सूर्य थी नहीं the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions.
Norah Jones ( born Geetali नोराह जोन्स शंकर ; कूच 30, 1979 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
She is the daughter of भारतीय सितार खिलाड़ी रवि शंकर और Sue Jones.
She is भी anoushka शंकर 's half-sister.
In 2002, वो शुभारम्भ उसके सोलो म्यूज़िक करियर साथ the रिलीज of the commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed album Come Away with Me, a fusion of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album, selling over 26 million copies.
The record अर्जित जोन्स पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित the एल्बम of the साल, रिकार्ड of the साल, and Best New Artist.
Her subsequent studio albums, Feels Like Home, released in 2004, Not Too Late, released in 2007, the same year she made उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी नाइट्स, और उसके 2009 रिलीज the पतन सब gained प्लेटिनम औकात, selling over a लाख नक़ल और यहूद generally well received by critics.
Jones ' fifth studio album, छोटी टूटा दिल, थी released on अप्रैल 27, 2012.
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards और थी 60th on बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका 's कलाकारों of the 2000–2009 decade chart.
throughout उसके करियर, जोन्स रै जीती numerous पुरस्कार और has sold more than 50 million albums worldwide.
बिलबोर्ड नामित उसके the शीर्ष जैज़ artist of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be confused साथ आयाम of a शारीरिक quantity.
For अन्य उपयोग, देखिए आयाम ( disambiguation ).
From left to right, the वर्गाकार, the घन, और the tesseract.
The वर्गाकार is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों, the घन by 2-dimensional क्षेत्रों, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A projection of the घन is दिए चूंकि it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, जिससे additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप भी in three-dimensional space.
A diagram प्रर्दशित the पहला चार स्थानिक dimensions.
In physics and गणित, the आयाम of a स्पेस or ऑब्जेक्ट is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to specify any point within it.
Thus a लकीर रै a आयाम of एक क्युकी तभी एक निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a point on it ( for example, the point at 5 on a number line ).
A surface such as a plane or the सतह of a बेलन or गोला रै a आयाम of दो क्युकी दो निर्देशांक हैं needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये example, to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a cube, a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional क्युकी तीन निर्देशांक हैं needed to locate a point within these spaces.
In physical terms, dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position in time ( perceived as a scalar dimension along the t-axis ), as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures कि correlate साथ दोनो कण और फ़ील्ड conceptions, interact according to सापेक्ष गुण of द्रव्यमान —and are fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or अन्य अक्ष, may be संदर्भित to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or ढांचा in इसके रवैया and relationship to other objects and occurrences.
Physical theories that चरितार्थ समय, ऐसे as सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' सहित क्वांटम फ़ील्ड और स्ट्रिंग theories.
The state-space of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional function space.
the अवधारणा of आयाम is नहीं प्रतिबंधित to physical objects.
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for अनेक कारण, अक्सर as विन्यास स्पेसेस ऐसे as in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; ये हैं अमूर्त स्पेसेस, स्वतंत्र of the physical space we live in.
Fontana ( ) is a नगर of 200,762 निवासियों in San Bernardino County, California.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially ग्रामीण जबतक संसार युद्ध ii, जब उद्योगों हेनरी J. कैसर निर्मित a large steel mill in the area.
It is now a regional hub of the trucking उद्योग, साथ अंतरराज्यीय 10 और राज्य रूट 210 transecting the नगर इससे ईस्ट to वेस्ट, और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County system पुस्तकालयों, a संवर ऐतिहासिक थिएटर, a नगरपालिका पार्क, और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे on the साईट of the कैसर Steel Mill.
Fontana also hosts the fontana दिनों हाफ मैराथन and 5K run.
This race is the तीव्रतम half-marathon कोर्स in the world.
The U.S. 2012 जनसांख्यिकी reported कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012, बनाना it the second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state.
cowboys स्टेडियम is a स्टेडियम साथ a retractable roof in Arlington, Texas.
It serves as the घर of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's डलास Cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered टेक्सास स्टेडियम, जिससे खोली in 1971, और परोसा as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season.
It was समाप्त on may 27, 2009.
The stadium seats 85,000, making it the तीसरा largest स्टेडियम in the एनएफएल by seating क्षमता.
The maximum क्षमता of the स्टेडियम, सहित खड़ा room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are पीछे सीटे in प्रत्येक समाप्त मण्डल और on a श्रेणी of छह elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म कनेक्ट by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free आंतरिक और the चौथी largest ऊँची परिभाषा वीडियो स्क्रीन, जिससे hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line.
The facility can also be प्रयुक्त लिये a किस्में of अन्य क्रियाएँ बाहर of इसके प्रमुख purpose ( पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल ) ऐसे as कॉन्सर्ट, बास्केट games, boxing matches, college football and high school football contests, soccer matches, and motocross races.
Canadian इतिहासकारों जबतक the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक history, including labour history.
In part this is because कनाडा रै था दूर कम राजनैतिक or सैन्य विरोध than अन्य societies.
This was especially true in the पहला हाफ of the बीसवीं सदी जब आर्थिक इतिहास थी overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this period were आर्थिक इतिहासकारों, ऐसे as हेरोल्ड innis, डोनाल्ड creighton और आर्थर R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history यहूद वारिस to the परंपराओं कि विकसित in यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन frameworks कि worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada.
The heavily मार्क्सवादी बहकावे आर्थिक इतिहास कि dominates यूरोपीय has little relevance to most of Canadian history.
A focus on class, urban areas, and industry fails to पता कनाडा 's ग्रामीण और संसाधन आधारित अर्थव्यवस्था.
Similarly, the monetarist school that is dominant in the संयुक्त राज्य भी रै महरूम मुश्किल to ट्रांसफ़र उत्तर of the border.
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on economic भूगोल, और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल स्कूल of विचार रै महरूम the स्टेपल्स लेख.
इस स्कूल of विचार bases the पढ़ाई of the कनाडाई economy on the study of natural resources.
इस दृष्टिकोण रै चूंकि भी become प्रयुक्त बाहर of कनाडा in Australia and in many developing nations.
पहले the आगमन of europeans, the पहला राष्ट्र of कया would become Canada had a large and vibrant trade network.
Furs, tools, decorative items, and other goods were प्रायः transported हज़ारों of किलोमीटर, ज़्यादातर by कैनो throughout the अनेक नदियाँ and lakes of the region.
The early European history of the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था is प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था विकसित through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a रेडियोसक्रिय समस्थानिक of कार्बन साथ a केंद्रक containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in organic materials is the basis of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to तिथि पुरातत्व, geological and hydrogeological samples.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940, by Martin कामेन और sam रूबेन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण प्रयोगशाला in बर्कली, हालांकि इसके अस्तित्व था महरूम सुझाया by फ्रांज kurie in 1934.
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, and carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts, i.e., बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years.
carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta decay.
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक रे कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the atmosphere, and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air नाभिकीय परीक्षण between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
The different isotopes of carbon do नहीं differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक properties.
This is used in chemical and biological research, in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त to बदलें nonradioactive कार्बन, in अनुक्रम to ट्रेस रासायनिक और biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए organic compound.
Lightning is a अत्यधिक दृश्य रूप of उर्जा ट्रांसफ़र
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a विशाल स्केल between the माहौल और an earth-bound object.
They ज़्यादातर originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the ground, called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning.
However, they may also be initiated from a very tall grounded ऑब्जेक्ट और पहुँचें into the clouds.
Although `` a बिजली स्ट्राइक '' is commonly प्रयुक्त to describe सब बिजली, it is बल्कि ग़लत और a misnomer, as तभी परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं cg, the विशाल बल्क of lightning events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ), where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere.
The scientific name for the पूरा प्रक्रम of a सिंगल बिजली इवेंट is a और it is a बहुत complex, multiple stepped interaction, which is not completely understood.
Most CG flashes only `` strike '' one शारीरिक स्थान, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the उज्जवल coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '', is तभी परिचय 1 इंच in व्यास, although to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are miles long, upwards of tens of मील.
And the entire फ्लैश, lasts तभी a few भिन्नों of a दूसरी, सबसे of जिससे is not visible to human eyes.
थंडर is सदा उत्पादित by lightning.
Just like lightning, that deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or closer than it वाकई is, the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी दिमाग 's बोध of the बाहर संसार, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
Lightning can नहीं happen in a वैक्यूम विहीन of ions, nor can थंडर occur without molecules to vibrate.
थंडर is a शारीरिक निरपेक्ष for every single flash of lightning.
contrary to लोकप्रिय विश्वास, a बिजली स्ट्राइक itself is प्रायः नहीं responsible for multiple deaths or injuries from a single event.
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of a फ्लैश, जबतक लोगों or पशु यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य, or वे यहूद somehow arranged खड़ा और part of the flash channel.
When lightning ignites an available fuel source and an विस्फोट occurs, it is the शॉक वेव or आग causing the चोटों, नहीं the strike itself.
Ground Currents, भी पुकारा कदम संभावित, of an धरती termination is कया truly कल्याणकारी सबसे चोटों or death to humans and animals.
The near instantaneous फटाफट of सतह आरोप, induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud itself, रेस to the स्ट्राइक पाइंट इससे hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge.
This current, caused during each stroke, takes the path of तनिक प्रतिरोध, जिससे may be आयन समृद्ध इंसान or एनिमल टाँगे, over poorly conducting earth.
This is why it is बेहतरीन to crouch, साथ फीट बंद साथ, if कभी caught in the open during a thunderstorm.
Unfortunately, most reports do not draw a भेद between the रियल कारण of चोट or मौत, be it the स्ट्राइक itself, a resulting explosion or fire, or usually responsible step potential.
पीटर F. kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is the current Attorney General of Rhode Island.
Kilmartin is भी a रिटायर्ड पुलिस कप्तान और a पूर्व सदस्य of the Rhode Island House of Representatives.

Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual ) performed in latter दिन संतो मंदिरों by a व्यक्ति पकड़कर the sealing authority.
The purpose of this अध्यादेश is to मुहर परिचित संबंध, बनाना संभावित the अस्तित्व of family relationships throughout eternity.
LDS शिक्षाओं प्लेस ग्रेट महत्व on the विशिष्ट प्राधिकार जरूरी to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine सिखाती कि इस प्राधिकार, पुकारा the priesthood, corresponds to कि दिए to Saint Peter in.
Sealings are typically performed as विवाह or as sealing of children to अभिभावक.
They were performed prior to the death of Joseph Smith, Jr. ( the main संस्थापक of the latter दिन संत गति ), और हैं फिलहाल performed in the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of Latter-day Saints.
Although some other denominations, ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह, दृश्य sealing as an centuries of स्मिथ 's अभ्यास of बहुवचन विवाह, कुछ do स्टिल perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two thousands '', was a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1, 2000, और ended on दिसम्बर 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated बाद the जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी, जारी to be a फ़ोर्स in the 2000s.
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to वैश्वीकरण दौरान the दशक, बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact साथ अन्य लोगों, एक्स्प्रेस विचार, introduce अन्य to अलग संस्कृतियों और पृष्ठभूमि, उपयोग goods और सेवाएं, बेचें और ख़रीदे ऑनलाइन, शोध और सीख about things, along with experiencing the world without having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages and technologies कि उभरा or यहूद redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक लाभ अनेक देशों, in particular China and India.
However, in other parts of the world such प्रगति विफल to पता जारी struggles साथ आधुनिकता, सबसे notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups.
The सितंबर 11 हमले in 2001 led to the संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, स्पेन, कनाडा और अन्य राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान, as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror.
The European संघ देखी further संयोजन और विस्तार throughout much of Europe.
The आर्थिक विकास of the 2000s था considerable पर्यावरणीय consequences, उठाया माँग लिये घटाते उर्जा संसाधन, और was still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s.
The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral थी a gunfight कि took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार, अक्तूबर 26, 1881, in tombstone, एरिज़ोना territory, और is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted only about thirty seconds, was fought between the outlaw Cowboys बिली claiborne, आइक और बिली clanton, और tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury, और the opposing कस्बा मार्शल वर्जिल earp और उसके भाइयो सहायक कस्बा मार्शल मॉर्गन and temporary lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy claiborne भागा इससे the लड़ो unharmed, लकिन आइक 's bhai बिली clanton थी मारे, साथ साथ both McLaurys.
Lawmen वर्जिल और मॉर्गन earp and Doc Holliday were wounded.
Only Wyatt Earp आए through the लड़ो unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a समय in अमरीकी इतिहास जब the frontier थी खोलें दायरा लिये outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि थी स्प्रेड पतला over vast territories, leaving some areas unprotected.
The gunfight was नहीं खूब ज्ञात to the अमरीकी पब्लिक जबतक 1931 जब लेखक स्टुअर्ट झील प्रकाशित what has since been determined to be a largely fictionalized biography, Wyatt Earp : Frontier Marshal, two years after Earp 's death.
Lake retold उसके स्टोरी in a 1946 किताब कि निदेशक जॉन घाट विकसित into the movie My Darling Clementine.
After the movie gunfight at the o.k. corral थी released in 1957, the shootout came to be known by that name.
Since then, the conflict has been portrayed साथ varying डिग्री of सटीकता in numerous Western films and books.
Despite its नाम, the gunfight दरअसल occurred in a सीमित लॉट छह द्वार वेस्ट of the पश्च प्रवेश to the O.K. Corral on Fremont Street, and also in the street.
the दो opposing पार्टियों यहूद initially only about apart.
परिचय तीस गोलियाँ यहूद fired in तीस seconds.
Ike Clanton दायर हत्या आरोप विरूद्ध the earps और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे लकिन वे यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश बाद a 30-day प्रारंभिक hearing and then again by a local grand jury.
On December 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw cowboys, और on कूच 18, 1882, वे assassinated मॉर्गन earp.
The संदिग्धों सुसज्जित ठोस alibis, और newly नियुक्त डिप्टी u.s. मार्शल व्याट earp took matters into his own hands during the Earp Vendetta Ride, ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest.
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed वीडियो आंकड़ा और compressed/uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स यंत्र '' ) to a संगत कंप्यूटर मॉनिटर, वीडियो प्रोजेक्टर, डिजिटल टेलीविज़न, or digital audio device.
HDMI is a digital बदलना लिये मौजूदा एनालॉग वीडियो standards.
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available, each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format, including standard, उन्नत, ऊँची परिभाषा, और 3d वीडियो सिग्नल ; up to 8 चैनल्स of संपीडित or uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो ; a cec ( उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कंट्रोल ) कनेक्शन ; और an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards, which define video स्वरुप और waveforms, हस्तांतरण of संपीडित, uncompressed, और lpcm audio, auxiliary data, and implementations of the VESA EDID.
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each अन्य जब जरुरी और allows the उपयोक्ता to operate अनेक डिवाइस with one remote control handset.
Because HDMI is electrically संगत साथ the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल विज़ुअल इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ), no signal conversion is necessary, nor is there a loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used.
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection, HDMI is independent of the various digital television मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस, ऐसे as atsc और dvb, as ये हैं encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी वीडियो स्ट्रीम ( जिससे can be decoded और आउटपुट as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
उत्पादन of उपभोक्ता hdmi उत्पाद प्रारंभ in late 2003.
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is शामिल in the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification लिये tv सेट लिये hdtv, प्रतिपादित by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV camcorders और डिजिटल स्टिल कैमरे in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is ten years after the release of the first HDMI specification, over 3 अरब hdmi डिवाइस have shipped चूंकि the लॉन्च of the hdmi मानक.
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also ज्ञात in the श्रेणी as ब्री होज और ब्री वेस्टन ) is a fictional अक्षर और एक of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives.
She is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has received multiple awards और nominations लिये उसके portrayal, सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन, three Golden Globe Award nominations, and two Screen Actors Guild Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of ब्री रै महरूम widely praised by critics and fans.
Cross originally auditioned लिये the भूमिका of मरियम ऐलिस यंग, लकिन श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क चेरी thought she was better suited for the role of Bree.
Dana Delany, who eventually was cast as कैथरीन mayfair, थी originally चुनी लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas, saying it थी too समान to her role in Pasadena.
Bree 's main struggle throughout the श्रेणी रै महरूम उसके कोशिशें to maintain a पूर्ण जीवन despite विभिन्न बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood, divorce, and alcoholism hindering her.
She has been शादीशुदा तीन टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ), orson होज ( काइल maclachlan ) और ट्रिप Weston ( Scott Bakula ).

The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American comedy फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary तस्वीरें और वितरित by warner भाईs. तस्वीरें.
It is the sequel to 2009 's the hangover और the दूसरी फिल्मी in the hangover मताधिकार.
Todd Phillips निर्देशित the फिल्मी in जोड to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin, and Scot Armstrong.
The film stars Bradley कूपर, ed helms, zach galifianakis, केन jeong, जेफरी tambor, जस्टिन bartha और Paul Giamatti.
The Hangover Part II tells the story of फिल, stu, एलन, और डग as वे सफर to थाईलैंड लिये stu 's विवाह.
After the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Stu takes no chances and opts लिये a सुरक्षित, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
However, things do not go as नियोजित, resulting in another ख़राब hangover साथ no यादें of the previous night.
Development of The hangover भाग ii began in अप्रैल 2009, दो महीने पहले the hangover थी released.

Production began in October 2010, in ओंटारियो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, पहले चलती on स्थान in थाईलैंड.
The film थी released on may 26, 2011 और, despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक reviews from critics, it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run.

The English Renaissance थी a सांस्कृतिक और कलाकारी गति in इंग्लैण्ड डेटिंग from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century.
It is संबद्ध साथ the pan-european पुनर्जागरण that is usually regarded as beginning in Italy in the late 14th century.
Like most of northern यूरोपीय, इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of ये developments जबतक अधिक than a century later.
The beginning of the अंग्रेज़ी पुनर्जागरण is प्रायः लिया, as a convenience, to be 1485, जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the Wars of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty.
पुनर्जागरण स्टाइल और विचार, however, यहूद slow in penetrating इंग्लैण्ड, और the elizabethan era in the दूसरी हाफ of the 16th सदी is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance.
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( April 8, 1918 – July 8, 2011 ), थी पहला महिला of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1974 to 1977 दौरान the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford.
As First Lady, वो थी क्रियाशील in सोशल नीति और निर्मित precedents as a politically active presidential wife.
Throughout her husband 's term in office, she कायम ऊँची स्वीकृति दरजा despite विपक्ष इससे कुछ रूढ़िवादी Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues.
घाट थी विख्यात लिये उठाने स्तन कर्कट जागरूकता following उसके 1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate supporter of, and activist for, the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ).
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement, she gained fame as one of the most candid first ladies in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या of the समय, सहित नारीवाद, बराबर अदा, the era, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun control.
वो भी उठाया जागरूकता of व्यसन जब she announced her long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House years, she जारी to लॉबी लिये the era और remained क्रियाशील in the feminist गति.
She was the founder, and served as the first chair of the board of directors, of the बेट्टी घाट बीच लिये पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation साथ her husband, Gerald R. Ford, October 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone, presented 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 ( cd31 ) is a प्रोटीन कि in इंसान is एनकोडेड by the pecam1 जीन मिला on chromosome 17.
PECAM-1 plays a key भूमिका in निकालना aged neutrophils इससे the body.

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the प्रतिनिधि लिये the राज्य फ्लोरिडा in the मिस यूएसए pageant.
While Florida has been successful in terms of runners-up, finalists और semi-finalists, the राज्य रै never जीती the मिस यूएसए pageant, हालांकि चेरिल patton became मिस USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.

Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became ज्ञात as इंग्लैण्ड, स्थायी इससे the समाप्त of रोमन occupation और स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी जबतक the नॉर्मन conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who आए to ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th और 6th सदियां, सहित कोण, saxons, frisii, और jutes.
The term also refers to the भाषा बोला at the समय in इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा English, and to the culture of the era, which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon इंग्लैण्ड थी वर्चस्व by the heptarchy, the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया, mercia, ईस्ट Anglia, Essex, Kent, Sussex, and Wessex.
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed anglo-saxon paganism दौरान the जल्दी काल, लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity दौरान the 7th century.
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of Mercian hegemony दौरान the 640s, समाप्ति साथ the मौत of पेंदा of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became प्रबल दौरान the 9th सदी, अंतर्गत the नियम of अल्फ्रेड the ग्रेट.
During the 10th century, the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे stood opposed to the danelaw, the viking kingdoms स्थापित इससे the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क in 1013 और थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042, when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored.
the पिछला anglo-saxon किंग, हेरोल्ड godwinson, थी killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

Although the term lox is sometimes लागू to स्मोक्ड सामन, वे हैं अलग उत्पाद.

defibrillation is a आम उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be बाह्य, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, ज्ञात as स्वचालित बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the निदान of treatable लय, अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some cases no training at all.
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) थी a फ्रेंच फ़ैशन पंक्तियां और संस्थापक of the चैनल brand.
She थी the तभी फ़ैशन पंक्तियां to appear on समय पत्रिका 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
Along with Paul Poiret, Chanel was credited with liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the स्वीकृति of a sportive, कैज़ुअल चिक as the feminine मानक in the post- संसार युद्ध i era.
A prolific fashion creator, चैनल 's influence विस्तारित परे couture कपडे.
Her design aesthetic was realized in आभूषण, हैंडबैग, और महक.
Her हस्ताक्षर सैंट, चैनल no. 5, रै become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, महत्वाकांक्षा और उर्जा जिससे वो लागू to उसके पेशेवर and social life.
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence धन्यवाद to the कनेक्शन्स वो बना through उसके कार्य.
These included many artists और craftspeople to जिसको वो became a patron.
However, Chanel 's अत्यधिक प्रतिस्पर्धी, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led उसके to मेक questionable जीवन चुनाव जिससे have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा, विशेषकर उसके आचरण दौरान the German occupation of France in World War II.
अलाइड मिलों आटा मिल on the बैंको of the मैनचेस्टर Ship Canal
A gristmill ( also : grist मिल, मकई मिल or आटा मिल ) grinds grain into flour.
The पद can refer to दोनो the पीस यांत्रिकी and the building that holds it.
Romania ( ; dated spellings roumania और rumania ; ) is a देश स्तिथ at the चौराहे of सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania shares a border with हंगेरियाई और सर्बिया to the वेस्ट, युक्त और moldova to the northeast and east, and Bulgaria to the south.
At, Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union by area, और रै the सातवाँ largest जनसांख्यिकी of the यूरोपीय संघ साथ अधिक than 19 million people.
Its पूंजी और biggest नगर is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest नगर in the EU.
The संयुक्त principalities उभरा जब the territories of moldavia और wallachia were united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the throne as the सत्ताधारी प्रिंस of the रोमानियाई principate और in 1881 he थी आखिरकार पहनाया as किंग कैरोल i the पहला monarch of the Kingdom of Romania.
Independence from the Ottoman साम्राज्य थी घोषित on 9 may 1877, और थी internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of संसार युद्ध i, transylvania, bukovina और bessarabia संयुक्त with the Kingdom of Romania.
World War II gave cause to the वृद्धि of a सैन्य तानाशाही in रोमानिया अंतर्गत फासिस्ट सामान्य आयन antonescu, जो chose to लड़ो on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944.
After his removal, रोमानिया switched पहलू in 1944 और joined the allies.
By the end of the war, कुछ formerly रोमानियाई northeastern territories यहूद occupied by the सोवियत संघ, साथ रेड फौज इकाई stationed on Romanian soil.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a लोगों 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact.
In 1965 Nicolae ceauşescu became सामान्य सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी, और the हर्ष austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक repression, and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually his सत्तावादी सरकारी थी toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
With the fall of the Iron Curtain, Romania began its परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र और a पूंजीवादी मार्केट अर्थव्यवस्था.
After a decade of post-revolution आर्थिक समस्याएं और living-standards मनाही, extensive reforms fostered economic recovery.
As of 2010, रोमानिया is an upper-middle-income देश साथ a high human development index.
Romania joined नाटो on 29 कूच 2004, और the यूरोपीय संघ on 1 जनवरी 2007.
It is also a member of the : लैटिन संघ, francophonie, osce, wto, bsec, संयुक्त Nations, etc.
आज, रोमानिया is a एकात्मक semi-presidential गणतंत्र, in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा consists of the President and the Government.
`` Ancient '' redirects यहाँ.
For other uses, देखिए प्राचीनता ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The times पहले लिखने belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
Khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th dynasty ) and ग्रेट sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 bc or शायद earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the लिखा पास्ट इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित इंसान इतिहास to the Early Middle Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, साथ cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट, the oldest खोजा रूप of सुसंगत लिखने, इससे the protoliterate काल around the 30th century BC.
इस is the शुरूआत of इतिहास, as opposed to प्रागितिहास, according to the definition used by most historians.
the पद शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to इतिहास in the बूढ़ा World from the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the founding of रोम in 753 bc, the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम, और the शुरूआत of the archaic काल in Ancient Greece.
हालांकि the समाप्ति तिथि of प्राचीन इतिहास is विवादित, कुछ पश्चिमी विद्वानों उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad, the closure of the platonic अकादमी in 529 ad, the मौत of the emperor Justinian I, the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history.
In इण्डिया, the काल शामिल the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms, और, in चीन, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included.
methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is a रूप of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12, occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin b-12, भी पुकारा cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the आठ B vitamins.
It is normally involved in the चयापचय of प्रत्येक कोशिका of the इंसान देह, विशेषकर affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण and regulation, but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor पशु हैं सक्षम of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the एंजाइमों जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण, हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
it contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन परिवर्तन between अलग फ़ॉर्म of the विटामिन can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic रूप of the विटामिन, cyanocobalamin, करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति, लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the इंसान physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving पीछे the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
the अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of ये is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता, जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये secreting मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12, so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर, as देखी in घातक anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 कमियां और उनके biochemical प्रभाव have चूंकि been elucidated.
The Roman Empire ( ) थी the post- रिपब्लिकन काल of the प्राचीन रोमन सभ्यता, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, था महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी of सिविल wars.
Several events marked the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 bc ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` रोमन सलाम '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 ad ).
In the 3rd सदी, the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि threatened इसके अस्तित्व, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th सदी, दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the वेस्ट in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा, धर्म, वास्तुकला, दर्शनशास्त्र, विधि, और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed, विशेषकर Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total body surface area ( TBSA ) is an मूल्यांकन माप of burns of the स्किन.
In वयस्कों, the `` नियम of nines '' is प्रयुक्त to determine the कुल प्रतिशत of area burned for each major section of the body.
In some cases, the burns may cover more than one body part, or may not fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns हैं measured by using the casualty 's ताड़ as a सन्दर्भ पाइंट लिये 1 % of the देह.
For children and infants, the lund-browder चार्ट is प्रयुक्त to assess the burned देह surface area.
Different percentages are used क्युकी the अनुपात of the संयुक्त सतह क्षेत्रफल of the सिर और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult.
ठेठ मान लिये आम समूह of इंसानो follow.
( due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )
