Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June 26, 1975 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम kj-52, is a ईसाई rapper from Tampa, Florida.
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old रैप alias, `` किंग J. मैक, '' a नाम जिससे he बाद वर्णित in one of his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is pronounced `` five two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude साथ पाँच loaves और दो मछली, जिससे is भी सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the `` kj पाँच दो '' on it 's सुनाया 'five दो.
He was awarded the rap/hip हॉप अंकित सोंग of the साल लिये `` never dekh दूर '' और rap/hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.
On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released `` समाप्त of my रस्सी '', जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये उसके एल्बम five-two टेलीविज़न.
His song `` Dear Slim '' is आधारित on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` स्टेन `` और is a sort of निजी message from KJ-52 to Eminem.
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical प्रतीक कि is प्रयुक्त, among अन्य बाते, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक प्रणालियों ), घंटों ( in the medical field ), or degrees of temperature.
The symbol consists of a छोटी उठाया वृत्त, historically a शून्य glyph.
In Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
This is a list of roots, suffixes, and prefixes used in चिकित्सा शब्दावली, उनके meanings, और उनके etymology.
There are a few नियम जब using चिकित्सा roots.
Firstly, prefixes और प्रत्यय, primarily in यूनानी, लकिन भी in लैटिन, have a droppable -o-.
As a general rule, this -o- almost सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट दो consonantal जड़ें, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = गठिया, बजाय of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical roots generally go साथ according to भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go साथ यूनानी प्रत्यय और लैटिन prefixes with Latin suffixes.
Although international scientific vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining फ़ॉर्म of अलग भाषाएं, it is advisable जब coining नई शब्द नहीं to मिक्सर अलग lingual roots.
Stomach cancer, or gastric कर्कट, refers to कर्कट arising इससे any part of the stomach.
Stomach कर्कट कल्याणकारी परिचय 800,000 मौतों worldwide per year.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) क्युकी सबसे मरीजों उपस्थित साथ उन्नत disease.
सारा lynn इवांस ( born फ़रवरी 5, 1971 ) is an American country singer and songwriter.
For her entire career, वो रै महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड नैशविले.
इवांस ' डेब्यू, तीन मदारी और the सच्चाई, किया नहीं produce a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts.
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998 ), Born to मक्खी ( 2000 ), बेचैन ( 2003 ) और रियल ठीक प्लेस ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ), जबकि the अन्य तीन एल्बम सब यहूद certified प्लेटिनम.
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No Place That Far ``, `` born to मक्खी ``, `` suds in the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the शीर्ष 10 हिट्स `` i could नहीं Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain song ), `` I Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 Greatest Hits included the top 15 hits `` तुम 'll सदा be my baby `` और `` as if ``.
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number 1 hit, `` A छोटी बिट stronger ``, जिससे थी co-written by हिलेरी स्कॉट of Lady Antebellum.
Evans has also won one पुरस्कार प्रत्येक इससे बिलबोर्ड, the अकादमी of देश म्यूज़िक, देश म्यूज़िक संघ, Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award.
The world 's principal religions and spiritual traditions may be वर्गीकृत into a छोटी क्रमांक of प्रमुख समूह, हालांकि इस is by no अर्थात् a वर्दी practice.
This सिद्धान्त began in the 18th सदी साथ the लक्ष्य of recognizing the सापेक्ष levels of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a c-54 जमीन at tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The Berlin नाकेबंदी ( 24 जून 1948 – 12 may 1949 ) थी एक of the पहला प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the Cold War.
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II Germany, the Soviet संघ अवरोधित the पश्चिमी allies ' रेल, सड़क, और कनाल अभिगम to the सेक्टर of Berlin under Allied control.
Their aim was to force the पश्चिमी शक्तियां to allow the सोवियत मण्डल to प्रारंभ supplying बर्लिन साथ खाना और ईंधन, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In जवाब, the पश्चिमी allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन एयरलिफ्ट to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin.
Aircrews from the United States Air Force, the British Royal Air Force, the Royal Australian Air Force, the Royal Canadian Air Force, the Royal New Zealand Air Force, and the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी एयर फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 फ़्लाइट in एक साल, providing up to 4700 टन of रोज़ necessities ऐसे as ईंधन और खाना to the berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort was clearly succeeding और, by अप्रैल, the एयरलिफ्ट थी delivering अधिक कार्गो than था previously महरूम transported into the city by rail.
The कामयाबी of the बर्लिन एयरलिफ्ट brought शर्मिंदगी to the soviets जो had refused to believe it could make a difference.
The blockade was lifted in may 1949 और resulted in the सृष्टि of दो separate German states.
the संघीय गणतंत्र of जर्मनी ( वेस्ट जर्मनी ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin.
In remembrance of the airlift, three एयरपोर्ट in the पूर्व पश्चिमी zones of the नगर परोसा as the प्राथमिक gateways to Germany for another fifty years.
The euro चिह्न ; logotype और handwritten.
The euro sign is the currency sign used for the euro, the आधिकारिक करेंसी of the eurozone in the यूरोपीय Union ( EU ).
The design was प्रस्तुत to the पब्लिक by the यूरोपीय Commission on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter कोड ( according to आईएसओ मानक आईएसओ 4217 ) लिये the euro is EUR.
In युनिकोड it is encoded at.
In English, the चिह्न precedes the value.
In कुछ styleguides, लकिन नहीं अन्य, the यूरोपियन चिह्न is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes भी spelled maté ), भी ज्ञात as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a परंपरागत दक्षिण अमरीकी infused पेय, विशेषकर in अर्जेंटीना, उरुग्वे, पैराग्वे and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, Syria and Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping सूखी पत्ते of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, ज्ञात in पुर्तगाली as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is served with a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे a साझा खोखला calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in some लैटिन अमरीकी देशों, a bomba in पुर्तगाली, और a bombija or, अधिक generally, a masassa ( प्रकार of स्ट्रॉ ) in Arabic.
the स्ट्रॉ is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially उपलब्धियाँ लोभी हैं typically बना of निकल silver, called Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; जबकि in ब्राज़ील, it रै the विशिष्ट नाम of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of Brazil, still used for general food and drink in remote regions ).
भी if the जल is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate पत्ते हैं सूखी, कटा, और मैदान into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla अधिनियमों as दोनो a स्ट्रॉ और a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with small holes or स्लॉट कि allow the brewed द्रव in, लकिन ब्लाक the चंकी पदार्थ कि makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla डिज़ाइन उपयोग a सीधा ट्यूब साथ छेद, or वसन्त sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the मार्केट in अर्जेंटीना, पैराग्वे और उरुग्वे लिये अनेक सालो अंतर्गत ऐसे व्यापार names as `` taragüí vitality '' in अर्जेंटीना, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''.
This is considered a completely अलग पेय.
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it संबद्ध साथ the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The automotive industry is a term that कवर a चौड़ी दायरा of कंपनियाँ और संगठनों शामिल in the डिज़ाइन, विकास, manufacture, विपणन, और selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is एक of the संसार 's सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक sectors by revenue.
The term automotive industry प्रायः करता नहीं शामिल उद्योग समर्पित to the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations.
The term ऑटोमोटिव थी निर्मित इससे यूनानी autos ( स्वः ), और लैटिन motivus ( of गति ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle.
This पद थी प्रस्तावित by sae सदस्य Elmer Sperry.
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista, jr. ( born जनवरी 18, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी मिश्रित martial कलाकार, bodybuilder, कर्ता, और पूर्व पेशेवर पहलवान बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये his time in World Wrestling Entertainment competing under the ring name Batista.
In WWE, he became a six-time world champion, जीतना the संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार टाइम्स, और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई चैंपियनशिप दो times.
he is the longest-reigning संसार हेवीवेट Champion in WWE history.
In addition to these championships, Batista has won the World Tag Team चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric फ्लेयर और एकबार साथ जॉन सीना ) और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप एकबार ( साथ rey मिस्टीरियो ).
बतिस्ता थी भी the विजेता of the 2005 royal rumble मैच और गई on to शीर्षक रेसलमेनिया 21, एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant, Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 और थी भेजा to इसके developmental territory, ओहियो घाटी कुश्ती ( ovw ), जहाँ he जीती the ovw हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप.
In August 2012, Bautista signed a contract with क्लासिक entertainment & खेल to लड़ो in मिश्रित martial arts.
He won his MMA debut on अक्तूबर 6, 2012, defeating विंस lucero via tko in the first round.
Henry T. Thomas Sampson, Jr. ( born in जैक्सन, मिसिसिपी in 1934 ) is an african-american आविष्कारक.
He graduated from ऊँची स्कूल in 1951 इससे lanier ऊँची स्कूल in जैक्सन, Mississippi.
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years before transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a सदस्य of the ओमेगा psi फाई बिरादरी.
He received a Bachelor 's उपाधि in विज्ञान इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
He graduated with an MS degree in अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Los Angeles in 1961.
sampson भी प्राप्त उसके ms in नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965, and his PhD in 1967.
He is the first African अमरीकी to earn a ph.d.in नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Some of his accomplishments include होने a सदस्य of the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी between the सालो 1962 और 1964 और कमाई an परमाणु Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the ब्लैक चित्र पुरस्कार इससे aerospace निगम in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science Award, और पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा, by the लॉस एंजिल्स परिषद of ब्लैक पेशेवर इंजीनियर्स in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson was शादीशुदा to लौरा howzell यंग in st. थामस, u.S. वर्जिन Islands.
young-sampson is a प्राध्यापक in the कॉलेज of शिक्षा at California State University San Bernardino.
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser लिये us अध्यक्ष Barack Obama.
previously, he थी the 28th White House Press Secretary.
Gibbs was the संचार निदेशक लिये then- u.s. सीनेटर ओबामा और उसके 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked with Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns, having served as communications निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान कमेटी और लिये चार व्यक्तिगत सीनेट अभियान, सहित those of ओबामा in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs was also the दबायें सचिव of प्रतिनिधि bob etheridge.
On November 22, 2008, Gibbs was घोषित as the दबायें सचिव of the ओबामा प्रशासन.
He assumed the भूमिका of दबायें सचिव on जनवरी 20, 2009, और दिया उसके पहला official briefing on January 22.
On January 5, 2011, गिब्स घोषित कि he होता छोड़ the श्वेत हाउस to become an बाहर adviser to the administration.
He बाएँ on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
On February 12, 2013, it was announced that Gibbs had been नियुक्त as a योगदानकर्ता लिये cable-news चैनल एमएसएनबीसी.
His first appearance was on the वही रात्रि prior to the 2013 राज्य of the संघ पता.
Armando Pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम pitbull, is an अमरीकी rapper, songwriter, and record producer.
His first recorded प्रदर्शन थी इससे the लील jon एल्बम किंग्स of crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his debut album titled m.i.a.m.i. ( छोटी लिये धन is a प्रमुख समस्या ) अंतर्गत tvt Records.
Since then, he has released three अन्य एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल : el mariel in 2006, the boatlift in 2007, और ग्रह Pit in 2011.
He released Rebelution in 2009, जिससे शामिल singles `` i जान तुम want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``.
The latter peaked at No. 30 on the Hot 100 and No. 11 on the Hot Rap ट्रैक्स चार्ट जबकि `` i जान तुम want me '' peaked at no. 2 on the hot 100 और peaked भीतर the शीर्ष टेन धब्बे of चार्ट in the uk, कनाडा, इटली, और the Netherlands.
The song reached No. 1 in फ़्रांस और the यूरोपीय hot 100 on the सप्ताह समाप्ति अगस्त 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He later signed with Polo grounds म्यूज़िक through सोनी म्यूज़िक और निर्मित his own label Mr. 305 Inc.
Another सिंगल इससे rebelution थी `` होटल रूम सेवा ``, जिससे peaked at No. 8 on the Hot 100.
Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5 लाख विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles और एल्बम संयुक्त.
Nevertheless, he dropped a smash called `` दे me सबकुछ '' जिससे पहुँचे # 1 विश्वव्यापी, और प्रदर्शित artists Ne-yo, Nayer, and Afrojack.
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit songs, जैसे tik टोक, चीख & चिल्लाओ, lo hecho esta hecho, ख़राब, papi, ईंट, कैसा कम, tonight ( i 'm lovin ' तुम ), वीडियो फोन, over to तुम अभी and Bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the मेजबान of उसके अपना spanish-language कार्यक्रम on the केबल channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The Corner ).
In 2005 pérez और rapper शॉन 'diddy ' combs co-founded ख़राब लड़के लातीनी, a subsidiary of combs ' Bad Boy Records label.
It primarily focuses on लैटिन हिप हॉप, लैटिन आत्मा, लैटिन पॉप और अन्य तीव्र म्यूज़िक, और रै कार्यालयों in New York and Miami, Florida.
Along साथ co-founding it, pérez फिलहाल heads the A & R division of the label.
Pérez has become a product endorser, representing alongside Drake, Rihanna, and Trey Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी साथ the नरम पेय दानव dr pepper as भाग of the अभियान “ विदा 23 ” लिये जिससे he अंकित the सोंग specifically प्रदर्शित on उसके एल्बम Armando.
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson for voli वोदका, in जिससे he holds a बहुमत इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी, और budweiser रै चुनी pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer.
the commercials फिलहाल हाइलाइट pitbull नाचना और gyrating on stage holding up a bottle of Bud Light.
Pitbull has भी खरीदा an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in मियामी subs पिज़्ज़ा and Grill.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31, the संध्या of the पश्चिमी Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार, और त्यौहार of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other विद्वानों maintain कि it originated independently of samhain और रै solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा पार्टियों, नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, ठहराना bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's राय और विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं, as साथ मानहानि, बदनामी, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( सहित, लिये उदाहरण inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR राज्य कि `` [ e ] veryone shall have the सही to थाम राय बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश, receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of पब्लिक order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is found to cause religious offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, showing the Opera House, the CBD, गोलाकार quay, the सेतु, the parramatta नदी, उत्तर सिडनी और kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge आरपार सिडनी harbour कि carries रेल, vehicular, सायकिल और पैदल ट्रैफ़िक between the सिडनी सेंट्रल business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore.
The dramatic view of the bridge, the harbour, and the आसपास सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is an iconic चित्र of सिडनी, नई दक्षिण Wales, and Australia.
The bridge is nicknamed `` the coathanger '' क्युकी of इसके arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr j.j.c. bradfield of the nsw विभाग of पब्लिक works, the सेतु थी designed और निर्मित by अंग्रेजों firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
The सेतु 's डिज़ाइन थी बहकावे by the नरक फाटक Bridge in New York.
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 मीटर ( 160 फीट ) चौड़ी, जबतक निर्माण of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch सेतु in the संसार, और it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब bridge, measuring from top to water level.
जबतक 1967 the harbour सेतु थी सिडनी 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट स्तिथ निकट the namesake हवाई Islands, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world, the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount कड़ी, an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long कड़ी of ज्वालामुखी, चार of जिससे हैं क्रियाशील, दो of जिससे हैं dormant, और अधिक than 123 of जिससे हैं विलुप्त, अनेक having चूंकि महरूम मैदान beneath the लहरें by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the किनारे of the aleutian गर्त, निकट the पूर्वी किनारे of रूस.
While सबसे ज्वालामुखी हैं निर्मित by geological कार्यकलाप at tectonic थाली सीमाएँ, the हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is स्तिथ दूर इससे आसपास थाली सीमाएँ ; the क्लासिक हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त, पहला प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन, proposes कि a सिंगल, फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds ज्वालामुखी कि तब, काटें off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and हवाई खण्ड of the कड़ी थी caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट in the गति of the प्रशांत Plate.
In 2003, भैस investigations of इस irregularity led to the प्रस्ताव of a मोबाईल हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त, suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल, नहीं fixed, and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य of the ज्वालामुखी to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their निरंतर बैटल साथ the समुद्र थी a प्रमुख तत्व in हवाई mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of Europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 जेम्स ड्वाइट दाना निर्देशित the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics, confirming the संबंध long observed by the natives.
1912 चिह्नित the founding of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी वेधशाला by volcanologist थामस jaggar, initiating continuous scientific observation of the islands.
In the 1970s, a मानचित्रण प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to लाभ अधिक सूचना about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to गहन, और ओलीवाइन और गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have दिखाया इसके मैग्मा कक्ष is लगभग.
In इसके at तनिक 85 लाख सालो of कार्यकलाप the hotspot has produced an estimated of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift रै धीरे increased over समय, causing the राशि of समय प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत ज्वालामुखी is क्रियाशील to घटी, इससे 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 लाख साल बूढ़ा डेट्रॉयट seamount, to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक million year-old Kohala ; on the other hand, eruptive volume has increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट पक्ष of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming ऐसे superstructures as हवाई द्वीप और the प्राचीन मावी नुई ), the oldest of the सम्राट seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

osteonecrosis of the जबड़ों ( onj ) is a कठोर अस्थि बीमारी कि affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various forms of ONJ have महरूम वर्णित over the पिछला 160 सालो, और a क्रमांक of कल्याणकारी have महरूम सुझाया in the literature.
osteonecrosis of the जबड़े संबद्ध साथ bisphosphonate चिकित्सा, जरूरी by कुछ कर्कट उपचार regimens, रै been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk इससे निम्नतर मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates, लिया by मरीजों to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have महरूम छान, however कठोर मामले of onj स्टिल आवश्यकता surgical removal of the affected bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing प्रणालीगत समस्याएं और संभावित साइट of दंत संक्रमण हैं जरूरी to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball team based in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, और a सदस्य of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी लीग पूर्वी प्रभाग.
Founded in as one of the American लीग 's आठ चार्टर franchises, the रेड sox 's घर ballpark रै महरूम fenway पार्क since.
the `` रेड sox '' नाम थी चुनी by the टोली मालिक, जॉन I. टेलर, around, following previous Boston teams that had been known as the `` Red Stockings ``.
They have played in 11 संसार श्रेणी, जीतना 7.
Boston was a प्रबल टोली in the नई लीग, defeating the पिट्सबर्ग Pirates in the first World Series in and winning four more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history, called by कुछ the `` अभिशाप of the bambino `` बाद इसके कथित शुरूआत साथ the रेड sox 's बिक्री of बेब रुथ to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी यांकीज़ दो सालो बाद उनके संसार चैंपियनशिप in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in.
However, the टोली 's इतिहास दौरान कि काल थी hardly एक of futility, लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे यादगार पल in संसार श्रेणी इतिहास, सहित enos वध 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` Impossible Dream `` of, Carlton Fisk 's home run in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history has also been marked by the team 's intense rivalry with the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest और सबसे ऐतिहासिक in उत्तर अमरीकी पेशेवर खेल.
The Boston Red Sox are owned by Fenway खेल समूह, जो भी अपना लिवरपूल फ़ुटबॉल क्लबों of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox are consistently one of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति, जबकि the छोटी क्षमता of fenway पार्क रोकता उन्हें इससे अग्रणी in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular ऋतु ) लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल रिकार्ड कि lasted लगभग a दशक.
mince पाई भर साथ mincemeat
mincemeat is a मिश्रण of कटा सूखी फल, आसुत आत्माओं और मसाले, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat सदा contained meat.
Many modern recipes contain बीफ suet, हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्रिटनी, कनाडा, उत्तरी यूरोपीय, आयरलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, the United Kingdom and the United States.
In some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced or मैदान meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana frances ; née स्पेंसर ; 1 जुलाई 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) थी the पहला बीवी of चार्ल्स, Prince of Wales, the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was खूब ज्ञात लिये उसके fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 थी आयोजित at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और देखी by a वैश्विक टेलीविज़न दर्शक of over 750 million.
जबकि शादीशुदा वो bore the शीर्षक राजकुमारी of वेल्स, duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, duchess of Rothesay, Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two sons, the princes विलियम और हैरी, जो became दूसरी और तीसरा in लकीर to the British throne.
डायना थी born into an वैभवशाली अंग्रेज़ी family with royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th अर्ल स्पेंसर और उसके बीवी frances, बेटी of मौरिस रोश, 4th Baron Fermoy.
She became a पब्लिक फिगर साथ the घोषणा of her engagement.
She भी प्राप्त मान्यता लिये उसके दान कार्य और लिये उसके support of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Campaign to Ban Landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the ग्रेट ormond गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children, in जोड to dozens of other charities.
Diana remained the ऑब्जेक्ट of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny दौरान और बाद उसके विवाह, जिससे ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
मीडिया ध्यान और पब्लिक शोक यहूद considerable following उसके मौत in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the Argentine Republic ( ), is the दूसरी largest देश in दोनो दक्षिण अमेरिका और the लैटिन अमेरिका region.
The country is a federation of 23 provinces और the autonomous नगर of buenos आयर्स, इसके पूंजी और largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by जमीन क्षेत्रफल और the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक क्षेत्रफल of 2,780,400 km2 और is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, mercosur, the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the संगठन of ibero-american राज्य, the संसार बैंको Group and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by चिली to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण, बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the उत्तर और ब्राज़ील and Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina दावा प्रभुता over भाग of अंटार्कटिक, the फ़ॉकलैंड आइलैंड्स ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor state of the viceroyalty of the río de la प्लाटा, an विदेशी उपनिवेश of the स्पेनी Empire.
Argentina declared independence during the अर्जेंटाइन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी followed by the अर्जेंटाइन Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The country faced अनेक सैन्य coups और राजनैतिक अस्थिरता दौरान the 20th सदी, along with periodic economic crisis that continue to this day.
A recognized Southern Cone power, and middle power, Argentina is Latin अमेरिका 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था, साथ a `` बहुत ऊँची '' दरजा on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, Argentina has the पांचवां उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita और the उच्चतम in purchasing power terms.
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for future growth due to its market size, levels of foreign direct निवेश, और प्रतिशत of high-tech निर्यात as share of कुल manufactured goods '', और it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
Argentina is the Latin American country साथ the सबसे नोबेल पुरस्कार, लिये a कुल of पाँच, सब प्राप्त दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the twentieth century.
The country has three Nobel पुरस्कार in विज्ञान और दो of सलाम.
The most important पहलुओं of विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी in अर्जेंटीना हैं चिंतित साथ आयुर्विज्ञान, नाभिकीय भौतिकी, जैवप्रौद्योगिकी, nanotechnology, space and rocket technology and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the आचमन प्रदर्शनी बीच of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, उद्योग and art that are Latin America 's largest.
Hickory is a city in Catawba काउंटी, साथ भाग भी in बुर्के काउंटी और काल्डवेल County.
The city 's 2010 अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the hickory-lenoir-morganton एमएसए, in जिससे the जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, पीट, or the obsolete petp or pet-p, is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; beverage, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a सोर्स of भ्रम क्युकी इस पदार्थ, पालतु, करता नहीं contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate form, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly जर्नल्स लिये the खातिर of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on its processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may मौजूद दोनो as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline polymer.
The semicrystalline material might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( कण आकार up to a few माइक्रोन ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic एसिड और एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल साथ जल as a byproduct, or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
बहुलकीकरण is through a polycondensation प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( done immediately after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET production is for सिंथेटिक मछली ( in excess of 60 % ), साथ बोतल उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of वैश्विक demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its आम नाम, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` पालतु '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer production and is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) और polypropylene ( pp ) हैं पहला और दूसरी, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized इकाई of the मोनोमर एथिलीन terephthalate, with repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, और रै the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on अप्रैल 30, 1812, और elects सीनेटरों to वर्ग 2 and Class 3.
Its current सीनेटरों हैं डेमोक्रेट मरियम landrieu and Republican David Vitter.
Black खीर, रक्त खीर or रक्त सॉसेज is a प्रकार of सॉसेज बना by कुकिंग रक्त or सूखी रक्त with a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in विभिन्न संस्कृतियों इससे एशिया to यूरोपीय and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, sheep, बतख, और बकरी रक्त can be प्रयुक्त depending on अलग countries.
In Europe and the Americas, ठेठ fillers शामिल मांस, मोटे, suet, ब्रैड, cornmeal, मीठी आलू, onion, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
in स्पेन, पुर्तगाल और Asia, potato is often replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, organization, सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन 's actions
Stakeholder, an entity कि can be प्रभावित by the परिणाम of कि in जिससे वे हैं कहा to be हितधारकों, i.e., कि in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a व्यक्ति, समूह or संगठन साथ an ब्याज in a project
Stakeholder theory, a सिद्धान्त कि identifies और मॉडल the समूह जिससे हैं हितधारकों of a corporation or project
शेयरधारक विश्लेषण, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a project or event
शेयरधारक ( विधि ), a तीसरा पार्टी जो temporarily holds धन or property while its owner is still being determined
Jack smight ( कूच 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) थी an अमरीकी theatre and film director.
Smight was born in मिनियापोलिस, मिनेसोटा और गई to school with future actor Peter Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner, Rabbit, Run, Loving Couples, Midway, Harper, Airport 1975, Damnation Alley and the Emmy पुरस्कार -winning एडी, as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न श्रेणी ऐसे as the गोधूलि मण्डल और the अल्फ्रेड हिचकॉक Hour.
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play the 49th cousin और रचित the म्यूज़िक लिये the फिल्मी adaption of फेंकें of थंडर सुन My Cry.
Smight died इससे कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
dmitri ivanovich mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी 1907 o.s. 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor.
He formulated the Periodic Law, created उसके अपना संस्करण of the आवधिक तालिका of तत्व, और प्रयुक्त it to सही the गुण of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the नगर of modesto, is the काउंटी सीट और largest नगर of Stanislaus County, California, United States.
With a जनसांख्यिकी of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, modesto बाँधने as the 18th largest city in the state of California.
The Modesto Census County Division, which includes the शहरों of ceres और riverbank, रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the सेंट्रल घाटी क्षेत्रफल of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 मील उत्तर of fresno, 92 मील ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को, 68 मील दक्षिण of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time पेड़ नगर यूएसए honoree, is घिरी by समृद्ध farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, मुर्गियों, अखरोट, और मकई साइलेज, the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto was immortalized in the 1973 जार्ज लुकास film American Graffiti.
The award जीतना फिल्मी captured the स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और दोस्ती on 10th और 11th गलियों in 1962 और led to the पुनरुद्धार of 1950 's nostalgia कि शामिल the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, Harrison Ford and रिचर्ड dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी.
the साउंडट्रैक थी a विशाल success.
Director George Lucas is a देशी of modesto, graduating इससे Downey High School in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants daily और asks individuals to assess उनके कार्य, finances, शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य, emotional राज्य of दिमाग और समुदायों, क्रमित modesto 126 आउट of the 190 cities surveyed.
In December 2009, Forbes ranked Modesto 48th out of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck शहरों ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability और सफर समय लकिन भी क्रमित 86th in जॉब भविष्यवाणी विकास and 99th in foreclosures.
स्वतंत्रता दिन, commonly ज्ञात as the चौथी of जुलाई, is a संघीय अवकाश in the संयुक्त राज्य commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated with आतिशबाजी, parades, barbecues, carnivals, मेलों, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, बेसबॉल खेल, परिवार reunions, और राजनैतिक भाषणों and ceremonies, in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the United States.
स्वतंत्रता दिन is the नेशनल दिन of the संयुक्त States.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an सजीव or characterizes an एजेंट by gender.
The two standard gender प्रतीकों denoting पुरूष ♂ और मादा ♀ हैं निकला इससे astrological symbols, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance also denoting तत्व in alchemy, specifically the धातुओं आयरन और तांबे.
They were first used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e. sex of व्यक्तिगत in a दिए crossbreed, चूंकि सबसे पौधे हैं hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold एस्टेट is an स्वामित्व of a अस्थाई सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों of रियल प्रॉपर्टी by कुछ रूप of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does hold अधिकारों to रियल प्रॉपर्टी, a leasehold एस्टेट is typically considered personal property.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or प्रॉपर्टी कार्यकाल जहाँ एक पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy जमीन or a building for a given length of time.
As lease is a विधिक एस्टेट, leasehold एस्टेट can be bought and sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs इससे a freehold or शुल्क सरल जहाँ the स्वामित्व of a प्रॉपर्टी is खरीदा outright और thereafter आयोजित लिये an अनिर्धार्य लंबाई of समय, और भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as weekly or monthly.
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a पट्टे, जिससे रै तत्व of अनुबंध और प्रॉपर्टी विधि intertwined.
The term एस्टेट लिये सालो may occasionally be प्रयुक्त.
This refers to a leasehold एस्टेट लिये कोई विशिष्ट काल of समय ( the शब्द `` years '' is misleading ).
An estate for सालो is नहीं automatically नवीनीकृत.
Colloquially, `` पट्टे '' और `` पट्टे `` हैं प्रायः a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the संसार of the सुअर ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by मीडिया कम्पनी chorion और based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on उपनाम jr. in the us, मिल्कशेक !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and Disney Junior in लैटिन अमेरिका और ब्राज़ील, treehouse tv in Canada.
The show has won a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its धनात्मक स्टोरी लाइनों और वर्ण.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( नीचे ) और caribbean ( शीर्ष ), साथ कनाल at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a जलयान कनाल in पनामा कि connects the अटलांटिक समंदर ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
the कनाल कटौती आरपार the isthmus of पनामा और is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
There are locks at प्रत्येक समाप्त to लिफ्ट जहाजों up to gatun झील ( ऊपर sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the राशि of कार्य जरूरी लिये the canal.
The वर्तमान ताले हैं wide.
A third, wider लेन of ताले is being built.
France began कार्य on the कनाल in 1881, लकिन था to रोकें क्युकी of engineering problems and high mortality due to disease.
The United States ( US ) बाद took over the प्रोजेक्ट और took a दशक to पूरा the कनाल in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy केप सींग रूट around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult अभियान्त्रिकी प्रोजेक्ट कभी undertaken, the पनामा कनाल शॉर्टकट बना it संभावित लिये जहाजों to सफर between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required.
the shorter, तेज़, safer रूट to the us वेस्ट coast और to राष्ट्र in और साथ the प्रशांत Ocean allowed those places to become more integrated with the world economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory कि is अभी the पनामा कनाल थी पहला कोलम्बियाई, तब फ्रेंच, और तब American ; the United States completed the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the panamanian सरकारी, as long नियोजित.
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 ships when the canal opened in 1914, to 14,702 बरतन in 2008, the latter measuring a कुल of 309.6 लाख पनामा canal/universal मापन प्रणाली ( pc/ums ) tons.
By 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the canal, अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest जहाजों कि can पारगमन the कनाल आज हैं पुकारा Panamax.
The American Society of Civil इंजीनियर्स रै नामित the पनामा कनाल एक of the सात चमत्कार of the आधुनिक world.
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) थी एक of the founding fathers of the United States.
A noted polymath, Franklin was a अग्रणी लेखक, मुद्रक, राजनैतिक theorist, राजनेता, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, musician, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
As a scientist, he was a प्रमुख फिगर in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of भौतिकी लिये उसके discoveries and theories regarding electricity.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन स्टोव, a carriage ओडोमीटर, and the glass 'armonica '.
he facilitated अनेक नागरिक संगठन, सहित a आग department and a university.
Franklin earned the शीर्षक of `` the पहला अमरीकी '' लिये उसके जल्दी और indefatigable campaigning लिये औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies, तब as the first United States Ambassador to France, he exemplified the emerging American nation.
फ्रैंकलिन थी foundational in धमक the अमरीकी ethos as a विवाह of the व्यावहारिक मान of thrift, मुश्किल कार्य, शिक्षा, जातियाँ स्पिरिट, self-governing institutions, and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious, with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the शब्द of इतिहासकार हेनरी स्टील commager, `` in a फ्रैंकलिन could be मिलाया the virtues of Puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
To Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the most संपन्नता अमरीकी of उसके आयु और the सबसे influential in inventing the प्रकार of समाज अमेरिका would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working क्लास जड़ें, became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक in Philadelphia, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania वृत्तान्त, a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात लिये इसके क्रांतिकारी sentiments और आलोचनाओं of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य in the अमरीकी colonies.
He became wealthy publishing ग़रीब रिचर्ड 's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया Gazette.
Franklin gained international renown as a वैज्ञानिक लिये उसके प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in विद्युत और for his many inventions, especially the lightning rod.
He played a प्रमुख भूमिका in establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया और was elected the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national hero in अमेरिका जब he पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न to have पार्लियामेंट repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An संपन्नता राजनयिक, he थी widely admired among the फ्रेंच as अमरीकी मंत्री to Paris and was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations.
For many years he थी the अंग्रेजों postmaster लिये the colonies, जिससे सक्रिय उसे to नियत up the first national communications network.
He was active in community अफेयर्स, औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती, as खूब as नेशनल और international affairs.
इससे 1785 to 1788, he परोसा as governor of Pennsylvania.
Toward the end of his life, he freed उसके स्लेव और became एक of the सबसे prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement, and औकात as एक of अमेरिका 's सबसे influential founding fathers, have देखी फ्रैंकलिन सम्मानित on coinage और धन ; warships ; the names of अनेक कस्बों, काउंटी, शैक्षणिक संस्थानों, namesakes, and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
Criminal Minds is an अमरीकी पुलिस प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम कि premiered सितंबर 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a टोली of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's behavioral Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
The BAU is भाग of the एफबीआई नेशनल बीच लिये the Analysis of Violent Crime.
The show differs from many प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the दण्ड, बल्कि than the crime itself.
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in association साथ सीबीएस टेलीविज़न studios ( originally सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न ) और एबीसी studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in अक्तूबर 2009 कि विरासत इंटरैक्टिव होता develop a वीडियो game based on the show.
The game होता आवश्यकता खिलाड़ी to जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों for clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive पहेली खेल थी released in 2012, लकिन किया नहीं विशेषता कोई of the आवाज़ें of the दिखाएँ 's डाल, nor थी the cast involved with the project.
On March 14, 2012, सीबीएस नवीनीकृत दण्ड minds लिये an eighth season, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` heart-shaped बक्सा '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge बैंड निर्वाण, लिखा by vocalist और guitarist Kurt Cobain.
the सोंग थी released as the पहला सिंगल इससे the समूह 's तीसरा और फाइनल studio album, In Utero, in 1993.
It was one of two songs from the एल्बम मिश्रित by स्कॉट litt in अनुक्रम to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in the United States, `` Heart-Shaped Box '' प्राप्त much अमरीकी रेडियो airplay, reaching क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड आधुनिक चट्टान ट्रैक्स चार्ट.
The international रिलीज of the सिंगल पहुँचे क्रमांक पाँच on the uk Singles Chart.
The song 's music video, निर्देशित by एंटोन corbijn, garnered नाजुक plaudits.
The orbital speed of a body, generally a planet, a natural उपग्रह, an कृत्रिम उपग्रह, or a अनेक स्टार, is the गति at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter of a प्रणाली, प्रायः around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed, the औसत गति as it completes an कक्षा, or instantaneous कक्षीय गति, the गति at a particular point in its orbit.
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति, और the विशिष्ट कक्षीय उर्जा, जिससे is स्वतंत्र of स्थिति : the गतिज उर्जा is the total energy minus the potential energy.

Brown Palace होटल is the second-oldest ऑपरेटिंग होटल in Denver, Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now संचालित by कोरम होटल और रिसॉर्ट.
It was built in 1892, एक साल बाद than the ऑक्सफोर्ड Hotel.
It was named for its original owner, हेनरी C. भूरा, और थी designed साथ इसके विषम triangular आकार by वास्तु Frank Edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th st, डेनवर, co between 17th गली, ब्रॉडवे और tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The प्रमुख प्रवेश द्वार is on tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format प्रयुक्त to स्टोर डिजिटल वीडियो on dvd discs, और is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
discs using the dvd-video specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
वाणिज्यिक dvd फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
typically, the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, और the बिट रेट is usually adaptive.
It was first उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम लिये a शुल्क of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
Certain information in the DVD किताब is मालिकाना और गोपनीय.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a ईकाई of लंबाई कि is परिचय एक मिनट of चाप of अक्षांश measured along any meridian, or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator.
By अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध it रै महरूम नियत at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for उपयोग in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई by the bipm ) प्रयुक्त विशेषकर by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in international law and treaties, विशेषकर regarding the हद of territorial waters.
It developed from the समुद्र मील और the सम्बन्धित भौगोलिक mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and एयर navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of इसके convenience जब working with charts.
Most nautical चार्ट उपयोग the मर्केटर प्रक्षेप जिनकी स्केल varies by परिचय a फ़ैक्टर of छह इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश, so चार्ट covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a मिनट of अक्षांश on a चार्ट, so a अलहदा measured साथ a चार्ट divider can be roughly परिवर्तित to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale.
Shippensburg is a बरो in कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, shippensburg झूठ in the कम्बरलैंड घाटी, 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 लोगों जिया वहीँ ; in 1910, 3,457 ; and in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,492 at the 2010 census.
shippensburg थी incorporated as a बरो on January 21, 1819.
In the past, there were फर्नीचर कारखानों, इंजन और पंप works, और अन्य औद्योगिक works स्तिथ भीतर the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest निर्माता of सजावट और पार्टी goods, जिससे बिकता इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर सजावट विश्वव्यापी.
It is भी the स्थान of pague और fegan, the oldest लगातार operated hardware store in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ इसके अमरीकी मुख्यालय to Shippensburg.
shippensburg is भी घर to shippensburg विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया, एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया State System of Higher Education.
Yearly the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of जुलाई, the shippensburg जातियाँ Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the fair बिल्स itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county मेला.
The fair includes agricultural exhibits, a शिल्प दिखाएँ, खाना विक्रेता, और कार्निवल यात्राएँ amongst other things.
Every summer on the last Saturday of August, Shippensburg holds the Corn Festival, an इवेंट कि brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता to operate stands downtown.
the शहर is बंद to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at तनिक 5 ब्लॉक for most of the day.
Average उपस्थिति at the पर्व is अनुमानित at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy tongue ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the जीभ जहाँ the filiform papillae elongate साथ ब्लैक or भूरा discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, लकिन it is a हानिरहित कंडीशन.
Predisposing factors शामिल धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और certain medications.
Management is by improving मौखिक hygiene, विशेषकर scraping or brushing the tongue.
The IEEE 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a सीरियल बस इंटरफ़ेस मानक लिये high-speed संचार and isochronous real-time data transfer.
It was developed in the late 1980s और जल्दी 1990s by ठहराना, जो पुकारा it FireWire.
The 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is comparable to usb, और प्रायः those दो technologies हैं considered together, though USB has more market share.
Apple first शामिल firewire in कुछ of इसके 1999 मॉडल, और सबसे ठहराना कंप्यूटर चूंकि the साल 2000 have शामिल FireWire ports, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The इंटरफ़ेस is भी ज्ञात by the ब्रांड i.link ( सोनी ), और Lynx ( Texas Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many अनुप्रयोग, क्युकी of निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन लागत और a सरलीकृत, अधिक अनुकूलनीय cabling system.
the 1394 मानक भी defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस, though this is not as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition audio-video संजाल गठबंधन ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) घटक communication and control.
FireWire is also उपलब्धियाँ in बेतार, रेशा ऑप्टिक, और समाक्षीय संस्करण using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, और रिकार्ड producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और नेता of दोगुना Trouble.
Together with वादक क्रिस layton और bassist टॉमी शैनन, वे ignited the ब्लूज़ revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning सात सालो, vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट concerts while their albums frequently went gold.
He was born और उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, और लिये a छोटी period of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical करियर, joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that eventually evolved into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly performed around ऑस्टिन.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of संगीतकारों दाउद बोवी और जैक्सन Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य, जबकि browne offered the बैंड फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and दोगुना ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to एपिक रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the समूह released the एल्बम, could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released and अर्जित उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians सहित अल्बर्ट किंग, फ्रेडी किंग, ओटिस फटाफट, और muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ and pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम shores park.
Stevie Ray vaughan is widely माना to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas.
GigE redirects यहाँ.
लिये the कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल, देखिए GigE vision.
In computer networking, gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 gige ) is a पद describing विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting ईथरनेट फ्रेम्स at a रेट of a gigabit प्रति दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into उपयोग शुरूआत in 1999, धीरे supplanting तेज़ ईथरनेट in तार लोकल संजाल, जहाँ it performed considerably faster.
The cables and equipment are बहुत समान to पिछला मानकों और यहूद बहुत आम और किफायती by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are allowed by the specification, लकिन full-duplex उपयोग साथ switches is much अधिक common.

the प्रमुख components of a stamp:
1. चित्र
2. perforations
3. denomination
4. देश name
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper कि is खरीदा और प्रदर्शित on an मद of मेल as प्रमाण of भुगतान of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from खास पेपर, साथ a नेशनल नामांकन और denomination ( दाम ) on the फेस, और a गम चिपकने on the रिवर्स पक्ष.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती मेल as खूब as अन्य कारोबार necessities ऐसे as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s आकार is प्रायः कि of a छोटी आयताकार of varying proportions, though triangles or other shapes are occasionally used.
The stamp is affixed to an लिफाफा or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e., पैकेट, बक्सा, mailing बेलन ) that the customer wishes to send.
The item is तब processed by the डाक प्रणाली, जहाँ a postmark, sometimes ज्ञात as a रद्दीकरण चिह्नित, is प्रायः applied over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the तिथि और पाइंट of origin of the mailing.
The mailed item is then delivered to the address कि the ग्राहक रै लागू to the लिफाफा or कवर.
postage stamps have facilitated the डिलीवरी of mail since the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the शब्द 'stamp ' ), प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or कॉर्क, यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to फ़्रैंक the मेल और confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the पैनी ब्लैक, थी जारी in the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1840.
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of Great Britain और आयरलैंड, जिससे in the जल्दी 19th सदी थी in अस्तव्यस्तता और rife साथ भ्रष्टाचार.
There are varying खाते of the आविष्कारक or आविष्कारक of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient, a system that was associated with an irresolvable problem : the लागत of delivering मेल यहूद नहीं recoverable by the डाक सेवा जब प्राप्तकर्ता यहूद असमर्थ or unwilling to अदा लिये वितरित वस्तुएं, और प्रेषकों था no प्रोत्साहन to सीमित the क्रमांक, आकार, or weight of items sent, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved this issue in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner, साथ the अतिरिक्त लाभ of रूम लिये an तत्व of सौंदर्य to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes, post cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage मीटर, और, अधिक recently, specialty बाक्स और लिफाफे provided फ़्री to the ग्राहक by the u.S. डाक सेवा लिये प्रधानता or एक्स्प्रेस mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience for both the मेलर और डाक officials, अधिक efficiently बरामद लागत लिये the डाक सेवा, और ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings दौरान the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era were the most लोकप्रिय रास्ता of paying लिये मेल, लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी यहूद rapidly होने eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी और the पहला दशक of the 21st due to घटती लागत of long अलहदा टेलीफोन संचार और the विकास और विस्फोटक स्प्रेड of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली आधार, इतिहासकारों और collectors began to take notice.
The पढ़ाई of postage stamps और उनके उपयोग is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be दोनो a शौक और a रूप of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ, as government-issued postage stamps और उनके mailing systems have always been involved with the history of nations.
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों in बर्मिंघम in the u.S. राज्य of Alabama.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज एक of तीन संस्थानों in the विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama System.
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic विभाजन अग्रणी to स्नातक 's, निपुण 's, डॉक्टरेट, और पेशेवर डिग्री in the सोशल और behavioral sciences, the उदार arts, business, education, engineering, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, and public health.
The school is अत्यधिक प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके चिकित्सा शोध और प्राकृतिक sciences कार्यक्रम.
The UAB स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली, एक of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त States, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in various medical specialties, सहित आतंरिक आयुर्विज्ञान, न्यूरोलॉजी, सर्जरी, radiology, और anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the only ACS सत्यापित स्तर i आघात बीच in अलबामा, as रेटेड by the अमरीकी कॉलेज of अध्येतावृत्ति Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 संकाय और स्टाफ और over 53,000 कार्य at the विश्वविद्यालयों and in the health system.
An अनुमानित 10 प्रतिशत of the कार्य in the birmingham-hoover महानगर क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 jobs in the state of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall सालाना आर्थिक प्रभाव थी अनुमानित to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the University of Alabama at बर्मिंघम नामांकित 17,999 विद्यार्थी इससे अधिक than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
वहीँ हैं योजनाएँ to commence साथ an `` aggressive '' growth in enrollment at UAB.
The वर्तमान uab अध्यक्ष is dr. Ray L. Watts.
टोफू, भी पुकारा सेम दही, is a खाना बना by coagulating सोया रस and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
it is a घटक in अनेक ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast Asian cuisines.
There are many different varieties of टोफू, सहित भैस टोफू और टोफू कि रै महरूम processed in some way.
Tofu रै a हल्का स्वाद और can be प्रयुक्त in savory and sweet dishes.
It is often seasoned or marinated to सूट the डिश.
टोफू originated in प्राचीन चीन कुछ 2,000 years ago.
Chinese लेजेंड ascribes इसके आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज : 劉安 Liú Ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu and its उत्पादन तकनीक यहूद introduced into कोरियाई और तब जापानी दौरान the Nara period.
It स्प्रेड into अन्य भाग of ईस्ट एशिया as well.
इस स्प्रेड संभावित coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty वर्णित a विधि of बनाना tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of प्रोटीन, और little fat.
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant प्रयुक्त in निर्माण, may भी be ऊँची in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a आम चिंपैंजी, ज्ञात लिये होने the one-time पालतु of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल Jackson, who bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent travel साथी to the सिंगर, जिनकी अनुलग्नक to the एनिमल led to मीडिया mockery और, among अन्य कारकों, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, for example, Jackson brought बुलबुले साथ उसे to जापानी, जहाँ वे दोनो पिया चाय साथ the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles was initially kept at the जैक्सन परिवार 's घर in encino, लॉस एंजिल्स, लकिन थी स्थानांतरित to neverland ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in जैक्सन 's बेडरूम, प्रयुक्त the सिंगर 's toilet, and ate candy in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, like all captive chimpanzees, Bubbles था matured into a विशाल और आक्रामक वयस्क chimp unsuitable as a साथी animal.
He was sent to a California animal trainer, जहाँ he थी reported to have attempted आत्महत्या.
When the प्रशिक्षक shut bas उसके आपरेशन in 2004, बुलबुले थी स्थानांतरित to the बीच लिये Great Apes, a sanctuary in Wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.
चिंतन हैं an अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड इससे teignmouth, Devon, which formed in 1994.
The band consists of school मित्रों मैथ्यू bellamy ( सीसे vocals, सीसे गिटार, पियानो, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 एल्बम ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे, keyboardist और percussionist मॉर्गन nicholls रै performed सजीव साथ the band.
Muse are known for their energetic and हद सजीव प्रदर्शन और उनके संलयन of अनेक म्यूज़िक जाति, सहित स्पेस चट्टान, प्रगतिशील चट्टान, वैकल्पिक चट्टान, भारी मेटल, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ), absolution ( 2003 ), ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे ( 2006 ), the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ) और the 2nd विधि ( 2012 ).
They have भी जारी तीन सजीव एल्बम, hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ), जिससे is भी a संकलन of b-sides, absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे अर्जित the बैंड a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन and a third place finish in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history, including five MTV Europe Music Awards, six Q Awards, आठ nme पुरस्कार, दो ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव अधिनियम '' twice, an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, चार kerrang !
पुरस्कार और an अमरीकी Music Award.
They were also nominated for five Grammy Awards, of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन चट्टान एल्बम, लिये उनके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ).
चिंतन have बेची over 15 लाख albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और, as the न्यायिक पूंजी of the स्वदेश, एक of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's तीन नेशनल राजधानी – the अन्य दो होने केप Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of गुलाब ``, owing to the प्रचुरता of ये पुष्प और the सालाना रोज़ पर्व आयोजित there.
The city 's Sesotho name is mangaung, अर्थ `` प्लेस of cheetahs `` और it रै महरूम शामिल in the mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above sea level.
The city is home to 369,568 निवासियों, जबकि the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 645,455.
