The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of जीवन or अस्तित्व in general.
It can भी be expressed in अलग फ़ॉर्म, ऐसे as `` क्यों हैं we यहाँ ? ``, `` कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It रै महरूम the विषय of much philosophical, वैज्ञानिक, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have been a large क्रमांक of प्रस्तावित जवाब to ये सवाल इससे अनेक अलग cultural and ideological backgrounds.
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on many other issues, such as सांकेतिक अर्थ, सत्तामीमांसा, मान, purpose, आचार, शुभ और दुष्ट, फ़्री होगा, the अस्तित्व of एक or अनेक देवताओं, conceptions of परमेश्वर, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the ब्रह्मांड, exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science also अध्ययन और can provide सुझाव लिये the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of morality.
an वैकल्पिक, humanistic दृष्टिकोण मुद्राएँ the सवाल `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide साथ the उपलब्धि of परम वास्तविकता, or a अहसास of oneness, or भी a अहसास of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, और numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice डाल consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती आवाज़ अभिनेताओं शामिल पैट्रिक warburton, आदम वेस्ट, जॉन G. ब्रेनन, निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide आवाज़ें लिये अनेक characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities on the दिखाएँ, चित्रण प्रेरणा from celebrities and pop culture.
Family guy वर्ण have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक कर्ता, after members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, हालांकि no अन्य cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
1911 उदाहरण by एडमंड dulac
`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; शाब्दिक अनुवाद : `` the राजकुमारी on the मटर '' ) is a साहित्यिक परी टेल by hans ईसाई Andersen about a young woman whose royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
The tale was first published with three अन्य by andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in कोपेनहेगन by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had heard the story as a child, and it likely has its source in लोक सामग्री, संभवतः originating इससे स्वीडन as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition.
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 were well प्राप्त by डैनिश आलोचकों, जो disliked उनके कैज़ुअल, chatty style, and their lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess and the Pea '' was adapted to the musical स्टेज in a उत्पादन पुकारा एकबार upon a गद्दा अभिनीत कैरोल burnett.
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the United राज्य जो यहूद either born in जर्मनी or हैं of जर्मनी ancestry.
They comprise परिचय 50 लाख लोगों, बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry समूह ahead of Irish Americans, African Americans and English Americans.
They comprise परिचय 1/3 of the जर्मनी diaspora सब over the world.
None of the जर्मनी राज्य था नई संसार colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the first significant groups of German आप्रवासियों arrive in the अंग्रेजों colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th सदी, साथ कुछ आठ लाख आमद इससे Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता, और धकेल आउट of यूरोपीय by shortages of जमीन और धार्मिक or राजनैतिक oppression.
Many arrived seeking धार्मिक or राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता, अन्य लिये आर्थिक अवसर वृहद than those in Europe, and others simply for the chance to start fresh in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought आउट the सबसे उत्पादक जमीन, जहाँ उनके intensive खेती तकनीकों होता अदा off.
After 1840, many आए to शहरों, जहाँ `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German Americans established the first kindergartens in the United राज्य, introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा, और originated लोकप्रिय अमरीकी foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the देश, एक of the सबसे well-known होने the german-american steuben परेड in नई यॉर्क नगर, आयोजित every third Saturday in September.
There are also major annual events in Chicago, सिनसिनाटी, मिल्वौकी, पिट्सबर्ग, st. लुई और अन्य cities.
Like many other immigrants कि आए to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of जर्मनी or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United राज्य संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of, the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the लोगों '' suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
The history of the Internet began साथ the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the अवधारणाओं कि होता सीसे to the अंतरजाल जब a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, tymnet, और telenet, यहूद विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into a संजाल of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, and नतीजतन, the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected tcp/ip संजाल, पुकारा the अंतरजाल, थी introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf ) विकसित the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial Internet service प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET थी decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when nsfnet थी decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture और कॉमर्स, सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल, तत्काल messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, और the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and शिक्षा जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global संचार लैंडस्केप थी लगभग तत्काल in ऐतिहासिक शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way दूरसंचार networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना, कॉमर्स, entertainment, और सोशल networking.
Southwest एयरलाइंस co. ( ) is a प्रमुख u.S. एयरलाइन और the संसार 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
It थी स्थापित in 1967 और अपनाया इसके current name in 1971.
The airline has अधिक than 46,000 कर्मचारी और operates more than 3,400 flights per day.
as of जून 5, 2011, it carries the सबसे घरेलू passengers of any U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, Southwest Airlines has scheduled सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको.
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s, except लिये a few सालो in the 1970s और 1980s, जब it संचालित Boeing 727s.
As of अगस्त 2012, दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 विश्वव्यापी साथ over 550 in service, each operating an average of six flights per day.
In May 2011, the एयरलाइन acquired airtran एयरवेज़, साथ संयोजन of the वाहक अपेक्षित to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the company थी जारी a सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र, technically बनने one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv पाले lager शुभारम्भ in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing Company.
Although founded as a local beer in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया, it थी marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a national product.
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis, मिसौरी, in मिड 2006, जिससे transferred brewing परिचालन to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born जोसेफ aloisius ratzinger on 16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is पोप emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He served as पोप इससे 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was दोनो the नेता of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और sovereign of the Vatican City State.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal उद्घाटन द्रव्यमान on 24 अप्रैल 2005, और took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of st. John Lateran, on 7 May 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria, ratzinger स्थापित खुद as a अत्यधिक regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the लेट 1950s और थी नियुक्त a पूरा प्राध्यापक in 1958.
बाद a long करियर as an अकादमिक, सेवारत as a प्राध्यापक of धर्मशास्त्र at अनेक जर्मनी universities—the पिछला होने the विश्वविद्यालयों of regensburg, जहाँ he परोसा as वाइस अध्यक्ष of the विश्वविद्यालयों in 1976 और 1977—he थी नियुक्त archbishop of Munich and Freising and cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977, an unusual promotion for someone with little pastoral experience.
In 1981, he settled in Rome when he became prefect of the सभा लिये the doctrine of the आस्था, एक of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as पोप, he थी भी डीन of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स, और as ऐसे, the primus inter pares among the cardinals.
Prior to becoming pope, he was `` a major figure on the Vatican stage for a quarter of a century '' as `` one of the most आदरणीय, influential और विवादास्पद सदस्यों of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स '' ; he था an influence `` दूसरी to none जब it आए to सेटिंग गिरिजाघर प्राथमिकताएं और दिशानिर्देश '' as एक of पोप जॉन पॉल ii 's closest confidants.
He was originally a उदार theologian, लकिन अपनाया रूढ़िवादी views after 1968.
His सफल कृतियाँ बचाव परंपरागत कैथोलिक doctrine and values.
During his papacy, बेनेडिक्ट xvi advocated a वापसी to आधारभूत ईसाई मान to काउंटर the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
He views relativism 's denial of उद्देश्य सच्चाई, और the denial of moral सच्चाई in particular, as the सेंट्रल problem of the 21st century.
He taught the importance of both the Catholic गिरिजाघर और an समझना of परमेश्वर 's redemptive प्रेम.
Pope Benedict also revived a number of traditions सहित elevating the tridentine द्रव्यमान to a अधिक prominent position.
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art, देखने the उपयोग of सौंदर्य as a पाथ to the पवित्र, प्रचारित the उपयोग of लैटिन, और reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments, for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक फ़ोर्स in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen आज और confidantes of उसे, notably Christoph Schönborn.
On 11 February 2013, Pope Benedict announced his resignation in a वाक in लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` कमी of शक्ति of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His resignation became प्रभावी on 28 फ़रवरी 2013.
he is the पहला पोप to इस्तीफा चूंकि पोप ग्रेगरी बारहवीं in 1415, और the first to do so on his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294.
As pope emeritus, बेनेडिक्ट retains the स्टाइल of उसके पवित्रता, और the शीर्षक of पोप, और होगा continue to पोशाक in the papal colour of white.
He was succeeded by पोप फ्रांसिस on 13 कूच 2013, और he स्थानांतरित into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
Pocket stereoscope साथ असली परीक्षण चित्र.
Used by सैन्य to जाँचें stereoscopic pairs of aerial photographs.
View of Boston, c. 1860 ; an जल्दी stereoscopic कार्ड लिये देखने a झाँकी from nature
Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station देखने apparatus and sets of stereo slides.
Patented by A. fuhrmann around 1890.
कम्पनी of महिलाओं watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र, painting by Jacob Spoel, before 1868.
A very जल्दी चित्रण of लोगों using a stereoscope.
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a तकनीक लिये बनाना or बढ़ाना the भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis लिये binocular vision.
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` कड़, ठोस '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to dekh '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic विधि उपस्थित दो ऑफसेट बिंब separately to the left and right eye of the viewer.
These two-dimensional बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in the दिमाग to दे the बोध of 3D depth.
This technique is विशिष्ट इससे 3d प्रदर्शक कि प्रदर्शक an चित्र in तीन पूरा आयाम, allowing the निरीक्षक to बढ़ाएँ सूचना about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by head and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
An अमरीकी founding पिता, he थी a statesman, राजनयिक, and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an Enlightenment राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार, दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in अक्षर to उसके wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
एडम्स आए to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted थामस जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, and was its primary advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital सरकारी लोन from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts संविधान in 1780, जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी, बहकावे अमरीकी political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the army and नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by थामस जेफरसन and retired to Massachusetts.
he बाद resumed उसके दोस्ती with Jefferson.
He and उसके बीवी, अबीगैल एडम्स, संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता, राजनयिकों, and historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, the छठे President of the United States.
His achievements have प्राप्त वृहद मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स, हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became ज्ञात as the White House.
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander हैमिल्टन, is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the reverse.
( Hamilton is one of दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल issued U.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 विधेयक.
हैमिल्टन is एक of तभी चार लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal टेंडर ) ; जार्ज meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter. )
All $ 10 bills जारी आज हैं संघीय आरक्षित टीप.
The Bureau of नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 यहूद $ 10 बिल्स.
Ten डालर बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 विधेयक is the तभी u.S. पेपर करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).

A jetboat is a नाव propelled by a जेट of जल ejected from the back of the craft.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat कि उपयोग a propeller in the जल नीचे or पीछे the नाव, a jetboat draws the water from under the boat into a pump inside the boat, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of नई जीलैंड, specifically to overcome the प्रॉब्लम of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the अकुशल डिज़ाइन of the इकाई और the फैक्ट कि वे offered few लाभ over conventional propellers.
Unlike ये पिछला waterjet developments, ऐसे as campini 's और the hanley hydrojet, हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need लिये a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water, and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From this, the लोकप्रियता of the जेट ईकाई और jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was found the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a wide range of vessel types, and as ऐसे, waterjets हैं प्रयुक्त widely आज लिये अनेक high-speed बरतन, सहित यात्री ferries, बचाव शिल्प, पैट्रोल नौकाएँ and offshore supply vessels.
Jetboats are highly maneuverable, and many can, from full गति, be reversed और brought to a रोकें भीतर छोटी अधिक than उनके अपना लंबाई, in a maneuver ज्ञात as a `` crash stop ''.
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is cut, the steering is turned sharply and the throttle खोली again, causing the नाव to स्पिन जल्दी around साथ a विशाल स्प्रे of water.
There is no engineering limit to the आकार of jetboats, हालांकि the वैध of उनके उपयोग depends a लॉट on the प्रकार of application.
Classic prop-drives are generally more कुशल और किफायती at कम speeds, up to परिचय, लकिन as नाव गति increases परे इस, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ).
भी, in परिस्थितियों साथ बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug नौकाएँ ), the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the vast बहुमत of waterjet इकाई हैं संस्थापित in high-speed बरतन और in particular परिस्थितियों जहाँ उथले draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are found in military use or the high-speed passenger/car फैरी उद्योग.
South Africa 's s ( लगभग long ) हैं the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even these German-built बरतन हैं सक्षम of performing `` क्रैश stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as सूजन of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the मध्य, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral और thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ साथ तात्कालिक उपचार to control the inflammation.
eric `` e. ''
Murphy is a fictional अक्षर on the comedy-drama television series Entourage.
He is played by केविन connolly.
The Shining is a 1980 मनोवैज्ञानिक हॉरर फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by स्टेनली Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane Johnson, and starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Scatman Crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
the फिल्मी is आधारित on the स्टीफन King novel The Shining.
A writer, Jack torrance, takes a जॉब as an off-season कार्यवाहक at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses मानसिक abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए बाते इससे the पास्ट और भविष्य, ऐसे as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
Soon after settling in, the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm, और जोकर धीरे becomes बहकावे by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he उतरता into दीवानगी and attempts to murder his wife and son.
Unlike previous Kubrick films, which developed an audience gradually by भवन on word-of-mouth, the जगमगाता थी released as a mass-market फिल्मी, खोलने at पहला in बस दो शहरों on मेमोरियल दिन, तब nationwide a month later.
Although initial response to the film was mixed, later नाजुक मूल्यांकन थी अधिक अनुकूल और it is अभी viewed as a क्लासिक of the हॉरर genre.
Film director Martin Scorsese, writing in The रोज़ जानवर, क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of all time.
Film critics, film students, and Kubrick 's producer, जन harlan, have remarked on the विशाल influence the फिल्मी रै था on popular culture.
The initial European रिलीज of the जगमगाता थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण, achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.
Patio कोला बोतल
आँगन आहार कोला थी a ब्रांड of आहार सोडा introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
It was created in जवाब to आहार रीति कोला, जिससे थी the पहला आहार कोला on the market.
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was आँगन आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता.
In 1964, Patio released नारंगी, अंगूर, और रूट beer flavors.
This flavor line was not meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स जैसे नारंगी crush, लकिन बल्कि भरण out the line.
Patio sodas were उपलब्धियाँ in the cold-bottle मार्केट : किराना और mom-and-pop stores.
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the समय, bottlers यहूद regionally franchised, और सम्बन्धित विज्ञापन थी necessarily local.
In 1964, आँगन आहार कोला became आहार Pepsi.
The newly ब्रांडेड आहार सोडा थी advertised alongside पेप्सी साथ the टैगलाइन `` पेप्सी either रास्ता '', जिससे replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor ''.
The short life span of Patio आहार कोला makes it a ग्रेट जोड लिये बोतल collectors.
Most of the बाकी आँगन लकीर of जायका यहूद phased आउट by the जल्दी 1970s, while a few survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic शारीरिक और organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a समाज or एंटरप्राइज़, or the सेवाएं and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected संरचनात्मक तत्व कि provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting an संपूर्ण ढांचा of development.
It is an महत्वपूर्ण पद लिये judging a देश or प्रदेश 's development.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society, such as roads, bridges, water supply, sewers, विद्युत ग्रिड, दूरसंचार, और so forth, और can be पारिभाषित as `` the शारीरिक components of interrelated प्रणालियों providing commodities और सेवाएं अनिवार्य to enable, sustain, or बढ़ाएँ societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services, and also the वितरण of समाप्त उत्पाद to बाज़ार, as खूब as मौलिक सोशल सेवाएं ऐसे as स्कूलों और अस्पताल ; लिये उदाहरण, सड़कें enable the transport of raw materials to a factory.
In military parlance, the पद refers to the इमारतें और स्थाई संस्थापना जरुरी for the support, redeployment, and operation of military forces.
To make it simple, अवसंरचना is anything कि is needed रोज, an रोज item.
A graphical प्रतिनिधित्व of the आदर्श इंसान karyotype
mitochondrial DNA.
Human genetic विभिन्नता is the जेनेटिक मतभेद दोनो भीतर and among populations.
There may be multiple variants of any दिए जीन in the इंसान जनसांख्यिकी ( जीनों ), अग्रणी to बहुरूपता.
Many genes are not बहुरूपी, अर्थ कि तभी a सिंगल allele is उपस्थित in the जनसांख्यिकी : the gene is then said to be fixed.
no दो इंसानो are genetically identical.
Even monozygotic twins, who develop इससे एक zygote, have infrequent जेनेटिक मतभेद due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation.
Differences between individuals, even closely सम्बन्धित individuals, हैं the कुंजी to तकनीकों ऐसे as जेनेटिक फिंगरप्रिंटिंग.
alleles occur at अलग बारंबारता in अलग इंसान populations, साथ populations that are more geographically and ancestrally remote tending to differ more.
Causes of differences between individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज of जीनों दौरान meiosis और various mutational events.
There are at least two reasons why जेनेटिक विभिन्नता exists between populations.
Natural चयन may confer an अनुकूली लाभ to individuals in a विशिष्ट पर्यावरण if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur तभी in those भौगोलिक regions जहाँ वे confer an advantage.
the दूसरी प्रमुख कारण of जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is due to the high degree of neutrality of most mutations.
Most mutations do नहीं appear to have कोई चयनात्मक प्रभाव एक रास्ता or the other on the organism.
the प्रमुख कारण is जेनेटिक बहाव, इस is the प्रभाव of random changes in the gene pool.
In humans, founder effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have था an महत्वपूर्ण influence in न्यूट्रल मतभेद between populations.
The सिद्धान्त कि इंसानो recently migrated out of Africa supports this.
The study of human जेनेटिक विभिन्नता रै दोनो विकासवादी significance and medical applications.
It can help scientists understand ancient human जनसांख्यिकी migrations as खूब as कैसा अलग इंसान समूह हैं biologically related to one another.
For medicine, study of human जेनेटिक विभिन्नता may be महत्वपूर्ण क्युकी कुछ disease-causing alleles occur अधिक प्रायः in लोगों from specific geographic regions.
New findings show that प्रत्येक इंसान रै on औसत 60 नई mutations compared to their parents.
Apart from mutations, अनेक जीनों कि may have aided इंसानो in प्राचीन टाइम्स प्लेग humans today.
For example, it is suspected that genes कि allow इंसानो to अधिक efficiently प्रक्रम खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible to obesity and diabetes today.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. कैपिटल और the नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच on वॉशिंगटन on September 12, 2009.
The Tea Party movement is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, reducing u.S. government spending and taxes, and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit.
The movement has been called partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, और partly populist.
The movement has sponsored विरोध और समर्थित राजनैतिक उम्मीदवार since 2009.
The name of the movement is निकला इससे the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी of 1773, an iconic इवेंट in अमरीकी history.
Anti-tax प्रदर्शनकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य have प्रायः referred to the असली बोस्टन Tea Party for inspiration.
References to the Boston Tea पार्टी यहूद भाग of कर दिन विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s and earlier.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some conservative activists of mailing चाय बैग to विधायक और अन्य officials as a symbolic act.
The currencies of Puerto Rico closely follow the ऐतिहासिक विकास of Puerto Rico.
As a उपनिवेश of स्पेन और the संयुक्त राज्य, प्यूर्टो रीको थी granted the use of both foreign and provincial currencies.
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502, प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण बंदरगाहों, साथ its own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves भागा खाली भीतर the सदी, the द्वीपसमूह 's economy suffered.
The स्पेनी क्राउन जारी the situado mexicano, जिससे meant कि a semi-regular शिपमेंट of सुनहरा इससे the Viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island, as a way to provide economic support.
between 1636 और 1637, फिलिप iv of स्पेन imposed a कर which had to be paid using a revenue stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8- रियल banknotes in the स्पेनी साम्राज्य और जिससे in the स्पेनी सरकारी 's स्वीकृति of subsequent issues.
The situado थी discontinued दौरान the 19th सदी, बनाना an आर्थिक संकट, as a परिणाम of Mexico gaining its independence from Spain.
साल्वाडोर meléndez bruna, the औपनिवेशिक राज्यपाल in दफ्तर, ordered the समस्या of प्रांतीय banknotes, creating the Puerto Rican peso.
However, मुद्रण of ये banknotes ceased after 1815.
दौरान the following दशकों, विदेशी सिक्के became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s और 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the banco español de प्यूर्टो रीको थी उदघाटन और began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed चार श्रेणी और लगाई तीन in circulation under Spanish rule.
In 1895, a royal डिक्री ordered the उत्पादन of प्रांतीय पेसो सिक्के.
On अगस्त 13, 1898, the spanish-american युद्ध ended साथ Spain ceding Puerto Rico to the United States.
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto रीको और जारी बिल्स समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य डालर, creating the Puerto Rican dollar.
In 1902, the पहला नेशनल बैंको of पोर्टो रीको issued banknotes in a parallel manner.
दो अधिक श्रेणी were issued until 1913.
After प्यूर्टो रीको 's अर्थव्यवस्था और मौद्रिक प्रणाली थी fully एकीकृत into the संयुक्त राज्य ' economic and monetary system, the Puerto Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury.
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues, including commemorative banknotes, private करेंसी, और a क्वार्टर सिक्का designed साथ फोर्ट सैन फेलिप डेल morro in the फेस.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is उत्पादित and manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created और विकसित in 1893 और introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
The किताब of ezekiel is the तीसरा of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल, following the किताबे of यशायाह और यिर्मयाह and preceding the Book of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat अलग in the ईसाई Old Testament ).
It derives its name from, और रिकॉर्ड the visions of, the 6th सदी bc पुजारी और नबी Ezekiel.
According to the book, the prophet, exiled in बाबुल, अनुभवी a श्रेणी of सात visions दौरान the 22 सालो इससे 593 to 571 bc, a काल जिससे spans the फाइनल विनाश of Jerusalem in 586.
The visions, and the book, are structured around three विषयवस्तु : ( 1 ) निर्णय on इसराईल ( अध्याय 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) निर्णय on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और भविष्य blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the United States.
The New orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला, as खूब as इसके cross-cultural और बहुभाषी विरासत.
New ऑरलियन्स is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके भोजन, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके annual celebrations and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is प्रायः referred to as the `` सबसे unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the मिसिसिपी नदी.
the नगर और ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट, plaquemines to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद, झूठ to the उत्तर और झील Borgne lies to the east.
The National Birth Control League was a birth कंट्रोल संगठन in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It was founded in March 1915 by मरियम dennett, क्लारा gruening stillman और जेसी एशले.
Its main purpose थी to overturn the कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives from the U.S. mails.
Campaigns were आरोहित in नई यॉर्क, लकिन in 1919 the लीग थी disbanded और reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant फुलाव, is a व्यापक समूह of विभिन्न रोगों, all involving unregulated cell growth.
In cancer, कोशिकाएं divide और grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby parts of the body.
The cancer may भी स्प्रेड to अधिक दूर भाग of the देह through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
नहीं सब tumors हैं cancerous.
Benign tumors do नहीं grow uncontrollably, do नहीं invade neighboring ऊतकों, और do नहीं स्प्रेड throughout the body.
There are over 200 different known cancers कि पहुँचकर इंसानो.
Determining what causes कर्कट is जटिल.
Many things are known to increase the रिस्क of कर्कट, सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग, निश्चित infections, विकिरण, कमी of physical activity, obesity, and environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage genes or combine साथ मौजूदा जेनेटिक त्रुटियां भीतर कोशिकाएं to कारण the बीमारी.
लगभग पाँच to टेन प्रतिशत of cancers are entirely hereditary.
Cancer can be detected in a क्रमांक of तरीके, सहित the उपस्थिति of निश्चित लक्षण और लक्षण, screening tests, or medical imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic परिक्षा of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी, विकिरण चिकित्सा और सर्जरी.
The chances of surviving the बीमारी vary greatly by the प्रकार और स्थान of the कर्कट और the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
जबकि कर्कट can affect लोगों of सब आयु, और a few प्रकार of कर्कट हैं अधिक आम in children, the risk of developing cancer generally increases with age.
In 2007, cancer caused about 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों विश्वव्यापी ( 7.9 लाख ).
Rates are उठती as अधिक लोगों सजीव to an बूढ़ा आयु और as द्रव्यमान जीवनशैली changes occur in the developing world.
Spring ski touring on hardangervidda, Norway
Skiing is a recreational कार्यकलाप और प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in जिससे the भागीदार attaches long धावक or skis to बूट or जूते on the फीट और उपयोग them to travel on top of snow.
Aside from recreation and competition, स्कीइंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये सैन्य उद्देश्य और भी यात्राएं in क्षेत्रों कि experience heavy snowfall.
Many types of प्रतिस्पर्धी स्कीइंग कार्यक्रम हैं पहचाना by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी, and the International Ski Federation.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron Keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a अंग्रेजों अर्थशास्त्री जिनकी विचार have fundamentally प्रभावित the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of आधुनिक macroeconomics, और सूचित the आर्थिक नीतियों of governments.
He built on and greatly refined earlier work on the causes of कारोबार चक्र, और is widely माना to be एक of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक macroeconomics और the सबसे influential economist of the 20th century.
His ideas are the basis for the school of thought known as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, as खूब as इसके विभिन्न offshoots.
In many ways, subsequent developments in 20th सदी अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either भवन on keynes ' ideas or reacting against them.
In the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic सोच, overturning the पुरानी विचार of neoclassical अर्थशास्त्र कि आयोजित कि फ़्री बाज़ार होता, in the छोटी to मीडियम पद, automatically provide पूरा employment, as long as workers were flexible in their wage demands.
Keynes instead argued that aggregate माँग संकल्पित the overall स्तर of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप, और कि अपर्याप्त कुल demand could lead to prolonged periods of high unemployment.
He advocated the use of fiscal and मौद्रिक उपायों to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of आर्थिक recessions and depressions.
following the outbreak of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, keynes 's ideas concerning economic policy were adopted by leading Western economies.
In 1942, keynes थी awarded a खानदानी peerage as सामन्त Keynes of Tilton in the County of Sussex.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s और 1960s the कामयाबी of keynesian अर्थशास्त्र resulted in almost all capitalist governments adopting its policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a result of problems that began to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक, और partly क्युकी of critiques इससे मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन और अन्य अर्थशास्त्रियों जो यहूद pessimistic परिचय the क्षमता of सरकारें to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy.
however, the आगमन of the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for economic policies undertaken in जवाब to the संकट by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश और बराक ओबामा of the संयुक्त राज्य, प्रधान मंत्री गॉर्डन भूरा of the United Kingdom, and other heads of governments.
In 1999, Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और influential लोगों of the 20th सदी, commenting कि : `` उसके radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to being an economist, Keynes was also a civil servant, a director of the British Eugenics समाज, a निदेशक of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड, a संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर, a भाग of the bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals, an सलाहकार to अनेक charitable trusts, a लेखक, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 टेन आयतें at the Amsterdam Esnoga synagogue.
The Ten आयतें, भी ज्ञात as the decalogue, हैं a नियत of biblical कानून relating to आचार और इबादत, जिससे खेल a fundamental role in Judaism, Islam and Christianity.
They include instructions to worship तभी परमेश्वर, to रखना the sabbath पावन और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry, इनकार, हत्या, theft, deception and adultery.
अलग समूह follow थोड़ा अलग परंपराओं लिये interpreting और numbering them.
The Ten आयतें appear twice in the यहूदी बाइबल, in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, God inscribed उन्हें on दो स्टोन टैबलेट, जिससे he दिया to मूसा on माउंट sinai.
Modern स्कॉलरशिप रै मिला संभावित प्रभाव in hittite और mesopotamian कानून और treaties, लकिन is विभाजित over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them.
The discography of the English alternative चट्टान बैंड the smiths consists of चार स्टुडियो एल्बम, एक विस्तारित खेल ( ep ), एक सजीव एल्बम, टेन संकलन एल्बम, बीस singles, one video album and fourteen music videos on the Rough Trade, Sire and WEA record labels.
The band was formed in 1982 in मैनचेस्टर by vocalist morrissey, guitarist जॉनी marr, बास खिलाड़ी Andy Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce.
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc jockey जॉन छिलके, the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल, `` हाथ in दस्ताने `` ( may 1983 ), failed to chart.
Its follow-up, `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ), met with critical acclaim and reached क्रमांक twenty-five on the uk singles चार्ट.
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984, as वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर करता it मेक ? `` सिंगल और पहुँचे क्रमांक दो on the uk एल्बम Chart with their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
Their next three singles all reached the top twenty of the charts in the UK, helping to consolidate उनके पिछला चार्ट success.
The next studio album, Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ), reached the top of the British charts ; however, the only सिंगल to be released इससे the एल्बम, `` कि चुटकुला is n't मजेदार anymore `` ( 1985 ), विफल to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than क्रमांक तीस in the uk और उनके तीसरा एल्बम, the महारानी is मुर्दे ( 1986 ), पहुँचे क्रमांक दो in the UK.
Despite the band 's chart success, Marr left the समूह in अगस्त 1987 due to a strained संबंध साथ morrissey.
Failing to find a बदलना, the smiths disbanded by the समय उनके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम, strangeways, यहाँ We Come, was released in September that year.
Strangeways, Here We Come reached क्रमांक दो in the uk और became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the United States when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
In early 1992, WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and उत्पादित दो compilations – बेहतरीन... i और... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of जिससे पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, साथ a further संकलन, the ध्वनि of the smiths, released in नवम्बर 2008.
Gone with the Wind is a अनोखा लिखा by मार्गरेट मिशेल, पहला published in 1936.
It is often placed in the literary sub-genre of the ऐतिहासिक रोमांस novel.
However, it has been argued the novel is a `` near miss '' and करता नहीं contain सब of the तत्व of the रोमांस विधा, बनाना it बस a historical novel.
The story is set in Clayton County, जॉर्जिया, और अटलांटा दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण.
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara, the spoiled बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक, जो जरूर उपयोग प्रत्येक अर्थात् at उसके निपटान to आइये आउट of the गरीबी वो finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea ''.
मार्गरेट मिशेल began लिखने गए साथ the हवा in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering from an auto-crash injury that refused to heal.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of Macmillan, an एडिटर जो थी looking लिये नई fiction, पढ़ा कया वो था लिखा और देखी कि it could be a best-seller.
After Latham agreed to publish the book, मिशेल worked लिये another छह महीने checking the ऐतिहासिक सन्दर्भ, और rewrote the opening chapter several times.
Mitchell and उसके husband जॉन दलदल, a नक़ल एडिटर by व्यापार, संपादित the फाइनल version of the novel.
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments पहला, और तब लिखा the कार्यक्रम कि led up to it.
As to what became of her lovers, Rhett and Scarlett, बाद the अनोखा ended, मिशेल किया नहीं जान, और कहा, `` लिये सब i जान, रहेट may have found someone else who was less difficult. ''
Mitchell प्राप्त the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार लिये fiction लिये the किताब in 1937.
The book was adapted into a 1939 अमरीकी film.
Gone with the Wind is the only अनोखा by मिशेल प्रकाशित दौरान उसके आजीवन.
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is एक of the दंत specialties पहचाना by the अमरीकी दंत संघ, royal कॉलेज of dentists of कनाडा, और royal australasian कॉलेज of दंत अध्येतावृत्ति, and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth.
Endodontists perform a किस्में of प्रक्रियाओं सहित endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked teeth, and treating dental trauma.
Root कनाल चिकित्सा is एक of the सबसे आम procedures.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic ऊतक, और तंतुमय ऊतक ) becomes diseased or घायल, endodontic उपचार is जरूरी to save the tooth.
Serial Attached SCSI ( sas ) is a point-to-point सीरियल प्रोटोकॉल कि चालें आंकड़ा to और इससे कंप्यूटर भंडार डिवाइस such as hard drives and tape drives.
sas replaces the पुरानी समानांतर scsi ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) बस प्रौद्योगिकी that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like its पूर्ववर्ती, उपयोग the मानक scsi command set.
SAS offers पिछड़ा संगतता साथ second-generation sata drives.
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be कनेक्ट to sas backplanes, लकिन sas ड्राइव can नहीं कनेक्ट to sata backplanes.
The T10 technical committee of the International कमेटी लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी मानकों ( incits ) develops और maintains the sas प्रोटोकॉल ; the scsi व्यापार Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is one of the eligibility requirements स्थापित in the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान लिये चुनाव to the office of President or Vice President.
This आवश्यकता थी intended to protect the nation from foreign influence.
The Constitution does नहीं define the phrase natural-born नागरिक, और विभिन्न राय have महरूम offered over time regarding its precise meaning.
A 2011 congressional शोध सेवा report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause रै महरूम उल्लेखित in गुजर in अनेक निर्णय of the संयुक्त राज्य परम् अदालत और निम्नतर न्यायालयों dealing साथ the सवाल of पात्रता लिये नागरिकता by जनम, लकिन the Supreme Court has never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' warner ( born जून 22, 1971 ) is a पूर्व American football player.
He played quarterback for three नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई मेढ़ों, the नई यॉर्क दिग्गज, और the एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स.
He was originally signed by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted फ़्री एजेंट in 1994 बाद playing college football at Northern Iowa.
Warner would go on to be considered the best undrafted खिलाड़ी of सब समय, following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the महानतम कहानियां in एनएफएल इतिहास.
Warner first attained stardom while playing for the St. Louis Rams इससे 1998 to 2003, जहाँ he जीती दो एनएफएल mvp पुरस्कार in 1999 और 2001 as खूब as the सुपर कटोरी mvp award in Super Bowl XXXIV.
he led the 2008 एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to सुपर कटोरी xliii ( the मताधिकार 's पहला सुपर कटोरी berth ), and owns the three highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history.
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest करियर passer दरजा of all-time ( 93.7 ), और the third-highest करियर पूर्णता प्रतिशत in एनएफएल इतिहास with 65.5 %.
In 13 career playoff games, Warner ranks पहला all-time in पूर्णता प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ), गज प्रति attempt ( 8.55 ), and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
He also holds the highest completion percentage for a single game during the regular ऋतु, at 92.3 प्रतिशत ( 24/26 ), on सितंबर 20, 2009, विरूद्ध the jacksonville jaguars.
He घोषित उसके रिटायरमेंट on जनवरी 29, 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ; born May 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर इससे उत्तर कैरोलिना, in दफ्तर चूंकि जनवरी 2009.
previously वो परोसा in the उत्तर कैरोलिना Senate from 1999 to 2009.
She is a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी and is viewed as a moderate member of her party.
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent एलिज़ाबेथ dole in the 2008 संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट चुनाव, वो became the पहला स्त्री to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election.
The Heisman Memorial ट्रॉफी पुरस्कार ( प्रायः ज्ञात colloquially as the heisman ट्रॉफी or the heisman ), is awarded annually to the खिलाड़ी deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate football.
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's athletic director, John heisman ( पूर्व भूरा विश्वविद्यालयों और विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया खिलाड़ी ; सिर फ़ुटबॉल कोच at oberlin कॉलेज, auburn विश्वविद्यालयों, clemson University, Rice University, and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football, basketball, and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ).
The award is presented by the Heisman Trophy Trust in जल्दी दिसम्बर पहले the postseason कटोरी खेल.
It is the oldest of अनेक overall पुरस्कार in कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल, सहित the मैक्सवेल Award, Walter Camp Award, and the AP Player of the Year.
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the तभी पुरस्कार to सम्मान the सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी, जबकि the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार और वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार recognize the best player, and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player.
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the एकीकृत कमांड ढांचा लिये the बहुराष्ट्रीय सैन्य शक्तियां supporting the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War.
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of कोरियाई ( उत्तर कोरियाई or dprk ) invaded दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25, 1950, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद अपनाया रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 कॉलिंग on उत्तर कोरियाई to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted Resolution 83, recommending कि सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र provide सहायता to the गणतंत्र of कोरियाई `` to repel the armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area ''.
Security Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that members providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` मेक ऐसे शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता उपलब्धियाँ to a एकीकृत कमांड under the United States of America ''.
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC were `` संयुक्त राष्ट्र शक्तियां '', और संयुक्त राष्ट्र itself could be माना a belligerent, in अभ्यास the संयुक्त राष्ट्र exercised no कंट्रोल over the कॉम्बैट शक्तियां, which were controlled by the United States.
Most observers concluded that the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद नहीं in विधि संयुक्त राष्ट्र सैनिकों, and the acts of the UNC were not the acts of the United Nations.
The UNC can be regarded as an गठबंधन of नेशनल सेना, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the सामूहिक सही of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at बुसान to जुड़ें the unc, जिससे जबतक तब शामिल तभी rok और u.S. शक्तियां.
The 27th ब्रिगेड स्थानांतरित into the naktong नदी लकीर west of Daegu.
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia, Belgian United Nations Command, Canada, Colombia, इथियोपिया, फ़्रांस, यूनानियों, ध्वज, the नीदरलैंड्स, नई जीलैंड, the फिलीपीन, थाईलैंड और तुर्कों.
The संघ of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी provided एयर इकाई जिससे लड़ा alongside the एयर forces of other member nations.
Denmark, इण्डिया, नार्वे, और स्वीडन provided चिकित्सा units.
Italy provided a hospital, भी हालांकि it थी नहीं a un सदस्य.
The United Nations Command and the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई armistice अनुबंध on 27 जुलाई 1953, ending the heavy fighting.
the armistice अनुबंध स्थापित the सैन्य armistice आयोग ( मैक ), consisting of representatives of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
The North korean-chinese मैक रै महरूम replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि under exclusive North Korean management.
Regular meetings have been stopped, although duty अधिकारियों of संयुक्त सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly ज्ञात as the युद्धविराम गाँव of panmunjom, इससे प्रत्येक side meet regularly.
Lincoln Heights is an अमरीकी परिवार नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय एडी सटन, a मिशन विस्टा पुलिस अधिकारी जो चालें उसके परिवार वापस to उसके old neighborhood, Lincoln Heights, to start a new life and to help out his old neighborhood.
It is a dangerous place to उठाएँ a परिवार, और through the अनेक ट्रायल the परिवार goes through, वे जल्द सीख कि settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life as a street cop in लॉस एंजिल्स, उसके बच्चे कोशिश to अनुरूप in at उनके नई स्कूलों और with their new neighbors.
The दिखाएँ premiered जनवरी 8, 2007 on the एबीसी परिवार संजाल साथ 13 episodes ordered for the first season.
It was approved for a second ऋतु, जिससे premiered सितंबर 4, 2007.

To promote season 4, वे 're using the सोंग, हिमस्खलन by Marie Digby.

A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम, ढांचा, और doctrine within Christianity.
In the Orthodox परंपरा, चर्च हैं विभाजित प्रायः साथ जातीय और भाषाई लाइनों, into separate churches and traditions.
technically, विभाजन between एक समूह और another हैं पारिभाषित by doctrine और church authority.
Issues such as the प्रकृति of यीशु, the प्राधिकार of अपोस्टोलिक उत्तराधिकार, eschatology, और papal primacy पृथक one denomination from another.
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members, over half of all Christians worldwide, making it the largest denomination लिये कोई धर्म विश्वव्यापी ( हालांकि the गिरिजाघर करता नहीं दृश्य itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational church ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide, and साथ the catholics, protestants, anglicans, और अन्य closely सम्बन्धित denominations comprise पश्चिमी christianity.
The Eastern Orthodox गिरिजाघर, प्राच्य परंपरागत चर्च और the assyrian गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट हैं माना Eastern Christian denominations.
Western ईसाई denominations जीतना in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय and its former colonies.
Eastern Christian denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, the मध्य ईस्ट and North Africa.
ईसाइयों have विभिन्न doctrines परिचय the गिरिजाघर, the देह of वफादार कि they believe was established by Jesus Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider प्रत्येक of themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक पावन कैथोलिक और अपोस्टोलिक गिरिजाघर to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated from the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर क्युकी of theologies और practices कि वे माना to be in उल्लंघन of their interpretation.
Generally, members of the various denominations acknowledge each अन्य as ईसाइयों, at तनिक to the extent कि वे have mutually पहचाना baptisms और acknowledge historically परंपरागत दृश्य सहित the देवत्व of यीशु और doctrines of सिन and salvation, even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder full communion between churches.
Since the reforms surrounding वेटिकन ii, the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट समुदायों as `` denominations '', जबकि reserving the पद `` गिरिजाघर '' लिये अपोस्टोलिक चर्च, सहित the पूर्वी परंपरागत ( see subsistit in and branch theory ).
There हैं however कुछ non-denominational ईसाइयों जो do नहीं follow any particular branch.
The panda ( ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), also known as the दानव पांडा to फर्क it इससे the unrelated रेड पांडा, is a भालू देशी to central-western and south western China.
It is easily recognized by the विशाल, distinctive ब्लैक धब्बे around इसके आँखें, over the कानों, और आरपार इसके round body.
Though it belongs to the order carnivora, the पांडा 's आहार is 99 % बाँसुरी.
Pandas in the wild will occasionally खा अन्य grasses, जंगली tubers, or भी मांस in the रूप of पक्षियों, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, they may receive honey, eggs, fish, yams, झाड़ी पत्ते, संतरे, or केले साथ साथ विशेषकर prepared खाना.
the दानव पांडा जीवनदान in a few पहाड़ सीमाएँ in सेंट्रल चीन, मुख्यतः in सिचुआन प्रांत, but also in the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces.
As a result of farming, वनों और अन्य विकास, the पांडा रै महरूम चलित आउट of the lowland areas where it once lived.
The panda is a conservation reliant endangered प्रजाति.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in captivity अंदर चीन और another 27 बाहर the देश.
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows कि वहीँ हैं परिचय 1,590 individuals जीना in the जंगली, जबकि a 2006 पढ़ाई via डीएनए विश्लेषण अनुमानित कि इस फिगर could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also show that the number of pandas in the जंगली is on the वृद्धि.
However, the आईयूसीएन करता नहीं मानना वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable.
While the dragon has often served as China 's नेशनल emblem, internationally the पांडा appears at least as commonly.
As such, it is becoming widely प्रयुक्त भीतर चीन in अंतरराष्ट्रीय contexts, लिये उदाहरण the पाँच fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics.
the पतंग धावक is a 2007 अमरीकी नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by मार्क forster आधारित on the अनोखा of the same name by Khaled Hosseini.
It tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do boy from the Wazir Akbar Khan ज़िला of काबुल, जो is tormented by the guilt of abandoning उसके dost हसन, the बेटे of उसके father 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events, from the fall of the monarchy in अफगानिस्तान through the सोवियत सैन्य हस्तक्षेप, the द्रव्यमान exodus of अफगान शरणार्थियों to पाकिस्तानी और the संयुक्त राज्य, और the तालिबान regime.
Though most of the फिल्मी is नियत in अफगानिस्तान, ये भाग यहूद ज़्यादातर शॉट in काश्गर, चीन, due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time.
The majority of the फिल्मी 's संवाद is in जमींदारी, साथ the remainder spoken in English.
The child अभिनेताओं हैं देशी अध्यक्षों, लकिन अनेक वयस्क अभिनेताओं had to learn Dari.
Filming wrapped up on December 21, 2006, and the film was अपेक्षित to be released on नवम्बर 2, 2007.
However, after चिंता लिये the सुरक्षा of the यंग अभिनेताओं in the फिल्मी due to fears of हिंसक reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in which they appear, its release date was pushed back six weeks to December 14, 2007.
The Kite Runner was released on dvd on कूच 25, 2008.
A HD DVD release was announced लिये the वही तिथि, लकिन थी रद्द following the format 's demise.
The film थी मनोनीत लिये the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Foreign Language Film in 2007.
The film 's स्कोर by अल्बर्टो इग्लेसियस थी मनोनीत लिये बेहतरीन असली स्कोर at the सुनहरी ग्लोब्स and the Academy Awards.
The legality of कैनबिस varies इससे देश to देश.
कब्ज़ा of कैनबिस is illegal in सबसे देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, अनेक देशों have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of cannabis, particularly in North America, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is विधिक or effectively विधिक in the नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तर कोरियाई और होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और Washington if it were not for federal law, which governs persons in all states.
The medicinal use of कैनबिस is विधिक in a क्रमांक of देशों, सहित कनाडा, the चेक Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य स्तर और कुछ राज्य have स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of कैनबिस और replaced उन्हें साथ a नियामक शासन, भी contrary to संघीय statute.
कुछ देशों have कानून कि हैं नहीं as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन, अलावा इससे the देशों that offer access to medical marijuana, most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, उपयोग, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, बनाना it दंडनीय by confiscation और a ठीक, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता, साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes.
वहीँ हैं भी परिवर्तन in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक direction as in Canada.
ड्रग परीक्षण to detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly आम in अनेक देशों and have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs.
However, simple कब्ज़ा can carry long कारावास वाक्य in कुछ देशों, विशेषकर in भाग of ईस्ट एशिया और southeast एशिया जहाँ the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
loxahatchee is a जातियाँ स्तिथ in ताड़ Beach County, Florida, United States.
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and उत्तरपश्चिम of royal ताड़ बीच, फ्लोरिडा और लगभग वेस्ट of वेस्ट ताड़ बीच.
Loxahatchee is also the name of the Post Office that serves इस क्षेत्रफल, जिससे is अंतर्गत the zip कोड of 33470.
The name loxahatchee अर्थात् `` कछुआ नदी. ''
loxahatchee is स्तिथ भीतर the भारतीय trails सुधार ज़िला and the Loxahatchee Groves Water Control District.
Lion Country safari, a drive-through safari पार्क, is स्तिथ in loxahatchee.
In 2006, the state of Florida approved incorporation of part of loxahatchee as the कस्बा of loxahatchee groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका in ताड़ बीच काउंटी.
The main reason for incorporating was to better protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई विकास और to बचाना the ग्रामीण अक्षर of the पड़ोस.
Perhaps the most rural area within a बंद निकटता to वेस्ट ताड़ बीच, साथ लॉट आकार दायरा इससे 1-20 acres.
Along with The Acreage, it is notable for loose land प्रतिबंध और the देशी और exotic एनिमल उपस्थिति is काफी notable.
Seminole लकीरें ऊँची स्कूल serves the area.
The Canadian नागरिकता परीक्षण is a परीक्षण, administered by नागरिकता और आव्रजन कनाडा ( सीआईसी ), कि is जरूरी लिये सब आवेदकों लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता जो हैं aged between 18 and 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship.
The test is available in दोनो फ्रेंच और अंग्रेज़ी, the official languages of Canada.
Renaissance Cruises, originally founded in 1989 स्वामित्व by fearnley & eger rederi in ओस्लो - नार्वे, बाद खरीदा by एडवर्ड rudner ( संस्थापक of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf War.
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean, the यूनानी isles, tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत, उत्तरी यूरोपीय और scandinavia.
the कम्पनी ceased परिचालन on 25 सितंबर 2001 और accommodated up to 220,000 guests in 2000.
While the company had been in poor financial health for quite some time, the आर्थिक मनाही resulting इससे the सितंबर 11th आतंकवादी हमले हैं credited साथ the निधन of this cruise line.
The fleet is सूचीबद्ध अंतर्गत सूची of क्रूज जहाजों.
It was headquartered in फोर्ट lauderdale, Florida.
Epithelium is एक of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक, साथ with connective tissue, muscle tissue and nervous tissue.
Epithelial ऊतकों लकीर the कैविटी और सतहों of structures throughout the body, and also form many glands.
Functions of epithelial कोशिकाएं शामिल स्राव, चयनात्मक अवशोषण, सुरक्षा, transcellular transport and detection of sensation.
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) अर्थात् `` on '' or `` upon '', और `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying संयोजी ऊतक, through the तहखाने झिल्ली.
Epithelia can भी be व्यवस्थित into क्लस्टर of कोशिकाएं कि फलन as बहिःस्रावी और अंतःस्रावी glands.
Kent E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an अमरीकी यंग धरती creationist.
Hovind has बोला on सृष्टि विज्ञान और रै aimed to मनाना श्रोता to अस्वीकृत theories of एवोल्यूशन, भूभौतिकी, और cosmology in एहसान of उसके निर्वचन of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible.
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of his ideas have also been criticized by यंग धरती creationist संगठन ऐसे as जवाब in उत्पत्ति.
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, और अक्सर spoke on यंग धरती creationism at seminars at निजी स्कूलों और चर्च, debates, और on रेडियो और टेलीविज़न प्रसारण.
Since जनवरी 2007, hovind रै महरूम सेवारत a ten-year थाना वाक्य बाद होने convicted of 58 संघीय रिश्तो, सहित 12 कर offenses, one count of obstructing federal agents, and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions.
He is incarcerated at the Federal Correctional संस्था at बर्लिन, नई हैम्पशायर.

A bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a drop, छोटी कण, बिन्दु '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in तमिल, तेलुगु, और मलयालम ) is a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर India, Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia.
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in the बीच of the माथे बंद to the eyebrows, लकिन it can भी consist of a चिह्न or टुकड़ा of आभूषण worn at this location.
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 थी आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 2, 2010, to elect the राज्यपाल of नई यॉर्क, to serve a four-year term that began in January 2011.
लाज़िम लोकतांत्रिक राज्यपाल दाउद paterson, निर्वाचित as लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of former Governor Eliot Spitzer, chose not to run for a full-term.

Green Party candidate Howie Hawkins received over 57,000 votes, allowing the नई यॉर्क ग्रीन पार्टी to be सूचीबद्ध on the बैलट लिये the अगला 4 सालो.
The प्रमुख डाल of ड्रैगन बॉल at the समाप्त of the manga.
The Dragon Ball manga and anime श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण निर्मित by अकिरा toriyama.
The series takes प्लेस in a fictional ब्रह्मांड, the वही as toriyama 's पिछला श्रेणी dr. slump, और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे Goku from childhood to adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls, used to summon a wish-granting dragon.
During the कोर्स of the स्टोरी, he मुठभेड़ों allies ऐसे as bulma, yamcha, kuririn और trunks, विरोधियों ऐसे as tenshinhan, Piccolo and Vegeta, and enemies such as Freeza and Cell.
जबकि अनेक of the वर्ण हैं इंसानो साथ superhuman शक्ति and/or अलौकिक abilities, the cast also includes anthropomorphic animals and later, extraterrestrial lifeforms.
The series also includes depictions of the आफ्टरलाइफ, साथ अनेक वर्ण होने देवताओं कि govern the ब्रह्मांड.
