The Comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory, known as Comancheria, consisted of present day eastern New Mexico, southern Colorado, northeastern एरिज़ोना, दक्षिणी कान्सास, सब of ओक्लाहोमा, और सबसे of उत्तरपश्चिम टेक्सास.
The comanche लोगों हैं नामांकित in the federally पहचाना comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
historically, the comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers with a horse culture.
There may have been as अनेक as 45,000 comanches in the लेट 18th सदी.
Today, the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment संख्याएँ 15,191 साथ लगभग 7,763 सदस्यों residing in the lawton – फोर्ट sill और surrounding क्षेत्रों of दक्षिणपश्चिम Oklahoma.
the comanche स्वदेश homecoming powwow is आयोजित annually in Walters, Oklahoma in mid-July.
The Comanche spoke the comanche भाषा, a numic भाषा of the uto-aztecan परिवार, sometimes वर्गीकृत as a Shoshone dialect ; however, only about 1 % of Comanches speak it today.
Ethan Frome is a novel published in 1911 by the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार -winning अमरीकी author Edith Wharton.
It is set in the fictitious कस्बा of starkfield, मैसाचुसेट्स.
The अनोखा थी adapted into a फिल्मी, Ethan Frome, in 1993.
Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो स्तिथ in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार पड़ोस of the मैनहटन बरो of New York City, New York.
The studio is best known as the production home of ABC News ' Good Morning America ( GMA ), a morning न्यूज और बात कार्यक्रम और खण्ड लिये जीएमए on एबीसी न्यूज Now.
The Las Vegas Strip संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश except Cuba and North Korea.
It is उत्पादित by the coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन साथ filtered जल और sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और खाना सेवा वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on अवसर, introduced अन्य कोला पेय under the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, coca-cola शून्य, coca-cola वैनिला, और खास संस्करण साथ lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान ब्रांड.
Types of bar-lines
In musical notation, a bar ( or measure ) is a segment of time defined by a दिए क्रमांक of बीट्स, प्रत्येक of जिससे हैं आबंटित a particular note value.
Dividing music into bars provides नियमित सन्दर्भ अंक to pin पाइंट स्थितियाँ within a piece of music.
It भी makes लिखा म्यूज़िक easier to follow, चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of staff symbols can be read and played as a batch.
typically, a टुकड़ा consists of अनेक बार of the वही लंबाई, और in आधुनिक musical संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट at the शुरूआत of the स्कोर by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ).
The word bar is more common in British English, and the word measure is अधिक आम in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी, हालांकि संगीतकारों generally समझे both usages.
In American English, although the words bar and measure are often used interchangeably the सही उपयोग of the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the लंबवत लकीर itself, जबकि the शब्द 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars.
In international usage, it is equally सही to बोलो of बार संख्याएँ और माप संख्याएँ, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the वही लाइनों, it is हिकमत to आरक्षित the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ etc. for beats only ; bars चाहिए be referred to by नाम in पूरा.
the पहला metrically पूरा माप भीतर a टुकड़ा of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the piece begins साथ an anacrusis ( an अधूरी माप at the सिर of a टुकड़ा of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
The 19.9 MW gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 hours a day.
Solar उर्जा, रौशन लाइट और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar उर्जा technologies शामिल सौर हीटिंग, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और distribute solar energy.
Active सौर तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण, और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy सुरक्षा through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
ये लाभ are global.
Hence the additional costs of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
प्राथमिक परवाह may be provided in community health centres.
प्राथमिक परवाह is the स्वास्थ्य परवाह दिए by a स्वास्थ्य care provider.
Typically this provider acts as the प्रिंसिपल पाइंट of परामर्श लिये मरीजों भीतर a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणाली और निर्देशांक अन्य specialists कि the patient may need.
Such a professional can be a primary care physician, such as a general practitioner or family चिकित्सक, or depending on the मोहल्ले, स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली संगठन, और रोगी 's discretion, वे may देखिए a फार्मासिस्ट, a चिकित्सक सहायक, a नर्स practitioner, a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ), a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे as in भाग of Africa ), or an Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ).
Depending on the nature of the health कंडीशन, मरीजों may तब be referred लिये द्वितीयक or tertiary care.
`` Ocean एवेन्यू '' is a सोंग अंकित by American pop punk group Yellowcard.
It was released in फ़रवरी 2004 as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे समंदर एवेन्यू and the third track.
It is known for bringing them into the मुख्यधारा, as it प्राप्त numerous spins on एमटीवी and increasing radio airplay.
Ocean Avenue is a street in Jacksonville, Florida, the band 's stomping grounds near their ऊँची स्कूल, डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the कला, और another गली उल्लेखित in the सोंग, चेरी गली.
The name of Ocean एवेन्यू in jacksonville is दरअसल बीच Boulevard.
They बाएँ उनके असली आधार पीछे when they moved to Los Angeles.
The सोंग थी प्रदर्शित on the much म्यूज़िक संकलन album Big Shiny Tunes 9.
A मनोचिकित्सक is a चिकित्सक जो specializes in psychiatry.
A psychiatrist specializes in the उपचार of दिमागी disorders.
psychiatrists हैं प्राधिकृत to prescribe आयुर्विज्ञान, conduct शारीरिक examinations, अनुक्रम और interpret प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण, उपयोग मनोचिकित्सा और may अनुक्रम दिमाग इमेजिंग अध्ययन ऐसे as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning.
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( जो ) परिभाषा of स्वास्थ्य as a राज्य of पूरा शारीरिक, दिमागी और सोशल well-being, और नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or infirmity, reproductive स्वास्थ्य, or sexual health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, functions and system at all stages of life.
Reproductive health, therefore, implies that people are able to have a responsible, satisfying and safer sex जीवन और कि वे have the काबिलियत to reproduce और the स्वतंत्रता to decide if, जब और कैसा प्रायः to do so.
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have अभिगम to सुरक्षित, प्रभावी, सस्ती और स्वीकार्य विधि of जनम कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to उचित स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन, reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा कार्यक्रम to तनाव the महत्व of महिलाओं to go सकुशल through गर्भावस्था और प्रसव could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant.
On the other hand individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं.
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic औकात, शिक्षा स्तर, आयु, नस्ल, religion, and resources available in their environment.
It is possible for example, कि कम आय individuals कमी the संसाधन लिये उचित स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं and the knowledge to know what is appropriate for maintaining reproductive health.
According to the WHO, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health खाते लिये 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये महिलाओं, और 14 % for men. ''
Reproductive health is a भाग of यौन और reproductive health and rights.
इस is a सूची of एपीसोड लिये the डिज़्नी चैनल असली श्रेणी the सुइट जीवन on डेक, which aired for three seasons on Disney Channel from September 26, 2008 to May 6, 2011.
Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit x86-64 single-, दुआl-, और quad-core microprocessors आधारित on the कोर microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core मॉडल comprise दो मरता, प्रत्येक containing दो cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the pentium ब्रांड to the mid-range मार्केट, और reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu लाइनों, जिससे previously था been divided into the Pentium 4, Pentium D, and Pentium M brands.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 जुलाई 2006, comprising the सोलो ( single-core ), duo ( dual-core ), क्वाड ( quad-core ), और in 2007, the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro प्रौद्योगिकी ( designed लिये व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core और quad-core शाखाओं.
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ), the उच्चतम स्तर of पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल in the संयुक्त राज्य, culminating a ऋतु that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to पहचानो प्रत्येक खेल, बल्कि than the साल in जिससे it is held.
For example, Super Bowl I was played on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 नियमित ऋतु, जबकि सुपर कटोरी xlvii थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
The खेल थी निर्मित as भाग of a विलय अनुबंध between the एनएफएल and its then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
It was agreed that the two leagues ' चैंपियन टीमों होता खेल in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल जबतक the विलय was to officially begin in 1970.
After the विलय, प्रत्येक लीग थी redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन ``, और the खेल थी तब निभाई between the conference champions.
Currently, the National Football Conference ( nfc ) लीड the श्रेणी साथ 25 विन्स to 22 विन्स लिये the अमरीकी Football Conference ( AFC ).
The day on which the Super Bowl is निभाई, अभी माना by कुछ a de facto अमरीकी नेशनल अवकाश, is called `` Super Bowl Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest day लिये u.S. खाना खपत, बाद थैंक्सगिविंग दिन.
In addition, the Super Bowl has frequently been the सबसे देखी अमरीकी टेलीविज़न ब्रॉडकास्ट of the year.
Super Bowl XLV, played in 2011, became the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास, आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the पिछला साल 's सुपर कटोरी, जिससे itself था taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H.
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting कार्यक्रम in the संसार, लगभग सब होने उत्तर अमरीकी ऑडियंस, और is दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s यूईएफए champions लीग final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide.
Because of its high viewership, वाणिज्यिक airtime दौरान the सुपर कटोरी ब्रॉडकास्ट is the most expensive of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on the सुपर कटोरी, कंपनियाँ regularly develop उनके सबसे महंगी विज्ञापन लिये इस ब्रॉडकास्ट.
As a result, watching और discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become a significant aspect of the event.
In addition, many लोकप्रिय गायकों और संगीतकारों have performed दौरान the इवेंट 's pre-game और मध्यांतर ceremonies क्युकी of the exposure.
फिओना is a feminine given name.
The name Fiona was invented, and first used, by the स्कॉटिश कवि जेम्स macpherson ( 1736–96 ), लेखक of the ossian कविताएं, जिससे he claimed यहूद अनुवाद इससे प्राचीन गैलिक स्त्रोत ( स्त्रोत, जब challenged, he never produced ).
The name थी subsequently प्रयुक्त as a pseudonym by विलियम शार्प ( 1855–1905 ), जो authored several romantic works under the name `` Fiona Macleod ''.
The name has since become popular in इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड.
The name is considered to be a Latinised form of the गैलिक शब्द fionn, अर्थ `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona, हालांकि ये names हैं वरना unrelated ( as fíona is निकला इससे an तत्व अर्थ `` बेल '' ).
There is also a modern tendency to equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine नाम Fionnghal with Fiona.
The name Fiona is rising in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर in जर्मनी -speaking countries.
Fiona was the 49th सबसे लोकप्रिय नाम लिये baby लड़कियों born in 2008 in जर्मनी.
Fiona was tied for तीसरा प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of सबसे लोकप्रिय names लिये baby लड़कियों born in the छोटा principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The name was the 347th most लोकप्रिय नाम लिये लड़कियों born in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008, जहाँ it रै क्रमित among the शीर्ष 1,000 सबसे लोकप्रिय names लिये लड़कियों चूंकि 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name Fiona रै महरूम विशेषकर लोकप्रिय लिये लड़कियों of एशियाई or प्रशांत islander descent in नई यॉर्क City, where Fiona ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from those groups in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have महरूम प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त States.
the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त language is English.
वहीँ हैं भी अनेक भाषाएं स्वदेशी to उत्तर अमेरिका or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe, Asia, or other parts of the world make up a large portion of the languages currently used ; अनेक भाषाएं, सहित creoles और चिह्न भाषाएं, have भी विकसित in the संयुक्त राज्य.
लगभग 337 भाषाएं हैं बोला or हस्ताक्षरित by the जनसांख्यिकी, of जिससे 176 are indigenous to the area.
fifty-two भाषाएं formerly बोला in the country 's territory are now extinct.
The variety of English spoken in the संयुक्त राज्य is ज्ञात as अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी.
English is the de facto नेशनल भाषा of the संयुक्त राज्य, साथ 80 % of the जनसांख्यिकी claiming it as a mother tongue, and some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very well ''.
However, no आधिकारिक भाषा exists at the संघीय level.
There have been several proposals to make English the नेशनल भाषा in amendments to आव्रजन सुधार बिल्स, लकिन none of ये बिल्स रै become विधि with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the राज्य और territorial स्तर, साथ कुछ राज्य mirroring the संघीय नीति of adopting no आधिकारिक भाषा in a de jure क्षमता, अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी अलोन, अन्य officially adopting English as well as local languages, and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the second most common भाषा in the देश, और is बोला by over 12 % of the जनसांख्यिकी.
The United States holds the world 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking जनसांख्यिकी, outnumbered तभी by मैक्सिको, Spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United राज्य, long-established spanish-speaking समुदायों coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल Hispanophone immigrants.
Although अनेक नई लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों हैं कम than धाराप्रवाह in अंग्रेज़ी, nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently, while only about half still speak Spanish.
According to the 2000 us जनसांख्यिकी, लोगों of जर्मनी ancestry मेक up the largest single ethnic group in the United States, and the German language ranks fifth.
Italian, Polish, and French are still widely spoken among populations descending इससे आप्रवासियों इससे those देशों in the जल्दी 20th सदी, लकिन the उपयोग of ये भाषाएं is dwindling as the पुरानी पीढियां die.
Russian is also spoken by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over एक लाख अध्यक्षों प्रत्येक in the संयुक्त राज्य, लगभग entirely भीतर recent immigrant populations.
Both languages, along with the किस्में of the चाइनीज भाषा, जापानी, और कोरियाई, हैं अभी प्रयुक्त in चुनावों in अलास्का, California, Hawaii, Illinois, New York, Texas, and Washington.
Native American languages are spoken in छोटी pockets of the देश, लकिन ये populations हैं अवरोहण, और the भाषाएं are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few देशी अध्यक्षों, is an आधिकारिक भाषा साथ with English at the state level in Hawaii.
The state government of Louisiana offers सेवाएं और दस्तावेज़ in फ्रेंच, as does New Mexico in Spanish.
Besides English, Spanish, French, German, navajo और अन्य देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं, सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः सीखे इससे अप्रवासी पूर्वजो कि आए बाद the time of independence or learned through some form of education.
1990 's Pontiac Grand am सेडान फेंडर और क्वार्टर फलक
On an automobile, a क्वार्टर फलक ( or पश्च wing as it is ज्ञात in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however, the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The क्वार्टर फलक is typically बना of चादर मेटल, लकिन is sometimes बना of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although, this varies with different makes and models.
A quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the uni-body ढांचा or monocoque.
बदलना of a चादर मेटल क्वार्टर फलक typically requires it to be काटें बंद the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to this ऊँची राशि of specialized मजदूर, a क्वार्टर फलक may प्रायः be repaired बल्कि than replaced by hammering आउट the क्षति, और a देह फिलर sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface.
shropshire ( or ; alternatively salop ; abbreviated, in छपाई तभी, shrops ) is a काउंटी in the West Midlands region of England.
It borders Wales to the west, चेशायर to the उत्तर, staffordshire to the ईस्ट, वॉस्टरशायर to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south.
A unitary प्राधिकार ( shropshire परिषद ) थी निर्मित on 1 अप्रैल 2009, लेने over इससे the पिछला काउंटी परिषद और 5 ज़िला councils, and covers most of the county.
The borough of Telford और wrekin रै महरूम a पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 लकिन continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county कस्बा of shrewsbury, जिससे is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of the काउंटी ; telford, a नई कस्बा in the ईस्ट जिससे थी constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी कस्बों, सबसे notably वेलिंगटन, dawley और madeley, which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the south.
The county has many further मार्केट कस्बों, सहित whitchurch in the उत्तर, न्यूपोर्ट बस to the north-east of telford, and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट, covering Ironbridge, Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, अन्य notable ऐतिहासिक औद्योगिक साइट स्तिथ around the काउंटी, ऐसे as at shrewsbury, broseley, snailbeach and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire Hills क्षेत्रफल of बकाया प्राकृतिक सौंदर्य कवर परिचय a क्वार्टर of the काउंटी, मुख्यतः in the south.
shropshire is एक of इंग्लैण्ड 's सबसे ग्रामीण और sparsely आबादी काउंटी, साथ the population density of the Shropshire Council area being just 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The Wrekin is one of the most famous प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the काउंटी, हालांकि the उच्चतम पहाड़ियाँ हैं the Clee Hills, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
Wenlock किनारे is another significant भौगोलिक और geological landmark.
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is the fenn 's, whixall और bettisfield mosses नेशनल प्रकृति आरक्षित, एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और बेहतरीन preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, ग्रेट ब्रिटेन 's longest नदी, रनों through the काउंटी, exiting into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley.
shropshire is landlocked, और साथ an क्षेत्रफल of, is इंग्लैण्ड 's largest inland county.
The काउंटी पुष्प is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat उद्देश्य, the काउंटी ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering सब of the ceremonial काउंटी ), साथ साथ the अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.

The American sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates शेल्डन कूपर और लियोनार्ड hofstadter, दो caltech physicists ; पैनी, a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग टाइम्स, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी, और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), जो joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.

The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series, running from 1983 to 1987, about a fictional group of ex– संयुक्त राज्य फौज खास शक्तियां कर्मियों जो कार्य as सैनिको of सौभाग्य, जबकि on the चलाएं इससे the फौज बाद होने ब्रांडेड as युद्ध अपराधियों लिये a `` अपराधों वे did n't commit ``.

Diana Prince is a fictional character appearing regularly in कहानियां प्रकाशित by dc कॉमिक्स.

Wat Phra kaew, बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड
There is no official state religion in the Thai संविधान, जिससे guarantees धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता लिये सब थाई नागरिकों, हालांकि the king is required by law to be Buddhist.
According to the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are Buddhists of the Theravada tradition.
Muslims are the दूसरी largest धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, yala, narathiwat और भाग of songkhla chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations, consisting of दोनो जातीय थाई and Malay.
The southern tip of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर जातीय malays.
Christians, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A छोटी लकिन influential जातियाँ of सिखों in थाईलैंड और कुछ हिन्दुओं भी सजीव in the country 's cities, and are heavily engaged in retail commerce.
There is also a small Jewish जातियाँ in थाईलैंड, डेटिंग वापस to the 17th सदी.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the Thai government as आतंकवादी or separatists, have rallied विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी क्युकी of कथित भ्रष्टाचार और जातीय पूर्वाग्रह on the part of officials.
थाईलैंड 's विभाग of धर्म, फिलहाल अंतर्गत the मंत्रालय of संस्कृति, is formally जिम्मेदार लिये the पंजीकरण of धार्मिक समूह in Thailand URL_http which hold properties through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, साथ साथ the आव्रजन पुलिस, over the कार्य permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी religious workers '' of all religions.
A value added कर ( vat ) is a रूप of खपत tax.
From the perspective of the खरीदार, it is a कर on the खरीदें price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax तभी on the मान added to a उत्पाद, सामग्री, or सेवा, इससे an हिसाब पाइंट of दृश्य, by this stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between these two amounts, और retains the बाकी लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the कर वे था previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a उत्पाद by or साथ a कारोबार is the बिक्री दाम चार्ज to इसके ग्राहक, minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a sales tax in that ultimately तभी the समाप्त उपभोक्ता is taxed.
It differs इससे the बिक्री कर in कि, साथ the latter, the कर is एकत्रित और remitted to the government only once, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, संग्रहण, remittances to the सरकारी, और क्रेडिट लिये कर already सशुल्क occur प्रत्येक time a business in the supply chain purchases products.
A रेफरी कॉलिंग a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the नाम of दो infractions in the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी कि may occur जब a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently plays साथ उसके or her stick above the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can परिणाम in a stoppage of play or in a penalty.
In the rules of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग, high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a दंड in नियम 60 और as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a high stick comes in contact साथ the पक और the टोली जो छुआ it regains कंट्रोल of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a player touches the puck साथ a ऊँची स्टिक और the opposing टोली gains कंट्रोल of the पक.
If the puck goes into the opposing net बाद coming into सम्पर्क साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the goal is disallowed.
The level at which a स्टिक is माना too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into उसके अपना जाल साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the goal is allowed.
a दंड is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another खिलाड़ी with a high stick.
The player is दिए a नाबालिग दंड जबतक उसके ऊँची स्टिक caused an चोट, in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a दोगुना नाबालिग लिये an आकस्मिक चोट, or a मैच दंड लिये a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ).
चोट is प्रायः decided by the ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding, लकिन the उपस्थिति of blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the रेफरी determines कि the चोट sustained थी sufficient to वारंट a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern मेमोरी कार्ड रीडर, संगत साथ अनेक आम formats
A memory कार्ड रीडर is a यंत्र, typically having a usb इंटरफ़ेस, लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a मेमोरी कार्ड such as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card readers also offer write काबिलियत, और साथ साथ the कार्ड, इस can फलन as a कलम ड्राइव.
कुछ मुद्रक और निजी कंप्यूटर have a built-in card reader.
A multi card रीडर is प्रयुक्त लिये संचार साथ अधिक than एक प्रकार of flash memory card.
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory क्षमता, लकिन हैं समर्थ to accept अनेक प्रकार और शैलियाँ of मेमोरी ताश.
The क्रमांक of संगत मेमोरी ताश varies इससे रीडर to रीडर and can include more than 20 different types.
The number of अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर can accept is expressed as x-in-1, साथ x होने a फिगर of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
There are three categories of कार्ड पाठक sorted by the प्रकार और मात्रा of the कार्ड स्लॉट : सिंगल कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 1x sd-only ), multi card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x SD only ).
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB कृत्यों do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर, ऐसे as the बुद्धिमान स्टिक मेमोरी कार्ड, जिससे can प्लग सीधे into a USB slot.
The USB device क्लास प्रयुक्त is 0x08.
Bullying is हानिकारक to विद्यार्थी ' well-being और विकास.
Bullying is the use of फ़ोर्स or coercion to गाली or intimidate others.
The behavior can be habitual और involve an असंतुलन of सोशल or physical power.
It can शामिल मौखिक उत्पीड़न or threat, शारीरिक उत्पीड़न or coercion और may be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular पीड़ितों, शायद on grounds of race, religion, gender, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a समूह, it is पुकारा mobbing.
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be पारिभाषित in अनेक different ways.
The UK फिलहाल रै no विधिक परिभाषा of धमकाना, जबकि some U.S. states have laws against it.
धमकाना consists of तीन मौलिक प्रकार of abuse – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves हल्का विधि of coercion ऐसे as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one धमकाना to अधिक जटिल धमकाना in जिससे the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants '' जो may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in स्कूल और the कार्यस्थल is भी referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. फुलर रै analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A bullying culture can develop in कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे इंसान beings interact with each other.
This शामिल स्कूल, गिरिजाघर, परिवार, the workplace, home, and neighborhoods.

Laura बुश और rae leigh bradbury ( formerly लापता ) on अप्रैल 4, 2007, in ऑस्टिन, टेक्सास, बाद the 8-year-old introduced mrs. बुश दौरान घोषणा of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be बरामद as a परिणाम of an एम्बर चेतावनी जब वो थी 8 सप्ताह old in November 1998.
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : cae ) is a चाइल्ड abduction चेतावनी प्रणाली originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : प्रसारण आपात जवाब, नामित लिये एम्बर hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted और murdered in आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's Call '' ( नामित बाद लेवी frady ) ; in हवाई, `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; और अरकंसास, `` मॉर्गन उपनाम एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( in मेमोरी of मॉर्गन Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts are distributed via वाणिज्यिक रेडियो स्टेशन, अंतरजाल रेडियो, उपग्रह रेडियो, टेलीविज़न स्टेशन, और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition लक्षण, the led billboards जिससे हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ, साथ साथ the led/lcd लक्षण of बिलबोर्ड companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert has also teamed up साथ google और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an एम्बर चेतावनी to an ever growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to प्राप्त एम्बर चेतावनियाँ in उनके क्षेत्रफल via sms संदेश can विज़िट बेतार एम्बर चेतावनियाँ, जिससे हैं offered by विधि as free messages.
In some राज्य, the प्रदर्शक scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी terminals are also used.
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each पुलिस संगठन ( in अनेक मामले, the राज्य पुलिस or राजमार्ग पैट्रोल ) जिससे investigates प्रत्येक of the abductions.
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description of the abductee, a वर्णन of the suspected abductor, और a वर्णन और अनुज्ञा थाली क्रमांक of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि वो worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair और इसके परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
House of Night is a series of पिशाच -थीमd काल्पनिक novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C. डाल और उसके daughter Kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of रात्रि बोर्डिंग स्कूल in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
the श्रेणी रै महरूम on the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स बेहतरीन विक्रेता सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह और वहीँ are over seven million copies in print in North America alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, जिससे गई on बिक्री on अक्तूबर 27, 2009 साथ a पहला मुद्रण of a लाख नक़ल, entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
In January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a जर्मनी अनुवाद of चिह्नित, पहुँचे the # 1 स्पॉट on the der spiegel bestseller list.
The series has so far sold more than ten लाख किताबे in 39 देशों.
Burned was released on अप्रैल 27, 2010, और जैसे इम्तिहान, it डाला the यूएसए आज बेस्टसेलर list that week at # 1.
Awakened, released in जनवरी, 2011, भी डाला the list at # 1.
The श्रेणी, जिससे is प्रकाशित by st मार्टिन 's दबायें is नियोजित to include twelve books.
In 2008, योजनाएँ लिये a फिल्मी अनुकूलन were also announced.
The tenth किताब in the श्रेणी, छुपा, थी released on October 16, 2012.
The second book in the novellas ( which give पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण ), lenobia 's प्रण, थी released जनवरी 31, 2012.
Book ग्यारह is फिलहाल पुकारा नाज़िल, और the casts have घोषित कि दो अधिक novellas, neferet’s अभिशाप, नियोजित to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the Trojan War was waged against the नगर of ट्रॉय by the achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद पेरिस of ट्रॉय took हेलेन इससे उसके husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम in यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी साहित्य, सबसे notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey.
The Iliad relates a part of the पिछला साल of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a साईकिल of एपिक कविताएं, जिससे have बच through fragments.
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and other works of Greek साहित्य, और लिये रोमन कवियों सहित वर्जिल और ओविड.
The war originated from a quarrel between the देवियाँ एथेना, hera, और aphrodite, बाद eris, the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन, दिया उन्हें a सुनहरी ठहराना, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the देवियाँ to पेरिस, जो judged कि aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', should receive the apple.
In exchange, aphrodite बना हेलेन, the सबसे खूबसूरत of सब महिलाओं and wife of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of हेलेन 's husband menelaus, led an expedition of achaean सैनिकों to ट्रॉय और besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the Achaeans Achilles and अजाक्स, और the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और पेरिस, the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The achaeans slaughtered the ट्रोजन्स ( मगर लिये कुछ of the महिलाओं और children जिसको वे रखा or बेची as slaves ) and desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
Few of the Achaeans लौटे सकुशल to उनके घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies in distant shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to aeneas, एक of the ट्रोजन्स, जो थी कहा to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The प्राचीन यूनानियों विचार कि the trojan युद्ध थी a ऐतिहासिक इवेंट कि था लिया प्लेस in the 13th or 12th century BC, and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, दोनो the युद्ध और the नगर यहूद widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced Schliemann that ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on प्रॉपर्टी belonging to calvert ; इस अर्जी is अभी स्वीकृत by सबसे विद्वानों.
Whether there is any historical वास्तविकता पीछे the trojan युद्ध is an खोलें question.
Many scholars believe that वहीँ is a ऐतिहासिक कोर to the टेल, हालांकि इस may बस औसत कि the homeric कहानियां हैं a संलयन of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical विरोध प्रायः तिथि it to the 12th or 11th सदियां bc, प्रायः preferring the तिथियाँ दिए by इरैटोस्थनिज़, 1194–1184 bc, जिससे roughly corresponds साथ पुरातत्व प्रमाण of a अनर्थकारी burning of ट्रॉय VIIa.
Anarchists have employed certain symbols for their cause, including most prominently the circle-a और the ब्लैक ध्वज, हालांकि anarchists have historically largely अस्वीकृत the महत्व of प्रतीकों to राजनैतिक movement.
Since the revival of अराजकतावाद around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century संयुक्त साथ the वृद्धि of the anti-globalization गति, अराजकतावादी cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the कपाल कि transmits the वृहद palatine धमनी, रग, और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
सतह तापमान of अंटार्कटिक in शीत और गर्मियाँ इससे the यूरोपीय केन्द्र लिये Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
The climate of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the पूरे of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring तापमान कभी अंकित on the मैदान on धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at Vostok Station.
It is also extremely dry ( technically a मरुस्थल ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण per year.
Even so, on most parts of the महाद्वीप the हिम rarely melts और is आखिरकार संपीडित to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely घुस दूर into the महाद्वीप.
Most of Antarctica रै an बर्फ कैप जलवायु ( köppen ef ) साथ बहुत ठंडा, generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the year and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) साथ a छोटी गर्मियाँ averaging ऊपर जमने, और much उच्चतर वर्षण.
Current सिर कोच माइक tomlin, दौरान the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै था 16 सिर कोच throughout its history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in, the name was changed to the स्टीलर्स prior to the ऋतु to celebrate the नगर 's विरासत of producing steel.
Joe बच परोसा दो पृथक शर्तें as सिर कोच और वॉल्ट kiesling served three separate terms.
During the and seasons, due to the amount of खिलाड़ी जो लड़ा in संसार युद्ध ii, the स्टीलर्स संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया and Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared कोचिंग कर्तव्य साथ चिकनी neale और फिल हैंडलर, जो have नहीं महरूम शामिल भीतर इस list.
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years, the टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ अधिक विन्स than नुकसान was coached by Jock Sutherland in.
In, under sutherland, the स्टीलर्स निभाई उनके पहला playoff खेल विरूद्ध the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head कोच खर्च उनके संपूर्ण पेशेवर कोचिंग करियर साथ the मताधिकार, सहित जॉन mcnally, वॉल्ट kiesling and Chuck Noll, who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of तभी चार मेन to कोच the वही टोली लिये 23 years, Chuck Noll retired in.
Noll is also the only coach in National Football लीग इतिहास to जीत चार सुपर प्याले.
विधेयक cowher, noll 's बदलना, coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl xliii, जबकि सिर coached by माइक tomlin, the टोली 's वर्तमान सिर कोच.
In criminal law, fraud is intentional deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to क्षति another व्यक्तिगत ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation, हालांकि the विशिष्ट दण्ड विधि परिभाषा varies by विधिक क्षेत्राधिकार.
Defrauding people or entities of धन or valuables is a आम purpose of धोखाधड़ी.
A hoax भी involves deception, लकिन बगैर the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन of a अनुबंध.
Fraud is a आधार लिये निष्पक्ष क्षेत्राधिकार.
Passover, or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah, pesakh, यहूदी : peysekh, paysakh, paysokh ) is an महत्वपूर्ण biblically -derived Jewish festival.
Historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( shalosh regalim ) दौरान जिससे the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
samaritans स्टिल मेक इस यात्राएं to माउंट gerizim, but only men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the यहूदी माह of nisan और lasts लिये either सात दिनों ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, यूँ the पहला दिन of passover तभी begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at संध्या of the 15th दिन of the माह of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the passover जश्न commence साथ the passover seder जब the 15th of Nisan has begun.
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover takes प्लेस in वसन्त as the तोरा prescribes it : `` in the माह of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the सबसे widely observed यहूदी holidays.
The यहूदी लोगों celebrate passover as a commemoration of उनके मुक्ति over 3,300 सालो पहले by परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र कि थी ruled by the Pharaohs, and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses.
It commemorates the स्टोरी of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी बाइबल विशेषकर in the किताब of Exodus, in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the कथा of the exodus, the बाइबल tells कि परमेश्वर helped the children of इसराईल एस्केप इससे उनके गुलामी in मिश्र by inflicting टेन plagues upon the प्राचीन उन्होंने पहले the pharaoh होता रिलीज his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The israelites यहूद instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered वसन्त मेमने और, upon देखकर इस, the स्पिरिट of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the holiday.
वहीँ is कुछ बहस over जहाँ the पद is actually derived from.
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is said कि वे बाएँ in ऐसे a hurry कि वे could नहीं इंतजार लिये ब्रैड आटा to वृद्धि ( leaven ).
In commemoration, लिये the अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया, for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is खाया दौरान passover और it is a प्रतीक of the holiday.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती every 75–76 years.
हैली is the तभी short-period धूमकेतु कि is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती, and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद नहीं recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल, जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अमोनिया – और धूल.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely रचित of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is विपक्ष to साम्यवादी.
Organized anti-communism विकसित in प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी, विशेषकर बाद the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the अवधारणा of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद, जिससे is a सेंट्रल विचार in मार्क्सवाद.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief कि पूंजीवाद होगा be followed by समाजवादी और साम्यवादी, just as feudalism was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists question the validity of the मार्क्सवादी अर्जी कि the समाजवादी राज्य होगा `` wither दूर '' जब it becomes अनावश्यक in a सच्चा communist society.
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the जल्दी सालो of bolshevik नियम, जबकि नहीं as चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम, थी स्टिल कठोर by उचित मानकों, citing उदाहरण ऐसे as फेलिक्स dzerzhinsky 's रहस्य पुलिस, जिससे eliminated numerous राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism और फासीवाद as सर्वसत्तावाद, देखकर समानता between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest रै argued कि साम्यवादी थी जिम्मेदार लिये tens of लाखो of मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to power have tended to be rigidly असहिष्णु of राजनैतिक विपक्ष.
These प्रतिद्वंद्वियों अर्जी कि सबसे कम्युनिस्ट देशों have दिखाया no लक्षण of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of economy to an ideal communist stage.
Rather, Communist governments have been accused of बनाना a नई सत्ताधारी क्लास ( a nomenklatura ), साथ शक्तियां और privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil बगुला ( 9 अप्रैल 1922 – 27 नवम्बर 2008 ) थी a jamaican professional footballer.
He was the first black player to play लिये स्कॉटिश क्लबों सेल्टिक, और थी the पिता of कवि और संगीतकार gil scott-heron.
he died in डेट्रॉयट of a heart attack on 27 November 2008.
The soybean ( us ) or soya सेम ( uk ) ( glycine अधिकतम ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to ईस्ट एशिया, widely grown लिये its edible bean which has numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a पल्स by the un खाना और agricultural संगठन ( fao ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) सोयाबीन भोजन is a significant और सस्ती सोर्स of प्रोटीन लिये एनिमल फ़ीड्स और अनेक prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी oil is another product of processing the soybean crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured vegetable प्रोटीन ( tvp ) हैं संघटक in अनेक मांस और dairy analogues.
Soybeans उपज significantly अधिक प्रोटीन प्रति acre than most other uses of land.
Traditional nonfermented खाना उपयोग of soybeans शामिल सोया मिल्क, और इससे the latter tofu and tofu skin.
Fermented foods include soy sauce, fermented सेम paste, natto, और tempeh, among अन्य.
The oil is प्रयुक्त in अनेक औद्योगिक अनुप्रयोग.
The main निर्माता of सोया हैं the संयुक्त राज्य ( 35 % ), ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic एसिड, alpha-linolenic एसिड, and isoflavones.
Harrison Ford ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an अमरीकी फिल्मी कर्ता और निर्माता.
He is famous for his performances as हान सोलो in the असली स्टार युद्धों त्रयी और the शीर्षक अक्षर of the इंडियाना Jones film series.
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade धावक, जॉन किताब in गवाह और जोकर रयान in patriot खेल और साफ और उपस्थित खतरे.
His career has spanned छह दशकों और शामिल भूमिकाएँ in अनेक हॉलीवुड blockbusters, सहित presumed Innocent, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
At one point, चार of the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स of सब समय included one of his roles.
Five of his films have महरूम inducted into the नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री.
In 1997, घाट थी क्रमित no. 1 in साम्राज्य `` the शीर्ष 100 फिल्म Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United States domestic बक्सा दफ्तर grosses of घाट 's films कुल over us $ 3.5 अरब, साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
Ford is the husband of अभिनेत्री calista Flockhart.
A ट्यूब of chapstick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और प्रयुक्त in अनेक देशों worldwide.
It is intended to help treat and prevent chapped होठ ; hence the नाम.
Many varieties भी शामिल सनस्क्रीन in order to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the पद रै become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क.
It popularly refers to any लिप बाम contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the वही manner as लिपस्टिक.
However, the term is still a registered trademark, साथ अधिकारों exclusively स्वामित्व by फाइजर.
In स्वीडन और in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the उत्पाद 's प्रमुख प्रतिस्पर्धी is lypsyl, बना by novartis उपभोक्ता Health, which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop बर्कली ( बिशप of cloyne ), थी an anglo-irish पारस जिनकी प्राथमिक उपलब्धि थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he पुकारा `` immaterialism '' ( बाद referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory झुठलाए the अस्तित्व of सामग्री पदार्थ और बजाय contends कि परिचित वस्तुएँ जैसे टेबल और chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not exist without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be आभास `` ).
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction, an महत्वपूर्ण आधार in उसके तर्क लिये immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published his first major कार्य,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of इंसान दृष्टि और उन्नत the सिद्धान्त कि the उचित objects of sight are not material objects, but light and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the सिद्धान्त of इंसान ज्ञान in 1710 जिससे, बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, he rewrote in संवाद रूप और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक तीन संवाद between hylas and Philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( यूनानी : 'प्रेमr of दिमाग ' ), जबकि hylas ( यूनानी : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, in particular जॉन locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir इसहाक़ न्यूटन 's doctrine of निरपेक्ष स्पेस, समय और गति in de मोटू ( on गति ), published 1721.
उसके वितर्क यहूद a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published Alciphron, a Christian क्षमाप्रार्थी विरूद्ध the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक, an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the development of mathematics.
His last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल, और तब continues to discuss a चौड़ी दायरा of विषय सहित विज्ञान, दर्शनशास्त्र, और theology.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to दर्शनशास्त्र in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the समस्याएं of बोध, the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities, और the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically ज्ञात as tsingtao, is a प्रमुख नगर in पूर्वी शानदोंग प्रांत, पूर्वी China, with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level शहरों, is घर to परिचय 4,896,000 निवासियों in 2010.
It borders Yantai to the पूर्वोत्तर, weifang to the वेस्ट और rizhao to the southwest.
qīng ( ) in चाइनीज अर्थात् `` ग्रीन '' or `` रसीले '', while dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
चिंगदाओ is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the पीला समुद्र, चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख seaport, नवल आधार, और औद्योगिक centre.
It is भी the साईट of the tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest sea bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of चिंगदाओ साथ huangdao ज़िला, straddling the jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is नामित चीन 's सबसे livable city.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a समूह of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित विशाल viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis थी वर्णित, it था the largest capsid व्यास of सब ज्ञात viruses.
mimivirus रै a विशाल और जटिल genome compared with most other viruses.
mimivirus, छोटी लिये `` mimicking microbe '', is so पुकारा to प्रतिबिंबित its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of स्वतंत्रता ( 1810–1821 ) थी an हथियारबंद विरोध between the लोगों of मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों which started on September 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the Mexican युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, थी led by mexican-born spaniards, mestizos और amerindians जो sought independence from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their औपनिवेशिक मास्टर्स, लकिन ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists और मैक्सिकन छापामार insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn syndrome and क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी कि may affect कोई भाग of the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be निरन्तर ), or वज़न घाटा, लकिन may भी कारण जटिलताओं बाहर the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट ऐसे as स्किन rashes, गठिया, सूजन of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between पर्यावरणीय, immunological और बैक्टीरियल कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a दीर्घकालिक जलन विकार, in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली हमले the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune disease in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have वर्णित it as an प्रतिरक्षा कमियां राज्य.
वहीँ is a जेनेटिक संघ साथ crohn 's बीमारी, primarily साथ विसंगतियाँ of the NOD2 gene and its protein, which senses bacterial cell walls.
सहोदर of प्रभावित individuals are at higher risk.
males और महिलाओं हैं equally affected.
Smokers are two times more संभावित to develop crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's बीमारी affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in North America.
व्यापकता estimates लिये उत्तरी यूरोपीय have ranged इससे 27–48 per 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the किशोर और twenties, साथ another शिखर incidence in the fifties to seventies, हालांकि the बीमारी can occur at कोई age.
There is no ज्ञात फार्मास्युटिकल or सर्जिकल इलाज़ for Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options are प्रतिबंधित to controlling लक्षण, maintaining remission, और preventing पतन.
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, साथ साथ दो अन्य सहयोगियों at माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क, वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.
This is an अधूरी सूची of the tallest इमारतें and structures by country.
The list directly includes the tallest buildings and structures for each देश, और जहाँ उचित, it भी अंक to अधिक विस्तृत country-specific lists.
Rough and Ready is a census-designated प्लेस in नेवाडा काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States.
It is located west of Grass घाटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लगभग 62 मील ( 100 km ) इससे sacramento.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing website, created by three former PayPal कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005, on जिससे उपयोक्ता can अपलोड, view and share videos.
The company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री, सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स, tv क्लिप्स, और म्यूज़िक वीडियो, as खूब as amateur सामग्री ऐसे as वीडियो blogging, छोटी असली videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations सहित सीबीएस, the बीबीसी, vevo, hulu, और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव कुछ of उनके सामग्री via the साईट, as भाग of the youtube partnership program.
Unregistered users can watch videos, जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an असीमित क्रमांक of videos.
वीडियो माना to contain potentially अप्रिय सामग्री are available only to registered users at least 18 years old.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was bought by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब, और operates as a subsidiary of google.
Sister Act is a musical लिखा by cheri steinkellner और विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by Douglas Carter Beane, with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken.
