Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of human बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं, सहित दोनो उनके variability और invariance, अंतर्गत विविध सांस्कृतिक conditions.
Through expanding research methodologies to recognize सांस्कृतिक variance in बर्ताव, भाषा, और अर्थ it seeks to extend and develop psychology.
Since मनोविज्ञान as an अकादमिक अनुशासन थी विकसित largely in उत्तर अमेरिका, कुछ psychologists became चिंतित कि constructs स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed, especially since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success.
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes, ऐसे as affect, संज्ञान, conceptions of the स्वः, और मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology, चिंता, और अवसाद, may कमी बाह्य वैध जब `` exported '' to अन्य सांस्कृतिक contexts, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक शोध और अर्जी कि गंभीर त्रुटियां in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases प्रयुक्त impede बल्कि than सहायता the वैज्ञानिक ढूंढें लिये सार्वभौमिक सिद्धान्त in मनोविज्ञान, cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the study of how differences ( variance ) occur, rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry.
In 1972 the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान ( IACCP ) was established.
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as वहीँ रै महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating संस्कृति और विविधता into अध्ययन.
cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान is differentiated इससे सांस्कृतिक psychology.
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds कि इंसान बर्ताव is significantly बहकावे by सांस्कृतिक मतभेद, अर्थ कि मनोवैज्ञानिक phenomena can only be compared with each other across cultures to a very limited extent.
In contrast, cross-cultural psychology शामिल a ढूंढें लिये संभावित universals in बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं.
Walter J. Lonner, लिखने लिये नजर on psi ची, रै stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be विचार of as a प्रकार शोध methodology, rather than an entirely separate field within psychology ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga, इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ).
It was released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of इसके अनुसूचित release.
लिखा और उत्पादित by महिला गागा और redone, `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of उसके जीवन कि वो ca n't एस्केप.
Gaga has further समझाया कि the सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single was designed by गागा in microsoft शब्द.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups, the song was generally well received by आलोचकों, जो likened the सोंग to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the एल्बम 's सीसे single.
The song रै a समान ध्वनि to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन पृथक hooks और a हाउस -influenced break down.
Gaga explained कि the लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन, regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a स्त्री should be.
`` Judas '' initially था a दमदार बिक्री खोलने, लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना to गागा 's previous singles.
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets, और भी पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the चार्ट in दक्षिण कोरियाई.
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई मरियम magdalene.
The वीडियो portrays उन्हें as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying यीशु, और ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting stoned to मौत.
Before its release, the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in the video.
however, आलोचकों generally praised the video, not finding any offensive content.
The video was nominated for two पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows, including the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ, शनिवार रात्रि सजीव, शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '', the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as खूब as on the Ellen DeGeneres Show.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced वीडियो कोडिंग ) is a मानक लिये वीडियो संपीडन, और is फिलहाल एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग, संपीडन, और distribution of high definition video.
The फाइनल drafting कार्य on the पहला संस्करण of the मानक was completed in May 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -आधारd कोडेक मानक विकसित by the itu-t वीडियो कोडिंग विशेषज्ञ समूह ( vceg ) साथ with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ).
The project साझेदारी प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the Joint Video Team ( JVT ).
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the iso/iec mpeg-4 avc मानक ( formally, iso/iec 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10, उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly कायम so that they have identical technical content.
H.264 is perhaps बेहतरीन ज्ञात as होने एक of the कोडेक मानकों लिये blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क players must be able to decode H.264.
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources, such as videos from Vimeo, YouTube, और the itunes स्टोर, वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe फ्लैश खिलाड़ी और microsoft silverlight, और भी विभिन्न hdtv प्रसारण over स्थलीय ( atsc, isdb-t, DVB-T or DVB-T2 ), cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is a प्रकार of मध्यस्थता in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination of the अधिकारों of the पार्टियों to the विवाद, लकिन इस determination is not binding upon them, and no enforceable arbitration award is issued.
the `` पुरस्कार '' is in प्रभाव an सलाहकार राय of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the respective merits of the parties cases.
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें a negotiated settlement.
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding मध्यस्थता is, on the सतह, समान to कि of a मध्यस्थ in a मध्यस्थता.
However, the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the उपनिवेश प्रक्रम और होगा तभी दे a determination of देयता और, if उचित, an indication of the क्वांटम of क्षतिपूर्ति payable.
Subsequent to a non-binding मध्यस्थता, the पार्टियों remain फ़्री to pursue उनके दावा either through the न्यायालयों, or by रास्ता of a binding arbitration, although in practice a settlement is the most common outcome.
The award and reasoning in a non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in कोई subsequent कार्रवाई in the न्यायालयों or in another arbitration tribunal.
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is utilised ज़्यादातर in the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada.
It is largely unknown in Europe, although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a उपनिवेश to jointly instruct a महारानी 's counsel लिये an राय on the merits और संभावित क्वांटम of a अर्जी, और तब to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in that opinion.
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on अगस्टाइन द्वीप in southwestern कुक इनलेट in the kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral तटीय अलास्का, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Anchorage.
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount अगस्टाइन as स्तर of चिंता रंग कोड ग्रीन लिये विमानन और the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी Level is at Normal.
अगस्टाइन द्वीप रै a जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, जबकि वेस्ट द्वीप, बस off Augustine 's western shores, has.
The island is बना up मुख्यतः of पास्ट फटना जमा.
Scientists have been समर्थ to discern कि पास्ट गुम्बद पतन रै resulted in large avalanches.
A मैप of बेलीज़.
The country of बेलीज़ रै roughly 386 km of तटरेखा, और has many coral reefs, cays, and islands in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of these form the Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध stemming लगभग.
The reef and its आइलैंड्स have महरूम a युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट चूंकि 1996.
The following is a list of oceanic islands of Belize, arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन सब of जिससे हैं in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of the islands variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' और `` caye '', और भी use the Spanish `` cayo ''.
River islands have नहीं महरूम सूचीबद्ध.
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet writing application for the Microsoft Windows operating system that allows optical disc आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस to be प्रयुक्त in a manner समान to फ्लॉपी डिस्क.
dla is a पैकेट लिखने प्रौद्योगिकी लिये cd और dvd मीडिया that uses the UDF file system.
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista और नए, हालांकि a पैच exists to फिक्स इस समस्या अंतर्गत खिड़कियाँ विस्टा.
Roxio Burn was introduced on अप्रैल 30, 2009.
As a बदलना लिये dla, it remedies संगतता मुद्दे अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 8.
Alpha Rex Emmanuel Humbard ( August 13, 1919 – सितंबर 21, 2007 ) थी a well-known अमरीकी टेलीविज़न इंजीलवादी जिनकी गिरजाघर of कल दिखाएँ थी दिखाया on over 600 स्टेशन at the peak of its popularity.
असीमित is a 2011 अमरीकी थ्रिलर फिल्मी निर्देशित by neil बर्गर और अभिनीत Bradley Cooper, Abbie Cornish, and Robert De Niro.
It is based on the 2001 novel The Dark Fields by एलन glynn साथ the पटकथा by लेस्ली डिक्सन.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर, और the प्रशांत समंदर to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 United States.
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's economy is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it रै ये संसाधन in abundance.
Alaska थी खरीदा इससे रूस on कूच 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, और the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
the नाम `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) थी already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल, जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an aleut word derived from the same root.
Nelson Mandela महानगर विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी tertiary शिक्षा संस्था साथ इसके प्रमुख प्रशासन in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of three संस्थानों संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास तिथियाँ वापस to 1882 साथ the न्यास of बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ Art School.
The विश्वविद्यालयों draws अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी इससे all over the world.
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the संयुक्त राज्य, फ़्रांस, चीन, जर्मनी, बेल्जियम, डेनमार्क, फिनलैंड, नीदरलैंड्स, नार्वे, स्वीडन, संयुक्त Kingdom and many other countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive विश्वविद्यालयों offering पेशेवर and vocational training.
the विश्वविद्यालयों रै छह campuses - पाँच in बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ and one in George.
the प्रमुख कैम्पस is the South Campus.
Students at nmmu can पढ़ाई towards diplomas और डिग्री up to और including doctoral level qualifications.
A number of courses include workplace अनुभव as भाग of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an American cosmetics brand founded in Maryland, by the Noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी ( बाद पुकारा noxell ) और acquired by procter & gamble in 1989.
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing `` कवर लड़कियों '', फ़ैशन मॉडल जो appear on the सामने cover of women 's magazines, to wear its products.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual ग्राहक सेवा by providing a चौड़ी किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ at उचित कीमतें.
On the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स डार्विन जिससे is माना to be the न्यास of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of प्राकृतिक चयन, or the संरक्षण of favoured दौड़ in the संघर्ष for Life.
For the छठे संस्करण of 1872, the छोटी शीर्षक was changed to The Origin of Species.
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory कि populations evolve over the कोर्स of पीढियां through a प्रक्रम of प्राकृतिक चयन.
It presented a body of evidence that the diversity of life arose by आम descent through a branching पैटर्न of एवोल्यूशन.
Darwin included evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent निष्कर्षों इससे शोध, पत्राचार, and experimentation.
Various evolutionary विचार था already महरूम प्रस्तावित to बताइये new findings in biology.
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, but दौरान the पहला हाफ of the 19th सदी the अंग्रेज़ी वैज्ञानिक स्थापना थी closely tied to the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, while science was part of natural theology.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the मान्यताओं कि प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम और that humans were unique, unrelated to other animals.
the राजनैतिक और theological implications यहूद पडती debated, लकिन transmutation थी not accepted by the scientific mainstream.
The book was written for non-specialist readers and आकर्षित फैली ब्याज upon इसके प्रकाशन.
As Darwin थी an प्रतिष्ठित वैज्ञानिक, उसके निष्कर्षों यहूद लिया seriously और the प्रमाण he प्रस्तुत उत्पन्न वैज्ञानिक, philosophical, and religious discussion.
The बहस over the किताब contributed to the अभियान by t.h. हक्स्ले और उसके fellow members of the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades there was widespread वैज्ञानिक अनुबंध कि एवोल्यूशन, साथ a branching पैटर्न of आम descent, था occurred, लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to दे natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
During the `` ग्रहण of डार्विनवाद `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s, विभिन्न other mechanisms of evolution were given more credit.
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became सेंट्रल to आधुनिक विकासवादी सिद्धान्त, अभी the unifying अवधारणा of the जीवन sciences.
चार्ल्स डिलन `` केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30, 1890 – सितंबर 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` the बूढ़ा perfessor '', थी an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager.
He थी निर्वाचित to the बेसबॉल Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in Kansas City, मिसौरी, और originally nicknamed `` डच '', a आम उपनाम at कि time for Americans of German ancestry.
After उसके प्रमुख लीग करियर began, he acquired the उपनाम `` केसी '', जिससे originally आए इससे the आद्याक्षर of उसके गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे विकसित into `` केसी '', influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम, `` the बूढ़ा प्राध्यापक '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related.
हालांकि उसके बेसबॉल करियर spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों और cities, he is primarily associated with clubs in New York City.
Between playing and managing, he is the तभी man to have worn चार of नई यॉर्क 's प्रमुख लीग क्लब ' uniforms.
He was the पहला of चार मेन ( through the ऋतु ) to मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ और नई यॉर्क मेट्स ; योगी Berra, Dallas Green, and Joe Torre are the others.
Like Torre, he भी प्रबंधित the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager for the then विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स, जिससे जीती over the दिल of नई यॉर्क partly due to the अद्वितीय अक्षर of उनके दिग्गज नेता.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the साल in the जूलियन और gregorian पंचांग और एक of the four months with a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in his कविता concerning the महीने हकदार the Fasti.
The पहला is कि the माह is नामित बाद the रोमन देवी juno, बीवी of बृहस्पति और समतुल्य to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word iuniores, meaning `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the month with the longest daylight घंटों of the साल in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और the shortest daylight घंटों of the साल in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध.
June in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is the मौसमी समतुल्य to दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध and vice versa.
in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
In the Southern गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological शीत is 1 June.
At the start of June, the sun rises in the नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the समाप्त of जून, the सूर्य उदय in the constellation of Gemini.
however, due to the precession of the equinoxes, जून begins साथ the सूर्य in the astrological चिह्न of Gemini, and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer.
June is known for the large क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur over the कोर्स of the माह.
According to one etymology, जून is नामित बाद Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the देवी of विवाह और a शादीशुदा युगल 's household, so some consider it good luck to be married in this month.
According to another etymology provided by the रोमन कवि ओविड, जून is नामित लिये the iuniores, लैटिन लिये `` यंग लोगों '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि the month of May is named for the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
In Iceland, लोकगीत says कि if तुम bathe नग्न in the morning ओस on the morning of जून 24, you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
a संविधान is a नियत of आधारभूत सिद्धान्त or स्थापित precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed.
These rules साथ मेक up, i.e. constitute, कया the entity is.
When these principles are लिखा bas into a सिंगल दस्तावेज़ or नियत of विधिक दस्तावेज़, those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
Constitutions concern different levels of संगठन, इससे sovereign राज्य to कंपनियाँ और unincorporated एसोसिएशन.
A treaty which establishes an international organization is भी इसके संविधान, in कि it होता define कैसा कि संगठन is गठित.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the सिद्धान्त upon जिससे the राज्य is आधारित, the कार्यविधि in जिससे कानून हैं बना और by जिसको.
Some constitutions, especially codified constitutions, भी अधिनियम as limiters of राज्य शक्ति, by establishing लाइनों जिससे a राज्य 's शासकों can नहीं cross, such as fundamental rights.
George Washington at Constitutional सम्मेलन of 1787, हस्ताक्षर of u.S. संविधान.
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign देश in the संसार, containing 448 आलेख, 12 schedules और 100 amendments, साथ 117,369 शब्द in इसके अंग्रेज़ी भाषा संस्करण, जबकि the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is the shortest written constitution, at 7 articles and 27 amendments.
Ron Diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training सत्र in the स्पेस पर्यावरण सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at नासा 's जॉनसन स्पेस बीच.
Engineering management is a specialized form of प्रबन्धन कि is चिंतित साथ the अनुप्रयोग of अभियान्त्रिकी सिद्धान्त to कारोबार practice.
Engineering management is a career that brings साथ the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the organizational, प्रशासनिक, और नियोजन abilities of प्रबन्धन in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion.
Example areas of अभियान्त्रिकी हैं उत्पाद विकास, निर्माण, निर्माण, डिज़ाइन अभियान्त्रिकी, औद्योगिक अभियान्त्रिकी, प्रौद्योगिकी, उत्पादन, or कोई other field that employs personnel who perform an engineering function.
Successful engineering managers typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव in कारोबार और अभियान्त्रिकी.
Technically inept managers tend to be वंचित of support by उनके तकनीकी टोली, और non-commercial प्रबंधक tend to कमी commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy.
Largely, engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking, यूँ आवश्यकता the जरुरी लोगों कौशल to कोच, mentor और motivate तकनीकी पेशेवर.
अभियान्त्रिकी पेशेवर joining निर्माण कंपनियाँ sometimes become engineering managers by default after a period of time.
They are required to learn how to manage एकबार वे हैं on the जॉब, हालांकि इस is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the राशि of खर्च कि जरूर be सशुल्क आउट of जेब पहले an insurer will pay any expenses.
In general usage, the term deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of अनेक प्रकार of clauses ( देखिए नीचे ) कि हैं प्रयुक्त by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments.
Deductibles are typically used to deter the विशाल क्रमांक of नगण्य दावा कि a उपभोक्ता can be reasonably अपेक्षित to भालू the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs, the insurance firm expects to अदा आउट थोड़ा छोटी amounts much कम अक्सर, रूष्ट much उच्चतर बचत.
As a result, बीमे प्रीमियम हैं typically सस्ता जब they involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an बीमे नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
They are normally quoted as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा और is a भाग of सबसे नीतियों covering नुकसान to the नीति holder.
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable खर्च कि exceed इस राशि ( विषय to the अधिकतम sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the नीति, the deductible may लागू प्रति covered घटना, or प्रति year.
For policies जहाँ incidences हैं नहीं आसान to delimit ( लिये उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be नियत by the insurer आधारित on the cause of the claim.
For example, a single housing बीमे नीति may contain अनेक deductible amounts लिये घाटा or क्षति arising इससे चोरी, आग, प्राकृतिक calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement कार्यक्रम कि reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an स्वचालित, घर, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An invoice or bill is a commercial दस्तावेज़ जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, और agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer.
An invoice indicates the बिक्री लेनदेन तभी.
भुगतान शर्तें हैं स्वतंत्र of the invoice and are negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
भुगतान शर्तें हैं प्रायः शामिल on the invoice.
The buyer could have already सशुल्क लिये the उत्पाद or सेवाएं listed on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a अधिकतम क्रमांक of दिनों in जिससे to अदा लिये ये goods और is sometimes offered a discount if paid before the due date.
In the rental उद्योग, an चालान जरूर शामिल a विशिष्ट सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the समय होने billed, so in जोड to मात्रा, दाम और छूट the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
generally प्रत्येक लकीर of a rental चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक hours, days, weeks, months, etc., being billed.
From the पाइंट of दृश्य of a विक्रेता, an चालान is a बिक्री invoice.
इससे the पाइंट of दृश्य of a buyer, an invoice is a purchase invoice.
The दस्तावेज़ indicates the खरीदार और विक्रेता, लकिन the पद चालान indicates money is owed or owing.
In English, the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the पद चालान is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to clarify इसके अर्थ, ऐसे as `` we भेजा उन्हें an चालान '' ( वे owe us धन ) or `` we प्राप्त an चालान from them '' ( we owe them money ).
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, और अधिक लंबवत in दिशा than the left.
It is about 2.5 cm long, और enters the सही फेफड़ों nearly विपरीत the पांचवां thoracic vertebra.
The azygos vein arches over it इससे पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary artery lies at first below and then in front of it.
About 2 cm from its commencement it देता बंद a शाखा to the अपर पालि of the सही lung.
This is termed the eparterial शाखा of the bronchus, क्युकी it arises ऊपर the सही pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes below the धमनी, और is ज्ञात as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides into दो branches for the middle and lower lobes.
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea, it will most संभावित डालें the सही प्रमुख bronchus बजाय of the बाएँ, due to the straighter संरेखण of the सही bronchus to the trachea.
Squash is a racquet sport निभाई by दो ( singles ) or चार खिलाड़ी ( युगल ) in a four-walled अदालत साथ a छोटी, hollow rubber ball.
The खिलाड़ी जरूर वैकल्पिक in striking the बॉल साथ उनके racquet और hit the बॉल onto the playable surfaces of the four walls of the court.
The game was formerly called squash racquets, a सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared साथ the fatter ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ).
स्क्वैश is पहचाना by the ioc और समर्थक हैं lobbying लिये its incorporation in a future Olympic program.
In 2003, फोर्ब्स रेटेड स्क्वैश as the क्रमांक एक healthiest sport to play.
Residual oil is आयल मिला in कम एकाग्रता naturally or in exhausted oil fields.
Often mixed with water, it can नहीं be बरामद by conventional तकनीकों.
However, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced आयल रिकवरी ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the खूब reducing श्यानता और बढ़ाना प्रवाह of the oil.
The technique is नहीं नई लकिन रै नहीं महरूम प्रयुक्त extensively on अवशेष आयल zones, low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार miles in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr.
The technique is limited by उपलब्धता of कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड.
It does not result in sequestration of the carbon डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the गैस is recycled as much as possible.
United राज्य reserves of अवशेष आयल हैं अनुमानित to be 100 billion barrels.

The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration कि burned इससे संडे, अक्तूबर 8, to जल्दी मंगलवार, अक्तूबर 10, 1871, हत्या सैंकड़ों और destroying about in Chicago, Illinois.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the rebuilding that began helped develop Chicago as एक of the सबसे populous और economically महत्वपूर्ण American cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग of इंग्लैण्ड from 21 April 1509 until his death.
He was lord, और बाद किंग, of आयरलैंड, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र अर्जी by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty, succeeding उसके पिता, हेनरी सात.
Besides his six marriages, हेनरी viii is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles साथ रोम led to the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings, भी बाद उसके excommunication इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
Henry oversaw the विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the कानून in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor, maximillian i, और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल, well-equipped फौज, लकिन हासिल छोटी at a considerable वित्तीय cost.
Maximillian, for his part, used the English invasion to उसके अपना ends, और इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the फ्रेंच.
This foray would prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession लिये हेनरी, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, लकिन again the पावन रोमन सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to और इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the विशाल लागत of the युद्ध, ransomed the नगर back for peace.
His contemporaries माना हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक, शिक्षित और संपन्नता किंग, और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling साथ निरपेक्ष शक्ति, he भी सगाई खुद as an author and composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly क्युकी he believed a बेटी होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to उसके मौत in 1547.
He is अक्सर characterised in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela उत्पादित by the संयुक्त राज्य टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo, in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 network and RTI Producciones.
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo pérez-reverte, the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ), a यंग स्त्री इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the सबसे शक्तिशाली ड्रग trafficker in southern Spain.
Patricio Wills, the अध्यक्ष of telemundo टेलीविज़न studios, थी the executive producer.
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of the Year, पसंदीदा सीसे अभिनेत्री, और बेहतरीन ख़राब लक वीडियो, it जीती no पुरस्कार.
With a $ 10 million budget, La Reina del सूर थी the सबसे महंगी telenovela कभी उत्पादित by Telemundo.
The program 's premiere on फ़रवरी 28, 2011, थी the संजाल 's उच्चतम रेटेड premiere for a telenovela to date.
The कार्यक्रम अक्सर वर्चस्व इसके समय स्लॉट, भी over अंग्रेज़ी भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग on other major U.S. networks.
La Reina del Sur समाप्त इसके 63 एपीसोड चलाएं on telemundo और इसके 13 एपीसोड चलाएं on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख दर्शक ), और ताल सब of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा u.S. टेलीविज़न संजाल to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The program 's success spurred Telemundo to लॉन्च इसके पहला अभियान to लाभ the श्रेणी an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन.
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on may 31, 2011, और चिह्नित the telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व Cristina Saralegui.
la reina डेल सूर is ब्रॉडकास्ट in अनेक अन्य बाज़ार, सहित सर्बिया, कोलंबिया, चिली, साइप्रस, निकारागुआ, कोस्टा रिका, Mexico, Albania, Hungary, Slovenia, Croatia, Romania, ( among others ).
An example of रैक आरोहित सर्वर
A web hosting service is a type of Internet होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन to मेक उनके जालस्थल accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as आवास in लैटिन अमेरिका or France.
the पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via File ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a वेब इंटरफ़ेस.
The files are usually वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा free to subscribers.
Individuals and संगठन may भी obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग from alternative service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब pages.
A complex site calls for a more व्यापक पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री प्रबन्धन.
Also, सुरक्षित sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource संजाल अवसंरचना.
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden फ़ुटबॉल पहले 1993 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल वीडियो खेल श्रेणी विकसित by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक Arts Tiburon for EA Sports.
The game series is named after Pro फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of famer जॉन मैडेन, a well-known पूर्व सुपर कटोरी –winning कोच of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator.
The श्रेणी is the बेहतरीन selling ea खेल series.
The खेल have consistently महरूम a बेहतरीन विक्रेता, और रै even spawned TV shows where players compete.
Among the खेल 's यथार्थवादी सुविधाएँ शामिल sophisticated playbooks और खिलाड़ी आंकडे, और आवाज़ commentary that allows players to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast.
The Madden एनएफएल श्रेणी रै महरूम nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd Franchise.
The series was originally conceived by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स, जो तब approached मैडेन in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise.
Due to मैडेन 's insistence कि the खेल be as यथार्थवादी as संभावित, the पहला संस्करण of John Madden Football was not released until 1988.
The second version of the game was released in 1990, साथ सालाना संस्करण चूंकि तब.
The series ' नाम थी बदला to मैडेन एनएफएल in 1993 बाद ea acquired the अधिकारों to use NFL teams and players.
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend उसके नाम और provide expertise for the game.
सिंडी ली मिलर sheehan ( born जुलाई 10, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी antiwar activist जिनकी बेटे, u.S. फौज विशेषज्ञ केसी Sheehan, was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War.
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा दोनो passionate support और एंग्री आलोचना.
Sheehan भागा unsuccessfully लिये कॉंग्रेस in 2008.
She is a vocal आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक Obama 's foreign policy.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : A Mother 's यात्रा through heartache to सक्रियता, थी published in 2006.
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम and Freedom Party.
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born October 17, 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped इससे हैती 's अध्यक्षीय बैलट – समय, अगस्त 21, 2010.
`` Before he घोषित on अगस्त 5 कि he थी कार्यशील लिये अध्यक्ष of हैती, wyclef Jean was still listing his age as only 37 years old.
But after declaring खुद a अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी, the haitian-american-irish hip-hop स्टार भी decided to आइये साफ और confirm कि he थी वाकई 40. '' is a three-time ग्रैमी Award -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, musician, record producer, and politician.
At age nine, Jean moved to the संयुक्त राज्य साथ उसके परिवार और रै खर्च much of उसके जीवन in the country.
He पहला प्राप्त कीर्ति as a सदस्य of the acclaimed New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees.
On August 5, 2010, Jean filed for candidacy in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, हालांकि the चुनावी आयोग subsequently शासित उसे अयोग्य to स्टैंड as he था नहीं मिले the आवश्यकता to have been resident in Haiti for five years.
Wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti election सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी न्यूज, अगस्त 22, 2010.
Haiti 's electoral commission कहा कि mr जां थी अयोग्य to स्टैंड as the haitian संविधान requires candidates to have lived in the country for five years prior to an election.
The 40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान in the US.
Jean 's efforts at भूकंप राहत, अत्यधिक publicized in 2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य, यहूद channeled through उसके charitable संगठन, Yéle Haiti.
The charity, which performed a किस्में of charitable works in हैती between 2005 और 2010, effectively closed in 2012.
In law, a set-off is a statutory रक्षा to the पूरे or to a portion of a plaintiff 's claim.
It had no अस्तित्व अंतर्गत the अंग्रेज़ी आम विधि, होने निर्मित by 2 जियो. ii c. 22 लिये the राहत of insolvent कर्जदार, हालांकि set-off was recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded तभी in आदर of परस्पर debts of a definite अक्षर, और किया नहीं लागू to मामले in जिससे क्षतिपूर्ति were claimed, nor to equitable claims or demands.
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a defendant in an action may set बंद or नियत up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a अभियोक्ता, और ऐसे set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair हालात whereby a व्यक्ति ( `` पार्टी a '' ) जो owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना, despite the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A.
The law यूँ allows दोनो पार्टियों to टालना भुगतान जबतक उनके संबंधित claims have been heard in court.
Upon judgment, both claims are बुझे और replaced by a सिंगल जाल योग owing ( e.g. if पार्टी a owes पार्टी b 100 और पार्टी b owes पार्टी a 105, the दो रकम हैं नियत बंद and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual अनुबंध so कि, जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत, the परस्पर amounts owing हैं automatically set off and extinguished.
In certain jurisdictions ( including the uk ), set-off takes प्लेस automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, लिये प्रत्येक पार्टी जिससे is दोनो a creditor और debtor of the insolvent कम्पनी, परस्पर debts हैं set-off विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य, और तब either the दिवालिया 's creditor can अर्जी the संतुलन in the दिवालियापन or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid, depending on which side owed the most.
This has been criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा ब्याज कि violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, where a creditor रै to अदा सब इसके debts, लकिन प्राप्त तभी a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys that other unsecured creditors get, poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
The right to set off is particularly important when reporting a बैंको 's विकिरणों to नियामक अधिकारियों.
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, because there is a risk that the borrower might डिफॉल्ट thereby अग्रणी to the घाटा of the बैंको 's or इसके जमाकर्ताओं ' धन ) is यूँ replaced ( जहाँ the बैंको रै लिया सुरक्षा over साझा or प्रतिभूति of the borrower ) साथ an एक्सपोज़र of the money lent minus the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, फिल्मी निदेशक, और निर्माता.
Aniston gained विश्वव्यापी मान्यता in the 1990s लिये portraying रेचल ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom मित्रों, a भूमिका जिससे अर्जित उसके an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Award.
एनिस्टन रै भी enjoyed a कामयाब हॉलीवुड film career.
She gained critical acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ), दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ), the शुभ लड़की ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ).
She रै था उसके महानतम वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003 ), the break-up ( 2006 ), Marley & Me ( 2008 ), Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston received a star on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति on फ़रवरी 22, 2012.
a श्वेत बंगाल बाघ at the Houston Aquarium
( वीडियो )
A White बाघ at tobu चिड़ियाघर, in saitama, Japan.
The white tiger is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ, जिससे थी reported in the जंगली इससे time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa.
Conventional पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of कोई particular प्रोसेसर.
Devices connected to the बस appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles, जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन of isa प्लस एक vesa Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट, जिससे हैं sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards, ध्वनि ताश, modems, अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल, tv ट्यूनर ताश and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA और vesa ताश, जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा इंटरफ़ेस लिये वीडियो ताश became अगप, और तब पीसीआई Express.
PCI वीडियो ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस slots.
Many devices previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions.
Caffeine is a कड़वा, श्वेत crystalline xanthine एल्कलॉएड कि acts as a stimulant drug.
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, and fruit of कुछ पौधे, जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes और मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the पौधे, as खूब as बढ़ाना the reward memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the coffee संयंत्र और the पत्ते of the चाय बुश, as खूब as इससे विभिन्न भोजन और पेय containing उत्पाद निकला from the kola nut.
Other स्त्रोत शामिल yerba maté, guarana जामुन, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central nervous प्रणाली उत्तेजक, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness और restoring alertness.
It is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug, but unlike many other psychoactive substances, it is विधिक और unregulated in nearly सब भाग of the संसार.
Beverages containing caffeine, ऐसे as कॉफी, चाय, नरम पेय, और उर्जा पेय, आनंद great popularity.
In North अमेरिका, 90 % of वयस्कों consume कैफीन रोज़.
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug प्रशासन as ग्रा ( generally पहचाना as सुरक्षित ) is कि विषाक्त doses ( over 10 गामा ) हैं much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks, भी जब carried on लिये सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों, सहित parkinsons Disease, and certain types of cancer.
Caffeine can have दोनो धनात्मक और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव on चिंता disorders.
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine, especially दौरान the संध्या घंटों, लकिन अन्य दिखाएँ छोटी disturbance और the प्रभाव of कैफीन on sleep is highly variable.
Evidence of a रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal, लकिन कुछ अधिकारियों have concluded कि दूरदर्शी सलाह is लिये गर्भवती महिलाओं to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less.
The American Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 कि कैफीन खपत is सुरक्षित up to 200 mg प्रति दिन in गर्भवती women.
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who are not used to it, but regular उपयोक्ता develop a सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव, और अध्ययन have generally विफल to support the आम ख़्याल कि ordinary खपत contributes significantly to dehydration.
साथ भारी उपयोग, सहिष्णुता develops rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल रेट और मांसपेशी twitching, but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय of विवाद in the चिकित्सा साहित्य.

A longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a skateboard.
It is commonly used for cruising, downhill रेसिंग, slalom रेसिंग, स्लाइडिंग, and/or हस्तांतरण.

The other three तटीय कैलिफ़ोर्निया पहाड़ सीमाएँ हैं the अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ, Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains.
Physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific Border प्रांत, जिससे in फेरे हैं भाग of the larger प्रशांत पहाड़ प्रणाली physiographic division.
युनेस्को रै शामिल the `` कैलिफ़ोर्निया coast सीमाएँ जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in इसके man और the जीवमंडल Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

An automobile, autocar, मोटर car or car is a wheeled मोटर गाडी प्रयुक्त लिये transporting यात्री, जिससे also carries its own engine or motor.
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed to चलाएं primarily on सड़कें, to have seating लिये एक to आठ लोगों, to typically have चार पहियों, और to be constructed प्रधानतया for the transport of people rather than goods.
The पद motorcar रै भी महरूम प्रयुक्त in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of electrified रेल प्रणालियों to denote a car which functions as a small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage.
These locomotive cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban और intercity रेलरोड प्रणालियों.
It was estimated in 2010 that the क्रमांक of ऑटोमोबाइल था risen to over 1 अरब वाहनों, up इससे the 500 लाख of 1986.
The संख्याएँ हैं increasing rapidly, especially in China and India.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), प्रायः referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1961 जबतक उसके मौत in 1963.
After military सेवा as कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953 जबतक 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन in the 1960 u.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ), और the पहला person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have जीती a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट, the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल, the स्पेस रेस, the african-american Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to कोर the स्प्रेड of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by the दक्षिण वियतनामी सरकारी.
It involved certain forced relocation, गाँव internment, और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy थी assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों, लकिन he थी शॉट और मारे by Jack Ruby two days later, before a trial could take place.
The एफबीआई और the वारेन आयोग officially concluded कि Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed और कि कैनेडी थी संभवतः assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, एबीसी न्यूज in उनके छानबीन, the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of रक्षा tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s सूचना concerning कैनेडी 's private life has come to light.
Details of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become बेहतर known, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the सामान्य पब्लिक, रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks highly in पब्लिक राय दरजा of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों.

A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ), or आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ), is the controlling घटक of a Fire Alarm System.
The panel receives information from environmental सेंसर designed to detect परिवर्तन संबद्ध साथ आग, मॉनीटर उनके operational अखंडता और provides लिये automatic control of equipment, and transmission of information necessary to prepare the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence.
The panel may also supply electrical उर्जा to operate कोई संबद्ध सेंसर, कंट्रोल, ट्रांसमीटर, or relay.
There are four basic types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, और मल्टीप्लेक्स प्रणालियों.

Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट सेवारत the नगर of कोलोन, the अन्य is ratmalana International Airport.
Mattala Rajapaksa अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र स्तिथ in दक्षिणी नगर of hambantota is the अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय airport in Sri Lanka.
भण्डारनायके अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo.
It is administered by Airport and विमानन सेवाएं ( श्री लंका ) ltd.
It is the hub of SriLankan एयरलाइंस, the नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका, और mihin लंका, the budget airline of Sri Lanka.
Black Swan is a 2010 American मनोवैज्ञानिक थ्रिलर और हॉरर फिल्मी निर्देशित by डैरेन aronofsky और अभिनीत नताली Portman, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
The plot revolves around a उत्पादन of tchaikovsky 's swan झील बैले by a prestigious नई यॉर्क नगर company.
The production requires a नर्तकी to खेल the निर्दोष और नाजुक श्वेत swan, लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध नर्तकी नीना ( पोर्टमैन ) is a पूर्ण अनुरूप, as खूब as the dark and sensual Black Swan, which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ).
Nina is overwhelmed by a अहसास of immense दबाव जब वो पाता herself स्पर्धा लिये the भाग, causing उसके to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़ on reality and descend into a living nightmare.
Aronofsky conceived the आधार by connecting उसके viewings of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
Aronofsky cites Fyodor दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना `` as another inspiration for the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a साथी टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 फिल्मी the पहलवान, साथ दोनो films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art.
He and Portman first discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000, और बाद a ब्रैड अनुलग्नक to सार्वभौमिक studios, ब्लैक swan थी produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior to फिल्मांकन, और notable आंकड़े इससे the बैले संसार helped साथ फिल्मी उत्पादन to आकार the ballet presentation.
The film premiered as the खोलने फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film Festival on September 1, 2010.
It had a limited release in the United States starting दिसम्बर 3, 2010 और खोली देशभर on दिसम्बर 17.
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release, particularly for Portman 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा, और थी a significant बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी, grossing $ 329 लाख worldwide.
The film received five Academy Award nominations और पोर्टमैन जीती the बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार लिये the फिल्मी, as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक guilds और त्यौहार, जबकि aronofsky was nominated for Best Director.
In जोड, the फिल्मी itself प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये Best Picture.
The world’s पहला ice-calorimeter, प्रयुक्त in the शीत of 1782-83, by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये और pierre-simon लाप्लास, to determine the ऊष्मा शामिल in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat.
These experiments mark the न्यास of thermochemistry.
A ऊष्मामापी ( इससे लैटिन calor, अर्थ ऊष्मा ) is an ऑब्जेक्ट प्रयुक्त लिये कैलोरीमिति, or the प्रक्रम of measuring the heat of chemical reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity.
Differential scanning calorimeters, समतापी microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters और त्वरित रेट calorimeters हैं among the सबसे common types.
A simple calorimeter just consists of a थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a मेटल संग्राहक full of water suspended above a combustion chamber.
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a reaction between दो substances a और b, the substances हैं added to a ऊष्मामापी और the आरंभिक और फाइनल temperatures ( पहले the प्रतिक्रिया started and after it has finished ) are noted.
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass और विशिष्ट ऊष्मा capacities of the substances देता a मान लिये the उर्जा दिए बंद or अवशोषित दौरान the reaction.
dividing the उर्जा बदलें by कैसा अनेक औज़ार of a were present gives its enthalpy change of reaction.
This method is used primarily in अकादमिक शिक्षण as it describes the सिद्धान्त of कैलोरीमिति.
it करता नहीं खाता लिये the ऊष्मा घाटा through the संग्राहक or the heat capacity of the thermometer and container itself.
In addition, the object placed inside the calorimeter shows कि the वस्तुएँ transferred उनके ऊष्मा to the ऊष्मामापी और into the द्रव, और the ऊष्मा अवशोषित by the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to the ऊष्मा दिए बंद by the metals.
A जोड़ी of ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a किस्में of अन्य names throughout the संसार ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल situations, such as outside or at the beach.
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the पहला और दूसरी toes और around either side of the foot.
They may also be held to the पैर साथ a सिंगल डोरी over the सामने of the foot rather than a thong.
the नाम `` flip-flop '' originated क्युकी of the ध्वनि कि is बना by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking.
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many संस्कृतियों throughout the संसार, originating as जल्दी as the प्राचीन उन्होंने in 4,000 B.C.
The modern flip-flop उतरता इससे the जापानी zōri, जिससे became लोकप्रिय बाद संसार युद्ध ii when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back.
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s, 1990s, और 2000s, और कुछ किस्में have भी मिला उनके रास्ता into अधिक औपचारिक पहनावा, despite criticism.
the उपयोग of flip-flops can परिणाम in अनेक pains और चोटों, including ankle sprains and broken bones.
Some individuals जो चलना लिये long अवधि रपट pain in the feet, ankles, and lower legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often परिणाम in over-pronation चोटों, caused by the पैर घुसते inwards further than normal.
इस can सीसे to चपटा फीट and tendonitis.
Other injuries that may result are due to the जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति, ऐसे as stubbed toes, cuts, and bruises.
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned सोल्स, as खूब as those कि have a डोरी कि is नहीं कैनवास और कि आता वापस almost to the ankle.
The owners of hanjin ओसाका, देखी यहाँ transiting the पनामा कनाल in 2008, घोषित सामान्य average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on.
The law of general average is a legal principle of maritime law according to which all parties in a sea venture proportionally share any losses resulting इससे a voluntary बलिदान of भाग of the जलयान or कार्गो to सहेजें the पूरे in an आपात.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, crew members often have अनमोल छोटी समय in जिससे to determine precisely जिनकी कार्गो वे हैं jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could बर्बाद मूल्यवान समय, वहीँ arose the निष्पक्ष अभ्यास whereby सब the व्यापारियों जिनकी कार्गो उतरा सकुशल होता be called on to contribute a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While general average traces its origins in ancient maritime law, स्टिल it remains भाग of the admiralty विधि of most countries.
The first संहिताकरण of सामान्य औसत थी the यॉर्क antwerp Rules of 1890.
American कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949.
General average requires three elements which हैं clearly stated by mr. इंसाफ grier in बर्नार्ड v. आदमs:
`` 1st.
A common danger : a danger in which vessel, cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and जाहिर 'inevitable, ' मगर by voluntarily रूष्ट the घाटा of a portion of the पूरे to सहेजें the शेष. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or casting away, of some portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in अन्य शब्द, a ट्रांसफ़र of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril जरूर be successful ''.
Example पॉलिश कॉल लिये टीकाकरण विरूद्ध Diphtheria and Tetanus.
A टीकाकरण अनुसूची is a श्रेणी of vaccinations, सहित the समय of all doses, which may be either recommended or compulsory, depending on the country of residence.
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce active immunity to a बीमारी, in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of संक्रमण by कोई प्राकृतिक or `` जंगली '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require अनेक doses लिये अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता, either to उपज sufficient initial immune response or to boost response that fades over time.
For example, टेटनस टीका boosters हैं प्रायः अनुशंसित every 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians समूह to achieve अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता using जरूरी और अनुशंसित टीके लिये a मोहल्ले जबकि महती the क्रमांक of health care system interactions.
Over the past two decades, the recommended vaccination अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as अनेक नई टीके have been developed.
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( देशों, subnational क्षेत्रों, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common.
लिये उदाहरण, पीला ज्वर टीकाकरण is on the दिनचर्या टीका अनुसूची of फ्रेंच guiana, is अनुशंसित in निश्चित regions of ब्राज़ील but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In developing देशों, टीका सुझाव भी लो into खाता the स्तर of health care access, the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed देश using a अनुसूची जिससे extends over the पहला पाँच सालो of a चाइल्ड 's जीवन और उपयोग टीके जिससे लागत over $ 700 सहित प्रशासन लागत जबकि a विकासशील देश उपयोग a schedule providing vaccines in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25.
This difference is due to the निम्नतर लागत of स्वास्थ्य परवाह, the निम्नतर लागत of अनेक टीके provided to विकासशील राष्ट्र, और कि अधिक महंगी vaccines, often for less common diseases, are not utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox टीका थी the तभी एक administered to children.
By the जल्दी 1950s, children routinely प्राप्त चार टीके, लिये सुरक्षा विरूद्ध ( diphtheria, pertussis, tetanus, polio, and smallpox ), and as many as five shots by two years of age.
Since the mid-1980s, many टीके have महरूम added to the schedule.
, the US Centers for बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा टीकाकरण विरूद्ध at तनिक fourteen diseases.
By two years of आयु, u.S. children प्राप्त as अनेक as 24 टीका injections, और might receive up to five shots during one visit to the doctor.
The use of combination vaccine products अर्थात् कि,, the संयुक्त किंगडम 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the आयु of दो, rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection.
Two revellers नृत्य in the streets.
The form of dancing is पुकारा `` wining '' ( घुमावदार ) pronounced wine-ing
a म्यूज़िक ट्रक entertains the भीड on the streets.
Trucks are an अभिन्न भाग of the गली परेड, featuring सजीव प्रदर्शन or deejays
The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये भागीदार 's रंगीन वेशभूषा and exuberant celebrations.
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन पंचांग, साथ numerous सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रम कार्यशील in the सीसे up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday.
it is कहा कि if the आइलैंडर्स हैं नहीं celebrating it, then they are preparing for it, while reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical जश्न रै महरूम कैलिप्सो ; recently सोका रै replaced कैलिप्सो as the most celebrated type of music.
वेशभूषा, stickfighting और limbo प्रतियोगिताओं हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण components of the festival.
Carnival as it is मनाये in त्रिनिदाद और Tobago is also celebrated in cities worldwide.
These सहित टोरंटो 's caribana, मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल, ह्यूस्टन carifest, लंदन 's नॉटिंग हिल कार्निवल as खूब as नई York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few.
Carnival was created when West African slaves mimicked उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो जहाँ ज्ञात लिये उनके lavish वेशभूषा गेंदें.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters, स्लेव संयुक्त तत्व इससे उनके अपना संस्कृतियों to उनके निपुण 's fete.
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab jab or jab molassie ( शैतानों ), मध्यरात्रि लुटेरों, imps, lagahroo, soucouyant, La Diablesse and Demons.
With the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed Africans took their version of कार्निवल to the गलियों through अभिव्यक्ति of ड्रम, riddim भाग जैसे tamboo बाँसुरी और as प्रत्येक नई अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी डाला त्रिनिदाद, कार्निवल विकसित into कया we know today.
The city of Chicago, Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव on मंगलवार, फ़रवरी 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a member of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर since 1989, did not seek a seventh term as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 याचिका हस्ताक्षर by नवम्बर 22, 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot.
अप्रैल 5, 2011 थी अनुसूचित to be a runoff चुनाव date if no candidate received an absolute majority.
Rahm Emanuel जीती the रेस लिये महापौर साथ more than 55 % of the vote.
He was उदघाटन on may 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी इंडी पॉप बैंड फोस्टर the लोगों.
It was released as the group 's debut सिंगल in सितंबर 2010, और the following साल थी शामिल on उनके ep फोस्टर the लोगों और उनके डेब्यू album Torches.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the समूह 's भेदन hit और थी एक of the most popular songs of 2011.
The सोंग थी लिखा और अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he थी working as a commercial jingle writer.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical संयोजन, the गीत describe the homicidal विचार of a troubled youth.
The track प्राप्त considerable ध्यान बाद it थी posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड, और it helped the group garner a multi-album record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011, बाद receiving significant airplay on आधुनिक चट्टान स्टेशन, the सोंग crossed-over onto समकालीन hit रेडियो stations.
The song खर्च आठ लगातार सप्ताह at क्रमांक तीन on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य, बनाना it the पहला बिलबोर्ड वैकल्पिक गीतों number-one सिंगल to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song was widely praised by critics, और it रै महरूम licensed लिये उपयोग in a चौड़ी दायरा of लोकप्रिय media since its release.
`` Pumped up kicks '' प्राप्त a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन पॉप Duo/Group Performance.
The State Fair of West Virginia is an annual राज्य मेला लिये वेस्ट वर्जिनिया.
It is आयोजित annually in mid-august on the राज्य fairgrounds in fairlea, निकट lewisburg, वेस्ट Virginia in the southeastern part of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a विशाल खोलें फ़ील्ड लिये carnivals और प्रदर्शनियों, a घोड़ा track, grandstands, and several exhibition buildings.
Free पार्किंग is provided सटा to the fairgrounds और, जबतक 2006, free camping was also available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers हैं अभी चार्ज a small fee.
The White House, the president 's official निवास और बीच of the प्रशासन
Under the United States Constitution, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal सरकारी as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence और मान्यता.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि should the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद to जिससे किसी else थी निर्वाचित may be निर्वाचित अधिक than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 years of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक of the संयुक्त States.
This list शामिल तभी those व्यक्तियों जो यहूद sworn into दफ्तर as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, देखिए अध्यक्ष of the महाद्वीपीय Congress.
The list does not शामिल कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
वहीँ have महरूम 43 लोगों sworn into दफ्तर, और 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट ), चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, विलियम mckinley, और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी कॉलेज.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office साथ 32 दिनों in 1841, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into उसके चौथी पद in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन, थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an individual can be elected president.
एंड्रयू जैक्सन, the सातवाँ अध्यक्ष, थी the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920.
History records four राष्ट्रपतियों – जॉन q एडम्स, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था, और the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, बराक ओबामा, is the पहला अध्यक्ष of African descent.
`` Lombardi ट्रॉफी '' redirects यहाँ.
For the award awarded annually to the बेहतरीन कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker, see Lombardi Award.
The Vince Lombardi ट्रॉफी is the ट्रॉफी awarded प्रत्येक साल to the जीतना टोली of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप game, the Super Bowl.
The trophy is named in सम्मान of legendary एनएफएल कोच विंस लोम्बार्डी.
This is a list of tables of the सत्यापित oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal रैंक, ऐसे as oldest व्यक्ति or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international देह कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध, ऐसे as the जराविद्या शोध समूह ( grg ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ), जो died at आयु 122 सालो, 164 दिनों.
She met Vincent वैन gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13.
इस led to न्यूज मीडिया ध्यान in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's आयु, परे कोई उचित सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके देशी city, Arles, France.
More evidence of calment 's जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
the longest undisputed जीवनकाल लिये पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of Jiroemon Kimura, who currently lives in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The People 's Court is an अमरीकी arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ, फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश Marilyn Milian, in which small claims disputes are handled.
The People 's Court is the first court show to use बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता, introducing the स्वरूप into the विधा in 1981.
The प्रणाली रै महरूम duplicated by सबसे of the दिखाएँ 's successors in the judicial genre.
Moreover, The लोगों 's अदालत is the पहला लोकप्रिय, long-running reality in the judicial genre.
It was preceded तभी by a few short-lived हकीकत in the विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely सम्बन्धित to न्यायिक कार्यवाही, मगर लिये एक : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
Prior to The People 's Court, the विशाल बहुमत of tv courtroom shows प्रयुक्त अभिनेताओं, और बनाई or fictional मामले ( as did radio before that ).
Among examples of these types of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध जूरी ट्रायल और Your Witness.
The People 's अदालत रै था दो चिहृ जीवनदान.
the दिखाएँ 's पहला जीवन थी presided over solely by पूर्व Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner.
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September 14, 1981, जबतक may 21, 1993, जब the दिखाएँ थी रद्द due to कम दरजा.
This बाएँ the दिखाएँ साथ a कुल of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
The show was taped in लॉस एंजिल्स दौरान इसके first life.
After being cancelled, reruns aired जबतक सितंबर 9, 1994.
On September 8, 1997, after होने आउट of उत्पादन लिये चार सालो, the लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी जीवन in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer और महापौर of नई यॉर्क ed koch थी चुनी as arbiter, जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न from the 1997–98 season through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 season, husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over न्यायधीश जुडी ) और पूर्व नई यॉर्क राज्य परम् अदालत न्यायधीश जेरी sheindlin succeeded Koch.
sheindlin lasted एक और a हाफ सीज़न as he थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ).
Beginning in spring 2001, फ्लोरिडा न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian took over the लोगों 's Court and has presided over the show ever since.
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 ऋतु, वो होगा have परोसा as longest arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons.
As of the उपस्थित, however, उसके सालो on the कार्यक्रम टाई wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 टेलीविज़न ऋतु, the लोगों 's न्यायालयों 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons.
While the show taped in New York City for the first 15 seasons of its दूसरी जीवन, it अभी टेपों in stamford, कनेक्टिकट as of the 2012-13 ऋतु.
On सितंबर 3, 2012, the लोगों 's अदालत 's 2nd/present जीवन entered its 16th season ( 28th overall season ).
With 28 कुल सीज़न, the लोगों 's अदालत बाँधने as the 2nd longest-running courtroom कार्यक्रम पीछे the जारी तलाक अदालत at 33 सीज़न ( from its 3 combined lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( arapaho : wo'tééneihí ' ) is a राज्य in the Western United States.
It became the 45th राज्य admitted to the संघ on January 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, और the 10th-least-densely आबादी of the 50 United States.
लगभग 80 % of यूटा 's 2,817,222 लोगों सजीव साथ the wasatch सामने, centering on नमक झील नगर, leaving विशाल expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited और बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the north, Arizona on the south, and Nevada on the west.
It भी छू a कोने of नई मैक्सिको on the southeast.
Utah is the most religiously समरूप राज्य in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ), जिससे greatly influences Utah culture and daily life.
The world headquarters of The Church of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो ( lds गिरिजाघर ) is स्तिथ in यूटा 's राज्य capital.
The state is a center of परिवहन, शिक्षा, सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध, सरकारी सेवाएं, खनन, और a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation.
According to the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's जनसांख्यिकी estimates, Utah is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United States as of 2012.
St. George, was the fastest–growing महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त States from 2000 to 2005.
A 2012 Gallup नेशनल सर्वेक्षण मिला यूटा overall to be the `` बेहतरीन राज्य to सजीव in '' आधारित on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic, lifestyle, and health-related outlook metrics.
coldwater is a छोटी कस्बा in टेट काउंटी, Mississippi.
It is in the मेम्फिस महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 1,674 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
The hard palate is a पतला आड़ा बोनी थाली of the कपाल, स्तिथ in the roof of the mouth.
It spans the मेहराब formed by the अपर दांत.
It is formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine bone.
It forms a विभाजन between the nasal passages और the mouth.
Also on the anterior portion of the छत of the मुश्किल तालु is the rugae जिससे हैं the irregular ridges in the श्लेष्मक झिल्ली कि help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx.
This विभाजन is जारी deeper into the मुँह by a मांसल extension called the soft palate.
पूरा नियत of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or the miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '', is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी term for the Tanakh.
The books of the tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी, called the Oral Torah.
गम्भीरता नाका in जर्मनी
Driving under the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), drunken driving, drunk driving, drink ड्राइविंग, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence, पीने और ड्राइविंग, or impaired ड्राइविंग is the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग a मोटर गाडी साथ रक्त स्तर of दारू in excess of a विधिक सीमा ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
समान regulations कवर ड्राइविंग or ऑपरेटिंग निश्चित प्रकार of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by पीने दारू or taking other drugs, including, but not limited to prescription drugs.
इस is a दण्ड ठोकर in most nations.
convictions do नहीं necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle.
in सबसे jurisdictions a मापन ऐसे as a रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर, such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense, with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In some jurisdictions, वहीँ is an क्रोधित श्रेणी of the ठोकर at a higher level e.g. 0.12 %.
In most countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone जबकि अंतर्गत the influence of दारू or दवाएँ can be heavily fined, as in फ़्रांस, in जोड to होने दिए a lengthy थाना sentence.
Some jobs have their own नियम और bac हद, लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट, और the संघीय रेलरोड प्रशासन in the संयुक्त राज्य रै a 0.04 % limit for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example, the state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac सीमा, जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर holds a commercial driver 's license.
The California BAC limit is 0.01 % for those younger than 21 सालो of आयु और those on परिवीक्षा लिये a पिछला dui conviction.
Some large corporations have their अपना नियम ; संघ प्रशांत रेलरोड रै उनके अपना bac सीमा of 0.02 % कि, if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण, बाद a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in कनाडा have अपनाया सच्चाई in sentencing कानून कि enforce सख्त दिशानिर्देश on sentencing, differing इससे पिछला practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have न्यायिक दिशानिर्देश requiring a अनिवार्य न्यूनतम वाक्य.
दंड लिये dui आरोप दायरा इससे महंगी शुल्क to forfetiruree of your license plates and in some serious circumstances, your vehicle.
a नशे ड्राइविंग सिम्युलेटर in montréal, Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( duii ), ड्राइविंग जबकि intoxicated ( dwi ), ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence ( oui ) ऑपरेटिंग जबकि intoxicated ( owi ), ऑपरेटिंग a मोटर गाडी जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ), ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the संयुक्त influence of alcohol and/or other drugs, driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ].
Many such laws apply भी to motorcycling, बोटिंग, piloting वायुयान, उपयोग of motile फार्म उपकरण ऐसे as tractors और combines, सवारी घोड़े or ड्राइविंग a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, possibly with different BAC level than driving.
In some jurisdictions वहीँ हैं पृथक आरोप depending on the गाडी प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as bwi ( bicycling जबकि intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
In the United States, local विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसियों बना 1,467,300 रखवाले देशभर लिये ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence of दारू in 1996, compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 dwi अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or कारावास, bas इससे 593,000 in 1990 और up इससे 270,100 in 1986.
