A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a यंत्र कि modulates an एनालॉग वाहक सिग्नल to encode डिजिटल सूचना, और भी demodulates ऐसे a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information.
The लक्ष्य is to उपज a सिग्नल कि can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the original digital data.
Modems can be used over कोई अर्थात् of transmitting एनालॉग सिग्नल, इससे लाइट emitting diodes to radio.
The most familiar example is a voice band modem that turns the digital data of a personal computer into modulated विद्युत सिग्नल in the आवाज़ आवृत्ति दायरा of a टेलीफोन channel.
These signals can be transmitted over टेलीफोन लाइनों और demodulated by another मॉडेम at the receiver side to recover the digital data.
Modems are generally classified by the amount of data they can send in a given unit of time, प्रायः expressed in बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ( bit/s, or bps ), or बाइट्स प्रति दूसरी ( B/s ).
Modems can alternatively be वर्गीकृत by उनके प्रतीक rate, measured in baud.
The baud ईकाई denotes प्रतीकों प्रति दूसरी, or the क्रमांक of times per second the modem sends a new signal.
लिये उदाहरण, the itu v.21 मानक प्रयुक्त ऑडियो आवृत्ति शिफ़्ट keying साथ दो संभावित बारंबारता corresponding to two distinct symbols ( or one bit per symbol ), to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud.
By contrast, the original ITU V.22 standard, which was able to transmit and receive four distinct प्रतीकों ( दो बिट्स प्रति प्रतीक ), संभाला 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 प्रतीकों प्रति दूसरी ( 600 baud ) using phase शिफ़्ट keying.
The घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता is a बयान अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4, 1776, जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies, then at war with Great Britain, regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
Instead वे अभी formed a नई nation—the United States of America.
John एडम्स थी a नेता in pushing लिये स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी unanimously approved on July 2.
A committee had already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा, to be तैयार when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to चुनें थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the document, which congress would edit to produce the final version.
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, अधिक than a साल बाद the outbreak of the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी War.
the नेशनल जन्मदिवस, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on July 4, although Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4, कॉंग्रेस जारी the घोषणा of Independence in several forms.
It was initially प्रकाशित as the मुद्रित डनलप broadside कि थी widely distributed and read to the public.
The most famous version of the Declaration, a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is प्रदर्शित at the National Archives in Washington, D.C.
Although the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत on जुलाई 4, the तिथि of its signing was August 2.
The original July 4 United States Declaration of स्वतंत्रता पाण्डुलिपि थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have महरूम निकला इससे this original document.
The sources and interpretation of the घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly inquiry.
The Declaration justified the independence of the United States by listing औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii, और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक और विधिक अधिकारों, सहित a सही of क्रान्ति.
Having served its original purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता, the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा थी initially उपेक्षित बाद the American Revolution.
Since then, it has come to be considered a major statement on इंसान अधिकारों, विशेषकर इसके दूसरी sentence:
We hold ये सच्चाई to be self-evident, कि सब मेन हैं निर्मित बराबर, कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` one of the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '', containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in अमरीकी इतिहास. ''
The passage came to represent a moral मानक to जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य should strive.
This view was notably promoted by Abraham lincoln, जो माना the घोषणा to be the न्यास of उसके राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र, और argued कि the घोषणा is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted.
It has inspired work for the rights of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the संसार.
The अर्थव्यवस्था of ग्रीनलैंड can be characterized as छोटी, मिश्रित and vulnerable.
The present economy consists of a big public sector and comprehensive विदेशी व्यापार, जिससे रै resulted in an अर्थव्यवस्था साथ अवधि of दमदार विकास, considerable महंगाई, बेरोजगारी problems and extreme dependence on capital inflow from Denmark and use of outside, mainly Danish, skilled labor.
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the अर्थव्यवस्था is critically निर्भर upon substantial support इससे the डैनिश सरकारी, जिससे आपूर्तियाँ परिचय हाफ the revenues of the घर नियम सरकारी who in turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ).
Unemployment nonetheless remains high, with the बाकी of the अर्थव्यवस्था निर्भर upon माँग लिये निर्यात of झींगा और मछली.
Hydrogen is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक h और परमाणु number 1.
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ), हाइड्रोजन is the lightest तत्व और इसके monatomic रूप ( h1 ) is the सबसे abundant रासायनिक पदार्थ, constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass.
Non- remnant stars are मुख्यतः रचित of हाइड्रोजन in इसके प्लाज्मा state.
At standard temperature and pressure, hydrogen is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, अत्यधिक combustible diatomic गैस साथ the आणविक formula H2.
Most of the hydrogen on Earth is in अणुओं ऐसे as जल और सशुल्क यौगिकों क्युकी हाइड्रोजन readily forms covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements.
हाइड्रोजन plays a विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in acid-base रसायन साथ अनेक प्रतिक्रियाएँ exchanging protons between soluble molecules.
In ionic compounds, it can take a negative charge ( an anion ज्ञात as a हाइड्राइड और लिखा as h− ), or as a positively charged species H+.
The latter cation is written as though composed of a bare प्रोटॉन, लकिन in वास्तविकता, हाइड्रोजन cations in ionic यौगिकों सदा occur as more complex species.
The most common isotope of hydrogen is protium ( name rarely used, symbol 1h ) साथ a सिंगल प्रोटॉन और no neutrons.
As the simplest atom known, the हाइड्रोजन अणु रै महरूम of सैद्धांतिक उपयोग.
For example, as the तभी न्यूट्रल अणु साथ an analytic समाधान to the श्रोडिंगर समीकरण, the पढ़ाई of the energetics और संबंध of the हाइड्रोजन अणु played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics.
Hydrogen gas was first artificially produced in the जल्दी 16th सदी, via the mixing of धातुओं with acids.
in 1766–81, हेनरी कैवेंडिश थी the पहला to recognize कि हाइड्रोजन गैस थी a अलहदा पदार्थ, और कि it produces जल जब burned, a प्रॉपर्टी which later gave it its name : in Greek, hydrogen means `` water-former ''.
Industrial उत्पादन is मुख्यतः इससे the भाप reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस, और कम प्रायः इससे अधिक energy-intensive हाइड्रोजन उत्पादन methods like the electrolysis of water.
सबसे हाइड्रोजन is employed निकट इसके उत्पादन साईट, साथ the दो largest उपयोग होने चट्टान ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g., hydrocracking ) and ammonia production, mostly for the fertilizer market.
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle अनेक धातुओं, complicating the डिज़ाइन of pipelines और भंडार टैंक.
Unstoppable is a 2010 अमरीकी कार्रवाई थ्रिलर फिल्मी निर्देशित by टोनी स्कॉट, written by Mark Bomback, and starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine.
The फिल्मी, loosely आधारित on the real-life csx 8888 घटना, tells the स्टोरी of a runaway भाड़ा train, and the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it.
It was Scott 's फाइनल विशेषता फिल्मी पहले उसके death in 2012.
The film was released in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा on नवम्बर 12, 2010, and in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2010.
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a `` Certified Fresh '' rating on सड़े टमाटर आधारित upon समग्र समीक्षाएँ और a दरजा of `` generally अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ '' at metacritic.
The film was मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Sound Editing at the 83rd Academy Awards, but lost to Inception.
in छायाचित्र, bracketing is the सामान्य तकनीक of taking several shots of the same subject using different camera settings.
Bracketing is useful and प्रायः अनुशंसित in परिस्थितियों कि मेक it मुश्किल to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र साथ a सिंगल शॉट, विशेषकर जब a छोटी विभिन्नता in exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image.
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a सेटिंग on the कैमरा to लो अनेक bracketed गोलियाँ ( in कंट्रास्ट to the फ़ोटोग्राफ़र altering the settings by hand between each shot ).
Given the time it takes to accomplish multiple shots, it is typically, लकिन नहीं सदा, प्रयुक्त लिये स्थिर विषय.
Insulated glazing ( IG ), more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane, और increasingly ट्रिपल glazing/pane ) हैं दोगुना or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or अन्य गैस भर स्पेस to reduce ऊष्मा ट्रांसफ़र across a part of the building envelope.
insulated कांच इकाई हैं manufactured साथ कांच in दायरा of मोटाई from 3 mm to 10 mm or more in special applications.
Laminated or tempered कांच may भी be प्रयुक्त as भाग of the निर्माण.
सबसे इकाई हैं manufactured साथ the वही मोटाई of कांच प्रयुक्त on दोनो panes लकिन खास अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as ध्वनिक क्षीणन or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit.
A sectioned आरेख of a फिक्स्ड insulated चमकीले ईकाई ( igu ), indicating the numbering convention used in this article.
सतह # 1 is facing बाहर, सतह # 2 is the अंदर सतह of the exterior फलक, सतह # 3 is the outside surface of the interior pane, and Surface # 4 is the inside surface of interior pane.
The window frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals हैं दिखाया in रेड ( # 7 ), the आतंरिक खुलासा is on the सही हाथ पक्ष ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed ईकाई ( a प्रमुख कारण of असामयिक विफलता ), निर्माताओं उपयोग a नियम of अंगूठा कि permits a अंतर of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of glass used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit.
For example, a unit may be ordered साथ a 4 mm फलक on the exterior और a 3 mm फलक on the interior.
These विसंगतियाँ हैं अनुमत लिये architectural और cost reasons.
Other combinations can be निर्दिष्ट और उत्पादित लकिन the निर्माता may आरक्षित the सही to सीमा the पद of the वारंटी or refuse to warranty the unit altogether.
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned ईकाई हैं नामित according to the following सम्मेलन : सतह # 1 ( facing बाहर ), सतह # 2 ( अंदर of बाहर फलक ), सतह # 3 ( बाहर of अंदर फलक ) and Surface # 4 ( inside surface of inside pane ).
Applying the corresponding नामकरण लिये ट्रिपल paned इकाई परिणाम in सतहों # 1 through # 6.

A typical installation of insulated glazing खिड़कियाँ साथ uPVC window frames.
Selenium is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक se और परमाणु number 34.
It is a nonmetal with properties that are इंटरमीडिएट between those of इसके आवधिक तालिका column-adjacent chalcogen तत्व sulfur and tellurium.
It rarely occurs in इसके elemental राज्य in प्रकृति, or as pure ore compounds.
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene अर्थ `` चंद्रमा '' ) थी खोजा in 1817 by jöns याक़ूब berzelius, जो विख्यात the समानता of the नई तत्व to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ).
Selenium is found impurely in metal sulfide ores, जहाँ it partially replaces the गंधक.
Commercially, selenium is उत्पादित as a byproduct in the शोधन of ये ores, सबसे प्रायः दौरान तांबे उत्पादन.
Minerals that are pure selenide or selenate यौगिकों हैं ज्ञात, but are rare.
The chief commercial uses for selenium आज हैं in glassmaking और in pigments.
Selenium is a सेमीकंडक्टर और is प्रयुक्त in photocells.
Uses in electronics, once महत्वपूर्ण, have महरूम ज़्यादातर supplanted by silicon semiconductor devices.
Selenium continues to be प्रयुक्त in a few प्रकार of dc शक्ति surge protectors and one type of fluorescent quantum dot.
Selenium salts are toxic in large amounts, लकिन ट्रेस amounts हैं जरुरी लिये सेल्यूलर फलन in अनेक जीवों, सहित all animals.
Selenium is a component of the एंटीऑक्सीडेंट एंजाइमों glutathione peroxidase और thioredoxin reductase ( जिससे indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized molecules in animals and some plants ).
It is also found in तीन deiodinase एंजाइमों, जिससे बदलें एक थायराइड hormone to another.
Selenium requirements in plants differ by प्रजाति, साथ कुछ पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts, और अन्य apparently requiring none.
The United राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 2008 थी the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election.
it थी आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 4, 2008.
Democrat Barack Obama, then the junior सीनेटर इससे इलिनोइस, पराजित रिपब्लिकन जॉन मैक्केन, the वरिष्ठ सीनेटर इससे एरिज़ोना.
As the campaign progressed, the War in Iraq and outgoing रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश था become increasingly unpopular, और the major-party उम्मीदवार भागा on a platform of change and reform.
Domestic policy and the economy eventually उभरा as the प्रमुख विषयवस्तु in the पिछला few महीने of the चुनाव अभियान बाद the onset of the worst recession since the 1930s.
Obama होता go on to जीत a निर्णायक विजय over McCain in both the electoral and popular vote.
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American history, and won the लोकप्रिय और चुनावी vote by the largest हाशिया in 12 सालो, as खूब as the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote लिये a डेमोक्रेट in nearly a half-century.
This was the पहला u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी थी निर्वाचित, having भी महरूम the first in which an African American won the nomination of either major party.
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. इतिहास कि दोनो प्रमुख पार्टी उम्मीदवार यहूद बैठे u.s. सीनेटरों, तभी the तीसरा समय ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s. सीनेटर थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, और तभी the second time that the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S. Senators.
This was also the first election since 1952 in जिससे neither of the प्रमुख पार्टियों ' नामांकित थी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष or Vice President.
The Sovereign Prince or राजकुमारी of मोनाको is the reigning monarch और सिर of राज्य of the Principality of Monaco.
All princes or princesses have officially लिया the नाम of the हाउस of grimaldi, लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न अन्य घरों ( goyon de matignon, polignac ) in पुरूष line.
The reigning प्रिंस is अल्बर्ट II.
Visualization of fragmentation और तब of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file systems, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the amount of fragmentation.
It does इस by physically आयोजन the सामग्री of the द्रव्यमान भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to स्टोर फाइलें into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
It also attempts to create larger regions of free स्पेस using compaction to impede the वापसी of fragmentation.
Some defragmentation utilities try to रखना छोटी फाइलें भीतर a सिंगल निर्देशिका साथ, as वे हैं प्रायः accessed in sequence.
defragmentation is लाभदायक और प्रासंगिक to संचिका प्रणालियों on electromechanical disk drives.
The movement of the hard drive 's read/write heads over अलग क्षेत्रों of the डिस्क जब accessing fragmented फाइलें is धीमा, compared to accessing the entire contents of a non-fragmented file sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments.
A service-level agreement ( SLA ) is a भाग of a सेवा अनुबंध जहाँ a सेवा is formally पारिभाषित.
In practice, the term SLA is sometimes used to refer to the contracted डिलीवरी समय ( of the सेवा or performance ).
As an example, अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं होगा commonly शामिल सेवा स्तर समझौतों भीतर the शर्तें of उनके contracts with customers to define the level ( s ) of service being sold in plain language terms.
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean time between असफलताओं ( mtbf ), औसत समय to मरम्मत or औसत समय to रिकवरी ( mttr ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा दरों ; throughput ; जिटर ; or समान measurable details.
Union Station is a former shopping mall in Union City, जॉर्जिया, in दक्षिणपश्चिम मैट्रो अटलांटा सटा to अंतरराज्यीय 85.
After new ownership and renovations in 2006, the नाम थी बदला इससे शैनन southpark Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall.
A previous नवीकरण थी किया in the लेट 1990s.

This map shows the contiguous United राज्य और, in insets at the निम्नतर बाएँ, the दो राज्य कि हैं not contiguous.
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the महाद्वीप of उत्तर अमेरिका कि हैं दक्षिण of कनाडा और उत्तर of मैक्सिको, प्लस the ज़िला of कोलंबिया.
The पद excludes the राज्य of अलास्का and Hawaii, and all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions, such as Puerto Rico.
Together, the 48 संलग्न राज्य और d.C. occupy a संयुक्त क्षेत्रफल of, जिससे is 1.58 % of the total surface area of the Earth.
of इस, is जमीन, composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area.
officially, is जल क्षेत्रफल, composing 62.66 % of the nation 's water area.

It is the तीसरा सिंगल इससे उनके छठे स्टुडियो album, Unstoppable.

it थी लिखा by रोब mathes and Allen Shamblin.
Utilization management is the मूल्यांकन of the appropriateness, चिकित्सा need और दक्षता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to स्थापित मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश और अंतर्गत the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan.
typically it शामिल नई क्रियाएँ or decisions based upon the analysis of a case.
Utilization management describes proactive प्रक्रियाओं, सहित निर्वहन नियोजन, संयुक्त planning, pre-certification and clinical case appeals.
It भी कवर proactive प्रक्रियाओं, ऐसे as संयुक्त नैदानिक समीक्षाएँ और पीर समीक्षाएँ, as well as appeals introduced by the provider, payer or patient.
As pre-certification and संयुक्त पुनर्विलोकन of मामले grew, utilization प्रबन्धन spun आउट of utilization review.
While not synonymous, health परवाह पेशेवर tend to उपयोग the शर्तें as interchangeable.
The difference is utilization management is and intends to मैनेज स्वास्थ्य परवाह मामले efficiently और लागत effectively पहले और दौरान health care administration.
Utilization review is more considering whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी appropriately लागू बाद it थी administered.
There are four basic तकनीकों in utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
utilization Review
मामला प्रबन्धन
Disease प्रबन्धन
The outsiders is a coming-of-age अनोखा by S. E. hinton, first published in 1967 by Viking Press.
Hinton was 15 when she started लिखने the अनोखा, लकिन किया सबसे of the कार्य जब वो was sixteen and a junior in high school.
hinton थी 18 जब the किताब was published.
The किताब फ़ॉलो दो प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूह, the greasers और the socs ( सुनाया by the author as, short for Socials ), who are divided by their socioeconomic status.
The book takes place in Tulsa, ओक्लाहोमा, in 1965, लकिन it is never stated in the book.
A film अनुकूलन थी उत्पादित in 1983, और a little-known short-lived टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared in 1990, picking up where the movie left off.
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two houses of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral विधानमंडल ).
it is अक्सर referred to as the House.
the अन्य हाउस is the Senate.
The संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in आलेख एक of the United States Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट re-pass the विधान साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in each chamber ).
The House has several विशेष शक्तियां : the शक्ति to initiate आय बिल्स, to impeach officials, and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
प्रत्येक u.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी but is entitled to at least one representative.
The most populous state, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि.
The total क्रमांक of मतदान प्रतिनिधि is fixed by law at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The हाउस meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United States Capitol.
A supply chain is दरअसल a जटिल और डायनेमिक सप्लाई और demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of संगठन, लोगों, क्रियाएँ, सूचना, और संसाधन शामिल in चलती a product or service from supplier to customer.
Supply chain activities transform प्राकृतिक संसाधन, कच्चा सामग्री, और components into a समाप्त उत्पाद कि is वितरित to the end customer.
In sophisticated सप्लाई कड़ी प्रणालियों, प्रयुक्त उत्पाद may re-enter the supply chain at any point where residual value is recyclable.
सप्लाई जंजीरों कड़ी value chains.
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by Jimi Hendrix in 1967, released as the दूसरी सिंगल by the जिमि हेंड्रिक्स अनुभव in दोनो the संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त States.
It later appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's 1967 album Are You Experienced.
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical साइकेडेलिक ड्रग गीतों of the sixties ''.
`` जामुनी haze 's '' गिटार virtuosic तकनीकों होता be emulated by many metal guitarists.
A close up picture of a गैंडा स्किन.
Skin is the नरम बाहरी covering of vertebrates.
Other animal coverings such as the arthropod exoskeleton have अलग developmental उत्पत्ति, ढांचा और रासायनिक composition.
The adjective cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the स्किन '' ( इससे लैटिन cutis, skin ).
In mammals, the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue, and गार्ड the underlying मांसपेशियां, हड्डियों, ligaments और आतंरिक अंगों.
Skin of a different प्रकृति exists in amphibians, सरीसृपों, और birds.
All mammals have कुछ बाल on उनके स्किन, भी समुद्री स्तनधारियों which appear to be hairless.
The skin interfaces with the पर्यावरण और is the पहला लकीर of defense from external factors.
For उदाहरण, the स्किन plays a कुंजी भूमिका in protecting the देह against pathogens and excessive water loss.
Its other functions are insulation, तापमान विनियमन, सनसनी, और the उत्पादन of vitamin D folates.
Severely damaged skin may चंगा by forming scar ऊतक.
This is sometimes discoloured और depigmented.
the मोटाई of स्किन भी varies इससे स्थान to location on an organism.
In humans for example, the skin located under the आँखें और around the eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा, और is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles.
The skin on the हथेलियां और the सोल्स of the फीट is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body.
फर is घना hair.
Primarily, fur augments the इन्सुलेशन the स्किन provides लकिन can भी serve as a द्वितीयक यौन characteristic or as camouflage.
On some animals, the स्किन is बहुत मुश्किल और मोटा, और can be processed to बनाएँ चमड़े.
Reptiles and मछली have मुश्किल सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on उनके स्किन लिये सुरक्षा, और पक्षियों have hard feathers, all made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier to ड्योढ़ी of रसायन और is प्रायः विषय to परासरण और diffusive forces.
For example, a frog sitting in an anesthetic समाधान होता be sedated जल्दी, as the रासायनिक diffuses through its skin.
थामस स्कॉट
The Rev. Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally ज्ञात लिये उसके best-selling कार्य a commentary on the पूरे बाइबल और the फ़ोर्स of सच्चाई, और as एक of the संस्थापकों of the गिरिजाघर मिशनरी समाज.

Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in the श्रेणी, हैं पूछा in jest क्यों वे have नहीं महरूम डाल.

`` लकिन nobody पुकारा '', nighy added.
But in 2009, Yates डाल nighy as मंत्री of जादू rufus scrimgeour in Deathly Hallows.
nighy कहा, `` i am no longer the तभी अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता नहीं to be in Harry Potter and I am very pleased. ''

I was a bit too बूढ़ा लिये हैरी ''.

i जान कुछ जो हैं still waiting. ''

( v ) indicates the actor or actress lent तभी उसके or उसके आवाज़ लिये उसके or उसके फिल्मी character
( y ) indicates the कर्ता or अभिनेत्री portrayed the भूमिका in a flashback scene or when the character was young.
( f ) indicates the actor or actress did not appear in कोई नई फुटेज लिये the फिल्मी ; फुटेज इससे an पहले फिल्मी or films थी प्रयुक्त.
A light grey cell ( such as the one in the `` Charity Burbage '' पंक्ति in the `` पारस 's स्टोन '' कालम ) indicates the अक्षर थी नहीं in the फिल्मी अनुकूलन.
A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual सिद्धान्त, ' आधारित on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी इससे, मजबूरी, or अन्य behavioral problems.
originally प्रस्तावित by alcoholics बेनाम ( aa ) as a विधि of रिकवरी इससे alcoholism, the बारह कदम यहूद पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939.
The method was then adapted and became the न्यास of अन्य twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक संघ, the process involves the following:
admitting कि एक can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a उच्चतर शक्ति कि can दे शक्ति ;
examining past errors with the सहायता of a प्रायोजक ( अनुभवी सदस्य ) ;
making amends लिये ये त्रुटियाँ ;
सीखना to सजीव a new life with a new code of behavior ;
helping अन्य जो suffer इससे the वही व्यसनों or compulsions.
Witness impeachment, in the विधि of प्रमाण of the संयुक्त राज्य, is the प्रक्रम of कॉलिंग into सवाल the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial.
The Federal Rules of Evidence contain the नियम शासी महाभियोग in संघीय courts.
Party leaders and whips of the United राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि हैं निर्वाचित by उनके संबंधित पार्टियों in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य ballot and are also known as floor leaders.
The u.S. हाउस of प्रतिनिधि करता नहीं officially उपयोग the पद `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' although the media frequently do.
The House instead उपयोग the शर्तें `` रिपब्लिकन नेता '' or `` लोकतांत्रिक नेता '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats.
The वर्तमान हाउस बहुमत नेता is रिपब्लिकन eric cantor, जबकि the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is Republican केविन मैकार्थी, जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer.
following the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i in 1914, the जर्मनी फौज खोली the पश्चिमी सामने by पहला invading Luxembourg and Belgium, then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France.
The tide of the advance was dramatically turned साथ the बैटल of the Marne.
Following the race to the sea, both sides dug in साथ a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches, stretching from the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France.
This line remained essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये सबसे of the war.
Between 1915 and 1917 वहीँ यहूद अनेक प्रमुख offensives साथ इस सामने.
The attacks employed विशाल तोपखाने bombardments और massed infantry advances.
However, a combination of entrenchments, machine gun nests, barbed तार, और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted कठोर हताहत on the हमलावर और counterattacking defenders.
As a परिणाम, no significant advances were made.
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 मुर्दे, the बैटल of the somme साथ अधिक than [ an अनुमानित ] लाख हताहत, और the बैटल of passchendaele साथ roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to ब्रेक the deadlock, इस सामने देखी the परिचय of नई सैन्य technology, including poison gas, aircraft and tanks.
But it was only after the अपनाना of improved tactics कि कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता थी लौटी.
The German Spring Offensive of 1918 was made संभावित by the सन्धि of brest-litovsk कि चिह्नित the समाप्त of the विरोध on the Eastern Front.
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German सेना उन्नत nearly to the वेस्ट, जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष चूंकि 1914 और बहुत nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant प्रकृति of इस सामने, इस थिएटर होता prove निर्णायक.
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies during the second half of 1918 persuaded the जर्मनी कमांडरों कि शिकस्त थी अपरिहार्य, और the सरकारी थी मजबूर to मुकदमा लिये शर्तें of an armistice.
The terms of peace were सहमत upon साथ the हस्ताक्षर of the सन्धि of versailles in 1919.
The following is a list of पुनरावर्ती और नाबालिग वर्ण in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली श्रेणी the Suite Life of Zack & Cody.
These characters were regularly घुमाया, प्रायः disappearing लिये long अवधि दौरान the series.
The following list of characters has been sorted alphabetically, by first name.
Some of the characters had no last name and most were commonly referred to by उनके पहला नाम so इस appeared to be the सबसे लॉजिकल method.
In the case of Chef पाउलो, जो था no ज्ञात पहला नाम, वे have been listed by title.
the पहला महिला of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flotus ) is the hostess of the White House.
Because इस स्थिति is traditionally भर by the बीवी of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the शीर्षक is सबसे often applied to the wife of a sitting president.
The current पहला महिला is मिशेल Obama.
After her husband Barack Obama was re-elected on नवम्बर 6, 2012, वो is अनुसूचित to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
सेप्टिक शॉक is a चिकित्सा कंडीशन as a परिणाम of कठोर संक्रमण और सेप्सिस, हालांकि the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular site.
It can कारण अनेक अंग dysfunction सिंड्रोम ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death.
Its most common victims are children, immunocompromised individuals, और the बुजुर्ग, as उनके प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालियों can नहीं सौदे साथ the संक्रमण as effectively as those of स्वस्थ adults.
Frequently, patients कष्ट इससे सेप्टिक शॉक हैं cared लिये in intensive care units.
The mortality rate from सेप्टिक शॉक is लगभग 25–50 %.
Kevin Brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम k-os ( ; `` अराजकता '' ), is a कनाडाई rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer.
His दिए नाम may भी be cited as kheaven, a स्पेलिंग he बाद adopted.
The alias `` k-os '', spelled with a lower case `` k '', was intended to be कम आक्रामक than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers जिनकी names यहूद all upper case, such as KRS-One.
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self, '' although in a later interview he said that it originally stood लिये `` केविन 's असली ध्वनि. '' k-os ' म्यूज़िक incorporates a चौड़ी किस्में of म्यूज़िक जाति, सहित रैप, दुर्गंध, चट्टान, और reggae.
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive संदेश '' जबकि at टाइम्स expressing आलोचना of मुख्यधारा हिप हॉप संस्कृति 's obsession साथ धन, कीर्ति और glorification of violence.
A musician as well as a producer, k-os रै लिखा और उत्पादित nearly प्रत्येक भाग of सब चार of उसके एल्बम.
k-os usually performs साथ a सजीव बैंड, कुछ कि is uncommon in the hip hop genre.
He sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान सजीव प्रदर्शन and in the studio.
k-os received his first musical exposure साथ the सिंगल `` musical essence '', released in 1993.
बाद the रिलीज of उसके दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य '' in 1996, he withdrew इससे the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 और released his debut album Exit in 2002.
The album प्राप्त धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची अपेक्षाकृत few copies.
He released उसके दूसरी एल्बम आनन्द विद्रोह in 2004, जिससे received platinum status in Canada.
A third album,, was released in 2006 और भी गई प्लेटिनम.
His चौथी एल्बम, यस !
, was released in 2009.
His fifth एल्बम ब्लैक on सुनहरे थी released in 2013.
the आधिकारिक 2007 संस्करण of the UCC.
Even the गोपनीय अशिष्ट मसौदा of the ucc यहूद saved और प्रकाशित as a 10-volume set.
The Uniform वाणिज्यिक कोड ( ucc or the कोड ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1952, is एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि have महरूम promulgated in संयोजन with efforts to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in all 50 states within the United States of America.
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of चढ़ाई रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops at a belay station.
Each section of वास्तविक चढ़ाई between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch.
The leader ascends the pitch, placing gear and stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay स्टेशन.
The कारण लिये the stops can be संकल्पित by चुनाव, convention or necessity.
For example:
The रस्सी is too छोटी to do the संपूर्ण रूट in one pitch ( necessity ).
the नेता रै चलाएं आउट of सुरक्षात्मक gear ( necessity ).
There is a सुविधाजनक protectable कगार, or फिक्स्ड bolts लगाई by पिछला चढना, at the location for a belay station ( convention ).
The leader chooses to rest or एक्सचेंज लीड पहले the अगला खण्ड of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of ये stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber जबकि collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent.
At the belay station, the सुरक्षात्मक गियर is एकत्रित, संभवतः exchanged to a नई नेता, and the leader of the next pitch ascends the route.
A diagram showing an I गठन on ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन on defense
In अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
The specific role that a player takes on the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके स्थिति.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, कि is टीमों may बदलें any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the विकास of तीन `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी, the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the बॉल, जो is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's प्रमुख जॉब is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और वितरण of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also परोसा as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on Narcotic Drugs.
the विधान निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration और the खाना और ड्रग प्रशासन, determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules, हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a नई जर्सी पारगमन park-and-ride स्टेशन in वेन, नई जर्सी साथ the montclair-boonton लकीर कि provides बस सेवा to नई यॉर्क नगर और विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton Line train service to New York, Hoboken, and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University.
It is स्तिथ बंद of the southbound गलियों of नई जर्सी रूट 23 on वेस्ट बेल्ट सड़क, निकट the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23, Interstate 80, and U.S. Route 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
the स्टेशन खोली in जनवरी 2008 and has 1,000 parking spaces.
New Jersey Transit intends लिये इस संयुक्त रेल और बस स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन, '' कि होगा सहायता relieve the habitual जमघट at the वेस्ट बेल्ट सड़क Interchange, where the three major highways meet.
In addition, the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride, a bus डिपो on रूट 23 उत्तर कि रै चूंकि महरूम renamed माँ 's पार्क & सवारी, और the willowbrook मॉल पार्क & सवारी ; the now-mother 's साईट था सीमित पार्किंग while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook.
the वेन township बस गैरेज is स्तिथ on the opposite side of Route 23.
There रै महरूम a प्रस्ताव to निर्माण a पार्किंग डेक साथ another thousand spots and develop the land at the station.
In addition to Montclair-Boonton रेल, the पारगमन बीच is परोसा by the following नई जर्सी पारगमन bus lines:
75 to न्यूर्क penn स्टेशन और बटलर
194 to बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल और William Paterson University
324 to Port प्राधिकार और वेन रूट 23
748 to willowbrook मॉल and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol, ampersat, apetail or वाणिज्यिक at in english—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of अन्य शर्तें.
The fact that there is no single word in English for the प्रतीक रै prompted कुछ लेखक to उपयोग the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली arroba—or to सिक्का नई शब्द ऐसे as asperand, ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency.
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 विजेट @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, लकिन थी on at तनिक एक 1889 मॉडल और the बहुत कामयाब Underwood models from the `` Underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is now universally शामिल on कंप्यूटर keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to include the sense of being `` located at, '' `` and, '' or `` directed at '', विशेषकर in ईमेल पता और सोशल मीडिया, विशेषकर ट्विटर.
The mark is एनकोडेड at.
the catcher in the rye is a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger.
Originally प्रकाशित लिये वयस्कों, it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent पाठक लिये इसके themes of teenage angst and alienation.
It has been अनूदित into लगभग सब of the संसार 's प्रमुख languages.
Around 250,000 copies are sold each साल साथ कुल बिक्री of अधिक than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, होल्डन caulfield, रै become an प्रतीक लिये teenage विद्रोह.
The novel was included on टाइम्स 2005 सूची of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923, और it थी नामित by आधुनिक पुस्तकालयों और इसके पाठक as एक of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels of the 20th century.
It has been अक्सर challenged in the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य देशों for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It also deals with complex मुद्दे of पहचान, belonging, कनेक्शन, और alienation.
skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
इस is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the ठेठ इंसान, और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or ट्रंक, मांसपेशियां of the अपर limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical स्थिति.
In other स्थितियाँ, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by जोनाथन मरे लिये the Oxygen television station.
The show centers on सात feisty और शरारती महिलाओं साथ अलग पृष्ठभूमि और personalities, who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems.
They are introduced to the show बंद उनके घातक बर्ताव और accomplish विशिष्ट goals.
The cast, deemed `` ख़राब लड़कियों '', आनंद a luxurious जीवनशैली in a ठीक mansion for three months, during which they must obey specified rules.
Their lives inside – और बाहर – of the हाउस हैं chronicled और अंकित by the उत्पादन टोली.
The Bad लड़कियों क्लबों is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त राज्य, नीदरलैंड्स, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, हंगेरियाई, और स्वीडन ).
It has प्राप्त ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, जो मानना the show promotes violence by adolescent viewers.
Furthermore, several cast सदस्यों बना विवादास्पद remarks जिससे outraged अनेक viewers.
The स्वरूप of the दिखाएँ रै बदला इससे जल्दी सीज़न.
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a नियम, वो is evicted इससे the दिखाएँ और, if it is जल्दी in the season, replaced by a new `` bad girl ''.
There have been nine complete seasons of the ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों, साथ the दसवाँ ऋतु फिलहाल airing.
The fourth season had the उच्चतम दरजा in the दिखाएँ 's इतिहास, बनने इसके `` भेदन season ''.
There have been three spin-offs of the ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों.
One of उन्हें, प्रेम खेल : ख़राब लड़कियों need प्रेम too, जहाँ पास्ट डाल members seek true love, has gained high ratings.
ऑक्सीजन रै भी released a मोबाईल खेल, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप और merchandise to promote the show.
Of the 92 contestants, Kerry harvick ( of ऋतु एक ) थी a कामयाब देश सिंगर before the show.
Tanisha Thomas ( of ऋतु दो ) बाद hosted ऑक्सीजन 's oxygenlive !
and the subsequent सीज़न of प्रेम खेल : Bad Girls Need Love Too.
Thomas, who has been dubbed the `` godmother '' to सब प्रतियोगी, रै उसके अपना टेलीविज़न वृत्तचित्र हकदार tanisha Gets Married.
As of Season 8 she 's महरूम the मेजबान of the पुनर्मिलन specials.
The Iowa Senate is the अपर हाउस of the आयोवा सामान्य सभा.
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate, representing 50 single-member जिले आरपार the राज्य साथ populations of लगभग 60,927 प्रति constituency,.
Each Senate district is रचित of दो हाउस जिले.
The सीनेट meets at the आयोवा राज्य कैपिटल in Des Moines.
Unlike the lower house, the Iowa House of Representatives, Senators serve four-year terms, साथ हाफ of the सीनेट लड़खड़ाते लिये re-election प्रत्येक two years.
वहीँ हैं no पद हद लिये the Senate.
mechanical मरम्मत
Maintenance, repair, and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance, repair, और overhaul involves फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र चाहिए it become आउट of अनुक्रम or broken ( known as repair, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also includes performing दिनचर्या क्रियाएँ जिससे रखना the यंत्र in working अनुक्रम ( ज्ञात as अनुसूचित maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be defined as, `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in जिससे it can perform इसके जरूरी function.
The actions include the combination of all तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक, managerial, और पर्यवेक्षण actions. ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer, i.e. a service is being offered, or whether the उत्पाद is खरीदा by the reprocessing संगठन और बेची to कोई ग्राहक wishing to मेक the खरीदें ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former case it may be a backshop आपरेशन भीतर a larger संगठन or छोटी आपरेशन.
the पूर्व of ये represents a बंद लूप सप्लाई कड़ी और प्रायः रै the पैमाना of maintenance, repair or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an खोलें लूप सप्लाई कड़ी और is typified by refurbishment और remanufacture.
The प्रमुख characteristic of the बंद लूप प्रणाली is कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched with the supply of a used product.
Neglecting asset write-offs और असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of the उत्पाद between the ग्राहक और the service provider remains constant.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of वेल्स, और डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और third-eldest पोता of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ ii और प्रिंस Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of succession, behind उसके पिता, to the तख्तों of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Prince William was educated at four schools in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of st एंड्रयूज.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, बेलीज़, तंजानिया, और कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया और holidayed अनेक टाइम्स.
Prince विलियम रै भी लिया kiswahili अध्ययन at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and, दो सालो बाद, अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at Royal Air Force College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the royal एयर फ़ोर्स, थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर flying training in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force.
in 2010, he समाप्त उसके सामान्य और special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on No. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
प्रिंस विलियम शादीशुदा उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड, कैथरीन Middleton, on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey.
Hours prior to उसके विवाह, प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, Earl of Strathearn, and Baron Carrickfergus.
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), better known by उसके स्टेज नाम soulja लड़के बताना 'em, or बस soulja लड़के, is an अमरीकी rapper, रिकार्ड निर्माता, actor, and entrepreneur.
in सितंबर 2007, उसके सिंगल `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the अंतरजाल, और it बाद became a number-one hit in the संयुक्त राज्य for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007.
On August 17 Way was listed at # 18 on the फोर्ब्स सूची of hip-hop नकदी किंग्स of 2010 कमाई $ 7 लाख for that year.
Way has फिलहाल released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम और एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
However, उसके अगला दो एल्बम, isouljaboytellem ( 2008 ) और the deandre रास्ता ( 2010 ) किया नहीं मैच the वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू, the latter तभी selling 100,000 नक़ल, despite the success of several singles across both albums, such as `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope रिकॉर्ड जिससे meant a सीमित राशि of रिकॉर्ड यहूद बना उपलब्धियाँ to the पब्लिक.
As of 2011, Way रै पुष्टि he is working on उसके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, हकदार USA DRE, which will be released in 2013.
The electron हस्तांतरण कड़ी in the सूत्रकणिका is the साईट of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The NADH and succinate generated in the साइट्रिक एसिड साईकिल हैं oxidized, providing उर्जा to शक्ति एटीपी synthase.
Photosynthetic इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण कड़ी of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an electron donor ( such as nadh ) और an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) साथ the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) आरपार a झिल्ली.
The resulting electrochemical proton gradient is used to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप of एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( एटीपी ).
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms प्रयुक्त लिये extracting उर्जा इससे धूप in photosynthesis और भी इससे रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, लाइट ड्राइव the परिवर्तन of जल to ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to nadph साथ ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the परिवर्तन of ऑक्सीजन to जल, nadh to naD+ और succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient.
Electron हस्तांतरण जंजीरों हैं प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, ultracet, ultram in the यूएसए, ralivia, zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in कनाडा or adolonta in स्पेन ) is a centrally एक्टिंग सिंथेटिक analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
the ड्रग रै a चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग, सहित उपचार of आमवातीय गठिया, restless legs syndrome, motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
It was शुभारम्भ और marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces serotonin रिलीज and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to o-desmethyltramadol, a significantly अधिक potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished इससे अन्य अधिक potent opioid agonists by सापेक्ष selectivity लिये μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an अमरीकी पूर्व stockbroker, निवेश सलाहकार, फाइनेंसर, और श्वेत कॉलर दण्ड.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market, and the admitted operator of a पेन्शन योजना कि is माना to be the largest वित्तीय fraud in U.S. history.
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm बर्नार्ड L. madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960, और थी इसके अध्यक्ष until his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on वॉल गली, जिससे bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by सीधे निष्पादित आदेश over the काउंटर इससे खुदरा brokers.
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior मैनेजिंग निदेशक और मुख्य अनुपालन अधिकारी ; पीटर रै चूंकि महरूम sentenced to 10 years in prison.
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney, and his बेटे एंड्रयू और चिह्नित ( चिह्नित वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by फांसी exactly दो सालो बाद उसके father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told authorities that their father had confessed to them that the एसेट प्रबन्धन ईकाई of उसके कड़ थी a विशाल पेन्शन योजना, और कोटेड उसे as describing it as `` एक बिग झूठ. ''
The following दिन, एफबीआई एजेंटों गिरफ्तार madoff और चार्ज उसे साथ एक count of securities fraud.
The U.S. प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक ) था previously conducted investigations into Madoff 's business practices, but did not uncover the massive fraud.
In March 2009, Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies और admitted to turning उसके माल प्रबन्धन कारोबार into a विशाल पेन्शन योजना कि झांसे thousands of investors of billions of dollars.
Madoff said he began the Ponzi योजना in the जल्दी 1990s.
However, संघीय जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s, and those charged with recovering the missing money believe the investment operation may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing इससे क्लाएंट खाते, सहित fabricated gains, थी लगभग $ 65 billion.
The court-appointed ट्रस्टी अनुमानित वास्तविक नुकसान to investors of $ 18 billion.
On June 29, 2009, he was sentenced to 150 सालो in थाना, the अधिकतम अनुमत.
Administrative Professionals Day ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public administrative एजेंसी, जिससे रै शक्तियां और प्रक्रियाओं resembling those of a अदालत of विधि or न्यायधीश, और जिससे is obligated to objectively determine तथ्य and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action.
Such actions are able to remedy a situation or impose legal दंड, और may affect the विधिक अधिकारों, कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट पार्टियों.
Monument of Tycho Brahe और योहानेस कॅप्लर in प्राग
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen Brahe, was a Danish nobleman ज्ञात लिये उसके सटीक और व्यापक खगोलीय और ग्रहीय observations.
He was born in Scania, then part of डेनमार्क, अभी भाग of modern-day स्वीडन.
Tycho थी खूब ज्ञात in उसके आजीवन as an astronomer and alchemist.
in उसके de नोवा स्टेला ( on the नई स्टार ) of 1573, he refuted the aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated कि `` नई सितारों, '' ( stellae novae, अभी ज्ञात as supernovae ) in particular कि of 1572, lacked the लंबन अपेक्षित in sub-lunar phenomena, और यहूद इसलिए not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed, but were above the atmosphere and moon.
Using similar measurements he दिखाया कि धूमकेतुओं यहूद भी नहीं वायुमंडलीय phenomena, as previously विचार, और जरूर pass through the माना `` immutable '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical लाभ of the copernican प्रणाली साथ the philosophical लाभ of the ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना मॉडल of the ब्रह्मांड, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he was the पिछला of the प्रमुख नग्न नजर खगोलशास्त्रियों, working बगैर telescopes for his observations.
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the द्वीप of hven और the funding to निर्माण the uraniborg, an जल्दी शोध संस्थान, जहाँ he निर्मित विशाल खगोलीय यंत्र और took अनेक careful माप, and later Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories ऐसे as paper-making to provide सामग्री लिये मुद्रण his results.
After मतभिन्नता साथ the नई डैनिश किंग ईसाई iv in 1597, he थी आमंत्रित by the bohemian किंग और पावन Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He निर्मित the नई वेधशाला at Benátky nad Jizerou.
Here, from 1600 until his death in 1601, he was assisted by योहानेस कॅप्लर जो बाद प्रयुक्त tycho 's खगोलीय आंकड़ा to develop कॅप्लर 's laws of planetary motion.
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul, South Korea, जिससे थी अलग इससे yeongdeungpo ज़िला on अप्रैल 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the city, where besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति as a हस्तांतरण कड़ी जिससे contains railroads, जमीन रूट इससे the बाकी of Seoul to the south of the country.
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway lines कनेक्ट सियोल to बुसान और इंचियोन.
In addition, Seoul Metropolitan Subway lines 1, 2, और 7, और प्रमुख राजमार्गों प्रतिच्छेद in Guro District.
The name Guro originates इससे the लेजेंड कि नौ ( ) बूढ़ा मेन ( कोरियाई : ro ) enjoyed आयु in the district.
A digital औद्योगिक जटिल is स्तिथ in guro District.
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile निर्माण, dressmaking और अन्य labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967, रै महरूम rapidly बदला into an it औद्योगिक complex.
This complex played a pivotal role in the आर्थिक विकास of the दक्षिण कोरियाई 's विकास era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी ``, और also contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s.
Twenty-one percent of the total area of Guro District is a प्रतिबंधित मण्डल to be प्रयुक्त as a greenbelt साथ the तभी arboretum in Seoul.
The zone is changing into a lively district as विशाल labour-intensive कारखानों हैं चलती इससे the क्षेत्रफल और the परिषद is developing what it terms its four zones.
An `` e-government `` system आधारित on इस hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9, 2007, साथ the भागीदारी of अधिक than thirty-seven countries.
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors सहित आंद्रे santini ( issy-les-moulineaux, फ़्रांस ), केविन foy ( चैपल हिल, us ), apirak kosayothin ( बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड ), uvais मोहम्मद emthiyas ( कोलोन, Sri Lanka ), and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford, UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro Declaration, अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम, aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट लिये e-government विकास और to स्थापित a कंक्रीट project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities.
This अभ्यास रै महरूम recognised लिये providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण step in the development of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among cities, to provide i.t. उद्यमों स्तिथ in guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल the अवसर to लॉन्च into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मार्केट, to improve इसके चित्र और become a वैश्विक नेता to कंक्रीट e-democracy.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on February 7–9, 2007
A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in ट्रांसक्रिप्शन इससे cantonese ; मंदारिन : húndùn ) is a प्रकार of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a number of Chinese cuisines.
Many people were शामिल in the आविष्कार of रेडियो as we अभी know it.
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered, including inductive और capacitive प्रेरण और हस्तांतरण through the मैदान, however the विधि प्रयुक्त लिये रेडियो आज exclusively involves the हस्तांतरण और रिसेप्शन of electromagnetic waves.
After जल्दी अटकलें on the विषय, प्रायोगिक कार्य on the कनेक्शन between विद्युत और चुंबकत्व began around 1820 साथ the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and continued with the work of André-Marie Ampère, Joseph Henry, and Michael Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the पूरा सिद्धान्त of विद्युत्चुम्बकत्व विकसित by जेम्स Clerk Maxwell.
This सिद्धान्त वर्णित the सैद्धांतिक आधार of the propagation of electromagnetic waves.
After मैक्सवेल 's सिद्धान्त थी प्रकाशित अनेक लोगों experimented साथ बेतार communication, some intentionally using Maxwell 's theory some not.
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a signal by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें थी performed by दाउद एडवर्ड ह्यूजेस around 1880, हालांकि इस थी माना to be प्रेरण at the time.
The first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM लहरें थी performed by heinrich रुडॉल्फ हर्ट्ज़ और वर्णित in papers प्रकाशित in 1887 और 1890.
Hertz famously माना ये परिणाम as होने of छोटी practical value.
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and सिद्धान्त शामिल साथ the हस्तांतरण और रिसेप्शन of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक waves.
Others, notably Guglielmo मार्कोनी, यहूद चिंतित साथ व्यावहारिक सुधार और the वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग of रेडियो to बेतार telegraphy.
बाद on रेगिनाल्ड A. fessenden became the पहला to भेजें an ऑडियो सिग्नल by अर्थात् of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a बीमारी resulting इससे a कमियां of विटामिन c, जिससे is जरूरी for the synthesis of collagen in humans.
The chemical name for vitamin C, ascorbic acid, is derived from the Latin नाम of स्कर्वी, scorbutus, जिससे भी provides the क्रियाशील scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ).
Scurvy often presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy, followed by गठन of धब्बे on the स्किन, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the thighs and legs, and a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks पाले, feels उदास, और is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be open, suppurating wounds, घाटा of दांत, पीलिया, ज्वर, न्यूरोपैथी और मौत.
Scurvy was at एक समय आम among sailors, pirates और अन्य सवार जहाजों at समुद्र longer than perishable फल और सब्जियां could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय तभी on cured and salted meats and dried grains ) and by soldiers similarly deprived of these foods for extended periods.
It was described by हिपोक्रेटिस ( c. 460 bc–c. 380 bc ), और हर्बल cures लिये स्कर्वी have महरूम ज्ञात in many native cultures since prehistory.
Scurvy was one of the limiting factors of समुद्री सफर, प्रायः हत्या विशाल संख्याएँ of the यात्री और क्रू on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the आधुनिक era in the आयु of डिस्कवरी in the 15th सदी, continuing to play a significant role through World War I in the 20th century.
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional deficiency, until the isolation of विटामिन c और सीधा प्रमाण of इसके कड़ी to स्कर्वी in 1932, numerous theories और उपचार यहूद प्रस्तावित, often on little or no experimental data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin c as a पृथक अवधारणा, an अक्षमता to reliably कड़ी अलग भोजन ( notably उपस्थित in भैस citrus, watercress, and organ meat ) to scurvy.
An additional concept required to understand स्कर्वी थी the degradation of विटामिन c by एक्सपोज़र to एयर और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल लवण ऐसे as those of आयरन, यूँ बदलना the कड़ी of भोजन to स्कर्वी over time.
उपचार by भैस खाना, विशेषकर citrus फल, थी periodically implemented, as it had been since antiquity.
However जबतक the 1930s, उपचार थी असंगत, साथ अनेक अप्रभावी treatments used into the 20th century.
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy, James Lind who first proved it could be treated साथ citrus फल in प्रयोग he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब, a treatise of the स्कर्वी, हालांकि उसके सलाह थी नहीं implemented by the royal नेवी लिये अनेक decades.
In infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as barlow 's बीमारी, नामित बाद सर थामस barlow, a अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक जो वर्णित it.
However, Barlow 's disease may भी refer to mitral वाल्व prolapse.
Other eponyms लिये स्कर्वी शामिल moeller 's बीमारी and Cheadle 's disease.
Scurvy does not occur in most animals because वे can synthesize उनके अपना विटामिन C.
However, humans and other higher primates ( the simians - बंदरों और apes - और tarsiers ), गिनी सूअर, सबसे or सब bats, और कुछ प्रजाति of पक्षियों और मछली कमी an एंजाइम ( l-gulonolactone oxidase ) जरुरी लिये such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet.
विटामिन c is फैली in संयंत्र ऊतकों, साथ विशेषकर ऊँची एकाग्रता occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, and green peppers.
Iron is a chemical element with the प्रतीक fe ( इससे ) और परमाणु क्रमांक 26.
It is a metal in the पहला परिवर्तन श्रेणी.
It is the most common element ( by mass ) forming the planet Earth as a पूरे, forming much of धरती 's बाहरी और भीतरी कोर.
It is the fourth most common तत्व in the धरती 's क्रस्ट.
Iron 's very common presence in rocky ग्रह जैसे धरती is due to इसके abundant उत्पादन as a परिणाम of संलयन in high-mass सितारों, जहाँ the उत्पादन of nickel-56 ( जिससे decays to the सबसे आम समस्थानिक of आयरन ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
इस कल्याणकारी रेडियोसक्रिय निकल to become the पिछला तत्व to be उत्पादित पहले पतन of a supernova leads to the explosive events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 elements, iron exists in a wide range of ऑक्सीकरण राज्य, −2 to +6, हालांकि +2 और +3 हैं the सबसे आम.
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids और अन्य कम ऑक्सीजन environments, लकिन is reactive to oxygen and water.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, लकिन oxidize in सामान्य एयर to दे hydrated आयरन आक्साइड, commonly known as rust.
Unlike many other metals which रूप passivating ऑक्साइड परतों, आयरन आक्साइड occupy अधिक आवाज़ than iron metal, and thus iron oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion.
Iron metal रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि तांबे alloys, जिससे have lower melting temperatures, were used first in history.
Pure iron is नरम ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ), लकिन is unobtainable by smelting.
The material is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities इससे the smelting प्रक्रम, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces स्टील, जिससे may be up to 1000 टाइम्स harder than pure iron.
crude आयरन मेटल is उत्पादित in धमाका furnaces, जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया by कोक to सुअर आयरन, which has a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon सामग्री to the सही proportion to मेक स्टील.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the सबसे आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग, due to उनके ग्रेट दायरा of वांछनीय गुण और the प्रचुरता of आयरन.
Iron chemical compounds, जिससे शामिल अमिश्रित और ferric यौगिकों, have many uses.
आयरन ऑक्साइड मिश्रित साथ एल्युमिनियम powder can be ignited to create a thermite reaction, used in welding and purifying ores.
It forms binary compounds with the हैलोजन्स और the chalcogens.
Among its organometallic यौगिकों is ferrocene, the पहला सैंडविच यौगिक खोजा.
Iron plays an important role in जीवविज्ञान, forming देवालय साथ आणविक ऑक्सीजन in हीमोग्लोबिन और myoglobin ; ये दो यौगिकों हैं आम oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates.
आयरन is भी the मेटल प्रयुक्त at the क्रियाशील साईट of अनेक महत्वपूर्ण रेडॉक्स एंजाइमों dealing साथ cellular respiration and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross Blue Shield संघ ( bcbsa ) is a संघ of 38 पृथक स्वास्थ्य बीमे संगठन and companies in the United States.
Combined, they directly or indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे to over 99 million Americans.
The history of Blue Cross dates back to 1929, जबकि the इतिहास of ब्लू शील्ड तिथियाँ to 1939.
The Blue Cross संघ तिथियाँ वापस to 1960, जबकि इसके ब्लू शील्ड बंटवारा थी created in 1948.
The two organizations merged in 1982, forming the वर्तमान संघ.
A potato chip ( ज्ञात as a चिप in अमरीकी, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, नई जीलैंड, कनाडाई, singaporean, हांग काँग, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी और jamaican अंग्रेज़ी ; as a कुरकुरे in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी और hiberno-english, and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly परोसा as an क्षुधावर्धक, पक्ष डिश, or स्नैक.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; अतिरिक्त किस्में हैं manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और संघटक सहित seasonings, herbs, मसाले, cheeses, और कृत्रिम additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may भी refer to अनेक अलग प्रकार of savory स्नैक उत्पाद बेची in the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड, कुछ बना from potato, but may also be made from maize, tapioca or other cereals.
An example of ये kinds of savory स्नैक्स is दानव Munch.
Potato चिप्स हैं a predominant भाग of the स्नैक खाना मार्केट in english-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations.
The global आलू चिप मार्केट उत्पन्न कुल revenues of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
This accounted for 35.5 % of the कुल savory स्नैक्स मार्केट in कि साल ( us $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( April 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) was a lawyer, politician और skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट और in the हाउस of Representatives.
He served three different शर्तें as स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और थी भी Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He lost his campaigns for अध्यक्ष in 1824, 1832 और 1844.
Clay was a dominant फिगर in दोनो the पहला और दूसरी पार्टी systems.
As a leading युद्ध हॉक in 1812, he favored युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant भूमिका in अग्रणी the nation to war in the War of 1812.
In 1824 he ran for president and lost, but threw his electoral मत to जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, जो बना उसे सचिव of राज्य as the jacksonians denounced कया वे माना a `` भ्रष्ट सौदेबाजी. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the प्रत्याशी of the whig पार्टी, जिससे he संस्थापित और प्रायः dominated.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to फोस्टर उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य, the उपयोग of संघीय funding to निर्माण और maintain अवसंरचना, and a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it होता इंजेक्ट the गुलामी समस्या into politics.
Clay भी opposed the mexican-american युद्ध और the `` manifest नियति `` policy of Democrats, which cost him votes in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` Great pacificator, '' मिट्टी brokered महत्वपूर्ण compromises दौरान the nullification संकट और on the slavery issue.
As part of the `` Great triumvirate `` or `` अमर तिकड़ी, '' साथ साथ उसके सहयोगियों डेनियल वेबस्टर और जॉन C. calhoun, he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He थी viewed as the प्राथमिक प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी रूचि in इस समूह, और थी दिए the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, मिट्टी आयोजित स्लेव दौरान उसके आजीवन लकिन freed them in his Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the Whig leader in इलिनोइस, थी a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी, saying he was `` my ideal of a great man. ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly समर्थित मिट्टी 's आर्थिक programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee selected Clay as एक of the पाँच महानतम u.s. सीनेटरों, साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर, जॉन C. calhoun, रॉबर्ट La Follette, and Robert Taft.
BJ 's Wholesale Club, Inc., commonly referred to simply as BJ 's, is a membership-only गोदाम क्लबों कड़ी ऑपरेटिंग on the संयुक्त राज्य ईस्ट coast, as खूब as in the राज्य of ओहियो.
The company is ranked # 232 on सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग of अमेरिका 's 500 largest public corporations.
The जादूगर of oz, ज्ञात दौरान उसके शासनकाल as the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली oz, is the epithet of ऑस्कर zoroaster phadrig इसहाक़ नॉर्मन Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs, a fictional character in the Land of Oz, created by American author L. Frank Baum.
The character was further popularized by the क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म, wherein उसके पूरा नाम is not mentioned.
Kristinia जेमी debarge ( ; born कूच 8, 1990 ) is an American singer, songwriter, dancer and actress.
She first appeared on national television in 2003 as a प्रतियोगी on the अमरीकी आइडल spin-off, अमरीकी juniors.
In 2009, DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records विभाग sodapop, releasing उसके डेब्यू एल्बम उजागर in जुलाई of the वही year.
The first single, `` अलविदा ``, पहुँचे the शीर्ष 20 in the US and Canada.
The lead single ( `` Cry Wolf '' ) इससे उसके बेनाम sophomore एल्बम थी released on सितंबर 27, 2012.
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of hawaiʻi at mānoa in ncaa प्रभाग I FBS college football.
The टोली is coached by Norm Chow.
It was part of the Western Athletic Conference जबतक जुलाई 2012, जब the टोली joined the Mountain West Conference.
The Hawaii Warriors were the third non-AQ टोली to खेल in a bcs कटोरी खेल ; खोने to जॉर्जिया 41–10 in the शुगर कटोरी on जनवरी 1, 2008 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Marvin Gaye ( अप्रैल 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born मारविन pentz gay, jr., थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell, बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the बागडोर of इसके production company.
Gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul.
Following a काल in यूरोपीय अंतर्गत a कर निर्वासन in the जल्दी 1980s, gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the चट्टान and Roll Hall of Fame.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the सेंट्रल अधिकारियों of the Soviet Union.
An explosion और आग released विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित, और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities are still being accounted for.
